title: Sounds great, but low battery life
body: They really do sound good, but the battery life of the charger is low. I travel a lot of work, and I use them at the gym so this is somewhat problematic. I have to remember to charge them when I get home even after moderate use or they are dead when I go to the gym.

title: Comfortable & great sounding earbuds
body: Really like my new earbuds.  They are comfortable and fit well with the ability to swap out the rubber ear piece to get the best fit.  My music sounds great with a nice balance of low, mids and highs.  So far, talking on the phone has been clear.  The callers on the other end can hear me good and clear too.  The charging case is a nice feature as well.

title: These are the best earbuds for music!!!
body: I am soooo pleased with these earbuds!  I’ve tried others and had to return them.  Pairing of others was a challenging task.  These paired effortlessly!  The sound quality was so pleasantly surprising.  I followed the instructions to find the best fitting cushion.  The fit is perfect.  I’m hoping battery life won’t be a problem.

title: Great Sound Quality and Waterproof In Steam Room
body: Love these earbuds, needed them to use in a steam room and they work fabulously.  Sound quality is great, bass is amazing.  Only issue I had is that it disconnected from my far below the the 32 feet, or 10 Meters, it claimed.  Also, if I wore only 1, earbud, the music would skip/or fade in and out.  I did buy them for the steam room and they work wonderfully.

title: Excellent Quality, Sound, and battery life
body: These earbuds are excellent! They have some of the best sound quality I've heard in addition to a great battery life. they are also very user-friendly and I have had no issues with their connectivity to each other or my phone. My one minor complaint would be that they do not automatically pair to my phone when they turn on. However I am willing to bear with this minor annoyance for the price. Overall, I would say these are some of the best wireless earbuds you can get for $50 and would highly recommend them to anyone interested in true wireless earbuds.

title: Can't skip track or change volume. Range not great.
body: Overall I like them. It's nice not to have to worry about getting them wet. When I have my phone in my cycling jersey pocket though I lose connection to the headphones occasionally which is pretty annoying. Some say you get a 30ft range, but inside a pocket with only my shoulders in the way it cuts out if I turn my head. I also wish I could do to the next track since I use them on a bike.

title: Decent but not for me.
body: I truly wanted these to be the answer to my personal office music situation. First the good... These are very reasonably priced. The sound produced is better than expected for the price paid. The concept of a case that recharges it's earbuds multiple times without having to re-plug these into a recharging USB port is great. The recharging time is very fast when compared to the amount of time that you receive playing music. Now the bad... I had hoped to be able to plug the case into a wall outlet rather than a USB port for charging purposes. Not a deal breaker but it would have been nice. Next, the instructions that I received do not list all options; for example, how to turn off the earbuds. Not a deal breaker as I eventually figured this out on my own. Finally... these are extremely uncomfortable regardless which set of earcaps I used (S, M, L or XL). I had to use the small sized earcaps as none of the other sizes would stay in my ears. With the small earcaps, I was able to get them to stay as long as I sat at my desk and didn't make any sudden movements, but after about an hour, these earbuds became very uncomfortable. I need something that I can wear for 8 hours without discomfort. This was my deal breaker.

title: Company "bribes" for stars
body:
Just an FYI, I returned these because the sound quality wasn't great and I had connectivity issues with it. However, it is worth noting that shortly after ordering, I started receiving emails asking me to review the product and I would receive a free charging disc at no cost to me.

I responded that I hadn't had the product long enough to warrant a true review and asked it a review was necessary to receive the product... no reply was given.

Just saying beware about the high number of stars, I don't think it's a legit reflection of opinions.

title: Almost perfect
body: The product is great! The only thing that i can complain about is how it is hold in my ears. It is really not stable, and i have a felling all the time that it falls off... The rest is great. Maybe, there is some additional apliance to solve this problem.

title: Great value!
body: A very good value for the money. The wireless charging is a great update and it still has the micro usb charging port as well for travel. Sound quality is much better than expected. Good bass and noise reduction  is better than expected.

title: Good product. Very good customer service
body: These earbuds have great sound and noise cancellation. The fit is very good and stay in my eats even during a workout. One earbud had a problem and the customer service was great and got me a replacement right away. Definitely recommend this product

title: I wanted to like these, but...
body:
I really wanted to like these ear buds. Construction looks decent. Reviews were fairly positive and I don't like cords. I would however, not recommend these earbuds. While the sound is good in ideal conditions, they are marginal the rest of the time.

Fit--the rubber tips that came with the Tozo T10 are very uncomfortable. I had to use tips from another set of earbuds. And having tried 7 or 8 different set, I have to keep re-adjusting the earbuds.

Connectivity--they pair fairly easily, but the signal is weak. Because the right earbud is the master, I can not put my phone in my left pocket or they will not get a signal. They might be better than Bluetooth 4.2, but not by much. Sound fades out of the left side if I'm walking. And the sound is not consistent between the two side. Sitting at a desk or table with work fine.

Battery life--surprised how small the battery in the case is.

title: Cordless Bliss for Smol Ears
body:
I was highly impressed with these Bluetooth earbuds as soon as I started using them!

I bought these because I have smaller ear canals that do not work with the AirPods or other non-silicone in-ear buds. I was skeptical about shelling out 50 bucks but the reviews convinced me on this pair and I’m super happy with my choice!

Pros:
- Incredible sound quality. Impeccable bass and treble / vocals sound super clear as well.
- Large range of volume. I usually have these set around 5 or 6, well below the max iPhone volume, and get almost no sound interference. They’re plenty loud with seemingly no loss of quality.
- EASY Bluetooth pairing! Once set up, they connect automatically in ~10 seconds to each other and my phone as soon as I take them out of their case.
- Sleek, magnetic charging case. I love the magnetized slots for the buds within the case and the fact that it holds about 4 charges.
- Comfortable, easy in-ear fit.

Cons:
- They are a taddddd bulky and look like they’re sticking out of my (relatively small) ears quite a bit. This is a negligible note since they’re still super comfy and the sound quality is GREAT!

title: Almost perfect
body: These are wonderful. They cancel sound very well even without music, which I like because of the loud work environment Im in. When I bought them one of the ear buds would lose its charge in half of the time as the other one and I notified the company and was able to get a replacement very quickly. Wonderful customer service.

title: Great sound!
body: I really like these ear buds. I was worried they would fall out of my ears. They come with several different sizes of ear tips. They fit great. Great noise cancelling. Its nice not to have a cord attached. I have two negatives or i would have given 5 stars. They pair automatically except i have to open my phone to tell it to pair. I dont have to do that with my car or my small blue tooth speaker.  As soon as i get in range they pair automatically.  The other is that it has to be in direct site to play. If i put my phone in my back pocket it cuts out.  These are very small compaired to the quality you get. These are the best blue tooth ear buds i have used.

title: Great price and easy to use
body: Picked these up to use at work. So far so good. Very easy to use out of the box and impressed with the sound so far. Definitely a good deal for the price point

title: Love these! Super easy to use and connects with all my devices
body: Loving these headphones so far. The battery life is great and the headphones connect with all my devices. I previously had issues connect Bluetooth headphones to my computer but these easily connect and the sound quality is great. They are small and compact. I love the case, its all magnetic and the headphones has a designated space for each bud. Would recommend!

title: Affordable quality product.
body: I just got these today and I have to say that I'm impressed. The sound quality is very good for the price range. You can hear all the highs, mids, and feel the beat of the bass in your ear. Voices sound clear and undistorted. From out of the box and paired to my iPhone XS it took less than a minute. The battery only lasts 3 hours for music and 5 hours for talk so if that's important to you then you might want to consider other options. However with that being said the case can recharge the headphones up to 4 times before having to be recharged itself. The manual claims a 20-minute quick charge will get you 1 hour of life. They fit snugly in my ear without any discomfort and stay there just fine. There are different sized cushions for differently sized ear canals. Both the case and the headphones are waterproof. I've seen some people complain about these not working underwater. The manual clearly states with visuals that these will not work underwater as Bluetooth signal bounces off the surface of the water. If you were to ask me I'd say go ahead and buy them. Even if they aren't your main pair of true wireless earbuds then they'd make an excellent backup pair.

title: 2 pairs
body: Just bought an extra pair. They Re definitely beat headphones for the price. I like to wear them while I run and I sweat a lot. They are definitely water resistant.  I have broken beats and many other headphones that were supposed to be water resistant.  I would recommend these 100 percent.  I will never buy another brand

title: Can't swim with them, but the sound quality is great.
body: These earbuds work awesome until you go under water with them, the only reason i give the 4 stars is "waterproof" to me means i should be able to swim with them on. Other than that these little earbuds with such a low price pack a nice punch and sound great, i will enjoy these for a long time.

title: Really work - even in my ears
body: I love the T10 earbuds. I have the kind of ears that will not hold Apple earbuds. They just fall out. I have not been able to find others that stay in my ears reliably, until I bought the T10s. I did 50 jumping jacks wearing the earbuds yesterday morning, and they stayed in place! Today, I gave them a more rigorous trial. I did a 30-minute P90X3 workout called CVX that involves lots of jumping up and down - lots of impact. The earbuds stayed in place the whole time - no problem! The sound is so good, that although I have done this workout at least 20 times in the past, this time, I heard parts of the commentary that I had never heard before. My previous earbuds had carrying cradles with hooks that went over the ears. They worked fine as long as there was not abrupt movement or bouncing. Then they would come loose and fall off. This even happened when I was on my rowing machine. The T10s, in contrast, are rock steady regardless of my movements. I also find that they pair easily with my iPhone, and my iPad, and my MacBook Air. And while I had trouble with my old earbuds when trying to switch from one device to another, the T10s are a breeze to switch between devices. I've only owned the T10s for 3 days, but so far, they seem to be an excellent product.

title: Fantastic earbus
body: I've owned a couple of sets of wireless earbuds like these, however, these surpass any of the others.  The sound quality is supurb; battery life is extremely long.  The wireless charging of the base is a unique feature and one that really drew me to this product as I have wireless charging pads all around my apartment and office, so to be able to just drop the base down on one and charge is a feature I'll never grow tired of.

title: They’re GGGGrat !!!!!!
body: I bought a pair for my son in-law for a Fathers Day gift for him. He love them and said how great they were, so I ordered me a pair. I agree, they’re great.

title: Easy and Quick
body: I got these ear phones for my Fire and Audible books.  Once in my ears they "melt" away and you forget they are there.  With no connecting wires you can turn your head and they do not move.

title: Sound is AMAZING, range sucks :( VERY SAD :(
body: I ordered these to swim laps in a pool with, it says not for swimming. But it says you cant go underwater with em n use BT bc the water breaks up the signal.  No problem I dont ever get my head wet anyway. I tried these out n I was working on our 35'RV n it's good up to 10 meters(32'). It kept cutting out at about 28'-30' range. Cant even use a back yard pool with these.  Very sad as the sound is AMAZING! I LOVE EM, there comfy and many size plugs to fit any ear, but unless you have your device less than 20' away from you these will leave you frustrated. Everything is great with these buds expect the range. #sadpanda

title: Great quality for price!
body: I recently bought a pair of the Tozo t10 wireless earbuds , and could not be happier with the quality especially for the low price. I’ve been looking for a wireless earbud that is comfortable and cost effective, without sacrificing sound quality, so far Tozo has done exactly that. The sound is rich and full, they are comfortable to wear compared to other earbuds, and they connect very easily. For the price there is no better!

title: Horrible
body: I wonder if the reviews here are for this item!  These earbuds are HUGE!  I received the earbuds yesterday.  I plugged in the charging box, to see that it is charging, you have to view from the top.  Once the box was charged I put in the earbuds to charge.  The light on the buds never turned from red to blue after hours of charging.  I use my earbuds to sleep so I removed them from the case and they paired with relative ease.  The sound was o.k. but there was a lot of fading in and out on the left side.  They would play for about a half hour and then nothing; once I turned them off and on they would play again.  For sleeping, these buds are ear splitting big and they did NOT come with different sized tips.  I am returning these post haste.  EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTING PRODUCT.

title: Great Product, Great Price! Highly Recommend!
body:
I am very happy with my purchase of TOZO wireless earbuds! They are very comfortable and do not fall out even when working out. The sound quality is clear and loud. Even if I have the volume very low, the noise cancelling feature works great! I love these so much I got a pair for my dad too! We love them! Also, the battery pack can charge them 4x and you can put a string on the charger too so you can wear it on your neck if you have no pockets.

My only con is that the left earbud cannot connect without the right earbud being connected. But they're identical, so you can use the right one in the left ear if you want, so I still gave it 5 stars.

title: a huge disappointment
body:
I decided to try these out as my first foray into single earbuds. I really wanted to like them and picked these for the extra features of the Qi charging, waterproof status and decent case.

It only took me a few days to realize this product was subpar. The sound was weak. I swapped out all the different ear bud pieces to find the right fit, nothing. My volume was maxed out on my phone (tried 3 different devices) to the same result. I normally am listening comfortably at 50% volume.

These also did nothing for canceling noise. At first I thought, ok, maybe I read the description wrong, maybe these ARE for hearing the ambient sound (not a bad feature in itself) but the features to rate this product includes a Noise Cancelletion option so this is clearly not the case.

On to the battery life. One word, horrid. I have previous wireless bluetooth headsets that do remarkably well, 5, 6 hours. The most disappointing and unacceptable part however was how it dies. I watch the % as I'm listening , 100%, 90%, 80%... After about an hour or more the sound degrades rapidly and if I check and see it at 60 or 50%, it starts to noise dive and drops to 40/30/20 and dead in less than 10 minutes. This simply sucks in my book and not going to work for any of my longer activities.

going back to the skull candy bluetooth, rock solid and better sound even after 1 year of use.

title: Amazing value, I just wished they worked with a Pixel 2
body:
Right off the bat: I got a pair of these delivered, they would work for an hour or so and then I'd have major signal issues.  Left ear would cut out, right ear, the whole thing.  This ONLY occurs when I am moving and can sometimes be mitigated by not having my phone in my pocket.  That said,I worked with an Amazon rep to walk through a bunch of solutions and nothing worked.  They sent a replacement pair and I had the exact same problem.

All of that said, there is a very good chance that the problem is with my phone, a Pixel 2.  If you have a P2 or P2XL, you will remember that there were many issues at launch with Bluetooth connectivity.  I genuinely believe it is a compatibility issue.  I will say that I tried almost every configuration of settings I could (AVRCP versions, Bluetooth Audio Codecs, Sample rates, etc) and wasn't able to find any particular setup that would mitigate the problem. Also, I had a pair of BeatsX (that died prematurely, do NOT buy them) that never had any kind of signal issue like this.  I've also had other devices that worked great (fitness trackers, Bluetooth speakers) and did not have an issue with any of them.

So in short: the audio, battery life and usability of these earbuds is absolutely astonishing for $50.  If you have a device they will work with, I can't imagine a better value.  But as I said, they are all but useless to me at this point. Luckily the return process seems to be fantastic so I'm not out anything.  Also, I'm not seeing other folks have the problem so it is possible I got two bad pairs but I don't think so.  I just think it's a combination of issues around Pixel 2 Bluetooth, Android/Bluetooth versioning and the antenna setup on these particular earbuds.  Caveat Emptor if you have a Pixel 2.

title: Great product!
body: Great product at a very good price. I love the way these look and feel and I especially like the various air bud sizes. I can never seem to get earbuds to stay in place when I run, however the smallest sized earbud fits comfortably! Worth every penny!

title: These are fantastic!
body: Order several other earbuds and had to send them back. These are great because they connect to any device quickly.  If you find its not connecting to a device it just means its probably connect to a second device you were using. Trust me when I say this is a quality item.  I may order a second pair just to have for travel.  Great find!

title: Great product at an unbeatable price.
body: I did a lot of research before deciding on these ear buds. Many of the review videos I watched rated these better than the big name brand competitors. Once I received the product, I can honestly say I was happy I went with these. The sound quality is amazing, and they seem to be very well made. Easy to connect and start using within seconds out of the box. Well worth $50.

title: Great quality for great price
body: These earbuds are amazing quality for an amazing price. They have great sound quality and are very comfortable. My ears are small so it is difficult to find comfortable earbuds, but these are great and have 4 different sizes for all ears.

title: Great sound, good fit
body: I was skeptical to purchase these shape headphones because they are too large for my ears but these came with different size options. I can move my head around as much as I please and they stay in. They give great sound and a definitely noise canceling. The only complaint I have it that the microphone is not the strongest and it is hard for people to hear me when on the phone but that was something I expecting with the size of them. For the most part I love the headphone and I would 100% reccomend them for music and videos.

title: Solid Wireless Earbuds
body:
I love these earbuds! I have them on me constantly. They are incredibly easy to maneuver into a comfortable position from the case to your ear. Most of the time I do it with one hand.

The package comes with three sizes of ear buds that you can swap out to reach the ideal comfort and noise cancellation. The ear buds stay in my ear really well. Once they’re in, I don’t have to adjust them at all. I’ve gone on 10 mile runs without having to worry about them at all. I also have no issue with their comfort or ability to stay in during high mobility and high impact workouts.

I haven’t put them through a rough test for waterproofing such as swimming. However, in a heavy rain while out running, there is no degradation in quality, comfort, or connection.

One small downside is that occasionally the left earbud comes out of synchronized with the right earbud and takes a brief second to reconnect. I think this is mostly due to interfering signals. However, it is a rare occurrence. Usually while I’m operating power tools. Again, it doesn’t happen very often.

I don’t give 5-stars for noise cancellation because the cancellation isn’t active cancellation and depends on how much of a deal in your ear you can get from the rubber ear pieces. I never get a perfect seal, despite the different sizes. However, it works well enough that I dont have to worry about my lawnmower drowning out the sound.

Overall, these are lightweight, comfortable, high quality, and a good set of ear buds. They charge quickly and the charging case does as well. I love how compact they are and having them in my pocket everywhere I go. I appreciate the indicator lights that show operation and battery level. There are lots of good features for a solid set of headphones.

title: Get a set of Comply Audio Pro - SmartCore foam replacements and this is 5-star
body:
I originally bought a pair of high end Jaybirds but the manual said do not use in the shower, so I took them back. My use case is listening to podcasts (mostly spoken words, interviews, etc. I.e. not music) in the shower. I used to use a Bluetooth speaker for this and just crank it up, but then I had a newborn so can’t wake him.

I am “wow-ed” by these little guys!!!! SOooo much cheaper than the Jaybirds and they’re actually usable in the shower. I’ve had them for several weeks and have not run into issues, and have only had to charge them once or twice.

I deduct a star because the stock ear bud fits my ear and seals ok, but it can shift and then the sound isn’t matched between earbuds. I bought a set of Comply Audio Pro - SmartCore foam replacements and the difference is noticeable. The bass hits much harder and the seal is much better.

I have no qualms recommending these, and the price is fantastic. I’m pleasantly surprised.

title: Now I'm just sad.
body: Extremely disappointed. They paired nicely, had a good fit and sounded great for almost 10 seconds! Then the left ear bus kept going out every few seconds. I tried disconnecting and reconnecting several times and there was no change. Even tried with another device and same disapointment. Sadly I will have to return them. I was really hoping for some nice wireless ear buds.

title: Way more impressed than I expected
body: I picked these due to the high reviews. I didn't expect much. I've tried buds before and they either hurt my ears or fall out, but was optomistic. When I got to my was pretty excited that they were not only comfortable in my ears but extremely stable. They stayed in and I never got the feeling there were about to fall out. Once I started playing music through them I was even more impressed. The sound quality was amazing in the base was pretty impressive. I bought Jawbone years ago for big bucks and was pretty disappointed. Figured wireless buds were just garbage and not for me. These totally change my mind. I would recommend them to anyone.

title: The search for great earbuds is over
body: I had previously purchased several earbuds only to find that they were not suit to my preference. Most of these earbuds whether had bad sound effect or just frequently dropped bluetooth connection. I was about to consider purchasing an Apple earbud, which is cost more than one hundred bucks that I found this Tozo T10 on Amazon. I decided to give it a try before heading to Apple. To my astonishment, the sound was incredibly awesome, the treble and especially the bass were effectively echoed to my ears. I have used it for several days to listen to news and music, and every time I listened I was satisfied with the structure of this earbuds. The price is reasonable and the sound were great, what else could I wish for?

title: Super happy
body: When I received the earbuds, I was amazed at how well the instructions where written so that I knew exactly how to set up my earbuds for the first time. I used them right away listening as I did my school work. The sound quality is amazing, the workmanship is very nice and they are very comfortable. I’m very surprised that these earbuds only cost $45, my Bose cost 3 times this amount and the quality was poorer then what I have now. Once again great product.

title: Amazing sound and range!
body: These earbuds sound amazing and have the best range of any I've ever tried! I can't imagine there is a better product in this price range. I even wonder if the sound quality rival that of Apple's and other expensive buds.

title: Great product for the price
body: The sound quality on these are amazing to the fact that it almost drowns out outside noise. I have only been using for 4 days. I charge them and listen to music at work and the notification comes on to charge in about 3 hours. I have noticed that if I take out 1 earbud so I can hear around me at work it states that it is disconnected but, then it will automatically reconnect.

title: Amazing and comfortable product
body: Love this product amazing sound and comfortable fit.charging is fast for the price definitely a great purchase looking forward to more products from this manufacturer I give 5 stars because all around a quality earbuds and I'm enjoying them! Can't go wrong with the tozo T10 earbuds beautiful design!

title: Good but I like the t8 more
body: I bought the t o z o T8 a while back and was a huge fan of them. When I discovered there was a T-10 option I was excited to try it as well. The sound quality is still very good and I'm very happy with it. The size is significantly bigger than the T8 and it the fit does not feel as good to me as the t8s do. All in all for $30 it's a very solid headset with a recharging case and great quality

title: Good set of Earbuds.  Some connection issues when in an area with strong signals.
body: The earbuds seem to work well so far.  I do have some repeatable sound drop outs when walking through certain parts of my commute.  Must be strong signals in the area.  This is in a major train station.  The other issue I have, is the buttons on the earbuds require you to press pretty hard on them, forcing the buds hard into your ear, and making an uncomfortable air pressure sound in your ear.  The buttons are of the detent types, and not just touch sensitive buttons.  The case for the earbuds, is also a little large, making it hard to keep in your pocket.

title: Perfect to exercise
body: I bought these to be able to exercise without hearing the cables moving. The noise cancellation is great. Easy to pair, great quality sound. They had white as a color choice. It comes with different cap sizes to fit your ears. You can charge them in the box and wirelessly. You can also receive phone calls. I am VERY happy I bought them.

title: Left Ear Bud Issue Quickly Solved by Great Customer Service!
body: My left ear bud went out. Very unusual, I am told. Not sure about my warranty but it was after Amazon's return date. Contacted customer service on a Saturday. Received a reply that same day. Was told they would replace them. Incredibly, received my replacements on Wednesday. Impressive! No return of the old ones necessary. I love my ear buds so I can listen to Hair band music and Audible books  on my 7 mile daily mountain walks with my new rescue pupper. Special thanks to Katherine.

title: Almost Great, almost....
body:
It sucks that I have to write this, because these headphones are almost a great buy. So here is the deal, they have great sound, great range, actually VERY good range as I've walked 30ft from my device and still had connection. But here is the problem, everytime I want to use my headphones I have to listen to the most annoying beeping sound for a solid 10 minutes. EVERY TIME. Due to the nature of my work I  use one headphone, and so when I go to use the left bud it will start searching for the right one and thats what causes the beeping sound.  There is no way to disable this, some suggest that yo simply take out the other bud and put it in your pocket but when I try that my device will loose connection. Its possible that this is caused by malfunctioning devices so that will not effect my review.

Here is the deal, I would LOVE to give this 5 stars, if they were to produce an app or put a button on the charger device that disables the buds from searching than I would for sure change the rating. It's so damn annoying having to listen to a beep every 10 seconds for 10 minutes when I want to use my device.

title: Great sound and fitment, a real value!
body: Wow, great set of true wireless earbuds! Very impressed with the quality from the box to the actual earbuds. The material and workmanship A+. I have worn blue tooth headsets and but I thought I'd give wireless a try, but since I am a runner was afraid of losing, so I figured I will try with a inexpensive set first before purchasing a "higher end" set. I think I will keep my money and just stay with the Tozo10s. I've run with them and the noise cancelling is awesome. The rich bass really comes through. IPX8?! What?! For the money so far, this sounds as good if not better than the Jaybirds I have. Excellent, can't go wrong here!

title: Great earbuds
body: I've tried a number of Bluetooth earbuds prior to purchasing these. They really stand up to the sound quality of earbuds that cost hundreds of dollars -- I'm very satisfied.

title: Best bang for your buck. Easy.
body: I had bought a pair of the T10's bundled with a pair of airpods just in case that these didn't turn out so well, boy was I wrong. These earbuds are wonderful, amazing noise cancellation going along with the perfect balance of bass and treble. Great options of rubber sizes to adjust to different ear sizes. Luckily, the pair they came with them were perfect for my ears. Comes with a year warranty  just in case for any mishaps. Amazing earbuds for a low prize, it was a great decision

title: Almost Perfect Earbuds
body:
I got these earbuds a little less than a week ago and have tried it out every night both while working out and while cooking/cleaning.  Here are my thoughts on it:

-- SOUND QUALITY --
I've got an amazing pair of Bose noise canceling headphones and use them frequently for gaming/PC sessions, but they're not at all ideal for working out, so I bought these wireless earbuds, and while it's not the most amazing sound quality I've ever heard, I'm pretty impressed.  Sounds nice and blocks out a decent amount of noise.  HOWEVER, one glaring negative that doesn't particularly bother me too much (but may deter you from purchasing) is that the sound sometimes cuts out on the left earbud.  I've literally sat down right in front of my phone, browsing Spotify, only to have it cut out several times in a row.  That was an isolated incident, though, and since then, it's only cut out maybe 1-2 times a day for about 1-2 seconds.  It's not a deal breaker for me, though, and despite this annoyance, I really enjoy these earbuds.

-- COMFORT --
I tend to get some discomfort from earbuds after wearing them for ten minutes, but with the smallest size, I've been able to wear these earbuds for 2-3+ hours with very minimal discomfort.  All I need to do is slightly adjust it when it gets a little uncomfortable, and I'm good to go again.  In addition, I don't have an issue with these falling out of my ears while working out, so that's a plus, too!

-- OVERALL IMPRESSIONS --
Pretty design, convenient wireless charging, good sound quality, very comfortable, and fantastic deal for the price.  But I had to knock off a star because of the sound randomly cutting out in the left earbud.  Otherwise, absolutely love these!

title: Pretty Good Buy
body: So far no issues and complete satisfaction. Customer Service very quick with responding to inquiries of Warranty coverage information. Great for initial purchase purpose, when trying to speak on the phone people are unable to hear me clearly unfortunately.

title: No Volume Control
body:
Despite the false claim in the Amazon Q&A Board, these earbuds do not have touch control to adjust the volume.  For my application, this was necessary.

If volume control at the earbud is import to you, it is important to know these earbuds are completely lacking this functionality.

title: Awesome buds/ Excellent Customer Service
body:
Amazing product for the price. These bluetooth buds are the highest quality. Amazing waterproof case, charging dock,sturdy and built to the highest quality.

They have a great customer service staff.
10**********

title: Great headphones
body: Really good headphones for the price, hold the charge pretty well, waterproof (so far tested under rain), noise cancellation is great. Buttons work as described, no issues there (used with iPhone).

title: Easy Connnection
body: The fabulous way it connects it connects is just great. fast and easy. I also love the compact case that contains these marvelous ear buds. You know when the case is charged and the buds are charged.. Makes ii a no guessing game like others. They fit securely with the multiple covers they provide. I can't say anything more than just get them. The price is good the quality is the best. No others will do...

title: Lives up to the 5 stars
body:
I recently upgraded to an iPhone XR and was looking for some wireless earbuds for working out in.  These work great! Very easy to pair with my phone and I like that they pair with themselves automatically out of the charging case.  The sound cut out on me briefly a couple times but I think it’s because I was at the gym and was competing for a signal with everyone else. Sound quality is good-very clear with just enough bass for my liking.

Overall, I’m very happy with them.

title: Great value. More pros than cons. Worth it.
body: Great value. Sound is great for a wireless earbud. Takes a bit getting used to as when u insert it in ur ear u have to allow it to sync then adjust at times to achieve the full surround sound. Sounds a bit confusing but when u put it in ur ears you'll know what I'm referring to. It will fall out at times and u will find urself adjusting it BK in ur ear. I wouldn't try to run with these but I would lift weights with them.

title: Awesome earbuds
body: Great earbuds!  I’ve never used earbuds before but I am very satisfied with the quality and sound. Highly recommend them to anyone!

title: Not Very Good For Calls
body:
I found them to sound better when I first place them in my ear and they don't move around, because once they do, the deep bass goes. I did find them to stay in my ear pretty well during a workout that included running. As far as voice calls, I found that the microphone must be awkwardly placed because the person I talked to had trouble hearing me at times, especially if I was trying to have a private conversation.

I wouldn't buy them again, because I would prefer to have something that allows for better call quality.

title: NOT WATERPROOF
body:
These earbuds are NOT WATERPROOF. I bought these to swim laps with and they are absolutely unusable.

The instructions say “waterproof” and then “(you cannot dip it into water)”

title: Can't beat the price!
body: Just got these babies in the mail. Straight out of the box, they feel solid in my hand and the construction appears to be well made. They already have a charge on them as well as the case. That's pretty legit, most electronic devices do not provide the luxury of connect and go straight out of the box. I bought these because I bought a pair of JBL Endurance headphones a week ago. The sound on these headphones put the JBLs to shame! everything is better as far as I can tell straight out of the box. I cannot speak to the longevity yet, but best believe I am going to get some serious use out of these, so I shall return for an update later on. But so far, 4 starts for the initial review. My impression is that I will upgrade them to a 5 after long term use.

title: Low Battery, Great Sound
body:
While I love the charging case and the audio quality, the battery life is beyond terrible. I can't go more than an hour without changing them. Luckily each headphone earpiece can be used individually so if I go one earbud at a time I get maybe two hours.

If the battery life were longer, this product would easily get a 5/5 stars for mobility and audio quality. It is a shame that I cannot use it longer.

title: Had to return, kept losing Bluetooth connection.
body:
Worked great with big exceptions.
1) kept losing Bluetooth connection when I had my phone in my pocket just walking at a normal pace. So I kept hearing over and over the little beeps it makes when it loses connection and also when it reconnects.
2) too much bass, if you like nothing. It big bass in your music, you’ll probably love these. But for me there’s a time and a place. So when I put on some hip hop or electronic music they sounded pretty decent. However when I wanted to change it up to country, oldies, or classic rock, they sounded so bad with all that bass and couldn’t enjoy my listening experience. Ended up returning them.

title: Left Ear bud cuts out (Updated 8/8/19)
body:
Truly a 1 Star experience with these, Left ear bud cuts out very frequently even on the replacement set.

8/08/19: Went on a 30 minute walk this morning with Replacements... Cut out about once everyone minute or two. Super frustrated and upset. Returning for a REFUND and will look else where for a quality pair that works as it's supposed to.

8/07/19: Received replacement set. Went for 45 minute walk, seems to be promising, only cutout once or twice.

8/04/19: Day 2 of trying to use Earbuds.... Still having cutting in and out issues with Left ear bud, getting super frustrating. Tried many different pairing tricks others suggested with no luck.
Just submitted a Request for replacement from Amazon. Will update once replacement arrives.

8/03/19:
Just got these earbuds today. Was easy to pair to phone and started listening to music within seconds.... that's about the end of the positives.

Put phone in pants pocket and started my walk... 30 seconds in I notice the left cutting in and out every 10 seconds or so. I stand still and it works fine... start walking and left bud cuts in and out time to time.

I turn buds off.. unpair and forget device from phone. Turn buds on they pair to each other and say "right channel", "left channel".. i then pair to phone and all seems well again... until i start walking. Left cuts in and out every 10 seconds or so....

They seem to work only if you sit still but that is NOT what I bought them for. I NEED something for walking. Will try few extra tips and if no resolve, will return for replacement or refund.

title: Stopped working after a couple months
body: Can no longer get them to connect to my phone via bluetooth......even before that they needed to be charged after roughly 6 hours. Don't buy.

title: Device for music lover and must go with phone calls
body:
Superb sound quality, specially when i paired with my phone used for phone calls, I found like i got the device which i was looking for, i am using now for daily workout, running, while driving and also for business calls. Easily i can pair and connect for my business calls and freely i can do other work like coding, eating etc. A device i would recommend  we must try and feel the difference. Build for music lover with great wireless feature. Very ease for phone calls and for working out.
Sound quality is not high what I expected specially when i am comparing with Bose headphone or earbuds  but defenetaly price difference is there. we can not simply compare with Bose where you have to pay almost 4-5 times. However i am enjoying this new buddy and found a new reason to use my phone and other devices :)

title: Totally TOZO - Best Earbuds Ever!!!
body: The product was delivered on-time as scheduled. Opened it up and was very impressed with the packaging and the charger-case.  Now to performance.....The sound clarity and quality is top-notch!  The feel and comfort in the ear is remarkable and a pleasant change.  I highly recommend TOZO earbuds!!!

title: Register the Warranty and Tozo Will Help
body:
Impressed with this little bundle and the features offered at a great price. A little disappointed at the distance Bluetooth tes mots if using in water.

About six months into having these, one bud stopped charging. I contacted the company and they promptly responded in helping me resolve this issue.

Update: upgraded from four to five star because as promised, the company was excellent in sending me a replacement pair and very quickly!

title: Solid wireless earbuds option that won’t break the bank.
body: Great sound, awesome value. I lost a pair of expensive wireless ear buds and it was so frustrating, but I didn’t want to give up the freedom of wireless earbuds. I decided to try a less expensive option. I noticed these had a lot of good reviews, and they have not disappointed. They sound great. They pair easily. And they still look decent. They charge very quickly and they hold a charge very well. This is definitely a solid second option for those who don’t want to spend a lot on earbuds.

title: Great product and great customer service!
body: The TOZO T10 Bluetooth earbuds have great sound quality, especially in relation to what you're paying for them! I had an aesthetics issue with one of them 6 months after I bought them and contacted TOZO directly. They shipped me a new pair and told me to keep the original. Allie in their service department was a joy to work with. She definitely knows how to keep her customer happy!

title: Easy Peasy!
body: What an amazing company and product I received my new earbuds quickly. They were easy to connect to my cell phone and the sound quality is outstanding.  The kit comes with different ear sizes to attach to the buds for an easy fit.  They are easy to charge with their neat compact charging case.  Considering buying my wife a pair for Mother’s Day. She loved mine :). I strongly recommend the company and the ear buds! I’ll buy them again.

title: FAKE REVIEWS
body: Many of the reviews are fake. The sound cuts out constantly, the earbuds do not pair to each other or to devices, the battery time is lower than advertised.

title: Better then I expected...Looking forward to using these more and more
body:
I like that these came with several different options for sizing in the ear.  I was able to find one that didn't ever seem to make my ear sore.  I don't believe I have ever had that before.  I haven't used earbuds a really long time because they just never worked out for me.  I wore these for several hours when I got them prior to doing any charge or anything and was extremely satisfied with sound quality and comfort.  I haven't done much other then working around the house so I can update once I take them to the gym or some other environment.  I don't foresee any issues though.  Great product.

UPDATE:  I have tried all of the different sized ear pieces.  When jogging they tend to slip out.  I'm constantly adjusting them to keep them in.  Walking is fine but jogging/running is when I always have to push them back in...  It probably has more to do with my ears then anything.  Just thought I would update.

title: They are great value
body: I got these headphones on self for 30 bucks and I use them every day despite them being small at earbuds they stay in your ears their waterproof and their sound is surprisingly clear

title: Fantastic value
body: I have used many bluetooth earbuds so I have some experience to differentiate and compare.  These actually have pretty good sound and strong bass.  Pairing is probably the best I have used and instantly connect without issue.  I do want to point out I could pair these earbuds to my 2017 MacBook Pro, but they consistently go in and out.  Not just some of the time, but all of the time.  So if you plan on using these with a MacBook Pro I would pass on these.  If they are just for a smartphone then these are great!

title: BEST EARBUDS
body:
I loved these earbuds from the moment I got them. I usually have a problem with earbuds of any kind staying in my ears which these do. The sound is also amazing I have bought some dj headphones before and the sound is way better than those I am genuinely impressed with these ear buds.
I HIGHLY recommend these they are worth your money

title: Unethical follow up
body:
The earbuds are.. ok.  Battery life is crap & takes an hour to charge.
+
Hello
Thank you for your confirmation about your address ,could you please kindly post your kind honest experience about the product on the web page first？
It would be more appreciated and it would be more helpful if you could add some photos on the re-view. (just a suggestion : )

We would try our best to provide the  5 stars products and service.Lots of buyers really love the great sound and waterproof earbuds.
If the comments systems is too busy to post review, could you please try it again in the days and let me know the title once post successfully. Thank you!

You could click the below link to post your words:
https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07J2Z5DBM
Or just refer below: Your account-----Your order---find this TOZO earbuds order---click the <write products re-view>----Then you can post the re-view.

Waiting for your kind reply.

Best regards,
Elena

title: Great sound Quality and even Better Customer Service
body: When I first got these ear buds they werent working properly but the sound quality was amazing. So Tozos customer service reached out to me and handled the issue quickly and promptly. I got a new set and I couldnt be happier. This earbuds are some of the best quality ear buds in sound I have personally ever heard. I tend to wear the bigger headphones for the bass and good sound quality but with the technology getting better I decided to give these a shot and they do not disappoint!

title: Best Bluetooth Earbuds I've had yet!
body: This is the 14th(!!) pair of bluetooth earbuds I've purchased on Amazon for the past two years (including name brands like Jaybird, Anker, etc.) and for me, they beat all the others.

title: So Far So Good
body:
Just got them and so far so good, I thought they'd be a little smaller but it doesn't bother me at all, in fact I fell asleep with one of them on, but did freak out when I woke up cos it wasn't in my ear anymore, but I'll take the blame for that.

In terms of sound quality it's great, connectivity range is good and overall very satisfying.

title: Amazing sound quality
body: The sound quality is amazing. You don’t have to buy the Apple headphones. I have not had much luck with earbuds. I have one of those ears where nothing fits. This one does, and very well. The sound quality is excellent. I recommend this to all.

title: COULD BE so great... but are not.
body:
I WANTED these to be awesome.  They're not, because:

The left earbud keeps disconnecting.  Seems fine for a few minutes, then you do something crazy, like... turn your head.  Or touch your hat.  Or God forbid, you touch the other earbud.  Then the left one cuts out for a second.

So you know, I thought it was a fluke, so I exchanged them for another pair.  SAME THING.  Then I read that a lot of other people were experiencing the same thing.

If they ever decide to fix this and make a pair that stay connected, I would buy them again in a heartbeat, as they were great for the price.  But without consistency, not worth fifty cents, let alone fifty dollars.

title: Great quality ear buds
body:
Solid set of ear buds for a good price.  Actually tried them in the shower today, just because I could.
Pairing was very easy, and sound quality is impressive.  Level of Bass was surprising.
As expected, using for phone calls is tough with the location of the microphone.
Noice isolation works well, and ear buds fit snuggly and securely.  Overall a great purchase.

title: Great product - great customer service
body:
I bought these headphones a couple months ago and have used them nearly daily since I purchased them. I use them for working out and for my bike commute to work as well as any other leisure bike rides.
The headphones fit in my ears very well and stay fairly snug. As other reviewers have mentioned, make sure to try the different earbud sizes for the best fit to minimize any chance of them falling out. I had mine start falling out once I would get a bit sweaty on the treadmill, however this issue was averted when I moved a size up. Sound quality is on point. I have never worn these headphones for longer than 1.5 hours each day, and usually wear them for a few days in a row and they stay charged up in the case before I have to recharge again. The noise cancellation is decent, but not really noticeable above what regular headphones provide. Regardless, that's not what I bought them for and I can hear my music clearly while wearing them, which is what I really care about.
Finally, I want to touch on the customer service. I reached out to customer service about an issue I had with the headphones (not a product defect, this was primarily a user error) and they not only responded within a couple hours, but went above and beyond to provide a solution for my issue. I was astounded by how fast they got back to me throughout our correspondence as I could hardly keep up with them.
These headphones are absolutely worth the buy and I will keep TOZO on my radar for any other products I need.
Hope this review helps you make an informed decision.

title: Great sound quality!
body:
I have had several sets of wireless earbuds before and, while I’ve only had these for a couple of days, I can tell you that the sound quality is significantly better than my previous ones.

My older ones tended to malfunction after a couple of months, so the extended one year warranty is a comforting feature.

Quite happy so far!

title: Don't quite fit my tiny ears but great sound quality
body: So far so good, took them for literal test run around the neighborhood while jogging at light pace, moderate sweat, noise cancellation and sound quality were excellent! Sweat didn't seem to affect them, waterproofing appears intact. Only problem is even after adjusting for different ear bud since, the unit as a whole is a little too thick for my ears and sticks out, doesn't stay lodged against the auricle of my ear as the wearing guide advises. While running at night I was worried abt them falling out and losing them while moving vigorously, so I sport taped them to my ears. They stayed in fine walking around the house though! I will try running with them in daylight or at the gym to see how well they stay in, when I have less chance of losing them if they do fall out.

title: Initial impression is good.
body:
This is an initial impression review.  Just came off the truck while I was doing yard work. Packaged well within its own box. The box seems to be made out of the same plastic that small 12v power supplies are made of so its durable for sure.

 For a moment I thought that if you only wanted to use one bud with the other in its case you could only use the right bud. If you  take one out of your ear and put it in the box to charge it will do so uninterrupted.  But if you take it back off the charger you will need to power cycle.  I assume the right ear bud is the "master bud" or something.

title: Surprising quality
body: Wife bought me these for Father's Day, and given the price point, I would have to say these are a very nice quality wireless/bluetooth ear bud.  They have a high quality feel and sound, including the case, which cleverly dual-functions as a magnetic holder and charger for the buds.  So far, quite pleased!

title: Wireless earbuds done right!
body: This is the best wireless earbuds I’ve ever had.  The simple connection and the sound quality is amazing.  I wish I pick this up years ago.  I bought a lot of wireless earbuds before l, this is the best out not all.

title: Quit scrolling and buy these!!!!
body: Amazing Sound Quality. Crank to the max with no distortion. I have issues with ear buds fitting. These fit perfect with the stock inserts. I can't hear a thing but music while mowing. Stoked I chose this set.

title: Good sound not the best connectivity
body: The sound quality is not the best I have heard but is definitely very good with good bass and range of sounds. Noise cancelling is pretty good. Can barely hear somebody talking to me with the earbuds in. This is my first set of truly wireless earbuds. I really like the freedom but they do not stay in my ear as good as I had hoped. I followed the directions and are using the biggest rubber piece. I usually use these for running. They will stay in my ear pretty well but have to reset them in my ear every few minutes. I did have one Fallout the other day because I did not catch it early enough. That would discourage me from using these for mountain biking or snowboarding. I am quite a sweater and my ears get pretty wet so not all may have this problem. My biggest problem with these is the connectivity. I can set my phone down and walk across the gym with very good connectivity but when I put the phone against my body like a pocket they have a hard time staying connected. The first set I got were really bad. I called for tech support and they had me try a couple Placebo type fixes that did not seem to work. I returned them for another set and the second set seem to work much better but still have issues if I have my phone in my pocket. I usually run with a waste belt that holds my phone and this seems to work much better.

title: I really wanted these to work but they do not
body:
Bought these to workout in the gym or to listen while doing yardwork
and quite honestly
they don’t stay connected to my iPhone or other Bluetooth devices I have tried to work with
if you move your head too fast the left side disconnects for the right side,
it’s very frustrating that it is so sensitive or weak
I would not buy these again
but I don’t wanna go through the hassle of sending them back
so I put them next to my bed and put them in maybe when I’m taking a nap..
USELESS for the gym...
Check my other reviews - this is NOT
Fake News...

title: Best headphones ever
body: Sound quality is Phenomenal and bass for get about it. They thump. Battery life is also great. If I lose these I would have to buy another pair. They sound better and louder than the Beats headphones I had before.

title: Heavy Bass
body: These little things provide a lot of punch for the size.  Can't duck a point for having to pick from the different ear pieces.  they include enough.

title: Great quality and very impressive sound!
body: After searching high and low for a pair of wireless ear buds I finally stumbled upon the Tozo T10s. I tried a lot of other brands even my brothers apple airpods, but the volume was low and no bass. As soon as I received the Tozos I was impressed with the packaging and build quality. They didn't feel cheap whatsoever. Popped them in and was blown away with the sound quality! Crisp highs and deep lows. The bass rivals my Beats over ear headphones. Very easy to pair to my phone it only took a few seconds. I would highly recommend these ear buds and look forward to putting them to serious use!

title: Great but question
body:
I received this yesterday and have used it quite I a bit thus far. I like it. Easy to use, charges easily, sound is clear, feels comfortable in my ear. When I made my first phone call with it, the person I spoke with could not hear me. My second call the person heard me but the call and connection were dropped. I'm hoping that it gets better. I love the fit and convenience, but can't have headphones where the other person does not hear me.

UPDATE: A few weeks have passed and people still can't hear me clearly on phone calls. I would not recommend this product for anything other than listening to music/videos. It's not useful for phone calls.

title: Can't beat this product for the price!
body:
After looking for a pair of wireless headphones for quite some time I decided on these. I am extremely happy with this decision so far. The battery life of the individual ear pieces isn't great. However; having the charging case with you easily allows you to use them all day with some short breaks to charge.
I briefly tested the water proof feature in the shower and had no issues with connection or sound quality. I have read others had issues with sound quality when submerged so your mileage may vary on that.
With the different size caps for the ear pieces it should be easy to find a fit that matches your ears although I found the original size to be the best fit for me.
I mainly use these for work calls and the mic works fine indoors. This may not be the case if you were to be on a call when working out.
Very easy to set up and connect with my phone. The buttons are very simple and intuitive to understand so I got the hang of it in no time!

Overall very satisfied with my purchase 5/5!

title: Good for the price
body: I wasn't looking for anything really cheap, or anything expensive. I read some of the reviews and they all said how good the quality of the sound is, and I have to agree. It has good base and relatively good sound. My only caveat is that you can't just use one ear bud. both need to be on, otherwise there is a beeping noise, and sometimes I only need one ear bud.

title: Great sound quality!
body:
Surprisingly great sound, very light weight headphones that feel like they are constructed properly.  They connect to your device very quickly, and are smartly programmed to turn on and off when you remove them from the charger.

My only gripe is that I wish the charging case was much smaller as it feels very light, and the headphones don’t seem to take up much space within it.  I understand there’s a battery inside, but it seems there’s a lot of wasted space and I would love for the case and headphones to fit in my pocket more easily.

title: so far so good
body: Just had these a couple days but so far so good. Good fit after I changed to small size. Mostly listen to digital books and sound is totally satisfactory. I like the small easy to carry/pack charging box. Would like to see a volume control on the next version. I would recommend to others.

title: I really wanted this to work
body:
Disconnects randomly. It is very big and does not fit in my ear. And I am a big guy, if it does not fit my ear, I do not know how it will fit to anybody. Microphone is very weak. Other party cannot hear what I am saying.
Sound quality is great.
Battery life is very good.
I had to return it and will look for another.

title: Tozo customer service...
body:
UPDATE: Tozo reached out to me and made the situation right. My new set works great. I got approximately 4-5 hours of almost continuous playtime. I'm satisfied.

I'm really disappointed. I saw the high reviews and purchased these. I followed all the instructions and the batteries are bad. My phone will say they are at 50% and then they just did. They last about an hour and a half.

title: True meaning of customer service
body: I highly recommend buying this product, not only is it great! But service is also excellent. I lost my earphones and it was hassle free getting it replaced, most sellers give you trouble but no not this seller. They are loud and everything you want in good Quality earphones. I am a music creator and these are the one. Trust me 10 stars. Katherine is Amazing, she helped me with getting my replacement. She knows the true meaning of service, I will be buying other products from this seller. Thank you !

title: They are good when they are working, but pairing is annoying, hurt my ears
body:
Honestly not sure how this gets such great reviews.

Pairing is a pain... sometimes. Sometimes it's simple but then sometimes I need to put it in and out of the case 10 times before it decides to cooperate. Or even more annoying is when it won't unpair, so I'm trying to play something from my phone and it won't stop playing through the headphones, even though the headphones are in the case.

Also they hurt my ears after too long. Especially not good if you plan to be wearing under a hat. With a hat it puts so much pressure on my ears I can't do it.

They stay in well most of the time, but not so well when sweating.

title: Better value than AirPods
body: I love these! Didn’t want to spend the $$ on AirPods, and these had great reviews and were a better price. I bought them in white and love the color. It comes with different size ear pieces (the silicone piece that goes inside your ear) for different sized ears and once I switched to the smaller size, they fit perfectly. Haven’t tested the waterproof quality yet, but the sound is great, and I can’t hear much else when they’re in. I recommend them.

title: Apple air pods got nothing on these babies
body: So happy I bought these, the sound quality was definitely there although they are by no means noise cancelling (muffling maybe). A few times i caught myself unsure whether I was wearing them or not because I wasn't sure if the sound was coming from a speaker out loud. Super convenient, they free up my hands and I don't have to worry about a wire hitting me in the face while I run. I would buy as a gift for family because of the quality that you get for such a great price, I love it!

title: I really enjoy it.
body:
I recently purchase TOZO T10 and really enjoyed the product.
PROs,
  1.Bluetooth really easy to set up,
  2.Sound quality is great, i really love base, though it is on the high end of the spectrum.
  3.they are water RESISTANT! so you can have them in the shower, you can do laps on top of a pool but they are
  NOT meant for submersion.
  4.It comes with (excuse me for not knowing the exact term) some different size earbud plastic cover, so if the one
  doesn't fit or doesn't feel right you try putting on the other ones on.They fit perfectly onto me and not really
  worried about them falling out.
  5.wireless charger case, so if you can a wireless charger or a smart phone that can support wireless charging that
  really good if you don't use the wired charger.
  6.really good battery life, it says 3.5 hours, however I didn't have them on no longer 2 hours and when I put them
  away, the case would be charging the buds so thats pretty nice and I can honestly say I never had them died out
  on me unexpectedly.
  7. this is just a already added feture but does a pretty nice job block outside sound. Sometimes I just put them on
  and don't turn it on just to muffle/ lower sound when Im practicing guitar. I like to practice a lot but that can
  hurtful to you're ears if you don't have ear protection, so that's nice.

Dislikes
1.it does come with a charger for the case if you don't a wireless charger, but its kinda small. not that big a deal though.
2.No mic built in I believe, but if did I doubt it be water proof now. would be nice to have both.

Summery, I really enjoy it. I don't really have anything against it. I love the battery life on this as well as the sound quality, though I more of a low end guy so if possible to configure that, i think would be even more amazing. the charger that it comes with is kinda small but i usually just put it next to my laptop so its pretty to nice to look at sometimes with the lights on telling me its charging. Overall its a nice, fair product. Not much to complain. love going to gym with them.

title: Good headphones for the price
body: They have good sound quality and the battery lasts a good while. I like that you can take the charger on the go in case you need to charge while working out or are just on the go. But they do not stay in your ears very well when running. As soon as you start to work up a good sweat and you are running they fall our super easy and its a hassle to constantly stick them back in or if they did fall out to look around for them.

title: No need to stop the music in the water.
body:
These are amazing.
The first day, one of them fell into a sink with water and it was working perfectly well all the time.
When you get out of work listening music and you get home and you can literally go to the shower without stopping the music...Great!!!! (excellent sound quality and noise cancellation)
Fast pairing with my Laptop and Phone. Really good for PC gaming.

title: Great budget headphones, ideal for workout
body:
Great headphones that arrived fast. My other headphones are Jaybird bluetooth and a Sony WH-1000XM3. These headphones are ideal for the gym and running. With the multiple sizes of attachments, it should fit snugly for nearly all ear types. The sound is good and has some decent bass. Overall the sound and fit are better than my Jaybirds which I would use for gym/running. As a bonus they are water/sweatproof. They are lightweight which is great. The case is small and the wireless charging is great. It easily fits into my pocket. Obviously the sound cannot compare to my Sony headphones but thats not why I bought them.

If youre looking for a pair of good sounding wireless in ear headphones that fit snugly that also feature wireless charging, look no further.

title: Sound quality is good but it keeps falling out, buy separate earbud tips
body: The earbuds would be pretty great if they could actually stay in the ear. Tried all the different ear tips/molds but they never stay in. Especially when talking or moving. I really want to like these earbuds but they basically don't work cause cause they can't stay in place; had to buy additional earbud tips for the tozo to stay in but even then, the slightest movement can move them around a little, ultimately loosening.

title: Finally getting sleep with noise cancellation!
body: I listen to music every evening to help me fall asleep. I got tired of getting wrapped up in my wired headphones. I tried those bluetooth set specifically for sleeping (looks like an eye mask) but it made my head too hot and uncomfortable. So I woke up multiple times in the evening. This product is great so far! Excellent sound quality (actually much louder than I thought it would be) and awesome noise cancellation. Best of all, no more getting choked by wires and so far I’m sleeping through the night.

title: Connectivity issues
body: I wanted to like these earbuds.  They have a nice look, feel and sound was good with enough bass.  I was able to run in these without issues.  I used them for a little over a week until I started to have an issue with the left earbud.  The first time I noticed, the left earbud lost sound for about 2 seconds and only one time.  However, today I was losing connectivity multiple times a minute with the phone less than 2 feet away from my ears.  Sorry, but I'm returning.  Too soon for a $50 pair to have issues.

title: Good quality for price, fit varies depending on your ear shape.
body:
These are the first wireless earbuds that I've used, so in terms of ease of use, I have nothing to compare to. However, they are just as good as any wired in-ear earbuds, just more convenient because you don't need to have your phone close by to listen to music. I use these earbuds for casual listening, and they have worked perfectly when connected to my iPhone. However, when connected to an older Macbook, the sound can get spotty since the Bluetooth isn't as strong.
In terms of comfort, they don't fit my ears as closely as I'd like. Although the manufacturer includes 4 pairs of ear bud tips in varying sizes, my ears fall somewhere in between, so it's not an exact fit. Also, the instructions for wearing the earbuds indicate that you have to twist them horizontally until they lock around the inside ridge of your ears, but my ears are a little larger in that area, and so they tend to sit loosely. They have fallen out of my ears before, so I don't plan on heavy exercise with them in.
Overall, they do seem to be waterproof, have a decent sound quality (but don't expect deep bases or an "open" sound), and charge very easily in the provided case. It is an acceptable quality for the price.
P.S. the earbuds are not noise-proof, since there's no noise-cancellating technology in it, but it does block some external sound due to them being in-ear.

title: YES!
body: Okay I love these.  I even accidentally threw one in the washing machine, and they are still working!  I just wish the little ear pieces came in smaller sizes.  The smallest ones are still to big for my ears, and it drives me nuts after about 30 minutes.  Even with that, I love them and the sound and quality is amazing.  I highly recommend these!

title: Hits it just right
body:
Sound quality
4.5/5
Bass hits and I'm a bass head. Can alter this with your phones equalizer but I know that fat bass is not for everyone.

Noise Cancelling
4/5
Comes with three sets of bud sizes. Dark grey with red interior accents. Mix and match to your sizing. Not the most noise cancel but with the optimal sound volume, it will keep most noise out at a comfortable level. Also keeps most water out.

Battery
4/5
Been on these for a week but have yet to fully drain these till dead but its rated at 3 hours one charge, then the case for 4 full charges. Doesnt come fully charged out of the box but it works as advertised. There are others that are rated more hours but battery is solid for this price range.

Functionality/Design
4/5
Pairs fast, good sound, sport/shower waterproof but it is a little bulky. Havent tried calling feature yet but for listening to music, this is worth the purchase price. Would recommend 4 out of 5 times.

title: Deep bass, long battery life, and solid build
body:
These were my first pair of bluetooth earbuds and as an iPhone user I wish I hadn't waited so long... no more lost or broken headphone adapters!

The audio quality is impressive and gives you plenty of bass. Great if you're running or lifting and want to really feel the music and ignore the outside world. If you're not a basshead, the sound might be a bit unbalanced with regards to the mids/highs so don't be afraid to adjust your EQ settings. Given the price, convenience, and build quality I am completely satisfied with the sound. If you're looking for incredibly detailed and nuanced audiophile quality, these are not it... but that's not what they're supposed to be. These are an everyday carry item that perform well in almost any environment.

title: Perfect for me!
body: I work in a factory where we can only use one head phone (don't want to step in front of a forklift or under tye crane). Today I was a ble to give a trial run with these. I never had an issue with it falling out, and didn't need to crank the volume to hear. Sound is still perfectly clear in one ear with machine noise in the background. Update: I have been using these for a full week now, and so long as I take the headphone out and place it in it's charging case on my break, the battery lasts me all day.

title: Horrible, not the same product
body: I originally bought these bluetooth headphones for my husband (pictured left), he enjoyed them so much and was so satisfied with them I decided to reorder them for myself (pictured right). Upon unboxing, I noticed they were nowhere near the same box and taking the earbuds out, not even the same style. I gave them a try after fully charging them for a night and tried them on a walk. The sound quality was horrid and they kept disconnecting and just finally gave up after less then 10 minutes. Mine will be returned.

title: CANT CONTROL MUSIC
body: The sound is pretty good for the price. Not sure why they say it’s got great bass. It’s almost non-existent. The main thing just bugs me about these are the fact that you can’t control the volume or skip tracks. But you can answer calls?! Seems sorta backwards. I’d rather have control of the music than incoming phone calls which makes these pretty much useless at the gym because now I have to take my phone off the arm band to skip tracks or adjust the volume.

title: Best Active Sport Wireless Earbuds
body: I have used plenty of wireless earbuds and these are by far the best. Connection wise, batteries, and even staying in place during workouts or heavy runs. I use them all the time around the office and I have synced them up to my iWatch as well. I would say that during sleep or in bed, you cannot lay down with them in your ears as it will be uncomfortable but overall they are extremely pleasant and have great noise cancellation. I definitely would recommend these to you!

title: Great sound way better than i thought
body:
Punchy bass, good highs/mids. I thought the wireless charging case would be a loss or at least not used. i was wrong, i regularly use that feature. Had them about 2 weeks now, i will say that the blue tooth is glitchy. Here are some of the weird things that have happens with my Samsung note 9:
Lost pairing, like completely lost the buds, had to repair.
Lost pairing again about an hour later.
Had to re dock each earbud in the case to turn it on and off about 2/3 times each to get each bud to pair and then stay connected to play stereo sound. I will see if this continues. if it does i will change my rating.

title: Good for Garmin Vivoactive 3 Music
body: I bought these ear buds to go with my new Vivoactive 3 Music watch. They arrived quickly. The package had the charger, USB cable, ear buds and an assortment of ear caps. My charger had 3 blue dots indicating almost a full charge right out of the box. No need to wait for the first charge. The ear buds paired with the watch easily and have good sound. I am still experimenting with the ear caps for the best passive noise cancellation for me. I have not run any battery life tests for the ear buds yet since the watch only has a 5 hour battery life when playing music. I think the buds will outlast the watch in play time if I alternate left and right buds in the charger.

title: Left ear piece drops voice
body: So I received this last weekend and started to recently use it this past week. My left ear piece keeps dropping music...meaning i listen to music but the music turns off quickly from the left earpiece than does the same with the right. It lasts for about a second or two. But for a four minute song i couldnt hear the whole song as it dropped about eight times. I still haven't looked into whether or not the battery last long as I havent used it long. But the material used us decent.

title: Great BUT right earbud works while the left earbud is charging but not vice versa. Disappointing.
body:
I am one who must be listening to something while I work -- music, old TV shows, whatever. It is "white noise" for me as I concentrate on the job at hand.  These earbuds have freed me away from my tablet as I can walk a fair distance away from the tablet and still pick up the signal.  (15' maybe?)

They fit in my ear, and stay, even when I sweat.  However, there is one major flaw I hope they will work on -- the left earbud cannot work without the right earbud!  I listen ALL DAY.  The batteries last between 4-5 hours, if I am remembering correctly.  Great, I thought; I'll use the right earbud and when it dies I'll use the left earbud.  IT DOESN'T WORK THAT WAY.  To use the left earbud only, the right earbud must be laying on top of the recharge case, so it is draining its battery the whole time the left earbud is being used.  (My husband is handicapped so I need to keep one ear open to hear him talking to me.) This set is practically perfect, but I do wish they were not rigged to work only out of the charger.

title: Solid build, good performance.
body: I bought these on a whim, influenced by the Amazon Daily Deal price. The material quality is good and the earbuds feel sturdy and well made. I experienced some pairing issues with my Windows 10 laptop. At times, it takes a while to get a full stereo connection and I only get sound out of the main, right, earbud. The battery life is about three to three and a half hours. It would be nice if this could be extended.

title: I was sceptical at first!
body: I have to say, i am a dinosaur when it comes to updating technology items for my personal use, but I decided to jump on board with the purchase of these Bluetooth wireless earbuds.  With so many choices to chose from I decided on the TOZO.  From what I have experienced, so far... the quality and sound quality are amazing.  Very crisp and clear.  I am an avid music listener and these have met my needs.  I enjoy the feel in my ears, and with the multiple choices of ear bud sizes they make it easy to pick the correct one.  The compact case is efficient and allows the earbuds to be recharged if you are not near a charging source.  I have not used them in the water, so I cannot vouch for that. If there was anything that I would change, it would be the length of time between charge, when in use.  They last about 3 hours - 4 hrs...but overall, I am thoroughly satisfied.

title: Left ear bud will stop working; Happened to me twice after exchanging the first one.
body:
These are great sounding BT ear buds with excellent base...  Until the left ear bud stops working.  Happened twice after exchanging the first set for the same reason.  The left ear bud will start working intermittently.

- If they get wet, the microphone won't work well.  People on a call will won't hear you well.
- You can't skip a song or go back to the previous song.  This is annoying since it's a feature people would use often.

title: Bad sound, good looks... for $50?!
body: Absolutely terrible quality. Within seconds I was ripping these out and digging my old waterlogged Apple earbuds out of the trash. No noise cancelation, static in the background, and just all around terrible quality. I could find the same quality in the headphones you get for free on an airplane. $50 for Bluetooth noisemakers?
