Yeah right. They look good, but they ain't good.

title: Good Price and Good Sound
body: I've been without a bluetooth headset for several months because I just couldn't figure out which ones I wanted to get after my LG and Samsung went out. I read the reviews on several pairs of bluetooth/wireless earbuds before deciding on purchasing TOZO T10. I have to say that I'm satisfied with my purchase. The sound quality is very good whether I'm listening to music or holding a conversation on the telephone.  My daughter paired them to her phone to try them out and now she wants me to order her a pair. I can't wait to try them out when I workout!

title: Good set of wireless headphones at a great price.
body: The sound quality and noise cancellation are great (especially for the price). The fit farally well. Have problems with them falling out of my ear every once in awhile. Slight lag when connecting and sometimes have an issue with it connecting.  Wish they had better instructions on how they actually work.

title: very nice workout earbuds
body:
Was using it for a few days and can tell you that i have few thinks that i really liked.
First sound quality- the bass was very solid (considering that those are earbuds) and also the sound was very clear. Noise cancelation was pretty good, although there is some room for improvement for a future models.
Charging is super easy and fast, battery life also as described in the product descrpt. Pairing is also easy and faster than on the other earbuds that i possesed in the past.
I can definitely recommend this product for a young people that enjoys working out.

title: Probably the best Bluetooth headphones I have found
body:
I have tried numerous wireless headphones with mixed success. I was quite nervous to try these as the last pair of earbud headphones I bought wouldn’t hold a charge for more than 30 min and would cut out if I put my phone in my pocket.

I am happy to report these headphones do not suffer those restrictions. The first day I took them to work I forgot the charging case and was worried they would die on me, thankfully they lasted all day with moderate use.

I primarily use them to listen to audiobooks periodically throughout the day, and to make phone calls. I work in maintenance and often need to speak with customer service or a vendor while using my hands for something else- I have had no complaints of people not being able to hear me with these headphones (a common problem with many of my previous pairs). In addition the sound quality has been excellent. The one downside that I have found is that when using only one earbud (it must be the right one as that is the “master”) there is a soft beeping to indicate it is trying to connect the left side. It is not so loud as to be annoying but I do wish there were a way to tell the system you are only using a single earbud so it stops trying.

Another issue with pairing is that it often takes upwards of 1 minute before it finally pairs with the phone. I believe this is caused by it searching for the other earbud - which is still in the charging case and therefore not in pairing mode.

Also while running with both earbuds I found that the left one would cut out periodically when I turned my head. I rarely use the left earbud, however this may bother some people.

title: Great product for a great price
body: So far these earbuds are great. I have only used them for a day so looking forward to using for a long time to come. They have excellent sound quality and even great bass for earbuds. My only minor complaint is that the left side occassionally the sound cracks. But I would highly recommend these to anybody looking for good wireless earbuds.

title: Has been working great
body: My order arrived early and I was so happy to get my hands on these. The sound quality is surprisingly good. The battery life is around if not more than 4 hours from my experience so far. Keep in mind these earbuds cancel out a lot of noise, so keep that in mind. I never got to test the waterproofing, but it survived being used in rainy weather. I would highly recommend this product if you want quality sound for a good price.

title: Good one
body: For the price it should be..long battery life,  even though I haven't used it for a week it still has battery life, sound quality is good.. only thing is it keeps popping out my ears.. have to wear a bandana or head band to keep it in, esp if I'm at the gym.. better than those cheap ones..really

title: I'm in love with these earbuds!
body: the earphones are sleek, and look very nice visually, the base holds a very decent charge, and the earbuds last more than long enough for each listening session. There is no discomfort whatsoever, and the white case and earbuds make it so it's very difficult to misplace, and if i do lose them, i find them just as fast. I've dropped the case a few times accidentally, and the case has easily weathered these small accidents. i found it very convenient that the case came with an optional cord to tie it securely to whatever i want, in order to hang it or keep it in a secure spot! it also came with a free warranty in case of any trouble which i found very nice.

title: Trabajan perfecto
body: Me gusta tienen buena calidad. Nada más falta el detalle de usar el control de volumen ya que todo lo haces desde el celular pero la calidad del sonido es buena. Hasta el momento me trabajan súper bien espero que con este review ses cierto que me enviaran gratis el wireless charger gratis.

title: Affordable and good quality earbuds.
body: I enjoyed how the earbuds come with multiple noise cancellation sizes, so you can find the perfect size. The product matches the picture and descriptions. The charging case allows you up to four full charges on your earbuds, so you can travel with case and not have to constantly plug in the case to charge. One negative note is the earbuds tend to fall out when running or exercising. All in all, they exceeded my expectations on wireless earbuds.

title: Awesome Earbuds and a great Price
body: Very great sound earbuds. I love it how I can use just one earbud cause I do that all the time at work with a wired headset. I like how the battery last, and with charging case its get enough charge on my break and lunch it lasts my whole shift. Its my first wireless earbuds i have bought and I am glad I did.

title: The fitting
body: Sounds good, little bulky for my ears but the sound is really good. Enough bass. My right side slips off a lot no matter how I wear it, it gets a little uncomfortable while working out. But if you’re not doing high intense workouts, the ear phones are fine. Went sprinting, sweat of course kept getting right side to slip. Maybe it’s my ears but I have smaller ears (female) or maybe the shape that makes it a bit uncomfortable. Almost a sore to my ear.

title: Great Sound
body: Love the sound quality and charging case.  Pairing is quick and easy. Love the lack of wires.  Only downside is that they are less secure in the ear than I would like. I have had them fall out during a workout.  I've only used the ear bud rubber cover that was installed in the package, These come with bigger ear bud covers but change over is difficult.  Overall pleased with the purchase

title: these are great
body: i wasnt expecting the quality i got at this price (50$), im very happy with this purchase, the battery life is great especially considering you can use the case to recharge 4+ times, each earpiece can connect independently or at the same time, this is a good buy.

title: Amazing little earbuds
body: These are pretty amazing little earbuds. They stay in when exercising, and they sound great. The charging box they come with is very convenient, and as long as you plug it in from time to time, you can charge the headphones anywhere no wires needed. The whole thing seems very well made and every consideration was taken to design them for convenience/comfort. One note they do not fit in my wife’s ears, it comes with smaller ear buds, but the device itself is bigger than her hears so it maybe isn’t the best for more petite wearers.

title: Fantastic sound
body: After reading all the reviews, I expected to get a good product for the money I spent. It took me a minute to connect, but once I got connected, the sound quality was amazing. I have used many Bose products, I have to say that these totally match them. I am still getting used to the slipperiness of the ear buds (nothing to complain about). I hope to own this for a long time to come. I am thinking about getting one more for my family.

title: High Quality for a Low Price!
body:
So, I've been an over-the-ear headphones guy my whole life. Earbuds tend to hurt my ears after a while, and I've found it's very difficult to beat the sound quality of good over-the-ear headphones. Having said that, these earbuds come really, REALLY close.
The sound quality is better than anything I've ever found in any earbuds I've worn in the past; listening through them really wasn't very different than listening with my over-the-ear headphones. The bass is satisfyingly powerful, and when seated properly, the high notes come out rich and full, instead of tinny and pitchy like with most other earbuds. They also fit very comfortably enough in my ears that I don't worry about them falling out, and while I haven't tested the battery capacity to its limits quite yet, they last long enough that I haven't yet had them die on me in the middle of my walks around town, which can sometimes take up to two or three hours. Even if they had, though, they can recharge right in the case, which can hold up to FOUR full charges before the case needs to be recharged again! That's incredible! As for the mic, I haven't used it much, but those I've spoken on the phone with while using these headphones never complained about the sound quality, even after my asking them, so at the very least I can say with confidence that the mic is good enough for casual conversations over the phone.
I couldn't be more satisfied with this purchase. My biggest gripe about over-the-ear headphones was that they get uncomfortable after a while/they're uncomfortable to wear while doing certain things, but these earbuds completely solve that problem! I even use them to help me fall asleep when I'm feeling restless. 100% would recommend!

title: Excellent value; comfortable; good microphone reception.
body: Works well with both iPad and Android phone. Very comfortable to wear for several hours. Good sound quality, and surprisingly good microphone reception. Not quite the equal of the iBuds, but at one-third the price, they're a much better value.

title: Great for small ears!!!!!!!!!
body: These headphones are the only ones I have found to fit in my ears. Which just so happens to make them the best to wear while mowing the lawn or splitting fire wood. You can still hear them over the machines.

title: Punch above their weight (and cost)!
body: My first ever pair of wireless earbuds. I couldn't be happier. Good sound quality and noise blocking. I use them for Skype calls, podcasts and music. Especially handy in the gym. Can't vouch for the waterproofing as I haven't had the nerve to get them wet yet. They have never lost connection yet. Had a few pairing issues to begin with, until I got the knack - take the right bud out of the case a second before the left bud, then let them pair with each other (will only take a few seconds) before pairing with your device.

title: Excelente Producto
body: Me encantaron. El diseño es lindo, el sonido muy bueno, la batería dura bastante bien y son fáciles de emparejar

title: Excellent Earbuds!!
body: Delivery was fast, as usual. Thank you, Amazon!  The earbuds themselves are of excellent quality and produce very good sound..., much better than some of the earbuds I've purchased in the past!  They fit perfectly, and I loved that they came with additional plug sizes.  The bluetooth pairing process is the easiest I've ever experienced, and they automatically sync with each other! Great product!

title: Do not buy
body: The buds constantly disconnect and reconnect. The sound quality is very good. Only used for phone calls and a little music. Unrealible on phone call transmitting or being heard.

title: Great value
body: More or less the same sound quality as the more expensive jabra elite earbuds I tried, and with much better bass! Connection quality is also solid

title: Great earbuds, perfect bass
body: Great earbuds.  I was looking for a pair that had deep base..these are perfect!

title: Not made for all ears
body: I honestly do not use these ear buds because they fall out of my ears and I haven't been able to find rubber attachments to help keep them in place. If/when I do, then I'll be sure to update my review/rating

title: Bye bye Airpods you’ve been dismissed
body: These TOZO T10 earbuds really are great all for $50.00  I walk around the the office with them in never I’ve I had a problem. The charging case with the other one in the case charging is in my pocket so I can swap them when I need to which is mid afternoon or so. I highly recommend them for the price you can’t go wrong give them a try.

title: Several issues.
body:
The Bluetooth is extremely slow to connect.

Battery life in both the headphones and the container is mediocre at best. Charge often.

The sound quality is weak.

The right headphone failed after 3 months.

I contacted the seller with no response and bought a different brand to replace these.

They are water proof.

I could not keep them in my ear mainly on the right side. They are very bulky.

title: These earbuds are FANTASTIC and so is the customer service.
body:
I needed a new pair of earbuds for work and my wife surprised me with these. At first I was a little skeptical because I've never heard of the brand, but I gave these a chance and I was pleasantly surprised with the sound and build quality. I've owned many of the high dollar brands before and these sound, look and feel way more expensive than they are. For the price you can't go wrong. They are waterproof (I use them in the shower), come with their own wireless charging case, the cancel out noise very well and they sound AWESOME! I was a little worried they wouldn't be loud enough, but they are plenty loud. They are as loud as your phone or other device will allow. For these features and quality you should expect to spend many more times the asking price, but TOZO is doing us all a favor and are offering these at a great deal.

I did have an issue with my set though when they first came in... At first they worked awesome but out of nowhere the right earbud just stopped working and nothing I tried would resolve the issue. Fortunately these come with a warranty (which is another thing you won't find at this low price point) so I contacted customer service and they helped resolve my issue straight away. Customer service was helpful, polite and FAST to act on my issues and everything has been sorted out to my satisfaction.

TOZO gained a fan for the long haul in me and I'm excited to try their other product lines. If you are on the fence, just get these T10 earbuds and I'm sure you'll love them. The product is great and customer service is great. Save the money you would spend on a far more expensive product and use that to buy some more music.

title: Highly recommended
body: I ride my ebike in city traffic every day and these work great. Great sound and convenient bluetooth make these ideal. I hear enough of the traffic to be safe and yet the tunes come through loud and clear. I highly recommend these earbuds.

title: pretty bad tbh
body: Good sound quality, but otherwise, really hard to deal with. The bluetooth signal gets attenuated completely if it has to pass through your body at all - I cant listen to music if my phone is in my left pocket. Also, the pairing is a pain in the rear. The left and right earbuds can become unpaired from each other, meaning I not only have to pair them to my phone, I have to experiment with the dumb one-button pairing feature until the pods pair with each other, then, if I'm really lucky, with my smartphone. Review to follow up in ~3 months if these stop working like every other set of "Amazon Choice" bluetooth headphones I've bought...

title: Can’t beat the deal!
body:
These  fit nicely in my ears. I work outside in extreme heat and require waterproof ear pieces to prevent sweat from ruining them. Battery life lasts me a good work day and the case makes recharging them when not in use a breeze! For the price they can’t be beat.
Only con is the mic works so well they tend to pick up ambient noise that other people can hear.

title: Save your money
body: Not very good, poor sound quality and they do not fit in your ear very well and fall out easily. Returned them

title: Awesome Product
body: Pairing them with my phone was too easy. All you have to do is take them out of the charging case and they are ready for pairing( just a quick note make sure you choose TOZO-T10-R, the right earbud is the primary). The bluetooth v5.0 mean they have a stronger connection and longer distance. I can leave them in my backpack and I am still connected up to 30 feet away. The clarity of the highs and the richness of the bass are of the quality level of the highest end earbuds. I have personally taken these into the shower, I wasn't actually showering at the time, both of the earbuds and the case itself are extremely water resistance. I was pleasantly surprised to find that I could use my T10s for a little over four hours and the charging case is good for four full recharges of the earbuds. Finally, I have to say the Qi wireless chargeable case is very handy. I can set my phone and earbud case on my Qi charging pad and I'm good to go. If you have never used wireless charging, you need to. All in all for the price I could not find a better earbud on the market.

title: Totally worth the buy!
body: I really like these earbuds! They stay in your ear and don’t fall out. The sound quality is good and they aren’t uncomfortable to wear. The one thing I don’t lik is that there is no way to operate the music with them, so when you want to change the song or volume, you have to do it manually. But that is a minuscule issue compared to how perfect these earbuds work. Totally recommend them.

title: Affordable, comfortable, quality, and sound.
body: I use the product mainly while exercising. For the price, the sound and quality is good. The ear buds fit comfortably in your ears. Overall,  this is a item to purchase.

title: Well designed, perfect Bluetooth hookup, fits comfortably, good sound
body: Haven't had them long enough to judge everything and I haven't used them for a symphony yet, but what I know is in the headlines. There's also good after-purchase support if you register the product.

title: Won't stay connected with my TV
body:
Tazo bluetooth earbuds worked pretty good with my phone, however not with my Samsung TV.
They paired easily and started up, but every few seconds they would disconect and reconnect.  Impossible to use.
I thought perhaps I had volume too loud.  Then I removed and repaired.  Tried numerous efforts and finally decided it's not going to work out.

title: Better than I had expected
body: Really like these.  I bought them to use in the pool and hot tub I use after my workouts.  I have  a great set of Bose SoundSport Pulse Wireless Headphones I use when I train and didn't expect these waterproof headphones to have good sound quality.  Especially at this price.  I was surprised at the quality of the sound and the fit of these earbuds.  I've had them in underwater without issue, keeping in mind the Bluetooth does not work underwater.  Bluetooth drops when you go under the water and comes right back on when you emerge.  I definitely recommend these.

title: UPDATED:  Seriously, At this price, go for it. Best cheaper ones out there.
body:
While this doesn't touch the $300+ Jabras for sound quality and range, these are really amazing. The range is just as advertised, though when you approach the 30 ft mark, it cuts out. Occasionally, I find that if the phone is in my back pocket, this also can cause cut out. At the cost of a low end product, these headphones have high mid-tier worth. The bass is clear, it takes serious bass to distort them. They can sound a little tinny at times if the input is mostly treble. I've dropped them so many times and never experienced any issues. I also wear them in the shower from time to time and they are still going strong.

UPDATE: Just a few short days after posting this review, the case stopped accepting a charge. I contacted TOZO and they've not only sent me a replacement case, but also an extra bonus as well, just for the inconvenience. Highly recommend!

title: Excellent
body:
Shipment arrived on time, was well packaged, offered registration for a 1 year warranty and followed up with after sale communication.
I am pleasantly surprised and very impressed by the sound quality, and build of the Tozo T10 wireless airbuds.
Clear and crisp with both highs and lows the Tozo T10 is providing a joyous listening experience for my music and movies.
Pairing and set up were easy with my phone, IPad and Fire TV, and the charging case is a great convenience.
The fit is very comfortable and I am getting about 4 hours continuous playing time.
Great product!!

title: So far better than I expected
body: My experience with these has been pretty good so far. For some background, I have about 6-8 earphones/headphones ranging from $30-$300 plus a couple DACs and Amps for them so I definitely care about audio quality. These sound pretty good for the price, the soundstage and bass are tweaked, so they don't sound as natural as neutral earphones but I think most people will probably enjoy the sounds. Bass is more prominent and the soundstage sounds wider. All around very happy with this purchase, definitely worth the price.

title: Great sound quality, great warranty service
body:
Overall these are very nice headphones. If you position them correctly in your ears they sound kind of amazing. Even bass notes come through nicely. But it's all about positioning them properly in your ear.  I really was impressed when listening to certain songs with these.  I'm used to tinny sound out of earbuds but these really sound nice.

Only minor issues I have are sometimes I need to manually connect and other issue is that if you connect only one headphone, for a couple minutes that single headphone will beep waiting to connect its partner. It doesn't do this if you use both headphones.

My right headphone went out after only using it for a few weeks but their warrant service is very efficient and had already sent me a replacement within a couple days.  VERY impressive.

title: Exactly what you want in wireless headphones
body:
WOW is all I can really say. TOZO knows how to make headphones!

APPEARANCE: Stylish clamshell case that tightly snaps, well made ear attachments/adapters in sm med and lrg come with it in case the default ones don’t fit nicely (mine did). Brushed matte black on the headphones looks nice and adds a little extra grip to them. USB port is behind a small rubber tab, perfect to avoid water damage. Comes with a lanyard for some reason, the case doesn’t appear to have any place to loop it into, but not a problem as I never use lanyards.

FUNCTION: EACH earbud can function alone but pair beautifully without any effort. A nice touch is that they announce which channel they are when powering on and pairing (left or right) so you know without having to look for the tiny “l” or “r” on the actual earpiece. INTENSE sound even in the bass.

NOISE CANCELING: This is where these guys blew me away. The seal of the earpiece is perfect such that I can’t hear the person next to me, and can barely hear background noise through them. Tested watching Infinity War and it took turning it up to 50% before I could hear through my music. And even then it’s very muffled, very well done sound management.

TECH: worked with Siri without any effort, answering calls during music pauses music and sound crisp and clear. Spotify sounded amazing and works on iPhone, iPad, Mac and PCs with Bluetooth.

title: Good, but take a while to connect.
body: Pretty good set of wireless earbuds. The only complaint I have is that it takes a while to connect to your phone. It turns on automatically and tries to connect as soon as you take them out, but it sits and beeps for a good minute before it actually connects to my phone. That's annoying. Otherwise, the sound quality and fit is good.

title: Great for everything except at the gym.
body: If you want a great set of earbuds that you will not use in the gym get these. they fit nicely into the ear and hold their place, the sound is great. using them for talking on your phone; people can hear you but are saying it sounds like im in a tunnel. I bought these to listen to music in the gym. They do not work well when you have alot of other people using bluetooth also. these earbuds keep cutting out. I had to return them only due to that.

title: A little Bass-y
body:
Only had for a few weeks so far.
Work great, except for at the gym (which is the main location I want to use them).  Something in the gym is providing terrible BT interference, so my music continuously cuts in and out.  I've tried them in other locations (like work) and do not typically have the same problem.

They do stay in my ear well w/o too much fatigue.  The battery is sufficient for a bit of a work out, and the recharging cases can keep me charged all week long.  I just recharge the case on the weekend and I'm good to go.

The sound is a little bass-y, which is hard for me to say as I enjoy good bass.  With these though, it's easy to get the bass to drown out the rest of the music/vocals.  There are ways around this (a little adjustment on the Spotify equalizer), but shouldn't be necessary.

I do wish I could find a solution for the constant BT Interference I get at the gym, if any one has any suggestions...

title: WOW just WOW!
body: This is the best pair of BT earphones I have owned. Just amazing how well they fit in the ear and connect with the device. I own apple earpods and the music sounds way better on these compared to them, deep base and clear sound. Works flawlessly with wireless charging. Worth every penny!

title: Wonderful Product
body: Such a wonderful product. The price is great and the quality is even better. They fit perfectly and I don’t have to be adjusting them or be afraid of them falling off. I’m really glad I bought them. I am recommending them to others as well.

title: Works for me.
body: I bought these to use at the gym because I was tired of wired headphones. These didn’t disappoint. I have used them several times, running on the treadmill and lifting weights and the sound is great and they stay put. Love the charging case. So convenient and magnets snap them right back in place for easy charging and can throw them in my bag for safe keeping until the next time. I would buy these again.

title: Amazing Quality and An Amazing Price! Better than expected!
body: I bought these as a replacment for my blue tooth my dog ate. At first I wasn't expecting much. But then after recieving them I was blown away by the quality! The packaging was the first thing I noticed, then once I opened them the build quality was amazing for what I thought would be a budget set of ear buds. Every detail was more then expexted the charging case was solid and well crafted. The ear buds were spot on with the pictures. The call quality has been amazing regardless of if I use one or both earbuds, and the same goes for the quality of sound while listening to music regardless of the source. Battery life is also impressive for such a small bud. And the fact that TOZO also throws in a year warranty is fantastic. I'd recoomend this to anyone looking for a great set of ear buds for single or dual ear usage.

title: Wish they fit petite ears
body: When I tried them on they made me look like Frankenstein, they stuck out of my ears like little knobs on the side of my head. I am petite and have proportional ears to my body, but I couldn’t even get the small sized rubber tips to fit. I don’t know about sound quality because I sent them back as soon as I realized they didn’t fit.

title: Good headphones would recommend
body:
Great headphones. The only issue is that my left ear is having difficulties with the seal. But that’s not the earphones fault. I will try a different size cover and hopefully that will keep the left side in place.

I haven’t worked out hard with these just doing elliptical type stuff and the right one has stayed in fine. I have no problem hearing the music or book I’m listening to and they were easy to connect. I will say that I just switched from a galaxy s9 to a iPhone XS Max and they seem to pair faster with the iPhone. But again it is only a few seconds of difference and not something I’m actually complaining about.

title: Wish able to sleep with them...
body: Husband really like these earbuds! Only issue is if you lay down (sleep/cover up) loses signal and cuts out. Which was main reason I bought was for sleeping for him..... Works offshore 🤨 but he is happy with them in every other aspect.

title: Charging case won’t hold a charge, otherwise fine
body: I have had these earbuds since June, and every time I go to use them, they’re dead.  When I prepare and MAKE SURE to charge them before a trip or workout, they’re great.  Excellent sound, 2-3 hours of play time, they stay in my ears (no small feat), and are very comfortable.  But I also have Anker SoundCore wireless earbuds, and while they don’t perform as well (fall out of my ears now and then, sound is good but not great), I can charge the case, put in my earbuds and they’re always fully charged, even after weeks in my backpack.  The Tozo ones are always dead (and yes, I seated them properly in the charging case and followed all of the direction ... to the letter!).  Five stars if they can fix the battery life / charging problem.

title: Left ear will not connect.
body: I really was hoping to like these.  The right ear works fine but the left will not connect. It's so frustrating because I really want some Airbuds for working out and walking.

title: Great sounding ear buds
body: These are great sounding ear buds. Easy to pair and last about 3.5 hours so I bought a second pair after using these for a while cause it takes me five hours to cut my yard. I use mostly when mowing with my zero turn which is very loud and while brush hogging. These are great at canceling noise, so you don’t have to crank up the volume. Very good quality!

title: Thiccums
body: The absolute size of these lads are immeasurable, they are like an inch thicc and they are so bottom heavy they just fall out of your ear, also you need the right earbud out of the case in order to use it so that's great

title: Great Value, fit, and sound
body: I've tried two other bluetooth earsets that are similar to the apple airpods and they fit and sound wasn't great.  I use these for working out and the fit and waterproof capability is spot on.  I like how they come with additional ear sizes so you can find the right fit.  The quality of the case(magnetic connection) and automatic turn on is great especially when you're on the go.  The wireless charging case is money and should be a minimum for all bluetooth headsets.  There's a reason why we want wireless so make everything wireless.  Great product!

title: Great Sound
body: I was surprised with the awesome sound quality of these earbuds.  The sound is crisp with deep bass.  I have issues with earbuds staying put while i run.  These earbuds stayed put and i had no issues with them falling out.  The pairing process is really simple and quick.  I've been using them for 3 weeks now, so will update my post once i have more time using them.

title: Great Product and great company to buy from
body: Great Product and great company to buy from. I got my earbuds in one day which was amazing. The earbuds are exactly what I wanted. The quality is wonderful, easy to pair to your devise and easy to use. I am truly happy with this product and the company that supplied them

title: The Best!
body:
Don’t listen to the negative feedback!!
These are my first pair of wireless earbuds and I’m thankful I went with these.
Sound to me is perfection.  These cancel out everything around you,
Charge lasts about 3 hours but the wireless charging case they come with recharges them right back up in less than 2 hours.
The wireless charging case is AWESOME!!
The case can be charged with a mini USB or by a wireless charger.
I charge the case and place it on my key ring if I need to charge them up.
I would recommend these to anyone that is looking for a surround sound experience!
Buy them........you won’t regret it!!!

title: They come out during long distance runs
body:
I've been searching for a true pair of wireless headphones and ordered these. I run long distances and was tired of the cord with other options.

There are many positives with these headphones. They sound good (for what they are), sync easily and have a good long charge.

My problem with them is that they don't fit tight during my whole long distance run. After about two miles they start to loosen up in my ear. I'm confident this is due to sweating though as they stay in during my entire strength workouts without problems.

These are great headphones and worth ordering unless you plan to use them ONLY for long distance running. Overall, I am very happy with this purchase.

title: Recommended
body: Great quality sound, easy to pair with iPhone.  Have only used a handful of times, so I can't speak to durability, but impressed so far.  I typically find ear buds uncomfortable, but with the variety of sized tips provided, I was able to find a perfect fit that is secure while working out, but does not cause pain.  Very convenient to not have to deal with a cord while exercising.

title: One Issue - Resolved!
body: These ear buds came in a timely manner as promised.  I use them on bike tours and unfortunately one fell out mid-trip.  A little upsetting, but found with the change of the size of bud, they fit much better and have had no further problem.  They sound great and have lasted the 2+ hours of a trip without the need to re-charge.

title: Great sound at a great price
body: These things sound great and stay in your ear. I wanted to jump into the true wireless earbud game, but didn't want to spend $100+ to find out if they were worth it. Really impressed by the sound quality and are a great value! I use them at work where it can get noisy and they really block out the noise as well. Would buy again.

title: Good quality earbuds for the price
body:
I've had these earbuds for a couple months now, so I figured I'd leave a quick review.  Ultimately, I'm pretty satisfied with these!

I primarily use them when I'm in the gym.  The reason I actually looked for and bought these earbuds was because my last pair of Sony bluetooth headphones began to crap out after a while (partly, due to sweat), so I needed a quick replacement for working out.  So far, so good!  I don't take them swimming or anything, but they definitely seem to hold up pretty well during vigorous exercise on the treadmill and in the weight room.

My only initial complaint was the actual audio quality.  When the volume is up (>90%), it sounded a little "staticky" on some of the highs, especially when there was heavier bass.  When I'm in the gym, though, I don't even really notice if/when that happens anymore.  But, I'd say the overall sound quality is pretty clear at medium, medium-high volume.  Noise cancellation is pretty good, too.

So, when all is said and done, I'd recommend these earbuds.  For the price, I got what I expected and needed.

title: Great value!!
body: The product is awesome the ergonomics of it rivals some popular hanging type that just don’t stay put, anyways these here stay put and never give you that feeling of them slipping or coming loose AWESOME! Only negative is sometimes they disconnect from each other briefly.

title: YES YES YES, SOUND QUALITY IS PERFECTO!
body: I am so relieved. I read through many reviews on different earbud products and came across this one. I've only had these out of the box for an hour but I'm truly blown away. It was very easy to pair, they are comfortable but the sound quality is just superb. I was skeptical as many are in here.... how can it possibly be that good for $50. I promise you it is. As of this review, there are more than 14, 000 reviews and I believe more than 83% gave it a 4 or 5 stars. That's a lot of reviews. Looking forward to using these on my next flight.

title: Great Ear Buds
body: Great ear buds! I've run about 5 times 4 miles using the ear buds and they've done great. I did have to change the ear plug size. I tried the largest first , then mediums. You have to experiment the best way to fit the buds so they stay put but it didn't take but one run to figure it out. I'm sure this voids my warranty but I forgot they were in my running shorts and washed and dried them. I figured they were ruined or at least the sound guilty would be bad but that wasn't the case. They came on no problem and the next morning used them for my run. The case to store and charge them are also a plus.

title: Can be used one at a time
body: Sceptical at first. The product is well built. Comes in very good packaging. Sound actually is great. Can be used once at a time. To use one at a time,  take both ear buds out of the charging case. Let it connect. Once working put the left bud back in the case. Right bud will say disconnected and will beep once. If you start with one bud right away, it will beep non stop. Very pleased with this product and hope it last long.

title: Great quality for the price
body: I was surprised at how good the sound quality was for these headphones, especially since they use Bluetooth and they have reasonable price tag. I bought these headphones for use at the gym because I was tired of wires getting in the way of my workout. The headphones generally stay secure in my ears as long as I am not actively trying to shake them out, but they do take a little bit of time to get used to. Running or swimming with them I wouldn’t recommend though. The battery life has not been a problem for me so far, as the portable charging case that they come with is really nice. Anytime I am not using them I just put them in the case and they are good to go for the next time I need them. I haven’t run into any problems with connection between the headphones or my phone either. Overall I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of the headphones for their price.

title: Left earbud stops working after 1 week
body:
Less than a week after receiving these earbuds, the left earbud stopped working. The behavior of the LED light does not mention anything in the instruction manual: it flashes purple non-stop until the battery presumably dies, at which point I can't turn it on. Even after leaving them in a fully charged case for 12 hours, I am unable to turn on the left earbud, let alone have it connect to the right one. Overall, I am very disappointed with this product. The only option they give you is to reset the device: too bad I can't do that if the device won't even turn on!

Also, the earbuds fall out all the time and do not stay in the ears. I had to purchase memory foam earbud tips to make the earbuds stay in longer. If you are buying this product, expect to buy your own earbud tips!

title: Good for everyday use, I think a little over priced though.
body:
I still am not sold on these, but I can’t say they’re a bad product.

I own everything Apple, but don’t feel I need the apple AirPods. I prefer wired headphones, but needed something wireless for my workouts. These seemed like a good compromise.

First off, the sound on these is wonderful. The noise canceling is great. When you have both in and music playing you can’t hear anything else. It’s amazing.

My issues comes from pairing.
I usually have to go into my phones Bluetooth and manually click to pair these. The EarPods don’t seem to want to pair automatically.

You cannot switch from one audio device to another easily, its a manual process. I paired them with my Mac and my IPhone, and it always pairs to the Mac first automatically  and then I have to discount it and manually pair it to the iPhone in the settings. I’ve since told it to forget these pods on my Mac, but still doesn’t want to pair automatically with my phone.

If you pair the left first, the right won’t pair, so you then must disconnect the left and then pair the right.

If you want to use only the right earpod - you still have to remove both pods from their pack, pair both, then place the left back into the pack. Then the right earpod will beep at you for about 30 seconds while it’s trying to repair with the left pod until it gives up.

I’ve had some issues of the sound going in and out while only listening to the right earpod.

I can’t speak to battery. Seems fine.

I think 50 bucks is too much for these. Not really sure I’m going to keep them or not. They’re def. a hassle for the way I want to use them but for everyday, pop in, listen to music, pop out, they are fine.

title: Below average for price
body: For the price it's average. However, there are ones for 20 dollars that are just as good. It's not spectacular. In fact, for 50 bucks you could find ones twice as better.

title: Good Enough to Game with!!!
body:
I've been through an array of wireless headphones for couch gaming and movies and had lag issues with Bluetooth (even Sony and Skull Candy) and cut outs with Turtle Beach (proprietary dual-band) to the point where I now have USB extensions run like speaker wires in the room for good USB gaming headphones while on the couch.
So I bought these for podcasts/audio books @ work and was so impressed with the bass I stared using them for music and then even tried them for gaming! While no wireless I've ever tried beats wired solutions I was truly impressed especially for this price point!
When I don't have to use headphones I like it loud enough to shake the walls and had absolutely no expectation from earbuds other than loud enough to hear while working out or mowing the lawn - these are blowing me away.

(like all BT-still has ever so slight lag but sooo much improved from a couple years ago)

title: Really good for exercising
body:
I waited for a month before writing a review. Overall, very, very good. Battery life is plenty long. Unlike the another brand of white pods, these don’t fall out of my ear. The plug type pod gives really good passive noise reduction enabling you to hear your music even in noisy environments (including airplanes). As others have noted, from time to time the left pod will lose connection, albeit only very briefly and then it restores on its own.
I’m definitely not an audiophile, so I have no comment about the quality of the sound.
Overall, 4 stars

title: they stick out a bit for someone who has small ear canals and a large outer ear.
body:
I've only had it for one day, but the only problem I have with it is based on the immediate application of the product; putting it on. Took me awhile trying each size of ear tips twice to find the best fitting one which was the smallest one. I have small ear canals yet the outside part of my ear (excuse me for my lack of anatomy regarding the ear) and my lobes are large so the earbuds just jut out awkwardly and I am not one who likes to draw attention so I'm debating on whether to return them or not if I cannot find a way to wear them more discretely. However, for those who have normal ears, this product is worth it.

Edit: They fall out far too much for comfort for me. The noise cancellation helps when using public transportation but doesn't mean much when they slip out every few minutes even when sitting still

title: Very good product!
body:
This product is great!! I bought for myself and another one for my nephew. I cannot use ear plugs like airpods..they don't fit my ear and fall off, but these fit just fine.
Customer service was very good as well  when I had a problem connecting once.. they contacted me promptly and helped me figure out the solution.

title: Bad audio quality, possible email farming for spam
body:
Not a fan of these headphones. The audio quality is far below what I would expect from $30 headphones much less at $50. The charging is case is bulky and not easily pocketable. There is a lot of phantom drain from the headphones which means you have to keep charging them even if you don’t use them. It’s also impossible to just use one without the annoying beeping that keeps overriding the music.

Additionally, registering warranty may have resulted in email spam. I have not given one of my email addresses anywhere, but after registering my warranty, I started receiving a lot of spam.

Overall, I wish I didn’t get these headphones. There are far better options out there especially at this price range. Go with a reputable brand like Anker. At least they support and stand behind their products. Be wary of all of the positive reviews for the product. If you read them, you’ll see a pattern on why customers have it such high ratings.

title: Great earbuds at great price
body: I got these ear buds to use at the gym. I have gone through three other pairs of wireless ear buds and because I tend to sweat a lot, they none have lasted vey long. Not these. These, so far, are the very best pair I've gotten. I can use them during my HIIT training out on the stairs and they stay put. It also gets very loud in my gym and they play their own music but when using these I can't even tell. The charging box is also a feature I find super convenient. I am completely happy with these ear buds.

title: GREAT HEADPHONES & GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
body:
**UPDATE! I EMAILED THE COMPANY AND GOT A VERY QUICK RESPONSE THAT THEY WERE GOJNG TO HANDLE THE UNFORTUNATE SITUATION THAT I HAD.  VERY IMPRESSED WITH THEIR CUSTOMER SERVICE SO I AM UPDATING MY 3 STARS TO 5 STARS NOW BASED ON THE GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE**
I LOVE THE HEADPHONES..EASY TO USE AND THEY ARE COMFORTABLE. MY ONLY NEGATIVE ABOUT THEM IS THEY FOR SOME REASON NO LONGER CHARGE WITH MY WIRELESS CHARGER LIKE THEY SHOULD.. I EVEN BOUGHT A NEW CHARGING PAD THINKING THAT MAY BE THE ISSUE BUT IT STILL WONT CHARGE. BUMMED ABOUT THAT PART CAUSE THAT WAS ONE OF THE TWO MAIN REASONS I BOUGHT THIS PAIR

title: Nice earbuds, very clear audio.
body:
I really like the headphones.  They sound good and fit my ears well. The only negative for me is the poor outgoing audio for phone calls.  My friend said the earbud's mic made my voice fuzzy/cloudy/veiled.  Since using these for phone calls is a low priority for me, I only dock the rating by one star.  On the plus side, dictation via Siri worked fine.

While reading reviews I noticed some misinformation, so here's some info from the product manual.
-Earbud battery capacity is 55mAh/3.7V *2, which I assumes means 55mAh per earbud.
-Earbud storage/charging box capacity is 600mAh/3.7V, which is enough to charge two earbuds 4 times.
-Music play time is about 3 hours.
-Phone call time is about 5 hours.
-Fast charging: 20 minutes of charging can provide 1 hour of music playback.

I really like these, they sound good and come with 4 different size ear caps so you can customize them to better fit your ear size.  I listen to a lot of Audible audio books and these make the reader's voice come through very clearly, better than many full size bluetooth headphones that I've owned.  I have not tried the Apple bluetooth earbuds so I can't compare these to them, but nevertheless I am very happy with them.

I hope this review helps someone!  Happy shopping!

title: Nice ear buds
body: My husband ordered these for his work n a manufacturing plant that is loud.. he loves them. Tho they are a little big for his ears. Something he can get used to.

title: Best earbuds I’ve used so far
body: I use the earbuds for daily exercise mostly walking and running on the treadmill.  I like the fact that there are multiple earbud sizes... The noise reduction is very good... However, as I approach the end of my exercise and my ear gets sweaty, there is a slight shift of the device in my ear... very slight... It got better when I replaced the earbuds with a smaller size! I really love it.  The charger case makes life easy, plus it pairs immediately with my mobile device! I would recommend this to anyone one who needs good earbuds for exercise!

title: Holy sound!
body: These are my first pair of truly wireless ear buds and I was literally blown away. I put  them in while they paired to my phone, and jumped when they connected and came on. The sound was awesome. They fit nice and snug and have stayed in great working out. I do burpees with them in, can run, and so my cross trainer. Definitely recommend!

title: Keeps disconnecting
body: I really like the sound of the buds, nice bass!  They work great when just listening to music.  But when I try to use them with my IPhone 11, they keep disconnecting.  I am only using the right bud when using it for the phone, so I am not sure if that is why.  But, I can be talking, then I get... "disconnected, reconnecting, connected".  And this happens every 30 seconds to a minute.  Just got the new Iphone, so now the return period has passed, I guess I'm SOL!

title: Great Sound At A Great Price
body: Great sound quality for a great price. Only reason I rated a 4 star is because I have not figured out how to control volume when using it with my 4K Firestick watching TV. Seems I have no control of volume. That may be on me and open to any suggestions someone may have.  Level that comes out however is comfortable. Other than that works great with my phone and Nexus 7 pad. Volume level is controllable and quality is much better than cheap pair I had previously purchased and as good as very expensive pair I had tried. Storage/charging box is very convenient and takes away any anxiety one may have as far as using for a long time. Charges very fast , both ear buds and charging box. Charged case to full when I received it and still at full after a day. Buy them, you'll be glad you did.

title: Definitely recommend!
body: Buds arrived late and I almost returned since I specifically purchased for my international travel schedule. I decided to try and immediately loved these. The souls is crisp and clear. I virtually hear no noise. These are perfect and very easy to operate. I use while working out. I get lost in whatever I am listening to which makes working out less painful! (It’s bee a while!) I definitely recommend this product!!

title: The negative reviews can easily become positive...
body:
The first pair I received had an issue where the left earbud kept disconnecting. I had a feeling this was just how it was designed. Cheap... $50 Bluetooth earbuds... you get what you pay for... I started to pack them back up to return. Instead of accepting it, I actually contacted the manufacturer.
They helped troubleshoot them, and it turned out to be a defective pair. They sent out a new set and I am so glad that I decided to work with them.  They sent me out a fresh pair, and now they work great!

Take the time and size the ear tips correctly, and you’ll get good sound. I ordered a pair if Comply ear tips, so I am expecting even better sound isolation and quality.

I wear them in the shower. Due to my roommates schedule, I had to quit using my speaker.

I am so happy with the customer service I received!  The earbuds have been constantly used since I received them. In fact, I ordered a second pair to have in my car for when I go shopping.

title: Good earbuds
body: So far this earbuds have been great. I use them for running everyday since I got them and the sound is pretty good. Fully recommend them.

title: Fantastic on a budget
body: The earbuds are great, and the waterproofing is excellent. The sound quality is fantastic, and the case wirelessly charges, which is super cool. I misplaced one of my earbuds, and the Tozo customer service was amazing and sent me two replacements. Can not recommend this brand enough.

title: Received them as a gift & love them!
body: Received these as a gift from my hubby so I’ve only used them once so far.  They came with several sizes for the ear pieces, which was good because I needed the smallest ones.  Those were easy to change out.  Sound quality is great, I have my phone on the lowest volume setting and think they are plenty loud.  I can even hear the individual background instruments when listening to songs, sounds that I had never noticed before!  As I said, I’ve only worn them once as they were a gift, but so far so good!!

title: Worthwhile Investment. Love it!!!!!
body:
I received my earbuds last week. It looks and sounds great and very easy to pair. The Tozo T10 is compact and fits easily into my ears. This earbud has liberated me from wires and I can even listen to music and podcasts in one ear at work and use the other ear to receive phone calls.

My brother loves my T10 and is thinking of discarding his bulky old clunker for a T10. I highly recommend this product.

title: Bang for you buck!
body:
Everything is great, but just for those who need in-depth information on how it sounds here it is (and I will be critical):

Highs are very weak. The mids and bass are chokingly loud compared to highs, which might be an attractive option for you bass heads out there. But, don't expect much clarity in music. I am guessing due to waterproofing, many high frequencies are getting lost.

Mids are very prominent, really too loud making it sound a bit like an old radio (in terms of vocals and background track), but this is easily overcompensated by the fact that the bass in these headphones is insane.

Bass, now the low frequencies on these bad boys are extremely loud, but with no clarity. As loud as it is, I can hear small distortions as well as muddiness in the bass. It almost sounds like the bass has reverb on it, but it shouldn't.

With the price in mind, honestly great wireless headphones. Setting up is simple, sounds great for the price range. It might be a bit hard figuring out how to plug them in your ears without it falling off, but it is great for working out in as well as just everyday use.  Waterproofing is always a nice addition for working in moist conditions.

After using:

Transitioning from Sennheiser HD 598 SR, these earphones sounded just all right. After adjusting to it, I am no longer annoyed by the lack of highs or strong presence of mids. Still, the bass is too overwhelming, and especially playing video games it lowers the audio awareness due to an incredible amount of bass muddying up game sounds. I had to lower the bass on my phone as well as on PC just so I can hear anything with better clarity, which did increase the sound quality quite a lot. Either way, a great budget option for those bass heads out there but not so much for those who prefer balanced audio.

title: Sounds good but didn't fit
body: They sound great, but no matter what I do (switched to the small attachment) they don't fit in my ear well. I gave them to my daughter to try and she couldn't wear them either (they practically fall out). Perhaps we have little ears.

title: PLEASE TRY-YOU WON'T BE DISAPPOINTED!
body: I tried these earbuds to replace the Samsung buds I just purchased.  I was very unhappy with the Samsung product and the cost was more than double.  Well, I am so happy that I did.  The Tozo T10's are exactly as advertised..the sound is clear..no problems with the connection..all of the features of the Samsung..BUT the best part of this purchase is.....I had a few questions but realized there was no phone number to call so I emailed their customer service.  I heard a reply within hours!!!  A second email made after hours was answered first thing in the morning.  They could not have been more accommodating.  So...the product is perfect (I used mine on the beach today for 4 hours...quick charge gave me another hour) and their customer service is A++++.  A win all the way around.  Thank you Tozo!

title: Amazing! Blown away!
body: The sound is amazing. The fit is just right. I'm so happy I purchased these instead of the way more expensive alternatives. I'm recommending them to all my friends.

title: Great quality headphones!
body: Once i received this i took this out and it paired right away.  The md earbud size that was on the ear sets fit in my ear perfectly!  Sound quality on these are great and on par with the more expensive ones out there.  So far battery life is good no issues there.  Glad i pulled the trigger on these!  Good price for this quality headphone!

title: Good range, charging adapter is great
body: These ear buds were super easy to connect and have really good sound quality. There are several size ear pieces you can easily switch out to ensure they don't fall out while you're running. The range is pretty good, it didn't start breaking up until I was at least 50 or 60 feet away from my phone. I already had a wireless charging pad for my phone and the charging adapter works perfectly with it. Great to recharge the adapter every couple days and recharge the headphones everytime you take them out of your ears.

title: A MUST buy for anyone who loves music!!!
body: The sound quality is amazing!!!  Truly a bargain for the cost of these earbuds.  They hold a charge for a really long time and they don't fall out while working out like other wireless earbuds.  These are great all around AND waterproof!!! They're fantastic; you definitely can't go wrong with these earbuds!!!  Did I mention how comfortable they are?  I wore them for a couple hours without any discomfort in my ears.

title: Left headphone plays on and off
body:
Sound quality is relatively good. I have always had a problem with the left (slave) ear cutting in and out. Then it will play for a period at a much lower volume then the right. Other times it just stops playing, then surprises you by tripping in every now and then.

If the left ear would play consistently, I would be a happy customer. There are no issues with the right side. It connects via Bluetooth and plays until I turn if off.

title: Great product.  Just what I needed.  So I thought
body:
I received my headset a few days ago.  I liked the sound, the weight and comfort of the headset but people couldn't hear me. So, I called Amazon customer service and they told me to keep the defective headset and sent me another one which I received today.  The previous set was defective.  The replacement set works great and operates seamlessly for listening to music and making or receiving calls.  I have them on listening to music while working at home and when a call comes in, I click the button on either side and I'm on the phone.  I highly recommend this set.  Don't give up on this set.  Apparently the manufacturer does not have a good quality testing program based on the reviews.  I'm glad I stuck with this set and didn't return them.
UPDATE of my review:  I received the replacement headsets yesterday and still have the same issue. Returned to Amazon for full refund.  They only asked for one set back.  The set that I still have will make a good Bluetooth headphone.  I will buy a cheap headset this time since my Plantronics that cost as much as this one switches back and fort to the phone in the middle of the call. I give this thing a one star review for having wasted my time.

title: Bad mic and left earbud looses connection
body:
For $50 I would expect more from these headphones.  This is my first set of wireless earbuds so maybe my expectations are too high, but I wouldn't recommend paying $50 for these.
The Bad:
1) Everyone complains about the mic quality when I use them during phone calls.  So I've all but given up using these for phone calls
2) The left earphone cuts out frequently.  I'll be listening to music and for a second or two, I won't be able to hear anything out of the left earbud.
3) Battery dies out quickly.  Batter seems to die out quickly.  Maybe it's just my expectations are too high, so I'm not really holding this against them.

Neutral:
1) Sound quality seems okay (when it's not cutting off - but that's more of a connection issue and not a sound quality issue).

Good:
1) I like the charging deck.  The charging deck has an internal battery so you don't have to have it constantly plugged into the wall.  Very helpful when traveling.

All and All, I would say these are a decent $20 pair of headphone.  But for $50, I would expect much more and they don't deliver.

title: Best earphones I've ever owned
body: Pretty much the best earphones I've ever owned. I bought them on a lightning deal when a friend recommended them and I'm still extremely surprised about the quality of the earphones for the price. I have a tendency to always break the wires on corded earphones so the fact that these are bluetooth is perfect for me. The bass is really good, again, for the price you can't beat it. I would totally recommend them to anyone looking for affordable bluetooth earphones

title: Best sounding earbuds, only one thing from 5 stars
body: I tried 4 different brands of earbuds in this price range. By far, these are the best sounding ones. Great bass, good quality buds. Only thing keeping them from 5 stars. You can answer phone, redial and all sorts of functions, but I was shocked that you cannot skip or forward songs using the function button of the earbuds. I would much rather have that function than all the fancy phone functions.

title: Don’t buy.
body: These do not pair well. Don’t buy.

title: TOZO 10 Experience
body: I was in the market for bluetooth earbuds and decided to give these a chance after reading so many positive reviews about the sound quality. I have to admit, I initially purchased the Pasonomi iXP7 rated bluetooth earbuds, but I just needed a better experience in terms of sound quality. I'm not sure about others, but these are the earbuds for music enthusiasts. If you enjoy listening to music while being fully engaged in sporting activities, then these are for you. The sound quality is as good as one could hope for, I love listening to music with deep bass and these exceeded my expectations and delivered where the Pasonomi earbuds could not for me [(but it did for my wife :-)]. The sound quality is amazing, crystal clear, and I haven't experienced any issues with battery life in the four weeks that I've been using my TOZO earbuds. The one opportunity for improvement would be having the ability to switch  tracks/ adjust volume directly through the device; however, for me the sound quality makes it worth it for me!!

title: Great for music, terrible for phone calls
body:
UPDATE: Turns out these earbuds sound fine, but they're terrible for making phone calls. Every time I call someone with them, they say they can barely hear me, like the sound is very muffled. I guess maybe that's because of the waterproofing? Anyway, deducting 2 stars due to very bad call quality. If you're only using these to listen to music, they still work fine for that. Below is my original review.

I've been very happy with these earbuds. They sound good and the battery seems to last about as long as advertised. I usually wear one in my ear with the other in the charging case, then swap them when the battery gets low and they easily last all day switching between them like that. The Qi charging feature of the case is pretty cool too.

title: Never have to buy ear buds again
body: These ear buds are the end all for me buying new ear buds. I have boughton many ear buds that say they are water proof to only have them fail after about 2 weeks working out and getting sweated on. Not these ear buds they just keep going and going. They stay in place great never falling out with all the moving around when working out. They also have very good sound quality, and noise cancellation. I won't be looking for any more ear buds these are a homerun.

title: My husband LOVES these
body: And I want a pair for myself now. I got them for him as a Father's Day gift. According to his statements, they pair really well, have great sound quality, and are comfortable to wear. The portable charging case is a bonus. So far it's all pros and no cons.

title: Solid buy
body: I really like these ear buds. I can workout in them, do yard work, desk, plane, and even sleep in them. I like that you can split the ear buds to two different devices. The case/charger is legit the fifth star as it works great, durable, and looks nice. For this price And the quality you get I think anyone would be hard pressed finding a better deal.

title: Pretty neat *UPDATED 10/9/19
body:
So far this is great! I am able to listen with just one ear bud in. Making it great for keeping an ear out for surrounding sounds.
*************
10-9-19
The sound is still great but unfortunately if I get a call I have to take out the earbud because the caller can not hear me clearly. They describe it as sounding under water or having the mic covered. This gets pretty annoying especially when I'm cooking or have my hands full and can't grab my phone to disconnect the Bluetooth. Music still plays really well and blocks out all noise if both are in.

title: Great quality for the price
body: I've been looking for true wireless headphones that were good quality, provided a good amount of bass, and didn't cost an arm and a leg. Thankfully I found these bad boys and not only were they way cheaper than most wireless headphones, they actually gave you a great amount of bass. The fact that they were water resistent and that the case had wireless charging was a huge bonus. Alss I've watched some review videos and people complained about the earbuds don't pair right away when you take them out of the case. I haven't had any issue with this, once I paired them they always automatically paired up once I take them out. I've had them for about a month now and haven't noticed any problems so far.

title: Really impressed with the sound quality and how easy they operate!
body:
I was hesitant to go bluetooth, but since many of the major smartphone manufacturers have abandoned headphone jacks I guess it became inevitable.

I really didn't want something else to charge, but the case makes it easy.  The headphone turn off and start charging as soon as you put them back in the case.

The sound quality is top notch.

They include 4 different sized earbud adapters to find the perfect fit.  I had a corded headset before that had three and I had not idea my fit was not great.  This in between option is incredible.  It blocks so much more noise and allows for better listening at lower volume.

Go ahead and get them, you will be happy you did.

title: Bluetooth connection drops out a lot
body: Fine earbuds, sound is good. Biggest issue for me is that these really are only good if you phone is in direct line of sight of the earbuds, as the smallest obstruction will block the bluetooth signal. As soon as my phone is in my pocket, it will drop in and out repeatedly to the point of being annoying and useless. I don't have this probelm with other bluetooth headphones .  Perfect if you want to put your phone on a treadmll in front of you, but otherwise pretty disappointed. I will have minimal use for these.

title: Comfortable and they sound GREAT!
body: I was looking for some decent wireless earbuds and came across these. After reading the reviews I decided to give them a try and I'm very happy I did. I have some Bose earbuds that aren't wireless that cost more than twice what these did and the TOZO earbuds sound just as good to me. I'm also pleased with how comfortable they are. I love the wireless charging case too! Very convenient.

title: Great sound.  Actually stay in your ears when walking!!
body: I received your wireless earbuds and I really do like them. I love the way the case to also doubles as a charger. I like the fact that they are magnetic and snapping the case so they don't fall out. They also have a really good sound to them. I ride the train to work everyday and these are perfect. Also I was very surprised that the shipping  was super super fast.  You have a really good product. I am 100% satisfied with a both the product and your company.

title: Not worth $50.
body: Product Bluetooth barely functions while moving, with the left headphone cutting out repeatedly. Sound quality is decent. Customer service is terrible and makes false promises. Battery life is also less than 4 hours on a charge.

title: So far So good!
body:
Really impressed with these so far. I am an avid gym goer and really prefer the earbud for working out. No wires is just such a perk when it comes to all the movement I'm doing.

So far the sound is really good, does a decent job of cancelling. The fit is a bit weird with it..i'm still getting used to it, but still solid.

battery has been good so far. This is a big part of earbuds for me. i've had a pair before and battery life completely evaporated and ended up only lasting for maybe a hour before needing recharging. I will keep an eye I've only had these for few days, but so far it's held up very well.

Overall I think these are excellent for the price. The customer support has been fantastic as well and checked in with me right away asking about my purchase and thoughts. I really appreciate it when sellers actually care about their customers.

Definitely recommend as long as the battery life maintains!

title: Perfect!
body: Use at work, in the yard, and just finished a vacation out of country.  I could see the kids in the airplane cabin, but these kept me from hearing a peep from any of those wonderful monsters.....

title: Fantastic Sound
body:
I'm really impressed with these ear buds. I got a pair for my mom for her birthday and she loved them so much that I got them for myself. The bass is really impressive. I barely have to turn the volume up to hear clear sound and I feel like I'm hearing some intense bass but it's just in my head. Well balanced sound imo.
A big selling point for me was noise cancelling and these excel at that. I'm dead to the world with them on. No screaming kids on the airplane. The included charger is really solid. They didn't cut corners. It's got a magnetized lid (not snapped) and the ear bud pop right into place with the magnet. It also comes charged which is really thoughtful.
I have really tiny ear canals and the smalls mostly fit in. I don't feel like they are sticking out from my ears. If they ever made a kids size I would be on board, but it's not their fault at all. They have four total sizes instead of three which is also impressive.
Overall this was really worth it especially for the price.

title: Really Great Earbuds when they work. My left earbud is dead after 5 months.
body:
****Update. The left earbud has stopped working. It won't pair with the right earbud and the voice prompts are slowed? It's weird. Anyway disappointing as these weren't "that" cheap. They should last longer. I hope there is a warranty....

I really love these. I bought them so I could listen to podcasts in the shower and not bug everyone with a shower radio.  Sound quality is great. No connection issues whatsoever. The only and I mean only flaw really is that wearing them in the shower....as soon as you get a little water in your ear area, they loose grip and start to come out. I wish someone would come out with some earbud tips that have rubber that has some grip/texture on it so they don't want to move.

title: My favorite pair of headphones but I wish I could just buy a new charging case!
body:
I love these headphones but I've lost the cases...TWICE >_< I still have the ear buds and do not want to spend the money just for another case.  Anywhoodle, the headphone are great, loud, no issues with syncing together, they do not fall out of the ear at all. I am not a sweaty person so I really wouldn't know how well they would work in that instance but for my cardio & weight training it has been awesome to hear nothing but the music I want to hear.

Again, I wish I could just buy a new charging case "/

title: Great sound and comfortable
body: I am not a swimmer but the book clearly tells you that if your head goes under the water you will lose connection. I did however use these ear buds and I was superiorly surprised by the sound quality... So far they have been great for sound quality and for running... They are very comfortable and they don't fall out of my ear like some of the other ones that I have tried....I would like to say however, that when I am on a phone call everyone says that it sounds like I am in a tin can. In addition, they find it hard to understand me. My phone is an Iphone XS and this is what disappoints me--a tin can voice for those I am talking too... Come on and make the mic better... the sound is great just not the mic...

title: THESE ARE NOT WATERPROOF!
body: I went swimming with these headphones and they were ruined. These are not waterproof!!!

title: Great Performance to Cost Ratio
body: These ear buds are an excellent buy.....in fact I bought a second pair for my daughter two days after I received the first set.  The high and mid-ranges are crisp and the bass is reasonably good.  Overall great performance for a very reasonable price!

title: Garbage. Do not buy.
body:
For $40, I did not expect these earbuds to be top of the line. I did, however, expect them to work properly.  I gave them the benefit of the doubt for a few weeks; silly me because now the return window is closed. Here is a short list of problems:
-Constant popping noises
-Audio is persistently out of sync between earpieces or cutting out completely
-The microphone is spotty at best; I would need to shout for the person on the other end of the phone call to hear me

** Update 5/10/19:
I'm updating my review from 1 to 4 stars due to the proactive customer service of the seller to contact me and send a free replacement unit. So far, the replacement ear buds are not experiencing the same issues as the last pair. I've taken them to the gym a few times, and they appear to be maintaining sync even with strenuous movement.

title: Good crisp sound and bass.
body: By far this is the only item that I really like of all other brands that I had before. This earbuds really beats the other earbuds even Bose Sound Sport True Wireless.Nice design fit perfectly for the ears, nice crisp sound with kickin' bass. Also this earbuds good to be use for making calls.The person that I talked with can hear me clearly

title: Great sound quality for the price
body:
I was looking for a reasonably priced wireless pair of headphones to use for the gym! I didn’t want to compromise sound quality but at the same time, didn’t want to pay more than 100.

These headphones immediately caught my attention for their impressive sound quality and surprisingly good base. Also, they stay on my ears just fine and can even shoot the basketball and run around without any issues.

I recommend these if you’re looking to get a solid pair of wireless headphones without breaking the bank!

title: Don’t buy
body:
The sound isn’t the best, no much volume and no bass. If you move your head left or right stop the sound for 1 or 2 second and then start.
Simply I don’t recommend it

title: Constantly disconnecting
body: Constant audio popping and clicking heard.  Constantly "disconnecting " and reconnecting just feet from my phone. Occasionally the left unit drops out. Purchased for $49 and the day after purchase it was on lighting deal for $25.. probably would purchase a different brand in the future. Really wanted to like these but disconnecting during conversations on conference calls is really annoying and unprofessional

title: Good 90% of the time
body: The sound on these is very nice for bluetooth, and the earbuds fit comfortably and securely. I use these on my bike rides and have no issue with them coming loose. The problem is that the connection will drop on and off, sometimes dozens if not hundreds of times during a ride (over a time of an hour or two). Overall this only adds up to a few minutes of dropped time total since each drop is only for a few seconds. I haven't been able to pinpoint what causes it. It seems to sometimes coincide with my leg movement (in my pocket as I'm biking) but I don't think that would matter for a bluetooth connection. I don't know if it's my phone, or the earbuds, but I suspect the latter because other people have had similar issues and because if I use my phone's bluetooth in my car I never experience any similar drops. This isn't a huge deal; it's only a few seconds at a time. Still, it can sometimes be very annoying if I'm trying to enjoy a song or listening to a podcast or whatever it may be. The drops are what make me give the earbuds 4 stars instead of 5.

title: Value & Performance
body: I purchased these earbuds initially based on price point and solid customer reviews.  So far I have been nothing short of impressed with the quality and value they have provided to date.  Syncing with my device was extremely simple and fast; a literal ‘plug & play’ type experience.  Battery life has been significantly greater than expected.  For reference, I wore these on a 4 hour flight and upon re-docking they showed a 3/4 battery life left.  Loudness is commonly a problem with earbuds and these do not fail to deliver.  Even wearing on a loud commute, these earbuds provide enough volume range to comfortably enjoy your content.  All in all, solid product and it performs as advertised.

title: Comfortable and sound great!
body: I have such a hard time finding ear buds that are comfortable and won’t fall out of my ears. These wireless ear buds have been awesome! I was able to change the size of the buds to fit my ears and they stay in with no problem. Unlike other ear buds that can hurt after just a short time, these remain comfortable and the sound quality is top notch. I would definitely recommend these for anyone who struggles with the air pods or similar wireless ear buds.

title: Horrible product...
body:
The sound quality I think is great for the price. Not bad. Just couple inconveniences for me like not automatically connecting to my bluetooth phone when taken out of the case. One major thing that bothers me is that instead of a slight touch to pause/play music... you have to CLICK. And while the ear piece is in my ear, I have to press the button really hard for it to actually click and by the time it actually clicks... it digs into your ear and is slightly painful. So i have to hold the earpiece with my thumb and middle finger to try to press down hard enough w my index finger.

Updated review: less thanb2 months have gone by and the earphones are already acting up. If you want to use only one earpiece... that one earpiece will beep every 2 secs trying to search for the other earpiece. So if you wanna use one piece. You have to pull both earpieces out of the case and leave one in your pocket or something.
Frequently, the music will quite down almost as if I got a notification on my phone but when I check. Nothing. The music also pauses randomly for some reason.

title: Love them!
body:
I love this earphones.  Working alone and with no stimulation, time becomes dull.  I was listening to some audiobooks, but at times, the noise of moving boxes around the freezer was shutingoff the serene voice coming out of the smartphone.
