Then I was observing that my younger coworkers had some white device in their ears.  They told me that cost them $170!
Well, I searched for wireless earphones in my favorite omnichannel:Amazon.  I saw the reviews.  And I have to say that I saw the bad reviews.  Before ordering I read one review about the earphones not working... but the customer service was great...  I guess that made me decide to order them.  I received them and I m listening to many audiobooks while working.  I love them!
Now I have to deal with my data and my service with AT&T.
Thanks a lot!!!

title: Well worth the reasonable price!
body: Device is intuitive, easy to use and stylish. I am very impressed by the functionality--easy pairing of l/r and to my devices--and obvious quality of the manufacture. There are times when the left channel drops out/phases, but I use the buds during physical activity and don't see that as a huge issue: just the way BlueTooth rolls.

title: Works somewhat decent.
body: They sound pretty good to me, BUT, they cut out often. I use these at the gym and I'm there for about an hour and a half usually and they always cut out at least once. And the battery life on the case is horrible. Lasts about 2 days MAYBE. If you leave them fully charged for a few days and come back to them, the buds and the case are both dead. Sad.

title: Excellent sound, efficient customer service
body: I've had the TOZO 10 earbuds a few days now, and am astonished at how good the sound is for bluetooth earbuds.  It's almost as if the sound is being generated in the center of my head, it's that kind of "surround sound" sensation.  Also, really mutes out outside noises, so great for concentration in noisy environments (haven't had them on a plane yet, but expect they would excel in that application).  Finally, had a small glitch getting them to connect automatically to my iPhone 10, and customer support was prompt and efficiently solved the problem, so kudos there, as well.  --Andrew

title: Great out of the box
body: For the price I wasn’t expecting much but I was actually blown away by the sound quality. They may not pair as easily as maybe AirPods but for a third of the price of them they are great! Would recommend if you’re looking for a cheaper alternative than buying these name brand wireless earbuds. The only issue I had was finding the right earbud size the shipped size fit ok but the size above hurt my head so there wasn’t a perfect fit but they would only fall out if the was shaking my head vigorously.

title: Reasonable price for great quality earbuds
body: My daughter is very pleased with these earbuds. Says the quality of sound is very good and she loves the wireless feature.

title: I’ll keep looking.
body:
I liked the fact that with the rubber on the earpiece I was able to screw it into my ear for a secure fit. But this tight fit blocked out too much of the world around me and people I was talking to did not like the sound and we’re always saying are you on a speaker phone, could you turn it off because I can barely hear you.
Also the battery life was often less than 8 hours.
I also only use one device.
In short another moderately priced Bluetooth and I’ll keep looking.

title: Best Earbuds I have purchased
body: Being a softball player and an avid gym rat I have gone through a number of different earbuds and headphones.  My son purchased the a similar product and after trying his I was sold.  I have only had the TOZO 10's for a short time but I would recommend them to anyone.  For the money, they have been a solid investment and the best pair of earbuds I have owned to date.

title: 7/10 Good but could have been great
body:
Pros:
-When you pop them in your ear, they tell you which is the right and left channel in case you put them on wrong. Love this.
-Sound quality is much better than expected for something their size. Crisp clean sound. Comparable to my wired sony earbuds.
-wireless charging, Love it.
-pairing is super easy and I love that I can listen to spotify from my phone on my earbuds, get in my car, put the earbuds in the charger, and my phone just goes to my car bluetooth, no buttons needed, super easy.
-Decent range. I can be anywhere in my 1 bedroom apartment and I don't lose range.
-The magnetic "click" when you put the earbuds in their case. So satisfying.
-sturdy design, both of the earbuds and the charger
-waterproof IPX8.

Neutral:
3.5 hours continuous battery life and 9 more hours with charging. Some competitors are offering 5 hours continuous for those long hikes.

Cons:
-No navigation functions other than pause?? They should have at least made double-clicking one of the buds the skip function, but instead, for some reason decided to make it a redial function on both earbuds...
-The mic might as well not be there at all. whenever I try making calls with it, people complain that they can barely hear me and it just fades in and out. Reading other reviews, it sounds like I'm not alone.
-When I am using the earbuds with my phone and I put my phone in my pocket, the sound quality will be choppy for a second or 2 like I'm going out of range but quickly go back to normal.

Conclusion:
My intent was to use these as a replacement from my $25 Sony wired earbuds with mic. As a listening device goes, the sound quality and wireless capability are big plusses, But the wired Sony earbuds have a mic I can actually use for calling out with no complaints and unlike TOZOs, the Sony wired buds have a button on the mic that I can use for single-press pause AND double-press skip.

title: My first pair of bluetooth earbuds!
body: These are a great, affordable pair of bluetooth earbuds. I use them while swimming at the gym, and I have had an overall great experience with them. They stay in my ear quite well, and the bluetooth range covers the entire pool as far as I can tell. The portable charger is a nice feature, though I haven't found out yet if there is a way to stop the charging (aside from taking the earbuds out). You'll want to charge the whole apparatus regularly, like a cell phone.

title: Good music sound, but poor on call quality
body: Not good at all on using for phone calls.  Gets background noise and poor quality for the person on the other end to hear you.

title: Poor sound for the money
body: First off, the plugs do not stay in ears. I am constantly redirecting the ear buds, very aggrivating. Never used them in water so I cannot comment. Now, the crux. The sound is decent. But not up to "par" with the coast and description. You can find less expensive ones that sound better on this website. The music sounds blurred. Not defined and way too heavy on the bass. Mid and highs I could never fully grasp. Well, that's it kiddies. I would have returned the darn things but just now seeing I missed the return date, but all, that's on me. But, the impetus for this review. It is "Fair" and accurate, with no embellishments. Good luck!

title: Best Bluetooth Earphone Out there!
body:
My personal tips for people who's struggling:
1. Use various sizes of earbuds to find what's a good fit for you. Spend good amount of time to find it because it is important for your future use.
2. If you can't pair left earphones, try turning it on and off by pressing the button till you hear "power off"
You will hear "Connected" followed by "Right channel" & "Left channel"
Be sure to connect your device to TOZO-t10-R not L because Right earphone is the hub.

I don't prefer using Bluetooth earphones/headphones because it is usually uncomfortable, sound quality isn't good as plug-in earphones, and more importantly, it always falls off when I work out or play basketball. I tried out Airpods, but, yeah, as always, it falls off when I play basketball.
Tried this because I wanted to listen to music when I work out and it was AMAZING. At first I was skeptical and was ready to refund if it is a mediocre Bluetooth earphone. Although I bought it only for workout uses, as I wear it daily now because it is the most comfortable earphones I've ever used. Don't fall off easily and the sound quality is surpirsingly good. Sometimes I don't feel earphones in my ear, so it feels like I have a background music just like a main character in a movie.
100% would recommend if you are looking for a good workout or daily usage Bluetooth earphone.

title: Heavy and uncomfortable, can't hear yourself talk.
body: They are heavy and don't stick will in my ear. Sound quality is just okay. You can't hear yourself through the earplugs while on the phone, so it's hard tk hear yourself talk. They don't seen too have noise canceling technology, more like they just plug your ears. I'd recommend getting something else.

title: Battery life is sketchy, sound quality is meh, and noise cancelling is unnoticeable.
body:
I use these most everywhere.. As a normal earbud, they are fine. Nothing bad, not great. A bit pricey for not much low end. I notice the lack of performance in the gym and on my motorcycle. They fall out easily in the gym and the speaker 'shorts' or crackles when when sweating, and eventually stops working after about 15 minutes. This is with trying all of the different sized, silicon 'buds' to get the best fit. On the motorcycle, wearing a helmet, they work fine for music and I can even make calls. Noise cancelling does not work well, though. For the $49.99, I would expect a more robust, better performing product. Battery life is intermittent from 2-4 hrs. Not as much as expected or advertised.

UPDATE:  Seller has contact me and said I may have defective product. Offered to replace. Nice move. Hopefully, I just got a bum product and the replacement will be better.

title: Great Value for the Price
body:
For the price of these headphones being around $50, you get a lot of  features. Unlike another pair of similar headphones I bought, they do not have connection issues between the two headphones when out walking, and the distance to the main bluetooth device can also be quite far. I really like the waterproofing, a great thing to be able to use them without worries of damages. The case that they charge in is really solid as well, and the wireless charging in it can also be very convenient.

The shape of the headphones is slightly bulky, or I guess larger than similar headphones, but the bass response on these headphones is good. Audio quality in general is quite good, not balanced or perfect, but great for the price. Also the shape of the tips included cover a good range of ear sizes, and different tips can also be used and fit in the case, as the hole for the headphones is quite large.

Overall I have just a few complaints, which are not a big deal at the price you get these. The battery charge of the case seems to be slightly incorrect, not sure what could cause that. The other main complaint is that the right headphone is slightly louder than the left in my pair, probably not noticeable to most, but it is slightly distracting to me. I give these headphones a 4.5/5 overall, hard to beat the features at this price.

title: Great sound.  Long battery life.
body: I've only had these earbuds for 4 days but so far I love them. They're working as expected and the sound quality is amazing.  They paired to each other right away and to both my phone and my laptop, buy only one at a time.  I was a little disappointed that it could not pair to 2 devices at once, like my old LG headset. Battery life at first seemed to be quite short but on the 2nd day it was amazing.

title: Not backward compatible
body: Bluetooth 5.0 apparently not backward compatible with 4.2 ... at least not on the Samsung S7.  Continuously cuts out unless I hold the phone up to the buds...and even then, not consistent.  My other older earbuds work fine, but not the 5.0 earbuds.  Had to return them.

title: Pleasantly surprised!!
body: My expectations were low based on the price, but these sound much much better than anticipated. Pairing was a no-brainer on my iPhone, and I've had no connectivity issues during use. The longest I've used them so far is 2 hrs. so I can't speak to the battery life. I found that the frequency response can easily be adjusted by just maneuvering them a bit while in use. Based on the bang for the buck I recommend.

title: Poor Sound and Connection
body: I bought these as an addition to my existing collection of Bluetooth headsets because it had a wireless charging option. In comparison to my current and most used Bluetooth headphones, these TOZO's have poor audio quality and have a disturbing delay between video and sound. This delay does not exist on my current headphones so it must be specific to TOZOs electronics. Also, the right and left earpiece randomly pair with each other while I'm listening to some audio source which is just strange. I might have kept these if they were under $20 and all I would use them for is audio books. But the $50 price tag certainly doesn't justify keeping them given their sound and processing quality.

title: There okay but wouldn't recommend these.
body: I purchased these earbuds so I could retire my powerbeats 3 while working out. My beats still work but I wanted some earbuds without any wires. I purchased these because of the price and the five star reviews.  I am kind of disappointed with these. My major problem with these earbuds is the fact that the right earbud has a lower volume when compared to the left one. For some reason the left earbud sounds normal while the right one barely can be heard. I looked through reviews and the questions section and found others are having this problem as well. I found that by tapping/hitting the top of the right earbud makes the sound match the left ear bud. After hitting/tapping the earbud they start to work as intended until you turn them off and turn them back on again.  I think these are good but I wouldn't recommend them.

title: Spend your money on better quality headphones
body: They do not cancel noise at all, so if that's what you're looking for, don't buy them. They also frequently lose connection with the device I'm listening to, forcing me to stop what I'm doing and manually reconnect. I bought them for work (listening to recorded interviews), so this is a huge inconvenience. I've gone back to my old headphones, which aren't wireless, but better sound and they never lose connection.

title: Everything I needed
body: I usually work in loud environments. I have to proble. Hearing music through these and the quality is excellent. People can also hear me very well over the phone aspect of it.

title: ¡Great earbuds!
body: This TOZO T10 wireless earbuds make the big difference. Very light, waterproof, well designed, easy to install and pairing, good battery time and small case. Very good price and excellent customer service. Lets hope, next model would have volume control because although you can use the volume control in your phone. Some smart tvs do not allow you to use or set the volume. If you are looking for a very good and reliable wireless earbuds set...these are the ones. Very important: if you want to enjoy them properly, follow the instructions.

title: A great set of Earbuds. Amazing sound quality.
body:
This is my first pair of wireless earbuds. I’ve had numerous pairs of over the ear wireless earphones as well as wire ear buds.  I must say I’m extremely happy with this purchase. The ear buds arrived in one day. They were already charged and ready to go. They paired with my cell phone with no problems. I also paired them with my ipad. Because you can have two devices paired at the same time, I’m able to play music from my ipad while monitoring my phone as well.  I find the overall sound quality to be very clear and the bass is amazing. The range of the Bluetooth is excellent. I am able to walk around my home without the ipad and not loose the signal nor hear any degrading of the sound quality. I love the fact that the case pulls the earbuds in and locks them in place magnetically ensuring good contact while charging. There are 4 lights to show you the status of the charge/charging. The case is compact and easily fits in a pocket.  The earbuds have red lights to indicate they are charging and are out when fully charged. You can see these lights through the case top so no need to open it to check status.
These are very high quality wireless earbuds that are well worth the money. I highly recommend them.

title: Love, love, love these!!!
body: Love these wireless Bluetooth earbuds!  The sound quality & base are amazing!  Love the fit with the small fitting ear piece!  It’s great they give so many sizes!  Love the wireless charging case as well!!  So happy with this purchase!

title: Best earbuds for me thus far!!!
body: I had been looking for new earbuds after my previous ones had started to give me issues and then got misplaced, and I had considered just caving to the peer pressure and getting the apple airpods. Let me say, I am glad I found these, they are IMO just as good as the apple ones but at a fraction of the price, plus I am a fan how they fit in my ear, and I don’t have something dangling from the bottom of my ear. Call quality is pretty good too. Only real complaint is that it takes just a little over 10 seconds for the left bud to sync and connect to the right when I first take them out of their changing case, but that’s just a minor irritation. Would recommend these to my friends.

title: They don't fall out!
body: My whole life I wish and tried to be able to use Iphone headphones and they just would not stay in my ears. These headphones do not fall out. Not in the gym, not at work, not cleaning, not sweating at the pool, they just don't fall out. Phone calls on them work great, super easy to set up with any device, they're just so convenient. No regrets buying these at all. The case they came in is a good size and lights up with how much battery is left on it. The 4 different sized ear buds that came with it are great too. I'm definitely going to get the flat charger for it though because using the cord is kinda of irritating but not impossible.

title: God sent.. amazing for the price..
body:
I run, the fact that I can run even if it’s drizzling out is really awesome so I don’t have t worry about damaging them as they are water proof. For the price, these are totally worth it! Very sturdy and the charging case is great, way better than spending 250
On AirPods from Apple. Self recommend these!

title: Great Product! A few things to watch for
body: Overall, this is a great product for its price. The major issue is that its design of the buds really allows them to fall out of your ears. They are water resistant, but the water doesn't really help with this issue. The other is that it goes a bit crazy when it's connecting to a device, notifying you about 4 different times before fully connecting. The last issue with the device is the battery life is short.

title: A must buy
body: This are a muy buy, been trying many different brands of ear buds with little satisfaction. I received these and the minute I turned them on, I was hooked. I love the many different sizes of ear caps. I have very small ears and the smallest size fits perfectly. The sounds is also fantastic,  when I'm wearing the ear buds. I love that they are wireless and begin to pair with my phone as soon as I take them out of the base. Also the confirmation that both sides have been connected leaves out any doubt. Phone calls are easy to answer and very clear. The carrying case is very durable and the small size makes it easy to slip into a bag or pocket for on-the-go. The shipping box and packaging are also very impressive. Also, they were charged when I received them so I could use them right away. I have to say again how pleased I am with the different sized ear caps.. Probably my favorite feature. They don't fall out of my hears and I don't have to shove them in & hurt my ear.

title: Avoid this.
body: The left bud frequently, and I mean all the time, cuts out or gets static.  It is worthless.  I just use the right one.  You get what you pay for.  Avoid this product.  You are NOT going to get what you expect or paid for.  When it works, which is completely random, its decent, but it rarely works correctly.  Just spend the extra $20-$30 to get something worthwhile.  Hey China, if you are going to steal tech you should have the resources left over to MAKE SURE IT WORKS!

title: Great quality/sound for the price!
body: These earbuds are great, especially for the price you pay. Can't complain much. The sound quality is amazing, lots of bass and definitely cancels out the noise. They're great for going on a run because they don't fall out. The only down side to them is that they are a little too big for my ears so they stick out a little more than I'd like and don't fit 100% to my liking. I guess I just have really small ears? However, I reached out to the seller and they offered to send me smaller earcaps which was very nice of them. Overall, great earbuds and I'd definitely recommend them :)

title: Good quality earbuds
body:
I had been looking for a good looking and good quality earbuds. So far, the performance is great. Bluetooth connectivity, size, material quality, color, and battery life are so much better than any other in the market.

What I really like is:

1. Wireless charging option.
2. Extra hours in the compact charging case.
3. Connect more than 1 phone at the same time. I can talk with one phone and listen to music with the other while using the earbud.
4. Waterproof.
5. Bluetooth technology behind it and easy connectivity.
6. Different sizes for the silicone earcaps, so it fits into my ear channel.
7. Color option.
8. They are not really noticeable.
9. Case fits in my pocket.
10. No background noise and anybody can hear me very clear and sound.

title: Beyond pleased!
body:
If you haven't bought these yet then hit that button now!
The over all sound is better then I could have expected.
Fitment is great and I don't even know they are there.
Battery life is excellent
Bluetooth distance is at least 200ft in the gym with equipment in the way.
Seems like the manufacture is easy to work with and they want you to be satisfied.
I have tried my friends Bluetooth BEATS and BOSE and these are better all the way around and a fraction of the price.

To summarize this is one of my best purchases all year!

title: Great sound and noise isolation!
body: I use these headphones at the gym and they don't come out like my other Bluetooth headphones, the sound isolation blocks out the people at the gym so I only hear my music and with the case, it has enough battery to last the whole day. I only wish it had a dedicated app or ability to talk to Siri because the only way right now to lower the volume or skip tracks is through the phone, but who knows maybe they'll have an update!

title: Poor bass
body: Didn't fit well into my ears, but I have smaller ear holes so wasn't surprised.  I bought these for my son, they fit him well.  Overall good mids and highs, but horrible bass response.

title: Great gym headphones
body: Bought these for use at the gym and for running. They fit really nicely in my ears and don't fall out. The noise cancelling is excellent. The gym I go to plays really loud music that I don't like and these filter that out really well. Sound quality is good too. They also have really good range. For $50 it's hard to complain about these. Would definitely buy again.

title: They don't stay in your ear at all.
body:
Took a chance on these headphones, and they aren't bad. The big issue is they just don't stay in your ear very well at all. I have tried the different rubber ear pieces that come with the headphones but none of them seem to work. Decent sound quality for such a small device but the fact that they fall out so easily really limits how useful they are. Will have to look at other brands to find something that works.

Update: The earbuds have started beeping and chirping constantly. I can not recommend these at all.

title: Great for on the go work out
body: It's great but it doesn't work with my game system

title: Wow terrible
body: Im not sure how this product got so many positive reviews.  The earbuds are comfortable and stays in your ear.  However the connection is glitchy. I returned mine cuz it was really bad and got a replacement. it was better but it continues to cut out when i move my head to certain positions.  The worst part is i have to manually go to my Bluetooth setting and connect...i have the iphone 8+...the battery life is total LOL

title: Really nice earbuds.
body: I just received these earbuds and so far I really like the music that comes thru them.  The noise cancellation seems to be wonderful, maybe so good that I only wear one when I am listening to music in my office.  It did take me a few minutes to get them paired, but that could be more about the operator than the earbuds. I charged them 4 days ago and they are still charged.  It comes with different sizes on cushions that can be replaced for different size ears.  Nice that it is not one size fits all.  So far I am really pleased.

title: Worth the Money
body: I love these ear buds. They were super easy to pair to my phone and the sound is excellent. Everything feels quality built.  They give you an extended warranty and multiple ear bud sizes. Call quality is great as well. I highly recommend these

title: Really happy with these earbuds
body: I'm really enjoying the Tozo headphones so far. The sound quality is excellent: they have a deep base, the music sounds crisp and clear and they're noise canceling. The headphones pair really easily with my galaxy s9 and they stay in place really well. I've been using them with the default medium sized ear pieces and they haven't fallen out yet. My only complaint is that they're a little bulky and the box is a  little big but other than that they are working really great.Overall, I'm really satisfied.

title: More pros than cons
body:
I have had the earbuds for about three months. The sound is excellent, though the volume has to be managed through the device. The buds will not work for phonecalls!!! The other person will not be able to hear you well!!
The charge lasts 2-3 hours, but recharge in the charging case within 45 minutes. I have been able to use it in the shower with no problem. The size and fit and good.

title: Great Wireless Earbuds
body: I love these earbuds!  I have had them for about a month now and they are so easy to use.  I was able to pick the correct size ear pieces and pair them to my phone right away.  The sound quality is fantastic and definitely cancels out noise really well.  I use them on the train to work and at work.  It's nice to be able to listen without dealing with any cords and accidentally yanking them out.  They fit nicely in my ears and have not fallen out so far.  I really like that they are water proof as well.  That's a big bonus. Overall this is a great product and I even got a pair for my mother in law, who also loves them!

title: Superior crisp sound
body: A variety of ear canal fittings; super comfortable!  Easy BT join up.  Sound is amazing. The best part is phone conversations are crisp and clear and the microphone is superior!  No one can even tell I’m speaking through the Bluetooth!  I can leave my phone on the counter and walk all over the house and stay connected!  Easy charging and long life with each charge.

title: Best Choice
body: Just received the headphones yesterday about lunch time. I love them. I have used them to listen to music, and talk on the phone. The people i have talked to have had no complaints about echos or other noises. The are extremely easy to charge, put in, and the also are comfortable. The box had extra ear peice covers to fit any ear. The convient peice of rope makes for easier of the box.

title: Comparable to earbuds over twice the cost
body: As someone who uses mostly Samsung products, this one here is on par with the Samsung IconX, and Galaxy buds which are much more expensive. As far as sound quality, noise cancellation, and water resistance, it's right on par. In fact, the battery life and Bluetooth pairing is better than the IconX.

title: Quality at an affordable price
body:
Bought these based on good reviews and fair price.  Extremely please with the fitment, sound quality and ease of use. I travel and these earbuds amazingly cancel a significant amount of noise. The bass response is superb.
At the price point it’s hard not to at least give them a try.  You’ll be pleasantly surprised.

title: A solid choice in this price range
body:
This is my first pair of wireless earbuds, and I’m very pleased with its performance and features.
Pros:
_ Rich bass.  I own a couple wireless headphones, and this pair definitely belongs to the group with deep bass.
_ Support wireless charging.  This is a rare feature for earbuds in this price range.
_ IPX8 waterproof rating.  I did not try to submerge the earbuds to test this rating, but I accidentally dropped one in the sink and washed it under running water without an issue.
_ The battery lasts the whole day for me listening to audio.
Cons:
_ The carrying/charging case is a bit bulky to keep in your pocket.
_ No single earbud mode.  I normally listen to audio with only one earbud, and it will keep trying to pair with the second one for couple minutes before giving up.  The beeping during pairing attempt is very noticeable.

title: Worth every penny, and hour searching!
body: I did a bunch of research to find a good quality pair of Bluetooth earbuds. And I ultimately purchased these. I have been using them for over a week now, and I couldn't be happier for the price. They are fully waterproof, I shower with them, use them at all times. The battery length is about 3.5-4 hrs continuous music play, but the charger can charge the buds 4 full times on a full battery. I love these! They're super discreet, and connect easily. 10/10

title: I was really hoping I’d be able to give them ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️...
body: So, I’ve had these Bluetooth “waterproof” headphones for less than 1 week. My initial opinion was a positive one...once I figured out how to fit them properly they worked great! The volume capacity, bass, noise cancellation and overall sound quality was awesome! I got 48 hours worth of enjoyment before I finally put them to the real test (the main reason I purchased them): wearing them in the shower. I’m one of those people who like to listen to music loudly while I shower. My roommate doesn’t mind the sound of my singing, but apparently the bass is more than a little distracting. So for the first 10 minutes of the shower, they worked just as well as they had in dry conditions. But when it came time to wash my face, I decided to take them out because I figured they’d probably fall out in the process. I set them up on a shelf in the shower, literally the furthest away from the shower head as you can get. After washing my face the earbuds wouldn’t stay put in my ears. I guessed it had something to do with my ears being dry when I’d first put them in and had them stay successfully. Upon stepping out of the shower the first thing I did was wrap them in paper towels cuz I figured they’d need to dry. I then put them back in their case to charge and didn’t attempt to use them again for several hours. That’s when I discovered that the left one had stopped working. Completely. It will blink it’s light while in the case, but as soon as I take it out it’s totally unresponsive. The right one still seems to work, but I didn’t spend $50 for 1 working waterproof earbud. And I haven’t showered with that one because I’m afraid it’ll die too. I purchased the recommended extended warranty at the same time, I’m hoping they’ll get me a pair that will work consistently. And I’ll come back and update/edit this review once it’s been addressed.

title: Company buys reviews, not a true and honest review of the product.
body: I purchased these based on the reviews.  Once I got them, they looked and felt good.  I registered for the warranty because hey why not?  The. I got an email from the company....if you post a good review on amazon and take a screen shot, we will send you another charging case.  So I started thinking they BOUGHT their reviews!  Anyway, trying to be optimistic, I went on a walk yesterday with my new ear buds and they sounded like crap.  No base at all.  Sounds tinny and they kept disconnecting.  I have since returned them this morning.  Pisses me off that companies try and buy reviews!

title: Unbeatable price!
body: Purchased these wireless earbuds because I refused to pay a ridiculous $200 for Apple earbuds. Quality and sound is great! What I love about this product is that you can wear any earrings as the buds don’t get in the way, unlike many wireless headphones on the market. In the package you receive different size ear buds to match your ear size, which is brilliant. I highly recommend this product!

title: High quality earbuds at a great price
body:
The Tozo T10 earbuds are high quality earbuds at a very reasonable price. The sound quality is rich and the bass is full, much better than my previous earbuds.  Wireless charging case is a great feature - the reason why I chose this over other models and I'm glad I did.
They fit pretty securely in my ears - I've run with them a few times and they haven't fallen out yet.
I like the fact that you can connect either earbud independently, so if you only want to use one (during calls or if you don't want to completely drown out the noise around you), you can. Speaking of which, if you have both earbuds in, they do an excellent job at blocking out noise.
The range is very good (30+ feet before signal cuts out). The Bluetooth 5.0 is a much better connection vs my old BT headset (after connection, my old headset would sound garbled for 30 seconds or so after connecting. And the connection would degrade when my phone was in my back pocket vs in front of my body - none of these issues with these earbuds)
The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is that the call quality isn't great. When I'm using as hands free headset, the other party had a hard time hearing me. To be fair, this also happens a lot when I'm not using these earbuds with my pixel 3xl... But it seems to help when I use the phone vs the earbuds.
I highly recommend these earbuds, but there's a little room for improvement.

title: Great Product for the Price
body: I have tried various wireless headphones. Most recently had a pair from Costco that were over $100. They crapped out after less then a year and would not charge any more. I decided to start looking for a replacement and found these. I was a bit skeptical at first due to the price, but they had good reviews so I decided to give them a try. Turns out it was a good purchase. Great sound quality and battery life for the price. Charging case is small and very convenient. Pairing was easy and the battery life seems to be great. after a 1.5 hour work out they were still at 90%.

title: Great quality sound,  ease of use, and affordable
body: I have many sets of Bluetooth earbuds, and my quest has always been to find a pair with good quality sound that holds up when I’m mowing my lawn on my riding mower, and that will not fall out of my ears while I’m working on the yard. The T10 is way better in terms of sound quality and fit than any I have previously purchased. I was very pleasantly surprised the first time I wore them. Easy to charge, easy to pair, and I love the bass with I’m listening to music (I’m a 60’s rock guy) I was hopeful when I ordered but given the price compared to ‘high end’ buds I didn’t expect greatness. In fact, these earbuds are better than my expensive Sony, Beats, and Bose earbuds that I have. Highly recommend!

title: Not good for exercise
body: If you stand still like a mime, the plugs won't fall out. Its a joke that there suppose to stay in. If it wasn't for use on my motorcycle helmut, I would have returned. Takes forever to sync with last device as well . Sound is great though.

title: great buds. buy them. =)
body: i wear only 1 bud at a time, but it doesn't matter which one i use, i can listen to music, pod casts, talk on the phone, etc. the pair lasts me a few days before having to recharge the case and buds together. had it for over a month now and haven't lost one yet... a bit tricky sometimes when i do have to re-pair them with the phone (especially if i take both out first and want to only use the left bud after that), but all in all, long lasting and good quality buds, glad i made this purchase.

title: Best headphones for Working out
body:
I am a heavy sweater and doing cardio with these headphones are a treat. IPX8 is well worth the cost.. No issues thus far, and holds a charge for way longer than I expected. The bass quality is very good for its purposes.
Also I have a hard time keeping headphones of this kind in my ear, but right out of the box the ear buds stayed in throughout a vigorous workout.

title: Great Sound
body: This little package packs a punch. Great sound with deep bass and easy connectivity right out of the case. I keep them charged frequently so I haven't run them to end of battery life but can say I am very satisfied with this purchase.

title: 1st Time Wireless Earbud User and Very Satisfied
body: I was tired of using corded earbuds because of their constantly getting caught on things and being yanked out as I was trying to work. Nothing worse than when you're in the middle of a project  (think doing the dishes, changing the oil in the car, mowing the lawn) and in the middle of a fave song when suddenly the shock when an earbud is caught on something and suddenly yanked out of your ear. Oh, the horror. Well, now I am much more free and able to do more with these particular wireless earbuds. They pair quickly, charge quickly, and the sounds quality is as good as my previous $30 earbuds but of course, these are wireless. Well worth the money and easy to use. This is my 1st Bluetooth anything and so I am looking forward to streaming with other devices. Tozo makes an excellent product, here. Highly recommend for your first or 2nd or 3rd wireless earbud purchase. Give them a try. I'm sure you'll be as satisfied as I am.

title: Awesome on every aspect
body:
Just got them yesterday, so far so good I can literally go anywhere in my house and I can still hear the music perfectly. It skips for milliseconds when you first start them up and I have to manually pair it with my phone. But these are definitely worth the price!
***Update***
(3 weeks in)
The right ear bud falls out from time to time while I’m running they are super durable though. Sound still works perfectly, and the case always keeps them charged.
As for the case I am using a wireless charger for it and it works perfectly.

title: Best Bang for your Buck!!
body: I wasted a lot of money on other ear buds trying to find the best pair, well finally!! I've found them! Off the Bat I was excited about the quality and sturdiness of the product. Product was very well crafted. The noise cancelation was excellent Which allowed for better sound quality and enjoyment. There's just not enough words to explain all the good things about thiese ear buds all I can say is don't waste your money like I did on other products because of the price and don't be deterred by how affordable these are. This is definitely the best bang for your buck!!!

title: Great sound and value in a small package!
body: For starters, these earbuds sound great!  Responsive low freqs and clear mods and highs. The volume is good, controlled by the device it’s paired to, not loud enough to noticeably distort or hurt your ears. Fit and feel is good, multiple ear tips will help you get it just right. Battery life is better than expected for such small pieces. I tend to use them one at a time while I’m at work so I can jam out while still being able to hear my coworkers, so one is always charged and ready to go. The finish is very stylish and clean and very well executed. The buds and charging case are sleek and user friendly. A better product at half the price than what you’ll find at big box retailers, try them!

title: Great sound, wish there was more functionality
body: I have tried a lot of headphones and these have a great sound and fit tightly in the ear. In terms of controls, it is a bit hard to press the button when they are in your ear and I would like to have the ability to change the songs by touching the earbuds instead of doing it on my phone. Also, the play time is a bit disappointing considering similar earbuds have 5 hours of play time with the ability to change songs. The sound is excellent and the main reason to purchase these.

title: Best value wireless earbuds
body:
I was thoroughly impressed with the Tozo T10. The packaging was incredible, the build quality is top notch, and an amazing set of features for the price even if the price was twice as high. Wireless charging, IPX8 waterproofing, high quality 8mm sound driver, and bluetooth v5.0 are just a few of the high end features the T10's have to offer.

Pairing them with my phone was too easy. All you have to do is take them out of the charging case and they are ready for pairing( just a quick note make sure you choose TOZO-T10-R, the right earbud is the primary). The bluetooth v5.0 mean they have a stronger connection and longer distance. I can leave them in my backpack and I am still connected up to 30 feet away. The clarity of the highs and the richness of the bass are of the quality level of the highest end earbuds. I have personally taken these into the shower, I wasn't actually showering at the time, both of the earbuds and the case itself are extremely water resistance. I was pleasantly surprised to find that I could use my T10s for a little over four hours and the charging case is good for four full recharges of the earbuds. Finally, I have to say the Qi wireless chargeable case is very handy. I can set my phone and earbud case on my Qi charging pad and I'm good to go. If you have never used wireless charging, you need to. All in all for the price I could not find a better earbud on the market.

title: Why can't the big named companies build as high quality at an economical price!
body: Nearly perfect! Sound quality is superb in such a small design. They fit comfortably in your ear and recharges in a case which can be charged wirelessly.  Battery life overall could be longer in a single charge but I've yet hit the max in a single use; typically placing back in the charger for safe keeping.  Extremely happy with my purchase!

title: Easy to use and good sound. Good customer service.
body: I ordered this in June and had no problem setting up, charging and using.  It was very convenient and easy.  However, after about six weeks of use, the right ear bud would not pair with my phone.  I contacted TOZO and they quickly responded with a method to reset the earbuds.  I did as they instructed but the right bud still would no longer pair with my phone.  TOZO replied that this was a very unique situation and would replace both buds free of charge.  I was most impressed with the way the problem was handled and solved.

title: Will not keep pairing
body: First set wouldn't charge.  Amazon sent me a second set (easy to deal with) and these won't hold pairing.  When they do work, they sound real good.  Maybe I just got two bad sets, but, I've resorted to my "wired" earbuds for now.

title: THESE ARE THE ONES!!!
body: I got these for my birthday (which I had to buy to replace the vacuum my husband bought me...smh) and seriously these are fantastic!  I just plugged them in, they connect to each other with no effort on my end, and easily connect to my phone.  The fit is fantastic, and do not fall out, no matter how hard I try!!!  The sound quality...WOW!!!  I had no idea how bad the cheap cord ones I have used for years were until I used these.  I can't comment on the moisture wicking, but these are seriously the best!

title: Great sound quality and noise cancelling earphones for the price!
body: I’ve been looking for a good set of earphones for me to be able to workout in without them getting in the way. So far I can not recommend these enough, especially for the price point! For reference I do mostly weight training and I boulder. While I weight trained they stayed in place. I’m glad they provided extra sizes for the ears. The sound quality is also exceptional! For the price, it is loud and has a good enough bass. I’ve worn these around the house and are also really good at noise cancelling. Will try to provide more updates as time goes on.

title: Great product and incredible customer service! Made my week! Love these earphones. Thanks Tozo!
body: Wow. These earphones are by far the best on the market at their price point. Quality is great, bass is deep, fit is perfect, pairing is quick. They are light weight, charge ridiculously fast (I find charging just for 10 minutes can give you 30-40 minutes of extra play time). They are perfect for the office and the gym and everywhere in between. One of the most incredible things about this product and the company is the unmatched customer service. I had some issues pairing these that came up randomly. I was frustrated, so I reached out to Tozo. They immediately sent me a brand new pair for free and I didn't have to do a thing! They showed up in 2 days! Customer service is so helpful and friendly, it brought a huge smile to my face. Please consider these earphones! You won't regret it!

title: Adequately perform the job needed for the price
body:
I really wanted to rate these 3/5 but given the poor experience I had with my last pair of bluetooth earbuds these were much better. The battery life is only a few hours but they charge quickly enough in the case. It feels just barely premium enough, the buds magnetically click into place satisfyingly. The pairing and sync experience isn't perfect, sometimes they'll need to be put back into their case and pulled out to "reset" them. One can be used by itself but will beep annoyingly looking for it's partner for a short amount of time (less than 2 minutes or so I guesstimate) after starting to use it.

Also, maybe I've got weird ears but I can never seem to get a good seal with earbuds and these are no exception.

title: Smooth warranty process
body: I really like this product and was very happy with it, however it stopped working shortly after receiving it! However the customer service is amazing and after just sending an emailed was told they are shipping a replacement and apologize for any inconvenience! I have to say I’m impressed and my daughter has not had an issue with the one she purchased! I will review again once I receive the replacement!

title: Space Saver
body: These are great. I love how lightweight they are. I don't like wearing headphone hook over my ear because I have to wear glasses, which makes my primary headphone uncomfortable to wear. These are a good alternative if you don't want to wear contacts to the gym all the time. Pairing is simple and the earbuds have a nice sound quality. The case for the earbuds doubles as an external battery that can recharge the earbuds up to fours times. Well worth $50. Get rid of your Bose and Beats. Downsize to these.

title: Best Waterproof Buds For the Money!
body: These are excellent buds and relatively inexpensive. I am often in the pool listening to music and got tired of replacing the much more expensive Bose buds that immediately failed if they accidentally dropped into the water. Problem solved by Tozo. They fit much better and don't stick out as much as the Bose version, which stuck out so much they made me look like Shrek! The waterproofing alone is worth the money. Sound quality is very good. I'm happy and water-worry free.

title: Great Product
body: The TOZO T10 earbuds worked seamlessly and well out of the box.  I really like how comfortable they are and how well they fit.  The sound quality is really good, the earbuds paired easily with  my phone.  I love the ability to use the right earbud while leaving the other in the case when I'm driving and on the phone.  I like the one push on the earbud to answer a call and one push to hang up.  I am very pleased  with the quality of this buy.

title: Great product and great value!
body: I am extremely happy with my new Tozo T10 ear buds! I have wanted a pair of ear buds for a while, but frankly was scared off by the $200 price tag of the units from the big boys, so I did a lot of research, and am very pleased with my choice. They are comfortable, with great sound quality, considering the value. The charger case is amazing, keeps the little buggers charged and ready at all times. So far, I've used them in the office, in the car, on the motorcycle .. hopefully at the gym, soon... Highly recommend.

title: These do EVERYTHING well!
body:
These are THE earbuds you want to buy.
I have four different sets of earbuds and haven’t been happy with any of them for various reason.

These simply do everything well! They sound great, fit comfortably, charge and connect quickly, don’t move around (or fall out!) and I’ve been soaked in sweat while working and they aren’t phased!

Couldn’t be happier. FINALLY a great set of earbuds at a fair price!

title: Great quality at such a low price!
body: So I misplaced my $160 Jabra earbuds so ordered these inexpensive ones until I located my other ones. Right out of the box I noticed the quality; much better than I expected. Then I paired them and tried out my music. I was confused...because they sounded THAT good! I then played all genres of music and was even more impressed. Later that evening I used them in the gym and not once did they fall out of my ears. I'm at that point now that I hope I DON'T find my jabra! great product...

title: Bad sound
body: My 3rd set of wireless. Each time different brand. This one is the worse. The sound is like it is coming from a tin can or something. Very annoying with absolutely no base. I will keep but dont recomend.

title: easy pairing, good sound quality
body: I have tried other bluetooth earbuds, and these are the easiest to pair most reliably.  However, I am only able to use the right earbud because the left will not stay in my ear even though I've tried all the cushions provided and even some from other models.  I primarily listen to podcasts and audiobooks when hiking and exercising, so the mono sound is sufficient .

title: Works great for a great price.
body: I have only used them twice since buying them, but they sound great, they're easy to set up and they are indeed waterproof. There is no volume control and you cannot track back or forward without using your phone or a BT remote control (or at least there isn't anything about it in the user manual), but the overall sound quality and the fact they they are waterproof more than makes up for the lack of control. They also fit me great and are very lightweight compared to what I am used to (NuForce BE Free5).

title: You'll love these - with a small catch
body:
I am a non-paid reviewer, but was asked to review the product.

4.5 stars rounded up.

Why 4.5-Stars?
- Great sound.  Pretty damn great actually.  Rivals more expensive sets for sure.
- Light (for me), and they stay in my ears while I run/sweat.
- No issues with disconnection, though sometimes the audio will blip.  I don't know if this is due to poor LTE in some situations or if the headset is struggling to maintain connectivity.  It doesn't happen often.
- I haven't dunked myself in water with these on, but its nice to know they won't die due to that.
- The charging case is a generic thing that most manufacturers offer for this type of setup now, but this is a nice battery/charging case to boot.

Why not complete 5 Stars?
- Well, this isn't the manufacturers fault, but I should have looked harder at the specs.  It seems Bluetooth LL (Low Latency, or APTX LL) is not supported.  What that means is that extremely low latency applications (like gaming) utilize the generic Bluetooth protocol only.  This means that there can be a small lag in video to audio sync in SOME applications.  For instance, if you pair to a TV and listen/watch.

Overall, very happy.  Great build quality and great follow up by the TOZO team.  They obviously care.

title: As advertised, and even better
body: Great earbuds for the price, these can go even higher in pricing if they wanted to. The sound quality is great, good noise cancelling, and the battery life is really nice. I needed bluetooth earbuds because wired ones just wouldn't cut it while I was working. These never fell off while I was working and I never needed to adjust it. Best pair of earbuds I've ever owned, and I highly recommend it. Customer service is amazing too!

title: Solid product, great customer service
body: These are really nice headphones with very good sound quality, easy to pair and charge. The company also provides excellent customer service. Though they came with three ear tips, the earpieces kept falling out of my ear because even the smallest tip was too large for my tiny ear canals. I reached out to Tozo and they sent me a pair of smaller ear tips that actually fit, free of charge.

title: Take my money!!! 🙌🏽🙌🏽🙌🏽🙌🏽🙌🏽🙌🏽
body:
Take my money!!! 🙌🏽🙌🏽🙌🏽🙌🏽🙌🏽🙌🏽

The sound quality is great! I was overall pleased with the overall sound quality, noise cancellation, and battery life. I really liked the wireless case! The earbuds easily drop into the magnetic case.

Paring was a breeze on my Galaxy S8 - just followed the instructions that were included. If you're worried about them fitting, well they got that covered. They include a variety of earbud plugs to choose from.

My 13 yr old kid likes them more than his new Airpods lol Need I say more? 💳

title: Excellent fit
body: As someone with 1 misshapen ear, it has been very challenging for me to find ear buds that fit well and won’t fall out of my ear while working out or simply going about normal activities.  These headphones fit the bill!  Sound quality and battery life are great too!  So happy I found these.

title: Ear Pieces Don't Charge
body: I've had these for less than two months and they no longer charge correctly/or do not hold a charge. The case is plugged in at all times and I put these in the case overnight. For the past week, every morning when I put them in at work they say low battery.

title: Will stop working after 3-4 weeks.
body: These worked alright for about 3-4 weeks.  After that I noticed there were pairing issues that were not easily fixed.  Usually it was just both earbuds taking more than 5 mins to pair and then one earbud would not pair.  After a while the volume in the right earbud hardly audible. Then no sound in the right earbud.  Tried everything from un paring to pairing and restarting everything.

title: Wise Choice to Purchase
body: I had purchased some Blackweb wireless headphones from Walmart and within one week, the left ear would not consistently charge in the charger case. When it did charge it was only good for about 2 hours and then die.  I purchase these TOZO to replace the others and not only do they have superior sound quality, but they also fit in the ear much better than the previous brand. You can even pair them with multiple devices without having to go and unpair one before you can link up with another.  This was a wise purchase and I will try other TOZO products.

title: tozo review 7/15/2019
body: These headphones are pretty good. Sound quality is solid and they don't fall out of my ears as much as i would think they would. Often has a crackly sound run through it. The battery life is relatively short but they charge very quickly so its not much of an inconvenience. The low battery alert doesn't give you nearly enough time, its like a 30 second delay before they actually shut down. Overall it is a good product and for the price i would purchase again.

title: Amazing Earbuds
body: I wanted to find a pair of Bluetooth earbuds that had great sound quality and a good base. Luckily I found gold. I use it for everything, from going to the gym to going to class. The only thing I don't want to try out is showering with them since I don't want to break them in any way. They are waterproof as I have spilled water on them by accident and they still work fine. I am surprised by the quality and would say that they're better than apple airpods

title: I'm very happy with these Earbuds
body: I've tried a number of earbuds using my list of test songs, these earbuds passed easily. I really like these earbuds, they sound great to my ears. They fit well right out of the box, paired with my iPhone easily and quickly, and provide a robust and reasonably accurate sound stage. I was impressed with the case having convenient wireless charging built-in. Really, the only minor downside to me is that the case is a bit too large for my taste.

title: Very impressive!! Better than Bose Soundsport!
body: I am so impressed by these earbuds!! They sound great, look good, very comfortable to wear (which I have small ear canals so I tend to have a problem with other ear pieces), and the noise canceling is great! I could barely hear my (very loud) dogs bark & I even mowed my yard and couldn't hear the mower.  I recently bought Bose Soundsport Free & I’m not impressed at all...I definitely prefer these way more! I’ll be selling the Bose.

title: Good buds, bad connectivity
body:
I'm writing this after about 2 weeks of us, primarily with a Samsung Galaxy S8.

The good
- Feel nice and solid
- Comfortable
- Solid sound
- Great battery life
- Wireless charging case is convenient

The bad
- Connectivity is spotty and cuts out often
- Case is bulky
- Not good for talking
- High pitched noises hurt.

I liked these at first blush. They feel premium and I enjoyed using them, but connectivity quickly became an issue. When turning my head certain ways, touching my ear (like scratching), or having my phone in different pockets, I noticed a lot of connectivity issues. Brief audio cuts have been common, and it can be so bad that things become unintelligible.

On the plus side, they do feel great and I enjoyed them a lot when they worked. It's possible my set has an issue, but as itsl stands, they're hard to recommend because of the audio cutting out.

title: Bang for your Buck
body:
Honestly, you can't really go wrong with these wireless earbuds. The sound quality is great for the price, they fit snugly and comfortably (and the earpieces can be changed, so its bound to work with you) and the battery life is excellent. At times I'm forgetting I'm wearing anything and I've even fallen asleep with them without any worries about them being uncomfortable or falling out.

I've yet to find any problems with them regarding bluetooth pairing, though I must admit the buttons on them are somewhat mushy and not clicky enough for my taste. Likewise, I think the charging case is a bit bulky and might be uncomfortable to have in a pocket compared to other lightweight cases that are out there.

Overall, the quality matches the price quite aptly, one doesn't have to break the bank unlike with other bluetooth earbuds out there. If the little gripes I found with the product aren't a dealbreaker, I'd say these earbuds are well worth the purchase. Plus, you get a full year of warranty at no extra cost, which is always a nice touch.

title: Quite low fidelity and not very compact. Disappointed
body: As with most Bluetooth headphones they do not get very loud at all. The base response is poor for an in-ear headphone, and they protrude from your ear much farther than it shows in the pictures. I was going to send them back but it is past the window of return for me by the time I tried them.

title: Expected so much more
body: It disconnects frequently from my phone. It doesn't run smoothly I'll listen to it and sometimes it'll go in and out. It's not that loud and they're very uncomfortable that design on them is really poor

title: The future is now! Tozo T10
body: I was looking to upgrade from wired buds, which have a tendency to stop working due to issues with the wiring. I decided to take a chance on the Tozo T10  because of the excellent reviews, as well as the sheer number of reviews. I was right to take the chance; they sound excellent, not much worse than my bose qc35. They key to getting good sound it to make sur they fit as deep in the ear as possible. They can be slept in, given you adjust to the right position. The only level of discomfort comes from them  the pressure of laying against them. Customer service is excellent so far and has made the experience, as well as the product, 5 stars.

title: Not worth it
body: These barely lasted me 2 hours at a time and I couldn't even have them in my jean pockets without them cutting in and out constantly while I move around.

title: Great sound and form factor
body: What a great pair of ear buds! A very solid case with easy to use controls. The tight fit (make sure to try the various size bids) blocks external sounds and delivers good sound. Love the ability to wireleasly charge the case too.

title: Bad sound, terrible Mic
body: Really underwhelmed with this. I've bought headphones for half the price that are twice as good. The sound is not great. people can't hear me at all using the mic on the headphones. Really terrible purchase. Waste of 45 dollars. Would highly recommend something else.

title: Great Price & They Actually Stay In!
body: These earbuds are great quality for the price. I was impressed with the sound. They don't hurt my ears like most headphones do and they actually stay in my ears. My ears are small so it is hard to find earbuds that will actually stay in. These come with different sizes of replacement rubbers made to fit all different ear sizes.

title: I love these earbuds!
body: I am super impressed with the sound quality and ease of use of these earbuds!  Great quality!  Long lasting sound.  Easy to recharge with the case.  Perfect fit and pairing was a snap!  I bought them so I could listen to music and audio books while cycling.  I am definitely going to use them for more than that!  The price was great too!

title: Overall good quality headphones!!
body:
I overall enjoy these earphones. The noise quality is great, and it cancels out noise well. I use these while running and cleaning around the house. I'm trying to get the volume dialed in so that I can potentially wear one earbud while working as a massage therapist. I also LOVE that you can charge the case and headphones at the same time on a wireless charger! So convenient!

One thing that I was not impressed with was there were some typos in the directions and occasionally the directions to get the earbuds synced to your device were a bit vague. My boyfriend is a wiz at figuring electronics out and he has them working in perfect order now!

Overall I VERY MUCH recommend these to people

title: Great sound quality and microphone!
body: So at first I was a bit sceptical. Tried them out at first the left and right side weren't connected and when they were the left side lost the right occasionally.  I charged them overnight and today they work perfectly! And the sound quality is amazing. Plus I was driving a semi tractor with when window down at highway speeds and took a few phone calls and the callers on the other end said they could hear me perfectly!  All in all wonderful product. I would deffinately reccomend to anyone interested.

title: Very Impressed with these ditties!
body: These are very good wireless ear-buds. Very easy to set-up, charge and use with excellent sound quality (plenty of bass). They fit comfortably in my ears and I will use them to listen to religious podcasts in church whenever the pastor gives a wimpy sermon. :-)

title: Great sound but not so good connection
body:
I was wanting so bad to love these but they just would not stay connected to each other or the phone. I returned them as a result of one continuously cutting out on more than one occasion.
The IP rating is what drew me to them and the sound was actually not bad I just couldn't continue to have my left side keep disconnecting.
If tozo fixed this issue I would recommend them. As of right now though I would not buy these they are a waste of money.

title: Randomly disconnecting when phone is in pocket and I'm working out
body:
These have amazing sound and good battery life, but the most important feature of bluetooth headphones is staying connected.  When my phone is stationary on a counter and I'm walking around a room I experience no problems whatsoever.  But when my phone is in my pocket the earbuds disconnect consistently making them unusable.  Really wish this wasn't an issue because I love everything else about these.  Sending them back :(

update:  Tozo sent me a second pair of these for free saying that they had fixed the connection issue.  Unfortunately it hadn't been fixed.  I'll reiterate the fact that these sound great and are really nice quality build along w/ the charging box.  It's also possible that it could be my phone (iPhone SE) but I found that if the phone is in my pocket the earbuds won't stay connected.  My wife used them at the gym and with her phone (also an iPhone SE) in a stationary position on the treadmill that she had no connection issues.  I changed my rating to a 3 star bc of tozo's customer service, I wish I could give it a 5 star but the connection issues are still there for me.

title: EDIT: Stopped working after just 3 months!
body: EDIT: I have changed my review to one star since the earbuds have stopped working just a month after my return window closed. I am so disappointed - they barely hold a charge and and even after charging them if you don't use them the battery runs out anyway. Wish I could return these.

title: An Amazing experience!!!
body: This product is really awesome. I can't believe I could get this quality at this price. It was really easy to set up and start using in no time. It comes with a great little charger case that really makes it easy to store and charge. I am loving being able to exercise with no strings! Thank you for a superb product.

title: 1st ok, then annoying
body:
So far so good for price. Find a little hard for people to hear me when I get calls, but got it for working out.

After 2 months kind of disappointed. It keeps disconnecting and reconnecting. When I 1st connect it beeps like 6 time's. The noise cancellation doesn't really work. My wife says she can never hear me. Hope the battery life failed so I can buy something else.

title: Better than expected
body: Ok, was hesitant advertisement was correct but everything so far has exceeded my expectation, including - and most importantly - ease of use and sound quality!

title: Watch the video on how to use these
body: These earbuds came fully charged as did the case for them. So far they seem to fit my ears. These are the 6th pair of bluetooth sets I have tried. None well stay in my ears. I drove a dump truck and it is extremely noisy. I will update on noise cancelling.

title: Sound quality is good, battery life is good
body:
Bought these for husband for a birthday gift. He really likes them, says with the different size adapters they fit in ear perfectly. Noise reduction is of good quality as well as sound quality.
He was able to walk over 20+ feet away from phone and the sound quality on the phone was still good. I did not have any problems hearing him & know what he was saying. There was an occasional static the further he got from the phone, but it wasn't constant and I could still hear him well enough.
He says the music quality is good as well. There isn't much to complain about. Good price, good product thus far.

title: Awesome product for the price!
body: I was skeptical about purchasing these due to the price compared to others on the market. I’m glad I went with them! Absolutely great sound. It overpowers the local gyms music and is crisp and clear. Believe it or not has a decent bass hit to it as well. Charge time is pretty insane, I can plug them in literally for a couple minutes before leaving to the gym and they are charged up. As for falling out of the ear, I’d say 95% they stay in even when sweating. When I’m doing sit-ups at the end of my session they occasionally slip out. Also the cases charging port has a rubber boot that protects it when not in use. This thing is extremely difficult to get out to plug your charger into. Not that big of a deal at all... but worth mentioning. Overall excellent product and would buy again in a heart beat.

title: Terrible phone call headphone.
body: They are ok. They are great for a “cutting the grass” pair of head phones. They are terrible for phone calls, meetings etc. I have been embarrassed on several occasions because of clarity. I get the same response time and time again “sounds like your a mile away from your phone”. The sad part is that I purchased them for a low profile Bluetooth alternative. I wish I’d have saved my money.

title: Fantastic Wireless Earbuds
body: I bought these in hopes they would just 'be adequate' but I was mistaken ... THEY ARE FANTASTIC!  Perfect fit, excellent call and music quality, and they connect effortlessly!  I'm beyond satisfied and high recommend them to anyone looking for a noise canceling earbud system that adapts to any Bluetooth device!

title: Won’t hold a charge after two months of use
body: At first I loved these headphones!  They don't budge in my ear and can stay put when I am cycling, running or even riding my motorcycle.  I have only had them two months and they quit holding a charge.  The case won’t charge and the earphones won’t hold a charge.  The right one isn’t even charging at all.  I’m so disappointed.

title: Would be great if both worked
body: I can’t get both earphones to consistently work. No matter how many times I’ve read the manual, online Q&A, etc. I was able to get this working on my phone but unfortunately not on my ASUS laptop (which is the real electronic I bought these for). I honestly should’ve just bought AirPods.

title: Very happy with them!
body: I love these! Granted, I’ve only had them for a week, but I am super happy with them. They stay in well through my workouts, and I’ve only had them plugged into the wall once so far (but I do keep them in the charging case often). The batter seems to last well for what I use them for. Sound quality is decent—pretty mid-rangey. Overall, I would recommend! Hopefully, they’ll last awhile!

title: Wonderful earbuds, easy to use, great sound
body: I had bought two other pairs of earbuds and they were either a real pain to pair or charge, or both, or they fell out of my ears.  All-in-all, not impressed.  I gave earbuds one last chance.  These charge real easily.  They pair by themselves.  And they don't fall out of my ears.  I am a huge fan.  And oh by the way, great sound.

title: IPX8 Waterproof rating is VERY misleading
body: I bought these earbuds for swimming laps and they failed miserably. The second they touch the water they cut out and disconnect, despite their IPX8 waterproof rating that claims they will work in up to 1 meter of water for 30min. When i contacted TOZO about the issue, they completely blew me off and said they weren't meant to be used for more than just everyday sweat, a little water here and there, etc... So maybe they should give them an appropriate waterproof rating for that? ugh, so frustrating. Thumbs down to these earbuds for claiming to be something they clearly are NOT.

title: Awesome alternative to expensive earbuds
body: I love these earbuds! They fit perfectly in my ear, have good sound quality, and the charge lasts a long time. I love having the case that charges the earbuds when they are not in use. The biggest benefit to these buds are that they are wireless. Wonderful experience with customer service. Thank you!

title: Perfect Bluetooth Earbuds!
body: I'm not a fan of the hard plastic earbuds, so when I wanted to try Bluetooth earbuds, I knew I wanted to have something with softer plugs. The TOZO T10 are great! No problems connecting quickly and the sound and depth is amazing! I would definitely recommend these to others. They are a tad bit heavier then the std plastic kind, but worth it for the connectivity and sound. 5 stars! Would buy as a gift for family and friends with zero hesitation!

title: Great Earbud but not everything is perfect
body:
I've been using these for about 2 weeks now. Sound quality is good, better than I expected from a $50 earbud. The charging is good and the case is amazing. I've only had 1.5 issues with the earbuds so far.
1. When I go biking to school, I leave my phone in my pocket and it cuts off a lot when I'm biking. Only when I'm biking, so every other time it's perfect. Sadly I'm mostly using these earphones while I'm biking so that's kind of a bummer. But I bought this phone case that attaches to my backpack so theres no connection problem there now.

Kind of an issue?? I don't know but the left earbuds feel different (like its looser). The right earbud fits in perfectly with my ear, and I've changed the ear foam thing on both sides to make them feel equal. I thought maybe it was my ear?? but like I've never had to change my older earbuds before so I asked my brother to try it out and he also said the left side is looser. Its irritating so i'm still experimenting with why the left side seems looser.

title: Best use is for listening not for phone calls, with excellent sound quality
body:
The sound quality from this items is outstanding, and I'm a trained audio engineer with an excellent ear. They are virtually distortion free. The bass support is excellent for such a small item. The buds fit comfortably in your ear, especially with the supplied multiple size cups they give you for best fit. Just be careful if you purchase this item for making/taking phone calls. The noise cancellation is very good, but you hear yourself from inside your head (as when you plug your ears and talk) so speaking this way can make some people uncomfortable.

I will add that the case that comes with this device, plus the overall packaging is very luxe and high tech; I love that! I use it with the Tozo wireless charger and love the futuristic, high quality look and feel. I recommend this item for those who want to listen to music and other sounds. Not necessarily the right item for long phone convo's.

title: Satisfied
body: So far so good! The sound quality is pretty dang good! It came packaged well and they feel pretty nice. I bought a different wireless earbud and ended up returning them because they stopped working after two weeks of little use. I came back to this one and I like how sturdy the earbuds sit in the case. They definitely won’t budge like the other earbuds I had purchased. I’m loving them so far!

title: Maybe  a defect?
body:
Sound is pretty good. Set up easy. The left earbud will regularly cut out for a split second.  It's very annoying.  It does this at least once every 2 to 3 minutes.  The right one doesn't do this,  leading me to believe there is a defect with this. I may return
I will say that the customer service responded very quickly and is working to remedy the matter

title: excellent value
body: I run a lot, sweat a lot, and spend a lot of time in the steam room post-workout. Have had these for a while now with zero problems. Even jumped into a pool with 'em in my ears, and they still work great. Sound quality is good, not great, but that's to be expected; with a bit of manipulating the equalizer in your music app, they can be plenty powerful and provide sufficient sound quality for exercise. At the price point, you really can't beat the value provided here.

title: Fantastic sound, unbeatable price, very responsive customer service.
body: I purchased these earbuds back in January of this year, and have used them faithfully everyday!  They pair easily to my iPhone and iPad and stay connected for more hours than any other pair of Bluetooth earbuds I have owned.  One feature that I love about them, besides the sound quality is that you don’t have to turn them on or pair them once you have set them up.  You just take them out for their case and put the. In your ear and start using them.  I mainly use them to watch videos on YouTube, as I spend a lot of time in the hospital as I am a cancer patient.  Their customer service is outstanding, when I had a problem with them, and couldn’t figure it out on my own, I sent the company and email and they responded within 24 hours with a solution to my problem.  I highly recommend these earbuds.

title: Pretty decent for the price.
body: For the price, it is pretty decent. Sound quality is pretty good, not the best, and I stressed test the battery life during work. It played music nearly up to four hours, including breaks, without being putting into the portable charger. The only thing that bothers me is the left earbud pretty much has to practically be right next to the right earbud to pair and that sometimes the right earbud doesn't want to charge in the portable charger. But a simple remove and putting it back in is enough to fix it though.  Also if the phone/Ipod isn't nearby, static is imminent so range isn't the best either. Otherwise, you get what you paid for.

title: Awesome wireless earbuds
body: I bought the first pair of earbuds to try out. I had bought other brands and they did not hold the charge, or the noise cancellation did not work. After I got these and tried them I really love them. They hold a great charge for weeks and work great. I loved them so much that I got my husband a pair as well. He loves them too. If your looking for wireless earbuds, these are the ones to get.

title: These earbuds are worth keeping
body:
I can't say I have any issues with these bluetooth earbuds so far. They arrived in a day which was pretty good, everything came prepackaged which tells me it's of some good quality.

They sound really good the bass is nice and punch, loud enough, not is it deafening you just gotta find the right size bud, no static and good range. They fit nice and perfect in My ears.  Connecting them to my S9+ was a breeze. Just turn on your phone's bluetooth and turn on the earbuds they will pair up tight away

They have the option to take calls reject calls and redial. Pause and play but no next or previous track, which is my only issue.

REALLY GOOD BUY!!!!

title: Great product, would recommend
body: I bought this product because I needed earbuds to wear at the gym without the cord getting in my way. These earbuds are great. They have good sound quality and cancel out the noise around you. They also stay in my ear very well, especially since they have multiple sized ear pieces. It’s also interesting how the charging case can be charged by a wireless charger, I didn’t realize this until after I bought them

title: Amazing quality, amazing comfort!
body:
I have just had these earbuds for 3 days and I'm so impressed by them now.
First, they are really comfortable the box comes with several options for you to find an ear plug of your size, and once you do, they are great to wear. I've tried jumping, shaking my head, and running, and they dont slip a bit! They just wont fall of your ear.
Second, the sound quality. As soon as I got them I played a few songs and even watched ASMR videos on youtube and the quality is even better than my wired earphones.
