Also the battery has great endurance. I've used them at the gym for 2 hours, then school for walking around, then work, and they haven't died on me. The fact that the case charges them is extremely useful and so far I havent had to charge the case.
An extra detail that I liked is that it includes a lace that you can attach to your case and wear is as a necklace or wrap it on your backpack or on your belt as I wear it (as shown in the images)
Overall great earbuds and definitely worth it

title: Inconvenient but good
body: This is an updated review. With a lot of trial & error, I found the trick to make this earbuds work. Set up was super easy. But I had A LOT of problems with the sound cutting out during my hike. I kept my phone in my pocket. So I put it in my pack & zipped it up. Same frustrating problem. Then I held my phone in my hands. To my surprise, it worked! Sound quality was great. But super inconvenient to hold my phone for a 2 hour hike! So I put my water pack in front & put my phone 1/2 way in the very small pocket & it was great. However, going down steep hills I needed to hold my phone which worried me in case I slipped.

title: Love the wireless charging, very convenient
body:
These earbuds are top notch, fast charging and good sound quality
These are really comfortable too, not the hard plastic like some others
Hard to find quality earbuds at this price point

title: fantastic product, great customer service
body: I loved everything about this product but the first one that arrived had a minor technical issue. The company promptly helped me with the issue and replaced the item with no hassle. Fantastic product, great for the gym-this blocks out all sound and allows me to listen at a good volume and is comfortable and is a great price.

title: Great reasonably-priced earbuds and amazing customer service
body:
I've had these earbuds for four months, and I'm really happy with them. The sound quality is as good as it gets with earbuds at this size and price point, and they stay in without any problems. The battery case is brilliant for whenever I'm travelling for longer periods.

Unfortunately, the left earbud stopped working inexplicably this week, but TOZO customer service to the rescue! Their sending me a new pair, free of charge! Just what this product needed to be perfect - superb customer service.

title: Great!
body: These are fantastic

title: so far so good
body:
I was planing to buy AirPods but was worry they will fall out out of the ear with out the silicons, so I start browsing amazon and saw TOZO T10 with great reviews so I decided to give it a try.
Got the ear pods about week ago. It was very easy to pair them. They fit great. Good quality/sound. In general I have no complains so far.
Will update my review once I use them more.

title: Audio skips / drops
body:
These headphones are ok for walking, and extremely frustrating to use while running. I originally had these synced to my phone which I carried in my hand while running. If my rhythm altered at all while running it would interrupt the audio connection and either skip or disconnect entirely. I recently purchased a Fitbit Ionic, and the earbuds did the same exact thing when paired with that device too. Although the idea of having wireless headphones was appealing, the connection is unstable regardless of which device I use. I have to stiffen my arm to prevent skipping / drops from music. I tested the connection by flexing my wrists up / down and waving my arm around with both my phone and Ionic, and the motions confirmed that is what was interrupting my wireless connection. I removed the device from my settings on both my phone and Ionic, then reinstalled it, but still had the same issues. The phone and earbuds were also fully charged. The really disappointing thing is I bought 2 pairs of these, and my husband's does the exact same thing when using the bluetooth feature.

The case is extremely convenient and pretty heavy-duty. The water resistance is also a nice perk. Another thing I like about these headphones is the case automatically charges the headphones when you put them back, plus there are magnets that hold the earbuds within the case. You can also visually see the charge progress and how much charge is left within the case even when it's closed because of the LED indicators.

I would wear these in the gym, and like I previously said, they do ok while walking if you do not walk briskly or alter movements unexpectedly. I'm currently searching for new wireless earbuds that I can sync to my phone and Ionic and not have to worry about the skipping or drops with the audio connection.

title: Happy Buyer!
body: I just received these earbuds and right off the bat I’m already very pleased with them! Set up was super easy and the sound quality is much better than I expected! I don’t think I’ll ever have them in water but knowing they’re waterproof is definitely an added bonus!

title: Fall out of my elf ears.
body:
Update - they stopped working after week 2!

I had to replace my Bose wireless headphones and thought I would give these a try. First the good:
1. Love the case and how they automatically switch on.
2. Sound quality is good. Quite crisp and clear. Once you put them in properly with the right tips they give the Bose headphones a run for their money.  The bass might not be as good but good enough for most songs. I mean they are a fraction of the price.
3. Good build quality. So far they only cut out on the odd occasion. I’ve been able to walk around my whole apartment and they’ve been good. They sometimes cut out on the subway or in a very congested area. The battery life is comparable to Bose but since you have a case they have the extra advantage.

Now for the bad:
1. I’ve tried all the tips and when I use them to run they will fall out. Sometimes fall out when walking about. It’s infuriating. I guess my ears are elf like or something. I will have to get ones with a wire. Unfortunate really. Would have been perfect otherwise.
2. Controls are confusing. Why would clicking once dial my phone. How do I change the volume ? Hmmm. Ok ok just couldn't be bothered to read the manual.

title: Best Bang For Your Buck!
body:
I absolutely love these earbuds!  I was looking at Samsung's offering since I just upgraded to a Note 9.  However,  the Tozo earbuds had much better reviews and are $100 cheaper.

In the box:
Very good packaging

2 wireless earbuds clearly labeled for left and right.

1 charging case

1 pair of the smaller rubber covers and a pair of larger ones in addition to the ones included on the earbuds themselves.

A 1 year extended warranty card (must activate within 14 days of receipt) - easy process using the provided car code!

Detailed instructions

The earbuds pair quickly and easily to each other and to my Note 9 with voice prompts letting you know when each is paired.  You also get a voice notification for incoming calls and when hanging up a call.

The buttons are pretty tactile, however you do have to give them a bit of force.  This does help in mitigating erroneous button presses though.

The earbuds fit my ears out of the box but come with various sizes so you can get the perfect fit for you.

I haven't done a complete workout with these but I have worn them for hours during moderate activity and they haven't fallen out of my ears.

The battery life is amazing!  I've used these for hours and they only got down to 80%.  The case conveniently charges the earbuds when they're not in use and I've only had to charge the case once after a few days use.

The case itself is a little on the large side but I'll take that trade off for the amazing battery life it delivers! Although I can comfortably carry these in my pocket (I'm 6'3 and have deep Jean pockets), most might opt to carry these in a gym or laptop bag.

The sound quality is decent given the price with lots of bass although I usually prefer a "flat" signal.  However,  I use the PI music app from the Play store which has a decent EQ so I just flatten out the signal there.  You'll definitely want to be careful not to listen to these with the volume cranked all the way up as they can get pretty loud.

The range is top notch!  I think I read these are supposed to work up to 10 meters away from the paired device but I've gone further without any drop in reception.

These earbuds are rated IPX8 which means they can get wet but you don't want to submerge them in water.  I've had these on in the rain with no issues.

Overall,  you won't be disappointed with your purchase!  These are high quality wireless earbuds! Enjoy your music and your savings!

title: Excellent sound and comfortable
body: These are my first pair of wireless earbuds. I care most about sound quality and these are crystal clear. You can hear the details in the lows, mids, and highs. Very good balance. Pairing to my iPhone  was effortless. Now when I’m done listening I just put them in the charger and they turn off automatically and charge. Taking them out of the charger they automatically turn on and reconnect to my phone. They are comfortable to wear and very convenient. An excellent value for the price. Several of my friends are going to order these now.

title: Good earbuds for the price
body: Audio sounds good for this price point. I like how easy it is to take the earbuds out of the case compare to another brand earbuds I have. Also like the wireless charging case that makes it really convenient instead of having to plug in the cord.

title: Perfect for everyday use!
body: I was pretty hyped up to try these great wireless earbuds. Sound quality is perfect for everyday use.  They seem very durable. The case is heavier than it looks and has very strong magnets that keeps the lid shut. Wireless charging works great. I have the volume at 50% most of the time which gives a great sound. After having these for a couple of days and using them, I am very, very happy for what I got for the price. As long as they last a while, they'll be perfect. I would definitely buy again.

title: You wont's find better at this price point!
body: The sound quality is the best I've heard for this price point, (actually better than most $60 buds). Build quality is solid, for the buds, & the charging box, (that's Qi wireless capable, wow!).The only criticism I can give, is I wish the buttons on the buds were easier to press. I would prefer touch control. One thing to remember, is that headphones in general, have some variation of a "break-in" perod. They will sound better the longer you use them, (to a certain point).

title: Great quality at a reasonable price.
body: These are the first in-ear buds I’ve purchased (taking advantage of a daily deal), and I am quite happy with them. The sound quality is better than I anticipated for the price. Also, the battery life is way longer than stated. I used them for about three hours and they weren’t even half way discharged. One of the things I like the most is the ability to charge on my iPhone wireless charge pad. No messing around with cables. Very nice product, well built and paired up easily and with superb range.  I left my phone at my desk and walked at least 40 feet away with decrease in sound quality or interference noise. I didn’t look for the specs on this, it was just a nice surprise.

title: TOZO T10 EARBUDS give 'em try.
body: I like the way these TOZO T10 earbuds fit. Once I put the right size buds on they for and held in my ears really well. The sounds is very good and the noise cancellation is spot on. While the battery life isn't fantastic it's a trade off to the rest of the device. Good features. Good sounds. Good functionality. Good fit.

title: Affordable and durable. That's the bottom line.
body: Past few days I've gone running and done a fair amount of walking (once in a pretty heavy drizzle) and so far no problems or issues. Battery life is more than good for me as I use them for my work commute and running or just walking around and I just pop them back in the  I've been on the wireless earbud wave for like two seconds but I'm sold. And with this being the cheaper alternative, I have no complaints. Tozo is a quality company.

title: Great buds with a minor software flaw (Updated)
body:
Very solid earbud case. The sound and fit of the earbuds are great! My only dislike is that there's no way to skip to the next song (that I know of) without using your phone. Other earbuds usually have a double click to switch songs, but these earbuds call your last contact when you double click.
Not a deal breaker for me, but I would personally prioritize song switching over redialing.
All in all, these seem like really high quality and great sounding earbuds.

Update:
After 7 months of moderate use, the right earbud stopped taking a charge. Now they're rendered useless. Pretty disappointing.

title: Great earbuds for the price
body:
I will start by saying I VASTLY prefer wired over-ear headphones to anything else. I got these earbuds to use while I'm chilling on the couch on my laptop and my wife has borrowed them to work out. We were both satisfied but noted that the sound quality isn't there compared to over-ear headphones, but I think it's about as close as we're gonna get until they manage to make the electronics even smaller.

These earbuds feel like they're built with quality. They feel solid and have the heft you associate with quality built products. They come with 4 sizes of ear pieces which I greatly appreciated since one of my ear canals is bigger than the other. My earbuds also came with a little leaflet to register them within 14 days to get their 1 year warranty. REMEMBER TO DO THIS! It's well worth the minute it takes especially since other earbud brands have warranties that end after only 90 days.

I'm using these earbuds instead of my over-ears this week to test them out, and so far I reach ear fatigue around the 2.5-3 hour mark. My ears are a little sensitive so this is a little better than cheaper earbuds I've tried. It's also coincidentally convenient since they say the battery will last around 3 hours with normal use.

title: Great Buy!
body: These little ear buds pack a punch! Easy to charge, easy to connect and easy to use. Sound quality is great, battery life is great. Bluetooth connectivity can be a bit sketchy, I keep my phone on my right hip and they will disconnect every now and again, but reconnect right away, so not a huge issue, more annoying from time-to-time.

title: I like the IPX8 rating!
body: I was looking for TWS earbuds that have >= IPX7 rating. These fit the bill by specs. So far rain and sweat has had no issues (I haven't yet tried submerging them at the moment). I'll update once I have more environmental experience/testing. I took off just one star since I wish they had volume control from the earbud itself (instead of using my phone). But otherwise, they're great so far!

title: Good quality wireless ear buds for good price
body:
I was in a need of wireless ear buds as my so called best quality apple beats wireless headphones didn't get a chance to last for about a year, thanks apple.

But TOZO made a good change for me. These ear buds does have what it takes. They provide good sound and have options of tips for the ear buds. The only thing I will say the battery life isn't what I was looking for for 3.5 hrs compared to other wireless ear buds that can last for +5 hrs just for the buds for themselves or 34hrs with the buds and the case. But the earbuds are really good if you are looking for an inexpensive wireless product.

As a student myself they are convenient and useful. I would totally recommend these to anyone.

title: Tozo Loses Connection Easily
body: Tozo connection is constantly going out. I put it in my pocket and the earbuds go out every five seconds while listening to music in Bluetooth. This is a product that is not very reliable.,

title: Good value for price!
body:
*** Update ***

So after about a month, i decided to return them. Mainly the reason is that one of them does not stay in my ear and i have to push it very hard in order to be in place which results in muffing the sound. i tried the smallest cup but with no luck.

The item is and feels elegant. Quality is very good and very well built.
It come with 3 additional earpieces plus the one already attached. They can be replaced very easily.
Once you pull them out of the case, they auto connect to each other and then there is only a step to use them.
Bluetooth on your device, click on them and done!

Sound quality is by default very good. Personally i would like less bass but i adjust it from my devices. I connect to Samsung S7 Active and Tab 8.4 with zero issues. Only once happened to lose connection on Tab 8.4. Tried them in gym and no problems with sweat.

Small and portable I think is very good value for the price point when other brands are way to high.

So to be totally fair, if I didn't had the ear issue, i would keep them for sure. Small package, good battery, no really issues (hickups happens all the time with devices).

title: Left earbud goes in and out.
body: I’ve had these for 4 days and the left earbud is already going in and out. I have the one year warranty so these are definitely going back for a refund. They’re heavy and uncomfortable as well and not worth $50.

title: TOZO T10 Ear Buds
body: I received these ear buds a week ago.  So far, I am very pleased with them.  They came very well packaged.  They were easy to set up and pair with my iPhone.  I really like the charging case they came in.  Good place to store the ear buds when not in use.  The set came with four sizes of ear caps.  They are a little difficult to change but definitely stay in place once put on.  The ear buds take a little getting use to in placing them in your ears but once you learn how it is no problem.  I think the sound quality is very good.  Overall, I am very happy with this purchase.

title: Poor phone call use (updated)
body:
When I'm shopping for something on Amazon I typically like to purchase something with 4-stars or greater, and with 1000 reviews or more.  I purchased these for multi-function reasons, noise-canceling, music, and phone calls.  The earbuds worked great for noise-canceling but struggled from time-to-time staying connected while listening to music, which is not the worst, just a little annoying. However, the use of the earbuds during phone calls was horrific.  I had so many people tell me they couldn't hear.  It sounded like I was underwater or far away from my phone.  Since I spend a lot of time talking to clients and vendors I couldn't afford to keep them.  I had to return them!!

UPDATED:

After returning these items I quickly got an email from the manufacturer stating they were sorry about the poor quality and that they wanted to make things right by sending me a replacement set at no charge.  The customer service behind this company has been second to none.  Extremely proactive.  Extremely focused on you being happy with their product.  I would buy from this company again.

title: Cannot charge
body: Only 2 months and no way to charge. Poor quality charging port, will not accept any new cable I try.

title: Won't work with phone and meeting apps
body: I really wanted to like these headphone. The sound quality and comfort and fit are great. However, they would only work with media apps like YouTube and Spotify. They would not work with meeting apps like GoToMeeting, Zoom, or Skype for Business. Also, would not let me use it with my phone app either. These had great potential but didn't meet my needs.

title: Company Stands by Solid Product
body:
I like to listen to a lot of music so I like to have several different kinds of headphones. When these came, they did not fit in my ear properly. However, I emailed customer service and they resolved my problem immediately. I had new ear pieces the very next day.

As for the sound quality, it's excellent. It's nice they are waterproof and I can wear them in the shower. However, I would not swim with them because they do tend to still fall out of my ears at times.

Overall, this product was exactly what I was looking for and it really helps that the company is so easy to contact if a problem does arise.

title: Great headphones, great customer service.
body: I love the way these sound! Nice and clean, solid bass, and loud. I use them for the gym and running as well as my everyday travel and go headphones. Very quick and responsive customer service as well. The only reason I took a star away was because one of the ear buds stopped working, but they are sending out a brand new unit so that’s cool.

title: Great sound, great price
body:
I’ve bought (and returned) a few pairs of wireless earbuds in my efforts to find a good option. I’m picky about sound and too many of them just sound tin-y and have no bass or depth of sound.

I was pleasantly surprised that these sound great when they are at such a decent price point. They come with 4 different sizes of tips, and once I found the right size, it just took a little twisting to adjust the placement in my ear to block out noise and get the best sound. The batteries seem to last a decent time on a charge (haven’t timed it), but I’ve only had them a couple weeks so I can’t speak to longevity. Can immediately tell a huge difference between these and others I’ve tried and hope they’ll last!

title: Had trouble connecting after 1 hour
body: Very disappointed - this product had great reviews. Used it the first time, and for the first hour, everything was good. Then it started to go in and out - the left earphone kept cutting out and reconnecting, then stopping. Made my music sound like it was skipping (an old record player). No noise cancelling feature to speak of.  Returned them.

title: Tozo responds and sends new buds
body:
Update to this review. They finally responded and corrected the issue with sending a new pair of ear buds that work. Thank you!
Haven't had the product for very long and the Master Right Ear Bud no longer works. Contacted the manufacturer and they refused to help or replace it.
When it worked, the sound quality was wonderful. But they have a very short life span. Ended up buying a different brand while we were trying to get Tozo to fix the issue.

title: Constant choppy sound
body: I don’t understand all the great reviews. These headphones cut out briefly every few minutes but they are even more terrible when I go running. Non stop choppy sound both headphones cutting in and out

title: Totally worth the money!!!!
body:
These are great!!! I’ve had mine for a few weeks now and I love them. I just wear one at a time mostly and then just switch them out after the battery dies. The battery life is great though. Lasts several hours!!!
The sound comparison of these versus a Sony wireless head set I have is insane. This is so much clearer!!

title: Impressed!
body:
I use these earbuds every day! Gym, school, commuting on a bike, walking the dog, etc. So far the only mild complaint I've had, is an issue with keeping them in when running. I'm not sure if it's the sweat or the bouncing that pops them out. I'm still trying the other sizes, so it may resolve itself and it isn't enough of an issue to take any stars away!

I've been impressed with the sound quality. They cancel sound better than my Beat Studio 3s. I have been able to use them all day and not run out of charge.

I appreciate being able to connect a single ear bud and have a free ear (safety while walking or biking). I haven't had any complaints while talking on the phone.

Very happy I picked this up!

title: Great sound, waterproof...
body: I wear these earbuds while exercising.  Earbuds that are waterproof with great sound are hard to find.  My other 2 pairs of earbuds needed an equalizer to improve the sound.  No need for an equalizer here.  Also good to know that the TOZO store is committed to total customer satisfaction if I have a problem.

title: The left earbud is faulty.
body: I ordered my earbuds yesterday and received them perfectly fine, zero problems with shipping. When I opened the package they looked nice no visible damage, but the left earbud does not work. The left earbud does not charge or turn on. I didn’t use them because only one earbud worked. I definitely did not pay 49.99 plus the warranty for half a product.

title: 5/5 Would Recommend
body:
Amazing headphones for the price. Great sound quality, easy to use, although not true sound cancelling the design does a great job blocking external sounds. Fits comfortably even when wearing to bed.
Only con is the auto connection to an iphone is a little slow, but if the few seconds matter you can connect instantly by manually selecting the device under bluetooth devices.

title: Great for music, not so much for phone calls.
body:
For ~$50, these ear buds seem pretty great so far.  Having only had them a few days now, I'm pretty impressed with the quality of these.  The only thing keeping this from being 5 stars is that I've had multiple issues with the left ear bud cutting out, or not connecting properly.

Pros:
Pairing is simple and automatic, though it does seem to take between 30 and 45 seconds  on average.
Excellent bass and overall sound quality.
Once you twist them into your ear properly, they don't seem to want to wiggle loose.
Small, easy to carry case with wireless charging.
Speaking of the case; it's solid, with a lid that feels secure.  I'm not worried about the buds falling out in my pocket.

Cons:
Pressing the button on the ear bud takes a good bit of effort, and would get uncomfortable with frequent use.
The left earbud seems to have some connectivity issues.  I've only worn them a handful of times so far, and I've noticed  it a few times.

**UPDATE**
While the sound quality of these are fantastic, I ultimately ended up returning them for one reason: I was consistently unable to use them for phone calls. Every attempt to do resulted in the person I was talking to telling me that I sounded distant and in a cave. Since hands free calling was a big piece of why I needed new headphones, this didn't meet my needs.

If I was simply looking for music and not phone calls, these would still be excellent earbuds.

title: Extremely comfortable, good sound, happy customer
body:
I was skeptical about these but I really needed a waterproof, affordable pair of buds that would work no matter what I was doing. I'm a fire instructor and have used these under my hood during evolutions, I've run with them, drove with them...so far they've exceeded expectations on all counts. Not sure how but these are better for phone conversations than the wired headphones that came with my new Galaxy phone. No idea how it picks up my voice so clearly.
Charging case is awesome also. In the words of Gump..."that's all I have to say about that".
 I'll be flying a lot over the next few weeks so I'll update my review for that function when I get back.
Overall...highly recommend!!!!

title: Sound Quality is AWESOME!
body: These were a birthday gift for my boyfriend. He loves them! Sound quality is great, love that is comes with different size ear pieces, and and packaging is professional.

title: Nice product
body: So far so good though I rarely purchase Chinese products for their inferiority this one seems to be a good product. Hoping America takes back their manufacturing jobs as China steals intellectual properties every day.

title: VERY USER FRIENDLY AND GREAT SOUND!!!
body: These TOZO wireless Bluetooth earbuds are amazing!  I had purchased a pair of wireless Bluetooth earbuds from another manufacturer on Amazon a couple of months ago, however I became extremely frustrated with them due to the fact that they practically had a "hair trigger" response and even the slightest touch would change just about everything. That being said, these TOZO earbuds are an absolute GEM.  They turned on and paired immediately after taking them out of the charging box. As soon as I initially paired them with my tablet, I was getting fantastic sound quality. The bass is excellent, and most of the outside noise was blocked out. I normally only use these when I am watching a movie on my tablet when I am flying.  The only thing they do not do is control the volume, but that was not an issue for me; the volume is very easy changed by a touch of a button on my tablet. To me, that is one less thing you have to worry about when you are trying to enjoy your wireless earbuds. The less buttons (or how long you have to hold this one or that one down for this or that) you have to think about is what works for me. They stay in my ears with no discomfort whatsoever. Good job TOZO!!!

title: The negative reviews aren't wrong.
body:
I tend not to let negative reviews get to me if the percentage is low. So is the case for these earbuds. When I first got them, I gave them a full charge out of the box. Went out to do some chores with my phone in my right pocket. Right away the buds start cutting on and off like crazy.
I tried to be positive about it. I usually wear a button up shirt with a pocket in front. I can just put the phone in my pocket.. the phone literally a foot in front of the buds. This seemed to work alright for a song or so. Than it started again. It seems like very little movement at all can cause a bluetooth interruption.
For example, as I type this with my phone in my face, everything is great. No cuts at all. If I lock my phone and put it in that top shirt pocket than the skipping starts again in less than 60 seconds and if i make any movement it gets worse.
At this rate I feel like I would have to tape my phone to my forehead to get these to work properly. I'm let down. For me while 50 bucks seems cheap, it's the most I've ever spent on earbuds. I imagine I will try them for a few more days but will likely request a refund. This is a bummer for me because i really wanted these to be the ones.
Audio quality is more than acceptable. Feeling is nice. Case is great. They simply do not work correctly.
Edit-after a while they dont even work right while I'm using my phone inches away from my face. This is bad.

title: Love the tozo!
body: Great buy ! The description of the product is accurate. I lost my buds but I have the warranty but I don’t know how to use it. Really sad about it. I hate when I turn my  head whilst i’m listening to music that they start to cute out the sound effects . Hopefully. They’re will be a new version that doesn’t do this ,and it works really well while on WiFi.

title: I’m in LOVE!!!
body:
I’m not much of a reviewer, but the moment I placed these in my ear, I knew I hit gold and had to let the world know.

My $150 Bose SoundSport earbuds just died on me, so I went online to find a non-Bose replacement and stumbled across this Amazon Choice for $100 less.

The sound quality blows Bose out of the water and at a fraction of the cost. I’m really hoping that these will last me a very long time.

title: Horrible mic. They cant hear me.
body: After pairing with 3 different phones and calling 3 friends with differents providers.  The result was the same.  THEY CANT HEARD ME!! sound like talking through a tunnel.

title: Great sound quality for the price!!
body: I've been using these headphones for about a month now and they're amazing! The sound quality is incredible (way better than airpods in my opinion) and definitely worth the price. With the variety of tips they've sent me I've been able to show them to my friends and they all agree they're incredible. I also used them for working out and they stayed snug in my ears without having to fear them falling out! I highly recommend this product!

title: Great headphones for the price
body: These headphones are pretty great for the price. I wear them while working a desk job and can leave them in for hours with no issues of them falling out or hurting. The different size earbuds were great as I needed the smaller ones to make them hold comfortably in. I've usually only gotten about 4-4.5 hours out of the battery life, but that's good enough for me. Wireless charging case is also a great bonus.

title: Great sound quality, bluetooth mechanisms, very happy overall
body: Have had these earbuds for several weeks. They fit well, are very comfortable, and have amazing sound quality. I've been showering with them in and with my phone down the hall, have had no problems with water damage or bluetooth connection. I have some concern about the overall battery quality (seems like it may be running low faster now), but it's still early. For their affordability and overall quality I would highly recommend

title: Better than Apple Earbuds
body: Purchased the Tozo T10 earbuds in an attempt to find earbuds with great sound and a better fit than Apple, and I have been VERY pleased.  The sound quality is great and the fit is much more comfortable than the Apple style earbud.  No earbud is great at noise cancellation, so I wasn't expecting that feature.  The only shortcoming is that the Tozo's don't have the automatic pause feature when removed from the ear like the Apple's do, but this is not a dealbreaker!  The Tozo is a great product at a great price

title: Buy it
body:
Sound is OK but can’t compare to high ends like Bose. For the price I think it’s worth it to buy this.

I rated 4 stars only because I got some hiccups from the first use where the left channel keeps on disconnecting so the support sent me replacements.

title: I found the sound quality excellent!
body:
I loved the quality of the sound. It's rich, clear, and balanced. It took a little bit to learn how to use the system, but once I did, I found it to be a well-made product which delivers what it said it would.
My only issue is the built-in mike. When I used it with my iPhone 8 Plus, the person I was calling couldn't hear me. I'll have to learn that part of the system better!!
Good product. Well put together, sturdy and reliable.
Joe, New Jersey

title: Very High Quality for the Price.
body: Honestly, these earbuds have surpassed my expectations. Right out of the box, the packaging is extremely high quality and you can tell the seller puts a lot of thought into first impressions. The earbuds themselves are very comfortable and do not fall out of my ears when I'm in the gym or when I'm just casually listening. If they do not fit well at first, then you can try the 3 other sizes of ear pieces that come with the earbuds, I personally need to use the smallest size because all others fall out. Sound quality is as good as an earbud can get, clear notes and easy to hear voices as well as a strong bass. Pairing was extremely easy and another thing that surprised me was the battery life. The case charges quickly and so do the earbuds; the earbuds also hold a very long charge. I was using them one night and forgot they were in my ears while I was watching videos for multiple hours, the battery never died and the quality never faded. The charging case is very well made and the magnets are strong, not to mention the purchase comes with a free 1 year warranty in case anything happens to your earbuds. Final verdict: if you are looking for wireless earbuds, buy these and don't look back. You are getting $200 worth of quality for the extremely fair price of $50 (as of when I bought them).

title: I washed them once!
body: I didn't really think the waterproof feature to these ear buds was ever gonna pay off for me (I bought them for the positive reviews on sound/battery/wearability-usually ear buds/pods constantly fall out everytime I turn my head). I'm a groundskeeper and custodian and I left the ear pieces in my scrub top and accidentally washed them AND THEY STILL WORK PERFECTLY. They do sometimes fall out but they are way way better than any ear pieces and now I'll use them while cooking or cleaning.

title: Stopped working.... ugh
body: Stopped charging and working a little over a month after I got them. Just after the return date passed, of course. Do not recommend. Have had a second pair replaced and same issues.

title: An audio experience that you must have! Best on the market!
body: I purchased these earbuds for use at work (I am a chemist and work in a laboratory with constant noise) and I could not be more satisfied with the quality that I received in these T10 ear buds. The noise cancellation paired with the cutting-edge sound technology makes for an experience that must be had. Have you ever had Johnny Cash play just for you? That is the quality of what you get with the TOZO T10 ear buds!

title: Good product, good customer service.
body: The T10 earbuds sound great and fit great. I use them for running, exercising, and when I’m doing yard work. Customer service from the company (Tozo) is good to. I recently lost my left ear bud after finishing a 5k. I’d placed the ear buds loose in my pocket and must of lost one when I pulled my keys out. I contacted Tozo customer service via email explaining my situation and seeking to purchase just the left ear bud. They replied back saying they would replace my lost ear bud at no charge. That’s pretty awesome customer service in my book.

title: Company only wants your money but does not give what was promised.
body: Hi, I purchased this product in hoping it was going to be as good as all the reviews. My unit does not hold a charge for more than 3 days or so and have to recharge the whole unit again. The company also asked me to provide a 5-star rating ASAP and in exchange, I would receive for free a wireless charging station to charge the unit for doing so. I have asked several times and still have not received the charging unit. I think they are just pushing for great review so people will buy their project and that is all.

title: Alternative Track and Volume Controls
body:
Everything is really good about these earbuds for my first pair ever!
Skip and Forward Solution with Volume Control!
Ok so first of all forward or previous track you can always use google or Bixby, first say "ok google(or Hey Bixby) (next or previous) track" works the same way with volume up and down! Just say "ok google (bleep) volume up(down) by 5 (numeric value here or whatever number you choose)
I use one earbud (Right since its master bud) for music and leave my Left one on while it's in the charging case. If you leave the left one off while it's in the case the Right bud will keep beeping trying to connect to the Left bud.
4 star battery life and noise cancellation because I still need to use them for that long! Overall they're very great and would highly reccomend them to anyone looking for buds! Didnt know they had white tho, totally wouldve got those ones to match my new S10+ prism white!!!!

title: It has its flaws.
body: Great earbuds overall, however the CONSTANT disconnection of the left ear bud is unbearable. The sound will also change tones randomly or lose connection. I really was hoping to like these, but unfortunately they’re to finnicky.

title: Too expensive for the quality.
body: Sound is mediocre. For my ears, none of the tips work to keep these from falling out unless my body and face sit nearly motionless. This defeats the purpose of buying these. The back speaker is too big and too heavy which is what causes them to flip out of your ears if you are running, dancing, bobbing your head to the music, etc. The whole set up with the battery pack and general design is clunky and chunky. The mpow over ear, earbuds are around $20, come with memory foam inserts for your ears, sound better, are still waterproof and you can basically to cartwheels without them falling out.

title: Would recommend but..
body:
I absolutely love these. They came with 4 different size earbuds so it was easy to find the perfect size. I love the little magnetic charging case they come with that easily fits in my pocket. I was able to leave my phone charging in one room and walk in and out of almost every room in the house without losing signal. The sound quality is amazing. Well worth the money.

I did only give them 4 stars though for the following reasons. I bought them to use at the gym while I workout. Unfortunately the left earpiece cuts out frequently when I'm at the gym and thats with the phone sitting less than a foot directly in front of me with nothing blocking the signal path. There have also been a few times I am at home holding my phone in front of me and the left one will cut cut out for a few seconds. I'm guessing there is too much interference at the gym and it's only slightly annoying, so I do still use them. I'm not sure why it cuts out on rare occasions at home and its always just the left one.

The other issue and this is a very minimal issue, is that they don't sit very flush in your ears. They stick out a little bit and are easy to accidently knock out if careless. You would need much larger ears I think for them to sit in there snug.

title: Weak Bluetooth signal
body:
I have only one major complaint against this product. The Bluetooth signal is rather weak, and cuts in and out if i put any type of barrier between the phone and the headphones. Example: If i have my phone in my back pocket and I sit on my phone, the signal gets cut on the hearbuds. If I'm in an office where there are several Bluetooth signals, connection drops in and out.

The earbuds are loud when connected, though you can only control volume through the device you're connected with (ex: Phone). A slight annoyance for me is that I'm unable to skip to the next song using the earphones. A person can use the earphones to make calls and answer call though. However, I've not taken a call using them because of the worry of the weak Bluetooth signal.

The reason for not getting a lower review is because it does do the other aspects. The sound quality is decent and battery life is as described. Even with the weak Bluetooth signal, it still does what I need it to do a good 83% of the time.

title: TOZO T10 Blew My Mind
body: Had absolutely no problem pairing the earbuds to my phone from the second i opened the box. Sound quality is out of this world for the price. I have wireless Beats and Beats Studio headphones...obviously the studios have better sound and noise canceling but i also spent 7x the amount i paid for these. The TOZO T10 earbuds stand side by side with my wireless beats and was extremely shocked to see for myself how well these earbuds are. I had an open mind paying $50 for wireless earbuds and honestly wasn't expecting to get half the quality, comfort or durability that these came with. To be honest you couldn't ask for a better pair of wireless earbuds for the price and would purchase these again in a flash. Excited to see what TOZO has to offer in the near future!

title: Quality product
body: I was pleasantly surprised at how well these stay in my ears while playing basketball. With all the running and jumping around, it's nice to know that i don't have to constantly readjust them. I love the clear sound i get from these. The battery life is a bit shorter than some of my other bluetooth headphones but it's not a big deal for me. I get 2+ hours which is a long time to have something in your ears in my opinion.

title: Fantastic range
body: I was skeptical to order these. Reviews are good but that can be iffy and sketch sometimes. These are really good Bluetooth ear buds. Super easy connect. Range is fantastic. Battery life is great. Sound is really good for the price. Getting the right size ear size things on is the only challenge. This little stinkers are some what of a challenge to get on the bud. After that...WoooHooo!  Good quality. I would definitely purchase these again!

title: Uncomfortable and fall out
body: The main issue that I have are that no matter what size I put on the earbuds, they fall out while working out. I lift relatively intensely, and during the set I make movements and facial gestures that cause the buds to slowly slip out mid set nearly every time. This is extremely annoying, and gets worse when I start to sweat. When I'm not working out, I can get them to stay in the ear relatively well (if I keep my face still), however the pressure they place in the ear is really uncomfortable. Sound quality is ok, I like that they create a seal in the ear which makes what you're listening to more pronounced. They are really bass heavy, even when I set the equalizer to flat. Case is really bulky for someone used to airpods. Overall, these just aren't cutting it for me, and aren't worth $60. I plan to return if I'm able.

title: Quality Earbuds
body:
I was highly impressed with the Tozo T10. The packaging was incredible, right out of the box these earbuds looked impressive, the build quality is top notch, and an amazing set of features for the price.
Pairing them with my phone was too easy. All you have to do is take them out of the charging case and they are ready for pairing. The bluetooth have a stronger connection and longer distance. I can leave them in my backpack and I am still connected up to 40 feet away. The clarity of the highs and the richness of the bass are of the quality level of the highest end earbuds. The charging case is good for four full recharges of the earbuds.
I was highly impressed with the Tozo T10. The packaging was incredible, right out of the box these earbuds looked impressive, the build quality is top notch, and an amazing set of features for the price.
Pairing them with my phone was too easy. All you have to do is take them out of the charging case and they are ready for pairing. The bluetooth have a stronger connection and longer distance. I can leave them in my backpack and I am still connected up to 40 feet away. The clarity of the highs and the richness of the bass are of the quality level of the highest end earbuds. The charging case is good for four full recharges of the earbuds.

title: So comfortable!
body: So comfortable!! I use them while cutting the grass and they stay in no matter how much I sweat and I barely hear the mower. This is my third pair because I keep 1 at home and 1 at work and my husband liked them so much I had to buy him a pair!

title: Great sound quality, stays in ears really well
body: I ordered these headphones after a co-worker spoke highly of the Tozo T8 earbuds so I thought I would give the newer ones a shot. After trying out another brand that was terrible, I returned those and ordered the T10's. I instantly loved the sound quality and they stayed in my ears even when running or moving around a lot. They are great for working out as they don't slide out because of sweat. The bass quality was really good which was impressive to me. I did have some connectivity issues at first, but after emailing the company they were quick to respond and fixed the problem immediately. Great service on their part.

title: Good headphones
body: For the money these headphones can’t be beat. They sound just as good if not better than my wireless Beats By Dre. I wear these working out and bike riding and haven’t had one fall out yet. Charge lasts several hours and connectivity is no issue. I like that when I pull them out of the charger they automatically connect. Only downside is you cannot skip to the next song by double tapping the button or anything so you have to pull your phone back out. I have an Apple Watch so it’s not much of and issue.

title: Not IPX8 *updated*👇
body:
It quit working as soon as it got wet and I waited too long to return it :/
*UPDATE*
After hearing from TOZO's customer service, they sent a replacement pair. Their customer service and warranty on the products seems really great. The new set is working much better. I would still say these are more like water resistant instead of waterproof though.

title: Tozo-Finally found earbuds that work good, aren't dorky big, and have bass, VERY happy.
body:
First of all, I have spent approx. 2 hrs over the past 2 weeks looking for some wireless earbuds that were reasonably priced, and actually had real reviews.  Each time I would give up out of frustration of all the fraud in the reviews on these products..  For some reason, everytime I though I found a good set up earbuds I would look into approx. 10 reviews to see if the count and star rating was real. some of the other products actually had reviews that were for a completely different product... weird trick.  But consistently I would find a high number of fake reviews.. clearly fake.. note they typically have one review.. OR if they do have multiple reviews you will see they did them all within a couple days for cheap items.  This was the only product with a high review sample size and I couldn't find any evidence in my sampling of fake reviews.  So don't believe me, actually go in and look at a bunch of reviews for this product and see for yourself.  All I would find was reviewers with high review count, many years.. So hard to fake.  I had one other set of earbuds that looked huge, had tinny sound.  SO after my long search and finding these... I am so happy.  I just received them 2 hours ago, so excited had to do a review.  I got the white ones, Sound is excellent, bass is just right, I wouldn't say too much, or too little.. just right.- But yes it does have bass so my songs actually sound like I wanted them to.  Comes with different size earbuds sleeves... I though smaller would be better … but actually found the slightly larger sleeves were best fit, they won't fall out.  Super happy with these, search is over.  One other point is these don't look dorky big in my ears, like the previous ones I tried.  I don't know if noise cancellation is working or not.. hard to tell.. I couldn't hear the TV in the room practically at all so maybe it is working.. OR its just the earbud is blocking my ear canal.. either way sounds great.  Distance is great too, I have walked 50ft away and into my garage.. only there did it start to go choppy, but was going through firedoor and wall.  Plus says there waterproof on box.. I like that for when I exercise..  Great product you will be happy..  I'm glad this seller didn't go dishonest with the reviews like all the other earbuds.  I wish amazon would do sampling of reviews by dishonest dealers and cut them out!, rather them leave me to waste my time figuring it out.

7-1-19 One update on my review.  I talked about noise cancellation.  I went and used them for working out.  Found there is really no noise cancellation.  I could still hear the music and noise around when working out, but not bad.. BUT I still love the product.  In fairness I looked again and the manufacturer didn't say there is active noise cancellation, They only mentioned something to the equalivant of noise blocking.. I.E. since there is plugs in your ear canal.  So Still very happy with my purchase.  IF you are looking for active noise cancelling.. these don't have that.  BUT still the Best earbuds I could find on Amazon for a good low price.

title: Build Quality and Customer Service was Great!
body: I needed a new pair of headphones for working out since my last pair broke so I purchased the TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds. The build appeared high quality and the battery life was great with the charging case. The only problem was that I could not get the headphones to stick in my ears. They kept falling out since the smallest ear caps were still too big for my ears. I contacted customer support yesterday and they responded quickly and offered to send me a replacement TOZO T5 TWS Bluetooth Headset since those headphones will stay on the users ears due to the over the ear attachment. Overall I would give this a 5 star review because it is so hard to find good customer support. I will post pictures when the T5 gets shipped and review that also.

title: Not worth it.
body: Started out fine but they started to disconnect and reconnect randomly. After a point it was more disconnecting notifications than music playing through them.

title: Great Product!
body: I have gone through several earbuds on Amazon over the past couple of years. I'm a big guy and sweat alot when working out so in addition to sound quality I need the to actually be water resistant as advertised. These are the first to actually deliver both! Great product and customer service responds rapidly when I had a couple questions.

title: my hubby loved it
body: I bought it to my husband as his first Father's Day gift. He loved it so much, keeps putting them every time he goes out, even when he goes for a short walk with the dog. It has a very good noise cancellation and a long life battery. happy with the purchase.

title: Best wireless earbuds I have found!!!
body: I did a lot of research before buying and I'm glad I did.  These are buy far the best true wireless earbuds for the money.  I use them at the gym, and even take conference calls.  Sound quality is great and they fit perfectly.

title: Great for sleeping,great bass and clear sound,truly water proof!
body: Color me impressed! I first fell in love with wireless earbuds with taotronics. However i wanted to use them to sleep with and they do not fit comfortably laying on them. They also shorted out in the shower which scared me since they are supposed to be water proof. Enter TOZO T10. I took a chance since the profile seemed smaller and it  paid off! First thing i did was try them in the shower no problem at all! Washed my hair and everything lol. I'm a side sleeper and am able to fall asleep comfortably listening to my audio books. Big thing for people is sound quality i must say these SURPASSED my expectations! I can't even listen past half volume, deep bass, clear sounds and no crackles super impressed! The magnets in the charger are very strong no issues of them falling out and the case is sturdier and battery life longer than my taotronics set. I haven't used those since i got these! Only weird thing i noticed is if you put your hand up close to the non master side the volume fades on that side it's quirky but not annoying lol. I fully endorse these you will love love love them!

title: Good battery life, Great range
body:
I haven’t had the headphones die on me once yet although I haven’t pushed it too hard. I was very surprised with the range on these headphones. I can leave my phone sitting out and clean the pool up to 40 feet away without too much interference. Looking forward to seeing if the performance is maintained so I will plan to update in a few months.

P.s. make sure you try a few of the different ear buds. I was surprised to find the smallest worked best for me.

title: They actually work while wet!
body: Sound is great, but loud outside noise's can be a bother. Otherwise they have a good wireless connection. The 4 pair of different size ear buds were great to fit best size. I really thought these were a great price and great quality.

title: Worth the money works well not exactly made for activities with a lot of movement
body: I’m very satisfied with him so far I’ve been using them for about a month now. The magnetic charging of the devices and the case that they come in is really nice. The sound quality is great. The only thing I wish is that they had some sort of better keeping system to them so that they would fit inside my ear better I know they do come with extra size had to try and fit many different ear sizes but seems like the weight of the device Works itself loose in a matter what size I tried. So I wouldn’t really recommend them as an act of our work out type earbud but for sitting or walking around there not bad at all especially for the money sound and connectivity is great and battery life is pretty good I get about hour and 3/4 probably to a charge and they charge up relatively quickly and up to about three times from the case being fully charged.

title: Great so far! Even fell asleep with them in :-)
body:
This is my first pair of wireless earbuds.  I was concerned because I have small ears and all of the other "hard" style earbuds (like those that come with the iPhone), hurt and I can't wear them for long.  I am pleasantly surprised with how comfortable these are.  They were easy to use, right out of the box.  They are loud enough, even only at half strength, to allow me to enjoy what I am listening to without any noise from my surroundings.  Not only can I not hear my surroundings, but people near me can not hear what I am listening to either.

The first night, I fell asleep with them in, listening to a book.  Not only where they comfortable, but they didn't fall out when I tossed and turned.  I eventually woke up, took them out, and with the magnetic charging case they were even easier to replace in the case while I was half asleep!

title: TOZO-T10 - Very Satisfied One-Eared Customer
body:
TOZO-T10 Satisfied One-Eared Customer, overall rating 4.9.

The primary reason I bought these earbuds was as a cheap alternative to using an expensive hearing aid for music listening during wet, cold, windy, and risky outdoor activities where I live in Southeast Alaska.  Having used them now for several weeks of fall hiking, boating, bushwhacking, road-side litter pickup, and working in/around home (as well as for frequent post-activity hot tub soaks), I am completely satisfied with their overall performance.

They are simple to use and are apparently quite durable (haven't killed one yet).  They have survived all challenging daily conditions, as well as some contrived testing challenges, and one good accidental dunking in the hot tub.  Simple and easy to use, I'm also perfectly satisfied with great sound quality, even compared to my very much more expensive hearing aid.  In addition, the large single button on/off control is easy to hit, even while wearing some gloves, unlike the hearing aid.

The second reason for purchasing this particular model, was reviews that indicated both buds can be used singly.  This aspect was important to me, because I am completely deaf on the left side with no ear canal.  Although not recommended, and maybe not an ideal fit, but I was very pleased to find that the left bud can indeed be fitted into my good right ear when desired, so that I effectively get two devices for the price of one.

I did discover that when only one bud is connected, it generates a periodic tone to alert the user about the disconnected device.  This repeats a few times, and then stops.  Did not find this mentioned in any users info, and I don't need it, but I can see how very useful it would be for most users to know that the 2nd device is disconnected.

I will most definitely be posting information about these particular earbuds on websites devoted to the single-sided hearing community.

title: Great Product at a VERY FAIR PRICE
body: This was my first purchase of wireless earbuds and I was hesitant not to purchase a set of high priced earbuds for fear of being disappointed in my decision. The outcome is just the opposite. I am delighted with the TOZO T10 earbuds. Sound quality, noise cancellation and battery life are great and they fit and stay in my ears perfectly - and they are waterproof!

title: Amazing product for great price
body:
These headphones are great. The buds are small and can be adjusted to fit your ear.After getting these I compared them with jlab wired headphones and jlab sports wireless. These took the cake. The sound was great, you are able to make out crytal clear noise, fulll of all the sounds. If you use a bud at a time,they last you all day. I love the wireless feature;being able to place them on my pad and wake up with them fully charged. The noise cancellation could be better but with the rich sound quality, you already don't pay attention to your surroundings.

Hope this review helped

title: Excellent!
body:
I did extensive research before purchasing these TOZO earbuds. Although others were inviting I kept coming back to TOZO. The sound quality, the balance between treble and bass is high quality and the noise cancellation is effective.

I appreciate that the charge level is displayed on the top of the carrying case. The battery life is very good.

These TOZO earbuds are high quality, particularly for the price.

title: Best Wireless Earbuds I've Ever Used
body:
I've had these headphones for about a week now, and I could not be more happy with them. I've owned other products that were similar to these, but for less than $10 more than I spent on those other earbuds, there is a BIG difference in quality with these made by Tozo. Here are some of the things that stand out about this model vs earbuds made by other companies I've tried:

First of all, the build quality is fantastic. The charging case is sturdy, and the magnets which "click" the earbuds into place are very strong. This makes it easy to "seat" the earbuds so that they will charge, even in the dark as you're getting ready to go to bed.

The charging indicator lights on the inside of the case are A HUGE plus.

You can use one earbud at a time, effectively doubling the battery life on days when you'll be listening with them all day. One caveat here- there's an inconvenient "beep" when you only use one earbud at a time, but that goes away after about 15 seconds. The "beep" is to let you know that it's trying to pair with the other earbud. Like I said, though, when you don't use both earbuds, that beep goes away and you're free to listen, uninterruptedly after 15 seconds or so.

Battery life for the charging case and the earbuds themselves seem to be very good. I haven't really measured the amount of time the earbuds themselves stay charged, but the case itself has only needed to be plugged in once, and I've used these earbuds every day since I got them a week ago.

The fit of these earbuds is really nice in my ears, using the second-smallest plug thingys.

Like I said, I cannot say enough good things about this product so far. Amazon had a coupon for a set of similar earbuds to what I'd used before. That would have made them $10 cheaper than the Tozo ones, but I decided to spend a little more to get a LOT better quality. I'm glad I did

title: Just Perfect!!
body:
At the begging I was a bit hesitant on buying the product. Once I got them and charge the properly, I have used them many, many times. I can recommend to anyone to get / buy this product, considering that the quality of it and the sound is simply perfect (for me)!!! I have Bose and Samsung earbuds yet the Tozo T10 have much better Bass than the other 2.

For the price you  will be paying for them, it is indeed a perfect buy and a "Must get" item.

title: Cheap crap, doesn't sync. Shrill, high frequency sound- low sound quality
body:
It looks pretty, the battery case is solid, and it's cool the way magnets pull the earbuds into place in the case. But between the sound quality being so bad, and it not syncing properly, I had no choice but to return it. Looking online, I found the syncing problem to be somewhat common. People have come up with ways to make it sync, by powering everything down, making the phone forget the buds, restarting your phone, shutting everything down for at least 5 minutes, etc... None of those those methods worked for me. It was frustrating.

The sound quality is high frequency- it hurt to listen to it moderately loud, and gave me a headache. I thought I could get used to listening to it on relatively low volume, as it does block out most outside noise, but the straw that broke the camel's back was the second time I used it, when the left one wouldn't sync with the right. It's not like one could simply enjoy music with one ear. I don't understand how this product could have such a high rating.

title: Incredible value!
body: I ordered this item based off of the positive reviews. The package came quickly. Actually, it was perfect timing! I was spring cleaning out the yard and my Plantronics headset just died. I open the box and thought, “maybe these have some charge on them? Sure enough, they did! Another hour and a half of use right out of the box! Paired in moments. Noise-cancellation is to be expected from ear buds (good, as nothing is ever going to beat over-the-ear cans!) I didn’t really buy these for swimming, but I can tell you they stood up to an afternoon of yardwork sweat!

title: Decent sounds quality, but short battery life.
body: The earbuds are very light weight and have no issue staying in my ear throughout my day. I have not run with them, but don't see any reason they'd have any issues. They come with various sizes of earbuds that should fit almost anyone. Unfortunately, for all the pros of this product, I'm less than happy with the battery life. Not only do the earbuds themselves not hold a very long charge, the wireless charging pack that charge the earbuds when not in use also has a very short battery life before needing to be plugged in to recharge.

title: Good phone sound quality too!
body:
I’ve had these for a couple if days now and have used used them for phone calls, music, and podcasts. Most importantly for me, my callers say the sound is good also.  I bought them primarily for hands and cord free calls while I work.
They fit comfortably in my ears. Haven’t used them enough to comment on the battery life but so far it seems good and the pairing is easy.

title: Think about an other pair, but meh, these still work.
body: These sound pretty good. But the battery life, at least on my pair, is not good to say the least. Usually goes about 3-4 hours of on and off use with low volume while I take calls at work before saying the battery is low and they near shut off. But the most annoying parts are, you cant just use 1 with out the other or it beeps in your ear non stop until you take the other one out of the charging case and just leave it on the desk or put it in your pocket or something. Also these things have had trouble connecting to devices unless you do it in an order of, taking out both headphones and waiting for them to pair together, then pairing your device.. and the whole time, the things are beeping every 2 seconds until paired. Idk, these are horrible and are a good option for wireless if you don't mind the "little things" but I wouldn't buy again.

title: I like them and recommend getting a pair.
body: I bought the ear buds because so often I will get the wire caught up during a workout. The range on the ear buds is great and the sound quality is really good. I had to play around with the different sizes for the ear pieces. The first ones that were the most comfortable would fall out during fast direction changes. I switched sizes and can do anything without the ear buds falling out. The customer service is outstanding and they are very responsive. If you are looking to get a more reliable set of earbuds. Look no further.

title: Good Quality Headphones
body: I got these headphones as a gift and I really like them! The instructions were a little confusing, but I learned to try to pair them with your phone after you take both of them out of the charging box and then it works perfectly! The sound quality is good and they are very comfortable. Sometimes there is a little glitch in one of the headphones but it doesn't really bother me unless you are super sensitive because it is so tiny. Overall really good and the customer service is awesome!

title: Sweat-Proof and nice tight fit.
body:
I use these earbuds 5 days a week while I work. I load freight trucks so the work is fast paced and I get very sweaty.
I have never had an issue with the earbuds falling out nor have I had any issues with them getting drenched in sweat.
Great product!

title: Pretty good
body: I've enjoyed using this for the last week. The earbuds do have a tough time staying in my ears when I'm walking or doing other physical activity, though. The sound quality is amazing and I love the charging case.

title: Left earbud sound cuts in and out
body: The headphones are large compared to others but they seem to fit my ear well. The battery life seems good and lasts hours. The problem is that the left earbud sound cuts in and out at times and is very annoying. I have tried to reset them and reconnect but the problem persists. When they arent cutting in and out, they work very well.

title: Don’t buy!
body: UPDATE: This is a scam. They talk people into giving a good review and promise a free wireless charger. Never got the charger and after a couple days of using these I already started having issues with them. I just received these and tried them out for a few minutes. So far they sound and fit much better than the last brand I bought. I can’t wait to use them at work tomorrow:)

title: Surprisingly Impressive
body:
When I got these earbuds, they were on sale, seemed decent and claimed to be waterproof. I am so glad I did. The case is well made and sturdy, and the magnets are strong enough to keep it closed (it flops around my messenger bag all day) yet still easy to open. The earbuds themselves are also secured in the case by magnets, which not only helps to keep them safe and secure but also charges them.

These come with different sized cushions so you can find a comfortable fit. I am still trying to find that "perfect" fit, but yet soft enough to wear for long periods at a time even if you are only wearing them for the noise cancellation.

Not only was I impressed with the NC, but the sound blew me away! Please keep in mind; I am not a professional, nor an audiophile, but wow! I had gotten the Sony XF-1000X earbuds then, decided I wanted something waterproof. So I returned those and got these and haven't looked back. (Haven't tried them in the shower yet, but will update if I ever get the courage to do so.) The sound quality is almost as good, if not the same for so much cheaper.

title: Definitely a great product and highly recommend!
body: I love these earbuds.  I was skeptical because I have had wireless earbuds cut out when using them but these are awesome.  I used them while mowing the yard and they stayed connected the entire time while my phone was in my hoodie pocket.  They are very easy to connect to my devices.  They have a very comfortable fit in the ears with nothing hurting.  I have bought the AirPods two times and both times the right one hurts my ear so I've sent them back.  I definitely recommend these.

title: High Quality sound with superior bass well constructed
body: These are the best earbuds in the $50 range. You can pay less for another brand, --less quality. And, more for not necessarily great sound. This IS the one.

title: Excellent bass response.
body: I am very, very pleased with these wireless earbuds. Easy connection to my phone right out of the box. The bass response is superb. Very comfortable in the ears, and they sit solid.

title: Great sound...!!!...poor customer service...
body:
I love these earbuds.  I finally found earbuds (after 4 tries) that aren't awkward and loose, they fit perfectly.  I enjoy the great sound and can answer my calls easily...Great buy...thank you.!!!
I can't say the same of their customer service...they offered a wireless charger for posting a review in Amazon, which I did; after four back and forth emails, they still needed more information...????
Make it simple...and you will succeed.

title: Impressive and left earbud interruptions SOLVED
body:
UPDATE #2:
If you're having problems with your left earbud audio being interrupted, contact their technical support and let them know!
I requested support for my left earbud interruption problems, and they happily sent me replacement. I've been trying the replacement for several hours a day for the past couple of days, and several recharges during that time, and I will have to say the problems with the left earbud momentarily losing signal from the right earbud have practically vanished! Now, I'm really happy to have such awesome sound, uninterrupted. Back to 5 star rating. I still get some rare interruptions when working with my arms over my head and in tight, enclosed spaces. But that is probably to be expected for the nature of any true wireless earbuds?
I liked that their technical support was eager to help me with my earbud problems. Once they verified my purchase, it wasn't long before I had a free warranty replacement in hand that worked great! How refreshing! :-)
Some other additions to my review are:
These earbuds come with 4 sizes of removable earpieces to fit different sized ears. There's 2 sets consecutively larger than the size installed from the factory, and 1 size smaller. The one from the factory fits my ears just fine, but was a little too small, and I could tell because I could still hear additional noises around me. To replace the "tips", I recommend gripping the earbud firmly with one hand, and the removable ear piece/tip with the fingers of the other hand, squeezing the tip gently, but firmly, and twisting back and forth a little while pulling away. (Reverse that for putting on the new tips, being careful to get the removable cap lined up properly with the tube). For me, the next size up still fit comfortably, and blocked out most of the surrounding sounds. This was my ideal fit. The sizes were close together, and difficult to tell next size up (or down) until I laid them all out side by side for comparison. The largest size has a black "center" (instead of red like the others).
Another observation to record is that I think I noticed that the earbuds wont charge until you take the case (battery pack) off of being charged / its charger? Someone feel free to crrect me if I am wrong. But on mine, I would charge the base up (amount of charge indicated nice by four blue charging leds), then when I removed it from the charger, the earbud indicator lights would turn red indicating that they were charging. when everything is charged, all the lights turn off. I found I could get them all turn turn back on (to see the charge level of the case and make sure the earbuds were charged) simply by lifting the earbuds a little and letting magnetism pull them right back down to the charger.
It seems like the case does not hold its charge after a couple of weeks? I could be wrong about that as I may not have charged it after draining it the last time?

UPDATE #1: After some heavy use of these earbuds, I had to come back and lower my rating (from 4 to 3) on these earbuds. They are great earbuds, but the reason for my lowering this rating is because of the number of times the left earbud loses connection from the right earbud. The music in left earbud stops play and then usually comes back shortly afterwards. even when I am sitting typing at my computer (low activity). It definitely happens more often when I'm working / doing activity while using the earbuds (high activity). This happens even when the earbuds are fully charged. I have also reset the earbuds according to the manual (purple flashes). And that has not helped any. I'll inquire with their technical support as well.

ORIGINAL REVIEW:
(Please note disclaimers at the bottom of this review).
This is my first true wireless earbuds, and I like them a lot!
I bought this because I wanted to listen to music in my basement while moving around a lot and not have to play the music loud and disrupt my wife upstairs. I felt this product had good reviews and was a reasonable price to introduce me to the bluetooth true wireless earbuds.

PROs:
Nice packaging
The manual was good / decent enough for me to be able to understand and use most of the functionality of the device(s). Furthermore, I found that the device(s) behaved as the manual indicated they would. They readily advertise their support contact information throughout.
Device(s) came with a partial charge so I could start using it right away if I wanted. However, I usually charge them fully first.
I did have to change the earpieces to fit my ears better. I'm glad it comes with 4 different sized earpieces. The instructions did not specify how to change the earpieces. I didn't want to break them and could not tell for a while if they pulled on/off or screwed on/off. (They pull on/off).
Devices were easy to hook up and get to operate. I did not have any problems pairing with my computer. I have NOT tried pairing with other devices.
I felt like the bluetooth range was reasonable. I dont have much (other bluetooth devices) to compare it with, though. The more centrally located in the house the bluetooth source (my computer) was, the more range I could get throughout the house / basement. And of course anything getting in between you and the source diminishes or interrupts available signal strength, especially metals.
I really liked the sound quality of these earbuds, and I felt like they did a good job of sealing out surrounding noises. They do not actively cancel any noise around you, though. I was happy with the sound quality. I'm also not an audiophile. I felt like the trebles were crispy, and the bass boomy. It does not come with an EQ, so you have to use your own EQ if you want to customize your listening experience to your preferences.
They come with a built-in microphone, but I also did not test that feature. This was important feature to me though, in case i wanted to do conference calling or other calling in the future.
the earbuds have a "button" on each one. The instruction manual contains details about their use.
I did not test the water-proofness of these earbuds.
I feel like the battery life was accurate: I think mfr specified about 4 hours of battery life for the earbuds before you had to recharge them(?). I got about this and maybe a little more.
The earbuds seemed to be very (acceptably) light for their functionality / lifespan. But again I have no frame of reference.
The charging lights are all inside the carrying/charging case. you can see the lights through the top of the case (kind of a smokey tint to the case. You can have the lid open to see the lights better, or closed and still see the charge status. It seems like you can charge the case or charge the earbuds, but not both at the same time(?). Either that or it took a lot longer to do both at the same time. It did not take too long to charge the case from completely drained (couple hours?), and about an hour or a little more to charge the earbuds from dead.
The earbuds have built in voice that can guide you occasionally, like when battery is low, etc.

P.S. wireless charging is pretty cool! No wires to regularly plug and unplug once the charging unit is set up. Just lay down your device to charge it and pick it up when needed.

CONs:
One thing that was kind of annoying was disconnects / losing connection (interrupting the music). The left earbud pairs with the right earbud, and they have to have good communication with each other on either side of your head. Sometimes, when getting too close to a monitor, other electronics, other rf noise sources (like cfl lights), or even just putting my hand/arm up to rest my chin on it while sitting in front of my computer would cause a disconnect between left and right earbuds until I removed the interference to a greater distance. rarely it would lose connection for apparently no reason at all. But the other times, the difficulties were obvious, and simply avoiding those interferences would quickly bring back the music. This is the reason I had to give the product 4 stars. I would be willing to live with the occasional disconnect and give it 5 stars, but the disconnects were enough to annoy me at times and thus 4 stars. In all cases (except going out of range and being disconnected for too long causing a timeout), the earbuds would continue automatically once interference removed.
When signal would be interrupted, though, the earbuds would very kindly fade the music (audio). There was no popping, crackling, blowing out your eardrum, etc noises.
