Among the manual / instructions was an insert called "wearing steps" that I felt was difficult to understand. But I figured it out eventually.

DISCLAIMERS:
disclaimer1: Manufacturer is offering a free wireless charging pad in exchange for a review. I dont usually submit product reviews because everyone else does such a good job, but a free wireless charging pad to use with the earbuds would be nice. I endeavor to be truthful and not let this sway my review.
disclaimer2: This is my first true wireless bluetooth earbuds. I'm just getting into the bluetooth scene, and so dont have a lot of bluetooth product experience to draw from, but I am an electronics geek, and do have some related electronic and PC computer experience and history.

title: My Favorite Commuter Headphones
body:
These Tozo T10 headphones are simply the most ideal commuter headphones I have yet to find. Originally, I tried a couple different kinds and styles of headphones (even bone conductor ones like the AfterShokz Aeropex) and I did end up keeping one pair of Shure ones (for sound quality purposes, (which I also just purchased recently in 2019)), but these were my favorite for everyday use. I also currently own a pair of Sennheiser HD 380 PRO (purchased in 2017) that I do enjoy, but are inconvenient for travel. I also previously owned a pair of SONY MDR-XB90EX (purchased back in 2015) where the left ear bud unfortunately failed on me recently so I discarded them. I still got 4 years of use out of them though soooo not the worst thing ever.

I've only used the Tozo T10s for about a month so far, but I use them every morning/afternoon during the workweek on my commute into DC to work, which is about 50 mins/each way every day so total (1.4hrs/day). The headphones constantly recharge in the travel case and the charge capacity in the travel case lasts about 3 days with headphones plugged in. Basically all I have to do is charge them in the middle of the week and on the weekends. They stay connected impressively well, signal drops off infrequently (like maybe 4 times so far), but not enough to bother me. I test this periodically too just by stopping the music on my phone to talk to someone and then playing music again. It usually only takes a moment for the headphones to recognize it and pick it back up again.

My favorite feature is that they auto-connect to my phone immediately right after taking them out of the travel case so no need to hassle around with buttons. The sound quality is pretty strong for most peeps mostly because the base is totally there, but I will admit that mid-high range is not fine-tuned. My Shure headphones I mentioned earlier (model SE215SPE) are wired in-ear and have much better sound quality, but are also more expensive and such a hassle to deal with fitting in the ears, etc. I only take them on long trips (on an airplane, sitting at a computer, etc). With the Tozo T10 ones, I can slip them on super quick and absolutely love that they actually STAY in my ears.

It's tricky for me to get in-ear headphones that fit really well because I have a tragus piercing in my left ear and a daith piercing in my right ear, which makes me have to wear a size down in my left ear with the plastic ear piece. Yet, both headphones rest super snug in both ears. Overall, these headphones are a fantastic purchase that I'm happy I made.

title: Perfect for my Apple TV!
body: These are perfect for watching your AppleTV if you happen to be one of the folks who can't wear the Apple Airpods because they slip out of your ears.  These earbuds are super comfortable, have excellent sound balance between bass and treble, fantastic range, and excellent battery life. Please see the other reviews because I am not the only one who is extremely pleased with the TOZO. Thank you!

title: Amazing Earbuds
body:
I really enjoy these earbuds. I had purchased the Bose Soundsport Free earbuds and I ended up returning them because they had hurt my ears. I purchased these TOZO T10 earbuds and they are a game changer. They have really good sound quality and an extreme amount of bass. I absolutely love bass, I had three subwoofers in my previous vehicle, and I still had to turn the bass down with an equalizer on my phone. They are wicked "bassy". I washed my truck with them in and got water on them and theyre fine. I wouldn't go submerging them, but getting water/sweat on them is no big deal. They work great.

I do wish that the sound went a little louder, and the bass wasnt as intense. I think the bass overcompensates the sound. If you're looking for a pair of earbuds that are truly wireless, and have great bass, these are the ones for you. They aren't that big either, a big plus to be able to fit the charging case in my pocket. I'm also a fan on the wireless charging. They will work with any wireless charger

title: Wow!
body: My 22 year old daughter "misplaced" my previous pair of blue tooth earbuds so I had to buy a new ones. I got on Amazon and started looking around and found these. They looked cool, were in my price range and had received a lot of great reviews so I bought them. I'm embarrassed to say that I didn't really read much about them before I purchased them. Just another one of my many impulse buys. LOL! When I received the buds and started reading about them I was floored. They're WATERPROOF! That's insane! I haven't tried them in the shower yet, though, so I can't give you a review on how well they work in water. The carrying case is very solid and it needs to be because its' also the charger for the ear buds. You DO have to keep the case charged with a USB but when you need the buds charged you simply place them back in the case and whamo. Way cool! I've not had any problems with the buds moving around or falling out of my ears. Just follow their advice on sizing. Also, way cool! But the best feature is THEY SOUND AWESOME! I'm not an expert on stereo or sound equipment but I know what I like and I LOVE these. Buy them! You won't be sorry.

title: Great sound and worked well
body:
Right earbud will not power on, or charge anymore. Earbud would die after around 2 hours of use after charging all night. I'm a day past the return window and left with a $30 paperweight. Avoid the Tozo brand. No customer service number or website that I could find.

Update 2/28/19: After posting on their Facebook page, they responded and are sending me a new right ear bud.

After getting the replacement, everything works fine and I'm happy with the ear buds.

title: Great for the price
body: I purchased these when they were $46. Sound quality is more than what I expected for wireless buds. Tested them in the shower for durability, and they're awesome--moreso if you don't want to wake up your roommates/significant other when you're trying to hype yourself up for the day. In terms of battery life, they're okay--haven't fully utilized the 3.5hr playback time. The charger box is great when you are out and about and can get a quick charge for your buds. However, the box does lose its charge--I had it fully charged so that I could charge my buds when not in use. After about three days or so of not being in use I brought them with me to the mechanics only to find out that the box lost quite a bit of its charge. So be sure to keep an eye on that before you head out to use these. Overall, I am quite happy with these earbuds and for the price (especially now) you can't beat it. Sound quality, durability and wireless charging (for the box), the Tozo 10s are pretty nice.

title: Great sound!
body: First world problem: They cancel out enough noise that I have to keep removing them when people talk to me. Can't hear a word they're saying. They sound awesome. Btw, don't use as hearing protection for shooting. They block the sound perfectly, that's not the issue. Apparently a magnum load 12 gauge will distort it enough to start ringing. Other than that, these things are great.

title: GREAT PRODUCT
body: OVERALL GREAT PRODUCT, SUPER GOOD SOUND, DEEP BASS. I LOVE HOW THEY AUTOMATICALLY PAIRED THE FIRST TIME AND EVERYTIME I TURN THEM ON THEY CONNECT SUPER FAST TO MY PHONE. I THINK THE COOLEST PART OF THESE BUDS ARE THE SWEET CASE/CHARGING DESIGN. REALLY COOL LOOKING CASE AND THE BUDS GET SUCKED IN BY MAGNETS WHEN CHARGING SO YIOU GET A GOOD SECURE FEELING WHEN YOU PUT THEM IN THERE THAT IF THE CASE GETS JUGGLED AROUND THE BUDS WILL BE SAFE. ITS A GREAT DESIGN THAT IM ODDLY IMPRESSED WITH. GREAT PRODUCT AT A SUPER AFFORDABLE PRICE POINT

title: Solid design, exceeds expectations.
body: I bought these as a simple way to accomplish running with music, without fighting with wired earbuds.  Apple earbuds’ design does not work for my ears and thus I wanted an “in-ear” earbud.  I am very pleased with these.  They come with multiple sizes of ear “adapters” so I was able to easily find a fit.  Sound quality exceeds my expectations, even compared to my standard wired earbuds.  The case is solidly constructed and charges the buds quickly though I have yet to determine specific battery lifetime numbers, I know they will outlast my running endurance.  In short, if I lost these tomorrow, I’d buy another to replace them without hesitation.

title: Tozo 10 great ear buds
body: These ear buds are really great. They have very good sound quailty. They fit is very good once you find the right size tips. They connect to my phone fast. When talking on the phone sound quality is clear, was told that I was clear on the other end. I like how you can get extra charges with the case. The only thing I wish these ear buds had was tap controls, instead of having to push the button in to answer call pause music ect....  Other than that I am very happy with my Tozo 10 was buds

title: Overall they are ok
body: They sound great, I can get 3 hrs of music life out of them. The left will not work without the right one. The left one fits perfectly and doesn't fall out or move, for the life of me I cant get the right one to stay in my ear. I tried all the different size things and even ones from other headphones with no luck. I actually lost the right one while on the riding mower but I turned the mower off and the volume up and found it under the grass. I tried to just use the left and put the right in my bra didnt work, the music just kept cutting in and out like it lost the signal from the right one. I do like how far you can be from your phone, it's a good distance.

title: Perfect for working out
body: I had been using a wired set of earbuds for a couple of years and finally decided to find something wireless and sweat proof.  These earbuds were the perfect pick.  The sound quality is great. I usually run on a treadmill and watch a movie. It’s definitely noise canceling. They fit great using the smallest size. Definitely recommend these!

title: Excellent customer service
body: The sound quality of these earbuds are amazing. The battery life is not that great, I only get between two to three hours of use per full charge. As far as comfort goes, they are extremely comfortable and they stay put well. The main reason for my 5 star review is due to the extremely great customer service that I have experienced. They are quick to return emails and VERY fast to replace a defective device.

title: Disappointed...
body: The sound quality for listening to music is great. The issue I have with these ear buds is when I'm on a call, I can hear everyone perfectly fine but every person I talk to say they can barely hear me. I've tried turning the volume all the way up but I'm always told I sound really far away. Also, it doesn't hold a charge long, which is frustrating. I had such high hopes for these but I'm very disappointed.

title: Great Headphones, better than Bose, 1/4 the price.
body: This is my first pair of wireless headphones. I have tried the airpods and they never stay in my ears. I tried a friends Bose and while they sounded good, the price scared me off. I have a couple pair of TaoTronics wired headphones and absolutely love them so I bought the Taotronics wireless earbuds as well at the same time as the Tozo T10. I tried the Taotronics first and got exactly what I wanted, affordable wireless ear buds that sounded good. I then put in the TozoT10's and was completely blown away at how good they sounded. It was like my ears were woken up. They sounded so good I had to try the Taotronics again to make sure I wasn't hearing things, I wasn't. These headphones sounded much better, I gave my wife the Taotronics and kept the Tozo for myself. The pairing process went exactly as they describe. I had no trouble connecting right to my ipad and iphone. I really feel like the twist motion will keep them in my ears when I workout. I always have a problem with phones falling out and my initial reaction is that these were very secure.

title: Quality Buy
body:
Fabulous find!
Much cheaper than leading brand air pods and GREAT sound! Easy, fast charge as well as water proof and connect to multiple devices. Super comfy fit with sound grip and different sizes. Recommended! 5 stars. Oh and optional 3 yr warranty. Comes with a year warranty.

title: Smart Earphones & great customer service
body:
I was debating between this one (due to high amazon reviews) vs. the airpods.. Obviously, since this is a third of the price I thought I'd give it a shot. I've used it for a week:

pros: fits correctly in the ear and hasn't fallen out yet, sound quality is really good, mic is good when tested with a call, and you can pause podcasts/answer and end calls, and pairing is super easy. I love that when you take it out of the charging case, it automatically turns out and tells you that it is on.

one thing to note is that there's no way to increase/decrease volume once it is on unless I use the phone. However, I am not sure that airpods do that either.

one great note is that the customer service seems great. I had a minor issue, and responded right away. Will update once I have used this a while bit longer!

title: Disconnects constantly
body:
Product constantly disconnects and reconnects. I know it's not my phone because other products are just fine. I would pass on this.

EDIT: Changing this review to a 5 Star as the company has offered to replace the existing ones. I will review them again once I receive the new ones.

title: Light weight with great sound
body: I really like how light they are plus the fit was perfect for me right out the box. For me the fit is great and that makes them sound really good. There’s a lot of choices out there I’m happy with the one I made.

title: Sounds great!
body: Easily pairs. Charging via Q. Great full sound, not tin like, I think the housing helps with the bass.  Stays in ear.  Highly impressed.  Would buy again.

title: Very comfortable.
body: Very comfortable to wear.  Loved how I could change earbud size. Easy to activate to my IPhone .  If  you’re a girl and wear earrings other type of wireless earbuds make clicking noise every time the stem of earbud  would hit your earring. With these there’s no interference with my earrings.  😀

title: Works Great
body: I'm really loving these wireless earbuds. I was skeptical on whether they would stay in while running or jumping, but I haven't had any problems with them slipping out. The earbuds are also pretty good at canceling out surrounding noise and provide excellent sound quality

title: It just works, best tech is when things simply work out of the box.
body: I was not expecting much for $50, its much better than I anticipated.  Works all the time, take no time to sync up with my Galaxy S10 as soon as I take them out of the case.  Sound is very good, they last for hours at a time, the case can recharge them about 3 times before it needs recharging.  Noise cancellation is just ok.  These are worth the money, you will be pleasantly surprised with these earbuds.  Loving them thus far.

title: Surprisingly good!
body:
Surprisingly good! Quality is excellent. Bass is enhanced. Im using Rock eq preset in my iPad.
Not much noise cancellation unless you play your music loud.

title: The Bass!!!
body: I love the bass on these earbuds! Worth it just for that. Convient to use with 2 people and talking to someone and being able to work run and play with them on. Just keep your phone close by. Compared to tons of others, these win in afforadavle working wireless earbuds. Not perfect but they do the job.

title: DONT BUY
body: Honestly I don't know If I have a detective item or that is how it is . It keeps disconnecting from the left side . I dont recommend it

title: Glad I rolled the dice with these wireless earbuds
body: These got good reviews, so I went for it. Glad I did! Great price, they sound really good and there are different ear sizes so you can pick the one that's most comfortable. I find the bluetooth range okay. When I walk around a corner in the house, they do disconnect. Battery life is decent enough. The carry case is dope. Recommend.

title: Fast Charging and Comfortable
body: The earbuds shipped already charged, and worked within minutes of receipt.  Good quality sound, nice resounding base, and microphone was clear for phone calls.  Have used in the shower a couple of times now with no issues.  Very happy with earbuds overall quality of build as well as the charging case.

title: Short life
body: This product started out wonderful; however, after a couple weeks the right ear stopped working all of a sudden.

title: Just what I was looking for!
body: I've only had my earbuds for about a week but I am loving them.  The sound quality is great!  I love that they provide 4 different sizes of tip covers.  I wish the battery lasted a little longer but tend to not want to take them out.

title: Will not disappoint!
body: I have tinnitus in my left ear. I can use these earbuds one at a time, and always have music in my ears (or answer phone calls). Music or white noise really helps the tinnitus throughout the day. I bought them for running, which I still use daily. Charge the case and the earbuds charge once you plop then back into the charger case. I use them daily, 6-9 hours (switching them out to charge). I charge the case which holds the earbuds 2-3 times a week. I really enjoy these and the price was perfect.

title: It has a "Voice Promt" response - Can not disable
body: They're great to tune the world out definitely, but the only thing no one mentioned was the " voice promt Response" that comes on every time. The voice is a soft speaking feamle voice but it became extremely annoying and theirs no way to disable.  So instead of getting another pair, I just returned them and pony up and got the Samsung earbuds that has a soft "beep" instead.  TOZO are very impressive just not for me. PS. I did get 2 of their wirless charger disk and they are so worth it. I can use them on my Samsung Galaxy earbuds and on our iPhone 10.

title: So brilliant.
body: I had a $20 set of bluetooth earbuds purchased a year or two back.  They were on an awkward behind the neck tether and the signal constantly dropped out.  These babies offer true wireless and they never drop the signal from my phone.  They're comfortable and they sound amazing.  And so easy@  They basically auto connect to device when removed from the carry case.  What more do you need?

title: Would not recommend
body:
Sound quality is bad, it's not nearly as 'clean' sounding as my other earbuds. There is a lot of noticeable crackling even at low listening volume (25%).
Range is terrible compared to other earbuds. Best case these have a range of 15 feet (I'm used to 30 feet). These will cut out even with your phone in your pocket.
Fit is good, I was able to run/jog with these in without them falling out.
Controls are very lacking, not being able to control volume/skip songs through the earbuds was disappointing.
Set-up was easy, earbuds came charged and had them working within a few minutes.

I've yet to try the water-proof feature of these, but in all honesty unless you put your phone right at the edge of the pool these wont have the range to be useful.

I can't see any scenario where I would recommend these, even if you don't care much about sound quality the terrible range and lack of useful controls do not make these worth it.

title: Fantastic Bluetooth Earbuds!
body: These have been great so far. I was worried about the weight and the sizing, as I have rather small ears, but neither have been an issue. These are comfortable and sound great. The charging case is awesome too. I love how the earbuds just snap in place and automatically turn off/on.

title: the best bang for your buck
body: I original bought a pair of these earbuds and loved them straight out the box. the sound they produce was crisp and clear with nice deep bass. you can hear nice clear sound even over the lawn mower. the product is awesome you can't go wrong , and the it gets better. I actually had a defected pair and I was a little late to return thru Amazon but the Tozo Customer Service team took care of me. they replaced my defect pair with a brand new one, and evey step of the way they have the nicest and fastest customer serivce. they wanted to make sure I was 100% happy and Thanks to the Tozo customer service I am. I would recommend this product to any one and I will be a repeat customer. great job tozo, keep bring us great product at great prices and that awesome customer service, you can't go wrong.

title: Ok head BT headphones
body:
These are ok. In the past couple of days of using them, I began to see some flaws in the design of the product. The product page says is Ip8, but at the bottom of the charging case, it says Ip68. But regardless of the Ip rating, it did well with sweat during my runs. The stock bud tips were ok, ended up switching them out for the MPow Flame ear tips cause the stock ones didn't feel all that secure in my ear while in use. One big gripe I have is that it does not automatically connect to my phone. I would literally have to go in the bt settings to connect to it ( I cleared out all of my bt connections to see if that would fix it, it didn't. Waste of time) and my phone is either in my hand or inner coat pocket. For $50, I would expect it to automatically connect.

Pros - lightweight, stays in place, sound quality is good, good battery life.
Cons - charging case is bulky (not very pocketable), does not really feel secure when running/walking, would always have to adjust with stock ear tips on, does not automatically connect to phone when the device is close by, unable to use as a mono headset w/o the right device beeping.

6/25/19 Edit: So after a couple of months of use, it finally happened. The right pod popped out of my ear and on to the subway tracks during my morning commute to work. I was using the stock ear tips as well.

title: Unique earbuds backed up by good customer support (edit)
body:
This appears to be the only reasonably priced truly waterproof, truly wireless ear buds that you can wear in the shower and such. Unfortunately the microphone quality makes it useless for calls, and the company apparently has poor quality control because the first one developed a strange issue with the audio coming out very quiet on one side, and the replacement device the company provided has a weird buzzing in response to certain frequencies, which is rather annoying and makes for very poor audio quality overall. I was going to give them another shot with a return but the return window expired before I got around to it, so I guess I'm left with a decent and usable wireless, waterproof earbud set with poor audio quality of both the microphone and sound drivers.

Edit: I discovered that even though the Amazon return period expired, the Tozo warranty still had me covered. A few emails and a return postage later and they say they will be sending me a replacement! Added 2 stars.

title: Good product and fantastic value
body: Got these a few days ago and I love them.  For the price the sound quality is excellent, they fit my ear very well and don't fall out at the gym.  I also like that I can just use one ear piece and leave the other one in the charger.  At this price you won't cry too much if you lose one which is always the downside to the tiny wireless earbuds.  I would get these again for sure.

title: Great for Running, the Gym and Drowning out Loud Coworkers.
body:
When shopping around for new bluetooth headphones, I came across these TOZO T10s.  It was important to me that 1) they stayed in my ears while being active. 2) That the sound was great and 3) Noise cancelling was highly effective.  After having these for 2 weeks, I can confidently state that these have checked all those boxes.  It is important to get the right bud size to ensure a tight fit and sound profile.  You may have to test out the different sizes to do so.  Another nice feature is the auto connect process.  Simply just pull the buds out of the charging case and they turn on and connect.  It is quite fast and impressive.

I give the TOZO T10 a 5 star rating for meeting my needs. Some "nice to haves" would be track and volume control (it does have pause/play) but definitely not a deal breaker.

title: They are everything they advertise!
body: I ordered the earbuds and got them the next day and they are all that I hoped they would be! They fit my ears with the smallest fitting and sound great when I put hem in I can’t hear a thing! They both sync perfectly and when you just want to use one it works great and if you need them both the connection is seamless. I am so glad I decided to get these it was a great choice!

title: Great Product and Service!
body:
One of them stopped working after I dropped the case. Fortunately it comes with 1 year warranty so I contacted the customer service email and I was pleasantly surprised. It took only about 10 minutes to get a response and they were very friendly, offering a free replacement.

As for the actually sound quality (referring to before I broke them) and product details, they were great! The sound for music is very clear, and the battery life is pretty good. I can get though a day with moderate use. I used them at the gym recently and they stayed connected even when I went a bit away to get a wipe for the machine. I also really appreciated the size options for the squishy part, as it helped them stay on.

Overall would recommend!

title: Great wireless headphones!
body: I’m really impressed with these headphones! The sound quality is fantastic and they stay securely in my ears. The charging box works very well and is super convenient for transport and storage. My friend was jealous about the price that I paid vs the Apple headphones that he has. I would definitely recommend this product for purchase!

title: Very good quality.
body: Very good for the price. it does have a great sound quality with bass and nice isolation. Well, it does have some transmission problems that happens sometimes only once for about a second, but sometimes it repeats more than once... Although I'm very glad to have it.

title: AMAZING
body: I was very leary of buying because of price; even with the great reviews. SO happy I did!! Great quality, sound and easy in general

title: Light and fits right
body: I have to say I was very surprised how light and comfortable these earbuds were. The sound quality was a lot more than I expected. The bass tones were rich and I could not hear any other noise around me. It is very convenient that there are multiple sizes for earpieces. my wife and I have different sized ears and it's convenient to interchange them between the larger ones and a smaller size. the wireless charging of the case was it unexpected surprise. This is definitely a good price for the value of earbuds that you get.

title: Not truly waterproof - do not recommend for lap swimming
body:
The product description says that these can be submerged up to 1 meter. However this is blatantly not true if you would actually like to continue listening to music during those moments of submersion.
I specifically bought these to use while swimming laps but my first time out they were a miserable failure. The second I would dip my head below water, they would immediately disconnect and the only way to reconnect is to go back through my phone. This obviously does not work for anyone who is actually trying to swim laps. I have tried since but have had zero success. If you see the pamphlet above, the headphones may be able to be submerged a meter without breaking but they certainly do not play music or function in any meaningful way.
Unfortunately, by the time I finished trying to make this product work for me, the return window had closed so I am stuck with these ear buds. Wanted to save others from this same fate if at all possible.

title: Great Headphones with Quality Sound
body:
These headphones have great sound and completely block out the noise around me.  I can't wait to try them during hunting season while in a tree stand.  The multiple sizes for ear inserts is a bonus as well.

The only thing that I would like to improve is the battery life for the ear buds.  Would like for them to have a couple more hours of running time as I use my head phones for everything including work conference calls.  Outside of that they work as described and are great for what I use them for.

I even wore them in the shower and they worked perfectly fine.

title: I recommend
body: I really like these earbuds and recommend them. They have great sound quality and I love the charging case they come in. I also had a problem with one of the earbuds and they went out of there way to ship me a new pair. Great customer service. I recommend if you like great quality product and great customer service

title: A pair of high quality earbuds with magical sound that defies the price!
body: I have been postponing purchasing a pair of earbuds because I have always felt that the quality of sound was not up to par with wired headphones or blutooth headsets. Not the Tozo T10's. Every action from taking it out of its charging case to syncing it with my iPhone was easy peasy. Crystal clear highs with punchy lows with quiet passages. Couldn't ask for anything better. Well, at times it's difficult to know which is the right and the left because of the dark print on the buds. I'm being too picky because there isn't anything to fault with these exceptional blutooth earbuds. Highly recommended!

title: So far great!
body:
Initial impression: Sound quality and fit are great, there are several sizes and different shapes of the earbuds, so it's easy to get a comfortable fit. I tested my earbuds sound quality on a large variety of genres from Dubstep to Trance, Classical, Rock and Roll, and Country as I like basically everything, and the sound was great all around. Bass was a little weak as you'd expect from any earbuds, but better than most of the earbuds I've tried including the wired ones.

I'll update on other aspects like the durability, noise cancellation, and signal strength once I've been able to test them out in different circumstances for a while.

title: Sound good, pairing was a breeze, now wait to see if they last.
body: I got these to use in my car, to replace a wired set which is quite a bit bulkier and a bit more trouble to use. I liked hte idea that I could just remove one of these and have it automatically turn on and connect. I already have a wireless charging unit in my car for my phone, so recharging the base station will not be a problem. All in all, I'm very happy with the purchase after two weeks of limited use.

title: Won't stay synced with each other
body: Left would not stay synced with right.  Very disappointed.  I have $30 ear buds that stay synced well with each other and they are also completely binaural.  Makes me think that these are not truly BT 5.0 in both earbuds like they should be.

title: Reasonabe Price, Good Quality, and Great Service
body: I purchased this product in April. The sound quality is great and offers good noise cancellation. The earbuds need tweaking as one of the buds wouldn't stay in my right ear. But, I tried couple of the rubber fixtures to find the best that worked for me. Eventually, I figured it out and it is awesome. Unfortunately, the device stopped working in June and I requested a warranty replacement. They contacted me right away and didn't even request me to the send the old device back, they replaced it on time. The service was great (thank you, Katherine!). Great product, recommend highly.

title: Good buy
body: My mom had some of these and really like them so I thought I would try them. They have multiple sizes of end pieces that come with them which is great. As long as you find the right fit for your ears they stay in place while exercising.

title: This was an ALMOST perfect purchase
body:
When I recently purchased these earbuds,  I was looking for great sound for my music, easy connectivity, water resistance, Bluetooth 5.0, and a very clear mic for calls. And while I did find that a few of these needs were definitely met, I was extremely disappointed with the mic and charging capacity.

Pros...
The connection was pretty easy once I added the Bluetooth name to my Android phone. Each time I took out the earbuds from the charger after turning on my Bluetooth, they easily connected with each other.
These earbuds have GREAT stereo sound...very clear and rich sound which I think could rival higher priced earbuds.
The carrying charger case is a great size, very compact and the transparent lid allows you to see the charging lights while closed.
The earbuds stay put and come with 3 different size buds that should be good for any ear size.

CONS...
The mic...I called several different people to see how the calls sounded on both ends and ALL could barely hear me. I heard them fine on my end but it doesn’t really matter if no one can hear me. I did try putting the earbuds back into the charger and reconnecting to Bluetooth but it didn’t help. This is such a disappointment because if it weren’t for the poor call mic (and 1 other issue), I would have been SO happy with these!
The other problem is that the charging lights and possibly the charger itself was very inconsistent. The directions say that when charged, the lights on the earbuds will go from red to off, but every time they went off and I removed them for a second and put them right back, they would remain red. So are they charged or not? Very confusing. Also, when using the buds, the lights weren’t always the color they should be. For example, the dominant bud (Right) should continuously blink fast (blue and red) but sometimes it would just be red.
The battery/charger case....The charging case has 4 blue lights that, when charged, should be all solid. However, after fully charging the case, I used the earbuds for a short time then put them back and no light came on at all. So I’m not sure if the case was charged or not. I found myself spending way too much time being on “light patrol”. Crazy.

Final thoughts, it’s possible that the earbuds that were sent to me were defective, and if this is the case, I would be very willing to try another one. I really wish it worked! I guess if you are looking to just have great music quality then you will be very happy you are willing to put up with the dodgy battery.

title: Lasted during my 6hr flight
body: This is my first set of wireless earbuds, so i completely went off of former reviews when i decided to make this purchase. I do not have any regrets. I travel quite a bit and they are convenient for airplane travel. I was able to use them during my most recent 6hr flight and they lasted the entire flight before they announced in my ear that it needed to be charged. I am pleased with them thus far and for the price point I honestly cannot complain.

title: T10 compared to T8
body:
T10-
-Great sound
-Very waterproof

T8
-decent sound
-very light

The T8 has a 90 degree design compared to the T10 130ish degree  design.  The T8 stays In my ear better but you can cram the T10 in a lot deeper so you can really hear that superior sound quality.
The T10 seem about twice as massive as the T8, while still being nearly the same actually size.  Obviously the larger elements require bigger batteries and they’ve crammed all that in a ultra compact size.  This extra weigh sometimes make the T10 feel less natural then the T8

Overall the T10 is far superior, yet has its own flaws.  I would only recommend the T10 over the T8 if your interested in the high waterproof rating or deeper bass capabilities.

—Update—

After a few weeks I’ve noticed a few other things

The T10 battery warning voice plays layered over the input audio, rather then completely coving the audio like the T8 does.  This is great because you don’t miss any of your audio.  I really like this upgraded feature.

The T10 magnetic case is great because the ear buds don’t turn on until you take them out of the case, unlike the T8 that turn in as soon as you open the lid, which causes them to try to connect to each other.  This was an inconvenience for me since I often use only one bud at a time.

And since I only use one bud at a time, The (R) and (L) decal on each are essential for knowing which channel im trying to connect.  The T8 has some low quality ink that rubs off within a few weeks.  The T10 is completely different and will not rub off.  Much better

Battery life of both sets is not great, but it’s definitely what one should expect with such a small unit.  Just Keep the case charged and handy and it’s not a big deal.

I seem to always have trouble with the left channel not wanting to connect after a few months of use, But considering that these cost about the same as a set of premium wired earbuds (that I seem to always destroy with in a week) I’m pretty happy with the longevity of these.

I still stand by My original recommendation.  The T8 is good enough for most, but the T10 is arguably better

title: Easy to use & wonderful sound quality
body:
The earbuds were very easy to use and pair with my iPhone. After you pair the right earbud the first time, it’ll auto-pair both earbuds to your phone every time you take it out of the case.
If you want you can even use just one earbud at a time.

As for the sound quality, the bass is amazing!  I mainly chose this brand for the sound quality reviews, the price and the fact that it’s waterproof in case I drop it in water. I haven’t tried it in the shower yet, but I’m planning on using it while relaxing in the bathtub and by the pool or seaside.

title: Great sound for the price.
body: I bought these looking for a cheaper set of true wireless headphones with decent sound quality. I read a few reviews and decided to try these out. I have not been disappointed. Most of the use has been with my laptop listening to music while studying and they do the job well. The sound quality is impressive for such small earbuds and they are fairly comfortable to wear for a couple of hours at a time. The quality is good, the buds themselves feel solidly put together and the case is magnetic so when you place the buds inside they snap into place and begin charging and the lid is also magnetic so it stays closed.

title: Beeps if both headphones aren't connected
body: I wanted to be able to use just one side at a time while at work but these beep for several minutes until I connect the second ear bud. Sometimes sound cuts out of the left ear bud. If i charge the whole set and unplug it overnight the charge drains by the time I wake up. I always seem to be charging it.

title: High convenience, low fidelity
body: Unfortunately, as another reviewer stated these headphones crackle/crunch during intense parts of music at any volume when connected to my S7 Edge. The bass is nice and the convenience can't be beat but I would not recommend these headphones for anyone interested in high fidelity music playback. Also I have to keep my phone in my right pocket or they constantly drop and regain signal. I think if you bought them at the lightning deal price (which they seem to hit every week or two) you'd likely be pleased with them. I made the mistake of buying them at full price on impulse and am regretting it. If you aren't dissuaded by the sound quality and connection issues at least add them to your wish list and wait for the notification of the lightning deal.

title: Really great Headphones, Perfect for motorcycling & working out
body:
First off, they're light and compact. They come with several earbud sizes (standard practice I know) and I found the small ones fit nice and snug in my ear canal. They appear to be watertight and sealed, time will tell of course but first impressions are these will not succumb to sweaty workouts any time soon.

I also tried them out on my motorcycle last weekend, and they fit comfortably inside my helmet. Very good sound on the open highway. I would note though that the headphones do not fit flush against my ear (understandable) so they do get pulled out when taking my helmet off. That's a small gripe though overall.

Finally, the little charging station they come with is also very slick and can be charged via wireless charger.

Overall, $50 well spent, especially if you don't feel like making Sony any richer than they already are.  I highly recommend. =)

title: Great value for money
body: I use this for music and podcasts. It has been working well with my Samsung phone. The charging case is not the slimmest, but is still small enough to fit in a jacket pocket so I can charge the earbuds when they're not in use. The earbuds get the job done and are a lot more convenient than wired earbuds. Great value for the price!

title: The replacement pair worked so much better!
body:
My first pair was defective, it would constantly beep even when it was paired. But that’s why i love amazon...i just click on replace and the replacement pair was on its way, even before i sent the original back! I’m glad i let them replace them instead of attempting a new brand. This replacement pair is AMAZING.

Pros:
-The bass is so different from my original pair! The sound is BEAUTIFUL! I’m a hip hop girl, so bass is so important for me. I also listen to all my chemistry/organic chem lectures on my earbuds so i need different tones from my buds. These are great!!
-The small ear pads fit my tiny ears perfectly. I’m glad to see these companies trying to include us small eared customers in their concerns. The airbuds that apple makes are way too big for me. These get right up in my ear and give you the whole experience of the quality of these buds!

Cons:
-Battery life is not so great. When i use these for my school work they don’t last long enough. However, all of the wireless earbud manufacturers all have similar battery life. So it’s a problem as a whole, when buying wireless buds. Unfortunately i cannot wear wired earbuds because i also use them when I’m scrubbed in for surgery so i can’t have wires hanging out of my head. It’s a sacrifice i will have to make.
-The manual is so short and isn’t well written. Your best bet is to find YouTube videos if you need to adjust any settings.
-charger cord is SHORT. So if your outlets are on the floor or wall, the cord will be way too short for you. If you’re going to use your laptop or a battery-pack for charging then you’ll be fine.

title: Disappointing, even for the price
body:
Pro
-Low cost

Con
 -Sound quality is pretty bad
 -Case will ONLY charge with a 0.5a USB port. Does not work with most standard charging blocks
 -Case and earbuds will not charge simultaneously. You need to charge the case, then the earbuds
 - Can’t find quite the right fit for them to stay in the ear
 - Microphone picks up too much background noise and is unusable outdoors with even the lightest wind

Conclusion
- Wanted to like them, but it was a waste of time and money

title: Fantastic value...great performance vs low price
body: Absolutely a fantastic value.  The earbuds are comfortable, extremely convenient and sound fantastic.  Definitely worth every penny.  I often use them while mowing the lawn and they are perfect.  They cancel most of the noise from my tractor and sound great.  Couple that with the fact that they are much lighter and cooler than my Parrot Zik over the ear headphones that I used to use, and they are a winner.  If you are looking for a set of earbuds, do yourself a favor and pick these up.  A great value.

title: Great sound d but doesn’t auto-reconnect to phone.
body: Great sound quality and build. Unfortunately they don’t seem to pair automatically with my iPhone XS. I’ve owned several different Bluetooth headsets and earbuds and this is the first that doesn’t automatically connect to the phone after the initial pairing. I have to go into the Settings app on the phone and click the Tozo T10 under Bluetooth 90-95% of the time. Initially I thought this was how the product was designed, but once in a while it does connect. I did try forgetting the headset and re-pairing but same deal. The sound quality is great and the Qi charging case is also great. Battery life seems fine.

title: Great sound quality
body: These are great. As many other reviewers have said, I must have small ears because most ear buds fall out. These are nice because they have the different sizes. When running, I still had to adjust them from time to time, but they fit pretty well. The sound is great. They can be quite noise-cancelling if sitting still, but they fit so snugly, then when running, the sounds travels mechanically through so you can hear your feet hitting the ground. I just didn't put them in quite so snug, which is probably why I had to adjust them from time to time.

title: Absolutely LOVE them.
body:
I have had these headphones for about a little over a month now. I love them. I've used them in the pool, shower, around the house, and on the go. They last a long time and can switch out. Both buds link to the phone both separately and together. I use one at a time and switch them out when one dies. The only thing that I would improve is the microphone. When on the phone with them my husband has mentioned he has a hard time hearing me sometimes. But I absolutely love the product and would definitely recommend them.

Update: I had a problem with my left bud and emailed the support team. The emailed me back right away and replaced my ear bud for free.

title: Amazing Buds
body: I. LOVE. THESE. EARBUDS. Not to mention they will save my marriage...kinda kidding about that, but they'll help. My wife and I share an office and she's easily distracted by sounds, so if I have to listen to something on my computer, she complains. I've been through a number of headphones,earbuds, etc., but none have been as comfortable and reliable and barely noticeable as the TOZO T10s. They're fantastic. Great sound, very good noise cancelling, but not enough to not let me hear my wife if she has a question, and so comfortable I almost don't notice they're in. Plus, they're easy to connect. I keep them right on my desk in their convenient holder. Can't think of anything I'd change. They're great.

title: Excellent product and fast delivery.  Fantastic sound!
body: The pairing process is effortless and once I found the right ear pads, the sound is fantastic.  Great product, well made and great sound.

title: Earbuds for working out
body: I got these for when I workout... I like how they turn on as soon as I pop them in. They automatically sync in and link up with my phone.  A quick dial of my music selection and I’m in the zone.  Sturdy and tough, they have a good battery life and the charging case fits in the palm of my hand.  A good buy if this is what you are looking for.

title: Goodbye Cords!
body: I could not work out, run, or even shave while using my old earbuds with the 6' long cord; eventually I'd accidentally rip the buds out of my ears with my moving hands.  I'm so happy with this product - super easy to connect to my ipod/iphone, and fits perfectly into my ears for wireless listening.  The best part about it is, I can use them in the shower! No joke. I live in an apartment complex, and they kind of disapprove of blasting your music. Now it's not a problem, as I can listen to whatever I want, wherever I want.  Highly recommended!

title: Great Sound Quality
body: I was initially very impressed when I received these headphones. They paired quickly and the sound quality was better than expected. The soft tips act like an insulator and do a good job of cancelling outside noise. I also purchased the wireless charging mat from Tozo, and I'm happy with how the two items work together. I am finding some tweaks with the pairing of the left ear bud, but Tozo's customer service was very prompt to respond to my query, so I'm planning to stick with this product.

title: Will not stay in your ears!
body: I can't even walk at a moderate pace without these falling out - if you are sitting, they are ok but any movement and they fall out.  These are very expensive to not fit properly

title: The sound quality Is the best hands down!!!!
body: I simply love these earbuds!!!! I’m in the healthcare field and using your phone or having visible earphones are frowned upon. Well I tested them out at work yesterday and no one knew I had them on! I just recently used them for my morning run and I’m soooooo impressed by the sound quality!!! They are amazing! I beyond satisfied with my purchase and I have already recommended them to my co workers, friends and family.

title: Worth it!!!
body: Great headphones! they stay in my ear and work extremely well.  I was having some problems with the connectivity of the headphones but once I emailed the company they were extremely helpful and very accommodating. I would highly recommend these to anyone looking for high quality sound and an overall solid wireless earbud experience.

title: Would not recommend.
body: They fall off even if you use different ear pieces to adjust fit. Sound ok. Callers say you sound far away. Good concept needing improvement.

title: Sound is good but the microphone is horrible
body: Sound is great but bought these earphones to also be able to talk on the go. I've tried on several occasions, with different people in different locations to have a conversation through the phone and no one could hear me. I have to remove one of the earphones and hold it up to my mouth in order to be heard. Completely beats the purpose and really frustrating.

title: Bad battery life
body: I like the case. But the battery life sucks compared to other wireless ear buds I’ve had

title: Buy these headphones they don’t disappoint
body: These are GREAT headphones for quality and price. In the morning I pop them in my ear while taking a shower and listen to audiobooks, when I get to work, (I work in a large area with many distraction and people loudly talking) I pop them in and I am able to cancel all the noise. The sound quality is full and very loud with music, I cannot put the volume all the way up, I have a wireless charging pad so I can easily place the case on it charging pad. Sometimes i just use one bud in the ear so that I can swap them out and use them all day but either way you can let wrong with these headphones

title: Updated after 3 months: Wireless charger bribe for 5 ⭐.  Does the job.
body:
Updated after 3 months: You might wonder why this has so many 5 🌟 reviews. The seller emails after you buy for a bribe wireless charger for 5 star 🌟 review. Who doesn't want free.

Now to the ear buds. It's not fantastic, not bad either.

- Comfortable and does not fall off.
- Negative: Blue tooth pairing never pairs automatically. I always every time have to click on my saved TOZO T10 to pair. I tried everything according to instructions and reviews. Doesn't pair automatically. I use a note 8. My Jay bird and anker pairs automatically without problem.
- Magnetic case is good and comfortable to fit in pocket.
- I have no idea of turning it off yet. No power off button legible to know. Let me know if you find out.
- Holds charge for moderate use. Won't be an issue.
- Call: Does the job. Caller mentioned doesn't have a huge disturbance.
- Music: Quality is good. Good bass and loudness. I like this.
- Negative:  Having said that the connection is poor. The song drops off so many times with your phone just in your pocket. I have to keep it behind pocket for better connection. This is 2019 and this is what is in this product. Bluetooth connection should be good without interruption for at least couple feet.

title: Constantly drops connection
body: I have owned these for a little over a month now, using them for phone calls, meetings, and music from my laptop and iPhone.  On the PC they constantly drop audio and I have to swap output devices in and out to get them to restore audio.  On both the iPhone and the PC the left channel is very unstable, sometimes I will go 30 minutes solid, other times it just constantly looses connection cutting in and out.  Over sound is good, as is the battery life, but the connection issues make these a no go, if I was still in return window these would be going back.  As it is I am going to have to buy something else because these are just not usable.

title: Careful if you shower with them.
body:
Expected a wireless earbud device that could operate in both stereo and mono. Unfortunately it is not the case. If you turn on one ear bud they both turn on. For my particular work, that is a deal breaker.

What I did experience? They pair together very quickly. I assume with the ipx7 they can handle moderate water. I would not try to swim with these buds. Might be able to survive short submersion in water. But they will have to dry out for optimal audio quality.

Also expect maybe 4-8 weeks of usefulness if you do subject them to water. Great that Amazon has a good return policy.

Edit : the company has fantastic customer support. They got in touch and fixed my problem. 3 stars easily becomes 5.

title: TOZO BLUETOOTH Review
body: I have really enjoyed this product since I have received it. The nosies quality is excellent and the battery life can last for the whole day. The only issue I’ve had with this product is sometimes when wearing the head phones it seems like there are certain dead spots when listening to things. I find that the left headphone flickers in and out with the sound. I never have the device it’s connected to to further than the instructions specify but the headphone always seems to flick out.

title: Great sound quality but bad pairing
body:
I got this headphones for hands free calling. They work great for listening to music or audio but the pairing has been a nightmare. Sounds quality is good and so is the battery life. I gave two stars because the pairing is the hardest part. Here are my general issues:

1. Auto pairing with phone: I was not able to connect these automatically to my phone. Sometimes, I paid one headset auto and then have to restart the headset to pair both. It requires me to turn off Bluetooth and then turn back on.

2. Pairing both headset: pairing both headset is a nightmare. I had to restart both headset multiple times to pair both headset. Then something times I have to restart the headset to make it work.

title: Great TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds
body: Great earbuds!  The fit is very secure, the noise canceling is a welcome addition compared to my last pair of earbuds.  The battery life on the earbuds is fantastic and the charging case is wonderful.  I have recommended these to my friends and co-workers.  A great price for a great pair of earbuds.

title: Too expensive for what they provide
body:
Tl;Dr: With the static, bulky size in the ear, average sound quality, but surprisingly good bass, these should be at MOST $35, not $50.

I have read elsewhere that Tozo offers customers a free wireless charging pad in exchange for a 5-star review. I have not received this offer since getting the earphones a day ago, but I think this is a terrible practice that should be stopped by Amazon (but I know it won't).

These earphones are okay. They take about 15 seconds from the moment I take them out from their case to pairing to my phone. Sound quality is lacking, with lots of white noise at all levels of volume. This is mostly okay for me for what I mostly plan to use them for (riding on my motorcycle and working out). I have not used these to run or do other workouts yet. While riding my motorcycle to work today, I had just the right earphone in inside my helmet and it did a pretty good job of canceling wind noise and I could hear my music clearly. The bass is actually pretty good! I produce audiobooks occasionally and while it is not V-MODA or Bose quality bass, it gives a nice depth to music and podcasts. In a quiet environment, phone call quality is also surprisingly clear on both ends. However, you can only use the right earphone during calls.

They're kind of bulky. This doesn't affect the sound quality, but it does make it a bit harder to stay in the ear. Even when doing nothing, I find myself adjusting them often. I will continue to experiment with the other sizes provided. I cannot comment on battery life yet, but I will update when I decide it is good or bad.

Overall, there are better options. I will keep these for another week, and if I find any more problems, I will likely return them and get something else.

title: Comfortable, easy to pair and great sound quality
body: The headphones fit my ears very well. They come with multiple ear buds and should accommodate everyone. The charge case is high quality and uses magnets to 'snap' the headphones into place. Charging is seamless. The noise quality is also impressive for such small and fairly priced item. I was surprised at how well they worked!

title: Great product
body: Can’t say enough good things about this. Sound quality is WONDERFUL!!!

title: Sound is hollow and tinny. Hardly any bass. Rubber tips are a pain to install.
body: I'm not sure what the other reviewers are smoking, or maybe they're deaf. The sound quality of these things is inferior to a cheap pair of wired earbuds I bought roughly 15 years ago. Also, the rubber tips are a pain to try to get on. I actually find these earbuds to be somewhat uncomfortable to wear. I can't recommend them.

title: Unbelievably comfortable
body: Very comfortable, easy to pair, and the battery life is good. Sound quality is amazing. Love these buds. Normally I find earbuds to be uncomfortable, but not these. I can wear them all day long and they come with multiple sizes to suit everyone. Great product

title: Small Ear Fail
body: These are great in all aspects of sound, battery, noise cancellation, all I wish was a smaller ear bud size. Gave them to my husband and am on the search for new ones for myself. Found another good pair from another company that fit well but they don’t allow me to listen with just one ear bud... *sigh* TOZO, just make one size smaller buds please!

title: Try the sizes for your fit
body: Easily falls out. Sound is great. Not sure if mine are holding a charge anymore. Have had them about a month now. Read the instructions when you set them up. Always connect the right on Bluetooth, not left.

title: Worth the price!!
body: I bought this earphones to use at work for conference calls linked to my notebook or cellphone. The sound quality is clear as well the sound isolation. Combined with the wireless changing it makes an good pack to have by your side. The only area to inprove is related to the microphone as other people hearing me have reported the they had difficulty to hear me .

title: Extremely choppy audio from under 5 ft away.
body:
These are essentially useless earbuds. They cut in and out so much I would say their uptime for audio is 60% and this is from a few feet away with no obstructions.  I should also note that I also received a wonderful offer for a free wireless charger for the low cost of giving this 5 stars.  How many of the reviewers took them up on this I wonder?

As for looks and feel: They look pretty good but aren't really comfortable in my ears. Thankfully they don't work so my ears are fine.

title: Perfect first wireless ear buds that aren't too expensive!
body:
These are my first pair of wireless ear buds. I wear them at work and I bought them after I got annoyed having to take out my headphones every time I got up from my desk because I had to keep my phone plugged in. Don't get a new phone, get new ear buds.

My son picked these out for me because he saw that I struggled with less tactic ear buds. With these, I don't have to try to figure out where to wave my finger at to get the song to pause or answer my phone. I just have to press the buds and not only can I control what I'm doing, I know what I'm doing.

The sound quality is really good, and I love the case that charges them. I've only had them for a few days, but I really like them.

title: Quality bang for buck.
body: I had to return the first set due to the left ear bud constantly disconnecting. It's still an issue with the new pair, but I've always had issues with headphones cutting in and out so that may be a problem with me? I'm not sure. Anyways I'm happy with what I have for the price. They're simple with only 1 button, but the sound is fantastic. They're definitely sweat proof. The battery life is pretty good considering the size. They're super light. They stay in my ear no matter how hard I try to shake them out. Overall I'm happy. This was money well spent. If they go the distance and last a year then I'll say I have no regrets in purchasing them. I will definitely recommend others to buy them.

title: Great headphones! Also seriously doubt they have Noise Cancelling
body: First full charge got me right around 3 hours, although, i will say the music was loud. The sound quality is excellent. You'll definitely need to modify the equalizer settings, however, as the treble was pretty intense.

title: Great so far.
body: So far, so good! Fit nicely, paired right away. The long cord is a little odd. Not sure how I'm supposed to wear it, but it's nice to have.

title: Quality is top notch
body: My old Bluetooth was a wear around the neck model and just the ear buds in the ears. The weight of the Tozo T10 model in my ears a little heavier than used to but getting rid of the choker around my neck a good trade off. Quality of the Tozo T10 seems to be top notch in build and quality. Purchased to drive wirelessly and to listen to tv shows so my wife can read in peace. Overall a product I would recommend highly.

title: Great earbuds
body:
Just remember, it's the Tozo-R and not the Tozo-L when you connect on bluetooth. Great earbuds, great sound and super comfortable (how they fit and how they stayed in were super important criteria for my selection). They come in a neat charging bank that gets about three charges (enough to last a whole day at the office).

When I have these things in, I can't hear anyone else in the office. People have to come and tap me on the shoulder to get my attention. It's absolutely a must if you need to zone in and get some work done.

title: Superior Sound Quality For The Price.
body: I ordered the TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 specifically for use at the gym. The setup took 15 seconds as I was able to pair my iPhone X to the earbuds without any problem. The sound quality was better than my Beats By Dre Earbuds! Tozo must read customer complaints regarding general wireless earbud use because they include several different earbud sizes to choose to insure a perfect fit. Highly recommend for the price point.

title: Oh so close to perfection!
body: So I wanted desperately to be able to give these a 5 star. And I would have if it wasn't for the bit of lag you get between the moving mouths in the video and then the actual words you hear in the ear buds. It's minor - and if you're exercising and not focusing on the screen, you won't notice. But if you're on a treadmill and you're watching TV to distract because let's face it, us normal people are dying while we're exercising and that tiny screen is the only bit of distracting I have from sheer passing out - it's hard to stay focused on living when I can see the lips moving then hear the sound seconds later. So I wish I could figure it out - I wish I could have a pair that works maybe better. Because then I would so give these a 5 star because they sound amazing and fit perfectly. Best fit of a pair of ear buds ever. And I LOVE the look. :(

title: Good quality earbuds for a great price
body:
So far the ear buds work very well. Pairing is indeed very simple. You pair with the Right side since that is the main one, and when you take it out of the charging box, it'll pair up automatically with each other.

Battery life is really good and the charging case is super convenient. The case is also qi-wireless charging compatible which is super useful and you don't have to deal with wires. It also has neat magnetic lid and place for the ear buds that snap the buds into place with ease. The battery life on the earbuds are long enough for most regular usage (3+ hours) where you don't have to hassle with charging every time.

Sound quality is quite good. The bass is a lot stronger than other earbuds I've had and the music is clear though it.
I did have some distance issues with the bluetooth. This might vary between phones but I couldn't use it further than 5 feet.

Overall, very happy with the product!

title: prettty good. Me quedo satisfecho.
body:
Battery life is really top notch.
A lot more base than I expected.
If the earbuds keep falling out, try on a different bud size and remember to twist them backwards once they’re in your ear 👍
Sometimes the earbuds will come a bit loose when running and some noise canceling ability is lost when the seal is broken between the the bud and your ear if that makes sense...just re-adjust them.
Overall great build quality and the case is top notch. Would buy again.

title: Love them
body: So far they are great. No problems. Very easy to connect and I love the wireless charging. They sound great and look nice in my ears. Was a great buy and great price

title: Good value. Wish battery life was more than 3.5
body: Had these for almost a year now. Battery life is right at 3.5 when I’m watching movies. Wish it was closer to 5 like AirPods but at the price difference you could buy 2 and swap them out to charge and still have money left. I have small ear canals and these fit great and my ears aren’t sore after. I have another set from another brand and those won’t pair well. Glad I went with these.

title: Quality Not Reliable
body: I liked these earbuds just ok- sometimes they worked AMAZINGLY with great sound quality and no cuts/drop outs with the connection. Other times, it sounded almost like a radio static in the background and bluetooth connection would cut in and out so often I couldn't make it through a song without multiple interruptions. So when they were functioning properly, they were pretty great, but they weren't reliable. Also, there is no volume control to the earbuds themselves and the lowest volume setting was louder than I'd like sometimes for working in quiet spaces like the office. Ultimately I returned these ear buds because they were not reliable.

title: Best True Wireless Earbuds For The Gym
body:
I have been using various "wireless" earbuds for the past 2-years, primarily for use in the gym and subways. Since my gym sessions last between 2-3 hours each day, I can get pretty sweaty and need wireless buds that will not get affected by the moisture; they also need to be comfortable and stay in place while running and doing various exercises. I have been using the TOZO T10s for a couple of weeks now and they have been absolutely amazing! I use the largest of the three bud sizes and they fit perfectly and never feel as though they will fall out - even when running for an hour. The sound quality is great for wireless earbuds; they have great base and range, and sound good playing whichever genre of music I select (rap, hip-hop, rock, metal, etc.). The case is also very durable and charges the earbuds when not in use (just don't forget to charge the case!). The earbuds pair almost immediately when taken out of the case - to each other and to my phone.

Since I have only been using them for a couple of weeks, I will update my review after a couple of months to see how they have held up with a few hours of daily use. Lastly, while not apart of this product specifically, TOZO has offered to send me a wireless charging pad for free to be used with the earbuds (and any other wireless charging devices I have). I will update my review to include the wireless charging pad and charging capabilities/speed of the case.

Update: The earbuds have been holding up very well and I have not had any issues with them. They have been used daily for 2-3 hours (sometimes more if I was on a business trip and used them on the plane). The free wireless charger that TOZO sent over works great as well and goes well with the earbuds. After all that I have put these earbuds through, I can confidently recommend them to others!

title: TOZO T10 Absolutely a great set of wireless earbuds
body:
Out of the case the earbuds paired. Sound although not super lood is fantastic. Good bass, mids & highs are very good.
Do not have and can't compare with higher priced sets but these definitely do a great job for me. Have compared with similar priced earbuds and these surpass by far others tried.
Pros: Solid connection, terrific solid overall sound, nicely made, light weight & comfort.
Cons: none
Suggestions: Congratulations. Keep making outstanding products

title: Great sound..Case serves as charger!
body: I just received the TOZO T10 wireless earbuds a few days ago. I really like how the case also serves as a charger. These headphones are super easy to pair..they automatically pair to each other when removed from their case, and linked quickly to my Bluetooth device. The instructions are clear to state you link the Right earbud to your Bluetooth device, this is important to note as both the Left and Right earbud show up as linkable to your Bluetooth. I have not used the microphone capability as of yet, however, another family member purchased these and uses them frequently for phone calls. I have found these earbuds to be great at canceling out noise and they arrive with several optional size ear pieces to choose for comfort. They sound great, are very light and comfortable to wear.. overall a great purchase!

title: Nice Concept, Needs Improvement
body: Battery life isn't great. Has problems sometimes coming in and out of connectivity when outside not sure if it's impacted by other bluetooth tech nearby. I use them everyday at work, it's just 1/2 way through my day I have to switch with other wireless earphones so they can recharge. The phone feature seems to work well, others do not have issues hearing me when I'm speaking during a call.

title: Will not hold a charge
body: I sent back the first pair because the left ear bud would not hold a charge.  As soon as I put it in my ear i heard a beeping for low battery.  I got a replacement and now neither one will hold a charge.  I wanted them to work because the sound quality was excellent and they were comfortable.  Unfortunately I need to send these back.  I won’t be replacing them with the same thing.

title: Great product, one note.
body:
This is a great pair of wireless buds and is amazing for the price. Definitely waterproof and last for hours. The case recharges it a couple times as well. More than enough time for an entire vacation trip.

An important fact though, almost all true wireless buds (no wire in between them) use a master/slave bud interface which is susceptible to signal interference. In simple words, at certain angles and placements, your phones signal may disrupt connection in the left bud momentarily. That is not a manufacturing error or problem with the product. It is a limitation of the technology that all true wireless buds have.

Overall though, the interference is not usually noticed and is a wonderful product that works amazingly for such a good price.

Great buy.

title: Thumbs down
body: After giving these things multiple chances I have to give them a thumbs down. Call quality is horrible but sound quality is good. So I thought I would just use them for music and podcasts. Sound keeps jumping from one ear to the other repeatedly. Will drive you nuts. I really wanted to use these but just can't. Customer service is excellent but Earbuds need work.

title: Great sound, perfect for running!
body: Excellent sound quality, I am actually surprised at the depth of the bass and the full range of sound, pairing was super easy, paired immediately with each other and iPhone XS. Very light, fit ears well, and very comfortable. I use them for running and they are very secure. I have not experienced cutting in and out, works great. Highly recommended!

title: Great product no problems thus far
body: Had this a week, in the last year burned through a dozen various models with something I didn’t like or they died. This one is fine although not tested near water as of yet. My second product from these guys both working fine.

title: Tl;dr version: BUY THEM!
body:
First let me say I paid for these, this is an honest review after having them a week. Now down to business...
My bf has a different brand that is popular here and they are pretty decent. I decided to get these over the very expensive “fruit” brand. We wanted to see which ones were better. I think I won with these. I’ve been really impressed with them.

They had a nice charge straight out of the box. The packaging was spot on, and had a nice feel to it. 5/5 on presentation. If it will let me upload pics I will share them.

The case had 3 bars and each earbud was charged. It is plastic, but not flimsy. I turned it upside and shook it while open and the earbuds did not fall out. The magnet is fairly strong.

Pairing was insanely simple. There’s a voice that notifies you when they are connected. You can one or both. The mic is in the right so you won’t be able to answer a call with just the left in.

It comes with a lanyard that makes it easy to handle. My hands sometimes don’t work, and I dropped the case within five minutes. Luckily the lanyard was around my wrist and they didn’t hit the floor.

It has multiple sized ear buds and that was super handy. The smallest one fit my ears comfortably.

It comes with a short charging cable as well as being able to sit it on my wireless charging pad. That was the first charge I did, and it works beautifully.

Initially they were a bit uncomfortable, but that’s probably me. My ears aren’t used to noise cancelling earbuds. The fit is very snug so that they don’t fall out.

Noise cancelling... really impressed. I had to take these out to hear people talk at a normal level. It is not 100% silent, but I’m good with that. I think for safety reasons I prefer to hear a bit of background noise.

Call quality... not bad. Not perfect. My BF has a hard time hearing me at times because I’m rather soft spoken, so he had to have me repeat what I said several times. If I could give it a 3.5 I would but I rounded up instead of down because the call was clear. You must remember these are tiny tiny speakers and mics in a waterproof housing for under $50 they will NOT be the quality of “$200 fruit”. They are Great for their price point.

Music/sound quality... wow!! I am super impressed with how they sound when listening to music. I see a few negatives about the Bass, but I thought it was fine. This isn’t a home entertainment system, it’s an earbud. A tiny speaker. Be logical. It’s not not going to thump like it’s in a high school parking lot.

I. WORE. THEM. IN. A. POOL. BOOM! Excellent!
Look, I was skeptical, and saved the packaging to send them back when they died today from not being waterproof. They get the last laugh on me because they are perfectly fine today. I thought if the water didn’t hurt them the heat would. It was 104 F according to my car thermostat. I swam floated splashed and played for 4 hours in the water. They will cut off when you get under water because the signal is interrupted. Bluetooth doesn’t go through water. My phone was appx 15-20 feet away in a leather bag, and I only had a few temporary losses of signal. No big deal.

Is there anything bad?
Well, maybe. It may be user error, so I hate to say it’s the product.
When I have left them to charge and the red light signaling they are charged goes off, they aren’t always fully charged. They will beep in my ear after pairing indicating a low battery. So I have resorted to picking them both up to activate them then dropping them back in to stay charged.

 If I’m doing something wrong I’d appreciate any feedback from the company or a knowledgeable user. Thanks.

Conclusion: worth the expense... I’ll be buying another pair, I guess, because my kid wants some. :D

title: My best find on amazon in recent times
body: I wanted to try this new trend of the wireless ear buds that's going on right now, so I searched online and found two suggestions mostly Pasonomi and Tozo, as the battery life was better I went with pasonomi first but the sound quality of those ear buds was totally plain, no bass but plain voices, no wonder the battery life is so much. I love bass, so I tried these, and these are great ! the bass on these buds is amazing and I am very happy with these! I don't worry about battery life too, as I get nearly 4 full charges in a single go for the case.

title: Great Product, Sound and Battery Life! A++
body:
These earbuds are perfect for any application. I am very pleased to have purchased them. We began working out at the gym and needed a truly wireless feature to listen to music. Ordered two pairs, one for me and the other for my son.

Pros on this item:

Great Sound, Lightweight, Fit and sit nicely in ear, don't fall out even when running, Instant connection to device and you can use both earbuds or just one. Wireless charging for the pack and multiple charges if you plan on using them for a while or are away from power source. and Yes hey are truly waterproof!
-During a job painting one earbud fell completely into paint can, was completely submerged. Simply rinsed with water and still working. Son confirmed that they also work in the shower!

We have had them several weeks without fail and they work flawlessly every time. The company also offers one year warranty.

Cons on this item:

There is really only one negative I have for this item, and that is that it didn't offer to have a different color option. We purchased two pair and it would be great if we could have purchased different colors. If you do end up offering different colors please inform.

Final Note:

5 stars because of the great quality, flawless connectivity, ease of use, freedom of application such as work, gym, running, and being able to use one or the other at times. The fact that there was no color option doesn't change my 5 start rating. The company also followed up to see if we had been satisfied with the product and sent a complimentary gift afterwords. Thank you A+++

title: The quality and simplicity will surprise you.
body: I got my TOZO T-10 ear buds for running and I can tell you they did not disappoint me.  The sound is much better than my previous ear buds, the fit is very comfortable.  The variety of sizes made finding a good fit very easy.  And the price was a surprise given the quality and simplicity of this product.
