The waterproof feature will surely add to the long term reliability.  All in all, a great product you will not regret.

title: LOVE THEM AND THE CASE
body: Ordered two pairs, fit and work great - they come with 4 different earbud sizes which makes a big difference since I am small and the pair for my husband is large. Wireless charger makes everything easy. I put the wireless charger by the treadmill and they are always ready to go. I love the case too - grab and go when we jump on the boat for two more charge rounds. Small and I wanted the white, looks good in the ear and not so big and obvious. I am going to order one more pair for my assistant.

title: You should seriously buy them!
body: I love these ear buds. They are amazing. The only issue I have with them is you can't use just one at a time. They both have to be out of the case and turned on, otherwise it beeps over whatever you're listening to. Other than that, I would buy these again and again. The charge lasts so long. They've never died on me, but do keep in mind that I always place them back in the case when I'm done with them. The case stays charged for a few days at minimum.

title: Great earbuds, especially for the price!
body:
Probably one of the best pair of earbuds I have bought so far, especially for the price. These sound just as good as Apple’s AirPods but they fit my ears better, and they are way less expensive.

My only con with these is that I wish the battery life was longer, but they do charge back up fast with the charging case.

Overall, a very good buy!

title: Outstanding overall, and particularly recommended for bass lovers
body: So I received the TOZO T10’s a couple of weeks ago, and I’ve had lots of time to listen to them. The packaging was very solid, as is their construction. I had to do some adjusting to make sure that I had a good fit (this is of course critical with any earbud-type earphones). Once in place, they feel more comfortable than one would expect. The sound is excellent. Note of course that they aren’t flat-graphically equalized, but actually solidly bass-boosted as most music listeners gravitate towards. The bass is quite deep and rich — boosted noticeably near the mid-bass range in particular, and therefore ideal for anyone who loves good, substantial bass. The mid-range is pretty good and the highs are pretty reasonable as well. The maximum volume is substantially louder than any earphones I’ve ever listened to. I’d also say the clarity is pretty good, not perfect, but quite good—the thing to remember is that Bluetooth in general tends to be relatively lacking in clarity when compared to wired earphones. Even though I haven’t listened to every other brand of earphones (though I have heard many) the TOZO T10’s would have to be, by far, the best in their class.

title: Good quality sound, noise cancellation, okay battery life.
body:
The bass is impressive, and the sound quality is good. The earphones fit snugly in my ears, and the noise cancelling effect is decent for in-ear headphones. For the battery life: after a full charge these headphones died in about 4-5 hours. The portable charger allows you to recharge them on the go, which is neat, but I haven't tried it yet because it's a bit too nu wave for me, and what am I supposed to do? Put the charger in my pocket? Okay.

Other notes: Sometimes I forget that they are even in my ears, until I get an itch and I remove one of them to itch my ear, and that gives me a chuckle.

title: Excelente compra! Excellent!
body:
Primera vez que compro unos audifonos inalambricos, me encantan, facil de instalar, gran sonido, excelente calidad, diseno muy ractico y bonito, y por ultimo a un precio muy modico por la calidad del producto.

The first time I buy wireless headphones, I love them, easy to install, great sound, excellent quality, very practical and beautiful design, and finally at a very reasonable price for the quality of the product.

title: Great Customer Service and Shower proof
body:
These earbuds are great quality for the price. These are by far my favorite earbuds in this price range, other brands to not offer the deep base and "showerproofness" lol ; there are many times I am relieved that I can use my earbuds in the shower.

Overall, if you don't want to spend too much money on true wireless headphones, I recommend you to buy this one. In the last 2 years I bought about 4 wireless earbuds, and this one is the best so far.

GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE! My right earbud had about 70% volume decrease. I emailed the company and they shipped me a new one in less than 30 MINUTES.

The customer service is what keeps me coming back!

title: Simply Superb EarBud
body:
Just Wowww..

What I Like about this Product:
1- Amazing Sound Quality
2- Perfect Fit
3- Very Good Noise Cancellation
4 - Light weight and Quality Product
5 - Tunes play so well
6 - Good Battery Life

What I Don’t Like :
1-Little Bit high on Bass when played on very high volume.
Not sure If an Option exists to Adjust Bass in this headset

I am yet to test this on Full workout but I am enjoying it.

title: Poor fit
body:
I bought multiple wireless earphones from different brand in order to give this review.
Pros:
.Good sound quality
.Very high IPX rating
.Stable connection
.Useful extra stuffs
Cons:
.I can't get these to stay in my ears, even when I'm just walking
.Can't adjust the volume. That's a bummer for this price range

title: Bang for you buck!
body: On my second pair because my girlfriend through my first pair out the window because i wouldn't listen to her in the car. Luckily she was cool enough to by me new ones. Besides that i have had a good experience with these. I work out with them shower with them converse with them. Easy to operate and sound good!

title: Left earbud kept disconnecting
body: Ended up sending these back. Worked fine initially then the left earpiece would constantly disconnect if I moved my head. If I stared straight ahead or left my finger on the earbud it would work. Tried all the resetting processes but it continued to disconnect with any head movement. I guess I got unlucky as there are a large number of good reviews for this particular product, occasionally someone will get a dud...I guess that was me this time.

title: Work very well once they connect - had to work to get them fitted properly
body: I really like these and had to play with the different sized ear buds and once I gotten these fitted I was able to get much better sound, initially I thought they sounded to brassy and were lack luster on the base end of the spectrum.  Every once in a while I have to put them back in the case and then pull them one at a time out of the case as a process to get them to attach to my devices.

title: Best bluetooth headphones at this price range
body:
I have bought 3 bluetooth headphones over the last year. This pair is by far the best at this price range. The first pair I purchased would lose charge in my pocket without use after 1 day. Pretty inconvenient.

The next se I purchased were "Beats" style and while the sound was good, they werent that good for working out in and after about a month the spaeaker in the right ear came loose so that was kinda a bummer.

These headphones though, so far, have great sound and play for over an hour on one charge.(probably longer,  I just havent used them for longer than that.) I have only had a week but so far so good. I have no complaints. I will update later to see how they hold up.

title: Amazing
body: These things work amazing ! Having no chord from one to the other is the best

title: Great for listening to music
body: The sound quality is fantastic for listening to music. Very clear with audible highs and deep punchy bass. They fit in ears well and they last a long time on a charge. Also the the case charges the earbuds and the case can charge wirelessly also which makes it very convenient. Only drawback is the quality of the sound heard by people on the other end of the call when using it for a phone headset. They say it is muffled.

title: Could of been an awesome product
body: This product should be awesome it has decent sound but so annoying because the left ear Bud keeps dropping out and its annoying.

title: Love these wireless headphones!!
body: This is a good set of wireless headphones,the best that I ever owned battery life is good and it stays connected at about 20' from the device without any interference,the headphones case can charge the headphones wirelessly with a wifi charger, took a  shower with them on,yes I did ,it works as advertised great sound great value,would recommend to friends and family. 👌

title: Wonderfully Convenient
body:
Excellent sound quality for the price!  Deep BASS!!

Using the buds is very intuitive--take them out and they pair to your device and put them back in the case to charge and it disconnects.  They charge quickly.

Great for music on the go as well as movies/videos if you want to watch quietly.

No issues with them falling out; they fit snugly when one adheres to the insertion diagram.

The buds worked fine in the rain.

No disconnection issues.

They cancel sound pretty well--almost too well.

I would not wear these while biking.  But that may be because I am a cat.

title: Excellent sound!
body:
These earbuds work great. Easy pairing and the bass is excellent. Noise cancellation is adequate considering that it is not Active noise cancellation.
The only difficulty I've had is keeping the right one on, but that may be because I have an unusually small ear canal.
It would be great if it had wings to help it stay on.
Other than that it is pretty good.

title: Great set of earbuds!
body:
This is the second set of wireless earbuds that I have purchased and the first from this company.

The first thing that I noticed was the sturdy ness of the case. The case is solid, protecting the earbuds. My previous set were docked in a case with no lid and I kept them in my truck. If I had to stop suddenly and the case would shift from where I had it the earbuds would come out of the case and I would find myself search for them on the floor of the truck.

I also like that this case holds a charge apart from having it plugged in so there is no need to have it connected in the truck ( my primary use of these buds is when I am at the gym or driving).

I also appreciate that they are waterproof as there are times I sweat quite a bit in the gym and it relieves the worry of one dropping in the sink.

The sound quality is solid. I get great clarity regardless of what I am using them for: music or conversation.

Although I did not need them, this unit has four different sizes to accommodate your ear.

For the price, they are phenomenal!

title: Great quality for the price and excellent customer service
body: These headphones offer a high quality performance, especially in the context of how cheap they are. All their features work as advertised (bluetooth, waterproof) and sound quality is very good. There is a decent amount of passive noise cancellation due to the seal it makes with your ears. Battery life is 3-4 hours and with the case, i can usually get 1-2 days of listening out of it. Furthermore, their customer service is excellent. My right earbud stopped working 4 months after the purchase and they immediately offered to replace it free of charge. For the price, this quality and service cannot be beat. Would definitely recommend.

title: Excellent purchase
body:
Very pleased with this product.
The price was very reasonable.
They fit very comfortably, and do not feel like they will fallout.
Recommending to all my friends

title: Poor battery life and fit
body:
These are of an okay quality. The sound quality is just good, albeit a little grainy with heavy music. Batty life is also very short, only around 3-4 hours of active listening. This may seem sufficient but for a commuter, it's a nuisance having to recharge so frequently. They also don't fit comfortably in the ear, and are prone to slipping out (not suitable to the  gym). I've tried multiple sizes for the rubber and the earphones still fall out, sometimes in the middle of the street. The left earbud also chips out at random times, even when I'm being sedentary. That being said, these are not terrible earphones. The small size makes them very portable. If you want average sound quality and don't care about connectivity or battery life, these may be right for you. I will be returning as I don't believe they are worth the price.

Update 3/21: The company reached out to me and offered a replacement that's a different model from the one shown here. I am increasing my review from 3  to 4 stars, in compliment of the customer service received.

title: convenient and easy
body: they come with multiple sizes of rubber inserts to fit anyone's ear. they pair up instantly when you take them out of the case, and do just what i want them to do. i haven't had any problems with them coming out or not working properly. they have better noise cancellation than airpods. good all around, would recommend

title: Excellent earbuds at a great price!
body: I am so impressed with these earbuds! I use them at work for phone calls and being hands free is very nice! They sound really good and eliminate the outside noise. People on the other end don’t know I’m using earbuds the sound quality is so good. Very impressed with the quality and battery life and I love how the case charges to give you extra life. Excellent product I would buy again

title: Quality
body:
Overall a pretty darn good set of headphones for the price. Some things you lose out on - range isn’t quite as good, and you can’t listen with just one at a time while recharging the other. Also of minor note: low battery warning gives you about 30 seconds before they cut off, and they have an obnoxious pairing vocalization - both sides announce 2-3 things over top of each other, all basically just saying it’s connected.

All of that considered, I’ve give them 5 stars. Certainly not as good as AirPods, but they have some features AirPods don’t, and they’re 1/4 the cost. What causes these to lose 2 stars is that I’m 2 days past my return period and they’re already pealing in terms of the coating on one of them. Granted I’ve been using them - in water and while working out - my I got these for those purposes, and if they’re only going to last you a might, but just skip getting your hopes up for a product that will ultimately not deliver.

If I’m wrong about this and somehow just got a bad batch, I’d be happy to reconsider if the seller were to show me I’m wrong.

UPDATE: Tozo provided great customer service and sent a replacement earbud, along with prompt follow-ups via email. While I'd still recommend being a bit more careful than I'd like to have to be, this is a great product and earns 5 stars.

title: Very poor sound quality
body: The sound quality is TERRIBLE from these. The sound is quite tinny and sort of resembles a voice call where the receiver is shouting into a phone on speaker phone. It is mind-boggling to me to read these other reviews stating that the quality is good. I've owned at least three other budget Bluetooth headphones off Amazon and all of them have had much, much better sound.

title: All-round solid product.
body:
Good sound quality, connects easily to my phone, holds a good charge, stays in my ears through workouts.

FYI the seller contacted me after my purchase and asked me to leave a review, and in return they sent me a wireless charging pad for free. In all honesty the headphones are just okay. The range isn't the best, and it cuts out a ton if you turn your head away from your phone, or if you have your phone in your back pocket.

title: They work great!!!!
body: I LOVE THE WIRELESS EARBUDS!!!!! I truly think they are great and love using them  They sync easily and I use them almost all day. I had trouble hearing my phone at work when colleagues would call or message but now I wear the earbuds, much better.

title: Disappointed.
body: Ear phones keep blanking out when my device is more than 3 feet away from my ears. I wear an I watch on my wrist and i have to hold my wrist across my chest to enable earphones to pick up signal. Needless to say this is not acceptable. I have other wireless earphones that do not have this problem.

title: Better than AirPods!
body: Great product!!! The sounds quality is top notch !! I love the fact that it comes with few different earplugs this way you can find the one that fits you the best!!! I have tried the AirPods but I was not happy with them ... they are crazy expensive and didn’t stay in my ears .. these earplugs are amazing!! I was shaking my head up and down , left and right and they didn’t move (I ended up getting very dizzy from all the shaking haha)! The price is right and def way more better than the AirPods! Try it and you won’t regret it!!!

title: Left earbuds cuts out often
body:
These sound pretty good when they are working. Bass heavy which I expected from other reviews.

I have a problem with these where the left earbuds cuts off very often. Pretty much whenever I look to the right even though my phone (Galaxy S10) is in my left pocket. Can't understand why but it happens very consistently and makes it so the listening experience is poor. I'm not sure if I have a defective unit or it is a design flaw, but I do see other people with the same complaint, so I'm going to return these and they a different brand.

title: Not the best fit.
body:
These would be really great, except for the fact that they fall out of my ears constantly.

I like the sound quality, and how they fit in a neat little charging case. I like the battery life and their general utility. The thing I don’t like, is how they always fall out of my ears while I work out. I can hardly wear them on runs because they fit so loosely in my head that they fall out just from running.  I followed the directions and tried using every earbud combination that came in the box and settled on the smallest ones. That worked fine for the left side but not the right.

title: Can't get buds to stay in my ear. Unless purchasing other supplement buds.
body:
Great sound. My only issue is that they loosen which causes a huge reduction in base and overall quality in sound. A lot of the times they just fall out of my ear. I have tried every size option, and twisting method as directed my the manual to no avail. Great sound but useless if they don't stay in my ear.

Update: Purchasing these ears buds allows the TOZO to stay in my ear, bumping to 4 stars. Forgot to mention, it is not good for calls, just music. Below is the link for where i bought the buds. The Thimble type worked the best for me.
https://www.amazon.com/gp/aw/d/B00GCS4OEC?psc=1&ref=ppx_pop_mob_b_asin_title

title: Really Bad headphones.. keep disconnecting, beware.
body: I bought them a month ago, to be precise, around 32 days ago. I was busy and did not use them but last week when i started using them. they keep disconnecting, i thought it was because of the new ios i installed. then i reverted my ios it still keep disconnecting, i even tried with my wifes' phone, same results, I called Amazon support but they cant return it now as its more then 30 days (32 days). So i stuck with these disconnecting ones. Beware.... Hope this helps for your buy.

title: Quite Impressed - Great Buy
body:
Having bought a pair of ear pods, which required me to crank the music all the way up so I could hear it while mowing the lawn was ridiculous. That, coupled with the fact that they did not stay in my ears, made me wonder what the big deal was.
I was so dissatisfied, I quickly purchased a pair of TOZO T10. WOW. These are so different (in a good way).
The battery life is great; the noise cancelling feature works so well, that as I mow my lawn, I can only put the music up less than halfway.
I highly recommend these little gems.

title: Great sound while on the phone, and listening to music!
body: These are great headphones, especially for the price! Bluetooth is great, and the sound quality is great. I can mow my lawn, and barely hear the mower over my music. Pairing is super easy, and happens very quick when taking them out of the charing case, or turning them on. Definitely a great buy!

title: Excellent -if you don't need a microphone
body:
The device itself, as headphones works great. The build quality is nice with a soft rubber finish. Being able to wireless-charge the buds with the case is a convenient feature. These fit me well and remain in place. These are also good at isolating you from outside noise.

A major annoyance: I don't think you can use these in mono mode. The right bud will beep every 10 seconds or so if used alone. I think if you pull out the left bud, let it connect and replace it back in the case, the right bud will beep for 20 seconds (once per 10s interval) and then it seems to stop. An annoyance, but still a 5-star product at this point.

The reason for the 1 star review:  the microphone is completely useless. It's not even sub-par or low quality. I call my work line using my cell and even with the right bud 2 inches from my mouth, my own voice felt like very low background noise -from far, far away.

I really wanted to like these... but I'll have to return them.

title: WAY too big + poor sound quality
body: These earbuds are WAY too big...even when you use the smallest tips and follow the install instructions. If you have small to medium sized ears, these won't work. I'm a 6'1" (187 cm) man and these earbuds do not fit in my ears. No way I could exercise without them falling out. And the sound quality is not great. There's noticeable background static. I believe most of the positive reviews are fake.

title: Awesome sound great battery life.
body: I have recently gone through several headphones and I finally decided to try these out. I have been looking at these for probably 2months or so and pull the trigger. I am so happy that I did. They are great!  Plenty of volume with great sound quality. I would recommend these to anyone that is looking for good sound with great battery life.

title: Great earbuds!!!
body: I purchased these earbuds after going through two other competing brands that failed after about a week of use.  These are outstanding!  They fit perfectly and are very comfortable.  The sound quality is also excellent.  I like the fact they are waterproof also in case I am caught out in the rain or sweating while working out.  Purchase these and you will be very happy!

title: Very Happy With My Purchase
body: These are great quality at an affordable price.  This is the first pair of wireless earbuds I've owned so I have nothing to compare them to but I am very happy so far.  They fit snug and sound great.  They are very easy to set up.  The sound is incredible.  Phone calls are crystal clear.  I can hear who I am talking to without any problem and who I am talking to has no problem hearing me.  I will be buying more for my kids!

title: Poor bluetooth signal.
body:
Worked ok when standing still. When walking around bluetooth signal faded in and out. I keep my phone in a hip case and have no signal loss with previous head sets and no issues with the Aftershock air head see I am currently using.
Highly recommend the Aftershock Air (Bone conduction) head set.

title: Great Sound Horrible Functions & Battery
body:
I really, really wanted to like these earbuds. To be honest, they are great! The sound is amazing, the bass POPS, and they fit super snug (rare for me because earbuds tend to fall out and I usually end up having to use headphones), but they have NO functions. If I’d known I couldn’t even turn the volume up or down, I never would have bought them... and the battery life is pretty terrible.
If you want a reasonably priced pair of wireless earbuds and don’t care about functions (literally any functions aside from re-dual last number and pause... seriously), these are great. I wish I had looked at the functions before I bought them... I will probably be returning them :(. I really wanted to like them!

title: Awesome
body: I wanted a pair of bluetooth headphones for working out and running and these are great. I have had them for about two months and worn them almost daily, and they are holding up fine. I have even dropped the little charging box on the street, but no damage. They come with different size ear squishies so you can switch them out to be more comfortable if you have small ears. They do not fall out when running, and I have worn them in the shower a couple times so they are waterproof. My only complaint is the bluetooth distance is not very long. Maybe 30 feet from your phone and the headphones start cutting out and become disconnected. I have to take my phone with me to go to the water fountain. But its not too big of an issue to just bring my phone along considering everything else about these headphones are great. Overall recommend.

title: Excellent Product...great value!!!
body:
Fast delivery and worked great right out of the box.  Excellent packaging and easy to use.  Don't worry about fit....these really stay in my ear better than any others I've tried.
Buy with confidence....these high quality ear buds will serve you well!

title: Great product!
body: I have a really hard time finding earbuds that are comfortable but these are great.  I hardly know they are in!!  Very easy to use, convenient charging case and the sound quality is terrific.  I love them & will likely get a set for my hubby, too!

title: Sound quality is excellent,  underpriced
body: Wow best wireless earbuds so far. Use Bose soundsport prior to these and these are so much better in every way.  Much better bass, do not fall out, do not loose connection.  Very happy with this purchase.  Low price but quality is much better than trivoli, beats, or bose.

title: Great headphones when they're not cutting out
body:
I was so excited about these when I first used them; the sound quality is awesome and has great bass. Even my audiophile husband was impressed. The big problem is that they cut out a LOT. It happens at least twice/session. Sometimes they just stop playing music even if I haven't paused the music or disconnected them. This happens when the headphones are fully charged, so I don't think it's a battery issue.

The phone feature is so-so. Sometimes it works, and people I'm talking to have no trouble hearing me. Other times, they can barely hear me.

I'm giving 3 stars because the sound quality is so good, and I like the wireless charging.

title: Kinda a letdown
body:
So the earbuds play music and you can connect them both after finding the left and right bluetooth channels from your phone. BUT they are much bigger than I expected and they won't even stay in my ear. I tried all three size buds they gave me and non of the sizes would comfortably stay in my ear. Also i tried to just listen to one bud and the earbud constantly paused and played, so you cant only have on in at one time. When you charge your earbuds through the case, the earbud's LED light always stays at an orange, so you never know when they're charged.
Obviously returning them.

title: Amazing Wireless Earbuds!
body:
The noise cancellation on these earbuds are awesome. Will buy again if needed in the future.

They also have a great range so leaving your phone/pad on your desk and heading to the kitchen or even outside is viable.

title: Impressive bass response!
body:
Man, I was honestly just hoping for some decent quality audio and ok build quality for the price, but what I got was some of the best sounding earbuds I've ever owned, wired or wireless. I changed it the ear pieces for the best fit and they fit very nicely, snug and comfortable and light weight.

I'm also a fan of the carrying case with the 400ma power bank for recharging when you're not near power. I can also take advantage of the wireless charging with my Galaxy s10+ if I'm really desperate.

So far, I'm extremely satisfied with these earbuds. Will update on durability once I've owned them for awhile.

title: So far, so good! :-)
body: These headphones are great! I like the functionality of them. I have not done an intense workout with them to know how well they will stay in my ears during that, but I did a quick, jump heavy, exercise and they were great. The sound quality is awesome too!

title: Good for $49
body: Volume is not awesome, but quality is good. No music control on earbuds other than play/Pause and call accept/decline. Overall a good deal for $49

title: A great product with one possible drawback
body: Over-all this is a great product. It is super easy to pair, charging is easy and I love that the carrying case can charge it, if you don't have an outlet handy. Everything TOZO says it will do it seems to do. I would have given this 5 stars except for one problem I am having. When I use it while mowing my yard it will periodically loose the connection. It does re-connect but will be very sporadic with maintaining the connection. I'm really not sure why. Perhaps it has something to do with the frequency the mower is running at? All and all I would recommend this product without reservation.

title: Good sound, poor fit
body: Unfortunately these things just do not stay in my ears if I’m moving around. I’ve tried every different fitting and shoved them into my ear at every different angle, but they always fall out within 5 minutes of walking. If you plan on using them for workouts, it might be a waste of money. Otherwise, the sound quality (especially the bass) is pretty dang good for the price.

title: Very bad and not good product
body:
I was very disappointed after I bought this product, so I trusted all these reviews.
Do not trust all of these reviews, the goods are not high-quality, cheap plastic, it works poorly, I used them on the phone and the MacBook, the sound disappears, then it is chanted, the headsets do not work simultaneously.
It is extremely difficult to match the size for the ears, they either do not climb or fall out.
They can not be used in the gym.
I am going to return them as this product does not cost $ 50.
I do not recommend

title: TOZO is the BEST!!!
body:
Great sound on the earbuds, and great customer service! There were no problems,
They just sent me an email, offering to send me a wireless charger for free, out off the blue! A friend had recommended these, because they sent him an extra pair for FREE! I didn't believe it. But now I DO! I'm very happy with this purchase. They actually work really well and sound great, so the free stuff is just a bonus!

title: Awesome sound, great fit, waterproof...
body: i purchased the TOZO T10 wireless earbuds to workout in the pool as they were one of the few IPX8 sets available and definitely the most reasonable.  For the price, i didnt expect that much, but I was blown away by the sound quality.... crystal clear with velvety bass tones.  Reception distance was really good, there was no loss in quality at the far end of the pool.  Good to know that if I accidentally drop one in the water or it were to fall out of my ear, I can scoop it back up and keep going.  But it is doubtful that will happen as the fit is tight but comfortable. Very pleased with my purchase.  The only negative thing about this buying these is that my husband is impressed as well, so it looks like I will have to buy another pair for him to use while he is out on his kayak.  He isn't getting mine. :-)

title: They are decent.
body: Callers complained about not hearing me.  Intermittent disconnects.  Otherwise they are decent.

title: Awful: It keeps disconnecting itself
body: These are the worst wireless headphones; they keep disconnecting themselves. I am listening to something, then the headphones disconnect. Sometimes it reconnects when I return them to the base and start over but I should not have to do that mid-listening. I am 10 days past the return date. Otherwise they would go back.I would give less than one star if possible. save your money.

title: Good bluebooth earbuds
body: Sound quality is good for a Bluetooth earphone. You can hear wide range pitch and bass. Bateery life is good for five to six hours after intensive usage. It also include three different size for ear pieces, which really help making it secured.

title: Works for small ears too
body: I am happy with this purchase. I have tried to find countless earbuds to fit my ears because most earbuds are too big for me. Not these! Finally something that fits!

title: Amazing sound quality and excellent customer service!
body:
I was highly impressed at the sound quality of these earbuds! Great noise cancellation, great bass, and all around great sound! The bluetooth range is highly impressive as well. I am most impressed by the battery life, at 4 to 5 hours of listen time and approximately an hour for a full charge. The battery pack can charge the earbuds 3 to 4 times before it needs to charged too, which is much better than I anticipated.
I also need to add what wonderful customer service I recieved from the company! I accidentally put one headphone in the washer with my jeans, for about 5 minutes, and the headphone broke. The company was more than happy to issue me a replacement pair, no hassle and no run around! I highly recommend these earbuds and this company. Five stars isnt enough!

title: Nice Suprise
body: My Bing's stop working and was shopping for earbuds recently. I found these Tozos on Amazon and decided to give hem a try. I have to say I'm very happy I did. The quality and feel of this product feel well made. These were also reasonably priced versus the alternatives. They sound great and come with a hard case and charging cable. I was able to sync them to my phone with no problem. If your looking for earbuds, I would definitely would recommend them.

title: Easy set up
body:
This is such cool technology and I am usually not very proficient at setting up new electronics. Was a snap and they really sound great. The fact that they come with several sizes of ear caps is a definite plus. The earplugs that came with my iPhone never stay secure. Being able to pick the correct size is a wonderful feature. All in all, I am happy with my purchase of Tozo T10 earbuds.
Ann Marie

title: Decent quality for price, but volume/bass is gone after 4 weeks of use.
body:
I bought these products to use while running and studying. They weren't the best but for the price tag they worked really well. Great bass, about average sound quality. The charging case on a full charge lasts me more than a week too!

But...

After about a month of using it, I picked the headphones out of the case put them in and realized that I wasn't getting the same bass as I was before. I also noticed that despite it being at max volume, the music was a lot softer, barely audible while I'm at the gym or running. The same carried over to listening to podcasts, taking calls, etc.

That sucks because they were good sounding headphones, just bad quality. My guess is the bass driver broke or gave out.

title: Great earbuds!
body: High quality, I really like the charging case concept and it works great. Everything feels nice and sturdy. They fit well and are comfortable. They pair easily, have good range and the microphone is good for calls. My only complaint is that the lowest volume setting is still pretty high before it clicks to mute. I wish there were about 4 or 5 more increments between lowest volume and off—but for working outside or exercise it’s not an issue. Only in quiet settings like the office or home do I wish you could turn them down lower.

title: THE REAL DEAL! Best bang for your buck and then some!
body: These wireless headphones are a dream come true for me. The sound quality is supreme, the comfort level is 10/10, could wear them forever without noticing them in. Again, the sound quality, especially for the price can't be beat. The charger case is legit!, the products are sturdy, non fragile, strong, with great quality, nicely built equipment and materials. I would believe that these were in the 100s of dollars range: that's how pleasantly surprised and super excited when I tried them out for the first time! They are waterproof, mic'd, great for sports/running/sweating, bluetooth and wireless, their own heavy duty charging case with magnetic receptacles for each single ear piece, both R & L. The packaging was stellar and easy as pie to pair with phone/computer/ anything bluetooth, and again, they don't lose signal or connection and there is a instructive woman's voice to guide you heard through the earpieces as to whether you've connected or not, it's a joyful experience overall! It far exceeded my expectations which were set pretty high!

title: Great wireless earbuds for the price.
body: Item as described, sound is very good for what I listen to...audiobooks, podcasts, and some music. Battery life has been fine. As soon as I use them, I put them in the charging case and charge them back up. Have not tested the full waterproof ability, but look solidly built for it.

title: One earbud at a time works!
body: I purchased this with the intent in wearing while at work. I need to have one ear open however so i only wanted to use one at a time, charge when dead and just swap out when needed, always having one in use and one in the case. When i first got them there was an anoying beep when only one was being used (trying to sync with the other) and i was dissapointed. An email i sent out to the manufacturer was quickly answered and they explained the process to get the beep to stop. Very helpfull and now i can use how i wanted!

title: Decent budget buds, with some downsides
body:
GOOD Cheap.  Very comfortable and stable in the ear, unlike Apple's buds (for my ears).  Long enough battery life.  Synced first try.  Have survived about 20 sweaty spin classes.
BAD The charge case is too big for a man to carry in pants pockets or a suit jacket - it's about 3x the air-pod charger case.  (For women it's not an issue.)  There is no volume or track skip control, only pause and power on/off.  You have to take out your phone to change the volume or skip forward or backward.  Weak signal: I can't carry my phone in my back pocket because if I do they start dropping in and out.

title: Returning due to poor battery life
body: Ive been delaying purchasing buds forever as I was worried about them falling out and not being able to use for calls. Finally gave in and bought these. Today was 1 of use. The good: they dont fall out and sound quality is great. The bad: battery life is terrible, between 2-3 hrs and call quality is pretty bad too. They would be great for gym or commute only, then need to charge. Looks like I will be returning.

title: Great Set of Earbuds
body:
After upgrading my phone, I needed a new set of earbuds. While I could have bought a 35mm To Lightning Adapter to allow my current earbuds to connect to my new iPhone, I opted to go wireless instead. After some research, I decided to try out the TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds. They were marked with "Amazon Choice" and had great ratings.

And the ratings are well deserved. These earbuds have great sound and clarity. I use them primarily while mowing my lawn so noise cancellation is incredibly important. The TOZO T10 earbuds definitely do the job. Pairing the earbuds with one another and with my phone is incredibly easy. And, so far, battery life seems to be fairly long; a few hours out mowing the lawn and they were still going strong.

So far, with my experience with them, I'd definitely recommend the TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds.

title: Easy to Use and Great Noise Cancelling
body: I absolutely love them! I'm glad that they aren't too discrete because I wear headphones so that people won't bother me in public. I've always needed headphones that won't fall out while doing pushups, situps, or jogging! These are perfect for the job. The night I got them I used them to cancel out the noise from a scary movie my room mate was watching while I was cooking(I hate scary movies). I couldn't hear a thing!

title: No Bass
body:
They have literally no Bass.  I have cranked the Bass on my phone and it is still inadequate.

On the plus side, they pair up easily, and the case acts as a charge battery, so the battery life is good, and if you don't need bass, then the sound is okay.  Bear McCreary's All Along the Watchtower doesn't even sound like the same song as on my cheap earbuds.

title: better than airpods
body: these headphones are incredible. my friend who always flexes her airpods used to keep telling me about how much better wireless headphones are than regular headphones, and i used to never believe her. until now. until these headphones. you never realize how much of wires hinder you and how much of life you're missing out on due to them until you get these. and another bonus: they're way cheaper than airpods and have good squishy things on the ears so they don't fall out. legitimately the most life-changing purchase of my life.

title: Very satisfied!
body: I'm really happy with these earbuds so far.  Great quality sound and very comfortable.  I am very picky when it comes to sound quality and I can honestly say that I am very satisfied with the sound that these earbuds produce.  Very fast and easy pairing with my phone.  Very fast charging.  I haven't had them for long,  but I have purposely tried getting the earbuds to fall off by jumping around and shaking my head, with no success, they are on there real good.  Amazing earbuds for an amazing price!!  I highly recommend!

title: Was skeptical, but proven wrong.
body: Ear buds fall out of my ears with ease.  I thought these would be no better but I was wrong.  I can put these in and shake my head violently and they don't move.  The sound is incredible.  Loved them so much I ordered a pair for my wife.

title: Battery life is useless and they never hold its charger for more than a day
body: Havent had used them for more than 5min only for them to die on me.i received a second pair due to the first ones having charging issues, the second ones worked fine at first but after a couple of days of not using them I come to find out the battery is completely drained. I guess I either have pretty damn bad luck or this product is just straight bad

title: Good set
body: These are great for the price my only complaint is that the charging case doesn’t seem to hold a full charge longer than a day. I’ve charged it to where all 4 lights are lit and by the next day it will be down to 2 lights

title: Terrible!  Don’t buy them!
body: Absolutely awful.  I read the poor reviews and I thought they were just being too critical but they weren’t.  These earbuds only worked one time for about 30 min before malfunctioning.  I tried all the trouble shooting and tried reinstalling yet they still malfunctioned.  I even saved the box so I could return them and set them aside to return and by the time I got around to returning them it was too late.  I don’t see how this company can produce such defective products.

title: A Great Alternative to Air Pods
body: I got these because everyone in my home got air pods and I want to have wireless earbuds to work out and watch shows on my tablet. So far, I am very satisfied with the purchase, they work just as good as air pods at a third of the cost. The sound quality is great, excellent noise cancelling to tune out any annoying noises (and Cub fans) around you and for me, a good battery life, since I use them for about 2 hours a day.

title: Sound and fit, solid. Battery meh. Syncing ok.
body: Fit and sound quality for music is good. Low-end (bass) is full but flat. I think its as good as you'll find for $50? For phone calls, people have a hard time hearing me. I only can use them for calls if I am indoors and they are paired before a call comes in. Quite surprised when not in use how short they hold a charge. Lastly, the pairing process is slow. Anywhere from 15-60 seconds to pair with each pod and then the iPhone.

title: Simply amazing and affordable
body: I recently lost my wireless headphones and was in the market for a replacement. I stumbled across the Tozo T10 earbuds and didn't want to spend a lot since I want sure how they would sound. I've been disappointed with some other brands and didn't want to invest to much. Received my new wireless earbuds, quickly charged them and tried them out. Wow! I was surprised at the sound quality, noise isolation and volume. How have I not heard of these before? I am so happy to have picked these up. These are a great product!

title: Amazing sound
body: I was so pleasantly surprised by the quality of these earbuds. At this price point, I was expecting something that would "get the job done" while in the gym. What I recieved were amazing earbuds that I can enjoy while using a chainsaw and weed wacker in the yard. These provide wonderful sound quality and and I do not have to scream in order to be heard on calls. I will be buying more for other members of the house.

title: Do not purchase unless you plan on remaining stationary while listening
body: This product has connectivity issues.  If you are in a direct line of sight device to this product it works fine.  If you place your phone in your pocket or phone holster it cuts in and out very badly. Do not plan on walking or jogging with this product. It also has difficulties connecting to each earbud.  Took a very long time to get them in sync with each other.

title: Terrible range, not good for talking on the phone
body: I returned these. For the price, I would have expected more. I would walk away from my phone (like just in the other room) and the signal would cut out. Then, talking on the phone was terrible and the person could barely hear me. Not worth it!

title: Rarely do a review
body: I have only done a hand full of reviews in my history of making purchases on Amazon.  This is the second pair of wireless ear buds that I have purchased and will say that everything that was advertised and reviewed so far is spot on.  I was amazed at the ease of pairing this product with the other pair I purchased  that never seemed to work.  The TOZO T10 has been flawless in use with both my iPhone and iPad.  I would repurchase without hesitation.

title: My Techie Husband Loves These!
body: My husband spends a LOT of money on tech & electronics and he has other earbuds and headphones that are $300 and up, but these are his absolute favorite! (Wish he’d found these first! LOL!)

title: Great product for the price.
body: I wanted a pair of Air Pods but was not wanting to spend the money.  The things I cared about were small size, true wireless, ease of use, and charging case with small footprint.  I decided to try these and I am glad I did.  I got everything I was looking for at about a third of the price of Air Pods.  These also stay in the ear very well and are comfortable.

title: Great Earbud sound, great value!
body:
I bought the Tozo T10 as a replacement for a pair of ear buds that lasted six months. I unpackaged the Tozo T10’s, fully charged them and started the pairing process. Let me tell you, I was amazed at how easy it was to pair these ear buds to my phone. Once paired, I selected my favorite music station and enjoyed a full 2.5 hours of music before having to pack up and attend a meeting at the office. When I put them away to recharge, I had no indication that power was low, so I believe I could  have gotten at least another 2 or more hours on the charge.

Now, I’m no audiophile but I personally thought the sound these ear buds produced was fantastic!

I would recommend them to anyone who is looking for a fair priced pair of ear buds that produces great sound.

title: Comfortable, Clear, Quality
body: These earbuds block out external noise so you can enjoy the great stereo provided by these T-10’s. If you are looking for quality comfortable high performance earbuds look no further.

title: The best ear buds I’ve ever tried
body:
I had low expectations for wireless ear buds in this price range, and I was unwilling to purchase very expensive ear buds because of two reasons: 1) In the past, all the ear buds I have used always fell out of my ear & 2) I never liked the sound produced by ear buds due to the size of the driver and it’s ability to faithfully reproduce sound frequencies,
I was pleasantly surprised with these wireless ear buds. The sound is fantastic. I like it better than my Bose QC 35. Also it comes with four sizes of ear buds and I was able to find a fit that stays in my ears. I would recommend this product.

title: Fantastic Earbuds!
body: A fiend who works in a noisy office recommended the Tozo T10 earbuds to increase my efficiecy - let me tell you it was a bargain purchase!  Comfortable, easy to pair, excellent sound quality, and what a nice package - pleae see my phots which demonstrate how you can see the charged status thru the unique charging storage case which is very robust.  You can’t go wrong - highly recommended!!!

title: Good sound quality, foolproof connection
body: The setup on these could not possibly be easier -- I had them connected to my iPhone and playing perfectly within about a minute flat. Both the earbuds themselves and the charging box feel quite solid. I don't have a wireless charging station, so I can't speak to how that feature works. Pausing/playing by clicking the center of the earpiece works seamlessly, as does accepting incoming phone calls. Same with the built in microphone -- my caller said they couldn't tell I was on a Bluetooth device. And while I'd love a bit more bass, at this price point the sound quality is pretty darn good. Very satisfied!

title: Not a great sound on Android phones
body:
I wanted to like them, I really did. They're comfortable and good battery lfie with the case but sound on Android phones is very dissapointing; at mid range to high volume there's a crackling sound as if the treble is too high ( I have Samsung s8) which It us not as noticeable when I use them on iPhones.

Too bad.

title: Fast Easy Pairing
body: This is a great product.  It was extremely simple to begin using these Wireless Earbuds.  It paired immediately with my Samsung Galaxy Note 9 phone.  I am very pleased and happy with the earbuds.

title: Great value, strong sound quality, waterproof and consistent connectivity to both earbuds!
body: I use these daily for a 2 hour workout and I was pleasantly surprised of the sound quality, fit, signal consistency and ease of pairing. You have to get the proper sized rubber boots but once I did (they came with the purchase) they have not fallen out. I did have to deal with their customer service but they were quick to remedy my situation within 24 hours and to my full satisfaction. Since I live in Washington I have to deal with rain so being waterproof is critical and so far so good.

title: Great sound, wireless charging is not working.
body: Sound quality is excellent, nice deep base. What I do not like is the wireless charger isn't working and I have to charge it using the wired charger. I am so I pressed by the sound quality I had to give it 4 stars although the wireless charger isn't working.

title: Very stylish and convenience
body: I would have to say that the design of the earbuds and the case they come in is really nice.  The sound quality is what I expected from Bluetooth earbuds which is decent so no complaints with that feature The battery life is decent, they tend to run out of battery life quickly but that's what that cool charge station is for.  Overall I highly recommend the product to anyone who's looking for a decent wireless option to listen to music or conversation.

title: Great bass, great battery, muddy high end.
body: Bought these for use while mowing five acres. Batteries last through mowing, trimming, and clean up with charge to spare. The nose cancellation is very good even without audio playing. The bass is deep and sounds great. My only complaint is the muddied high end. Still, great for the price.

title: A life saver for long office days.
body:
The fast charge, wireless charging case, and sound quality mean I stay sane during tiring office hours. the only thing I'd change is give them more battery life., but a quick smoke break is normally enough to bring them up to around 80%.

That and the ability to change the function of the buttons, double press for re-dial on a pair of headphones seems useless. But almost all headphones do that (to my and many other's annoyance).

title: Highly recommend
body: I love these. I cannot wear the pre-molded earbud like air pods and have often had a hard time keeping even this type of headphone in my ear. At first, I wasn’t sure these were going to work either but once I switched to the smaller ear piece they fit perfectly. They’re easy to carry in my purse and so far I’m happy with the charge. The sound quality is great and I like that I can use only one earphone if needed.

title: Received a defective pair, but TOZO stands by their word!!!
body: When i received the product, i was very happy with what I got. I enjoy ALOT of bass in my music and these earbuds were able to give me that with decent battery life. Unfortunately, the right earbud started to produce less sound than the left ear bud. After a few days,  it became unbearable. I looked to see if it was a common issue, but it wasn't. I was pretty upset, because even though I had a warranty, I know from past experience how time consuming it is to claim warranty's from manufacturers. TOZO however made it really simple. I let them know via email what happened, and they got back to me within 24 hours! They replaced my earbuds with a new set AND let me keep the defective ones. Thank God because trying to send it back probably would have been a real hassle. I have grown very fond of these earbuds and TOZO. I will probably be buying more of their products from now on.

title: Awesome earbuds , get them 👍🏻👍🏻
body: These are great earbuds, I'm glad they provide a great quality of sound and comfort in my ear, the battery is great and last a long time and the charge time is very quickly, they do not fall out , I tried moving my head around like doing an activity and didn't budge , the different sizes of ear paddings is a bonus for those with different sizes . Enjoy these buds and save some bucks and enjoy a good product.

title: Most of the time they work well
body:
The build quality is great
The battery life is pretty good
Theyre okay to figure out how to set up

My only issue with them is the connectivity between both of them. If you want to use only one side, Theyll give you some trouble. When you go to use only one, They will beep every like 10 seconds unless you connect the second half. I guess its trying to say you lost or dont have connection to the other side? Maybe I got a bad unit? I dont use them as much as I could because of this issue since they are kindof finnicky to connect and use because if you just pull one out and turn it on then youll get the nonstop beeping. So I end up doing this weird combination of turning the both off and on. You could turn both on and only put one in but I end up getting serious lag if I leave the 2nd in my pocket or bag and ill constantly hear the audio stopping and starting trying to sync correctly.

Other then that issue (which might not even be noticed by a lot of people) these are excellent headphones. I really like everything about them

title: great product!!! worth more than you pay for in my opinion
body: very good sound quality for the price. I had several wireless headphones before and have the T8 as well, I can say that this a big step up from T8 and a lot better from the other brands I used. I love that it’s waterproof and it can charge wirelessly. the sound is very clear and the bass is just perfect. the fit is great too and very comfortable perfect for working out. plus... great customer service... will buy again

title: Great in ear headphones!
body: These earbuds are actually pretty impressive for the price point. My only complaint is that the rubber earbuds that they provide with the headphones do not stay in at all for me. I shelled out another $15 for some malleable earbuds and it was a real game changer for the items sound quality and ability to stay in my ears.

title: Unreliable
body:
Avoid these... after a couple times in the water, the left pod has completely stopped working and the right one will not connect via Bluetooth anymore.  Even when they were "working" it was a constant battle of what order to power them on, restart bluetooth on my phone and have to manually trigger the connect.  Distance is about 10 ft for reliable connection

Also you can't hear them when you are actually under the water.... Not a big deal for what I wanted them for but swimmers should be aware.

title: Great quality,great price
body: These headphones are definitely worth getting.I was hesitant at first but so happy that I got them. Once you find the right ear pieces that fit for you they stay in place very well even while working.The sound quality is well above and beyond what I expected, and to top it all off the charger case is amazing at protecting the earbuds and acting as a portable charger. I would recommend this product.

title: Good earbuds, but missing track skip / controls
body: I got these as they were advertised for working out and I needed some for biking. There are a lot of things to like about these for the price - they sound fantastic, they have a few sizing options and they stay in my ear when I sweat. The biggest issue I have with them is that the only controls are pause, play, and accidentally call your mom. I don't think many buying these are wanting to use them for phone calls, and if so they could pull out their phone; Tozo should've given us a skip button instead. I use a long playlist on shuffle when I'm biking and I keep my cell in my backpack, so it is a huge hassle to stop and pull it out just to skip a song I'm not feeling. For that reason these get three stars from me and I'll likely replace them soon.

title: They're GREAT! Even better than the previous model.
body: I don't write reviews of every product that I order.  But these earbuds are truly great. I previously purchased the earlier model, TOZO T8 earbuds. They had really good sound, but the bluetooth connection was "iffy".  These new earbuds DO NOT have that problem at all. Now, I don't wear them swimming or in the shower (how long are your showers?), so I can't vouch for the waterproof quality. But I bought the new model earbuds because of the sound quality, comfort and convenience of the T8 model.  I can tell you that these earbuds, in my opinion, are even better for true sound and great range. They're comfortable and conveient to carry along in your pocket, purse, etc.  The battery in the recharge/storage case lasts FOREVER-- or at least it seems to.  And the recharge/storage case has nice blue LEDs to indicate how much charge is left in the case's battery-- this is really a very nice convenience.  Based on my pair of the TOZO T10 earbuds, I think you will really enjoy them, too.  So stop hesitating.  ORDER THEM!

title: A Really Good Budget Set of Earbuds
body: I got these mainly for working out and running. The waterproofing means that they won't get messed up when I work up a sweat, and I absolutely hate running with wires dangling and bouncing around. The sound is actually surprisingly good for the price, with some nice lows and punchy mids and highs. Another thing that I really like it that they actually stay in my ears. For some reason, I was blessed with smaller than average ears, and using the smaller earbud covers makes them fit nice and snug and stay in place while I run.

title: Great sound and noise cancelling
body: I didnt want to buy the new ihpone airpods because i always have trouble fitting them into my ears. The Lozo earbuds fit snuggly in my ear, even when i am exercising. the sound quality is amazing, i also like to have mymusic play loud and my gf says she cannot hear it anymore through these headphones! great noise cancellation. Battery life is also very good, I usually charge it once and it lasts for more than a day!!! Cant beat this price either!

title: If one is good- two is just right!
body:
I bought the first pair of your T10 wireless earbuds and liked them so much I bought a second pair.
So many great features.
One touch pairing
Water resistant
Stereo sound
Case with charging battery
Case is even wireless
It's all good.

title: Missing items
body: Missing items in the package that don’t allow me to properly fit my ears. The look, feel, and build quality seem good but can’t really experience the sound as they do not fit my ears and am missing the different size buds.

title: Amazing for the price, sound quality with a surprising bass punch
body:
Tozo done good on these- popped them in the case, and they paired as promised as soon as I plucked them out! Pairing to my iPhone was equally pleasing. The sound pretty much outdid my old AirPods.

Bravo!

title: Where have you been all my life?
body: I LOVE these headphones. They pair easily and quickly with my iPhone. Pop em' out, turn em on and they seamlessly pair; no fiddling around. I keep the case on my keychain so it is always with me, usually charge once a week. They have been a game-changer for working out and walking into work from the parking lot (it's a long walk). Fit well, haven't fallen out, super comfortable. I recommend these to all my friends. THANK YOU!

title: Died after two months
body: These were great for the price, until I realized that I got what u paid for. I lived using them but they died on me after two months of use. I never got them wet or used them in a way in which they would break. The quality of sound is good and they work well, as long as they don’t die on you.

title: Left channel drops out constantly
body:
These headphones would sound great, it they actually worked.  I used them three times on three different workouts.  The first one the left channel dropped out for very short periods of time on occasion.  The second one the left channel was off more than it was on.  The third started out great for the first 20 minutes, but then the dropouts started and got worse and worse as time went on.  They are unusable.  I can't see how anyone could stand the almost constant dropouts of the left channel.  After the third use, I packaged them back up and sent them back.

I will say that shortly after buying them I got a great email from the manufacturer offering me a free wireless charger for them, and encouraging me to write them a 5-star review because of this great offer.  What I would like more than a free wireless charger is just a product that actually worked.  Great reviews should be the result of great products, not free stuff offered after the fact.

title: Great quality, easy to use
body: These came quickly, charge quickly and are easy to pair.  I am a hearing aid user and my mini-tek Bluetooth crashed so wanted an option until I am able to replace HA Bluetooth.  These fit well for me using the smallest probe tips and are comfortable.  They hold charge for at least 4 hours of continuous use.  Notice that if wearing while eating, they sometimes shift as if to come out but that's to be expected.  In the few times they have gotten wet, they wipe off easily and no problems noted when re-inserted.  Great go to product!

title: Great Deal / High Quality
body: This is what I was looking for, and I glad a bought them. The sound quality is great; deep base, plenty of volume, and sounds good at low volume, to. They fit well in my ears (this matters, because regular apple ear buds always fall out of my ears). They also look good. I am very pleased with these.

title: Perfect ear buds
body:
I love my Tozo T10 wireless earbuds. They fit perfectly and sound even better. I can highly
recommend this product.

title: Great headphones for the price.
body:
I purchased these for my sons but quickly found I needed a pair myself. for $50 I don't think you'll find a better pair of waterproof bluetooth headphones with a self-charging case!  It's a brilliant design and easy to set up and use.

Pros: Love the size, waterproof design, and the self-charging case. The multiple ear cup sizes make sure it's a fit for any ear.  Super easy to use and the sound quality is acceptable for the price.  It's also great that you can accept calls and talk without needing to take the phone out of your pocket.

Cons: I have had a call where the other person could not hear me, but then on the next call they worked fine.  Also, I did hear from one caller that my voice was a bit muffled.

Neutral: I cannot speak to the battery life as I've not fully used them for a long period of time, but having the charging case is a nice feature.

title: Horrible battery life
body:
I bought this a few months ago and everything works well. Everything but the battery life. Despite being charged in it's case. I have to constantly recharge them. I only use them for about 45 minutes!!!

UPDATE:
I'm changing my previous rating. The previous one that I got was defective. The replacement one that I got can hold a charge a lot longer now!

title: Good noise cancellation, heavy base.
body: This is my first noise cancellation product and also my first wireless earbud, and I must say I am very happy with it. The base quality is also amazing, I couldn't believe these little things would be able to provide such a rich and heavy base. It does sounds abit artificial and non-organic, for a lack of a better word. But I cannot complain at all. The overall sound quality is a good experience. As for usability, the interactive buttons and self paring (R and L) are VERY EASY to maneuver. Literally, just need to read 3 short sentences of instruction for use to understand what's going on.  This earbuds would a great gifts for people are working/want to work out, or the generally anyone who are looking for earbuds.

title: Satisfecho totalmente se recomienda
body: Muy buen producto!!  Suena muy bien, facil de usar.

title: Good quality and good sound
body: I used it a handful of times and so far so good. Build quality seems excellent as is the case/charger. Only downside is headphones don't have much audio control except play/pause with button press. Also can't seem to be able to power off unless you place the headphones back into the case. But the auto pair once you take it out of the case is nice feature. This does have a lot of bass for it's size and good form factor. Being waterproof was definitely a reason I chose this. So far so good.

title: Great sound
body: These earbuds are amazing.  Went to the gym yesterday and it felt like I was there by myself.  All I could hear was the music I was playing. They fit perfectly in my ear. Didn't fall out while I was running.

title: Excellent product at a great price.
body: The only reason I did not give them 5 stars is that I have not had a chance to test them thoroughly, but I will say, everything about the product is well done. All the components are made of solid material, and the quality and design are well done, but I must say I have trouble keeping the left ear bud in place, but that is more of the way my ear canal is shaped than the product. I compared them to other buds of the same price and there is no comparison. All in all I would recommend them.

title: Bought 2 of these for me and my daughter
body: These earbuds were shipped on time, in great condition.  So far they fit great, and sound amazing.  The instructions tell you to twist them when putting them in and that really works.  Wireless charging or usb charging for the base, and they are nice and clearly marked Left and Right, so you don't have to strain your eyes to see which ear they go in, or which spot in the base they go in.  Would highly recommend them.

title: Racially triggering product descriptions
body: Admittedly, for the first 3 minutes of owning this product, I was pleased. I do not like the look (or price) of airpods, so I was on the hunt for more affordable and aesthetically pleasing wireless headphones/earbuds. The reviews for this product were very good, so I went ahead and purchased them. To make a long story less long, I was trying to read more about how the two earbuds communicated to one another, so of course I picked up the instruction manual. It detailed how I should connect the left earbud, "the slave", to the right earbud, "the master". I have no idea how this sort of racially-triggering product description was put out there for public consumption. Referring to pieces of plastic as slave and master is also just unnecessary - they could have simply been called right and left earbuds. I had no choice but to return these despite the 3 minutes of excitement I felt upon first trying them out.

title: Great earbuds!
body: Gave these a try because I couldn't stomach the cost of the Apple AirPods.  Just got them, haven't really used them yet, but the price was right, fit and finish looks good, and I like the multiple tips so you can find one that fits your ears.  So far, so good.  Will be putting them to the test in about 2 hours.  Looking forward to it.

title: Better than a few others I've tried
body:
For wireless earbuds, their sound quality is much better than a few other ones. While the bass quality doesn't match taotronics noise-cancelling earbuds that I have, they are better than other wireless earbuds.

The design isn't necessarily bad, but it can improve. I don't like how they put the "L" and "R" so big at the center of the earbud where it can be seen. Instead, a logo should have been placed there.

title: Really enjoy true wireless ear buds
body: These things are great all around. I like using my when I go to the gym, or doing work around the yard. My old Bluetooth earbuds were better than having a line running from the phone and getting tangled in something, but having no wires at all is wonderful. Sound quality is great, I'm not an audiophile, but they sound better than my previous Bluetooth set. They look way better than those stupid air pods also.

title: WOW - Very Nice!
body: I have to admit I was a little anxious of what level of quality sound I was in for - since I had bought these at such an awesome price. The sound was rich and full so of course they passed the first step.  Since this is my first attempt at using wireless buds I was then concerned they would easily fall out - not so, they fit great.  If they didn't, there were additional sizes already included. They passed the next test.  Ease of pairing - you guessed it PASSED.  I was extremely pleased with every aspect of the product!  ( I can't speak on the waterproof part of the claim.)

title: No Issues Works as Expected
body: Charge lasts and the sound quality is good. I would not wear these for noise cancellation. I’ve had no issues with this product but be sure to read what the features are and what you want in earbuds.

title: Awesome Quality at Great Price
body:
I was thoroughly impressed with the Tozo T10. The packaging was incredible, the build quality is top notch, and an amazing set of features for the price even if the price was twice as high. Wireless charging, IPX8 waterproofing, high quality 8mm sound driver, and bluetooth v5.0 are just a few of the high end features the T10's have to offer.

Pairing them with my phone was too easy. The clarity of the highs and the richness of the bass are of the quality level of the highest end earbuds. I have personally taken these into the shower, I wasn't actually showering at the time, both of the earbuds and the case itself are extremely water resistance. Finally, I have to say the Qi wireless chargeable case is very handy. I can set my phone and earbud case on my Qi charging pad and I'm good to go. If you have never used wireless charging, you need to. All in all for the price I could not find a better earbud on the market.
More than value for money

title: Don't plan on using these for making calls! TERRIBLE microphone!
body:
Disclaimer - I was contacted by TOZO and they sent me a free wireless charging pad for my 5 star review of this product.  They do that apparently because the earbuds are awful for making calls.  If you want to use them for listening to music, even in wet applications, sure, go for it.  The poor reviews saying they don't work underwater are silly - Bluetooth can't transmit through a body of water - but the 1 star reviews actually telling you that they don't work when people are trying to hear you talking in completely dry, quiet conditions, those are spot on.

I contacted the company back about this serious issue through their two email accounts they were communicating with me through and heard no reply.  Samsung Galaxy Buds may only have a 2 water resistance rating while these claim to have an 8, but if you can't use them for talking on the phone, they get a 1 star from me AND are being sent back!

title: Guess How Many Times You Will Have to Charge These!
body: They have so many reviews because they offer a 10$ gift card to review them.. I've purchased many earbuds off of amazon and these are very below average mainly because the battery life is 3-4 hours... get some sensos earbuds for 20$ they sound better and last 2-3 times as long

title: Worth it
body: The only thing I don't like is that when I use them to talk on the phone everyone says it's hard to hear me. So i just use my other set for talking. Other than that the battery life is great and it's pretty great at blocking out other noises.

title: That they quality and fit my needs for fitness!
body:
I have been searching for ear buds that sound great and will stay in my ears when I work out and when I am in my road bike.
Need less to say these are fabulous, sweat proof , water proof , multiple ear pugs so they fit correctly. Great job amazon!

title: Excellent purchase!
body:
I've been using these for a month now, and they are perfect! They were exactly what i was looking for, now i can listen to podcasts at work without disturbing anyone else! They work either one at a time, or both at the same time if you prefer.

These earbuds have fantastic battery life, i listen to them 8 hours a day, 5 days a week, and i only have to charge the unit twice. It has a convenient micro-usb charge port on the back, and battery indicator lights to show when its getting low.

The lid is even translucent, so you can watch it charge even with the lid down.

I havent tested the waterproofing yet, but i love the idea that i can go to the gym and sweat it out without worrying about shorting out my earbuds.

title: Great price for a top notch product!
body:
I have to say I was pretty impressed with the Tozo T10's. Packaging and build quality is high-end. Wireless charging is a bonus. IPX8 waterproofing is the icing on the cake! I am an avid mountain biker and these perform in the rain without issue so far.

Pairing was simple. Just make sure you take them both out of the case at the same time and choose TOZO-T10-R. These sound just as good as high-end earbuds but at 1/4 of the cost! I have some wireless Beats and I can't tell the difference. I wanted something I could ride with and not worry about a $200 investment! I typically ride for 60-90 minutes and I can easily get 2 rides out of them before recharging. The charging case is top notch as well. It's quite sturdy and can be charged wirelessly. Can't say enough about these little earbuds. If you're in the market for some earbuds, look no further. You won't regret this buy!

title: Great fit and sound! UPDATED
body:
My big issue with ear buds is generally they either do not fit correctly or they sound terrible. Love these ear buds as they both sound and fit perfect, I will be purchasing a second pair for my wife.
UPDATE****
After using these for awhile, the sound is still great, but the left ear bud cuts out very often. It also has issues pairing with devices. Half the time I have to manually pair the head phones which is very frustrating. The sound quality when they are connected is great though.

title: Absolutely worth the money and more!
body:
I am beyond impressed with these headphones. I’ve used Bose Soundsport wireless headphones for the past 3 years because I loved the quality of sound and the battery life. However, both pairs I had started to mess up and wouldn’t charge, plus connectivity sucked. So i decided to take a chance and try these after looking at reviews and the great price.
The bass and overall sound of the earbuds is amazing, and in my opinion pretty darn close to that of Bose. The noise canceling is perfect; I can’t hear much at all around me when they’re in. They are also pretty comfortable. The medium size rubber covers they came in work just right.
Pairing is super quick and I was able to test the connectivity. I was able to leave my phone in my bedroom which is in one corner of the house and walked into the kitchen about 2 rooms away and the connection still worked.

These are a great buy especially if you’re a college student on a budget and don’t wanna blow a ton of money on AirPods or something else.

title: Good overall!!!
body:
Pros: decent sound, good bass (depending on the silicone insert), battery life, small battery case, water resistance, wireless charging capability

Cons: no music controls, sometimes fall out of ear

Overall a good decent pair of wireless earbuds.

title: Good.
body: This is a nice ear bud player but they don’t seem to fit in my ears to well. My wife has a pair and she loves her, and they fit well in her ear canal. The sound not bad at all, really good...but could be better. Battery life is about 3 hours. Takes about 20 minutes to charge them. A good product but not great.

title: The best or better for the price
body:
About six months ago I lost a pair of Power Beats.  Which are very expensive in my income bracket as a school teacher.  I used them at the gym to help me escape the terrible music they blast over the PA.  I listen to podcast and music that is more meditative.  So I searched Google, Youtube reviews and personal recommendations for a new set of headphones.  Number one on my list was not to spend as much money.
I bought the gambit of cheap headphones.  All the way down to five dollars.  Then for my 65th birthday.  I decided to get myself a decent pair of headphones for my birthday.  But without spending a fortune.
 I decided to check on Amazon and discovered TOZO T10.  They got great reviews and I got them in two days.
They are amazing.  I love going to the gym again.  They are extremely comfortable.  The sound is every bit as good as my power beats.  Though I do wish they had a surround sound mode for listening to movies on my iphone.  But that might be a little bit too much for the price.  Do I recommend these?  Whole heartedly yes.

title: What great wireless headphones!
body: I've never used wireless earbuds before so I was a bit skeptical, but the first time I paired them to my phone the sound was phenomenal!  On my wired ear buds I had to turn the volume almost to it's max setting to blur our the noise of the lawnmower, with these i had to turn them down because the sound filled my ears and the noise cancelling made the mower a non issue.  I love these so far!

title: Lasted 3 months
body:
UPDATE: They were great while they lasted. Out of nowhere the left earpiece stopped working. It powers on and off but does not connect or play music. I can still hear the female voice in the earpiece when I press the buttons but it is more high pitched than it used to be suggesting some electrical malfunction.
