Also, after 3 months of use I can tell you that it's not good enough for calls. People on the other end complain that my voice sounds distant as if I was talking 5 feet away from the device.
VERY DISAPPOINTED.

- - - - -

SOUND QUALITY: Treble and Mids are really good. I am indeed hearing musical notes I could not hear with my standard Apple earphones. However,  the bass is lacking. I am no bass freak, but these would be perfect if it had just a bit more bass. You can only compensate for the lack of base by having the ear buds very tight and deep inside your ear canal to "trap" the sound. This is very disappointing.

FIT: They hold up fine in the ear with little chance of falling even when running. UNLESS your ear canals get wet. Either from sweat of from showering/swimming then they fall right out. I run 30 min every day and by minute 10, I am sweating and have to constantly push the earbuds back into position or they get very loose and the sound quality is affected.

WATERPROOF: They are waterproof and I have used them in the shower 3 times so far. BUT this is pretty much a useless feature because as soon as your ear canals get moist, the earbuds fall out. If you're thinking about using the when swimming, you can forget about it. They will fall right out as soon as you get your ears wet. I am speaking from experience. And even if they held up in your ear, the range is only 10 meters. So in a standard 25 meter pool, you will constantly be losing reception.

BATTERY: I love that the case can charge the earbuds up to 4 times without plugging anything into an outlet. I rarely use them for more than an hour straight so battery life is never an issue for me.

title: Good to Go
body: Really impressed with these solid affordable option for wiresless bluetooth earbuds.  Really nice sound quality for the price point and solid retention in the ear. I Have not had any issues with them pairing or connecting and they stay in great while performing all sorts of tasks whether its at home doing chores or at the gym working out. Nice to have the magnetic retention in the case when your done along with the charging feature. Helps me get through a whole week of workouts without having to worry about charging. Watch for sales and these will be a huge score. I have purchased two sets already to have a spare and would definitely purchase another set if needed in the future. Only addition I wish it had was a way to adjust volume or skip tracks but given the size I understand it is not really possible

title: Appears to be waterproof to set standards
body: These earbuds are great. The quality of the sound is good. They charged quickly. I even dropped one in the hot tub accidentally. I picked it up and dried it off and put it back in my ear and kept listening.

title: Great Product
body: I just got these recently and I am not disappointed at all. I'm sure there are some better and more expensive wireless earbuds out there, but for the price these definitely are some of the best. Great sound, good bass, and a comfortable ear fit. I am very satisfied with these.

title: Pretty Good, but battery doesn't warn almost out
body:
I wanted to wait before I gave a review. So I've used the buds for about 3 weeks so far.  Pros:  small and fit in ear pretty nicely (I don't jog with them, but I do walk), sturdy (I dropped them before, and no problems), charges quickly, no wires, love carrying case to pop them in to charge. Cons:  No warning they are about to die, battery life is about 3 hours (so if you listen to Audibles/Travel and talk - you'll need 2 pair), wiggles out of ear a little - not a perfect fit (but what is perfect?).
Overall, I'm going to stick with them.  They just take some getting used too because I used my prior wireless headset all day before needing a charge.

title: Kick ass head phones 🔥🔥🔥🔥
body: Ok so I am big fan of skull candy head cause they r loud an just last for a while I put my head phones threw a lot was gonna buy a pair again instead I gave the tozo a try never had a pair but I like the idea of no wires so they arrive today an I tell u they sounds just as good an just as loud as my skull candys an can’t wait to see how they do wen at the skate park but for the last 20 mins listening to them they r most deff worth the money an will buy them again twice thank u 🤘🏻Hope they last a little while I like high volume all day so we will see

title: Terrible product.
body: Terrible product and terrible customer service. They only last 3 hours on a good day and the left earbuds keeps breaking up and disconnecting. When I told the seller about it he did not offer to replace them he just offered to refund me 30%. He kept telling me that the they have a hard time communicating through the head. Well, isn't that what they are supposed to do? I went with the JBuds for the same price and they are awesome. 14+ hours of continuous play time and INCREDIBLE sound.

title: Top notch sound quality and noise reduction for its price!
body:
I recently had my (very expensive) pair of Powerbeat earbuds break recently, and not being a big fan of the Apple buds I went looking for a cheaper alternative. I was a bit skeptical of this product despite the number of postive reviews because of its price, but decided to give it a shot anyways. And now that I have it my, well, ears for about a week now I can safely say that it is completely worth the money!

I was actually blown away at the sound quality of these earbuds, and putting them in pretty much blocks out any other sounds for me. Along with that, a constant problem I had with my Powerbeats is that they would constantly keep falling out of my ears despite having those odd (and apparently pretty fragile after said breakage) ear hooks. But these buds stay in my ears no matter if I'm jogging, going up stairs, doing jumping jacks, or whatever odd movements.

Overall, I really can't recommend the product enough, and if you're looking for an alternative to the more recognizable brands than this one is a fantastic choice.

title: Not good for jogging or gym. Left ear cuts out
body:
Update a month out. Right ear quit charging. Contacted tozo and they sent me a new pair and they work great. Left ear does not drop at all. Sent me a wireless charger for inconvenience also. Customer service did a good job.

The sound quality is excellent. They fit well in my ears. Very easy to use and connect. Charging case is convenient. Problem I have with them is the left ear cuts out a couple times a minute while jogging or working out. If sitting at my desk or driving they work great but I purchased them to use while working out so 3oo5 rating from me

title: Excellent fit and sound!
body: There is nothing to dislike about these earbuds.  They sound great and fit perfectly.  Four tip sizes to choose from for perfect fit.  There were so many choices for earbuds out there, these had all the promised features, including that they were water proof, and they came through.  Excellent choice.

title: Great set of earbuds for a great price.
body: I bought these as a birthday present for my wife. She loved them. She likes the small size and light weight. The sound quality is great for a $50 set of earbuds. The wireless charging ability is great since the charging port cover is not the easiest to open. They say that they are waterproof, but we haven't tested that yet. All in all, I think $50 was a great price for what we got.

title: Tons of background noise
body: These are great for listening to music  Sound quality is good while listening to music,  but if you are on the phone the person you’re talking to hears nothing but background noise making it difficult Fire the other person to hear you.

title: FINALLY !!!  Ear buds that WORK as promised
body:
1st off let me say these are my 5th or 6th try at getting great sound out of ear buds.  I was thinking that it just wasn't doable.  Ordered these earlier today and they showed up early evening, wow and wow.  Went with white as I am tired of losing things in airplanes and gyms.  Nice change.

So, sound quality:  WOW.  I listen to a lot of Latin: Prince Royce, Romeo Santos, Aventura.... things with lots and lots of harmonies and mid range percussion, bongos and crazy things.  To FINALLY get buds that bring out that myriad of sound is an answer to a prayer.  Clear, crisp highs, clean drums and mid ranges, clear voice.  The base is just right, very present but not overwhelming.  Listening to Daddy Yankee Dura, holy crapioly,  amazing percussion....  I feel like breaking into Zumba!!!

 I would say just about perfect sound.  The best I have heard this side of my $1,500.00  Alpine Audio in my Nissan Z.

I like that they are waterproof, not that I am going to go swimming with them in to test it, but still kind of cool.  More than able to handle sweaty LA Fitness trips.  Gotta love the wireless charging feature too.

All this for $49.00 is CRAZY.  So glad I kept trying and returning until I found these gems.  I will be looking no further.

My only suggestion would be to include Comply foam ear tips.  That would be a huge  win.

title: Can't use buds independently 👎🏻
body: The sound on these headphones are great not going to lie. But you CANNOT use just one at a time. If both aren't on the one you are using beeps constantly till you pair the other one and drain both batteries at once. If you're hoping to charge one while using the other to double the usage, try another pair....

title: Music sounds great, phone calls not so much.
body:
These earbuds get a 3-4 rating. Sound quality when I listen to music is excellent, but when I talk on the phone with them the other party can barely hear me. The battery life is great.. they got delivered to my house in a timely fashion and the price was right..
They are also pretty heavy and I have a hard time keeping them in my ears. I could definitely not run in them, but they’re ok for listening to sounds at work. I may end up trying to order some ear hooks to keep them in place.

title: Good earphones for the price
body:
The sounds quality is very good in my opinion. The battery life could be better, of both the earbuds and the charging case. And I don't like that it continuously tells you that the battery life is low for the last several minutes of the battery life. It interrupts your listening. They aren't true noise cancelling, but if you choose the right earbud size, they do keep out a decent amount of ambient sound. They are definitely waterproof. I have worn them in the shower and dropped them in water without issue.
I did have a problem with my right earbud (the main one) and am needing to have it replaced. It stopped pairing to my phone. Working with the company to have it replaced has been easy, however.
Overall, I think they are a good earphone for the price.

title: THE BEST
body: I love the sound and not having to untangle my wires since these are wireless. I had a call come in while working out on bike and I could talk and hear their voice great and went back to music as soon as call was finished....awesome.....love, love these for running and working out. Read another review and realized I have extra buds to adjust to my ears and this is even a better fit.

title: Great Value
body:
This product looks very sleek and high quality.  The ease of syncing to Bluetooth is as simple as it gets.  They cancel outside noise very well and the sound quality is great.

The reason I didn't give full 5 stars is that I have noticed that while the sound is great quality, people I call often say they cannot hear me very well so I end up taking them off and just using my phone directly.  I'm not sure if there's a setting I can adjust to have a stronger microphone, but that's been the biggest issue.  For listening to music, however, the headphones are great.

title: Amazing quality for the price
body: My husband bought these earbuds for him and I soon as I tried them on they became mine. The sound quality is excellent.They fit in my ears perfectly as you have different sizes of plastic ear caps to try in your box. When you are done with them you put them back in their little box to be charged. You don’t have to pair them they automatically find your device as long as your bluetooth is on. They are waterproof too but you can loose your signal if you go underwater. Great wireless Earbuds.

title: Generally good, but with some minor annoyances.
body:
I've had these a few months now and wanted to share my experience. It's easy to review right away (something they kept pestering me to do with initial impressions that don't line up with longer term usage. I've generally been happy with them, but there are a few things that have annoyed me about them.

I bought these to replace the cheap wired earbuds I've used for years to mainly use to listen to audiobooks while riding my bike, doing chores and running errands. I haven't really listened to a lot of music with them so I can't speak too well to how they sound as the requirements for audiobooks are pretty different. But they've been pretty good for my audiobooks.

There are two things that I really love about these. The first is the ability to start/stop my audio book by pressing the earbud without having to fumble for my phone, which is especially valuable while riding. The other is the general convenience of wireless. With my old wired earbuds I constantly caught the wires on my handlebars of my bike and a variety of other things when doing chores that'd pull them out of my ears.

The first few times I rode my bike I was in constant fear of them falling out of my ears. That was my fault for not trying out every size. I went with something that seemed to fit fine at home but as I rode they felt like they'd pop out so I was constantly re-adjusting. Once I got the right size that feeling has mostly subsided. It's really worth your time to play around with all the sizes even if one of them feels good when you try them. There may be another size that fits better.

My main issues now are dropped connections and charging.

I was reluctant to switch to wireless because I didn't want to deal with having keep them charged, but that has mostly been a non-issue. I did have a day where I thought it was charging only to realize the right earbud was out of power halfway through my ride. Since the connection to the phone goes through the right one, I couldn't simply use the left earbud and had to cut my ride short.

I have found it can be sometimes buggy where the right earbud wants to stay connected to the phone and won't charge even when I have it back in the charging case. I reread the manual and don't recall seeing any tips on this, but I've found it works best when you put the left earbud in first and once the red light comes on the put in the right earbud and close the lid. If you don't close the lid it seems to stay connected to the phone.

I haven't tried the recharging of the case on the go very much so I can't speak to how well that extends the battery life, but apart from when it didn't charge properly I've never run into issues with the battery life even after several hours of usage. However I've never needed a full day on the go and I'd typically have the case plugged in and would top off the buds when I didn't need them in between activities where I did.

When I ride I keep my phone in my pocket as I don't have any sort of armband. Most of the time it's fine, but often when I raise my head slightly to drink some water the audio drops off for a few seconds. I'm not sure why. I once accidentally left my phone on a different floor of my house and it kept playing for awhile without issue, so I don't think it's a distance issue. It's annoying but not a major issue.

I've also found issues with the initial pairing to my phone if I pull the left earbud out of the case too soon. So now I tend to just pull out the right and wait for it to pair with the phone, then pull out the left. The left will pair to the right almost immediately after so it just works smoother for me this way.

title: Neat Charging System and Excellent Sound Quality
body: The little wireless earbuds have great sound quality for listening to music.  They go into the box for storage/charging and automatically pair when they are pulled out of the charging box.  The charging box has a battery of its own so the earbuds get charged even when not connected to a charging cord or wireless charger.  If using for phone calls, the mic isn't great - it picks up sound from everyone nearby.  We'll keep them to listen to music because that part is great!

title: Excellent ear buds
body: Was hesitant to order these. I was used to a pair of expensive shure ear buds so I thought these would be a total let down. These are so convenient and the sound quality is superb. The bass is actually a bit deeper than my shure ear buds. Love the portable charging case. And it charges just fine on my iPhone wireless charger. Extremely impressed.

title: Will not stay in.
body: I read most of the reviewed and sounded great however they just don’t stay in, I’ve tried different ways to put them in and is impossible. And that was just on a treadmill, can’t wait to see what happens when I take them on trails.

title: You won't regret it
body:
I spent quite a bit of time researching wireless earbuds to pair with my devices, trying to find some that won't break the bank but are still great quality. I must say, these earbuds were the answer I was searching for to meet my needs. They have great sound, fit comfortably for hours of wear, and are incredibly easy to pair.

I highly recommend these if you are looking for a set of wireless earbuds that are affordable and great quality.

title: This product could use more work.
body:
The positive side is they were nice and loud and they stayed in my ear with little to no falling out.

There were three overall problems that need to be fixed. 1). When on the phone the other party was unable to hear  me unless I removed the right earbud and spoke int it directly. 2). When I moved my head from side to side, the left earbud would fade in and out. Lastly they would constantly disconnect and reconnect to my cellphone(s).

title: Amazing sound
body:
I purchased these ear buds just a few days ago and they came straight away. Connected them to my phone, which was incredibly easy, and proceeded to listen to talk information. I was impressed by the clarity and noise canceling of the units. I honestly have a hard time hearing anything outside of the sound coming from the speakers. This morning I decided to listen to music (heavy metal), and was once again VERY pleased with the quality of the product. The full range of dynamic sound is actually way better than I was prepared for at the price of them.
If I did have one complaint, it would be that they could go louder. Personal preference of course as I like my music to BLAST my ears when I am in the zone! :)
All in all this is a GREAT PRODUCT and I would recommend them to anyone.

title: Amazing Product
body: It is a fantastic earbud! I was in the jacuzzi and the right Earbud fell in the water. I know that it is waterproof, but it says on the manual that it is not for soaking in the water. Surprisingly, after I dried it, it works, and it sounds very well.

title: Great headphones!
body: I replaced my old Senso headphones with a set of these because my old headphones were broken after several years of heavy use. I am glad I bought these because they fit snug, have great sound quality, and come with a convenient charging case. My only minor caveat is that the audio sometimes cuts out occasionally, but I still recommend this product because of Tozo’s great customer service and the overall build quality.

title: These things are amazing!
body:
This is the first pair of Bluetooth headphones I've owned; partly because I'd always feared that the pairing would be a pain. But my experience with the Tozo T10s has been just the opposite. By the time I pull the first earbud out of the charging case and stick it in my ear, it's already announcing that it has paired with my TV (I bought them for bedroom TV watching so as not to disturb my wife, who's usually reading).
  The sound quality is excellent; way better than listening to the TV speakers. Dialog is clear, and you get a way better sense of "space" through these.
  Highly recommended, especially for the cost. (They're also great in the gym and stay in quite well.)

title: Easy to use, sometimes buggy
body: Great pair of earbuds. If you drop 'em, you can spend a lot of time looking for them though! Left channel cuts out about 15% of the time, but usually consistent sound.

title: Definitely not sport or calling headphones
body: Alright I am just like any other amazon buyer and the reviews are important and this is the FIRST one I’ve ever written so that should say something. These headphones are awful. They don’t stay in my ear when I run, they constantly cut out, they are constantly disconnecting and repairing when on the phone so I cut out and they battery life is garbage. They may work better for an Android but I have the iPhone 11 pro and they are garbage with it.

title: Very surprised!!
body: I was HIGHLY surprised! The sound is AMAZING.  I had a slight issue with the left for a half second and just clicked it again and it was totally fine and has been since.  The sound alone is worth every penny, I’m shocked they have the price tag they do.  Buying my husband a pair now!

title: Excellent Earbuds
body: I love these earbuds. I normally have problems keeping earbuds in my ears, but not these. After following the instructions, I found them to fit perfectly. They are solid even when I move or shake my head. The sound quality is excellent. The charging box is well designed with a semi opaque top so you can see the charging progress and the buds snap right into place in the box. I have not had any problems with pairing. They are ready to go after 2 or 3 seconds. For the price these earbuds are a bargain.

title: It's a lottery draw.
body: Absolute crap. Crapped out after two days of work. Stupid me got rid of the box, so I can't return it. The left and right ear buds keep alternating connecting and disconnecting,  it's annoying as hell. And as soon as I place my phone in my pocket, the signal gets choppy. This was an absolute waste of money.

title: The headphones are great, great quality, loud speech/music. But... (Hate case)
body:
The headphones are great, great quality, loud speech/music. But...

1st.) I have cheaper wireless headphones that last longer and are smaller. These headphones last between 3 - 3 1/2 hours, cheap headphones last 4 hours+, but I guess that's what you have to give up for better sound.

2nd.) I absolutely hate the Battery in the case every wireless headphone I  have had in the past have had a case that lasted 2 days or more. when I use these headphones for 4 hours in a day only one headphone at a time It doesn't completely drain the case battery after they charge, but it does go pretty low, like 1/4 blue lights. So I pretty much have to charge it every day. Also if I fully charge it and don't use it for like 3-4 days Its completely dead by the time I want to use it again, That's weird because none of my other wireless headphones does that (the cheapest brand at least keeps some charge in the case and the headphones always stay full)

All in all, These are the best sounding wireless headphones I own. It has an annoying beep when turned on but that dies out after 1 or 2 mins. I Just HATE the case.

EXTRA
P.S. when are they going to make some headphone that has good controls, they all suck in that category (Tip. 1 press for play and pause, 2 presses for skip song, 3 presses for repeat/go back a song.

title: Good Buy
body: The sound quality of these earbuds are better than the skullcandy earbuds I'm used to using. The pairing process was very easy, their instructions are easy to follow but pretty much you just need to pair your phone with the right earbud and the left is automatically connected with the right. I was personally concerned about how the earbuds would feel in my ear, but I think after wearing them a couple times, you get used to it and don't even realize they are in your ear. I wanted a truly wireless earbud that had good sound and could be used for exercising, I found this to be true for this earbud so if that's what you are looking for then I recommend trying this earbud out.

title: You should really get these.
body: Have tried a few wireless earbuds in the past but these ones are by far the best. Wireless charging is a plus. Build quality is superior and honestly, why pay more for another brand of these work just as well or even better

title: Great Earbuds For All Your Needs
body: After the first pair didn’t arrive on time, and actually never arrived, the secondary order did and wow. I was amazed instantly from the sleek look to the compact ability of the whole system. They work great. The material is sturdy and reliable.

title: Very Good Earphones!
body:
I loved these earphones. They're water/sweat resistance, so they didn't get damaged from exercising; they cancel out noise very well; they stayed in my ear with activity; they are pretty easy to use; good sound quality with a good bass.

My only complaint would be the battery life compared to my previous wireless earphones, but the portable charger, wireless charging that it provides, and how quickly the earphones charge sort of makes up for it. Would give it about a 4.5/5!

Would definitely purchase again if I need to.

title: Big bang for your buck
body: Very good ear buds. They can be used independently, but you will hear a beep every few seconds for about 30 seconds while the bud tries to connect to the other.  They are indeed waterproof at least for the shower or working in heavy rain. Battery lasts quite well while listening to audiobooks.

title: Fantastic for the money
body: Bought as a cheap alternative to air pods. I have no other wireless earbud experience, but I’m a fan of these. I usually just wear one so I can hear my surroundings at work. Sometimes I have to re adjust so they don’t fall out of my ear, but not enough for it to be a problem. Battery life is good enough, sound quality is acceptable as well, but I’m usually listening to podcasts so it’s more than adequate. Pretty good for music too. Recharging in the case is great. If they stopped working tomorrow I would buy another pair to replace them. Definitely worth the money.

title: Right earbud constantly falls out of ear
body:
It is honestly more of a 4.5 since I have one issue with the product. Other people not using the earbuds can hear the sound coming from them if it's being played loudly. Other than that, the product is great. I love the design, sound quality, and the way it fits snugly into my ear. I have not tried working out in them yet, but I think they should be fine.

Update:
Above was my initial review because they sent me an email saying I would get a free wireless charger if I gave them a review, so I thought that I might as well give them a good one. Anyways, it's been about a day of use, and the right earbud is always slipping out of my ear. I tried all the earbud sizes and none of them worked. I will be returning these earbuds shortly.

title: Very good product ( five stars)
body: The product has a smooth touch, excellent sound and seals really tight in my ears. I have tried this product while showering and still perform great. The box is also and excellent product. It has four recharge before any need of being recharge itself. Excellent product

title: Big Bang for your Buck!
body: For a while now, I've been looking for a pair of true wireless earbuds I can use at the gym without spending a whole lot of money. I came across these and decided to give it a shot. Best $50 spent! Sound quality and noise cancellation is great and it fits my ears perfectly. Battery life is awesome and the case is small enough for me to carry anywhere. I'd highly recommend these earbuds if you're looking for a cheaper alternative that's great in quality.

title: Great sound, easy to use, great value.
body: Headphones are as pictured.  Sound is great, has rich and full sound with decent bass.  Great value.  The case charges the headphones 2-4 times pending your use.  Easy to pair.  Haven't used the calling features yet but seems easy enough with a series of taps on the headset button.  Sometimes one or both headsets can disconnect if you move too far away from the source.  The charging case can be finnicky with the headsets and sometimes you have to spend several attempts to get the headset to register in the charging case accordingly.  Overall a great set of headphones.

title: Cordless the way to go!
body: Great for the gym, the case being a charger as well makes these an AWESOME buy!! Last about 3x's for a 3 hour gym trip per time when fully charged with the case before they need to go back on my wireless TOZO charger I use for these and my cell phone, no plugging in, even when I charge them, it is very nice with both of these items.

title: Bluetooth Connectivity Drops Frequently
body: I like the sound quality in these ear buds and they fit is nice.  I like the fact that the case charges them an is capable of wireless charging.  The problem that I have found however is that any time there is a strong breeze the bluetooth connectivity cuts out and the reconnects.  What the wind has to do with the bluetooth connectivity I'm not sure but I have noticed it.  Still debating on whether to return or exchange.

title: Excellent earbuds, stunning sound sound quality, great battery life, easy to pair to many devices!
body:
For a while I had resigned myself that i could't get great sound from earbuds but now I am totally impressed by the deep bass and clear highs. I had almost forgot the great sound I heard from my music collection until I got these earbuds. I could swear the bass is near sub-woofer levels and that is while jogging in the city. The noise cancellation blocks out most sound but still being able to hear sounds that you need to hear like fire engines. Just the perfect amount for me.

I am impressed by the battery life because I listen rather loudly and thought it would drain the battery too much but it has no effect on the battery life. I love the charging case!

I am constantly pairing between two laptops, an Nvidia Shield and my phone and I find myself looking forward to the voice assistance as I power up or pair to hear the message that I am connected to my device of choice. I have paired with devices that are Bluetooth 4.0, 4.1 and 5.0 with great success. I enjoy the range i have from my phone in one room while walking to another room. I used to think that only wired earbuds would sound great but I love these earbuds! The only downside is that you will love listening with these comfortable earbuds so much is that you won't get much work done.

I love the fact that this company is customer friendly and genuinely concerned with my opinion of the product and this is a relationship I am happy with.

I recommend these earbuds wholeheartedly!

title: Must buy
body: I love them. I’d suggest playing with the different earpiece sizes that it comes with in the package before going to workout so they don’t fall out as easy. I took them to the gym and during my workout (treadmill, squats, burpees) i honestly forgot they were in my ears. Amazing product for such a cheap price. They only thing i would change is how they don’t connect automatically to your phone. You have to go to settings every time to connect but that’s a small price to pay for such amazing earpieces.

title: Excellent earbuds!
body:
I love these earbuds!
They are great for everything!
I had no problem answering calls. The cancel noise when I am listening to music!
No regrets!

title: They slip out easily for me
body: My biggest concern was there's nothing to hold them in your, especially for those with tiny ear holes. no matter how deep you jam them in, they will slip out. if your are sitting still,  that's not an issue.  The Samsung buds have a liner that will ridge into place and if these buds had that, they'll be perfect. are there any smaller rubber caps?

title: Good sound but didn’t stay in place
body: I love the case for these headphone and the sound is great but I wouldn’t call them sport headphones while on a short one mile run I had to push them back in about 15 times and I’ve changed the size on the ear buds and they still fall out wearing them around the house for cleaning they only fell out when bending over so they are okay but I will be returning because they are not good for working out

title: Would be the best thing on the market if sound didn't drop out...
body:
This thing sounds and feels great. Definitely a better sound and fit then the Apple Air buds. However the sound cuts out on the left side when walking on the sidewalk. It does have a much more stable connection in an office environment where there is less (wifi?) interference. Unfortunately this dropout issue prevents it from being useful while walking or jogging outside (a problem the Airbuds do not share).

I contacted their support and they instructed me to reset it (turn off by holding down, hold down for 15 secs till purple light) but the problem persisted. It’s a pity because I would gladly have paid double the price if only it worked properly. I'll be looking for an alternative...

(ps - the charge on the buds lasts about 2 hours, then requires 1 hour in the case to recharge fully)

Update: Product support support is sending me a second pair so I will update this review if those work better. 5 stars for support in any case.

title: I exceed my expectations
body:
I exceed my expectations
I was tired of trying wireless earphones among them LG feeling really frustated and with my badly spent money, I bought the TOZO-10 earbuds and sincerely I was shocked, I did not espect the Sound Quality and its features, Awesome sound Quality and great fit

title: Great for the first week...
body:
Update 10-20-19
  I was really happy with the earbuds (despite the lack of volume control) until a few days ago. The left earbud will not hold a charge for more than a couple of hours while the right one can go for 5 or more. It's too bad since these are the first buds that actually stay in my ears.

I just unboxed the earbuds and had them paired with my phone, Echo Dot and Amazon Fire stick within a matter of minutes. The sound is great and they actually stay in my ears. The only issue I have is that there's no volume control on the earbuds and I can see that as being a major inconvenience (hence the 4 star rating.)

title: Superb Sound Quality!
body:
I was a bit skeptical at first when I looked at this product, regarding its quality. But after using it for 3 weeks I can confirm that I made the right choice going with this. The sound quality is just awesome. It has a stereo bass kind of effect that surrounds you and Bluetooth 5.0 makes it even better with longer range and its superior data rate. You won't find any difference between this product and your wired earphones in terms of quality.
I was able to use these earbuds for 3 hrs straight which is pretty great. The charging case it comes with can be charged wirelessly and it can charge your earbuds twice, completely. All in all, I would recommend this product. For the price, it's definitely a win!

title: Outstanding sound quality!
body: Just got these a few days ago and I am very impressed with them. The bass is more than I expected, even better than the LG Tone headphones. The pairing is also easier than I thought it would be, seeing that there are no really visible controls. The wireless charging for the case works very well and the case charges the buds quickly. I ran them down all the way and after only a few minutes of charging I could use them again, although not fully recharged. I would definitely recommend these earbuds. Well worth the price.

title: No cords! Awesome pairing and sound!
body: I'm not an expert on noise cancellation ear buds but I can still hear all of what I need to hear while still picking up a conversation in the background. Whether or not this is normal I think it is great because personally I still like to know what is going on around me. These buds are great because I can cook and even blow dry my hair and watch or listen to something for the first time in my life. Also, you don't have to worry about wires!!!! I love the new found freedom. Everything about them, the pairing, the case for charging, and hassle free way they go in the ears is fabulous. Great company too. Good job!

title: Quality product great customer service.
body: I liked the sturdy construction since day one. The product is well made and light weight. The connection and programming is flawless and works great. Even after a few drops from up on a ladder the earbuds wash off and work perfectly. And customer service is top notch! Great response times and they actually care about their customers, such a rarity nowadays.

title: Great quality for the price!
body: I love these! They sound great! The battery lasts a good while! No wires! My only problem with them is the annoying beeping they do when you connect one ear bud to your phone but not the other. I like to be able to listen to audiobooks while I grocery shop, but want to have an ear free to listen around me.

title: Great headphones for running
body: These headphones have been great so far, I run with them and was pleasantly surprised at how well they stay in my ears, i have a new pair of the wireless Bose over the ear headphones and to be honest the base that comes from these is better if not just as good.

title: Other than occasional blip sound is great! Fantastic for Music! Too quiet for phone calls
body:
I really enjoy these headphones. They came for a great price and the experience of using them is great.

Pros:
Great Sound - Rich Bass
Less expensive than other similar headphones
Suction cup earbuds with 4 sizes
Good battery life

Cons:
Mic too quiet for phone calls (using iPhone SE)
Will not auto-pair with phone, need to select earbuds in bluetooth menu before every use. Usually causes delay when answering a phone call

title: Left earbud cuts out when moving around
body: Thought I'd give these a try since they are the most popular earbuds on Amazon.  I think they have good sound quality - not professional of course but for most every day use, it is good.  They fit great in my ears and I like the simplicity of wireless charging, pairing, etc.  HOWEVER, the left earbud does in fact drop signal or cut out if you're doing any activity such as walking around, exercising, or just being outside.  This was my immediate experience after trying these out.  I'll probably keep them because I'm only using them in bed at night, but for anyone else, you might want to consider this.

title: Probably the best ear buds under $50
body: These are great. I tried 3 other Bluetooth wireless earbuds before this one and they all had spotty connection and just didn't feel as well built. These are a little bigger in my ear than I had anticipated, and they do become uncomfortable after a few hours. But at least I get a full work day of battery life, and over time I think I will get used to how they fit. Overall, I'd give these a 4.5.

title: Great for the price!
body: These things are great! I pop them in before taking a shower, and they work wonderfully! They have a good seal, and sound amazing. I work outside and I'm not worried about these in the rain. I forget that they're in my ear and can wear them all day.. I think they've only died on me once.. And that was after about 6 hours without putting them back in the case. I think I've charged the case maybe once a week if I remember.. The case hasn't died on me once.

title: Decent quality at a decent price.
body: I bought these after I broke my last pair of buds and at first I was skeptical of these as I had never heard of the brand, but they turned out to be pretty good though. I'm not an elitest audiophile, so I don't really care that these aren't the best possible sound quality and noise cancellation. I actually can get 5+ hours off one charge as opposed to the 3.5 they advertise plus the actual charger has a pretty good battery capacity. Overall pretty good. If you're on the fence about these I would recommend them.

title: FAKE REVIEWS. DO NOT BUY CHEAP CHINESE GARBAGE
body: I was willing to give them a chance until this lovely email. All the reviews are fake. Can't connect to my windows 10 PC. Sounds worse than an $8 pair of ear buds. They do however block noise out completely for me so I will give them that. Battery life is about 4 hours or so. I am not going to hang onto my product and wait to see how long they last when there are plenty of other products that aren't trash.

title: Felt a bit like a prototype with bugs
body: With so many good reviews, I expected these to be a bit easier to work with.  Sound quality is on par with what I expected for this price range. What got me was the pairing process for each time I’d connect. It wasn’t consistent in turning on when I pulled the first one out of the case and it never connected both without some awkward on/off sequencing of each earbud.  They also showed up as individual Bluetooth connections (one L and one R) which was really odd way to deal with a stereo pair.  Also the earbuds wouldn't consistently charge. They seemed to need to pushed really hard into the case to charge.  I ended up with the Anker neo libertys and those are pretty seamless

title: Best Value and Product
body: These are the best earbuds I have ever had. If you are like me, you go through several pairs  of earbuds a year and it is hard to find ones that live up to their price point.  They have great sound quality and are extremely comfortable. I would recommend them to anyone who finally wants to have one pair of earbuds they can commit to.

title: Excellent earbuds! Best Value on Amazon!
body: I needed these to be able to make Bluetooth phone calls on my cell phone and use them on Zoom calls on my computer and laptop. I have only had them a few days but people have told me my voice is coming through clearer than when I had my phone up to my ear. The sound is great and I just bought a second pair for my wife!

title: terrible audio quality and connection stability
body: I got these to replace a set of bluetooth earphones (with the left and right buds connected by a wire) to use for workouts, conference calls, and listening to audiobooks / music while walking outdoors.  These earphones failed at delivering even decent quality on all 3.  The left and right earbuds frequently go out of phase, so there's a micro-delay between the L and R channels.  If that's not bad enough, if you're in a crowded gym, outside with your iPod / iPhone in your pocket, or ANY situation other than "empty room with your paired device 3 inches away from the earbuds and no obstruction between the 2," there are frequent gaps in the audio. This proved true on multiple devices, with a full battery charge, and basically every other situation I can imagine.  Don't buy these, they're not worth it.

title: Great sound quailty with wireless charging case, well worth the money!
body: I love these ear buds! This is the 1st pair of Bluetooth ear buds that i have ever owned and for the price they sound really good.  My favorite feature is the wireless carging case, that is awesome!  My only problem is i dont have a wireless charger yet.

title: magnetic charging case is very nice!
body: I love these earbuds! They turn on and pair up as soon as you take them from the case. They are very comfortable to wear and stay in my ears without falling out! They sound fantastic!

title: Quality headphones for reasonable price
body: Initially, I was skeptical about buying wireless headphones because my main concern is sound quality. Apple airpods have great sound quality but do not fit my ears. With these headphones, they provide just that and more. I am also an active person so I use these while at the gym. I also recently found out that I can swim with them, but not deep underwater and they work perfectly and still work at a far distance. All in all, this is definitely worth the buy.

title: Great sound and battery life
body: Great sound quality and amazing battery life! Tozo is a good company to buy from too. I had an issue with the headphones, and they kept in contact with me to figure out how to fix it. 10/10 would recommend to a friend

title: EASY TO WORK WIRELESS EARBUDS!!!
body:
The TOZO wireless earbuds were exactly what I was looking for. I watch many YouTube videos late at night and really needed something quick and easy to wear to listen to videos while my family slept. I thought I had selected the white colored ones upon ordering but i received the black ones and I was still happy with them. Will love a second pair for my husband who’s a runner but will have to wait for now. The different size earbuds that come with the product help out but my teenage daughter was still unable to find the right size for her when she tried to borrow them from me since she has super tiny ear canals. I would definitely recommend them to anyone looking for wireless earbuds.

One thing they did not have that might make them better is the ability to control volume. Unless I totally missed the instructions on how to work the volume feature, I don’t think you can do that with these wireless buds. The feature of easily managing phone calls simply by tapping on the earbuds is so cool though!

title: Not worth
body: Does not fit in the ear properly and it falls down every 30 seconds. Sound Quality is below average. Dollar store earphones are better than this. Returning the product.

title: Great for phone calls
body: Got this ear buds after my previous ones went dead. Pleasantly surprised not only by the wireless charging case, but the quality of them in phone calls - can hear the calls in both sides, and the other party hear me really clearly.

title: Superior quality for a great price
body: Sound quality is surprisingly really good, as well as the fit. They stay in your ears well unlike apples earbuds, these are very comfortable. I love the fact that the case serves as a charger and that you can put it on a wireless charging pad. Bluetooth pairing was super easy. My fiancé has apple’s AirPods and he was jealous of these. Love that these are superior quality for a great price!!

title: All around awesome product
body: I was a little hesitant ordering these as I have heard many stories of pour sound quality.  WOW!!  I couldn't be more impressed with these.  They came pretty much fully charged right out of the box.  When I turned them on BOOM!! awesome clarity and deep bass.  I for sure recommend these.  Thanks!

title: Great stereo Bluetooth headphones
body: These are the first Bluetooth headphones I have been happy with.  I have bought several different pair and these are the first ones that work well, don't drop communication, are water proof, and don't hurt my ears after having them in for several hours.  I would recommend these to anyone looking for a good pair of bluetooth headphones.

title: Awesome wireless ear buds for the money
body: Wow, I love these ear buds, the wireless charging is great, the sound quality is amazing. I will usually use one at a time and the battery will last about 4 hours each. When you use them both, outside sounds are almost totally nonexistent. I just bought a second pair to keep at the house. Great for mowing the yard.

title: Great for the $$
body: Great pair of headphones for the price. I’ve had a only one connect once or twice but it was easily rectified by a basic restart. For less than 1/3 cost of similar headphones these are phenomenal.

title: Best earbuds for this price range!!
body: I absolutely love these ear buds. I use audible almost consistantly. Especially at work. The sound quality is great and they are comfortable. No falling out or slipping. I love that the case is on a lanyard so I'm not losing it. I love that they 're waterproof as I have a tendency to fall asleep in the tub with them in. My only slight complaint is the distance the ear buds can go from my phone. Usually I would have my phone on the charger at home and have the ear buds in while I am doing housework, but the range on this pair doesn't reach my whole house. Very small downside and would absolutely recommend.

title: Great and Affordable Wireless Earbuds
body:
The earbuds work well and the price point was very good, the product came and it feels very solid.  I have small ear holes so it was great to see that it came with multiple sizes so you can switch it to your preferred size.

Pairing it was easy and there was a handy guide included so you don't have to look through the manual to get started.

The sound itself is nice for blue tooth, and the twisting action really keeps the buds in your ears so they don't fall out.

All in all a great product and I am left satisfied.

title: Perfect
body:
I got these to replace my non waterproof buds I had before and I'm so happy about it. I use them at work and then move to the gym and they are amazing. The sound is perfect, I hear nothing else, lightweight and actually fit in my weirdly small ears.

Sweat a lot during a workout? No problem these bad boys didn't miss a beat even in the sauna.
Cross country flight? You're in luck the battery will last.

Bonus: They don't look like those weird apple ones....

title: SAVE YOUR MONEY!!
body:
So I originally thought these ear buds were the best.. turns out ... not so much. The first couple days everything was great! Then people that I was speaking to on my phone using the ear buds started telling me that they couldn't hear me or I sounded far away or in a tunnel. I've made sure the ear buds are charged and my phone has service so I don't know what is wrong with these things. Definitely disappointed at the poor design
(I should have went with the other ear buds I was going to get) and the reason for the star change/updated review. Would not recommend if this is what happens after a week of use.

title: Very disappointed
body:
I bought these because of the reviews and am really disappointed. The sound is of lesser quality than the free corded iPhone headphones that come with your phone. Sound for music isn't horribly disappointing but the hands free phone function is absolutely worthless. I can still hear a lot of the noise around me but that doesn't bother me personally. I had thought I read good points about battery life but out of the gate I think the longest they have lasted is 2-3 hours at best without a charge in the little case. I have had these for a week and already have the left earphone not connecting to Bluetooth.

I would suggest looking around. Maybe I just got a bad set, I do not know. I will likely be requesting a refund.

title: Great earbuds!
body: Very good earbuds! I love them! They sound great, work with cell phone! Perfect!

title: Awesome sound but..
body: Had issues with ear buds connecting to take a charge so I exchanged them and then wireless case would not take a charge. Amazon took them back I bought another brand. I will say they fit great and sounded great.

title: Great wireless earbud value
body: Great wireless earbuds. My initial impression is that this is a quality product. The earbuds are well made and easy to sync. The case looks durable. Sound volume and quality are great as well.

title: Constantly cutting out, can't listen to music
body: These are awesome in every way EXCEPT one, and it's the most important one. The bluetooth connection is horrible. I loved these, I prayed to the high heavens that they would work because they fit wonderfully, they have great sound quality, the wireless charging aspect is awesome, the charging case is the best part of all of this. The biggest down side is that they CONSTANTLY cut out and lose the connection to my phone. They claim they have a 10m connection, but if my phone is in my back pocket of my jeans, I can barely listen to my music because they're cutting out every 30 seconds to a minute. It's frustrating and unfortunately outweighs all the positive things. Not sure how this got such positive reviews, since although nice quality in all other aspects, it's nearly impossible to actually listen to anything. Very, very disappointed.

title: Connectivity and fit issues
body:
So in general these aren't a bad set of ear buds as you can see by the other reviews.

However, the set that I got must be defective as they have a really poor connection during use. While using them in the gym if I moved more that 3 feet away from my phone the audio would cut out. 1 ear bud would stay connected and the other will go out, the would reconnect, then it would flip.

Another thing was they would constantly try to connect to my phone even while in the case. The only way I was able to get them to stop was to forget the connection on my phone.

Also, regardless of what little rubber ear piece I used they would fall out of my ears. Followed the instructions to the letter on how they are supposed to "lock" but they never did (might be that I just have weird ears, I don't know).

Overall the sound quality was good for the price but there were just too many issues for me to recommend anyone purchasing them even for that price.

title: Absolutely fabulous!
body: I tried these on a day or two after these arrived. They work great and are amazing in every way. There is just one problem that I have noticed. When I am doing an activity that involves constantly changing direction like running around a small square or around a circle or an 8 shaped symbol, I lose audio for a brief second or two at the instant I am making a turn but then audio is back after the turn. I wish that problem wasn't there. Besides that little flaw, it works perfectly otherwise.

title: Defective left ear bud
body: I really wanted to like these ear buds. The sound quality is decent and they're pretty comfortable, unfortunately it's all for nothing.  Bluetooth connection is incredibly poor on the left ear bud and cuts out constantly rendering them unusable. I have read other reviews with people that have had a similar issue and don't want to risk an exchange just to get another defective pair; I will be returning these for a refund.

title: Great sound quality and very comfortable
body: These are fantastic. Super easy to set up.  Turned them on and my phone found it instantly. I was not expecting  how loud they could be. Nice surprise. I also have the tiniest ears and these fit great

title: Comfortable wearing with high performance noise cancellation.
body:
I purchased this to use during training in Golf Range. I am listening metronome tempo.
I used have a wireless earbuds having a wire around my neck. Which was very uncomfortable. This is the main reason that I purchased this one.

Pairing was seamless and it is actually very comfortable!
Another thing is that noise cancellation is much better than I expected! Hence, I have to take out my left earbuds to hear the feedback sounds from golf balls when hitting.

I really like this one.

title: good price
body: The sound quality in these are amazing! but the battery life isn't great, they're not noise cancelling and it often drops from my Bluetooth with IPhone X. Also using it for phone calls isn't good sound quality. For 50$ the price is good if youre just using it  for working out and nothing else. I lost my Jabra's and these were a good comp, but I'm going to purchase the Jabra again .

title: Love these!
body: These are my go to head phones. For gym, home, everywhere. They have a good battery life, no cords, and good sound plus sound cancellation! Super easy and a weekly charge. They haven't died on me and I've had them for several months now. Love these.

title: Surprising
body:
Seems a little laggy on response. When my phone makes noise (system sound) there seems to be a delay. I did also have a couple times where it seemed like they dropped the connection to my phone but picked it right back up.

Sound wise there really nice. Loud enough and a clean sound. I'd say noise canceling is a bit to good,but not quite 100% noise canceling. Meaning you can still hear a bit with the volume lower but not quite good enough to listen to a conversation. I'm a runner and I'd hoped they would block out some ambiant noise but still let me hear cars.

They block out cars. My son tried talking to me with them In and I could hear him but not understand what he was saying

title: I love them!
body: I love how discreet they are, even more than AirPods in my opinion. The nose cancellation and the sound quality are amazing; I can hear and feel the bass of certain songs and the volume never has to be very loud for me to not hear anything but the song I'm playing. The best part is that the earphones charge in their case so even though the battery life is 3 hrs (from full charge to zero), it ends up being longer if you always put them back in the case.

title: Good for a price but not ideal for a workout
body: The headphones are good and have a crystal clear sound, however I notices that after sometime they start to wiggle out of my ear and not a ideal option for working out, else I would have given 5 stars

title: Awsome Earbuds!
body: These ear buds were exactly what i was looking for. Much more economical than wireless Apple brand. I wanted these wireless ones for work so i could have just one ear bud in at a time to hear things out of my other ear. These work great because they can be paired one at a time so the other can be charging and not in use while i use the other. They last about half the day of constant use then i just switch to the other one. Absolutely would recommend to anyone that can't afford the Apple brand. These are great and way better than expected.

title: Great set of earbuds
body: So this is only based off of a day but ao far this is an excellent purchase. The earbuds sit comfortably with the smaller pads (a few different sizes are included) and the aound quality is about as good as I expected. Nothing exceptional but perfectly adequate. I use them for the gym and enjoy all the features especially thr battery charger case which can be charged wirelessly. It's very convenient. I don't know how long the battery life will last yet but my needs are being met. Pairing is easy and successful.

title: poor connectivity through my body
body:
If I have my phone (OnePlus 3) in my right-front pants pocket it will mostly work fine communicating with the right earbud.

Otherwise, if I have my phone in my left-front pants pocket, the earbuds briefly but regularly cut out, every few minutes. If my phone is in my rear pants pockets, it is cutting out nonstop.

These earbuds sound quality is great when the connection is working. The microphone sounds fine to my callers when making phone calls.

The earbuds stay put in my ears only just OK. I have to position them carefully for them to not wiggle their way out during exercise.

The little charger/carrying case works well.

Overall, I'd say these earbuds are barely adequate.

title: Don't stay in ears
body: Sound quality was good and would be fine while stationary, but even light movement caused mine to fall out or have the feeling of about to fall out, which was almost more annoying. Swapping out the silicone cover did help at first, but after a short time had same problem. These are larger than I expected, loved the wireless charging case, but ultimately invested in Air Pods and have been much happier.

title: Great Fit, Great Sound
body: I received these earbuds a couple days ago and have since worn them for a couple workouts at the gym and gone on a few runs wearing them.  After I selected the ear insert that fit my ears best, these buds fit snug and do not feel like they will fall out while running or at the gym.  Pairing was easy (I have a Samsung Note 8).  The sound quality is solid and the bass was fuller and deeper than I expected from such a (relatively) small earbud.  Finally, the charging box is nice - the buds have a bit of a magnetic snap into place and overall the earbuds and charging box feel like well-made products.

title: Excellent product - but the bright flashing LED while in use is a problem (I have a fix)
body:
These really work well for all the reasons posted many times by others (good sound, great case, battery, pairing, comfort, etc.). One important feature is that these do NOT beep constantly, in between every song or video, like some Bluetooth headphones and earbuds, and that is really important.

But the bright blue LED that flashes periodically on each earbud while in use is a real problem if you are in a dark place, or listening at night. It lights up the whole room, and is blinding if you look right at to anyone nearby it their eyes are adjusted to the dark. What are people to do on dark airline flights? The person sitting next to you is going to murder you after 2 minutes of being blinded every 5 seconds. Your spouse is going to divorce you if you attempt to listen to stuff at night and the room keeps lighting up like the police are raiding the place.

I solved the problem by covering the LEDs with small pieces of electrical tape that I cut out, but now there is no way to see any indicators at any point in time. I hope they will consider changing the product to either allow the "in-use" flashing to be disabled or dimmed to a reasonable level.

title: Good fit
body: These were easy to activate and have a variety of sizes for ear pieces which was important to me as I have not used earbuds before because they fall out.  These work well and I wore them when biking with confidence they would not fall out.  My needs are not great and these answer my desire for wireless integration with my phone.

title: Very Good Quality for the Price
body: This is my third attempt at wireless earbuds and I cannot complain about these.  I have small ears and these fit perfectly.  I was even able to go jogging with them.  So far, I haven't had any issues with them disconnecting.  I will say that if you don't use them for a while, you will have to recharge them up even if they were fully charged.  Other than that, I am really enjoying them.

title: exactly what I wanted
body: The battery life is amazing (4.5 hours) and they automatically turn on and off when you take them out or put them in the charging port. I also sweat a lot when I work out and they've held up fine and the Bluetooth signal never gets interrupted. The only thing I don't like is you can't skip songs with the headphones, otherwise great!

title: Great little earbuds
body: These are great little earbuds.  They sound great, plenty of bass.  I got better bass after switching to a larger ear piece. These come with 4 sizes, which is nice. Very compact case. I wish there was space to fit the usb cable into the charger/case but That is not enough to take away from the great quality of this product, especially for the price. Pairing was a snap.  I really like the LED indicators on the charging case so you know how much juice the case has left.

title: phone calls don't work well on iOS
body: They don't work for phone calls.  People on the other end cannot hear because of sound fading and static.  They are ok listening to music at the gym, but usually have to re-connect multiple times.  Battery life is good

title: Headphones are great for their price
body:
Disclaimer: I bought them on a flash sale for about 30% off but would buy it now anyway.

PROS: The headphones are working great. I sometimes shower with them in my ear with no problem, they last a full day and a half for me and the sound quality is great (I tuned it for myself in the Samsung equalizer). Case lid is pretty solid and has never opened however many times i dropped it. Headphones work up to 10 meters away unobstructed.

CONS: However, the left earbud (slave) cuts out if you keep the right ear but (main) away enough or behind  barriers (in extended clutched hand, in pants pocket etc.), but listening with right earbud is never a problem. And now starts the nit-picking: NO ONE THOUGHT OF MAKING THE DOUBLE CLICK SKIP TO NEXT SONG, INSTEAD IT REDIALS LAST CALLED NUMBER (led to some awkward explanations). And the plastic case has a little hinge for you to attach a string to not lose it i guess? I cut it off because it was awkward to hold/look at. The lid has these magnetic bits that could have been concealed a bit better but meh.

EXTRA:I read the reviews before buying but you don't need the box to pair the headphones to the phone. There is a button to (turn on/off, connect, play/pause).

Overall I am loving these headphones and learned it's quirks fairly quickly. Good product.

title: KICK OF BASS
body:
These  wireless headsets an are excellent product with an awesome design amazing sound with a Big Kick of BASS Very good battery life and they charge quite quickly when plugged into a wall socket. Not as small as others but that is fine with me
Great job guys !!

title: I'm quite happy with my TOZO T10 wireless earbuds
body: I'm quite happy with my new TOZO T10 so far.  The sound quality is great and the bass is good which was my biggest concern when searching for the best ones on Amazon. I'm glad a lot of reviewers mentioned about the bass quality.  It's good but not as good as my corded Scosche earyphones that i've been enjoying for years.  Then again without having the cord is wonderful and an excellent trade off.  Longer will I have to struggle with the cord getting caught on the workout machines at the gym.  Just only had it for 2 days and so far so good.  Not sure about the battery life yet so i've given it 4 stars but may renew my review later.  This being my first time with a wireless earbuds I have to say i'm pretty pleased with everything so far. I would recommend this as it is a reasonable price for what it is.

title: Constant Pairing Issues and Poor Battery
body: It is always a hassle to try and pair these headphones. Sometimes it take 10 plus attempts. They seem to pair "when they want to". Also, i have used these on 2 hour flights and they have consistently died before the end of the flight. I received a very odd mass email from the company after i registered my product online that they would send me another charging case and i never got anything. Spend a couple more bucks and get some more reliable headphones.

title: Great product
body: Is is a great product. The sound is amazing. They're comfortable. The only reason I don't give it a 5-star is because the case is big compared to others in the market. Too bulky to keep it in your pockets.

title: Disappointed, more like bluetooth 00.1 not 5.0
body:
Extremely disappointed, unable to connect to a Samsung phone or iPhone.  The earbuds have connection issues. I will recommend (Abnes earbuds) for less money. I was looking foward to a better bass as advertised.

Wasted 45 minutes trying to troubleshoot them, should've listened to the other reviews.

title: Amazing Customer Service= Now I’m a Customer!
body: I just received excellent service from phobe, a very kind representative of Tozo!  After I sent an email to Tozo’s customer service, phobe responded in the most kind and caring way!  What happened was that I accidentally left my earbuds in one of my pant’s pockets, and Tozo responded back with giving me a complimentary set of earbuds so I can be happy again with my Tozo earbuds!  This amazing experience I’ve had with Tozo means I’m a guaranteed customer for a very long time!

title: Sleek design and good sound, don’t slip out of the ear nor look tacky
body: The sound quality is pretty good, clear and not tinny with decent bass. The khaki case is kind of a teddy bear brown. It may look misleadingly gold but it is matte tan. The earbuds fit well with your right tip so try every tip for the best fit and sound. I love that the case snaps magnetically, super sleek design I just wish it wasn’t completely plastic as it may come apart over the years. Apply for a 1 year warranty! Last thing, connectivity was really straight forward and I love that they were charged as they came, no one likes waiting to use a product ;) These are good for the price! Rethink paying triple for AirPods that may only last 1.5 years and don’t fit as snugly.

title: Left ear pod is useless
body: I wanted to love these...  I’ve had them for a few months in hopes to give them a better shot, but  the left ear pod cuts out almost every two seconds if I’m walking or moving. It’s pretty much like having one headphone the entire time with sound in your left ear for one second at a time every 10 seconds.  I looked online after I bought these and it seemed to be a common issue. Sadly looking for a different pair of headphones because it drives me insane.

title: WOW!!!!!
body:
Updated 9/23.... wore these on the plane yesterday and the sound was phenomenal.

Original:  I have to say, I can see why these have such a great review.  I tried with the buds with the covers that came on them, then tried the smallest and by the time I was done I found that the Large gave me the best sound quality of all of them.  I guess it is not about whether it fits into your ear canal but how well it blocks our surrounding noise etc.  So far I am extremely happy with them although I did get a call and had to pull one of the pieces out as it sounded strange to me :)

title: Lowest volume setting still too loud
body: At lowest volume still too loud. When I try to lower the volume, the sound goes completely off. There’s loud and louder, no soft quiet listening. I’m disappointed as I wanted wireless and quiet while listening to music during rest. Sound is crisp and clear with nice bass tones. I do like the sound during the day, but as I’ve already mentioned, they are too loud to be able to rest with music at the lowest volume setting. Plus, if you are wearing the ear buds while connecting to bluetooth, the volume will max out and sound blast your ears -that’s not mentioned at all in the instructions and I find that a bit dangerous for the inner ear hearing. If you wear glasses while wearing these, the blue flashing light reflected is rather irksome. Would have given 4 stars if they could be turned down; 5 if the there wasn’t a constant flashing light.

title: Best Bluetooth Wireless Ear Buds on the market!!!
body: I ordered these ear buds after seeing the 4,500+ reviews averaging close to 4.5 stars. This product did not disappoint and truly exceeded my expectations. The sound quality is crisp and clear. For such a small lightweight product, the depth and tones of the music is undeniably better than any bluetooth wireless headphones on the market. I've had them for less than a week and am already recommending them to all of my music enthusiasts.

title: Too large for ears
body: Great product besides one big flaw: too big for ears! they stick out and look ridiculous, and don't stay in too well because the body weighs it down.

title: A good value
body: This product has great quality sound and is very convenient. The only drawback is that no matter which size earbud cover I use, they fall out of my ear during regular movement. One must be careful about where it lands.

title: good
body:
After they are charged they work well for about 30-45min. then one or the other cuts out (mostly the left).
After 45 min. then they start to shut off. They are waterproof I ware them in the shower at the gym and have no issues.
Updated. Tozo contacted me and are going to replace the defective earbuds at no expense to me. Awesome customer service!

title: Great bass and good sound how ever sound gets static if they detect you moving
body: We ordered 2 sets of these one for my wife one for me. Good sound great bass only complaint is if you do a lot of moving like jogging even lifting weights the sound gets static. We tried re syncing and nothing worked. They are good if your stationary which sucks

title: Good headphones, just need more sound
body: I got these headphones because the last ones I had were wired and kept falling to one side so I had to keep pulling them back in place and they got shorted out. I like these because they don't have a wire. I wish they could get louder because I like my music very loud in my ears, but these are good enough. They don't always connect automatically to my phone which I wish they did, but it's a small problem that can be easily overlooked. Overall, I'm happy so far but I've only had them for about 3 days.

title: 1 week in and still happy
body: I bought these earbuds about a week ago. I am very happy with my purchase so far. They sound great and have been  trouble free for the most part. The first time I used them the left ear piece would cut in and out. I put them in their case and fully charged them and then did a reset and have not had the problem since. I have used them with both my cellphone and my PC and they have worked excellent. I only use them a couple hours at a time and then put them back in the case for charging and storage. Time will tell how durable they are.

title: I love them!!!
body:
I've only had these for a couple days, but I put my stuff through the wringer. I carry the mail in Ohio and I use these to listen to J. Vernon McGee's Thru the Bible while I walk. I have already had them out in the pouring rain and they worked perfectly. I'm no audiophile, but I hate tinny sounding cheap headphones. I'm extremely picky, and that's why I sent back a set of the mpow BT earbuds, and another that I can't remember the name of. Both sounded very cheap. These have deep bass, and are very loud. I deliver mail on a busy 4 lane and have absolutely no problem hearing the sermons.

I am always moving and have never had one work its way loose. No need for adjustments at all. I put one in, and it stays where I put it. THE BATTERY IS BETTER THAN ADVERTISED. I only use one earbud at a time for safety reasons, so I use one until it starts telling me the batter is almost dead, and then I switch out. When you switch to the other one, you have to open the blue tooth menu on your phone and have it forget the one you are disconnecting and then repair the other one. Takes about 10 seconds literally. I'm just happy that you can use either one independently of the other one. The last pair I tried advertised that you could, but the right bud was the only one that actually connected to the phone. These TORO's are awesome. Work better than I expected to, and I will definitely shop with them again.

GREAT PRODUCT TORO. I don't leave a lot of reviews, but when someone puts out a better product than the competition, and then sells if for about 60% of the crappier one, I like to say thanks.

title: GREAT ear buds for music, but not so much for phone calls
body:
Just received these yesterday and haven't been experienced the battery life, so, I did not provide a rating on it. However,  the sound quality and noise cancellation is excellent IMO.

IMO, these can't be beat for the price!!

UPDATE: While these are great for listening to music, they do not appear to be good for telephone calls. Everyone I spoke with on the phone was having great difficulty hearing me.

title: GREAT PRODUCT ALL AROUND!!!!!!!!
body: Great earbuds.  I was in the market to change from wired to wireless earphones.  After extensive research on different websites, I ended up on Amazon.  The overwhelmingly positive reviews set the TOZO T10 apart from others.  I received them sooner than expected so that was a step in the right direction.  Let me say these are my first wireless earbuds.  Right out of the box, I put them on and the fit was comfortable and snug, better than expected.  I went for a mile jog and no issues either by not being able to listen to music nor coming loose and falling.  I also did not have any issues with incoming or outgoing phone calls, the reception was clear without static.  Very happy with my purchase.

title: Great sound and snug fit
body: I bought these for working out and for listening on flights.  That's why I need my earbuds to block out outside noise and these do a great job.  The sound is better than I expected for earbuds much cheaper than the ubiquitous Airpods. Nice deep bass response.  The fact that they can charge wirelessly and with a micro USB cable is a plus.  My only wish is that they connect automatically to my iPhone X.  Although they pair automatically, you still have to press "Connect" under your bluetooth settings.  I got the white ones and they look great.  Very satisfied so far and will update if they break down.

title: Great headphones!
body: I’ve had these for a few weeks and wanted to try them out in my daily routine. I love the charging case and use them for my job making lots of calls during the day. The sound quality is better than if I had my phone on speaker and my clients can hear me well. As for music you just have to get the right angle in for them to stay and voila you have great noise cancellation and sound! I might still play around with the ear bud sizes when I go for runs as they can fall out if not placed in properly. Easy to pair and sync to your phone! I’ve recommended to a few of my friends now as well

title: TOZO T10 Ear Buds have excellent sound!
body: This is my first pair of Ear Buds and I think that they are amazing. The sound is very clear and the Bass is excellent sounding! I didn't know what I was missing out on! I read the reviews and researched them before purchasing and it's true, as many have reviewed, TOZO has done a great job with the design of these Ear Buds! I like that they send a variety of sizes of the Ear Covers. It makes it easy to find the right fit. Give these a try. I think you will be as happy as I am.

title: BEWARE...The ear buds I received are not what is in the description or picture..
body:
I am not sure what I received but the product mailed to me was titled "TWS Wireless Earbuds"  and was not a TOZO product.

The case is different and the buds are totally different.  The box was also missing the different sized earpieces.

When trying to sync this knock-off product to my iwatch, only one side would work.  When syncing with my iPhone, both would work but then just heard constant static along with a constant cutting out in the right and left ear.

When looking at "TWS Wireless Earbuds" online, I found this pair I received selling for $14 on eBay.

Someone is trying to pull a fast one swapping out this product for cheaper product.  I will be returning these ASAP to Amazon and not purchase from TOZO ever again..

title: It pairs with my Macbook Pro very easily too!
body:
The main advantage is how easily it is to pair with our phones, but it also pairs super easily with my Macbook as well. I noticed the range I can walk away from my devices with the earbuds doesn't go quite as far as my wireless headphones (from a different brand), but the noise quality is nicer for these and they're comfier to wear.

If you're a lady with smaller ear-holes or a child, I recommend swapping the fit out to the smallest size. That's what makes them the most comfortable.

title: Beware of unethical gaming of review system
body:
I just got this product and it seems OK so far. Good fit for my ears with the smallest ear pieces. Pairing was simple and easy. Seems to connect and charge quickly with my wireless charge pad. As for sound quality, my only gripe is that the bass is too strong. I wish there was a way to dial it back.

However, my main complaint about this product has to do with the reviews.
