I registered the product and immediately got an email informing me that if I would give them a 5-star review here on Amazon and send them a link to the review, they would send me a free wireless charger. In my opinion, gaming the system like this is unethical and should be banned by Amazon as it destroys the integrity and value of the process. So take the high reviews for these earbuds with a huge grain of salt.

UPDATE: "Hanna" from TOZO followed up my review with another email offering me a free wireless charger with no strings attached, just to make sure I was 100% satisfied. OK, sure. I responded with my address. Then I got another email telling me that they would ship the charger just as soon as I went in and revised my review and changed it to five stars. Haha. Nice try, TOZO.

title: Great option for wireless earbuds
body: I was a user of some Jabra Earbuds and one of them broke and to replace it was over $100. I didn't want to buy apple airpods because they're still a little to expensive if I were to lose one. I read the reviews on these and took a chance because the price was substantially lower. I've now had them for over 2 months now and they gave me a 1 year warranty. These are loud, don't fall out when working out or running long distances, and per the price and quality to me is a no brainer.

title: Kept falling out
body: These headphones are great for the price. The only issue I had which is the reason I gave them away was they didn't stay in my ears. They kept falling out even with as little movement as weight lifting. It got annoying constantly readjusting them to keep them in. This is unfortunate because other than that the headphones are great.

title: The best headphones I've ever owned!
body: I really like these. There's no wire, you can bring the case to charge them more while you're out & they last a while too. I went all the way from my home in Brooklyn to the city, walked around & then went home & they were still working. My only complaint is I wish they were louder but it's probably for the best so I don't go dead because I really blast my music. They also come with 3 different sized earbuds which is great because I always need the smallest one. I was so glad these fit.

title: Audio drops are most annoying while listening to Queen
body: These earbuds do have many great qualities but all are trumped by one fatal flaw. They keep cutting out. Music will be playing along and mainly the left channel will die. Then it will come back causing the right channel to die. They will come back and play well for a few seconds maybe a minute and the. Audio drops all over again.

title: Great product at a great price!
body: I have had the headphones for 3 days and have loved them so far!  Was really worried about fit because I need them for working out!  So far I have box jumped, did kipping pull ups, jump rope and push press and I didn’t even think for one minute about them shifting position or falling out!!  I also mowed the lawn with no problems!  They are also very light which is great for exercise!  I can’t speak to the life of them (which I pray lasts longer than my last pair of “sweatproof, very expensive earphones).  I purchased the extended warranty this time!!  So far, I’m a big fan!

title: Easy pairing - poor connection stability
body:
On the positive:
Easy pairing makes it easy for anyone to operate and the fit seems secure, although I have yet to workout with them. A few walls gave me connection problems at work, but that's to be expected. I'll be testing the range at the gym today and battery life on the trails this weekend. I'm looking forward to a solid wireless experience!

Update (all negative): Battery life was substantially less than expected, lasting only three hours (fully charged when starting). The connection was substandard with the signal fading out on the left earbud and the bluetooth source less than two feet away during a hike.

However, the poor signal issue seemed to go away as long as I wore my brand new magic hat (a basic hiking hat purchased at REI). I tested this theory 8-10 times at random intervals during my 10 mile hike - as long as I wore my hat, the signal was solid, rmoving the hat immediately resulted in a lost signal.  I fully expect to be able to communicate with aliens using this hat, although I'm not sure if the earbuds will be required. At least I'll be able to use my tin foil for other stuff.

I'd fully recommend the hat as a companion item, except that when I sweat, it drips orange/red drops of sweat from the visor, so I'd only give three stars for the hat, itself.

As far as all the other 5 star ratings for the earbuds, those seem fully related to the seller relentlessly pursuing and bribing people by offering a wireless charger for the non-working earbuds in exchange for a 5-star rating. I'd buy another magic blood hat before purchasing another pair of Tozos.

title: They are very small and user friendly
body: My husband says he likes them a lot. They stand up to the abuse he subjects them to in his construction job and long commutes.

title: Absolutely Amazing Sound Quality!!!
body:
Got really tired of my popular ear buds falling out of my ears. Yes they were Airpods...
I read many many reviews and came upon these TOZO'S. The reviews on these are true! Took a chance and ordered them! Let me say my ipods don't even come close, chuck them in a drawer, never be used again. These TOZO'S are the best I've ever owned. They stay put in my ears with heavy mountain biking even when I'm sweating like a maniac. The sound quality is what got me the most. Deep big stereo sound with a punchy base took me to my own world. Long battery life and a wireless charging case is perfect. Put the right size ear pieces on my buds and they are super comfortable. I highly recommend these ear buds if your looking for comfort and sound quality.

title: It works and its a great product for the price!
body: I wanted to purchase Apple's wireless earpods but then I found this product on Amazon. The price and the reviews made me take the plunge to purchase it. I have had it for one day now and I have to say that I am really impressed with the product. I have used it on my daily train commute to work for listening to music on my phone, used it in a call and used it in the gym during workout. The sound quality is great and mic seems to work great too. The size is small enough that it fits well within the ear and it doesn't fall off. The only improvement I would suggest is to add more controls in the buttons so it could be used to skip tracks etc.

title: A great buy!
body: These were surprisingly a great buy! I have a pair of Bose noise cancelling headphones and while these are not the exact same quality, they’re pretty close for wireless headphones. I’ve never had wireless ear buds before and was skeptical of the fit and sound quality but these fit really well actually. I’ve only used them leisure walks so I can’t attest to how well they stay in during active exercise but for what’s I need them for, I’m really happy with the purchase!

title: Best value and quality for the money
body:
I returned by jabra elite 65t for these things. The jabara was better at noise canceling, but phone calls were terrible. Constant echo's.

I turned to the TOZO T10 after a random encounter on Amazon. And I can say that it's an easy replacement. I've used these for music, working out and phone calls. With the latter being my main use case for work.  The battery life could be a bit better, but it's a moot point since I can charge it up rather quickly.  These are a must have at the price point.

title: Goodbye Tozo, hello AirPods.
body:
I hoped this would be a cost saving solution to Apple AirPods or Powerbeats Pro.  I returned them after trying for a week and experiencing a few problems:
— they fall out of my ears no matter what fittings I use (4 provided). This has always been a problem with earbuds for my ears.
— when I do get a tight seal in my ear, it would not last very long, especially if bumped.  And to get the right seal in my ear I had to push it in to the point that it was airtight in my ear channel.  It would cancel out all notice at that point, yet wouldn’t stay in that position for long.
— they are automatically set to call your last phone number when you press the button 2 times.  I can’t begin to describe how annoying that is.  And I can’t think of a time in my life where I have needed that feature.  Much more helpful would be the double tap for “skip” which these earbuds do not have.
— wireless charging: this is great, and worked perfectly. A very nice feature: just set the case on the charger at night and bling!
— the Tozo’s also take a little while to connect to your phone.  I’ve tried my sons AirPods and the are instantaneous.  I found myself wondering: are they on? Do I need to restart them so they find my phone again?  But eventually they would pair up with my iPhone (maybe 20-30 seconds?)
—instructions are helpful but in a rough English that is imprecise and odd phrasing for American speakers to read.

I ended up ordering AirPods the day I returned these.  Sometimes you have to bite the bullet!

title: Outstanding sound quality
body:
These wireless earbuds are fantastic. The various size ear caps are especially nice.  After installing the proper size for me they fit perfectly making them a nice snug fit.  I wore them for several hours without them falling out which was a problem for every other earbud I tried, wireless or wired.  Even though they fit snug and stay in place they remained comfortable.

When I received them I paired my laptop and listened to a Podcast.  Next I paired my cell phone.  No problems pairing either.

Answering calls was easy and people I talked to said my voice quality was good.  I highly recommend these earbuds

title: Great quality, a solid buy!
body: Awesome earbuds. Fit great, block out outside sounds. Quality sound. Lasts decent amount of time on a charge - I just have to remember to keep them charged in between use. Not sure if it’s me, but if I don’t keep them charged, they seem to loose charge between uses. More than happy with them though. Used them during a half marathon and they lasted the full 13 miles.

title: Sound quality is excellent!
body: After giving my daughter my first set of wireless earbuds I purchased these to utilize the wireless charging feature. The quality sound and build of the earbuds really surprised me. These are great earbuds! When I ride my stationary bike my ears get a little sweaty and occasionally the first set would fall out of my ear. (They were not made by Tozo.) The new set don't fall out so they don't disrupt my workout. Great sound, great fit and wireless charging for a reasonable price make me a happy customer.

title: Decent for the price
body:
Overall, these are a decent pair of earbuds.  My biggest problem is they do seem to have a sensitive bluetooth connection.  When my phone is in any pocket, it has waves of spotty connection.  Usually it is ok, but if it skips once, it will usually continue skipping for about 30 seconds.  I mostly use these for the gym as my wired pair just gets in the way, and they work great for that.  However, when I'm at the gym, my phone is not in my pocket, but 20 - 30 feet away on a table.  It really seems like the pockets create way more interference than you would think.  A couple other things that could be bothersome:
- You can't have one earbud turned off or it will constantly beep until you turn it back on
- No function to skip songs or change volume without going to your phone.  You can pause and accept/decline calls, but having to go to the phone to control media is a bit of a bummer

title: Sound cuts in and out
body: I'm not too happy with the purchase. I haven't had them for too long and the sound quality is already getting worse. The audio on my music while I'm working out is  fading in and out on both ear pieces. It's not all of the time, but enough to be pretty annoying.

title: Pleasantly Surprised!
body: I wasn’t sure how I’d feel about this style of earbuds, but I’ve been pleasantly surprised! The sound quality is great and they stay put in my ears without any issue. So far I’ve only used these to listen to music at work - I suspect I’ll test them out at the gym at some point, but in the meantime I’ve given my head a good shake on more than one occasion and they still don’t budge. I do wish the charge lasted a little longer, but they charge pretty quickly in the case so at least there’s that!

title: My favorite running earbuds
body: These wireless earbud are a great upgrade from my older buds that had the cord connecting each ear together. My large head and neck would tug them out of position, so having wireless buds makes me very happy. They sound great, and stayed in my ears for my normal 80 minute morning run. No problems pairing with my Samsung Galaxy S10+. Really like the case and it's wireless charging. The magnets that hold the buds in place to charge is a nice touch.

title: Really good wireless earbuds for the price
body:
Just received and tried the product and I actually really like it.

Pro
-Suprisngly good sound quality for the price. The base actually was really good. Compared to my old wireless earbuds (Cheap) the sound quality was so-so. But this ear buds surprised me for sure. In a good way.
-Nice design. It can be bit bulky but it gets job done

Con
-short battery life compared to other major ones
-Bulky design which might not look as nice to some ppl.
-Lack of functionality such as volume control and voice recognition

Overall- I mainly use earbuds for my workout so not having some of the functionality or short battery life isn't much of problem to me. This is a great product if you are looking for wireless buds for work out and you don't want to spend $200 for a pair.

title: Nice design, quality devices.  Very happy customer
body: My wife wanted earbuds for her smart phone and my friend at work has a set of the Tozo T10 bluetooth earbuds and recommended them to us.  Based on his recommendation and how happy he is with them we purchased a set for my wife.  They paired smoothly with her phone and the sound quality is delightful.  She does however need smaller ear caps then even the smallest provided with the earbuds so we contacted Tozo and they replied almost instantly with willingness to send an even small set.  The product is great and the customer service even better.  My wife is happy and so am I.  Regards, Ken

title: Throw away your AirPods!!
body: God made these headphones and then made AirPods as a joke. These babies are unbelievably comfortable, they look adorable, and the sound is impeccable. I have been hearing instruments in songs I never knew were involved in the composition for years. These headphones have a beautiful relationship with all frequencies. Also, ‘tis this season: these are going to make great Christmas presents.

title: Wasn't expecting such quality sound!
body:
I bought these headphones for the price and convenient wireless charging features. I wasn't too worried about sound quality, but it turned out to be maybe the best part of these headphones. I tend to stick to this price range for headphones and these have by far the best bass I've found, without feeling like I was going to blast out my eardrums.

The charging case is as advertised and super convenient, just charge the case ~once a week and it keeps the buds charged for my use (about an hour at a time, 4-5 times per week).

The only cons I've come across are: the buttons on the side don't allow for many controls. Really just play/pause, on/off and accept/reject phone calls. Previous/Next track and volume up/down would be great to have.

Customer service has also been top notch!

title: A great product for an even better price
body:
I was a bit skeptical of the ear buds when I saw how cheap they were. I have had bad luck with cheap wireless head phones. With these everything was perfect. The fit in the ear (once I chose the right size ear buds), the sound quality and the connection time to my phone. The headphones completely cancel noise if the volume is on max. Put them on half volume and they are very good for running. I had a minor problem with getting them connected to my phone. I contacted customer support and they responded in a very fast fashion for email standards.
Definitely one of my better purchases.

title: Great for the price!
body: Great product for the price!  Can withstand an intense workout.  Call quality is good.  Once and awhile while using it for phone calls the eat buds get out of sync and it echos.  Other than that great deaign.

title: Poor quality
body: I bought this because it had good reviews.  I have to go in to my phone to connect it manually because it won't automatically connect.  It just sits and beeps.  The left one cuts out constantly.  I would not recommend buying this brand.

title: Good sound for listening AND phone calls
body: The earbuds feel very comfortable, the sound is good, the carrying/charge case is excellent and the mic for phone calls is good.  On my initial order, the pair I received had trouble with the mic - TOZO responded very quickly and replaced the units in one (1) day!  Customer service is excellent!

title: Good but not perfect
body: These wireless headphones are pretty good. Upside are the price, good sound quality, good charging capabilities, battery life and size. Downside are what I’ve experienced to be a so-so microphone, and they hurt my ear a little bit when I point them upwards as instructed, so I turn them downwards and they don’t hurt. Otherwise they are great, and since paying $150 for AirPods is a bit absurd, these fit the bill perfectly.

title: Left earphone cuts out
body: The sound quality is great, when both ears are working together. But about once every minute or two the left ear drops in volume, or completely cuts out. This is an issue of consistency because many more people have given this a four or five star rating, and I have no doubt that they are getting good performance. However, I can't recommend this, knowing that there's probably a 10% chance of receiving a set with a defective connection. I chose to return, not exchange, for this reason.

title: Best headphones so far and I have a lot!
body:
So incredibly happy so far. Have been wanting true wireless for a long time now. But didn’t want to be one of those guys with the white ear buds dripping out of their ears. Bought these based on the reviews and have been extatic so far. Have them paired to my Apple Watch and they sound great and connect immediately. My wife even stole them from me and didn’t loose connection in the other room.

Was expecting some sort of comprise but have been unable to find one so far. They sound as good or better than my Jaybirds, my Powerbeats and my Anker Bluetooth buds.

title: Disconnection between ears major issue!
body:
I really wanted to like these, so I'm going to keep it short and concise.

Build quality is very good for the price, both the ear piece and charging case.  Fit in my ear is pretty good but they feel a little heavy and bound to fall out (they do with any activity with some bounce)
Unfortunately I've been using them for a week now and they keep disconnecting for about a second and my music drops.  Really kills the consistency and vibe.

title: Must have waterproof earpods alternative
body: I was looking for wireless earbuds to use in the Hot Yoga room and for swimming as my original earpods (Apple) are not waterproof.  These paired up straightaway and provided awesome quality sound. I love the sturdy charging case.  The signal is lost if you duck your head in the water - but for my breast stroke it is perfect.  Different ear canal sizes can be accommodated to make sure they stay put; but I recommend wearing a swim cap for extra measure

title: Very pleased
body:
These earbuds had great sound, but they could not hold a solid connection to my Galaxy S9.  If my phone was in my shirt pocket, the connection was usually good, but if my phone was in my pants pocket (front or back) I would get frequent drops and almost instant re-connection.  Sometimes the earbuds would drop connection if I turned my head one way or another.

Updated 5/7/19:  The seller contacted me and belives that I may have received a defective pair of buds.  They are rushing out a new pair to me, and hopefully they are correct.  I will give a full report on the new ones, once they arrive.

UPDATED 6/1/19:  I received the replacement earbuds from seller and I have been using them for a couple of weeks now.  The new pair have performed flawlessly, and I am very pleased with them.  I am very impressed with the seller's efforts to make sure I was happy with my purchase.  I am upgrading my score to 5 stars.

title: Great earbuds for the price
body: I bought these earbuds to replace a pair of headphones that would fall off my neck while laying on my back. So far they have been way better than expected for the price point. They come with a great little charging case and an assortment of different size earbud covers. The only feature that they dont have that I would like them to have would be volume and next song/skip control on the buds themselves( you have to use your device to control those features). Other than that they have been great.

title: Amazing sound and bass. Compatible with Apple EarPods !!!
body: I was skeptical at first as I was debating on the EarPods or a cheaper alternative. I stumbled on these headphone and looked up the other reviews and product description. My ideal headphone has to have crisp sound quality and bass. I usually listen to dancehall, reggae etc. upon purchasing these I received them the nest day. And looking at them I can instantly tell these are durable and for $50 I was surprise. Just to make this review short and stop babbling. If I was to compare these to any headphones for the sound quality and all that. I will definitely say these are just as or even better than the EarPods!! The bass and everything is amazing. Thanks to the individuals that engineered these headphones!!

title: JUNK AND MORE JUNK
body: Won’t pair after 3 uses won’t even charge.TOO MUCH MONEY FOR POORER THAN POOR QUALITY. REPLACEMENT PRODUCT EXPERIENCE WITH CUSTOMER SERVICE WAS WORSE THAN THE QUALITY OF THE EARBUDS. WHY DO I SUBSCRIBE TO PRIME 🤬

title: Good value earbuds, some issues with Bluetooth pairing
body:
These have very good sound quality, and I like the convenience of wireless charging. The volume levels are good (I use these under ear muffs for mowing) and they stay connected 95% of the time.

The only issues I've had have been the pairing of the Bluetooth; when using both earbuds, they do not automatically pair with my Galaxy S9 like everything else does - you have to pair them manually on the phone; and sometimes they even don't pair with each other out of the charger box - I have to put them both back in the case and pull them out together again. If I want to use just the right earbud, it won't pair with the phone because it is looking for the left earbud first and hangs there, requiring several iterations of "back in the box" and pairing again with the phone.

title: the distance away from the cell phone is less than 5 feet before it stats to cut out
body:
************MUST READ BEFORE YOU BUY*************
I never write reviews but in this case I felt compeled to. As the reviews on this producted is over inflated due to TOZO offers a free cordless charger for a 5 star review (email below).

TOZO service <TOZO.service@outlook.com>
Aug 17, 2019, 5:58 AM (12 days ago)
to me

Dear Valued Customer,

This is Levana from TOZO. Your warranty registration about T10 wireless earbuds have been activated.

The wireless earbuds supports wireless charging, so in order to ensure that you can fully enjoy our great earbuds more conveniently, if you agree, how about we provide you a new wireless charger for free?

Don't worry, it is totally free for you.  We just want to ensure that you are 100% satisfied with 5 stars shopping experience on our great sound earbuds and service.

The first time I used them I was outside in the open lining my side walk with bricks. I had my phone sittin on my 25 foot side walk in the middle. I took two steps away from my phone and my music started cutting in and out, again this is a wide open area NO obstruction to block signal in any way.
Wait it gets better. on several occasions I was sittin right beside my phone within 3 feet of phone to ear peices and you guessed it my music would cut in and out. at one point I even put the phone directly on my lap and the music still cut in and out.
However when the music does play It does have a good quality sound to it!
Dont be fooled as I was by the over inflated reviews just so you can get a free wireless charger! These are nothing but trash and waste of your money!

title: Good headset, great price.
body: I went looking for headphones that I can use while walking at my local in door pool and read some reviews and decided to try these out. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the sound and the range it works in. I was able to link it up with my IPad as well and listen to some recorded shows as well. I can take phone calls in my car from speaker to private just by putting in one of the headsets. I’m happy and have recommend it to family and friends.

title: Obvious choice over AirPods
body: These are simply fantastic. I simply cannot understand what anyone would pay for AirPods when these are superior in every way, and a fraction of the price. Great fit, great sound, easy to maintain. Amazing.

title: 1 YEAR WARRANty
body:
I have been an immovable client of apple, but after trying the AirPods I realized that the AirPods fell out of my ears too frequently, so I decided to go with samsung level active this was fine in my ears but the cable is annoying especially when I'm running
so I decided to give a TOZO T10 a try to my surprise these fit my ear well but my biggest surprise is the sound better than apple, the battery lasts much longer than samsung,
you can't go wrong with these beauties

title: Good value for the price!
body: Had the Airpods, but was afraid to wear them when working out. They never did fit my ears properly, and had to constantly adjust them, there was a few times when they fell out. The TOZOs fit snugly in my ears, and because of that, I can now wear them when I'm cutting the lawn, or driving the forklift at work. When I'm mowing the lawn, I can now also hear what's playing on my phone. Good value for much less than Airpods

title: High Quality Wireless Earbuds On A Budget
body: Just received my earbuds a few days ago but so far I’m in love. Build quality seems like high quality on the earbuds themselves, as well as the included charging case. The packaging was also very nice and gave the product a sense of quality over cheap bulk packaging on some other products out there. Only thing I noticed was when I turn certain ways the left earbud cut out for a fraction of a second, but only noticed it once. Could’ve also been due to the Bluetooth signal on my iPhone. But so far I rate these headphones 4 out of 5 stars. They sound great and appear well built, especially for the price.

title: Great Headphones!!
body: I have been using these headphones to work out in for the past few weeks. They have great sound and don't fall out as easily as I thought. I do run at a good pace for about a mile and a half. They will start to work their way out occasionally but once you push them back in a couple of times they are fine. While I work out they are great and just what I was looking for. The case is really nice and will charge the headphones quite a few times before you need to recharge it.

title: Constant beeping sound.... Don't buy
body: The earbuds sound pretty good but it's hard to enjoy the sound when you have a constant beeping in your ear every 5 seconds. I've tried disconnecting, reconnecting, reconnecting one at a time, reconnecting both at the same time...... If I only have to use 1 on, I can't get rid of that beeping sound. And I just realized my return window has ended. So frustrating.

title: Great sound and great value!
body: I just got these ear buds and my first impression is WOW!  They sound amazing.  The last pair I tried from a different manufacturer kept cutting out.  These never did in the hour I wore them.  They are also extremely comfortable.  I usually get ear fatigue after about 30 minutes with most earbuds.  Not so with these.  Also they stayed put very well even when I shook my head trying to dislodge them.  Fir the price, you can’t go wrong.

title: Not worth the 50 bucks.....for 30$ if they are on sale maybe
body: After returning the first set...I'm still disappointed. If the phone sets on the bench in the shop I can walk around a good 25 foot area. If the phone is in my pocket I lose connection....I purchased an arm holder...works better....still for the cost..i guess they are ok.

title: Great product
body: Happy with the earbuds, wanted to get away from wires that seem to always get tangled up when working. These fit really well for me even while moving around. Pairing was straightforward no issues.

title: Good wireless earbuds at a decent price.
body: Purchased my Tozo wireless earbuds around 3 months ago and I've truly enjoyed the sound quality these earbuds have provided. Good sound, and fit great. The best part is no wires to accidentally hit or pull when doing chores working out etc. They stay in place and from my experience so far stay charged for most of my long running activities. When you're done, they go back into their very conveniently sized charging station, which keeps your earbuds in a safe area from being damaged. I would certainly buy these again, and for roughly 50 dollars you aren't going to find a better pair for this price.

title: Surprisingly loud and clear - worth the money.
body:
I've tried other wireless headphones but these are a step above in terms of sound quality and volume. The manual is in a very broken English which had me worried at first-- however the headphones are great. Half volume is plenty most of the time-- which is unlike any other wireless phones I've used.

I wear them running on the treadmill, lifting, commuting, etc. They have only fallen out a couple of times when changing my shirt and knocking them out.

Battery life is also as advertised and the rechargeable case gives them a good 2-3 full charges.

They claim to be waterproof but I've yet to put that to the test...

Easily worth the money. One caveat I have is the functionality of the buttons-- a double tap redials the previous call and I have no use for that myself. Nonetheless they are pretty great true wireless headphones.,

title: Decent earbuds for sport
body:
Pros:
-Sound is great. I'd say even deep
-It sits good in my ears (shadowboxing, running, cycling, even when I jamming my boxing dummy with full power )
-Looks durable. (didn't test waterproof trait though, by I'm sweating like a pig so.. seems like they are)
-Charge is decent
Cons:
-Box is kinda big
-Buttons is too hard to press and I pierce my ear when I do it (I guess because of waterproof trait)
-Sometimes I need to manually connect it to phone

Overall I recommend it to active people.

title: Love it
body: Used it for 3 days now and love it - bass is really good (at least for me) and better than the other earbuds I bought.  have had no issues now connecting and works very well. Battery life looks decent also and the wireless charging is a major plus.

title: Best bluetooth earbuds out on the market and amazing customer service!
body:
I have never owned bluetooth earbuds and was hesitant to buy these ones from TOZO- what if the sound quality wasn’t all that good? What if the connection was bad? What if the earbuds didn’t fit my small ears?

Let me tell you, these earbuds are everything and more you could possibly need from bluetooth earbuds. At first I found them uncomfortable to wear, the smallest size earbuds were still too big. I reached out to TOZO and they had an amazing and fast customer service team that helped send me an even smaller earbud size for free! After registering my product for the 1-year free warranty, TOZO actually reached out to me to send me (you guessed it) another free item but this time it being the wireless charging pad and I quote “to ensure I was completely satisfied” I already was but now I'm just over the moon at this point- guys, this company not only has really good quality earbuds for a steal of a price, but also amazing customer service; so if something doesn’t seem to be working for y’all, contact them, don’t just get frustrated and return it, this company is like no other.

As for the actual product review:

As someone who has small ear canals, I was worried these earbuds wouldn’t work for me, I was wrong. With the multiple earbud sizes, you can be guaranteed something will fit!

And the connection, I read that some people had horrible connection if they had the slightest obstruction to their master earbud or their phone- for me however, I walked all the way across my house to the kitchen while my phone was charging in the guest bedroom and I could hear my music just fine and with that being said, I was washing dishes and waters always loud but these earbuds have awesome noise canceling.

More on noise canceling; I share a room with my boyfriend and sometimes when im trying to study and listen to music while he’s in a call talking to friends it can be very very annoying. I have never truly came across headphones that are what they claim to be with noise canceling- however, these earbuds do just that and I was shocked to find that I can see my boyfriends mouth moving and hear nothing from him- oh my god the joy!

I have yet to try these earbuds near water but if I ever do, I’ll write an updated review.

And last but not least, the carrying case/charger.

The carrying case is not only made to hold your earbuds but they do carry charge for I think about 4 times of full charging if you can’t make it to an actual outlet to charge them. The case is opaque so I can see the charge of my earbuds through the case without having to open them to check on them which is nice. And if you carry these out and about it does have a little area you can tie something to it and carry it to a bag or pants if you want- and its not too big to carry about, fits just nicely in the palm of my hands!

And as for the charging pad? It’s on it’s way here as I write this but I can only expect my experience with this product to get better from here on out.

(Also, I am so pleased with these earbuds I’m waiting for a couple more paychecks to roll around to get myself a second pair for work, would definitely recommend this product and the company!)

title: ABSOLUTELY WORTH IT!
body:
A man at my gym was raving about these ear pods...I was intreagued, particularly about the waterproof part (he was a swimmer) as well as the price (my daughter had just saved up for airpods, and OMG!)

They came quickly. Sound quality is great; lots of bass though - ideal for working out!

I like that they charge in the box on a wireless charging pad and I like that they came with 4-6 different size ear plug sizes. (I ended up needing the smallest size, and they have never fallen out of my ears!)

title: Unreal earphones at an unreal price.
body: These earphones are much better than I thought they would be. I got them after my last pair of Bluetooth earphones stopped working (the kind with the annoying wire connecting them) and was worried about these falling out of my ears but they fit in perfectly and stay in even during jump rope exercises. The SOUND QUALITY is soooo much better than my las pair too and I don’t see why anyone would pay $150 for apply AirPods when you could have these. Excellent clarity on the lows, mids, and highs. These are top notch wireless earbuds. I haven’t tried them swimming yet, but I plan on trying that sometime soon. They also come with a year-long warranty which makes you feel comfortable actually trying them in the water! Unreal.

title: Great sound at a great price
body:
The ear buds provide great sound with substantial amount of low end bass. Pairs with each other quickly without fail. They stay in your ear comfortably while on a run. Hasn't had a problem with sweat or rinsing with water. I haven't had the confidence to take it into the pool yet. Hopefully, the battery will remain healthy for a long time.

"The customer support Tozo provides is top-notch. They will promptly resolve problems, even after your purchase is done and over with."

title: Affordable, wireless & great sound
body: So I just got them & I love them so far! They cancel a lot of background noise for being affordable ear pods! Plus no cord! Super happy with this purchase; definitely would recommend. Don’t know about the battery life yet; have 4 stars.. I will update in a month or so!

title: Very nice fit and well worth the price
body: These little headphones are very comfortable as I listen to audible books a lot and the charging box works with my Samsung charger I just have to lay it on the pad. Sound is outstanding as well

title: BEST EARBUDS I'VE EVER HAD !
body: Myself along with multiple family members have purchased these earbuds. I have had several comparable ear buds from popular brands but these are the best. The highs are crisp and the bass is deep with no distortion. The call quality is excellent. I've tested voice quality on them while in the gym and no one noticed that I was talking through bluetooth. Battery life was my biggest concern but with the charging case and quick charging times that helped mitigate the concern. Overall these are some of the best on the market right now !

title: A Must Have for Ear Buds...
body:
I have had 5 different Blue Tooth ear buds and was not happy with any of them, Until I received my Tozo T10 BT ear buds. They were easy to get set up and pair, upon first listen the Bass rocks in these ear buds, and treble is also great. Battery life is up to expectations. I give a full thumbs up.
A++
SOM

title: Not for small ears
body: Overall these are just okay from a fit standpoint and great from a sound standpoint, I will continue searching for wireless earbuds. I have small ears holes so even with the smallest pair of plugs I can't get them to stay in. They also stick out of my ears in an off putting way. I need something cuter which can accomodate my small ear holes.

title: You get what you pay for.
body: I've really got to stop buying stuff from no name Chinese companies.  It always boils down to, you get what you pay for.  Yes they are cheap, I love that they can charge via wireless.  The connection some times goes for no reason and doesn't always reconnect without manual intervention.  The battery in these doesn't seem to last as long as similar made Chinese ear pods, but they charge in their cradle very fast.

title: Pretty Good but not Blown Away
body:
I like these a lot. They sound good and don't seem to fall out (yet). There are just a few downsides that keep me from giving 5/5. First, to keep them in your ear you really have to shove them in and it's not painful but it's not pleasant either. Next, to push the button either one you basically have to shove it more into your ear. Last and most important, the connection can be very iffy. The range isn't great and gets blocked if anything is in the way (including a hand). I will say this might just be my phone.
Apart from these few things, the headphones are great especially for the money. Overall, would recommend!

title: So Far So good
body: So far So good, Just to get to the points, product came on time, nice packaging, one year warranty who does that on Earbuds TOZO, that's who, great sound quality no amazing sound quality, great price point, if not for price point I would give 4 stars because no volume control on bubs themselves, if volume control was on the bubs I would give a 6 star. I will highly recommend TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds.

title: Sound quality
body: These have been the best headphones I have ever bought! They have pretty awesome range and the battery life is pretty impressive! Also having both of them in and only at half volume I can’t hear anything outside of them. I bought them mainly for my husband so he has can call me or answer any important call I may have for him. Thanks TOZO!

title: The new ones are working very well
body: The owner has reached out to send me another pair free of charge because my set was defective. I will see if they stick to their word. I’m looking forward to writing a new review after I receive the new ones. I have received the new ones and they are working just fine. The owner made good on the replacement of the defective product and I’m quite happy with the ear buds . You should try them.

title: Good quality for the price
body: So far so good. I can’t really comment much on the battery life yet - I just got them. But the noise cancellation and sound are great. They’re not too heavy and they fit my ears well. I have small ears so it’s hard finding ones that fit. But there’s plenty of the rubber things to find the right size.

title: Easy to clean and remarkable bass
body: Got these for working out and hanging out at the pool, the ipx8 waterproofing makes them indispensable. Since the case if waterproof also I can just pour some alcohol into the pockets in the case, drop them in for a bit and just like they're sterile again. Nibs are snug and seem durable but easy to remove. Never heard bass like this from any earbuds. No noise cancellation but I find that feature somewhat disorienting anyway. Design is not ostentatious and they are a tiny bit smaller than I expected which is nice. Only thing so far I would improve is to make the left and right symbols on the buds a bit easier to distinguish. An overall excellent product. 1 year warranty included and another 2 years for two bucks - pretty sure that's called a no-brainer.

title: Pros and cons
body:
Setup with iPhone is very easy, sound quality is perfect, connection with mobile is very easy.
While using with iPhone, in some calls the other side says the voice quality is perfect and others says sound quality is very bad or there is some delay in sound.

title: Best value for the price!
body: This is a great set of Bluetooth earbuds for the price. I am very impressed with the build quality. These are very solidly built and I really like the magnets that hold the earbuds in the case, and also in the lid of the case. They are not 100% reliable in connecting to my iphone every time without having to tap on the Tozo T10 on the Bluetooth screen, but this is not a deal breaker for me.  I would recommend to always remove the R earbud  from the case first, and then the L, and it seems to connect more reliably that way. The sound is not audiophile quality, but far exceeds my expectations for what this product is and the money spent.

title: Very good earbuds. Great sound!
body:
I was a bit sceptical about buying these earbuds but decided to give them a try since there were so many good reviews. I’ve had them for 3 weeks now and I’m very happy with them. I like them so much, I’ve already bought another pair as a gift for my brother.

Things I like:
- Sound quality is really good.
- Pairing is usually very easy.
- Range is great, in the right conditions.
- They’re comfortable. I use the small tips and they fit very well. Haven’t ever fallen out, but they do get loose sometimes if I’m moving around a lot.
- I like that I can use one earbud at a time. This is great for work.
- True Wireless is so much more convenient than any other design. Especially is you plan to use these often (workouts, house/yard work, washing the car, etc...)

Things that could be improved:
- Although pairing is usually pretty easy, it’s not very fast. Usually takes 10 seconds or so for the earbuds to pair with each other and then with my phone.
- They look a bit odd while wearing them, because they stick out a little. Not terrible, but don’t look as sleek as the airpods style.
- Not sure why, but the signal seems weak or interrupted when I’m working in the yard with any gas powered equipment. Gets a little staticky. Also happens if I bend down to pick something up.

Overall, for the price, you really can’t go wrong with these earbuds. It’s a very well made product. I would definitely buy them again.

title: Really good wireless earbuds at this price
body:
Sound - It is really good as compared to other earphones I have. Bass is also good, as needed for EDM.
Battery - It runs around 4 hours which is pretty good. The battery case is available to charge if the battery runs out.
Grip - It fits perfectly in the ear and also has earbuds of other sizes so that people can change it according to their needs.
Noise cancellation - It is very good as I asked the person on the other side, and he could not differentiate whether I was using earphones or talking on normal phone.
Pairing - It is really easy and is very fast. As soon as I take the earphone out, it pairs automatically.

title: Pretty good
body:
These are the FIRST earbuds of this kind that I've used where i haven't had ANY dissconnect or glitchy issues. So far anyway. These have pretty good sound quality, pretty good bass. The only downside to the sound is that these earbuds don't like symbols on drums. They come across as staticy on most songs that have high hats and symbols.

These don't have the best sound quality but considering these are the first rechargeable case wireless earbuds I've bought without connectivity issues i love them. They have more bass than the $160 jabres. They sound amazing with audio books. One kind of annoying thing is that if you don't turn them off before putting them in the case they will constantly discharge, killing the case battery

title: Good value for wireless earbuds.
body: I am happy with the sound quality and now I'm happy with the overall performance of the system.  I had some issues with the first pair having a poor wireless connection between the left and right earbuds.  Bluetooth connection to the phone was fine.  I contacted the seller and after a couple of emails they sent me out a replacement set.  Very happy with the customer service and for the price I believe these wireless earbuds are a good value.  I'm pretty happy with the purchase.

title: The best by far!!!
body:
These are the by far the best wireless headphones ive had as of yet! Pros and Cons as followed by:

Pros:
1. They hold a 3 hour charge
2. Have a fairly nice comfortable fit
3. Bass is definitely on point when it comes to volume
4. recharging base is a decent size and making it magnetic also gives you a little more security if you drop the case ( has happened to me )
5. No real issues with connecting to blue tooth using a Samsung 10+
6. You can shower with them! If my speaker dies i usually use these but make sure to dry them off and let them sit before putting them back in the case ( i try not to do this often )

Cons:
1. (As for most and unlike some devices that are completely wire free) youll find yourself in the dog house if any components go missing or are damaged.

2. (not to sure if its true but wouldnt test my luck) the charging case or headphones are definitley not fragile so make sure to not drop them or put them in a compromising position.
3. Wish the range could be better, depending on where my phone is and if my phone is in constant movement ive noticed that my music playing will be interupted abruptly.

Summary: unless i miracolously find better blutooth wireless head phones then these are my go-to for the season. Affortable and definitely worth it for daily use.

title: liked it
body: I like it, durable and fits to ear. For that price range it is perfect for me...

title: Really good product. A+
body: I was looking for an earpiece with apple quality BASS and this product has AMAZING quality, good bass for it's size and battery life. Everything about this item screams excellent quality.

title: poor microphone sound and connectivity issues
body:
This is my first pair of wireless headphones.  I purchased them thinking that they would also replace the Bluetooth headset that I use when making phone calls.  My job requires that I'm on the phone constantly.  When I receive a call, sometimes it answers automatically, this is NOT good.  I like to choose which calls I answer.  Another problem is that the person on the other end couldn't hear me.  I had to turn off the headset and pick up the call. I also like to use one earphone at a time, this is difficult.  Oftentimes I just continue to get this beeping  noise while it is trying to connect to the one that I'm not using.

The sound quality is very good.  I'm going to give these a couple more days and see if I can get used to them, but if not, I will be returning them.

title: Great product for the price.
body:
Great sound quality, great noise cancellation but my only issues are 1) it takes too long to pair to the device automatically 2) the lack of ability to change tracks or volume. I only use these for running and working out, so it’s a bit inconvenient especially while running because I gotta take my phone out the arm band to change tracks or adjust volume, gotta make sure it’s all done beforehand. I haven’t tried out the waterproof ability because if it doesn’t work then God help me, I’ll wait until natural circumstances has its way.

Other than that, for the price you’re getting this especially compared to brands like apple and Samsung, it’s a good deal. 4/5 for me dawg

title: Perfect sound and great noice cancellation
body:
Wonderful sound and makes me deaf to the outside world. Perfect noise cancellation.
Looks nice as well.
Wish it would play longer than 3 hours, since I love watching series, but other than that... these are amazing.
My husband wants them too

title: Left earbud OR both Disconnects sometimes
body: Ehh. Sometimes both would disconnect and then reconnect within a second or 2 two. Sometimes it would just be the left earbud that disconnects and then reconnects. My old wireless earbuds never did this and they were CHEAPER! Definitely not pleased and also disappointed with the product. If it gets worse or continues I might have to return them and get my money back and buy something better from another company. That's how bad the problem is and I'm not the only one with this problem it seems according to other reviews.

title: Great affordable Wireless earbuds!
body: So far, really impressed with these. Got them for my teenage daughter - her not cheap wired Beats earbuds only lasted about 8 months, and cheaper wired options only lasted a few months at best. She's loving these - very convenient and the charging case works well and is easy to use. Her only feedback was that it would be nice to have volume control on the earbuds themselves. Great product, would buy again!

title: Great during walks
body: These pair quickly and work well with a Sony Bluetooth Walkman MP3 player. I listen to audiobooks during walks.  The stay in place well.

title: Wireless charging, great price, great sound!
body: Love the wireless charging aspect.  Great sound.  Easy paring to my iPhone X.  Great price as well.  If I lost one of them I would not be in sticker shock as they are not the OEM buds at 200 bucks.

title: Very Satisfied with Purchase
body:
I primarily use earbuds for listening to music while running and working out.  First time buyer of wireless earbuds so I was apprehensive as to sound quality and I was seeking a product that remained stable in my ear while working out .  I have always used wired earbuds prior to this purchase.  My standard $30 dollar wired earbuds would last a couple of years before wires would ultimately break and loose sound in one of the ear buds.  Another issue with wired earbuds was the cords would eventually pull on the earbuds requiring readjustment to add slack to the cords and then press back in the earbuds.

I ended up purchasing the Tozo T10s given its features, reviews, and reasonable price.  1) I didn't want to have to worry about water or sweat impacting the earbuds. Given these have a waterproof rating of IPX8, I feel confident in not having to worry about them getting soaked.  2) Sound quality exceeded my expectations for price level - very clean tones with good base.  Volume level capacity is great given it will go louder than what I need even though I've had slight hearing loss through the years. 3)  Stability of staying put in my ears during running is very good.  No more cords pulling on the earbuds!  These are more bulky than my wired earbuds but they are fairly light in weight.  I encountered no issues with them coming unseated from my ear canals during 30 minute runs.  Occasionally, I will slightly press on them to adjust the seal pressure in the ear.  I love the freedom of having no cords!  Glad I chose to go with these over wireless earbuds that are joined by a cord that wraps around the neck.  Coworker mentioned cords on his wireless earbuds do become unbalanced and will pull on his earbuds when running. 4) Battery life is good - more than adequate for getting me through a couple hours of workout at the gym.  Love that the charging base has an internal battery that can recharge the earbuds several times when away from any plugins.

I would not recommend this product for phone use.  Given the location of the microphone being in ear, it has a hard time clearly picking up my voice.  Not a concern to me since I did not purchase this product for phone use.

title: Audio lacks frequency range unless you like tinny!
body:
While the audio is clear and crisp it is crisp as in no low to mid frequencies. Vocals all sound tinny and there is no bass at all. The snare drum and high hat cymbal is loud and clear if that’s your interest. I had hoped to free up the worship team from their earphone monitor console and I will get their input.  I’m sure I'll get a thumbs up for wireless freedom from their console but totally thumbs down for overall audio quality.  For what it’s worth, so far, I have only tested these earbuds with my iPhone and iPad. If I find anything new worthy of mention I’ll update this review.

Update: Bluetooth latency is unacceptably long. That may or may not be more a transmitter issue. From speaking into a microphone to hearing in the earbuds is a delay of maybe a second. For their intended usage of streaming audio the latency is not much of a issue but if real time audio is needed Bluetooth is not the answer.

Regardless of the latency, audio reproduction is terrible with no lows to mids.

title: Very impressed!
body: I was very impressed with every part of this product. Case and additions that come with them are nice. The sound quality and battery life are fantastic. The appeal is sleak and light weight. Have nice features and are WATERPROOF! I am around water daily. I was looking for one that I could use as an ear piece while driving my work van and listen to music all while having an old phone that the speaker doesn't work anymore. This product cured my problem. The only thing is you need to read the instructions on donning them because it makes a difference when they are in correct. I would recommend this product.

title: It works. Only thing i dont like about it is the sound. Its not as good as the $300 ones.
body: I like how everything works and the quality is top notch. BUT as soon as i started listening to my music, there was a scrathy noise in the background. So if you really dont care about quality sounds then by all means buy this. But i rather use my samsung with wire on it for a better sounds quality. Im still thinking about returning it. Never mind im keeping them after all. Pretty good for its price. If you really want a good wireless pay $200 or $300. Other than that ill give it 4Stars. I love the base on it. You will enjoy it while working out maybe. Or if you dont want to hear someone else talking.

title: Best wireless earbud bluetooth says wifey
body: This a gift to my wife who had a number of wireless earbuds collected & set aside and has not been satisfied on any of them until I purchase this. The sound quality, noise cancelling, battery life plus it's waterproof had her a 2 thumbs up. For a decent price, she said it's the best wireless she owned so far.  Hopefully this is the wireless earbud she'll keep for last...

title: Good sound and quality... poor execution for wireless phones not having basic music controls!
body:
Just purchased these... so far quality seems good. They’re loud enough...  I like my music loud!
Something I don’t like, and TBH never thought to review because I assumed it would be a standard feature... music control.

There’s no advance/repeat song control! Which is ridiculous... maybe not a prob for the masses... but a huge disappointment for me.

I am an install tech, I do physical labor working with my hands all day. I don’t have the freedom or the desire to pull out my phone every time I want to skip or repeat a song!

So unfortunately, I will be returning these and looking for a pair that does have the BASIC controls ALL wireless headphones should have!

title: These things are great!
body: I purchased these headphones on 12-August and promptly took them on a 30 mile cycling ride. Had been previously using a pair of wired bluetooth headphones and my first impression of the sound quality from the TOZO T10's was in how rich and full the sound quality was from these relatively tiny earbugs. It was very good with rich bass, solid midrange and high highs. The fit was great and the devices paired instantly with my S7. Listening on these has made me realize that there are differences in sound quality between the major streaming services. Very pleased with the purchase and highly recommend the TOZO T10 to anyone looking for wireless earbuds.

title: Great wireless head sets will buy another
body: Great head set for the price you cannot beat these head sets very comfortable for my long runs hold a great charge in.

title: Great for small ears when working out
body: I use this product for working out. They fit very comfortably and snug. I have very small ears, and they work perfect. Easy to pair, and last a long time. Would definitely buy again.

title: Great Headseats
body: I like these headsets for their mobility of being wireless.  The sound quality is excellent.  I love the lanyard so I can carry the case with me during walks. I have not used them for voice calls as of yet but will repost after several call usages.  I will also see how they stand up during my swimming session.  Great product

title: I am really impressed by these headphones....
body:
I have a few different types of wireless headphones and none of them have really impressed me.  So, I decided that I needed a really good pair and searched through Amazon and read a lot of reviews.  The reviews for these TOZO T10 wireless ear buds were really good and after reading about 30 of them I clicked the buy button and ordered a pair for myself.

The buds arrived within in a day and so far I have fell in love with these little babies.  First of all they synced up with my iPhone right away with no issues.  If you sync one of them, the other follows automatically, just give it a few seconds.

The sound quality if fantastic and they have just the right amount of bass so as not to make you go deaf.  The carry case is also the charger and you can charge them with the provided usb plug or if you own a wireless charger that will work just as well.

They are sleek and well designed and come with different size changeable ear buds that will fit any size ear hole.

For the price you cannot beat these buds and I would buy another pair if I needed them.

title: NO WIRELESS CHARGING!
body:
NO WIRELESS CHARGING.  I have numerous wireless dicks of different brands and this will not charge in any of them!
Update*** After my initial 1 star review the company reached out and offered to send me another set of buds and a free wireless charger!  I upgraded my one star to a two star because of the customer service!  However, I received a new pair of ear buds but the free wireless charging dock they were going to send as well was not in the box.  New pair of buds are sketchy with wireless charging.  Will charge for 5 minutes and shut off!  I then need to lift the case off of my charger and place again.  Yes it does wireless charger but not appropriately.  I will continue to charge via cord but do yourself a favor and try a different brand!

title: Left channel drops in and out constantly
body:
UPDATE:
TOZO is sending a new set to see if the right channel was the problem. They are trying very hard to please me, including offering a full refund (return unnecessary). I opted to try the new buds because I really like the sound and how well they stay in my ears.
----------------
TOZO sent me a new left channel earbud when I told them about the problem with it dropping out. Only took a week to get the new one! After resetting the earbuds according to their directions, the newly reset left channel continued to drop out like the old one. It's possible that the problem is with the right bud, but they only sent the left. Most likely it's a bad design that only works for some people in some environments.

After some research it would appear that it is rare for bluetooth headphones to work right all the time, so Tozo is not unique in this aspect. I've read that Bose makes some that work, but the reviews on Amazon belie that. Since I own a set of Apple AirPods, and they work great, I know it's possible to design something that functions properly, electronically (AirPods slip out and are not water resistant).

There are several reasons why wireless earbuds might drop out on the left channel, but all revolve around the signal. Bluetooth transmits the left and right channels to the right bud (master), and then the right bud sends the left channel to the left bud (slave) via another bluetooth channel. Since most heads tend to attenuate the signal, very little signal gets through skin, skull, brain, and blood. It's better to get the antennas outside the ear so the signal can go around the head, so to speak. I suspect Apple figured that out and put the antenna in that little stem that hangs out of the ear.

It's sad that these TOZO earbuds don't work worth a darn since they sound rather good for bluetooth audio from an MP3 file, and wireless bluetooth is so convenient when out running, cycling, etc. So now it's back to the Apple AirPods that slip out of my ears. Ugh!

title: I don’t recommend this product.
body: Received as expected. However I didn’t open when received. It’s been over a month since ordered, return allowance has expired and just tried to use. Right ear bud doesn’t work and I have to reconnect for each use. I do not recommend this product.

title: Amazing product not only for the price  it all around
body: Extremely happy with The Too ear  uds. I wear them in the shower all the time, I actually attached the charging case to my keys on a lanyard so I never leave the house with out them. I love that I can put on my favorite podcast while I take a shower and not worry about the foul language that used to pump through a Bluetooth speaker bleeding out into the rest of the house. Great product, quality sound and above and beyond customer service. Definitely a must by considering if I didn't know better I would think they cost 3x their listed price .

title: A+ Customer Service
body: I loved these earbuds the minute I took them out of the box.  They fit perfect, they were comfortable, the sound was clear and the phone connection was great.  Unfortunately after a few weeks they stopped holding a charge :-(.  I contacted TOZO and they sent me a new pair the next day!  No questions asked, no hassle!  I really appreciate the service and them standing behind the product.  Very solid!

title: Airpods 1/3 the price
body: Great wireless earbuds for the money. They magnetically attach to the case to charge, which can in turn wirelessly charge or charge through the microusb port. Sound quality is quite good, I think it's as good or better than airpods, while this is 1/3 the price. Airpods technically have more battery life, but I never listen to music long enough for these to run out of power anyway, and they get over 10 hours or something when you're putting them back in the charging case every few hours or so. Comfortable in the ear, just gently twist to get a good seal. Depending on the size of your ear you may need to change out the ear tips (multiple sizes are included). Just connect to the right earbud and it will automatically connect to the left. Thanks, for reading, I've enjoyed these earbuds and would recommend them!

title: Much Better Than Anticipated
body: Let me start by saying these are terrific!  The build quality is solid, packaging and presentation are nicely done and the sound is truly surprisingly very good with much better bass than something this small normally has.  I'm very pleased with these.  I had a pair of Phaiser's wrap around Bluetooth earbuds and they were far more finicky and not durable.  So came here looking for a replacement and wanted something that could handle sweat and found the behind the wrap annoying.  So gave this shot and wow, these blow the Phaiser earbuds away.  The charging storage case is a great touch and a useful place to store these after a work out.  The only warning I'd make is these are tiny and dark, so if you drop one of them, which I did, they're not easy to find.  The unit comes with several sized ear cups,  the standard size turned out to be a bit too big for my ears, they include two sizes smaller and one size larger.  The smallest size works best for me.  So try them for fit before going on a run,  and change if needed.  I went with the standard size out and one fell out, when I began to sweat.  Wasn't easy to find in the early morning light, but did and no harm or issue with it.  I changed the cups when I got home and now the fit is more secure.  I'd buy these again in heart beat.  Love the freedom of this style of wireless headbuds.

title: Great earbuds
body: Great product , not just for the price but this is a great product in general I was surprised by the quality of the sound, it was better then my wired earbuds, I was able to shower just fine with them I however wouldn't make a habit out of it the only complaint i have is the battery life but this does not at all take away from how good these are especially considering how cheap they are.

title: Better sound and fit then the apple AirPods
body: Over all, the best wireless headphones I have tried so far. Sound better then the apple AirPods. Stays in my ear. Decent batter life and wireless charging case. Connects with my iPhone Xr (also have BT 5.0) without any issues and very quickly. Have been using the headphone regularly for a few months.

title: Great wireless headphones!
body: Great sound quality. Comes with a variety of ear pieces to choose from for the best fit. I was surprised how well they stayed in my ear and how comfortable they are. I like the fact that the case holds a charge, so when the headphones go out, just stick them back in the case and they are charged in 20 min. I am thinking about buying another pair for my spouse.

title: Only one bud pairs issue, good waterproofing
body: The ability to pair only the right earbud is a big disadvantage, and shouldn’t be an issue with a product at this price point. Get a pair where you can pair either bud so you never have one out of batteries. FYI, waterproofing is legit. Washed mine and it still works perfectly.

title: Uncomfortable and Difficult to use
body: Honestly I don't much care for these. They're really hard to connect to my phone for some reason and they hurt my ears despite switching to a more fitting ear bud piece. The sound quality is good. I just dont think these are a good fit for me.

title: sounds good
body:
I've been trying to use these with my Fitbit Ionic.  They sync fine but they often lose connection while in use.
I first thought this was an issue with these earbuds so I tried another brand with the same results. I guess Fitbit wants you to use their brand.
They are comfortable to wear.

title: Excellent True Wireless Buds for about 1/3 the Price of Airpods
body:
I was skeptical at first because this deal seemed too good to be true. Good reviews on true wireless buds for only 1/3 the price of airpods?

They are super convenient, easy to pair/use, doesn't fall out of my ear (if you use the right size bud that comes with the product). What really does it for me over airpods is that it has isolation, no need to crank the volume up to cover background noise.

For $50? It's a steal.

title: Excellent wireless headphones
body: I got these after I grew frustrated with the wireless headphones that had a cable connecting the 2 headphones.  Wire was always bouncing around pulling one earplug out.  Figured I'd give these a shot and I have to say thus far I have been very happy.  The pairing is easy, functionality is equally simple.  The sound quality is excellent on these.  I actually had to turn down the volume compared to the previous headphones I had.  The case that comes with it keeps the safe and charges so I don't have to worry about the headphones dying on me.  Great buy for the price.

title: Not a disappointment
body: I read the reviews...I have found these buds to be great! Great sound/excellent sound cancellation. I work in a wood machining factory. Comfortable as well. Case charges quick as do the bids. Ez 6hr play nonstop with 35% charge to go. Quality product in my opinion

title: TOZO T10 TWS Bluetooth 5.0
body:
Quick charging with wireless charger
Great battery life and wonderful deep sound quality.
Great bass quality and I can turn sound down and it is still loud enough
Awesomeness

title: Super easy, barely an inconvenience!
body: Great earbuds. Sound is impeccable. I found these earbuds comfortable and stable in the ear.  No problems while jogging on the treadmill. Pairing is easy and fast.

title: Good quality except for phone call microphone
body: Everything was good except when it comes to phone call. Person on the other end couldn't hear me at all. Great make and quality but just lacking the mic call quality

title: Super Impressed by TOZO!
body:
These wireless earbuds are amazing! First of all, I love the same day shipping Amazon offers and the fulfillment from TOZO. The sound quality is above average for wireless earbuds with punchy bass. The packaging is also super impressive showing the detail and care TOZO puts into their product. The pairing process is easy to follow and the instructions included are clear and concise. Lastly, the price for these is super affordable considering the quality. Great job TOZO!

NOTE: Don't forget to register for the warranty through TOZO with the information in the packaging and your Amazon order number.

title: Wow, what an amazing product!
body: Wow! I was surprised with the sound quality and the fit and feet of these buds. I had previously ordered the $300 Bang & Olufsen 1646102 Beoplay E8 2.0 Truly Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds and Charging Case - Limestone and returned them due to pairing issues, sound quality and fit. I hesitated to buy any others for fear of further disappointment, but I saw the reviews on these and decided to pull the trigger. Don’t regret one bit! These are the find of the century  and I’m beyond satisfied. I purchased the tan ones and they are very trendy and slick. Full package - stylish with awesome sound.

title: Really nice I give it A+++.
body: I really like the ear pods. They sound really great and the phone calls are great too. I listen to talk radio a lot more than music. They do great. I wish the battery lasted longer. But it nice that you can put them back in the case to recharge. I haven't tried the water yet but I can't wait.

title: Excellent noise cancellation and convenient charging case makes the investment worth it.
body:
I’ve owned this product for 2 months and use them solely at the gym. They have fantastic noise canceling abilities as long as they fit tightly in your ear. Luckily they come with different sized earbuds and I recommend trying out multiple. As for sound quality, they sound exactly the same as a pair of $20 Bluetooth headphones I have owned the past few years. I was hoping for better quality considering their price point. It should be noted that they also have significant levels of bass. As for battery life, I have consistently used these earbuds for approximately 2.5 hours before they die. Typically this would lower my view of the product, but the included charging case makes keeping them fully charged very convenient. I would recommend charging these earbuds after each (>1.5hr) use to ensure they do not die in the middle of a workout. Overall, they are an upgrade for entry level Bluetooth headphones and are worth the investment if you don’t want to spend $100 or more.
4 out of 5 stars.

title: Just what I needed
body: Exactly what I was looking for, I've ruined past headphones sweating at the gym, these are working fine regardless of the extra moisture. They sound great and they stay in my ears comfortably, I almost fell asleep with them on during my initial trial. No connection issues, they pair fairly quick, and they pause and play music when I push the button on either side without delay. I got these mostly for working out to music, so I haven't tested call quality yet, but so far they are everything I wanted. I also love the wireless charge feature.

title: Easy to use
body: I have had my earbuds for over a week now they are really simple to set up on your phone, I like the variety of sizes they give you for your buds so they fit your ears, the quality is wonderful and the company it there to help you every step of the way if needed.  I would recommend this product to anyone who is looking for a great set of earbuds for a very reasonable price.  They are also waterproof which is a great plus if your into swimming or you sweat a lot!

title: GREAT HEADPHONES GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE.
body: My headphones arrived within two days and the left one was skipping out a bit so I decided to message the company directly TOZO, I was amazed at house fast they responded and offered to send me a new pair at no cost to me. The company is honestly amazing and whenever my headphones weren’t skipping. They worked amazingly. So worth the price. I love sound quality and loud music and bass. So I was sold once I tested them out. Abasolutety worth the money and I would highly recommend them to anyone.

title: Sweet Little Buds
body: I've been thinking for a while about getting some wireless earbuds. I wear headphone at the gym connected to my phone and am constantly hitting the wire, knocking my phone down, and looking like a fool to get off my machine and scramble to pick everything up. This will happen NO MORE. These sweet little numbers connected to my phone perfectly with no issues. I love that there are different sizes available to use for a snug fit in my ears. I opted for the smaller size as even other ear buds would fall out of my ears. With my first test drive, I happily put on my music and the song drowned out the sounds of my daughter singing in the shower. They are truly noise cancelling. My husband was even impressed and is considering a pair for him. He mows lawns and can never hear his phone. The only downfall is the 3 hour battery life, which for a normal person, may be perfect. These little things pack a punch and I couldnt be happier.

title: Great product! Have recommended to my friends
body:
So far I’ve loved the headphones. Having the control of both headset’s with one unit independently is highly advantageous. For instance it’s easy to have one ear piece positioned in the ear and place the other ear bud in your pocket utilizing it as a simple remote. This is where having a microphone built into each headset become invaluable. Great product. Just buy it and enjoy 5 stars.
P.s.
  I’m sorry I forgot to leave an opinion on bettering the product. The ability to switch songs with the ear pieces would be amazing. Maybe by splitting the single button on the exterior surface of the earpiece Into two pieces. Granted it would cost more and that would be reflected in the marketplace. That said granted the products solid status and reputation, tacking on another $20 per unit w/ extra controls and features would not keep people from buying. #skipbutton

title: Perfect for the gym!
body: I love my new wireless earbuds!! It was nice that they came with different sizes of cushions because I did need to use a smaller size. The sound is great and cancels outside noise almost completely. They're perfect for the gym!

title: Perfect for working out and laying around!
body: I love these headphones! I use them to workout and just laying around. Others can hear my music when I have the volume up all the way but other than that, these are perfect! I sweat a lot, especially in the sun, and they’ve held up very well!

title: Not for Sport
body:
If you like to run and have these literally fall out of your ear even though you have "implanted" them into your canal, then get these....
Should come with a sticker "do not jog, run or bounce....will fall out"
Disappointed and also when running the movement of my I-phone can be heard into the buds.....its like a "swishing" sound but it picks up the motion of the phone in either hand.....overall diminishing return

title: My Rating – Two Buds Up!
body:
I’ve been looking for a decent pair of earbuds for a decent price for several months. A few days ago, I just happened to come across these bad boys on Amazon and then spent a long time on YouTube checking out the reviews. The positive reviews far outweighed any negative comments. As we all know, you can’t please all the people all the time. I finally decided to “pull the trigger” and placed my order with Amazon.
I just received my new TOZO T10 earbuds. The pairing process with my iPhone was a seamless non-event. The enclosed instructions were a little lacking but my countless YouTube searches paid off. These are the first earbuds I have ever used and I totally love them. The fit in the ear canal with the “medium” ear cap is just right for me. I used them on the local gym treadmill for 45 minutes yesterday and the fit was great and solid.
Two other people at the gym asked what kind of earbuds I was wearing. No problem recommending these babies, you won’t be disappointed.

title: Sound is amazing. Very small form factor. Love these!
body: I searched all of Amazon for the best Truly Wireless earbuds. I debated several but settled on the TOZO T10s because the size of the speaker driver. I figured if it is bigger than most than sound should be produced better. Anyway, I got them yesterday and all I can say is WoW! The sound is simply what sold me. I want a headset to be loud, have bass and clear highs, these definitely deliver what I was looking for in earbuds. I am using the original silicone tips it came with but I will be swapping it out some comply foam tips I have for another headset. Just to give you an idea these actually sound better than my Jaybirds X3. I have yet to test them out in water and test the battery life but from a sound point of view I love them!

title: Good but faulty
body: I used this product everything from the gym to audio books while I fell asleep.
