If I am listening to an audio book (or listening to something where it is not a necessity to have both buds in), I can be using one bud while the other is charging, and then switch when the other one needs to be charged - is a great feature as this gives an almost indefinite listening time.

I haven't had long enough to comment on longevity of the product but am hoping they will last.

title: Uncomfortable and difficult to use
body: The headphones kept dropping out of my ear because its too big (even with the smallest headphone adapters).  Also the device would not pair with my device.  Its a shame, b/c the packaging looks very nice.

title: Totally a great deal! Do it!
body: These were recommended from a coworker and it spread quick! There are now 4 people at work who has purchased them and all of us are very satisfied! I love the grey! Sound quality is amazing! I had the apple air pods first but they hurt my ears, like other earbuds had. These are perfect and the first pair I’ve had that I can wear for hours without any issues!

title: Unbelievable sound quality
body: Amazing headphones worked right out of the box. Full rich sound with deep bass. I am using these to swim in my pool tethered  and although they do cut out a bit if they get under the water they come right back on. Makes swimming in my pool bearable! Can’t wait to try these running. You won’t be disappointed! Great package too.

title: Amazing quality for the price you pay!!
body: These are perfect to use for physical activities or at the gym. They don’t fall out which is a huge plus and the bass is better than expected. The Bluetooth function is easy and use and the ear buds last for hours without needing to be charged up. The magnetic function in the case helps to be it secured even when it’s open.

title: Great bass quality, sound, and easy to use
body: I actually purchased bluetooth earbuds from a different company of a similar price along with these to compare and contrast between the two and see which one I preferred better and these earphones really took the cake for better sound. The bass and overall sound quality was noticeably front and center and more apparent than the other brand I tried (taotronics), which sounded more distorted. I have other products from taotronics and was hoping their earbuds would be good too but compared to tozo's earbuds at least I must say these were much better by a landslide. I've used mine every day since I got them and had no problem figuring out how to connect them so the ease of use is great for when I'm gymming or when listening to music at home and want to dive into bed and chillax. I appreciate that these earphones also seem to have noise cancellation although it may not be advertised? The only issue is that it blocks out too much sound that it's dangerous when I'm on the stairmaster and don't realize how loud I'm panting because I can't hear anything else besides my music! Anyway I was blown away by the sound quality over anything else compared to standard quality of other brands I've tried, and that'll be the main reason I'm choosing these over others of similar price (and airpods are too expensive lol).

title: Amazing earbuds!
body: The moment I took them out of the box I loved them! They look sleek and well made. The charging box is well made as well. The magnets that keep the box shut are very strong and I don’t worry about it accidentally opening and the buds falling out. I like the fact that the buds link automatically  once I take them off the charger. When I connected them to my phone for the first time and listened to them I was very satisfied. They are as loud as I like and they definitely are noise canceling. I can’t hear anything when I have them in and that’s how I like it.

title: Great Earbuds!!!
body:
I purchased the T10 earbuds and they worked great, did everything mentioned. I understand that some products malfunction so Unfortunately one earbud stopped working. I got in contact with Tozo and they were Quick on the response very apologetic and offered to send out a brand new pair!!
Overall The product works great and their customer service is awesome!

title: Comfortable and Secure
body: These ear buds stay in very well. Battery life is as advertised. Recharging is quick and easy in carrying case. I’ve experienced quite a bit of cut out lately from one bud to the other. Not sure if it’s a pairing issue or charging issue. Will continue to monitor. All in all, I gave these 5 stars because they beat anything I’ve tried thus far. For this price point, I highly recommend.

title: Great value and great quality
body: Extremely satisfied with these headphones. Noise cancellation is great. Deep bass sound for headphones. Long battery life and a case that charges them four times before needing a plug is awesome.

title: EXCELLENT
body: I loved these headphones. They are comfortable and don't fall out like some wireless headphones. The battery life lasts for hours and they are a lot less expensive than airpods. They connect quickly to my devices without an issue and are excellent at noise cancellation. I love that they are waterproof as it makes great for walking in the rain or listening to music in the shower.

title: Good price, good battery and fair sound.
body: Is a good product for the price. My only insatisfacción is that on the calls not always sound is strong. Sometimes the other person do not hear and you are force to remove it. If you are in a not noise environment works perfect but if not probably the noise cancelation reduce the power of the sound. But if you have both connected is very good sound even though not that strong as expected.

title: Very Easy to Pair and Use Right Out of the Box
body: This was my first experience with Bluetooth earbuds, and found them to be very easy to pair with each other and with my iPhone XR, my iPad, and Amazon 4K FireTV Stick right out of the package.  I have just begun using, but so far am impressed with the sound and build quality.  These appear to be a very solid value.

title: Better than my Bose ever were.
body:
UPDATE: I have now purchased two sets of these.  The sound and feel and ease are more than I ever hoped for.  I wear them almost every minute I'm at work.  I wear them so much that three other co workers have also now purchased them because they liked them so much more than their airpods and bulky over the ear headphones.  I can't rave enough about these.  Probably the best purchase ever on Amazon.

I was ridiculously skeptical about these headphones when I ordered them. $50? I have $150 wired Bose in ear headphones that are starting to wear out. The wire was so annoying when trying to work at my desk and block out noise of my office. I had to get wireless.

All that said, these are BETTER than my Bose headphones ever were.  The weight of them is a little odd feeling at first but easy enough to get used to. Pairing to my phone literally took 15 seconds. I may buy another pair just to keep in my back pack so I have them when I travel.  Amazing find.

title: I love these headphones
body:
I can't stop recommending them to others. I'm a guy who loves listening to podcasts and music as I go about my day, taking walks, running, taking a shower, etc. And these headphones are the best product for that. The charging case is amazing for keeping the headphones together and for keeping them charged. I have small kids, so the fact that the earbuds are harder to pull off are really good (yet, if they don't fit, you can still get them off and resize them), and the case keeps the headphones protected from my beloved little monsters as well. I kind of wish I could charge one headphone while listening to the other, that might make the product a little better, it would certainly prevent that awkward moment where you have to stop listening to charge your headphones, but that's a small thing.

Great product. I'm a huge fan, and I heartily recommend it not just here, but to everyone I know.

title: No more cords getting in the way
body: I've been able to run with these in and they've never fallen out! Great sound and the way they fit blocks out virtually all other noise! I love that the case is also the charger.

title: Simple connection with quality sound
body: The earbuds connect easily and the sound is very good. I use them while listening to Podcasts while walking. There are addition earpieces to use so the buds fit snugly to your ear. The battery seems to be as advertised.

title: Easy and effective
body: These buds are great! They're easy to get started, fit snugly (they offer multiple bud sizes) so I don't hear other stuff when listening, and they sound clean and clear. Very easy. I was worried they be heavy and fall out, but they weren't. I went running with them no problem. What a relief!

title: Left ear bud continued to cut out
body: I purchase these to ware while working out. I used them for three weeks and the left ear bud continuously cuts out or fades in and out. At first I though it was just a glitch between my phone but then it kept getting worse and it also happened when paired with my watch. It was so frustrating trying to work out and listen to music that kept cutting in and out in one ear. I spoke with Amazon and I’m returning them. Thank you Amazon for the great customer support!  Maybe I got the bad pair of the lot, but I will be trying another product.

title: Nice sound, kinda chunky (BIG)...
body: Great sound.  Nice wireless charging case.  Kinda big and chunky, meaning they would fall out of my ear at gym.  If they had ear-hooks I probably would have kept them.

title: Nice base
body: Fit is pretty good. Base is extremely good for a product that was this cheap. Left ear cuts in and out once in a while so I may have to update review if it doesn't go away. Only had them for a day but impressed so far.

title: Others can barely hear your voice
body: The headphones are awesome, they fit without a problem, do not feel awkward and sound quality is great! But there's one problem which kills it all. Microphone voice is too low, the others can barely hear you. Your voice is muffled and you have to literally shout to make yourself audible. There is no point of headphones, however great they are - if you cannot use them to talk. Disappointed!!!

title: Basic Headphones with “Great Reviews”
body: Very happy to upgrade from cheaper TaoTronics to these after seeing reviews. The buds came fully charged which was great, but did not come with different ear plug size options. They came with the generic size which I feel is a normal ear size. I do a lot of cardio and they slip out every 3-6 minutes. It’s so annoying. The tutorial video they advise you to watch, suggests you twist the bud in your ear. I can twist it all day and still slips out of my ear. The sound is ok, but very very basic. I would absolutely never buy these again. I wished I would’ve returned these upon arrival. Good luck with your purchase otherwise.

title: Great Ear Buds!
body: The Tozo earbuds are very convenient and provide very good sound quality. The docking/charging station fits in my pocket so my earbuds stay charged and I don’t have to carry any wires with me. They also stay secure in my ears during runs. Their customer service has also been quite exceptional.

title: What I was looking for
body: These are excellent quality and what I was looking for in ear buds.They have great bass response and Mids and highs.Just what I was looking for IMO.Customer service is top notch and emails quickly

title: Can You Hear Me Now
body: Product as advertised. Take some time to get use to in ear with fit. Kinda hard to switch the ear piece sizes. #A1 overall

title: Worth it - good sound quality, blocks some noise, makes riding the metro pleasant.
body: Purchasing these headphones were worth it. Pros - wireless, minimal issues pairing, and while they are not noise-cancelling, they are in-ear so they block a lot of the outside noise. Cons - a little bulky of a fit, but that's kind of to be expected. The other thing, while not exactly a con, is that they are quite loud. I keep them on the lowest volume most of the time, otherwise I think they probably would be bad for your ears. Overall, would definitely purchase again.

title: Lightweight, easy to use.
body:
Lightweight, easy to use.  Really like the steamline case. I have similar pair from a different company, but this pair is superior for clarity of sound..
I do wish the charging interface was micro-USB, instead of type-C.  While I really like how easy type-C is to use, I already have many, many micro-USB cables.  I've had to begin labeling the darn things since, at a glance, they look the same.

title: The positive reviews are real!
body:
I am very satisfied with these bluetooth wireless headphones! I will be honest,  I was a bit skeptical based on the price and features. I just figured something would he inferior to the big name headphones that cost three times as much.
I read some reviews stating one or both of their earbuds would cut out and was hoping that was not the case for mine, I am really happy to say I have had zero issues so far!

I use mine with my ipod nano and once i paired them for the first time they automatically pair now.  I really like that they give voice prompts as to what is going on. So you know when they power off and on and when they are pairing and have paired.
I have many styles of headphones and these are near the top. The only pair that have more punch are my WIRED pair of Sony xtra bass. But you can't compare them as they are wired and wireless is SO much nicer in the gym. These tozo buds beat out the plantronics bluetooth that I'm replacing.  They still use a cord to connect both buds.

These get more than loud enough I usually do not go past 3/4 volume and i listen pretty loud.

I also have not had any issues with them falling out. Just make sure they are in your ears. I use the ear piece that came on the buds but you get a total of four sizes to get the right fit for your ears.

The case is solid too and the buds click right in with a satisfying snap as the magnets meet. The whole case charges wirelessly too and works great on my wireless charger.

I'm glad I went with these and saved about 100.00 over the big named ear buds.

title: Impressed for the Money
body:
For $50.00 I am very impressed with the quality of the product.  Fits very comfortably.
Sound quality is very good.
The right and left units pair with each other automatically.

I just got them yesterday and was using withing 10 minutes of opening.

Battery life seems good but I will update the review if this changes.

title: Bought these as a gift for my son
body: Bought these as a gift for my 20-year-old and he loves them. He's quite the audiophile too so the quality must be good or else he wouldn't use them. Thinking about getting some for myself now...

title: TOZO T10 ear buds exceed expectations with sound, noise reduction and fit.
body: This is the 4th pair of wireless headsets that I have purchased. Very simple to 'install', join up quickly, find other bluetooth devices quickly. So far they are the best, and the noise reduction is very good - better than the noise reduction headset that I use on airplanes, tho these are a bit newer (technology). I picked a banjo + guitar piece on my phone, played it on top volume on the table and could barely hear it while listening to a clarinet and orchestra solo with these buds. Pretty excellent. The various size ear seals makes a tight fit possible. Not sure if I'd run with these on for fear of losing one, but walking and performing simple tasks, leaning over, etc., is no problem at all. Like these a lot. Can't judge battery life, just received the set, only have ~ 2 hours after charging.

title: Wonderful headphones, very good quality for price!!
body: These headphones are unbeatable for the price, they sound great they hold a charge for 8 hours on a charge. Easy to use and very good quality. Definitely recommend for anyone looking for a great set of wireless earphones for a great price. There customer service actually cares about what you think also which is a big bonus. One more thing they come with a 1 year 100% gaurentee from defects.

title: Ear buds do not charge while case is charging.
body: My rating generally stems from a comparison to another product.  I purchased both these and the "SoundPEATS True Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds in-Ear Stereo TWS Bluetooth Headphones Wireless Earphones" as lightening deals on Amazon.  On one note, these were about 20% cheaper so that has some weight to it, however the fact that the ear buds do not charge while the case is charging is miserable.  Battery-wise these are no comparison.  After 4 workouts these ear buds & case are dead and need a recharge.  The SoundPEATS on the other hand lasted me 3 weeks (15 workouts) on a single-case-charge and unlike the TOZO Earbuds, the earbuds can charge while the case is charging.  On the plus side, the battery does last the length of a workout for me (about an hour) but the fact that they don't make it through a week of workouts is a sticking point.

title: Good product for the price
body: I was tired of wired ear buds and was looking for wireless. These are exactly what I was looking for and expected. The product looks solid and the sound is very good. The charging case is substantial and comes with the ability to hang it around your neck. It also works well with the wireless charger for my cell phone. I am very please with the product, especially at the price.

title: They did not stay in my ear!
body: So like everyone else in America, I was going to purchase apple airpods. But they're expensive, so I looked into these. They did not stay in my ear at all and I couldn't get them to-tried different sizes etc. So sadly, I wouldn't purchase these again.

title: Awesome sound! Durable
body: I bought these earbuds because I ended up putting my old ones thru the washing machine. These ones are waterproof and are able to use a wireless charger so I decided to try them out . They were alittle more expensive, but WOW what a difference in sound quality compared to my 30 dollar pair.  These are awesome!

title: Awesome earbuds, great customer support!
body:
Great little product!

This is my review of these earbuds after three months of usage.
Pros:
-Louder than expected.
-The base is surprisingly good.
-It works in the sauna, and the shower
-perfect for workouts

Cons:
-doesn’t work under water
(Bluetooth signal can’t penetrate water)

title: Sporadic cuts outs, microphone is terrible.
body:
I really wanted these to work well. I particularly liked the wireless charging feature of the case - it is very convenient just to drop it on my charging plate. I have no complaints about sound quality, but I typically listen to audiobooks and not music, so I might not be as demanding as others.

Unfortunately, these earbuds have a few serious flaws.

One killer for me is that the microphone is terrible.  It is extremely quiet.  I left a voicemail as a test call, and when playing it back I had to crank my PC volume to the max to barely hear it. I don't make many calls with earbuds, but I do get them occasionally, and I don't want to have to take an earbud out, fumble in my pocket for the phone and switch the audio device (without dropping the earbud) before I can take the call.

Another problem, and one that would likely bother everybody, is sporadic drop-outs of the right earbud - it goes silent for a moment, and then comes back. The time between dropouts has been as short as every couple minutes, and as long as half an hour.

A final annoyance is when I pull the earbuds out of the case and they pair with the phone, they crank the volume up very high, so my ears get blasted before I can turn it down. I've never had any other bluetooth headset do that.

I'm using Android 9 (Pie) on a Samsung Note 9.

title: I would buy them again in a heart beat
body: Hi I don’t work out so I can’t rate them. I have small ear canals so I use the smallest buds they great. The noise canceling is great as my wife snores loudly.

title: Easy to start using
body: So far so good. Only used a few times but couldn't be easier to charge and connect. Very good sound, plenty of bass. I actually had to turn down the bass on my phone to get to a sound I wanted. Use them to exercise, no problem falling out at this point.

title: So far, so good - well worth the price
body:
These headphones have not disappointed.  I've only been using them for a week, but so far I am really impressed.

Big Pros:
User friendly/Easy pairing - connecting to a phone is super easy, simply take the earbuds out of their case and they start looking for a device to pair with.  Simply go into your phone's Bluetooth menu, select TZ10 and done.
Battery Life - The earbuds themselves hold a decent charge, but coupled with the built-in battery in the case means they will last a really long time.
Comfortable fit - I must admit I was worried when I first got these that I would not feel comfortable wearing them.  I was pleasantly surprised in how well they fit in my ears.  They provide several different adapters to ensure you get a comfortable/snug fit.  I also never felt any discomfort with while wearing them for longer periods of time.
Waterproof - come on, that kinda says everything right there.
Customer service/warranty - Maybe not a big thing for some people, but for me this was a big one.  This device comes with a 1 - year warranty.  Getting the warranty activated was very easy, and the agents I talked to were very courteous and helpful.  For me...major plus.

Concern: To be fair, I have to voice my one big concern at this point.  This is likely true for all similar earbuds, but I worry that devices that small are easily lost.  Even the charging case the buds come in is quite compact, but does come with a cord to allow you to secure it to something larger.  I guess in the end it comes down to how diligent you are about with taking care of them.

As I said, I've only been using these buds for a week now.  If I have any additional experiences later I will definitely add them to this review.  But as I say in the title: So far so good.

title: If you have tiny ear holes, these are not for you.
body:
I'm still on the fence of whether or not I will return these.
Pros:

Sound quality is good, battery life is SUPER long, and they stay in my ear holes when I am jogging. I generally have problems with buds falling out, and was worried when I read the other reviews, but I have had no problems.

Cons:
The beep constantly for the first few minutes after I pair them and it gives me the rage. I have no idea why they do this or how to fix it.
When I run and I put my phone in the pocket of my running tights on the opposite side of my body, my music cuts out more than every second. When I move the phone to the same side as the ear bud or have the phone in my hand, perfect quality. It brought me back to the days of having a skipping walkman and also gives me the rage.
The smallest ear bud size is still too big for my tiny, precious, delicate ear holes. This is probably not a problem for most people, but they start to hurt after a while and I only like to have them in strictly when I'm running. I'll use standard headphones when I'm listening to something on my computer or on an airplane.
They're super easy to lose... I currently only know where my right one is lol... good thing I only need the one. This is my problem, of course... but it would be cool if they beeped or something so you cold find them.

title: Nice set of Buds
body: I just started using y TOZOs this week. I like them very much! They stay in my ears when I work out and the sound quality is better than average. Charging is quick and easy. I've used them over 3 hours and have not charged them yet. If I get 3 workouts outta them it's a win in my book!

title: Wireless that works!
body: These are truly amazing. I had the previous model and the sound quality was okay, however these are amazing and waterproof! Working out in the rain theses were unaffected. Quality is clear and pristine. And syncing is super quick.

title: Very satisfied
body:
I had no problem paining these earbuds. The build quality is good and the sound is also very good. The battery charging case works well and the battery life in the earbuds is pretty standard.

I would buy again and recommend to my friends!

title: Overall great earbuds for the cost
body: When I first got these they were cutting out. Found online that others fixed it by resetting the earbuds and pairing again. This worked for me. Since then I've had no issues and used them for between 3 - 6 hours per day the last few days. Has good level sound (so many headphones attempt to boost bass these days, usually poorly). Charging the buds in the case works great and charging the case is really convenient if you have a QI charger. I've taken calls on these in my office and they worked great. I like the freedom of still being able to use my hands when I talk. The only negative I have found is that the Bluetooth on these doesn't penetrate through things as well as my over the ear Bluetooth headphones. For example, if I leave my phone in another room of the house it will cut out, but I can walk far away form my phone if there is line of sight. I usually have my phone on me when in use so this isn't much of an issue for me. Be sure to register for these and you get a 1 year warranty.

title: They work fairly well most of the time
body: Had some initial pairing issues, same with the second set, but once I got them paired they've been much better than the first. The company reached out to try and make the situation right, and I appreciate them for doing that, it definitely helps let you know they will do what they can to make things right.

title: HORRIBLE battery life-maybe bad from the mfg.?
body: Bought these for runs of about an hour to 1 1/2 hrs..besides screwing around with trying to get these TOZO's  to bluetooth connect with the iphone (and break off with connection to car ) i spent far too much fiddling around in doing so..first right then left then right then start all over shutting them down etc etc :-(  The biggest CON was the battery life. Perhaps they were duds from the manufacturer?  Anyway I think I had ONE run where they ran for almost a full hour and a half after they were on charge all night (4 blue light on charge case) and taken off charge immediately b4 run.  I would no sooner start out and the female voice would repeat 'battery low  needs recharging' OVER and OVER again til it went dead about 5 minutes. Checked the connecting pins they appear okay/intact, 4 blue lights on case always fully lit right before I take them out, I am so disappointed in these that I'm just going back to wire earpieces for running...waste of 50 bucks altogether....If you are an athlete, and going out for distance runs etc forget about these....

title: Excellent Earbuds with Deep Bass
body:
Love this Earbuds.  The sound is excellent and the bass is deep and tight.  If you want bass, this is the one to get.
Better than my $150 JBL - FREE True Wireless Earbuds.  Use this as my primary earbuds now, plus the wireless charging case is so convenience.  Bought this second pair for my son and he loves it.

title: Great Sound and Headphones BUT battery life is horrible
body:
I recently purchased a pair of these headphones based on reviews. After receiving the first pair, the battery life was about 3-4 hours which was much less then advertised.

I ordered a replacement to find the 2nd pair after charging more then 8 hours did not last on a flight from LA to Dallas (roughly 2-2.5 hrs)

While they are great in sound quality and noise cancellation, if you want them to last more then 2-3 hours GOOD LUCK

title: Very high quality ear buds
body: Sound is fantastic. Item is clearly well made and is as high a quality as the iBuds at a 3rd the price. I just bought these so I cannot attest to battery life but my expectations are high.

title: Functionally OK
body:
Functionally OK. Not wowed by the sound quality. Clear, but shrill.

They do seem to be doing some active noise supression. That is moderately OK.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - -

OK, I have been living with these phones for a while and I am less and less impressed with them.
Same opinion of the sound as above.
They do have a tendency for one or both channels to drop for a fraction of a second.
The quality of the mic for phone calls is not good. I often end up switching to just the phone itself...

Finally, the charging base is a clever idea; but the system does not keep a charge when stored. After a few days in my bag it's dead and needs to be charged :-/

title: Worth the price!
body: I have bought at least three other wireless earphones and Tozo is the only one that has worked properly and has great sound. I’m not very tech-savvy but I was able to follow the instructions on pairing and getting it to work on my smart watch. The sound is clear and doesn’t have any static at all; the power lasts longer too. The other earphones had horrible sound and didn’t last longer than two hours. I also appreciate that Tozo has three earbud sizes because earphones are usually too big for my ears and never stay in place. I used the smallest earbuds for mine and they always stay in place even when I am running. So worth the price!

title: The price to performance ratio is incredible
body: I skeptical at first of the TOZO T10 due to how low the price was as compared to some other wireless earbuds, but now I feel silly for ever having such a feeling. I don't have any complaints at all. They sound better than nearly all of the earbuds I've ever used and they fit very securely in my ears. In addition to this, they charge very quickly in their case. When you combine these factors with the fact that they aren't nearly as expensive as the alternatives, the decision to buy them is a no-brainer.

title: Great sound; comfy fit!
body:
The case is very sturdy and well made. Set up was a breeze.

The fit of the headphones is great! It comes with various size ear-pads so you can pick what suits you most comfortably. These headphones cancel sound well for the listener and also do a good job keeping the sound down for folks around the listener.

When on a call the person using the headphones is audible; however, definitely quieter than when on a device/headphones with a mic closer to your mouth.

I was impressed by the sound, quality, and comfort of these headphones! Would definitely recommend.

title: Good buy. Good and weird company.
body: The product has good sound Quality and relatively good bass for the price point. The charging has never been an issue for me and I have worked  out walked around campus (college) with these on. I will say I was sent a slightly alarming email that seemed like spam with highlighted words, and a lot of pressuring language to give a 5 star review in exchange for a wireless charger. I still would like the charger but I also know that a reputable company would not create false positive reviews in exchange for a free wireless charger so I expect to see mine in the mail regardless of me not giving them a 5 star review. I will update.

title: Better bass than my apple headphones and no cord to tangle
body:
Pros: These work well and have better sound quality than the corded earbuds I was using. The case charges with a regular microusb cable and the buds make a satisfying click when they snap into it.

The batteries last several hours for sure but definitely will need charging on e.g. a longer trip.

Cons:

You have to remove both from the case in order to use either.

Loud audio feedback in each ear whenever anything connects, disconnects, or is trying to pair.

My iphone doesn't auto-pair with them, I have to click them manually (but it does auto-pair with my bluetooth speaker).

I did initially hate the blinking bright blue light while they're in use (incredibly annoying at night!) I put electrical tape over the light and now I'm happy.

title: Packs some power in a small sleek setup.
body:
I can’t do AirPods . Not only do they not fit, but every time I see someone with AirPods I’m reminded of the scene in There’s Something About Mary where he has... well... “stuff “ dripping from his ear.

I bought these based on the reviews and how they look. I’m tired of catching the cable of my headphones when I’m in the gym.

Look, if you’re skeptical, I understand, but don’t be. I just got them and started tinkering around with the ear plugs and charger and it’s a pretty sleek setup. Just make sure to pay attention to the directions in the box.

As for the sound quality? I’m a metalhead, and I just cranked up Debonair by Dope- I am thoroughly pleased with my purchase and don’t want to take them out much to my husbands disapproval. ;)

title: High Quality Sound
body: When I first purchased these ear buds, I was a little skeptical because affordable high quality sound seems to be hard to find.  I was pleasantly surprised!  The sound is rich, the bass is deep, the ear buds a comfortable, and they're easy to use.  I highly recommend these to anyone.

title: Great headphones at a great price
body:
This is a solid pair of headphones! The audio quality is very clear and the bass is deep, but not muddy. My biggest suggestion is to take the time to find the right fit for the earbuds. They give you plenty of options and finding the right size helps keep them comfortable as well as secure.

I'll agree with the 3 hours of battery life while in constant use (I wear these at work) and the case does a good job of giving you about 3 full recharges.

I'm currently having issues with the charging case not holding a charge, but I reached out to their support people and got a very prompt response with directions on how to proceed next to get the replacement case.

My only criticism would be that they will occasionally drop the signal to my phone and then reconnect if my phone is in my left pocket (the headphones connect to your phone through the right earbud). Typically it's a very brief pause in the music, but noticeable. Hardly a reason not to consider these an excellent find, though.

All in all, I'm very happy with them.

title: Good product with great service.
body:
I bought two pairs of T10 Bluetooth earbuds for my daughters and they both enjoy them. I find my self borrowing them as well. The sound quality is about what you would get from any decent wired earbuds like a $10-20 pair of Phillips. I connected them to every phone, tablet, TV, PC etc. that has Bluetooth capability that we own and had no connectivity issues. They have been worn in the shower and there was no damage. The batteries seem to keep up with two teenagers who live on their personal devices. The cases are convenient and reasonably fast charging. The case does not seem delicate and magnetically holds the earbuds and lid firmly in place making them great for on the go. The earbuds look pretty slick and not goofy like other designs of various brands. They stay in place with a strong shake of the head and even when tilting an ear hard to one side. As for the support I had to reach out and confirm the extended warranties and the response during their business hours was prompt and courteous with them looking to resolve issues expediently. They answered multiple e-mail replies in the same day. I am very satisfied with the product and the service.

Update: I have fully showered with these several times and rinsed them off with no damage. The water proofing is the real deal as far as I have experienced.

title: Awesome Value!!
body: I have to admit I was really surprised at the sound that came out of these reasonably priced earbuds. The connected to my Galaxy S10 plus right away and I didn't have any drop outs with the phone in my pocket. The charger and headphones appear to be very well made. Packaging and communication was top notch as well. I recommend these buds. If I run into any snags I'll update this review. So far, very satisfied.

title: Great sound, easy to use, LOVE the case
body: I’ve never spent money on nice headphones before. I’ve only ever bought the cheap $20 or less headphones with wires. After using a friend’s super nice ($250 range) headphones of a similar style, I knew I needed a pair, but wasn’t willing to dish out that much (I’m not a sound snob). I absolutely love these. They fit my ears super well (I don’t even feel them once in), stay in, connect SUPER easily to your devices, and the sound quality is great (for the things I do with them). I tried wearing them in the shower on day 1, but had trouble when water would get into my ear a little and loosen the hold of the earbuds (but nbd, not my main use for them).

title: Good product with a few flaws
body:
Product gets the job done, but has a couple flaws I wouldn't expect in a $50 product.

1. Microphone is super quiet; no one can hear me well when I use it, so it's basically useless.
2. Volume is too loud; pretty unpleasant to listen to when I'm at the lowest possible volume setting on my phone

Not bad, but I'll be testing some competing products since I'm sure there's something better out there at this price point

title: Stellar Sound
body:
I received these yesterday and love that they came almost fully charged. I connected them right away (I was excited for new headphones, haha.)  I've listened to a few other branded headphones and they were sub par at best. These actually have a full sound. The fit of the ear buds is important, but I immediately switched to the small ear bud size knowing that's what I need. I was definitely not disappointed. These have such full sound. They have full bass and highs without being tinny. The sound is very clear and not muddy. I have daith piercings in both ears and due to these I have a hard time finding ear buds that are comfortable for long wear. These have been great. I've been wearing them all morning. I love that they cancel the noise of the room around me. I can't hear anything when music is going and everything is so much quieter if there is no music going. I love that if I leave the left ear bud in the charging case that it automatically switches the right bud to full sound instead of stereo. (I have quite a few songs that have sound for only left and right ear that pan accordingly but when only one ear bud is synced you don't lose those pieces. I work where I need to use just one ear bud sometimes and so this is an important feature for me. These have great range around the house. I can leave my phone in one room and be in a different room and still have clear sound. I've had problems with other brands and my phone being in my back pocket and cutting out but that's not an issue with these. I have only made one call so far  but the person on the other side said it was clear and easy to hear me. Its easier for me to hear the other person with these than with the iPhone speaker.

I will update once I've had these a little longer.

EDIT: I’ve had these for 9 months now and they still have stellar sound. They are comfortable. I don’t get complaints from the people I call. They charge quickly and hold their charge well. I still highly recommend.

title: TWS done right
body:
Every Christmas I usually have enough personal money to make an impulse purchase, usually in Electronics. This year, I wanted to upgrade the $20 pair of totally wireless sound (TWS) earbuds I had. They were good, but needed better sound to make them perfect.

With a budget of about $100, I started off looking for something good from a known manufacturer (like Samsung, Jabra, etc.) There was just nothing out there in my price range. I couldn't see myself paying that kind of money from a brand I didn't know, so I started looking for a cheaper model. For around $50 I found 3-4 that looked good and reviews were good enough. I liked Anker's other Bluetooth earphones, so the Soundcore Liberty Lites were considered. With the good reviews and previous good ownership of Monoprice products the Monoprice IPX4s were looking good, too.

Due diligence and a desire to be able to use one earbud at a time drive me to search Amazon's best rated under $50 TWS sets, and Tozo looked pretty good. While the buds are labeled L and R, they are both the same, and can be put into either ear. They come with 4 tips, and for the first time, I'm not using the largest ones. So if you have really big ear canals and find it hard to get tips that fit, you may find a good fit here.

The sound won't knock Bose out of the water, but for the forty dollars I paid, it is good, and an outstanding upgrade from my $20 pair. It has nice bass, and well defined mids and highs.

Battery time is right around 4 hours at low volume (I wear them at work as background noise). The travel case can charge one while the other is playing, so I don't find it hard to get through a work day with them. I like the charging case, too. It's well built, and can use a Qi wireless charger, which I don't care about really. There are 4 lights to tell you how charged it is. it closes and fits in a pocket. I can't tell you how many charges it will take, because I usually keep it plugged in.

Pairing, once initially done, is easy. Just pull a bud off the charger and it will turn on and start looking for your paired device. Since I'm using one at a time, I find I need to turn the one I'm using off completely first, then get the other one. I paired them first together, and then separate. This is the best part of these for me, almost seamless use.

All in all, very happy with the purchase. And I save up some money to get something else. I have already recommended these to people (my brother is not convinced, he has bone conducting headphones he likes). I do like them that much.

title: Disappointing battery life
body: I work out in the field. Utility company.  I have used a bunch of headsets, ear buds etc. These are not for me. Battery life is more like 3 or 4 hours. Right bud has to be on so the left can work. With the short battery I tried using right for 3 hours then left. Nope, cant do that. The left needs the right bud to work. Sad, I was hoping this would last my entire shift.

title: Happy customer
body:
I have not tried these in swim yet, but I plan to. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because I feel like it's more bass than mid or high range. The bass comes out beautifully, but the high notes in songs don't come through as well. I have to customize my equalizer on my handset to get it to where I'm happy with how it sounds. I listen to a lot of hip hop and rock, so I need both the bass and the high notes (for those guitar rock solos, yo).

But I'd get them again.

title: Obvious Quality Control issues...but they made it right!
body:
EDIT: pleased with customer service! They reached out and offered to send us another complementary set of earbuds. We were pleasantly surprised to receive a new set and they worked perfectly!!!! Yay! Thank you Tozo for going above and beyond to make this right :)
————
So I wanted to buy a pair of True Wireless Earbuds for myself and my wife.  I received the initial trial pair to try out since I was skeptical at first.  I unboxed the first set and everything worked great.  Both ear buds worked great from the start.  They paired with one another, when placed in the charging cradle, both earbuds indicated they were taking a charge by lighting up and automatically restarted/reconnected out of the cradle.  The sound out the earbuds were impressive and were a comfortable fit.  I was happy with the purchase.  I went ahead and ordered another pair for my wife.  When I got the second pair, I unpacked the TWE and immediately I noticed the left earbud didn't start up right away and pair with the Right.  I had to turn it on and wait for it to pair.  When I placed the earbuds into the charging cradle, I noticed the left earbud did not indicate it was taking a charge by lighting up and did not restart/repair upon taking it out of the cradle.  Both earbuds seemed to work but I had no way of telling the earbuds were taking a charge.  I did not want to risk the purchase so I asked for a replacement.  Amazon of course made excellent on the replacement and I received my third pair.  Sadly when I opened the third pair, I experienced the same issues after unboxing but this time it was the right ear bud acting up.  Again, if it doesn't work properly out of the box, I am inclined to return it right away.  I took a refund on the third pair and will look for a completely different pair.  The initial pair are working good and am happy with them.  I am just disappointing I could not get a second pair for my wife.  I will have to go shopping again.

title: Slim fit great quality works in shower , update review on one stopped
body:
So far I have used these for two days and I really really like them!! They are not obnoxiously big , and have great sound quality. They say they are waterproof also,  if I come into that situation I will have to update this review. I really like the container they come in that also charges them nice quality!
Update so I purchased these on 9/16/19 and as of today the left one will not charge nor work. I have worn them in shower and they work wonderful, just upset on the one that no longer is working. Going to find the 1 year guarantee and see if it’s covered.

title: Worth it
body: I was worried about these at first but I love them! I use them everyday at work and they cancel out the noise to the point I don’t hear people trying to talk to me. There are multiple ear pieces to choose the perfect size for you ears. The battery life could be better but it does last most of my work day if I run them non stop. I would buy these again.

title: Great product,  a must try for the price
body:
I was looking for wireless earbuds to try and not go broke in the process. I took a chance on these and I love them!
I had trouble with my  ears being too small since every other product that I tried was too large and heavy that they would just fall out of my ears. These come with several sizes and the small one really did the trick for me. They stayed in my ears even after a 40 minute treadmill run! I have not showered/swam with them on, but I don't think I will ever do, so I can't confirm if they are truly waterproof. I picked the white case so as not to lose them in my black gym bag.

title: Wow
body: I bought these on a whim, I hadn’t been in the market for wireless earbuds. Wow, these are freaking awesome! Easy to sync with my Bluetooth, fits my ears well and sounds great.  Out of the box and in my ears, I’m very impressed.

title: Beautiful, sturdy Ear Bud
body: The easiest thing to pair.  Very straight forward.  Beautiful design and very sturdy and strong case.  You will not find a better Ear Bud for the money.  I love the easy way to pair, just open device you paired with and take out 1 Bud and you are on.

title: What a pleasant surprise!
body: I was in the market for wireless headsets but didn't want to spend $150+ on airpods when I came across these. For a third of the price I wasn't expecting much but these earphones really impressed me. Pairing with my iPhone was effortless, sound quality is great and the battery life never became an issue for me. As an added bonus they're waterproof and come with a year warranty. Really happy with my purchase and I definitely would recommend.

title: Great set for a great price
body: Great Earbuds, especially for the price. The bass is perfect and the noise cancelling is very good for a set of Earbuds at this price. I use them while driving a lot and I can't hear the background noise from the car. During calls the people on the other line say they can't hear the noise of me driving in a car.

title: Amazing!!
body: I bought these to help for my schooling. I am very pleased with the fast delivery. The sound quality of these is pretty good. The initial setup took me a few minutes to get the right ear bud linked to the left, but i believe that was do to my errors. There is no lag when watching videos. I was able to watch 2 hours worth of lectures for college classes without the need to charge. the case is durable and has good weight to it. I highly recommend these to people. Now i also tried them when working out, but they kept trying to come out when jogging. Walking or other exercises was perfectly fine. Very pleased with this purchase.

title: Great product for the price!
body: Very happy with Tozo T10. Really nice sound and brass for not paying a lot for them. I wish the charge lasted a little longer. Very happy with the purchase.

title: More Choices Best Fit and Superior Sound Quality!
body:
The sound quality of the TOZO T10 TWS Bluetooth 5.0 Earbuds is the best I have ever experienced and because of the tightly fit of the ear caps, the outside noises are mostly reduced into muffled sound which makes the music coming out of the earpieces crystal clear and seemingly coming from all directions. This pair of masterpiece also boasts of its deep bass which makes you feel more like in a theater enjoying live band!

The most crucial thing is to choose the right size ear caps that fit your just right. Fortunately, TOZO T10 TWS Bluetooth 5.0 Earbuds come with four sets of ear caps making the fitting easier and more precise.

Another convenience is charging. The two ear buds are sucked into their beds and you never worry they will get loose. The capsule can also provide the earbuds at least two or three charges ensuring you continuously enjoy your favorable music all day long. TOZO T10 TWS Bluetooth 5.0 Earbuds are the best in-ear wireless listening device I have ever had!

title: Fantastic Ear Buds!
body: I was not knowing what kind of quality to expect from my TOZO T10 wireless bluetooth ear buds. I must admit, I am really pleased and happy with the quality, sounds, and comfort of these buds. The noise canceling quality is so good that I don't have to turn my volume super high to hear my music. Good Rich volume all the way around. I'd encourage everyone to give these babies a try, you won't be sorry!

title: Well put together product for the price!
body:
The Tozo T10 wireless Bluetooth earbuds are such a great product for the price. Pairing and syncing the earbuds to devices is quick and simple. The sound quality is really exceptional, especially considering the price of them; I was truly surprised. The bass is punchy and mids and highs are well rounded. I find the battery life to be pretty good—I can get about 4 hours of use from them on a single charge. At first I thought that kind of sounded low, but I realized there isn't really a point in time where I have earbuds/headphones in for that long anyway.

The earbuds come with a super cool charging case that is a remote charging battery. You can plug the charging case into any USB device and it will fill the battery pack. You can then place your earbuds into the battery pack which magnetizes and secures them in the sturdy battery case and it will charge your earbuds on the go. The earbuds charge fairly quickly. You can tell they are charging by the red LED light on each earbud. Likewise, the battery charger/case has four (4) LED lights that are blue, which lets you know how much power is available in them.

I really enjoy these earbuds because they are versatile. I primarily use them in an office setting, but I also use them when I walk my dog, or go on long runs/to the gym. They are great and cancelling outside noises, almost a little too good. At work, I have to wear them one so I can overhear if anyone is talking to me/asking me a question—which leads to my one and only complaint—you can't really use these one at a time. If you turn off one headphone, the other will constantly beep as it tries to pair with the earbud that is off. However, I believe you can put the left earbud in the charging case and the right one will still work. In all honesty, it's not really that big of an inconvenience.

Overall, I really enjoy this product and because of their price, I think I will be purchasing multiple pairs to give away for birthday/Xmas gifts.

title: High Quality Sound, Clever Technological Features, Comfortable
body:
I primarily use these earbuds to workout. I also use them for general use around the house, because I style my hair and using over-the-head headphones would ruin my hairstyle.

My previous headphones was the Amorno Wireless Headphones. The TOZO T10 is my second set of earbuds. I needed a new set of earbuds because the Amorno Headphones charging case usb connection thing broke (not my fault).

Overall, I definitely noticed that the TOZO T10 yields:
 - Nice/Great sound quality
 - Convenient technological features, such as earbuds turning on automatically when pulling out of charging case AND earbuds turning off automatically when inserting back into the charging case
 - Uses magnets to securely charge the earbuds with the charging case
 - Durable charging case
 - Long lasting charge on the earbuds and charging case
 - It also comes with a 1 year warranty, which I doubt I will need to use because of the quality of the product

You most likely will not find a better set of wireless earbuds for ~$50. I am greatly satisfied with the product, and, in my opinion, these earbuds are great for your "bang for buck".

title: Horrible product ! Do not trust reviews!!!!
body: Not as expected , doesn’t work well, battery full charged lasted about 2 hours, pairing separately, a nightmare ! Too complicated just to have a wireless bud! Will stick to originals from iPhone.. or even inexpensive cheta! Much much better!

title: HERE COMES THE BOOM!
body: These earbuds are the shiznit!!  The bass will make the little hairs on your arms stand up.  I listen exclusively to old school rap, when one of them Dr. Dre beats come on, wooooowee, bangin!  Get these in your ears STAT!

title: Total garbage
body:
I generally don't take the time to write reviews of products on Amazon but this product was so BAD, I felt it was my duty as a consumer to say something. I was given a pair of Apple Airpods as a gift and I loved them but, as we know, they are crazy expensive and, like a moron, I lost them. So I started looking at what might be a suitable, affordable, alternative. I saw a lot of positive reviews about the TOZO's and so I figured...why not?

Let me tell you why not:
1) Pairing is intermittent. These things connect and disconnect randomly with your device which is really annoying when you're actually trying to talk to people.
2) The battery life is awful. These things die...real fast. The charging case also dies quickly.
3) They are heavy in the ears, which makes them kind of uncomfortable.

I gave them a chance before writing this but today was the final straw. I've had them less than 2 months at this point and today I tried again, I really tried people, but they wouldn't stay connected and cut out during two significant calls. These things are going to be bound for the e-waste facility and I'm going to go find another option. I'm open to any suggestions.

title: Excellent product for the gym
body:
I like to listen to my iPhone while working out at the  gym, and the T10 is perfect for that.
I love the fact that it is waterproof.  If there are imperfections in the sound quality, my hearing is not good enough to pick them out, so the sound quality is great and the earbuds block much of the background noise.  There is an awful lot of background noise at the gym.

title: Great headphones!
body: All I can say is wow! Sound quality is excellent,  so much bass I had to turn it down on my phone. Pairing was effortless,  automatically connects both & case that is also the charger is great. Only had them 1 week but so far they exceeded my expectations.  The only question left is longevity,  time will tell

title: a solid "eh" out of 10
body:
for the price, it's a pretty decent pair of wireless earbuds, but they're honestly kinda a pain! i've tried all the earbud sizes and none fit right; they always fall out in minutes or are in so tightly they're uncomfortable. recently, my left earbud has stopped connecting with the right "master" bud, or when it does connect it periodically disconnects. it's sorta hard to jam out when your earbuds are constantly going "DISCONNECTED... CONNECTED. RIGHT CHANNEL. LEFT CHANNEL."

noise cancellation is ok, and the volume is pretty loud (though i honestly wish they could go quieter). there's not any features with the buttons on the sides of the headphones other than pause and play -- no skip function, volume adjustment, etc.. they're shaped very oddly, in a way which makes them very hard to adjust and, again, stay in properly.

i'm kind of mad, especially because i have missed the return deadline by one day, which you can bet your bottom dollar i'd be taking advantage of had these stupid headphones used up the last of my patience even a day sooner. considering how much air pods are going for, this is an okay alternative if it's simply not within your price range, but if it's a matter of taking the time to save up for more pricey, high quality bluetooth headphones, just do it.

tl;dr: these feel like more of a liability than a piece of $50 luxury earbuds. okay if they're the only thing in your price range, but don't expect much comfort or efficiency from them.

title: Great sound quality, when they work...
body: So just to keep it simple and brief. I ordered first pair of these and was quite excited based on reviews and some research on my part. I found them to be comfortable and simple to use. However, the left earbud would not stay connected and kept going in and out while the right was constant. Did everything I could to reset them and try to get a stable connection. Had a second pair sent and same problem after less than two days of use. Really just disappointed overall. Could have been a great pair of gym earbuds. Guess I’m trying something else.

title: Great for the price. Works well
body: This is my first set of Bluetooth ear phones. It takes a.bit to fit in my ears because I have small ear canals. (Where they go). I am able to make calls and speak to the person without any issues.

title: High quality for less cost!
body: I thought for the price that I would receive the product I payed for. In other words, they would be of low quality and zero customer care. Boy was I wrong! Amazing product that is as good if not better than a four time as expensive Bose product and it truly waterproof. I’m a kayaker and always thought how nice it would be to have music while I paddle and now I have it. Great product and unbelievably customer care. Don’t be put off by their less than great grasp of English they really do want to please their customers.

title: Incredible value
body: I've been shopping for wireless earbuds for a long time and wanted good quality that wasn't ridiculously priced like the "top of the line" earbuds. These are incredible. I'm an avid runner, and haven't had a close call to them falling out. Battery life has been solid, and the multiple options for size of the inner ear components really helped! (I'm a bigger guy, so I needed bigger inner ear components) Highly recommend these.

title: Nice Sound Quality
body: Great Sound quality ,but they don't stay in my ear properly. I'm always worried about losing one of the earbuds. Not a very long lasting battery ,a few hours, at most

title: Best wireless Bluetooth earbuds for the price
body: These stay in my ears while running, lifting, rock climbing, and swimming. It’s nice that smaller earpieces are included. They lost Bluetooth connection when my head went underwater, and intermittently when walking about town (but not enough to stop the feed). There’s no microphone so no talking to folks when using them. They’re great for the price though.

title: Awesome product!
body:
I needed a way to listen to music at work without having cords hanging as I only use one at a time. Based on customer reviews I decided to give them a try-so glad I did!! They arrived in one day, all charged up, pairing was a snap.  The only reason I have 4 stars for noise canceling is because I don’t use them both at once, however the sound quality is awesome I’m very pleased. The range is excellent! I got an entire work day (9 hrs) of play from one charge, I use the right one first then charge it while the left one is in use. The fit is great, I had no worries about them falling out.
All in all, I would recommend these! And a 1 year warranty is included..

title: Revised Review. Complewte Garbage, DO NOT BUY THEM!!!!
body: I initially gave this product a 5 star review except that afterwards the first pair lasted a massive two weeks before the left earpiece went completely dead....wouldn't charge or turn on. So I requested a replacement. The replacement pair arrived and on the second day I went to use them the right earpiece was completely dead....again wouldn't charge or turn on. I've owned Bose earbuds and Senso earbuds for well over a year with no issues. Two defective products in a row? I'm done with this product and this company!!!!! DO NOT BUY THEM!!!

title: Great value, lacks some features
body: Overall these aren't the best wireless earbuds, but well worth their value. They lack some features like auto pairing to your phone (at least for me) and you are not really able to listen with only 1 ear bud in unless you have the other one playing in your pocket or something. They also sound good but do have a fair amount of bass, this doesn't bother me too much but worth noting. Other than those small gripes, these are great secondary ear buds for working out or running, especially for the price.

title: Like them but don’t love them
body: Overall I like these. I don’t love them. They stay in my ears well in the gym but I guess the excess movement the left ear bud cuts in and out constantly. However when I’m stationary they work fine. Minor annoyance. Overall I like them.

title: Hearing Quality Excellent
body:
Like:
1) Hearing quality is excellent
2) Charging is easy - if you charge up the base fully, you can use that alone to charge up ear buds instead of looking for a plug
3) No problems with connection

Don't Like:
1) Sometimes have to yell for caller to understand or hear what I am saying
2) Listening to music on ear buds, make them die out quicker
3) Right ear bud is dominant, therefore if it dies, the left one automatically stops working also. Both ear buds pair up on your phone, but you can only talk using right bud
4) Haven't figured out how to store them close by when not in use, so ear buds aren't just sitting in ear

Haven't Checked:
1) Waterproof

title: Great, except one issue
body: These sound great, last about 3 hours on a charge. But, the left earpiece keeps dropping out and back in. It's only the left ear that does it. Right always stays connected. And it is completely random. Sometimes I can listen for 45 minutes and it doesn't do it. Then, it will disconnect 4 or 5 times within a minute. It always reconnects, but is every annoying when trying to listen to music.

title: Awesome Earbud ..But
body: Bought this set after losing my previous single earbud from Focus. The sound is great and they are very effective at blocking out other noises though they are not noise cancelling. The batteries last long enough for me which is my whole shift. I gave  four stars because they tend to fall out of my ear even with the smallest insert. I did not have that problem with my Focus power ear bud. I am 5'8" , 145. They may very well fit a larger person better but if you are in the small side you may be disappointed .

title: Good headphones when they're working...
body:
Pros: Great sound quality. Fits in my ear perfectly. Case charges fast

Cons: You can't listen to the left without the right. But you can listen to the right without the left. Very sensitive, I dropped my right one on the floor and now it doesn't work. Which is bad because now I can't listen to my left one because my right one doesn't work.

Update: I contacted Amazon and they worked with me to get a new one. I figured out that you can listen to the left without the right you just have to pair them separately. T10-L and T10-R.

title: Looking for a solid set of earbuds!Look no further!
body:
I have to admit, with all of the options out there it was difficult to make a decision, but I’m happy I went with the T10s.  They were easy to pair, the sound is great and they are comfortable to wear for an extended amount of time.  I was happy to discover the memory foam tips from my wired earbuds fit these too!  Battery life is good, and the fast charging seems to deliver as promised.

If you want a set great quality true wireless earbuds for a great price.  Look no further!

title: Not as good as I imagined.
body: Great sound quality (not so loud); Great noite cancellation; Excellent battery life, but the audio signal transmission constantly peaks in failure.

title: Best Alternative to High End Wireless Earbuds
body: I was on the market for a pair of wireless earbuds because it seemed everyone was slowly moving to these. I was considering the Samsung Galaxy Buds or the Sony WF-1000xm3s but I decided to give these a try because I did not want to spend so much on headphones and am I glad I chose to go with these! The sound is very high quality and the fit and finish exudes elegance. It doesn't have the noise cancellation capacity of the Sony Earbuds or the battery of the Galaxy Buds, but for the price it is definitely a steal for the high quality product you get.

title: Finally a good set of bluetooth headphones
body: I actually bought 4 pairs of these, one for each member of the family.  After looking through Amazon for a good pair of bluetooth headphones it was nice to find some with REAL reviews for the product listed.  These Tozo T10 headphones have been great so far.  The charging case has 4 LEDs that show it's power level, and the headphones themselves have a little light that lights up when they're charging as well. The charging case cover is translucent so you can see the charging light and the headphone light through it, so you don't have to open it to know the status of either.  Sound quality has been fine and calls work well on them.  We have 4 iPhones in the house that these are connected to and we've not had any pairing or connection issues.  Wireless charging seems to work fine as well, or you can use the supplied USB cable to charge the case if you don't have a wireless charging pad. Overall we're very happy with the 4 pairs we have and would recommend these to anything who is looking for a fairly inexpensive pair of bluetooth earbuds.

title: Great product.
body: I really like how comfortable these ear buds are and so light weight. The sound quality is really good also. And the fact that they are waterproof is awesome due to the fact that I work out in the rain at times. Great product.

title: You cannot skip songs with these
body: If you are looking for a little bass...these are not the headphones for you. They are loud and have a lot of treble...good for Metal. Bad thing about these is you cannot skip songs. A double click will redial your last number called. I'm not sure if I will keep these...only because sometimes...you just got to skip the next song in the middle of a workout.

title: Great hardware marred by poor firmware design decisions
body:
Firstly, the hardware for these earbuds are really great. I love the fact that the button is a clicky push button instead of the capacitive buttons you see on many of these headphones. Good battery life though I haven't tested extensively. The case a a little large to be comfortable in a front pocket but not terrible. Not too heavy, pretty comfortable in the ear and really good sound.

The issue with these is that a couple small things ruin the overall experience for me. Firstly, I use 1 earbud at a time a lot, probably more than I use both together. When you first put a single earbud in your ear it connects then searches for the other earbud to connect. The problem with this is that, whoever wrote the firmware for these, decided it would be a good idea to have the earbud beep every time it runs the search for the other earbud. So, every 7 seconds or so for about a minute after you put it into your ear, it beeps at you and there is nothing you can do but wait for it to time out. For someone who puts the buds in and out of his ears many times throughout the day this got old and unacceptable real fast.

The other issue is that the LED on the earbuds will blink briefly every 5 seconds as long as they're on, just to remind you that they're there. Why?! If I have these on at night listening to something while my wife falls asleep, these things are practically lighting up the room. Again, nothing you can do about it.

It's really a shame since I really love these headphones otherwise. Fix those 2 lines of code and I will gladly use these but, for now, they are getting returned before they drive me insane.

title: Disappointed
body: I was  excited to receive them but disappointed when they arrived. They don’t fit as expected or what the previous reviews were on them I would much rather have AirPods or entire wireless headset .

title: Amazing bluetooth earbuds for the price
body: Usually, you would pay about $100 for a decent set of Bluetooth earbuds, but these are a great bargain. The earbuds connect easily to your phone and the volume is loud. I keep mine at a low volume and still get a full immersion experience. They cancel outside noise to a high level to the point I could not hear car honk the horn right outside of my house. The battery lasts about 4 - 5 hours of continuous play time and the earbuds charge super fast in the carrying case. My only gripe is that the earbuds tend to come out from time with jolting movements. I ride my bike and hit bumps and an earbud has come out in on two occasions. Make sure you have the right size ear piece on for your ear but that still will not prevent the occasional loosening from extreme movement. I had no problem with them coming out when doing a gym workout.

title: The sound goes out in both buds.
body: Recently I bought these earbuds, I bought them because they were way cheaper than any other wireless earbuds I was looking at. At first I loved them! They connected to phone in seconds, the sound and noise cancelation was awesome. But recently the sound will go out... at first it was just the left bud (I thought I was because of the distance of my phone, but then remember that the phone could be 100 (?) meters away and still play), but now it's both buds. I would love to keep using their products but I dont have the money to keep buying them. (Bought: April 12, 2019)

title: Perfect for what I need!
body:
Incredibly convenient and compact. I went running with these and I had no issues with them moving around or falling out. They have great sound quality too. These are great because my wife and I can each use one while watching a movie on my phone and we aren't restricted to a 1 foot radius because of a cord.

The only complaint is that it doesn't totally cancel out the noise around you, but for the price I paid it is definitely a great pair of headphones.

title: No regrets!
body: This product is awesome!!! I love bass and this thing be boomin! This earpiece set gives quality sound and makes you feel like it’s just you and the music in the room regardless of who is around or if the tv is on.  As far as the fitting - won’t stay put in my ears but I have that problem with Apple headphones too so 🤷🏽‍♀️ ...it just may be my ears! 😆

title: Be warned
body: At first they worked great about a month in the left side stopped working on phone calls you only get about 5 hours of working time on the right then it needs charging for 3 hours

title: More then what I expected!
body: So, I bought these to use at the office and had the Beats at home for the gym but I got to tell you that these sound better than the Beats.  The base is exceptional, I can't be happier.

title: Incredible sound quality!!
body: These were easily one of the best purchases I've made. Definitely very soundproof/noise canceling (I wear them at work all the time and can't hear I thing happening around me 😆). The bass is awesome, it feels like your body is vibrating not just your head. They stay in place when you have the them in after you adjust them to the right angle for you. The only thing I would say to work on is while they are extremely water proof, when I shower with them in they keep slipping out of my ear. Maybe look into making a detachable ear hook piece for each earbud to help stay in place for people like me? Other than that, pretty much flawless.

title: TOZO T10 EARBUDS, BEST CHOICE FOR THE MONEY ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
body:
Great sound and fantastic price.  Best earbuds out on the market .  I am so glad that i bought these and didnt put out the $169 for the apple earbuds as i originally planned.  Only one thing bad about them, i let my wife use them once and she kept them.  I have to buy another pair.  Great base.....you wont be sorry...
Follow up review, 1 month update:  the earbuds are absolutely out of this world, when i can pry them out of my wifes ears.  Wear them at gym and they never even move, great sound.  Company contacted me by email and informed me they were going to send me a free tozo wireless charger.  Just got it and it is a quality product, works great and is free.  The only drawback is that the company is in china and it takes 2-4 weeks to arrive.  BUT LET ME TELL YOU IT IS WELL WORTH THE WAIT!  PRICE IS GREAT!  Hannah the lady i dealt with through email, was top notch and very courteous.  1/3 of the price of apples ear buds, and just as good if not better....⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

title: Perfect for Exercising
body: These devices fit snugly and are very durable.  Also, the long battery life means I don't have to worry about charging it every single day.  It's perfect for those with a busy schedule.

title: Ok, but.....
body:
I was pretty hyped up to try these but I was quickly disappointed.  Headphones work great when I'm looking directly at my phone but when the phone goes into my pocket.... sound cuts out intermittently.

Updated Review:
I'm updating my review from 1 star to 4 stars
It seems that my headphones cut out when I'm in the gym in front of the dumbbell racks.  When I'm in other areas of the gym, they seem to be fine.  Outside the gym they are great and haven't had an issue.

title: Pros and Cons
body: This is great for sedimentary uses. I tried to use these for a jog and the earbuds kept falling out. It has great call quality, but the sound quality isnt the best (what can you expect from 45$ earbuds??) Lastly, when I was first pairing it with my phone, holy guacamole... it was a bit of a challenge. I had to play with it for a while even after reading the instructions. Battery life is great.

title: Kept falling out
body: There were several problems with this product: The sound quality was great but they would lose syc with each other and constantly break up. Another is that they just didn't go far enough in the ear canal to really stay in, 1/4" deeper in and they would be perfect! Sent them back and got another pair and those are going back too! SAME ISSUES!

title: Not Too Shabby
body:
Overall, these are pretty nice Earbuds. The tips are on the cheap side, but the rest of this package is better than average.
The Bluetooth can cut out if you have a thick head, or bury the buds too deep into your ears. The carrying/charging case is a nice touch. You can also purchase the passive charge pad (which I did), that works just like a pad for your phone would charge. I'm on the fence as to whether the price is justified...

title: Sleek Look however poor sound
body:
Just purchased these a week ago and i have to admit, these might be the lowest sounding wireless earbuds i have ever purchased.  With my volume at max, the sound might only reach half the volume of say my bluephonic, focuspower or smartomi earbuds.  Such is disappointing because I do like the look of these and the case that it came with is pretty cool since it can charge the buds up to 4 times.

Edit: Increasing my rating,  Customer service was actively trying to work with me and replace item as well as provide additional support products.  Because of that i have increased the rating.

title: Good quality for a great value
body:
This is my fourth pair of wireless earbuds I've tried (all from various makers) and have enjoyed these most. Buds are lightweight and comfortable. They also seem to recharge much faster than the previous earbuds I've had in the past.

The only complaint I have with them is connectivity. As long as there's nothing blocking the beam they work wonderfully, but when trying to pass through, say a human body, they tend to cut out frequently.

Overall, however, a worthwhile purchase!

title: Best Quality
body:
Wow..!!! I did not expected it to be that GOOD. The sounds were amazing. Bass & Treble were exceptional. Love it. I really enjoyed these Bluetooth Earbuds.
These are amazing and worth the money. The packaging it's good. The charging case is well built and won't open in your pocket. Ear buds are comfortable, have amazing clarity, bass,treble. Easy to pair up. Best thing is it comes with an extended 1 year warranty, you can't beat that.

title: Beautiful earbuds with fast connection
body:
I love the feel and look of it, ordered a white one. The case feels sturdy and has a strong snap once it's closed, it's about the length of my plam, approximately 3 inches long.

The sound quality is nice however I did hear a bit static here and there but not very noticable. The first time I used it to watch a video, there was no delay then I used it a second time to watch a video, I noticed a very faint delay but maybe it was because I had been using the earphones for quite a while and draining the battery, I'm not sure but will update later. I will say that these earbuds connect very fast! I was very impressed at the connection of it. I did use it for calling and the sound is crisp and clear. The person on the other line did hear me well and there were minimal to no background noise from my end of the call.

I had to give this rating a 4/5 stars. Why? The earbuds do not stay in my ear very long. It falls out constantly and I had to fix it by jamming it into my ears. I've changed the the tips to the various sizes that came along with the product and still it keeps falling out. At first I thought it was just my ears but my boyfriend has the same earbuds too and his falls out as well. I'm wondering if these earbuds are compatible with the ear clips? I'll have to find out and will update this.

The direction was very clear and easy to follow however, I do recommend the company to change its names for the right earbuds and left earbuds. The right earbud is the leading/main earbud and the left earbud follows, in the manual, it was called "master" and "slave." Mmm, wrong choice of words. If those are fixed, then I say it's a positive manual.

Not all bluetooth earbuds are perfect, everything will have its flaws. But so far I've been impressed with this device and definitely recommend it. If it didn't fall out of my ear, it would've received a 5/5 stars. The package arrived the very next day after I ordered it so I'm content.

title: Great bluetooth earbuds at a reasonable price
body: I have owned other more expensive and less expensive earbuds and this set is probably the best I bought given the price range. Setup was easy and straight forward.
