Audio quality is decent, not far away from even those that are more expensive. It does come with different sizes of buds so it will fit your ears. Quality is excellent, looks well built and solid. I am using for my workout to replace a pair that I lost, so I will provide more updates in the coming months.

title: Great value. Great sound. Great quality.
body: Great sound quality. Great fit with 3 different ear pieces included. Easy charging. Nice in the eyes too. Only thing I’d like is if there was control built in. Overall GREAT value

title: Great sound (deep bass) just OK for workouts
body: They produce great sound, really good deep Bass for the sizen something to consider if you want some decent bass, however they tend to get loose while working out; even after trying different size earplugs.

title: Really great and at a low price!! Great customer service!
body:
These earbuds are awesome!  The sound is so good. They stay in my ears easily when I run (I use the smallest ear pieces).  I even use them for work as I’m on a lot of Zoom calls. The mic works great.

I had some issues with mine and customer service replaced them immediately and with no questions asked! Very happy!

title: Good For You Money
body: A week in and I love them. I will say the left one sometimes loses connection but its bounces back in a split second. They charge fast and they last maybe 3 to 4 hours before needing another charge.

title: Good Earbuds For The Price
body: There's  a million of these on the market... some brands I never heard of. So I took a chance based on reviews. These earbud are great. Bluetooth was an easy setup. The sound quality was great. They charge in the case easily. For the price I highly recommend these.

title: Great Earbuds, Great company very responsive to customers.
body: Had an issue with the first set which kept disconnecting from phone while on calls.  Reached out to Tozo on their Facebook page and received a quick response.  I was instructed to reset and pair again but that didn't help.  Then I was quickly sent a new set of earbuds and these work as expected.  The sound is great, they stay put while running.  Great  item for a great price and the company is responsive to customer's concerns.

title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND
body: The sound on these is incredible. Super comfortable and I have really small ears. I needed some wireless ear buds for the the gym and these are perfect. I love the case too! Super compact and lightweight. The noose cancellation is amazing. I am seriously impressed. The range is really awesome too - you can be pretty far from your phone with no problem. Love them. Would highly recommend!

title: High performer, Low cost
body: The good price, quality, ease of operation, makes these  T10 a win win deal.  Sound volume and sound experience is very good. I like the wireless charging. Can not think of anything to say bad about them.

title: Good sound, affordable price
body: Got these for my dad as a Father’s Day gift and he loves em. Almost got two pair cuz they look so cool haha. Ended up trying a cheaper pair for myself, but these ones are definitely better sound quality.

title: Excellent Customer Service and Product
body: I like the T10 earbuds so much that you rarely would catch me without them. I wore them everywhere, until I dropped them while riding a jet ski. I contacted customer service to figure out how to get a replacement and I was blown away! I was told that the T10 warranty does not cover lost damage caused by human factors, but they really care about the customer and sent me a replacement!! Super happy with TOZO and will be buying more from them.

title: Exceptional Wireless Earbuds!  Great Customer Service
body:
These earbuds are great .  Pairing and connecting was easy little effort required.  Sound quality is great.  I work in a loud warehouse and the sound is outstanding.  I like the effortless recharging of the earbuds in their dock.  I can't believe wireless charging of the dock.  A great value.  I purchased these to see if my ears would tolerate them before spending $130 to $250 dollar earbuds.  I am sold, don't think I will purchase the higher priced ones.  Might buy more of these TOZOS earbuds.

Customer Service is Outstanding.  Their concern is to make the customer experience the best one could ever expect.  I have never experience this level of friendly, patient, and fast customer service.

title: Ear pieces
body: I seriously like these. However, the rubber buds are horrible for my ears. I wound up putting my old Skull Candy pieces on to get the deep bass I want along with the comfort. Update: The body of the bud hurt my left ear after I spent a couple of days rotating it back to get better bass depth. I still like these but I just want to worn against doing such a thing. I wear them all day long since I work in a loud environment. Now I can only use my right bud for a while until my ear heals.

title: These are legit!
body:
I've probably have gone through near 10 style earbuds in the last 15 years ranging from wired, bluetooth to truly wireless bluetooth, but these are by far the best in every column. Whether it be the price, battery life, noise cancelling, sound quality, pairing, staying connected and I can keep going on!

They were simple to pair, charge and stay connected. I've had very few drops in connection, it might be interference from someone else being in proximity with their own bluetooth device(s). I'm enjoying the fact that while at the gym, I can block out all the noise around me without blowing out my ears at 100% max, be able to walk freely around the weight room without hardly any interference whether by equipment or other gym goers technology. I'm not audiophile, but it sounds really good, bass doesn't sound blown out. Battery life is spectacular, an hour of continuous use only consumes 20% of battery life and doesn't take long to fully charge as well, I don't think I've seen it drop below 80% after a gym session. Being waterproof, I don't have to fear washing my face after the sauna with them on.

We'll see how they last long term, but as of right now they are perfect for anyone who likes a quality product that has good sound, noise cancellation and phenomenal battery life.  They might be the simplest bluetooth device I have. They just work every time without connection issues.

title: TOZO is an amazing company!
body:
I bought these because they had great reviews. And it's true, they do sound great. They stay in my ears well. I use the smallest ear hole pad that they supplied and they fit well and are not uncomfortable. I use them often in the pool but according to the instructions they don't recommend staying under water with them for too long, which is not a problem for me as I usually just chill on float anyhow.

But what makes TOZO a  great company is that after two months I was having trouble with the right bud so I sent an email asking about my warranty. They responded the same day and were very sympathetic. Two days later there were brand new headphones on my doorstep. This was some of the best customer service I have ever experienced!

title: Great product for price!
body: I’ve been searching for a new pair of headphones that are wireless, comfortable, stay put and can be used in the tub. These fit the bill and def are a decent price. I was also happy to have a 1 year warranty attached to the product. The sound is also quite impressive. My biggest complaint would be that I can not adjust the volume from the headphones themselves. This would be helpful. I have not had them long enough to really know how well the battery lasts or how good they range is.

title: Cuts off
body: Cuts off sound when you move and not much bass unless you force them into ear...

title: Best decision I made....
body: I absolutely love these wireless ear buds. Easy to pair with my phone (Android Note 8), great sound quality and a great carrying case/charging case. I was the Guinea pig so going to purchase a pair for my hubby.

title: Useless battery life
body: Do not buy these, I have been using them for 10 months. First, the connection is weak, you constantly hear the hopping sound of them trying to connect even long causes disconnection. Then the battery starts to decay very quickly, first they last all day then they'll last half day, then they last only a couple hours, now they don't even charge. They were great compact and don't even feel them but they don't last.

title: Buds are just ok
body:
I've bought a bunch of Bluetooth wireless headphones and buds.  These could be the best.  But some things that I don't like are that with phone in my front pocket when walking or bike riding the buds disconnect.  Weird because I can leave phone in one room walk to next and keep connection.  Decent sound but not Beats level, but not Beats price.  I bought 3 of these so I can cycle through each if one charge.  I still have plug in beats buds that I like for certain situations and these for more mobile use and when charging phone.  These should really be 4.5

--
Been using two pairs for several months now. I will not use these for phone calls.  And I still loose connection turning my head or when walking or riding bike and phone is on one side. I believe the right ear bud receives the signal from phone and transmits to left bud.  When right bud battery dies, the left shuts off.

title: Great bass and mids
body: The bass is incredible as are the mids. Drum sound is better than any earbuds I've listened to at this price point. Sound is clear and realistic. The highs get a little muddled but I found a solution for that. I replaced the tips with a pair of Comply SmartCore tips. They make a huge difference in the sound most noticeable in the highs, which now sound as good as the rest. The buds pair very well and fit nicely. Would have given these a 5 rating but without the 3rd party tips I'm rating them a 4.

title: Initial hiccup but worth it
body: I was very excited to get these wireless headphones, since they’re water resistant and recharge from their case. When they arrived, the left channel would come on and off making them frustrating to use. I liked the concept and price too much that I decided to return them and try another pair. Thankfully I did as the new pair have worked very well. I haven’t tried them on my pool float yet but am looking forward to it b

title: Left Ear Cuts out, poor quality
body: 2nd set ordered, second set that sucked. Left ear keep cutting out sporadically, Bluetooth incredibly weak. How this has so many positive reviews is beyond. Returning defective devices and taking my business elsewhere.

title: Great Value for Money
body:
I am a runner and honestly pretty hard on on my equipment.  Running in the rain, heat, and freezing weather will chew through shoes, headphones, and smart watches pretty quickly.  I have used a pair of Bose Sound Sports for several years now and had to replace them 3 times.  These were always under warranty, but most recently after getting my new Soundsports back, they were overheating and failing in less than a week.

I was not excited to drop another 150-200 dollars on headphones, so I decided to give these Tozo T10 wireless buds a try.

Sound:  The sound is great.  Really good stereo effects and I can crank the sound up and really blast music/movies.
Fit: I have a weird ear canal.  The medium fits as well as any other bud, but I still pull my headband down over them to make sure they don't fall out while I am running.
Battery Life:  It is true to its word which is about 3 hours which is less than I am used to, but again it matches what is advertised.
Range: This is the biggest issue with these.  I get a bit of interference when I am running and my phone is on my running belt.  This is not enough to cause major distress, but again it is less than what I would prefer.

All in all, for the price, after a week and probably 10 hours of use, I am very pleased with the Tozo T10 buds.

The charging case is durable as well.

title: Only 6 hours of use in 4 days....then died
body: The first day I used these rhe sound kept coming and going from both left and right earbud. I left them charging overnight and the same thing happened on my next day of use at the gym. I used these for a total.of 4 times and each time.for no longer than 1.5 h that I train at the gym. The sound cancellation is not that great as I was able to hear the constant rattle and noises of the gym. At its 5th day they automatically decided to shut down. I heard a voice say "power off" , that was not a happy day at the gym. So I cahrged them.for 2 days and still no response. Word of advise save yoirself the money and buy better quality products. At the end the cheaper items turn out to be more costly when you add up annoyance, replacement and return hassles.

title: Extremely happy with the quality of these earbuds.
body: The sound quality is legit, they fit perfectly in my ear especially when working out, the battery life is great and the case they charge in is solid and easy to use.  These earbuds replaced my BOSE earbuds and I couldn't be happier, especially for the price.  I would highly recommend these earbuds for anyone with an active lifestyle.

title: Poor call quality and don't stay in ear
body: Doesn't stay in ear and poor call quality (the other person cannot hear anything). It would have been best earbud on Amazon if these two things were fixed.

title: Amazing!!!!!!
body:
Really loving this product!!! The sound quality is amazing! Was a bit apprehensive because of the price but it's definitely worth it.
Battery life is great, using it during my workouts and haven't had any connection problems or sound lagging. More than satisfied with this purchase.
Had this for about 3 months now and hadn't had any problems. Now the right one won't turn on r charge now. All I heard was a child's voice before this happened. Can't reset it, tried. Seller has agreed to send another pair. We'll see how that goes, will change the 4 stars to 5 if everything's okay.

title: Works as expected
body: I use headphones all day at work and so far these are perfect. I used to have to charge my old headphones at lunch break but with the case it's as easy as setting the bud down in it's spot on the case. So far I have not gotten a low battery warning! I also got the tozo wireless charger plate and now it's full on worry free! The sound and bass are not too shabby either. Now keep in mind I have only had these for a day, if my opinion changes I will update this review.

title: If you only use one earpiece and it won't stop beeping!
body:
I was getting so frustrated trying to use just the right earpiece but there was a constant beeping every 10 seconds or so - rendering the earpiece utterly useless!  I scoured the eleventy billion Q&A on the product page and nothing seemed to actually address the issue until I found the answer deep in the bowels of all the questions.

For one earpiece use without the constant beeping you have to start by taking BOTH ear pieces out out of the case, let them pair with each other, let them pair with the device - THEN - after those steps are done you can put one of the earpieces back into the case and while you'll hear a disconnect notice and another annoying beep that's it!  No more constant beeps and the remaining earpiece will still be connected to the device.

Hope this helps anyone who looked at the manual and didn't find an answer - and lost hope scouring through all of the reviews and Q&A.

title: Working great
body: So far so good!  I didn't want to commit to a $100 ear bud purchase, but wanted the convenience of small wireless listening devices.  These earbuds are just right.  Very easy to use--quick pairing.  Good battery and sound.  Several ear bud sizes to try too.  My ears don't usually hold ear buds very well, but the size shape and weight of these makes them work!

title: Fantastic running/ workout earbuds
body: Awesome ear buds! I was looking for some good Bluetooth running earbuds and have finally found them! I had some other brands that i had to return bc they either fell out of my ear or the wires that connected them would catch on the back of my neck and drive me crazy. So o decided to order these... they have been awesome so far! Excellent sound, they stay in place and the battery life has been much better than anticipated! I have run everyday this week and they are still fully charged. I just put them back in the case after every run and the case charges them right up. The waterproofing is an excellent addition!

title: They are WATERPROOF
body: These ear buds are a great value. They have a long battery life, believe it or not they are WATERPROOF,  I wear them in the shower and the pool. Also a plus is that you can charge them on a wireless charger.

title: Awesome better than expected!
body: So I just got my new Pixel 4 phone and I wanted some cool really good earbuds to go with them. I checked out the reviews online and found these to be really good. I was not disappointed pairing was so easy I couldn't believe it. Sound quality is awesome The only thing is that noise canceling is so good I can't hear anybody else talking which honestly is a good thing sometimes. I can't believe for this price that they are so good. Very happy with my purchase.

title: Sound as good as wired and DOES have a USB charger (in the case) and cable.
body:
I've always used regular earbuds with my phone to listen to podcasts or music while I mow the lawn. The Pixel 3 came with no headphone jack, and the USB earbuds that came with it rest in your ear , rather than actually sticking in the ear and 'sealing'. In addition, the USB headphones don't work with the belt case I have for it, so I needed to consider other options.  I was a bit wary of these, my concerns being if they would be loud enough and 'seal' against the ear hole well enough to cover the noise of the mower, and secondly whether they would stay put. Ultimately I was very pleased, and honestly surprised how well they stayed once you got them right (not REAL easy, but I'm glad it's POSSIBLE to take the time and get them seated perfectly).  In addition, while I wouldn't mind if they were able to go a hair higher, I don't know that I'll ever actually need it any higher, I just like a little headroom. But both music and podcast were plenty loud and full, and came through clearly over the mower noise that did get past the seal.
The case is great too, charges on my 'Pixel Stand' (wireless charger) and for those who like me didn't find it clear from the description, it DOES have a USB charging port in the case and includes a USB cable. It ALSO allows wireless charging while in the case, which is a nice touch for the price. They're $50 headphones any day of the week, even without the wireless charging, so including that is great, and will become even more handy as wireless chargers become ubiquitous.

title: Left Earbud Failure - Seems to Be a Chronic (and Common) Issue **UPDATED**
body:
Updated 09 OCT 2019 - received the replacement earbuds quickly and packaged perfectly!  Unfortunately, they have the exact same issue as the original ones... they work and sound amazing inside, but as soon as I go outside the left earbud breaks up.  These would be great if I only wanted them for inside, but that isn't the case.  Sending these back as well....

This is a perfect example of "I should have read the reviews."  I was initially very happy with these earbuds.  Charging and connection were pretty seamless, sound quality and noise cancelling (while initially wearing them in the house) was great!  During my first attempt to wear them while walking outside, the left earbud kept going in and out (as described in so many other reviews).  I unpaired and repaired, as well as unpaired from other devices, thinking it may reset the earbuds and possibly eliminate interference... but no change.  After returning home I reset the earbuds per the instruction manual and again they worked great inside the house...but just walking into the backyard made the left earbud fade again.
I have scheduled to return these earbuds to Amazon and will give the replacements a try.  Unfortunately, I didn't read the reviews and identify the number of similar issues until after I elected to replace rather than just return for refund.  Fingers crossed my replacements won't have the issue.  I'll update the review after receipt.

title: Over exceeding product!
body:
I couldn't hear people calling my name, so the cancellation was amazing.

Sound quality, I hated it because i was expecting something far less for the price they were offering. I would easily put these up against ANY other earbuds. Bass is deep and crisp. The highs and lows are balanced.

I'm not sure about the battery life that's why I gave it a 4. I havent used it for more than 3 hours yet so I'm just giving a honest post. But the 4 star can also go to one minor flaw in the making of the device, and that the button on the earbuds. It's kinda hard to push if it were a touch feature or a easier to push button this would kill and bud in the market.

It pairs easily with out hassle. Plus if you cant read the instructions then maybe you dont need these earbuds. Overall a 5 star product!!! Thanks guys!!!!!!!!!!!🎶🎵🎧

title: Meh
body: Loved these as first until they decided to connect when they wanted and not when I wanted. Had to return. Plus they fell out a few times

title: Dont waste your money
body: I have them for a week and after that they keep making a sound in my ears (low battery) I charged them and still nothing, i returned them. Also they offer to send me a quick charge for my phone if i post a good review...

title: BUY THIS PRODUCT
body:
These earphones are honestly the best purchase I've ever made. I'm a really picky person so this is an honest opinion of this product. The tozo earbuds really do secure onto your ears without any chance of it falling off especially during a workout which is full of movement. I've had these for about a month and these are great for the price and quality and comparable to Apple Earbuds or dare i saw BETTER.

I recently lost my carging case in which the eabuds go in and I applied for the year time warranty discussing the incident and they responded the next day reassuring me they can do some arrangements for the loss. I'm currently waiting what the next step is so I'll keep you updated! Also when applying for the 1 year warranty they added a free wireless charger so I'm excited to see how that goes.

The only issue I have would be the packaging in terms of actually securing it somethere like a keychain specialized for the case since I did lose mine. Obviously it was my fault but the extra security would've definetly helped

title: LOVE MY TOZO WIRELESS BLUETOOTH STEREO EARBUDS!!!
body: Finally wireless blue tooth earbuds that have excellent sound and seem to be top quality for the price.  I have shopped and shopped for weeks and feel so very fortunate to have found these little treasures.  So easy to pair with my smartphone and right away I could hear beautiful crisp sound.  And my calls are crystal clear too.  I use these earbuds at work to help me decrease my stress while I concentrate on my projects.  I usually work 2 hours at a time and the battery seems to last a little past that time.  Everything feels so sturdy and expensive.  The only issue I have is the USB cord that came with the unit didn't fit and I had the darn-est time trying to open the USB charger port.  With some real effort I finally opened it.  I was offered the free wireless charger sent to my home by customer service.  Great service and support.  Great purchase and warranty.

title: First week it broke but support was quick to help!
body: I was very impressed with these earbuds! They hold a great charge and they sound great for the price! Although within the first week one of the charging pins fell off, but these earbuds come with a one year warranty! The support was nice and quick about getting a replacement out. Took about a week to get a new charging case, other than that these earbuds are definitely worth it for the price!

title: Great value for a good price
body: I purchased this product for the purpose of daily walking as well as conference calling. Pairing with my iPhone is automatic out of box. The receiving audio quality was great with the first trying. I was a little concerned about microphone at the beginning since I did not put them in correctly. But once I adjust the position, the microphone works great! Great value!

title: works really good! and the quality is excellent !
body: If you want to buy a wireless earbud , this is the one for you, good price!, great sound and quality , the battery is good too, last enough time and you can charger again with the case , even call you can make and the quality is fair , I highly recommend this product! great purchased !!

title: Great Overall
body: These are great Earbuds, the sound quality is awesome, connectivity is great. I only have two small issues. I cannot control the volume from these and they tend to fall out so hoping the other size ear covers will help them stay in.

title: Pair with devices very easily!
body: I absolutely love these! Price is good, easy to pair and use, water proof! I tried wirelessly charging and it didn’t work but they charged great with the cord!!

title: Awesome Customer Service
body:
I used these buds for several months.  Sound is excellent particularly in the bass which was what I was looking for.  I give 5 stars for performance.

However, I did have an issue.  I could not get the buds to charge.  I stewed over what to do for some time.but I did finally figure how to reach out for customer service.  I sent my message at 10:30pm Sunday night and at 4:12am Monday morning I  had a most generous and convenient offer to send me a new wireless charger f.o.c.!  How about that for customer service?  So 5 stars also for outstanding post sales support.

title: [Update 2] Great deal
body:
Used it with my Galaxy S6 and returned it the next day. The sound quality was nothing of note, it did it's job when I was walking the dog. But turning my head or having my phone move around in my pocket caused frequent disconnects that drove me up the wall.

The case and build quality were great, the sound was okay, just the connection that drove me to return them.

[Update]
Tozo customer service rep contacted me about the product and indicated that my headphones might have been defective and that they were going to send me a new pair to try. Updated to 4 stars for the customer service, and will update again upon receiving the new buds.

[Update 2]
After receiving a new pair (Thanks to Christina at Tozo), there have been zero problems with connections. Put my phone in my room, closed the door, walked into the bathroom and downstairs. Zero disconnects. While the sound quality is not as good as my daily headphones (Senn 650's), the quality is not bad and the IPX8 rating means my sweat is not going to be a factor.

For $50, these are a damn steal.

title: Excellent quality
body:
I tired multiple wireless ear buds and these were the best. Waterproof, so no need to worry about how much you sweat. Great sound quality. The new headphones today tend to amplify the Bass which is annoying to me. These produce clear, true sound. The design is excellent and fits my ear very well. Noise cancelling is dependent on getting the correct fit with the included ear pieces in multiple sizes.. I recommend that you use the largest one that fits your ear to get the best noise cancellation.
Bottom line -  Great product, excellent value, GREAT customer service.

title: Must buy for the price and quality
body: Can’t say enough about these earbuds for the price I feel your getting everything the more expensive earbuds provide. After doing me research the only thing that these earbuds don’t have that 200$ earbuds have is about 2hrs more battery life . I haven’t had a problem with battery running out while using them and if so I would just put them in the Wireless charging case provided. Of witch other brands charge more for wireless charging case. All in all I’ll take a couple less hours of battery to save 150$ and have a premium waterproof pair of earbuds.

title: Bright blinking lights main problem... few others
body:
Returned these after a few days. Reasons:

1. Like to listen to podcasts/music while going to sleep. These have pretty bright blinking lights in the dark—wife didn’t appreciate it and plus I felt like a freakin borg.
2. These are a bit chunky/heavy. I have pretty normal size ears for a 6ft guy and I had to put on the smallest earpiece cover to approach comfort
3. Bluetooth pairing was a bit fussy. These were the first Bluetooth headphones I’ve tried so maybe this is normal, but they got confused between my iPhone and iPad and would unpair/pair sporadically until I made sure Bluetooth was deactivated on all devices except the one I wanted to use.
4. Seconding what another reviewer said about racially insensitive language in the manual: referring to the left and right as “slave” and “master”?? Cmon wtf is wrong with you? Creepy and a turnoff.

Other than that, pretty good sound I guess?

title: Great quality but not connected underwater
body: I was super excited to get these! I love that they came with smaller ear bud covers because now they fit my ears perfectly and don’t fall out. I swam with them and unfortunately I cannot go completely underwater with them or they lose connection. I think if I had a waterproof iPod they would stay connected. The Bluetooth connection of my phone is only good for like 10 feet, so putting my phone in the middle of the pool would work best.

title: Good quality for the price
body: I use these earbuds to listen to class lectures on my laptop. They are such an upgrade from the Apple earbuds I was using, which I found very uncomfortable to have in my ears for hours at a time. I especially like that there are different ear bud cap sizes provided to find a fit that works for you. If you're the type of person that is really into peak sound quality and very picky about that, these probably aren't for you. I still use my Beats to headphones listen to music. I would say that given the price, the quality of these are pretty good and I would recommend them to a friend.

title: Great sound and great customer service!
body: I only received one pair of ear caps. The larger ones but the instructions says to try on all of them but there is only one size in package. But the company has already replied and sending them to me me. The sound is great and when I receive the new caps I’m sure even better. Customer service has been top notch! Thanks Tozo

title: Good Product-And they fit any ear!
body: I literally have to wear the right Apple bud in my left ear and the left in my right ear because they do not fit me! These come with options to fit different ear sizes and they fit great.I love to listen to something while walking my dog and hated being wired up to me phone. These solved that problem and the walk is much more enjoyable! Support is great also....had one bud stop working after just 35 days and they replaced it with no questions asked. Definitely recommend.

title: The Quality Surprised Me!
body: I received my earbuds a day or so earlier than I expected.  They were packaged very well, and arrived undamaged.  They're pretty intuitive, but I followed the directions, got everything charged up, and started pairing them with all my electronic stuff.  I have paired them with my iphone, ipad, Lenovo PC, and my Samsung smart TV.  I love it!  And when they're in your ears, very little sound gets through from the outside.  Also, I didn't realize when I purchased them, that the case is also a charger.  I'm sure it said it, but I didn't notice it, so that was an extra bonus for me.  I have no idea how well these work with an Android, but they sure work well with Apple products.  Get some today!

title: Great Sound for the Price
body:
For the price the sound quality is great!  I use them on the plane and can't hear any extraneous noise when playing music through them.

The noise canceling is basically the result of plugging your ears with buds.  There doesn't appear to be any type of active cancelling.

The only thing I'm disappointed with the is the case which is used to charge the buds.  It does not hold a charge well when the buds are not actively charging.  I had the case fully charged along with the buds and after a few days of no use the case lost about half its charge.  The buds themselves seem to hold a charge pretty well.  I've only had this product for about a month so time will tell.

title: Affordable, elegant, and sounds awesome.
body: With the TOZO Bluetooth earbuds, I was blown away at the sound quality, the design, the fit, and ease of use. As someone who has larger ears, standard earbuds are always falling out. The sound cancelling is so good, people have to tap me on the shoulder at work to get my attention.  These earbuds are a great buy.

title: Great fit and sound!
body:
I purchased this ear pods as a gift, and the owner reports the following:

The pairing of the ear pods went well without a hitch, though they needed to be paired again. It's just a matter of following the directions exactly.

The sound quality is excellent, with great stereo separation. The bass sounds very good, too. Also, the range of the ear pods is great, in this case it was greater than the 10 meter range described in the manual.

The ear pods fit snugly in the ear and are unlikely to fall off like Apple's Airpods. The fact that Tozo's ear buds come with four sizes of nubs for the ears is also great.

If there is something that could be improved is the "L" and "R" markings on the ear pods could be lighter in color, as the color is very close to the color of the pods themselves.

title: Best TW earbuds I’ve ever used!
body: Love these earbuds!  They have a great sound quality when worn properly.  Easy to use, easy to connect and very durable.  So much better than all the others I’ve tried including the little white ones from the fruit company that won’t stay in my ears!

title: Awesome earbuds
body:
I recently got these earbuds to replace my older wired earbuds I use while I'm at the gym. The Tozo T10 earbuds are great! The sound is really good to me! I listened to drum&bass music, metal, rap, and classical to test out the sound and everything sounded crisp and clean. The wireless charging feature is fantastic! I keep them on a wireless charging pad I have in my car so they are always ready to go when I get to the gym! The charging care is also super nice, and pairing them to my iPhone was really easy. Also the instant on feature is awesome!

Just get them!

title: Earbuds I've been searching for years!
body: I've always had difficulties finding a set of earbuds that fit comfortably and sound good, at a convenient price. I've bought many pairs over the years that would have a tendency to pop out of my ear, even changing to the different size inserts. I've resorted to buying the corded buds with the ear loop. These would become uncomfortable after awhile and just didn't want to mess with them. I was using a pair of padded, over the ear headphones at the gym but didn't have a good Bluetooth earbud solution until I got these TOZO T10s! They fit fantastically and are comfortable for long periods of time. The sound actually blew me away and have been impressed with them! I have them connected toy Fitbit Ionic and just love it!!

title: Range
body: The range distance is a bit disappointing. I'm still testing it but, so far I couldn't go from by bed room to the kitchen. I didn't even make it there and it's not that far away. That being said, I'm very very happy with it so far.

title: They Work Mostly
body:
They work for the majority of the time but the sound cuts out everyone now and then for a split second.
Not the biggest deal in the world but it would be better if they never cut out.
The sound itself is alright.

title: Incredible Value!
body: These are incredible! I bought these headphones to replace a different brand of earbuds that stopped functioning.  The earbuds arrived quickly and in a great carrying case. They pair with each other quickly and then quickly pair with my phone.  The sound quality is incredibly clear with a rich sound.  The base is very strong.  The noise blocking feature is an added bonus, I hear very little environmental noise while outside.  These will be great for my next flight.  Customer service has been superb, checking to make sure I am satisfied with my purchase, unusual in today’s world.  I would recommend these to anyone looking to buy a good quality affordable pair of earbuds.

title: Good for at home listening if not picky about sound quality
body:
Sound quality sounded great for the first few uses. After that, it seems to have dropped pretty significantly. They cannot handle the “bass booster” equalizer on Spotify without sounding like crap. These are what I’d consider average sound quality these days.

While working out in a crowded gym, the Bluetooth is virtually useless. Sometimes I’ll get through an entire song without the music cutting out, other times it cuts out every 5 seconds. Very frustrating.

title: Consistent! Worth the money!
body:
So... I'm new to these bluetooth earbuds. I had to buy a few in order to find that these were my pick. What's good about these is that they're consistent all around. Solid sound quality, especially for the price, good build, easy to connect, and no drops in sound despite being bluetooth. That was my big gripe with the Tribit, which I do not recommend. Much clearer mids as well, lesser treble and bass though.

It also has a pretty good range, despite some reviews. Can kind of go through walls.  Just don't count on being more than 10-15 feet away from your casting device. Overall, very solid buy, excellent bang for your buck. Jack of all trades, and just generally good all around.

title: Pretty legit
body:
So I honestly bought these strictly because it had over 10thousand reviews and was rocking out 4 1/2 stars.
The reviews and star rating are spot on! I instantly fell in love with these when I was comparing them to some of the other “true wireless” earbuds I got. They fit snuggly in my ear, the sound is GREAT and it does cancel out the outside noise fairly well. Definitely would recommended to others and worth every penny

title: Great Battery life and tonal quality
body: I replaced my OEM AirPods I used with my iPhone with these.  Great fit in the ear, waterproof, great sound and battery life...  a sturdy wireless or wired charging case... who could want more ...

title: Legit Wireless for the Price
body:
I work out 6 days a week and need a good, durable set of earbuds. So far, these hold up. I've had two sets of PowerBeats Wireless and two sets of Bose. Wear and tear sets in pretty quickly, so I was tired of spending $200-$250 on a new set. Came across these and decided to go the alternative route after reading the reviews. Obviously, I was worried about quality and sound given the price point, but these can stand toe to toe with the top brands I've used in the past. Great sound that drowns out gym noise, no distortion even at max volume and the portable battery pod is awesome. They fit comfortably in my ears and only come a bit loose when I'm doing high impact moves.

What a product for the price. As someone who wears earbuds daily, these are a great get.

title: Works Well So Far
body: Had the earbuds for two weeks. They seem to work as advertised. The sound is great..lots of nice base. They connected very easily to my iphone.  Lasted about 3.5 hours on a full charge. Not great for phone calls but acceptable....music however sounds really good. Only concern would be how long they will last based on other reviews I have read.here. Will post an update on longevity if i have any issues. FYI, these will totally plug your ears and you wont be able to hear any outside noise which can be a strange feeling. Also, I paid 49.99 for the earbuds and they are now on sale for 29.99 which is a little annoying.

title: Perfect For the Price
body:
First off, these are really well built for the price. They feel sturdy, not cheap. Even the case feels good.

Second, they fit comfortably in my ear. I've been wearing bulky wireless headphones because I've never been able to find earbuds that would actually stay in my ear. I'm fairly active and previous earbuds would just keep falling out. But my headphones get crazy hot when I'm active. I was skeptical at first, but these earbuds are great! Follow the instructions (a simple twist in the ear) that come with them otherwise they won't fit right. I've been out but riding my bike, mowing my yard, and chasing my dog and these have remained firmly in my ears. I'm extremely impressed.

The sound quality is great. I didn't notice any difference between these and my headphones. That's all I could really ask for. Another feature is that you can use the Right earbud independently, but not the other way around. Not a huge deal, but nice when you still want to hear what's going on around you when you still want to listen to music or a podcast.

There's a lack of versatility with these buds. I mainly use them to listen to music and the only controls available are play/pause. The other controls are for phone calls. And it's only one button for everything. There's no volume control. You can't skip forward/backward on your playlist.

Battery is what you'd expect for the price. It's good, but not great. My headphones could get double the play time, but again I'm going for convenience here so I was willing to sacrifice. The case is able to charge the earbuds up to 3 times, so that's a plus. But now I have to carry around a case of I go on longer excursions.

The Bluetooth range is about the same as my headphones. Maybe a little bit less. I usually have my phone nearby anyways so it's not a huge deal to me. And if you don't have a smartwatch you need to keep your phone close by because of the lack of audio controls on the earbuds.

I gave these 5-stars because these are really great for the price. I was sick and tired of my bulky headphones making my head hot and these have exceeded my expectations so far. I'd recommend these to anyone looking for their first pair of affordable wireless earbuds.

Pros: well built, PRICE, good sound quality, charging case included, convenient

Cons: lack of audio controls, average battery life

title: Jah definitely Feel!!!
body:
Update -

So all y'all saying these pods fall out of your ear and ish, need to change the bud size that comes in the box. That solved the issue for me. They snug af. Jah heard?

Original Review -

Yo, unpacked these little pods or whatever you wanna call them. I've used plenty of earphones, headphones, bluetooth headsets and all failed me for one reason or another. Sometimes, the audio quality was excellent and the call quality sucked major a$$. These, held up well first day of use with sound quality being above sub par and call quality being better than most with clear call audio both ways. That is all I can ask for on a pair of fity something pods. Jah Feel? Jah definitely feel. Get 'em.

title: Very Satisfied
body: Had these for a few months now. Really happy. Great range, probably 40-50 feet before they disconnect. Great sound quality for my needs, gym, sometimes at work. No issues pairing to my phone (Google Pixel 3). For some reason I find the Apple style airpods horribly uncomfortable, no issue with these as far as comfort. Charge lasts for ages (I use between 3-4 hours a day and can easily go 3 to 4 days between charging the unit), and earbuds recharge quickly once you put them back in the case. Would definitely recommend.

title: Awesome Quality
body:
I am completely impressed with the Tozo T10.
The matte black case, sturdy plastic that facilitates cleaning. It also has an anatomical shape that gives a good grip on the hand. The strap of the box can be used to attach to the briefcase or backpack.
The  earbuds are perfect and extremely comfortable to wear.
No matter how much I jumped, they stayed in place! The important thing is to find the ideal shape that fits your ear.
Pairing them with my phone was very easy. All you have to do is remove them from the charging box and they are ready for pairing (just a quick note, make sure you choose TOZO-T10-R, the right headset is the main one).
The sound quality is impeccable with good highs and lows with a good amount of bass. The sound is much better than what I have in my car!

title: Great Base
body: These Earbuds are amazing 😉 I ride a Harley Davidson that  has a pretty loud exhaust system on it and when riding on back country roads with the Tozo earbuds in I can’t hear my exhaust! The sound quality is the best I’ve heard . Good base ! Very crisp sounding .. I highly recommend this product!

title: Great product and support
body:
Great headphones for a fantastic price.  Use them during my workouts and handle both sweat and pool just fine.  Fits well in my ear with no risk of falling out during workout.

I did have on problem and reached out for support, which was handled quickly and professionally.  Nice when a company stands behind the products.  Great alternative to the much higher priced options from Apple, Google, and Samsung.  Had samsung earbuds before this that had a problem, and samsung did not stand behind their product like tozo did.  Kudos.

title: Outstanding Product, Value and Customer Service
body: I ordered this product and received it next day (with Prime).  The packaging was excellent, and the product exactly as described and illustrated.  The instructions for pairing were spot on, and that was the easiest pairing process with a bluetooth device I have ever had.  The sound quality and bass boost are excellent!  In short, I would definitely recommend this product and more importantly, this seller, to anyone.  The seller sent a very nice follow up email to be sure I was happy with my purchase, and they clearly treat their customers very well and with great importance.  An excellent purchase and experience!

title: Pretty good piece of equipment
body: Received these yesterday and have been very satisfied so far.. sound quality is solid no distortion. They dont fall out through my.entire 5 mile run and that is key for me.. wish battery life could be a little longer.. it will run out of charge during an 18 hr transpacific flight.. but not that big a deal since case can be charged by USB and most long haul now have USB ports even in economy. Overall very happy with the earbuds so far.

title: Fine for music, not so great time and calls
body:
I am returning this device as soon as I can.  I've had it about 18 hours.  # 1 I have determined that the battery life is not that great.  I charged it last night right out of the box.  Used it a little bit just before bed time.  This morning, it was charged to 80% just before my morning workout.  2 hours later, it was complaining that it needed to be recharged.

#2.  I've tried using it on 2 conference calls and a regular call.  Each time people complained that I could not be heard or that I was going in and out.

The sound is very good.  I can appreciate that.  Still returning it as quickly as I can.

title: Wireless Earbuds That Work Well!
body: I bought these a while back and so far so good.  I did tons of research looking at reviews from different sources and settled on these.  I like that these don't look crazy in my ears (like Frankenstein with bolts sticking out).  It has plenty of bass and enough highs to balance everything out.  I have run with these and lifted weights and there have been no issues with them falling out.  I haven't run in the rain to test out their waterproof capabilities but based on everything else that works well, I'd imagine it wouldn't be an issue.  Customer support after buying these has been great and checking in on me.  No issues with these earbuds and I am loving these so far!

title: Item was a let down, but seller was outstanding
body:
I really wanted to like these earbuds, and at first I did. But I’ve tried various different sizes of the rubber tips it comes with and I still can’t get them to stay in when doing a workout that requires a lot of jumping and/or moving around, and I’m constantly adjusting them to make sure they’re firmly in place. I’m switching back to my other ones which, although not “true” wireless, at least the ear tips have a small hook that keep them in my ears. Maybe it just the way my ears are shaped but these weren’t for me.

UPDATE:
The seller contacted me after the initial review and wanted to make sure nothing was wrong or defective with the unit. I explained that I thought it was simply a poor design and not suited for intense exercise. They were eager to make things right and offered a different model free of charge. When I declined, they offered a refund on the original item with no need to send them back. Unbelievable customer service. I have no doubt they ultimately wanted an updated, positive review and I am more than happy to do so. Updated to five stars because they refunded my money immediately and were truly interested in make me a satisfied customer one way or another.

title: If you use an arm band this is NOT for you.
body: These will not stay connected to your phone if you use an arm band to run.  Totally worthless for running.

title: Great for the price!!!!
body: They fit well, and stay in place with whatever you are doing. Haven't had an issue with movement yet. The pairing process can be a bit funky at times, and I have to place them back in the holder on occasion to get them to pair and connect correctly, but only a slight issue and one I am sure happens with whatever earbud you might be using. The sound is ok, kinda heavy on the base, but most people seem to like that when working out which is what I use these for mostly. I don't notice the base nearly as much when I am listening to an audio book though. As far as connection, I have noticed a random dropping of connection for like a split second sometimes. Usually it is because I have moved from my phone or the battery is low. Over all, I recommend especially if you are not sure if in the ear wireless earbuds is the way you want to go.

title: I NEVER WRITE REVIEWS, BUT...
body: ***I almost NEVER write reviews*** So it’s not even the end of September, bought them at the beginning of the month, & one of the two earbuds is just nonfunctional. I’m not an athlete so it was sweat... I’m not a swimmer, so it wasn’t water... all I did was where them while I walked to coffee in the morning, and while I was closing down my bar at the end of the night. I’m disappointed in this product. Unless the manufacturers want to make this right, I stand by this review and please know I’m not just another complainer. Do not waste your money on this product.

title: Need earbud sizes please - otherwise sounds is good!
body: I got these for my boyfriend for his birthday and he said they are good for sound quality and noise canceling. The battery life is decent. The main problem is they don’t fit well in his ears and although it says there are different size pieces you can use to hold them in, his pair did not come with any different size earpieces. I’ve trying to figure out how to get them from the seller but haven’t had a response.

title: Absolutely PERFECT!
body: Just like my title says, I'd say these are absolutely perfect for my uses. I needed wireless earbuds for yardwork and runs. While certain name brand earbuds would run you $150 or so, a price which would result in me NEVER taking them outside, I figured this pair at 1/3rd the price would be cheap enough not to care about them. MAN WAS I WRONG. While the price may be cheap, the quality is not by any standards! Not only do they fit well, even if my ears tend to be very small and not work with in-ear headphones, but I also found the sound quality to be damn near perfect. After doing a few days worth of yard work, as well as going on a few runs, I've found they stay perfectly snug as well. I even dumped a bottle of water over my head, forgetting they were there, and had no issue. All in all. The product is absolutely wonderful! Very much worth the purchase!

title: Poor call reception
body:
I kept getting told by people I was talking to that my voice was too soft, or sounded far away. I ended up turning off Bluetooth on calls, and I've only had it for a week.

Plus, it's hard to keep the buds in my ears, they slip out real easy. No recommend, despite the swarm of good reviews.

title: Best on the market!!
body:
I have bought 3 types of wireless headphones and these are only ones I’m keeping!! I listen to all types of music from house to country to classical. These capture the true sounds I was looking for. One of the more expensive ones I bought sounded like AM radio.
These are amazing and not heavy. I loved these so much that I literally threw out my wife’s current headset and bought these for her.

title: Great product so far!
body: I just received my wireless earbuds and so far I am very satisfied. The feel comfortable once you use the correct adapter (several sizes provided), the sound quality is very satisfactory, they lock pretty safely in your ear (you must follow the direction and insert then turn them to fit perfectly in the ear) and the paired effortlessly with my phone. The little charging case is well made and it comes with everything you need. Again, so far, very happy.

title: My son is very pleased with these!
body: Bought these for my 17 year old son for Christmas. He has a tendency to lose things or leave them laying around for the dog to eat, so I wanted something good quality for a low price. He says the sound is really good and they hold a charge for a long time. He walked around NYC with one in his ear and only had to switch to the other after 6 hours. He says they are comfortable and easy to charge and small enough to toss in his backpack. Overall, I say he is really pleased with this gift.

title: Perfect for small ears!!
body: I have always wanted wireless earbuds, but always hesitated to buy them because I have such small ears that I didn’t think any of them would work out for me. After reading the reviews for the Tozo Earbuds I took the risk and order them. I was not disappointed! These earbuds come with plenty of different sized silicone pieces to fit you perfectly. The sound quality is great and the noise reducing aspect is quite good as well. I have already recommended these earbuds to a few people. Try them out for yourself!

title: The earbuds are great!
body:
Edit: I wanted to edit my review because I finally managed to get in contact with a customer service representative who was willing to help me. They shipped out a new pair of earbuds within 24 hours of my email, and they work great!

TLDR: The earbuds are ok, but if you get a faulty pair like I did, their customer support is nightmarishly bad.

I ordered these earbuds so that I could listen to music while I walk. When I received the earbuds and set them up, I noticed that the left ear bud would lose connection at the slightest movement of my head. When I sit perfectly still, I like the earbuds, but that's not very realistic. It seems clear that I received a faulty pair based on all the positive reviews these have.
The biggest issue has been customer support. In 6 business days from emailing them, I have received one, poorly translated email, telling me to try resetting the earbuds (which I have tried many times). It has been 4 days now since I responded to that email, and it seems clear that the company is going to drag their feet. If you buy these earbuds, you are taking a gamble that you are throwing away $50.

title: Very Good Heaphones for the Price
body: Needed something to wear in the hottub while the kids play in the pool so I can drown out their constant need for love and attention and these did the trick brilliantly.

title: Great headset, user preference gives 4 stars
body: I only gave this product 4 stars for several reasons.  I used this set for phone calling all day long.  I found it cumbersome to end and start calls by pressing the side of the unit.  It fit well and provided several sized ear bud covers, however, it did not meet my needs for the reason I was using it.  I'm guessing if you use them during workouts or other situations where you leave them in and don't accept lots of calls during use - they may work better.  The SOUND WAS GREAT.  If used for music or video's - they would be a great set.

title: Didn’t last long, but now testing their customer service
body:
Works great out of the box, good sound quality, decent (but not excellent) battery life.
However, after just 4 months of regular use, the right earbud suddenly stopped working, no longer shows a Bluetooth signal, speaks in a different tone of voice. Support department, took many days to answer my emails, but when they did, they have offered to replace the device.
Will update review when this has happened, with the life of the replacement.

title: Earbuds stay in ear during workouts & sound great!
body: The TOZO T10 TWS Bluetooth 5.0 Earbuds were my second purchase as I was trying to find a set of Bluetooth earbuds that would stay in place during my workouts. The TOZO T10's worked great, stayed in place and sounded great. They also appear to be resistant to sweat (this caused issues with another model which this one replaced). Strongly recommended for exercise or other activities where you want quality sound and secure positioning.

title: No good
body: This ear phones keep cutting out.

title: Started out good and went downhill fast.
body: The left ear bud stopped pairing after about a month. The charger gets really hot. The company said they would send another left earbud but never did. I returned it for my money back. Two months of trying to resolve this.

title: Ok
body: The don’t hold a charge for very long.  They were fully charged and the battery was dead within an hour or so.  They’re comfortable.

title: Worth the money
body:
UPDATE AT 30 DAYS: I’m really not a big review writer, but these headphones are definitely worth the price! The noise cancelling aspect is great. I sat on a 3 hour flight with a screaming baby, with the head phones in, no screaming! Wonderful! I now have the wireless charger and it works perfect too, and charges my iPhone. All in all, 30 days in, totally worth the $30.

Good wireless headphones for the price. Worth the buy. Comfortable, like that the case recharged them in between every use even if it’s only a short period of time.

I went on a 3 day trip, charged them before I left and they have still not died. Comfortable to wear and easy to pause your music or show. They connect to your Bluetooth as a pair or each individually which is great for me.

ONLY reason I didn’t give 5 star rating, don’t expect to use them for a phone call, the mic is very low and people on the other end of the call have a hard time hearing you. By for headphones alone, great buy!

title: Battery lasts a very long time!
body: I wanted to give it a few weeks before writing a review but I will say I am very happy with these headphones. The battery life is amazing. They fit perfectly in my ears and I have had trouble with other ear buds. I had to switch out to one of the different sizes, but now they fit great.  I spent the extra $5 on the extended warranty if anything happens to them, but so far so good. For the price, you can't go wrong with these ear buds.

title: TOZO bluetooth earbuds
body:
I haven't had them terribly long but so far I've been very impressed with their build quality and range. The sound quality is also solid. I've never owned a pair of wireless earbuds (had to get rid of wires because my cat chewed through three of my other wired earbuds) so this is my first foray into that jungle but so far I'm completely satisfied. Also, the charging case is definitely one of the major highlights for this product.

As for customer service, they seem to care about the customer's satisfaction. Was pleasantly surprised to have them reach out and asked me how satisfied I was within a week of my purchase. So far, it has been a good experience.

title: Great sound
body: Using both ear buds when you are alone and do not need to be tuned to anything around you as these are quiet and great sound for music.  It is convenient to use with one in your right ear to hear others and still hear your phone music or phone calls too.  I haven't used them much on the phone.  Mostly for music listening.  And haven't ran them long enough to comment on the battery life.  Overall good quality for a reasonable price.

title: Super portable and sleek looking
body: I just got my headphones this week and I must say they are nice. I have little ears and it’s so hard for me to find good wireless headphones that stay but these are doing great. Plus the staff has even followed up with me which is super sweet of them, you don’t find that often now in days, I highly recommend them.

title: Great sound & price
body: I wasnt expecting much, but these earbuds blew me away.  The sound is fantastic, noise canceling is great and the convenience of wireless charging is a bonus.  I highly recommend these.

title: Just perfect
body: Let me first say tozo thanks for making these unbelievable headsets for the price these pair work magnificent the battery life is just enough to get me thru work+ the sound is grate and the bass is bumping and I wanted to say the different earbud sizes is awesome 2 allow me to find the right size so it won't fall out my ear. So thank you very much tozo for making these unbelievable headsets and if I had to buy them again or tell a friend to buy them I would they are just perfect

title: Great sound quality for the price.
body:
Using it for couple of days, and as per initial impression, the sound quality is great, the bass is great and it has decent treble. It fits nice in the ear. I wore it for 2 to 3 hours straight and it was quite comfortable. The case is well built and it charges wirelessly. So that's a big plus.
Overall great earbuds.

title: Amazing convenience
body: Product is great. The charging is easy. They cancel out almost all noise around as well. For example, I can mow my lawn and still hear the pod cast I am listening too. I also wear them daily while running.  Most importantly, they stand by their product. For some reason, my headphones stopped charging and all I did was send an email and I was replied to in no time with a replacement. Would highly recommend this to anyone looking to get high quality sound at a good price.

title: Greatness arrives in these headphones.
body: These headphones are a ridiculous deal. After unboxing I took them out of the case and my phone found them very quickly. I swapped out the rubber enclosure with a larger one and they instant became noise cancelling headphones. They have not fallen out of my ears and I love the way they sound. The driver pumps out more than enough bass for your music. The call sound is great and very clear. Great work on these bad boys.

title: Junk - dont waste your $$$$
body: I gave these a fair shot and if you keep your phone in your pocket and thing you can use these like a normal person think again - the quality is so bad it is useless. The phone call is choppy and is like you have poor service.  You have to hold the phone closer to the earbuds - well then whats the point - just hold the phone. Like I said junk and to top it off I got stuck with them because I when on vacation for 3 weeks and missed the return window.

title: Works well but short battery life
body: If you can have ear buds that have to be charged every 2 hours these are good.

title: Awesome quality and sound for the $. Good AirPod alternative.
body: Bought these for my daughter as an “AirPod” alternative. She absolutely loves them! A couple cool things to note. Sound quality is excellent, they are waterproof and she wears them in the shower (against my wishes), and the case is also a charging base (when you plug in the earbuds and case the earbuds charge and the case charges also, so you can charge the earbuds in the case without plugging in).

title: Excellent earbuds!!!
body: I’ve had these for 2 months now and have no issues with them.  The charging case is incredibly helpful and makes it easy to charge throughout the day, just pop them back into their case when you’re not using them and you will have great audio all day long.  Very excellent quality and I’m very happy with them!

title: Great for gym workouts
body: I purchased these headphone because my Beats just stopped working and I had difficulty with customer service so I said forget it. I have had the TOZO wireless earbuds for over a week now. I can say that they provide great sound quality during my gym workouts and while I'm hiking on trails and cycling throughout the city to work. I am a heavy sweater when it comes to working out but I have had no issue with sweat getting in my ears and shifting the buds while I run. The earbuds stay in place. They are inconspicuous, which I LOVE. They can be used separately. They fit snuggly in my ears so I dont worry about them slipping out. I do participate in water sports and a few extreme sports but I'm not sure if these would hold up well while I'm in action. I'll come back in a few weeks to update those that want to know how they hold up while doing water activities such as rafting and canoeing. So far I am happy with the earbuds during my regular daily activities.

title: The sound quality is top notch
body: I researched alot of ear buds, trying to find the best bang for my buck without jeopardizing the quality. These really stood out to me. I am so glad I chose these! The sound quality is superb and crystal clear! I also love that I can use one bud at a time at work. When one dies, I use the other one, while the one that dies is charging while in its case!

title: Sounds great but battery last life need to be longer.
body: The headphones sound really great when compared to other headphones in the same price bracket( enough bass and great acoustic). Although, the battery life sometimes does not even last a full movie. This definitely needs to be improved . The headphones does not support active noise cancellation(ANC), but does a decent job of lower the ambient sound. Also, it takes time for getting use to pressing the multifunction while in ear, as it may hurt in the beginning.

title: Great headphones
body:
Even though I am sadly returning these headphones because my ears are too small(yes I tried all the sizes) I can only speak positively about how high quality they are!

The sound is amazing, it is noise-canceling before it fell out of my ear, battery life was good and the charger is quick AF!

If you have normal-sized ears that can hold these babies, get them!

title: Solid, affordable TWS earbuds
body:
I have had my earbuds for about 4 months now. I am a highly technical person, and I love music, but do not think I would classify myself as an audiophile. I now have 3 different sets of TWS earbuds, and out of the 3, these are my favorites. One thing I did that makes a difference, at least for me, is I replaced the included tips with memory foam ones that I have used on a number of different earbuds over the past few years.

Pros:
Good sound quality
Good bass, especially with replacement tips
Good battery life
Rapid charging
Wireless case charging
Solid build feel
Good customer service

Cons
Stiff buttons
Intermittent connection loss

Sound/Bass:
These sound as good as any other headphones I have used over the past 5 years or so. I do not spend the money for high-end brands like Bose or Beats, so I can't really compare these to them. I was able to hear a full range of frequencies and there was good clarity. With replacement memory foam tips, the noise isolation is good enough to block out 75% or more of my 20-year old lawnmower's engine.

Battery Life
I have researched and used enough of these to realize that I am not going to go 9-20 hours without having to change the buds. That said, even at high volume levels, the battery life on the buds exceeds what I expected. I can get from 2.5-3 hours on full volume, usually, and longer if I am not playing music/audio books the entire time. They charge pretty quickly in the case too, which means minimal downtime if you need to charge them up. I particularly love the wireless charging for the case. At night, I can just drop it on a charging pad next to bed, and well before morning, the case and buds are at full charge. Between the buds and the case, I am able to go all day without having to recharge the case.

Build
The buds and the case have a solid feel to them and have held up well. The case, in particular, is solid and has survived my pants pocket and laptop bag admirably. Another brand that I purchased, the cover broke off the case within 2 months.

Customer Service
I have had to reach out to TOZO twice about my buds. The first time, was due to intermittent loss of connection, the second, when my right earbud died. I received responses in a reasonable amount of time (usually, overnight), and there was no hassle dealing with them.

Stiff Buttons
I find the buttons are a bit stiff on the buds, and when I press them, I sometimes feel like I am forcing the bud deeper/too deep into my ear canal. It is not a huge issue, but if you push at the wrong angle, it can be a little uncomfortable.

Intermittent Connectivity
This is probably the only, and biggest, issue I encountered. All TWS buds that I have encountered, and even bluetooth headphones such as the Leophile Eel and LG Tone (any version) can lose connectivity. What I found is that there are a couple of places where the buds regularly get disrupted for some reason. I realize it must be the concentration of wireless/bluetooth signal, but it is inconvenient. It has never reached a point where I felt I needed to go out and buy a different pair to resolve the issue.

My other TWS earbuds are the Enacfire E19 and Enacfire E20. As much as I like the E19, these are just enough better for me to move them to the "backup" set. I just got the E20, and the shape/size of them is odd enough that I am not sure that I can enjoy them. Compared to either, the TOZO buds win.

title: Nearly-perfect wireless headphones
body:
Overall, this is a very good quality product and I would definitely recommend it, especially for the gym!

Pros:
1) The charging is easy and convenient! The box is pleasant to hold and easy to carry with you.
2) The interface is pretty intuitive and it does not take much time to figure out how to use this product.
3) The battery life is wonderful, for me, it lasts for 2-4 days.
4) The design is very well thought of.
5) I absolutely love that they don't cause any discomfort for the ears.

Cons:
1) The sound quality is mostly good, but sometimes drops, but then reappears again. It might be related to the qiality of the Bluetooth connection.
2) Switching the connection from one device to another (eg, phone to laptop) might be a bit annoying.

title: Buyer Beware!
body: The product that I received looked nothing like what was in the images on Amazon!  The box was a cheap cardboard with a label on the side indicating the name and serial number. There were no additional eartips included and the charging case for the headphones was also different from the one pictured! At this point, I don’t even care about how they are with sound quality as my trust in the product was broken from the minute I opened the package.

title: Fantastic Sound, Sleek, Comfortable
body: This is my first ever pair of wireless earbuds. They sound way better than my wired ones. Nice packaging, quality product and charging case. Haven't tested them in the shower or running yet, but I'm excited to try them out!

title: GREAT- WHAT A SURPRISE!
body: I really like these earbuds, they’re great!  I didn’t have high expectations but I didn’t want to spend a lot on another “flagship” item yet again....  so I took the plunge and tried these out.  They exceed my expectations and the sound is GREAT!.  Noise cancellation was key for me as well and these do a good job as long as you have the right size buds in.  Try all sizes to assure the best fit.  Also LOVE the battery life!

title: Good Headphone but a little big
body:
Updated: these units are highly frustrating. When I use then for voice calls the person on the other end isn't able to understand me. Also if I am slightly active they cut in an out to the point that at times I can barely understand what is being communicated over them whether it is music over Pandora or listening to a podcast. I have had to fall back to my Bluetooth receiver and headphones. Boo!

These are a good set of headphones with nice battery life. That quality of sound is pretty good though a little on the brass side not quite enough bass. They are big and don't quite fit comfortably into my ear so I can't wear them for extended lengths of time. Also I using one (1) headphone is irritating, when I remove the right one from it's base it connects fine but if I don't take out the left one as well I get this constant beep in the right one, would be nice as I am sometimes in areas that I need to be able to hear in one ear. It would be nice if they had an app I could install on my phone to see battery life and maybe other controls. I like the ability to charge on a Qi wireless charger so I don't have to fumble for a chord all the time and the headphones charge quite quickly too. They stay in the ear well and I haven't had one fall out yet. Voice seems to be clear as my wife didn't seem to notice when I was wearing them and talking to her or talking on my LG G6.

Over all decent sound for the price with decent battery, a little big for my ears, would like an app and the ability to only use one ear piece at times.

title: Incredibly happy with these earbuds!
body:
I'm immensely pleased with this purchase. I've had trouble in the past finding earbuds that were comfortable in my ears (especially anything Apple-made). These earbuds are comfortable and snug, and it includes different-sized heads to ensure you find a right fit.

Given the price compared to the features included in this product, I was worried there would be obvious sacrifices in audio quality. Nope! I'm no audiophile, but the sound is crisp. I've previously bought cheaper wireless headphones on Amazon in the $20 range, and there's a world of difference between these high-quality speakers and some of the cheaper options out there.

I was I was in for a nice surprise when I realized that the case supports wireless charging. I lazily skimmed the product listing before purchase, so I assumed the charging case wireless charged the earbuds and thought "cool, whatever." But it's much better than that: the case itself can be placed on a wireless charging pad, which charges the case and the headphones. Neat! It works great with my Samsung wireless charger, and I'm about to purchase a Galaxy S10 phone which advertises that it can wirelessly charge *other* devices, so I'm optimistic that I'll be able to charge these headphones from my cell phone in a pinch!

Another worry I had was that I've owned products that charge using magnetism to pull exposed contacts together, and sometimes you have to line it up *just* right to make contact and start charging. Not a problem with these earbuds! Each headphone is pulled snugly into its slot with a satisfying "click", and I've had a true 100% success rate with the metal contacts making a connection.

The carrying case is a bit bulky, but it includes a built-in 600 mAh battery (along with the wireless charging hardware) which has to go somewhere. Can't complain on this front.

How's the battery life? Not sure. I have yet to push the limits of my battery since it's simply so convenient to charge these. I largely just use these for 1 hour or less and then return them to the case. No problems on that front.

Each earbud has a tactile button that can long-press to power off, or short-press to play/pause on the connected device. I do wish the media control could've been taken a short step further (skipping to the next song is the main use I have in mind, and volume control would be great). Oh, and double-clicking a button will redial the last called number. This is probably something I will literally never want to do, so it seems like an accidental call waiting to happen. Luckily the buttons have some nice tactile resistance, so it seems unlikely that I'll accidentally double-click.

Finally, the pairing process is as easy as I could ask for. The state of the pairing process is announced in clear, plain English over the earbuds as things get connected (instead of forcing you to rely on obscure patterns of flashing light like some other devices I've used).

title: Too big, not good for running
body:
Headphones are huge, and stick out really far if you have small ears.
Sound is decent, no volumn control, don't stay in ear when running.

title: Fantastic sound quality. Crystal clear highs and pumping deep base
body: These are my second pair of wireless earbuds and I couldn't be happier. I was initially drawn to the TOZO brand due to  offering IPX8 waterproof. That is great, but the quality of the sound and power output is fantastic. I have a large lawn and I love to listen to music while mowing. These are able to cancel out the mower noise without barely exceeding half volume. I also use them while on the bus commuting back and forth to work and love them. I highly recommend them.

title: Great sound.  Comfortable . Sleek and feels built with quality
body:
So I was a little skeptical about making a purchase  for ear buds like these only because I know my self and it's only a matter of time I misplace one taking them out on the fly or one falls out do to my clumsy nature with that I would rate myself 3 stars .  But back on track here.
I've only used them for about 5 days and am quite the  sound snob when it comes to listening to music.  Ive had a pair of blue tooth headphones before but they were true wireless the bud style was similar but a tiny core wrapped around your neck . So for starters

I love the true wireless set up which I know is pretty standard now  a days . But its great.

The sound quality is far superior then any ear buds I've ever used at max volume the sound and bass is consistent where with some especially lower end ones the sound starts to get a little distorted or the clarity  gets lost.

I had to adjust the size on the one bud but the comfort level it's great and they lock one pretty well . I did a motion test .ex.  jumping up and down, moving around quickly, power walking etc.

The case is compact and sleek with led indicators to tell you the battery life and also comes with a lanyard which is great for  someone like me. Makes it easier to track down if it decides to grow legs and walk away .

I was a little confused on pairing with my phone the only picked up 1 bud. But just some quick thinking that my device reads it as 2 sound outputs  so I had to go to my bluetooth settings and enable left ear speaker and right ear speaker. (Something  to keep in mind)  my phone  galaxy S10+ .  ..  also your phone at least mine tells me the battery life of each ear bud in the bluetooth menu.
