I'm 32 and yes even tho most electronics say water proof ir resistant.  Im still semi old school and dont dare to risk it. But built by the quality of these buds sound and crafting I'm sure it is true to its name . But I'm not willing to test it.

So I left them on(purposely) and they do last about the time they claim can't give you exact I was sleeping when they finally died.

I've only used or examined those core features so that's all the idea of the product I can give.  I. Would recommend.

title: These Will Drive You Insane
body: These headphones are not worth the money. The sound and fit were very good but the bluetooth signal is so weak and unstable that if you move your head, cover one of the earbuds or even chew with them in, they cut out. Doing anything physical in them is impossible. Unlike lower priced models, they cannot operate with just a single bud in. They must both be connected, otherwise the left earbud beeps constantly, like a bird sadly calling out for its lost brother. I bought these on a recommendation of a coworker, who has since experienced the exact same issues. They just aren’t very good.

title: Would have got a 5 star, but...
body: The sound is great with these earbuds.  They fit in your ear quite well, as long as you follow the instructions on putting them in your ear(s).  I also love the charging case how you can charge the earbuds on the go.  The only downfall, and what gives these earbuds a 4 star is the length of the charging cord, it is very short.  I am sure the most of you have cords that will fit the charger that is longer.

title: Love these earphones.  I want several pairs!
body: I love these earphones.  They're much more liberating to wear than headphones/earbuds with cords.  Plus they aren't annoying like traditional "over the ear" earphones.  The sound quality is great, and using the mic for calls works well.  My friends can hear me better than when I used a collar version of mic/earbuds.  I wish I could wear these all day.  My only disappointment is that the 3-3.5 hours or charge goes by too quick.  I think I'll need to pairs to recharge one while listening to another.  Then problem solved!  Thanks Tozo!

title: Disappointed
body: I received a pair as a gift and they did not work right out of the box. One of them would cut in and out until it completely stopped working. I recently received a replacement pair and they were just as bad. I returned this pair as well and went with a different brand that are working perfectly.

title: I am very happy with these earphones
body:
I like everything about these headphones.  Good sound quality, light weight and comfortable, good battery life, convenient charging case that I wear around my neck most of the time.
One headphone fell out when I first got them, but then I learned to put them in more firmly.
I have not tried them in water, but I have worn them when I shave and they caused no problems.

I already recommended them to a coworker who promptly ordered them.

title: So far so good!
body: Purchased these earbuds recently and just started to use them.  Much better than the cheaper version I had been trying to use.  I primarily use these for phone calls and the sound quality if much better than what I had experienced.  I no longer have to take them out mid-call because the caller can't hear me well enough.

title: Not gonna get a 5 star review because you asked for a 5 star review
body:
I have never written a review for a free product. This company wanted to send me a "wireless" charger if I said the headphones "had the best bass", "good build material", etc.

After I bought the headphones, I looked at the reviews and half of them were falsely sounding.

Here's a genuine review:

The headphones work and that's a plus.
They stick out of my ear canal so it looks like I have two plastic cylinders protruding out of my ears.
Sound quality is just ok. I have Airpods and they almost comparable not "exceptional" like some of these reviews state.
The headphones lack mid and treble so when you listen to a song, it sounds muffled a bit.
Charging is fast and the headphones hold a charge for about 2 hours.

All in all, it's a decent product, but not a 5 star product. here's their email:
----

Dear Valued Customer,
Thank you for purchasing our great T10 wireless earbuds.

Your satisfaction truly means a lot for us, in order to ensure that you can fully enjoy our great earbuds more conveniently, if you agree, how about we send you a spare wireless charger for free? Don't worry, it is totally free for you.

The wireless charger allows you to charge earbuds case more conveniently with no string attached, it can also support wireless charging phone.

We LOVE our customers and we will always be here to support if you need us.

-----

Me: I won’t be able to post a review. Does that mean I won’t get the charger?

-----
Sorry, since our manager need a reason to approve us to send out a new free item. Thank you for your kind understanding.
Best regards,
Hannah

title: Sound quality is lacking.
body:
Pros:
Seem to be put together well, and they fit in the ear nicely. The case is good, although the ear buds don't fit quite as easily as they should. So far it's charged my earbuds about 4 times without requiring recharge. I like that they both have power switches. They're light in your ears and hold very well, I wouldn't want to jog with them but they'll be good for most other activities. They do fine watching videos, there's no noticeable "lip lag" on my phone or my TV.

Cons:
You'll notice the tinny, thready, bass-less sound right away. Pretty bad, honestly; not $5 earbud bad but maybe $10 earbud bad. The power buttons are plastic membrane type, they'll wear through quickly. No noise cancellation. They last about 3 hours between charges.

Overall:
For $50 I expected better sound. Otherwise minor niggles. If I'd paid $25-30 I'd be happier but I'd still give them away.

title: Unfortunate.
body: Dang.. I wanted to love these headphones! The sound (when they work) is awesome. I bought my first pair then the right earbud stopped charging and wouldn't turn on. I ordered a replacement set and the bluetooth cuts on and out and becomes very annoying when listening to music.

title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!!!!!
body:
I've tried just about every earpod/wireless headphone on the market and I'm so impressed with this purchase. The customer service and level of support - is mind blowing!

I highly recommend this product - definitely worth the price!!!!!

title: Great Earbuds
body: I'm very happy with the sound and quality of the earbuds. The case is nice and keeps charging the earbuds when it's unplugged. I like the indicator lights so I know when to charge the case. I tried cheaper buds, and they were not good at all. These are very reasonably priced and the sound is excellent! Nice bass (just enough for me). Great highs and mids. They pair up quickly and easily.

title: Better than standard apple headphones (and most other headphones I’ve used)
body: First and foremost, I really don’t like using ear buds as it makes my ears hurt, and it tends to fall out especially during workouts HOWEVER, these are the most comfortable headphones I’ve used (next to apple’s), and it does not fall out what so ever. Sometimes it feels like it’s not even there, but it’s secure and snug. Additionally, the sound quality is amazing. I can hear a wide range of sounds, crisp, clean, snappy, and the bass is phenomenal (without it sounding overbearing). Highly recommend this product. The noise canceling is really good as well, sometimes I can’t hear the person next to me even with a low volume of music.

title: Decent, but won't stay in ears well.
body:
CONS:  I would be giving these earbuds five stars if it wasn't for the fact that they frequently slip out of my ear when I am working out. The product says you can use them while swimming, yard work, etc, but I would not trust the earbuds doing something like that. Would never wear them out somewhere where it would be hard to find it if it fell out. I am even using the smallest buds it came with. The medium size won't fit me. For the price I spent on these, I honestly had higher expectations for the fit. And because of this lack of fit, the noise cancellation is pointless. Sound quality is good until it starts slipping out.
The phone call feature is basically crap. Tried it out, the other person couldnt hear me at all.

PROS: connection to phone is easy. Battery life is good. Sound overall is good, if it wasnt for the lack of proper fit into my ears.

title: Perfect Bluetooth pairing
body: Great product! I had another brand of wireless headphones in the past and lost the master headphone but still had the slave, making them completely useless. I love that this set I can use either just one or both together. And I was really surprised at how great the range is! I can set my phone down and walk all over my house, even up stairs and still be paired. The price can't be best for the quality. I loved the different sized ear bud pieces to find my right fit.

title: Very affordable
body: I love the buds, not as expensive as the Airpods I have purchased already. These Tozo10 earbuds fit inside your ear canal and doesn't move unless you take them out. You will have to discover which size silicone cover best fits you. The price was definitely on point. Everything in the photos are included plus you are offered a free year's warranty, within 14 days of purchase not to mention there's a 3 year warranty offered for about $6.00 (optional). I noticed that there's a beep for a few minutes but it does stop. The charge is within 20-30 minutes, only a USB cord is included all you need is a block for the socket. There's a string just incase you may lose or misplace the charger box. Please remember the right bud is the main source, you don't have to use both at the same time, but you will need to use the right one.

title: WOW!
body:
I am 69 years old and I was clueless on how to pair the earbuds to anything.  So I went looking for a young person at our local restaurant, and sure enough in walks two young people.  I asked him if he knew how to pair bluetooth earbuds and he said that he did.  I was so excited about finding someone to help me, that I paid him for his services.  Such a nice young man!  I can now listed to my echo while my husband watches tv without him complaining my music is too loud.
Life is good.

title: Affordable and Convienient
body: This Product works incredibly well and has amazing bass quality. The sound quality is terrific also, you can hear the clarity in each instrument. The earbuds last about as long as advertised (3.5 hours a charge) and the charging case they come with holds four individual charges for the earbuds so you'll have music all day. The waterproof feature works incredibly well and I've yet to have an issue with it in over 2 months of use. Very reliable product, would reccomend.

title: Not worth the price!!
body:
First off my fault for not looking at the battery life.  But barely 5 hrs and I didnt even play anything for some of that time.

Then same issues as the other 1 star people.  Left ear cuts out, bluetooth cuts out constantly.  Its cuts out constantly if there is a little wind or if it's in your pocket.  Haven't tried to swim yet but the bluetooth is so weak I doubt that will work at all.  And no volume control!

The only star it earned was because the sound quality was good at least.

WAY OVER PRICED FOR WHAT YOU GET

title: Tozo T10 great product great price.
body:
On February 16, I received two pairs of headphones, one pair for me and one for my wife. After almost a month of use, I can affirm that the product is wonderful, that the sound is to our liking, for which we are happy with the purchase.

El 16 de febrero recibi dos pares de audifonos, un par par a mi y otro para mi esposa. Luego de casi un mes de uso, puedo afirmar que el producto es maravilloso, que el sonido esta a nuestro gusto, por lo cual estamos contentos con la compra.

title: GREAT for first time wireless headphones user!
body: Love the sound quality these produce.  Super easy to use and link to device.  After reading other reviews, I did learn about the other sized ear bud adapters that are included in the package.

title: Not good for talking on the phone
body: These connect to my phone easily and reliably. The water resistance is great. But talking on them doesn’t work well - literally every person I’ve talked to over the phone while using these tells me it sounds like I’m in a wind tunnel or drowning in plastic trash bags... really kills the “cool” factor of these for me

title: Great sound - left ear but was cutting in and out
body:
I suffer from tinnitus and after riding my motorcycle on the highway for any great distance my tinnitus goes into overdrive after the ride and makes life miserable. I recently purchased these to use while riding my motorcycle on the highway. Went on my first road trip today.

The Pros: There are 4 included rubber earpieces included (the medium size is attached by default). Real easy to pair the ear buds with your phone or iPod. The sound on these is incredible! I didn't have to crank the volume for good quality sound while riding.

The Cons: The medium ear pieces fit and felt the best, but overall the earpieces feel large and I did not have that sense of security that the ear buds were secure in my ear. Later on in the ride, the left earbud would cut in and out when I was turning my head. It did not loose it Bluetooth connection like other reviews. just seemed to cut out for an instant. I have read in another review about a similar occurrence and the individual did a reset and that seemed to resolve the issue.

I HAVE NOT TRIED THE PHONE FEATURE. I doubt anyone would be able to hear, or understand me, if I tried taking a call while riding anyway. Not with the half helmet I wear most of the time.

Overall, four stars (for now, and subject to change). I will do the reset and get out for another ride before the warranty expires and see how they do. If that left earbud continues to cut out... I will send them back.

title: Good pair of blue tooth earbuds
body: These are very comfortable and fit in my ears well.  I walk often with them and they have never fallen out.  Sound is excellent on the few times I have used them for music (usually listen to podcasts or mp3 books).  Even wore them in the shower once to see how they stood up, and had no issues at all.

title: Great product but not for me
body: I bought this to use on my TV.  I could not get the buds to connect.  I went into Best Buy since it was right by Kohl’s. They told me you needed special buds that they sold in the TV section.  Before I returned them I tried to connect to my iPhone.  No problems at all. Great sound.  But I already had apple buds for my iPhone and only wanted these for the TV.  I was sorry for had to return them but I couldn’t use them.

title: Great Earbuds!
body: The TOZO T10 earbuds work really well. The sound quality is really crisp (I mostly listen to podcasts, however) but it is at least as good as any corded earbuds. The convenience and ease of use of these earbuds is over the top wonderful though. They charge when in the case, so it easy to charge when you're not using them. They seem to hold a great charge, as I use them for hours at a time. They stay in my ears securely - yet are very comfortable. They look great and have many other great features! I would recommend (and plan on ordering a second set for my girlfriend.)

title: Great Quality/Great Price
body: I was presently surprised with these ear buds, especially for the price.  Great sound, easy to connect and a nice fitting in the ear.  Only wish the battery life was longer.  The wireless charging is a plus.

title: Pretty solid earbuds.
body: I got these about a week ago. I used them at work, and at the gym. Got to say they are pretty nice! Good, loud sound. They actually fit into my ear, and don't fall out or become loose. Customer service has been awesome. I love that they come in a rechargeable case. I had other earbuds where the only way to charge them was with a USB stick they came with. I had to keep buying multiple earbuds, because the USB stick would break on me. Overall, I am happy with my purchase. Definitely worth $50.

title: You wont be disappointed.
body: I love these units. They are very comfortable to wear and last hours on a charge. The sound is amazing. I use them every day(have had them several months) and the battery doesn't seem to lose any charge time.

title: Very satisfied - Great value
body: These earbuds are perfect for workouts. The fit is great and they withstand the heavy perspiration that goes with running and cycling. In the past I've had trouble with expensive, high-end earbuds shorting out due to faulty moisture wicking capabilities. I am pleased to report the TOZO earbuds do not have that problem. They are also as easy to pair as the product description claims. Just take them out of the case and they automatically pair with your device. Since they are so reasonably priced, I'll probably buy a second pair to have one in my car and one in my gym bag.

title: Great sound but sometimes it loses connection
body:
The sound is really nice and, even though it's not active noise cancellation, it does a pretty good job.
However, sometimes, when I tilt my head a certain way, they lose connection for a fraction of a second.
Also, there's no way to control anything other than play/pause.
Other than that, I love these earbuds.

title: A STEAL FOR 50! BEST PODS IVE USED. CHARGING CASE AND PODS ARE FIRE QUALITY. 10/10
body: I was looking for the best earpods in the 50 dollar range and didnt want to buy the Samsung ones for 120 when I can get a pair that 12,000 people have reviewed as amazing. First of all... the charging box is awesome. Theres literally enough battery life in each charge for most my day to day use. And its 4x full charges in the magnetic, solid plastic and well designed case. The magnetic lid that rotates open snaps back when closing with a strong but easily accessible magnet. The earpods themselves are minimal and a.matte black, and has standard size swaps for ear shape/size. They kind of rest back under a part of the ear helping secure or prop it into place. I've yet to have them fall out or even feel iffy (have not ran or worked out with them yet. You can wear them in a pool swimming laps. And I'm hesitant but they have a year warranty. And claims waterproof. The sound is better than the tether wired powerbeats 3, by far... in all aspects including the much needed and lacked by "beats," bass. They knock harder than expected. Not so much as some, but just right. Works great with movie and game surround sound. As a person who never writes reviews but am stoned and HIGHly impressed... forreal. Now I can tune out my talkative can drivers at 5am daily. Buy these. They're what you're looking for. Unless you like trash.

title: Great Earbuds for the price, starting on poor customer service
body: I do truely love the TOZO T10 TWS Bluetooth 5.0 Earbuds.  The description was spot on.  The only draw back I have found it that my set doesn't come with the different size earbuds, ie the 4 ear piece sizes.  This would make it easier to know which item to purchase for the future.  If you dont have the right fitting earbud YOU WILL LOOSE IT BY IT FALLING OUT.  They have contacted me about an update charging case and replacement earbuds, but seem to be just emailing back & forth Since April 28th.  Will change rating depending on Customer Follow through.

title: Lots of features for such a small item.  Really worth the money!
body: These things are awesome!  I didn't think I would enjoy them as much as I do.  I used them for working out but also started bringing them to work.  I can just use one at a time so it allows me to listen to my music but still hear and talk with people around me.  Kind of like the normal bluetooth you use with your cell phone but less obvious.  The sound quality is great!  Charges fast and I like the wireless charging.  So you just put the case with the buds on it and it just charges!  Not bad for something that is less than $50!

title: Nice for the money, but don't expect professional quality
body:
Was sort of disappointed by the sound quality, but they're nice for the money and it's not terrible. They came fully charged and were incredibly easy to set up and pair.

Also came with 4 different size silicone earbud attachments so you don't have to worry about them being too big or small for your ears. Haven't tested the waterproof functionality yet, but hopefully they won't suffer the same fate as my last pair of earbuds when I inevitably drop them into a bucket of mop water on accident.

title: Worth the purchase
body: Works good. Switched the rubber for smaller ones included in the packaging. Still have to adjust to keep in my ears when running.  Keeps charge for a long time. Haven't died on me yet.

title: A great value for money product with good quality sound output
body: I bought these for fun but the quality of sound was beyond my expectations. The bass is good, fits nicely in my ears, noise filtering is not so bad for this price, pairing is easy and fast. I haven't tested the battery life yet but overall, i am pleased with this purchase.

title: I'm really enjoying them so far
body: I've only had them for a day now, but I've tried the wireless charging, I wore them in the shower just for fun to check the waterproofing, and obviously I checked how well they stay in my ears. I was very happy with all of it. The noise cancellation is good, the sound quality is good, and it's a great price for the quality.

title: Truly Wireless.....Great Sound!
body: These are the third pair of wireless pods I've had over about ten years (batteries wore out) and I definitely like these the best. Truly wireless. They paired up easily and synced to my iPhone every time I've used them since original setup. The bass is awesome!  The controls for phone answering are much easier to use the the other pods I had.  The fact that they're waterproof is great as I like to listen to music while hot tubbing and the Bluetooth range is good.  Very pleased with my purchase.

title: Loving it!
body: Five stars all the way around! I am loving everything about these earbuds! One of the best features about these is NO CORDS!! I have really long, thick hair and my previous Anker Bluetooth earbuds were good but had the wire connecting them and it was constantly a nuisance getting in the way or tangled in my hair, so its SUPER nice to not have to fight my hair or shirt, etc... with these ear buds. They look nice, the case is great, they are very comfortable to wear and the sound quality is fantastic. I can really hear the bass! I like that I can use the ear buds separately as I wear them at work for background music and get a full day out of the batteries by swapping them. I have used them for a couple calls and the person on the other end had no issues hearing me or with background noise so that's a definite win! The noise cancellation is great, maybe too good, even if I pause my music when talking to someone I still sometimes have to take the bud out to be able to hear them properly but not a big deal, it's great to drown everyone else out at the gym. My boyfriend was super impressed with them as well when I let him listen, he guessed they were double the price. I am very happy with this purchase!

title: Better than Congress
body:
You'd think for 50 bucks, they would be as effective as Congress. NOPE, they work magnificent, if they worked any better they would have to change the name to the PERFECT $50 EARBUDS that is better than Congress.  I have paid off a small home loan in all of the ear buds I have purchased over the years, so far they are amazing, 3/4 volume on my phones, and I cannot hear anything but my playlist. I dont even hear the dentist drilling my teeth. (TRUE) After 3 needles full of Novocaine I didnt feel it either. I now have badass earbuds and fixed teeth.
PRO: affordable, easy connecting to blue tooth. they stay in my head whilst Im lifting weights, rowing, getting drilled
CON: would be cool for an APP/ equalizer sound control (bass-mids, trebel)

Now let me tell you why I picked them. I wanted to try RAYCON, but what I wanted was sold out. I checked on Amazon, and I only look at 4+ stars and this one came up, with 10 billion reviews, - Im like well SHIZFIRE. 10 trillion people either like them or its a conspiracy and the Russains hacked Amazon and it all a bunch of lies.
So I took a chance, (so you dont have to) and Im glad I did, whether or not it is a hack job, I got a darn good pair of working earbuds, I look hip, i feel hip.

title: Great set of earbuds
body: These earbuds are some of the most comfortable that I have ever tried.  They have excellent sound quality.  I wear these at work and am able to focus while listening to my music.  I love the case with the wireless charging.  Since most devices are wireless charged now, I take them home and charge them each night.  Even talking on the phone with them is great.  Everyone is able to hear me clearly and I can hear them without having to mess with another headset.

title: High quality at bargain prices
body:
I bought these under my wife's account, so I can't show up here as a verified purchaser, but rest assured, I bought these headphones here on Amazon last week, and have been using them for about 7 days now.

About a year ago, I bought a pair of Zolo Liberty wireless earbuds for over twice the price of these, and had nothing but problems. The earpieces would often fall out of sync, and would lose connection with the phone in my pocket. These are much better, plus waterproof, and I greatly enjoy the fact that I can drop them on my wireless charging pads and come back to full batteries. The sound still cuts out every once in a while, but it very quickly improves, and I am not bothered by it when I'm listening to music or podcasts walking around in crowded areas. The sound quality and comfort of these earbuds is at least as good as that more expensive pair, but I lost those for a direct comparison.

(I am writing this review because the company sent me a request to post a review with the promise of sending me a free wireless power bank, but the words are true, and I am glad to try to convince others to buy this pair of headphones instead of wasting their money on a more expensive brand name.)

title: These are excellent
body:
I’ve been looking for something with a good bass kick for a long time and finally here it is. These are really great for the cost. Small and not bulky like the rest of the stuff on the market. And seriously light.

Sound quality is really good.
Battery will last about 4-5 hours which is pretty good their size.

Very easy to pair.

title: Great noise cancelling and bass!
body: The design of the earbuds and case feel quite sturdy and thus far have worked flawlessly. The noise cancelling is quite good as well and I am fond of the bass levels too. All in all I'm pleased and based on what I've found so far I would definitely recommend to a friend!

title: Worth the purchase price.
body: I like these headphones, fit is crucial and these do fit good with the default rubber earpiece. This of course is subjective. I did see one other reviewer noted these didn't seem very loud. I agree with that as well. But again subjective. Overall pretty happy with them. I would recommend them.

title: They are junk!
body:
These had great reviews so I got two pair. Both are total junk. The battery life is a joke. With the case I have to recharge it weekly. My old treblab800 lasted this long on the internal battery with no charging case.
The leads that connect the the ear buds in the case that charge them are to short and allow the ear buds to turn on and connect to your phone at random. I had to sand the area on the ear bud where the leads connect to allow them to make solid contact. The plastic in this area is to thick. Another design flaw!
Connectivity is a joke. I can put my phone in my left pocket and loose reception and get it back by moving the phone to my right pocket. I can’t walk more than 10 feet from my device without loosing connection.
The left ear but on one set won’t stay in place and the right one with the other set won’t stay in place. No option to control volume or skip? Man $8 ear buds have this ability. Also the wireless charging does not work on one set and sometimes does not work on the other.

These are total junk and not worth the wasted money. Go with treblab for cheap sports ear buds and be very happy.

title: Solid buy. Get these.
body:
I'll admit that I initially didn't have very high expectations of these, I've been burned many times by earbuds that claimed to be great and even had decent reviews. Thankfully, these were NOTHING like any other earbuds that I have tried.
First, the fit. They are actually very comfortable. They come with 4 different size ear pieces. I personally have to use two different sizes because my ears are odd, but they stay in place perfectly. Most of the time, I forget that I have one in.
That leads me to the sound. The sound quality blows away literally every other set of earbuds that I have ever owned, hell, they blow away every set of headphones that I have ever owned without a doubt in my mind. These things are on par with the audio system in my car (4x Kicker 6x8s, old enough to not remember the model, 1x Rockford Fosgate 15" subwoofer, powered by a 1000w Kenwood amplifier, and driven by a 200w Kenwood head unit). I CANNOT recommend these enough
The call quality on these is awesome as well, most of the Bluetooth headsets that I have used over the years have had problems with either picking up too much ambient noise, or just generally being too quiet for the other party to hear, but these are loud and clear, and don't pick up much of the ambient noise at all.
Finally, for battery life. I haven't run them long enough for them to go dead yet, but I can definitely say that they will last you a few good hours of steady use.
The case is a little bulky, but not completely unmanageable for men's pockets. Women, you'll want to stash this thing in your purse
The wireless charging works pretty well with my cheap 3-year-old wireless charging pad, and the buds themselves charge up pretty quickly too.
Overall, a very solid buy, and very happy with my purchase.

title: Best earbuds for price/value
body:
I love wearing headphones when listening to music so I got a pair of these so I can go cordless when walking around and trying to be active.  These earbuds are perfect, they synced to my phone and gear S3 watch without any problems. I love the case they came in and how I can use it with a wireless charger if I want. Plus the case they came with has a built in battery to always top off the ear buds in case you need it.

It was everything I asked for and I'm very pleased with them. Didn't have to spend hundreds on them for a superior product.

Bass was powerful too!

title: Great for driving or traveling
body:
The fit and function of the earbuds are good.  With different size cushions you can custom fit to your specific needs.  Sound quality is good, but lacks a bit of bass punch in my opinion.  I travel a lot and use them for listening to audio books and music.
Touch controls are simple (pause/play, on/off and answer call), but effective.  I've tried earbuds with sensitive touch response, and was accidentally pausing, fast forwarding or some other function when I reached up to adjust the earbud in my ear.  Pairing with my phone was very simple.
The holder/charger protects well and is easy to carry in backpack or pocket.  Recharge of the earbuds and charger are quick.
I liked these so much that when I lost my original pair (left them in a airplane seat pocket) I ordered a replacement set right away.

title: Fantastic Earbuds
body: After trying many different brands, which were a disappointment  I purchased the TOZO T10 Wireless 5.0 Earbuds and am very happy with them. They are comfortable and the sound so clear, something that not all earbuds have. I would definitely recommend them to my family and friends. My search is over!

title: Thank you
body: It really deserve five stars eventhough for some reason it doesn't stay on my right side ear and also I wish it come with bluetooth connector b/c I am gonna buy connector for my laptop, It is very quality product and 100% waterproof.  Thank you so much

title: Average Quality, Below Average Comfort
body:
These earbuds were very uncomfortable to wear for an extended period of time (30+ mins). The sound was average quality at best, very treble-heavy. The instructions were broken English and sketchy.

Anyway. I was disappointed with the purchase and instead returned the item. I'll spend an extra $20 and get a brand name pair that I can rely on.

title: You can't get better for triple the price.
body:
Okay so I just got these in a few minutes ago... I charged them for a little bit and then took them out. They immediately paired with each other and said "pairing". I selected Tozo-T-10 on my phone. Again, they paired immediately. I put them in my ears. I put on the song "Vivir Mi Vida" by Marc Anthony. I then proceeded to pick my jaw up from the floor. I am blown away. The sound quality on these earbuds is beyond belief. For the price, you CANNOT GET BETTER. I am a musician and a DJ, and I know music. These are phenomenal. The bass is nothing short of intense. The mids are clear. The highs are crisp. Oh, and by the way, I'm writing this review in the shower. My Note 9 is waterproof too. Did I mention they're waterproof?

These are nothing short of perfection for every category under $200. Absolutely incredible. I'm quite impressed.

title: Worth the Money
body: I like the fit of each bud.  I was skeptical at 1st if they would stay put while working or playing.  They do. I didn't have to change out the rubber ear pieces .  The ones on the buds fit just right.  The bass is amazing but the treble is a little weak.  The battery life so far has been about 3 hrs between charges on the base unit.  That is less than my old wireless jlab set that would go 5+ hours.  Maybe these will get better.  Noise cancellation is extremely good.  I can't hear my work hand held radio and have actually missed calls addressed to me because of the cancellation.  I have to loosen them in my ears just so I won't miss any more radio calls.

title: Perfect in every way
body: My main concern when buying earbuds was the sound quality coming from my side during a call. With these earbuds, I have no issues whatsoever with sound quality both incoming and outgoing. When listening to music the experience is amazing, and the noise cancellation is flawless. Additionally, the ability to pair one earbud to one device while pairing the other to a separate device can be incredibly helpful.

title: Broken Out of the Box
body:
Thank goodness the warranty card is the first thing you see when opening the box, because you’re probably going to need it.

Like many others, the left earbud kept cutting in and out sporadically. Attempted hard resets and unsynching from my phone, but still the problem persisted. With the thousands of good reviews, I feel Tozo has to have poor quality control with this product. Will be returning for a refund.

title: WOW these are good!
body:
I bought a different set of wireless earbuds: the sound quality was pretty bad and after 5 weeks they stopped pairing together and became individual devices, so you couldn't listen to music. Successfully negotiated a return (THANKS AMAZON SUPPORT!), and decided to take another chance. BOY am I glad I did!

Sound. I wasn't expecting much, because wireless, but I was wrong. Great bass, good overall sound, and you can pause music with a touch.

Connection. They have a good manual which details exactly how to connect them, and what to look for both on the buds and in your Bluetooth list. Worked great every time.

Fit. The other ones I got had a weird protuberance and shape that made them fit weird, and they stuck way out. These are GREAT. Multiple ear canal adapters, so whatever size your ear, they'll fit snug. They also don't stick out too far, and are very comfortable.

The only minor issue is that having volume and skip controls on the buds would be cool. But otherwise these are excellent earbuds for a good price.

title: Overall good quality but will not stay put in my ears
body: These seem pretty high quality overall, and I really wish these worked for me, but they absolutely will not stay in place no matter which size tips I use which makes these utterly useless for me.

title: Fit like a glove!
body: The sound on these is super!  I love them.  And they are so easy to pair to my different devices.  I would recommend these highly.

title: Solid Bluetooth earbuds for the price (2nd pair I’ve owned)
body: This is the second pair of wireless earbuds I’ve owned. I’m not in any way an audiophile, but the sound quality on these definitely blows the Enacfire ones out of the water. Also, so far I haven’t experienced the same issue of my body interfering with the signal when my phone is in my pocket. The build also feels sturdy. I haven’t tested them out in the water but from close examination they seem pretty solidly sealed.

title: A great product
body: This product is absolutely amazing in terms of both sound quality and battery life.  On one charge of the case with the headphones inside my headphones will last me around two weeks with me using them at least an hour a day.  Not only that but the sound quality is great with deep bass and clear sound. I have yet to try them out in any wet conditions so I can't speak for that feature but I am impressed with the quality these offer.

title: Great buy! You won’t regret it!
body: Great product, I was skeptical and I am very picky when I choose headphones, but I thought why not and gave it a shot. I usually go with Sony but I gotta say these were worth every penny! I do not regret buying these at all! Great sound and awesome package deal. I will be buying two more pair. Blew my Sony’s out of the water! Go tozo and you won’t go wrong.

title: Never automatically connects to my phone
body:
These work fine overall, sound better than the TaoTronics equivalent and quickly connect with each other 3-4 times you take them out of the box. The 4th time you might have to put them back in and take them out once or twice, but then they usually connect to each other again. The primary challenge I'm experiencing is that even though they are paired with my phone, they cannot connect to it automatically when I take them out of the box. Each time I want to use them I have to go to the settings on my phone and select the TOZO option from my paired bluetooth list.
These are the only bluetooth device I've ever own that requires this extra step. Consequently, I can never just pop them into your ears and start listening. Every time I want to use them I have to take that extra step. Ultimately, I use the TaoTronics version more often because they don't have this issue, nor did any of the other 20+ bluetooth headphones I've owned over the years. Of coure the TaoTronics version has it's own severe problems because they often can't connect to each other, but that's for another review.

title: Awesome earbuds!!!
body: I was looking to get a pair of truly wireless earbuds for a while and these caught my eye. The earbuds are really good for the price. You cant really go wrong with them. To be honest I was not expecting the sound quality to be this good. The bass is deep and the high and mids are super clear. They are super easy to use and the ability to just use one ear piece for calls is awesome. I have not faced any connection issues so far. After paring them with my phone they automatically connect to my phone as I pick them up from the case.

title: Choppy connectivity in both ears
body: The headphones feel great and have great noise cancellation however the connectivity drops constantly when you are in motion. The choppy sounds make these headphones unbearable as your music/podcasts keep dropping every second. Sometimes it is just on the left earbud but many times it affects both of these.  This issue seems to be happening to a lot of users. When sitting or laying these headphones are great however what's the point of them if you can't walk, can't imagine how running would be.

title: Buds cut out and loose connection when using during active sports
body:
Upd.: After few weeks of usage I have some updates. First of all, whatever is said in the original review is still true provided you're sitting behind your desk and do not move around. But after I wrote the original review I took it our for a run. Surprisingly, as soon as I started actively moving, it started cutting out on me every 30-40 seconds. Of course, it is impossible to use them like that. I took them off and finished my run without them. Then I did initial round of troubleshooting, resetting, reconnecting etc. and the second day I took it out but had another buds with me (the kind where two buds are connected with a wire). 15 minutes into my run I stopped and switched to those back ups.
Then I returned these buds and god replacement sent out. Tech support said that it was because "interference with other electronic devices". Yeah, right. I'm sitting in the office with tens of electronic devices around me, and they work just fine, but as soon as I get out onto a forest trail, it suddenly sees "electronic interference"?
So, I was told it might have been a bad device and I agreed to get a replacement.
Got it 5 days ago and was taking out those buds almost every day. Everything was more or less OK (3-5 cut outs in 30min run) but today it started cutting out every 30-40 seconds again. I did some more experimenting and realized the following: Your own body shields these buds from connected device. If you put your connected device somewhere on your lower back on the left side - it completely blocks the signal, as there is lot of flesh and bones between the right bud and your connected device.
If you connect your buds to your smartwatch, as I do, and wear it on your left wrist, then as you run or walk, you'll be moving your arm in and out of area of good connection, causing cut outs. Even if you have some long sleeve closing - it will reduce signal a lot and your buds will start cutting out. And don't blame the connected devices - I tested that with another set of buds, it is the intrinsic problem with this specific model of buds.

As such, these buds are only good in office, where you keep your connected device close to your right bud and do not actively move around. But in the office you can use something more comfortable and with higher sound quality. The whole point of these buds is active sports, they are waterproof and light, so you can take them out for runs, hikes, etc. Unfortunately, they fail miserably in their intended use.

Original review:
I was surprised how comfortable these are and how good the sounds quality is.
I have more expensive (around $180) buds from a well known brand name, and I was quite disappointed with them. The problems were: impossible to get a good fit, buds were falling out all the time, material was causing my ears to itch like crazy, very poor sound quality which depended on how they fit, absent bass and noticable lag.

These buds that are almost three times cheaper, have none of those problems:
Great fit, stay in the ears
Solid bass, no squeaking trebles
Almost undetectable lag, less than 100ms.

Great passive noise cancelling, based on the tiny holes on the buds I suspect that this thing might have some kind of active noise cancelling, but haven't read anything about it and haven't tested it yet.

Another nice touch: wireless charger. I just need to put it on my charging plate, no plug/unplug hassle.

Have yet to see what the battery life is and if it makes my ears itch after long time use.

title: Cannot use just one; charging case does not hold a charge
body:
Pros:
Light weight, great for runs and work outs.
Seem to be sweat resistant.
Extremely quick charging.
Cons:
Don't come with deep fitting rubber ends, and if you have your own they have to be removed every time you charge.
Cannot use just one at a time, they constantly look for each other.
The charging case can't seem to hold a charge for more than a day.

title: Excellent Earbuds with a Pumping Bass
body: I purchased these earbuds with careful evaluation on the sound quality and bass coverage. And boy I was glad I got these. The sound quality at this price point in my opinion puts the other premium companies/headphones to shame. The bass is really kicking and the design helps eliminate a lot of the ouside noise. When I reported a wierd problem happening with my earphones (sound from the right side earphone got very diminished) to the company's customer service, they immediately got back offering to send a new pair as a replacement. Kudos to a very positive experience overall as I await the replacement.

title: TOZO strikes again!
body: Another winning product from TOZO. I had the T8 earbuds and used them every day. Every possible activity you can think of, I did wearing them and they always fit snug. Now the T10 earbuds are so much better price. They fit, feel and sound better with higher quality at an amazingly affordable price. I highly recommend these earbuds!! I got the grey ones.

title: Awesome Sound and Portable
body:
i bought them as a gift for my husband Bday , for him to use at office.

He loved the size and quality of the headphones . the bass from the little ear buds is great .

title: Nice buds!
body: These are nice! Sound quality is good could be better but for the price you wont find better. I bought a generic pair before these and the sound was terrible. Tozo actually has a website and customer service which is great in case anything goes wrong. Overall very happy with my purchase.

title: Surpasses comfort and quality
body: TOZO earbuds far surpass any others that I have had confort, ease-of-use, and sound quality.  These are beautifully designed earbuds  that's stay in that's stay put.  They're easy to charge on a Yootech wireless charger or youcan use the direct connect use cord.  I have small ears and many ear buds just are not comfortable to wear for long periods of time.  Not so with the TOZO earbuds.  They are small, light weight, and very comfortable to wear all day long.

title: Great Earbuds!
body: These are great earbuds.  They fit comfortably and secure in the ear (which was one of my main concerns) and come with 4 different size buds.  Most importantly the sound quality is very good.  They have great bass response without distorting the mids and highs.  The case is nice with a translucent lid that allows you to see the changing lights.  Overall a great product at a reasonable price.

title: "Lightning Deal" for LIGHTNING GARBAGE PLEASE DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY
body: Worst Buds I have ever used right bud clicks constantly makes it feel like there is water in your ear tried all the different size cups and still no change then switched ears to see if maybe I was crazy but still clicks and constantly cutting out. "DO NOT WASTE TIME OR MONEY" There are many other buds for the same price that are way better TRUST ME. Also tried to contact the manufacturer about the issue and no response so they obviously must know they are selling a defective product and don't give a crap.

title: Great fit, quality and price.
body: I am active duty Military so I go to the gym 5 days a week at least if I’m not training or other requirements.  The gym I frequent is hot no A/C but some fans blowing stink around.  These don’t  let sweat inside the ear.  Sound is great and the fit is great (read the instructions or watch a you tube video) the biggest seller for me is that their isn’t a wire.  The last 43 years EVERY pair of headphones no matter how long they lasted started shorting out at the wire, problem eliminated.  I am happy thus far, will update if needed

title: Great budget buy earphones
body: Love the design of it. Fits really well and very much like that it's waterproof. I can go to the gym and use them confidently knowing they'll be okay by the end of a very sweaty workout. Love the ease of use and how fast they connect to my iPhone when I take them out of the charging case. All in all they're a smart and reliable purchase and plus they're very stylish. Great features and very budget-friendly. Buy them, you won't regret it.

title: Almost perfect headphones
body:
If your looking for a good wireless headset. I'll recommend this item for you.  If your a gamer, movie/TV, and editing wizard ToZo is your best bet.

The only one issue I have with it. These headphones don't have the options to control the volume on the device you sync with.

title: Look no further!
body: These earbuds are a game changer! Having no wires attached is what earbuds were meant to be all along and they are better than I expected. They fit well and don’t fall out, block out most other noises, and are not bulky like some of the other kinds! You won’t be let down!

title: Great value
body: These are solid devices. Pairing is super easy and the sound is actually great for the price. I had to replace my beatsx and the seem to be up to the challenge. I was not sure about the fit but the small ear cushions are perfect. I wish they had skip control but I can deal.

title: Great headset but after
body: Great ....update after a few months they are great today aug 13th the only time that i actually drop the case the spring loaded charging pins for the head phone broke off never dropped the case ever since i bought them in April until today my headphones werent even in the case at the time little upset about it also now and then i would have to reconnect them but just turning then off now and then isnt a big problem just care full with the case

title: Superb quality sound.
body:
Amazing earbuds, I tried the power beats 3, also the jaybird thara pro and the Sennheiser IE60 headphones, all of them close or even over $100.00
and all of them lacking the quality sound that the Tozo T10 have, Im very impressed and highly recommend this amazing sounding earbuds.
UPDATE:
Connectivity issue, for some reason, I'm having the left side disconnected every time I'm outside, not a problem when I'm indoors but as soon I get out of the house the earbuds start losing connection especially on the left side,  is very annoying,  Im gonna keep trying them a little more.

title: Great option for complete wireless headphones
body: The bluetooth connectivity connects easily with my device, almost too good at cancelling out noise, recharge quickly and I love that the case holds the headphones as well as the magnetic feature to hold them to charge. I only wish that the charge lasted longer than a few hours, I don't get a full 8 hours work day of using them without charging, but what more can you ask for when it comes to a low-profile earbud.

title: Good but may have issues
body:
So let me start by saying that the earphones are good, when they aren't failing you. The issue these earphones have is the sound. The sound continuously cuts off. It goes a little something like this, the sound is playing and when I apply pressure on a certain part of my phone the audio starts cutting off and when it comes back it comes back in a faded manner. I've had a similar kind of issue with other bluetooth earphones. My second problem is when I was using both earphones, it decided to pause therefore, I set one down in the charging slot, then when I tried using it again I had issues trying to get sound on the earphone that I put away. I imagine what solved it was leaving both in the charging box for a length of time.
Besides all this the sound is good and does a good job of blocking sound from outside sources. I'm thinking of returning though I wouldn't like to deal with the annoying issues any further.

title: Left earbud drops out.
body:
Everything about these is great except for on major issue. The left earbud (slave) keeps losing signal with the right (master). Kills the listening experience. Tried a factory reset no luck. A shame I have to send them back.

Also, the terms slave and master are not racist as another review implied. They’re audio terms. When one speaker gets a signal from another speaker instead of from the source, it’s consider the slave. The speaker getting source signals is the master.

title: Great Bang for the Buck quality
body: I just unboxed these about a half hour ago. I ordered based on a lot of bang for the buck reviews. So far, I'm very happy with them. The case had a charge in the box, but I charged it up to be sure it was a good charge. The buds charged up in about 20 minutes. Pairing was a cinch, just have your device set for Bluetooth and scan for new items and remove them from the case simultaneously.  They paired up in a snap. Sound quality is even better than I expected for the price I paid. I've gone through several wired bluetooth earbuds,  mainly Skullcandy and Beats. The bass in these Tozos is clear and full. I highly recommend fitting them with the different cups or caps to find the right seal for your ears. It will make a huge difference in sound quality and comfort. I can't give a true rating on battery life yet, but ao far so good. I will be gifting a set to my kids in the future. I'm very happy the overall product.

title: Great quality for such a low price...
body: These ear buds met expectations as described by other reviewers. The charging case is an added bonus being able to be recharged wirelessly. But ear buds themselves are great. The sound quality is excellent especially with the add low range. The only issue I had was with the selection of ear tips.  I have tiny ear canals so had to purchase smaller tips, but they were inexpensive and allowed a perfect fit. I can move around without the coming loose. I will say that in my case, eating while wearing the buds does cause then to dislodge a bit but they do not fall out. I can highly recommend these buds.

title: Excellent product and great price
body: Excellent product, used them at work and the gym. Didn’t fall out at all and drowned out any outside noise. Great purchase and I can charge the case with the same cordless  charger I charge my iPhone with.

title: Mostly Satisfied--Generally speaking
body: The sound quality, especially for under $50, is great! The different sized earbuds help keep earbuds in ear. The charge lasts 3 to 4 hours; however, I never timed it. My ear canals are large (I guess?). So, I do have some difficulty keeping the earbuds in place, especially when running or doing "jumpy" exercises. For me on exercising with buds, this product is better suited for weightlifting than jumping around a lot.  I also recently cleaned some corrosion (green stuff) that had formed on a connector in the unit's charging box (Q-tip & rubbing alcohol--a 2-minute job). Other than that, I am mostly satisfied with the purchase.

title: Great set of earbuds for a great price!
body:
I have tried several truly wireless earbuds and these provide the best combination of features.  While i think I could use an in between tip size, they are pretty comfortable and never fall out.  The fact that the case can charge them in my pocket and I can also use just one at a time makes for hours and hours of uninterrupted listening.  I prefer to listen to podcasts or audio books while doing various chores like mowing the grass or cleaning the house or even just taking a trip to the store.  Would definitely recommend.

When using just one earbud, take both out of the case and let them pair, then put one back.  The one you are still listening to will beep that is has lost connection a few times.  I don't honestly know how many times because I decided I was just going to try to deal with it and hours later i realized i wasn't hearing the beeping.

title: Better than others
body: Really like these. I had problems with other similar products where the left channel would constantly drop out. Not these. Great sound quality too.

title: Very good quality for the price
body: I wanted, since I own AirPods, to get Beats Pro for better noise isolation when needed but cost and bad reviews on quality prevented that purchase.  I've used these for several weeks now on my morning walk and on balance am very satisfied with my purchase.  Yes, they do sometimes get out of sync with each other but then so do my AirPods, though not as much.  I keep my phone in my right back pocket and if I move my right arm up or down sometimes that will cause the issue and sometimes nothing I do causes any problem.  (Bluetooth is just weird.)  I listen mostly to podcasts and audio books but they are acceptable for music with decent bass with the proper seal.  On that issue, I could not get a proper seal with the included ear tips.  Or if I did they fell out easily.  No problem, I have lots of tips from over the years and found a set that works.  As far as the charge goes, they last through my walk which can be up to 90 minutes.  After two recharges in the case I have to charge the case itself but for my purposes that's not a problem.  I can't speak to how long they'll play without being put back in the case beyond the 90 minutes.

title: A Very Pleasant Surprise...UPDATE - Maybe Not So Pleasant
body:
I was somewhat despondent after our puppy chewed my Bose ear buds into a very mangled and unusable versions of their former selves. Since purchasing another pair would be fiscally irresponsible at this stage, I decided to give the TOZO T10s a shot. Figured there was not much to lose at the price.

I will admit to initially being quite impressed with the overall presentation and packaging upon receipt; however, packaging doesn't mean much if the product doesn't deliver. Well, it delivered for me. The one step setup and pairing could not have been easier. Both wired and wireless charging is quick and works well. Battery life is consistently right at 4 hours with my usage. As for the fit, I feel extremely lucky that the T10s fit perfectly for me right out of the box, but it is good to have three other tip options just in case. In fact, I have been in the gym with them and have not felt the need to stop and adjust them as I move around. For my amateur, untrained ear, the sound quality and call quality are well beyond my expectations with noise cancelling and waterproof being nice bonuses.

At this point, I couldn't be happier with the T10s after my first week with them. They definitely give considerable bang for the buck and have me rethinking my views on wireless earbuds in general.

Update - Actually, I find myself very disappointed because in many ways I still feel the same about my previous observations; however, I guess it was too good to last or be true. Connectivity - Over the last couple of days, the left earbud began losing connection once in a while but ultimately it began happening regularly. The right earbud maintains slightly better connection unless it is too far from my Samsung S9, which is apparently the distance from my pocket to my ear...especially if I turn my head away from my phone. I have reset the Bluetooth connection and the connection between the earbuds without success. Rating reduced to 1 star because lack of connectivity in wireless earbuds is kind of a big thing and back to Amazon they will go.

title: Solid product with good quality
body: I really like this product. It is easy to use and has very good sound quality. Although the IPX8 is kind of a overkill, I wear it all the time during workout and commute. The noise canceling is very good. One thing to point out is since it is inserted to the ear channel and it has very good sealing. There is a “unbreathable” feeling after long hours of usage. Overall, I will give it a solid 5 stars.

title: Great Customer Service
body:
These are my first pair of bluetooth headphones. I mostly got them for going to the gym. They are a lot easier to deal with then regular headphones with cords.  They work really well in the gym setting, didn't have any real problems getting the right fit and them staying in.  I pretty much use them all the time now, not just in the gym setting.

The only gripe was that it only lasted about 4 months before the charge base wouldn't hold a charge, unless I kept it plugged in. (which is why it's 4 stars instead of 5)  I'm not sure if I just got a bad one or not.  I ended up emailing TOZO to see about a replacement.  They sent me a new full set (Headphones and Charge base). Couldn't have been more happier with their customer service and fast shipping to get the new ones out to me.

title: Best headphones so far.
body: I’m glad I took a chance and ordered these headphones. They fit great and the sound quality is amazing. These are the best headphones I’ve tried by far!

title: Good sound/ok staying in
body: The earphones sound real well and do block out noise well. This is good for if you’re listening indoors. I wouldn’t recommend for riding your bike or running outside, you won’t hear much outside traffic. However, unfortunately I had issues keeping them inside my ear while working out, I did switched the ear pad to a smaller one and that did help some, but it would loosen up, which prompted me to reinsert. Overall, they do sound very good, equal to my $100 earpbuds. But I struggle a bit keeping them in.

title: Decent headphones for a great price. Customer service was superb.
body: Excellent product, not the greatest sound quality but it is definitely not a cheap dollar store knock off, connection is splendid. I did have one ear piece completely stop working after a few months but the costumer service was terrific and immediately sent out a replacement.

title: it links up real easy
body: I really like these headphones but they don't stay in your ear . Plus the battery only last three hours. Otherwise I like these headphones for the sound quality. They are very comfortable.They sync with my iphone real easy.

title: Disappointed
body: Sound was great but connection was inconsistent. Bought on recommendation from a friend, but returned because of frequent drop out of left and/or both buds. Sound was good when connected but at times it seemed like simple movement would cause a signal drop. Walking the streets of Manhattan with these became increasingly annoying as time passed. Signal would drop and reconnect constantly. Purchased a different set (not Apple) and am totally satisfied. Had to spend a little more($100) but got the quality I wanted.

title: SPECTACULAR EARBUDS!!!!!!!
body: I've been living in these, they block all noise and are pretty darn discreet. I love how easily they connect to my phone just pop em out of the handy dandy charging/charging case. They have a pretty long battery life it would be nice if they would add a carabineer to the case instead of the black string. I really appreciate the multi sizes of ear cushions. I strongly recommend this and honestly I'll be getting my husband done in the near future.

title: 10/10 would recommend
body: Over all this is a great product I purchased these last February, they just now started to get static and not working in the right ear bud, but alas they come with a one year warranty so I emailed the company and they responded within 2 days stating how they were sorry for the inconvenience and would send me a brand new set of ear buds free and I could keep the kids ones as to save time. They were very professional and virtuous and have amazing customer service I would recommend this product and company 10/10.

title: First time fully dying and it is dead DEAD!
body: Originally I wrote a positive review. The product worked fine. Sound was decent although i did have the issue of who i was talking to not hearing me because the mic picks up everything single noise around me. I have to switch off the headphones when im in any area with noise other wise the other person on the call cant hear me. Not such a big deal for me since I got these to listen to music when i work. For the first time since I bought these, the pack that the headsets actually charge in died completely. No big deal, right? Nope... wont hold a charge anymore... this is the first time it completely died... and they arent' even that old.

title: Elegant design and solid sound
body: Great fit (four sizes from which to choose)!  The base is fabulous. Nice, streamlined case design. Simple, straightforward ways to operate the device. Haven’t tested the outer limits of its charge yet, so time will tell. But at a minimum, it easily goes more than an hour of uninterrupted use. The one flaw is when doing phone calls, it’s not as loud as when playing music, but calls come through on both earpieces, not just one, and the mic is decent.

title: After issues all’s fine now.
body:
Battery life isn’t great. Sound quality seems quite good.
Had issues with first set. Left channel dropped constantly. I Sent them back and had replacements delivered. The new ones worked well.

title: Not good with the outdoors
body: I've had this earbuds for over two weeks now and they are the first bluetooth earbuds that I've bought that synchronize with my video, but the biggest problem is that they cut off when I'm walking outside and have them in my pocket. I wanted the earbuds to listen to music while I'm working but it was a jarring experience. They would cut off if I moved a certain direction. The purpose that I bought them for doesn't work. I like them so I'm going to trade them in for another pair and see if it's faulty system.

title: Easy to pair and use. Sound is great. Lots of thought put into charging.
body: I doubt you will find a better value. These sound great and fit well. The design is sturdy and I love the combined charger/carrying case which means my earbuds are always charged and ready for use. The case recharges wirelessly if you have a wireless charging pad. I am very pleased with my purchase.

title: Great sound, no dice for sound and microphone simultaneous use
body: The headphones work great with music, but they have microphones as well. I bought these to use as gaming headphones. Problem is that they cannot seem to connect with a computer and transmit on sound and microphone. Even when they say sound and microphone, only the microphone is working. I have to set the sound through the computer speakers.

title: Great 1 Month In
body: I’ve been using these for a month and I’m really happy. The sound quality is about 90% as good as my Bose headphones. I wouldn’t call it “noise canceling” so much as “snug fit,” but it does an amazing job isolating outside sounds. Battery life is good - I haven’t hit the wall yet on any of my 5k runs or workouts. Will update if anything goes south in the next few months.

title: Great ear buds with excellent audio and battery life!
body: I bought these TOZO  T10 ear buds to replace wireless earphones that kept powering off.  After going through two pair of the wireless earphones, I decided I wanted a pair of wireless ear buds for working out on my elliptical a machine.  I sweat a lot so I wanted a set that was sweat proof but I wanted a pair that had very good audio quality and long battery life.  These TOZO T10 wireless ear buds were the perfect replacement.  They have fantastic audio (excellent sound across the entire range), they are sweat proof, and have excellent battery life.  They were easy to pair to my phone.  A bonus for me was that the case also can be charged wirelessly. Couldn’t have found a better pair of wireless ear buds.

title: Great customer service.
body: They worked great. I had them for almost a year.  They sounded great and were actually waterproof. But one day the right earbud stopped working. So I emailed the tozo service and they are sending me a new pair. I dont even have to send my old ones back. Great customer service.

title: BEST EARBUDS!!! Exactly as advertised
body: So much earbuds on the market you don’t know what to choose but I’m glad I choose this one.  I’m very satisfied with the quality of sound and noise cancellation and the battery doesn’t die easily. Would definitely buy again and recommend to others.

title: Sound constantly cuts off in left ear piece.
body: While the right ear piece seems to stay sync'd with my phone, the left one constantly goes in and out with sound.  I cannot listen to music with these earbuds as the switching from stereo to mono (right ear only playing) to stereo back to mono (right ear only playing)...would ruin any enjoyment of a song.  I can only listen to audio books and podcasts with these earbuds as the poor sound quality is less disturbing if only playing spoken voice.

title: Surprised with the quality and happy with my purchase.
body: My first pair of wireless earbuds, and I’m very satisfied with the product so far. I went on a 5 mile run with these on, and they stayed in my ears the entire time to the point where I even forgot I had them on. The noise cancellation is great compared to other “noise cancelling” products I’ve owned. I wore them while vacuuming and couldn’t hear the loud, annoying buzz, and the audio was crystal clear.

title: Great Little Earbuds that are what I wanted.
body:
Did not know what to expect with these.  So far they have been great.  Paired with phone and Desktop very easily.  This was my first BlueTooth earbud purchase.  Did not want a full headset.  Use only one earbud, I need to have one ear uncovered.

Overall, a great purchase.  The quality is outstanding and they should hold up well to any abuse.  The order was received promptly and in perfect condition.

title: Good Overall Buy, Connecting is a bit of a Pain
body:
I primarily listen to Electronic and Alternative music.

Sound: Overall good quality compared to earbuds in this price range. Treble is a bit lacking and bass is thumpy, though a little more boosted than I like.

Fit: Once you get the proper ear pieces equipped the fit it good and tight. Noise isolation is better than I expected.

Battery life: The earbuds themselves last pretty long, but the case tends to go dry after 3-4 days of moderate use

Overall: A good buy for the price. Would buy again.

title: Awesome Quality at Great Price
body:
I was thoroughly impressed with the Tozo T10. The packaging was incredible, the build quality is top notch, and an amazing set of features for the price even if the price was twice as high. Wireless charging, IPX8 waterproofing, high quality 8mm sound driver, and bluetooth v5.0 are just a few of the high end features the T10's have to offer.

Pairing them with my phone was too easy. All you have to do is take them out of the charging case and they are ready for pairing( just a quick note make sure you choose TOZO-T10-R, the right earbud is the primary). The bluetooth v5.0 mean they have a stronger connection and longer distance. I can leave them in my backpack and I am still connected up to 30 feet away. The clarity of the highs and the richness of the bass are of the quality level of the highest end earbuds. I have personally taken these into the shower, I wasn't actually showering at the time, both of the earbuds and the case itself are extremely water resistance. I was pleasantly surprised to find that I could use my T10s for a little over four hours and the charging case is good for four full recharges of the earbuds. Finally, I have to say the Qi wireless chargeable case is very handy. I can set my phone and earbud case on my Qi charging pad and I'm good to go. If you have never used wireless charging, you need to. All in all for the price I could not find a better earbud on the market.

title: Great value and quality!
body: Wow these are a great value! Ordered the AirPods for almost 3x the price and they were nowhere worth the money. Then found these and decided to give them a shot. So far they are fantastic!

title: Don't look no more!!! This are it!!
body: I usually don't write reviews,but I had to with this headsets! They're great , Small,good on the sound, battery life is awesome!! Some time I forget I even have them on.lol. I didn't want to spend a lot of money on earpods found this. The review were saying all good stuff about it so honesty I agree with them!!

title: Best earbuds I've ever owned
body: I've tried out several Bluetooth earbuds and none of them even compare. I would say this product surpasses the Apple AirPods in every category. I would expect a pair like these to cost easily over $100 yet I got them for a quarter of that. I have let my friends try them out and got 3 of them to order a pair without hesitating. Do yourself a favor and just buy them. You won't be disappointed. If for some reason you don't like them, Tozo has incredible customer service and will gladly reimburse you. Overall 10/10!

title: Super value
body: Really excellent quality for the money. The drivers are top notch and the fit (for me) is great. Definitely a great value.

title: solid
body: I only use this to listen to music and podcasts while I'm working or exercising, and have only used it once for making a call. Sound quality is pretty good, and the battery life is fine for what it is. It seems to charge quickly enough from the included charger so I don't wait too long between listening sessions. The only issue I have is that sound will drop off from one of the buds when they are a few feet from each other. Other than that, no complaints. Solid for the price.

title: Great Sound, Easy Pairing
body:
The T10 earbuds produce fantastic sound even at low volume.  They fit comfortably right out of the box.  The carrying case acts as a recharger battery when not connected to a power source.
Overall very satisfied with the earbuds.  Good product.

title: Best fit ever!!!
body: I love that they cover all noise around you. Excellent for workouts. I use it to listen to my music while cleaning around the house. Also to listen to my books. Best gift ever from my husband. They snuggle right into your ear.

title: AWESOME BUDS!
body: I've used these about 4 times now and nothing has disappointed me.  I plan on seeing how well they do with a little sweat from a long bike ride.  If I have any issues, I will add on to this comment later

title: Im impressed!
body: I was kinda skeptical about ordering these at first but i must say these are impressive for the price very solid and premium feel too them these headphones almost feel like they’re worth $200 excellent sound quality and they provide you with extra ear tips for different ear sizes. They’re magnetic so you don’t have to worry about them falling out of the charging case not to mention it’s pretty convenient that you can charge the case wirelessly too. I must say well worth spending $50 on these. I’ll provide picture updates later on but they even provide you with a one year extended warranty in your package as well free of charge!

title: Better than iKanzi IPX7
body: These wireless buds have great bass and mids. They fit well in my ear and, of course, come with multiple size ear inserts to get the perfect fit. Most imporantly, they aren't overly sensitive to touching. My previous earbuds, the iKanzi IPX7 wireless waterproof earbuds, would stop playing at the slightest touch (a problem when you are just trying to wipe sweat off your head). And they didn't fit nearly as well. These are excellent.

title: Problems with the mic
body: The mic doesn’t work very good people have a hard time hearing me.

title: Great customer service!
body:
Update:
Company sent me another set free to test. They ended up functioning as expected and sound great. I just think there may be some products defected but I am glad the company was willing to make sure they resolved the issue as best they could.

Like other bad reviews, when I walked around at all the LEFT earbud would cut out for a split second then come back on. It was more annoying than not having any music!

title: So far so good
body: I was a bit doubtful that they would work well on a run.  I am a noob when it comes to using wireless earbuds when working out.  That said, I started off using these on an 8 mile treadmill run and no problem.  Mind you, I was only running 10 min miles but they did not move nor was there movement that caused sound degradation or the like.  I hope they keep up.  I will update if there is any change when I do faster interval training, outside run, gym workouts and the like.

title: Great for the price.  Battery life is meh : 3-3.5 hours.
body:
I had to read the tiny instructions before I realized that the typical “pair” trigger isn’t initiated with a button press, but rather by sliding the buds into the case for two seconds, and then quickly taking them out - simultaneously.  LOLZ.

Very respectable buds for the price.  Would recommend to family and friends.

title: Music to my ears
body:
Needed a pair of earphones to use running as my regular ones constantly came out of my ears. I was wary about these at first. They arrived quickly and in the box are the head phones, charging case, ear pieces to adjust size as needed, USB cord to charge, instructions, 1 yr warranty, and a cord to attach to case for carrying.
Very easy to use. As soon as you take them out of the charging case they pair to each other. If your Bluetooth is on - they will then pair to your phone. Good fit - no issues with falling out at all. Sound quality is great - could even make out bass on songs which sometimes isn't as clear on cheaper headphones. I was able to go a good distance from my phone before they disconnect. If you need to hear something or speaking to someone you will need to take one out even on low volume or off. Charging is easy - stick them back in the case. They will charge up to 4hrs if case is not plugged so great for work. I am very impressed.

title: Great sound and fir!!
body: I am always nervous about Bluetooth headphones. I have had some that had a horrible sound- almost tinny. I have had some that wouldn’t hold a charge. I have had some that couldn’t pair with the 2nd earbud. I am glad to report that these earbuds have great sound! They fit great in my ears which was another concern. So far I love these earbuds.

title: Nice earbud for the price
body: Just receive the product. Really nice Bluetooth earbud for the price point.  It has good sound quality and nice design. Haven't test the water proof yet but I trust it would work. The battery is what I love the most. I used it for 2 hours straight with one charge and it still has juice left after that. ( Also you can just put it back in the box if it run out.) Overall, a really cost effective one and fit my daily use.

title: Good quality, but may have Bluetooth signal conflict.
body:
Very good performance. Sound quality and noise cancellation is as good as expected. Mic sensitivity is a bit weak.
However, it has a bit conflict with my laptop. Whenever it is connected with my laptop, there is always a high-pitch white noise in left earbud. When connected with other devices, e.g. my iphone, no high-pitch white noise. I suspect it is due to signal frequency conflict with my laptop Bluetooth signal.

title: Quality
body:
Theses are nothing short of AMAZING! Great deep rich bass, crystal clear TWS synchronization. So easy to pair, just pull them out of the case and they will link right up to the last device used (if in range with bluetooth on).
