I have tried many sets of headphones like these, but they always fell out of my ears. The Tozo earbuds on the other hand (once the right "buds" were put on) are a very snug fit. I can walk, jump, or even run, and they stay in place.

Not only do the earbuds get 4 wireless charges out of the sturdy travel case, but the case itself charges wirelessly. Simply set it on your wireless charging pad and walk away.

You simply won't find a better pair of wireless earbuds in this price point (double it for that matter).

title: Great Budget Friendly Wireless Earbud
body: The big selling point on these for me was the volume. Other earbuds in a similar price range just simply weren't loud enough on the volume unless you were using the right bud. With these, I can use either bud independently of the other. Also, the volume on either bud is plenty loud enough even when I'm brushing my teeth with an electric toothbrush. Overall great quality for the price and seems sweat/water resistant and drop resistant. Get a pair of these if you want a good quality bud without paying 2-5 times the price.

title: Best wireless earbuds you could ask for.
body: This product is amazing! I have bought many earbuds over the years but they dont come close to the TOZO T10. Bass, nice volume, and great quality. Highly reccomend this pruduct to everyone.

title: Cuts in and out to much
body:
Item seem to loose connectivity while walking very often, it constantly cuts in out likee every 10sec. Which is very annoying. I had for 3 day days now, 1st day i figure item much be charged up a little more. Day 2 i put phone in my fannie pack, it still cut in and out, just not as offten. . But overall they sound pretty good and fits snug in the ear.

Im planning on returning: for a refund

title: A Company that truly cares about their products.
body: A few months ago, I purchased a TOZO T 10 and in my review mentioned I was less than satisfied with the quality.  Shortly after the posting, I received a package with a new T 10. Since I had not expected anything including a response, I thought it might have been a mistake. Turns out, it was not, when I received an e-mail from TOZO inquiring about the delivery. As promised, I opened the replacement immediately and I was delighted with the outcome.  The “replacement “ TOZO worked better than expected and I am delighted to rescind my original review with one more in line with the product offering. I especially want to thank them for their outreach and efforts in caring about my original disappointment. I highly recommend looking at the T 10 for future purchases.

title: Very good ear buds for the price
body: I was truly impressed with the sound quality when I played music through them. Very good fit, they don't fall out even when i run and I'm the type of guy where AirPods will never stay in my ear. Although it did start giving me trouble a week later when i would take them out of the charging case and it wouldn't connect properly, and restarting the earbuds fixes the issue for a little bit.

title: Left ear keeps disconnecting
body: Just got these today and I'm overall impressed. The sound quality is much better than I was expecting. It took a bit of getting used to when it came to wearing them as I'm used to headphones but these are amazing. They stay put in my ear and had no trouble connecting and pairing.... at first. But then the left ear started to disconnect constantly disrupting the listening experience which is why I put one star. It sucks. These would have been amazing. Gonna be returning them.

title: Wonderful Product First Impression
body: recently purchased this item after purchasing another which was very much inferior to this item. unlike the other brand the TOZO T10 is comfortable to wear, the sound quality is great and the battery life is also amazing played music for over 3hrs and it is still going. the build is very premium it feels very expensive in the hand... amazing product

title: Perfect for the Office!
body: I’m a Facility Manager who works by herself usually, and I needed some new wireless headphones while I patrol my 500+ units. And I have to say theses are wonderful. Customers don’t notice them but I can definitely attest to their noise cancelling ability. And the battery life is amazing. They’re also super convenient to charge and pair. I love these.

title: Constantly disconnecting and people can't hear me
body: I am quite dissapointed as I was looking for something comparable to airpods but not $250. I initially liked these I use them as a headset for work a lot and also to listen to music at the gym. When I have them in for extended periods of time they will just do this wacky beeping and disconnect and reconnect. No clue why. I often talk to people who say they can't hear me so I have to switch to another headset which is a huge pain and when I leave voicemails people call me back and say they couldn't hear a thing I said. I am going to reach out to support and see what they say because they are really not working for me.

title: Don’t waste your money
body:
I bought this product do to the raving reviews. Unfortunately, I was not that lucky.

The product looked good but the Right earbud would not work. Then I noticed that there was not rerun address in the box, nor a phone number to reach the  company.

I had to contact Amazon for return information and in the process of returning it today.

Don’t waste your money

title: Excellent price. Excellent product.
body:
I've had these for about a week now, and really like them. I previously had wireless, but wired earbuds, and it's amazing how much more comfortable running is without having a wire on your neck. The build and feel of the headphones are great. Sounds is perfectly fine for podcasts/audiobooks. Battery life is a bit of the shorter side ~3h, but since you are conditioned to put them back in the charging case, it stretches the battery life to a more substantial timeframe--I've only had them ask to be recharged once in the countess instances that I wanted to listen.
Will continue tracking longevity, but so far these are excellent and I'd buy them again! Bargain pricing at <$50!

title: Great for the cost
body: I finally needed to get a new pair of bluetooth headphones after my wired around-the-neck ones had too much dropout from the wires being old and used from the extending and retracting process, so I chose these.  The two most important things to me about this choice was the fit and the charging.  I immediately did the "shake test" and after making myself dizzy from shaking my head, I was pleased that these were still comfortably secure in my ears.  The second thing was the wireless charging.  I have several wireless charging pads throughout my house and office (call me lazy) and it immediately begins the charge and goes quickly about it.  I've never waited more than 30 minutes for these to be back and ready at 100%.  I must also say that the built in bass boost is awesome for listening to music.

title: Great product and worth the money
body: Great product and great customer support. After seeing the review they try their best to fix thing for me and contact me so fast. They are really helpful and very efficient. I love the product. Give it a try and you’ll love it

title: Great set of AirPods.
body: Bought these headphones and was skeptical at first because of the low price. Man was I wrong. They were so great that I bought another pairs for my family and they love them too. Great buy without paying for the name brand AirPods.

title: Excellent quality!! Very happy!!
body: These are amazing! I thought the ones I had been using for the last 3 years, that just died were good, but all I can say is that the sound with these is SO much better. Sound is crisp, crystal clear, mix is spot on and the use from pairing to listening was very simple. These are also a comfortable fit. Highly recommend!!

title: These are Awesome
body: Product works a Great. Easily paired and so very convenient to use. I love the ability to use the right earbud while leaving the other in the case. Allows me to have a conversation while being able to listen to music. Awesome Product

title: Excellent Product and Customer Service
body:
I was thoroughly impressed with the Tozo T10. The packaging was incredible, the build quality is top notch, and an amazing set of features for the price even if the price was twice as high. Wireless charging, IPX8 waterproofing, high quality 8mm sound driver, and bluetooth v5.0 are just a few of the high end features the T10's have to offer.

Mine started having an issue after sometime where one Pod was not pairing with another POD. I mailed the cusotmer service and they sent me a brand new Earbuds free of cost. Excellent Customer Service.

title: Great Value
body: So this was a Birthday Present and the TOZO T10 really delivered  So easy to pair up with my cell phone  my only complaint is that I may need a new battery for my cell phone to keep up with the new ear buds  Luckily I have a charger on hand for the phone  great sound quality and I love being able to just pop the ear buds back into the charging case  its that simple  Thanks TOZO for making a work day even better.

title: Theatre sound like earbuds
body: I am an avid runner, on average, I run 7 miles a day. I was looking for a headphone that would allow me to focus on running with little to no distraction. And TOZO T10 allow me to do just that. But the only problem that I am currently experiencing is that when the inside of my ears starts to sweat, the earbuds start to slip out. Maybe I am using the wrong size, but I plan on trying all of the extra bugs that comes with it.

title: Excellent Sound Quality and Bass
body: The sound quality and bass reproduction are excellent vs other Bluetooth ear pieces I have tried. The only issue I have notice is they take a long time to connect to my phone once they are removed from the case. I have used them in the pool and while walking/running and had no issues with sound quality. I would have given 5 stars but there is the issue of them taking a long time to connect via Bluetooth and once in awhile I have lost connection to my phone when running and my phone was in my backpack.

title: Keep them always charged and try to keep then connected if possible
body: I use these head phones for everything working out and driving because I am a truck driver. When working out at times the head phones go in and out of the music when I am at different angles. When trying to connect the head phones to my phone using bluetooth they keep switching to one side then another side then start going back and forward and then the bluetooth connection is lost and they just stay on but not connected but after a while they connect back and if I have an important call that's incoming I lose the call because of that situation happening. When I am on the road it is hard for some people to hear me while i am driving even when I have the window all the way up and air off but they are alright. Like how they sit in the case which is cool and how they can charge with a plug or on a battery pad. Easy to carry around.

title: I dont get the reviews
body:
These things were pretty bad. I dont understand the reviews.  I read through all of them and thought "maybe finally this one will be a good bluetooth set".

Nope, they CONSTANTLY disconnect with any movement or interference. I cant recommend these at all

title: Better than AirPods!
body: I loved the noise cancelation that these have. There is no software based NC, but they do seem to plug your ears very well. Audio quality is above and beyond a 50$ pair of earbuds, has wireless charging, case is built really well. I have walked about 50 feet from my phone and had no dropouts in sound. Just make sure you aren’t in a collision domain. Many different things can affect Bluetooth. WiFi, other Bluetooth devices, microwaves etc, but this is still the best bang for your buck. I would get these over AirPods.

title: OK Quality...While They Lasted
body:
To start, I've had these for just over two months. The sound quality was OK - not great. Better for podcasts/videos than music. The connectivity was OK when the phone was in my pocket, but getting a few feet away or being in a crowded place, the earbuds would cut out constantly.

The issue is, after two months, the portable charging case will no longer take a charge, and so the earbuds are dead with no way to charge them back up. Very disappointing given the number of 5 star reviews this product got. Definitely would not recommend, and definitely not worth $50.

title: Gimmicky Bluetooth.
body: These headphones are gimmicky. They have great sound and noise cancelation, but has trouble with bluetooth. It constantly needs to be reconnected and sometimes doesn't connect at all until you place it in the charge port. Will be returning these.

title: Comfort
body: These are easy to use and comfortable.I don't usually like things in my ears but these do not bother me. They have a clear sound. Tells you when you need to charge. The case is nice and I am happy with my purchase

title: Changed my life.
body:
I run a business in which I work hard, fast, and needed a way to use music to zone while moving a lot with yanking a cord every two minutes. I was worried about the more expensive wireless earbuds in case my level of activity would be too much for that expense. These proved to be perfect. The sound is great, however slightly lacking in migrating mid-to-high levels (minor detail, not a deal-breaker at all). The bass is perfect for a d&b-head like me, and they stay put. They come with 4 different sized pairs of earbud attachments and I found my ears are happy with the second-to-smallest (I'm female). I have tried them in the shower and it was fine until I started to shampoo and the soap dripped to lubricate the set and they started to slip a little but didn't fall out; not a product problem - function and reliability were not at all affected.

It's important to find the correct-sized earbud adapter (included) and install them correctly - get the ends moist to help slide them on. Install into the ears correctly, too: Put them in with the base pointed down and out toward your face, then twist them up and back so the base now fits into your ear flange and pointed back and up. That'll seal the earbud into your ear.

I've used these extensively, have not had the batteries run out yet, and the "battery pack" charge style is SUPER helpful for someone like me who may need to charge these up without having access to a power outlet.
Overall, more than highly recommended over the $$$ earbuds out there that probably work just the same :-)

title: The right earbud started speaking slowly as if it were a tape recording
body:
The right earbud started to give pairing problems and speaks slowly.  Reported the problem to Tozo, they were extraordinarily helpful and totally inclined to solve the problem.  This is an excellent product because of the customer support received.  They are focused in the 21st century where the product is as good as support.

Excellent service.

title: Great BT Buds for a great price
body: I had been wanting a decent pair of bluetooth earbuds for a while, and these fit the bill quite nicely. I’ve only had them for about a week, they do a good job of noise-cancelling, the bass is pretty deep for the price point, and they’re comfortable to wear for longer periods of time, which is something I can’t say for the Apple EarPods. I love how the case can be wirelessly charged, and the case itself holds enough of a charge to fully re-charge the buds a few times, which is super cool. Haven’t tried out the waterproof aspect of it and probably won’t, because I don’t feel the need to use them while showering or swimming. All in all, I’m really happy with them, especially for the price I paid!

title: Too Often Out of Sync
body: The product is sturdy and well built with good sound quality.  The major drawback is that the two earbuds fail to sync 20-25% percent of the time and have to be placed back in the case to resync.

title: Quality Product for a Great Price
body: For $50 you really can’t ask for more, these things are awesome.  Charging case, adjustable size, BT can connect to either one, 8mm drivers, incredible sound quality for the price, wireless charging, I could go on...  If you’re buying AirPods instead of these you’re doing it wrong.

title: Super Impressed!
body: I have only written a handful of reviews on Amazon but wanted to express how happy I am with these wireless earbuds. There are quite of few on the market and I am so happy I found these. In addition to being extremely well made (including the charger that comes with it), they are easy to set up with bluetooth, quite comfortable, and have amazing sound quality. The volume and bass levels are fantastic. Highly recommended!

title: Did NOT work for swimming
body:
I bought these for lap swimming.  They lived for about 5 laps - then the left one died, likely due to water damage as they were fully changed.  When they worked they cut out every time my head was underwater - thus I only heard sound when I was breathing to the right.

The sound quality was great - nice deep bass.  They connected really easily and quickly.  They would be great for sports, just not for real swimming.  I am returning.

Update:  I heard from Tozo who wants to make things right.  They are sending another pair free outside of Amazon and hope that things will work better.  I will add two stars for customer service.  Should the earbuds work underwater and not short out I'll update again.

title: Great for the casual user
body: I got these about two weeks ago knowing nothing about wireless headphones, having an iPhone I knew AirPods weren’t going to work for me and the case I use is waterproof so I didn’t want to have the charge port open all the time. These fit well in my ears, were a little snug to adjust to the size and weight but after trying various sizes of the adaptors my ears just needed time. The sound is good, no complaints, there are times where is can cut out or jump between the buds but it’s manageable. I’ve been able to wear these around the house with good quality and little Bluetooth loss.  I have worn these in the shower with care, I am not sure how waterproof they may be but they work for my needs. The case tends to hold closer to three charges than four but that is plenty sufficient for me. The customer service also appears to be on top of things too!

title: Stop shopping now. You have found the best!
body: Great fit and very stable in my ears. Doesn't come loose in activities. Easy simple setup and I am impressed by the sound, especially the bass response!

title: Water resistant!!!
body:
Great product for great price. I was worried about the fit, and it possibly falling out my ear.  But it fits perfectly! Very comfortable, and easy to use. I love the ease of automatic connecting and disconnecting as I remove it or put it back in the charging case. I've only had it 1 day,  but I used it at work, and in the shower.  Im not sure if it's possible,  but when using only 1 earbud,  its seems like it has to be the Right earbud,.. but maybe I have a mess with it more.
Overall,  I highly recommend this product!

title: Great wireless headphones!
body: The headphones work great. Easily paired and convenient to use and carry. I love how you can use the right earbud while leaving the other in the case. This works great for work as it lets me have conversations while being able to listen to music. This is the first set of wireless headphones that I’ve purchased and I’m not disappointed. The best part of the whole experience was the customer support and follow up from the company. They sent me an e-mail a day after I received them to make sure that I was satisfied.

title: Great product with a small concession
body:
Good fit, good sound, and easy to use.  These are a great alternative to having a more expensive set of earbuds.  I especially like the magnetic charging for the earbuds, and the wireless compatibility for the case.  Overall GREAT purchase

Great earbuds for the price, there's only 2 small concessions I have found

1 - no volume control
2 - lack of USB C support (still uses micro usb)

title: One stopped working... had to return
body: It may have just been the unit Igot but the left ear stopped working after about five or six days while I was on the treadmill  ..they were great up until then..lol

title: Not great, but not horrible, getting what you pay for.
body:
I bought these to replace a halfway decent bluetooth headset I used for running that crapped out on me after a solid 18 months of use.  I am pretty sweaty so I figured I'd give the wireless earbud style a shot and see what it was like given the IPX8 waterproofing certification.  The price is... compelling.  50 USD for a pair of wireless earbuds is hard to ignore.

So... how are they?  Decent.

The sound quality is decent.  I am no audiophile, but I wouldn't call the sound quality to be any more than that.  Acceptable range so most music genres sounds nice, podcasts come through clearly enough.

The Charging Pod is convenient and keeps the lil stinkers from bouncing around in my bag and maintaining a good charge.  Given I routinely loose small things, this is something I am actually pleased with.  Magnets keep the earbuds fixed in the case for storage and charging.  The case itself acting as a battery pack is a nice touch to avoid constant re-charging.

I've not had any significant issues with connection in-and-out while running.  I admittedly do not use these for just normal listening or phone call purchases.  They paired to my apple watch without issue and play with only the occasional hiccup.  They seem to have better connection quality to my watch than my previous running headset so that was nice to see.

First mildly annoying issue are the buttons and controls.  They are more than a bit on the unresponsive side.  Difficult to press the button on either of the two earbuds without my finger slipping or feeling like I'm going to crush the plastic housing into my ear.  Both sides have the same control options, and there is no volume control so you are going to have to use the source of your audio to manage that.

The fit is not bad, but not great.  There are a nice set of optional silicone sizes to try to get the optimal fit.  And for a cursory test of music walking through my home, that seemed like a good fit.  Then I went for a run.  They just didn't 'quite' fit right, with one or the other starting to wriggle its way out every 4-5 minutes or so.  Not so bad for a short run but if you go for distance, this will probably become infuriating.  It very much feels like a loop or band could (and should) be affixed to loop around the back of the ear to combat this with a minimum of fuss.  It honestly seems like they are on the cusp of a solid robust fit that would handle the trials of head bouncing from any vigorous exercise.

I'd give it a 2.5 Star Review if that were possible.  Given the price and the relative quality even to wired sets I've owned, bumping it up to 3 seems fair.  But pretending these are great is being very generous indeed.  A better set can be had, just be prepared to pay for it.

title: Good quality
body: Finally ones that work! I have tried two other brands. They were awful. Junk. These are easy to use, sound great. Good seller. Shipped promptly.

title: Not IPX8 or Waterproof!
body:
Not IPX8 waterproof!  I took it lap swimming and within a minute the left ear bud shorted and the right ear bud was muffled.  IPX8 is defined by depths beyond 1 meter.  I don't know how this company says it can be submerged for 30 minutes, nonetheless in only 2 feet of water without breaking.

The Bluetooth connection was spotty also.  The music would cut out (Bluetooth transmission from my Garmin watch) when running if I move my arm slightly too far back.  My $10 Walmart Bluetooth phones worked better for running.

When it was working, the sound was pretty good.  Slightly heavy on the base.  The case it comes with is pretty sweet too.

I'm returning it, looking for a better product.

title: Excellent sound quality!
body: Wonderful sound!  Easy to use and most of all a great price!  Numerous ear buds for any ear size.  I also bought TOZO wireless charger for my phone and these ear buds. It’s outstanding too!  I was so impressed that I told all the people at work about these headsets and they bought some and were thrilled with them! The only con is when you change the ear bud part it takes a little patience. They fit pretty tight on there. If somebody has an easy way of doing this please post, that would be great!

title: So much good stuff for the price!
body: Wow, set up too all of 2 seconds, you get a bunch of size options so you can really get a great fit and they stay in really well. 1 touch operation on either side to pause music, answer calls, it reject calls.  If there's music playing you can't hear anything else. Can't wait to use these on my next flight.

title: Update: Seller sent me a replacement
body:
2nd Update: the seller sent me a second pair that are far better than the original ones I got. I only hear an occasional bit of static or dropout in signal.  These earbuds seem to be a lot louder and have better Bass. For these reasons I'm upgrading my review the four stars especially because the seller is very concerned about making sure the customers are satisfied.

***UPDATE: The sellers are clearly bribing customers for good reviews by sending you an email offering a free charger in return for a good review. I've used the earbuds a few times now and the static just keeps coming back. All I have to do is put my hand near my face and I get static and lose connection in one ear. I never realized how much I touch my face until I try to use these headphones!

I also noticed they're not as loud as the wired ones that came with my phone. I primarily use headphones when mowing my lawn and have a hard time hearing when using these compared to the wired ones.***

I bought these after seeing how much less they are than the "premium" brands, and saw how many great reviews they have on Amazon. I opened the box, took the earbuds out of the charger and they connected to each other immediately.  Connecting to my phone was super easy and the sound is very good. I love the magnetic charging case, too.  At first I did have some static so I did a full reset of both buds, per the included instructions. I believe it has fixed that issue.

title: Does't Fit
body:
Good product.  Accurate description and great build quality.
The only con for me personally is that the left ear buds does not fit my ear properly. I have tried large to small sizes. Returning them.

title: Great Deal For The Price!
body: I cannot find anything bad to say about these. Nice packaging, nice charging system, good sound, connects easy with my Galaxy S9+. No issues so far. Great deal for the money.

title: Love Them!
body: I was tired of constantly having to adjust my airpods to get them to stay in my ears while working out as well as dealing with the inconsistent connection issues.  After first looking at more expensive options to replace my airpods, I saw these.  Glad I did.  Sound is amazing, phone talk is amazing, fit me perfectly!

title: Really good
body: Really good for the price, sound is really good and comfortable one thing i would like on them would it be a better way to keep them in your ears when youre working out other than that battery life is good and you have the case to charge them on the go easy pairing too

title: My husband LOVES
body: I purchased these for my husband for a trip we were going on.  The noise cancellation is amazing especially for the plane.  The sound is fantastic.  My husband is a musician so sound quality is super important to him.  He said these were great.  He said the noise cancellation was exceptional.  He uses these all the time when he goes to exercise etc.  Good product. I recommend and the price point is right on. You need these

title: Performing flawlessly
body: Great bass from an earbud. I keep these in my travel bag subjecting the case to a bit of abuse. No problem. Still looks brand new and the charging cable, I use a separate charging battery, stays in place. Perfect for on the go. We've had some snowy weather lately. Worked fine in the cold and wet.

title: The Search Is Over
body:
After trying several different true wireless ear buds (and some not so wireless), I have finally found the perfect pair.
 I workout a ton doing functional training and needed to be free of cords.  I would constantly get the cord tangled and ripped out of my ear mid workout.  OR they would just fall out if I didn’t constantly keep readjusting them. I’m looking at you AirPods!
I tried some true wireless ones and would never be quite satisfied..either they sounded terrible, the battery would die or the sound would cut out cause the phone was too far away....like in my pocket.  I recently ordered these and another pair from amazon that both had extremely high ratings to try them out and get to the bottom of my search.  The other pair were small , sleek and were easy to pair.  I’m thinking alright! These are starting out pretty cool. Nope! They were the worst sounding earbuds I have ever owned (briefly) and would not stay in my ear cause of the TINY earbud portion on them.
 I started to loose hope.  Then I opened these. The TOZO T10!  Right away I loved the design of the buds and case. Feels sturdy. The ear bud portion of it was a perfect snug fit (you need that to get the noise canceling and bass)!  It paired with the phone with in seconds and it was off to the races!  I seriously tried to knock these things out but they stayed out! And the sound?  These are phenomenal for the price!  Deepest base I have ever had and definite noise cancellation!  Plus the IPx8 waterproofing gives some relief cause I sweat! Never a problem! The battery lasted forever too. Don’t think I charged them the whole week working out 1+ a day. Also I have set my phone down and walked 10-15 feet away and you couldn’t tell from the headphones.  They stayed clear as day!  Freedom!!
The added bonus was that people can actually hear me when I make phone calls!  I never got them for this cause I have never found a pair that came close to providing that service but these do it!!  Awesome, awesome product!
Fit ✔️
Design ✔️
Sound✔️
Bass✔️
Battery Life✔️
Waterproof✔️
Range✔️
Durability✔️
Noise Cancellation✔️
Phone calls?✔️✔️✔️✔️

Like I said..The Search is Over

title: Great for running with Apple Watch or phone.
body: These are overall great headphones for my needs.  They clearly state when you turn them off and on and when they are paired.  The lights are helpful, also, to know when they are on and when they are charging.  The charging box has lights to tell you the battery level left in it. They stay in my ears for running.  I frequently run with only one because they are so noise cancelling, I can’t hear traffic, other people, birds, etc.  You need to turn both of them on first before taking one out, otherwise it beeps at you to let you know that you are missing one.  That one needs to stay within range also or again, it will beep at you.  Connects flawlessly to my Apple Watch.  My one complaint is that the range is only about 2 feet.  That is fine for running/connecting to my watch, but doesn’t work so well (at all) when I’m on the treadmill and want to connect to my TV across the room.  Also, if I put my watch hand behind my back when running-even for a second-it starts to lose connection.  That is a pretty short range!  Overall happy with them and they stay in way better than AirPods.

title: Perfect fit
body: I have tried many earbuds and so i thought i would try these the fit is perfect they do not fall out and the sound is awesome i have an embroidery shop and these sounded great even with my machines runnung!! I would buy these again and would reccomend them.

title: Complete crap
body: Doesn't work, I turned on the left side it only plays from that. I turn on the right side it unpairs both and won't connect both. After 10 min of nothing working I gave up.

title: Small but packs a punch!!!
body: I was kind of reluctant in purchasing this item but I am glade I did. The quality sound these ear buds put out is amazing. Clean and clear quality sound and really good bass I would compare to my beats headphones. I highly recommend.

title: Sound good, work on a motorcycle but a few concerns
body:
First off these sound very good. Not like Movie theater good but for someone that is under a 1/2 inch wide and thick very good.

I use them when on my motorcycle. I haven't fully tested battery life start to finish, but I would say less than the 3.5 hours provided. The other concern I have for the battery is that when charging wirelessly on my Samsung wireless charger (haven't checked wired) that it never sends a fully charge signal to the charger leaving it to possibly over charge.

THey also will beep for about 90 seconds not listed if paired as just one headset. I also never  see the "Master" as listed only the Toz R or Toz L (Forget the correct working they use) and it shows connected but it will beep if only one is paired for abotu 90 seconds.

They fit comfortably in my ears using the default plugs and make riding better. I can hear using a half helmet and it 100% cuts down on the outside noise.

title: Great sound quality.
body: Probably the best wireless earbuds I've used. The sound quality is great. The one before that I used, I had to put the volume up to half at least before I could hear anything. With TOZO I could hear it below half. It was bulkier than I expected it to be but I got used to it after a while. The smaller earbuds also fit pretty snuggly in my ear. I like the overall experience I have with it so far.

title: As good as advertised
body: Just got them and have used them once at the gym.  They were hard to get paired but after a few attempts I was able to get everything working. They stayed in my ears comfortably throughout my workout and were not affected by sweat and stayed solid in my ears. The sound quality is great and I am very pleased with my purchase.

title: No volume or track controls from the earbuds
body: Sound quality is excellent.  Battery life is average.  Size is a bit bulky (a little Frankenstein's monster-ish).  Fit is maybe a little above average, i.e. they don't fall out of my ears but do get a little uncomfortable after extended use.  My main issue is the lack of any controls from the earbuds other than play/pause (and redialing the last phone number with a double-tap).  I really wish this was a more common feature as it doesn't require more than 1 button per earbud (just requires multiple taps).  Granted, I realize you can't have total control this way, but it's a significant advantage at the gym, while taking walks, doing chores around the house, etc. to not have to take out my phone just to nudge the volume up or down, or quickly rewind a podcast or audiobook for that last bit my brain was too distracted to hear (or fast-forward past a commercial).  I guess wireless earbuds are a relatively new technology, and I'm still waiting for a pair with these features that also last longer than a few months before failing.  I'll update if these break down in short order as well, though they will likely serve mostly as a backup.

title: Good For The Money
body: For fifty dollars i have no major complaints. Using them as hands free, is not an option as your voice is very low. I wish there was an app so you could pair other bluetooth items with these. Overall though not bad for fifty bucks.

title: Awesome little things!
body: These earbuds are AMAZING!  I tried the Apple ones, that were almost $180, and they kept falling out of my ears.  No solution in sight, so I did some research and found these TOZO's to be very popular and loved by many.  I further found out that 3 of my friends in the office, have these exact earbuds, and they love theirs too! They are a LESS THAN a THIRD of the price of Apple product, don't waste your money... by these TOZO T-10, you will LOVE them too!

title: Quality earbuds
body: This product is packaged well and delivers value relative to the more expensive brands. What I love is the indicator lights, which show when the earbuds are fully charged, and the various sizes available for the ear piece. Sound quality is great, and the case is very portable and easy to use. Recommend!

title: Great product worth every dollar.
body:
This product seems like it's worth a lot more than $50. Having a a year warranty also made me feel good. I did not want to purchase airbuds or the Galaxy version because I just don't think paying $200 for something that will have another model come out next year makes any sense.

The sound and bass is amazing

The battery last about 2 1/2 hours and die

The charger case it comes with feels very high quality and durable and it's cool how it's magnetic.

I've had them for about a week now and my only problem with them is I don't know if it's my ear, but the left ear is able to stay in my ear but the right one falls out and it is very frustrating.

I'll keep trying on the other sizes/angles to see if I see any different results, I really hope this works for me or I will just end up giving them as a gift.

title: Fantastic earbuds for 1/3 the price of Apple
body: I saw a featured article on these earbuds in my news feed and after reading the other customer reviews I decided to give them a chance.  Amazon shipping delivered them promptly and the very professional packaging impressed.  Inside the buds were very well packaged and included all the necessary charge cables and additional foam fittings for various ear sizes.  Four sizes in total and I settled on the second largest for best fit for sound quality and ability to stay seated during movement.  I am not planning to use these while exercising, running, biking, etc … just walking and doing chores around the property, and for this they fit and stayed seated really well.  Being very small I did not have high expectations for the sound quality as most are very thin and tinny sounding.  These earbuds have a substantial amount of bass an actually produce an overall balanced and nice sound for my preferred pop and rock music.  I cannot comment on volume as I have no intention of cranking up to max to see what they will do, but at a normal, comfortable level they are fantastic.  Final comments are on the charge/carry case.  Very well constructed with a great fit & finish... the bugs pair when removed and auto power off when placed back.  I'd like the case to be a bit smaller but it's a fine trade in exchange for the additional charges it carries.  Plus it's nicely rounded and smooth so slips into (large) pocket very easily.  All in all I'm delighted with this purchase!

title: Great Value & Perfect for the Gym
body: I have always had trouble finding the perfect ear buds, especially ones that will stay in my ear when at the gym.  After reading the reviews on these headphones, and doing online research, I gave these a try.  I could not be more satisfied.  The sound quality is excellent, and they fit in my ears perfectly.  The earbuds come with multiple tips, so you have options to find the fit that works perfect for you.  I also enjoy the sweatproof feature, which is perfect when walking outside on a hot day, or for working out.  The charging case is also very handy. It automatically charges the headphones, so you never have to worry about putting in your headphones and them being dead.  Lastly, the bluetooth pairing was one simple step.  Incredible value for the price.

title: These are keepers.
body: This is the 4th pair of bluetooth earphones I've purchased in about the last 6 weeks.  One was returned, the other two were "meh" and I'll keep them for backups or something, but these are definitely keepers.  Based on the pictures I thought they'd probably be heavy and/or would fall out, but they paired very easily (to my desktop PC with a 4.2 bluetooth dongle), sound great, and really are very light.  I can barely feel them, and they don't fall out.  Personally, I like sitting with just one in my ear so I can still hear if the kids want something or the SO has a question (and when I'm walking the dogs so I can hear traffic) and these are fine in that respect.  I can use one and leave the other in the charging case and they don't disconnect.  I'm perfectly happy with my purchase.

title: For the price, it's good!
body:
Excellent reception 👍. I am really enjoying my earbuds. They are working perfectly. It took some time to to p as it them up, but this was new to me. I use them mostly for my audible books so am enjoying the sound.
Thank you.

title: This is a great product!
body: I really love these wireless earbuds.  They took some getting used to for me because I've never had truly wireless earbuds before, but every time I used them, I loved them more and more.  The sound quality is a bit shrill in the high end when the volume's louder and with certain songs, but for the most part, they are really great.  It was a bit tricky to get them to sync and connect together and sometimes it still takes a few tries, but once they connect, they connect strongly.  The charger pod it comes with is really convenient as well.  Now that I've experienced this kind of wireless earbud, I'll probably never go back.

title: Great sound, great value for price
body: I love how they pair automatically when taking off the charger. I'm on the phone for to 5 hours per day during work, but I never have to worry about them losing a charge because I put them back on the charger when they're not in use. when the phone rings, I can usually take it off of the charger case and it tears automatically so I can answer on the Bluetooth without having it in my ear all the time. They are comfortable and also nice at night when listening to music or watching a movie.

title: Amazing quality for the price!
body: The sound quality is by far some of the best compared to the galaxy earbuds I had a few years ago. The bass is phenomenal and you can really feel it. The waterproofing works flawlessly and has been tested extensively in the few days I've owned these. These are a definite recommend from me.

title: Great value and unexpected quality!
body:
I had gone through two pair of the Apple wireless ear buds and lost both pair due to their falling out of my ears becasue of the loose fit!  I read many reviews and looked at several options before settling on the TOZO 10t.
When I received the earbuds, I charged them and began using them right away.  I did have to change out the buds to provide a snug fit and once I did,  they did fit perfectly and provided a comfortable fit.  Be certain to rotate the buds once they set in the ear!  This prevents their falling out and loss.
Pairing was easy and it was just a matter of a minute before I was able to enjoy listening music.  The sound quality is better than anything that I have had in the past - the sounnd was rich and as I enjoy listening to podcasts, the voice quality was great as well.
I am certain I will enjoy these ear buds and consider this a good value!

title: Blew my expectations.
body: I used to work in Best Buy and I have more or less used a lot of premium headphones, true wireless, noise canceling you name it. All of em sounded amazing, I cannot deny that but this product blew my expectation. When you are usually looking for substitution products, they often disappoint you. So far, this did the opposite to me. I am in love with these fellas, amazing sound quality, noise-canceling superb. I have been using these ever since I got em and enjoying them more than I enjoy my other premium headphones. I only bought this for the gym but now I am using them on a daily basis. Also, it is giving the same utility as a headphone that will cost you $200. I honestly would recommend it to anyone.

title: Great product for the price!
body:
Great product at an affordable price point. High quality, excellent sound. Wasn't sure what to expect with friends having the expensive apple ear buds. But these turned out to be much better than expected.
I get about 4 hours continuous use before getting a low battery warning, charge time is quick.
The sound quality is excellent - the only "negative" that I have is, that of all the ear buds provided, even the smallest is a bit too big for my inner ear - they fit fine, I'd just prefer the bud to be a bit smaller (personal preference).

title: Great bass and pairs easily
body: The bass is amazing. Unexpectedly great sound from a $50 set. Good quality construction and design. Headphones pair easily and quickly. Charging case is great too. Customer service reached out afterwards to make sure I was satisfied and would write a review to get a free wireless charging base. Great deal all around.

title: These are worthless with my Galaxy S8
body:
Utter crap. Can't believe all the positive reviews. They make me doubt that Amazon has any control over the review process.
-can't get the right bud to stay in my ear despite trying all sizes.
-sound is terrible. No one can hear me and complain about multiple issues.
-they connect easily, but that's not helpful if I can't use them.
-WARNING - Return window is only 30 days.

title: Did not even last 24 hours
body:
When listening to music the left ear bud would fade in and out and sometimes just drop sound. I have not even have them for 24 hours before the issue started to happen

Update. There customer service was very nice. Even with the time delay not bad to respond.

title: Great headphones!
body: Great headphones! I got them a few weeks ago and have zero complaints so far. They came with several size earbuds which was great because I tend to have a hard time finding ones that fit right. I got them to use at the gym at them stay in well while running and have used them swimming and they do appear to be waterproof as advertised. I love that the case charges them, I've used them several times and have yet had to plug it in. So far I have no complaints. And the company contacted me after I purchased them and provided a free wireless charger pad for them which was very nice.

title: 100% satisfied, for the price.
body: These were the first wireless earbuds or headphones I've purchased. I had been waiting for the SQ to improve and was actually looking for ones that had APTX, but the reviews on these were so good, I decided to try them out. I'm completely happy with them for the price. SQ has far surpassed my expectations. Bass was a little heavy, so I adjusted the eq in my phone and all is good. So glad I didn't pay $200+ for some "premium" buds, which would be mostly paying for a brand name. I hope they last, but for now, I highly recommend them for anyone who wants great sound for a very reasonable price.

title: Amazing quality for the price! Waterproof and charge very quickly.
body:
These are life changing esp if you haven't had truly wireless earphones before. The quality is solid, the waterproof feature is extremely convenient. I wear them every day. The battery life could be longer but they charge up so fast that it isn't really an issue, and at this price point totally understandable.
Definitely recommending these to my friends and coworkers already XD

title: Happily impressed!
body: I was impressed with this product from the beginning with the packaging and am enjoying using these daily during my commute to work, and basically any other activity for streaming music, visual entertainment, and they are also great for calls. They go with me everywhere! Many different fitting options and the charging case with the magnetic top and sturdy construction fits nicely in any bag to carry; it also comes with a strap to carry on its own. The USB charging cable is short but that works for me since I charge them right on my laptop. There's also a wireless charging pad available for more convenience. All around great purchase for a reasonable cost!

title: Awesome customer service
body:
Wow, what awesome customer service from Tozo
Really fast and reliable! They completely made me really happy with this product regardless of the unfortunate problem with the left ear peice after 5 months of use . No hassle , no worries just complete honestly and direct . straight foward company and the headphones themselves are magnificent. Really loud and durable. They do not fall out of ear when working out and are great in the shower. Definitely recommend ESPECIALLY with the customer service

title: Amazing sound and price!
body:
The sound is amazing! Fits better than my airpods and the noise cancellation is awesome! This little
thing really packs a punch, with just half the volume on my phone, it is as loud as full
on my airpods.
However, I took 1 star off because of the microphone. Tried calling using these while at the gym and all the other person could here is the background noise and very minimal of my sound. Not sure if I got a defective one or this is just how it was built.

title: The button uses on the headphones themselves are very limited in use.
body: I really like the packaging of it and it looks really stylish in your ear. The sound is also incredible. Some things I would like for it to have are the ability to control the music, so volume up and down or next. I also want a pouch or an on and off button on the charger, because sometimes I don't need to charge them I just need somewhere to put them and when you put them in the charger it automatically charges it.  Other than that they are really good headphones and they do their jobs exceptionally.

title: Love it!!
body: I love these headphones. I wear them all day every day at work.. They stay in my ear perfectly and the sounds quality is lovely. I love the color of mine, i purchased the blue set. 10 out of 10 definitely recommended getting your self a pair of these bad boys. And the battery life on them is good, they last 4 to 5 hours.

title: Good but not the best
body: I like these a lot for the proce, the one thing I wish that they had was a way to skip to the next song. So if you want to change songs you'll have to do it on the connected device. It's a shame because these could have been a 5 out of 5 if they did a little better on battery life and that.

title: Super discreet!
body: My boyfriend surprised me with these earbuds and I absolutely love them! I use them while driving and for the gym, but I especially love using them discreetly at work to listen to music without my coworkers noticing. I love how small and easily it fits in my purse and scrub pockets! Call quality is great! Sound is crisp, and microphone is awesome as well! I love how quickly it connects to Bluetooth on my iPhone XR as well! Super happy with my new earbuds!

title: Great Product!
body: I reviewed a large number of wireless ear buds and watched quite a few video reviews on YouTube before purchasing these.  I purchased a pair for my wife the day after mine arrived.  The waterproof feature made these highly attractive to me.  They are easy to setup, have a very nice fit and sound great.  I hated having wires hanging while I was working out.  I definitely recommend them.

title: True Wireless / Waterproof Ear Buds at a Great Price!
body:
So glad I purchased these ear buds - they are the real deal! True wireless is the best!! The range is solid and the sound is crisp and clear - and at this price point hard to pass up.

And are they really waterproof? The first day I got them I inadvertently put their IPX8 rating to the test - when I accidentally dropped one into a bowl of SOUP. Yes, it plunked into the soup and I had to fish it out, then RINSE it clean under tap water. After that, it still delivered the same great sound quality like nothing had ever happened. Awesome!

Highly recommended.

title: Quality Purchase! NO disappointments here!
body: It’s a quality product. The case is super nice and doesn’t seem cheap at all. The directions are clear and very happy with this purchase. Comes with different sizes for your ears in the package. No disappointments here

title: great sound and fit!
body:
These earbuds are great and stay in my ear unlike other models I've tried. The battery life per charge is also solid and the case charges incredibly quickly. I was using wired earbuds before getting these and the sound improvement is unbelievable. These are noise cancelling without having to blast your music and great bass.

The only feature I would change about these is being able to double click the earbud to skip a song instead of redialing your last number. I use these solely for music and not at all for talking on the phone, so those features aren't very useful to me.

title: This is insane
body: The pricing is completely irrelevant to the quality of this product. It can be left in 1 meter deep water for 30 minutes, the sound quality is the best ive ever personally experienced, and the battery life is so extra its almost pointless. When you take them out of the case to immediately put it on, the headset pairing voice is very quick and low so it would never hurt your ears. These could be 1-200+ dollars and id believe it, but for $50 its a steal, I was ultra hesitant but as a fellow human ill tell you, you've found the product.

title: They Would be Great if they Worked
body: This was a real disappointment, unfortunately. The price is fantastic and the sound quality is surprisingly good. They stayed in my ears for a 3 mile run and were quite comfortable. The problem: the connection was dreadful. The left headphone would cut out intermittently and the right headphone (which seems to be the "master") would cut off completely if my phone was on my left side. It seems the Bluetooth connection on these headphones has a problem going through the body. You get what you pay for, I suppose. I'll be returning these and exchanging them for another brand.

title: TRY THEM!!
body: I’m a total music snob but on a budget. I like my bass to be deep and the sound to be rich. These are awesome buds. The pre-installed ear pieces were a touch too large but it comes with four or five different sizes ranging from tiny to huge. Once I attached the next size down, it actually enhanced the noise cancellation and the music quality since everything was sealed properly. I have not tested out the water proof ness yet so no comment there. I do like that the case is wireless charging capable as the cord it comes with is like four inches long. So far these are quality earbuds on a budget.

title: Right Side breaking in and out
body:
I love the convenience of the case.. that it can charge your buds for you multiple times without needing to charge the case.. and even when you do it is also capable of wireless charging...

I am returning these buds because the signal kept breaking in and out on the RIGHT side even though my phone stayed pretty close, very annoying when I am trying to focus at the gym.

title: Good, and bad..and random disconnects.
body:
Update: Working with TOZO Customer service has been great, they are doing all they can to make sure I am satisfied with my purchase by sending me a replacement set free of charge!

Thanks for the awesome support!

First off, let me say this, these things are comfy, sound great and connect easily to whatever device I pair them with. Secondly, they are a great value for what you are getting, and if it weren't for some niggling issues, the rating would be higher.

My biggest issue is the random disconnects from the left earbud; it will work perfect fine about 75% of the time, then out of the blue just drop and cut out all sound for a second or two (tested with Pandora, Spotify, Youtube and Facebook videos on an Ipad Air 2 and an IPhone 8). Not sure if it is an issue with the Bluetooth connectivity between the Left and Right earbud, but the source is usually never more than a foot away from either, and it still happens.

Other than that, they fit great, sound great and are super easy to connect, and the wireless charging is a bonus. It's just keeping them connected that seems to be the issue. Going to try and submit a warranty claim with Tozo to see if we can get this rectified.

title: Horrible for calls, slow to pair, primitive for the price, but music quality is okay
body:
When I bought these, I only used them for music and they seemed fine.  As I was unfamiliar with a variety of earbuds, I did not know that these are actually very limited compared to other ones.  Many competitive products like the $59 TaoTronics SoundLiberty 77 Earbuds are also waterproof but provide controls to change volume, track, play/pause, and even use Google Assistant/Siri directly from the earbuds.  That alone makes these earbuds very limited and and not a very good value, but I had a much bigger problem with these.

The audio for calls would only pick up voice at about half volume or lower.  If I get really loud, only then can the person on the other end of the call understand me.  Since getting these, I've purchased several other earbuds for different purposes and when tested with my phone or my spouse's phone, they all work perfect for calls except the TOZO earbuds.  The issue is not with my devices or setup, it is specifically the TOZO ear buds.  I contacted support and after 2 weeks they responded asking if I would accept a 20% refund asking if I could please not return these.  At the end of the day, why would I want a slightly lower priced pair of earbuds that still do not work?

Additionally, pairing is extremely slow with these.  When I take the earbuds out, it takes 5 seconds to pair with each other, and then another 10 seconds to pair with my phone.  Basic SoundPEATS earbuds or the TaoTronics SoundLiberty 77 earbuds, for instance, instantly pair with each other and your device.  If my phone starts ringing or my laptop has an incoming business call, I simply put those in my ear and can casually answer the call by the second ring.

Horrible microphones, horrible customer service.  Do your homework and find a better product.  I originally purchased the TOZO earbuds based on the quantity of reviews thinking it must be good if thousands of people rated them 4/5 stars.  This product falls short in so many areas and only has Chinese based support.

title: Excellent wireless ear buds
body: Holy smokes, I like these! They pairing is instantaneous and the sound quality is amazing. I've had to fiddle around with the different sized ear covers to find the best fit, but the kit included everything that i could need. I use these at work and my only complaint is that they battery life won't last all day. Perhaps that is asking too much for such a small device. However, the recharge time is really quick and then I'm back to rocking out. This is my fourth pair of wireless listening devices and by FAR my favorite.

title: First pair defective but read on
body:
I would have given 4.9 stars because first pair out of the box had an issues with connectivity, the left ear bud would drop sound for a second or two then function again for 10 -15 min then drop again. Also you could touch the right bud all you wanted no issues however touch the left bud and it would crackle and drop sound.
Now the good news.
I got them replace in 24 hrs after request.  I am using the seconds pair as I write and so far no drop issues, no crackling when touch.
Look and feel is excellent, I used the first pair while pressure cleaning and even wet that work fine (well except for above) Bases response is as good as other more expensive buds i have owned, but like all buds bass is best and deepest when the buds are properly seated in the ear. Have not test noise cancellation, but not looking for much in this area because buds will never be as good with noise as head sets with full ear covering cups.
P.S. Finally fully water proof!!!!
So far I like these buds and would not hesitate recommending these to other purchaser.

title: Best wireless earbuds for desk jobs.
body: What I like about these earbuds is they are not that visible in the office environment. I work in a office space downtown and spend most of my hours working at my desk on a computer but these TOZO T10 earbuds help the day go past smoothly, while watching my favorite show/videos on YouTube. I like these earbuds a lot because I can also exercise with them on and they won't fall out my ears. Great job TOZO, can't wait for the upgrade.

title: A great value
body: These earbuds are very convenient particularly at the gym.  But they have a tendency to fall out if you perspire a lot.  Of course I'm still working with them and I may find a way to keep them from sliding out but for now it's a problem.  The noise cancellation is okay but not great.  They are light and comfortable particularly while doing homework,  housework and other activities.  I would strongly recommend this product.

title: Great product at a great price!
body: Great product for the price! I like the storage and charging station that you can charge with the provided USB cable or if you have a Wireless charging unit you can simply place the storage along with the headphones on the charging station and it will charge automatically.

title: Terrific Sound!
body: Excellent sound quality and very simple to pair and use.  I received these wireless earbuds the other day after realizing my iPhone no longer has a port for earphones.  They have four different sizes of ear pieces so you are pretty much guaranteed to find the perfect fit.  I paired with my iPad and iPhone and wore them comfortably to watch a show while working out at the gym.  They delivered crystal clear sound and canceled out the gym noise.  I love them already.

title: Pretty Good for the Price
body: I will be honest I was surprised by the quality of the sound and overall product. I like how easy it is to link to phone device and they come with different ear bud sizes. I do recommend buying the wireless charger, I keep forgetting to charge them and I haven’t used them in a couple of weeks.

title: Nice surprise .... works well
body: It's great to go cordless. Sound quality is good, though I notice a little rumbling on the low end with deep bass. Carry case and recharging unit work well. In all, it was a pleasant surprise and a great bargain as a daily special.

title: Wish I knew about these sooner
body: Waterptoof! Great. Sound is loud and crisp. I like for my music to remove any extra sound and these do a great job and the case is a charger you can't beat that

title: Easy to use, wireless charging and larger capacity battery case great features.
body:
The earbuds worked seamlessly and well out of the box.  I use them while hiking the hills with my dogs and when working at my desk - I can still hear outside noises when needed for safety, but can listen to music without disturbing others.  The earbuds are comfortable even during exercise, and they fit securely.

Using the earbuds as a headset with my cell phone is easy as well.  I do have to experiment with how they handle the Google assistant.

The audio quality is at least stereo Hi-fi, and the earbuds paired easily with both my phone and laptop.

Wireless charging and having a large backup power source for the phone are terrific features.

title: Great price
body: I bought these to use instead of AirPods and I have to say I’ve been pleasantly pleased. The sound quality and microphone works great for phone calls. I tried to use these to run but the ear buds tent to fall out. Great product for the price.

title: Good sound quality, good noise cancellation, and amazing battery life!
body:
I bought this product a few weeks ago after browsing many kinds of bluetooth earbuds, and so far, I'm very happy with my choice. The sound quality is excellent (about the same as my over ear headphones), and during these two weeks, I only had to charge the case once (and I use them everyday during my commute to work and back, which is about an hour round trip). At first, the earbuds were a little too big for my ears the way they came, but they also include many different sizes of the little round thing that goes on top of the earbud, and switching to the smallest size was perfect for me.
TL;DR: If you're looking for an affordable yet good quality set of earbuds (especially for music) I would recommend these!

title: Great sound quality for the price!
body: Great product. Way worth the money. The bass is outstanding compare to AirPods, I wear them when taking showers or sitting in tubs. The only complaint is the tips are tooo big. I have to use other Bluetooth’s rubber cover.

title: Best in-ear ever!
body: I bought the TOZOs because they appeared to be better made than most, and they are.  I was also curious about the T10's 8mm drivers that boasted being 1.77X the norm.  Right again to the point of awesome.  I was watching the CGBros on YouTube when I first tried them.  - It was like Dolby theatre sound.. every digital nuance was crystal clear.  You can feel the bass in your cranium without blasting your ear drums.  In fact, they are so accurate that you notice the dramatic difference between HD signal and the others.  But they're still good for bumping some Roger Troutman..  lol

title: Function are not ideal
body:
This is great set of headphones,they fit tight, sound great. But the battery life is less then ideal and the functions are terrible.. I cannot change song or replay song for headphones. Only pause and call last number dialed?

Other then that they are great.. would like something that has better functions

Edit 4/30/19

I have updated to 5 stares!  Their customer service has been fantastic and has sent me a different set of headphones! Quick response and great trying make it work with what I need..

title: Not fittin’
body:
First order was used rather than new- earwax was present on the earbuds.
Reordered a NEW new pair, and they came swiftly. Tried them out:
Decent sound, easy to pair to electronics, material is low quality (I mean, they are only 30 something dollars), but seemed okay. The darned things would not fit in my ear, so I returned them. I tried all the earbuds (with fairly clean ears, I cleaned the buds upon returning) and they would not lock/stay into my ear. Wish they would fit.
Bought them with the intention to use with workouts and swimming.

title: Great product and customer service!
body: I ordered this after trying several others and wow! what a difference.  The sound quality and the ease of using this was amazing.  My batter case didn’t charge anymore and after contacting TOZO they were extremely helpful in getting the matter straightened out.  Everything about the product and the customer service is tops in my book.  Will be buying for gifts because I trust the product enough to do so.

title: Don't recommend
body: I wanted to love these earbuds. They were a little heavier than my old ones  and the reception wasn't as good, but they charge quickly. I listen to books and music a lot and within two weeks I started having problems. My phone can't connect, they can't connect to each other, they fall out because they are so heavy. Maybe I just got lemons.

title: Great sound and quality!
body: Love these! I was hesitant to get these wireless small headphones but I love them! They give you different size ear pieces to make sure they fit perfectly. The sound quality is great and when testing them while talking to my family, they said they hear me great!

title: Great value for the money
body: These earbuds have great sound quality while simultaneously cancelling out background noise. I use them while working in my home office, driving or traveling for business. In each case they work better than expected, especially for the price. For long international flights the ability to pre-charge the case and then take it with you on the plane or long drives, effectively extending the battery life of the earbuds, is very convenient. Bluetooth syncs with my Windows laptop and Galaxy S9+ cellphone with no problems.

title: Great sound, easy to pair, great fit, compact design.
body:
I have weird ears and struggle to find headphones that stay in my ears and don't fall out.  I was hoping that Apple's AirPods would be an exception, but they too did not fit.  Also, the sound quality was disappointing on the Apple AirPods.  I saw that these Tozo earbuds had 10,000+ 5-star reviews and I decided take a chance on them.

After charging them, the pairing was easy.  You pair the right earbud (master) to your phone and the left one (slave) pairs itself to the right one automatically.

It came with 4 different sizes of ear tips and one of them actually fit my ears perfectly!  I was so happy to find earbuds that fit.

The best part however, is the sound quality.  They blow the Apple Airpods out of the water.  The tighter seal of the Tozo earbud inside your ear canal channels the sound more directly than the AirPods.  It's a much richer sound with much stronger bass.

I have been super happy with this purchase.  Hopefully these will stand the test of time...

title: Perfect Solution!
body: The perfect solution for what we were looking for plus more!  We purchased to used outside to watch movies without disturbing our neighbors and while floating in our pool. These have been a perfect solution!  The sound quality is great and they stay in place.  We purchased two just for the above reasons but hubby and I are now also using them for work as well!  We are very happy with our purchase!

title: Great buy for the price
body: I bought these ear buds mostly to use while at work so I wanted them to be wireless and a bit discrete too. These earbuds are great for me. I was worried about buying earbuds off amazon cause of all the scammers out there but these have impressed me quite a bit. They are pretty small with a decent connection range and great sound quality. I was wondering how well they would stay in cause I would be moving around a lot and I also have pretty small ears but they stay great they come with different size buds which was great. And it also has a somewhat portable charger. It has a case that can hold about a four hour charge so u can charge ur buds while on the go if they die out on yay. Overall a great purchase for me I’ve recommended them to a few of my coworkers.

title: Great sound and really comfortable!
body: I have been wanting Earbuds for quite some time now. After doing some research I came across these earbuds and I am already so impressed! I used them last night for my very high impact workout and they didn't even budge. The moment I take them from their case they connect within seconds and connect to my phone as well! (No more having to fiddle with settings, trying to locate them, etc.) The sound is super clear and crisp as well and noticed the noise cancellation is excellent as I couldn't hear my boyfriend talking to me while I was wearing them and had music on.

title: Worked well. For 3 weeks
body:
These buds fit well and incredible don't fall when I'm running.
However, only after 3 weeks of low / no use, the left earbud stopped charging and working.
I have requested a replacement and will update this review if I have a different experience with this new pair.

title: Exceeded expectations
body:
I have had the earphones now for a few weeks and I can day the T10 ear buds are fantastic for their price as they exceeded my expectations. They have great battery life, easy to use charging, and the bass in the earbuds is quite spectacular. They are great for running and daily activities without the fear of them falling off. The only con is that turning on/off or pausing requires to actually press the button rather than touch sensitive. The reason it's a con because the ear is sensitive when pressing the earbuds in and must be  careful not to damage your ear drum( of course this can be resolved by removing the earbuds and doing it that one which is a bit inconvenient). Overall a 5/5. *NOT A PAID REVIEW*

Sound - 5/5
Set up with Bluetooth - 5/5
Aesthetics - 5/5
Pricing - 5/5
Durability - 5/5
Customer service - 5/5

title: Great ear buds!
body: I’m rely heavily upon ear buds for my workouts but have had trouble finding a high quality affordable pair in the past. Fortunately I purchased the TOZO T10 ear buds and couldn’t be happier. They fit snugly in my ears and don’t come out during cardio, have great sound, and are sweat resistant. Extremely happy with this purchase!

title: Quality>waterproof
body: If you only want these for there waterproof then go ahead. Microphone is terrible making it rather frustrating to talk to someone. If both earbuds aren't connected you get an annoying tone every 8 seconds or so. Earbuds lose connection between themselves quite often. Most of these product have a feature to skip a song but not this one. They are very big, projecting too far out the ear.

title: everything I hoped they would be.
body: Very impressed with these earbuds.  I have bought different ones over and over.  Finally found a pair that is exactly what I need.  Good sound.  Nice bass.  I even rode my Harley with them in and they did not even feel like they wanted to fall out.  But most of all they phone calls are very good.  The person on the other line can actually hear me now.  I love this product.

title: Terrific value for the price
body:
Honestly, I loved these wireless earbuds and they were a great addition to my workouts. Compared to wired earphones or attached wireless earphones, these got in the way much less. Sadly as I was waiting for the bus one morning, my right earbud fell out of my ear and I watched as it bounced into a sewer. Unfortunately that means that I am without working earbuds now, but they were great while they lasted.

PROS:
-Easily connected
-Sound quality was pretty decent
-Charging while in its carrying case is amazing

CONS:
-Hard time finding right fit for my ear
-Must have both earbuds to work (or at least have the right earbud)

title: Tozo T12 TWS Bluetooth 5.0 earplug
body:
I brought thee for my wife when see go to the gym and when see walks.  She fell in love with them.  She told me that the sound quality is a lot better then what she expected.  She give it a 10 rating.  I try them and I also was amazed. If any one reads this review I highly recommend this product. you won't be disappointed.
  Thanks for the time that you put into these ear plus to make them a top number Bluetooth ear plug (Tozo T12 TWS Bluetooth 5.0 earplug) Thank again.

title: Amazing Battery Life!
body: I have used bluetooth headphones in the past, but they have been over the ear, not ear buds. I am so happy with these ear buds. They fit snugly and the sound quality is great. The battery life is what sets these apart from any of the other bluetooth headphones I've had. I love the rechargeable case. I just pop the ear buds in the case and it automatically starts charging, without even being plugged in.  So far I'm extremely happy with the fit, the sound quality and the battery life. I haven't tested out the water resistance, but I love that I don't have to worry as much about getting them wet. Looking forward to getting lots of use out of these!

title: Enjoyed mildly before they broke 6 weeks in
body: I've had these for about 6 weeks. The first couple weeks I didn't use them much as they seemed to beep at me constantly. Once I got more used to that I liked them more, but the battery life was minimal and they didn't stay in very well while running. As of about 3 days ago the right one started acting odd and had a different sounding voice, the yesterday it completely stopped working. So now I have one headphone that I mildly trust to work. Don't get these if you are looking for long term headphones.

title: Better than the price indicates
body: You don’t expect much in the price range, however these exceed expectation. Very good sound... with decent highs and lows.. the ear foam allow the correct size at least for my ears. The fit is nice and comfortable. The batteries give several hours of use... overall I can’t complain one bit... nice set

title: Great value for the $
body: These ear buds sound fantastic!  Solid bass, and full range sound that equals anything I have tried before.  They also stay put in my ears a lot better than i thought they would when I bought them.  The only thing I can honestly complain about is that they don't control volume ....  however,  since the floor volume level is set fairly high,  the device (phone, other Bluetooth device) volume can control the ear bud volume quite well.  I find myself turning DOWN the volume on the device rather than wishing it could get louder.  All in all,  a really solid item,  and i am very pleased with my purchase.

title: Good quality sound for a reasonable price!
body: So far so good! The sound quality and battery are good. I tested out the waterproofing in the shower and no problems. I like that I can use each earbud individually since I can only hear out of one ear. The only downside is no volume control on the earbud, but my phone is usually handy.

title: Just like the reviews claim
body:
I spent quite a bit of time researching various earbuds after my wife bought some earPods and wouldn't stop gloating about them. I accepted the challenge to find <$200 earbuds that were of comparable quality.

While I will say that these are not as versatile as the earPods (earPods don't feel as stuffy as these ones do, and have better noise pass-through when off), I sure love the fact that these cost about 25% of the price as hers. Not to mention, I can use these in the shower! I've had them drop out of my ears several times, no problem.

IP68 earbuds? Awesome!

I've also managed to have these in around 70% volume for ~3 hours, and the battery has only died on me once. I don't remember how long they were in for, to be honest, but over 3 hours.

Excellent product!

title: Phenomenal Quality!
body: After a month of using them, I could honestly say, the TOZO T10 earbuds are great quality! The sound quality is exceptional. Great base and balance all throughout. They are comfortable, it feels as if you have no earbuds on! They are firm and will not leave your ear. They last me all throughout my 12-hour shifts at work! Finally, the charging is extremely quick! If you are looking for earbuds that compete with that of Apple and Bose, these are it!

title: Excellent Product
body: I'm very happy with these. When you consider price point vs features, these buds excel in quality and performance. Pairing was a breeze. I love they way they auto turn on and off when removed and replaced in the case. Use one earpiece or two. These buds are smart enough to know your choice with no extra clicks or buttons to push. Music and voice navigation is easy. The case is compact and light. I can charge it on the weekend and use it at work all week. If you're looking for value, this is it.

title: Don’t stay synced when streaming music.
body:
The sound quality is great. They stay in ear well when working out. The biggest down fall is that the left and right bud do not stay streaming at the same time. Audio on the left channel drops in and out when music is playing for the slightest reason. Head movement, phone movement, standinging still... it’s very annoying if your trying to get into a groove to have one ear bud just stop working for zero reason. For that reason alone I give it a 2 star because that is over all terrible quality for headphones.

—-update—-
