The company reached out to me after I posted my original review offering to send me a new pair in exchange for a better review. I assured them that had I received a working pair I would change my review. They would only offer me a replacement pair if I changed my review first. Unethical returning to sender and purchasing from a different vendor.

title: Outstanding wireless headphone!
body: These headphones work as advertised. Super simple to use. Just take them out of their charging case and connect to the right headphone and done. Used them for an hr in the gym deadlifts stair master jumps etc and thestayed in my ear. Highly reccomend!!

title: Terrible Bluetooth strength
body: The sound quality and volume of these headphones was good as well as the comfort. However, the Bluetooth strength and battery are awful. I had my phone in my pocket at work and was walking around like the hunch back of Notre Dame trying to avoid it going in and out. Additionally, the battery only lasted like 2 hours. Unless you're a midget or planning on wearing your phone on your arm or something and don't care that it'll last less than 2 hours then spend the extra money on a better pair

title: Great sound at a fantastic price!
body: I absolutely love these. They are a great product, especially for the price. The sound quality is great. They definitely cancel out the background noise. I was wearing them at work and my boss kept trying to speak with me, he would have to lean over and wave at me to get my attention because I couldn't hear him at all. Super easy to use. Overall quality is much better than other earbuds costing 3x as much. I will definitely be purchasing a few more sets to give out at Christmas. I can't recommend them enough!!

title: T10 > AirPods
body: There is a reason for the high reviews. I have an iPhone XS and not even at half volume you can’t hear anything besides the music. The case Is well constructed and the quality is well beyond the price. My only issue is my ears are narrow so the SM buds are a little to big for me but they still don’t fall out because they fit so well into the ear-well. And it comes with a 1yr warranty. I emailed them and got a message back same day.

title: These work great
body: Like these so much ordered another pair as a gift.  Included are different size buds.  Fit great.  Wear them when I workout.  When I get a call while music is playing. they mute the music and announce the call.  Totally awesome.

title: Perfect Purchase
body:
Standard for all my reviews: When reviewing products, I always remain objective and honest about the product or service. I always review with information that I feel others would like to know about the product as I always assume what I'm writing will influence for or against the purchase. I always try to go above and beyond surface characteristics and input into quality, value and application. Most importantly, I will always end the review with an answer as to whether I'd purchase the product again which I believe is the most critical question pertaining to the item. To manufacturers: Want me to review your items, just let me know!

These are exactly what I was looking for.  I did a lot of research and wanted to make sure that the earbuds I purchased could be used independently (one at a time) and also had multiple sized umbrellas for my ears.  I've had multiple surgeries on my left hear and the ear canal is much bigger than on my right, not to mention I'm mostly deaf in the left ear.  With both earbuds in I can hear just fine but usually just use my right one.  The wireless charging case is awesome and they are magnetically drawn into the each respective holder to charge.  They seem to hold their charge for a long time and the charging case is said to hold enough power to fully recharge three times.  I haven't seen it run out yet but haven't used them so often where that would be much of an issue.

They look good, fit well and the sound is quite good.  I only use it for me workouts and don't do a lot of treadmill/running so I can't speak to how they hold up to more jarring activities but they are perfect for gym visits where I use weight machines, rowing machines, etc.  Based on the fit, I don't think anyone would have a problem with these for most exercise.

Highly recommend these if you don't want to spend over $100 for earbuds or conductive headphones.

title: Good value for wireless Buds.
body: So far so good, I’ll update my review as I continue to use them. They have worked great in extreme cold weather and while working out. The battery life is great and the earbuds stay in place while running. One thing that bothers me was, after registering my device the manufacturer reached out with a request to provide a review. I’m not sure how I feel about that tactic as it makes me think that they think their product isn’t good enough to warrent a review.

title: Fantastic sound quality and levels!
body: Really pleased with this product! Slightly heavier than I expected but the sound is fantastic! Quality and level of sound is the best I have ever heard in ear buds. Battery life seems good but I haven't used them for extended periods of time so not sure but doubt this will be an issue. Again really pleased!

title: Perfect for the price!
body: The buds paired easily, and I really liked the different sized earcaps which I played around with til I found the right size.  I had thought, like others have said, that my order was missing the earcaps, but they were in the little box; it just felt like it was empty after I removed the charging wire but they were in there.  I bought the buds to listen to podcasts whilst loafing around - and they are perfect for that - but I'm not sure that they would withstand much activity. But for me, what I use them for, and the price, they work great.

title: Loses connection constantly.
body:
These lose connection to my phone constantly when it's in my pocket. Doing something as trivial as crossing my arms across my chest will cause them to completely fail. Whatever side pocket I keep my phone in, the same side earbud will cut out in time with my steps.

For sound quality, that's terrible. The noise cancellation is fantastic though because I can cause these to stop making any noise at all and all I have to do is cross my arms!

title: Best earbuds ever!!!
body: These Tozo earbuds are some of the best bluetooth earbuds I have ever purchased. The sound quality is amazing and they're well made. So they're not going to fall apart any time soon.

title: Solid Bluetooth Headphones
body:
Bought these back in January and I gotta tell ya, once you get them it's hard to live without em. Tozo is great.

Lightweight, durable, and they charge QUICK. Possibly the biggest surprise was how good the sound quality is for such a low price; they don't skimp out on bass or noise cancellation either. They've got a pretty long range as well--I've left my phone sitting in another room and am still within range (even with a wall in the way). Perfect for the gym, shower, around the house, etc.

I definitely recommend them!

title: Works as Advertised!!
body:
Works as advertised!! Sound quality is good!! I have now been using it in my flights, and the connection is automatic to my iPad and mor importantly connection does not drop. Noise canceling is adequate, while you will still hear the drone of the plane engines, the decibel level is appreciably lower.

The earbuds are light, and more importantly they ship with the package 4 sizes to make sure you have the right fit for your ear. The carrying case is compact, and you can put it in your pocket.

title: Pretty Damn Good!
body:
Real easy to pairs easy with my old LG V20 phone. Really good sounding. Cheap Trick sounds GREAT with these earbuds.
No worries about how long in use before having to recharge them. They fit very well with the use of the correct ear tips.

title: Best earbuds in this price range
body:
I've always been a bit weary about wireless earbuds, but I took a leap of faith with these after losing my old pair.  My old pair was a set of Sony MDRXB50AP Extra Bass buds, which were really nice for the price.  The TOZOs are beyond better,  and well worth the extra $20.

Sound quality is the best I've ever had in an earbud in this price range (I've never spent more than $50 on buds, but with these I don't feel the need to).  The bass is much more powerful than my old Sony's without drowning out the mids and highs (though if you disagree, equalizer settings on most phones can rectify this).

These are really simple to use as well.  Initial pairing took less than a minute.  From there, take out the right bud, give it a sec to pair, then take out the left one.  That's it.  Putting them back in the case disconnects and charges them.  I haven't had a chance to test battery life, but there are many other reviewers here that have.

Customer service is also top notch.  They'll email you a few days after you've received the buds to make sure everything is running smoothly.  They'll also throw in a wireless charger if you leave a review (they didn't ask me to write a 5 star review, I'm sure they'll send a wireless charger no matter how you rate it).  They seem to really care about their product, and it shows.

title: It's a beast in small package!! Ultimate item
body: Ohh Man, this is the best wireless earbuds one can find for less than 50 bucks.. truly impressed with the quality and the sound output.. forget all expensive earbuds and go for this.. you will never find better than this even though you spend more bucks... It's truly waterproof. Only thing I have not tested the calling feature supported by it. Just close your eyes and buy this. The sound quality is superb at low volume as well as high volume. It's able reproduce the perfect sould effect for low volume which is the best part of it and one this it's loudness is solid you satisfaction is Guaranteed!!

title: Not worth it.
body: I did not like these headphones at all. They keep glitching. The button to push to pause/turn off is really hard to press and has redialed to call people when I was trying to just turn it off. It's clunky and cheap material. I would say spend an extra 50 or whatever and get something better. These are a waste of money and definitely not worth 50 bucks. I would say the sound quality is worse then a pair of 15 dollar wired headphones.

title: Excellent product, excellent price!
body: I have been looking at earbuds for a while, and haven’t been able to justify the price... until now. The sound quality is fabulous, pairing with my iPhone is super simple, the charging case is super sleek and portable. I love that they have added four different size options for the silicons pieces that fit inside your ear. It makes the perfect fit possible for all ears!

title: Awkward fit
body: These headphones are too big. I put on the smallest ear piece attachement and they still didn’t fit well and kept falling out. I have no problems with other wireless headphones when it comes to size so I don’t think my ears are strangely small. They also protrude out of the ear a decent amount. All in all, they don’t fit well and look awkward. I can’t judge the sound quality since I couldn’t use them as designed.

title: Excellent quality!
body: I absolutely love these so far! They do fall out a little easier than I'd like when sweating in the gym or doing yoga, but the sound quality is excellent, they are light weight, easy to pair, charge and use! I bought white for me and black for my husband and he feels the same! We've tried swapping the silicon ear pieces to the different sizes that are included, but that didn't change anything or make the slippage better. It's not terrible slippage, but enough to be just a little annoying. Otherwise these would get 5* from us, especially for the price. They work better than the earbuds I spent 3x the $$ for I had to replace.

title: Father's day gift
body: Husband has been wanting Bluetooth headphones to listen to while at work! He tried them and loved them! Great bang for your buck! Only concern is the charging case, it doesn't quite charge it four full times.

title: Best Budget TWS ever.
body:
This product is great the sound is up to par with my bose earbuds.
They fit comfortably in my ear, at first I thought they were too big but the earbuds come with different gel sizes.
Battery life is great lasts 4 to 5 hours for just one charge.
Charging case is one of my favorite things about the product, nice easy plug in and extremely fast recharge time.
An overall great product, great price, even better quality, I love it!

title: Good for large ears, not so much for smaller ones
body: I really wanted to like these but they are just not good for my small ears. I wanted them to workout in since I don’t like the ones with the cord on them but even with the smallest ear bud in them they just don’t fit my ears well

title: Amazing Bluetooth Earbuds!
body: These Bluetooth earbuds are amazing! The sound is exceptional, and the fit is perfect. I am so pleased to have found such a great wireless hearing device at such a good price. I've had more expensive units, but this has made me enjoy my music and audio books way better. Thank you!

title: I love them
body:
The sound quality is amazing.  Best earbuds of any II've ever owned, not just for a $50 pair of earbuds but ANY, even sets where I've paid 2-3x the price.  Full base, great volume, good battery life.  SUPER comfortable even after a couple hours of use and they stay in my ears during workouts.  I love the IPX8 and the fact that I can wear them in hte shower or swimming.

The only drawback is the the button functions on the earbuds are geared towards phone calls, not music - no FF/RW or volume.  Missing volume is not uncommon for true wireless but the lack of FF/RW is a big miss.  That said they are so good in every other respect I'm keeping them and would most definitely  buy them again.  Hopefully on their next version they fix the one shortcoming.

title: Not worth the tape needed to return.  Don’t buy!
body: I hated these. I started a return no more than 2 minutes after popping them in. They lack in volume. I had the volume all the way up and it was woefully insufficient. Also, there is almost zero bass. And even with the largest buds attached they do a poor job of blocking out outside noise.

title: No sound volume control
body: i bought this earplug to use with my VR. But i found a few serious problems that make it impossible to meet my needs. First of all the buttons on these ear pieces lack critical functions, such as raise up/drop down sound levels. When i use my phone for VR, i don't have access to the phone buttons to adjust sound volume. Also it lacks next/previous functions when playing music. One extra annoying issue is pressing right ear button once will redial last phone no. which is a huge piss-off. i accidentally dialed the number i hated just because i pressed once trying to stop the music. These earplugs also are not comfortable to my ears. i have tried all sizes that come with it, none will fit comfortably for like 10 minutes. i took off the rubber part and found the stems are too long compared to another model i have. Other than those, it seems to be a OK item. But if you care about what i have mentioned, you might as well look for another product.

title: Great Clarity but lacking in Volume
body: I bought these because I wanted totally wire free earbuds.  These are a little bulky, but deliver a quality sound.  I wouldn't describe them as noise cancelling, as when using the pair, as opposed to just one so one ear remains open to all sounds, the volume tops off a little too low for my liking.  Using for Amazon Music and the sound on some things are barely audible if there is other active sound in the room.  But there is no upward adjustment that I have found to make them more functional.  I grade them overall a B-minus, for volume and comfort, a "C-" for volume and bulkiness, but a solid A for qualify of sound.

title: Really like this product from TOZO
body:
I have purchased a few different earbuds on Amazon before from different vendors/companies but was not very happy with any of them. They were either of poor sound quality or the volume was too low or the battery life was not very good until I found these.
The TOZO T10 surpassed all my expectations. It pairs easily, has a really great sound quality, volume levels are high  and the battery lasts much longer than what I expected. The nice feature I like is that the two devices (left and right) can be paired individually! Would definitely recommend this product!

title: Amazing!
body: I can't remember the name of the trade organization that gives Best Design awards, but this little package deserves it. As someone who loves buying electronic gadgets of all kinds, I have yet to see one as well designed as this one. My only suggestion concerns the ear pieces - even the smallest one is somewhat too large for me. Other than that, way to go, guys!

title: Great sounding headphones.
body: I finally got tired of wired headphones getting in the way or getting caught on something and being yanked out of my ears, so I decided to jump on the bluetooth headphone bandwagon and after some research I decided to try these ones out. I'm very happy with my decision these headphones sound great and they're comfortable. I was impressed by the bass that they have and the highs and lows are really good too. All in all I'm very satisfied with my purchase.

title: Great.... when they work.
body: When they both work they are good. However, the left bud works intermittently. These are less than a month and a half old. I’m not impressed with the quality of them.

title: Staticky
body: No good

title: 90% awesome
body: I love these! I ordered them for my birthday after extensively reading reviews, and I've been using them ever since. I haven't noticed a lack of bass, seems solid to me. I've also worn them in the shower with no issue. I only have one very minor complaint so far, that is the escalation in volume when you turn it up. It goes from being a bit too quiet to a bit too loud. I wish it would go in smaller increments, other than that they're great!

title: Give these a try!
body:
I really like these earbuds. They are a great value and sound as good as those four times the price.

They fit well, charge from the case, and are wireless charging. Everything you want.

title: Would not buy again.
body: Very good at blocking out ambient noise. Biggest drawback is that the earphones need line of sight to the paired device. I had issues with them dropping audio with my phone(S7) in my back pocket. I could put my hand over my ear and it would also block the connection to my phone. Sound quality was great, I thought.

title: Pleased, Good bang for the buck.
body:
Have been using these buds for several days now and I'm very pleased.  They seem well made, sound quality is good, pairing is easy. Noise cancellation is as good as can be expected without active noise cancellation.  Mine came with 4 sizes of pads S,M,L,XL so they should fit anyone and provide decent noise cancellation.  This is my first set of true wireless buds and I was concerned about them falling out.  But with the correct size pads and proper placement in the ear this doesn't seem like it will be an issue.

My previous headset is an LG Tone 780 and these are superior with regards to sound quality for both music and phone calls.  When making phone calls, the other party can hear me loud and clear, better than my LG headset.  Battery life is fine for how I use them.  I'm the type of person that keeps their devices on a charger anyway so I'll never test the full battery capacity of the buds themselves.  The wireless charging case is convenient and works well.

Overall, I'm very happy with this purchase so far and I've already recommended the buds to several friends.

title: Great Customer Service, Left Channel Issue
body: When I first tried the TOZO T10 Earbuds I was immediately impressed by their sound quality and ease of connection, unfortunately after a few weeks of use the left channel has gone out, will not connect on the left ear bud. I contacted the company and they responded within 24 hours stating that said they will send me a new pair, so far I am pleased with their response and hope that the new earbuds will perform as well just longer than the last.

title: Not for small ear canals and not for workouts
body: Even with the smallest ear bud attached, I couldn't get a firm seal--My left one catapulted out of my ear into the mechanism of the machine I was on and of course jammed it.  These had already fallen out on the street several times.  I wrote asking if I could replace the left ear bud.  Customer service, I assume there is some, has yet to respond.

title: Really nice headphones
body:
These headphones are really nice and I love using them. Only problem is that they sometimes cut out and randomly dampen the noise . Other than that they are really nice.
EDIT: These headphones are amazing!!! The overall quality is great. The pair I had previously written about were merely defective and after talking to Tozo support, I got a second set of headphones and they work amazing and do not cut out at all.

title: Not good for listening while doing other activites
body: These would be good while swimming or during other sport activity. When you twist the buds in your ear, they cancel out all other sounds. This doesn’t work when you need to multi task. If you don’t twist the bud inyour ear, it repeatedly falls out.

title: As advertised
body:
Just received these and they seem like a great product. They are heavy duty, paired right up and to my phone.  All features work as advertised. I have not yet had a chance to test the waterproof feature but no doubt they will work fine. The case is very nicely made and closed firmly.

UPDATE - first set had a problem with the left bud cutting out on occasion. I reported the issue to them and they replaced the set immediately with no questions asked. I give them 5 stars for customer service.

title: WOW these buds are awesome 👏🏽
body: I have been blown away from the time I opened the package. The sound is unbelievable. There is more bass in these boys than any earbuds I have purchased(this is set number 5) and the highs and midrange are really good too. If you’re looking for real deal, try these!

title: I love these!!
body: They are small but off the sound quality and volume that I was looking for. Charging is extremely easy and the customer service is impressive. I highly suggest!

title: Should have bought a long time ago
body: I am using these with a windows computer and I was using two 6 foot audio extensions previously. I should have bought these a long time ago, they were an easy upgrade. They work great and I am surprised how loud they can be. Normally I hate bluetooth devices with a pc but these were very easy to figure out. Case is super convenient, these are a good design.

title: Excellent for Walking
body: I purchased this set a week ago and have used them several times since. So far I’m completely satisfied with them. I used them for walking and found them comfortable, producing good sound, and no cut off at anytime during my walking. Highly recommended.

title: Great buy!
body:
Shipping was free and I received these earbuds in a day!  I was super excited to use them.  Really cool look...as advertised.  Really neat charging case.  The usb cord is really short, but that's no big deal.  They fit into my ears fine.
I used them outside digging a trench in the yard they held in my ears fine.  They worked great.  Only a few times the music got scratchy from being too far away from my phone.  Excellent buy though!  Quick delivery.  Very happy with my purchase and you will be too.

title: Really nice!
body: Wasn't sure what to expect with these. Once I figured out which earbud cover was optimal to seal the ear it has really nice sound! Bass is pretty decent. Easy to use. I love how they auto turn on when you take them out of the case and will connect to your phone right then. Charging case is a really cool way to store them and travel with them and will charge them up a few times before needing to be charged itself. Overall, very happy to have finally ditched the cables!

title: Great sound
body:
These headphones have great sound for a good price. At first it seemed they wouldn't stay in my ears, but once you have the right sized ear buds attached (4 or 5 sizes included) and follow the instructions, they stay in very well while you're working out, jogging, etc.
Hint: You have to turn them until the bigger outer part of the headphones is resting against your outer ear. (Read the manual)
Occasionally they don't turn on, but only until I put them back in the case and take them out again.
One thing missing for me is more controls for my music. While I'm working out, sometimes I want to skip to the next track without returning to my phone. This isn't possible with these headphones. Also, you can't control the volume from them.
If you turn off the Bluetooth on your device they turn themselves off, however, if you don't have the case with you (it's a bit too big to bring with me while jogging), you can't turn them back on again until you return them to the case and take them out again.
Otherwise, they're great.

title: Great pair of earphones!
body: Very comfortable in the ears. I had AirPods but hated how they always fell out my ears. These earphones are great for exercise because they won’t fall out your ears and they have great sound quality.

title: Ok, but sound sucks.
body: I'm not terribly impressed with the sound quality, but I don't hate them... for $50 bucks I could have gotten better quality sound.

title: What's not to like
body: I've tried these out for a few days now working out at the gym and it's been great. Even before putting on my music they worked great at canceling out the outside noise. Battery life is great, didn't have any disconnection issue. The earbuds tell you when they are connected to the phone and paired with each other so that's a nice added bonus when they are already in your ear. Definitely worth every penny!

title: Bass bass and more bass!
body: Good battery life, excellent bass response and excellent sound clarity. Impressive sound quality in a small package. I use these everyday in my train ride to and from work and they're very comfortable to wear for extended amounts of time.

title: Good Quality at a reasonable price
body: great product at a reasonable price. very slick and slim so it will fit perfect on your ear ( you'll get extra plug for various size so you could change it if the plug is too large or too small ). good quality sound throughout and noise cancellation help block out outside noise ( you'll have to get used to it since you can't hear any sound other than your music ) direction is very simple, turn on your product and turn on your bluetooh and sync ( done! )  I'll definitely recommend this product to anyone who need wireless earbuds.

title: Comparable in quality to $100+ buds
body: Very nice headphones for $50. The case, with a full battery, can charge the earbuds up to 4 times. The sound quality on the headphones is very good for the price and comparable to pricier name brands. Range isnt great but it suite my needs for the gym and even at work. The noise cancellation is also decent. The earbuds drown out a lot of outside noise. Comes with a 1 year hassle free warranty.  Overall recommend for the price.

title: Not a bad bargain
body: Clear sound however, not very loud,  can never user both at the same time so not sure about the noise cancellation feature, they last about 5 hours before needing a charge which is a bit frustrating when I need them for longer periods. The portable charging case is handy though

title: Did what we needed for a good price!
body:
Did what we needed for a good price!

Replaced a set that broke after 45 days.  For this unit:

Pros:
Good price
Can just use one of the headsets at a time if you want
Good sound quality
Color
Slim/portable case

Cons:
Battery life could be longer
(There are smaller cases with larger battery life)
Sometimes when you’re using the left one it will stop the music and make a beeping sound

title: Extremely good quality of sound.
body: Extremely good quality of sounds and noise block. I was hoping for a longer ear buds battery life. Carrier case has a good battery life. I was hoping for a longer Bluetooth range for swimming,  but if I use a floating box or waterproof case for my phone to keep near, it works.  Extremely good quality of sounds for the price.

title: This product is an amazing must have, the overall build of this product is simply one of a kind
body: I bought these headphones as gym headphones, to use in a gym setting because the corded headphones were a hassle to deal with during reps. However, they have surprised me, so much so that i have literally not taken up my corded headphones since I've received this TOZO product. they're great for gaming, phone calls and literally anything else you can thing of. I just love em. Great job to the product dev team who came up with this design as well, it fits perfectly and never falls out, not even when i sweat profusely,a nd believe me i do all sorts of movement with them in, and they never budge lol. an all around amazing product... a must have i tell you

title: Only need this Headset nothing else.
body: The whole enchilada is what you get here! I haven't found a single headset or wireless ear piece, that I even remotely enjoyed. Its always been something 2-6 weeks in! Rather it is the Natural punch and peak of the speskers that got me. Listen to just YouTube on volume "1" then tell me different. Lite weight yet sturdy & durable to make your life's Journey. If you ever listen to any review. Pick this ONE.

title: Good sounds with major flaw
body: Just received it today and charged it fully before testing it out.  This earbuds sounds pretty good for the price but I have to return it due to left earbud keeps on loosing signal.  I found out that every time my arm goes over the right earbud the left side loses it signal. For example when I do sit-ups with my hands behind my head the left side started to lose signal.  I tried to cover the right earbud with my hand to see if the problem exist.  Sure enough the left earbud loses its signal when I cover the right earbud with my hand.  I will probably not buying these earbuds again due to the above problem .  Also it doesn’t have control for volume and skipping tracks.

title: Great product, great customer service!
body: These are amazing! I use them every single day and have been very happy with them! I ran into an issue with charging and customer service was very quick to respond and solved the issue 100%. I highly reccomend them!

title: Great purchase
body:
At first I wasn't sure if these earbuds were going to be worth it because of how affordable they are, but I decided to watch some reviews and then I chose to get them and honestly I'm not disappointed at all. The battery life is one of the things I love the most, and the case to recharge them when they're not being use is great.
I'm very happy with these earbuds

title: Great pair of bluetooth earbuds!
body: I've been using these earbuds now for about 3 months, and they work great! The sound quality is great, and the distance is such that I can walk into another room away from my phone to get something and the music still plays! The charging container that comes with it is great, you need to charge the earbuds about once every 6 hours or so, and the charging pod itself needs to be charged every couple of days. I don't use my ear buds every day so I charge the container about once a week, and the buds every other day. They are also sturdy...the left earbud went through the wash by accident, I let it dry for a day and then put it back on the charger, and it worked perfectly! So very good product I would buy again!

title: Just buy them!
body:
This is an extremely good value proposition. The quality and sleek design is there, and everything functions exactly as it should.
I use these when doing moderate physical activity or at the gym and haven’t had any issues with the fit, retaining them in my ears, or discomfort over time.
The different earpieces size attachments seem to be pretty robust. I’m not expecting to have them wear quickly, and I’ve found a size that fits quite well.
The sound quality is outstanding at this price point. It’s difficult to justify going after a more expensive product when these are available, especially when they seem to be on the same level as those more expensive products in terms of performance and apparent build quality. The wireless charging capability is a nice touch.
Extremely satisfied with my purchase.

title: Amazing for working out!
body: It is so nice to be able to use these earbuds when working out and not have to worry about wires or anything falling out. I have had no problem with jumping and moving quickly with these staying in. They have great customer service and answer questions promptly. Definitely would recommend these to a friend and purchase again!

title: The left is a bummer.
body: So the rumors are true. The left ear bud constantly cuts in and out. If you’re listening to your device from your pocket or in another room. If your device is in front of you, when you put these in, the seem to work perfect until you leave that room or turn around and then the left ear bud cuts in and out.

title: First impressions: so far so good
body: Worked well out of the box (pre-charged, which is always nice). Paired easily with Pixel 2XL. These are not noise cancelling, but they do block a fair bit of background noise (and are more comfortable for extended use). So initial impression is very positive and a quarter of the price of new Airpods!

title: Excellent!
body: Excellent. Very easy to sync to your phone. Which was important to me. I have small ears. Ear bubs stay in my ears. Excellent product!

title: Treble over bass - my preference
body:
I'm very pleased that the treble for these earbuds comes through so clean and these aren't bass boosters like most devices.  I use them inside of over-the-ear noise protection when cutting the lawn and solo when cycling.  I can still hear surrounding traffic, bit more as background ambient noise.

I did have one earbud come out while riding once (very sweaty by that point) and it rolled into a storm drain structure.  Sat in water for 5-minutes while I pried the lid up and worked just great ever since.  Very please with these.

title: Quick pairing
body: The button that does everything is a little hard for me to remember. I pair these with my phone so I can enjoy technology or a business call without disturbing my family.

title: Great wireless ear buds at a very good price
body:
I boght two pairs of T10 and one pair of T8.

The new T10's are superior quality. Isit in my favorite club, which plays loud music and I listen to music from my phone with optimal bass and noise cancellation,

title: Don’t waste your money on Airpods- these rock!
body: This product is great! The ear buds are very light weight and do an amazing job of canceling out sound besides your music! I had an issue with one ear pod coming loose when I was on the treadmill but I just had to switch out the size for the ear piece and problem solved! Since I have small ears it’s nice that they give you a lot of size options to find your perfect fit! I love that every time you are done using these you just put them back in the charger so they never will lose battery on you!

title: High Quality Earbuds
body: These are great. I've been watching all the new offerings for months. I've tried the Airpods, which are too expensive and don't sound nearly as good as these earbuds, no kidding. Battery life is good. Quality is much better than expected.

title: Great sound for a great price
body: These sound great once you find the right size earpiece. Nice packaging, feel reasonably well built and time will tell. At the moment, I am satisfied with this purchase!

title: Hated these, better now
body:
Below is my original review. The company was nice enough to realize a possible defective product and sent me a brand new pair at no charge. Thanks guys!
So far so good!

Only have used these a few times while I'm mowing, literally 4 or 5 times at the most (can't wear them while running as they are too big for my ears) and they barely stay in my ears.
Very difficult to pair and Bluetooth to my phone from the beginning.
Now the right earbud, the main one, doesn't even power on any more so they are now completely useless after less than 3 months and 4 or 5 uses.
Maybe I have a defective one but I there is no option for returns anymore and I don't see an option for contacting the seller.

title: The best buds I’ve ever had!
body: I just recently purchased these earbuds within the last week.  So far, I have never owned a better pair of buds.  The sound quality is amazing and rivals or surpasses and of the many on ear/over ear headphones I have owned.  I have not had any issue with battery life during the few workouts I have used them for and don’t anticipate any due to the charging case, which seems to be of really great quality.  I’ve even taken showers with them and have had no issues.  Overall these seem to be a fantastic pair of earbuds so far!

title: That Elusive Fit
body: I have tried just about every configuration I can think of to get these earphones to fit. It's just not working. The seller was kind enough to reply with instructions but it hasn't been sufficient. The sound is good, and if they fit they would have been a great value. As it is they simply fall out of my ears while I run.

title: Great Earbuds. Highly recommended!
body:
I got these a week ago. I have a very physical job and enjoy listening to podcasts while I work, which was very difficult with other headsets. With these I can have a good listen while working without too much trouble.

Really the only negative I can think of is the battery life, 3 hours but about 9 with the charging case. I use them heavily daily and wish they had a better battery life.

title: Just as expected
body: After reading the reviews on many earbuds priced approximately the same I decided to try the TOZOs.  They arrived on time and were packaged very well.  They immediately paired with each other when removed from the charging device and were very simple to pair with my phone.  The sound quality is very good and although I haven't used them at the gym yet I think they will probably stay secured during a workout.  Overall, I'm very satisfied with the purchase.

title: These things are AMAZING for the price point!  5⭐
body: I've been using these pretty heavily since I got them around 2 weeks ago and all around I have zero complaints!  Waterproofing is super nice for the shower and pool and the ability to wirelessly charge the case is pretty convenient as well.  Sound quality and fit is better (in my opinion) than the AirPods. Noise cancellation is near perfect.  They also play nicely with my Android watch, offering me track/volume control without picking up my phone.

title: For the price equality is good.
body:
Easy to connect to cell phone
Unable to lower or higher volume on the bluetooth.
Hard to answer phone calls. You will need to push down to your ear to answer or hold with your fingers to answer.

Works well. I would like to try other products.

title: design and quality no match for the price!!!
body: I gifted my dad this ear bud in advance for fathers day, he loves it surprising that the quality of the product is such great and especially the waterproof feature makes it even more usable on day to day. I am going to order 2 more for me and my wife for workout. highly recommended. sound base is awesome.

title: Left ear bud cuts in and out
body: Overall these ear buds are nice. They fit comfortably. I wore them riding my motorcycle they did not try to come out of place at all. The phone feature works. However, the left ear bud cuts in and out at times, it very annoying. These earbuds would be a 5 star for me if they worked they way they should constantly.

title: Easy to connect, lightweight... good value and no problems
body:
I just received these yesterday.  The case is light and compact.  Pairing the ear buds to my iPhone happened almost instantly.  They feel comfortable and secure, so far. It's very easy to pause what I'm listening to, as well.  I did notice that the sound would cut in and out, if I walk from my living room to the front guest room (my house isn't huge), so that was a little disappointing.  I use Sony blue tooth ear buds that has much better bass.  So, the jury is still out. I use mine, primarily, to listen to audio books so I can walk around and do my household chores, or listen to a book while walking my dog. I think they'll do fine.  I have a feeling, though, that I'll have to keep my phone in my pocket so the range won't cut out on me. I will update in a few days, after I've used them more. That's when I'll know how the battery life is.
UPDATE: I've had more time to use these ear buds and I've grown to like them a lot. They do fit, snugly, so I don't worry about losing them.  These are super easy to pair. When I lift them out of the charging case, all can hear that the buds are pairing. I go to the Bluetooth in my iPhone and choose the Tozo name and it's paired!  I do have to keep the phone in my pocket, though, if I'm walking around the house-- or I lose the signal.  For the price, I'm happy!

title: They are mostly awesome.
body: So far so good. Usually earbuds don’t stay in my ears, but these guys actually do, most of the time. I have had them fall out a couple of times, but not enough to be annoying. They sound great and they can be used independently of each other. I just wish the beeping it makes when it is searching for its mate lasted only half as long, but it will stop searching and let me wear only one when I need to. I like them.

title: Great Ear Buds
body: I have had these earbuds for a couple months and they are great. The battery of each bud lasts close to 3 hours between charging and the case holds at least 2 full charges. I like being able to use just one ear bud individually and they synch to my phone and to each other with no issues. Although they are labeled “left” and “right”, they are the same shape so I can use each in the same ear and switch them out to charge. Sound quality is about what you would expect with wireless earbuds, it’s good but it doesn’t knock your socks off. It could be how they sit in my specific ear, but they do not drown out surrounding noise as much as I would like. Overall a great purchase for the price, would definitely recommend!

title: BUY THESE NOW! TOZO Believer!
body:
Man I LOVE THESE EAR BUDS!!! The Bass is crazy! The highs, mids, and lows all sound amazing. I recently bought some Mifo 05s and sent them back after 1 day or so and resumed researching via YouTube and Amazon and these Tozo T10s kept coming up! I’m very happy with my purchase and even if they aren’t “name brand” these are 10 times better than a pair of $250 premium
Beats (which only cost $14 to make) or
Sennheiser, or even my old Plantronics.

title: Good sound.
body: The tone is good and the sound is crisp and clear. The bass is very good but fit and bass were improved when I switched to the smaller ear buds. TOZO adds an interesting feature in that when you take the right earpiece out of the case it immediately powers up. Take the left earpiece out and it syncs to the right earpiece. Pairing with my phone was no problem. I am not a runner but I had no issues with the fit or the earpieces staying in place during brisk walks and riding my bicycle.

title: Great Earbuds!!
body: I have tried many earbuds and these by far are the best. They fit my ears good and the sound quality is amazing. I give them five stars.

title: Amazing!
body: Love everything about these! Sound's great, super easy to pair (had them on within 30 seconds), comfortable. I've had these for about a week and can't sat enough nice things.

title: Ear buds keep falling out of my ears.
body:
Update: I've inquired more than once about getting the extra small eat tips, but while a customer service rep answered other questions, they failed to respond to the issue about extra small ear tips. Since the earbuds keep falling out, with the left earbud falling out more frequenty, as well as causing ear pain using the small ear tip, I guess I have no recourse except to return them. It's also cringe worthy that the seller is bribe me to better my review.

Original review:
Nice sound. Wish it also included smallest ear buds. Needs a option for a "leash" ... Mine have already fallen out into the trash can and into the bathroom sink, and it's only day one!

title: Fantastic Sound
body:
My wife has been using wireless earbuds for a year or so, but I'd been sticking with my wireless over-the-ear full size headphones because I believed they did a better job of isolating or cancelling external sounds. Plus, because they were bigger, they'd produce deeper base than buds, right? I tried her two different brands of buds a couple of times, but wasn't satisfied with the sound of one pair, and the second pair, well, they sounded good but they lost connectivity so often they were essentially useless.

I did some review-surfing on Amazon and found these highly rated Tozos, so I decided I'd give them a shot.

Wow! For under fifty bucks, these can't be beat. Sooooo good! I charged them up, paired them to my phone (just the right bud, mind you), and picked out a few quality rock and roll songs to test them: The Cars - Moving in Stereo, Golden Earring - Twilight Zone, Boston - Foreplay-Long Time, Thin Lizzy - Jailbreak, and Barracuda by Heart. The stereo effect is flawless, the high notes were bright and precise, the mid-range tones and voices were clear,  and and the bass was full and deep. Much better than the standard headphones I have been using.

They fit snugly in my ears and do a great job of blocking most of the ambient noise around me. Add in the fact that they charge wirelessly on the pad of my Samsung phone charger, and I don't know what else you need to know. Make the purchase, you'll be glad you did.

title: Really nice.... sound is good... can use each separately with blue tooth devices at same time.
body: They do everything the sellers said they would. Sound is good... reasonably snug and confy… they can also work as a team and give stereo sounds... or, independently and connect to two separate BT devices at once.  It is like you can have two pairs of single ear plugs or have one pair of stereo ear plugs... you get to choose when.  The waterproof quality is just a bonus.

title: Awesome earbuds!
body: I ordered the earbuds for my wife, not knowing what to expect because this is the first pair she's owned. She's had several pair of the LG Tone earphones but their reliability has faded over the last couple of years. She's had no problem adjusting to these earbuds. She likes the sound quality very much and has found it to be easier to a answer and talk on the phone than the LG Tones. Overall, she's extremely pleased with these earbuds.

title: Super convenience...
body:
Got it earlier. Worked out of the box.
-Pro: - I can leave my ip down-stair then go up-stair or work outside/front yard still enjoy the music, still connected
  - The treble is super, very clear. The distant should be maintain within 10 feet of the device.
  - Pair easy to my IpX. The box works on wireless charge
-Cons:  - The bass is good still missing some compares to wired buds
  - The volume is limited. I guess it is the wireless limit.
  - For example: I have a skullcandy hesh 2 over-ear headphone which beats this ear phone if wire used but for  wireless the Tozo is more. Otherwise if compare the Tozo to the "Beats Urbeats3 Earphones with Lightning Connector" that I also have the Beats is more. Once again I guess it is the limit of wireless.
  All in all this is the best wireless ear phones that I have until now. you shouldn't try to remove 2 ear buds at the same time from the box, just pick one by one then they will be paired easier. Good for recommend to others.
  UPDATED AFTER COUPLE MONTHS:
My left ear bud was out  I contacted the Seller and they sent a new set in about couple days. Excellent customer services.Thanks

title: Sound quality is great
body: Very impressed with these wireless earbuds. The sound quality is great and the base it has it surreal. I have it on the lowest volume setting and it’s still loud. I was contacted by Winnie from Tozo Services to ensure my satisfaction the day after I registered the warranty. Great to see a company reach out to its consumers to get feedback. I would definitely recommend them to family and friends. It fits great in my ears without falling out. But I usually don’t have any problems like that with other earbuds I’ve used in the past. The real test will come later when I go to the gym or go for a run and bike ride. Very excited about them.

title: Great quality at a surprisingly great price.
body: I decided to look for a Bluetooth headset after getting tired of holding my phone to my ear all the time.  So, I went to Amazon and began my search.  What caught my attention with the TOZO T10 Bluetooth earbuds is the nearly 9,000 reviews and over 75% 5 stars it had.  After reading about the quality and sound of these earbuds and the cheap price compared to other known brands, I decided to buy them and give 'em a try.  After receiving them the next day, I was presently surprised at how they looked. The charging case is small and solidly made.  After charging it maybe 10 minutes, I was easily able to sync it with my Google Pixel 2 phone.  Since I read that the quality of sound was amazing, I played my first song and was amazed indeed at the quality.  The sound of clarity and bass were smooth with what ever song I played.  I love the fact that you can charge the case itself and in return, it will charge your earbuds.  The call quality is clear as well and I also like the different options the earbuds give you when a call comes in i.e. accept the call, end the call, and call back the previous call.  All and all, I highly recommend this product, you will not be disappointed and for the price...you can't go wrong.

title: does not fit well, seller claims will send gifts for five star review
body:
Bought these to replace another pair of blue tooth ear buds that I purchased that stopped working after a few months.  The sound quality on these is much better and they were much easier to use than the other pair.  However, they did not come with different size covers for the ear buds, and the ones that did come with the earbuds do not fit, they keep falling out of my ears.  After emailing the company with no response I posted a 2 star review.  With that, TOZO sent me a replacement pair that contained various sizes of ear bud covers.  After I received the covers the company sent numerous emails asking for 5 star reviews in exchange for a free charging station.  I did change my review to a 5 star after I received the new set of ear buds... more emails came to ask to confirm the 5 star review with the promise of the gift.  The new covers still were not fitting my ears well.  When using the ear buds on runs, inevitably one would fall out.  I knew I would eventually lose one and today was the day that the left one fell out and is nowhere to be found.

In summary - good sound, easy to use, but the earbuds even with different covers, did not fit in my ears.  And the company appears to bribe for 5 star reviews and then not follow through.  Makes me wonder about the other reviews that have been posted.

title: Middle of the road
body:
Pros: battery life, they work
Cons: -EVERY single time i want to use them I have to pair them, they don't remember my device
  -they DO NOT stay in place, they're fine for just sitting and listening but if you're doing anything even remotely active, they move and the music cuts out

title: Performs as described! Great product!
body: Great product! Sound is great! Fits relatively comfortable. Only complaint I have is both earbuds want to be activated/paired simultaneously (right being the “master” and left being the “slave) and, if attempting to use only one: a redundant tone continues to repeat in search of second earbud. It is a low key tone, thankfully, but slightly annoying. This is only an issue if you’re using them while trying to hear surroundings. Otherwise, noise cancellation is superb! Great for the gym, mowing the lawn, or any other activities that don’t require awareness of surroundings.

title: Great Sound, Attractive Appearance, Easy to Use!
body: I received my wireless earbuds a couple of days ago, and I was able to easily pair them with my Samsung phone as well as my Galaxy Watch (which is primarily what I purchased them for).  The earbuds charge quickly, they fit perfectly in my ears without me feeling as if they're slipping out, and without attempting to put them to a noise cancellation test, I had to take them out when I noticed someone talking to me but I couldn't hear them.  My son was looking for a pair, so after I let him listen to mine, he's also ordering a set!

title: They fit and they stay in my ears and the battery lasted through the entire workout!!!!!!!!
body:
I've tried countless earbuds and nothing can stay in my ears. And, if they were wireless, I couldn't get the battery to last for 2 hours at the gym.

This did all of that! I put them in and I could forget them. The blue tooth hooked up to my phone very easily (I had to struggle with other headphones), the battery lasted, and I wasn't spending the entire workout putting them back into my ears.

I can concentrate on my workout now. Yay!!!

title: Went dead as soon as I hit the water - not good when bought for swimming workouts.
body: I bought these to use while swimming laps after reading some positive reviews. After making a successful pairing with my iPhone, I jumped in the pool to get started with my workout. As soon as I took my first stroke both ear buds went dead. Then the right one came back to life and would only work when I took breaths and wasn’t in the water. I put the left ear bud on the deck and continued swimming with the right. After working intermittently throughout my workout it eventually completely shut down and hasn’t turned on since despite getting charged back up. Very disappointing so still on the lookout for a true pair of waterproof ear buds.

title: Great overall for sports / isolation
body:
I generally don't do many reviews, but reviews helped me decide on these.  As a musician, I have many earphones, earbuds, etc. $400+ wired ones, and less expensive bluetooth, all for different purposes.

I bought these for exercise and all purpose use, have had almost 2 months, daily use.

Pros:
  1) Sound is surprisingly good and full (iPhone XS Max)
  2) Never cuts out for me anywhere near, and functional range is over 33'.
  3) Seal is awesome and really isolates well (changed foams to Comply my favorites, the T-200's fit these)
  4) Convenient charging of ear buds, wireless charging of case.
  5) Very waterproof.
  6) Fast charge of ear buds.

Cons:
  1) Case only charges 2-3 times maybe
  2) Case is thick for pocket
  3) No buttons for volume or skip. (Button is a hard press, not a tap.)

They are what I hoped for, and actually sound and seal better.  I have taken them on multiple ocean kayak runs for 2 1/2 hours, flawless functionality, and I can answer calls without pulling out phone in the ocean.  I use them in the gym, 2 hours a shot, never a cut out, isolation is very high (with the correct foamies).  I use them on flights, again, isolation is great and they block out very well, which I prefer.  Have to take one out to have even a short conversation.

title: Great battery life crisp sound
body: i purchased the TOZO T10 wireless earbuds to workout in the pool as they were one of the few IPX8 sets available and definitely the most reasonable. For the price, i didnt expect that much, but I was blown away by the sound quality.... crystal clear with velvety bass tones. Reception distance was really good, there was no loss in quality at the far end of the pool. Good to know that if I accidentally drop one in the water or it were to fall out of my ear, I can scoop it back up and keep going. But it is doubtful that will happen as the fit is tight but comfortable. Very pleased with my purchase.

title: Good customer service
body:
So this is based on only two uses so far.... First use, I was noticing this weird clicking in and out of the sound-very brief skips. I figured it was because I was out in my yard and slipping in and out of WiFi coverage. Next day, out for a run, nowhere near my house... Same thing. I tried turning off call audio, didn't work. Accidentally realized, then, that moving my phone from my left arm to my right arm totally fixed it (or putting the right ear bud in my left ear and vice versa). Can only guess that since the right his is primary and the left bud is the slave that lefty is interfering with righty? Overall tho, sound quality is pretty decent and they actually stayed in my ear without any fidgeting for the entire room. Minus the weird quirk, I'm satisfied so far. For the price, I think they're decent.
UPDATE: after reading my previous review, they contacted me via email and think I may have received a defective pair. They immediately sent me a replacement. Have not been able to test them out yet, but the customer service had been excellent.

title: Best earbuds I've had so far!
body: I've been using this product for about a week now, and it's not disappointed! Purchased it a bit tentatively at first, because all the wireless bluetooth earbuds I've purchased so far have been wonky and broke down fairly quickly. I love that the sound has a rich bass, also provides good sound proofing around me. Love the way it fits my ears when applied the right way - they give me sufficient access to information on how to put them on right so that they don't fall off! Used them for a 30 minute run in the rain, and it was water resistant, just like they said! Over all, recommend! I think I might invest in another pair just for running, since it can get quite sweaty and icky (through no fault of the earbuds themselves)!

title: I did not want to go wireless but Pixel 2 XL has no audio jack.
body: I hesitated on longest time on going wireless on my earbuds as I love my wired ones. However, it's super inconvenient to carry the dongle and pulled the trigger on these wireless earbuds since it's got great ratings. And it is well-deserved. Immediately, you can feel the robustness of these earbuds as well as the case it comes with. The sound quality is much better than I was expecting at this price range. With the right ear silicon size, it fits snugly and do no fear it falling out. Definitely recommended.

title: Great purchase
body: Love it! The quality is great, especially for the price, and they fit so well in my ear and stay put even when I’m doing particularly intense workouts. The battery case doesn’t last as long as I thought but it may mean I don’t know how to appropriately turn off the headphones, and even so it lasts a full week between charges for me. Would for sure recommend.

title: Buy them!
body: If you have small ears and are worried about these falling out, DON'T WORRY!! I have VERY small ears and these come with smaller covers that fit perfectly. I ran a mile on a treadmill and didnt have to adjust them at all! These earbuds are awesome.

title: Great buds and price is right
body: I liked the ease of settling them up and the rechargeable case. I use them all the time,while jogging and at work. I have never a command to recharge due to the case. I remove them at work from time to time  and put them in the case and they recharge then plug the case in with buds before I go to bed. I have listened to audio books without having to stop and recharge. These are the best I have owned and the price is right.

title: Lightweight yet Powerful
body: I am very please with the quality and portability of these headphones. I had some issues with the initial pairing, however the instruction book and separate instruction cards were perfect to sort it out. Definitely read the card first! The ability to plop the case on a wireless charger I think is the neatest differentiation of all the ones I read reviews on. Very happy with this purchase!

title: So far so good!
body:
The actual iPhone hard plastic earbuds have never fit my ears. These fit perfect and feel very secure. I am extremely happy.

Only issue I have is that I would like to adjust the volume lower than it is. Listening through them late at night, when the house and outside is quiet, the lowest volume is a little too loud still.

Over all, I would purchase these again and just might for xmas gifts this year.

title: Harsh sound quality and manual connection process a deal breaker for me.
body: I really wanted to like these headphones.  The sound quality could best be described as harsh.  I appreciate that unlike many bluetooth earbuds, including many premium brand offerings, these do get much louder, but it's very tinny and bass reproduction is nearly non-existent.  I'll give it a big plus for the QI enabled charging case, but my number one issue with these headphones is they do no automatically connect to my phone after using.  The headphones will connect to each other, but I have to open bluetooth on my phone and manually pair them for each use.  I have reset the headphones several times and repaired to have the same thing happen.  I am currently using a Pixel 3 XL so it can't be brand related as there is no bloatware on Google Brand Phones.  Use for phone calls is adequate, although I'm told not as good for the other user as the $29 Sound Peats these were intended to replace.

title: Not good.
body: Sound quality was surprisingly very good. The case was nice because it charges on the go. Everything was good quality. Unfortunately the left ear bud constantly loses connection and breaks up. Extremely annoying. Had to return it.

title: Lots of good features
body: Sound is excellent.  I bought these earbuds to use my phone hands free.  They work better than many others, but the microphone is about average.  I too often get complaints from other party that I am difficult to hear.  Also, if I'm outside, small amounts of wind create meaningful background noise.  Battery life is good, the case is very convenient to charge the earbuds, and the case charges quickly.

title: Worthless junk
body: Bought these for gym use...if you have your phone more then 5 feet away or inside your pocket the signal transmission is horrendous...Bluetooth 5.0 NOT A CHANCE. Was wearing them out by my pool one day and forgot i had them in- got in the pool and they refused to work for 3 days afterwards. Wish I could rate it less than one star. Lousy customer service wont return emails. STAY AWAY.

title: Background Noise
body:
There is a constant static noise on the left ear bud. Not sure why. Fresh out the box and charged, no damage what so ever yet cannot clear this issue.

Update- I dont understand. I have notified this company of the noise on the left ear bud and received a "New one"
Please be aware the replacements were dirty so I cleaned them out before inserting to new ear piece. The left ear bud once again has the same scrunchy noise. The right earbud is perfect.

Update 2- I received an email from the company that they were sending me another replacement for the replacement. Now keep in mind I have 1 year warranty. Came to find out the “ warranty” is send back everything after they emailed me not too or you will be charged again.

title: YESSSS!!
body:
I have been so jealous of all my friends with the AirPods, but I’m one of those strange Alien-hiding-among-you types who cannot keep the regular Apple cordes headset earbuds in my ears to save my life.

I have been doing a LOT of research and I was going to plunk down $300.00 for the Sennheiser True Wireless earphones, but after doing some digging (yes, I saw ALL of the YouTube videos with people freaking out about the sound quality of the Sennheisers) I realized the charging case for the Sennheisers isn’t wireless charging capable — it doesn’t sit on an induction-charging Qi pad like these (the TOZO T10’s do and that’s a big deal to me. ESPECIALLY in a product called “True Wireless” .

When I saw these TOZO T10’s, at first I just could not believe any so cheap would even be alright. I’ve ordered a lot of stuff from Wish just as a joke, but I don’t want some crazy knockoff product that claims to be one thing or another but isn’t that thing at all. Lets face it on Wish you get a LOT of stuff that claims to be Bluetooth 4.0 that’s really BT 2.0 or something.

I was worried about these Earbuds. But these? These are so great.

They arrived beautifully and simply packaged. Though there were a couple of tiny errors in the English instructions, they were small, and did not in any way make the instructions un-readable. They were the kind of mistakes anybody could make because English is weird.

The Earbuds were already all charged up, or very close to the top anyway, and that was great, I could try them out right away.
In about 1 minute, I was already up and running on my phone.

Then, just for fun I decided to see if I could (since they’re BT5) pair them with my Apple TV because I was watching a horror movie and didn’t want the screams echoing through the house.

BAM! Worked first time, no problem. I sat here and watched a whole movie with the buds in and they didn’t itch, or make my ears sweat I hardly noticed them.

I don’t have fantastic hearing. Its okay, but I’m not the guy who is looking for the ability to hear Luciano Pavarotti’s intestinal bacteria working in my ears, you know? That’s what some people want but for me I just near good volume, decent bass and synch’d sound with video and between the two buds.

All of that was fantastic, they won’t fall out, and they are comfy enough that my French Bulldog even wore one for about 5 minutes (we share a lot) and he is SUPER SENSITIVE about his ears, doesn’t like them touched at all if he can avoid it. He thought they were really great. :-)

The only tiny really insignificant issue I had is that I ordered the “blue” ones, I love the color, but on the blue ones the “R” and “L” indicators are REALLY hard to see. I had to use my phone’s flashlight and a magnifying glass to see which was which. I marked the right one in a place you can’t see when they’re in so I won’t have that problem any more.

All in all I highly recommend these you cannot beat the price, and they work just great.

title: Sad to give such a low score...
body:
Ok, what I don't really like is that the connection is shotty because it only stretches 10 meters(and I wouldn't even say that...)

They are good ear phones I just haven't found a way to change volume and/or song without manually without phones. But I may also be spoiled by Ifrogz wireless headphones. I really wanted to try the true wireless headphones without paying 160 for them, but I don't have experience with other headphones like this...

title: Great item but.....
body:
These earbuds are great.... If they would have stayed in my ear. I'm not saying there is a design flaw, it's just that in ear headphones never stay in my ears. I tried all of the earcaps and even messaged the company. Maybe it's just my ears. That's my only issue with these earbuds. The case is great I love the fact that it had wireless charging capabilities. You can listen to through one earbud or both at the same time. I only listened through the right ear so I'm not sure if the left ear plays by itself. The sound is good and loud. I didn't use it for a long period of time so I can't say how long the battery lasts but the case does charge quickly.
I loved these earbuds but they just wouldn't stay in my ear.

title: Really happy with these buds!
body: I pondered ordering these for a week and finally pulled the trigger. I am so happy I did. The sound is impressive and they fit my ears well (with some experimenting with the different sizes), and stay there. I used them for a few hours 2 days in a row and still had 75% battery (in the case). I do wish they had volume control, but I am still happy with the purchase. Recommended.

title: Great for the price
body: They work very well, use them daily, they stay pretty well, sound quality is great for the price and loud enough for NYC subways which is important for me. If you have pairing issues just place back in charger and take out again and they sync back easy

title: Does not work well with Kindle 2018 generation
body:
DON'T BUY THIS FOR KINDLE 2018!  The bluetooth does not 'grab on' for kindle (you have to manually configure it every time--which is a real pain.)  In contrast, I own both the Amazon Dot & an Alterola IE600P both of which once initially configured will grab onto the bluetooth without having to delve into the admittedly poorly configured Amazon Kindle setup.

2nd--Voiceview on Amazon Kindle has an annoying 'click' each time a page is turned--which those of us that regularly use voiceview learn to ignore.  The problem with the TOZO T10 is that it apparently interprets the Amazon page turn click as an incoming call and therefore mutes the first few words of a book every time the kindle turns a page--making the TOZO T10 almost unusable with Kindle 2018 generation (Feb 2019 software build).

I also found the TOZO T10 to be a little larger than my Alterola (which I didn't like).  Otherwise I found the TOZO T10 to have a solid build quality, and good value... The increased size wasn't a deal breaker as in my mind other features made up for it (waterproof, lanyard on the charger, good value).  I just couldn't use it with my kindle.

NOTE:  The kindle-click is not present in either the PC kindle program, the Android kindle app (for the Fire or for phones).  It is only present in the new generation kindle voiceview.  So this earbud may work well with kindle apps for phones or other devices--just don't buy it for the 2018 Kindle.

title: The Perfect Earbuds
body: I mainly use these earbuds while working out. The different size earpieces included  allowed me to find the perfect fit. Paired with no issues right out of the box. They stay secure in ear while working out and never miss a beat during heavy sweat sessions. The sound quality is amazing!

title: Great product, out performs other expensive earbuds
body: I bought these and another earbud (the Jabra Elite Active 65T) around the same time. The Jabra Elite's were $150, 3 times the amount of these headphones, and I found that the T10's outperformed the Jabra's in every category. The T10's are comfortable, loud if needed, have powerful noise cancelling, and amazing sound quality and bass. I workout in a loud commercial gym and need to be focused constantly, and these headphones have no problem keeping distraction away. The bass is incredible, I can feel it in my head and it helps hype me up like crazy. Overall, great product. Save your money on the crazy expensive earbuds and stick with these.

title: These Suck...
body: They'd be great, if all you ever used 'em for was staying completly still. But if you move, I'm talking about Walking here, not even Running, the Left EarBuds will constantly keep cutting in & out... If you want Wireless EarBuds to use while sitting at your Desk, these are for you. If you want Wireless Earbuds to use while commuting to work, or exercising, these are NOT for you...

title: Excellent product and customer service!
body:
I love these earbuds! The sound is excellent, and the bass is better than other Bluetooth earbuds I’ve used. I haven’t had any issues with them falling out during workouts, either.
  The customer service is another selling point. Out of the box the earbuds come with a year warranty from TOZO, and when I emailed them and told them I lost one of the earbuds, they said they’d send me a new set! I was very pleasantly surprised with their quick response and willingness to go the extra mile for their customers.
  All in all, I’d highly recommend this product.

title: Great Bluetooth for working out. Minor flaws
body: These were an interesting experience as they were the first true wireless ear buds I've used. The pairing was simple and quick. The sound quality was average; if your looking for quality compared to powerbeats, these aren't for you. They sit very comfortably in your ears but I sent them back because when pressing the buttons while in my ear it made them very uncomfortable. Would be better if they were switches or buttons around the edge that could be pushed from the sides instead of pushing the device into your ears deeper. The charging case lasted a week and a half from the day I opened it. The battery life is probably the best feauture on this device. Overall I like it but the pressure applied while in ear was bad enough for me to send it back. These ARE suggested for gym use. Waterproof etc ( not the charging case) make for a good workout.

title: Your search for perfection is over
body: This is exactly what I was looking for. I have a hard time getting ear buds to stay in because most are too big for my ears, but with the multiple options for the ear piece these are the perfect fit. They completely block out surrounding sounds and have clear music playing. They are perfect for me because I can wear one if I need to hear surrounding noises or both for complete focus. I highly recommend them to anyone who is looking for an optimal pair of earbuds.

title: I must have pair of ear buds for all!!
body: These earbuds are absolutely fantastic.  The charging in the case and wireless ability to recharge the case is perfect for travel.  I can recharge the case off of the back of my Samsung S10 if needed.  These are a must have ear buds!!

title: Great Customer Service and Product
body: These are wonderful earbuds at a very reasonable price. I have had beats in the past and am much happier with the Tozo T10 earbuds. I am also happy to say that this company's customer service is one of the best. My first pair of T10 earbuds stopped working with my wireless charger, so I reached out to the company. They offered to send me a new set completely free and I could even keep my old ones too. All in all, I am very happy with this company and their products.

title: Left side stopped working after 4 months of use
body: Left earbud stopped working after 4 months of use. I use them 5 days a week at the gym with medium to heavy sweating and always make sure to clean them before putting them back in the case. I've had cheaper headsets last years but this one was a big disappointment.

title: For the price, you can't go wrong.
body: Great headphones, sound quality is good, some of the high range gets a little tinny. Battery life is just ok, on a regular work day I have to charge them at lunch time, so about 3-4 hours between charges. Design is great, choices of ear piece is great, the charging case is great and convenient.

title: Left earbud cuts out
body: If you cover your right ear with your hand, a pillow, a sheet, or just look to your right, the left earbud cuts out.

title: Snug, great sound quality
body: I purchased this mainly for listening to my audiobooks while my husband watched his tv shows. The sound is fantastic. I used the smallest earbuds that came with, and they fit snuggly in my ear. Music sounds lovely too.

title: Quality sound/comfortable
body: I recently bought these wireless headphones and I’m already loving them! Some features that sold me on the headphones are they come with a case that doubles as a charger, the quality of the sound, and the sleek design. Definitely worth the $50. I haven’t worn it long enough to test the batter life however I’m not concerned about it considering the case is a charger. So as long as you keep the case charged the headphones will be charged since the headphones automatically charge every time they are put back in the case. Overall really happy with the product and customer service.

title: What’s the point of hands free if Callers can’t hear you on the other end
body:
Ok so I would have given these earbuds two stars if it weren’t for the insane amount of time they stay charged. I have a job where I’m on my phone most of the day and these lasted a good 6 hours of continuous use. When I wasn’t actively on the phone I was listening to music or a movie while I worked. Sound quality was pretty good . Pairing was a breeze and I never had any connection issues.

Now for the cons, which may be two of the biggest reasons why I most likely will return them .  I’ve been on the search for the perfect pair of ear buds for my needs. These came so close !!’ I would sacrifice a not so stellar battery life for these two issues to have not been issues.
First, like other reviewers have said the ear buds are too big for the ears (I guess unless you have big ears) mine did come with different size earpieces and none of the sizes made the earbuds fit any better. It felt like constantly that they were going to fall out of my ears, which at one point the right one did while I was cooking and fell into a pan of chicken right into the chicken drippings. Thank God it still worked after that. The other issue which is a non negotiable for me was every caller on the other end of the phone said they had trouble or could not hear me. Which leads me to think that the fact that the earbuds being too big is what plays a part in this ; by not fitting properly in the ears. When I would carefully put my fingers to the edges of the earbuds and hold it into my ear, the caller would say they could hear me better.

As a crisis intervention nurse and Having a job where I’m on the phone most of the day it is so important for people to be able to hear me and for me to have the convenience of hands free.

I could even live with the issue of the earbuds being too big . Does anyone have a fix for the sound issue ? If not I’m afraid I will return these .

title: while great sound, kept losing connection
body: The unit kept losing connection under certain circumstances. While they worked great at home, indoors, once i went outside on a bright, sunny and a bit windy day, the left bud kept losing connection, then faded back in within 3-5 seconds. I synced them with a different phone and the same thing occured.

title: Product Frequently Cuts Out
body:
Pros - Nice charging case. Comfortable. Good Sound.
Cons - Frequently cuts out to an annoying degree

I bought these to use at the gym. I saw poor reviews about this issue but all the 5 star reviews convinced me it was probably a fluke, Fast forward to the day after I received them receiving an email offering a free Qi charger in exchange for a 5 star review. Makes sense now. I can't in good faith give these a good review as they are distracting to listen to and I'll be returning the product after a week of use as I am unsatisfied with them.

title: Easy to use and maintain
body: These wireless earbuds are great and easy to use.  They connect to my phone right away and stay connected.  The buds fit your ears perfectly and do not fall out during use.  Just what I was looking for.

title: Great product and service
