body: These are the best wireless earbuds I've used. The sound is loud and clear for music and phone calls. The convenience of using these have changed my workout routine forever. If you have any questions customer service is quick to respond with any issues. They are definitely solid with customer service and quality. I would absolutely repurchase in the future!

title: Not for my ear shape
body: I have owned 2-3 different pair of wireless Bluetooth earbuds and have found that the only way to get any sort of bass response is the have them fit snug into the ear canal to 'lock' them into place.  It made no difference  what size rubber adapter I used, due to they design they would not lock into place.  I ended up returning them with no hassle from TOZO.

title: Loved them for a short time.
body:
I absolutely love these headphones. The sound is amazing. They do not hurt my ears like others I've tried. They're easy to use. Mic works great on calls. Cant say about the waterproof function yet. If I'm cleaning around the house or something while using them I only wear one, because they absolutely are noise cancelling and I couldn't hear my kids otherwise. Definitely recommend.

Editing my review. I've been using these headphones regularly, I'm impressed with the sound. However, now only one will connect at a time. I dont know why or what happened. I've reset them. Tried everything in the manual. I'm exchanging them for a new pair.

title: Sound quality great for the price!
body: Was looking for truly wireless headphones and after doing my research ending up purchasing these.  I have to say I was really impressed with the sound.  I did change the covers to foam though.  It's a personal preference of mine.  Easy to activate and use.  I would purchase these in the future as an extra pair or gift.

title: Tozo T10’s are the real deal!
body: Love this product! I was skeptical before I purchased because of the price but so glad I did. When they arrived the set up was super easy and the sound quality was amazing . I was surprised how loud the volume can go all while keeping crystal clear audio (with no buzzing or cracking) .  The bass is also impressive. I have previously purchased many other wireless earbuds in the $100 -$200 range and the Tozo T10’s performance as good or better for a fraction of the price.  These are also water proof and come with Bluetooth 5.0. My others I paid close to $200 are not. The Tozo T10’s are the real deal! Will most definitely buy again.

title: Works great
body: My daughter wanted air pods but i didn't want to spend that much so I bought these and they work great and she loves them

title: does not work good with calls
body: Great sound with music and I love because I can play sports with these without them falling out my ear. But I do not work well with calls. Every time I answer a call people say that cannot hear me.

title: Earbuds with great sound, comfortable and easy charging!
body: I love my new TOZO T10 TWS Bluetooth 5.0 Earbuds!!  These are the first earbuds I have purchased and I love how easy and convenient they are to use. They are easy to charge with the wireless charging case that comes with them, and the case can conveniently be charged on a wireless charger.  The Bluetooth pairing with my iPhone was a snap.  The earbuds are lightweight, comfortable and have great sound.  They also have great noise cancellation.

title: Trash!
body: BEWARE! The sound quality is good, very good in fact but my wireless case broke, the headphones wouldn't turn on or charge half the time, and then they just stopped working! I threw mine in the trash because the customer service is wack! ALSO NOTE: PROBABLY 70% OF THE REVIEWS ARE ONLY 5 STARS BECAUSE THE SELLER AS YOU TO INORDER TO ACTIVATE YOUR WARRANTY!

title: These are FANTASTIC!
body: I've used these headphones in a number of ways - mostly running, in the shower, or studying - and they've been great! No indication of any issues water, they stay in my ears comfortably and snugly as I run, and help to block out the world as I study. I've been using them for a few weeks, and I love em. The manufacturer seems pretty adamant about delivering a quality customer experience, and I look forward to continuing to use these a LONG time!

title: Awesome in everyway, except the most important feature
body:
UPDATE 2 -----
I received the replacement headphones quickly thanks to their prompt service. For whatever reason I still have the same issue where the left earbud loses connectivity. It's really awful in some situations, other times, it is fine. It seems to occur more outside. I've tried everything to get it to work correctly. Turning off powersaver on my phone, etc. etc. Great service but the product just needs to be improved so that it works all the time.
UPDATE-----
Customer service contacted me and offered a free replacement. Great job on their part to stand behind the product. I will update again once I receive the replacement.  -------

These headphones are so awesome. Great sound, great price, comfortable, don't fall out... except they constantly lose the bluetooth connection! It is so aggravating. they constantly cut in and out anytime you move. This is less than ideal when you use them for working out. sitting still at a desk they seem to be ok, but anytime you get up and move around they immediately start crackling and loosing connection. The right ear stays connected ok, but the left is horrible. I believe the left is just a bluetooth slave to the right. This is to bad since they are friggin awesome otherwise. I'm going to have to return and keep looking.

title: Excellent sound quality and wireles charging case.
body: One step pairing was easy and worked without issue. The sound quality is very impressive. Battery life has been very good and the fact that the case can be charged wirelessly is very handy.

title: A $50 surprise - powerful, crisp and well worth it
body: There are quite a few wireless buds available online and, like other reviews, I wasn’t sure which would be a good alternative to high priced options. I selected the TOZO 10 based on the literal thousands of reviews and good feedback. These things are great! The packaging is professional, warranty is a simple QR code and then in a few clicks you’re registered. The devices fit perfectly and the charger is pretty unique as it doubles a carrier and comes with a lanyard. If you’re going to spend $50, these are the ones to spend it on. You could spend more but honestly, you’re going to get a very good experience with these and the customer service is excellent from a thank you acknowledgment to quick receipt when you submit the warranty. You’re going to like these!

I bought these wireless earbuds so that I can exercise with them. In terms of lifting and an exercises, they typically hold up pretty well. Now, running is where I get annoyed with them. While running at a really fast speed, the last thing I want to do is push them into my ear every time I feel them falling out. And on top of that, they have a bad battery life. They are constantly dying at the most inconvenient times, even after I charge fully and see that the battery level is high on them. Honestly I was so exited to use these and am just disappointed.

title: Great Gym Earbuds
body: I was surprised by how well they've performed at the gym. They don't move at all and I can get a solid 3 hours of playback while on med/high volume, which is more than enough. The case charges the the earbuds quickly so it's non-issue if I need to use them throughout day. Sound quality is great for the gym, it's loud without being distorted and the bass kicks just right. With the right size ear buds and music on, it basically blocks out all outside noise. All in all, I'm glad I purchased them.

title: Solid Bluetooth Earbuds
body:
I'm a big fan of these earbuds.  The Apple earbuds don't stay in my ears plus they are expensive.  These stay in my ears and are comfortable to wear.  They come with 4 different sizes of rubber caps so there should be a size for everyone.  I use mine to listen to music and watch videos and the sound is very good.  I'm sure there are better sounding earbuds out there, but for the price these are hard to beat.  I saw a lot of reviews saying that you can't use these 1 at a time so let me be clear that you absolutely can.  If I use one long enough to run the battery down I put it back in the case and get the other one out.  While I'm listening using the second earbud the first one is charging in the case.  You could use them all day like this.

There are a couple of things that I don't like about them but they aren't big enough problems to take away a star.  Both of them are due to bulk.  Each earbud sticks out of your ear so they're not very comfortable to wear laying on your side.  I don't do that much so it's not a big problem for me.  The other bulky issue is the case.  If you're familiar with the case that comes with the Apple earbuds this one is about twice the size.  Again, not a huge issue for me but if you plan on putting it in your pocket it's fairly big.  It's about 3.25 inches long & 1.25 inches wide & 1.25 inches tall.

If I had to buy another set of bluetooth earbuds I'd buy these again.  They are comfortable to wear, they charge in the case and they sound great.  I also like that you can see through the top of the case when you're charging it or if the earbuds are charging in it.  You don't have to open the top to see if either the case or the earbuds are charging.  I also like that there are magnets that hold the top closed as well as the ones that keep the earbuds secure in the case.

Overall, there are probably better earbuds out there but for the price these are hard to beat.

title: Good for sports, not so good for critical listening
body:
First off, this is a very handy set of earphones for riding the bike trainer. I haven't tried them outdoors, nor am I likely to just because I want to hear cars coming up behind me.
That said, I also tried them for just plain music listening and found they have a curious fade in/ fade out effect in silent parts of music.  This was too distracting.
The charging case is effective. The magnets that hold them in the charging case is a cool idea. It works good. I would definitely buy another pair if needed, but, as I said, only for sports.

title: Really Impressed
body: I wanted some wire earbud for a while but am always skeptical about unknown brands, I have to say i'm really impressed. The sound quality is really good, when the buds are seated correctly the bass is clean and punchy. The paring was simple and seems to hold up well. As far as features go they are basic but that's honestly what i need in earbuds. I want good sound and convenience and these offer both!

title: Comfortable and great sound!
body: So excited to receive my earbuds! They Sound great and are not as noticeable as corded headphones. These earbuds are very comfortable and seem to have a long battery life!  Love the depth of sound quality.

title: My new favorite earphones!
body: I've tried a few wireless earphone products and I've even found some great fits, but none with as good sound quality as the T10. The bass is excellent and high end levels are great too. Not tinny like my old Apple wired earphones. These fit well, and even though I was a little nervous that I had chosen the right color, I've decided that's cool too now.

title: Give it a try... they are good
body: Requested these wireless buds for my daughter, who is a dancer, it took her a couple times to adjust to having individual buds. She had to turn them to make sure they will stay in. So far so good

title: Poor Connection
body:
I bought these headphones to use while working outside. The bluetooth connection is so bad that I have to stand still and hold the phone a foot away from the headphones in order to have connection at all, which completely defeats the purpose of them.
The sound quality is good, especially for the price, but its unfortunate because I cannot use the headphones for the intended purpose listen to music without having to the deal with a chord getting caught in things).

title: Great!
body: I really enjoy these ear buds, great sound. Awesome that it has wireless charging comparability. I used these to workout which includes a lot of jumping and they stayed on the entire time! They are also very comfortable. I also love their appearance, very sleek and high quality. I got the white pair. Syncs very quickly to my iphone 10. Overall 100% satisfied!

title: Great product at great price
body: I purchased these as my son lost one of his airpods and I could not bear to part with the amount of money to buy new airpods.  These intrigued me as they were noise isolation as well as bluetooth 5.0 and IPX 8.  They are great headphones, with great sound quality, excellent noise isolation, comfortable fit and really nice build quality.  For the price, you just can't beat these.  I ended up getting 2 more pairs, one for my daughter and one for a permanent travel pair (they work well on planes).  My only gripe is that switching between devices is no seamless, but does work well.  You have to turn them off an then on again and make sure the other device it was paired to has bluetooth turned off otherwise it will pair with the device it has already paired with.

title: Awsome noise cancellation and distance
body: These are the best hearbuds I have had yet. I  use them at work to drown out the noises around me. These are excellent as there are no wires to deal with. I can move freely around the office and even go to the printer which is over 30 ft away and they never disconnect from my computer. It was also nice that there were several different size for the ear pieces. Will definitely buy these again once they die.

title: Perfect for the price!
body:
The Tozo Earbuds are just as described in Amazon, great battery life, awesome sound quality, and they are in fact waterproof! They come with multiple sets of ear plug sizes and charge very fast.

These are basically replacing my skull candy hesh 2 headphones, mostly becuase this heat is not meant for headphones but water proof wireless earbuds take it on perfectly!

title: Worth it! You'll love them.
body:
I’m really liking the sound and fit. I do wish the charge lasted longer, still, 3 hours is not bad. It would get 5 stars if charge lasted more.  They are comfortable and connect easily. The range is not very good, less than others in this price range, only about 40 feet.

UPDATE: I am Loving these earbuds!

title: Broke after couple days.
body:
Update: got replacement and sound quality is still good but mic isn't.  When I'm in my car people can hear me but they say there's a lot of echo. Once I'm outside forget about it, they have a very hard time hearing me.  If you are using these earbuds just to listen to music and stuff, they work well. Try and carry a conversation especially outside not a chance.

Had good sound quality until the left one stopped working. The earbuds kept falling out of my ear especially when you workout.  Wasn't very secure. Doesn't appear it can stand much impact when falling on ground.
 Shouldn't use this with alot of activity. Only had a couple days.  Will have to get a replacement.

title: Totally worth the money!
body: I was looking for wireless earsbuds which are not that expensive. Due to positive reviews, I decided to go fot the TOZO T10 and all I can say is that I am more than happy. The earbuds are very convenient to wear, the sound quality is great and the charging case is good as well. Due to magnets it is very satisfying to put the earbuds into the charging case. All in all I am very happy with my TOZO T10 and I recommend them to everyone who is looking for affordable wireless earbuds

title: Left ear fades in and out, no way to change volume or track
body:
Sound quality and microphone quality are very good. There are two major problems for me so I will be returning them. 1 The left ear fades in and out if you use them laying down, or rest your head on your hand. 2 There is no way to change the volume or to move to the next or previous track unless you use your phone controls.

I am very bummed because the sound and call quality are so good.

title: Fantastic, amazing, awesome.
body:
Those earbuds Bluetooth are exactly what I was looking for.
The sound is really great. It cancel the noise on my surroundings providing me a great sound quality and experience. In addition the battery life is incredible. I was listening my music's after work, during my workout and even on my way home with just one time charging. That never happened before with other products that I've been trying. Finally my search from a good Earbuds Bluetooth ended.
I need to make an additional comment about the design and presentation of the product it is so clean and modern. No other words. I am very satisfied. Thanks Tozo team.

title: Perfect earbuds for exercising
body:
Quality earbuds at a great price.  Stay in well and sound is good quality.  Easy to pair and battery case is a convenient size.  Great for exercising at the gym and in the pool!
Editing this review a few months later per request of the seller: I've used the ear buds daily in the pool while swimming laps with great success.  Unfortunately, the right one stopped working after a few weeks so I just wore the left - which was fine.  The left stopped working a few days ago and I miss having music with my swim!  The seller has agreed to replace the ear buds. (I did register for the warranty on their site when I received the first pair.)  The seller has been very responsive and easy to work with.  I look forward to having my music back soon!

title: Extremely satisfied customer for life
body: Seriously love these ear buds. They are so comfortable to wear, you don't realize you are even wearing them. They are light I'm weight but the sound is amazing. They for perfectly and don't slip out of your ears. Snug but comfortable fit.

title: Great Earbuds for low cost!
body: I ordered these to use at work when I have GoToMeetings. They connected seamlessly to the bluetooth on my iMac. They feel a little weird in my ear but I'm just not used to wearing earbuds. They also come with multiple ear pieces so if they ones attached do not fit, you can easily switch them out. They are definitely worth the $49 especially since apple ear pods are $150.  The sound quality is great and they are also noise canceling. Battery life seems to be good. I put them right back in the charging case immediately after each use.

title: Awesome! And they’re noise cancelling.
body:
Couldn’t bring myself to buy Apple air buds..read the reviews on these.  They shipped quickly, unboxed them and tried the different size ear pieces to find my best fit.
They were already charged and paired immediately with my phone.
The sound quality is awesome and they’re noise canceling!
Very happy with these, good quality reasonably priced.

title: Satisfied
body: Recently purchased these earbuds and though at first it was finicky but once paired properly I was blown away with the sound quality and especially the bass. Recommended tip is to find an ear tip that suits you to get maximum satisfaction.

title: Great value and customer service!
body: The product (especially for the price) is high quality.  I've had no problems with them at all and customer service contacts you before you ever have a problem to be sure you are satisfied.  I'm going to be purchasing a second pair and am excited to try more of their products as well.

title: Good quality Bluetooth earbuds...
body:
Initially I was having trouble getting the earbuds to fit properly; they were sticking out where they should have been more flush with my ear opening…  After a few attempts I finally got them in right, (see bottom row of image) but it was a challenge at first; helped to stand in front of a mirror. Once you get it right it makes sense and is a snap to fit. It was my first set of Bluetooth earbuds so it was on a steep learning curve to figure it all out at once.

Trying all the different sized tips (included) was useful, finally settled on the medium sized ones with good results. I found that learning to put the buds in, in front of a mirror at first was helpful, as was licking the tips for lubrication made the task easier. It takes a simple rotation of the bud to the back that locks the bud in the right position. Once you get it right and see how it fits, it gets easier.

The sound is surprisingly very good quality and with good base. If it sounds too thin & tinny initially, it’s a sign that the buds are not properly positioned in the ear.

I tried all the included rubber-tip fittings and settled in on the medium. The directions are ambiguous at times and I don’t know if something was lost in the translation, but it easy to figure out and they have a very responsive support team. I contacted them and was linked to several pages and videos that were very helpful.

I like the product and can now listen to my Kindle books without disturbing others. Connecting with iPhone/iPad was easy. The charging unit is small enough to carry in my pocket and comes with a lanyard so you can hang around your neck. Nice little compact unit.

All in all a nice addition to my pile of technology... :)

title: Decent cheaper alternative to AirPods
body:
Compared to apples AirPods:

1. left / right channels cut in and out more frequently.
2. Multi device use can be more problematic to switch back and forth with.
3. Generally more comfortable to the hard AirPods.
4. Sound quality on par or better.

title: So Far, So Good with an update
body:
These are my first wireless earbuds. In my case, I will primarily be using them to listen to spoken voice podcasts, therefore sound quality may not be as critical for me as for those who want to use them for music. I can also get by with a minimum set of touch functions to pause and play podcasts and answer/disconnect phone calls.

Pairing with my iPhone went very smoothly. I'm pleased that there are several sets of different pads as I plan to purchase another pair for my spouse should these work as well as I think they will.

The packaging is very good. The instructions come in multiple languages. The English translation is okay but lacks the subtlety of a native speaker; not a big deal. However, the diagram on the one page "wearing steps" is confusing, with the arrows seemingly given contrary advice on how to rotate the buds.

UPDATE: October 10, 2019
Having used these for several weeks I have some observations to add to the review.
- The pods frequently seem to lose synchronization with one another, resulting in echo. This sometimes clears up on its own, but the surest way to cure it is to reset the buds following the directions in the manual that comes with them.
- Similarly, the pods will also lose connection with the audio itself, leading to pauses in playback. This tends to last for about 15 seconds and then goes back to normal.
- As stated previously, I mostly listen to podcasts. The app I use is Overcast. I have found the same playback issues mentioned above using Apple Podcasts. The audio is already downloaded, so it is not being streamed from the cloud while listening.
- Battery life is good for both the pods and the charging case. No complaints thus far for how I use them.
- An alternative means of dealing with the echo problem that works well with podcasts is to simply turn off the left earbud and put it away. Mono is fine for spoken word.
- I have found that the earbuds have a tendency to fall out of my ears unless I really screw them into my ear channels using a back and forth motion, i.e. clockwise and counter-clockwise. Doing so will seat them firmly but also reduce ambient sound from the outside world so be careful when in areas where you need to have awareness of your surroundings to be safe.

title: Good sound, good fit, don't fall out
body: This replaced a set with the cord between them. This is way, way better. I use these mostly while doing yard work. My concern was them falling out but I have had zero issues. Comes with multiple size rubber pieces so you can get the right size.

title: Great Value!
body: I am very happy with the ergonomic fit and sound quality of these headphones. The battery life is solid for Bluetooth headphones and they are fairly quick to pair to devices. These are a great value for the price point. I purchased these for swimming and have not tried them in the pool yet, but my initial impression is very promising! The noise cancellation is also very good. Many people cannot even tell that I am wearing headphones and get confused when I can't hear them!

title: Good sound. Slow auto-pair.
body:
Pros:
Nice sound for the price
Last longer than 3 hours
Quick recharge
Relatively comfortable in ears (I’ve worn them for 3.5 hours straight, and they didn’t bother me.)

Con:
Takes at least 30 seconds (to a minute) to search and auto-pair my iPhone, so I manually pair them every single time. This is kind of a pain; wish they paired much quicker.

title: Overall very solid wireless earbuds
body:
Pros: -Above average sound quality, good bass quality
- Comfortable feel, even when prolonged usage
- Easy to connect, after first connection attempt it is automatic when you remove them from the charger case
- Battery life is very good, re-charges quickly

Cons: - If you decide to pair one earbud at a time and then pair the other earbud after, it will disconnect the previous earbud you were listening to and only the second earbud will connect. To fix this just shut off both and turn them on simultaneously, not a deal breaker.
- Sometimes the earbuds sound would fade in and out when I am exercising since my phone is on the move, slightly annoying but nothing drastic.

Overall: Worth the price, great quality material and sound, easy to use.

title: Sound quality blew me away.
body: These are a nice pair of truly wireless earbuds. The sound quality is surprisingly excellent. Noise cancellation is great, especially if you use the correct earbuds. Very easy to pair and wireless charging is convenient. My favorite feature is the four blue lights in the case that tell you how charged the case is. No more guessing!

title: Edit: A few months in and the left earpiece has major issues
body:
I bought these TOZO t10 wireless earbuds as part of a lightning deal, so they were $10 off. I had been wanting wireless earbuds for a while, but was hesitant. I didn't want to buy an expensive pair and end up losing them, and quality can be so hit or miss on less expensive products. I took a chance on these, however, and I was not disappointed! The sound quality is excellent, and the bass is nice and deep and rich. They are also totally waterproof! I've worn them in the shower a few times now when I didn't want to interrupt my podcast, and no issues. The battery lasts a decent time, and the case is conveniently sized and quality material. Plus, after I purchased the earbuds, the company emailed and offered to ship me a free wireless charging plate to thank me for my purchase! Seriously, this was overall a great purchase, 10/10 would recommend.

Edit: I haven't even owned these earbuds for six months and I am having issues. I have never dropped them or in any way damaged them, and I consistently keep them charged. I have never worn them in a pool or body of water and only tried them in the shower twice without issues. However, over the last couple of months I have been having issues with connectivity and sound. The left earbud in particular cuts out, and sometimes it won't turn on at all, for no apparent reason. I am so upset, because I absolutely loved the earbuds! For the sound quality they are an excellent price, and they do a great job of cancelling out background noise even though that isn't the primary function. I would buy another pair, but I don't want to spend the money if they are just going to malfunction again after a few months. As much as I hate to say it, stay away from these. Hopefully my pair were just a fluke, but I don't know if I would take the chance.

title: Airpods are better
body:
I bought these as a cheaper alternative, but I listen to music all day at work and it was getting really annoying having to constantly charge these earbuds and to also constantly charge the charging case.  Plus it started getting staticky/pauses during music as if it were losing connection.  I didn't want to get into the hype of the Airpods, but I tried a friend's out and loved it.  I'm able to listen to my music a whole lot longer without having to charge them.  These earbuds are good if you want a cheaper alternative, and I think they do a better job of canceling out noises if that's important to you.

Edit:  Updated to 5 stars purely for their great customer service.  They really try to make the buying experience great and was willing to send me new earbuds to try out.

title: Great sound, short battery life.
body:
I've had the TAZO 10T bluetooth earbuds for 3 months now. They are great! Here is a summary:
pro
+ great sound, good bass, separation and dynamic range
+ solid charging case w/magnetic
+ good fit, solid construction
+ water proof
cons
- short < 4 hour charge
- short bluetooth range (not enough to reach across the pool for lap swimming)
- plastic finish dried out after use in the pool
- charge USB is B-type not C-type

title: Nice sounding ear buds
body: These earbuds sound pretty good. The pairing takes a little while to get used to, but after some trial and error I was able to use either the left or the right (I like to use only one ear bud at a time). Overall I'm pretty happy with these, though I should note at the minimum volume on a Samsung Galaxy 7 these seem a little bit loud, but maybe that's something else I need to get used to.

title: I love it
body: great sound, very comfortable, I think that for the price is a good investment, the battery is durable.  I have only felt a problem in them, and that is that in certain movements of the head you lose the connection between it and you stay listening to only one, the same happens when you cover one of them with your hand, the connection is lost, but it is something  It does not take more than two seconds.

title: Great Bluetooth Earbuds for Price
body: I had recently been gifted a pair of cheap bluetooth earbuds and they broke only after a few weeks. I didn’t want to spend $200+ on something like AirPods, so I decided to find something more budget friendly. Being only $50, I was a bit skeptical on how long these earbuds would last and how well they would perform. However, they seem to be of good quality. I originally wanted something that would hook over my ears, but these seem to stay in just fine without the hooks (they also look more stylish). The different sized caps were nice because I could experiment with them to see which one would hold my earbuds in the best. I took these on a run and they stayed in just fine. I didn’t purchase these because they were waterproof, but I can say that they continued to work well when covered in some sweat. Pairing the earbuds takes me usually 15 seconds or less. I appreciate the little carrying/charging case that comes with the earbuds. It makes charging them so much more convenient. It feels kinda cool how they stay in the case magnetically. I’m not much of an audiophile, but I think that the sound is very good overall. There’s not much bass, but it is something I don’t really mind. I was kinda surprised how well these little earbuds block out sound and reduce noise. Maybe not at the level of headphones, but much better than most earbuds. Overall, the quality of these earbuds are very good for the price. They do exactly what I wanted them to do. The one year warranty is nice too. Highly recommend!

title: Did not like
body: They do not stay in my ear, even after I changed the earbud size. I do not like that I can not do anything with them. The volume can't be adjusted, I can not start or end my calls, nor can I do anything with my music. I thought "hands free" was the point.... if I still have to have my phone in my hand to do everything then that's pointless to me.  I wore these one day and then ordered something else.

title: Pairing is too difficult /  POOR technical support
body: I do not recommend this product to anyone, pairing with any Bluetooth device is too difficult, I tried to pair it with three different Smartphones, and it was really too complicated, when I finally did it, just with one of them (Left) the sound is not as good as I expected, it's only acceptable. The seller only gave me a very vague answer when I wanted to ask for help with the pairing. Never again did the seller give me any answers, therefore I had to ask for the money back, which seems to take more than three weeks. Very bad seller, very poor technical support, and the product is not of very good manufacturing quality. Not recommended ... PLEASE!!!!.. Do not buy this product.

title: Perfect for all activities of a retired guy.
body: Yes, for my exercise bike, outdoor bike, cutting the grass, hiking, cooking, all the activities I fill my retired days with.  These buds are beautifully engineered, comfortable and secure to wear, sound great.  Perfect for all my requirements.

title: WOW! WONDERFUL BASS EASY TO USE PRODUCT.
body: These TOZO T10 are phenomenal. I am a UPS driver for 32 years with a noisy truck and 100's of customers calling all day. For safety reasons I need to have both hands on the steering wheel (not to mention it's the law in Florida). TOZO T10 provides  the simplicity of popping them out of the case and they connect. In addition, I can alternate each earbud throughout the day  so my 12 hour day is never without a earbud. Moreover, the bass is outstanding for any genre  of music and listen time is consistently five hours or more even  with intermittent  phone calls . If the TOZO T10  runs low i can charge it back up about 15 mins for the 30 minute  train ride home. Great Product!!.

title: Decent, but issues getting a refund if you try to return them.
body: I bought these to have something to use while working that was wireless and wouldn’t get in the way. I used them for about two days before i decided that they were not for me because of how they fit in my ear. The sound quality wasn’t bad But I expected more for $50, kinda crackly when you turned them up to anything above half way to full volume. The noise cancellation was good, but that might have been because even with the smallest size of earbud that came with it, the fit was too tight and cause too much discomfort to keep using. I didn’t have them long enough to really get a feel for the battery life. But if you considering buying these, make sure they are what you want. Because I returned them over 2 weeks ago and I still haven’t gotten a refund. I can’t even track the refund through amazon anymore. So just be sure that you have no interest in getting your money back if you have any issues.

title: Great sound and features for a great price.
body: Great low end from these.  Was very surprised at the bass these put out.  I primarily listen to rock, hard rock and metal and these are great for it.  Love the ability to charge on wireless qi charge pad.  Include 3 additional ear bud sizes so you should be able to find one to fit correctly.  Pairing is super easy.

title: Not worth in the long term
body: First of all the earbud seems to be a bit big. So when you have it in the ear it's like this awkward piece out of your ear. They also fit tight in the ear which after a while makes your ear hurt. Do me a favor and save some time and money by not buying this product and getting others. I decided to buy because of the rating and what everyone was saying, but it's all false. At last, you get what you pay for...right?

title: Get these earbuds!
body: Ok. I read the reviews before buying these because I had a bad buy not too long ago. All the negative reviews are such crap. Unless I was fortunate enough to get a good pair. These earbuds are great. I wear them every. Single. Day. I wear them while I run. They do not fall out(make sure you size the earbud cushion). These are definitely worth the money. Oh! And they hold a charge for 4 plus hours!!!!!

title: Nice ear buds
body: I was skeptical when I ordered these because they don't hook over your ear. I was pleasantly surprised by the sound quality great highs and good lows to mid range.  The call quality is pretty good as well. I would give 5 stars but they didn't come with different rubber insert options for the part that goes into your ears. As is, they were too big to stay put. I took parts for another set I had to make work but still have issues keeping them in place. But the recharge case is great and I enjoy that when I wear just one ear bud I don't have the other swinging around my neck. I would buy these again if I had to replace them.

title: Great Product
body: These headphone are great. I went in looking for wireless earphones that I could go to the gym with. they fit great, have great sound quality, and are surprising comfortable. they might not look as trendy as airpods but atleast i'm not drowning in debt. In all, these headphones are great for working out and everyday life for that matter. The charging box charges quickly also and lasts a while. Last thing is that the company is awesome and they truly care about the customer as they offer warranties and follow up via email.

title: Best $50 I have spent in a while.. a lot more than I expected..
body:
just received these today.  OMG they are awesome..  I am not price sensitive.  I would gladly pay double for these..
Sound is crisp full range, bass strong, comfortable, plenty of power.  A little playing with the Bluetooth.  Just remove and rescan..
Will see on longevity, but for $50 wasn’t expecting much, but thought to give it a try before I bought new Sennheisers..
completely satisfied, comes with 1 yr. warranty..

title: Great wireless earbuds
body: This are good earbuds.  They paired easily with my ipod touch.  I love the case that can charge the earbuds without being plugged in.  Sound is rich and battery life is great.  So far they have lasted all day with on and off playing.

title: Great Bass, that's about it.
body:
Pros:
- Crazy bass!
- Fit nicely in your ears.
- Sturdy and magnetic case

Cons:
- Bass is overpowering for any genre that's not EDM (slow or fast)
- Very difficult to turn off; you have to push so hard to turn the headphones off that you really have to take them out of your ears.
- Does not hold charge well.
- No EQ app (to at the very least turn down the bass; the android native EQ does not really work)
- Cannot listen to none-slave bud while the other is off

title: Good quality, terrible battery life
body: The sound quality is great for this product. I really enjoyed using them; however, the battery life was terrible. It does not accomplish what it boasts. After about 90 minutes of use, they need to be charged, and after one full charge, the charger itself needs to be recharged. The frequency of charging necessary makes this product to inconvenient for regular use. I am returning these to use a better brand.

title: Not small enough
body: Unfortunately even the smallest tips were too big for my ears so I wasn’t able to get the full experience of wearing the buds. The sound quality seemed to be ok as well as the noise cancellation but again since I wasn’t able to get the full experience I can’t really vouch for the product. Every time I would move around the buds would fall out.

title: Best Headset
body:
The company is fantastic, I had some minor issue with my first order, they took care of the issue and send me a new one. I tested for several weeks making calls which works flawlessly, plus it was canceling outside noise too. Listening to music is awesome, you can hear every sounds of instruments. Actually this one even better then the one I bought for my wife which has a very good review as well.
I highly recommend this product for anyone looking for great Bluetooth headset, you can’t go wrong with this purchase!

title: Low-cost high-quality workout earbuds!
body:
These are incredible earphones. I use them in the gym and I sweat A TON!!!! I have long workouts. I begin by lifting, then do intense cardio. They stay in my ears the whole time and have great sound for the price.

The charging case is small and solid, and the earphones have a good battery life.

Only two negatives:
1) The range isn’t very far. It starts cutting out at about 10 meters.
2) The call quality for the person I’m talking with isn’t high. People say the sound gets really quiet sometimes, and the audio is crackly.

Otherwise, 5/5. Couldn’t be happier with these earphones so far, and the company has great customer service.

1 year warranty, but I’m pretty sure I won’t have to use it because these feel solid.

title: Worth it
body: Works well bit you have yo have both turned on at the same time or you keep hearing an annoying beep every few seconds, used quite a bit but now the battery life is starting to decline

title: Great product!
body: I have tried dozens of other headphones, both wired and wireless, in my search for a quality product I can use while working or while working out.  This product does the job!  The earbuds are easy to pair, the battery life is great, they stay in my ears during hard runs, and I love the charging case!  The company also demonstrated incredible customer service by reaching out to me as soon as I registered the device to ask how I was enjoying its product.  I certainly recommend it.

title: Wonderful product!
body:
The earbuds are wonderful.  I am one of those people who cannot use just any earphones.  I was happy to find 4 different
sizes and have a perfect fit.  Sound quality is wonderful....I like everything about these earbuds and I would recommend.them
to anyone.

title: Great ear buds!
body: They sound amazing! They look amazing! And the fact that I can lay on a raft in the pool (but not go under) is priceless. Usually when I lay out I have a speaker playing music but then the mowers start and I can't hear. With this I can hear the music and it blocks out the mowers! I highly recommend these!

title: Bumpin' Wireless Earbuds
body: My first pair of wireless earbuds to use along with my google pixel 2. Awesome sound quality, with some nice bass! Nice design, fits comfortably in ear. Multiple earbud sizing pieces to find your exact fit. Charging case is cool and easy to use. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for wireless bluetooth headphones!! Great buy!

title: Don’t waste your $$
body: Just arrived today. They were very easy to pair. Found the sound quality to be horrible. Very tinlike and no base. Made adjustments on the phone which helped but not close enough. The phone call voice was horrible as well. Not worth $49.99. Returning tomorrow.

title: Solid for the price. Great choice for those who don't want to spend big bucks.
body:
Owned these for several months, pretty happy with them. Battery life is reasonable, considering the size. The charging case is great, holds charge for a long time and recharges the earbuds multiple times before needing to be recharged itself. They fit my ears just fine, and stay in place without issue.

One minor complaint is the length of time it takes for them to automatically connect when you turn them on. It's like 20-30s sometimes. Meanwhile, I have other bluetooth audio devices that connect almost instantly upon turning them on. Worth noting that these will connect instantly when you open your phone's BT settings and actually TELL it to connect to them - so it's not like they're just slow to connect, across the board - they just take their sweet time doing the auto-connect-to-the-last-device routine. Not a dealbreaker though, just a minor annoyance.

title: Great new buds!
body: Delivered on time and came charged enough to try out immediately. Easy pairing to my phone. Sound quality is very good for the price. The fit was perfect right out the box!

title: Very pleased with sound, battery and durability
body:
I have been very well pleased with this product. The sound quality, amount of sound produced and the battery life have held up as stated by the seller. I own around 60 sets of earbuds (maybe a touch OCD) and these are well within my top 10. I have allowed friends to use them while they visited our home and they have all been impressed. I own another brand for w I paid over $350 for and this set of Tozo T10 earbuds is proof positive that the amount paid has nothing to do with performance.
I will certainly buy additional sets for gifts to friends and family.
I highly recommend this product.
If you purchase this product I believe you will certainly enjoy them as much as I do.
BTW: the web is full of reviews that rate these as some of the best  mid-market earbuds on the market.
I wish you all well and good luck.

title: Great earbuds for a great price
body:
To be honest, I thought this was too good to be true. $50 for earbuds that had such overwhelmingly positive reviews, that's gotta be fake, right?

I'm here to tell you these things are for real. They've got great bass and decent highs, the battery life is right within reason with what you'd expect (2-4 hrs per charge-ish), and they stay in your ear surprisingly well (just gotta make sure you find the right earbud size for your ears).

Super satisfied with the purchase so far. Looking forward to testing these more at the gym!

title: Top quality sound in a small package
body: I have tried other earbuds but was never happy with the quality of sound. I read many reviews on these and felt sure this product would meet my expectations and the reviews were right! Top quality sound in something so small. I was highly impressed. The charging method is so easy to deal with. As a whole (buds and charging case) this is awesome!

title: TOZO stands behind there products
body: These sound great and worked well but recently I experienced a problem with charging them. I contacted the company and they stand behind these earbuds and have agreed to replace them.

title: Hidden Wonders
body: I love them. I'm normally a wired headphones type of person but decided to switch it up and was looking at different brands and seen these. I was sceptical at first but after using them for a week I can finally say these are the best at this price point. I can listen to music at work in peace now and there mostly hidden from view lol

title: Amazing sound and value
body: Very easy to set up and get working.  Sound is amazing. Excellent build quality.  I can't imagine buying the apple product when you can get this for 1/4 the price.

title: Excellent product minus no volume control
body:
Reason for reducing 1 star is it has no volume control function on the ear buds. Now why is it important? It is coz u may not always have easy access to device it is connected to control volume.

Otherwise, it's a great product, fits decently well, sounds great including bass is very good.

I haven't used it much for calls but I find it not so convenient for calls and mostly other party has complained on not hearing me properly. However, good things is both left n right buds have mic on them so u can use any one for taking calls.

Battery back up has been decent so far. Case ain't that great looking and but it okay. It wud have been great if case shows up current charge indicator whenever the lid is opened or closed or earbuds are placed in or taken out.

Overall, a good buy!

title: great for gifts
body: gifted this to my brother for his graduation. he likes the sound quality and it has noise cancellation, but he would have prefer if it has longer battery life, but then again this is only 50-60 bucks.

title: Horrible sound quality
body: It fits well and the battery charger and such seems nice and convenient but the sound quality is just bad. Everything simply sounds as if you are listening to your music through a thin layer of drywall. And I do have a couple of other wireless earphone brands to compare it to. I'm not sure if I got a defective pair or if this is what the product is generally like but yeah it's pretty bad. Don't buy it.

title: Great wireless earbuds for the price!
body: So far very pleased with these earbuds.  I’ve only used them once so far, thought I charged them all the way, but seemed that 1 ran out of juice early.  Not going to ding it too bad for that since it may have been user error.  Great sound quality and excellent noise cancellation.  Cool the storage box is a self contained battery recharger too.

title: They stay in and have great volume.
body: The earbuds are surprising easy to setup and sync with my phone. They came charged and ready go. They come with different size tips. I found out when fitting these in my ear that I have two different ear canal sizes. This was no problem, I just used two different earbud tips. The sound quality was better than expected. I got these for my bike rides since my Apple Airpods aren't nearly loud enough for me to hear once the wind starts blowing around my ears. They stay in my ears have had not yet fallen out, even on my bike rides.

title: Aarontronix8
body: The buds take getting used to putting into your ears for a good fit.  Once you figure out how to rotate them and insert, they are great.  Good Sound! My son wants to steal them from me.  I may have to buy another pair for him.  I like that they are waterproof but I admit that I am very hesitant to try to swim with them.  Has anyone else actually swam with them in??  My son swims so if I get him a pair I'd like to ensure they can withstand water during swim practice.  overall, Company seems to want to ensure I'm happy and so far everything has been great!

title: Annoying issues
body:
I want to love these headphones but it’s annoying when you can’t listen with just one headphone,  the headphone turns on while on the charger, and pairing gives you major issues.

I’ve tried keeping one headphone in my pocket so I can leave one in my ear, that won’t work. When you keep them far away from each other (one in ear and one in hand), the signal will weaken and you won’t hear anything.

Sometimes you can try and connect the headphone on the dock while the other is on in your ear and it will work. Most times it will beep constantly until you have the second one paired.

title: Puts on a good show... then craps out
body:
These were going to get 5 stars...
The left side would cut out, then once it mapped through.. it didn’t drop took about 3-5 min to find path...

Why it dropped to 1 star... the case stopped charging...
at 28 days... and of that 28 days of receiving, I only was using it for 14 days..

Good little idea, and concept... crappy life expectancy of product...

title: Good for music, not for calls.
body: Overall, they are a very good headphone. The sound quality is quite good for this price point. I bought them primarily to be used for phone calls and the occasional music or video watching. The microphone for making calls was not adequate for this. I also found the Bluetooth pairing a bit inconsistent.

title: Far better than expected.
body:
After reading the reviews, I was a little bit skeptical about getting these earbuds, but the price seemed good and they looked pretty good. They got here in one day, so the shipping was really fast.

Now once I got them, they were fully charged, which was a surprise. They fit very well, they stay in my ears easily. The sound quality is way better than I was expecting. There is actually bass in the earbuds, which was really nice. I've worn them while riding my motorcycle, and they work very well. They block out the engine and wind noise while still playing my music clear as a bell. Overall, I would recommend them to anyone. Well worth the price, and a one year manufacturer warranty as well.

title: Awesome Earbuds - Choose Over Airpods!
body: The TOZO earbuds are awesome. They’re high fidelity and awesome sound. The noise cancellation works very well. For the price these are absolutely the best earbuds I’ve used.

title: One of the best in Amazon
body: Excellent quality for the price. Can handle bring dropped and canndtsnd being wet from sweat when I excercise. Perfect for any occasion.

title: Best earbuds I ever had!!!
body: I am a Bluetooth headphones/earbuds junky. I’m always trying to find some affordable great sounding pair and I found it. I love these earbuds . I’m in the military and when I workout in the gym these earbuds come in handy. They fit perfect in my ear where they don’t fall out. The incoming phone calls are clear as well as the music. I think the sound is amazing plenty of bass and that what I was looking for. The T10 don’t have any control features with them like volume control or next/previous song controls but for the price and quality I’m super happy with it and you will too!! Can’t wait to see what they come out with next.

title: Great Quality with a Solid Price!
body: For awhile I was debating on buying a pair of new Bluetooth headsets. My previous headset was the Google Buds, and I was not impressed. Before dishing out a lot of money on a pair that received mixed reviews, I figured I would try the Tozo. The series of strong reviews drew my attention. I was expecting a lot, yet I am thus far very impressed. Great battery life, fits my ear perfectly, and the sound quality is good. For the price, by far the best pair of headphones I have in my collection.

title: Great product for reasonable price
body: Sound quality is awesome! Great bass with clear mids and highs. Fast shipping, 1 day, and I live very rural. Easy pairing right out of the box. I let my teenage daughter listen to them, and I still haven't gotten them back! I'll be getting another pair for myself. Would definitely recommend these to anyone who likes quality sound for a reasonable price.

title: Read carefully before choosing this
body: The box doesnt work as a power bank and there’s a very disturbing noise that’s not easy to cancel, like a beeping

title: Great headphones at a good price
body: I needed a new pair of wireless headphone to use while working out. The sound quality on these is great, the battery life is what I need for my workouts (haven't pushed them much beyond that), the noise cancelling cap helps cut down on the background noise, and they don't fall out despite me sweating a lot. Overall great headphones.

title: First day I owned them. Beware
body:
I got these today, opened the package and charged them fully. I paired them with Bluetooth on my new (3 days ago) iPhone. They sound pretty good so I put my phone in my shirt pocket and headed out for a walk. Immediately the left ear bud started to cut out. Then both started to cut out. Throughout my 60 minute walk they cut in and out the whole time.
I might as well have bought a pair of corded headphones with a short in the cord.
They are garbage.
The sound decent but much to weak of a Bluetooth signal.
Can’t believe these reviews

title: Great Ear Buds
body: This in my first new ear buds in 10 years, so I went to wireless.  They are reliable so far and work consistently.  Sound quality is great and the mic for talking on the phone is clear ( according to whom I talk to on the phone).  So far so good.

title: GREAT value!  You wont find a better pair for the price!
body: Great product for the price.  Very lightweight and comfortable in your ear these earbuds are a great value.  I personally like more bass but that is the drummer in me....  I really like the storage case that also charges them each time you are done.  I cant wait to try the wireless charging pad for the case that should make it even better!!!  Buy NOW you wont be disappointed....

title: Blown Away!
body: These are very high quality manufacture and materials, feel solid and well built, and sound great!  Just what I needed for the gym so I am not constantly fussing with my sound. They charge fast too. Very happy with these buds and the price and plan to buy more as gifts.

title: Excellent Sound Quality
body: These earbuds are the best earbuds I have found.The sound quality is  superb. Good base  sound and great noise cancellation. Pairing is  a breeze. They are extremely comfortable to wear and they come with various size buds to insure a good fit.  Price is awesome as well.

title: I've tried them all, and these are the best
body:
These are the 6th pair of wireless earbuds that I've purchased and these are my favorite.  Better than the following:

1. Galaxy Buds
2. J-Buds True Wireless
3. Ankar Soundcore
4.  1MORE True Wireless
5. Jabra Elite 65t

Ridiculous volume, great bass, comfy fit, fantastic charging and unfettered by any amount of sweat I throw at them during intense workouts.  Don't waste your time with other ear buds, these are the ones that you want, especially for $50.

title: Comfy fit and great sound.
body: Very impressed with the quality and the ease of set up I love the case and it’s fantastic that they can charge wireless. I’m actually quite impressed with the product my expectations are surpassed.

title: Sounds Great
body: I really like these earbuds and I plan on purchasing a second pair.  I was really impressed with the bass. The reason I'm purchasing a second pair is because I have two phones.  A personal and a work phone. I would have given it 5 stars if it had two profiles to be able to connect two different phones to the same earbuds without having to unpair and then pair each time for different phones.

title: Great deal and even better performance
body: Very pleased with these ! I didn’t expect them to work as well as they do! Easy fit, great sound quality, strong battery life, and the case is great to carry. I got these mainly for the gym as ear buds whet wires often cause distraction while working out. I’ve been using these for a while both at the gym and at home- and it’s been great. At first it felt strange to have wireless ear buds but it’s an easy adjustment. I also got these because I don’t trust apple’s as I feel they’ll fall out of my ear. These will NOT fall. Very good fit and it comes with changeable earbud heads so you get the right fit. Highly recommend not only for performance but for price point. I actually want to get my family these too.

title: Holds a good charge
body: This is a good product overall for the most part;A couple things i dont like: it doesn't stay in my ears as well at least on my right ear, but it seems to stay well on the left. The other thing I'm not to impress with is the noise cancellation. I like the fact its light weight. Because it's my first in-ear set I can't really make a comparison to any others but so far I'm enjoying it. One more thing I can boast about in regards to this set is it holds a charge really well.

title: Product wouldn't stay paired - left side intermittent operation
body: I really wanted this product to work.  The sound was amazing, but on the first set, the left side would intermittently stop working...ever few seconds.  So back to the seller they went.  Second set, no luck - same issue.  The left side would work for a few seconds, then stop working, then work, then stop.  Very maddening.  I tried re-pairing the set, resetting them, all the recommendations.  No luck.  So back went the second set.

title: Great product at a great price-point
body: Great product, and great price point. I researched several wireless earbuds, and quickly realized I could spend a lot of money if I wanted to. Ordered these with low expectations and was pleasantly surprised. They stayed put in my ears on my run, and the charging/carrying case is nice. I was not concerned about sound quality, but they sound good to me, so bonus on that. My priority was comfort and ease of use during fitness...win, win.

title: Great sound, long battery life
body: Love these little suckers! The sound really is in both pods making music so much better to listen to. Battery life is great too; I use mine for about an hour or two a day and only have to charge every five-six days. They stay in ear pretty well, but little "wings" on around the edges might help keep them in-ear better. This could also be because I have smaller ears and the pods don't sit all the way in - which is probably also why noise cancelling isn't so great for me. Minor inconveniences for the sound quality and battery life though.

title: Amazing Sound Quality
body: Amazing sound quality and a complete steal for 50$. I had a little trouble with the earbuds staying in at first, but once I changed out the heads with smaller earbuds (provided with purchase) I have had no problems. I was using 100$ skullcandy headphone prior to this purchase and these headphones blow them out of the water. Better sound, better fit, better price. Highly recommend to anyone looking for some new headphones.

title: Tozo t10 Bluetooth earbuds
body: Product is okay, the bass is really good but the mids and highs are mediocre, it sounds kind of thin although im not sure if i just received a defective product or if that's just how it really is. The earbuds also keep slipping off my ears even after using the biggest earbud size if i move ever so slightly. You could try your luck on these earphones maybe it's the right fit for you and your ears.

title: The best
body: The best love them. Just right. Very easy to use, setup was a snap. The charge lasted all day. They are light weight and fit my ears just right. Superor noise reduction I can listen while working.

title: Best Sounding Earbuds Ever!!!!
body: These are the best sounding earbuds I've ever had, wireless or wired!  They even sound better than over the ear headphones!  The bass response is fantastic!  I took them out of the box and out of the case and they powered on super fast and went immediately into pairing mode where I saw them on my Bluetooth list on my iPhone 8 Plus and immediately paired them.  I have been using them outside in 90+ degree temperatures while running string trimmers, lawn mowers, etc.... and have not had one minute's trouble with them.  Once I put these in my ears the outside world just goes away!!!  You can't beat the quality at this price point.

title: Blown Away!
body: If you're looking for a good set of headphones, you're not going to find a better sounding set then these for the price. I would even argue that they're just as good if not better then some of the ones that are over a hundred bucks. They fit comfortably in the ears, I had no issues with him falling out, and I am very pleased. The best sounding headphones I've ever had!

title: I don't generally review products but these ear buds are worth it!!
body: I have been having problems with wired earphones. For some reason, they quit working due to the plug getting bent or damaged. Also, the hanging cord is a hassle when it gets caught on something and they get pulled out. I purchased these Ear Buds for two reasons. They were an Amazon Choice product and the reviews were very positive. I was not disappointed! They pair easy initially and once paired, you take them out of the charging case and they link up with each other and pair with my Samsung Galaxy S9+ phone seamlessly. Besides excellent sound quality, these buds last and last and last! When I take them off, I pop them back in the case and they are ready to go when I take them back out. The wireless charging is pretty sweet as well! No plugging in this case. I keep a wireless charger on my desk and just set it down and I am good to go! In summary, you won't go wrong with these buds. Five stars all the way!!

title: Great in ear headphones
body:
I own two other Bluetooth in ear headsets, one a major brand that is way over priced and one a bargain brand that is a good value with “good enough” sound. This pair sounds better than the Beats, is priced near the bargains, is waterproof, has a great case so I won’t lose them, and the case charges wirelessly. What’s not to love? Highly recommend.
The ONLY thing I wish is that they would just turn off when out of battery. I wear them while falling asleep a lot. During the night they wake me up to tell me the batteries are exhausted and I have to put them back in the charging case to shut them up.

title: Big disappointment
body:
I have been looking for wireless bluetooth ear buds for some time now. The ones with a neck thing with the wires going to the earpiece has been a bother as I constantly snag them in some way which eventually results in them being non-working on one side or the other. So, I finally took the plunge and bought these based on a glowing review in an article from airwatchdog. Super disappointment especially for the price.

Let's start with the physical product. This set does not come with additional rubber ear pieces so I cannot change to the size I need for my ears. They became painful to wear in no time. They are a bit bulky and I assume since there was no ear piece options, that would explain why it was hard to keep them in my ears.

Next, the sound quality was not good. This could be due to not having the correct ear piece size. However when I pressed them into my ears to hear what I expected to be great sound, this was not the case. The sound was rather weak on the bass. They sounded really cheap. I do admit when someone was talking to me I could not hear them talking even though they weren't fitting well.

Connectivity is a huge issue. They are easy to pair with devices. That's the only good thing I can say. There are a couple of problems to mention here. One is staying connected to a device after you've paired them with multiple devices. For me this was my pc and my iPhone. I would be listening to my phone and as soon as I turned on my pc or walked by it, the headphones would jump to the pc and dump my phone. The other problem is using only one earpiece. When I need to wear only one, I finally figured out that I had to take them both out of the charging storage box at the same time, let them pair to each other, then sometimes I had to lay the one I didn't want on the desk because if I put it back in the box the one in my ear would beep at me. Sometimes it wouldn't.

So overall, I am very unhappy and will be returning them. I tried using them for a couple of days and it isn't worth the hassle. I guess I will keep with the older wired bluetooth style because they can stay connected to the right device, provide great sound, last longer from a charge, and are comfortable.

title: Was weary of all the 5 star reviews
body: But damn, these are a legit pair of ear buds. I can't do Air Pods, as much as I wanted to, my huge head and ears just werent a good fit. These things fit perfectly with the large buds attached. Pairing was easy right out of the box. Now, I'm all about sound quality. I love full , clear sound. I primarily listen to EDM and Hip Hop, so bass is very important. These things bump harder in my ear than my GF's Beats Studio 3's. Seriously, she nor I could believe it. I use the spotify app and turn on the equalizer to make some small adjustments to the lows and highs, and they sound even better. Overall for this price, I can't believe the quality. Hopefully these lasts seeing as I've just received them today and have only had one trip to the gym to test drive them. The noise cancelling effect is borderline unsafe. I could not hear my gf talking while sitting directly next to me.

title: Good value for the money!
body: These have good options for fit with the various ear bud fittings.  The fit helps with the sound and blocking out unwanted noise.  The sound quality is very good for the value, both on the highs and lows.  They pair up instantly when turned on and I have had no problems with the audio cutting out on me.  The charging is quick and battery life is decent but the charging dock could be a bit smaller since it gets bulky in a pocket.  Much better than any wired option out there!

title: Excellent product for the price
body: I had resisted paying over 100 dollars for ear buds and have been looking for an alternative. I purchased these 3 weeks ago and they are excellent. The charging case works very well and they pair seamlessly, you will hear the right ear bud search for the left for about 30 seconds if you are using just one, but then it stops. Sound quality is excellent and the charging case is great. Call quality is acceptable. These are a great value for something that works very well. I had a question and the company was super responsive, overall a great buy

title: Exceptional Headphones for the Price
body:
These are great headphones, especially for the price. The sound quality is excellent (particularlyif you like bass) and they are comfortable in the ear. The microphone picked up my voice with no issues and the quality of the reception is excellent.

My one quibble would be that it seems like the battery charge doesn't hold as well as I'd hope, but that is probably a consequence of how much power and quality is packed into these headphones. Excellent product, highly recommend to anyone looking for good quality headphones at a very reasonable price.

title: Company Sent me a replacement to the first ones
body: Update The Company sent me a free set of earbuds as the ones I had at first were bad and fell within there warranty period. The Overall Quality of customer service was great. The earbuds themselves still need a bit of adjustment made to improve the product but the replacement pair they sent work as described on there listing. The replacement pair is lot better then the fist set I had received. The experience has changed my opinion of the product going from 1 star to 5 star. I will not gig them on the overall quality of the product because you get what you paid for a set of Bluetooth earbuds that are waterproof with in there specs. I would buy products from this company in the future knowing that they will do what is right to fix any issues for which are covered under warranty. I hope this review helps others

title: "Never anymore dangling cords"
body: Now having plenty of time to use my Tozo T10's is even better than I hoped.  The positives were the following, the sound  is great.  Along with all with the construction and battery life is A1.  I would recommend Tozo products to anyone!

title: Definitely worth the price and great bonus that they're water proof.
body:
I use these for just everyday general use and so far everything been great. I haven't had any problems with them.
There's not really anything I can say that's bad about these. The setup when you can them out of the box is super straight forward and they work right away.
 They fit very snugly in my ears as I've even used them while going to sleep. I don't really have issues with wearing these for hours that you may get from other kinds of earbuds.
The sound quality is pretty good and they're not wrong when they say there's some bass behind these little buds.
I've used these in the shower before too and they work great and had no issues with them even after.

To summarize overall a great buy for the price. You get good features and the quality is better than others I've seen on the market. Definitely worth the price and buy as I use them for everyday use now.

title: Great Costumer Service
body: I had got my earbuds and mine were broken, the earbuds speakers created static, however in-spite of this the products company was fast to respond in less than 24hrs. They asked me to just send them their required information and they would send me a functioning pair. I had my phone stolen from my gym the very same day so these guys working so fast and professional really made my day. I am looking forward to the working replacement set and I will write a second raving review if they turn out to be as awesome as I hoped. Thank you TOZO team!

title: Great earbuds but not for my ears
body:
Ok this is an update about this product, as i statetd nothing is change about sound...however they did not stays in my ears due the small canal i try every size of silicone and foam, espacially when im chuwing something in my mouth they fall off easally , so it is not the device it just me so decide to return them.
First the sound qualilty is awesome for the price nice base, trible...they sound much better and louder then Jabra active at $180, call quality i am not sure yet, ill update on that, for the fitting i have small ear canal so staying still working on it , but the main thing is the sound is very rich and if you want to customize that get the poweramp app for android you want regret it.
Update on the fittting, i have a hard time to keep them on my ears , they slip out easally from my ears , i try a different fitting from another brand and no luck, now i order a memory foam fitting and hopefully will work(cost $20 more)... i will update on that it my hepl some buyers .

title: Great Sound Quality and Comfortable to wear.
body: These earbuds are very comfortable and easy to wear. They also have a great sound quality. Their customer service is also top notch.

title: Good quality for a good price
body:
I purchased these headphones on a flash sale, so I got them at a reduced price. I figured, even if I don't like them, they weren't that much. I haven’t had them very long, but I’ve been surprisingly pleased with them.

So far, I’ve used them mainly at my office to watch Netflix during my lunch break. I have on a couple occasions used them for a few hours without any problems with the batteries running out. I really like that the carrying case holds a reserve charge to recharge the headphones when put back in.

I have never been able to comfortably wear a pair of Apple headphones, so I always avoid those kinds of earbuds. So far, they have been comfortable to wear. I haven’t had a chance to wear them to workout yet. So, I can’t speak to how well they stay in once I get moving. However, given the snugness of the fit with the current buds I have on them (the original pair that came attached), they feel pretty secure. I don’t foresee them coming out.

One of the things that initially drew my attention to these headphones was the IPX8 rating. While I do swim quite a bit, I don’t think I will be attempting to swim with them though. Bluetooth doesn’t work well in water. However, I do have to work outside sometimes in the rain. So, it will be nice that I don’t have to quickly put them away.

For the most part, I’m happy with the sound quality. I prefer more of a flat response, so I find them to be a little bass heavy. But that also means I was surprised at how much bass they actually put out. (Free tip: if you are using Spotify on your iPhone, there is an EQ feature so you can adjust the lower end if it’s too much.) Again, I’ve used them mostly for Netflix, so I haven’t noticed it as much. I was very surprised at how loud they can get.

The sound quality of the mic is about what you’d expect from a pair of headphones. They work well enough to communicate. Just don’t expect to record vocals for your next platinum selling album with them.

The Bluetooth is very quick to connect to my computer. They are usually connected by the time I can even get them in my ears. Even with the Bluetooth 5.0, there is some latency though. But, that is to be expected. It would be nice if they had aptX to help with that. However, given the low price, how new aptX is, being Bluetooth 5.0, and having an IPX8 rating, I can hardly expect that.

I really like the case. It is somewhat bulky, but that’s the tradeoff to have a case that provides a reserve charge for your earbuds. I also liked that the cover is slightly transparent so I can see the battery level without having to open it. I also love that the case is equipped with Qi charging capabilities. I would say that the charging cable, measuring in at just over 12 inches, is really short. But, again, at this price, I can hardly fault them for not making it any longer. And, it’s not like you’re going to need them plugged in while you’re using them.

Bottom line, I don’t think you’re going to find a better pair of earbuds with as many features at a better price.

title: An Earbud Should Remain in the Ear and Not Fall off
body: It is so sad that my earbud does not remain in my ear. I am suppose to walk around and talk, exercise and talk or listen to music, however, this product fails woefully on all those counts. The thing has fallen from my ear so many times, that I no longer use it. Cant I cook and just listen to a nice instrumental? Well....Yes, except it falls from my ear every time. Maybe my ears are too small or something. product works fine if and only if it would remain in my ears!!!

title: Great earbuds at a great price
body: These ear buds provide great sound at a great price.  They are waterproof, charge in the case and the case can charge wirelessly.  Just make sure when you first pair that you pair to the correct earbud.  The instructions show you how to do it correctly.

title: Tozo T10 - Great Earbuds for a Great Price!
body:
I've had these for about 2 weeks now and was pleasantly surprised at how much I like them!

I have worked out in them 4 or 5 times.  The range is very good and more importantly they stay in my ear.  The earbuds come with 4 different size tips and once you find the correct size, they are comfortable and stable in your ear.  I also tend to sweat quite a bit and have had no issues with moisture affecting the earbuds.

Today I traveled with them - 3 flights over a 12 hour period.  I used them for the first flight which was 3 hours long, put them back in the case, and when I took them out again for flight #2, they were fully charged.  I used them for the next flight (2 hours) and again put them back in the case and they were fully charged for flight #3.

It looks like these have become my go-to earbuds.  Highly recommended!

title: Wrong color...not once but twice!
body:
I just got them and they seem pretty good. Good noise canceling and sound quality is good. Better bass than expected. However, I ordered them in Blue, but received a black pair.

Update: my daughter also needed a pair and she wanted black. I decided to order a second pair in BLUE. I ordered BLUE a second time and received black again! Maybe only offer black if that’s all you have....

title: Disappointing
body: I’d love to give these headphones 5 stars. When they work, the sound quality is great. However, I’ve tried to use them several times since I purchased them and the left earbud is constantly cutting out on me. They are fully charged, and I tried resetting them, but that didn’t resolve the problem. Very disappointing.

title: Solid wireless earbuds at a great price
body: This is the first pair of earbuds I’ve owned, so I don’t have a basis for comparison. I did a lot of research and settled on this pair. I am very please with the sound quality and fit. The key is to use the right size buds and to position the buds correctly until you get the optimal sound. Sound quality is balanced and full. If you get static, reset the connection and you should be fine. So far, very please with this purchase.

title: Great Value Wireless Earbuds!
body: For $49.99, these earbuds cannot be beat. They work well, and are even water resistant as I have tried them in the shower. Their customer service is also great as they reply back to questions in a timely manner and are accommodating to any issues you might have with these ear phones!

title: Great headphones but wish you could skip songs directly on headphones
body: Amazing Bluetooth headphones! They really cancel out noise extremely well and I love the waterproof feature!
