However, I wish I could skip songs by clicking on the side but sadly this calls the person you last talked to. You have to click skip from your phone. Otherwise great purchase and I look forward to testing the features!

title: Honest Review, I'm 100% satisfied with this product and would recommend it.
body:
I'm 100% satisfied with this product and would recommend it.

PROS:

Design - Plastic surface very smooth, and made of strong materials.

Connections- wireless connectivity it does what it says in the manual, hassle-free, i try to used in my Samsung S9+, Huawei phone, and my bluetooth TX/RX connected in my TV.

Sounds Quality - Perfect for watching movies
You really notice the surround sounds, even for the music more into acoustic sounds its really good for the eardrum higly recommend it.

Wireless charger- 100% true fast charging.

Waterproof - i have tried only once, taking a bath Iistening to my fav music, but so far still working, still charging wow! Amazing huh! now, i'm excited again to take a bath tom. 😊

CONS:
- when i'm  about to start watching movie in my room , and I dimmed the lights I struggled with finding which one goes to the right and vice versa. It would be good if the labels glow in the dark...just saying 😉 and what would be even cooler is if this device could have a control volume that way I wouldn't have to do it on the receiver just saying again 😉 but overall I love this product. ♥️

title: Very good material, but not for cycling
body: under normal conditions works very good, but when riding a bicycle the audio is intermittent, it must be because the signal of the earbuds is very weak and the wind stop the signal.

title: They work well!
body: The left earbud didn't work on my first set and I returned them.  The seller immediately sent me a new pair free of charge!  Unfortunately, the left earbud didn't work on that set either.  Luckily, they sent a 3rd pair which I think was a mistake since I didn't ask for a 3rd pair, but the earbuds work great so I'm keeping them! They definitely stay in your ear while you jump, run, exercise, mow the grass, etc., and they're completely noise canceling so you can hear nothing but the music from the earbuds.

title: Disconnects while listening to music
body: I wanted to love these.  Wireless bluetooth headphones are so cool but they have been really annoying. It's hard to connect both earbuds to each and then to a device. I was in the library and the sound kept coming out of my computer instead of the ear buds for the first few tries. Also, when I connect to my phone and listen to music, the sound would randomly stop for like a second and then come back. My husband could never hear me when I talked to him using them but I was even going to.keep them until I realized that they just don't work for any part of my life.

title: Burnt down
body: I do not recommend the wireless charging burned through

title: Hassle free and convenient
body: I've been looking into wireless Bluetooth earbuds for a while now, but I definitely didn't want to spend a ton of money on the big name brands out there. I found these and I'm glad I made the decision to buy them! They come with 4 different ear bud sizes and the small fits my ears perfectly. The sound quality is great and there is some noise cancellation. It is possible to only use one and leave the other in the case, but make sure that you're using the right ear bud because it is the master ear bud that connects to your device. Overall, I find these extremely convenient to use and the charging case fits perfectly in my pockets when I'm on the go!

title: Would give more stars if possible!
body:
These things are amazing!! I got these on the recommendation of a friend and fell in love immediately. The audio output and noise cancellation work great as advertised, perfect for going to the gym and everyday work.

The product is extremely adaptive and convenient:
- Comes with various heads in case the standard size is either too big or too small.
- Can go back in RECHARGABLE, capsule-like case when not in use.
- Water-resistant/sweat-resistant
- The buds are magnetically attached to the case and are easy to take out and put in - the case is also magnetically shut.
- Automatically pair with device after removing buds from portable charging case.
- Also, comes with a 1-year warranty redeemable on the manufacturer website - provided you also provide your Amazon order number (to prove that you bought it, duh).

I've been so impressed with this product so much that I ordered two more pairs, one for my brother and one for my aunt.

I've yet to use Galaxy Buds/ Air Pods but I can honestly say I would prefer these. Price was definitely a factor in my decision to get these and I'm glad I did, no evidence of sacrifice to product effectiveness to cut costs.

While I whole heartedly love this product and have recommended it to others, there *are* some things that I would ask to possibly improve on any future models of this brand: improve upon the device's inputs from the button on the sides. What I mean by this is that to play/stop music or accept/end/reject calls/call the last person you spoke with, you would click on either left or right "bud". My qualm with this is that it's a bit awkward considering you either "press further into your to make use of the buttons" or partially remove it from ear and then click on it and then put it back in your ear. Not any bit of a hindrance on the product's effectiveness or utility whatsoever, just a suggestion if further models are released with this brand. The only other thing I would like is to include how long the battery life on the charging case and the buds are actually for after full charge - not stated (to my knowledge) on the product info on Amazon nor the instructional pamphlet included in the box.

In conclusion, this product is fantastic! Will continue to spread the good word and recommend this product to friends and family.

TL;DR, buy it, you won't be disappointed.

title: Incredibly high quality, top tier features for a fraction of the cost (IPX8 & 8mm Drivers)
body:
I've only had these a few days, but I have to say I'm absolutely blown away. I've been getting sick of my traditional usb-c headphones as I'm an avid bodybuilder and the cable is often a problem; between needing to keep my phone nearby, catching it during runs/lifts, etc.

I spent a good amount of time comparing these to competitors, to higher end brands (ones in the $150+ range, etc.) and made the plunge with these. For $50 they offer basically the latest features that even name brands struggle to match.

Pros:

+ Build quality & appearance: I was incredibly impressed with this. The buds are extremely solid and while the charging case feels a 'bit' cheap, the buds drop in with ease thanks to magnet grips and the case offers simple and intuitive charging status for the case itself and the buds. 'Plugging' the buds in is satisfying and easy (the magnets are strong) and the case closes with magnet as well, very firm construction and there's no worry of the buds being disrupted in travel or falling out. The case claims it can charge the buds to full 4x before it needs to be charged itself, and it's a very convenient design to grab and go. Very happy with it.

+Comfort: I was a bit concerned with this as I tend to dislike a lot of 'in-ear' buds, however these fit extremely well; even during rigorous workouts, runs or even in the shower they don't move an inch. They are also just comfortable in general as I actually don't notice them over time as I have with other earbuds. They come with 3 extra sizes in addition to the ones that they come with. I actually seemed to be fine with the 'default' ones, but may try a size down as they 'can' sometimes get disturbed. Point being they'll fit any ear like a glove.

+Features: Here's where I was REALLY impressed, after scanning tons of brands & the reason I settled on them. (including MUCH pricer buds, these had some of the best specifications even compared to 'luxury' earbuds in the $150+ range)

++ IPX8 - I noticed this was rare even among much more expensive brands. These buds/case are completely waterproof up to 1+ meter. I sometimes wear them in the shower with my phone 10-15ft away without any static or sound issue. If you are a swimmer I'd imagine you would have zero issue with these. (for comparison the nearly $200 Jabra Elite Active 65t are only 1P65-- basically 'sweat resistant') There's something extremely cool about jumping in the shower after a workout or even listening to a podcast before work!

++ 8mm bass drivers & sound - again another stand out feature. The bass on these hit HARD, better than probably any earbuds I've owned. To put it in comparison again, the Jabra Elite Active 65t use 6mm drivers. The sound quality is also crystal clear, but I'm not an audiophile by any means, how they stand up to more expensive brands I don't know; but the lows and highs are pitch perfect to 'my ears,' and again did I mention the bass? They are also EXTREMELY loud, I can usually only handle about 70-80% depending on media (music is a bit louder than youtube, etc.)

++ Bluetooth 5.0 - while this feature is common now with wireless headphones, combined with the IPX8 you can comfortably wear these in the pool/shower with your phone 20ft+ away.

Cons:

I can't really speak to any so far. They boast better features than earbuds for a fraction of the cost, are extremely well built and not obnoxious looking like a lot of wireless earbuds. The pairing could maybe be slightly faster, but it's sort of a non issue. Setup was as easy as removing them from the case, pairing once and then you're done. They take maybe 10 seconds to 're-pair' if you power off or remove from case, but you can simply put them in your ear and you'll get a 'device paired message.' Just a tip - the right earbud is the 'primary,' you always need to turn that one on first if they are turned off otherwise they may have trouble pairing. (they have to 'pair to each other' than they pair to your device, the whole process only takes 5-10 seconds)

The true test will be how the old up after a few months in the gym/use, but for the price you really can't go wrong. If you are someone that wants to have total control over your earbuds with an app such as equalizer settings, talk functions, etc. these may not be for you. However for just a general earbud that is sturdy, sounds great, and can take calls, you can't beat them, even at a higher price.

title: powerful buds
body: these are a wow! much more than expected great sound quality easy pairing easy charging they fit in my ear  comfortably come with a great carrying case what more can I say wow!  what a great buy!

title: Fantastic Earbuds!
body: These earbuds are awesome! I really like the way they activate and pair as soon as you take them out of the box. The indicator lights on the box show how many charges you have left really nicely. They fit flush in my ears and are very comfortable. Another nice feature is that you can use only the right earpiece without having to use the left, keeping one ear free to outside sounds. I would definitely suggest these as an all around win!

title: Gave them a second chance!
body: I love listening to podcasts while I work, these will last about 4hrs and then will need to be charged. They connect easy to Bluetooth and the sound quality is terrific. I originally was not happy about having to charge so often, they have approved!!

title: Buy these! You won’t regret it!
body: I got my TOZO’s only yesterday, but I love them already. I had raycons previously and they were TERRIBLE. The sound would cut out for no reason at all and the sound quality was very poor. TOZO is affordable and definitely worth the money you spend. They fit very snug and feel comfortable in my ears. The sound quality is great and you can’t hear much background noise while listening to music. Definitely a recommended buy.

title: So much better than dealing with cords.
body: I bought these because I kept yanking my corded earphones out of my ears when reaching for books or moving my mouse around. It makes listening to music while you work so much easier. Not to mention I can pull my hair over my ears and nobody even notices I'm wearing earbuds.

title: Works fine. Certain features are kinda annoying.
body:
Sound quality, battery life, and general performance is fine.

What i really don't like is that the "disconnected" beeping sounds play when im only using one side at a time and the selection of button functions. Why would i want to double click to redial?

title: *STOP* looking- BUY TOZO T10 TWS Bluetooth Earbuds These have Best Sound Quality, Most Features!
body:
I really like the quality of the sound from these earphones. The fit is very comfortable, the case is so handy and being able to charge on my Q-charger in the case is perfect. The case carries another charge as well just by placing my earphones back inside. They pair automatically every time I take them out to use them.
I had purchased a few different brands/styles to compare to determine what earphones would be the best, these came in top.
I have now purchased, and recommended these for several friends and family because I do feel they give you the best sound quality, support, and features.

title: These are Fantastic Earbuds!!
body: I was surprised with the sound that comes from these earbuds. They have great bass and rich sound. They fit perfectly in my ears. ( I have smaller ear canals so I had to go with the smaller ear tips) I have had trouble finding earbuds in the past that fit. I love the wireless charging also. It makes it so much easier to charge without the hassle of connecting wires. The battery lasts quite long too. I have gotten longer than 3.5 hrs out of them and the case adds additional charging time. I would definitely purchase these again

title: Glad I bought these
body: I was looking for a pair of Bluetooth earbuds for work and travel.  I work outside so being sweat and water proof is a huge plus.  Theyre also good for my walks at the beach and perfect for using on flights.  I cant wear Ipod earbuds… they hurt my ears too much.  These fit really well like a soft ear plug so I dont get that ear pain from wearing them for any amount of time.  I connected them to my phone, laptop and tablet very easily.  The case is also very nice with an optional lanyard to wear it around your neck.

title: Great quality and great customer service!
body:
I love this product! I wouldn't 100% buy from them again. The sound quality is clear and crisp. The battery lasts a long time. Currently, I have not listened to them long enough for them to die, so I cannot confirm the battery life. For my use, they have not died on me, and it has last 2+ hours.

My stepson requested this product as a birthday gift. I liked what I read in reviews so much; I decided to buy one for myself. My stepson has worked perfectly, but
my left ear bud quit working. Of course it was after the warranty. This company trouble shot with me, and when they decided it couldn't be fixed, they sent me a new set of wireless earbuds. It was hassle free.
The company contacted me through email. Check your spam account. The first few messages went to my Inbox, but the rest went to my spam account. The company contacted me quickly, and they were very professional.

title: Excellent Wireless Earbuds
body: I use these earbuds for the gym and they are great! They are comfortable and feel very secure - even when running I do not worry about them falling out. Once you take them out they automatically turn on and sync with your phone, and once you're finished, pop them back in the case and they automatically turn off. The magnets ensure that the earbuds are always seated properly so that they are charging in the case, and the case itself feels solid. I have also tried showering with these earbuds and have not had any problems whatsoever. Great product.

title: T10 Earbuds review
body: The buying experience was great and the ear buds were delivered in a very timely manner.  The sound quality is great.  My only problem is that once I step out, the left side starts cutting in and out.  I contacted the manufacturer, who suggested I remove the from my device, reinstall and re-pair.  I did that and the same thing continues to happen to the left side. Hannah has emailed me and said they will be sending a new pair.  I am excited to get them because when they work properly, they do sound great.  And I am impressed with the customer service.  If the new pair work as advertised, I will happily give 5 stars.

title: Sending back for the 2nd time
body: Bought these due to the fact that there were SO many quality reviews. Thought I'd jump on the good deal. 1st set was sent. Sound quality was great. Charging case didn't work at all. Used 5 different chargers included 2 wireless chargers. Contacted seller and returned for a new set. 2nd set arrived and charged fine. Having issues with sound cutting out randomly. Then, again, stopped charging. Sending back and giving these guys a review to NOT BUY AND TO SAVE YOUR MONEY ON ANOTHER WIRELESS HEADSET. cheers.

title: Disappointed
body: The appeared to be good at beginning, then I started to have connection issues that the phone connected with my phone and then disconnected, then connected again at its free will, while I had my phone with me. Also, you have to use both ear at the same time, or only use the Right one.However, you will get this annoying beep all the time...

title: Decent Headphones to Start....But...
body: I had high hopes for these headphones when I purchased them.  The sound quality and bass was great.  However, I like using my headphones while at the pool and the plastic material that these headphones are made of started to peel off.  Also, the battery on the right headphone now cannot be charged and therefore, the headphone set is useless.  I advise spending more on a higher quality headset.

title: An awesome product
body: I use these while riding my bike, working in the yard, at work and traveling on airplanes.  These are the best wireless earbuds I have used to date.

title: Great product all around
body:
I purchased TOZO and an other much more expansive brand ( which was on sale) at the same time. Other brand was return next day because it did not performed as good as TOZO
TOZO feet very comfortable in the ear, it is easy to pare with phones and tablet.

title: Call issues and won't say in your ear.
body: The first one I received would not stay in my ear even after trying different tips. Then I had yell so people could hear me talk. Some people reported words would cut in and out. After speaking with tech support A replacement was sent and it had the same issues. I did not want to waste time with another device so I went for a refund.

title: Great Quality!
body:
Great sound quality, good bass. Easy to pair. Love them. They look nice, the charging case is nice too. I actually passed these up initially because I had the T-8 which sadly died just after a year. But
 after returning 2 other brands, TOZO has a good thing going. I need good sound when I workout & these are really good.

title: Intermittent connection issues
body:
Pros: wireless charging case; ease of pairing; fit in ear during active workouts (running, spin class)
Cons: intermittent sound cutout; left ear cuts out during any motion, running or biking, sometimes even during a walk; right ear cuts out less frequently, but still happens
Overall: unacceptable disruptions for a modern earbud at any price; disappointing performance overwhelms the other positive features

title: Great Sound, Great Quality, But Poor Fit
body:
Good,
The product has really crisp and nice bass. It’s pretty comfortable to wear since it is truly wireless earbud. The build quality is pretty nice too. The case has a solid weight and the earbud itself is very light. The material used in these are pretty solid.

Bad,
I don’t know if it’s just me but it really does not fit my ear well. Earbuds end up falling when I’m doing any activity which defeat the purpose of the earbud. I’ve switched out earbud tips but they don’t really do good job holding the earbud into your ears. It kind of hurts too if you wear this for a long time. I would definitely invest in better earbud tips.

title: Mixed feeling on this product.
body:
Pro
-Sound. For the earbud under $50 and compared with higher end earbuds, this is good enough for every day use. Well.. being really exact not every day use and it'll be explained in cons.
-Battery Life. I had no issue on batter life on both earbuds and case. They are exactly as advertised I had no problem on battery running out during my use. To tell you the truth, max I've used this for was about 2 hours and a half.
-Phone Calls. People I was talking to was able to hear background noise but they had no issue hearing me.
-Holds steady in my ears. Comes with 4 different sizes so it should fit you find unless you have ear canal as big as a cave.

Con
-Connection. At home, fine. At shower, fine(IPX7 is true). Out for a walk/run, fine. Working out at the gym, disaster. Left ear is losing connection every second on and off. It kind of drives me crazy as I was focused on lifting. It sounds just fine only with right earbud on but hello this is a pair of earbud, not one single piece. I wanted to find a solution so I've had my wife to use it on crowded area and she had same issue.
-Customer Support. I've advised them what issue I had. They asked me to reset the earbuds and I've done so and issue was still the same. I asked them what the next step is and they've gone silent until now. That being said, I decided to just return afterwards.

Bottom Line is 3 Stars overall rating.

1 Star on Material quality.
5 Star on Sound quality.
5 Star on Battery life.
What turned me off was the connection of the left earbud.

In case if anyone is wondering what functions this one have. Both right and left earbud have buttons that clicks and have same function. Power on/off, answer call, reject call, hang up, stop and play music. There is no rewind, fast forward, skip track, volume control. For the price point, I think it's fair.

title: Excellent purchase!!
body: For TWS earbuds, these guys are the ticket! Crystal clear listening for both calls and music! Decent battery life. Love that I can recharge them several times in the case without plugging into power. The fit is also pretty good, nice variety of ear bud sizes. Overall I am very satisfied with my purcase!

title: No-Brainer at this Price Point
body:
There is no shortage of earbuds available here on Amazon in this price range, but i'm not sure you'll find any better, with these features, or more supported by the seller/manufacturer.

Waterproof and still full-range acoustics? Wireless Charging Case? Comfortable fit, for all ears--Apple earbuds don't work for my ears? Slam dunk.

I'm sure there are other products in this range that will serve but it's a veritable morass and i'm here to tell you that these are most definitely worth your money. Add to that the moment i had an issue with pairing with one of my devices, the manufacturer was quick to respond and assist. What will be your fate with another of these manufacturers? Another plus is that you can see in the details of the packages in a solid manual in unbroken english, it's a well developed product and not merely a knock-off.

title: Awesome sound
body: My daughter wanted AirPods which she got because she’s a girl but my son didn’t want to spend that much money and so after a week of searching I wander onto these earbuds.  I was amazed at the sound quality of these which to me were as good if not better than the AirPods which cost 3X as much.  My wife was so impressed we ordered a pair for her.  The only thing is that we can’t register the two for warranty under the same email address.

title: Great sound - Does not hold a charge
body: I like the headphones, the sound is great and they're easy to use, however, I've only them for about 4 months and the  case will not hold a charge and the headphones themselves have become impossible to charge. Really, really disappointing.

title: Great fit with quality sound
body: The earbuds connected quickly and easily. Sound quality is good, much better than expected. With the multiple sizes of silicone earbud fittings included, the fit is great. Wireless charging is an added bonus and gives one the option of being completely cord free. Case is solid and sturdy and the LED lights show when buds are charging as well as the internal battery level (case). I'd recommend these and after seeing mine, have already gotten a coworker to get a pair.

title: Not For Small Ears
body:
Received them, opened up the box, looks like I was expecting.  Then I tried them on, or attempted to.  Couldn't get them to fit right, not even close.  Tried all of the earpiece sizes, tried rotating them per the instructions (and instructional videos) to no avail.  I contacted TOZO, they responded within 12 hours, and sent a link to a video for making sure I was getting the proper fit.  I did what they indicated.  The problem being that my ears are too small to get the earbuds in deep enough to lock them in.  If you have small ears, be aware that these may not be right for you.

Amazon and Tozo customer service were responsive and helpful.

title: Best of its kind so far
body:
I have tried numerous wireless earbuds and in the end they have all let me down. That is until I received these earbuds.

The first thing I noticed was the obvious improvement in quality of the charging case. The previous cheaper brands I bought were flimsy.

The sound quality is very good. I have small earholes so once I put in the smaller rubber tips, it fit perfectly and makes a great seal and the buds stay in very nicely.

I have not had to deal with customer service but they at least have a one year warranty.

Now for the best part. These are wireless charging compatible. I sit them on my Samsung dual charger and they immediately begin charging.

I know these are more expensive than some of the others in the same class but I could have bought several pairs of these with the money I threw away on cheaper brands.

I'm planning on purchasing a pair for my wife and also a pair of the sport ones too.

title: Best bass out of any bluetooth headphones.
body: The TOZO T10 Bluetooth are an excellent pair of wireless earbuds. I really enjoy them as they last longer and are ipv8 waterpoof. Bluetooth earbuds I bought in the past were only ipv5. Unfortunately, I was having too much dancing at the pool and one of the pair fell out my ear and plopped straight into the water. I contacted TOZO and they said they'd be glad to send me another pair which is SUPERB!!! Overall highly recommended. Will edit this review in the future if I notice any downsides but none so far...

title: Great product for the money
body: I got this on a dare to see what works better and this product by far worked just as good as some high dollar stuff. Plus for me its better cause i use it all day at work so having one on and the other at the ready is even better. Sound is great the take a beating and keep working. Also i have no issues using it as a phone call sound is good the mike is good. And the both work together or apart. Great product.  Now the only bad that i have seen having this for about a few weeks now is they dont stay in my ear they keep falling out bummer

title: Decent at first
body: I originally bought these and was having discomfort issues causing my ears to swell up. They also did not stay in my ears well. Well I have to say was super impressed with customer service. They took the time to mail me a brand new pair for free! Well I was pretty satisfied, up until today. out of nowhere, my earbuds kept disconnecting and reconnecting. Then the womans voice my right earbud turned into a high pitched squeaky voice. i turned it off right away & attempted to turn it back on. Now it will not turn on at all and i tried charging it all morning through the afternoon. I've only had these for maybe a month and they're only ever in my ear or in the case inside my lunch bag for work. So theres no way for anything to have happened.

title: Ridiculous.....ly amazing
body:
I received my earbuds and thought "well lets open this piece of crap and send it back." Then I opened the package and saw the box. First of all, the packaging is quality. Secondly, the product itself is beautifully designed and very high quality. So I thought the sound quality would be the factor that got me to send it back; I was flabbergasted. Deep crisp bass and clean treble tones greeted my ears. So then I thought it would have to be the fit - I tested them whilst using the heavy bag, lifting weights, then on a four-mile run. The only time I felt I had to take them out was once during the run when I accidentally knocked the right bud out myself.
These things are nuts!! One of the best investments I've made. Right now I am on week two of having them and I love them. At the price, it is a whole lot of bang for the buck.

Cons:
I find that some people find it hard to hear me when I'm using the phone function in a noisy room or an area with a lot of ambient noise, but then again people can barely hear me anyway on the phone so whatever. All in all 5 stars from me - very satisfied customer.

title: Too much bass!
body: This earbud set is fine if you're not too fussy about sound. They fit fine, charging/storage case is cool but like I said, I don't care for the sound. They sound cheap (like a low-fi mp3) and there's way too much bass.

title: Hollow sounding.
body: They put out good volume but the quality is not so great.  This is an excellent option for phone users who want hand and cords free, but I would not suggest these to an audiophile.  All told I am glad to have them if perhaps somewhat disappointed they are not as high quality as the reviews suggested.

title: Easy to use and sound great.
body: Bought these to replace the neckband style I've been using for the past few years and was immediately impressed. They came fully charged and paired with my Note 8 almost instantly. They're comfortable and sound great. And the little carrying case that they come with is super cool because I use 1 bud at a time, so the one not in use stays constantly charged, so basically with me going back and forth on the individual buds, these things will last me about 2 days on a single charge.  I'm all in on these little buds.

title: Excellent sound quality
body:
I am very impressed with the Tozo T10. There build quality is impressive and they possess an incredible amount of features for the price (wireless charging, IPX8 waterproofing, high quality 8mm sound driver, and bluetooth v5.0 are just a few of the high end features the T10's possess).

Pairing them with my phone was easy and the seller provides a simple for follow guide for those who may need additional assistance. The bluetooth v5.0 provides for a better connection as greater distances. The clarity and richness are of a quality that one would expect from a high end earbuds. I have not tested the water prof feature of the T10's although I am certain that they will live up to the expectations of the seller. I was pleased to find that I could use the T10's for a little over four hours before they required a charge and that I was able to get four charges from the case before the case batter required recharging.

Finally, I would like to reiterate, these are an excellent product for the price and function better then described by the seller.

title: Very nice for the price
body: I liked the price and quality. The charging case is convenient and works well. The only problem I had was the lack of different sized ear pieces. I had to strip some off some headphones.

title: Battery life only down fall
body: Only downfall which is proble a only in my eyes is the battery life.. I work all day outside delivering and enjoy listening to my ear buds the whole time but they only last half the day. The charging is fast though by like half the time. Over all the product is amazing; fits great in my ears, sounds wonderful, very light weight, etc.

title: Super easy set up and a charger on the go.
body: So I got these and figured since it's two earbuds it might have an issue pairing both to my phone at the same time. But I was super wrong, the moment you pull them out of the box they instantly pair to each other than one click on the phone and it's done. Now the moment you take them out its instant pairing, as far as sound quality and what not it's great especially at a noisey gym you still hear the music and only the music. Lastly one of my favorite features is the little box changes them plugged in but also acts as a portable power bank for the earbuds. So when I walk out of the gym I'll pop them in and it quickly charges them before I even get home.

title: Way too much background noise
body: Overall the product is not bad.  I like the design, they are comfortable to wear, and the charging case is very convenient.  The sound quality is very good too.  I am only returning these for one unfortunate reason: every person that I spoke with asked me to stop using them for the rest of our conversation.  They said the level of background noise was painful.  And this is over 12-15 conversations in all different environments.  I was hoping to avoid spending $100+ on AirPods, but oh well.

title: Dang, these are good.
body:
I bought these not expecting much because of the low price tag. I’ve bought many other headphones and earphones surpassing these in price. I don’t consider myself an audiophile, but I enjoy good sound and with a bunch of headphones and earphones in the bag I’ve been exposed to many different cans.
These fit snug, I had trouble at work keeping in some other earbuds, they wouldn’t insulate well and was just a treble fest. These stay in and even if your ear gets sweaty they still stay in. The magnetic case is really handy, those earbuds will not fall out of the case and the hole for keychain access makes it that much better.
Sound quality is great, I was blown away by how punchy the bass is and how the highs are really drawn out. While I don’t believe they are balanced or flat, for people who listen to most genres these should do just fine. I do believe the highs and lows do drown out the mids a bit, but honestly it’s nothing a EQ couldn’t fix. The battery is standard for most earbuds on the market, but I’ve managed to squeeze out 7 hours on about 60% volume. The case also provides ~3 full charges for the earbuds.
For the price tag, I couldn’t recommend another wireless earbud brand, don’t be deterred by the name. These are the real deal.

title: High quality, worth the price
body:
I've had these headphones for about a month and a half now and I'm very happy with them. After buying pair after pair of super cheap bluetooth headphones that would suddenly stop working or the battery life would drop off after just a few charges, I decided to spend a little bit more and I'm so glad I did.

I literally use these every single day- at work, at the gym, running outside, and just doing everyday stuff. I work in a lab where there's loud equipment and machinery operating pretty much all the time, but these headphones do a great job of blocking out ambient noise, while not blocking so well that I couldn't hear alarms or someone trying to get my attention.

They seem really durable- I've dropped them in a full sink and had them roll down my driveway in the rain and they were totally fine. The manual says you can even go swimming with them, but I'm not really willing to try that. Sometimes when I sweat a lot, it makes the earbuds start to slip out or shift around, which can distort the sound. That's my one single complaint with these earbuds but it honestly might be a problem with all similar types of headphones idk.

 I've found that the battery lasts me about 4 hours so I need to charge them halfway through the day, but they take like 10 minutes to go from 0 to 100% battery- maybe that's a standard charging time these days but I think that's amazing! I charge them on my lunch break and they usually last until the end of the day.

The charging dock is also really nice. It can be charged wirelessly or by USB cable and both ways work well. I think the dock's battery has about 2.5 full charges worth of power for the earbuds, but I've never totally run out the battery on the charger so it might be able to do more. I've also gotten multiple emails following up my purchase to offer me a free wireless charger, but I already have one and don't need another one.

title: not valuable for the price
body:
noise cancellation works, but itself gives too much noise, you can hear something when you don't play anything.
music quality is not good, only for bass works ok, but sounds horrible when U listen to some classic music or others.
battery, 2 hours talking the most, fully charge 2.5 times

title: They are ok but have issues.
body:
I've used quite a few different bluetooth headsets with both a PC and an android phone and none of them have been great. The biggest issue with these are the mic volume when you are talking to someone on the phone, sometimes the other person can hear me just fine other times they have to turn the volume all of the way up. This is not due to outside noise or some other noise, I've had this happen sitting at a quiet desk and walking outside, I've turned them off and on again and it fixes the issue. Also there is a long delay (30+ seconds) for them to connect to bluetooth on my phone, other bluetooth devices connect immediately these do not. Also not found a good way to keep them in place in my ear while jogging, they seem to bounce loss and then I have to push them back in again, I'm still trying to find the right size for me. Also have they seem to have a lot of issues with discounting from one ear to the other when just walking around and moving, I'll hear it drop and sound come from my phone (phone is in my pocket) and then come back on but on the left ear only then on both ears. This is really annoying when you are trying to listen to something and I have never experienced these with other devices.

Overall I would not recommend them, I think the cheap pair of Senso's I have work better and sound better. It was also really annoying that the company contacts buyers and offers them a free wireless charger if they provide a good review on here, this seems really unethical and it explains why there are so many good reviews on these.

title: Missing additional sized ear caps.
body: They seem fine, but I did not receive any additional ear caps in my box... Just one size, and they're kinda snug. I think I have some other ear caps in a drawer somewhere. So, I'm not going to pitch a fit too much about it.

title: Really great sound and noise cancelling
body: I liked how the setup for these earbuds took almost no time and I can quickly switch between my macbook and iphone if I want to use it for either. The voiceover when it connects is nice because it tells you that you have a call and such. The earbuds came with 4 different sizes which was very useful since my ears couldn't fit the original size, swapping out to the large was necessary and it's a perfect fit! I like most how I don't have to play them loud at all, I keep them at the first 2 digits on the volume and this is because of how well it cancels other noise. Overall, I'm currently enjoying these earbuds and will continue using them for as long as possible! It's nice that they are waterproof and they are pretty durable. The case is also a nice shape, you can even hang it from a keychain or something using the lanyard, but it fits in my relatively large pockets well.

title: Good quality
body: These are alot louder than previous headphones I've bought and I really like that it's good for canceling out noise around me i havent tested waterproofness but i dont plan to either, case seems good quality and snaps shut well

title: loved until...
body: I have to admit i really love these earbuds. The sound is great, they pair easily and they fit perfect in my ear. unfortunately after about four months of sporadic use they  do not hold much of a charge anymore and my window for return just closed. other wise good purchase.

title: A great value and solid product
body: The size and weight of these is perfect for me.  They stay put and last through a workout at the gym without a wire to get caught on the equipment.  So far I'm thrilled with my purchase.  I was hesitant to pay such a price for a brand I've never heard of, but no regrets after trying them out.

title: Have the ability to come loose in the ear.
body: Ultimately I was looking for a quality alternative to Apple Earbuds and this product stacked up well with the exception of a firm ear fit.  They often come loose during workouts (jogging or jumping rope).  I tried all the ear adapter sizes but none compared to how secure the Apple Earbuds I have tried before.  A little disappointing in this regard but for a 1/3 the price I'll deal with the inconvenience . . . for now

title: Awesome value for the money
body:
I cannot believe the sound out of these, and they stayed in my ears during a wet, 4 mile run.  Sound quality is better than my Bose Sound Sport, which have the connecting wire on the back of the neck (which tends to grab a wet neck and pull out of your ear when you turn your head).  The Bose also fall out on occasion.  These were so great I turned around and bought my wife a pair!

If there is a downside, the buttons only control the phone, so I can't skip or start/stop music.  Also, initially the bass seemed a bit heavy, though I stopped noticing after a while.

title: good product for the money
body: The headphones took me a little while to get to work. The first time I tried pairing them with my IPhone I could only hear out of one headphone. I placed them on the charger for a little while and took them to the gym and they paired perfectly. I think they just needed to be charged a little longer. They arrived in brand new packaging on the estimated day of delivery. Setting up the warranty was super easy and I received an email from the company within a couple days of registering my product to thank me for my purchase and offering a wireless charging station. The color I wanted wasn't in stock so I ordered the white ones to get them sooner. I'm very happy with my purchase!

title: Good for the gym
body:
I bought these to replace some expensive Jay birds I had.  I got tired of the wire connecting both ears.  These are great because they are separate, they have a tad too much bass, but it isn't terrible.  You can adjust your EQ and it'll be perfect, I just don't like the inconvenience of having to change it back for when my car connects.

I've used these maybe 10 times, get very sweaty, and they're working fine.  The rechargeable battery dock is a nice touch.

title: No need to buy any other earbuds!!
body: I recieved jabra elite earbuds for Christmas which cost over $170.00 for the pair. Fortunately I lost them which made me purchase the tozo t10 and I have to say the tozo are much better. Better sound by far, easier to keep in your ears and better distance. You wont be disappointed with these.. dont waste your money on overpriced earbuds it's not necessary these cover everything you need.

title: Great Value! Buying another set for my wife.
body: Great Value. Got on Amazon to just find some quality ear plugs for swimming.  Stumbled across these and for the negligible price difference decided to go with these. They fit great I am a big guy but have small ear canals so having the different adapters was really nice. I had to use the smallest. They are comfortable and have no problem staying in when working out or even swimming.  While they are water resistant they are not 100% water proof in that you can't just drop them in the pool or wash them under running water. As long as they are in your ear they are waterproof providing they have a good seal in your ears and your not diving beyond 3 feet. Sound is good. I'm no HIFI expert but the sound is good with high highs and good bass response as well. Range is great. Note when swimming that when you go under the water the sound will break up or cut out all together due to the signal being blocked by the water. This is not the fault of the earbuds themselves.

title: Great Sound While They Last
body: I have had the earbuds for roughly 3 months and they were great for working out, work around the house, and listening to videos. However, there were three really big downsides: Bluetooth quality, lifespan, false garuntee. I first noticed the Bluetooth connection to my phone was spotty whenever I would go out for a run. It seemed that the connection would not hold while on the move and my left earbud would stop playing audio at random points as I ran. Walking, however, did not affect the connection. Not being able to use these on a run was a large upset. Second, after the three months of use, my right earbud died. Not in the sense that the battery ran out, but that it would play sound at an almost inaudible level. Now, the right earbud has ceased playing any audio at all, yet I can still connect it to the left bud and connect it to my phone. So, I decided to cash in on the free "1-Year extended warranty" that comes in the package with the product. Just filling out the information for the warranty was tedious and suspicious as it was not specific at all towards who bought what product, and thus, I have been denied any for of re-imbursement or replacement. The T10s were great for those three months, but I would not recommend if you are not looking to repetitively buy earbuds every three months!

title: Very Pleased with the quality of the product and service!!
body: First I have tried several different relatively BT earbuds and been very disappointed with durability and battery performance. From the first use the quality in these earbuds was apparent just by how they feel and operate. Battery life has been great. I have been able to listen for hours at a time without having to recharge. The bluetooth syncing has also been a breeze and the sound quality is great considering the price range. All in all I've been satisfied with my purchase.

title: ANYTHING can cause interference.
body:
I bought these so that I could listen to my music while I went on my daily runs. They look cool, they feel comfortable, and they seem like they'd be great. But they're not. I have yoga pants with pockets, and if I put my phone in my pocket, my music cuts in and out. If I put  it in my backpack, the connection is lost entirely. The only way I can keep the connection somewhat stable is to put my phone in my bra--which I was trying to avoid with yoga pants with pockets in the first place. And even then, if I turn my head too far to one side, the connection is lost.

If you plan on putting your connected device in your pocket, don't buy these earbuds. Heck, if you plan on doing anything that isn't holding your device right in front of your face with absolutely no barriers, then don't buy these.

Everything else about these is great. But they're just not effective for doing anything at all. I'm extremely disappointed.

title: Great for Running
body: I've used a Jaybird headset in the past for workouts, couldn't get them to last 1 year without failure.  So I decided to try these due to the price point and customer reviews.  Took a couple of the ear piece trials to find the best fit and function.  I have them for about 2 weeks and I'm pleased with the performance and great sound.  I would only suggest some additional ear pieces in foam, I've found they are the best in comfort and sound.

title: Great Product Great price
body: Was looking for wireless headphones to try out since I was looking to ditch the cable. I commute by motorcycle most of the week, so I was hoping they would work inside the helmet. To my surprise they work perfectly with a slight change to how I put on the helmet. But overall I can’t hear the deafening  decibels, I’ve used them in the shower successfully. Looking forward to seeing what more these can last through.

title: T10 Tozo Earbuds Review - So far so good!
body: I have only used them a handful of times, but the sound quality is really nice. Comfortable, doesn't hurt my ears. Volume can be loud enough, never find myself turn up the volume to max to listen to them.  As far as noise canceling I find myself adjusting them in my ear trying to sometimes get them to sit just right to cancel out more noise. But overall very happy with them.

title: Great fitting earbuds!
body: I was a but skeptical about getting some wireless earbuds that only go inside you ear as I was worried they would fall off during workouts, but I am glad I went with these. I've been using them daily for the past couple of days with no issues at all. They stay in snug and sounds quality is amazing. Would highly recommend to everyone!

title: Great product Believe the Hype....
body:
I use these when i am mowing. They have good volume and are very clear. I am having some connection issues but i believe that are phone related....  I was hesitant at first but am glad i was able buy a pair....

Just an FYI always remove the right ear bud first get it in your ear then removes the second. This patter seems to have helped with the connection items......

Great product.....

title: ground sound & connection for an amazing price
body: After my others (brain fart, can't remember the brand, but waterproof, $250ish from Best Buy, not Bose) died I needed something to replace them because....let's be honest, working out at the gym without headphones sucks. Was skeptical cause these showed up as amazon's "top seller" or whatever, and usually those are paid reviews. But these have way better sound than I thought, they don't stick out of my ears like I see some of the other brands (JBL / Bose). Huge fan of these. HUGE

title: Exceeded expectations for the price
body: For about $50, these earbuds surprised me. The fit is snug and comfortable. The sound quality is excellent. The case wireless charging is a very nice added bonus. There was minimal to no lag when watching videos. Overall, an excellent buy.

title: Crackling Sound on two different pairs
body: I bought these from a recommendation from a friend.  Production quality must have changed because the first pair I received, after pairing, had a crackling sound in each ear piece.  I tried pairing to another device and got the same thing.  I reset them, removed the old paring record from my phone and tried again, same result.  I chalked it up to a faulty pair and put in a return and had them ship me out another pair.  Got them, same exact issue, in that state they are unbearable to listen through.  Disappointed for sure.  Returned both pairs.  I don't recommend them.

title: As an Audiophile, I'm blown away!
body:
Fifty dollars (plus shipping) well spent. The stereo-feel to these are incredible. I usually only wear one ear-bud, so I underestimated the full experience of the T10's.

I can't seem to get them to sit right in my ears when I have my motorcycle helmet on, but that was expected.

The noise cancellation isn't overpowering, but feels natural.

title: No more cords!
body:
No more hassles with corded earbuds anymore!
Researched many reviews on Amazon and decided this had the most
Recommendations and was very well liked so considered it the best
Option to purchase. Very glad I did. Quality of sound is there and good,
deep bass. Strong battery life and ample recharge with magnetic case.
Packaging was quality and from the reviews I saw, company looks solid.
IPX8 waterproof is for minimal water submersion so I know I can wear
Them for jogging or to the gym. Very cool upgrade to my listening options
... no more cords!

title: Stay properly in place and are water resistant!!!
body: Bought Tozo T10 after reviewing multiple brands. I am very satisfied and happy with my purchase. They stay in place in the ear while I am exercising canceling out most of outside noises. Also, I have already used them in the pool and taking showers and still functioning exactly the same. Design is good and pair mode process is simple. Only one opportunity of improvement would be the Bluetooth range is not long enough compared to other brands, so I have to keep the phone within 11ft in a straight line from it. No walls and turns because it will start dropping reception.

title: product is great but does have an issue
body:
I loved the sound better than any wired set of earbuds.  The noise cancelation is great, riding my motorcycle now sounds like the interior of a car.  Putting the helmet on requires a bit of flexing of the helmet to get it over the earbuds.  Some have posted about the buds especially the left bud cutting in and out.  I have had this happen too and it seems to be a transmission/reception issue.  In my home the buds do not cut out but if I walk outside, place the top of my phone on my left hip, the sound fully cuts off. My home has layers of brick and metal, radio signal bounce off it so I have to use an external antenna. The Bluetooth signal is trapped in the house so I get great coverage indoors.  Outdoors it is a different story, body parts can block the signal, holding the phone flat and facing you gives a perfect signal.  This issue becomes a feature if you're like me and forget to take your phone with you.  At home, no interruptions, at the gym, I start to walk off, turn away and it cuts out for a second I turn back, pick up my phone and water bottle and NEVER forget my phone!
I am impressed with the engineering on the TOZO T10, it works great in the shower, phone use is clear and crisp, well worth the price!

title: First Use of Wireless Ear Buds
body:
I don't have an opportunity to use earbuds often but felt that lack of wires would be nice on those occasions when I do.
While I have not used the Tozo during activity they fit snuggly in my ears and cancel outside noise very well.  They connected easily to my Ipad and my Apple TV.  The sound quality is great and I no longer have to strain to hear whispered conversation on TV.

title: Awesome Sound
body:
Honestly I was blown away with the quality for only $50 bucks.
Nice and loud, good bass.

This is my first pair of wireless headphones but I wish they would last longer than three hours.

But honestly, they are awesome!!

title: Awesome, you can't ask for more at this price!
body: These earbuds have great sound with impressive bass response, fit well and don't fall out.  An added useful feature is the wireless charging of the case, no more plugging in (charging base is optional, but I had one for my iPhone).  One year warranty offered and the product appears to be of high quality.  You can't go wrong at this price!

title: Great bang for your buck.
body: I have had these headphones for about two weeks as of writing this. I could not be happier with the price to quality ratio. They sound great and have heavier bass than I anticipated. They also have a good weight and feel sturdy. I also like the build quality of the case, feels like it should last a long time.

title: earbuds that are music to my ears
body: These 'buds are really convenient for my job as an Uber/Lyft driver; the Bluetooth feature allows for hands free gps and messages used with job. I use them at the gym and while at home for comfortable wear, a good fit and excellent sound quality. The price was reasonable. And the after purchase followup with a year's warranty was a testament to the company's desire for great customer service.

title: Amazing Sound Quality & Easy to Pair
body: I love love love these earbuds. I looked long and hard and read more reviews about earbuds than I care to admit. I was finally sold when I read a review of these that were right up my technical-alley. I'm a sound snob, unfortunately and these produce all that I could hope for short of being in a concert standing next to the speakers! I have two pair so while one charges I can listen to the other. They both pair without any problems to my Samsung Galaxy S7 and are easy to wear. They never hurt my ears. I'm only sad I can't wear them more often (working meetings really get in the way of my musical enjoyment of these earbuds! :-)  ). I would venture to say that these are even better audio quality than the Bose earbuds I bought a couple of years ago, especially given the price! Go TOZO!

title: Great Product and Customer Service!!
body: These earbuds are amazing. They provide a wonderful sound experience. The earbuds come with 4 different size ear caps for optimal comfort. The customer service department exceeded my expectations. I wish all companies took care of their customers the way TOZO took care of me. Thank you!

title: Bestest Bluetooth Earbuds
body: After trying many many different Bluetooth earbuds I have found the best. I love how not only are they Waterproof but the charging case is too(IPX8). The sound is fantastic, better than any wired earbuds I have tried. You also get four different sizes for the rubber tips that hold them in your ears. Pairing with my phone couldn't be simpler. Once paired every time you remove them from the charging case they are paired up by the time you get them in your ears. These replaced a different brand that I received for Christmas. The other pair would turn on and pair to your device soon as they were fully charged. Stupidest thing I ever heard of. Who would want their earbuds to pair to your device while in a case. Not only wasted battery life but also messed with my phone. I would get a call and I could not hear anything and either could the person that called me. They were POPCHOSE so you know what not to purchase. I love my T10 earbuds and highly recommend them to friends, family and everyone.

title: Great earbuds, fantastic sound, and case recharges earbuds!
body: I have been using these earbuds for about two weeks now. They are great! Each earbud last over 3 hours. Then you put them in the case, and they recharge in about an hour. The case provides about 3 charges to the earbuds. These earbuds have decent deep bass for earbuds. Easy to connect via Bluetooth. So far, they have been great!

title: Amazing earbuds!!
body:
Great product. Theyre very comfortable and well made. Strong magnets to secure headphones in case but also the lid to the main body of the case(when closed).Sound quality and bass is pretty good.overall id give this product a 5/5 expecially with consideration of the price you cant beat it.
Also if any problems contact their store they're very friendly/helpful

title: Alright, but not the best
body: This product works OK. I'm still using it after several months, but it's not my primary wireless device. The battery last a few hours between recharging. The headphones don't work great when I'm bending down to do yard work. Somehow my body is blocking coordination when that happens. I would price these at closer to $30 than the $50 I paid.

title: So far, SO good.
body:
I must start this out by saying that I am not an intensive user of earbuds/headphones. I don't typically wear and use them for hours on end, and I have almost never burned through a single charge on wireless headsets. I use them walking from my car to my office building and back. I don't use earbuds for phone calls and can't really speak to how well they work for that. What I can say is that, after using the Plantronics BackBeat GO 2 earbuds for a bit over two years, I was growing tired of the cord catching on my jacket collar and them pulling out of my ears every time I turned my head. I wanted to try some true wireless earbuds, but I wasn't going to pay a whole lot for them. I got the Tozo T10 because of decent reviews and a good price. I had read the 1- and 2-star reviews and understood the issues. I am also aware that bluetooth can be far from perfection. I was (and am) prepared for these not to work very well. I've been using them for the better part of a week and have to say I've been pleasantly surprised at how much I like them.

Fit - this was a prime concern as I was initially worried about them flying out of my ears while just walking down the street. With 4 sizes of cushions, I experimented and settled on a size that works for me. They hang in there just fine and maintain a seal that usually provides good sound (occasionally my left channel gets wonky if it moves a bit, but I've had that trouble before and think it's my ear and not the earbud).

Sound - sound is great. I typically just listen to podcasts, so sound quality isn't high on my list of requirements, but I did happen to put some music through them and it sounded good to me. I am not an audiophile or anything and don't get too worked up about sound quality, but I can say that for me, the sound is pretty damn good.

Connection - jury's out on this and I'm still collecting evidence. So far it hasn't been bad. I did find when I connected to my Samsung tablet (to watch a movie at work) the earbuds got a bad connection due to conflict with a bluetooth keyboard also connected at the same time. But again that's typical of the bluetooth technology and not really a knock against the earbuds. I'm still concerned how it progresses. Many of the lower-starred reviews mentioned that connectivity issues appeared after a short time, so like I say, I'm keeping my ears open for any problems. Right now... they're working fine.

Battery - as stated previously I really have no idea if these have the battery life advertised because I never wear them long enough to go through a single charge. I like that they recharge in the case and that it functions as a portable charger. It seems to hold a fair amount of charge. I suspect if you are a light user of headsets you'll be pleased with these.

Waterproofing - I've used them in the shower once so far without issue. I haven't tried swimming with them and honestly probably won't. I can see using them in the shower more often though.

Travel - I will say that due to the case being a charger it is necessarily a bit bulky. There will be no slipping this into your pants/jeans pockets and going about your day. But since the buds themselves are small and easy to misplace without it, keeping the case nearby is kind of important. It comes with a lanyard cord but I found that pretty useless. You can keep it in jacket pockets or a laptop bag/backpack. Pants pockets are going to get uncomfortable unless you're sporting cargo pants, and then you have to deal with the fact that you're wearing cargo pants.

Warranty - the earbuds come with a 1-year limited warranty from Tozo. Seems like a good thing. We'll see if I ever have to use it.

Summation - so far, so good. I expect if something adverse happens, I'll come back and update my review, but for right now I really do like the Tozo T10.

Full disclosure... Tozo offered me a wireless charger for free. They asked for, but did not require, a review. They put no conditions for getting the charger, only to confirm the address that the earbuds were shipped to. They seem like a pretty good, customer-focused, company.

title: Pretty Good for the Money
body: The feel of the earbuds are comfortable in any position. The sound quality is good, although they can't be super loud or they will rumble a lot and the sound distorts. It also beeps for a really long time after connecting the right earbud to your phone if you don't connect the left earbud (or if you connect it and disconnect it). Battery lasts if you charge intermittently with your dock. The best feature is the noise cancellation. Just putting them in cancels out a majority .All in all a good set of earbuds for 50$.

title: A great buy!
body:
As others have said, the sound and feel of the earbuds are amazing, as I didn’t know what to expect with complete wireless earbuds.  The sound every bit as good as my wired Sony’s!  One thing that nobody else mentioned is the charging case they come with... it is a heavy duty design and well thought out.  This is important to me because they’ll be living in my book bag and get bounced around a lot.  The hinge and cover seem designed to withstand a fair amount of abuse compared to pictures I’ve seen of others.

The only negative that I’ve noticed is a slightly slow pairing when taking them out of the case, but that is most likely because of my very old iPhone 6.  Even so, I’m up and running in about a minute.

Overall, this was a great purchase and I’m extremely happy with them!

title: They work great...until they stopped
body: So I’ve recommended these headphones to a bunch of friends because normally they are great. They connect and disconnect automatically and sound and work great! Really do like these headphones. That being said, randomly recently the right headphone (the main one) has been randomly disconnecting from the left one on and off! It is incredibly annoying and making me reconsider these. I really do like these so if anyone has a fix for it I will take it! For right now I may have to get different headphones.

title: Great quality for the price
body:
4.5 Stars:
I'm a big fan of these headphones, in fact I'm actively using them right now.  I bought them mainly for noise suppression due to a noisy roommate (they are the saving grace of my sanity), but ended loving them all around as a solid set of bluetooth headphones.

Pros:
- Can wear to sleep (if you position pillows correctly, I sleep with a few) and work better than my earplugs (calming sleep music or falling asleep to audiobooks as an added bonus) - my alarm plays through the headphones, if they happen to still be charged when I wake up (good for naps)
- Can wear anywhere and have a decent normal range as bluetooth headphones go - I wear to the gym, grocery shopping, around the apartment, you name it.
- Can we worn in the shower and still work afterwards.  They don't always stay in the whole time, but I keep a towel nearby to dry off (both earbuds and ears) and reinsert.

Pro and Con:
The pro being they last a few hours on a single charge.  The con, the only work a few hours on a single charge.  The last set of bluetooth headphones I had (Jam mini buds) lasted a good 10-12 hours, so the trade off is real, but nothing I can't adjust to.  The travel charger is a life saver here.

Con:
- I wouldn't recommend if you're buying to swim with.  While they are water proof, as mentioned previously, I tried using them to listen to music when swimming laps and 1) as soon as I went under water, the music was cut off and 2) as soon as I pushed off the wall, they immediately fell out of my ears.

So overall, solid set of headphones for the gym, shower, and for everyday (and night for those of you who need it), but wouldn't buy for swimming.  Also received good customer service from Tozo itself following my order.

title: Better sound and quality than $100 and up buds!
body: I almost purchased the Samsung buds but after seeing the not so good reviews on them I continued searching and found the Tozo t10 buds and I'm so glad I did. These sound amazing, the base is deep and mids and highs are outstanding. I easily get through 3 hours of videos and music with these. Quality is great at this price point there's nothing to complain about. I recommend these and would buy again!

title: Great set of headphones
body:
I keep searching for Bluetooth ear buds that work for me.  I look for battery life, simple designs, ease of use, performance and durability.

I unboxed the set, plugged the charger into my AC adapter.  The charging cradle has a battery life indicator.  Once the user removes the earbuds from the cradle, they appear on the iPhone Bluetooth options immediately.  They connect seamless to my phone.

Each earbud has a button to power it on and off, independently.  There are multiple inserts for different user sizes.  The system includes a charging cable for those without wireless charging, and there is a carrying strap which I find to be useless.

Sound quality of talk radio on Sirius/XM Radio and music are excellent.  There is a nice balance of midrange, treble and bass.  The standard sized ear pieces worked perfectly for me, and they're stable in the ears.

I may have to do a back up set since I really like these over other headsets/earbuds I have used in the past.

Definitely a two thumbs up for me.

Update:

Speaking indoors is not an issue. Sound and clarity is good on both ends. Outdoors, wind causes too much interference disrupting sound quality.

title: There is a problem with the headset
body:
This headset has a very powerful bass that rivals AirPods and is stronger than Jabra. The phone call was also very clear. I bought it for three days and found no problems. This price can buy such a wireless headset, very value! awesome! I really like it too much. If you want to buy a friend of wireless Bluetooth headset, this is it, bought it right.
  Additional comments： It took a while, and now I found that the left earphone connection is unstable and the connection is always dropped.So change five stars to three stars

title: Best Wireless Ear Buds Ever!
body:
These TOZO T10 BT 5.0 earbuds are the best I've ever had.  Most importantly, they stay in your ears.  All you do is twist after placing in your ear.  The sound is great.  Pairing is always a hassle with other earbuds, but these are a piece of cake.  The wired charger is great.  Place the buds in their two places in the charger (they fit) and lower the lid.  All done.  The BT reception range is not a long distance, but when you come back in range the music is still playing.  I can't ask for more.  The documentation is easy to read and I had these buds up in running in minutes.  No wonder these buds are ranked right after Apple's AirPods and before everything else on Amazon.

The best is TOZO has been in touch within the month and wants to send me a wireless charger at no charge.  How cool is that?  Can't go wrong with these TOZO ear buds.

title: Great Sounding Buds
body: Just received these and my first impression is they are great. Worn them for about an hour, no discomfort and the sound, including decent bass, is very good. I also like the charging case - it allows you to charge the buds 4 times from the case, without having to plug the case into the wall - brilliant!

title: Great alternative to the $200 name brands
body: I couldn't justify spending almost $200 on some Sony or Jabra true wireless earbuds, but I didn't want to waste money on some cheap $20 ones with horrible quality. These sound as good as my Ludacris SOUL earbuds and charge quick enough to let them sit when I'm away from my desk for meetings. I did have some static in the left earbud, but I determined it was from a crappy bluetooth transmitter in my laptop, not the earbuds themselves. I highly recommend these for someone who wants to get rid of wired earbuds but doesn't want to spend the money on a major brand.

title: Worked great and sound is excellent
body: I replaced an older LG product with this and I really am enjoying it.  I found it fit with the earbuds that came with it, although there are several extra sizes included. The noise cancelling is great.  I haven't tested the moisture wicking yet but look forward to using these during my run and gym workouts.

title: Its a amazing product
body: Hi, recently I bought 3  pairs of these product to my family and me, We love it, the sound its amazing, nothing bad to say, I can recommend it. We contact the support because we have some informative questions and they answer us to fast, they are polite and professional and assist all the time, trying to give you the best experience. You are going to feel helped.

title: Best True Wireless Earbuds I've come across so far
body:
I've tried over 10 pairs of wireless earbuds and to be honest, these are the only ones worth keeping. First of all, I am so impressed by the sound quality, the deep bass, and the punchiness these earphones have.

A lot of other wireless earbuds don't offer much bass and their volume normally is weak due to the small size of the audio driver. But Tozo T10 comes with an 8mm driver and you could definitely feel the difference!

They are comfortable enough. Not the most comfortable ones I've tried but I have no issue with these earbuds in this aspect.

I'm impressed with the IPX8 certification and wireless charging. You get a lot of bang for your bucks definitely.

I hope these will last. I've only had them for a few days now.

title: Easy to use and great quality!
body: Have had these for a couple weeks - they are really good so far. Great battery life, actually fits in my ears (and my wife's too as we got her a pair), and excellent sound quality. Crazy easy to setup as well!

title: Great buy for price
body: The earbuds fit well in my ear and I can leave my phone on the counter and go outside on the patio and still have connection. The pairing is slow so it is faster for me to go into setting ms and pick the earphones vs waiting for it to pair. And, when the phone rings it doesn’t always automatically go to earbuds/Bluetooth. Battery life is about 3.5 hours straight through. Otherwise I am very happy with these for 49 bux!

title: GREAT SOUND QUALITY FOR THE PRICE
body: I own an over the ear, noise cancelling head phones that I originally bought for when I exercise but they are bulky and trap sweat so I decided to look for something smaller.  I bought a couple of Apple AirPods for my boys the same day I ordered the TOZO T10 but didn't want to spend the same $$$ on myself.  I saw the great review for the TOZO T10 and started reading the reviews and decided to order a pair.  I placed the order on a Saturday and it arrived the next day which was a plus for me since I am typically impatient when it comes to wanting to get the product ASAP.  I was pleasantly surprised when I first used the earbuds.  They fit comfortably in my ears and the sound quality is crisp and are very comparable to the sound quality of the AirPods but at one-third of the price.  Very happy with the purchase.

title: Great earbuds for the price!
body: These earbuds are pretty dope. I use them while I work and so far they function optimally. The case is sleek as well and I'm very fond of the magnetic charging dock. Worked perfectly straight out of the box and delivery took less than a day.

title: Absolute Garbage
body: I’m writing this review for the third time. Initially, I purchased these earbuds based on the good Amazon reviews that I read. The pair I received had terrible sound quality and intermittent connectivity issues. TOZO read my first negative review and offered to replace them free of charge. They promptly sent me a new set of earbuds that were worse than the original. I applaud their excellent customer service, it is truly top notch. However, the product is absolutely terrible. There is no amount of customer service that will ever make up for the poor quality of this product. I literally just threw both sets of the earbuds (the set I purchased and the set they sent to me as replacement for free) in my kitchen trash can. That’s how bad they are. They sound terrible and they don’t connect easily if at all. I briefly considered giving them away to a person I disliked, but I was unable to think of anybody I disliked enough to do that to. They’re garbage, don’t waste your time or money on them.

title: AMAZING headphones!!
body: Love love love these headphones! BEST bang for your buck! I am a huge geek when it comes to headphones and when I say they are great headphones (clear sounds and amazing bass), I don’t mean they are great only for their price range but they are simply amazing hands down. They don’t fall out even when I am exercising vigorously and yet super comfortable! Get them already :)

title: Can't get any better, buy them!
body: Put them in and I couldn't even feel them! They connect smoothly and almost immediately. Very soundproof and have at least a 20-30 ft range. They fit nice in my purse and they are charged with a standard micro USB cord. I got the gold color and it blends in very discreetly in my ear. I'm so glad I bought these instead of dropping $150 on airpods. I have a OnePlus 6 and I couldn't love them more! GET THESE!

title: HORRIBLE!! DO NOT BUY
body: Sound quality is patchy and the esthetic needs major Improvement but most importantly the buds will not stay in my ears. Maybe I’m a bit biased because I own a pair of Apple AirPods. I bought this item because I thought this can be a back up for wireless speakers but I can’t keep these things in my ears for more than two minutes and the sound quality is atrocious when compared to Apple. I’ll be returning to get my money back!!

title: It comes with everything you need and it connected fast to my phone
body:
Crystal clear. It is the best of all the Bluetooth
I ever purchase. I love it. Purchase these Bluetooth it is worth the money 5.0
It comes with everything you need and it connected fast to my phone

title: Sound quality not up to par
body: My previous pair of bluetooth earbuds cost about $25 and had better sound quality and less latency.  These are very bassy, so much that the mids and highs are lost in the mix. On top of that, the highs sound compressed (like radio fuzz) which I've never heard before on any headphone. Another problem is latency which makes watching videos annoying since the audio is behind the video just enough to take you out of the experience.  Because of these faults, I decided to return these. Some final comments, these fit nice and the build quality seems fine, I did not get to test the battery life so no comment on that.

title: BASS LEVEL OVER 9000%
body: Oh yeah, these earbuds are bomb. These babies are noise cancelling 9000%, with that nice deep bass that makes my spine shiver! They connected immediately and so far I've had no hassle using them at all. Showed my goth gf and now she is going to get them too, because I was right about these headphones actually being worth it. I would say these are worth it, and a safe buy for those that are skeptical.

title: An amazing product at an amazing price!
body: I thought these we're in amazing purchase for the price that they are! They have a long battery life! I can wear them in the shower without having to worry about them breaking! When the battery finally does go low it does not take too long to get a full charge again! I would recommend buying these if you're like me and have never bought wireless headphones before, I saw all the good reviews and I'm grateful that I looked at all the reviews before purchasing because that always helps me to purchase something is the reviews! Like I said I definitely recommend purchasing these I got them in Black. I believe they have five colors to choose from in all. And they do not feel heavy in my ears and they fit well! I think the only thing I do not like is that it's kind of hard to press the button to answer phone calls at Etc.. But other than that I find these to be very good and I've had no problems with them! My husband actually wants a pair now he he!

title: Very easy to use, fast pairing
body: I have had these headphones for a couple of days now and so far so good! The sound is great, and they pair to my phone as soon as I take them out of their case. My old headphones were also wireless but they has a little grip thing that went around the back of my ear, going from the extra ear support to none feels weird! I've worn them a couple times and they seem to stay in, I'm hoping with time I will adjust to how these fit.
