title: Works as described
body: Great alternative to the much pricier ear buds.  They worked as described and came with 4 pairs of other ear pieces in case the default ones are too large.  Sound is great, and the unit can charge wirelessly.  It does take longer to pair again vs. other bluetooth headphones I have (about 10 seconds from taking them out of the case), but other than that, smooth sailing with these so far.  Also, these do not charge with my Samsung wireless charger that came with my Galaxy S10+, only with generic wireless chargers.

title: Good bang for your buck.
body:
The T10's are a pretty solid set of Independant ear buds with a good design for the charging case and a lot of quality the price. They fit in my ear nice and snug and do a great job of tuning the world out with sound quality that carries a surprising about of bass from the size.

My only complaint is the battery time. I use these at my work and the 3.5 to 4 hour play time isn't ideal for an right hour shift. The buds charge in about a half hour to forty five minutes so I can charge them during my lunch break but being able to have a bit longer of a run time would be perfect for an office environment. Outside of that, sometimes there is a little issue in getting the ear buds to pair to themselves which is easily cleared by putting them back in the dock and retrieving them.

I'm happy I picked these up.

title: No volume or next song control. Not worth the price.
body: It's very disappointing that you're unable to control the volume or playback with these ear buds. With these simple features lacking, these really shouldn't be more than $20.

title: Great earbuds compared to Bose.
body: First, I lost a pair of Bose earbuds that are similar. I did not want to spend a lot on another set and these filled the bill. They were shipped fast by Amazon. They were ready to use out of the package. Took about 4 seconds to connect to my iPhone, and sounded incredible. Much better than the Bose. I asked about leaving the case on a charger for one to two weeks and was quickly told do not do this. So response to questions is very fast and thorough. I would buy another pair. They have a really good support team. Answers are swiftly returned and they go out of their way to make you happy.  I am happy.

title: Cuts in and out
body: I like the way they fit and look.  However, the audio cuts in and out every 20-30 seconds.  Very annoying when trying to work out.  Actually had to remove them to finish work out.  I have had other wireless earbuds that did not cut out at all.  Extremely disappointed in product.

title: First pair had issues. Seller is sending a second pair.
body:
Update: I registered my warranty and reached out to TOZO via email. They were very responsive and wrote back within 1 day of filing warranty claim with offer to send brand new pair. Warranty claim process was very easy and all done through their website (no annoying 800 numbers). I was happy with the performance of earbuds previously sent, for the first week when they worked, they had great sound quality, fit and feel. Hoping second time is a charm.

Extremely disappointed. It seemed  like good quality out of the box, have chargeable case, good quality earphone set. Connected bluetooth when it arrived, seemed to work great, good sound quality, great fit in my ear, would have been great for workout. BUT, the Right earphone stopped working within one week of purchase. No heavy use, haven't even taken them to the gym yet. Expected better for the price. Reaching out to the company to file warranty claim.

title: Believe the negative ratings becasue it seems like the positive ratings are mostly fake.
body:
These constantly lose connection and are painfully irritating to use. Overpriced garbage at best! I missed the return for refund window or else I would have send them back. Don't bother! Cheap quality, sound, and product.

I am unable to comment on battery life because I could not put myself thru the misery of using them that long!

title: Great highly recommended wireless charging case!
body:
Great product I really enjoyed it I ordered a second one. Made lots of phone calls people can hear me . clearly. Comes with different sizes of ear buds.

I ended up buying two of them!!

One for the car and one for my backpack.

title: Great earbuds at a reasonable price!
body: Super easy to use eaerbuds with really good range. I can wear these into other rooms away from my iPhone and they work just fine, and the price is right. I bought them because my son wears his running and they stay in his ears.

title: Muy buen producto
body: Un excelente producto. Bajos muy buenos, puedo hablar tranquilamente por teléfono y se escucha perfecto. aunque el volumen es algo bajo para mí.

title: Overall very satisfied
body:
I only just received my earbuds but so far I am very satisfied with them. The sound quality is better then I expected. The wireless charging is very handy since I already had a wireless charger. The different size rubber pieces allowed me to find a good fit for me. I even took them running and didn't have an issue with them falling out (even if I was careful to check them a lot so they did not). The magnets on the carrying case make it very secure. The case could be considered to be a little big to some but it is still small enough to slip in your pocket and forget it's in there.
I did have an issue where they were cutting out somewhat frequently but I found directions on how to reset the devices and have not had a problem since. It was probably just a glitch during initial setup.

title: Updated review - nice.
body: I originally wrote a negative review because my charging case would not work. The seller reached out to me and told me a new one was on the way. I had origally given this product a 3 but raised it to 5 stars because the seller reacted very fast and was proactive. The case works great and the earbuds are exactly what I was looking for. I had never heard of this brand but I will buy their products again.

title: Great purchase, I'm buying more
body: I've been using the Tozo T10 earbuds for a couple of days and I'm very impressed.  They paired flawlessly with my Galaxy S7, and the sound rivals my much more expensive wired earbuds.

title: Great at first, but pairing issues
body:
I've only had these for an hour, but I am already in love! They paired easy, they sound great, and they weren't $150 plus like other brands. They were packaged really nice and the charging case is good quality. The case can charge the earbuds 4 times and it can either be plugged in by USB or put on a charging pad. I can't wait to try them out running tomorrow!

Update: maybe its user error, but I can't get the right ear to sync and can only get music out of the left. I'm over it 😔

title: Pretty good overall!
body: These fit well and sound fantastic.  Charging is quick and the case fits well in my pocket.  I like how fast they activate and synch when I take them out of the case.  I have experienced a few times where the signal cuts out a bit in one ear or the other, usually while I am adjusting fit, but it is fleeting and not a persistant problem.

title: Bang for your buck!
body:
I can’t begin to tell you how much better these wireless earbuds are compared to the AirPods. For one, they fit so snug in your ear and immediately cancels out noise. I can now enjoy my experience without any interruptions!
Every morning on my commute to work I’m using the wireless earbuds and also coming home. I’ve never had to fully charge it anytime during the week - that’s how good the battery life is!
I listen to a lot of podcasts so being able to hear clearly what I’m listening to is major. And with these wireless earbuds I don’t have to turn up the volume to the max or ever have to pause to replay.
You can’t beat the price on this product. It’s a win, win!

title: Definitely worth the price for what you get
body: Very good sound and range was able to leave phone on other side of house and could still hear clearly with no issues. It will work with only one on but it has to be the right one and it will make a beeping noise until the left one is connected. They are waterproof I did take a shower however if they fall out whole wet they are hard to get them to stay back in while wet. The case does charge through micro USB which they include the cable but it is short. Full disclosure the company does contact you to leave a review in exchange for sending you something for free like a battery bank in my case, they don't say it has to be a positive review but just leave a review.

title: My listening experience has been 1000% improved.
body: I thought of buying airpods before I found these and I'm so thankful I didn't, these are so much better, they have a great feel to my ear and the best bass I've heard in earbuds in a while, the wireless charging makes it so that I can just leave them at the base and not have to think about if they're charged when I'm heading out, the battery life is also great, they haven't died once in any of my calls or listening sessions, most definitely a cop for anyone looking for wireless earbuds.

title: GreaT SOUND
body: These little things are AWESOME!  ONCE YOU GET THE RIGHT CAP FOR YOUR EAR and hey, they include several different sizes.  Love the charging / carrying case (wont lose them)!

title: Totally disappointed
body: The sound on these suck. The sound also goes in and out where I can only hear through one of them and then it will cut back in through both. They also don't automatically connect to one another. It usually takes several attempts to get them to connect to what ever device I am using. The wireless charging worked at first but now they will only charge if plugged in. Waste of money. That is what I get for going cheap.

title: Definitely worth the price. A+ quality for the price!
body:
I was looking for a pair of bluetooth earphones, as the nature of my work requires me to wear a headset all day, and the over-the ear variety causes a headache so bad that when I'm not working, I don't want to put another pair on. (It's also my preference, so wanted to try something new.)

Straight out of the box, I was able to pair it easily with my phone, my computer was a bit harder, but that was just due to outdated bluetooth drivers, and I managed to solve that issue.While the quality for sound is not perfect, it's great for the price, and I personally love to hear the bass in everything, so I was already happy they seem to bring out the bass in things well.

To me they look a little awkward, but of course, any bluetooth headphones look at least a little silly, it comes with the territory.

Battery life. These things say they have 5 hour talk time, and I would not be surprised. I used them all day yesterday, granted no longer than a few spurts at a time, but I can tell these will last.

Overall very satisfied, and for a good budget  bluetooth earbuds, I would highly recommend. Quality isn't great in the sound department, but it's good for the price point, and I feel anyone who wants to worry about that knows that most of the time, you're looking at higher price points for the quality you're looking for.

title: Very good quality and good bang for the buck!
body:
Can't beat the quality for the price! Would definitely recommend
Low-end (bass) and high-end (voices) are both very responsive and connectivity works consistently (sometimes takes time connect, but eventually gets there).
Bought them for working out and is a game changing upgrade from my old wired headphones.
The 200hz range is a bit high though, so the sound quality is a little on the muddy side.

Customer service is top-notch. Bought two of these but had issues with one of them, customer service was quick to send us a replacement.

title: Very satisfied music lover! Very satisfied!!!
body: Bought a pair for my wife as a gift, of course I had to try them out. I was highly impressed, crisp clear sound, the right of bass, can actually feel it from the earbuds. Quality build and perfect charging system. So I had to order my own pair...this is truly a bargain for the price. If I had listed to them with knowing the price I would have guessed 3 times the amount. These are know my go to headset for the car.

title: High quality earbuds
body: The earbuds were delivered today with great anticipation and I was not let down! The packaging was awesome that the earbuds came in.The earbuds themselves were easy to set up and I was good to go to gym right away. I love the sound and comfort of them and the charging case that keeps them ready to go. I have been able to walk to other side of gym with phone left on shelf and have no connection issue at all. I highly recommend these earbuds!

title: Perfect
body: These are so sweet! Dynamic sound, loud, and simple operation. I ride gnarly bike trails and these don't budge . They look good and simple, unlike the flamboyant apple earpods

title: Great sound but Left ear bud cuts connection constantly
body: I have to say for the price they are great. The sound quality and bass are amazing. The down fall tho is the quality control on these as my left earbud cuts out and some times just doesnt connect at all the right stays playing. and to be clear this has been straight out of the box not days later.

title: Don't bother.  There are so many similar ones, I recommend trying a different one than these.
body:
These are not usable headphones, it will cut out on the left ear if you press your phone into your left hip.  I suspect the Bluetooth reception may have trouble reaching the 'master' right side earphone through the human body.  I also see it cutting when I've held the phone with my right hand (to stay on side of the master receiver), and turned my head left or right, similarly cutting out reception when my phone orbits my head.  Not sure why, but imo definitely should happen and not even a possible limitation to Bluetooth itself.  Bass also sucks, out of the box, the treble is predominant (tinny).

On a live test run, I hiked about 90 minutes over 4.5 miles.  Rather than focus on positives (all things which should "normally be expected), here are the additional negatives that convince me to return the product:

-Preparing my morning, I had the earphone playing while having a quick breakfast, the left earphone fell out due to my jaws chewing.  The next size larger was uncomfortably pressuring against my canal.  They are heavier than other ones I just ordered to compare against.

- While on my 4.5 mile walk, if I held the phone in my left hand (natural usage), on the slave side ear piece, the stream consistently cut in and out.  This alone was enough to warrant a return and poor review.

- If I had cupped either ear piece with my hand, the left side (slave) would cut out and not return until I removed my hand.  Again, enough to warrant a return.

- When I unlock and lock my screen, the stream would also hiccup.  Annoying enough considering you don't want to accidentally operate the phone in your pocket but there are not enough remote navigation capabilities, you have to unlock your phone to change songs, read random articles, check messages.

title: Junk
body: JUNK!!!!!! I purchased this item because it had a lot of good reviews. The left side only worked a couple times. Now it won’t link up. Stay away!

title: exactly what I was looking for!
body: I wanted a pair of WIRELESS bluetooth headphones but I just couldn't get myself to buy $150 apple airpods, so I did some research and found these top rated ones on Amazon. Overall, I am VERY impressed and they seem to working great! at first, I couldn't get them to stay in my ears longer than 2 minutes, but then I ended up putting on the smalled ear pieces and now they stay in for most of my workouts. Occasionally I have to re-situate them, but it doesn't bother me that much. The sound quality is great, and noise cancellation and is pretty decent. I love that charging case and that it's portable and easy to carry in a bag/purse. I find that I can get about 6-8 hours worth of listening before having to charge the case. Overall, if you're looking for a nice option of wireless bluetooth ear buds, I highly recommend these. Save that $100 extra that you would spend on airpods toward something else :)

title: Game changer!
body: I just got these headphones two days ago and they are amazing. The sound quality is much better than my bulky and more expensive wired headphones. These headphones for sure withstand an active lifestyle. If they come out, try a different size of plug that come with the package. I definitely recommend!!!

title: So far so good
body: I recently received these and tested them out over the weekend. So far, they work really well and I love how easy they were to set up and that they're super light weight. The sound quality is clear and is perfect for my everyday use at work and while commuting. I don't typically use both earphones at the same time as I like to be aware of my surroundings but they do cancel noise well if you are using both and that is something you are looking for. I can't really speak to the battery life as I haven't used them for a full day at work yet but so far I am pleased with this purchase.

title: Great product for the price
body: This is a very good device, sound is very clear and high quality, battery lasts long (for several days I used and did not have to recharge), I use the treadmill at the gym and because the device comes with different sizes of earbuds  I can adjust - actually I need to change for the the smaller size that comes in the package but it never fell down even using a bigger one, but to prevent I will use the other one smaller provided to see of fits better.

title: Would not reccomend
body: Thought they were great at first but the longer you have them the more you see wrong with them. They don't sync correctly. I will be watching my phone normally and the next second they connect to these headphones while they are in the charging station. Also, there is no button to skip songs on these headphones, all you can do is answer calls and pause/play. Definitely going to talk to customer service to replace these faulty headphones.

title: Great for the price, last 4hours per charge.
body: These earbuds had great sound and really good volume, I wear them 6+ hours a day for work in a loud environment and I can hear my podcast and music just fine. I do recommend buying a set of foam eartips as it will make a major improvement in the comfort and sound. I only use one earbud at a time for work, the playback time per charge was 4 hours at 75 % volume. I only used them a few times for calls and everyone was able to hear me but said I sounded a little far away. (I don't care for the call ability, just need them for music) Every once and a while there is a very slight sync issue on YouTube or Netflix but it was hardly noticable. Overall these are great earbuds for listening to media and for the price I would recommend these.

title: 100% Satisfied
body: These earbuds are superb. I was pleasantly surprised by the clarity, depth, and quality bass that came from them. The battery life is great, at least 2 hours of nonstop playback before you have to recharge them. The included case is basically a power bank for the earbuds. If the case is fully charged, it can be used to recharge the earbuds up to 4 times, plus it acts as a storage case which is convenient and smart. They pair with my phone within seconds of removing them from the case. I have had zero issues with them falling out. They fit good and come with varying sizes of bud covers. I highly recommend getting a pair of these if you want quality sound, solid design, waterproof earbuds, and don't want to break the bank.

title: Great value
body:
The initial pairing of the Tozo T10s is pretty simple! I really like that they come with multiple size inserts to fit different ear profiles. I spent the first few days of owning them trying out different inserts before settling on the medium size. They aren't noise canceling but when I establish a good seal I have trouble hearing people when they speak to me even if I don't have any audio playing through my ears. Battery life is solid for a several hour study session and they will definitely last for a couple days of moderate use; but I like to charge them nightly with my phone because I'm always using them and I would rather not be inconvenienced with having to charge them during the day and having to have a silent study sesh or workout.
Overall, I have a hard time seeing how these earbuds can be beaten for the price of $50!

title: Great but efficient button function? Where you at?
body: as I really love this product there is one thing that sticks out to me and almost bothers me enough to send them back. These earbuds have little to no control on the actual earbuds. While there is a left and a right, they both do the same commands and there’s only four of them. And out of those four commands - three of them deal with taking phone calls. Yes that’s an important part to Bluetooth earphones but I can’t even change my music from the buds...all I can do is play or pause my music. I can redial the last number I called through...which is not helpful. I really felt like they wasted the button functions and left out important functions (like skipping music or restarting a song). I’m sorry but I’ve redialed a number maybe a total of 10 times in my life whereas I skip a song at least three times an hour. I just don’t get how making calls can be more important than having normal functioning buttons for music that are literally on every other pair of Bluetooth earbuds.

title: BEWARE Third Party Seller Tried Slip in Cheaper Earbuds
body: I ordered these Tozo T10's and noticed the case seemed rather light to be actually capable of wireless charging. I also had some pairing issues with these. After going to their support page, I noticed the earbuds I received looked different than the ones on their website and this Amazon item. After looking in the Bluetooth menu I did not see "Tozo T10" but instead saw "Xi7 TWS". A search for this on Google revealed some cheap $10-$13 earbuds that matched the ones I received. Before you ask; as far as a review of those cheaper ones I did receive:  they seem worth $10-$13 (unfortunately).

title: A+ transaction,fast delivery & great quality product
body: I love everything about these earbuds they're totally Wireless which is so awesome they're easily able to be reset if you have any issues with your sound or connection with your phone they sound great it does block out noise quite well and the base is good provided you stick them in your ear deep enough but if you do they can really bumb the bass. The travel charging dock station is great to! Thank you whoever invented these & a guy who I saw at a gym with this type of earbuds which led me to get some!

title: Great Customer Service!
body: This company has great customer service!  Because I found the headphones to fit very well in my ears despite the fact that the buttons were too hard to push and therefore you had to push hard onto your ears, they were willing to send me a new pair free of charge that felt better and were a bit "smarter".  Be sure to read the specs first before you buy in order to be well informed.  Great company to work with!

title: Sound is good but the beeps are annoying
body: I wanted to like this but just cant! I have had others that are way better and cheaper. I hate that the box needs to to be near by and you need to have both devises on and out of the box for that super annoying beeping every 10ish seconds to go away. I go for runs and as a girl I cant put 2 in my ears as it's a safety hazard but having to hold the box and the extra bud is stupid. The sound is pretty good but unusable for my needs

title: Great Ear buds!
body: Great alternative to Mac airpods at a fraction of the price. There are limited features... Like almost none (volume control replay songs fast forward etc. But the great sound quality makes up for it... Well done

title: Not for swimming
body: This product, despite the description, will not work for swimming. Once they get weedy the shut off music. Greet them out of water and they turn back on. Description states swim up to one meter under water. Manual states not to submerge underwater. Better clarification is needed in Amazon description.

title: great ear buds
body:
these are the best ear buds
i had trued others and thes have got to be the best ones i have ever had. thank you. fir in my ear good. sound ia great. and i can walk all over my house with them, great!

title: Good Overall Value
body: We've had the TOZO T10 TWS BT Earbuds for about a week and they have exceeded our expectations.  They are easy to carry, charge fast, and connect fairly quickly with my phone.  For the price point, they are a good value for a wireless solution when you exercise.

title: Returning to Amazon for a refund.
body: The left ear bud would not stay in my ear. I  made several attempts  and they all failed when inserting the ear bud into my left ear. The left ear bud would  simply fall out of my left ear.  Either walking or while sitting it would not stay in my left ear.I really wanted to like these ear buds however it was a fail for me. The are of a very good quality, and they sound pretty good. However if it wont stay in my left ear they are not worth while to me.

title: Overall, pretty good.  Has a few quirks which keep it from being 5 Stars
body:
I like the way the ear buds fit and feel.  They connect quickly and easily when removed from the case.  They fit snugly in my ears and don't seem like they will fall out when I sweat or move too much.
There are 2 annoying things that make me question returning them and prevent me from giving 5 stars.
1. If you only use 1 ear bud, it has to be the right one.  This is ok, but when you first take it out of the case and connect it, for the first 2-3 minutes approximately every 15 seconds it will be looking for the other ear bud and beep.  Eventually the beeping stops, but it's annoying.
2. The other issue is connection with the left ear bud.  Randomly (3 times in the approximately 3 hours of listening I've done with them) the left ear bud will drop connection for about 1 second.  It comes back and connects fine, but for that 1 second it seems to glitch and only have sound on the right side.

title: I’m Amazed
body: Got this for my son and he loves it. Originally we were gonna buy an Apple Product but thought we try this first.  Very happy with it.  Great fit and love the case with LED indicators.  Do not waste your money on big brands cause you will love this.

title: Pretty good for the price
body: This is the first pair of independent wireless earbuds I have owned and I am pretty impressed. The sound quality is quite good for the tiny package and they get quite loud as well. I love the waterproof part as I bought them for chilling in the hot tub. Have used them in the shower as well to try out the waterproof element of them. The con to them, and there is really only one I can find, is that the left side will often drop out. It is losing the signal from the right side. Doesn't take much at all for this to happen and it will often do so without any obstruction between the left and right sides except your head. Get your hand or arm or something close and it's gone. All things considered though, a very nice product. I love the charging case.

title: Returned them
body: Would never take a full charge. Earbuds would disconnect if they were over 12" from my phone. I couldn't even put my phone in my pocket before they would disconnect. I had to hold the phone near my head to stay connected. I don't know if I got a defective pair or what.

title: Comparison to existing product
body:
Jabra Elite vs TOZO T10
Jabra's sound quality is little more sharp but overall volume doesn't go high enough.
TOZO buds are purchased for swimming purpose, it works like a charm. In sound quality perspective, it's base feels a little too loud but it would be because i'm used to using Jabra buds which has low volume in general.

Jabra's product has all these cool features but for work out purpose, I think TOZO fits better. I love IPX8 rating.
Oh, the TOZO's price point is amazing.

title: Great buy
body: Bought these for my wife for Christmas and she loves them. I listened to them for awhile and the sound quality is very good. The battery life has been 3-4hrs listening to music and being able to recharge them with the case is great. They are pretty comfortable to wear for extended periods. She doesn't plan on testing them in water but it's great for piece of mind if caught in the rain or dropped in the tube. I'm probably going to get myself a set also.

title: just ran 5k with it
body: Just ran 5k with it and DID NOT HAVE TO GIZ IT A SINGLE TIME! Sound quality is amazing, stero is amazing too. I like loud music and honestly I dont past volume 3 with these. Really sound proof. Do yourself a favor and buy it  lol ! I hesitated bc many reviews looked fake, but I'm glad I bought this. Battery life seems good too. The only think is that you cant skip music or answer phone calls if you have an android. And also I didnt figure out how to connect to use only one side (keeps beeping looking for other device to pair)

title: High quality for the price point.
body: If you are in the market for wireless Bluetooth headphones, I would recommend these. Sound quality is very high for the average person. I have had a co-worker of mine use them, and they have apple air pods, and they have mentioned that the sounds quality was the same if not better.  The earpiece takes some time to get used to. However, there are multiple adjustment pieces. If you are on a budget and need some great headphones, I highly recommend it.  Also based on the shape, they block out a lot of sounds, so they have a noise-canceling effect. I use them at work without playing music just to hear my own thoughts.

title: Great Buy!
body: I purchased these earbuds for about 1 week now and I love them! I couldn't justify paying for expensive AirPods so went with these and so far I am loving them!! Great sound quality and super user friendly! So far battery life seems to be pretty good, I cannot really attest to logitivity but it worked great when I traveled and on the flight. Thanks Tozo!

title: Left earbud continuously cut on and off [updated]
body:
I really wanted to love these. The sound quality is excellent, they are super comfortable, and I loved the idea of being able to wirelessly charge them. However, they just don't hold up to use. The left earbud CONTINUOUSLY cuts in and out, especially when I am moving, which basically defeats the entire purpose of using them. It's so distracting. I've unpaired and repaired them several times, and even restarted my phone, all to no avail, I've only worn them three times and the problem just keeps getting worse. I was so happy with them at first that I threw away all the packaging and can't even return them. Very disappointing, especially for the price. :( Maybe you'll have better luck.

[update 2/12/19] The seller reached out to me and offered to send me a new pair, which was wonderful, and I added one more star for their customer service (although they did send me way too many emails bugging me about updating my review). Unfortunately, the new pair they sent were even worse than the first, with BOTH earbuds cutting out almost as soon as I placed them in my ears. All in all, these do not work for me.

title: Skeptical At First
body: Because I haven't had good luck with ear buds, I wasn't sure these were for me. After two days of use at the gym for 2 three  hour workouts, the ear buds not only produced excellent sound but were easy to use, cancelling out all outside noise. Loved the price and the charging case.

title: Weak Bluetooth Range Connectivity
body: The T10s are OK. The sound is good with a nice bass. The battery life is fair. The only big problem which disappointed me is the bluethooth connection. I literally walk 10 feet away from my Samsung galaxy smartphone and the music cancels out. At first I thought it might had been city interference from where my home is located but I have the problem everywhere I go. Even at Starbucks or at at park. I expected more bluetooth range from the T10s to be honest. I seen on here that they had the T6 model launched this year but I had purchased the T10 first without doing further research.  If I would have known the bluetooth connectivity was weak on the T10s then I would had purchsed the T6 instead since reviewers are saying the bluetooth connectivity is much more improved on the T6 earphones.

title: I wish the buttons were more useful, but otherwise sold purchase
body: I wish that double pressing the button on the headset did something more useful that "redial" which I 99.999% of the time would never use. Something like, right earpiece does "forward/next" and left earpiece does "back/previous".

title: I'm impressed!
body: After a few days of using them, I must say I'm quite happy with the sound quality, the noise cancellation, and the battery life. They're easy to pair up to my phone and are quite comfortable to wear. The only downside was that there's not volume or playback control (i.e. skip ahead, back, etc). HOWEVER...that's something I didn't bother looking for when searching for these, so that's my bad. If you don't mind not having that sort of control, then these are a great buy! And I was surprised to find out that the case charges on a wireless pad. So if you have one, BONUS PERK! I give these 5/5 overall despite the only con I could find...and that's only because I didn't bother to read the description more. No fault of the product itself! I've decided to return these, though, and swap them out for the T6 model which DO have the functions I desire. Can't wait to get them! I'm sure I'll be just as impressed!

title: Does as promised
body: I got tired of pulling cord earbuds in and out all the time, as well as having them accidentally get ripped out of my ears or phone. So far the size options work well and will fit a variety of inner ear sizes, and I am able to hear clearly with them at low volume. It also cancels out outside noise very well and it's easy to pull one out if I need to hear something speaking to me. The only complaint I have with this product is the battery life. I believe the description says the battery life lasts up to 13 hours, but I'm lucky if they last 5. I charge them per instructions and am not sure why they drain so quickly. Overall though I am satisfied with these bluetooth earbuds and do not plan to get anything else.

title: Great wireless ear buds for the price!
body: I have ordered a few pair of wireless ear buds and these by far have exceeded my expectations. For the money these are well worth it! I use them everyday and running with them has been awesome. Finally no wires hanging off of me :)

title: Be sure to read all instructions for the proper fit and wear.
body: Well written and easy to understand instructions, sound quality is great. Took advantage of an excellent price break on Amazon. Couldn’t ask for a better buy. Certainly a worthwhile purchase.

title: FINALLY THEY HAVE BEEN CREATED!!!
body: these earbuds are fantastic. I finally purchased a pair that fit my ear wonderfully. They come with different size pads to accommodate every type of ear (S, M, L). The sound is great I usually watch my Netflix shows while at work and I also use them to workout. They never fall out of my ear and they do not hurt my ear. Thank you Tozo for creating a comfortable, affordable pair of earbuds. Lastly you can use with Apple or Android phones.

title: Maintenance Man Approved!
body: I ordered these for my husband early Fathers Day. He does maintenance at a State Park and is often doing loud mowing and weed eating. These ear buds are amazing! They drown out background noise and provide great sound. Was also really impressed with the sound quality when using the ear buds to talk on the phone through Bluetooth! Would definitely recommend these!

title: Amazing quality and sound
body: The earbuds fit great and the sound is amazing for the price. The noise cancellation is amazing as well. I use them at work and at the gym. They stay in the ear well and don't bother me at all. The mic works better then expected. I did have a problem with one of the earbuds. I contacted the customer support and got a reply the next day. I am very happy over all the the earbuds and the customer support.

title: Great sound. Good quality. Ease of use.
body: I am impressed with the quality of these earbuds. I have been using them regularly, but haven't tried them while swimming, as while they are "waterproof" they cannot receive bluetooth signals while submerged. They are easy to insert and stay put if you follow the directions, but I recommend you take the step of accepting the extended warranty and read the slightly more detailed guide to use posted online, which provides a video explaining how the earbuds should be "set" in your ear. Every ear is different :-) so it is a good reference. Sound is very good and reception via bluetooth connection works great.

title: HIGH QUALITY - WORKS GREAT - EASY TO PAIR
body: Clear instructions were received with this product. I have no trouble pairing both earbuds to my cell phone or TV! When using with my TV, I place the earbuds loosely in my ears as there is no volume control like there is with my cell phone. Wearing them firmly or loosely in my ear is easy as they rotate once inserted making them very comfortable. Not a real deep bass, but the sound is great and they are very comfortable. Customer service for questions is outstanding.

title: These are the VERY BEST
body: I have ordered several other brands of wireless ear buds and returned them all for various reasons. HOWEVER, these are the best I;ve ever owned, wires or wireless. They pair easily, turn on and connect automatically, have great sound including bass. They also have several sized ear canal pads that make them fit perfectly and securely. You won't be sorry if you buy these.

title: Great sound, comfort, functionality, and customer service
body: This product is suuuuuuper high quaility for the price. I had bought some other 50$ pair of Bluetooth earbuds but they were really uncomfortable and had zero bass. So I ordered these to compare. These have a way better fit and sound quality with a higher quality case as well as rubber ear pads. I’m very satisfied. I’m a musician and love to really hear the music regardless of the location, these are great for quality and noise isolation

title: Okay...These Things Are *INCREDIBLE*
body: I usually don't leave reviews but I had to on this one.  These buds are absolutely amazing!!  I'm not planning to take them swimming so the whole waterproof thing doesn't really apply to me but the quality coming out of these little guys is *unreal*.  I have those huge $400 Bose over-ear headphones and the quality is basically identical (only these have deeper bass).  I can't stress enough how amazing these are - ESPECIALLY for the price!  Easily the best headphones I've ever owned.  Will definitely be buying more as gifts.

title: Easy to connect and sound great.
body: Very easy to setup and connect. Sound is good and volume can be set to a very high level if desired. The small earbud fittings work best for me and they stay in my ear during exercise.

title: Great sound quality
body: While I've only had these earbuds a short time, they seem to be working great!  The sounds quality is really good and you can't beat the price compared to some other earbuds.  I like that they charge in their own case, and that they are waterproof is an added bonus. Would definitely recommend this item!

title: Good quality and great water resistance - one tip on sound & connection quality
body:
These earbuds sound very good, and they fit securely in my ears so that I have no worries about them falling out when running or when at the gym.  They seal out environmental noise (so useful when the gym is blasting music I don't like).  They also have proven to be fully waterproof in the shower & the hot tub.

One tip on sound & connection quality: I saw a one-star review on here referring to the sound cutting out. That reviewer noted that the sound / connection would cut out when "line of sight" between his phone or smartwatch and the right earbud was blocked by his body or head.  He had to make sure the right earbud was on the same side of his body as the sound transmitting device.  I solved that problem with my Samsung S8 (Bluetooth 5.0) by turning on a Bluetooth option called DUAL AUDIO (Connections-Bluetooth-Advanced-Dual Audio).  I recommend making sure your phone uses Bluetooth 5.0 and has that option before buying.  Otherwise fully recommend this product.

title: Great product so far
body: After using a neck mounted system for years, this has been a very satisfying change of pace. This model in particular has given me a good performance. The sound quality is good to great about 90% of the time. The biggest issue is while on the phone. I have gotten feedback that it is hard to hear me speaking. The call quality that I hear also leaves me desiring more. Streaming music or using apps is about as close to perfect as I can imagine.  The noise cancellation, to me, seems to more related to how they plug my ears.

title: Worth the monies.
body: I wasn't sure about these, I was afraid they'd fall out of my ears, but they don't. Also, they sound F'n amazing! The audio quality is surprisingly very good, for such a small, cordless device. Very impressed.

title: Very happy with my new earbuds!
body: Ordered the Tozo earbuds last week and I'm very happy with the quality, value and packaging. The sound is amazing and my daughter has the apple earbuds and I like my Tozo's better. Great battery life and I love the fact that they are water proof. Already used them in the rain with zero issues. For the price I don't think I could find a better value

title: Nice sound quality
body: Out of the box, these were so easy to set up.  Love  the way they charge right in the carrying case.  Overall, well thought out product.

title: Quality sound and battery for price
body: I have had these for about a month now, and have no real complaints. Love the sound quality and battery life, only drawbacks are the distance it picks up the signal could be better (Usually have no problem leaving it at half court and playing all over the basketball court as long as battery is full) and the pairing process snags every once in awhile.  Definitely worth the money for me, I use it all day at work and then the gym. Dropped a bud into a bowl of Thai Chicken soup and it still works perfect so that’s a plus.

title: Great Buy & Product!
body: Finally got frustrated with my Apple AirPods and their charging each pod at a different rate and not staying in my ears with activities that required constant head movement such as working outside or cycling. I also love the fact that you can use only one ear bud at a time by simply powering on one earbud.

title: Best of the earbuds I've tested so far.
body:
+ Withstands all my audio needs and high volume needed for factory work.
+ Durable, has survived drops and generally feels solid.
- Does not have a skip feature for music.
- Rose in price over time (Which would be okay given the positives, but it doesn't provide the features or case battery life that other brands offer.)

Despite the negatives, this is an excellent pair of earbuds.
If you don't want to mess around and have to struggle with other brands failing you with defects or bad designs, get these ones!
I've been trying out lots of other pairs to find something better or just as good and it's been a royal pain.

[The Enacfire Future Plus earbuds were the best I've had so far but unfortunately the left earbud was defective. I tried two pairs of them and had the same issue.]

Again, these are still good and robust earbuds. Having not found anything better yet, I'd recommend these ones.

title: Not for sports, would probably work fine if you use them at home sitting and not moving anywhere.
body: Terrible and useless for running. They fall off the ear every 10 seconds, you need to fix them every 5 seconds in order for them to stay. Destroyed my run, took them off to continue as it was so annoying.

title: Lasted just 5 months
body: These were great for about 5 months. Now, the left ear bud is completely dead. I never dropped it, got it wet, or did anything that could have damaged it. Unfortunately, you can't use just the right one, either. It will beep about every 10-20 seconds if it can't pair with the other, and there seems to be no way to disable that.

title: Great product but a small problem that can be fixed
body: The earbuds sound great and look great, battery life looks great for me cause of my daily activity, can walk away from my phone for up to 20 feet and still hear it well, but the only problem that i have is that whenever i put my phone into my pocket it start to glitch i don't understand why if i can walk far and it works perfectly but once i put it on my pockets it starts to glitch, but still a great product

title: Earbuds worked when I went to the Water park
body: I wanted to find wirless water proof ear buds that I could use at the pool or the water parks to listen to music.  These worked great.  They come with different ear bud sizes to fit your ear.  I would recommend if you are looking for waterproof ear buds.  They don't work underwater.

title: Outstanding headphones for an amazing price.
body: I had gone looking for a pair of headphones so that I could use them in my off time. Something light weight and easy to carry that wouldn't be too much to handle. I'm happy to say that the Tozo T10 are an amazing pair of Bluetooth wireless headphones. They have a solid connection, good battery life and an amazing carrying case. Now some issues do come in the form of, battery life on the head phones are about 5 hours, the connection can be lost if there is a number of solid objects between you and your device. Now despite all that the carrying case has more than enough battery life to recharge the headphones. even the connection issues can be fixed with just keeping it in your pocket not that of course can't work if you're going swimming. Overall it's a great amazing product not enjoyed using them.

title: Great fit, Great Sound, Terrible Bluetooth, Shady company
body:
They worked wonderfully for the first week, fit my ears very well (I have very small ear canals, most others just fall out). These sound better than the other 3-4 true Bluetooth sets I have tried and returned. But, after about 3 weeks or so, they started randomly disconnecting from Bluetooth, losing their connection to each other, etc. Forget about a solid connection if you use these on a bike, and there is even a light wind. With my phone in my pocket I was able to reproduce a Bluetooth disconnection simply by turning my head to the left. Every single time.

After returning my first pair for this issue and getting a second pair, they started doing the same thing immediately. I got an email from the manufacturer offering me a free wireless charger. I replied sure, that would be great, thanks. Then they wanted me to write a positive review before they would send it, I told them no, I have no interest in doing that. They replied that the wireless charger didn't have anything to do with me writing a positive review, but that they wouldn't send it to me until I did so. I told them to leave me alone. They replied asking if I was happy with their product. I responded with my concerns about the terrible Bluetooth connectivity. They replied that they were pleased that I was happy with their product and would I please write a positive review?

So this is me writing a review. They seriously sound and fit better than any other true Bluetooth in ear headphones I've ever used, but the Bluetooth is terrible and the company is terrible.

title: A Very Satisfied Customer
body: A really awesome product. Far superior to other Bluetooth earbuds on the market, at a fraction of the price. The earbuds are comfortable and ergonomic. Charging is fast and easy. Love these headphones!

title: Cuts in and out when walking, great customer service
body:
These are good for around the office and in the kitchen... I have smaller ears and they fit fine with the smallest tips. When properly in, the sound quality is great. When walking however, these cut in and out... sometimes just the left... sometimes both.... giving a chopping distraction that is annoying. So if you are working out in the gym or in a generally stationary environment, these are great... but if you are going to be walking/jogging.... the choppy in and out can be a serious downside. **update** choppy connections seem to be getting worse - returning for refund. :-(

**addition update** customer service reached out offering to send another product, apparently I may have received just a defective product. Super excited and hopeful that that's the case. Either way, awesome customer service. Will update again. ::fingers crossed::

Update 8/30/19
Quickly received product... again, works great if you arent moving around much. Perfect for the office.... but cuts in and out when walking around the yard. Had phone in my pocket, still cuts in and out as you walk fully charged. Paired with a galaxy s8. So for mobile activity I'm going to have to find another product. :-(
Great customer service though

title: Crazy easy to setup, sound great, blocks out the world and really nice portable case
body:
I was a little skeptical mostly because they're competitors are priced much higher. But these headphones have delivered. I use them when commuting to work on my bike, and can only put one in because they cancel noise so well. The setup initially was SUPER easy, and now they pair automatically whenever I remove them from the case. They sound great, battery life seems awesome, the case is extremely portable and feels durable/well made, and they fit super well. They came with four different ear fittings, two of them actually work pretty well for me and the smallest ones work for my wife who usually has a really hard time with earphones.

One thing I've been really impressed with, especially given some other reviews, is the call quality. I cycle to work, it's about an 8-mile commute and my average speed is typically ~20 mph (thanks to the e-bike), which means the wind is whipping and it's a pretty loud commute. In the mornings, I wear a beanie to keep warm, and the beanie totally covers the earphone. The other day, I was on a call from the start of my commute to the end, with beanie on, and the call quality on both sides was flawless. The person I was talking to decided to buy them after the call because she was so impressed with it on her side.

For $50, or honestly for $100 if they were priced higher, these are worth it.

title: Overall good, but a bit fatiguing with some glitches.
body: Good overall sound, and a great stereo image. Lots of clarity in the mid range, more so than most. But there’s a huge bass boost that is a bit distracting. I had to play with the iPhone settings to find a setting that made for a less muddy/masking bass response. Before I found a good setting I felt that that bass boost was heavily masking the low mids above the bass and kick. I also find them a bit ear fatiguing because of the built in EQ curve. I’m coming from a music studio background and am used to stellar monitoring headphones so that could be coloring my opinion. There are also ocasional little glitches between the headphone sides where one side cuts out for a split second.

title: Initially Great, until left ear bud stopped charging and working
body: For the first 3 months I had these they were great, easily paired with my phone and Chromebook, used them to listen to music at work, take calls, listen to podcasts while walking my dog, and even listen to the news in the shower without bothering my wife.  I also used them when using power tools to protect my hearing.  Over the past few weeks the left earbud would intermittently not charge and I would remove it and replace it several times in the charging case, until yesterday when the left earbud stopped charging entirely.  Don't buy... spend more for better quality

title: Love the earbuds - truly waterproof
body: I have had the earbuds for about 3 weeks now, and they are great. Good sounds, clarity, and even works well to talk on the phone! I was down b  by the lake and one of the earbuds fell in about 3' of water. I was lucky to be able to find it after about 2-3 minutes and reached into the water and retrieved it. I thought I had probably ruined it. I shook it off let it dry  for a few hours, put it in the charging case and then tried a could of hours later. Powered up just fine, and is still working today. I am truly impressed with these earbuids, especially for the price.

title: Best bang for the buck wireless headphones
body: I've used these headphones for about 2 weeks now and they are great for working out. Honestly didn't know how annoying the cord was until it was gone, and they really are easy to pair and use. The sound isn't the best, they definitely could be clearer, and the bass seems to be overpowering. The great and comfortable fitting options are perfect, and I don't normally listen at loud volumes anyway, so I can honestly recommend these to anyone looking for a budget workout headphone set.

title: Great earbuds for a great price
body: I really enjoy these earbuds.  I have been using them for about a week now.  They have been working very well so far.  These earbuds are well made and so is the charging case.  I have experienced an occasional dropoff with the bluetooth signal, but it has lasted for about second and then comes right back - I am not sure if it is because of my phone or the earbuds.  It has been extremely rare, so I am still happy.  I would definitely recommend this product!

title: Great Bass! Great Volume! Great Music/Microphone Quality!
body:
Earbuds: They sound great. I LOVE THE BASS. If you search a a battle scene on youtube and put these headphones in...it feels like your in the movie theater. The bass is good an deep. I love them. I don't have any issues with them connecting to my phone. The treble is a little weak but I think a quick adjustment in your phones settings will do the trick. The volume is also plenty loud. I never but them up all the way.

Mic: I have no issues with the mic quality at home or in my car. The volume also gets plenty loud as well. Even on the highway the mic dosnt seem to pick up a ton of background noise. You can use one or both earbuds! This was huge deal for me! Alot of these other earbuds will only do one ear and dont get loud enough.

Case: Case is a little big but it does have wireless charging and feels like great quality. Lid is transparent so you can see the lights underneath. They also come with a small lanyard if you so choose to put them on the case. Opening and closing the case is also satisfying. The lid closes via magnets.

Overall I think these are the best headphones for the price. I have tried multiples different pairs in this price range. Other brands I tried were Cowin and Jlabs. Id recommend these over everything else in this price range! I also tried the airpods from apple and I still like these better!

title: The earbud cuts out
body: Left earbud cuts in and out. Started about a week after buying these. I thought they were awesome the first few days but with them cutting in and out so much i would try something different.

title: Great sound and fit! A must buy!
body: I bought these based on the reviews. The reviews were awesome. But, I really felt like the reviews were too good to be true. So I figured for $30 what would I really be losing if they didn't work out. I have say the positive reviews are right on the money. These earbuds come with several sets of earpieces to ensure you get the proper fit. They are small and discrete and tuck nicely into the ear and they stay in while running and working out and sweating. I use them not only to listen to music and watch Netflix on my phone but also for hands free talking in my car and they work great.  The charging carrier has a built in charger bank that keeps the earbuds charged after being unplugged from a power source.  I bought mine on a Prime lightning deal and got them even cheaper than the regular price. Talk about a bargain. So they get 5 stars. A definite buy for anyone looking for awesome, wireless earbuds on the cheap. I have had mine since Christmas and they are working great.

title: Best wireless earbuds I have owned! And I have owned a few...
body: These are amazing! I had the last version of these (the T8) and loved them as well, but these are more comfortable and sound a little bit better (the others sounded excellent). Multiple sizes of cushions, and when you select the correct size they STAY in place, no worries of them falling out. LOTS of bass, very clear and awesome sound. I would absolutely recommend these! Havent tested battery life to the limits, but I fell asleep with them in and they were still playing when I woke up at least two hours later. The case on the T10 is MUCH better quality than the T8 (the previous version). I assume they will charge the headphones a ton before needing to plug them in just based on the size of the case. I have owned JLab, JBL (2 versions), Sony and a couple of other major name brands and these are superior. OH and the "ok Google/hey google" function actually works great as well! The microphone for calling is OK, but it IS far from your mouth and with that in mind it is great. I only got these because TOZO customer service gave me half off for warranty purposes from my T8 version I loved (charging issue). They swapped out the charging case (fast shipping too!) to see if that would solve my problem, but it didnt, and they offered replacement or half off the new headset. Excellent FAST customer service. I had low expectations with an "off brand" headset, but I'm a customer for as long as they keep producing quality headphones.

title: Something got stuck inside my ear!
body: Be careful, this small piece might get stuck inside your ear (see picture) and I had to get it out with the help of someone. It was a pain. Thank God I didn't have to go on emergency.

title: Bluetooth Connection Issues
body: Not sure why, but I could never get a solid Bluetooth Connection from the pair I received. Seems like every time I would turn my head or move at all, it resulted in a disconnected response? After several attempts of re-positioning and turning the pieces on and off, I eventually sent them back. Seems like a solid piece for how much the purchase price is, just needs some tweaks here and there. Currently listening to the Jabra Active Elite 65T!

title: 2 defective pairs and Amazon won't honor the warranty
body: I've had 2 pairs of these headphones and both pairs broke within a couple months. The sound quality was great, they were very comfortable but only worked for a couple of months. The first pair started out great but after a couple of months the left earbud started to have static constantly. I contacted amazon and had them send me a replacement since I did sign up for the warranty.  The second pair, after another 2 months or so the right earbud just stops working, it won't connect to the left earbud or any device. I just contacted amazon they told me they won't replace them again even though they are defective. Apparently, there is a limit of one replacement even when the product is defective. When they work, the earbuds are great but I've had 2 pair now that just stopped working properly and can't get a replacement even though they are under warranty. I figured I just ended up with a couple of defective pairs and wanted to to have them replaced with a set that isn't going to break after a couple months since otherwise they were perfect but amazon won't help.

title: Best bang for the buck!
body:
I was looking for some new wireless ear-phones that would be comfortable in my ears and have some good bass.
I was initially looking at ones that cost $100+, but I read a lot of great reviews for these and decided to check them out. If I didn't like them I could always just send them back and get the (much) more expensive ones.
Well, I'm happy to say that these things are great!
They're very comfortable in my ears and stay put while I'm working out at the gym.
Just as importantly, they sound excellent! For small ear-phones they have nice bass, with a good punch! Maybe a bit bright in the upper end, but that's easily adjusted with my phones equalizer! The mid range is also very good.
All in all, I don't think that you will be able to find better ear-phones than these!

title: Great sounding earbuds + water resistance
body: I am quite impressed with this pair of earbuds. First, the sound is great. There's a good balance of bass, the mids, and the highs. The low frequencies do not drown out the mid and high's. Second, the earbuds are water resistant. One of the earbuds accidentally fell into my sink that had about 1/2 water in it. I picked it up after it was emersed in water, dried it with a towel and it still works! So, I don't worry about the earbuds going bad after walking several miles on my treadmill. Third, the earbuds can be charged in a charger that has wireless charging capability. I don't have to repeatedly insert into the charger the micro USB cable that comes with the earbuds. Fourth, when I'm done listening, I put the earbuds back into the charger and they automatically turn off and disengage from my iphone/ipad/macbook pro mid-2012. I have not tried other earbuds, but I'm quite satisfied with these earbuds based on the reviews and how the product has been functioning thus far.

title: Finally, earbuds that charge wirelessly!!
body: These were just what I was looking for! Wireless earbuds that could be used one at a time, in a case that will charge off my new phone wirelessly. They sound awesome and don't cut out at all like other wireless earbuds I've tried. Will see how the batteries hold up, and how long the ear buds and case stay charged between uses. So far so good!

title: Fit well, great customer service
body: I've had problems with other wireless earbuds, but these actually stay in my ears while running.  The sound is good, although for my purposes comfort is really more important.  I had a problem with the right earbud after about 6 months of use, and the customer service was great.  They responded right away and are sending a replacement.  I'm very happy with these and would buy them again.

title: Nice n Loud as compared to others. Good sound
body: Great Earbuds!! I’m somewhat of a connoisseur when it comes to headphones and I’ve tried about 5 different wireless buds. These sound the best and loudest in my opinion. I like my music loud. They’re still not as loud as a nice set of wired buds but are certainly better then others I’ve tried. Connectivity seems good, battery life is about 3 hours continuous. Charging case is weird it has full power then after 1 charge it’s down to the 1/3 or 4. Could just be the indicator light. Overall great!!!

title: Awesome little headphones for the price
body: Bought these for work so I wouldn't have to mess with a cord and I will never buy a regular pair of earbuds again thanks to these. They come with a nice case that charges the earbuds even after you unplug the charger.(which has wireless charging!) Charges pretty fast. They earbuds themselves are a high quality small design and last a long time. I was listening to podcasts over an 8 hour shift and they never died. Listening to music you get about 4 hours, still pretty good. The sounds quality is average but has decent bass. Paring is super easy and fast. They fit very good and haven't  fallen out of my ears at all. The only negative thing I could say is they cause a little discomfort after hours of wearing them, but I probably shouldn't have them in that long anyway :D Would buy again or for a friend. Would make a great gift.

title: Great sound quality
body: These provide a very good sound quality and easily connected to my iPhone.  The charging case provides on the go flexibility.  Provides multiple size ear pads.  My only issue (and its a big one) is that they are constantly falling out of my ears, even after going to the smallest size in the ear piece selection pack. This might be something most users will not have an issue with, but they just have not worked out for me.  I gave it 4 stars primarily because the product itself is very good and hopefully will work out for most users.

title: defect left and right earbud connection
body: I tried the wireless earbuds out of the box and found the problem of intermittent sound from the left earbud, missing more than 50% sound. Contacted Amazon for advise and they send me a replacement set. The new one won't behave any better. Wrote to company support but no response received. The takeaway is that if you need a quality wireless earbud, this is not the one. However the package is well designed and easy to use.

title: So far so good, intelligent purchase
body:
Phone used is the Pixel 3
1. Love wireless charging, when done just set them on the flat charger and forget.... no fiddling around with cords.
2.  Fit nicely, several different ear bud options change out...I went with the smallest.  They don't feel heavy and stay in working weight bench, stair stepper, haven't run with them yet... I have a few more months of rehab before that..
3. They connected with each other right away, and are also quick to connect to the phone and take over sound duties, pretty much right away. With other products, it would show connected on the phone, but the sound would continue to come out of the phone speaker and I would have to randomly push buttons and turn on and off to work right.  Not these, right away...connect and sound.
4. No cords between them is great, no accidentally hooking a cord and having them yank out of your ear... of send your phone scooting down the treadmill(still not running...several other product experience)

title: Subpar
body: You can’t go far.. I bought these to go swimming ... well when I get to the other end of the lap pool I can’t hear ish so the range quality not good.  They do work under water and the battery life sucks!

title: Awesome sound, great battery life, great customer service!
body:
The sound on the these is awesome, as many reviews have said, deep bass, great highs, and perfect mids.  I have had a few people try them and they have ordered them as well.  My wife had me order her a pair yesterday as well.
The battery time is great, especially with the case for charging.  What swayed me to these is the wireless charging feature, and the reviews of the sound.
The company has reached out to me a few times checking on how I feel with their product, this goes a lot farther than the quality of the earbuds themself.

title: Outstanding and affordable
body:
Love these and would definitely buy again. In fact, I already did! This is my second pair of the T10 wireless earbuds; I misplaced my first pair about a couple months after using them almost every day and enjoying every minute. Then couldn't find them and couldn't live without them so had to buy another pair! So reasonably priced, I didn't even flinch at getting a second pair (though still hoping I find the first pair!)

Sound quality is excellent, especially if you like your bass as I do. Bluetooth pairing is quick and easy and the connection is rock solid with my phone in front, side or back pocket. I love how they connect to my iPhone 8 immediately after taking them out of the charging case! The sound isolation is really great (I often use these instead of earplugs when running outdoor power equipment including mowers, blowers and chainsaws).

Wireless charging of the case is super convenient, though it seems to charge slightly faster when plugged in (I have a Mophie charging pad). Still, a GREAT feature on such an affordable product!

title: Super happy with my new earbuds!
body:
I was apprehensive to buy earbuds because I was afraid I would lose them, was worried about the sound quality,  and was afraid that the microphone wouldn’t work well while on calls.
 I’m so glad I Purchased these!  The sound quality is awesome, the microphone works crystal clear on calls, and love that the carrying case holds extra battery charges for my earbuds and keeps me from loosing them.
 Totally worth the money!
 I haven’t tried them in water yet.  I am a swimmer so this is a feature I was looking for. So the fact that I can is a bonus.

title: For a fraction of airpods and much better!
body: The thing that stands out is that I almost got 5 hrs of continuous playing time (on medium volume) out of these. Very important to me! I didn't try to charge it with the case for 15 minutes to get another 1.5 hrs but will definitely try that out at some point. They are comfortable (haven't figured out my perfect tips yet but the default medium were a good fit so far), sound/base is good, wireless charging case, extended one year warranty if you register to top it off and they DON'T cost $180 vs brand names.

title: Muffled Calls & Poor Fit
body: My review is based on the fact that these earbuds I was excited about because they've had great reviews, but after changing through all of the different size earbuds they don't fit me well. Not only that, but everyone I've called have told me that my voice sounds muffled no matter what way I orient the headphones. I essentially have to yell in order for my voice to be clear on the other side. The battery time is excellent though and haven't had the chance to really test the waterproofing as I've only worn this for a few days now, but disappointed in these.

title: Pretty good quality, great at the price
body:
These are my first Bluetooth earbuds, although I've had several BT speakers and one BT headset for office use, so my grade reflects my new-ish-ness to this type of product.

That said, I'm very happy with them. The pairing and setup are relatively foolproof, and the battery life has been sufficient for my usage over the first week+ of use. (Primarily, they've been used while watching movies on my iPad, so up to 2.5 hours continuous use leaves some power to spare.) The sound quality is good, though I may increase that to 5 stars as I get more experience and make alterations to the source EQ. Noise cancellation is as good as any earbuds I've ever owned, particularly once I finally figured out which sice of pads to use.

title: Acceptable for the price.
body:
Reasons why I returned mine:

- Flashing blue light on the side when on - I only noticed these when I was using them at night and saw my room being lit up at about a 5 second interval. Because the two buds are not paired at the same time, the buds flash independent of one another (not at the same time). I prefer something more subtle and would rather not piss off someone I'm sitting next to when on the plane or train.

- Voice over is annoying. On removal of the buds from the charging case, there will be a woman's voice saying that the device has been turned on, right ear connected, left ear connected, etc. Similarly, when turning the devices on/off manually by holding the button on the side, it'll beep and say device on/off. Super
unnecessary, things like this should be seamless - just remove it from the case and start the music.

- Connection drops out - over the course of about an hour and half walking throughout NYC, the connection dropped off two times. It managed to auto-fix itself without having to do anything, but still a slight annoyance.

- No volume control on the buds themselves.

- Not too fond of the fit despite trying all bud shapes. You're supposed to turn these at an angle toward the back of the ear but it still didn't feel that secure. It fell out once when walking as I raised my arm and brushed my ear lightly. I can't really compare it to other wireless buds as this was my first pair. The standard corded apple earbuds are still my go to.

Good points:

- It'll last at least 2 hours per charge as I haven't tested it for longer.

- Call quality/mic seem to be okay. I've only tested them with ~a minute long call.

title: Water resistant, pretty good sound, but not impressed by the battery
body:
I bought these along with a cheaper set of bluetooth ear buds at the same time.  Of the two I prefer the cheaper set.

On the plus side, the sound quality on these is pretty good, they have reasonable volume, and the range is acceptable. I tried them in the shower once and they seemed to be fine afterward, so the water resistance thing seems to be legit.

On the down side, even if I don't use them at all and leave them in the case, the battery level drops quickly (the case and buds will both run completely dead in about a week even if unused).  The cheaper set I bought lasts longer with a smaller case when I use them every day.

These aren't particularly comfortable for me, even after trying the different tips.

Also, when connected and in use there is a blue LED that flashes periodically from each earbud.  In a dark room it is bright enough to see it shining against the walls to your side.  I'd prefer the LED off when in use.

title: The Bass is amazing
body: For how small these are, the bass is amazing.  They fit snug in the ear and when bending or chewing they stay put.  The connection is great.  The right pairs with the left automatically.  Sometimes I only wear just the right side because of my work environment, having to hear other things, but even then the sound is satisfying.  The charge last about 4 hours. Just in time for lunch for them to charge in the handy self charging case.  Then we're ready to go again for the rest of the day.  Actually just bought a second pair for my son.  He works out and loves them.

title: Awesome Earbuds
body: I originally wanted to buy the apple air pods, but they were too expensive, so I thought I might as well take a shot at these.  Right now, I'm so glad that I did. These earbuds are amazing from the bass, to the amazing highs and lows. I asked one of my friends that have air pods to compare the two and I was surprised when she told me that these were actually better. If you're wondering whether you should buy it or not, the answer is buy it, its 100 worth every dollar, Im surprised that they aren't charging more.

title: Love them! They work great!
body: Somehow amazon sent me the wrong color, but this was very quickly corrected and in 2 days I had the correct color sent to me! I have so loved these, they easily connect to my computer, phone, tv, etc. I have pretty small ear holes and I hate the Apple EarPods so I was grateful to have an option that actually fits and stays in my ears!

title: Left stopped working- Updated
body:
After using with no problems for less than month left ear bud fades in and out, static or no sound at all.
Before that they were great but useless now.
I guess I will try to return through Amazon.
Update: I was outside the return window for Amazon but Tozo customer service did replace with a new pair. Kudos to Tozo customer service!
I used the new pair hard and heavy for a few days to test out. Swam in pool (did not totally submerge but they did get wet), mowed the lawn, rode my bike, etc. No problems surfaced.
Came with different sizes of ear inserts and I did switch out for the next smaller size. Fits snugly in ear, not noise canceling but does block out most ambient noise. Sound is excellent, true stereo.
Pairs to my device without issues. Voice inside tells what is happening "power on", "paired", "second device paired", etc.
Overall I am pleased with these ear buds, excellent price, very good functionality. I am glad I tried again and didn't buy a different set.

title: Best true earbuds for the price!!
body:
Work and sound great! Mine didn't include the extra ear tips, but I contacted them and they are on the way.

They are wonderful for listening to music or books or whatever. The sound is clear, can get quite loud, and they have better bass than others I've tried close to this price.

One caveat, like all true wireless earbuds I've tried, they are not so good for phone calls. They work, but you need to speak clearly & louder than any background noise to be understood.

title: Very impressed
body: Have really been impressed with these. I wasnt expecting much considering the price but I have been blown away by the sound quality and comfort. Connecting to my phone is easy and the bluetooth range is decent (getting about 25 ft)

title: A Quality Product. Love it.
body: I've been searching for a true wireless earbuds for a while. I'm happy to report the search is over. I am very impressed with this product! Even the packaging and manuals inside are quality. The charging case feels sturdy and has a good weight to it. It closes using magnets, and it is strong enough that it won't open accidentally. The earbuds fit nicely, and there are different sizes for the tip for a comfortable fit. It is incredibly easy to pair the earbuds, and once paired they always automatically connect to your phone when taken out from the case. When you remove them and put them back on the case they disconnect automatically. The sound is rich and there is some good base going on there! It's also nice that you can pause and play music pressing the button on any of the earbuds. The fact that it is also waterproof, including the case, and that it can charge wirelessly, it's just the cherry on top. It's a no brainer for me to recommend this product!

title: Works great, right out of the box.
body: I was worried that these weren't going to fit my ears very well since the Apple earbuds just don't fit my ears. They come with different size ear buds and fit great. Sound quality is outstanding with deep bass and great spectrum overall. The other thing I was worried about is that these were going to feel 'heavy' in my ears, since they're larger than earpods, but they fit great and don't become annoying after a while.

title: Great product, great price very good sound quality
body:
First the important stuff that covers most people... The sound quality is great, and people seem to hear me ok Those re important factors. Don't have enough experience yet with battery life. So I'll rate that late. Should things change for me on the quality issues, I'll report back.

I like the charging case, seems to be good quality
The ear buds appear to have good build quality.

My one "issues" is that they do not stay in my ear for long periods without me pressing them back in. This is why I gave 4-stars instead of 5. I would rate 4.5 if I could. Should I find some trick to adjustment in the ear, I come back and change the review.

Overall I'd say I'm pleased with the product.

Updated! I raised the rating to 5-Stars.
Customer service is excellent. They sent additional Pieces for the ear. i still have an issue with it staying in the for extended period of time. But that must be me. The product works very well. I've paid 2x this in the past for far less comfortable and less capable bluetooth headset devices.

title: At last! Wireless earbuds that work!
body:
After trying another brand of wireless earbuds (4 different sets!), I read the reviews and thought that I would give the Tozo T10 a try. They worked! RIGHT OUT OF THE BOX!
