BOTH sync up and connect immediately, and once I pull up my wireless device screen on my phone, connects to that smoothly! What a difference from the previous brand!

I think the sound is great.

Not so much noise cancelling, but I use them while walking my dog, and I need to be able hear sounds around me.

The for is a bit odd because they feel as if they are going to fall out, but they don't.

I sometimes get a sounds delay if I try to user then while watching TV because the synchronization is off, so I wear them while working out, listening to podcasts.

I don't regret this choice at all and would recommend them to others!

title: Solid Performance
body:
Very happy with these earbuds.  Battery life is good. 4-5 hours worth.  Sound quality is pretty good with solid base.
Phone call quality is fine unless in a noisy environment.
I typically wear these primarily on walking trails or doing yard work. I can even wear them in the shower as they have a level of waterproofing.  Overall very happy with these buds.

title: cool ear buds
body: these are excellent sounding ear buds. quick charge and paired with my android phone quickly and with no hassles.  wear during bike rides for music.

title: Okay
body: The music cuts in and out. I purchased these to listen to music while I do yard work. The sound is great, but it gets annoying to have the ear phones cu in and out.

title: Great value for the money
body: Very good quality product for the price. I’ve used other so called high end headphones, but I must admit these hold their own. The only complaint I have if there is one, is the battery life is 2 hours of continuous use. With that being said the recharge time is about 30 minutes or less.

title: Ease of Use
body: I was hesitant at first about ordering the ear buds and especially the comfort of them being in my ear.  I had a little difficulty connecting them to my IPod but after reading the instructions and trying again I was successful.  I ordered on a Tuesday and received on Wednesday.  Been using them every since I received them.  The charging box is great!  If they would come in the color "red" I would definitely order a second pair.

title: Work well at a distance
body: Bought them for a flight where my wife and I were not sitting next to each other cause that costs $ now.  So we listened to a book on tape while flying on a trip sitting multiple rows away.  Worked perfectly.  Each headphone had a pause button so we could individually pause if our neighbor talked to us or the drink cart came by.  Good stuff at a reasonable price.

title: Awesome Product with great Price
body:
From Last 1 month I am trying to buy ear buds and I did lots of search. Finally I have found one of the great ear buds which satisfy me a lot. Sound quality is awesome and it is giving you the best product under $100.

I really recommend that product to others who want to purchase ear buds.

Packing was awesome...It is so simple to Pair the same with devices.

I have tried both for with my phone and laptop.. And I found the TOZO ear buds are perfectly working fine.

title: These are the best bang for your buck!
body: I can not believe how good these ear buds are. I've went through two sets of wired Bluetooth headphones in just 2 years because the cords went bad. At first I was skeptical about buying these because I just didn't get how these could match the quality as the wired buds at the same price. These things are light weight, they sound better than the beats that I had, and they also come in a portable case that charges them! I love them so far and have been bragging since I got them!

title: Great earphones! Easy charging!
body: Really convenient earphones. Wireless works very well and covers a large distance away from phone. Charging works well inside case and very easy to use. The sound is clear and high quality. The microphone is clear where people can hear me speak clearly! Very affordable and long lasting durability!

title: Unpack ‘Em, Stick ‘Em In Yer Earholes, and They Just WORK
body:
I am always happy to review a product that exceeds expectations. I purchased these on a hunch because I was impressed with the reviews. I’ve always wanted some really good wireless Bluetooth earplugs that fit solidly in my ear and deliver good sound. If I am Romeo, then I have now found my Juliet.

The first thing I tried of course, was to see if they fit. Perfect, right out of the box. They are more in-ear than they are “pods.”
Second, are they easy to set up? Yes, they are; in fact they pair themselves together without even being asked. They pair with iPhone/Pad using standard procedure.
The sound is rich and full.  I bought these for podcasts, but tested them on “Fat Bottom Girls” and “Working on the Highway.”  Passed with flying colors.  Spoken-word clarity is first-rate.
All parts appear to be solid and very good quality.  Some earlier reviewers found the instructions hard to decipher, but Tozo has apparently hired a bonafide English-speaker since then.

So I am very pleased with this item, and recommend it to others who have been frustrated with ill-fitting buds and tinny sound.

title: More than likely the product will be faulty. DONT GET TRICKED INTO THE REVIEWS.
body:
I received the product in hopes that I could listen to music and use it as a microphone for calls. But I was wrong. Here’s why
1.) my left earbud was having extremely choppy audio
2.) the microphone quality was terrible
But the service was good enough help me get my refund. I could have just gotten a potato and I could have just risked getting a second one but id rather be safe than sorry. PLEASE DO RESEARCH ON OTHER REVIEWS
Sound was great and loud but the choppyness was something I couldn’t handle.

title: Tremendous Quality and Value
body: Great transaction - delivered in less than 24 hours.  Love the ear buds and the charging case - great sound and battery life.  Four different sized ear caps ensure the best possible fit.  Tremendous value for the money.  Cannot recommend highly enough.

title: Better than any waterproof earbuds I've tried
body: These Tozo earbuds are the fourth pair of earbuds that I have tried, having had issues with the first three pairs within weeks of purchasing them. The sound is awesome and the fit is great. They are comfortable to wear while laying in bed. They are as waterproof as I need them to be, having taken them into both the shower and the pool with no issues. I do not have any issues with them cutting out, as others have reported. Following the instructions of the manufacturer, connection to each other, and then to my devices was quick and easy. My biggest issue is if I want to use just one, the other one cannot be placed back on the charger, as the Bluetooth signal between earbuds is disconnected, but I can still use just one as long as I store the other outside of the charger...no big deal. And like I said, considering these little things, they still work better than anything else I've tried, even those costing more money.

title: Work great!
body: Love these new earbuds.  I have worn them at the gym and in the yard doing yard work.  The sound quality is better than my wired earbuds.  I love the fact that they can charge on a charging pad since there is one in my car.  Great purchase.

title: Amazing sound, fit, and quality
body: Wow. They fit so well into my ears and when I first heard the sound I was shook! The sound is like it’s in my head and not headphones. They are so comfortable I keep forgetting they are there. Love these, so happy I bought these. They stayed in comfortably during my 5 mile run too, rarely needed to adjust. Bummer I can’t adjust the volume but not a big deal.  I also was offered a free wireless charger after I registered for the warranty. INCREDIBLE

title: A lot to say but I will highlight the sound that is very clear
body: The earbuds arrived so quickly in the mail. I charged it fully and paired it with my phone and started using it. The sound is perfect, no worries of loosing it because it fits very well and stable in the ear. I love it because because it picks from far and it remains charged for very long. I recommend it to new shoppers 👌

title: Good Customer Service
body:
I bought these in May, and they worked great for a week. I after a week, the left earbud began to cut in and out. Well, now anytime I wear these while doing yardwork, running, or working out, the left earbud cuts out completely, for a solid 30-45 seconds each. Not very happy about these. Had great sound quality, blocked out noise, and were easy to use. I just wish they worked. I wouldn't recommend these earbuds. Save up and buy the Samsung Gear earbuds.

UPDATE:
Tozo reached out to me, and sent me a brand new pair. I decided to give them to my little sister, and she absolutely loves them. They're working great and aren't having any issues yet. Their customer service was quick to respond and quick to replace them. They really do care about their customer relations, that's for sure. I stay rather busy, and they've been wanting me to update my review, if I was satisfied. I was, and so...here's my updated review. Give 'em a shot, you'll like these ear buds.

title: Wonderful Audio Quality, Strange Button Functions
body:
All in all, a very nice product. The waterproofing lives up to standard, the case charges the earbuds very quickly and charges quickly itself, they feel nice in your ears and they don't fall out easily.
My only problem with them is that the button functions only allow you to pause and play the music, there is no way to change the song with them. Double-clicking the button typically does this on other headsets with controllers, but I quickly found that that redials the last number you called for some strange reason. You also cannot change the function of the buttons, and they're all geared toward phonecalls and not music.

The bass is exceptional, but the treble is somewhat sharp at times and maxes out if the volume is too high. The mic quality is standard, and both eaebuds have one although I'm not sure what for, as only the right one is needed.

They are just about perfect for the price tag, and after I bought these, I got another pair for my brother. Definitely reccomend if you're new to true wireless and don't want to worry about the price.

title: Best earbuds
body: I love these new earbuds. They are very comfortable and the sound is amazing.  Haven't worn in pool but will soon.  Great fit didn't have to change the tip.  So convenient to be able to just use one or both earbuds.  Pairing was simple and quick.

title: Amazing product for the price!!!
body: I bought these for my son for his birthday and I ordered too late so we didn’t get them in time. I went to the store to buy a different brand and kept these for myself. I was so impressed with the quality of these, I always have a difficult time with any type of ear bud they always irritate my ears and I can never wear them long term. I don’t have that problem with these! In fact after a week of my son using the more expensive ones I bought at the store we returned them and got a second pair of these! I honestly thought that at this price it was too good to be true but these earbuds are amazing! The sound quality is great, they really do block out other noise and they are comfort. The battery life seems to be great as well. I have never had them doe on me so that is a plus! I would recommend these to anyone looking for great quality wireless earbuds.

title: Great product
body: Would have given this 5 stars except it did not come with interchangeable ear buds and the standard ones where too big. Had to buy different ear pieces. Otherwise, sound quality is great and still highly recommend

title: Five star quality Bluetooth earbuds!!!!
body:
Everything about these headphones are five star, the sleek design, they fit perfectly in my ear and block out all other noise. The sound quality and bass is better than some “designer brand” earbuds.
The charging case is awesome, as wireless charging becomes a huge convenience.
They are worth every penny.

title: Cool product with very good sound
body: My daughter really likes these. The charging pod is a nice design. They sound very good. My biggest concern before i got them was would they stay in her ears when she was running, but that's not an issue.

title: They sound is great the battery life is great
body:
I read a review on this product from another website. That user recommended it for a variety of reasons important to me. So, I took a chance and bought. I was not dissatisfied. I tried several other pairs from others and they all went bac. The best thing about the T10's is that the bass is excellent. I will try them on an airplane next month.

Battery life is great but it's not especially important to me because the T10's recharge when they are placed back in the carrying case, even without it plugged in.

Mike  4/11/219

title: Couldn't wait to get these....
body:
Order arrived quickly, nicely packaged...great service from seller.

Charged them up prior to use, paired instantly, and the sound is terrific.

Perfect amount of bass and treble for my listening preferences.

Feels comfortable in my ears, and easily  drowns out external sounds without having to have the volume cranked-up all the way.

But it's nice to know that you can crank it up without distortion.

I like the various choices of color...I got the white ones... (easier to find)... Lol

Overall, a very positive purchase, and a very happy customer.

Thank you TOZO.

title: Best Choice if you prefer superior sound from In-Ear style
body: If you're like me and find the hard-sided "AirPod" style earbuds incapable of reproducing deeper bass sound, this is the choice for you.  They nestle comfortably into your ear, offering a snug fit and a superior listening experience.

title: Great headphones, minutes the auto pairing issue
body: Some of my favorite headphones I’ve ever used, the wireless charging is pretty great and the several earbud sizes they come with help you find the right size so they’ll stay in, I could go about a week without charging them and would take them out while riding my bike. I liked them so much I bought another pair after losing one earbud during a fall off said bike. My only complaint with these is that they don’t pair automatically to my iPhone and I have to go into settings to pair them manually, otherwise sound quality and case are amazing.

title: Great wireless earbuds for the $$$
body: These buds are better than many wired ones I've bought before. I was really hoping the bass response would be good, and imo it is. For the price point, I'd say I'm extremely pleased with this product. And many other reviewers also believe as I do, that TOZO cares about their consumers opinions. It's things like that, that will win me over more times than not. I might even buy another pair. Aw work pair and a home pair. I'm also interested in buying the fast charger, it looks like a great deal as well. I would recommend these earbuds.

title: Awesome Wireless Earbuds and Customer Service
body:
Very impressed. I got these for my wife but now that I tried them out I want a pair for me too. Ditch the wires and try these. Great price too.
Update: Batteries not holding a charge on just this pair. Customer Service sending me a brand new white pair for free! Excellent Service !

title: Great sounding ear buds
body:
Great sounding ear buds! I had no issues pairing with both my iPhone 7 and iPad. I like the wireless charging option and being able to see through the lid to track the ear bud charging progress. See second picture.

The ear buds come with four different sizes of ear cups. I used the second to smallest size because they fit my ear canal the best and held the buds securely in my ears.

I am not sure if I need the ear buds to be waterproof but it can’t hurt.

Very happy with the purchase!

title: Great for working out in the water, but not swimming.
body: I bought these for working out in the pool, and they are the best headphones for working out in the water that I've found. The battery life is true to the advertising. The only problems I've run into are pairing and distance.  Occasionally the headphones will pair with each other but not the phone, and if you go more than a 1/2 pool length away from the phone, the signal cuts in and out.

title: Good sound, good battery, good price.
body:
I've been looking for truewireless earbuds for a while that weren't over $100.
they are pretty good for their price. i was surprised by the good sound quality and great battery life. was a little disappointed with the noise cancellation, but nothing bad enough to change my opinion on them.

i only have 2 problems with these earbuds
1: I'm not a big fan of the design, the way the weight is on the top of the earbud can sometimes make it easy for them to fall out.

2: to make them stay in your ear, the part that goes in your ear canal is super long, so its pretty deep within your ear.

BUT i have large ears and ear canals. so this may just be a personal problem. a solution id like to see is maybe earbuds with a wing that goes into your concha cymba of your outer ear. just a idea ;)

overall, i am happy with my purchase. and see high potential in this company and will be buying their products again.
so if you're looking for cheaper, but good earbuds, i recommend these :)

title: good product
body: This  Bluetooth earbuds works really good. It is a lot better than the others we tried.  It has a good sound, you don't have to turn up the volume to high at all. The battery last longer too.

title: All is clear now
body:
I am totally surprised how much I love my new ear buds!!! I was expecting to ship them back the next day. I’ve tried several in this price range and they were cheap and the sound quality was awful...the are crystal clear!  The base is a little heavy in some songs but that doesn’t bother me a bit. When talking in them, I ask the people on the other end and they say I’m very clear!!!
Loved the different size ear covers too as I have small ears. 100% happy with them.

title: AirPods?  No thanks, check these earbuds out.  You won’t be disappointed!
body:
Disclaimer: I haven’t taken them for a true spin at the gym, shower, etc.  Used them around the house and the range is effected by solid objects which is understandable.

Only time will tell but these earbuds are quite the budget friendly option.  I don’t have any issues, I love them!!!

Case is very convenient, practical, and intuitive with its opaque cover that displays the charge indicators for both the earbuds and case itself.  The ergonomics are really nice.  If your looking for something wireless and on a budget, take a hard look at these and buy them!

Sound quality while I don’t have a real knack for music or anything I enjoy them tremendously.  The earbuds have built in noise canceling properties, at least in my mind.  I only have to them at about 25% on my phones max volume to enjoy the music and block out background noise.

I had an issue with the earbuds syncing to my laptop but with a little fuss, figured out that it’ll read each earbud independently (“L”and “R” in my devices page) if the earbuds don’t sync first to one another.  So be a little patient let them do there thing and then click the “R” designated earbud.

title: Great for those that want good quality at a good price
body:
These Bluetooth earbuds are pretty good for the price. I use them when I go workout and they stay in my ear throughout the entire time. These earbuds are great for those that want a premium set without paying the premium price.

One thing I would like to point out is that they are great for listening to audio, they don't really excel at making calls. The feedback I've gotten from the few calls I've made so far is that you can hear a lot of background noise. I suppose being at the gym didn't help. But overall I'm very satisfied with the T10s.

Last bit, the wireless charging feature is super convenient! Just drop the case on the charging pad and you're good to go 👍!

title: Very affordable high quality earbuds
body: I don't normally have the time to write a review of a product but felt like I had to do it for the Tozo Earbuds. For the price, I was not sure I was going to get any headphones of quality but was pleasantly surprised when I received them. Just as advertised they paired simpler than any other Bluetooth device I have had. They fit comfortably in my ears not loose or too tight. The sound quality is also very good. I also found the range to be a little better than advertised I have been away from my phone 2 levels and still getting sound. I recommend this product to anyone looking for an affordable high-quality Bluetooth earbud, you won't be disappointed.

title: Good reviews... Bad product...
body: I thought with all the good reviews that these would be my answer to a good quality product... I was wrong. They cut in and out approximately 6 times in 3 minutes at the gym. Which is to bad because I really liked the design of the product and the case. Unfortunately they do not work for use in a crowded gym... Returned..

title: Great earbuds, very convenient and highly recommended
body:
First time experience with any wireless earbuds and TOZO T10 really impressed me and works wonderfully. I will happily recommend this to any of my friends who are looking for one.
Few things that I feel can be be improve is the battery life(considering the fast charging it’s not absolutely required), song navigation(it will be awesome if we can do next/rev which will make life easier for the fans).
Being said that, after all what we need is great sound, good range wireless earbuds to transcend into whole another world!! Highly recommended for music lovers 👍

title: Decent headphones reviews slightly misleading
body: So I’ve been looking for new wireless earbuds for a while I was almost dead set on waiting for the price to drop on sonys newest WF-1000XM3 but after losing my air pods I finally made the jump to buy something now. These for sound quality is mediocre granted I only used my AirPods at work to listen to music or watch a quick YouTube video but that’s what these are replacing and comparably these don’t sound nearly as clean even with the noise cancellation factor of them being all the way in your ear. Now do they sound good for a $50 WIRELESS earbud yes better than expected honestly. Now build quality wise they’re pretty good nothing exceptional but they don’t feel cheap either. As for the case it’s a different story feels like cheap plastic case and it’s bulkier than I anticipated. I was hoping for something smaller but I may just have been spoiled by apples AirPods. When it comes to comfortability I definitely will say for someone with really small ear canals even using the smallest rubber fittings they’re pretty uncomfortable they hurt my ears after about 30 mins of use and now you can take that with a grain of salt because I have avoided wearing these style in ear ear buds for a long time for that fact alone I would suggest picking up a memory foam fitting if you plan on wearing these for longer periods of time. But all in all a decent pair of total wireless earbuds for the price I don’t think I’d buy another pair if I lost these though I’d either go back to AirPods or look for something else maybe worth a few more dollars from a reputable brand like skullcandy jbl sennhesier Bose or Sony.

title: Great Value & Convenient
body: These earbuds are exactly what I was looking for. I wanted some wireless earbuds to wear when I’m using my ‘shorty’ motorcycle helmet. These TOZO buds work great. The wireless charging is super convenient as well. I find I’m using these way more than I expected.

title: **Update** Stopped working after a couple of weeks.. was: Surprisingly Great earbud find
body:
**Update**
I really like the product and the concept. I got real bad news.. it stopped working for me :(. Amazon and Tozo have great customer service which is why I cannot give it one star because they are really trying to take care of me. However, I returned my first earbuds when the left earbud stopped responding. I sweat alot, and while I was working out lots of sweat came into my ears and the the left bud stopped responding. I contacted support and researched how I can fix this. They were helpful in trying to reset it, but no response from the earbud. I tried to recharge it in the case, and still no response. Tozo and Amazon then sent me a replacement and I sent back the non-responding pair of earbuds. Fast forward 2.5 weeks later and my left earbud of the replacement died again. Same situation, same attempt to resurrect. I really want to love this product with its nifty wireless recharging feature, decent sound, and comfort for my ears, but the earbud is not working. I am torn if I should get a 3rd replacement or just give up with my head down. I hope I can update this review with putting more stars back up and say how great the product is and the third time is a true charm.

Original Post
On a whim, I purchased these earbuds so I can go in long walks and listen to my music or news. I didn't expect much for the relatively low price I paid.

That said, it was one of the easiest things I ever paired with my very complicated bluetooth on my Samsung s9. It took less than 2 mins. Following this initial setup, connecting to my phone has been and continues to be seamless to the extreme...like it was made by Samsung.

When I first listened to a wide variety of music, the sound was a little metallic which is why it's 4 stars. But when I was listening while taking a shower, WOW!!! Suddenly the bass was deep and crisp. The higher frequencies lost their metallic sound and is almost like real high quality speakers. This is when I realized I need to spend time teying the different fittings to achieve that perfect sound that these earbuds are capable of. Do I higjly recommend? Absolutely.!

title: Very good earbud, Great Customer Service
body:
I bought these for my wife, they fit well, stay in place, comfortable, good sound. Pairing is quick and automatic. Great units.

Update 4/13/19: Still working great.

Update 5/17/19: Dog chewed up one, I asked Tozo customer service if I could buy a replacement but they don’t sell just one. They did offer a significant discount on a new set which I took them up on. The new ones are great BT 5.0, full waterproof.

title: Reliable pairs of bluetooth earphones with good sound quality. Great customer services.
body:
I wanted a pair of Bluetooth earphones for office use. I did extensive research on Amazon as there are so many options.

I decided to go with Tozo and I’m glad i did. For my main purpose os listening to podcast and audiobooks, the earphones meet my expectations. Sound quality is decent, pairing is quick. The built to me is simple yet high quality. I would recommend this product to my friends.

Customer service is great. The package somehow didn't contain the earcubs, but the issue was promptly addressed.

title: One died but they made it right.
body:
I loved these while they worked. I dropped them in water accidently and was thinking I'd be fine because of the IPX8 waterproof... Alas, the right one works but the left one is dead. =( Purchased Mar 18, 2019. Left one declared dead on June 7,2019.

Update
I registered the warranty and contacted the email address on the website. They didn't speak english natively but understood the issue. They kindly requested a picture and explanation of the issue. After sending they offered to replace the broken earbud. I like that they offered to replace the part rather than the whole thing. I hate wasting things. I'll update on how the new earbud works and change my rating accordingly. =)

Update again...
I received a full replacement rather than the defective part... They sound great! However, they are the wrong color. I'm not sure if I'm also getting a replacement earbud for the black set. I'm giving a star bump for the fantastic customer service attempt. Going from 2/5 to 3/5. I was waiting eagerly for the replacement defective part. I received a full replacement but in the color that I don't like.

Yet another update...
They sent me replacement ones in the color I wanted with fast shipping! They work great! While waiting I received the previously mentioned replacement left headphone. I'm not sure how that happened it might be because of a different department issuing that? Regardless the replacement left earbud they sent did not work. Probably because there's some ID or something connecting the two matching pairs. The replacement one must not have been paired to the original.

In short, it's been a lot of e-mails back and forth but in the end, I'm happy. :-) five star customer support!

title: Excellent sound quality, but other issues...
body: Sound Quality is awesome, but I'm perturbed at the time I spent emailing the company's customer service and trying to get this thing to connect. It paired easily, but took some time to connect to my iPhone xr. I'm awaiting a response now from customer service regarding volume increase/decrease and back/forward skip tracks. There isn't anything mentioned in the instructions about this. If the device does this the company needs to make that known so we're not asking questions about it. Further, I told them twice to make a YouTube video on pairing/connecting. Mine paired easily, but did not connect to iPhone easily. This company is not considerate of our time. I'm spending too much time with this product emailing back and forth. I'm a busy person and don't have time for this. It needs to be prevented and all this should be easy peasy. I will change my review if necessary, but right now overall I'm not too happy with this product mainly because it's costing me too much time.

title: Sound is Amazing!
body: I've been trying to replace my old earphones (true wireless) for the past couple of months. I've been researching, reading specifications and reviews of earphones including this one. My "deal breaker" requirements were: 1) Sound quality for music and audiobook and podcast, 2) Phone call quality, and 3) The ability to use only one ear phone at a time (either right side or left side). I picked TOZO 10 (I've been using it for the last 2 weeks) because it checked all three requirements and then some. I'm happy with my purchase and the quality of the product. The sounds is AMAZING, the phone call is laud and clear; they can hear my voice clearly and I can hear them loud and clear. The capability of the charging box being charged wirelessly is a plus. The only things I wish were better, are the battery life and the distance it operates away from the phone. it starts to break up if I walk away from my office to the kitchen at work. my old one worked perfectly. Other than that, TOZO 10 is a great earphone.

title: Nice job!
body: Performed as advertised. First pair of wireless ear buds and I think I scored with these. Just went on a couple of hikes and they worked very well. I had to change the medium ear bud size to the large, but after that I was good to go. Simple to use, comfortable and good sound. I usually have around the ear, noise cancellation,  Bose for work so I am used to quality. These are quite good, especially for just $49! These are great for outdoors, waterproof, you can take one out if you need to be more aware of your surroundings, sweating is no big deal vs conventional headphones, easy to stick in your pocket etc. Good job TOZO!

title: These Buds Are For You
body: Best earbuds I have used so far and I have been through a half-a-dozen pairs. Highly recommend. Excellent quality; great customer service as well.

title: Best Inexpensive Ear Buds in Market
body: I rarely leave reviews but for $50? Best damn ear buds I've ever used. I haven't had the need to root my Samsung Galaxy Note 9 since I got the phone — one of the only reasons I would have was if the sound quality was poor. But it's not, it's fantastic. The right-channel ear bud will always lose battery faster because it's the one connected to the phone and the other ear bud at the same time. Your phone is sending the signal to the right-channel which then syncs with the left channel and thus stereo sound. In this process, it has to use more battery life. So get over it people. But I will say that 1.5 hours, give or take, is a long time to have ear buds in at a volume that is detrimental to your health so at 50%, it lasts closer to 2.5 hours.

title: I approve 100% :)
body: I like everything about this product.  The design and diversity

title: Work great, bit bulky
body: I've been using these headphones for about 2 weeks now and think they are great. The main reason I chose these was for the IPX8 waterproofing, and the case that holds them has a lid. Sound quality is very good for an in-ear model. My only complaints are the earbuds are a bit bulky in your ears (but I have small ears) and the range of the Bluetooth could be improved a bit as well. If your phone is in your pocket you won't notice any issues with Bluetooth range, but if you leave the phone out you will notice the range cuts out after about 10-15 feet.

title: Great headphones for exercise or working around the house
body: I was a little skeptical of this product before buying it because I had never heard of Tozo before, but I'm glad I took a chance on it. I recently lost my previous set of bluetooth headphones that I didn't really care for that much because they were attached and therefore pulled on my ears. I no longer have that problem and they last longer than my last pair did as well. I really like the charge/storage case, it's very handy. I exercise at lunch so now I can continue listening to podcasts even while changing clothes without my headphones being ripped off my head. They're also really handy for when you're working around the house since I'm constantly moving all over the place. I can comfortably wear them for several hours. They are much more comfortable than my last bluetooth headphones. My only issue is that the smallest size is ever so slightly too big for my small ears, but they don't fall out very often. Very highly recommend!

title: High Quality wireless for a Great Price
body: I really like the convienance of these wireless headphones. The charging case is handy. The sound quality is really good. I would recommend these headphones very much.

title: Great for music, not so much for calls
body: I work from home and take a lot of meeting/conference calls which is why I wanted to invest in a pair of Bluetooth headphones. I had high hopes based on all the positive reviews, however these failed to meet the mark. The sound quality when listening to music is great however when I am on a call, the other person/people on the line hear me as if I am far away, and I cut in/out. I believe the issue is whenever there is background noise (fan blowing/AC blowing in the car) it interferes and causes issues. I tried pairing them to another phone but the problem persisted. Then I thought maybe they were defective so I exchanged them for another pair. Nope, still the same problem. Ill be back on the market now for a pair of Bluetooth headphones that can actually work well for calls, not just music.

title: Disappointed; kept falling out of my ears
body: Very disappointed by these. Tried all the different sizes of earpieces, but these buds kept falling out of my ears with only slight head movement. If you have small ears, maybe these will be ok for you. Otherwise they are a waste of time and money. I also was unable to find the buds on the Bluetooth on my android phone, though they showed up on my iphone. Finally, the English in the instructions is awful.

title: Wireless earbuds that are surprisingly awesome
body: These are awesome. Affordable, built in wireless charging case, super easy to pair and use. Auto pairing when taking out of the case is way cool. Fit well, super comfy, don’t slip out at all. I work in loud construction, and these are perfect. Sound quality is really surprising. Clear highs, solid mids, impressive bass. So good I bought another pair for my wife.

title: TOZO T10 TWS Bluetooth 5.0 Earbuds-somewhat poor microphone pick up
body:
I brought this product and it works well as far as connecting to the cellphone but the microphone worked horrible. The company sent me a new pair to try, and although the microphone works better, I still have to talk loudly for the person I am talking to can clearly hear me.

The microphone aspect to the earbuds still does need improvement, but I can give this second set a 3-star rating. I appreciate the company's determination to try to make the product right. Good customer service for sure.

title: Great earbuds but charging case stopped working
body: So I got this on March 19, 2019 and it's now August, I have not put this in water or messed with it in anyway. I use it daily to listen to music while I'm laying in bed to not disturb my partner. Well here the past month the charging case doesn't work unless I keep it plugged in to the wall constantly which is annoying because I like to take it with me to work but I have to take the earbuds alone which worries me that I may lose them. Idk what happened to the case but love the earbuds!

title: Excellent Deal and Quality Product
body: My Earbuds arrived charged and ready to go. The pairing process was simple and fast and within a minute, I was fitting the earbud with the correct side for my ears. The buds come with a nice selection of tips and they are easy to switch. The sound quality is excellent and I like the fact that they are water resistant since I use them by the pool. My husband has a very expensive pair and he was impressed by the quality and overall value of the set I bought. I am very happy with my T10's.

title: Excellent BlueTooth Earbuds 5 Stars.
body: I recently purchased these earbuds to use with my galaxy note 10+ which no longer comes with a Jack for earphones. The product is well made and easy to use right out the box. It was a snap to pair to my phone along with my tablet and computer. The charging case is easy to use and you can see through the lid to see the status of charge. I really enjoyed the sound quality. Overall the Tozo T10 Bluetooth 5.0 wireless earbuds are an excellent purchase that I rate 5 stars!!!!

title: The headphones work well
body: However, the Khaki color does not look like it does in the image.  The color is more like an ugly mannequin flesh color.  It certainly does not look like it does in the picture.  I purchased three, one black, one white, and one khaki.  I am returning the khaki due to the discrepancy in color between the image and the product, but otherwise the headphones work well.

title: Great value, As expected for price.
body: Obviously these are not air pods.  But, for the money, they work great.  They fit well with customization for different size ear canals.  Case holds a long charge.  I worked out for an hour and didn't use a third of the battery in the actual ear buds.  Happy with purchase.

title: The most comfortable in ear ear buds i have ever worn.
body: This is my second pair of true wireless ear buds but my first from TOZO.  The sound quality is so much better than my first pair that i bought from a different company and paid over 4 times the amount I spent on these. I even wore these while riding my motorcycle and not once did they feel like they were going to come out. The first time i pared them to my phone took less than 20 seconds and now when i remove them from the case they are connected before i get the first one in place! Music is a very big part of my life and my music which is heavy and fast sounds great and very clear!! I am about to order another pair for my girlfriend so she will leave mine alone. If anyone would ask me if they should by these I would absolutely tell them yo order now because they are missing great sounds!! Every time i put them in they go thru an audible "Right channel" and Left channel" system check to ensure both are working properly.

title: Great earbuds!
body: I got these earbuds for myself and my husband had purchased other ones that he liked before I purchased these. He really likes my a lot. I would have not purchased anything different and I did look at a lot of them first. Thanks

title: Nice Headphones
body:
For the price the headphones are excellent.  I have been using the headphones for a couple months now and rather impressed with the quality.  They are clear, loud, water proof, and charge wireless.  I would definitely purchase another pair happily.

The headphones did malfunction around a month in. The contact point for the charge in the headphone seemed to move and caused one of the headphones to have some issues charging. I am working with them currently in applying the benefits of the warranty supplied with purchase. They are fairly responsive with technical difficulties.

I say buy yourself a set and enjoy.

title: Great Earbuds!
body: I bought these for a friend and they worked great for about a month and the left one cut out. However, TOZO stood by their product and replaced them quickly with another pair 2 days later! Customer service is excellent and they really want to make sure the customer is happy. Would not hesitate purchasing another pair.

title: 2 Pairs 6 months and both pair having problems with syncing.
body:
I bought this item the end of March and have used it maybe a handful of times. After maybe the third time the left ear buds stop syncing, now it won't power up. I contacted the company and they were very happy to help with the situation. I love these earbuds because of the noise cancellation and quality of sound so I am thrilled that I don't have to buy another pair.
UPDATE: My second pair was sent out to me by the company and now it is October and again the new pair stopped syncing. I would not recommend to others and I won't buy again!!!!!!!!!

title: Well crafted easy to use
body:
Awesome product. When purchasing, I didn't even realize that they would work so well as noise cancellers too. They product feels well crafted and I am confident in it's durability. The instructions to connect it via Bluetooth are also very simple and I have been able to connect it to all by devices seamlessly.

I also used them to workout and even though there was sweat, the earbuds didn't come off. I have yet to use them for a phone call but will update when I do.

title: Great Headphones for workout!
body: I purchased these headphones a month ago because the wired Blue Tooth headphones were breaking on me.  I have enjoyed these headphones.  They pair right away and I haven't had any issues when I walk around the gym and leave my phone in one spot.  It is nice not having the cord, while you are running or lifting, getting in the way.  Sound quality is very good.  The only draw back is you cannot change the volume on the ear piece, however this doesn't bother me as I usually have my phone near if i want to change the volume.  Overall I would definitely recommend these to anyone looking for a good workout set of headphones.

title: Whoa
body: These little guys completely exceeded my expectations sound-wise, and I’m pretty amazed at how secure they feel in my ear holes. We’ll see how the battery life is - my old buds barely made it an hour. Recommend getting the white ones if you’re plotting beach use because the sun is hot and black absorbs heat. #physicskehd ;)

title: Outstanding for the money
body:
I’ve gotten tired of my older Bluetooth earbuds as they are still wired together. AirPods are ridiculously expensive, so I Decided to try these after seeing so many positive reviews for 1/3 the price.
Pros- The sound is very good. Not quite 5 star, the bass is t up to what my LGs are, but still very clear and more than adequate.
Battery life is better than advertised. I used just one at a time while at work, and just one side was used for about 5 hours, and still wasn’t dead.
As stated above, for $50 I think it’s a great deal.
Cons- about the only real con I’ve seen is not so much a con as an opinion, and that’s they they’re a bit large for me. Not the silicone inserts, as they include 4 different sizes to find your fit, but the whole earbud itself. But again, at this price point, it’s not that big a deal.
Overall a good buy and seems to be a great product.

title: Mostly great product
body:
I really liked the ease of connection. The earbuds worked great except for one issue. The left earbud would cut out when i was outside, only for a second, but long enough to be distracting. I replaced the earbuds thinking it was just a bad pair, but it happened with the second pair.
I really wanted them to work, the ease of use and setup was awesome and everything else worked as advertised, but i use them mostly outdoors so this was to annoying to ignore.

title: Incredible for the price (update not so good)
body:
I got these for working out. They are comfortable and have multiple earbud sizes which is nice. I also sweat a lot, and these stay in and have thus far been effectively waterproof as far as I can tell. For the price, sound quality is great too. Wireless charging a nice plus as well!

Update:
After about a month of owning these they cut in and out constantly when outside. They still work fine inside. Maybe I got a bad pair? I got them for running outside so they are now pretty pointless for me.

title: They are not falling out
body: I've had these for about 3 weeks now and can definitely say that these puppies are staying in your ear and they are not budging. They come with an assortment of sizes to fit your ear which is nice. I've moved all around the house, chasing an infant with these in, and they've stayed in place. The case holds up to 4 charges and off of 1 charge, i've been able to watch almost a full-length movie...about 2 hours on one go. Pairing is super simple. I literally just popped them out of the case paired the one, and they were good to go. I haven't had any issues with sound quality or connectivity either.

title: Great for the gym
body: I received the blue tooth ear buds last week and just returned from the gym where I was able to listen to audio book while walking the track , I was also able to continue using while in the dry sauna for ~ 30 min. They fit perfectly and the sound quality is amazing.  The compact case is solid, I am very pleased with the purchase.

title: I absolutely love these headphones!
body: I absolutely love these headphones! They stay in while I'm running and are wonderful for using in the shower! My first pair stopped charging after a few months of use, but when I contacted the company to ask if there was a way I could fix them, they sent me a new set for free! Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for wireless headphones that stay in during exercise.

title: Sound better than expected.
body:
Just got them real easy to pair to phone. The sound quality was much better than expected for the size. Charged the carrying case. I had to change the earbuds to smaller sized. Came with four different size buds. Never had a pair of wireless earbuds before. So far impressed with them
Great price. Can't wait to try out at the gym

title: Surprisingly clear, large sound stage
body:
First off. The sound is amazing!
Battery life is decent.. And the wireless charging makes them really convenient.

There's a decent selection of rubber ear pieces.
My ear seems to be a strange shape and has a hard time holding them in. Your mileage may vary.
All in all I would buy this again.

Will update after I've put them through their paces here on the farm.
Plus that you can just use the right earbud if you only need one. It complains for a few moments and then stops searching for the second earbud.
Well thought out design.

title: Amazing sound and function!
body:
I knew going into this that I was not spending $150 or $200 for earbuds but having used the Apple AirPods I have to say that this has amazing sound for music and audiobooks/radio streaming.  Amazon HD tracks sound wonderful with great highs and respectable base.  Volume is louder than would ever be needed.  The seal blocks out a HUGE amount of sound and while they don't have ANR they almost feel like they do.  In fact, they are so sound-isolating that I found myself taking one out from time to time to be able to better hear the world around me.

They paired instantly out of the box on my Note 10 and stayed synced.  There are super stable in the ears and I don't see them falling out short of really trying hard to make that happen.  The single button on both the R and L pods work as they should.

Build quality seems top-notch - Apple or Bose quality - for both the pods and the charging case.  The case charges by cable AND wirelessly which is super nice.  It is much larger than the AirPod case so if you are looking for the smallest package possible that is something to think about.

On calls, the voice of the other party is loud and clear but my voice is a bit softer than I would prefer - clearly softer than when using the phone handset mic on speakerphone.  It is too early to tell if this will be a 'problem' or if the other party will just be able to turn up their volume to adjust for it.  My voice is clear, however.

All in all, I can't see paying $150++ for other pods and I am eager to see how these compare with the soon to be released Echo pods.  They set a high bar so for Amazon to ask $90 more they will have to be amazing.

title: Amazing!
body: I was skeptical about this product, but it has exceeded my expectations in every way. Sound quality is marvelous but they must be positioned properly in the ear to get the best quality, particularly in the bass. You can charge the case while listeneing to the earbuds, then put them in the case where they will be charged. I've not tryed the charging pad (purchasing one today). The important thing to remember is to use the earcaps which fit and place them in your ear solidly and carefully using a twist. I had problems with one falling out until I got this down. No problem now. One of the most satisfying experiences I've had with electronics such as this.

title: Great sound quality, bad battery life
body: I tested a number of these bluetooth ear buds in this price range and these had the best sound quality with good base. The ear bud fit is ok, they tend to come slightly loose after a while which then affects the base and the sound quality... Bluetooth range is not as good as the other ones i tested. Battery life of the ear buds is ok, but the battery life of the charging doc is rubbish!

title: No real on ear controls.  Overall not great for much.
body: So these have pretty good sound, how ever the controls are kind of garbage.  You can only make a phone call or deny one.  You cant adjust volume, skips songs or anything else.  So even though they are marketed as an athletic earbud they are kind of usless for that.  Also if you do use them to make a call the sound quality of the microphone is exceptionally poor.  These are really only good for listening to music with your device in your hands, otherwise it's pretty annoying to keep getting it out and putting it back constantly when trying to do any type of exercise.  Also they do stay in the ear really well.  They also seem slow to connect to bluetooth and I often have do it manually because I get tired of waiting.  Also you cant use them independently, the left can't connect with out the right and the right beeps nonstop with out the left.

title: Good sound
body: The sound quality is good. Appreciate that I can use one at a time.  The only down side is that they have about a 3 hour life before needing to be charged again, but charging is very quick.

title: Great choice!!
body:
I purchased the T10 earbuds a while ago.  I have small ears, so I often have difficulty with fit.  These come with several size options so you can get your perfect fit.  The sound quality is great!  While there is a "left" and a "right" earbud, they are interchangeable.  You can use them both or use them individually.  I have slept with them in and they're still in place in the morning.  They have great customer support to boot.
 You can't go wrong with these.

title: If you want wireless earbuds, get these!
body: I wanted wireless earbuds cause I keep breaking my regular earbuds. And these earbuds are the best! I have never had a problem with them, they work well, and have a long battery life with the charging case. Any time someone says they want to get airpods I tell them that these earbuds are the better way to go. They are amazing and $100 cheaper than airpods. Also, amazing customer service so if you ever have any problems they can help you. Honestly, the best earbuds I have ever purchased!

title: Great Fit and Great Sound Quality
body: I ordered this product because my husband researched online and saw the best reviews and the price for these earbuds were not expensive, but of great value and quality. Once I used his earbuds after they were ordered, and I tested the sound using a cellphone, a smartwatch, and a portable bluetooth radio, and found the audio and media sound to be just what I wanted, I purchased a pair also. The charge holds great and we were able to wear these while working out on a treadmill, cooking, walking, or just about anything. They are lightweight but give a hefty sound. I would recommend purchase. I am 100 percent satisfied. But do not believe that you will receive a free wireless charger if you say that you are 100 percent satisfied with these earbuds. Trust me. That's not true.

title: Shower with them because you can🤷🏿‍♀️
body: Without music. These cancel sound decently but with music, don't have your back turned if you scare easily. These mute the world. And that's exactly what I needed. Plus I can wear them in the shower and get extra coursework done that I couldn't do before. Love them.

title: Pleasantly surprised
body: After going through a number of wireless headphones, and hating all of them, I was pleasantly surprised when I went for my first run with these. The right one popped out on me during a jog but I believe that was due to heavy perspiration. I think a bit of silicone or rubber around the edge that sits in the shell of your ear would help keep this from happening. The sound qualities decent but a bit loud even on level one because of how far down it sits in the canal. But overall this product is great. The charging system is compact and handy. I also love that these are waterproofed. Finally, the price tag can't be beat.

title: Excellent quality waterproof headphones at a great price!
body: I purchased these wireless headphones for my husband. He is very active & works out almost every day. He wanted something that would be comfortable, sound good, and be waterproof. We were VERY impressed with the quality, sound, and comfort. They stay in your ear really well! The noise canceling is incredible! Even without any music on you can barely hear the person next to you talking! Also really like the charging case, and it’s great for travel. Would definitely recommend this product!!

title: Totalmente recomendados
body:
Excelentes Audífonos.  Se cargan fácilmente con el estuche de los mismos y este se carga inhalambricamente.  Adiós cables!!  Se enciende automáticamente y se conectan al teléfono de inmediato con solo sacarlos del estuche.
Se escucha perfecto y me escuchan excelente al conversar por teléfono.  Totalmente recomendados!

title: Good earphones, comfy, nice battery life
body: I had different but similar earbuds beforE which broke within a week. These are so much better. I have them for quite some time now, the sound quality is awesome, they charge fast, they are as good as day one. Small and comfortable, I  Love them!

title: You get what you pay for
body: I bought the black set  and a white one for my wife. Battery only last a few hours on them. When used for a phone call there is a huge delay in the voice. When connected to my laptop watching like something on YouTube the lips move and then the sound catches up. More delay on both sets.

title: I'm very happy with these earbuds
body: Everything they claim on their Amazon page is accurate and true.  I tried several other pairs of bluetooth earbuds.  These were the last pair I was going to try before making the jump to Samsung earbuds that cost $130, but I actually like these more.  Although they don't have noise cancellation,  the sound quality is really good and they'll turn up loud.  Plenty loud enough to mow the lawn and still hear every note of the music you're listening to.

title: Randomly stop working
body: The product itself is great when it actually works. I bought these for myself and my boyfriend and we have both had problems within the first few weeks of using them. They randomly stop working even though they are fully charged and they always fall out when running. They also randomly connect to your phone when you aren’t using them. Probably not worth the buy

title: They’re ok but what do I know I’m just some guy
body:
I bought them to replace ones I lost. So I’ll just use them as reference.

Here’s what I think:

Good:
-They’re loud
-you can do mono audio (which means you can charge one and use the other to make the battery last longer)
-you can take your shirt off and they won’t come out (no guarantee)

Bad:
-Takes about 10-15s to connect (my other ones connected immediately)
-The case is kind of bulky considering the headphones are so small.
-Phone calls are bad

Battery: constant playing drains about
25-30% per hr

title: Simply WOW!!!  Watch out Apple.
body: I am absolutely amazed with my new T10s.  I've had LG HBS headsets for over four years because the true wireless devices were of cheap quality in manufacturing and sound in the past.  After bad experiences with my LGs I took a chance and researched the best TWS earbuds to date.  Tozo T10 was the model that stood out!  I received it in less time than advertised.  First impression was positive.  Quality packaging, instructions, feel and sound.  Pairing was very simple.  While playing music from my contemporary jazz library I could hear all the notes from all instruments clearly.  The sound wasn't overbearing and the bass was on target too.  One of the selling points was the wireless charging case.  Keep up the good work.  You are very competitive to Apple's Airpods in price and quality.

title: Cuts out constantly
body: Headset cuts out constantly if phone is in my pocket while walking. I have to hold the phone in my hand for it to work which makes this worse than wired headphones. Total garbage and the reviews are obviously fake.

title: Decent quality earbuds for this price range
body: I was extremely impressed by sound quality of these earbuds. They’re quite loud and provide clear sound. Have very little bass but that’s expected, not a very big deal for me. The reason for my three star review is that the mic quality is EXTREMELY poor. You can hear the person quite clear on the earbuds but they cannot hear you. It sounds as if you were far away and there is static in the background. This is also expected for this price range, but since this is a huge component for me I’ll have to return them. If you’ll be using these strictly for music then they are totally worth it. Another reason for my three stars is because these earbuds were way too big. They do come 4 ear caps but not even the smallest sized fit. They are very easy to pair and you can use one earbud at a time. The downside is that once you start using only one earbud is that you’ll hear a beeping but eventually stops.

title: Do not stay in ear during active workouts.
body: I was excited to read all the glowing reviews of this product. The market is definitely flooded with wireless earbuds and I thought I made a good choice with the Tozo T10. While the sound quality is decent and I liked that I could wear 1 earbud at a time if needed, I was extremely disappointed that the fit was so poor. The earbuds are advertised as great for using while exercising. I beg to differ. I tried all the silicone ear caps and selected the best one for fitting in my ear. I rotated the headset back as indicated in the directions, but I still find they come loose during active workouts. (Not bad if just riding bike, but awful when kickboxing or during any other "highly active" sport.) My two star rating is because these earbuds are pretty useless if they don't stay in the ear. I will be returning them and will continue my search for a budget friendly wearable pair of earbuds.

title: Good Product
body:
So far, I have had no issues with this item. The earbuds paired with each other and my phone very easily and the sound quality seems to be comparable with the mid range corded headphones that I normally use while exercising. I did have to change the earbuds for one of the included smaller sizes to fit well but this was not an overwhelming issue. I have, to date, not had the opportunity to test this product with an actual telephone call since I normally utilize them early in the morning just for exercising.

The headphones fit into the case which appears to be able to utilize either a cord or wireless charger. I also appreciate the excellent manufacturer followup, contacting me to insure that I was satisfied with the product.

title: WOW
body: This is a great little product. Not sure about the battery, but the sound is good for the price. I will updated review. I have a pair of $300 dollar bose headphones, and these are very similar in sound output. little tight in the ear..Pretty pleased

title: Great for gym, not a headset replacement
body: For the $ the sound quality is very good. I get these wet all the time and they do just fine. The software is simple. Bluetooth connection with my android phone is seamless. Put them in ears and go. The mic is not good for phone calls. Most people tell me I sound far away. If you're on a bluetooth headset for work all day, this will not be a suitable replacement. I wish I could find some earbuds just like this with a great mic

title: Good sound but not when breaking a sweat
body: I wanted a set of wireless ear buds to use at the gym and while running. The sound quality is great on these but no matter what I do and how many different ear bud sizes I try these keep falling out of my ears when I'm sweating, which sort of defeats their whole purpose for me.

title: Good sound, great bass, reasonable price
body:
Edit:  After using a few times, I am happy with the quality of sound.  There are a few glitches that happen though.  If the source of music is not very near the master earbud, ie the right side, it will cut out at times.  It doesn't cut out for long, but is annoying.  I moved my phone from my left front pocket to my right front pocket and this seemed to disappear.
The left earbud will cut out after about an hours worth of use.  Don't know if the battery is getting low to the point where it will periodically disconnect from the right, again, is just a moment lost, but also annoying.  Other than that, I have no real complaints.

To start out, I never pay attention to the 5 star reviews or the 1 star reviews.  These reviews are either by someone who seems to have been paid off to give a good review, or someone who is expecting "gold" for the price of "plastic".  I find these reviews unbelievable, so I go to the 4 and 3 star reviews for honest reviews.
So the seller is wanting an honest review of the earbuds.  I have used them for about a total of 10 minutes so far, enough to get the bluetooth connected to my phone and hear what they sound like.
The sound is clear with good bass.  How long will the battery last?  I have no idea.  How comfortable are they?  Well in the first 10 minutes, they didn't really bother me, but will find out when I have the opportunity to wear them for an extended period of time.  I also have not had the opportunity to use them on a phone call, so I can't tell you how they will sound, not to me, but the other person on the line.
The case is nice, and wireless charging capability built into the case is good.  The buds are secure in the case, they don't seem to bounce out of the seated, charging position.  All in all, they seem to be a good set of earbuds.  Price is very reasonable.  I hope they will serve me well for at least 1 year, as that would be a good lifespan for any earbud of this style.

title: Great bang for your buck!
body: Loved the TOZO T10 Headphones! Sound is amazing and noise cancellation is great. However it seems to fall out of my ears no matter which size ear cushions I use. Would recommend for heavy sweaters. Also wish there were touch controls. Really sucks when I have to pull out my phone when I’m training to change the volume or skip songs. Besides that the battery life is pretty good and charging is quick. For the price I think it’s worth it!

title: Great headphones for a great price!
body: After having my Bose soundsport stop working I wanted to find a new pair of wireless headphones that wouldn’t break the bank and stumbled across the TOZO T10’s. They are small discreet, come with three different sized buds for all ear sizes. The sound quality is great and they even offer noise cancellation. My only gripe is sometimes they take a little time to pair up when you turn them on but otherwise a great headphone.

title: Satisfied
body: So I needed to wear these for awhile before I reviewed. I love the little case they come in. The battery life is great if charged properly lol. My only complaint is they are top heavy which makes it fall out my ear. I just wear a headband to hold them in now.

title: Love Tozo T10
body: I liked that it looked a lot better on my grandson.. Even though I bought it for me. When I used it the ear buds proved to be a lot better than  I initially thought.. So much so I gifted it to my shun over.. He loves them enough to give them a 100% rating.. Very happy I bought them..

title: Stopped working after a little more than a month. EDIT: TOZO Has offered to replace my pair!
body:
The right earbud will no longer turn on or seem to charge(No orange indicator when plugged into charge box) yesterday it was running perfectly, and now i cannot manually turn on the right earbud nor get it to pair with my phone or the other earbud. The left charges fine and will connect to my phone no problem.  I am disappointed because the quality of the earbuds have been excellent before this point.
EDIT: TOZO Was more than kind to offer to replace my pair at no extra cost! They had a quick response through email, and immediately apologized and offered to repair my broken pair.

title: Quality sound, easy pairing
body:
I decided to try the TOZO T10 earbuds after bad experiences with two sets of "i-something" buds. The sound quality is good, they fit comfortably in my ears well thanks to the various size of ear caps included. They fit snugly without falling out during moderate movement, such as walking. If I were going to use in a workout situation, I would probably go for a model that has some kind of behind ear hooks. I like the waterproof case; there is a slight magnetism that draws the buds into charging position. There is a USB port for wired charging and it also supports wireless charging. I use with my existing wireless charger for my Samsung Galaxy phone where they reach full charge in a couple of hours. The charge lasts for at least 3 hours of listening to music.

The T10 earbuds may lack the "cool" look of the i-something buds. I wear them to listen to music and e-books at the pool. They are a bit large, so if you have smallish ears, they may not be for you.  Other than that, if you're looking for earbuds that fit well and work well, then these may be worth a try!

title: High quality at a reasonable price
body: I love the wireless Bluetooth earbuds for when I exercise. With wired earbuds, I was constantly getting the wire hung up on something and jerking the earbuds out of my ears, or worse yet, pulling my iPhone out of my pocket. The sound is excellent. I had looked at Apple Bluetooth earbuds, but these do the job at a fraction of the price. Connecting to the Bluetooth device was simple. I would highly  recommend these to a friend.

title: Great earbuds
body: These are very nice and comfortable earbuds.  Sound quality is very good,but to be fair I have been accused of being tone deaf.  Works great with the phone.  The PC is having trouble recognizing these as stereo headphones but I'm working on it.

title: Supurb sound quality
body: Honestly amazed at the incredible clarity of sound that these earbuds produce, especially for the price. Battery life has been good and they are well built. Highly recommended.

title: These have to be fake reviews.
body: I bought these, mostly, for doing yard work and being outside. I keep my Galaxy S9+ in my pocket and listen to music. These would constantly lose connection and make it sound like the music was skipping, although I know it wasn't. I couldn't even wear them. I have some Bose Bluetooth headphones that have a wire between them and the never dropped. This is the second pair of $50-$60 ones that I bought and I would not recommend them. I spent $80 and bought the Soundcore Liberty Airs and they seem ok. Haven't mowed the lawn with them yet but they got great reviews on CNET.

title: Great product
body: I am so happy I ordered these earbuds. Connected easily, fit great, and feel secure. Comfortable to wear and talk while I am driving and use 1 at a time. The people I am talking to don’t even realize I am driving the sound is so clear. Love this product

title: Won’t stay in my ears
body: These headphones sound great but they refuse to stay in my ears. I tried all the different tips and they all fall out. These prevent me from having a good workout because I have to readjust them every 30 seconds

title: The best earbuds yet!
body: This is my third pair of wireless earbuds from Amazon. Theses Tozo earbuds  are by far the best earbuds and my favorite. The sound quality is amazing, the bass hits, and the sound is clear. I cannot complain. The only thing I wish it had are play control options. I would like to be able to rewind and fast forward from the earbuds not the device. But for $50, these earbuds are the best.

title: I love these things
body: I have a freakishly large head (and ears). So, when I smile, laugh, or run over a mile, they slip a bit. But that's on me. These things kick *ss and I love them. Highly recommended!

title: These Are Not Good! They Are Excellent!
body: I've tried a lot of different wireless earbuds and I own a running company. Hands down these are my absolute favorite when looking at form, fit and function. The fact that they have a charging station that holds the earbuds is simply amazing but the sound quality is excellent, plenty loud and has great bass. So far we have purchased two sets and would have zero hesitation recommending this to anyone. I have not received any compensation and do not often write reviews but wow these just blew me away as being phenomenal. Thanks Tozo!

title: Great sound
body: For the price, these are awesome! The sound quality is wonderful. The bass is good. They cancel out the sound pretty well. There’s 4 pairs of different sizes plugs. I love them.

title: Best Sounding audio
body:
These earbuds are the best I've had. I'm a music producer and engineer and I needed a pair of earbuds that sounded just as good as a $300 pair but I wouldn't have to worry about losing them since the price is so great for the quality.

The bass is amazing and there isn't any crackling like other earbuds for the same price. The charging case is awesome. The battery life doesnt last as long ad I wish but no ear buds do. When my friend let me listen to theirs I was so happy to find a great sounding pair for the price. Noise cancellation is amazing, almost too good lol.

title: Great workout and work earbuds
body: I bought these for a work trip that I knew I was going to have to be on the phone quite a lot for. I had no intention of being Apple pods for the price that they sell for. After some research I found these with great recommendations and now I can recommend these as well. Awesome sound, easy to use, easy to pair, great battery life. I would recommend these to anyone at this price point. So much that I got my wife to buy a pair for herself. A great gift not only for you but also others. Christmas is around the corner.

title: Made me a Bluetooth Believer for Long-Distance Running
body: I'm an avid runner and spend a lot of time training on a treadmill. Until Tozo, I didn't think it was possible that a Bluetooth set of earbuds could survive the amount of sweat I produce over an hour or two of an intense workout. What's more, these buds have incredible battery life - so I can take in podcasts, long playlists, and binge-watching while I put on the miles. Comfortable to wear and they never fall out. The sound quality is excellent, and the charging station is super convenient. FInally the price: this is an unbelievable value compared to bigger brands like Apple, and the form factor is less noticeable and frankly more ergonomic on the ear canal. If you're a runner – or anyone in the market for a great set of Bluetooth earbuds - Tozo is an absolute gem.

title: Great headphones, especially for the price!
body:
Overall, these headphones are great. I’ve been looking for a pair of wireless Bluetooth headphones for while now and I stumbled across these on Amazon and I’m very happy I bought them!

Sound quality is great! Love the bass, as I listen to a lot of hip-hop/rap and edm when I’m working out (which is when I mainly use these). They have a lot of sound power to them and can very loud, so I keep them at maybe 30-40% volume AT MOST and that’s perfect! Practically noise cancelling, as I must take them out to have a conversation and can barely hear anybody around me during my workouts.

They pair very easily and the charging case is great.

There are two downsides, however, and that’s that there’s no ability to skip/backtrack songs nor adjust the volume, which is why I rated 4 stars and not 5. If these features were available, I’d rate 5 stars all the way!

Overall though, great pair of headphones and you can’t beat $50 with free shipping. Especially when compared to the Apple Air Pods, which will run you $160 for practically the same thing.

title: Wouldn't keep these if they were free
body:
I bought these to listen to while working, as the wired headphones always get in the way and never stay put.

As for these, If the connected device moves at all, the sound is constantly cutting out. It's annoying to the point that I would rather listen to nothing.

They work fine if I'm just sitting at my desk not moving, but then you will barely get two hours out of the battery.

Once the battery gets low, you are done listening because there is a non-stop voice in your ear telling you that the battery is low. It would make much more sense if you simply got one warning and then you get to listen until they die completely.

I have lost trust in brands that Amazon puts it's trust in. I have been ripped off twice in the last month. I guess it's time to start putting in the research before purchasing anything on this site because Amazon's rating system is broken.

title: Who's ears do these even fit?
body:
I really wanted these to be the ones that worked since they didn't have a cord, but they were not at all good. I thought maybe changing the earbud tips they provide would make a difference but they don't. They just dangle in my ear, about to fall out and the sound sounds as though the earbud isn't in all the way. Then when I push the earbud in further, it is a larger part of the earbud that finally makes contact with my ear enough to hold it in. I just don't think that the part that holds the earbud in my ear is the part that is suppose to. So after having the earbuds in my ear where I think they should be so they don't fall out, I can't have them in longer than 30 to 45 minutes because they hurt my ear.
Then the button on the earbud is not as easy to push as it should be so when you need to push it, you do so pretty hard which hurts your ear even more.
The pairing and playback was actually pretty good. I wanted to use these between my phone and desktop at work and they worked how I thought they would. I get up to use the restroom and they unpair but when I come back they automatically pair with both devices. Switching from one device to the other is pretty decent also but listening to video messages in Marco Polo still had the skipping in the audio which really bothers me.
So I returned these and found a pair of cheaper $20.95 bluetooth headphones with a wire and an around the ear type of earbud thinking that I'll just use them for working out but they are the best pair that I've found yet! They feel great in my ear, I don't notice the piece that wraps around me ear, they pair so easily with 2 devices at the same time, switching between the devices is seamless, the audio in the marco polo app is perfect with no skipping or pops. I would've paid $60 for a pair like these easily!

title: WIRELESS
body: I really love the fact I don't have to worry about the Tozo wireless ear buds getting ripped out of my ears because of a wire. I love how comfortable they feel inside the ear and the sound beats all other ear buds and head phones I've tried. The charging case will also help you from losing them. Pairing was really simple and easy to do. What a great product.

title: Yes, you need it...
body: The headphones work great. The sound quality is pretty good but I was really impressed with the range they have, I can be upstairs and they still work. Would definitely recommend for the price!

title: Best Headphones I've ever owned
body: This is my first pair of TRUE wireless headphones and they are great, i use my headphones at work and over the last 2 years I've had about 5 different pair cuz 1 side always gets caught on something or just goes out, and now true wireless, they paired up with my galaxy note 8 in seconds and sounds great, I have volume half way and it is nice loud and clear

title: GREAT headphones for the price
body: I personally loved the headphones they are very well produced, the only issue I came across is that after connecting the earbuds would continue to beep unnecessarily. Besides that they are great, I recommend them.

title: Intuitive setup and easy to use
body: I like these earbuds a lot. It's important to me that technology is easy to set up and use, without having to read or memorize a lot of directions or steps. These are very intuitive to use. They include a variety of earbuds so you can find the right size for your ears. That's very important because with the right fit, these earbuds sound great. I love the carrying case/charger as well. Customer service is super helpful and responsive if you have any questions. Great earbuds!

title: Fantastic Headphones! Five Stars!
body: My boyfriend and I originally got them so we can listen to podcasts together on walks. The earphones have amazing sound quality. Even if the earphones just in one ear we both can hear the music/podcast perfectly. We run and walk with the earbuds staying in our ears the whole time. Highly recommend the earbuds!

title: Great base. Nice sound.
body:
The beeping sound that goes off every few minutes from the earbud trying to connect to the other earbud when I only pull out one to use by itself goes away after about a minute.
