Its alot louder than the FocusPower F-10? FocusPower 10. It Definitely has the word Focus Power in it(the one that comes with a single earbud).

  It's pretty comfortable. Although I've only had it for a few days. Will update later on.

title: Very good quality for the price!
body:
These T10s are the best wireless earbuds I have purchased. They are light weight and store easily in the charging case. I have charged them wirelessly which is so convenient these days. So happy that I dont have to lug around chargers and cables.

I am amazed at the awesome sound quality! T10’s have great bass. I am using the T10s exclusively now. They stay in my ears and I can workout at gym and run without being annoyed by wires. An added plus is that the T10s are water proof. Sweat is not a problem.

Call quality is clear and noise reduction works so well that I am not disturbed by the people/ environment around me. I highly recommend the T10s!

title: Garbage!
body: Absolutely terrible. The sound was bad but the microphone was complete garbage. Person on the other line couldn't understand word I said through these.

title: Could have been a whole lot better !
body: I’ll admit I’m fairly new to these models of Bluetooth earbuds. I’ve owned a number of models that had wires stemming from neckband or around the back of your head connections. As far as sound quality they’re not too bad. I’m assuming there are much better out there. My main issues (unresolved ) are connectivity. Typically not difficult to get to connect to a device but keeping the connection is more challenging. They seem to have good range as I’ve walked at least 20’ from my phone however they tend to cut out side to side randomly with the phone right in front of me. I road cycle and having the phone in my back jersey pocket has always been ideal. Connection however seems to be impossible for these buds from the small of my back to my ears. Very frustrating. I sent one pair back right away and Amazon was solid in sending out a replacement. Sadly, I’m beyond the point where I can return these or I certainly would. I can’t recommend these

title: Love it!
body: My husband been wanting wireless earbuds and these are very fantastic! They sound great and feel great. He uses them at work and needed them water proof and these are perfect. He said he hardly needs to recharge them and its noise canceling too

title: Tremendous value! Great sound and nice fit.
body: The TOZO's have really great sound, and a nice fit.  They don't move around in my ear or fall out.  The first set I received the sound modulate din and out but I returned them and the second set has been working very well.  To me these are a tremendous value for the price!

title: Garbage. 3 months dead
body:
So have had these now for approximately 3 months.  And they are beginning to not work the right one will no longer charge.  Customer service is not being helpful.  So I no longer recommend these.  It's a shame that good quality is so difficult to find these days.  I assure you I did not abuse them either.  I'm poor I don't abuse my gear.

Waterproof! A little trouble in switching from one ear bud to the other, but that's the only issue.  The charging case is awesome!!! They stay in my ears!  Wish they gave me more control of song playback, but hey great sound quality!

title: Great Quality and Price
body: These headphones are the absolute best I've purchased.  At $50, they are comparable to any name brand product at 4 or 5 times the cost.  Very clear, good base and crisp sound with zero static.  Noise cancelling is non existent on other air pods while these work great to block out noise on the plane without having to turn them full blast.  I ordered a second set for my girlfriend - Highly recommend and super easy to pair!

title: Great Earbuds!!!
body:
The earbuds are great, light weight, and an easy setup. I mainly use them to watch/stream videos on my iPad. Since I do not run or lift weights … I’m not sure how well they are for working out. The reason I bought them is because my friend recommended them to me.

My only gripe is that the battery life lasted longer than three hours while in use.  I take frequent flying trips and sometimes don’t have time to charge them while always on the go.

Bottom line … they are great earbuds and would recommend them.

title: Best bang-for-your-buck headphones I've found
body: I was looking for a solid pair of cheap, waterproof headphones for running and got these on a whim after going through several pairs of from other brands that would consistently break after a month. I've had these for about 3 and have not noticed any issues after using them most of the day almost every day. I wouldn't call them ideal for running since they start falling out once I get sweaty (although I still use them for this, just a minor annoyance) but for non-active use they are amazing. They sound great and have never died on me and all I have to do is charge them every few days or so. I will say it appears that they need a pretty clear line of site to whatever they're connected to as they can cut out here and there. Other than that, I don't think you can do much better for the price and would definitely recommend if you aren't willing to invest in a high-end pair.

title: Great sound and quality! :)
body: These wireless earbuds are great! The sound is pretty good and noise cancellation is great! They do last a good amount of time without charging. I recommend these! I've been pretty happy so far!

title: Decent product, great customer service!
body:
For the first two months, these headphones were perfect for daily use - Great sound, lasts for a good amount of time, excellent use during commuting to and from the office, and a good backup for when my primary workout headphones run out of battery.

After two months, the bluetooth stopped working...not with my phone, my macbook, nor my PC laptop.... I called Amazon customer service, who gave me the email for the company that sold these headphones. It was determined this was a defect. The company emailed back RIGHT AWAY and has promised to send me a replacement. What a great experience!

title: Great audio quality but microphone leaves something to be desired.
body: Overall the TOZO T10 bluetooth ear buds work great. After researching and comparing which wirelesss ear buds to buy, I decided with these primarily for the sound quality and comfort. The audio quality surpassed my expectations as I thought most bluetooth headphones audio aren't the best. Battery life of the earbuds is typical but they charge real fast like other reviewers stated on here. Bluetooth 5.0 works great and at work I am able to walk 30 ft away from the phone with cubical walls up. Some issues I experienced is the poor microphone quality. It does not isolate the surrounding noises which makes it impossible for the other person to understand what I am saying which to me was a big important feature to me. Otherwise these headphones are great for listening to music.

title: Great fit, Great sound!
body: Amazing sound and perfect fit! Use them for music on my daily bike ride and so comfortable, I usually forget to take them off afterwards. Portable case is also a charger. A+!

title: GREAT BUY! VERY HAPPY!!!
body: I question the reviews about not being loud enough for the gym! EEks  I had it at 1/3 the volume and it was plenty loud at peak times at the gym!  It has not fallen out of my ear, despite much sweating!  My friend and I can go for a walk together and listen to music together! I use one ear bud and he wears the other.... the different sizes of ear bud attachments make that possible!  It easily paired with my phone....I love it!

title: No Song Skip or Volume Control. :(
body: FWIW...double tap does NOT skip songs.  In fact, you dont even have that option.  So if you are purchasing these for exercise, running, or general music etc. you may want to look elsewhere.  These are tailored towards phone call usage.  Bummer!

title: Not good for working out.
body:
I bought these for working out specifically. While walking they are fine. However they slowly slip a tad when using the elliptical. But when I went running outside however, they both slipped out of my ear one went straight into the water.

That being said, I do not recommend for working out.

title: Nice earbuds. great customer service
body:
I mainly bought this due to it's ability to not break in water, and it's wireless charging capability.  There were good reviews about the sound quality that sealed the deal for me. The sound quality is very good, but like all earbuds the fit has to be good for that to happen.  I had some issues getting the buds to stay in my ear for long periods so that was my gripe about it.  I think if the buds were shaped better, it would fit in the ear more securely.  Also there's a button, but could have been programmed more usefully.  Instead of double-click for re-dial (which I would probably never use).  having it skip forward/backward would be more useful.  I understand this is a preference, but I'm just stating my preference.

 I would rate these a 4.5 and their customer service 5.

title: Good for music, bad for calls.
body:
I loved the sound quality you get from these, it sounds nice and hd for such tiny little things, the design and texture of
these are superb and current to whats good in the top name brand markets, HOWEVER, the mic built in to these little guys are absolute garbage, i suppose its because the design is more water proof and weather for runners and people who
exercise, i for one, just need bluetooth cuz i like to not get my cord stuck and pulled over every little thing.
Sadly the built in mic is what is a no go for me, i spend almost my entire day every day in call, so the mic has to be perfect while the headset or earbuds are also convenient and comfortable, the mic was the one thing that was lacking and i know this due to the complaints i was getting, i was told i sound like im underwater or muffled and very quiet, note that i had everything optimized on my end to sound good so it was the mic itself as the problem.

title: Excellent Product!
body: Easy to follow instructions, paired to my iphone instantly. Earbuds are light weight and fit comfortably. I am impressed with sound quality and noise cancellation. Product registration was simple and received a followup e-mail right away. Great customer service experience.

title: Top quality without Big price tag
body: The earbuds are fantastic. I have pretty big outer ear canals but smaller holes so normal ear buds easily fall out. I tried the different mix and matches of sizes, and once I got used to the feel, they never fell out. To test the fit, I took them on a 45 minute run without them ever falling out. The case is nice and has the ability to wirelessly charge as well and easily fits into a pocket or can be tied to a bag.  I was impressed with the music sound quality, level, and how well the microphone picked up my voice on a call.

title: Low price but very good quality sound
body: I have been pleasantly surprised by these earbuds.. despite their lower cost, quality seems very good, as does battery life.  I thing I like better about them than other pairs I have is how well they seal in your ears, keeping outside noise out.  I also run with them in and they stay firmly placed in my ears.  Very happy with my purchase

title: Excellent quality and great value.
body: I love the sound quality of my TOZO T10 Bluetooth earbuds. I also like the ability to answer a call by pressing the button on either earbud. They are comfortable to wear all day long and they are excellent quality and value.

title: Don't expect high quality for cheap prices
body: I like that they're easy to pair and connect. I like how small they are and the fact that you have no wires or anything hanging around your neck is great. The only thing is that at times it just stops playing. Sound quality isn't great but I don't mind since most of the time I'm listening to podcasts anyhow. Overall for the price I'm happy with what I got. Don't go into this expecting Bose quality at bargain prices. Charging is quick and easy. Battery life is about 4 hrs.

title: Honestly, my favorite headphones!!
body: Honestly, my favorite headphones!! Most headphones fall out of my ears while jogging but not these. I love how soundproof these are(so I don't have to hear my heavy breathing) and the sound quality it impressive for a bluetooth connection. The customer service(tozo) for the warranty was even more impressive. They responded very quickly and simplified the whole process(including highlighting the more important sections of the email).

title: Not for smaller ears
body: Only 2 things are wrong with these so far, the battery doesn't last long and they're giant so they don't stay in my ears well. I switched to the smaller earbud pieces and they're still too big and heavy so they don't stay in well. The sound is great and they are super easy to pair, I'm still on the search for the perfect wireless Bluetooth earbuds.

title: Great Earbuds! Very satisfied!
body: I am glad I paid 50 bucks for these babies and did not go with the cheaper ones. These are as good as $100 buds for half the price. Work great and come with ALL WIRELESS charging (charger and earbuds) and great battery life. Charger CAN charge the earphones so it is a huge bonus on the go. Also, earbuds have a long battery life, pairing instantly with the phone, have good range and connection. Great sound too. Seller even offers a free bonus with the purchase. So I am very satisfied. Thank you.

title: Very Impressive for an extremely low cost
body: I have had the earbuds for several weeks now. Pairing was a breeze. Up and listening in about a minute. Love the automatic shut off when placed back in charging case and automatic hook up once taken out of the case. The ability to wirelessly charge the case is super convenient. Battery life has been great. All in all a superb value for the money and I would recommend (already have) to all of my friends in the market. Meets or exceeds my kids Apple Airpods in just about every category.

title: Great expensive paper weight if you ever need one
body:
For sure I thought, “With 12k reviews, it should be GOOD”!  I wasn’t going to sit around and read through every single one of them.  Most reviews were 4 stars.

Ordered a pair about 3-4 months ago.  Pairing it was straight forward and easy, no issues.  Once paired, noticed the left and right kept disconnecting from each other.  At first I thought it could’ve been due to having little to no reception or a bad connection.  So I uninstalled it and reinstalled, same thing.  I checked and verified that the case had charge, I didn’t charge it as the 3 blue LED indicators was lit up to show battery level (¾ way charged).  I thought maybe I needed to charge it (being a china product) so I let it sit plugged in for an hour.  Listened to it after fully charged and …. you guessed it.  Same thing.

I already knew this one was definitely a defect but gave it the benefit of the doubt and continued testing/using it for the next week.  A week goes by, normal daily usage for about 30mins here and there throughout the day (at work and at the gym).  It did work a lot better at work but I had to stay perfectly still or very little to minimal head movement, gym usage was a def. no GO.  I got a hold of Amazon and a replacement was sent out.  Received my replacement, lo and behold, the same problem with the new replacement.  This time, when the replacement came, I made sure both the case and ear buds were fully charged prior to using it.

The frustrating part was when I was using them at the gym till it starts to go fully crazy.  You sit there trying to tamper, disconnect/reconnect (multiple times) and trying to figure out how you can get it to work properly so you can continue your workout... but to no avail, then you have a bright idea as to use the right side by itself just to get some sort of music going while working out.  During this time you're constantly thinking, “hmm, maybe the left side might work now”, you throw the left side back into your ear and then the cycle repeats itself.  Your 1hr workout, turns into a 1hr and 15/30min workout because of this.

It's been about 3-4 weeks now since I have not used it and its been collecting dust on my night stand!  Paper weight basically.  The return window has now closed so I'm stuck with it.  Overall on a positive note though, I do love the fact that these ear buds are capable of wireless bluetooth charging, have great sound and small enough that it won't fall off my ears (compared to airpods)... if only they WORK DAMN IT!!! Thought I found my perfect ear buds, but now, it’s back to using wired ear buds till I find better.

title: Great sound quality, pairing sometimes cuts out
body: The sound quality was a lot better than I was expecting. I was actually kind of blown away by how good my music sounded through these played off my phone. I've only used them once so far for about 2 hrs. They were kind of cutting out at times, but perfect other times. Time will tell, but so far I am happy with them.

title: Easy to use but not great for calls
body:
I ended up returning this device due to inability to make calls. The device paired easily with my phone (Google pixel).  It also comes with extended warranty if you register your device & they offered me a free wireless charging station for writing a review.
It has a solid seal around my ears & has good noise cancelling, it's almost too good of a seal. When I make calls I can hear the caller on the other side very well but  people say they can't hear me very well.

title: Great quality for the price
body: I've had the earbuds for about a week and I absolutely love it. Fitting is pretty tight and comfortable. I've never had issue with connectivity so far and pairing is easy after first time connection. Sound quality is even better than certain Sennheiser and Sony models I've had before near this price range. (But this is probably highly personal preference dependent.) The advertised battery life is pretty accurate. My only issue for potential improvement is the inability to control volume and skip tracks. Overall great for the price and I'm very satisfied.

title: WHAT THE EARBUD!?
body: This earbud is great! I was trying in the shower yesterday and it was working wonders! The earbuds are really sealed, not allowing any water to seep in and they didn't interrupt once so far! It is a very good product for a fair price! I charged 4 times and it still have some battery left so that's really great! They are very easy to connect indeed and even running they didn't fall from my ear! Hope everyone can enjoy these too!

title: Good sound quality!!
body: Good sound, for some reason it keeps beeping in my ear for the first 5 minutes every time, maybe user error, they are kind of bulky but again good sound quality, and the wireless charger is very conventional and slim, I would buy this again! My hubby likes the buds too!

title: Great Product!
body:
Great Product!
Earbuds work perfectly, they fit just right and the set up (Bluetooth pairing) is extremely easy.
I have been using them for a month so far.  The sound is great. Around battery lasting... I am quite not sure yet since I have not run out of battery yet. I use them for periods between 2-3 hours before putting them back in the charging device without running out of battery.
Highly recommended!

title: good wireless for workout
body:
this is my first pair of wireless earbuds, and I did lots of research to finally decide on this one. here are my reasons and review:
1-price is acceptable
2-the design of the earbuds look cool :)
3-confortable to wear and do not fall even when I do HIIT; and it's not too heavy, so it's still comfortable to wear during workout
4-autoconnect once I take the earbuds out of the case, so it's very convenient
5-has warranty & protection plan: I bought a 3-year accident protection plan for the earbuds
6-sound quality is great. I can hear instruments pretty clear.

My ONLY complaint is that the lowest volume of the earbuds is still too loud for me. My ears are relatively sensitive to loud sound; even though the lowest volume from the earbuds is kinda acceptable, but it's optimal for me. Yet with this price, I think overall it's worthy :)

title: Impressive sound @ a great price..
body: Quality product with great sound I am very impressed. Pairing was fast and easy. They worked instantly. First time with them in my ears I listen to an entire Pink Floyd album. I highly recommend these earbuds.  I know a few people getting these for Christmas.

title: THESE ARE AMAZING
body: I tried these out right out of the box. They paired with my iPhone easily and the sound is phenomenal!! I called my niece right away and she said the sound was perfect, then I called my sister and she said they were just fine too. I'm listening to iHeart Radio as I type this and I am so impressed! The different size tips for a better fit were hard to change out and I was about to give up, but slightly pinching them and sliding them on one side of the post and wiggling them around finally worked. I'll be buying another pair for my husband soon.

title: Great buy! Great quality!!
body: I have purchased several headphones and earbuds over the years. I have small ears and most are uncomfortable. Not the case with these. I had to change the size of the ear piece to the small after that the fit perfect! I am semi active, I go to the gym and do vfc the  Elliptical and I also play disk off this Bud stay in my ear without me happened to fidget with them I love them!  It did take me a minute to just to the noise cancelation, wasn't used to not hearing things around me the sound quality is great I have no complaint this was a very good purchase.

title: Very impressed, exactly as stated in the ad
body: I had purchased an Apple knockoff before and they work, but started to fall apart, had little audio, and had a limited battery use.  I then researched for quite a bit and settle on the Tozo 10s.  I have been very satisfied with them so far to date.  They have sufficient volume that I can easily listen to them on a plane, and they do a good job of blocking out outside noise, such as the talkative gentleman next to me in the middle seat.  I really like that they instantly synch with themselves when I take them out of the case and then synch with my iphone.  It does take a little bit of turning things on and off to have them then synch with another device but they definitely do.  Overall, I am really glad I bought these and they have a lot more quality than my first pair of bluetooth earbuds.

title: They look great, sound great, and fit great!
body: After REFUSING to pay $200 for Apple’s AirPods, I decided to give these gems a try. They are fantastic. They fit great and sound great. The case is of good quality, as well. There’s the occasional glitch where the sound drops when I unlock and re-lock the screen while music is playing, but it’s only for about a tenth of a second, so it’s more of a minor annoyance than anything else. These are well-worth $50. I even ordered a second pair for my daughter!

title: Surprised it works so well.
body: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of these earbuds. My first concern was that they would fall out of my ears. They stay in place and the quality is excellent. While I also like that I can use the two independently and they work equally well, they beep. Not sure why but after a while it becomes white noise and helps me ensure I still have them. I love they are waterproof because I have shoulder length curly hair and don’t usually dry it so it’s wet for the first couple of hours each day which is when I use the earbuds first.

title: Exceptional wireless headphones!
body: These are truly the best wireless headphones I’ve used.  I also have the EarPods and the ToZo T10 actually have better sound quality and louder than the EarPods.  For the price, quality, and exceptional sound you won’t be disappointed!

title: Better that Bose and Airpods. Clean Sound and Deep Bass. Excellent Noise Cancellation
body:
I love these earphones. The built quality and the fit to my ear is phenomenal.  This is better than the Airpods and the Bose Sport.  The bass that these provides is super rich and deep.  The sound is really immersive.  It is like being in front of the stage listening to the artist sing live.

The bluetooth connection is great. It is stable. I used this 3hours straight and no hiccups. The sound quality is superb all throughout.  Charging is also great because you can use your wireless charging pad.  Very convenient.

I highly recommend this to anyone who would like to have a real wireless earphones.  (I sold my Bose and Airpods)

I am happy with this purchase.

title: Best earbuds I've ever had!
body: These really are the best earbuds I've ever owned! After you pair them to your phone the first time they automatically turn on and pair each time you remove them from the case. Several sizes of buds are sent with the package so you can match the right size to your ear. I love these! Inexpensive and very modern. I plan on buying another pair so I always have one in my gym bag and one next to my bed! Love them!

title: Completely noise cancelling
body:
I have had these now for a couple of days now
and I have to say I'm impressed I take the metro to&from work and these TOZO BLUETOOTH BUDS are perfect for blocking out noise and they are very comfortable

title: Great quality, super comfortable!
body: Have been using my earbuds for about a week and am extremely pleased with their versatility. They've proved to be great for both listening to music and conducting calls. I find the ear piece to be extremely comfortable and the buds themselves are very lightweight. Great quality for a great price!

title: Great sound
body: Great ear buds super loud and clear just stinks that you need both out of the charge pack otherwise it will have a constant beep

title: Awesome
body: Just amazing I put these through the test I used these at work  I'm in a fab shop where it can get pretty loud and the earphones can still be hear very clearly,I took them for a workout right after and they would not fall out and the battery power is also amazing,I also even  took them for a swim at the lake,will definitely recommend.

title: Cuts in and out
body: I bought these because I wanted headphones that would stay in my ear (the airpods sadly do not).  But the sound quality is atrotious.  It constantly cuts in and out when I jog around the block.  Completely useless.

title: When on a phone call people say they can’t hear me
body:
When on a phone call people say they can’t hear me and I break in and out. I don’t know how to resolve this issue.

Great sound quality and good bass, although not super loud. Fabulous and fast charging.

title: Love them!
body: I love these headphones. I have only had them for a few hours but the sound quality is great, the look is nice, very intuitive. The charging case is also very cool. The only compliant I have is the small earbud tips are still too big. Are there any smaller?

title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
body: DO NOT WASTE your money.  Went to use for first time and the one ear bud died with in a couple min despite charging both for over 12 hours so I assumed it was just a defective pair and sent it back to get a replacement.  When I received the replacement I knew something was off when the plastic box wrapping wasn’t even on the box.  But I charged and thought well I will give it a go.  Surprise surprise this time both earbuds died within a couple min.  This product is crap don’t even bother wasting your time or money

title: Comfortable and easy to recharge.
body: These are very comfortable, have great sound and they can be recharged in their case on our wireless charging station too. Would buy them again!

title: Best value! Clear sound, great price!
body:
I'm a skeptic when it comes to advertising "the best" this or that.
I compared this product to maybe a dozen others, including some "brand name" headphones...
The price per feature is a great selling point, and ultimately, the reason I bought these.
Being skeptical, I opened the box to find a quality product. Not "cheap" but quality.
Following the instructions, I had these paired with my LG-G8 in a minute, and started listening to my audiobook... My phone asked me to choose Stereo or HD sound... nice that these support either.
The sound is crisp, they stay connected, no dropping...
I've used them all day, off and on, and the battery life is excellent!
I'm very happy with the purchase. I'm looking at the white ones for my wife.

title: 10/10 would jam with again....and again
body:
This are wonderful! Very clear and bumpin! I use them to run, walk my dog, and to dance around the house! I use them also to listen to audible books and while listening to The Fellowship of the Ring, I fell asleep and the headphones stayed in! The battery life only lasts like 3-4 hours but I mean these are meant to be used for workouts and taking audible book naps🤷🏻‍♀️ So the battery life is the perfect amount!
But seriously though, 10/10, they’re great I love them and I have been jamming so hard🤘🏼

title: Great customer service
body:
Update: tozo sent me a new pair of earbuds. A+ customer service.

The earbuds weren't horrible, but the charging case stopped charging after 3 month. Unfortunately I used up the last of the juice on the earbuds today and the return window has closed. I cannot recommend these to anyone as once the case stops working the earbuds are useless.

title: Awesome sound and comfortable
body: These wireless ear buds have been beyond wonderful! Initially I was concerned that they would fall out or that they wouldn’t sound nearly as good as my Apple ear buds but I was was wrong. They sound amazing, cancel out all the train noise of my commute and fit perfect. Great choice!

title: Worse earbuds ever
body: I work remotely with folks daily and have tested dozens of earbuds over the years.  The pass or fail is very quick.  With this new product, I really wanted them to work, and probably kept them too long.  They drop signal, people can't hear you well, sound quality is poor.  They are bulky compared to other earbuds and frankly ugly.  Its like having a black bolt sticking out of your ear.  I finally text Amazon support late one night so frustrated that they gave me a refund.  I don't know who these folks are that are giving good ratings, but this product is crap.  I took my refund and bought a pair of  Alterola IE800 Bluetooth 5.0, which I've had for two months and have given them a review rating of 4.5.  They are excellent and look good.  I hope this review saves at least one person the frustration I went thru.

title: Problems with charging solved by customer services
body: The product is really good for all it says it will do. However, since I got the earbuds, I have struggled with charging the left  one. I put the earbud at the position and it does not charge at all. After exchanging some e-mails with customer services, I finally have the ear buds working properly. It is a great product and I recommend it to whoever wants a small earbud for running or biking.

title: Excellent Sound.  Super Convienent.
body: I love the sound quality these earbuds have.  They put out quality sound with good bass tones, as long as you're wearing both earbuds.  They're not "Beats," but at this price there's no doubt that their quality is good.  The compact charging case is also super convenient to slip into my jacket pocket to take with me on-the-go.  These are perfect for days at the gym, working outdoors, or for those days at work when I have the opportunity to listen to my own music.  Add in the ability to take a phone call without having to remove them, and they're even better.

title: Great Ear Buds
body: I bought these as a replacement for my headset that broke and I was going to buy a new headset but WOW these little earbuds are great.  They have great sound and I love how they fit so great in my ear.  At the price that I got these for it is a DEAL.  I do not need to buy a headset anymore.  These earbuds are great.  I can hear very very clear.

title: Perfect AirPod replacement - updated 1 month in.
body:
I loved my AirPods - but they would not stay in my ears.  The TOZO 10’s are turning out to be fantastic.  Easy pair (just like AirPods) sounds great and work wonderful on phone calls.  I’m very happy.  And they fit great - that is the cherry on top.

Update - 1 month in and still love the Tozo’s - but I have noticed that people have a hard time hearing me on phone calls - or the quality is not always good.  I emailed support - I got a response back in 24 hours and they are shipping a replacement set ASAP!  Great support.  Thank you.

title: Convenient and Cost Effective!
body: These earbuds are very convenient and easy to use. The sound quality is pretty amazing considering the low cost. They fit in the ear nicely and truly do diminish exterior noise. I was skeptical to "cut the cord" on my headphones as to not affect the music quality but these earbuds perform great!

title: Awesome product
body: I really was concerned about this product but i got to say it dose the job good sound quality and the people on the other side can hear me perfect

title: Such a great purchase
body: I bought these as a gift for my boyfriend. He has tried other wireless headphones but never loved any of them. He was apprehensive about trying these because he’s had a few failed attempts with other brands. Of course I insisted he try them out during his workout today. He called me immediately and told me how amazing they were! He said he couldn’t even feel them in his ears, they stayed in even while jumping rope, and the sound quality was amazing. He’s been using them nonstop.

title: Battery life is terrible
body: I had 2 of these units returned because the battery life is just terrible. In addition to earbuds, the charging case doesn't provide enough charge and does not provide playing time as advertised. I really like this product: the sound quality was decent, the fit was good and the design is nice; but because its battery won't last long I just couldn't justify $50.

title: As advertised, good product!
body: I am completely satisfied with this product! The more I've used them, the more happy I am with them! I had an issue with them getting wet in the rain and they stopped working, and TOZO warranty service made it right quickly. Great product, great service!

title: Excellent quality and price
body: Since upgrading my phone, I have been looking for wireless headphones. I was initially worried because I wasn't sure if these would be comfortable or have good sound quality. However, after purchasing them, I can confirm that they fit very well and the sound quality is incredible. It would have been nice if the battery life lasted a little longer, but thankfully I work in an office and can easily charge the headphones when they are low on power.

title: Good Product
body: These headphones fulfilled my expectations. The fact that they come with three different sizes of covers was really appreciated since that style of headphones doesn’t usually fit me. They came in a charging case which is always nice to keep them in. My biggest complaint about my previous Bluetooth headphones was that they were always being pulled out of my ears when I turned my head. These stay in my ears even when I turn my head. They are also water resistant, and have good sound quality. I have also been really impressed how long the battery lasts. Overall a good product.

title: Good for listening, not so much for phone calls.
body:
Sound quality is great.  I've heard bits of songs that I've never heard using just earbuds.  Waterproofing is good, I wear them in the shower without any problems.  I did get complaints about the sound quality when making phone calls, so back to my airpods or headset for that, but will use them other than that.

Only other complaint is the controls aren't customizable.  I was hoping to be able to access siri, but the functions are static.

title: I LOVE! LOVE! LOVE these!
body: So far I love everything about these earphones. I have had multiple kinds of wireless headphones and am always getting the wires hung on everything. These are so comfortable, they stay in my ears well. The sound quality is fantastic. I haven’t tried them in the shower yet, but will do that soon. I will be ordering more to give for gifts. They are wonderful!! They pair easily to my phone and IPad. Noise cancellation is great. They are comfortable to wear also. I have small ears, so the small bud that comes with works very well for me. My 27 year old son LOVES to sing in the shower, I am going to buy him a pair of these for Christmas, he will love them as much as I do.

title: GREAT CUSTOMER SUPPORT AND SERVICE.
body: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE AND A GREAT PRODUCT. Very easy to use and excellent sound quality.  I have 3 sets, one for the RV and one for the car and one for home. Thanks for a great product. LL

title: Good for the moment
body: After using these everyday for 2 months I’m disappointed in the longevity of the ear buds. The sound quality is good. I can hear the production very well and distinguish highs/lows. Noise cancellation is great IF you get them all the way in your ears. The ear buds are starting to cut out after only two short months. I haven’t tested them in the water. Battery on lasts 3 hours with constant non-stop (active) use.  Both earbuds have audio at all times, meaning if you take one ear buds out, they both stay on. Great start but needs improvements.

title: What impressed me most is the wonderful customer service and support!
body: I am absolutely shocked at TOZO’s product support and customer service! They are awesome! The first wireless earbuds I bought started to cut out on a regular basis. I didn’t want to return them because the earbuds are light weight and are very comfortable to wear for long periods of time. I called customer service and the gentleman knew all the fix tricks. He was very knowledgeable about this product. It was refreshing! When he could not get them to stop cutting out, he immediately ordered replacement earbuds. I did ship the defective ones back. The replacement earbuds are just as awesome! I love these earbuds not only for the comfort, but the sound quality is top notch! They really do cut noise out as well!

title: Not worth the cheap cost
body:
The quality of these headphones is something that is pretty awesome, in that fifty dollars can get you something that will in theory, do the job. But my concern with these headphones was three decent sized problems.
The headphones themselves are not very comfortable. I have average ears. I have not come across many sets of earbuds or headphones that feel awkward or difficult to wear. These earbuds do not feel good though. They also have a huge problem of sliding out, no matter what position I place them. I attempted the different size inserts, and they also had similar effects. This has not been a problem on other brands. I have since switched to the JBL Free X and they fit without any issues and have thus far been extremely comfortable.

The next issue is the quality. The bass seems to sound very distorted in these ear buds, while the left one specifically has a very tinny quality to the highs. It's jarring and forces me to want to turn the volume down, even when listening at low volumes. Overall, the quality of the audio is mixed, which is odd for something that you would think would be similar between both sides.

And last, the drop out. These earbuds do not stay attached across any of my devices for a constant session. Every few minutes, they will have a few seconds of audio loss and then come back. This is not a case of getting notifications. It's interference or just bad quality. I've used these buds on apple and android products, and none of them can keep these things attached without audio loss.

Overall, they aren't worth the money. I understand they are cheap and the technology is still being innovated. But overall, if they sound different from one ear to another, don't fit well and can't play without feeling like your audio is censoring itself, then they simply aren't worth the money invested in them. I would move on to a different product, probably something a bit more reputable.

title: FINE PRODUCT AT A FINE PRICE POINT!
body: This is a fantastic product! I was looking for an "in-ear' headphone alternative to replace MY customary "over the ear" headphones because I wanted something compact. But truth be told I wasn't a fan of anything that went inside the ear because I had found they always fell out! Well I did my YouTube and Amazon review research and I narrowed it down to the Tozo T10. I am a proud Android phone user (Samsung Note 9) and I didn't want anything that looked like those long white stemmed eye sores, so aesthetically, for me, they were perfect! It turns out that they fit beautifully, they sound AMAZING, the battery life is superb and I could not be more satisfied over a purchase as this! I would recommend these headphones to everyone and anyone! Oh by the way, pairing Bluetooth devices for me is very often hit or miss for me but these pods came about 75% charged out of the box and I'VE NEVER seen a faster pairing out of the box!! I literally took one pod out of the case and before I could pull the other one out, within seconds the pod had already paired! It was amazing! And lastly, the price was economical for an item of this quality! Perfection is hard to come by, so if I have one complaint is that replacing the the rubber tips for a better fit, at least for me, was a difficult task! I don't know if I was creating a more complicated scenario but I found that part to be annoying, but I finally accomplished my mission and if that's the worst I can mention, what are you still doing reading this review!? Go put in your order, I think you will be pleasantly pleased, I know was!

title: Great for riding!
body: I needed a pair of earphones that stuck in my ear for riding long distances 🏍 and these headphones do the trick. They fit in my ear better than AirPods

title: Not for swimming, work well for everyday life
body:
Update:

I believe they really care about customer satisfaction and I appreciate that. The headphones work well and paired well with my samsung galaxy s10 plus. They are comfortable to wear but the only downfall is that they do not work underwater. They are waterproof to a short depth but the sound cuts out immediately because of the bluetooth connection. As an everyday pair of headphones I give them a 4 stat as per swimming..  well they did not serve the purpose at all so it will be a 1 star.

I am very disappointed. Do not buy these... I used them to lap swim once and they completely stopped working. They claim that they will work under water and they won't.

title: Does not stay paired.
body: I like these at first, but now I cannot keep them paired. I have tried deleting the devices from my phone and laptop and repair them. Only 1 will work. Or one will start beeping even though the battery is not low. I am going to throw them away as I am tired of messing with them. It should not be this difficult to keep them synced.

title: Love these!!!
body: Love these ear buds.....They come with different sizes to fit your ears....love them light weight....so clear...great sound love the wireless option with out the huge price tag I definitely recommend!

title: Great headphones!!!
body: These headphones are great, work even better than I expected. Very easy to pair with my phone and easy to operate. I love that they come with four different size ear pieces to choose from since I have small ears. They came very quickly and packaged well so they were in great condition when I received them, I will definitely order from this seller again.

title: Could have been amazing, alas
body: Look, for the price, these are probably the best on the market right now when it comes to wireless earbuds. Unfortunately, a couple of design flaws leave me frustrated. The click controls don’t allow for skipping songs, only pausing and taking calls, which seems a moot point since the mic design is so poor. I’m addition, the little blue and red lights are constantly flashing during use which makes it annoying for night usage.

title: Awesome little bluetooth headphones
body:
These are GREAT little headphones. For years I've owned the bluetooth headphones that have a U shaped bit that goes around your neck, and have always enjoyed them. They stay put and dont weigh a lot, etc.

My last ones broke so after a bit of research, for the money and features, these headphones are awesome. They have 4 full charges in the case itself, the earbuds SOUND great with plenty of bass (find the right fitted ends for the earbuds). I was worried about them falling out of ear but that hasn't been a problem at all! They're very light and stay in there very well, and don't stick out too far.

The only thing I wish these did was allow volume control from the earbuds themselves, you have to control volume from the phone/device. That isn't a huge deal though, I would highly recommend these!

title: Great product, Great sound
body: I use these everyday to jam out while I work out.  They work great!.  Great sound, they are comfortable and stay in my ears.  I love the way they charge when you put them back in the case.  I am very happy with my purchase.

title: One of your best bets for truly wireless earbuds on Amazon under $50
body:
A few things I liked about the product -
1) Earbuds: Quite sturdy with a magnetic case. It has suggestive LEDs for pairing notifications, charging notifications. I've already dropped them twice on gravel and concrete, but not a scratch yet. These were very easy to set up, and the usage is pretty intuitive.
2) Sound: These earbuds are definitely bass-heavy, which suits my usage and music taste.
3) Ergonomics: They fit snugly in my ear, after switching tips. The buttons on the earbuds could have been a bit more tactile; they do feel plasticky and cheap. No complaints though, for this price-point.
4) Case support for wireless charging: Something that even a lot of high-end earbuds lack.

All in all, for lay music purposes, these earbuds do more than enough justice to punch way above its weight. I would highly recommend getting these. Total bang for the buck.

title: for $50, cant beat it.
body:
once I realized I was putting them in my ears upside down, they sound excellent when worn properly! Paired quickly and good range with bluetooth 5.0. Good strong bass, nice clarity in mids/highs. Very comfy to wear for several hours.. Only thing I wish was different the charging port is the older micro USB, wish it was USB-C, but thats a minor deal.
I have not tried the phone mic, and probably wont, so cant say anything as to that.
Excellent value. good build quality, highly recommend!

title: Amazing Earbuds
body: These earbuds are really nice. They really are noise cancelling and they have so much bass.  They have different sized rubber tips for comfort and boy are these comfortable. These have been in my ear almost nonstop since I have gotten them. I love them. I think the only time I removed them was to charge them. I also love the fact that they are water proof. I was able to wear them out in the rain the other day without having to worry they will ruin. If you are looking for an incredible pair of Bluetooth earbuds. You should definitely get these. You cant go wrong.

title: Great buy, worth the money
body: Just got these a week ago so we will see how they continue to do but they sound great and they stay in my ears , they’re very discreet and perfect for my work.

title: Great Headphone have bought twice
body:
I bought these headphones before I went on a trip to Aruba.  It was my first pair that didn't have a cord.  I was skeptical at first but they were VERY comfortable.  So comfortable in fact, that when a strong gust of wind blew-it flew out of my ear.  I didnt realize at first (since they feel like nothing) but when I did realize it was too late and they had gotten run over by a car.
I was sad- I didn't want to pay $50 for a new pair so I went with a cheaper pair from a different brand.  Let me tell you-saving $15 was NOT worth it.
I tried to wear the other pair I bought and they were awful.  So less than a week later I rebought the pair and haven't looked back.
They ate a great set of headphones and I would recommend to anyone

title: Will recommend to a friend.
body: For the price I pay for this product exceeded my expectation.  The earbuds is very easy to connect to my device.  When am out of range it tell me am out and when I walk back in-range it automaticaly re-connected. The sound is great stereo sound with noise cacellation.  Was hoping for a longer battery then 3.5 Hrs. of music listening, that is why I gave it a 4 on battery and everthing else is a 5. The extra 1 year warranty for free is a bonus.

title: Not for exercising!
body: As a runner, cyclist, gym-goer, and walker, I wanted non-wired bluetooth earbuds that would allow me to listen to music on the go (as opposed to making phone calls). In that regard, the Tozo T10-R's are pretty much the worst possible option.  Let's start with the fact that, no matter which of the different earbud sizes I tried, the earbuds quickly and nearly immediately fell out of my ears, over and over. I finally began coating them with sticky hair gel before every workout (good work around but annoying). Even worse, the earbuds have no controls for music volume or changing songs. So if you are running, or riding your bike, or lifting weights, you have to stop whatever you are doing and fish your phone out of your pocket to make any adjustments. Ridiculous. I regret spending $50 on the Tozo T10's and will eventually ditch them once I save up for some new earbuds.

title: Good as the name brand
body: Seems to be as good as the "Other" name brand product for a third the price. Works great ,sounds great and seems to be made very well.

title: Work great for exercise
body: I use these earbuds to listen to music from my Garmin Forerunner watch. They work great. I had to play around a little bit with the different earbud sizes to ensure a good fit. They sound and are a great improvement over my old Bluetooth headphones that would fall out of my ear after one sit up. These Tozo buds are great for exercise. I recommend.

title: Earbuds for elephants. Sizes range from too big to bigger. Ouch!  UPDATE!
body:
Battery life is really short... less than 3 hours. Earbuds are all too big and cause ear canal to start hurting before the short-lived batteries quit. The different sizes of earbuds range from too big to even bigger. They tend to fall out unexpectedly presumably because of the oversized earbuds. Other than these shortcomings the sound is good and so far no problems with showering with them in except for the occasional unexpected pop outs. I’ll update this review in few months to see if they hold up over time.
UPDATE:  Heard from Tozo and they say that they are sending replacement earbuds as well as replacing the units with an updated model which would be great except that it appears they sent them to someone in California.  I told them about the errant addressing problem.  Will update further if the replacements actually get to me.

title: Who needs the big names!
body: I have problems with any earbuds staying in my ears. Now that I have a piercing inside my ear (daith) it makes it even harder to get an earbud to stay in. After some playing and adjusting my earring numerous times. I found with these all I have to do is put it in! It stays put with absolutely no loosening. I wear them when mowing the lawn and I can’t even hear the lawnmower with the volume turned down to 1/4 or lower of their capabilities. I’m typically a volume all the way up blaring out my eardrums kind of person. But with these that is too loud! I can’t believe I just said that! I’m so glad I bought these for a fraction of the cost that I was considering, big name brands around the ear or over the ear styles. If these continue to hold up I’d definitely recommend.

title: Would not buy or recommend.
body: The packaging looks great, and it feels like a solid product when you open it. However, I had a lot of issues with these earbuds. The audio sound was great when it actually worked, but I had issues getting a consistent sound. When my phone was in my pocket the sound cut out a lot. Sometimes I would be stopped at a crosswalk and just turn my head and the audio would cut out and be choppy. The only way I was able to get consistent clear audio was when the phone was out directly in front of me on my desk while I was working. I was not satisfied with this device at all. The Bluetooth connection/range is horrible on this device, and not worth the money at all. I'm not sure why these were Amazon's recommend choice.

title: Still have not received my replacement earbuds
body: I love these ear buds.  I did drop them on Sunday, couldn't get them reconnected.  I contacted TOZO let them know what happened.  I received an email letting me know they would send a replacement.  The sound is awesome, easy to setup and I can listen to my books on tape at work and no one is any the wiser. Would definitely order these again.

title: My Amazing Earbuds!
body: These TOZO earbuds are amazing! The battery on these earbuds lasts over a week which makes it very convenient. The sound quality is stunning while  in use to make calls or to listen to music. The overall fit of these earbuds is incredible. These earbuds come with multiple ear caps to ensure the best fit when wearing the earbuds. You can wear both or simply one and still have a great experience. I highly recommend these earbuds!

title: Crazy lag and low sound quality
body:
I bought these because the headphone jack on my laptop is getting a little touchy, and I thought it would be neat to have totally wireless earbuds. These are that, and they have a great fit. Battery is decent for these class of headphones, and the charger is nice. Pairing was easy, and I like that it can pair two devices.

Unfortunately, that's where my good experience ended. The audio lag on these with both computers I tested these on was absolutely awful--about .5-1 second. It was completely unusable for anything other than music due to this lag.

I decided with that in mind I'd take them to work and pair them with my phone to just listen to music while I code. Turns out the sound quality is also fairly bad, somewhat tinny and empty, especially compared to my other $50 wired earbuds. I get that there's a big tradeoff here for wireless, but at this point that tradeoff is just too big for me. I'd rather deal with the wires and even with the slightly loose headphone jack.

title: Excellent value
body:
The earbuds case is solid with a translucent hinged top so you can see the charging status lights. They turn on and off easily by removing and returning them to the case and there's a solid click when you return them to the case. The best feature is that they can be recharged wirelessly. I've successfully charged them wirelessly on both my round 'hot plate' and vertical 'easel' style chargers. There's a wired USB micro charging port as well.

The 8mm driver provides very good sound for the price. I'm sure everyone knows the sound quality is dependent on the fit and experimenting with the supplied ear covers is critical; there are several and I easily found the right ones for my ear size. I found them comfortable too. The bass is subtle but overall, the sound is acceptable. I haven't tried using them for phone calls.

Pairing is easy and automatic (after the first time). Remove the ear buds from the case and they pair with other and within seconds they pair with your device. Return them to the case and they disconnect and power down.

There are no controls on these earbuds which I knew when I ordered them. You use your device volume control and application controls. This is fine but I discovered, for me, I like the convenience of a volume level control and pause/play in my earbuds.

So very nice case, good sound, wireless charging, easy pairing, but no controls make this a good choice for the excellent price.

title: This is the BEST purchase I've made in years.
body: The ear buds have freed up my ability to listen to audio books while I work and Drive.  They also handle cellphone calls with a built in microphone. The sound quality is perfect. One reviewer mentioned blue light blinking in a dark room - yes that happens so just close your eyes or cover your ear buds.  NOT A PROBLEM. There is a reason that these were an Amazon Prime Favorite... which is one reason I bought them.  Amazon has great quality controls and recommendations.  I would buy these again.

title: Awful usability - Please consider before purchasing
body:
Usability from just my one case (2-month experience with 3-minute round trip commute 3-5 days/week:
(1) Bluetooth connectivity leaves much to be desired. Expect minutes for completion of successful connectivity (both left and right ear components actually “connected”)
(2) Sighed in mental relief, rather than, OH, NO when one earbud fell into subway tracks
(3) Battery life = subpar @ best compared to competing non-Apple choices (as of 2019)

- Female, 34.5 y/o, not a tech equipment expert by any means. Just someone who feels guilty throwing out a gift from boyfriend’s family

title: Great sound quality, but..
body: Overall, it's a good product.  One thing that I do not like is the fact that I cannot easily skip songs or answer a call (I'm comparing to my previous LG headset).  The sound is really good, better than my LG model.  The pods are larger than I had expected and they stick out of my ear's quite a bit.  The microphone has some issues that I do not like.  Maybe it's because of the noise cancelling aspect, but it seems like I have to nearly yell to talk on the phone.  I found this quite uncomfortable especially in public area's.  Again, I'm comparing to my LG set, maybe that's how these ear buds are in general.  The privacy aspect and requirement of increased voice to make/answer a call is the main reason for my star rating.

title: Cheap earphones
body: I’ve been using for a couple hours, most days since receiving these headphones. The battery life is already extremely diminished. In addition, often times one or both cut out as if they aren’t getting signal anymore. My third issue is that recently one of the buds fell out of my ear while I was sitting and listening to music. Unfortunately the rubber part stayed stuck in my ear and i had to get assistance to remove it from my ear. Not pleased with these to say the least.

title: Happily Surprised
body: Received the TOZO T10 TWS Bluetooth 5.0 Earbuds for Christmas and so far I have been happily surprised at how great they work.  I like the compact size and charging case. My only compliant is that the bluetooth signal doesn't extend as far as I would like.  I usually use them with my Ipad and if I walk more than 10 feet away they disconnect.  I do really really like how easy they connect to my devices and each other.  I returned another brand I bought because it was such a pain to connect the earbuds to each other!  I could only get one to work at a time. It was so irritating.  With these I just take them out of the case, select them on my device and they simply connect themselves.  They are great pair of earbuds for the price!

title: Surprised.
body: It arrived very nicely packed in its case. Charging very easy. Only have been using it for 3 days but love how it is compact and stored in own case. Sound is just like my over the ear wired ear buds. So far works very well while sweating. May get another pair of all ok after 1 month.

title: Paired with my AppleWatch make great set-up for mowing, yardwork or the gym
body: I've had these for about 4 months.  So far they have worked well.  I paired with my Apple Watch and have enjoyed music and podcasts while mowing and at the gym.  Nice not to have to haul the phone everywhere.  They do pretty well for noise cancellation, as I was using them while using a chainsaw.  Haven't submerged them, but they seem to tolerate getting sweaty OK.  They have a decent battery life and charge pretty quickly

title: AFFORDABLE! Awesome quality and great sound!
body: I recommend these airbuds, because they are inexpensive and well worth the price. They are extremely easy to pair, not difficult or too techy to understand how to work them. When I wear them at the gym the outside sounds do not bother me, you can hear the music. I use them when I clean my home, when I vacuum I can't even hear the machine. You can change the size of the rubber bud so you shouldn't have a problem fitting your ears. So far this was worth the cost instead of paying $200 for higher AirPods. Great Job!

title: Sound is muddy, bass heavy - wouldn’t stay in ears
body: Heavy and muddy bass. Highs lack definition. Listened to these for about 2 minute and returned them. Bebens are very similar in sound. Prefer the Kissral Bluetooth headphones. Much better sound. Also I could not get these to stay in my ears while walking no matter what size earbuds covers I used. Disappointed.

title: Quality product, great sound, amazing support.
body: These earbuds fit so great. I can’t hardly tell they are in, and aren’t heavy at all. Provide great sound. And I love the case also charges the earbuds. It’s everything I wanted in wireless earbuds. And they don’t look cheap like those apple equivalents. Quality product.

title: So far so good.
body: Just got my TOZO T10 bluetooth earbuds and so far they are awesome. Very user friendly. Just pop them out of the case wait til the both light up and then connect to Bluetooth and your off. So far they seem to stick in my ears snugly and comfortably. I bought them to listen to music while at the driving range since cords just got too uncomfortable you use and being sweaty the normal earbuds fall out. These work perfectly for what I need them for. Haven’t tested battery life out just yet but 3-3.5 in the buds plus a backup of 9 hrs should be plenty of life for what I need them for.

title: Highly water resistant.....not waterproof!
body: Love these new earbuds with several brands and styles which I have purchased, these are the best all around.  They fill my ear well, have good sound, and adore the water resistant nature of these earbuds.  I have, as noted, many pairs from other mfgs on Amazon.  I work out daily, run, lift, and swim.  As part of that workout, I hit the Steam room, and jacuzzi and easily dunk my head in the pool or jacuzzi without any troubles.  Of course Bluetooth cannot transmit in water, however, as soon as your ears are clear of the water, sound picks right back up.  An important note is that if you drop it in the water to a depth of 3 feet or so...you are likely to have troubles.  The right earbud is the most likely to have troubles it seems after water at depth.  The first pair I dried in salt/rice for a day or so and it was still dead.  Then the second pair, after drying out, has recovered and is working fine.  Get them wet...no Problem, drop them in 3 feet of water for 20 seconds...likely dead.

title: Awesome Performance and Excellent Quality
body:
The TOZO T10 wireless earbuds design, clarity of sound, Noice cancellation and performance is excellent.
These earbuds perfectly fit the ear. I will appreciate the noise cancellation and clarity of voice.
It is suitable for everyone.

title: Having issues with these working as a pair. But did get a replacement
body:
Mine stopped working after 2 days. They would not connect as a pair and only as individual bluetooth devices. I tried all types of resets and then reached out to seller and tried their instructions to no avail.

The seller offered to send me a replacement after placing a review. Awaiting to see what the result is of that.

Edit: The seller sent me a new pair and they do seem to be without issues so far. So I am upping the review.

title: YESSSSSSSS. THESE ARE THE ONES.
body:
THESE. ARE. AMAZING!!!!!!
If you need headphones, please get these. The quality is really quite great. Ease of use is fantastic. Noise cancellation is great. So so excited about these headphones. I was pleasantly surprised that they are magnetically pulled towards the case as you are trying to put them in the case so they just pop right in their spot.  I am getting a pair for my husband as I can already tell we will be fighting over these.  Money well spent!!!

title: would be great if they stayed in my ears!
body: These paired well and sound quality was good, but they kept falling out! I switched up the earpieces and it still happened when I was walking around places. Would definitely not recommend for running/intense workouts, but I was a fan of a lot of other things, especially the fact that you could charge the case wirelessly.

title: Great Quality for the Price
body: The earbuds worked this weekend at the pool.  The sound was good and they are easy to pair and control.  I liked the way they fit and that they come with different sized ends for the best comfort.  I will be buy more as gifts come Christmas!

title: Good for the price
body:
Sound is good. Not awesome, not poor. Decent bass, not very high definition. I don't feel any noise canceling different than just the hermetic fit on the ear.
Battery life better than I expected. I usually get tired of wearing them earlier than when the battery dies out.
Light and discrete.
A very importan con: Two ore three days after the purchase, the company e-mailed me asking for a 5 star review and in return they would provide an extra charging base. To me the product is very good for the price, but this is a commercialization approach that should be banned by amazon. It is disrespectful and dishonest. This creates false positives reviews, and in the long term make the costumer not trust in the reviews. Maybe the rates this one have is already untrue and I had bought another brand.

title: These earbuds are surprisingly good
body:
I have been testing out many headphones/ear pieces over these past few years commuting to work in the DC/Virginia area. I have about an hour commute each way and usually am listening to an audiobook, or enjoying some music as therapy for the gnarly traffic and the crazy drivers that get your blood pumping.
Bluetooth wireless earpieces are a must now with the audio port gone from the iPhones. My experience has been that connecting up the phones is not always easy. The TOZO T10 ear pieces seem to connect with ease-- only one ear piece needs connection and the other will join in with ease. Good on TOZO.
The real pleasant surprise is when the music comes. Right out of the box, it seems the ear pieces are made for music. There is enough noise dampening to filter out the background noise and you feel like you have been transported to a world where every note can be heard. For driving, the ear pieces are snug enough to ensure the audiobooks can be heard but I can still hear enough traffic around me (in case of emergency vehicles coming).
Looking forward to more time with these ear pieces.

title: Better second experience
body:
UPDATE: Since I had a serious problem with my initial pair of these earbuds, the manufacturer quickly sent me a replacement set that did not have the battery problem of my first set. In the interim, I acquired a different set of similar earbuds from a different manufacturer. As a result, I have what I didn't have the first time I wrote about these: a basis for comparison. My overall experience is that although I don't own a perfect set of waterproof Bluetooth earbuds, this one is much more reliable.

THE GOOD
- I'm not an audiophile, but the audio quality is much better than any previous headphones I've owned.
- They do a good job of blocking ambient noise.
- The clicky nature of the buttons means you can stick them in your pocket without accidentally setting off the controls.
- Due to the clicky buttons, they're easy to turn on and off.
- Battery is generally decent. The charging case discharges a little faster than I'd like - it went from full to low over the course of a weekend when I used the earbuds very little - but this isn't a big problem since it's easy to charge them.
- They fit in my ear pretty snugly.

THE LESS-GOOD
- Some of the controls are nonsensical. When I'm listening to music, why would I want a double-tap on either headphone to redial the last phone number called? The instructions mostly only cover phone-related activities. There are no instructions for skipping forward and back a song, or for adjusting volume.
- The headphones pair to each other well, but having to manually pair them to my phone every! Single! Time! is very annoying.

THE NEUTRAL:
- From the different pairs of Bluetooth headphones I own, I get the sense that occasional mild interference from nearby devices may just come with the territory.
- Although the instructions aren't ideal, there's some important information there: only pair the right earbud with your phone; never the left. Pairing them both causes weird behavior. Completely deleting the connections and re-pairing them makes the weird behavior stop.

Since I've owned both sets of earbuds, I've switched back and forth testing each set. The last time I knew I'd be away from my house for an extended period of time, the TOZO earbuds are the ones I chose to take with me because they're just more reliable. Overall, this is a fairly decent set of this style of earbud.
-----------------

ORIGINAL REVIEW: My experience with these just went from mixed-but-largely-positive to negative. The set I purchased worked well until they became unusable.

I was lured in by the seemingly overwhelmingly positive reviews., and up until yesterday, I was mostly satisfied with them. The sound quality was good and they did a better-than-average job of blocking ambient noise. The buds usually pair to each other well, but it's annoying that I have to go into the Bluetooth menu on my iPhone to actively pair them every single time I use them. Is this standard for for type of earbud?

I've experienced a little of some of the other complaints I've seen here: I've had a couple of instances of the buds not pairing to one another well in the first few days, but the problem stopped after a few days. I also once experienced the audio cutting in and out when I was around other people, but this did not happen regularly.

The big, dealbreaking problem - and why I'll be returning them - is the battery on the earbuds. I'm in the habit of leaving the charger plugged in most of the time, and putting the earbuds back in the charger when I'm not using them. Yesterday, after I used them for 30 minutes in the morning, I  put them in the charger, which was plugged into USB at my workplace. After eight hours, I took the earbuds out of the charger, started using them, and left work. Within FIVE MINUTES, the right earbud began signaling low battery, and shut itself off after a couple of minutes of warnings. Again, they had been in the charger for a solid eight hours. Neither earbud's "charging" light was lit, so I had no reason to believe they didn't have a full charge. The charger itself showed a full charge. I just tried them again - they'd been shut off since - and the right earbud reported low battery after two minutes. I accidentally left the charger at work, so I guess I'll find out on Monday whether this was an aberration, or if the right earbud's capacity for a charge has been permanently reduced to a few minutes.

Let me be clear: I used these earbuds for less than two weeks before this problem, which renders the earbuds useless, occurred.

Although I've read a few reviews here that indicate I'm not the only person who has had this problem, it doesn't appear to be as common as, say, audio cutting out or problems pairing the left earbud. My guess is that this set is defective, but after reading other negative reviews here on Amazon - seemingly buried under a suspicious number of five-star reviews - I'm not going to seek a replacement because it looks too likely it would instead have a different set of the more common problems.

title: Great sound for the price!
body: These earbuds have a great sound. Good bass, crisp and clear. They easily pair automatically when you take them out of the charging case. The previous earbuds I had were always a pain to pair.

title: Earbuds need to remain within 3 feet of the device.
body: Not crazy about these ear buds. They drop connection constantly. You literally have to have both ear buds within 3 feet of the device that's casting the bluetooth signal. Simply turning your head or touching the ear buds with your hand will cause the ear buds to loose connection. When the connection is okay, the sound quality and noise cancellation is awesome. It's just annoying having the keep a direct line of sight and your head really close to the casting device.

title: LIBRA FROM MEMPHIS, TN YOU GO TOZO T10!!
body: I not  only like TOZO T10, I LOVE MY WIRELESS EARBUDS. I  HAVE HAD  A NUMBER OF CO WORKERS TO ASK ABOUT THEM. IT WAS VERY EASY TO PAIR THEM. THEY ALREADY HAD SOME CHARGE TO THEM WHEN I GOT THEM. MY PLANS ARE TO BUT 2 MORE PAIR. THEY ARE BETTER THAN THE MAJOR COMPETITION OUT THERE. WHAT  A GREAT PRODUCT!

title: Very Difficult Decision to Return These
body:
These are really nice Earbuds.  Everything they say is true.  A free 1 year warranty.  The product build is exceptional, as is the packaging in which they are shipped.  And they connected to my I-phone so quickly it was actually a non event. So, it was a very difficult decision when I decided to return them.
I originally purchased and compared two sets of earbuds and this set of earbuds was superior to the other in all categories except one.  The sound.  And it was extremely close even in that category but, in the final analysis, I realized the quality of sound was the most important feature so I eliminated all others from my decision and the OFUSHO earbuds were the winner by a very small margin.  They are also a little less expensive but, again, I did not include that in my final decision.  If, like me, the sound quality of your earbuds is paramount, assuming all other features are acceptable, then choose the OFUSHO.  But, I really believe most people would prefer the exceptional features and quality build of these ear buds.  The quality of sound difference is truly marginal but enough for me to make my decision and the longer battery life is just a perk.

title: Can not wait for an upgraded version.
body: I have these earbuds now for about one week. The sound is excellent and the noise cancellation is outstanding. The battery life not so good because it only provides a three hours charge. The price is unbeatable for what you get. Other earbuds battery would last longer but would also cost triple or more and you may not get the same sound that you get with this set. Overall, this is a good buy and I am sure they will find a way to increase the battery life to their upgraded product.

title: Best True Wireless Earbuds for Students!
body: Where to start... These earbuds blew me away. Though the bass could be somewhat overpowering at times to the point where the lows flood out the highs, the sound on these are incredible for the price point. The build of both the earbuds and the case are phenomenal - no complaints there. The charging case helps so that your earbuds stay 100% all day long. I've been able to take these from my 8AM classes all the way to my workouts at night on ONE CHARGE ALONE. All I can say is that these are a must buy.

title: Great sound but some connection issue with left bud.
body: The sound quality is great when it works. Every so often, the left side has a connectivity issue and fades in and out (when pairing with phone, its the right side that pairs whule the left side is tethered). The noise cancelling feature works and the earpieces hold tight in ear when inserted correctly.  I'd give 5 stars if the left bud would have a constant connection and not fade in and out.

title: THESE ARE AMAZING!! ❤️
body:
I went for a run yesterday after I received these headphones in the mail. So I could test them out.
I absolutely love them!!! They sound and quality was amazing. They stayed in my ears and as I was sweating there were no problems what so ever!
I have an iPhone XS Max and these work perfect with it! I would highly recommend!

title: Love these things!
body: Decided to give these a try and I am happy I did. These earbuds sound great with incredible bass. The fit in the ear canal is perfect. They are not loose when I am at the gym. I also love how the charging works when you place them in the case and you can either use the attached cord to plug them in or if you have a charging pad you can just place them on top and walk away. For the money you can't beat them in my opinion. Best earbud purchase to date!

title: So Glad I Purchased These Earbuds!!
body: I was nervous about the quality of these earbuds when I decided to buy them because they cost a lot less than the earbuds made by the brands I recognized. I went ahead and made the purchase because I knew I could return them if they weren't what I wanted.  I am so glad I made the decision to try them. I absolutely love them!! The set up was simple and they are very easy to use. I have been using them every day since the day I got them to listen to music and audiobooks and for calls. The sound quality is great.  Noise cancellation works very well. And, they charge very easily. I  highly recommend them!

title: good value for what you get
body: bought these for my son.  sound quality is great for the price.  battery life is solid.  carrying case is a little big but can place in pockets relatively easily.

title: TOTALLY WOTH IT!
body:
It's incredible the quality of the product for the price you pay. I have a pair of jaybird run ( that I bougth for over 200$ a year ago), but unfortunately I lost the charging case so I couldn't use them unless I buy the case which was 70$ and out of stock, reason why I decided to look for some earbuds and I decided to give this pair of 50$ a shot. What an amazin idea I had! This pair totally overcome my expectatives and made me really happy with the product in question
5 STARS!

title: junk
body: first of all they won't even stay in the ear,I think of you use Crazy Glue there would still fall out,the sound quality isn't that great anyway

title: After a Month of Use
body:
After a month of use, I can confidently recommend this product. I wasn’t sure when I was first on the search for a wireless earbud. I found this one and decided to test it for a bit before writing a review on it, just in case it didn’t hold up over time.
I’m glad to say it is a really great product. The sound quality is fantastic and it blocks out most noises while i work out at the gym.
They also stay in my ear when I run, unlike my last pair of earbuds.
I worries whether they would be uncomfortable in my ear, but with the different sized ear pads, I found the right pair that felt comfortable.
The only con I have is the size of the charging case. It’s rather large. Large enough that it doesn’t fit in a pocket comfortably, and looks too odd to carry around.

title: Very good headphones
