The microphone on these for calls isn't so great. I find myself having to raise my voice and almost yelling so the caller on the other end can hear me. I'm a truck driver so that's kind of a big issue for me. But if your just looking for truly wireless headphones for music these will do just fine.

title: Good product,
body: Pretty good product. They fit well in my ears and are small enough that they do not fall out while cross training or running. Connectivity was easy too. I actually bought a second pair for my brother!

title: Is it worth it?
body:
When I first got it, I thought the product was wonderful because I wanted to be optimistic about it since it was the first time I ever spent so much money on headphones. However, after a few days I noticed quite a few things about these earbuds.

They are not made for small ears (even if you change the silicone buds to the smallest size they have): It was very uncomfortable to wear and it did not fit comfortably in my ears. I think it's b/c my ears are so small (even though I'm sure it's normal size), but still it's good to be warned. I could not keep them in long, it was uncomfortable to sleep with and it kept heating up in my ears.

Battery life is not that long: I had to keep charging the earbud every hour even though the description said it would last 3 hours. The box that charges it lasts a while though, so that's a good thing and it doesn't take too long to charge for both.

Has limited capabilities: You can only press the button for play/pause and answer/end call. I don't think it says anywhere in the description about what it does exactly but I had the impression it could skip a song, turn up/down the volume, and have a great microphone (people can barely hear me when I call them).

The connection is not great: If you turn a certain way one of them cuts off continuously. It's usually the one with just a blue blinking dot. It does a little better at long distance but for some reason it can cut itself off or sound like static even when your not far from the connected devive.

Good things: The sound quality is great. It is noise canceling but I bought earphones that could do the same thing that were cheaper ($11). It has portable charging station that you don't have to charge too often. I'm not sure if it's waterproof since I've never tried it out.

Overall, I don't think it's worth the price you pay for it if it doesn't do it's most important function which is play sound (as I've said before it cuts on and off) so I am sending it back right away. If you can handle all of the things wrong with it then try it out for few days to see how it is.

title: Completely Blown Away!
body:
I'll be completely honest: I did not expect anything amazing from these earbuds. In fact, I was entirely prepared to receive them, use them for a day, and send them back due to poor quality.

I was happily mistaken.

The Pros: Right out of the box, these earbuds looked impressive. The housings on each earpiece have a matte, somewhat tacky (in terms of texture), black finish that feels really nice. Each earbud feels light yet sturdy. There are 4 included rubber earpieces included (the medium size is attached by default). The earbuds pair automatically when taken out of the housing. The sound on these is incredible! When situated properly in the ear, these things pump out a decent layer of bass and produce a surprising clear range of mids and highs! The buds pair automatically when removed from the case, and I have yet to experience any static while listening. They also have an excellent range, and you can even keep them on while you take a shower/bath! The most satisfying part of this purchase was the $31 price tag. I'm struggling to include all of the positive aspects of these earbuds in one review!

The Cons: I'm not sure I can think of any at the moment! My only gripe would be that the earbuds don't remain completely in the ear when you start to move around, particularly while running/dancing. When this happens, the sound quality is noticeably reduced (since they start to fall out).

Pictured are the XL, L and S earpieces (in that order) as well as all included accessories. The M earpieces are attached to the earbuds.

*Note: I have yet to really test the limits of the battery life on these. I will update my review at a later date.

title: Air Pod Status
body: After reading all the reviews and noticing the 5 star ratings i was convinced into buying myself a pair of these earbuds and for a very good price too. The storage case it comes with is very nice and also a nice feature is once removed from the case (If gonna use) they automatically connect to your phone and once put into the case they disconnect and shutoff. the fit of the earbuds is not perfect for me cuz the outer earbud rubs against my ear which causes discomfort after more than a continuous hour of use but i use one and switch earbuds to keep comfortable but other than that great earbuds that alone block out sound and once the music plays it’s all YOU.

title: Pretty impressed for the price!
body:
I bought these a month ago, so I wanted to try these out in a number of ways.  I'll address certain categories for this review: sound quality, range, battery life, comfort/fit, and ease of use.

Sound Quality
I'm very impressed with the sound quality, especially after trying out different settings in my iPhone's equalizer settings. I've found that "Small speaker" is the best overall mix for my ears.  The default setting was, to me at least, too strong on the treble and mid range, which washed out the bass and sounded a little bit annoying. But now the bass is about 90% as good as my Sony corded cordless earbuds. Try out a song like Jamie Liddell's "A Little Bit More" or Billie Eilish's "Bury a Friend" to test the depth of bass possible.

Range
I tested this aspect indoors, so it's probably different outside. It's kind of good news/bad news here.  Good news: with a clear line of sight to the streaming device (my phone in this case), I had a range of about 90 feet/27 meters. I did this by putting the phone on a bench on the side of an indoor walking track/basketball court.  I walked around the track and it held the signal 99% of the time. There were two interruptions, each lasting about .25 seconds that I can't figure out - they happened in different spots on the track, one near the phone and one far.

In the weight room (where I usually use these), I could set my phone down anywhere and walk around the rest of the room without loss of signal UNLESS I went around a corner (the bad news).  You really need line of sight for these to work consistently; any barrier or corner (even partially around a corner) and you'll get big cut outs and signal loss. It never completely lost connection, however, because I came back around the corner and it was fine again.

Battery life
I don't really know the run time of these because I use them for about 1-1.5 hours then put them back in their case, which charges them.  The case is nice: it's all black, and you can see through the lid to see the charging indicator.  As soon as you pick them up out of the case, they are on, connected, and ready to go. I charge the case (via micro USB cable) about once a week.

Comfort/fit
There are several different size ear cushions included, and it's really important that you try them all, even if you think you know which one is best.  Once I found the right size cushions, they fit great.  I've played basketball with them in and they stay just fine.  You put it in your ear in a vertical position, then twist them down to settle into your ear (see pics).  I can wear them about 1.5 hrs before they start to become uncomfortable.  I might still have to try different cushion sizes. Comfort and fit are adequate, but not great.

Ease of use
Good news/bad news again.  The good news is that once they are paired to your phone/device (which was easy to do: take them out of the charging case, go to your bluetooth menu, and select the earbud that has the "R" designation (both L and R will appear on your bluetooth list, but the L is a slave to the R so you only pair with the R).

I don't care for the button on these. You press it to pause the audio, but it also pushes it further into your ear when you do (you have to press hard to make the button click, no doubt a feature designed to prevent accidental button presses), which makes it uncomfortable.  Also, when I pressed the button, it did pause, but I couldn't unpause it. I had to use my phone to unpause, and even then a time or two I had to re-pair them to start the music again.

The charging case is nice: besides the see-through lid, the magnetic connection is snappy and good enough to keep them in place.  You know when they're properly seated by the sound of the magnetic click and the red light that then appears on each bud.

The only feature I haven't really tested (aside from sweating on them) is their waterproof-ness.

Overall, I like them, especially for the price point. You have to try different size ear cushions and different audio settings to get the best fit and sound, but they sound really good to me, a former user of Sony earbuds. At this point I would not hesitate to recommend them considering the review I just wrote.

title: What an awesome set for the price can't beat them
body: These buds are amazing. They sound better than the LG wireless headsets that I have had in the past. So far I am impressed with them and have had no issues.  The only thing that make even better is having a multiple assortment of the ear bud pieces for different size ear lobes. I Already have a bunch if my co workers looking at buying a set and I will be buying another set soon.

title: These are really great bluetooth earbuds and actually fit my ears!
body: I've tried two different brands on amazon and these actually have great sound and fit in my ears. I could never fit those Apple airpods they fell right out, these have different size covers, the standard works great. I also love that you can wear them in the shower and you can play and pause music and answer the phone. Very worth it for the price, I love them. The sounds quality is great too, love them!

title: Great product with super customer service!
body: This product works as advertised!.  Easy to pair and great sound.  I especially like the waterproof feature so sweat is not a factor during workouts.  Had a problem with RH bud and they shipped a replacement without having to return the defect.  I would recommend this product to anyone.

title: Tozo T10 Wireless Ear Buds
body: Love the quality and so easy to pair to my Amazon Fire Tablet, only issue was could not open the back to recharge so had to buy a new charging dock to take care of recharging.

title: Great ear buds( my first)
body: This is my first ear buds and I always think of getting one but concerned about how it hold s during running or playing sports. This one are really good. No problem with running with them . stays pretty sturdy in ears. Not happy that I paid 49.99 and in a week they are selling for 29.99. …..Great product and service tho. Will by another one if needed.

title: GREAT SOUND, BETTER DESIGN AND ITS CHEAPER.
body:
Got this product only now and found it truly amazing in sound quality and in looks. And its cheaper compared to other high-end product.

Bought Bose Soundsport Wireless last weekend but ended returning it the same day at Frys. No doubt, the sounds are great in Bose but itmade me look like a human version of Shrek. Looks so bulky in my ears.

This one is cheaper, got better sounds, designs are way better and since I just got it, I am giving the battery life a 3 star, which to me is neutral.

You won't regret this product.

title: Very great product!
body: Overall excellent product! These also work great in the shower. The only thing I would have liked to see is the ability to have just one active at a time if desired. I use one earbud often for specific reasons, and I have to place a small piece of paper under the connectors in the case to keep the earbud I’m not using from turning off. This keeps the second earbud-disconnected-beep from repeating in the earbud I’m using. This is probably a highly uncommon situation, but thought I’d share it regardless. Again, these are an excellent product and I’m very please with them.

title: These fit In my holes so well, especially when wet!
body: These are awesome! They really cut down on external noise if you have them inserted correctly. Still allows a little noise to get through but as good as any others I’ve used. The battery last for 3 charges as advertised, the bud itself last around an hour and a half per charge.  Have gotten them wet twice with no issues. So far so good!!

title: T10 earbuds great choice
body:
The have a very good sound quality. Bass is decent for their size. They sync up to each other every time you take them out of the charger and it only takes a second. Nothing for you to do, it happens automatically.

Once paired to your phone, they will connect to it automatically whenever you take the right earbud out of the  charger.  This also happens quickly.

The bus and case feel much more expensive than they are. The lid of the charger is magnetic and closes with such a satisfying sound I find myself constantly snapping it open and closed in my hoodie pocket. You'll see what I mean. Like closing a Motorola razor flip phone if you remember those.

I've only made one phone call on them, and the person on the other end couldn't hear me very well but I could hear her. Not perfect but doable.

I cant comment on staying in during athletic activity. I wear them at work under other hearing protection.

The tozo charger does accept a charge from my Samsung  s10+ but it takes a few tries to get it started. At home, on a charging pad they charge as soon as you set them down.

I am very happy with these earbuds and I would recommend them.

title: Great sound - stays in place
body:
This was my first set of earbuds that were completely wireless (all my previous had a strap that connected the two buds). I was very skeptical that they would stay in during my workouts. I was amazed at how they fit so comfortably and stayed in place even with heavy sweating. I'm not an audiophile, but I found the sound quality great - way better than what I had previously been using. I also found the noise cancellation to be quite effective.

I very much enjoy these earbuds and would recommend based on quality and value for the $.

title: Lots of drawbacks.
body:
Connection is poor quality at best...just brushing by the earbuds will interrupt the signal and it's repeatable and consistent. All the while the device that it's connected to is literally right next to the earbuds.

Connection cuts in and out within just 10 feet or so, and forget it if you go around a corner without the connecting device.

Connection and reconnecting is also very finicky. Sometimes it's fine sometimes it's nearly impossible to get reconnection without powering off and letting it sit disconnected for some time and then retry.

As far as charges...well the first few times the charge was fine and satisfied but then after about 3 charges the performance was horrible not lasting more than 20 minutes but only on one of the earbuds...this after having a full charge.

The earbuds tend to fall out regularly and regardless of the size of ear piece that is used, forget trying to jog when just walking a bit will jar loose and fallout.

Not impressed at all with this product. I'm out 50.00 now perhaps save your money for a better product.

title: Amazing value for the price! Great quality product
body:
This is an amazing value pair of earbuds. Of course AirPods have taken the world by storm but I’m not the type to want to pay that kind of money so when I saw these I had to give them a try. Man was it worth the purchase.

They stay put very nicely, just make sure you look at the directions how to correctly place them in your ear. They pair super easily and the battery life is pretty good. Sounds quality is very clear, really nice low ends with these.

The only downside is, I wish you were able to do more with the touch functions on the earbuds themselves but for the price I can definitely overlook that.

If you are in the market for lesser expensive earbuds but still want quality, I would definitely recommend considering these!

title: Truly wireless without breaking the bank.
body:
The T10 Earbuds connected easily to my phone. The audio for music sounds great and my wife said the call quaity was real good. It may just be a matter of getting used to the Earbuds, but when using them on a phone call while the rest of my house slept, the caller could not hear me when I tried to speak quietly to avoid waking others up...
The charging thru the case is simple and I was thrilled that they case can be charged wirelessly! Nice touch.

title: Battery and Noice cancellation
body: The sound quality is great. Gives you a good sound bass. The noise cancellation is also great. The only thing I don’t like is when I’m sweating heavily or running, the ear plugs tend to pop out of my ear. Every other minute I have to push them back in. The battery charger is great as well. Chargers them in about 30 min and lasts 1.5 hrs all during my workout. Great product.

title: Great little buds!
body: Good sound quality for music/voice. My husband said he could hear me fine talking to him on the phone (and he is somewhat hard of hearing). For the price, I was really impressed with the musical quality. I use them when exercising. I'm having trouble keeping the right one seated in my ear, so I may need to put a smaller rubber ear bud on it, but the left starts comfortable in place. I haven't used them over a long period, so I can't speak to battery life yet. They paired easily with my Note 8. I would recommend them.

title: Awesome earbuds. Awesome quality and sound.
body: The earbuds work great, i love it. Pairing is simple and fast. The sound quality is really good, and it's very comfortable. It fits perfectly to my ears, and it blocks the noise around you. The charging pod is well built and high quality material. I have no complaints, i like the earbuds and it sounds great.

title: Great Bang for your Buck
body:
Summary:
To get a Bluetooth set like this with decent sound quality, good battery life and the IPX8 rating for less than $50 is an amazing deal.

Detailed summary:
So far I am happy with this purchase.  The sound quality is impressive, better than I expected in terms of bass which is usually hard to produce in these types of earphones.  I tested in the shower once and so far they have not failed so I am assuming the IPX8 rating is legitimate.
The range is as listed, it is average but does tend to cut out a bit earlier than my previous pair of Bluetooth earphones.  I can't give a negative review because they are listed at a range of about 30ft and I would say that has proven to be true, but this must be an open 30ft, no doors or walls or the effective distance will go down.

They are about average for staying power in your ear.  This can be very subjective as all our ears are different shapes and sizes and we have different experiences.  I tried to use the next size large circular piece of the earphone but it was too big so I had to stick with the standard size which works fairly well.  They will come loose in my ear if I bump my ear or slightly hit the earphone is some way or don't seat them well initially and then will fall out so I will need to re-seat them in my ear.  In general I find that if you insert and lock them as instructed they will stay in place for exercise or running it is just when you bump them or just over time they will come slighly loose.

title: Let’s be honest
body: Honest review real talk I don’t need to waste your time with useless typical complaints , These Earbuds are missing one of the most coolest features and most off all wireless earbuds and that is the volume and next song feature ... smh like really why in 2019 do I even have to write about this ??? Get if fixed TOZO really that’s bull and you know it .

title: BEST WIRELESS HEADPHONES & Customer Service
body: I have been looking for a great wireless pair of headphones for a long time now. These popped up in my last search around my price range and I couldn't help but notice the 9,000+ positive reviews on them. Since I have had them I have worn them every day and used them for something. The sound is great, charging case is convenient and lasts long, and the microphone works on phone calls phenomenally. What's even better is the customer service. When you open the box there is a sheet of paper with instructions on claiming the FREE one year warranty (Make sure you do this right away it takes literally 1 minute to set up). After about a week of having them I dropped the case in the gym and it broke, but once I reached out to the customer service they were more than happy to send me another charging case immediately! Such a high quality product with great customer service it was hard not write a review

title: Best True Wireless Ever !!!!
body:
In the beginning, I was a little skeptical, however, the earbuds fit perfect, battery life is awesome, The case is very convenient and you can recharge the earbuds multiple times which gives you a lot of time to play.
The microphone is not the best, but the sound is amazing. I have Bose sports headphones, and the sound of Tozo is much better quality on Highs and lowes.
Very pleased with the product.

title: Great value. Even better sound.
body: I've been eying earbuds for sometime now, and had settled on the BOSE SoundSport Free Wireless Headphones. These were way out of my price range, however, so I did a bit of research and discovered these Toyo. It was hard to find a negative comment about them. I was impressed with the sound, very clean and natural. Bass response is a bit lacking, but nothing that can't be corrected with a good sound enhancer program (I use the free BOOM 3D).. Well worth the $45 price tag.

title: 5 stars is simply not enough for these earbuds....
body:
What can I say. After watching countless YouTube videos, my inner audiophile-self decided to splurge. Now, since I'm an audiophile, I care about sound quality more than the average person does. I am very picky with my earbuds/headphines/bluetooth speakers I buy. I have them all: Bose, dre beats, jaybird, etc. The only ones that came close to topping/being of equal level to my Bose earbuds were these. There is a great amount of base in these guys! They get super loud and you can hear the song the way it's meant to be heard. Also, these are extremely comfortable.

Do yourself a favor and just buy them! You wont regret it I promise. Especially for all of you audiophiles out there like me......just do it. Best $50 I've ever spent on a piece of audio tech.

title: Great pair of completely wireless headphones
body:
Received the headphones the day after ordering, so that was great. Sound quality, ease of use, setup, and wireless charging is excellent. I've been using them all day and the battery is still going strong. My only complaint is that I'm walking and my phone is in my pocket, it seems that the reception cuts in and out. Not sure if it's just they pair that I received or if the Bluetooth connection just isn't very strong. I don't have that issue with other headphones, so I'm taking one star away for it. That said, when my phone is out of my pocket I haven't had any issues with the BT cutting in/out.

Overall great headphones!

title: Terrible product
body: These do not stay in the ears. They are bulky and are a terrible fit. Yes, there are several ear pieces to use but the ear buds themselves are bulky and heavy and do not stay in. I would return but they were a gift and it is now past the time I can return. DO NOT BUY THESE!

title: Impressive.
body:
I was a bit concerned dropping nearly $50 on a pair of wireless earbuds. But, these things have surprised me. The sound is great. I had them turned up fairly loud playing a bass filled song and my daughter said she couldnt hear anything. I could see her mouth flapping away and never heard a word she said either.

The charging case seems pretty rugged
 It is just plastic but in the hand it feels durable enough. Its thicker than most I've seen on here. I'm pleased with it. Although, I wish it weren't plastic. Maybe aluminum or something else. It is what it is.

I cant comment on the battery life just yet. Hopefully I'll be equally impressed with that.

title: Get what you pay for
body: I actually like that I'm able to wear just one of these as I have to have an open ear for my work radio.  Fortunately I can use the other one while the one I was using recharges.  If I was able to have both left and right on at the same time, the battery life is too short.  Sound quality is fine.  You're listening to music, not attending a rock concert!  Fix the battery life issue and you'll get the 5th star.

title: Good product, but lacking to be a great product.
body: So far, the earbuds are great. They sound phenomenal, fit well, and stay where you put them once you find the rubber tip that fits your ear correctly. HOWEVER, as some have experienced, I am finding that the left earbud cuts in and out frequently. When it does this, my phone is less than 18” from my head. The other aggravating thing is that it is random, and about the time I go to turn the buds off and back on, it quits. I just spent 30mins on a stationary bike with my phone on the shelf between cup holders, and it seems to be the worst there. Hopefully I can find a suitable solution, because I love these earbuds otherwise.

title: Crappy product.
body: Drops sound all the time. No one can hear me on a call at all. Product is terrible and doesn't work. Doesn't hold a charge long.

title: Great buy!
body: I started out with a cheaper pair of the wireless earbuds to see how I would like them...after about 6 months I was ready for a new pair...I ordered the TOZO's after doing a lot of research. They were in my price range too. Everything about this experience from the seller to the product to the manufacturer has been nothing less than stellar. I am so in love with my new earbuds! This is one purchase that I was happy to make!

title: For the money, 5 stars. Was very skeptical buying
body:
Wow. For $45 I’m in love.

I am a real buyer and a real skeptic. I don’t trust these reviews sometimes.

I was completely ready to return if I didn’t like

For $45 it’s just a fantastic set. Really impressed

Perfect. No. But great.

1. They fit great. Super snug. Comfortable.
2. They are distinctly louder than AirPods and have better bass
3. Pairing was quick and painless
4. Charging case is pretty slick and nice to not have a cheap usb charger for a change.

title: Having sound issues
body: Seems well made. Nice case. Seems very durable. Having issues with the left channel cutting in and out. Its been this way since the first use. Thought maybe i didnt sinc them correctly or i had a phone or setting issue but nothing seems to help. Sound quality is great but im disappointed with the connection issues.

title: Game changer!!
body: Product works well. Easily paired and so very convenient to use. I love the ability to use the right earbud while leaving the other in the case. Allows me to have a conversation while being able to listen to music. I've owned so many earbuds but this is the best for using while my head was in a pillow which helped me recuperate while being sick. Even with all of these features, the best was the customer support and follow up from the company. It's been a long time since I've had a company that I actually felt cared about my experience. Will buy many products from them in the future.

title: This is 🔥
body: Love this product. I take showers with it all the time. Have had several types of wireless Bluetooth ear buds and this was the most comfortable and has protects wonderful sound.

title: Really good earbuds
body: These earbuds are great, better than the Samsung Buds, they connected instantly to my Galaxy Note10+ with no hassle. It's so easy to drop the buds in the case and drop them on the wireless charger. Highly recommend.

title: TL; DR. They're cheap with lots of flaws. But they're cheap.
body:
I already own a pair of Jabra Elite Active 65t true wireless earbuds but... I stupidly left them at home for a long trip abroad and ended up buying these on Amazon as cheap temporary replacements. Definitely no chance of them being more than that.

Cons:
- Biggest flaw: Buds are a bit bulky shapewise (not so much weightwise). They don't sit securely in the ear, and I have had them come off quite easily despite trying the different silicone tips and twisting them in at whatever possible angle. This is a big issue with wireless buds that would make them so much easier to lose.
- Sound is mediocre. The seal because of the unsecure fit already leaks in quite a bit of external  noise which doesn't help. They can get quite loud but then you can really hear where it suffers in terms of overall tinny sound, poor extension on both ends, and muddied separation. They're ok, I guess for podcasts and dialogue-driven content but not general music listening or shows/movies with lots of dynamic range.
- The buttons right on each earbud are terribly hard to press. You end up jamming the pods into your ear to increase volume or switch songs. I end up just using controls on my phone.
- No auto pause when you take either earbud out.

Pros:
- Being able to wirelessly charge the case is a nifty feature. Works on any Qi charging mat + my Galaxy S10e's wireless powershare feature.
- Pairing was pretty easy and mostly consistent. Link was also pretty OK but haven't tried walking more than 8 feet from the signal source or into separate rooms.
- Cheap. For the price I paid, I wasn't expecting them to permanently replace my Jabra 65ts, but I can't escape the feeling I could have found better deals (e.g. not as cheap but with better fit, design, or sound quality) if I shopped around more.

title: Great quality for inexpensive Bluetooth headphones
body:
Just got my TOZO T10 earbuds and got to play with them this past weekend on both my IPad and Phone. So far I’ve enjoyed them very much.

- Extremely easy to connect Bluetooth to my devices.
- Sound quality is actually pretty impressive
- I really do enjoy the charging case. Makes it very convenient when I’m carrying them around and it keeps them fully charged throughout the day.

Def recommend getting them if your looking some something inexpensive with great quality.

title: Worst Bluetooth I've ever owned
body: Right off the bat people said they couldn't hear me - no matter how loud I turned up the volume, they couldn't hear me and/or couldn't understand me. Then the left earpiece just went out. I turned my phone on and off, just in case it was the phone. Still couldn't hear out of the left ear piece. The instructions say to choose the ear cap size that fits your ear. What??? There's only one ear cap in the box! According to the instructions they have S, M, L & XL, but the different sizes aren't included in my box. So there I am working out and pop! The right ear bud bounces out of my ear. Basically they're not what is advertised. Do not purchase.

title: A Great Christmas Gift
body: I gave these as gifts to several people this Christmas.  They all love them and say they are more comfortable than any they have used.  They were my biggest hit this year.

title: Great customer service and headphones!
body: I love these headphones! The color is sleek and the sound is great. Easy to work with and much more affordable than air-pods. I also lost the charging case in an uber and the same day Sophia from their customer service got back to me and started to arrange my replacement, life saver!

title: Great when they work, but...
body:
The pair I got CONSTANTLY dropped the left earbud every 5-10 seconds.  This drove me crazy while I mowed my lawn and, after much testing, I think I figured out what the problem was - my friggin' arm! Every time my arm blocked the connection between my Galaxy S9 and the earbud (an overall distance of maybe 2 feet), it would cut out for 1 to 2 seconds.  It got really annoying really fast.  A cheaper pair I had given to my wife NEVER had this problem.  Remaining thoughts:

Pros:
-- The case is cool, charging is nice, the wireless feature was nice as well, although I did not test this thoroughly.
-- The sound quality is awesome.

Cons:
-- Aside from above, these things took 20 seconds to connect to a previously paired phone.  All my other Bluetooth devices take MAX 5 seconds to connect.

-- Other pairs I had before, I could use one ear and leave the other in the case.  These beep every 10 seconds until I take the other bud out of the case.  This made these earbuds horrible for my work, where I can only wear one bud in for safety reasons.

-- The amount of pressure required to press the button on the buds is MUCH higher than previous buds I've used.  It was really uncomfortable, having to shove the buds FURTHER into my ear just to pause/resume the music.

-- Not being able to reprogram the long/double button press actions without software overrides on my phone.  I didn't like that double-press was redial the last number that called me, the long press was something equally useless.  Other buds would either advance a track or go to previous track depending on which bud was double-pressed.

In short, I hope I had a defective set of buds, but when compounded with the other annoyances I experienced, I am returning these for a different set.

title: Broken in 3 months
body: After 3 months the drivers are so weak I can't even hear my podcasts.  Also has this obnoxious feature where it keeps beeping after it's already paired and playing something.  Better off buying a $10 pair every month, more cost effective.

title: Great Product with Quality Sound & Design
body:
I was certainly impressed with the base sound quality not to mention most of other noises were gone as soon as I put these earbuds on. The Passive noise canceling design from these earbuds are amazing great.
For the most use, I just had the volume setting on the lowest, and it was already loud and crystal clear.

Blue tooth pairing, connecting, and disconnecting were all simple and quick.

Battery lasts about 4 hours at low volume setting. With the charging case, there's no need to even worry about the running out of juice through out the day. Design of the case and earbuds themselves are solid and sleek. The charging case is capable to charge with Qi wireless charger (just FYI if wireless charging is one of the user experience you're looking for). The charging case is compacted, so fits pockets quite nicely and still leaves enough room for phone or wallet.

title: So small and comfortable , I can fall asleep with them
body: Best wireless earbuds I’ve ever owned. My wife watches TV and used to keep me awake. But not now! Other BT earbuds are too big to sleep with. These are so small and comfortable I can’t feel them between my head and the pillow.

title: Much better than the other brands
body:
My kids purchased two other brands and they worked ok.  A pain in the neck trying to get the two ear buds to link.

I purchased these Tozo T10 for myself and I am very glad I did. They were not much more money since headphones are cheap.  But the setup was all automated and the sounds is great.  I had surgery on one of my ears so I was afraid these would not work.  But with the many ear pieces they supply, one of the sizes worked.

I did not expect to be so happy for the price.  Great price and great quality.

title: Great earbuds!!!
body: I received my Tozo T10 earbuds about a week ago and they are fantastic! They stay in place even at night (I listen to music) and the sound quality is exceptional! I did have to buy a set of the smaller earbuds, but those were easy to purchase and come in 4 sizes to fit anyone most comfortably. I thoroughly enjoy them, and think for the price they are just perfect!

title: Great price point and quality product!
body: I’ve only had these earbuds for a couple days but I’m loving them so far.  I’m very active and use my earbuds a lot when I’m working out. It was important to find a product that would stay in my ear while doing physical activity. These are working great. They also come with 4 different size caps that can adjust to the size of your ear. I love that they are water resistant. A common problem I have is that I usually have to replace my headphones/earbuds bc they break bc of the sweat from working out. The price point and quality of this product has been perfect!  I’ll continue to use these earbuds and post updates! Looking forward to future workouts!

title: Excellent earbuds at an excellent price point
body: Straight out of the box these headphones were very easy to pair to my phone and fit to my ears. Im very impressed with the sound quality, especially for the price point. My favorite feature is how they are waterproof. Being able to wear earbuds in the shower is an awesome experience!

title: Actually Fantastic
body: You know, for such a low price, I didn't expect much out of these tiny little earbuds. However, I was completely blown away by the quality. They fit my ears perfectly, and even came with different sized buds just in case. I mainly use them to go running around my college campus, and never once have they gotten loose or fallen out from me jumping and landing. The one thing I haven't tried is using them in the rain or in the shower, but I'm sure the water proofing would work as intended. The sound quality is great, but I think the only downside is the short listen time. My commute over the summer was 4 hours round trip, so I had to charge them during the day unfortunately. Again though, you can't ask for much more for such a low price. Great product!

title: My search for earbuds are over
body:
After having these just one day, I can already see how the Tozo outranks my prior Bluetooth earbuds. Pairing was simple and the sound quality is amazing. I am getting about 3 1/2 hours of continuous listening. While I do not have plans to use these in the water, it is nice to know that if by chance they fall and get wet, I won’t have to worry.

To back their claim, when I opened my box, I saw a registration card for a 1-year limited warranty. When you stand behind your product, you know it will be excellent quality.

title: Best True Wireless Earbuds for the Price
body:
i’ve been looking for true wireless earbuds for a few months now. I am an iPhone user so at first i considered AirPods - but who wants to spend close to $200 for earbuds that aren’t even noise cancelling?
Anyways, I found these based on the good reviews and decided to try them. I am very impressed and would recommend these to anyone. They are truly noise cancelling and waterproof. they synced up to my phone so quick. The only thing i didn’t like at first is if you double click it doesn’t skip the song, it redials. But I quickly got over this - I listen to podcasts mostly.

Overall, I am very satisfied with my purchase and would buy again.

title: Fantastic Sound at a Fraction of the Cost and sold by a reliable company
body:
These headphones are great.  I have to say I was a bit surprised with just how good the sound quality and the bass are.  I use these everyday for roughly 2 hours a day and I could not be more pleased.

Equally important is how the company TOZO stands behind their products.  I would highly recommend these to anyone looking for wireless headphones or earbuds.

title: I shouldve just bought another set of convenience store brand BT earbuds than these.
body:
Im coming from a cheap convenience store brand bluetooth earbuds that i bought in an emergency when my wired earbuds died and those just had a constantly little electric buzz but they were ok and got the job done. So when those cheap ones died, i thought for 30 bucks more, these would sound better but no, the sound quality is arguably worse than the convenience store brand. For example, i tried listening to Mozart's "Gran Partita" and there is supposed to be a smooth swell in the beginning but it just sounded all crackely and horrific, like ur at an orchastra but theres a section that is playing along with newspaper, styrofoam, and forks on a chalk board.

Idk if its just my unit, but this sucks.

Only thing good about this is battery life. The case is very convenient and the earbuds themselves fit well in my ear. Shame it the audio quality is horrific.

I guess these are for podcasts and audiobooks only because I cant stand music on these things.

title: So far so good!
body: Great audio quality. Didn't really get it for the noise cancellation, but it does okay there too. Didn't know about the moisture wicking quality, but they don't get sweaty. All good!

title: Very Secure, Great Sound--Update! Returned
body:
I bought these for working out and was worried due to the design they would not be secure. They are, very. Sound is great, they seal out a good deal of ambient noise, they connect immediately out of the case. I haven't worn them for more than 2 hours so I can't attest to the 3 hr battery life but these are a great, mid priced bluetooth earbud no question I would reccommend them.
Update: 7/18. I noticed the left earbud would start to cut out, especially during movement. This problem got worse and worse over the weeks, to where the earbuds were unusable. Returned, sadly.

title: Work As Advertised
body: The battery life is quite good. I got 3 hours or so using them at a decent volume on one charge. They fit into my ears and don't fall out. I have had no issues with the left earbud disconnecting from the right earbud. I was also able to play music from my computer to my headphones when I was in a different room without them disconnecting. The bass on the headphones is pretty good. They fit in your ears snug enough to where you can't hear anything else while they're in. Great value for the price. They come with a one year warranty in the box, and the customer service is great.

title: Sound quality exceeds expectations
body:
I received these for Father's Day and had no idea what to expect.  When I first tried them the first impression was an overemphasis on base.  Then I continued to listen to them and found myself craving the smooth deep base.  Listen to higher quality streaming and you'll be amazed at the wonderful, full spectrum of sound including clear, crisp highs.  The sound produced is exceptional for the price point and I do recommend you give them a try!  They will grow on you.

I want to also mention that these have great build quality -- again exceptional for the price.

title: Great for keeping your hands free!
body: Great for listening to music or watching something on our ipad when you need to be quiet.  But for answering a phone call, not great, and for swimming, yeah, that didn't work!  Mostly comfortable to wear.  Sometimes they fall out,  but usually not.  I don't really think they were worth the price.

title: Must have both earbuds in or at least on your person!
body: This is a decent set of earbuds for the price.  Good value compared to the $200 sets.  I like the sound quality,  the price, and the fit.  Now on to the dealbreaker. I usually only wear the right earbud while I'm working because I need to hear what's going on around me.  With my last pair of bluetooth earbuds, they were connected together with a wire. I ran it through the top button on my shirt and the left earbud went into my left shirt pocket. With this truly wireless pair,  I can't leave the left one just rolling around in a pocket unconnected to anything.  It will eventually fall out somewhere and disappear.  What I've tried to do is just pick up and use the right one and leave the left one in the case.  The right one beeps at me every 2 -3 seconds until I connect the left one.  If I put it back in the case,  the beeping starts... if I walk out of range of the left,  the beeping starts.  Nothing I do short of connecting the left and leaving it rolling around in a pocket on my person stops this beeping. It makes this pair unusable for me and it's very frustrating.  This can't be such a rare scenario that no one would think of a way around it.  One idea would be to have a way to shut off the beeping with a button push or by leaving the left one off altogether.  This pair will probably get passed on to someone else who doesn't mind having both in all the time.  Other than the flaw with this particular scenario,  they are a good pair.

title: Great headphone set for the price
body: Been loving these Bluetooth earbuds for when I go to the gym and don't want to worry about any wires.  Sound quality is pretty decent and cancels out a lot of the ambient noise as well.  The only mild complaint, occasionally my left earbud will lose connection for about a second and go silent, however, it may just be a weird Bluetooth connection with my phone.

title: Better than AirPods
body: I used to have AirPods, having lost those I was looking for something affordable that could compete... The TOZO Earbuds are amazing!!!!!!!! They stay in my ear even when playing soccer, I can listen to my music while showering and the charge lasts a very very long time. Very convenient and reliable I would definitely recommend to anyone that wants Wireless Earbuds, even choose over those overpriced AirPods Apple sells.

title: Does not work for swimming.
body: I bought this product to use while I am swimming.  It advertised that you can do this, WHICH IS A COMPLETE LIE.  I put them on and as soon as my head was in the water they stopped working.  I did further research and found out that Bluetooth cannot transmit through more than 1 inch of water.  So...if you are doing a crawl stroke, backstroke, breaststroke, or butterfly this product will not work.  DO NOT BUY IF YOU WANT TO USE IT FOR SWIMMING...IT CANNOT AND WILL NOT WORK FOR THIS.

title: It absolutely positively worth the buy!!!
body: These things are awesome! I am VERY picky about headphones. I highly recommend these for one who loves to hear the bass in their music.  No need to have it at full volume, it will deliver quality sound whether you're on the phone, listening to music or watching a movie.  Would definitely recommend!

title: Great purchase!
body: This is an amazing product for the price you pay. Noise cancelling is amazing and sound quality is on point. The different size cover's fit every ear and the headphones won't slip out the ear if you have the right size in. Wireless charging a plus! Would highly recommend!

title: So far so good...
body:
This review is a work in progress.

1st impression (6/14/2019):  It looks great.  Case seem more compact than initially thought which is good.  The earphones fit quite secure in my ears, which I was surprised with.  My ears are very small.  Tried head banging and spinning violently.  Pieces stayed secure in my ear.  I only had couple of minutes to observe sound quality.  Bass seemed good with good kick.  Highs seemed clear.  I will cover more on that later after longer use.  Haven't had it long enough to cover battery life or build quality although it seems to be built solid from initial look and fill.  BTW, my son has the new Airpod 2 which he purchased yesterday from the Apple store, which I got to try out, and I really didn't like the sound quality of it.  So far, I am very happy with the purchase of T10.

title: It's about time!! These are fantastic
body: I have been wanting a pair of wireless for the gym that actually fit and stay in my ears with NOTHING going around my ears to hold it in place. These are fantastic and the sound quality is amazing! I LOVE that the case is a charger for them, this is just one of those products that makes you smile every time you use it.

title: Useless microphone and Bluetooth connection issues
body: The built in microphone is a disaster. People could barely hear me when I used them for calls and I actually had to take out and hold one of the pieces closer to my mouth in order to be heard at all. As other people mentioned in some of the reviews the connection between the speakers is really bad. After some use the left piece goes into an annoying cycle of disconnecting-reconnecting especially when you move your head and you have to keep resetting them in order to fix that. Whether I got a defective one or all of their products are like this I don’t know. But it seems like it’s a common issue so I’m not going to replace it and hope that the new one I get will be different. Sound quality is good and battery life is okay hence the two stars but I wouldn’t recommend this product. I wish they didn’t put that useless microphone in there and focused more on the connection strength and overall quality.

title: Minor audio issues
body: These are pretty good headphones, there are some.minor connection issues (sound drops on the left audio channel while in use) and sometimes pairing the left and right is a little wonky. Overall however these are pretty solid, was able to play basket ball with them in without them falling out.

title: Fine for everyday use but not working out
body: These headphones are good unless you are working out. The minute I start sweating they fall out of my ear. Not only that, when I push them back in they make this horrible clicking sound and I have no idea why. They advertise as waterproof but I can’t get them to stay in my ear when I’m running never mind if I tried swimming with them. Will be returning unfortunately.

title: Great product....great price....GREAL VALUE!!
body: I purchased this product last week wondering how good can the quality really be based on the great price? I am surprised, to say the least, of the overall quality of this product!! I will be ordering a set for my wife, and another for my son as part of their Christmas gifts this year!! These ear buds are made well, and work great!!! I am very happy with the product, and the rapid delivery!! Two thumbs up!! 👍🏼👍🏼

title: Thx
body: Don't buy it, keep Falling out of my ear also connection on you're Bluetooth Comes as  left and right, you will lose the left connection all the time then you have to re-sync and reset all over again many times

title: Very nice product
body: These things sound great, are easy to use and fit with a low profile. The quality seems very good. The product is easy to use also.

title: The user friendliness of the ear phones
body: I really like the quality of the sound.  They stay in my ears l.  I really like that there are no wires.  I would reccomend this product.

title: Ideal for the whole day and for training
body:
Since I received the package it looked good quality.
Very easy to use.
The sound is great and being waterproof is important for training, so I recommend this product.
The charger case is very comfortable.
The connection between one and the other is fast and automatic.
Buy yours and forget once and for all the wires that always get tangled up.

title: Does not sync up automatically like other wireless earbuds for the same price.
body: What can I say... the sound quality is amazing, I’ve compared it to others and you can clearly see how good these are. Now the downside to these are that they don’t automatically sync up to your phone as soon as you take them out of the case which gets annoying sometimes. You also aren’t able to skip a song by tapping them, you can only pause/play which is another downside. Sometimes the music does cut out but I will try to restart again. Overall I would recommend.

title: Very happy with this product
body: The sound is very good and very clear.  I usually have problem with earphones fitting right but with this no problem it is a snug fit but comfortable. Pairing is no issue. Wish the charge would last more; but all in all very happy with my purchase.

title: Solid earbuds, but a couple glaring problems.
body:
The sound quality is pretty solid - better than I expected. Deep bass and clear treble. The tips that were on the headphones already fit me perfectly.

HOWEVER

Every time I look up for more than 2 seconds, the left audio bud cuts out. My phone is in my pocket, so it's not out of range or anything.

Also, the tips fell off and got stuck in my ear twice. I am concerned by that. I was able to get them out each time with my fingers, but still...

I ordered a replacement in case I just got a defective pair, so I will update when they get here.

title: For the price, can't beat it!
body: I must be honest here, I mainly use these for listening to podcasts, so I don't have much experience wearing these while listening to music. The charging case it's super convenient. Its magnetically docked so it easily returns to it's charging position. The sync has worked well so far. I normally use just one at a time, so battery life hasn't been an issue.

title: When they work, they're ok.
body:
I thought it was just my older mac, but ANYTHING I try to pair these too has drop out issues. The earbuds constantly (every 2-8 minutes) lose sound for about 1-3 seconds. There is no pairing error, they just go silent and then start up again.

Battery life is mediocre. I get about 2.5 - 3.5 hrs of listen time before they die. Have not gotten any longer than 3.5hrs no matter how long they are charged.

Over all sound quality is good for what you are paying, when it's playing sound. The times they go dead, obviously, the sound stinks. They are not noise cancelling. They just fit so tight they muffle out external sounds. Noise cancelling is a tech that reads ambient sound and cancels that out, these DO NOT cancel out noise.

title: So-so earbuds (and pathetic tactics to get 5-star reviews)
body:
This is my second set of bluetooth earbuds. The sound quality in the TOZO T10 Bluetooth is quite good, better than in my other set. The bad: The connection gets broken if I turn my head sometimes or if I move my phone. That never happened with my other set. Also the battery seems to be very small and holds very few charges.

But what I liked the least about the TOZO T10 is that after I purchased them I started getting emails from the seller offering me a wireless charger if I gave them a 5-star review (I was to send them proof that I had sent a review). That is so pathetic! I imagine that a lot of people took them up on the offer because there are so many 5-star reviews, but I don't think that should be allowed at Amazon. Just because of this I will not buy any more products of this brand or recommend them to anyone.

title: ATTENTION MOTORCYCLISTS
body: Not a fan of ear buds. My ear canals are way too small for most brands. HOWEVER, with a little getting used to these, I found that they actually stay in my ears. I ride motorcycles a lot and wanted something wireless to take on long rides. These do the trick, and I can still hear the music over my obnoxious exhaust. Good product.

title: Excellent customer service
body: My first set didn't work correctly, they sent me a new set and said don't worry about returning the broken one. The new set works fine

title: Wish I could return, but I waited too long
body: I’m a pretty picky headphone person but had high hopes for these based on the reviews. Sound quality is good except for when they are occasionally staticky and cut in and out. My biggest issue is that the body part of the headphone is so big and bulky that they do not stay easily in ears. Find if you just want to listen while sitting or walking but they start slipping out as soon as you start running. I waited too long to return so I guess they’ll just sit in my drawer. Going to just cough up the money for airpods

title: They work Great
body: I purchased these last week and I am very pleased with my experience so far. At first I was a bit annoyed because they kept falling out of my ears, but then I found the other bud sizes that come with it. I ended up needing the smallest size. I use them for work since there are times when I am not interacting with people and just want to listen to music. I definitely recommend these to anyone looking for wireless earbuds, but don't want to spend 150-200 dollars on them.

title: The best buds for $50
body:
I researched extensively before purchasing the TOZO T10. I mainly was concerned about being waterproof and whether they would fall out.
Absolutely AMAZING earbuds and the price makes them even more so. The treble is a little weak but that is the ONLY thing the TOZO T10 lacks. I have recommended them to several of friends. The comfort of these are like they're not even there. Make sure to watch the video on the proper way to wear the TOZO T10's

title: Wireless Freedom, Charging Ups & Downs
body: The Bluetooth freedom and perfect fit make this next sound listening option a must. But you do have to pay attention to the fit of each bud as head movement can cause them to become loose. The sound quality for music is acceptable with lots of ambient noise but much better in quiet settings. Phone conversations are even better than the best car sound system! Battery life is the only drawback but for $45, its viable compromise when compared to like Samsung buds that advertise for $119 at Costco and 20 hour battery life. Overall, great value and ease of use for the price.

title: TOZO T10 TWS earbuds are AWESOME for swimmers
body: I am thrilled to be able to swim with these earbuds and listen to either my Audio books or music from my phone.  The blue tooth range is perfect so I can leave my phone at one end of the pool and the superb audio quality is perfect when I reach the other side of the pool.  This was a game changer for my swimming!!!

title: Great Purchase
body: Love these headphones. Once paired, they connect as soon as you remove them from the chargjng case. Sound is great, good bass quality.  Wish they had built in volume contrll, but that is really my only complaint. Had a pair of more expensive Rowkin wireless earbuds, these sound better and connect faster.

title: Great quality
body: I've had them for about 3 weeks now. I use them everydsy for about 2 hours. I did not have to put the pack on charge for 3 weeks. No lie! People seem to hear me fine as well. I like that they come with smaller adapters too because I have small ear holes. Fits nicely!

title: Not for active lifestyle
body: These work great for audio and noise cancellation. The battery life is great. But if you are very active, they don't stay in very well. The earphone piece is very big and bulky. I have tried a few others that are smaller and stay in good. So if you are very active, don't get these.

title: Design Flaw - Won't Stay in Ears
body:
These headphones are very cool. The case looks nice, very cool concept. However, there is a design flaw. They have nothing that keeps them in your ears. I've tried every single rubber size for the in-ear piece. That piece in itself isn't sufficient to keep them in. They would fall out when I was walking or anything similar.
These type of headphones need a piece that secures them, and it doesn't have it.
Also, sound quality isn't good at all. I have another cheap pair from a different brand that sounds way better.

title: Fantastic Earbuds at a Great Price.
body:
The sound quality is outstanding. Probably the best of any buds I have owned (5) for music and podcasts. Also, people I talk to on the phone say the call quality is the best I have ever had.
Very good battery life. The buds charge quickly, as does the charging case.
I have only three complaints, and two of them are just minor annoyances.
1. (just an annoyance) The "low battery" alarm only occurs about one minute before the bud goes dead. A little more warning would be appreciated.
2. (just an annoyance) There is no app. An app would be useful to monitor battery usage and a few other things.
3. (Almost a show stopper) There is no way to invoke the Google Assistant (or Siri, I guess) from the buds. I keep my phone locked when not in use. I can use the "Hey Google" command for some requests, but many of them return with "you must unlock your phone in order to do this". On all previous earbuds, I would long press the bud, and that would invoke the assistant right to command mode, even while the phone was locked.

But overall they are great, and I am keeping them.

title: The sound quality is really great
body: I love these because they have amped up the bass, which I love. The battery lasts a really long time, they are very comfortable and they connected to my phone and iPad instantly. Great value and great customer service.

title: Finally Decent Sound and Excellent Price
body:
I tried a few of these more reasonably priced wireless earbuds before landing on the TOZO 10's. While I haven't had them very long, the initial impression is great! I would suggest following their recommendation to try ALL of the various-sized ear pieces to ensure you have the best fit. I liked the fit and feel of the original mounted size, until I tried the smallest set. The sound went up a notch as they settled into the proper position within the ear and the noise cancellation became great. Even at a low volume I have to take a bud out to hear someone talking 3' away...impressive. I can't wait to use these on my next flight.

Pros:
- Syncing was effortless
- Good base for earbuds
- Nice sound (when proper size is selected)
- Hold a charge well
- Noise cancellation is really good
- Either bud can be the master, allowing for single bud use

I'll try to circle back and update this review after a few months of use.

title: Really nice sound.
body: I really like these ear buds. The only issue I have with them is the fit. The small bud size is too small and the medium is too large but I make it work. I can't imagine the # of different sizes they would have to make in order for you to find the one that fits perfectly.

title: My favorite pair of bluetooth earbuds hands down
body: I've tried a number of different bluetooth earbuds and the sound quality of my previous purchases were just so-so. The sound quality is great during workouts, because it helps cancel some of the surrounding noises at the gym. Plus they are sweatproof/waterproof.  I also love the fact that there are 4 different sized silicone ear pads that allow you to find the one that fits just right. I would definitely recommend getting these earbuds to others.

title: Comfortable, Good sound
body:
This product works very well, but sometimes slips a little due to sweat (but has not fallen out, even while running). The only thing about the sound is it cuts out every once in a while for a split second and then comes back. I'm not sure if that is due to faulty mechanical issues as it seems to do it when it's fully charged also.

Otherwise, the sound is pretty great and blocks most outside sounds. Base is great. They connect well to eachother and to bluetooth devices, no connectivity issues.

title: Purchased in lieu of spending money on airpods
body: I did not like how tight they felt in my ear.  Sound quality was good but they kept coming out while I was walking and fit uncomfortably in my ears.  Ended up buying the airpods.

title: Outstanding wireless ear buds
body:
I was thoroughly impressed with the Tozo T10. The packaging was incredible, the build quality is top notch, and an amazing set of features for the price even if the price was twice as high. Wireless charging, IPX8 waterproofing, high quality 8mm sound driver, and bluetooth v5.0 are just a few of the high end features the T10's have to offer.

Pairing them with my phone was too easy. All you have to do is take them out of the charging case and they are ready for pairing( just a quick note make sure you choose TOZO-T10-R, the right earbud is the primary). The bluetooth v5.0 mean they have a stronger connection and longer distance. I can leave them in my backpack and I am still connected up to 30 feet away. The clarity of the highs and the richness of the bass are of the quality level of the highest end earbuds. I have personally taken these into the shower, I wasn't actually showering at the time, both of the earbuds and the case itself are extremely water resistance. I was pleasantly surprised to find that I could use my T10s for a little over four hours and the charging case is good for four full recharges of the earbuds. Finally, I have to say the Qi wireless chargeable case is very handy. I can set my phone and earbud case on my Qi charging pad and I'm good to go. If you have never used wireless charging, you need to. All in all for the price I could not find a better earbud on the market.

title: Aren’t that great at staying in ears
body:
I’ve tried all the sizes provided but these headbuds stoll dont snugly stay in my ear all the time. They’ve fallen out of my ears several time and I’ve almost lost them that way. Besides that, the lack of controls this has kinda makes it second class to other wireless earbuds (can’t even skip a song with these things). I might just end up returning these.

UPDATE: after 2 months the left earbud no longer functions. I’d go with another pair. Also if you have trouble connecting these to a receiver/transmitter then you got to start the pairing process on both

title: Love them
body: Ok so I did my research on trying to find a good bluetooth and when I came across these I knew it was the one lol. Waterproof I havent test that out yet. It is durable and the battery life is amazing. I have had them about 2 weeks now and I've charged it about 3 times that's it. I love the bass and when I speak to people while driving there hasn't been the complaint that they cant hear me. This was a great buy.

title: THE BEST EAR BUDS FOR THE MONEY
body: These are by FAR THE BEST ear buds I have purchased!  I have used them daily, and they work great, hold their charge, and do NOT COME OUT!!!!  I have purchased corded earbuds, and blue tooth earbuds...about 5 pairs.  These have great sound quality, crisp and clear.  No interrupted play.  I wear them to workout and to mow my yard.  They shipped fast!  Were easy to pair with my device.  Best purchase I have made!!!!

title: Great Option for Wireless Earphones!
body: I was kind of skeptical that these would live up to their high review levels, but I must say I am impressed!  The pairing process was easy, and the fit and finish are good.  The sound quality was better than I thought it would be. Good bass and sound stage.  Treble can be a little bright or harsh at times, but not enough to be a significant detriment.  I like the smoked glass cover on the case so you can see the charging lights.

title: Very Impressed, improved on last design ALOT
body: Last year I purchased this same product but the generation before (cant remember what they are called, but the ones before the T10) and they absolutely sucked. Wouldn't pair to my phone after just a few days of use and the sound quality was nothing impressive. I was very weary about giving this company a second chance, but boy have they redeemed themselves. These are the best pair of wireless headphones i've ever used. Perfect for working out. They never fall out, sound is good, and the charging system received a MASSIVE update. WOW! Everything is magnetic on the charging case rather than spring loaded so its super satisfying to pop open the case and shut it. Not only that, but the actual headphones are held snugly in their charging ports via magnets. All you have to do is hover the headphones above their little slot in the case and they pop right into place effortlessly. I am very impressed with the quality of these headphones and I am very glad I decided to give this company another chance.

title: Worth every penny
body: Buy it!  Worth it I have Bose noise canceling headphones and these come close for the price they go well above my expectations.

title: I would give these 10 stars if I could
body: I have been trying many different brands of ear buds with little satisfaction. I received these and the minute I turned them on, I was hooked. I love the many different sizes of ear caps. I have very small ears and the smallest size fits perfectly. The sounds is also fantastic, I have a very loud, obnoxious co-worker and when I'm wearing the ear buds, it's like she isn't even there. I love that they are wireless and begin to pair with my phone as soon as I take them out of the base. Also the confirmation that both sides have been connected leaves out any doubt. Phone calls are easy to answer and very clear. The carrying case is very durable and the small size makes it easy to slip into a bag or pocket for on-the-go. The shipping box and packaging are also very impressive. Also, they were charged when I received them so I could use them right away. I have to say again how pleased I am with the different sized ear caps.. Probably my favorite feature. They don't fall out of my hears and I don't have to shove them in & hurt my ear.

title: The greatest Earbuds that I have ever used
body: I prefer these earbuds over AirPods for many reasons: they are waterproof, excellent sound quality, sound doesn't "bleed through" so that others can hear your music, and they have buds which allows them to actually fit comfortably in my ears. I use them all the time, especially in the shower and they work great. Thanks for this amazing product!

title: Quality earbuds with ever greater quality sound
body: I was kind of skeptical purchasing these earbuds never hearing of this brand. Though seeing that these were Amazon choice product and seeing the reviews, I thought it wouldn't hurt. I got the earbuds and where fully charged connected to my my android phone without any issues. Music quality from these earbuds are nice and clear bass is great also. I am was very surprised by the quality of the product and sound.  You have the option to connect either or both earbuds. The buds come with two other size silicone ear cap with the ones already attached to the buds. Charging seems to be quick for both the charging case and the buds themselves. I have not tested the waterproofing on them, but seem to be sweat proof when working out and the do not fall out while doing my workouts. I would recommend these to friends and family looking for earbuds.

title: Left bud cuts out constantly
body: I tried using these at the gym but the constant connection loss and audio issues were infuriating. The sound is decent, build quality and overall look of the buds is really nice, and wireless charging is amazing, but none of that really matters when they don't actually do their number one job. Sent them back and got my refund.

title: Can’t go wrong, quality product!
body: These wireless earbuds are the first that I’ve tried that DONT fall out and don’t feel uncomfortable. The sound quality is also pretty amazing for less than 50.00 earbuds, I bought these because my beats died on me and now I’m mad I even wasted the extra money on those when these are just as good if not better because they add a little extra bass to the music and I love that!

title: Great for value for the price
body: This was surprisingly a very good pair of headphones. It has a lot of bass, if you're into a lot of heavy workout music and the sound quality was pretty decent for the price. I can't really think of anything bad to say about them other than the battery life could be longer. It gives you virtually no warning before the battery dies completely and your headphones are rendered useless, but as long as you have the case handy it won't be that big of an issue. The case supports wireless charging so that's cool too.

title: Great Bluetooth headphones.
body: Headphones are well made and last a long time. I have small ears and the small ear buds work well. They also have medium and large.

title: Sleek, High-Quality, and High Value!
body:
I have tried so so many of these earbuds. I went through maybe 5-6 attempts at finding a good, reliable true wireless earbud combo for a while, but they all were patchy or flawed. I gave up for a bit, figuring the technology just had to catch up. Now it has!

This is the first quality pair of true wireless earbuds I have come across, and at a fraction of the cost of airpods! They connect incredibly easily--they come with instructions, but honestly any average user won't even need them. They are sleek, barely sticking out of your ear. They have pretty decent sound quality too! If you're an audiophile, you may notice slight muddiness in the sound, but for a pair of wireless earbuds these are top notch for the size and cost. The noise cancelling is surprisingly good! And the included size adjustment cups are a great way to ensure that.

Finally, they really shine when working out. There is no feeling better than being able to have no wires entangling you or holding you back while running, lifting, or walking. Truly a great experience.

Overall, I'm happy to highly recommend these. If you're looking for your first pair of wireless earbuds, or maybe looking for an upgrade from other earbuds, this is the product for you!

title: Awesome stereo sound!
body: These are so awesome sounding. Totally recommend. I have a quiet voice and so I’m getting used to increasing my volume since the mic is in the ear.

title: Fits multiple ear sizes!
body: My ears are small and traditional earphone/ buds just do not fit.  With something so small and compact, it needs to fit reliably to replace my other headset.  Changing out the included "medium" size for the included "small" size was fairly easy. I've been using them in multiple scenarios - and I am impressed with these earbuds! So far, so good!

title: TOZO T10 Lives up to it advertisement!
body: I ran across the the TOZO T10 by accident and I am glad I did. I was looking for something wireless, water proof and something that would stay in my ears under intense physical exercise, work or anything else. They have lived up to and exceeded my expectations as long as you take the time to put the right rubber piece to go into your ears. I was having trouble with the left side not properly sinking with the right side, and their customer service has been excellent in getting this issue resolved. I would recommend these to anyone, from the most serious athlete or for your part time gardening activities. Battery life is adequate but could be improved for extended use, however the charging unit works fast and is convenient!

title: Great sound quality, portability, battery life, size, comfort BUT NOT GREAT CONNECTIVITY
body:
These are some pretty solid earbuds for the cost. As with most earbuds, they're pretty good at cancelling sound; and that sound, the quality of it, is pretty great. I'm no audiophile but I enjoyed just about every little part of the noise coming into my ears. I don't believe anything was enhanced at the cost of another; every instrument got in the spotlight with these.

Also, extremely portable too. Fantastically portable. Tiny little box, no bigger than a cigarette box (smaller). Easily fit in a coat pocket or any pocket really. Magnets in the earbuds make attaching them to charge a quick ordeal, and the lid is magnetically closed too. Very durable.

What I don't like about these is that the signal is very easily blocked. Like, REALLY easy. As much as turning my head a different way sometimes would cut out the signal completely, even if the phone was in my shirt pocket, 4 inches from my face. I don't know why exactly it happens, but it happened an awful lot. Just for that reason, I would recommend you steer towards something that has a single, more reliable bluetooth reciever opposed to two less-reliable ones. My Skullcandy bluetooth headphones are somehow able to pass through just about anything while these started fussing as soon as I raised as much as an arm conveniently in the way.

title: Did not last 3 months. With little use
body:
Worked great at first, but now consistently cuts in and out while wearing.  Only used these on about 10 different occasions, mainly while jogging.
It's a shame too, because the sound quality and comfort was actually really good.  I bragged about them to everyone, but now they are basically a paper weight.

title: Good value and quality
body:
The audio is good for totally wireless earbuds. It’s fine for music. The mids are a bit low and the bass is punched up. I wouldn’t use these for audio editing but for any other application these will be plenty fine. It does make the sound feel a little cold right now.

I wouldn't recommend these headphones if you listen to a lot of spoken word - like podcasts. The treble is way too sharp. I hear every single "S" sound. The sound bites and there's no way to dial it down.

I found these headphones to be really comfortable but YMMV since not all ear canals are the same. I was able to use the plugs that pre-installed but there were other sizes in the box. When putting them on, the instructions started to rotate the buds. That really helped lock the headphones in compared to some other ones I’ve tried. I have only worn them while on the bike and walking. Neither activity caused the headphones to shift.

I like that the charger case is also supposedly IPX8. I haven’t submerged the case yet but it’s nice to know that it’ll be easier to clean. The cover for the USB port is hard to open but I suspect that’s to help prevent water intrusion. The one minor issue I have with the case is the USB port. It’s fairly inset. The port is also small so most of my existing USB cables won’t work. Otherwise I’m quite fond of the use of magnets in the case and headphones. The ear buds drop in to the case with a snap as well as closing the case cover.

I have used these daily for the last week. I’m pretty happy. I’m looking forward to breaking in the earbuds completely hoping that it’ll warm up the sound.

title: DO NOT BUY FOR IPHONE
body: There is no chance the other reviews are legitimate if they are using iPhone. These earbuds sound fine like any other ear buds of this price however I have tried to listen music for the past 2 hours and have yet to complete a single song without one of the ear buds cutting out multiple times, its beyond obnoxious. I will be returning these and just shelling out the money for AirPods this is very disappointing, I would rate 1 star if the sound wasn't decent but at least they have the going for them(when the sound actually comes through)

title: Excellent Quality
body:
These earbuds are excellent quality for the price. They sound great, are comfortable, and the battery lasts for a really long time.

As a student, I really appreciate their ability to block out noises while I study. They also stay in my ears when I'm working out, which is a big plus. Overall, I would highly recommend these to anyone looking for inexpensive, solid-quality earbuds.

title: Really high quality especially for the affordable price.
body:
I've owned these for about 3 weeks and have been using then almost daily. The fitting fits quiet nicely and I have had no issues with it falling out (except when I accidentally touch/hit it. They are the perfect weight and is not too heavy not overly light.

I was genuinely surprised by the great sound quality especially for a fully wireless earphone. Volume can get pretty loud so do not worry about it being too quiet.

The few minuses in my experience (which are kind of just ramblings) is that the battery life is about 4-5 hours which is fine but longer would obviously be better. The 2nd minor complaint is that it can only be used with both buds removed from the case, so you cannot only listen with 1 on.
