I just put one on and put the other one near the case when I want to listen 1 eared.

Pros:
1) Sound Quality
2) Price
3) Fitting / Weight

Cons
1) battery life can be longer (but might increase weight)
2) must listen with both buds connected and can't have only 1 on at a time.

Overall I think these are great and TOZO has done a great job!

title: Excellent quality
body: I was impressed with the quality of sound coming from the Torzo T10 earbuds. I really like the video demonstration ease of use. Never had that before. I’ve had other earbuds and the quality wasn’t there. They fit very comfortably in my ear. The battery usage life far longer than other bud I’ve had in the past. I have no problem with ordering them again.  I thoroughly love and enjoying them. The delivery time was on schedule. Far better with other items orders.

title: Not great for use during physical exercise
body: Sound quality is great....battery life satisfactory...but doesnt work well when using during exercising which is why I got them. Tried the different size ear buds. One of them works pretty well in my left ear but none of the options work very well in the left ear. Both will fall oit while jogging fairly quickly and eventually fall out while walking. Left does a little better than right. For me they only are consistent if using while sitting or maybe on stationary bike or something.

title: Great battery life
body: The only reason this gets 4 stars instead of 5 is that you cannot go very far from the device your using. If i walk across my living room the sounds starts to come in and out. Other then that they are great. The battery life lasts a long time and they totally cancel out other sound

title: Wireless charging case does not hold a charge.
body: I like the way these fit in my ear and how they sound, but the wireless charging case does not hold a charge.  I charge it and a few days later there is no charge.

title: Has pairing issues
body:
They have decent sound and ok bass. They fit well, even while working out. The battery life is ok. I found out that you have to turn them off before putting them back in the case or it will drain the case battery.

The one major complaint is that I always have to re-pair them with my phone (S10) manually each time I turn them on. Other headphones automatically connect once they turn on.

title: Good for the Price
body: I’ve never had Bluetooth headphones until I bought these ones.  I bought a watch and needed Bluetooth headphones for it.  It was hard finding a decent pair at an affordable price especially not knowing if the earbuds are going to be comfortable in your ears.  I don’t like at first that they are a little bulky, but you get used to it.  I only use one earbud at a time when I go running, so if you only turn one earbud on it will beep the first couple of minutes (very quietly and not constantly the first couple of minutes) because it wants to pair with the earbud.  The earbud stays in place pretty good, especially if you’re running.  I like how it comes with a charging case and haven’t had to charge them that much yet, but I’ve only used them a few times so far.  I’ve only had them for a week now, but the sound is really good.  If you can get over the minor flaws then I think this is a good purchase.

title: They've been great!
body: I rec'd my earbuds a couple of weeks ago and have basically used them non stop since I got them. They came completely charged out of the box. Pairing was a breeze & I've been getting nearly 3hrs per charge. The sound quality has been excellent, whether for podcasts, audio books or music. It takes roughly a hour to charge them and you get 4 charges before you have to charge the entire unit. While I've not gone swimming with them, they do hold up well in with sweat & water. I tried them in the shower and they were excellent in there as well. I do have the occasional issue with only one pairing instead of both, but a quick reset does the trick. The only con I can think of is I can't get more than 10-feet from my phone before they lose signal, but that's easily remedied by not getting too far away. 100% would buy them again & the price point of $50 is a great deal.

title: Do not buy these for phone calls.
body: While the convenience and compactness of the charging case were excellent, and the overall sound quality was very good, one of the main reasons I bought these were for calls.  I found a 50/50 split between calls that were clear vs. calls that were not.  I drive a lot for work so I need something that can deliver more consistently than that.

title: Great earbuds for the price
body: This is my first pair of wireless airbuds. Used them at the gym and was impressed at how well they stayed in place. The charging case is the feature that was a must for me so I could charge that at night and have the battery last all day. The only thing that makes this a 4 star and not 5 is the earbuds are bigger than expected and they stick out quite a bit from my small ears.

title: They do what they should do
body: These are my work earbuds. I sit in my cave and I listen to audiobooks with them. I never keep both in at once, and that's fine, because they swap easily and are happy to work individually or together. The tech is good, the sound is good. Each earbud lasts for about 4 hours of continual podcast/audiobook.

title: Definitely best bang for your buck
body:
I was skeptical as hell about trying these, since I had tried and returned nearly all the $200+ options on the market. But here’s my best breakdown:

Sound Quality: Definitely comparable to the high end options, and better in some cases. I hated the low volume level of the Air Pods, even at full volume they were quite weak. But even the new $250 Beats earbuds sounded way too sparkly in the highs, with no mid or low range. But these are well balanced. And definitely the best volume of any wireless earbuds.

Comfort/Fit: probably the best overall. There are others that feel comfortable at first. But after an hour of use I would feel the need to give my ears a break. So far I have done a 3+ hour session with no issues.

Connectivity: this is big for me, since I am on a lot of phone calls during the week. At first, I was worried because they did cut in and out quickly but frequently. This was the main reason for the 4 star rating. But after pairing again, I haven’t really had any issues and just hope it’ll stay this way because these really are good otherwise.

Battery/Charging: The charging cable for the case is laughably short, but not a huge issue. These seem to have a good battery life with a roughly 3 hour session logged. But the best part is they seem to charge faster than any other options.

Conclusion: I seriously can’t believe I ever tried more expensive ones (including a $350 pair). These are better in a lot of ways. And even then, the areas that maybe aren’t as good are only slightly so compared to the pricey ones. Save yourself the time and money and give these a try for a fraction of the price.

title: Really Great Volume
body:
I was pleasantly surprised by these headphones. They paired pretty quickly and easily to my Iphone, and I was acutally kinda shocked by the sound quality. I couldn't tell the difference between these and my wired apple earbuds. Also the volume is pretty nice. I have to keep my phone volume at the first bar always with these because its the perfect volume. These things can get pretty loud too, and they block out the sound. So if you wanna block out your surroundings these earbuds are great for that. Overall I really like these buds, and I like the convenience of its wireless charging capabilities.
-PS also water resistant

title: Great product minor bug
body:
I just received my ear buds and love them. The volume is loud enough, I can be heard clearly while talking on the phone. I love the case,  very easy to connect to each other.
The only thing that stopped me from giving this product 5 stars is because they do not auto connect to my phone when I take them out the box. I have to turn my Bluetooth on and off to connect. Every Bluetooth headset I have ever owned automatically connects after the first time even the cheap $5 ones. So that's a little annoying but the cost and everything else makes this a good purchase.

title: The sound quality is great!!
body: I must say these are so far some of greatest ear buds I have purchased. I have a total of 3 different sets. The sound quality is great, and so is the noise reduction ( I work in a very loud plant). They fit in my ear with no problems and they don’t fall out!!!!! I would recommend this product. 👌🏾👍🏾😀

title: Charger Issues UNRESOLVED // Resolved
body: UPDATE: seller contacted me and sent a complete replacement (complete charger and earbuds) )which works perfectly with the three wireless chargers I have.  I do like the earbuds and are great for walking and hiking.  Seller did follow up which is another plus ... too many times they just ignore you.  Great customer service after my initial contact.  Described issue with charger failing charge on 3 different makes/capacity wireless chargers could only charge with cable.  Seller: You may using a wireless charger incompatible with T10, we recommend you try our TOZO wireless charger.  DoD trip I took earbuds & charger.  Failed to charge on various pads in vehicles & kiosks.  Reason I purchased was not only for the earbuds but the need NOT TO TAKE MORE CHARGERS WITH ME. ...

title: Poor connection quality and short range; Would not recommend
body:
The sound quality was decent the signal held. However, for me, even the slightest jostle would cause the headphones to lose connection. Basically, I can only use them if I'm sitting still and the phone is resting somewhere. If one or the other is in motion, it cuts in and out. If I walk more than about 5 feet away, I lost signal completely. Given the purpose of bluetooth is to allow for some hands free range, it did not serve the purpose.

As an aside, I've made a seller review as well because they followed up on my last review. Demanded that I take it down and they would offer a refund and replacement pair of headphones to show that they "stand behind their product". To be fair, they followed up to see whether I had received the replacement pair. When I confirmed that nothing had been received, radio silence once again. No refund, no replacements and an all around shoddy product.

title: best in the market
body: first of all, the affordability of this product compared to mainstream earbuds out in the market rn, namely the AirPods from apple, is second to none. The sound quality is not compromised at all, even when I’m dripping with sweat from working out. The bass is particularly powerful. Above all, the customer service for TOZO products is amazing. Katherine helped me identify the malfunction with my earbuds and replaced them right away with fast shipping delivery, free of charge of course. Thank you Katherine!! In the same scenario, apple would’ve interrogated me for a week until they gave me store credit of 5 dollars.

title: Great sound and comfort!
body: I love these earbuds. The sound quality is amazing. Also, the extra earbud pieces ensure you get a perfect fit for your ear. It was super easy to set it up to my phone.  I'm so happy I made this purchase!!

title: Good while they lasted
body: Not the best sound quality but they did the job. Not the best fit either. Expected more for the price. Lasted just a couple of months and now one ear bud randomly works.  Would not purchase again.

title: Great fit, great sound, great price,
body: This was a pleasant surprise. I bought these because normal in earphones don’t fit my ears and fall out often. These are perfect, have a wonderful full sound and are ridiculously affordable!

title: Great sound. But that's it.
body: I love the sound quality. However for calls it doesn't work at all. I can't talk on the phone. No one hears me. Also u can't just have ur left earbud on an right off. If ur right is not on then nothing is on. U can just have ur right bud on but that's it. Charging time is good. Just hate that I cant make calls or just have my left bud on while my right is off. If u put the right bud to charge u can't use ur left bud at all!! Poopy.

title: Guess my ear holes are two different sizes...
body:
…..as I had to use two different ear pieces to get these to stay in my ears even with just the slightest head movement. Even now, not sure I'd attempt to use these during vigorous exercise, but for sitting at my desk working, etc they are staying in place finally.  The BT connection seems reliable and they sound great.

Update - the seller contacted me and offered to send a replacement pair to try. Not sure if they have made some update or if some slight variation in mfg, but this time the 2nd smallest ear plug options now seem to hold these firmly in place and they sound great.  Thank you to the great folks at Tozo.

title: Total crap. Waste of money.
body: These are crap. I’m barely over a month in and I can barely hear anything with them. They make videos and music sound like they’re skipping. The sound is crackly and constantly coming in and out. It’s impossible to follow voice calls or anything else. And my return window just closed so now I’m stuck with this crap.

title: Uncomfortable, heavy, and poor battery life.
body:
"Amazon's Choice": gives me the impression these are just overstock items that have reached the end of their life.
Feels VERY VERY deceptive for them to be labelled as anyone who would recommend these over the other competitors who offer much better quality and over-all value.

Amazon would only recommend these if their profit ratio is much higher on selling these over others.
All of the exhange-able ear-bud caps this comes with, have a rigid hard plastic circle ring around them.
It might be to ensure there's a snug fit, however it's hard and uncomfortable and will probably be irritating for most people, like myself.

The battery only lasts two to two and a half hours. Which is very poor in comparison to similarly priced competitor's.
The recharge time feels pretty poor for the battery life as well.

The case was kind of nice, about it really.

The earbuds are kind of bulky, and more importantly fairly heavy for what they are actually. (sounds a bit odd, but they're definitely quite a bit heavier than other brands, for whatever reason.).

I would NOT recommend these at all.
These should be $10-$15ish  at the most in cost -  in some dollar style bin at office max or office depot for a "back to school section" or something along those lines.

Curious stocking stuffer or otherwise. Save your money, spend the extra $15-20 for a much much much better value and pair of wireless earbuds. Avoid these. I doubt the batteries will have much of a charge after awhile, so you'd probably have to replace them within a year as well.

title: Great value!
body:
These earphones have exceeded my expectations for sound quality and security. I have now worn them while working, running, biking, lifting and gardening and they have stayed tight in my ears the entire time.
The sound quality is very good. It's not Bose or Shure quality, but it's about Sony level which I consider a little heavy on the bass, but still very good.

The battery life has been exactly as advertised. I only use them in about 1.5 hour increments so the battery life is not an issue for me. The case actually charges the earphones, which I thought was a very cool feature. Highly recommend at this price.

title: Buy them!
body: Wow! Just wow! I had very little expectations for this product mostly because of the affordability. However, I was blown away by the ease of pairing and the sound quality. It has a crisp, true sound that eliminates traffic noise, gym speaker systems, etc. Seriously, buy them. You won't be disappointed.

title: Fantastic Quality Earbuds!
body: Purchased these Tozo T10 earbuds after reading so many glowing reviews and I was not disappointed! They are fantastic quality for the price, and truthfully much better audio quality then items I have owned that were significantly higher price points! The build quality is excellent, and they feel very well made and constructed. The fit right out of the box was perfect, but it is nice that you also get additional sizes for fitment. Pairing was incredible simple and I was blown away with the quality of the drivers in this earbuds when I tested them out. Fantastic bass and midrange response and a very immersive feel when listening. The charging / storage case is very nice and I like the magnetic drop in for the earbuds when charging as well as the visual indicator lights that show the current charge status. All in all a really excellent product and value! Going to buy another pair for my wife since I like them so much!

title: Definitely not waterproof.
body:
First and most importantly: nothing about these are waterproof. At best resistant. If a company puts waterproof in the title they had best be waterproof or I know all the rest of your product description is a lie. If you get these fully wet they will short and die as mine did. Fortunately I found this out within the return window and did not lose any money.

Updated edit:
The company has great customer service and reached out to replace these headphones. This time they will avoid any contact with water and operations seem seamless. Nice headphones for the price.

title: Performs Great - Just as Advertized!
body: I bought the Tozo T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds with Wireless Charging Case to replace my Samsung Galaxy Buds, because I gave those to my teenage son.  To be honest, my expectations weren't too high because of the extremely reasonable low price point of these wireless earbuds.  Now that I have been using them for a few weeks I must say that I am very pleasantly surprised by these earbuds!  I love that I can charge them either via the micro USB port on the charging case, or via a Qi charger.  I have charged them both ways, and they charge great.  They also have four blue LEDs that communicate clearly how charged the case is (1 LED = not very charged; 4 LEDs = fully charged).  The earbuds themselves fit me just fine with the standard size ear gel that comes fitted to the earbuds.  But in case you have different-sized ears, they come with three other sizes of ear gels.  It also comes with a charging cable, to charge via micro USB.  I like that htey are water resistant, though I haven't challenged that feature yet.  I'm just glad to know that I don't need to worry about them getting a little bit wet.  The sound quality if very good, and they seem to cancel noise quite well.  All things considered I am extremely pleased with the value of these earbuds, and would recommend them to potential buyers.

title: Great value!  And manufacture stands behind their products.
body: Pods just don't fit comfortably in my ears and I don't like behind ear straps.  i use these for workouts and recently had an issue with one of the buds... after trying to fix the problem with Amazon tech support, manufacture took care of the problem, no questions asked.  Battery life is good, charging case is very good and bluetooth connection is fine as long as I keep my phone in my right pocket. BTW, I have very high end headphones at home and appreciate good quality of sound.  These are for my workouts only and I am quite happy with the quality... especially for the price.

title: Nice sound quality but do not stay in my ears while working out
body: This product has good sound quality and have not had any issues with the battery life so far. The main problem is fit. I switched to the smallest ear piece and while working out they will not stay in my ears doing any jumping type activities like jumping rope or Hiit moves. Continually falling out and having to mess with them disrupting my workouts.

title: TOZO T10
body:
I love this product. It surpassed my expectations. I am more than pleased with the way they contour to my ears, the way the noise cancelation really works, and the ease it was to link them and get them to work with my iPhone.
I am also pleased with the customer service I received. They contacted me to make sure I was happy and offered me help with anything I had an issue with. Although, so far there is no problems with anything.
My address is the same as the mailing order I have with your company.

title: The earbuds are so easy to use, even an old man can figure it out.
body: So far there is nothing to dislike.  I've had these for awhile now and the charging is so simple. They "jump" into the case as if magnetic.  The charger works incredibly well and charges itself very quickly.  I will say the sound is magnificent. An excellent mix of bass and treble. I'm having no problems with answering calls as well.  I am very impressed with this product and I'm a cranky old guy who tells it like it is.  Amy in customer service sent a follow-up email as well asking me what I thought...she was very polite.  I believe you will agree with me when you try a pair, they are excellent.

title: Very good buds at a fair price
body:
I have been using these earbuds since June 2019 without any issues.  I alternate them with my Apple earbuds, depending on what I am doing.  They stay in my ears, although this has not been an issue for me with other earbuds. I run outside and get sweaty, and have not had any problems with them staying put.
The sound quality is very good; clean and crisp, and the rubber covers block out significantly more ambient noise than the Apples.  I often wear earbuds all day, and after many hours, I have one ear that may become a little sore from the pressure of the buds, but that's after a lot of hours.
The wireless charging case is handy, and i like that I don't have to plug it in.  The blue lights show the charging statues of the cases, and the red lights on the buds light up when they are charging.
I have not had any issues with Bluetooth pairing, although the way the connection is made to a device is a little funky-  only the R earbud connects to the device, and the R bud connects to the L bud.  I have had 1 or 2 episodes when I have had my R earbud too far away from the connected device, and then I get a slightly out of sync sound from the 2 buds.  I believe it is when the L bud also connects to the device (I think)..  This is easily remedied by either turning them off and on again, or checking which bud(s) are connected under the BT menu on my iPhone.
I have used these with an iPhone 8S and and iPad mini 4.  Considering the price, these are a good option.  Since I have had such good experience with these, I ended up buying another set in white as a present for a family member.  I recommend them.

title: Very Good Quality
body:
Overall my expreriance with this product was very good. The sound quality is above average for earbuds, it's easy to use, and the battery lasts longer than you’ll need it to. There was a problem with having both earbuds connected, but it was easily fixable by disconnecting and reconnecting them.
For a person such as myself, who enjoys being outside a lot, it is helpful that they are waterproof. I don’t have to worry about getting them wet when it rains, or if I accidentally drop them.
It is a very good product that I would highly recommend for a fraction of what other wireless earbuds cost.

title: Great pair of bluetooth headphones
body: I had written a previous review about how inefficient my last pair were. Tozo reached out to me to, sent me new ones, and they work perfectly. They now connect automatically to my device, sound amazing, and battery life is better. I had originally given them a one star review but after their excellent customer service, I am very satisfied with my new pair and changed my rating to 5 stars.

title: Bliss In Your Ears
body: This is a product as good as the brand name items for way less money. I've had no issues with it so far. Its water proof function is excellent. I've been able to use it in the shower and hear nothing but the music. The included different earbud sizes are also a great thing for those of us with smaller ear canals. I highly recommend this product.

title: Pre-opened packaging, large earbuds, but otherwise decent.
body:
While making this purchase, I believed that I was ordering a new pair of earbuds.  Upon opening the box, that clearly was not the case.  The inner packaging had been torn open, but I can't tell if they had been used previously.  Rather worrisome.

Pros (so far): Relatively easy to connect to my phone.  Sound is decent. Seems to charge quickly.  Charging case lid is see through (so you can see the charging lights).  Regular USB/mini USB charging cable.

Cons (so far): Earbuds are HUGE! Probably not brand new.  Really short charging cable.

Will update if anything changes.

title: Great quality for the price
body: I have worn these on the beach all summer and love them. I recently had an issue with pairing one of the buds. TOZO customer service was super responsive. They got right back to me and since a reset didn’t work, they offered to  me new earbuds immediately. Really love this product, sound quality is very good. Easy to operate, cool charging case great for beach. I would definitely recommend this product and company.

title: Great price, sound and good customer service
body: Worked great and sound quality is very good. Customer service was very helpful with any questions I had.  I will buy again.

title: Delay
body: Serious audio delay when watching videos, which is the primary reason I purchased these. Resetting and repairing did nothing.

title: An excellent buy for the price point
body: These little things are pretty good for their price. The multiple earbud sizes are a plus (I actually had to go up myself to get a perfect fit). As they are earbuds, the noise canceling is excellent as the buds penetrate your ear canal. Sound quality is really good, although I think the bass is slightly high. There are also no controls on the earbuds themselves to advance tracks if you are listening to music; you have to do that from the actual device it is paired to. I made a test call and the microphone seems to work well if you speak at your normal conversational tone.  The charger is great: waterproof, can hold 4 full charges, is magnetic to hold the buds in place while charging, you can see the status of the charge (red/blue) through the lid of the case, and can see how many charges the case has left. They also included a little lanyard for the case if you want to use it. I haven't used them much yet, but they fit well, snug, and will work well for what I need them for.

title: Great Value EarPods
body: Great product as advertised.  I have used these for a week without issue.  They stay in for every workout and distance run, and connect the iPhone very easily.  The case is very convenient and well designed.  Great value!

title: Only a 3 Star
body: Gave it a three star due to if someone is beside you with the same type and you try to use these, they cut in and out. If you are the only person with these, then they work great. Other wireless Bluetooth works great with these.

title: So easy to use
body: I’m very picky with audio equipment.  I always prefer to listen to audio media through noise canceling inside-ear earbuds.  This product was a pleasant surprise.  Long battery life on the case and the buds themself, perfect audio quality.  They are so easy to use, the only problem you’ll have is when they are remembered by multiple smart devices.  My only complaint is the strength of the bass.  The bass quality is great however, my go-to “new headphone test” is any rap song with a heavy 808 beat ie Top Back by T.I.  You can tell that the buds only have about 95% of the power required for loud listening.  All around great product.

title: Worth the price and is superior to other earbuds in that bracket.
body: A good value/quality overall. Sounds if pretty good and not as boomy as one gets from most earbuds. charges good, my battery lasts a long time, and audio range is above average.  Best pair of 50 dollar ear buds I have ever bought

title: Great ear pods
body:
The noise cancellation is very good and the sound is clear and loud. The pairing is easy, too.
Highly recommend.

title: Great Great Earbuds!
body: I really like these earbuds. They sound great and say in place. I wear them at the gym, at work, walking around the city and even shooting basketball. They connect easy and the battery will last me awhile. They have never died on me or had any connection issues. Would defiantly recommend.

title: AMAZING PRODUCT, GREAT CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE!
body: I got my TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds about two months back and i have enjoyed every minute that i used it. Its literally with me everywhere i go. It makes great sound especially for music but i have enjoyed it mostly for my audiobooks. Its very soft to the ears when am reading on my bed at night and it has different sizes for ear adjustment. Lately after a swim, i noticed one of the buds had a technical glitch and i had to contact customer care. The customer care was quick to respond and are now sending me a new set at no extra cost. This makes me so happy! Now i can enjoy pure sound quality from a good read. Thanks guys!

title: Best wireless headphones
body: These headphones are amazing! Not only they fit perfectly into my ears and stay there even when running but the sound is so clean and perfect. Love the charging station they came with! I am so happy I got them!

title: Great noise cancellation and sound
body: Ordered these headphones for a replacement due to my old wired headphones breaking. The noice cancellation is great. Sound is good was having issues with disconnecting but reached out to customer support and they took care of the issues quick. Would recommend if seeking for a wireless headset.

title: Great wireless Headphones.
body: The fact that these are waterproof are ideal for any type of situation.  The sound quality is one the best out there.  The fact that you can connect to either side of the ear bud is helpful when you just want one in.  I usually use one at a time and when the battery dies on one side I switch out to the other one while charging.  There are however some limits to the headphones.  The first being that they will lose connection to your phone or blue tooth device pretty easily.  Does not  matter where you place the device.  The charging time for the headphones is a little on the slow side but understandable with the recharging box.  Overall I would recommend this brand of wireless headphones.

title: Left ear piece
body: When the headphones work at 100% they produce great sound. BUT, key word, WHEN they work, the left ear piece continuously cuts off for a couple seconds, maybe a minute maybe until you reset it. The company graciously sent me a different pair due to this problem... same thing. I have a Samsung S8plus. so what do I dislike... well, the left ear piece

title: Great for the price
body: The quality of the earbuds is amazing, however after connecting it makes a beeping noise for the first few minutes or so for no reason. It also doesn't like to auto connect to the right earbuds. It also wont play audio through both earbuds at the same time.

title: Fast charging, nice packaging, and great earbuds
body: This is my first wireless earbuds that I owned. And the quality is awesome! Clear sounds and it's very comfortable to use. Very nice waterproof packaging comes along with multiple sizes of earbuds selection. It charges very fast and has the wireless charging features which is great. Long and durable batteries. Great connection strength which delivers unbelievable soundings. Would definitely recommend it to everyone.

title: Sound plus Comfort plus Price
body:
Sound right away was most impressive. Deep bass clarity just seems to bring out the best in the rest of the music.
I wore these for over 3 hours outside doing yard work and not a sore or tender spot in ear afterwards. These are VERY comfortable. I do not need earbuds with any fancy functions, just great sound and excellent fit. ( Extra ear size fittings a good addition). If I needed to be convinced further by videos I watched concerning this product, the price made it an easy decision to check them out, and now keep and use as my primary wireless ear buds.

title: Left earbud kept cutting out
body: Just got this product yesterday after ordering it the day before (very quick delivery). Once I opened the package I read the instructions, charged the charger and the earbuds and paired as instructed. Within an hour the left earbud started to cut out every 2-3 minutes for a second or two. I resetted the earbuds (per the manual) and the same things started happening again. Tried three times and finally gave up. For $50.00 I expect this thing to work right. Other cons, sound is not the best, the charging cord is very short (about 6 inches) and the range is less than about 10 feet. Just returned this product to Amazon.

title: Small, compact and overall a great product.
body: Sound is amazing, haven't had it enough to know how long the battery lasts on average, but I love how the case is a portable charging station. On a comfort level, I would say it's a 3.8/5. But like many earbuds, you can't lay on your side with them without feeling discomfort. Works great when at the gym and it grips your ear pretty well. I haven't tested the water resistance since I'd rather be safe than sorry. Final thoughts are I would definitely recommend this, it's almost up there with my wireless headphones. 4.2/5

title: Terrible decision!
body: The worst purchase decision in recent memory.  It was the relatively high rating that sold me.  Wish I'd never heard of this product.  The earpiece failed the very first time it  was used.  While on a simple walk, the device fell out of my ear, and was nearly impossible to find.  After a change of the fitting for the ear, a second attempt was made, and with the very same result.  Before the walk ended, the dang thing fell out again.  This was an awful decision.  Several have said I should have bought the Apple equivalent.  You live and you learn.

title: Great for cycling
body: I needed earbuds that would stay in my right ear while road cycling - tried others, but this one is the best!  Also, easy to connect (and, stays connected no drop in signal) with Bluetooth.  Overall, a very good price/value.  Ideally, if the buds where a little thinner, they'd be outstanding - however, I would buy again and that did not distract from my 5-start rating!

title: pretty good
body: enjoyed these when they work, customer service is good for when there are problems

title: Quality sound for the price!
body: I'm not a big audiophile or anything, but to me these fit the bill perfectly! They fit perfectly in my small ears and didn't budge after an intense run. It was very easy to pair with my phone when I first got them too. I can barely hear any outside sound when I have them on, and the sound quality is very nice. Definitely happy with this purchase.

title: I am not impressed
body:
First, really interesting that I received an email from tozo service stating they will mail me a free wireless charger in exchange for a 5 star review.  REALLY.
The noise cancellation is great, but if I get more than a few feet from my device, I lose sound.  I have had them 3 days, I will give them one week in hopes they will get better.  If not, they will be returned as junk.

title: Good wireless earbuds.
body:
I liked the freedom of wireless without a bulky earpiece.  It's worth taking the time to ensure the earpiece attachment used is the correct size for your ear because it will effect the hearing experience.  The charging time is amazing along with the convenience and size of the storage case / charging case.  For the price, well worth the purchase.

Update- good for listening but my for calls the other party cannot hear me well.

title: An experience
body: I may have a skewed perspective because I used cheap earbuds for working out for a long time, but when I first put these on and pressed play it sounded like the orchestra was in my head. The best trait of these headphones by far is the stereo control they have. Next would be their strong and clear bass. The only downside is that sometimes there is distortion in the mid to high range, but I haven't personally owned any headphones that don't have this. I'm a musician so sound quality matters a lot, and for the price these do an EXCELLENT job

title: They fit and don’t fall out. The sound quality is really really good
body:
I was debating on getting the Apple air pods but the money didn’t seem to fit in my budget and the earbuds from Apple don’t fit in my ear. I came across these and looked up the reviews on amazon and YouTube  and they were ALL good reviews.  Not one bad one. And the guys reviewing them were Bass thumpers. Lol
I am so pleased with these. The price is right and the sound quality is as good as any others I’ve listened to. And they fit my ears perfect!!!! I worked out and did some heavy head banging and they stayed put. I’m so happy I purchased these. It’s a good deal and so worth it!

title: Awful!!!
body: Just received this item yesterday and tried it out at the gym today. Even after changing the ear piece, they would not stay in my ear at the gym. God forbid you’re chewing gum because that will knock them out too. The left side kept fading in and out while my music was playing. And, at one point they wouldn’t even sync to my phone. I had to CONSTANTLY keep adjusting them during my workout, it was so annoying. And lastly, trying to run with them in my ear, it was impossible!!!

title: Great wireless earbuds for someone on a budget
body:
I've had these earbuds for almost a week and so far I do love them.
  Pros
- Nice sound quality
-Quick sync to phone
-Feels durable
-looks stylish
-easy instructions and set up
-inexpensive
  Cons
-battery life isn't amazing but it's not bad but the charging case helps with this issue
-sometimes during the pairing only my right one will work and I have to disconnect them and retry a few times

Overall these are some really nice wireless earbuds the pros far outweigh the cons of the product. I'd recommend these to anyone whose looking for wireless earbuds but they are also on a budget

title: They are buying 5 star reviews by giving away their other products
body:
I got these headphones because I have been interested in not having a cord running to my phone anymore, gets caught on things.  These headphones seemed to fit what I was looking for as the reviews were very good and when I first tried them the sound quality was good as well.  After wearing them a handful of times I noticed a number of things.
1. The left ear made a popping/clicking sound when I put it in, the sound that a plastic yogurt container with an aluminum foil lid makes when you just barely squeeze it.  My guess is that it has something to do with the pressure equalizing but since the right did not make a noise I reached out to the company to exchange them.  I was told that the ones I had must be defective and they would send out new ones so I have them in a few days.  After using them for another 1.5 weeks or so, waiting for my new ones to arrive, the bluetooth began to drop almost constantly.  The only way I could solve the problem was to have my phone in my hand in front of me or to have it in my button up shirt pocket, kinda makes it hard to do anything else.  After 1.5 weeks I reached out to the company again to ask what was going on as I was then interested in either returning the headphones.  They apologized and said that they forgot to put them in the mail and they would be at my house in 1-2 days.  After 4 days I got home from work and started the return paperwork when the second pair arrived.  I tried them for 1 day and found that they had the same bluetooth problem as the first.
2. When I got the headphones I signed up for their warranty program.  When you sign up for the program they ask for your amazon order number, if you have purchased more than one of their products in one amazon order then you need to email them so that both items get in their warranty system.
3. When you sign up for their program they also send you an email.  If you give them a 5 star review they will send you a free wireless charger.
4. I fully charged the ear buds and the box they come in and after 3 days of not using them the box was at half charge, horrible battery life.

They got 2 stars because the sound quality was really good, everything else was poor at best.

title: Comfortable Buds with Quality Sound
body:
After trying a couple other sets of wireless earbuds, here are the top 3 things I appreciate about the TOZO T10s.

First, they are very comfortable. I tried another set but they didn't seal well in my ears, and the sleeves had rough edges. I couldn't keep them in more than a few minutes before they started to rub and hurt. But the TOZO T10s have great soft sleeves that feel great and cancel noise well every time I put them in. And they're snug: they don't fall out when I'm working out or running, and that was the main reason I looked at these.

Second, the sound is fantastic! As I mentioned, the TOZO T10s cancel noise pretty well, and even at a quarter of full volume the music I listen to is well-balanced with the right amount of bass, treble, and everything in between. I'm very pleased with the sound quality.

Finally, the TOZO T10s look great. They have a low profile in my ears, unlike some wireless earbuds that are too large and bulky.

Besides these features, the charging case is sturdy, I like that the earbuds are magnetically held in the case for a good charge, and they pair easily to each other and to my phone/computer every time. I'm very pleased with this purchase!

title: Great value for the price!
body: The reason for the three star reviews for noise cancellation and battery life is because I just received these yesterday.  So far I love them.  The sound is great and they are perfect for what I use them for.  I will update this review in a few weeks when I have used them more.  The quality is excellent and the price is right!

title: Well spent money!!!!
body: The best bluetooth wireless earbuds I've ever had so far, i was looking for some discreet earbuds that i can wear @work to listen my music on. The package says the battery last for 4 hours each one, but I used it for 5+ hours before it disconnect (I only used 1 of them because of my type of job). The charging box for them is wireless charging compatible A+ (and I love it). They stay in place and don't hurt your ears. The battery on the charger works pretty well, I just charged it once since I got them 2 days ago (it says it comes full but I just charged them before I use them just in case). I have received calls and I haven't had any issues with interference or people don't understanding  what I'm saying (I work on a warehouse and there's a lot of noise in there). They sound pretty good, the bass doesn't bother at all, the voices are cristal clear. I love them.

title: TURN THEM BACKWARDS FOR A TIGHT FIT OR YOU WILL LOSE THEM AND NEVER FIND IT.
body:
Great product overall for a good price. Found them very user friendly. Water proof stood up to pool dip and heavy sweat.

I lost the left side running one day. IMPLEMENT A FIND FEATURE. You could easily do it with bluetooth or at least a bright flashing light.

Case could be slimmer. I didnt like carrying the case bc it was just barely too bulky for the pocket.

title: 100% Satisfied
body:
I give this product 5 stars because it's a great product for the price. It's a sturdy, low profile, and stylish. I haven't tested its waterproofing yet but there's a sketch of a guy swimming with them in the manual. The sound quality is good. However, if you're an audiophile and are meticulous about sound quality, you may find the sound in these "satisfactory". Honestly, you're probably not going to find a much better sound in earbuds of this nature and price. But overall, a good buy if you're looking for a cheaper alternative to airpods.

One thing I need to note; you may find people saying these earbuds have good noise canceling. While it is good, don't mistake it for "active" noise canceling. These earbuds will block as much sound as you'd think plastic and electrical components would. So just keep that in mind.

title: Dont waste your money.
body: God awful. They cant hold a connection, so they unsync and sync repeatedly. They fall out of my ears a lot despite trying various angles of them being in there. They shut off randomly, which confuses my laptop audio software and then my gaming sounds end up blasting everyone around me. The mic has a hard time catching your voice at the start of your calls, and the overall sound quality is worse than the cheapest pair of Walmart headphones. Definitely would not recommend to anyone.

title: Love these for driving & listening to music!
body: I was not sure which wireless earbuds to buy. My niece told me she bought 2 different brands that were over $100.00 that were not loud enough & had difficulty connecting to her Bluetooth. Then she bought this pair & loved. That made my decision for me. She was right, they are amazing. They are easy to pair to my phone & sound is great. My husband just bought a pair once he tried mine. He loves it!!!

title: Great product, no big complaints.
body: These are a great pair of ear buds. Only issue i have, and i've had this issue with other similar products, every now and then it can't decide which one to send the signal to. i'll have the left ear bud in, and decide to use both and it will cancel the left and move it all to the right and vice versa. but just put them back in the case and pull them both out and works just fine.

title: Excellent price, sound, and perfect fit with options for ear pieces.  Nice.
body: These earbuds fit perfectly, are fast to pair with your device, and come in a very nice charging case.  Great value for the price.  I use them while doing home improvement projects or while cutting the grass.  Now that it’s summer, I’m curious to see how they’ll perform at the beach!  Thanks, Tozo! Keep up the good work.

title: Weak signal unless you are close to device
body: I love these headphones. However I rated 2 stars because you have to be very close to your phone or they lose connection. Even if I only walk to the next room they cut in and out. The point of having Bluetooth headphones is lost. Yes there’s no cords but I have to carry my phone. The sound is good and the noise cancelation is also very good.

title: Good for meetings and travel.
body:
I travel a lot and I'm on a lot of meetings that I need to call into. These headphones work great for both. I'm always a little skeptical with reviews, but these little gems are great. Sound quality is great, they're easy to set up, and surprisingly. The mic works really well. I've had no complaints on my business meetings that I sound muffled or can't be heard, which is fantastic.
The battery life of the fully charged earbuds is roughly 3 hours, which covers me for most flights I'm on. This is great for flights that I don't get my own personal screen, so I can just pair these with my Surface or iPhone. Once my headphones run out of juice, I just pop them into the case to be charges again. It's great because if the case is charged. I don't have to worry about plugging anything in.
It comes with multiple sizes for the silicone ear piece, and it was easy to swap then out for the smallest size to fit my ears.
I would definitely recommend these to anyone.

title: Great Value and Quality!!
body: I love my wireless T10’s. I was worried that the low price meant I had to sacrifice something in the quality. I was wrong!! These headphones are amazing!! They are comfortable to wear. I have small ears and most earbuds hurt when I use them. I was able to adjust the tozo t10’s to the smallest size and I can wear them for several hours at a time. The sound quality is amazing. I use them at work and while exercising and have no problems keeping them in. I am able to answer the phone while listening to music. I love that they are completely wireless. There are no cords hanging on my desk while working. Definitely a great pair of headphones and totally worth buying!!

title: Awesome earbuds for the price!
body: Super happy with my purchase of these wireless earbuds. At this relatively low pricepoint, you never really know what you're going to get, but the TOZO T10's definitely punch above their weight.  Sound quality is great, especially on the low end. They also seem to be able to play louder than different brands I've had in the past. Battery life is very good (and the charging case fits easily in my pocket), the quality of construction is solid, and I like the way they look.  I paid just under $50 and I think it's well worth it at that price!

title: A huge step up from the last wireless earbuds that I had.
body:
There are a few things that I love about these earbuds.

The design - very sleek and the earbuds fit in my ears quite comfortably!
The sound - the sound quality, is great though I was the bass was a bit deeper.
The charging case - it seems like it's very durable and the fact that it has wireless charging is a plus!
Water Proof - I have a pool and used these in the pool and they work fine still.

Overall, a great product!

***Update***

1 month later only one of the headphones are working correctly after taking them for a swim. (So I retracted my 5-star rating to a 2) The waterproof aspect is what sold me but I was ultimately let down.

***Update***
Awesome customer service, they replaced my headphones no hassle. Back to a 5 star!

title: Excellent value!
body: I'm really pleased with my headphones. The sound quality and noise cancellation are both superb. I've noticed I drop connection occasionally, but that might be my device or due to movement. Definitely recommend them.

title: Great for the price.
body: I had originally bought some Kissral headphones before these. I did not like the base on the Kissral. I ended up getting these due to a bigger drive on earpiece. I'm not disappointed from the sound and fit. I'm so happy I returned the kissral and got these. From the base, highs, and mids, it all sounds great. For $50 you are deffinetely getting your money's worth.

title: Excellent wireless earbuds
body: I am extremely happy with my Tozo T10 earbuds.  I have used them for 4 weeks in two different ways:  1)  at work  and 2) for running workouts.  For work, they do well with phone calls, noise cancellation, and music quality.  For running workouts, they work well with lack of slippage, water/sweat resistance, and music quality.  The battery life is pretty good for the most part.  For the money, this is a no brainer....especially considering the high quality.

title: Surprise! An inexpensive set of headphones that do it all very well for little $
body:
Let me start by saying this- I am a critical listener and I am very hard on headphones. I use them primarily for working out, where I sweat all over them, then take them to the sauna afterwards. I have been through several pairs over the years, and not one pair satisfied me. I started with the Motorola S9 about 16 years ago. Went through five pairs of those. I worked for Harman where I got anything below cost so had several pairs from JBL, Harman/Kardon, Infinity, and AKG.

When I got these I was sick of the cord between the buds, so these were my first true ear buds. I didn’t expect much and I waited a month and a half before writing a review. I gotta say, the sound rivals my AKG Herbie Hancock edition headphones. They actually fit and create a good seal so the bass is awesome. Controlled, smooth, and undistorted. Mods are nice and detailed and the highs are not harsh and forced like most earbuds sound.

The case is super nice, with a magnet that snaps the lid on the buds shut. They automatically come on and pair when you take them out. Every now and then I have to turn in the left one but it is rare. The only other drawback is on very limited occasions the left one cuts out for a half a second and comes back. Nowhere near enough to take away the fifth star.

I used to accidentally leave my phone near a workout machine and walk away, and within ten feet my old headphones would lose Bluetooth and let me know I was out of range. I’m not kidding- I can leave my phone on one side of the gym and walk to the other and the music is still strong. Whether that’s a good or bad thing, I would rather have it where it never cuts off.

Fit and balance are great. You can hardly feel like they are in. Where they really surprised me though was when I had to wait on hold for a long time to talk to an operator. I was driving and I finally got someone. Now, I’ve avoided using Bluetooth headsets to make phone calls because people are always asking “what?” Or saying “I can barely hear you- can you take me off of Bluetooth?” Not lying- it was like having a conversation in the same room, but with no background noise. I now use them for phone calls and it is much better than using the mic in my phone.

I have not found the end of the battery life yet, but I keep these in a case in my car charging all the time.

Suffice to say they vastly exceeded my expectations. I want to shake the person’s hand that led the design of these marvels. Aside from how good they are, the price is astounding. At any cost, these are the best Bluetooth headphones I have ever used. For $40, I feel like I stole them.

title: Great set of wireless earbuds!
body:
The sound quality is excellent and the battery life is as I expected with these earbuds allowing me to listen for hours without wires. The noise cancellation is very good but doesn’t quite compete with the Bose set I have for comparison. Overall, these are 5 star ear buds especially given the fact you can run in the rain in them and sound  isn’t distorted in the least.

I had an issue with the right master ear bud not working after about a month of having the set but customer service was quick to respond. They walked me through the reset process, which was also included in the packaging. Upon realizing that wasn’t the problem a new set was shipped to me. I would from this company who stands behind their product again.

title: I love these BAD BOYS!
body: I recently purchased the Apple ear buds for my wife... and because I don't like to copy her, I read the reviews on these... they sounded great... and guess what... these really do sound great... easy to charge, easy to insert... and they rock... would highly recommend these to anyone...

title: Really well designed inexpensive earbuds!
body: I've purchased several bluetooth earbuds over the last 2 years but these are by far, the best yet. The sound quality is up to par with the leading brands, the build quality is very nice (doesn't feel like cheap plastic) and the bonus is the charging case actually allows wireless charging! Not too shabby, I really like them. The packaging they arrived in was very nice quality as well. I highly recommend these!

title: I liked these earbuds so much I gave mine to my grandson!
body:
I love my grandson, so when he was visiting the other day I gave him my TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds with {Wireless Charging Case}. Of course that means I am without until the new ones I ordered arrive. Amazon Prime - Tomorrow, Tomorrow I'll have them Tomorrow!
In the past I had couldn't find earbuds that were comfortable, so I bought ear phones for comfort.  This resulted in me going to sleep listening to a book and breaking the wires during the night.  I have spent a lot of money on those. I have had these earbuds since April 10, 2019 and have had no problems with them.
These are great! While I am at work I only put in one earbud. I listen to audio books and soon discovered if I put both earbuds in I can't hear the office phone ring or people talking to me. But is great at night when I want to be in the same room with my husband but prefer listening to a book than what he is watching on TV (yes, both earbuds in). Being able to place the case on a wireless charging pad is great! So much easier than using the cord and always having to turn it over because I didn't have the correct side up the first attempt.
Obviously, I have ordered again.

title: Disappointing
body: I'm confused by why these headphones get such good ratings- I bought them on that premise.  The sound has good clarity and imaging but as far as listening to music is concerned they lack depth and definitely lack base.  Great as far as portability and having the charging case is great.  Not great for wearing in shower but they do work.  Overall an underwhelming pair of earbuds.

title: Great Headphones
body: They played continuous audio for 4 hours and 43 minutes. They really are waterproof, i have showered with them in multiple times. Audio quality and comfort is extraordinary. I honestly enjoy wearing these more than airpods.  Really, the only downsides are the shorter battery life at about 5 hours and the connection occasionally goes out in 1 ear, although this may be the fault of the cheap bt transmitter i am using.

title: Bluetooth earphones
body: I really like this product - especially for the price. They arrived perfectly and on time the sound is excellent and were extremely easy to pair with my devices, I have been using mostly with my kindle but have used with my I-phone and worked perfectly.

title: Great quality!
body: Admittedly, I was a bit skeptical about these earbuds assuming that they'd be like most ear buds, cheap and only good for a few uses. Especially after sweating them out in the gym. However, that is not the case with the high quality, water proof Tozo T10 earbuds. They are amazing quality for an amazing price. They have great sound quality and are very comfortable. My ears have smaller openings so it is difficult to find comfortable earbuds, but these are great and have 4 different sizes for all ears. Highly recommend these buds!

title: Best Bluetooth Earbuds I have Owned So Far
body:
I've had these for a couple weeks now and am very happy with the purchase. I can't speak to the longevity yet, but everything else has been great. The sound quality of these earbuds competes quite well against other more expensive earbuds I have used (airpods, JBL). The noise cancellation is great and they fit in-ear quite comfortably. Comes with different sized tips to find that right fit for you. The carrying case is compact and provides 4 charges for your buds before needing to be plugged into the charger again.

Overall I couldn't be happier with these. What you are getting for this price point can't be argued with. If you are an intense audiophile than I am sure you will find something to criticize, but then again you probably aren't using earbuds all that much either. For everyone else, I would highly recommend them. Easy to use, great sound, great fit, and great price.

title: Great sound!
body: Once you get the earbuds adjusted in your ear properly (takes a few tries) the sound is amazing. I'm still working on getting the perfect fit so that left earbud stays in. The IP8 waterproofing is a big bonus, so I was very happy to find that.

title: Great sound, but
body: Having an issue where the left earbud will cut out when my phone is in my pocket. Have done all the troubleshooting and can't correct it. Sound quality is great for the money. Wireless charging case is an awesome feature.

title: Does not work for making phone calls
body: People could not hear me when using it for phone calls.  I contacted the seller and they said that is the way they are and if I posted a kind review they would send me another set for free.  I primarily wanted them for making calls in the car.  I thought it was slimy that they try to get you to post a good review for free product.

title: These are great!
body: I am so happy with these little buds! I swapped out the standard tip for the next size up and now it really grips my ear. It doesn't fall out at all. One thing to know: both buds periodically flash during use. If you have a spouse sleeping next to you at night, these might be a slight nuisance in that respect.

title: Hidden Gem Alert!
body:
Yup these are as good as all the review say.  If you own higher end earbuds you will be very pleased on how good these sound for how little these cost.  Great packaging.  Solid case with magnetic closure and wireless charging for the case!  Highs are slightly off and bass is good but not insane.  Plenty for the average person but it's fine for everyday use.

Moral of the story.  I'd pay 50 or 60 for these easy and they are under 40 bucks!

Going to buy a second pair for my wife.  Love them!  You will too.

It's all about price point.  If you expect these to preform like a 200 set it's not gonna.  But you get a heck of a lot here for very little money.  I'd recommend.

title: Was Skeptical...AMAZING
body: I thought these were going to be too good to be true, but I was pleasantly surprised! The noise cancelation alone is worth the 50 bucks. The sound quality is stellar. The charging case is study and has a good weight to it. I loved the three sizes of ear buds, that is super helpful. They sync up perfectly every time. Plus with the one year warranty... you can't go wrong! Buy them!!!

title: Has the bass output that's lacking in other ear buds.
body: Has the bass output that's lacking in other ear buds.  No need to boost bass output.  Product responds to left and right ear bud press response for pause and play.  Have not rated phone call response yet.  Will add a star when I've completely tested over time.

title: Very Nice
body:
A great item.  The ones I had previously didn't last long and didn't want to spend a lot of money.
These absolutely do the trick.
Thanks.

title: Amazing sound quality
body: I was surprised by the quality of the sound. They're a steal and well worth the price.

title: Clarity while using it to talk..
body:
I'm currently a android Note 8 owner.
 I think these are average ear buds. I had really high expectations and I'm a little disappointed.  Maybe I should have tempered my expectations a little. The ear buds are quite good when listening to music but when using them while on the phone I've been getting complaints that I sound muffled, far away, and/or they can barely hear me.  Maybe there is some setup or adjustment required I haven't made to correct this but that's been my experience so far.

title: Great for what I need them for
body: They are good easy to pair love the sound. Not to big not to small. The charge is good for a few hours. The left ear bud does go in and out a little. Over all they are great for what I need them for. Dropped them a few Times at work (taking them out) they are not broke or scratched

title: Very pleased with these earbuds!
body: My boyfriend and I were very pleased with these earbuds! First of all, they pair and connect to your phone with ease. They do a really great job of cancelling out noise and produce great sound. I can put them on and study to some music without getting distracted by my surroundings. When put in correctly, I can work out without them falling out. One of my ears are a little smaller than the other though so one side doesn’t fit as snug as I’d like and I have to keep pushing it back in. But the other ear fits perfectly and I have no issues with the bud moving around or falling out. I really like the look and functionality of the charging case as well. I like that you can see the charging lights through the lid so you know everything is charging properly. Been using these constantly since I got them a few days ago, charged them inside the case once and haven’t had to charge them up again yet. Overall very happy with my purchase and will be recommending these to EVERYONE

title: Solid operation, good value and middle of the pack sound
body:
Good fit although functions are limited and sound is good, not great.
Bass a little overdone at the expense of mid-range and highs. Good fit in ear. Decent battery time. I prefer tight accurate bass, the are a little muddy. Still listenable and a good value but hard to get too excited about.

title: All around excellent value earbud!
body: I purchased these to replace a set of Apple EarPods that I lost. I just couldn’t stomach blighting off another $170 bucks.  That being said, I am only regretful that I didn’t buy the TOZO T10s in the first place. The sound quality is great and the noise canceling is a great added benefit that the EarPods did not provide. I’m hoping that I can keep up with these, but if not, I’d gladly buy another set of these.

title: These get loud enough to drown out my lawn mower...
body: Nice fit. Nice sound. Good sound quality. I love the way these fire up and connect automagically as I’m jamming them in my ears. Als the wireless charging feature is awesome.

title: Comfortable, great sound, 5-star quality
body: I usually buy headphones with over ear attachments for working out because I was nervous that pods would fall out of my ears. These fit perfectly and are super comfortable. The sound quality is surprisingly good and crisp sounding. They definitely cancel out noise well. I have to take them out to hear someone speaking to me, even if I’m not playing music. I would strongly suggest these EarPods. They are surprisingly good quality for the price and did not disappoint. The charging case is a nice touch also!

title: Best Option for Listening to music in the water
body: I bought these because I like to swim, yet I get bored after awhile in the pool. So the music breaks up the boredom. I have to change what swim strokes I do because the connection only works above water, but having the music is worth it.

title: Very happy these earbuds
body: I wanted to get plenty of use out of these headphones before writing a review. I am happy with the earbuds. They have allot of fitting options. They fit my ears great. The sound quality is nice as well  Great volume with plenty of bass. Phone calls sound good to both parties.

title: Great quality but usability not thought out!
body: This is my 2nd pair. The 1st keep falling out and very heavy and I returned them...These are stable and actually stay in the ear canal reducing outside noises..fits like a glove in my ear and not weighty. After 20 days Ive notice there is not a power off feature on these..nor an option to use Only the left or right as I have to have1 ear open for work. It would give alot of usuage if I could alternate both l/r but it uses same charge for both at same time. Also once used and disconnected it has to reset to the charger box just to reuse..thats a hassle!

title: Good sound, Good quality, and Good customer service.
body: I bought two set of T10 earbuds. One pair for myself and a pair for my girlfriend. She has had trouble with the fitment even with the smallest size ear cap. They won’t sit in her  ear canal and would fall out easily.  I really like the sound and quality of the earbuds and they cancel out the noise great. TOZO was also willing to help trying to solve the fitment issues she was having by sending “mini ear caps. “ for free. Fitment for my ears were great and I have no issues. For the price you can’t beat it.

title: Amazing sound quality in a tiny, affordable package
body:
My previous set of bluetooth headphones had lost their ability to hold a charge, so I looked at buying new ones. I was only looking for something which would have decent sound quality and reasonable isolation, and something which would have better battery life. These were on sale, so I decided to give them a try.

Not only do these fit incredibly comfortably, but the sound quality is very good. There's a tiny amount of background hiss (as is typical for actively powered headphones) but it's low enough that it doesn't interfere with my enjoyment of the music, and it does serve a purpose in letting me know they're turned on.

The controls on the earbuds themselves could be a little better; I wish there were some way of controlling the volume and skipping music tracks, but it only has play/pause and an assortment of call controls.

Unlike my previous earbuds, these don't play an audio indication whenever the music track changes, which is good (that was really annoying). Rather than playing little jingles on connect/disconnect, a voice speaks in English. I'd rather have a little tone but the voice prompts are pretty okay too.

I also tried recording a voice memo using the microphone, and while the signal level was a bit low (meaning I might come through a bit quietly on a phone call) the sound quality was fine, and surprising considering the microphone is physically in my ear. It might have trouble dealing with background noise. We'll see.

The little charging/carrying case is nicely designed. It's a bit big compared to the Apple AirPods, but it has enough battery to charge the earbuds 4 times, and it also itself can be charged wirelessly or via USB. Which is something the AirPods still can't do.

All in all these are great little earbuds and are well worth the money. Even at their normal price they're orders of magnitudes less expensive than the AirPods or the Jabra Elite 65t, too.

title: Just okay.
body: They're fine. A little bigger than I thought. The microphone is terrible. Great noise cancellation. I wanted to be able to use it for music and phone calls but no dice. Just music.

title: Worth it. Great bass. Stays in ears.
body: I was in search for the best headphones and these fit the bill. One of the most important things I was looking for was bass and these absolutely didn’t let me know. The bass is great. Make sure you get a tight fit and these puppies bump. They claim to be water proof too, but I’m not sure I’ll test that. Worth the money spent.

title: Great sound, great range
body: We are quite happy with the ear buds. They were easy to set up. We compared them with the Samsung earbuds and found the sound quality to be much better- more robust and full. The range surprised me, so much better than expected. Our house is not too big and I can roam the whole floor and remain connected. Haven't tried them near water yet but they fit well so expect they will perform well.

title: A lot of bit shocked
body: I bought these because when traveling am always concerned of losing my Bose wireless. So I purchased these and wow, they sound as good and play louder!  Thinks the Bose are going up for sale on Craig’s list and will buy an additional pair.

title: Amazing sound, comfortable fit and great price
body: I’m amazed by the deep sound that these earbuds produce.  My last headphones were Beats 2 Bluetooth.  They were good but the sound on Tozo T10 is much better in the full spectrum, however, the bass is much better.  In addition they stay in my ears better.  I have odd shaped ears but these guys popped right in and fit great.  I also hated the cord on the beats 2. It would stick to my neck and pull out the buds.  The truly wireless is so much better.

title: Sound in quality!
body: I  Was so excited to make this purchase .Once received the product is  well made , the sound is great I am very happy with my purchase!!!  I would definitely recommend you  Purchasing these as I will be purchasing a second pair for my hubby as  where fighting over them lol . The price is also great .  Highly recommended!!!!!!

title: Pretty good so far
body:
I have issues with all headphones; nothing stays in my ears but this one has been great so far.I've had to adjust between different sizes that were provided in the box.
The next test will be running while wearing it and I will update the review after that.

title: Very Please
body: I ordered these because when I work out, the ones I have that go around my neck would fall off when getting up after being on my back.  The only issue I have is if your chewing gum and sweating, they have a tendency to work their way of of your ear.  When I'm not working out, I have no issues with them falling out.

title: What a waste 😒 of my money
body:
I bought them on 5/5/19 and as of 10/5/19 the right ear does not hold a charge vand the left ear hold a charge for 40 mins only. I have used these earbuds 2 to 3 times a week for about an hour and a half each time.
I don't recommend these ear buds and would not purchase them again.  Very disappointed ☹️😞.

title: WOW
body:
I wasn’t sure what to expect since these were 1/3 the cost of my Bose wireless earbuds that recently fell apart. The sound quality is amazing. I don’t have to turn up the volume as much as I needed to with my Bose wireless earbuds. My son is watching TV a few feet in front of me and I can’t hear the TV at all. These do a great job of blocking out external noise. Very happy with my purchase.

So far the microphone works well. I did not test that feature for very long and I have not tested the battery life yet.

.

title: Exceptional high quality product at a reasonable price.
body: This product is quite amazing. Inexpensive and made of high quality materials the sound quality matches over the ear, noise canceling ear phones. Bass sounds are excellent. The charging case is of very high quality. If you need compact, high quality  ear buds for a reasonable price, the T-10, in my opinion, will meet your needs.

title: Very Good Value
body: Being a part time musician I am picky about how my music sounds. In my estimation these ear buds sound better than a lot of sets costing much, much more. Bass tone is good and doesn’t blow out the mids and highs. Easy to pair with iPhone or iPad. I think I’ll order more to cover me when my wife steals them.

title: Great for syncing to laptop for work
body: I bought these to replace my corded head set for my laptop for work. I was tired of being tied to my computer and ripping the head phones on and off whenever I needed to move out of my chair. These are fitting the bill quite nicely. The sound quality is good (only voice so far - haven’t tried it for music) and the included microphone in one of the ear buds works great - no complaints from folks I’ve been on web-based calls with. The battery charge seems to be better than expected - no problems during 4-5 hour sessions at the computer (both in standby and in use during that time). I didn’t give it 5 stars as it doesn’t appear there’s a warning when the batteries die. Or maybe there is and I just haven’t used them long enough to drain the battery entirely.

title: Use in Hot Tub Everyday & Around Pool while Stretching
body:
I use them everyday in the hot tub. I’ve also used them in the steam room. I like that if your charging them with a Micro-USB cable you can fold the cover all the way back so they can dry better while they charge. When I get them really wet I let them air dry for a few hours before I charge them again.
They are louder than I thought they would be, very impressed with that.

I haven’t heard any complaints on call quality, on my end they sound good. Only used a few times doing that in the pool though when stretching ( usually don’t answer ).

Overall very satisfied so far.

title: Amazing sound but even better customer service!
body: These headphones are so worth the money! They last forever and when I have them in they are perfectly noise canceling. I take them running, shopping and to work and they don't fall out, very nice fit. The customer service is wonderful as well. I  had a few questions about the product so I wrote them a quick email and received a fast and thoughtful reply. Extremely happy with my experience!

title: Good head phones, long battery
body: The battery life on these is great, but the sound is not as loud, and the noice cancelling is alright, but when you somewhere loud like a gym, it's a bit hard to hear

title: Good for Exercise and Showering
body: I've worn these for running and haven't had any problem with them falling out or going loose. They fit quite snugly. If you are not sure whether they will fit or not, four different sizes are provided to adjust to your ear size. The sound quality is good. Noise cancellation is definitely on point. I haven't had any problems with the battery life. I worn them for over an hour and haven't had any trouble with them. The best part is that they are waterproof, so wearing them in the shower is great! If I don't want to bother my roommates by playing music on a speaker, this works as a great solution! TOZO also provides great service. They have really gone out of their way to ensure that I have a great experience, which will most likely be the case if you decide to purchase these as well.

title: Awesome Sound For Such a Little Thing!
body: I got these for my workouts.  I sweat a lot, so I am always on the lookout for waterproof BT headsets.  When my last BT conked out on me, I searched on Amazon for the next one, and came across these.  After reading all the questions and answers and the reviews, I bought them.  They came the next day, and I immediately charged them.  It took me literally 20 seconds from taking them out of the charger, put them in my ears, to pairing them, for me to listen to my first song.  The sound quality is so much better than my last headset for sure.  But what I love most of all is that I can take a shower, and listen to my music without any interruption.  How cool is that?  I have had more expensive headsets in the past, but wasn't as happy as I am now with these.  For only $49.99, these are a steal!

title: Quality Headset!  Great Volume
body: I've had mine for only about a week so far but i'm loving them.  They last most of a day and will charge back to full in the case in under an hour.  I've owned a couple other types of wireless headsets in the past and the sound quality and more importantly to me anyway the volume on these is much better.  it's the first pair i've owned that i didn't have to just leave them on max volume all day.

title: Great Bluetooth Ear Buds
body:
In the past I have bought a few Bluetooth ear buds from Amazon.  For the price and the quality of this product, I could not approve of this product more than I already do.  A few of the pluses to this product: booming bass, clear mids and treble, qi wireless charging that charges the ear buds while off of the actual micro USB charger.  They are also waterproof! I'm sure if they ever have a problem, this company would stand by their product!

Thank you, Tozo

title: Broken after first swim
body: This is supposed to be supporting swimming. I only swam for 10 minutes and one of the ear pods was broken right there that moment. The bluetooth was also unreliable. I broadcasted music from my Fitbit, the distance was less than a feet in any given time, and the connection never worked properly.

title: Mic does not pick up my voice
body:
I really wanted to like these ear buds. Seem to be well built. Playing music is decent (but I'm a 60-something so my ears are not terribly sensitive any more).

The mic killed them for me.

People on the other end of a phone call  say I sound far away. They have difficulty hearing my voice. I have a voice that carries across the room, so it's not me talking too quietly.

Returning for a refund, sadly.

title: Awesome headphones with some flaws.
body:
I really enjoy these headphones with 1 major complaint. The left side likes to cut in and out. Otherwise they are awesome. I am debating looking into a replacement, but I don’t want to be without headphones while I wait for the replacements.

EDITED to 2 stars:
The cutting out seems to have gotten worse.
