title: My Best friend for pool walking and water running
body:
You have to fiddle a bit to find the best fit for the ear bud to keep the water out -so not exactly like regular earbuds. That said, these are the best thing I have added to my morning workout routine at the club. Great sound quality and connection to my phone while walking a 25 meter pool. I wear glasses all the time and they do not distort the shape of my ear to set my glasses wonky, nor are they pushed out of my ear when I move my glasses. The connecting and syncing is a little finicky when you're dealing with multiple items they can sync to (fitbit Versa and Android phone for instance), but once connected I'm good for an hour or more without interruptions.
True to technology, bluetooth does not travel through water, so the sound will cut out while swimming with your head in the water and occassionally while in the shower.

title: Bien
body: Bien

title: Best earbuds I've owned...period!
body: I'm extremely happy with this purchase.  I use it at my work computer and the charging station is very convenient.  You just drop the earpiece in the slot when you're not using it and it charges.  As soon as you pick it up, it reconnects with the device.  It does take a few seconds to finish connecting, but that's not even something that's worth getting annoyed over.  I was a former professional musician, and I can say that the sound quality is excellent for the price and the bass is better than any in-ear solution I've tried.  Buy with confidence!

title: bluetooth ear buds you can trust
body: people try to give a accurate account on what they hear and we trust them and buy. sometimes they are right and sometimes they are dead wrong. well i been looking for a pair of blue tooth ear buds for 3 months and most of the big name brands like bose jabra and others have annoying issues and if you look at reviews its only 3 stars. well let me help you and save you time and money and a real review: I just bought the TOZO T10-R $35.00 i think it was and i must say  talking on phone has been good> Good tight fit . they are not falling out. most of all is the sound now if you are looking for all bass and not really sound then keep it moving but if you care about quality sound then stay right here .sound is really great i mean crystal clear and no delay in nothing video or music and there is enough bass to make you happy trust me. the more i listen to them the more i love them even at max sound level crystal clear .if i had just one more notch  of loudness they would be a 95 but 94 out of a 100 is not so bad. hope to help somebody because some of these reviews on others earbuds like the ones i'm returning are so sad. they say good or great  and its far from it.

title: What a great product for the price!
body: I am totally satisfied with my new  TOZO earphones. Honestly it has gone beyond my expectations and is just exactly what I need at this present time. I have no complaints so far....I don’t know if this happens with every body but Just a word of advise, when you are about to use your ear buds, it helps to 1st take out the right ear bud and then the left ear bud 2nd while it pairs to your devices.  Majority of times I have found that doing it the opposite way would sometimes have only one of them working.... then you would have to reinsert it back on the battery holder and the take the R then L  for both to work  inSync together

title: Incredible buy!
body: My 13 year old was desperate for a pair of apple ear pods and I was not prepared to spend that kind of money, especially after all the complaints I had heard about them. She is a competitive swimmer and also a cross country runner, so we needed sweat/waterproof. I did my homework, read reviews, and got these for her! She LOVES them! Quality is unmatched, especially for the price point! I will be buying another set for myself when the Gold is back in stock!

title: Great sound quality, great battery
body: These have very nice sound quality for the price. I have had a JBL Free X, which is more than twice the price and these sound as good as those if not better. The only downside is that they occasionally disconnect depending on the angle of  your head, but a little adjustment makes that go away. Note that almost all bluetooth in ear headphones do disconnect somewhat at this point so this is a non issue.

title: Good quality for the good price
body: Small and compact. Very comfortable fit in my ear.  Sound is very clear and crisp.  Right volume unlike some other brands that the volume were too low could not hear very well even when we turned the volume all the way up.  The TOZO T10 earbuds is great for the price and the quality can be compared to the expensive brand name buds.  I am very satisfied with my purchase.  I work at the airport, people lost their earbuds all the time, including me.  I lost 2 of my very expensive ones.  Surprisingly, I never lost the cheap ones even when I left them around charging or forgotten.  Nobody turned the expensive ones in even with my name and phone number labeled on it.  No one touched the cheap ones.  I told myself I will never to buy expensive earbuds again.  When I saw this one I said I'll try this one.  The price is in the middle range and hope the quality should not be too bad and better than the cheaper ones I got.  This way I will enjoy the music and the movies with this and would not get too upset if I lose another buds.  I am not disappointed with the quality.  Hopefully, I will not lose this one either because it's not an expensive brand name buds.

title: Brilliant!!
body:
Wonderful!!
I was on the fence about buying some Bluetooth headphones but I ended up purchasing that's and wish I had done so earlier.

The headphones are great quality and very comfortable to wear. I have tiny ears and wear the smallest buds. They stay in amazingly well as don't hurt my ears like other types.

Then there is the case. I am blown away but the case as it holds additional charges for the headbuds. It has magnets that hold the earbuds in place and that also closes the lid. Sick a brilliant design!!

title: Superb sound quality and excellent craftsmanship
body: I use the earbuds with an iPad. The sound quality is excellent. First time use is intuitive and easy. The earbuds paired immediately and connected with my device easily. I just love not having to use cords.

title: Lot of Improvisation needed
body:
After a lot of research I decided to buy, but not worth the money

The good:
Amazing sound with good bass depth
Noise cancellation is good
Does not hurt the ears.
Holds charge for long period

The not so good:
Everytime you charge and wear, Frequent Connectivity Issues
Annoying message, right connection, left connection and pairing.
When you put it in the pocket, the connectivity is intermittent
When you move your head to left or right the loses connection
I believe, there are some channels in the earbuds and it keep shifting which is so annoying
Not ideal for phone calls, hard to hear for the people on the other side.
--Updated 6/4/2019
Terrible product, disconnects frequently, slight wind disconnects, turning your head disconnects, quite annoying. Not worth the money

----Update Review August 2, 2019
The seller contacted, sent another one to evaluate, I am increasing my stars to 4 as they followed up, I am taking off one star, I still have interference in the frequency intermittently, also this product is great for music and not for talking purpose, indoor calling is very feeble, outdoor calling is terrible, seller needs to explicitly state this until its good for calling purpose.

title: Unbelievable sound. I’ve tried and returned other other ear buds, but this is a keeper
body: I’ve tried and returned a number of other ear buds, disappointed in the sound, specifically the lack of bass. I was shocked amazed when I hears these.  I was listening to some random song on Sirius, and these blew me away.  I switched to a channel playing Boston.  Just like I remembered in college.  Then I tried a channel with Eric Clapton. Same impressive sound. Lastly I tried Pink Floyd.  I can’t say enough, but I will 😃

title: Great earbuds, great price!
body:
I was looking at a few more expensive models of earbuds and saw these on Amazon. I decided to try these given the reviews, water resistance and price. I have not been disappointed. These buds have great sound quality and stay in my ear very well. I have been very active with them and so far they have not fallen out. It is important to pick the right size ear piece for a proper fit (different sizes are included). Pairing is seamless on my iPhone no problems. I have had a few very minor breaks in sound when streaming Pandora, not sure if it’s the buds or the stream but not a huge issue at all. Phone calls are clear and have had no feedback saying that I cannot be heard. Overall for the price point these are great earbuds!

Update (10/11/19): The left earbud has stopped working and I contacted Tozo Support for warranty help. Prompt response with same day shipping of replacement earbuds.  I hope this pair lasts awhile but I know the company stands behind their product if I need help in the future.

title: Good but....
body:
Left ear bud died completely after first time in water. Other than that, these buds are great. Will upgrade review pending quality of customer service...

Update: customer service is BEYOND excellent! Rating 5 stars for product support and replacement unit. Thank you!

title: Do not recommend
body:
I was really excited for these earbuds. I checked the reviews and they looked promising, so I caved and ordered them.

Once my package arrived, I noticed it was substantially larger than what I'd expect for a small box of earbuds. I picked it up and my heart dropped as I heard my brand new earbuds just sliding around, slamming on the sides of the box. Once I opened it, there was absolutely no padding inside. Just this tiny box of earbuds. So right off the bat I wasn't too happy due to poor packaging. Luckily, the earbuds didn't look damaged. I charged them for a bit before I paired them to my phone, which was quick and easy.

I wasn't a big fan on the sound quality. I wouldn't consider myself an audiophile, but I do like to enjoy my music with decent audio quality, and this just wasn't cutting it. The bass? It just felt off. I'm not sure what it was, but it sounds "flooded" if that makes any sense. These are also not comfortable in the slightest. I probably wore these for about 30 minutes total and I tried every size that it came with. They all just hurt. Bad. My ears were so sore and I felt a huge sense of relief when I finally took them out.

The biggest issue I had overall was the mic quality. I made a phone call with these earbuds and I had to basically yell so they could hear me. After my call I recorded myself so I could hear what it sounded like, and I could barely hear myself even with the volume on max. I thought it was maybe my phone, but I tried it with another pair of bluetooth headphones that I've had before and it was just fine.

I realized that this just wasn't worth keeping. I spent an extra $16 and ordered a different pair and couldn't be happier. They're just all-around better compared to these TOZO T10's. I'm going to be returning them soon.

title: Awful clipping in high frequency ranges regardless of input volume
body:
Excellent build quality, great feeling case, and great fitting earbuds. Not a fan of the button, you smash your eardrums just pressing it.

I had to return these however - the high end of these earbuds, regardless of volume level or EQ (i never use an EQ and i did try multiple devices), clips unbelievably. I'm actually shocked so many people seem to enjoy them. If you enjoy rock or metal stay away. Soft electronic, youtube videos etc were great. The second a drummer hits a cymbal you will cringe. Total shame because the low end response is pretty nice.

title: Great upgrade.
body: My second pair of earbuds and it was a supreme upgrade. Sound is great and definitely cancels out noise, as I use it often and also when mowing my lawn. I love being able to just use a single earbud at time. So far great buy for a great price.

title: Does NOT work with Google Assistant (or probably any other)
body: The packaging and quality of these earbuds seems great. The case stays shut magnetically. The lid is black and you can see the lights inside representing the charge status of each earbud and the case itself. Charged very quickly. The sound quality was very good. The best sound quality of the 3 wireless earbuds I have bought so far (all similar price range) I would give the sound quality an honest 7.5/10 Crisp highs, clear mids, surprisingly well represented but still a bit muddy lows. I wasn't able to get the most sealed and comfortable fit with any of the provided tips.  Unfortunately I was lead to believe these were compatible with google assistant and that's kind of a selling point for me. I'll most likely return these for some that work with google assistant. If all you want is headphones for listening to music this is a great buy.

title: Earbuds with some SERIOUS BASS!!
body: These are the headphones I've been looking for! I've gone through 3 or 4 other sets of bluetooth earbuds which either didn't fit my ear, had connectivity issues while walking, or had absolutely no bass. These things flat out punch! I just got them so long term I'm not sure what to expect, but when I can feel the bass being produced by these little earbuds I'm pleasantly surprised. So far no connectivity issues, and the wireless charging is a plus!

title: Overall inconvenient and unreliable product.
body:
Not really satisfied with this product. I expected better sound quality, that said it's not horrible sound quality.

They are fairly comfortable to wear, even for hours on end. But they do tend to feel a little loose when you don't push them in all the way. That said, I've only had them fall out of my ear maybe two or three times.

My greatest complaint and the main reason why I waited them so poorly is the conductivity and pairing issues I frequently have the earbuds disconnect whenever I'm playing music I frequently have to position the phone just right so that it doesn't cutout. This happens even within 3 feet how's the phone. Quite the nuisance. However, I can oftentimes the within 15 ft of the phone and it will just be fine. I just wish it was consistent one way or the other.

Additionally, the trouble I have with the
Pairing is that I frequently have to re-pair them nearly every time I use them. Second, I have to have my phone on and unlocked and manually connect them whenever I leave my car in order for the earbuds to take over as the dominant Bluetooth paired electronic.

title: Glitchy and buggy...
body:
Not very pleased with these, and am thinking about seeing about a refund if it isn't too late. The sound is okay, when they work properly. Synching is easy, once they work properly.

Had a hard time getting them to synch, and when I did they were fine. For a couple days. After that, they had to be synched again. I only have them synched to one device, so I see no reason why I would have to keep doing it over and over. They sit right next to it every day, and are never more than five feet apart. But yet every couple days I have to synch them together again. Frustrating to say the least.

Sound? Okay, but not fifty dollars okay. Little too high on the highs, not enough bass. It's a little better using the medium sized rubber ends they give you, but even then, they aren't very loud. Meh...

Then we get to the most frustrating part of all. I listen to them at night while going to sleep. If I lie on my side and any part of the earbud touches anything, then the left side cuts off almost every time instantly. I can touch them with my finger, and they keep working, but for some reason if it touches part of my pillow, or arm, then it cuts off. Touching the right bud, turns off the left. Sometimes both cut off. Not sure if they are defective or what, but will do some searching and find out.

I do not recommend these, try different brand.

title: Great product at a great price!
body: I have a daily walk (weather permitting) and I listen to an Amazon Fire Tablet.  I have tried several different headphones and wired earbuds.  I bought the TOZO wireless earbuds and was blown away with the quality of the sound and the product itself.  The units paired with little or no effort on my part.  I wish I would have know this when I first started and would have saved much money.  Good product good price.

title: Expensive for what they are
body:
I'll start off by saying that TOZO will reach out and try to bribe you for a 5* review (in return they offer free charging station) and maybe that's why there are so many "5 star reviews".

Sound quality is really the reason I'm rating it low. Its too much base and the sound is really not as clear as I would have hoped for $50 price tag. my wireless 18$ earbuds outperform these. The only good thing about these is they seem to be solid build quality but they really lack in sound department for the price. Given the choice again I would not buy these.

title: Sounds just as good as Beats!!
body: I am so happy I bought these.  Easily pairs to cell.  Fits so nice in my tiny ears and stays in place!!  I have used beats and these sound just as good if not Better and way better price! Comes with cool case and charger.  My gym game has been raised to next level!!

title: Over all pleased
body: Working out- I'm ways worried they will pop out of my ear. Since I'm up high on eliptical I'm worried they will break if they hit the ground.  They have popped out a. Iuple of times. I did watch the insertion video, fyi

title: Poor performance
body: Given the number of positive reviews I couldn’t believe all the problems I had. The earbuds are too heavy for me and difficult to get out of the charger. The earbuds would not charge equally so when you removed them from the charger one would not blink blue. The buds did not sync consistently when taken out of the charger either. At times one earbud would fade out. And the charge didn’t last more than an hour. I returned them.

title: Stop offering free products and improve your product!
body:
I think it's disgusting that the company is offering free products for 5 star reviews. If your product isn't good enough to get 5 stars on its own maybe you should improve it.

The left bud cuts out bad and in an hour it probably happens 6x. It reminds me of a CD player dealing with skipping every time you move wrong. I also haven't had the best luck with the mic.

The automatic phone connection is nice. I also enjoy the the sound and volume.

title: Great and satisfying experience at this price.
body: Great quality at its price! Satisfied. 1/5 the cost of airpod but just the same thing, what more can you ask for? Was a bit sceptical at first but I got what I paid for. Great sound quality and noice cancellation. Really easy pairing. Reasons why it's worth 4/5 and not 5/5. 1). If you want to use these to listen to music, at least it should give you control of skipping a song or play back a previous track. Well, it can't do that. Most it can do is play or pauce by clicking either left or right earbud once. 2). If I want to just put on only one earbud and leave the one charging, well, I can't because the one you put on will continuously make this "beep" sound of trying to pair with the other one which gets annoying. 3). Putting on these earbuds should be easy and comfy. However, it really takes a while at the beginning for user to get used to how these fit in your ear without losing or felling figtigue. All in all, good quality at its price, but there are lot more areas to improve.

title: pairing problem
body: I thought the sound was very good and the noise cancellation was fine.  With that out of the way, let me tell you why 1 star.  The left side would not stay connected to the right side and so stereo turned into mono on the right side.  it would pair then stop, pair then stop.  I chatted with an amazon rep who said there was a firmware fix for this and they would send out another set right away.  good to their word they did, but the new set had the same problem.  I tried two different devices thinking it was on my end but it happened with other devices.

title: Great product and great price.
body: Great product and great fit. They sound really nice too. My old ones were wired and I kept catching the cord on things and ripping them out of my ears. That is painful. With these I don't have that problem. I put them in and twist them in place as described and they stay put. I mowed my yard and pulled weeds and they didn’t budge. Very nice.

title: Great earbuds!!!
body: Love the ear buds fits perfectly in my ear. Sound is great i listen to a lot of audio books. I wish the battery life was longer than 4 hiurs. But i cant complain i just put them in my charger and recharges. Love it.

title: Superb Sound and lightweight
body:
This Tozo-10 earbuds are a gem at a great price. The sound quality is superb with any kind of music. They came in a very classy box.
The fit is also perfect for my ears (They have three inserts to choose from). I am using the smallest inserts and they fit great in my ears, they don't fall out when I walk or bike.
They paired right away with my PC and my samsung phone. It was very easy to use them. And they are very comfortable, I use it often for several hours.

title: I had just returned name brand headphones and selected these as a replacement. I am glad I did.
body:
I had just returned name brand headphones and selected these as a replacement. I am glad I did.
 Great headphones for the price. Reading reviews helps and I would say these are mid range quality earbuds and are at a price that provide value. Bass is strong at times and present throughout music when needed. Treble sounds decent no bad complaints. Expected wireless static at times cannot be counted against the product as you cannot change radio theory this way. Battery time has not drained all the way in the ear buds yet and have been listening for countless hours (3-4 hours in spurts)  throughout the day at high volume...all while using the battery pod which DID drain daily (about 3 charges back to back). But quick recharge with wired or wireless charger was no issue. I give this product 5 starts. Yes it lacks perfect sound clarity at times and isn't state of the art. Although, for what you pay for it balances out. I believe this will last and I enjoy a good sounding earphone and these sound great.

title: High Quality Earbuds For The Discerning Listener
body:
You could be a noob and pay $200 for Air Pods. Or you could just pay $50 for these Tozo T10s and get superior battery life, sound quality and isolation for a quarter of the price.

The functionality and fit of these earbuds was very surprising to me for the money. I run and bike every day extensively every day, and have tried numerous earbuds and headphones to try to find something reliable and affordable. These definitely fit the bill. The earbuds pair very quickly to any Bluetooth device, and the charging case is a nice touch at this price point.

Don’t be a noob and pay over a hundred dollars for buds. The trick is to find something nice enough to use everyday but not too expensive that you’re worried about them breaking in a year. A great buy for audiophiles who are on the go!

title: Great headphones
body: Better than I expected for price. Bought these as in between headphones until the new beats come out. Usually I kill headphones with sweat in the first few days. 3 weeks strong with these so far and still sound great.

title: Not very satisfied.
body: They fall out so easily that you can't actually do any activity while wearing them. Furthermore, the left earbud often fails to pair with my phone. This is frustrating. Overall, I don't think it's worth the money. (Sound quality is tolerable, by the way.)

title: excellent
body: They were very easy to use.  I loved the sound that came out of them, especially the bass.  I really do recommend them.  The price is right.

title: Sync issues (UPDATE)
body:
****update***** 5-13-19
The vendor reached out to me to try a replacement set of earbuds to see if there is still an issue. will update accordingly. Good customer service.
After using the replacement earbuds for around a week, I will say that they are working a lot better than the original ones I got. There are still some random drops but nowhere near what it was before. Sound quality remains awesome.
5/5 customer service
4/5 connection technology (between the airbuds)
5/5 sound quality.

Original Review
I'm very torn on this product. These earbuds could easily be 5 star but the right/left sync kills it for me.

I've had these for a couple of months now and used them for walking (4 miles) and jogging. The left earbud looses sync with the right constantly. I have had maybe 2 sessions since I have purchased these where it only dropped sync a couple of times but I would easily say 60+% of the time the left earbud drops sync. The right earbud stays connected and never drops during that time.. this gets old very quickly especially since it happens during walking, jogging, riding etc. I've owned a different set of earbuds from anker and never had this issue. This is also on a brand new note 9 and an older note 5.

Sounds quality is excellent when everything is working.

I want to give this a 5, but the sync issue just kills it for me. If that can be fixed, these would be worth it to me.

title: Not good
body:
I wanted to love these because the reviews were so high but maybe my need for them were different. I need to be on long calls and the person on the other side couldn't hear me.
They dont fit in your ear well either doesnt feel stable tried all three bud sizes.
They're kind of chunky too so not an ideal size in your ear.
Connects to any bluetooth so my friend was able to connect to them while was using them
And I ordered white they sent black.
After using airpods this is a huge huge downgrade . If it was a lot cheaper maybe but to pay an extra 80 get airpods its that much of a difference in quality

title: Better then expected and no pain in my ears😊
body: I was kind of on the fence on buying this product.  But glad I did, for the money they  work great.  I have had issues with earphones in my ears, it would hurt but not with these, they feel great. Easy  to pair with my phone, nice case.  I am happy with this product.  I was contacted for an honest review in exchange for a free product.  But seriously I am happy with this purchase.

title: Does not stay in place
body: Got the TOZO T10 yesterday, very excited about it. Unfortunately my first impression is that it does not stay in the ear, easily fall off, spent a couple hours trying different ear caps and watched youtube videos, no luck. Will have to return it. Sound quality seemed good though but there was no point trying it all out. Unfortunate.

title: PROBABLY THE BEST EARBUDS FOR THE MONEY .....
body: I've had 11 pair earbuds and these by far blow the hell out of the others ... Bose, Jabra, and many Chinese brands and the TOTO T10s are way better than all of them, across the board ..... BUY THESE !!!!!

title: Great
body: Great product, especially for the price. I wasn't expecting much, but they for very well, don't fall out like other ear buds. Sound quality is very good. I'm pleasantly surprised and suggest them.

title: Outstanding Earbuds, Great Product
body:
What an amazing set of earbuds, I am thoroughly enjoying how they sound when paired to my devices.  I bought two and the price is justified in comparison to other brands.  The quality of sound is spot on and can be used to answer and speak with telephone calls.  Your device controls the volume levels.  Looking to get enormous usage out of these.  Great product “TOZO”!

Charles G.

title: Amazing
body: I had Apple AirPods,I lost one side of them and fond out that I have to pay $75 to replace .then I found this product on amazon for $50 .from any point of views this is better than apple ,sound quality ,wireless charging ,noise cancelling, water proof, how it looks and how it stays in my ear. this product is perfectt. I use this earbuds every day at Jim ,inside sauna and even while swimming and charging them ones a week and never had a problem

title: The perfect wireless earbuds
body: I originally thought that all these positive reviews were bought by the manufacturer, but I took the chance anyways..... It's $40 right? I was surprised when I got them and they were as good as all these reviews said. The battery life is amazing, the wireless charging is amazing, the sound is fantastic. I would absolutely recommend these to anyone.

title: I don’t know why you wouldn’t get these!
body:
So excited about these headphones! I use them at my work so I can answer a call if need be on the go or listen to music while on the grind! I love that you only need to have the right ear pod so you can still hear other things around you with your left ear.

Also, super simple and easy to pair; they basically do it themselves.

All positives here! Definitely worth it, especially for the unbeatable price!

title: Superior quality, true bass, excellent sound isolation
body: So first off I wanna these headphones are exactly perfect for my situation I work construction therefore AirPods are a bit pricey to be having around my field of work further more the quality is excellent they completely block outside interference and bring you true in depth audio with proper bass to hit all those deep tones also the water proof functionality is no joke I’ve never submerged them as it says not to do so but I have gotten them wet and they still work perfectly fine and the customer service here is also nothing to worry about they are definitely organized and on top of the game I highly recommend these phones coming from an audio engineer it should be 6 stars rated

title: BEST TRUE WIRELESS EARBUDS YOU WILL FIND FOR THE PRICE! PERIOD!!!
body:
First, let me say this a real review. I don't write these very often, so rest assured when I do one, its because I really really like a product.
I first tried a brand of buds called,"Thor," and they were basically garbage. Only one side would pair. So, i sent those back and thank God I did because I started reading reviews more carefully and payed close attention to HOW MANY their were which is really really important.
OK, so here it is: My experience with TOZO has been great from the very start. I had read all the reviews about how good their customer support was and they were all true.
1) the packaging is awesome with extra tips, cord, and warranty info. make sure you put the right bud in your ear first and then the left. those will pair because the right is the master. Then, activate your blue tooth on your device. you will want it off until the right and left pair to each other.

2) a one year warranty that's totally worth it. BUT YOU HAVE TO ACTIVATE IT WITHIN 14 DAYS OR SOMETHING. It's WORTH IT. I'm supposed to GET A FREE WIRELESS CHARGER too. YOU WILL LOVE THESE EARBUDS SO IT'S EASY.
3) battery life is great so far
4) sound quality is really good. I would prefer them a little bit louder but I'm a sound engineer and you shouldn't go by my volume levels considering I've probably lost some of my hearing already. For most normal folk the loudness is fine
5) they are pretty comfortable. wireless buds can always be more comfortable IMO but that's just the nature of true wireless

ENJOY!!!

title: Great buds
body: Just got them,  so far I'm really impressed.  Usually ear buds fall out of my ears due to odd shape of my ear canal and sweat. However they've stayed in thru all that.  The sound is awesome,  real good base and it does cancel out noise.  Phone calls are clear. A really good product.  I have to test them out in the shower but other than that everything they say they are is true.

title: Incredible sound quality!
body: The sound quality on these earbuds is AMAZING! The bass is a good, clear, and deep sound that is lacking in other earbuds I’ve tried. I also love the waterproof feature not only for the earbuds themselves but also the charging case. Very happy with these!

title: Good Product. Connectivity is a Little Suspect.
body: Pretty sleek little earbuds. Definitely play around with the fitting sizes, as I almost lost one in the grocery store the 2nd day I had them. Connectivity distance is a little suspect. I walk on my lunch break at work and with my phone just in my pocket, I'll temporarily lose connectivity. If you're stationary, these things are great.

title: Great Wireless Earbuds for the price
body: I have been using these for a couple of days now and the sound of these are better than the normal Apple head phones, they connect every time as soon as I pull them out of the charging station. They do sometimes fall out thought but not that often.

title: Sometimes fails to pair, otherwise great for price
body:
I was looking for a wireless headphone but I was not ready to spend hundreds of dollars. Looked through the YouTube videos and found this headphone a decent one with price within my range.

Only one issue I face is headphone sometimes fail to pair automatically with my iPhone X. I have to either put it back in case and try again or retry connecting via settings app.

title: Frustrating!!!!! Do not buy them!!!
body:
Update 9/22: The battery is BAD!

First of all, it doesn't last more than 2.5 hours on full charge
Secondly, it goes from 70% to 30% in 20 minutes (FALSE DISPLAY INFO!)
Thirdly, it gives you "low battery" warning at 30% and then leaves you with only 1 minute to get to the charger before it dies. So even if you're on a short run, you'd have to finish your run with no audio.
Fourthly, the charging case is subpar.

These, plus the on and off signal issue, I gave up....

title: Good Quality for the price
body: These ear buds were worth the money. They are extremely easy to setup and sound much better then the previous headphones I owned.The packaging was very well put together. I highly recommended these ear buds and would definitely buy them again

title: Great Earbuds
body: These earbuds are incredible for the price. They fit my ears perfectly and the sound is incredible. Great highs and superb lows. I highly recommend them.

title: Good Headphones
body: The sound quality is good and their connectivity is good, which is all I care about. The only problem I had was adjusting the earphones to fit me right but they provide different sizes of earbuds.

title: Extremely Disappointed!
body:
How disappointing!
With over 14k reviews and 4.5 Star rating, it was based on those reviews and that rating that I purchased these earbuds. So unless I got a lemon those reviews are either misleading or expectations of a product are very low.

Initially, the sound quality was awesome listening to music but when I used it for voice conversations over mobile, the person on the other line asked me to call them back when I'm in a less than noisy area.  Then more people told me to not use 'whatever i'm using' when speaking to them because there was too much noise coming in.  The sad part is, I wasn't in noisy areas so you can't imagine how disappointed I was.  So I purchased another earbud for talking and used these Tozo's only for listening to music at the gym and they were worked well until... One morning less than 2 months since I purchased them the left earbud would not connect.

I've had the lack of connection issue about 3x since I purchased it and that is not acceptable.  Considering I have used these earbuds about a couple dozen times in less than 3-months, this is extremely disappointing.

Oh btw... the range of the 5.0 Bluetooth SUCKS!

The sound quality is very good and the noise cancellation is average.  If the left earbud wouldn't go out anymore these earbuds would be awesome for listening to music ONLY. NOT PHONE CALLS!

PROS
-Nice design
-Great for listening to music
-Sound quality is very good
-Cool carrying case that charges the earbuds
-Fit comfortably in my ear

CONS
-Not good for voice talking
-Bluetooth range is horrible
-Left earbud issues. Didn't turn on a few times in less than 3 months
-You can't control volume from the earbuds

title: Awesome sound for a reasonable price
body: Fit is very good, hard to tell they are in my ears.  The sound is awesome.  Consequently, the passive noise canceling aspect is great.  I wished the battery lasted a bit longer, but the case charges the headphones, so that helps a little.  Probably good to take a break while they charge.  The button on the right headset is stiff and hard to press without moving it around in your ear.  Overall, great earbuds for the price.

title: Doesn't connect well
body: I had another pair of wireless earbuds that didn't last very long and thought I'd go with these after all the good reviews. However, they NEVER auto connect to my phone's Bluetooth unlike my old pair of soundpeats and they have a hard time staying connected. For the price paid for these, I'm actually quite disappointed. The battery life isn't as good either.

title: Very easy to sync to your device and Great sound quality!!!!
body: So far I Love these!!!!  The sound is amazing and they keep a great charge for several workouts!!!!  The charging case is great and very easy to use!!!

title: Fake +ive reviews BEWARE!!!
body: I bought two pairs and not one of these worthless piece of S***. It is nothing but Chinese knockoff product. I have tired all the silicon buds provided with it and no matter which one I use, they refuse to stay inside my ears. Thousands of positive reviews got me conned. I am not even able to return these since i got them from the US and i live in the UAE. Beware and don't fall for them. Go for branded ones which are expensive but worth the cost. I got the Jabra elite active 65T which is bang for bucks. I so regret buying these junk funk.

title: Sub-par headphones and poor customer service
body:
This is an edited review after quite a bit of use. The Bluetooth connection is awful despite everything I have tried. I have a set of Bose QuietComfort 35 that I use around the house with immaculate connection even if I'm in a different room from my phone. These, however, skip and drop the connection even if I'm holding my phone (connection point). Also, I was promised a cheap [free] wireless charger by the manufacturer if I left a positive review. The discount code is garbage and the initial positive review they bought from me was no more than a purchased review.

Low-quality Bluetooth headphones and a fake offer for a free charger.  Even if the company likely offers a working code after seeing this review, my review of the actual headphones stands. Look elsewhere.

title: UPDATE - TOZO contacted me and offered to send me a new set. They work great.
body:
ANOTHER UPDATE- received  another pair and they work great.  Glad to know company stands behind their products.

UPDATE - Company offered to send me a new pair of headphones.  I have not received them yet.  I will update again once I receive them and once I try them out.

Set #1  - (Rating of 1)  They will not stay connected for any length of time and they continually fall out of my ears even with the smallest pads.

title: Easy Pairing, Great Battery Life
body: Love how easy it was to pair the buds. I typically only use one at a time and love that when one of the buds dies, I can put it into the case to charge and pop the other one in to continue listening. Doing it this way, I can easily get 8 hours of battery life between the two buds.

title: Beautiful deep sound, BUT bluetooth and battery is poor
body:
The bluetooth reconnection is less than desirable. Iphone to headphone connection is 1 out 10 without requiring going into the iphone bluetooth settings and manually selecting connect.
The battery life is okay. Getting 1-2 headphone charges from the case is not up to average expectations.

The sound is 5 by 5. Most non-Apple headphones are about loud enough with poor tinny sound quality or 4 by 1.

I am giving them a 4 due to the poor bluetooth and battery. I will be keeping them as no other $50 headphones have sound quality that is comparable.

title: Great value!
body: These ear buds are comfortable and a great value.  I like that different size earpieces are provided.  I am not an audiophile but to me the sound is good for listening to audiobooks and watching movies.

title: Excellent for stationary listening.
body: Great sound. Work extremely well, paired flawlessly. They don’t have any ‘anchor’ to hold them in your ears. They keep falling out and that hit a point that overrides the benefits and good quality. So sad.

title: Better than expected/ Highly recommend + Great price
body: So upon receiving my earbuds i let them charge and immediately tested them for sound quality. They were great, they do not cancel out noise completely but that is okay for me since I am a person that likes to be aware of my surroundings. They fit just right and i like that hey come with different size rubber earbud pieces too. One concern i had was when I made a phone call to test out the sound quality on both ends. My cousin could barely hear me, in her words, “it sounded like I was under a rock” lol Frustrated i wanted to return them or exchange them, but something made me check again by calling my dad and my sister-in-law. It was loud and clear with both calls!!! Guess my cousin could use a pair of tozo10 earbuds for Christmas lol

title: Heavy on the ear, but great deal overall
body: These are great little alternatives to Air Pods. The battery life blows them out of the water. The low end of the bass is sloppy, mids and highs are decent. They do always feel present in my ears though, maybe a little too heavy. I think the T6 model may be lighter and easier on the ears for long term listening. Overall great buy (1 week after purchase)

title: Quality product
body: Superb sound and comfortable

title: Great buy
body: Just as described. Great buy! All the previous good reviews that are detailed are accurate. Happy with this purchase.

title: Good quality bluetooth earphones
body: I ordered these earphones because I just upgraded to an iPhone, and I hate Apple's earpods/airpods. These were a great alternative: more comfortable, great sound, and better price point. The only downsides to these earphones are that they don't cancel out as much noise as I would have liked and the lowest volume setting (one bar on the volume indicator on my phone) is still pretty loud.

title: Make sure you have the right size of plug on them to fit your ears.
body:
I bought these for my granddaughter and she loves them and uses them everyday about 12 hours a day. I love that you can attach the included lanyard to the charging unit and take it with you wherever you go.  The earbuds arrived earlier than expected which is always cool. The ear buds stay in pretty well even when shes running except when she takes
off her hoodie. The price is very reasonable considering how good the quality is.

title: Great sound... but only if you are sitting still and relaxing.
body:
These earbuds become dislodged and fall out of your ear during moderate to vigorous activity.  They will remain secure and produce their awesome sound as long as you are relatively sedentary.  They are perfect for the morning train commute, unless you need to run to catch your connection.  Then, they will likely fall out of your ear.  They are durable.  But they just aren't secure enough for activity.

By the way, the self charging storage container is pretty cool too.

title: Sound will cut out on earbuds
body: Sound will cut in and out.  This is my second set of ear buds I have purchased on amazon.  First set was cheaper about $25 and sounded better.  Ended up losing an earbud so figured I would upgrade to this model.  So far disappointed in sound quality and it cuts in and out constantly while running.  Would recommend a cheaper option. Probably will be returning this item.

title: Works great for small ears too!
body: Stayed in my ear for a work out at the park. Definitely could focus on my training with the noise canceling feature!

title: The Best Ever
body: After I decided to get wireless earbuds to use with my Apple watch, I did some online research as I knew nothing about earbuds.  I finally decided upon the Tozo T10 because it had the highest percentage of positive reviews of all that I considered -  85% of the reviewers gave them 4 or 5 stars.  I also liked that they came with a choice of 4 ear caps to ensure the best possible fit.  I placed my order on a Monday afternoon and they arrived on Wednesday morning using standard shipping.  Even though I am technologically challenged, it was super easy to pair and connect them to my watch.  They fit comfortably and IMO the sound quality is exceptionally good.  I am very well pleased with the Tozo T10 and when the time comes to replace them, I would definitely buy them again.  I have received excellent customer support in response to my questions.  They are exceptional quality for the price.

title: Excellent Product. Perfect Price Point. Great Performance.
body:
The headphones came fully charged and ready to go outta the box! The process of the setup was quick and easy. Just read the enclosed quick read documents first and you will have no issues. It's darn near dummy proof.

The bluetooth worked perfectly for both earbuds. Be sure to select the Tozo-R after your device (in my case it was a cell phone AND my chromebook) picks up the signal.

Sound quality is near perfect with a healthy deep sound (not tinny) and they can get loud enough to block out noise around you. However, I would not classify them or expect "noise canceling".

IMPORTANT: The fit depends on how much you paid attention to the instructions. You may (or may not) need to change the rubber heads to a larger or smaller size than the ones initially attached. This is easy to do. If they move too much or easily fall out, increase the size. If they are hard to get in or are too uncomfortable, use a smaller size. Easy peasy! Also, pay attention to how you put them in, and remember to give them a small slight twist as Tozo INSTRUCTS in their documentation.

Another solid feature is the charging case.
Once the case is fully charged, you can charge the ear buds 3-4 times before needing to charge the charger again, and each time the buds will last 2-3 hours give or take depending on usage.

As far as the waterproofing goes, I've only used them in the shower a few times and nothings changed after the fact, by way of quality or functionality.

Overall, if your looking for inexpensive, but not "cheap", truly wireless Bluetooth ear buds with great fits and exceptional functionality, the Tozo T10's are a great buy.

title: Minor complaints but they survived the wash
body:
Overall, I really like these headphones. Some minor complaint: 1) they cut out sometimes when I walk on the trail by my house. But that could be a problem with my phone's bluetooth. 2) I tend to only want one headphone it at a time but if I have the other turned off or on the charger it beeps at me so I have to have them both on and close by to use them, even if I only want to use one.

I accidentally washed them with my clothes and although I of course do not recommend this, they have been working perfectly fine since.

title: Wont turn Off
body: I have had these for a week or two now and the biggest thing is that I cannot get them to turn off and stay off. Even when they are in the charging case they will turn on and connect to my phone. Another thing is while the base is good, it has this weird feedback if the volume is where I normally listen to it and causes the music to sound poorly recorded. I feel like I wasted money. There have been a few things lately I feel have not been the quality described on amazon that I buy and then am disappointed. This is one of them.

title: Overall, great product!
body:
Almost everything about this product is great. The only real flaw I’ve found which I’ve also found in countless other earbuds is finding a earbud that fits my ear perfectly and comfortably. I was able to find a size that will work for what I need but not quite perfect.

However, the sound quality and noise cancellation is absolutely excellent.

I have had no problems at all with connectivity.

Overall, great product!

title: The best ear buds you can buy for under $50! ❤️
body: Great product! I am very pleased with this purchase. I was so afraid that the ear buds would be too large for my ears because mine are soo small but they are perfect. They come with different size silicone covers so you can choose what size you need. Also comes with a cord you can attach to the case for convenience. The case is wireless and holds a charge so if your buds die before you get home to charge you can recharge very easily without power!

title: Great choice for wireless earbuds!
body:
I had not had any previous experience with wireless earbuds before but wanted to try a pair with all my colleagues in the office starting to use them.  I had seen a lot of people using the Apple brand, but I really wanted something that sealed off in my ear more, quieted my surroundings, and could also be used exercising, etc.  I knew that Apple would not do that for me.  I also knew the Apple brand was overpriced.  I did some research and ending up buying the TOZO T10, even though I initially didn't recognize the brand name.  I liked the design and the reviews seemed positive.

I have now had the T10's for about a week and after figuring out how to charge, pair, and use them, I think they are great.  I was really impressed from the start with the packaging and the overall fit and finish of the product right when I received it.  The earbuds themselves are great quality and the charging case is also really good quality.  The case is a battery and charges the earbuds even when the case is not plugged in.  You do have to charge the case periodically, but it works really, really well.  I really like it.  There is attention to detail in the construction, for example the case has a top that is magnetic and closes tightly.  The earbuds also magnetically snap into the case for accurate connection when charging.  The lights on the earbuds and case show (1) when the earbuds are charging and when they are done and (2) how much charge the case has left.  Overall, a very quality product.  I cannot state that enough.  As far as using the earbuds, I had no issues with them pairing with my IPhone the first time and now they automatically pair with each other and with my IPhone when I remove them from the case.  Basically, removing them from the case turns them on and placing them in the case turns them off.  Again, really smart design.  Finally, I have found the quality of the sound is good.  I have listened mostly to podcasts up to this point, but the music I have listened to has been clear and met all my expectations.

Overall, if you want a great pair of quality wireless earbuds that have great fit and finish and are also waterproof, the TOZO T10's is what I would recommend.  It is also a super price point!  Do it!

title: Great sound. Bad fit.
body: Initially, I was super excited to find these. Unfortunately, after trying the different sizes they don't seem to stay in. I wanted to use them to talk on the phone and to listen to my music.  However, that's not happening because no one can hear me when I have them in and they fall out when I walk. Translation - I can only use them when I doing limited movement i.e. sitting at my desk.

title: These are the ones youre looking for.
body: I work out a lot and these are the perfect headphones for it. When you put them in your ear it blocks out everything else. I feel like its just me and the music. They are very comfortable and very responsive. The range on the headphones is very good as well as i can leave my phone upstairs and listen to music downstairs. The charging case is very sleek and even has magnetic slots for the headphones so they will not pop out. The headphones and case will let you know if they are charging or not by the lights that shine through the cover. Very innovative. I have had no issues at all with these and am very happy with this purchase.

title: Solid purchase
body: I'd give this something between a 4-5 but the rating system won't let me indicate that. In any case so far I'm very pleased with the purchase:  each bud toggles between my various phones automatically based on which I'm using, which is great.  I've noticed that you have to manually disconnect it from the laptop (I have a macbook) or else it won't automatically switch over to the iphone.  The only other thing I noticed is that there's certain apps (eg, SoundHound) on the iPhone that won't allow me to listen thru these earbuds.  But overall given the price difference with other quality earbuds I'm happy with the purchase.

title: Great earbuds especially for the price.
body: I purchased the TOZO T10 wireless earbuds to replace another brand of earbuds that had stopped holding a charge after 18 months. The TOZO earbuds work great. I use them several times every day as I walk my dog. The pair seamlessly with my phone, have great sound quality, and battery life. The charging case was a must for me and it’s works great. They come with a variety of size silicon earbud tips, which was great for me because I needed the smallest ones for a good fit.

title: Sounds great and is solid for workout!
body: I recently bought a cheap pair of earbuds and the sweat from my workout turned them into earplugs and nothing more. So, when I looked on Amazon I found the TOZO T10 water-resistant earbuds and made the purchase. I am so glad I did!. Once they arrived I loved the solid feel and case that snapped shut. The case holds about 3-4 workout sessions (about 90 minutes each) worth of charges. I charge the case about once every two weeks and haven't had one time where they were dead. Just pay attention to the 4 blue lights that denote the battery life. The sound quality depends on whether you use the tight fit rubber ear pieces (it comes with 4 sizes). I like to hear/feel the base so I use the small pieces and "stick" it in my ear for maximum hold. It took about 2-3 tries to get the right fit that would hold from moving around a lot and sweating during cardio. The larger ones "felt" better but the slightest movement and they were falling out. Overall, I am glad I invested in this project and have not had any trouble with pairing, charging, or sound quality. The only issue I have is that you have to pair in the correct order; pair the left with the right...then pair the right with the phone. Otherwise, you're not pairing them altogether. Buy them and be glad you did!

title: Great Ear Buds at Fair Price
body: Wife is very happy with these. Great Packaging, they seem very durable, only have had a couple days but she really likes them , Connect to bluetooth without issues.

title: Great sounding, compact earbuds perfect for the gym
body: These headphones are designed well and replaced a different pair of wireless earbuds that I use at the gym. For dance/electronic music or hip hop, these headphones are noticeably better due to the bass enhancements. So far, these headphones are great and the charging case is super convenient. I go to the gym five times a week and only have to charge these once a week. Great product!

title: AMAZING
body: I received these headphones 11 days ago... and I am totally in love with them. I really enjoy how fast they turn on when you take them out of the charging case and how fast they connect to one another and my phone. It's super easy and convenient. The sound quality on them are spectacular, it really does cancel out background noise. The one thing I really love about them is finally getting rid of the wires.. so amazing to be able to run with them and not have to worry about them getting ripped outta my ears. The case it came with is amazing and changes easily on my cell phones wireless charger. Overall great headphones and they weren't that expensive. I was debating between these and the Samsung ones. Really happy I went with these.. a lot nicer on my pocket Haha

title: Works Ok, stays in ear, left bud cuts out occasionally
body:
These earbuds seem to work well, but i have occasional drop out in the left earbud. TOZO is offering to replace my left earbud at no charge, so we will see how it goes.

Update: Customer Support has provided me with a second pair and they work very well. I am very happy with my purchase.

title: Great wireless earbuds
body: I must admit I was rather shocked by how good these wireless earbuds are for the price, this was absolutely a solid purchase for myself. I recommend these earbuds, quality sound.

title: Best purchase!
body: I love my earbuds. They are exactly what I was looking for! So easy to pair also. Great for when I'm working out. No cords to get in my way. Stays in my ears very well. Have a great sound . Sometimes I use only one if I am in a store but still want to listen to my audible book while shopping. Great purchase.

title: Nice sound but needs tap controls
body: Battery life is lacking and it has no controls from the buds like double tap to skip. Some people say they are able run with them, but for me I have to readjust them while jogging so not the best for active movement but i5 can work. If they had one size bigger ear inserts then maybe it would work better. I do like the sound and bass quality for such cheap buds. Also the ability to use QI charge is convenient.  The ability to throw them in my pocket makes them portable and great for when I go solo to Disneyland for the day.

title: Cheap for a reason.
body:
I used to own Apple AirPods, but the darn thing doesn't stay in my ears. I wanted to buy a true wireless, in-ear buds on the cheap, and came across the Tozo T-10. At first, the design was sleek and once paired, the sound was quite decent. It's also compatible with my Qi wireless charging so it felt like it was $40 bucks well spent. The following day, problems started to occur. First was the Bluetooth connection. Once it's paired to my phone, it refuses to disconnect even if the buds are in the case. The thing doesn't even stop playing while in the case which drained batteries on my phone and the ear buds. To disconnect, you would have to hit 'forget this device' beforehand. The other issue is the sound dropping. About 40% of the time, you'll hear sound from one side even when there's nothing blocking/disrupting the connections. About 30% of the time, the sound will skip. I am trying to justify that it only cost me $40 bucks to use it once in a while, but damn...

Pros:
- It's $40 bucks

Cons:
- Continuous play on a full charge only lasted 3 hours of audio play time
- Buds turn on automatically even though it's turned off. User must click 'forget this device'
- Sound often drops or skips

title: Returned them- they kept cutting out
body: I really liked these earbuds except for one major flaw.  The charging case was a great design with an opaque lid so you could see the charging status of ther case and each bud. It looked like a cute little robot face. The buds fit well and sounded good but here is where the  flaw appeared. The sound would cut out for a second then return. This happend frequently, sometimes a dozen times or more per hour. I sent a message to the seller (Worgo) but received no response. So back they go.

title: Great Fit and sound
body: I also am one of  those people who cannot wear just any earbuds.  Finally I have found a pair that fits.  When I workout I sweat, and these earbuds stayed in my ear.  The sound is great also.  When answering the phone with them the quality is great also.  I do wish that you could forward to the next song, but I can forgive that because they are able to stay in my ear.  I would recommend this product to anyone who has a hard time keeping earbuds in their ears when they are working out.  Also I love the fact that the charging case is waterproof also, and the case comes with a strap.

title: Great for the price
body: Snappy connection speeds, decent connection range. The sound is definitely on the bassy side if you're into that, but overall it sounds pretty full and pleasant for most genres excluding classical, jazz, and the like. Obviously, you're not getting studio-quality true-to-sound audio in a wireless budget earbud, but for normal listening, $50 is a great deal for these things. They're 100% worth the price.

title: Great product with great quality and cheaper price, love it
body:
the first time you open it you will feel the bad quality they use in it.
After using it and during phone calls; you will notice how the voice come and disappear by it self, you will keep checking voice level during the call.
The battery consumption is bad, even if it was fully charged and you didn't use for 2 days the battery will die.
As a conclusion i regret buying it and i wish i went for a higher earbuds level or a well known brand.
But eventually if u want want to save money you have to pay the price

Update,

After writing my review, the company sent me apology mail with a new earbuds the same i bought, the new one is amazingly working fine with great voice and music sound. Maybe the first one was damaged as they said. But the new one they sent to me for free is great

I really love this product and i highly recommend this to anyone who don't want to pay that much money on Apple or Bose products and get almost the same quality.

Thanks Tozo for the first response to my review and solving the problem without even asking for it.

title: Good quality, nice sound, good battery
body: Bought these as a gift for my husband to use at the gym. He loves them! Did have one little snafu where one earbud wasn't staying connected, but I contacted the seller who was helpful. My husband had to clear out all his bluetooth connections and re add the earbuds. Now they seem to work just fine.

title: Love them!!!
body: I love that they come with different buds. They sound amazing and no one can tell I have them in because my hair covers them!!! Will definitely recommend and purchase more as gifts!!!

title: This is a must have!
body: Amazing earbuds. Sound was much, much better than anticipated! Sound quality is better than my apple earbuds and these are much more comfortable and do have noise cancellation abilities. Pairing is simple and the charging case is amazing!

title: Nice sound, comfortable, great price and a warranty!
body: So far so good! Very happy with the price of these. I decided to give this brand a shot because I didn’t want to spend a lot. Great value. The case is very sturdy and magnetic which is great, so I don’t have to worry about it opening in my bag. They are comfortable as well.

title: Not an upgrade from my wireless earbuds with wire from ear to ear
body:
Terrible battery life, about 3 hours max listening to music. Can't work all day and use these....
Also getting them going take a while as they are a little goofy with how they connect to each other then to your phone.
Other than that, the charging case thing is cool and they see good quality but those two things are a deal breaker to me, lost time and not useful for someone who uses them while working and doing construction work.

title: Overall Great Pick for wireless earbuds
body:
This is my first set or truly wireless earbuds, but I made sure to read up on features and see reviews before purchasing.  My biggest hesitation before buying was that I was worried that the sound quality couldn’t possibly be as good as my trusty wired earbuds.  But, after reading many of the reviews on many other types, this one came back with a lot of good comments about sound quality, so I gave in and ordered them in white.

Now i have only had these for a day or two, but I am happy to report that the sound quality is actually As-Good as my wired ones, which themselves were great.  Not only that, the bass quality was right on point as well.  Huge plus.

Comfort:  I have fairly small ears, and I was worried about them being heavy or not fit properly.  I was also worried about them making my ears sore.  Well, I am happy report that I wore them for several hours last night and for several hours again today - no pain.  They are not nearly as heavy as I was expecting, which was another big plus.  As for the fit, I needed to put the smallest of the silicone earpieces on them, but then they were a good fit.

They didn’t fall out as I moved about my kitchen (even danced a bit -lol) and they stayed put.

Battery: the left one died a few minutes after unpacking the box, but after charging them, they  lasted about 4 hours before the battery level getting low.  I charged them overnight, and they lasted another 5 hours.  The charging is FAST, though, so you don’t  have to wait hours and hours for them to be ready to go again.  So would I love them to last longer on a charge? Yes probably...but for my lifestyle, 5 hours is plenty.  (Updated note: after owning these for a couple of months, they only last about 3 hours before needing a charge, and the right one doesn’t hold a charge as well as the left one for some reason.  This might just be my pair. We will see over the next few months if they continue to decline...)

Phone call use:  I did a test call and I could hear the other person fine, and they could hear me...they just said it was slightly quieter than normal, but still could hear me clearly.

The background noise blocking was moderately good.  I think if the fit was really snug it would be better,  but I’d say they were about 80% as good as my noise-cancelling wired earbuds.  But I still have to take them out if someone wants to talk to me, so it blocks plenty of sound out.  And if your fit is better, I’m sure it would be great.

Signal:  the packaging says the distance range is about 10 meters.  I tested that and I think I went farther than that without them disconnecting.  Maybe I should measure next time, but no need.  I went far enough to be impressed.

Updated note: these little guys don’t like to be separated, though.  If you are only using one in your ear and one on a table or somewhere not in your ear (but turned on), there tends to be an intermittent sputtering of the sound until they are close together again (I.e., both in your ears).  It happens less when they are fully charged,  and if you only want to wear one, just don’t turn on the left one and you’ll be fine.

Overall thoughts:  I am very pleased with these.  I love the sound of my music and not getting tangled up in cords, or feel the shock of accidentally ripping one out of my ear because of getting caught in cords.  Bring on my moving-constantly lifestyle - I’m ready to enjoy my wireless life!  Totally worth the price.  Get some.

title: Great earbuds for running and working out.
body:
I like this product because the ear buds come in different sizes to prevent them from falling out. I always have a difficult time trying to find ones that fit so I have tried many different brands.
I use them in the gym working out 4x/ week and for running 18 miles/week.
The sound quality is great for the price. The bluetooth initial pairing is easy and stays connected when in use.
The charger holder works great on a charge pad.

title: Great Quality!! Superior Sound Quality!
body: I just received these two days ago and I'm already LOVING them.  They charged quickly, paired really easily with my iPhone and work beautifully.  They had the smallest ear bud cover option which means they fit comfortably in my tiny ears without slipping or falling out.  The range is fabulous - I'm able to walk around the office without having to take my phone with me.  The charging station is easy to transport, and charges via wireless itself so it's super convenient.  I would definitely recommend these to anyone looking for Bluetooth ear buds!

title: Survived my washing machine and then the dryer
body: These things are better quality than anything wired or wireless at the price point. They have a great build quality, great sound, come with a great selection of sizing tips, and are water tight sealing. These are perfect for work or sport, connect easily, and are durable. After about two months of use mine went through the washer and dryer and work perfectly. They have a great warrenty but I dont see myself needing it. They have a good battery life and good case. Overall its a great product and better quality than its price point suggests.

title: Wireless headphones
body: I really love them. I like the sound quality. It is very loud which i love. The noise cancellation is very good. You cant hear a thing when you have the volume all the way up. The headphones havent died on me which is great. Although there has been problems connecting the wireless headphones to the device. There is two bluetooths that try to connect at the same time which i dont understand. There a is a bluetooth just for the right and just for left but anyways which ever you press it should wconnect both ear pieces to your phone. I do feel like the size is not accurate enough. I thought they would be smaller but they ended up being ok. Other than that there is mothing wrong with these headphones.

title: TOZO T10-Great Value- Highly Recommend
body: I have been using these headphones for about a week, and so far so good!  The sound quality is great.  I have not yet tried to do any physical activity with them in yet, so I can't speak to that.  I mainly use them at my desk and for walking around.  Once fitted correctly, they stay in place just fine doing normal, everyday activities. I am looking forward to trying to exercise with them soon.  I think the value for what you get, is great, I highly recommend.

title: Great value wireless earbuds!
body: I was looking for something top replace my Beats over-ear headphones for working out and studying. I definitely wanted an option that was smaller, more portable, and still had a lot of bass. I found these and after reading the awesome reviews, decided to purchase them. I'm so happy I did! For $50, these are an amazing value and even rival my older Bose sound sport headphones. I also LOVE that they include the perfectly sized charging case and how easy the earbuds are to pair. Make sure to try out the different earbud sizes included!

title: Not what the description says it is.
body: Very misleading description and product. The sound is muddy and I can still hear what’s going on in the inside. I was listening to some Tangerine Dream, but the sound was too muddy to hear the rest of the instruments. Also, the sound cuts off at random times for 1 second and it becomes an annoyance. Never buying from this price range or products from this seller again. I have $10 Skullcandy earbuds and even they sound better.

title: A nice surprise!
body:
I have a serious hearing issue and have problems with even the more expensive headphones. I decided to take a risk on these and came away with a pleasant surprise. Volume is no problem for me. I can hear the media, but  understanding it is something else. Something about these earbuds just seems to resonate with me. I haven't had them for long, so I don't know what the long term will bring, but being able to enjoy a night of music was a pure pleasure. They paired up easily then paired right to my phone and my pc with no problem. I even watched (and understood) a movie on Netflix,
Yes, I would recommend these to anyone who is looking for some decent headphones at a good price.

Follow-up after using them for a month.-
These earbuds are awesome, For music the bass is really great but not so much that it overpowers the clarity of conversation in tv shows and movies. I have a severe hearing difficulty. Volume is no problem for me, but the words are just noises that I can't decipher. The Tozo earbuds have made it possible for me to watch tv and movies and not lose much of the conversation. I have tried several sets of earbuds owned by family and friends in the last month, some of them better known brands. From my personal experience, I wouldn't trade my Tozo ear buds for any of them. The customer service is great.

title: Buy with confidence
body: These earbuds are pretty good quality for the price. With that being said, I bought these T10 wireless earbuds a couple of months ago and I'm having technical issues with them. THANKFULLY THIS COMPANY OFFERS A 1 YEAR WARRANTY FOR FREE! The connection seems poor because it often breaks like if they're too far apart from each other, and sometimes the volume in one of the earbuds will go all the way down and then it will go back to normal as if it was off and it was barely powering on. I emailed the company and they happily suggested they would send me an all new pair at no cost to me! I'm extremely happy with their costumer service and I highly recommend these.

title: Great bluetooth earbuds
body: These come in a nifty charging case with its own battery. They have good sound quality and good bass. I have found that I do not hear well out of my right ear and only use one bud at a time,  Unlike many wireless buds I can use the right one in my left ear easily, doubling the effectiveness of the product for me.  They are waterproof and survive sweat and rain.

title: Great earbuds for the price!
body:
For the price, you cannot beat these earbuds. Very good sound quality. I use them all the time. Battery life is very good. Much better than I expected at this price point.  I highly recommend them.

Update:  After reading some of the other reviews, I want to clarify mine. I only use these when I sit in the garage to enjoy a cigar. I don't know how they work for exercise or any activity when you are moving. If you block the right earbud, the left one will cut out. Not an issue for me. I usually listen to jazz with them. The sound quality is pretty good at the price you pay. You want $300 quality, then buy a $300 set of earbuds. For what I use them for, I am very happy with the purchase.

title: had a bad pair replaced is great
body: after a disappointing first pair , the company reached out & replaced them & the replacement are great , sou d is good, battery is good, & no cutting out like the last pair

title: Terrible connectivity. Poor mic quality.
body: I really wanted to like these. And while the sound quality was solid coming in, people often couldn't hear me. I would not purchase another set or recommend these to anyone.

title: They fall out
body: I waited about a month before I wrote a review on these headphones. I wanted to try them in the gym for several weeks first. Bottom line, as expected, they fall out. The sound is great and they’re good headphones for driving or even working out if you’re not doing too much movement. But for running, they fall out almost immediately.

title: Poor sound quality, low range
body: Disappointed in this product - never felt compelled to write about a purchase until today. There was a huge discrepancy between the highly rating reviews and the earphones I received - bought these for the gym, couldn't hear the music over the noise of other treadmills, and the earphones kept losing connectivity. My phone had been in my jacket pocket on the floor, right beneath the treadmill and the sound was cutting off. It was a bummer, had to return these and stick to the cheaper bluetooth pair I bought a few years back.

title: SO typical....
body: So the expiration date for the return was two days ago and these stopped working.  Sadly this has become par for course with so many items over the past few years.  Its almost like they seem to know exactly how long things will last.  Hopefully I can find a way to get a refund or replacement since its so close to the return date.

title: I wish the price range is cheaper
body: Without volume control function, I think the right price range is $35. In $50 price range, there are better choices out there. It is sort of annoying this does take seconds for the right side to get connected and wait for left device to be connected secondly. However, the base sound is impressive!

title: They SUCK BALLS AND AMAZON AS WELL
body:
So far, absolutely awesome.

Update : 9-13-19

They suck balls!!!! It takes at least 5 trys to get them to connect with my Galaxy Note10 Plus. If I have the right ear in and want to put in the left later, that's a big no go. I have to take both out, put them back in the charging case, wait a few minutes then try again. When cutting the grass with both in, they fade in and out. Both will play, then just the right, then both, then just the left, then both and so on. They just flat out SUCK. Also, I was supposed to get a free wireless charger if I left a nice review. Well that was a no go as well. Still waiting on the f'ing charger. They sent me some code to use at checkout which never worked ever worked. Just a shady a** company. Don't waste your money people. Spend a little more and get a good product with good customer service. Hell even Amazon is screwing me on this one and I just signed up for Prime. Real f'ing nice to both of them

title: Good sound quality, bass and battery life
body: When I first bought these headphones, I only intended to use them for work. I got them, started using them and fell in love. I didn't expect much sound quality or good bass for that matter but these earbuds pack a damn punch. I ended up using these everywhere and eventually lost them (and the case) as they had fell out of my pocket which to me is the only downside, but I ended up ordering another pair because I can't do without my good sound quality.

title: MEH / Okay earbuds / downgraded review (after 4 weeks)
body: The sound is good but inconsistent ! They are comfortable and stay securely in your ears.I really like the charging box. I bought the white so that I can see the lights through the closed box. I'm not as happy with this purchase as I was originally. They work best if you sit still and don't try to move around. Sound will cut out from time to time. It only cuts out briefly but still, it can be pretty irritating. For instance, if you have your ipod or phone in your pocket and you lift your leg, the sound will sometimes cut out for half a second or so. I may just have to go back to corded headphones or a different brand of buds.

title: Great sound at a great price
body: I ordered these earbuds after my last pair (Phaiser BHS-730) died after only 2 years. I ordered these and have had them for a two weeks or so. I use them 5 days a week at work for around 5 hours each day. I am a commercial landscaper and mower. The sound quality is very comparable to the Phaiser BHS-730 I had, maybe a little better. It handles all types of music well. The highs and lows are definitely enjoyable. The battery life is interesting, they work excellently for me, but this is because I am able to throw them in the changing case and carry them in my pocket between jobs. They definitely charge quickly but the charge doesn’t last forever. They are very comfortable to wear for long periods of time and I love that I am able to wear sunglasses (no over ear hook to get in the way) and a winter hat (they don’t stick out of your ear too far) without any problems. The fact that they are very water proof is fantastic because I get rained on a sweat considerably at my job. And they will handle workouts well. The noise cancellation is pretty good.
