When the music is on (mid level or about as loud as most will listen) and the earbuds are properly seated I can barely hear the loud mower or backpack leaf blower I am using. The only thing that I don’t love about these earbuds is that you can not control the volume from the earbuds. You have to use your phone. Other than that, couldn’t be happier. I would definitely recommend buying

title: Always charged and great sound
body: I like the sound quality and also having the earbuds charged all the time so I can spontaneously use them during exercise. The convenience is wonderful. Before, I used to have to go without earbuds or charge them for 30 minutes before I could go out.

title: Exceptional quality & features at a very low price
body: I am Extremely pleased with my new TOZO earbuds.  I bought them to get away from wired headsets (I own several) and I expected a great sacrifice in sound quality as a trade for the convenience.  I was wrong. The TOZO sound is GREAT, they are comfortable, light, easy to pair with my phone or I-pad, and charge easily and quickly. And they are waterproof when working out, swimming, or caught out in the rain.  I also like the compact pocket-sized charging/storage case. The earbuds automatically come on when you take them out to use them. All these positive features and at a very affordable price.  I plan to tell my friends and family how great these earbuds are.

title: Game changing headphones!!
body:
Probably the best $50 I have spent in a very long time. I have an affinity for quality headphones (Bose QC, audio technica) and I find myself reaching out for these over my over-the-ear phones because of convenience and comfort. Sound quality is incredible for what they are, I just love how crisp the bass is. I use these for running and mountain biking, and they stay in my ears even in the fastest of downhill runs. After coming home, I leave them in while showering.

I've shown them off to curious coworkers and friends, and all of them wound up buying a pair! If these broke today, I'd buy another set in a heartbeat. But I'm not worried about that, even after a couple of drops they have shown no signs of stopping.

The battery did die on me during a 2.5hr bike ride. If you are worried about battery length, I'd check out that newer T6 model that supposedly lasts for 5 hours for only $15 more...

No need for expensive beats by Dre, apple, etc. These are the bee's knees of wireless ear buds.

title: Pairing is very simple.
body: This is the first pair of wireless earbuds I've used and I love them. Awesome features include: waterproof, noice cancelling, and sound clarity. Pairing was very simple.

title: AirPod sound quality with half the price tag!
body: Great product. I normally cannot use earbuds because they fall out of my ears, but the multiple sizes of rubber adapters included with this product allowed me to find the perfect fit. Beyond that, once I found the right fit for me, the sound quality was great. And beyond the good sound and deep bass, I used these on a flight across the aisle from a crying child and couldn’t hear a thing. All the sound quality of AirPods with half the price tag.

title: affordable and convenient
body: Just got these on Prime day.  whoosh delivered in a day!  love that they have multiple size earpieces, better than airpods which I didn't even bother with as I knew they wouldn't work for me.  once I got the smallest size earpiece applied, they fit great!  way better than having an annoying cord around your neck.  Can't wait to try them at the gym.  And bonus they are waterproof!

title: Not Bad but read this review!
body:
I don't use these for working out. They tend to slip or feel like they are going to slip or move. Which hurts the rating. They just don't seem to feel right.

I use these for my iPad. If I watch YouTube or something where I need sound i out these on.  I'll use these and they work great for that. They hold a charge really well.
One important thing is that you can not use the same set for your phone and your tablet. They always fight to lock on. So I actually own this and a set of the SoundPerts. I USE the Soundperts for my Cellphone and the Tazo for my tablet. I hopefully this helps anyone out there looking for a good set of these. Dont get me wrong they are not bad for the price. A REAL set of these will run $110 or more

title: Exceptionallly satisfied with the TOZO T10 sound and comfort.
body: Bought these TOZO T10 bluetooth 5.0, a month ago and didn't know what to expect. The reviews sounded a little to good to be true especially for the price $49.99. And so i took a chance and I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of sound that was coming out of these things. The bass and sound were music to my ears. The connectivity was simple and quick to all of my devices. Finally the variations in rubber ear cushions was very helpful when choosing the right fit and confort.

title: Great for work
body: I work at a machine shop and these are great for work. They work great for noise cancellation while providing entertainment. They are a huge upgrade from traditional wired earphones in their comfort and are alot more safe to use around machinery.

title: Very good product
body: Paired with phone easily- quality sound-haven’t used them enough to tell about the battery life- if battery life is as advertised then they are as good as the AT&T store only about 1/3 of the price

title: Very happy with these earbuds!
body: I had a tough time believing that these earbuds at 1/3 the cost of Apple's would perform well but decided to try them out.  So glad I did.  I am not a fan of the Apple earbud design with that white stem.  I do a lot of bike riding and these are perfect.  They are comfortable to wear, stay in place and the full-range sound quality is really impressive.  The Bluetooth microphone quality is also great.  They are waterproof.  I recommend these to anyone on the fence.

title: Well worth the money
body: Long story short my two year old daughter likes to put things in the trash can, including my AirPods. So I was in the market for another a new wireless pair and I didn’t want to spend $175+. I found these and decided to give them a shot and I’m not exaggerating when I say that these are better than the AirPods. For $50 these things are great and I highly recommend them. Only downside is that when you receive a phone call there is no microphone so you have to take the buds out and use the phone...it’s a first world problem.

title: Inexpensive but value added BT headphones
body:
I hate cables but love in ear BT Heaphones
So far they work well Day 3
My only request is the silicone inserts have a wing or something that prevents them from easily sliding out
Not I have replaced the silicone inserts that best fit still worry it will fall out

title: Exactly what I was looking for!
body:
I do aquatic exercise. I want music (or workout instructions) as I workout. I've had a few waterproof music players - for various reasons they just don't work out (stop talking to the computer to be able to switch music, not great sound quality, cumbersome to use, etc).

So I've been searching for a blue tooth earbud (or even headphone) that was  waterproof - something that I can put my phone in a waterproof case and play music or podcasts or books or whatever.

A friend had found one blue tooth ear bud - it came as a single earbud. She bought us both one. It works great for her - Not so much for me. And that is with us in the same pool at the same time going the same distance. I was beginning to think it was just me.

Then I found TOZO T10 - I LOVE IT. It has enough noise cancellation that I can ignore other things (even a class) going on around me. The sound quality is decent for the price point. It connects to my phone easily.

I have recommended this to a few others. And will continue to do so.

title: I love this product it fits so well!!
body: I liked the cost for one I really did not want to spend hundreds of dollars on a set of wireless earbuds and these were definitely worth it to buy.  To start when you receive the product it comes with a variety of buds that you can replace on the actual Bluetooth devices to fit your ear better, this makes it so almost anyone can use this as long as they take the time to find their size.  Secondly its sound-quality is very good it cancels out most sounds which I like for meditation and it can play music very loudly.  Next its Bluetooth range is very far, I can leave my phone on my desk and walk around the house while still listening to my music and enjoying it.  Lastly its battery life, whenever I go anywhere for the weekend I bring it to a full charge at my house and the battery on the storage container lasts me those WHOLE weekend without having to charge it again and I use it a lot.  All in all I love these headphones they look sleek in the ear and work great for me.. it was a pretty good find.

title: High hope's but came up short
body: I really wanted to like these for running. Unfortunately, compared to my older and cheaper wireless buds, these have a much shorter range. While running the sound cuts in and out constantly, if I am not moving it's fine. I never had this issue before with my other earbuds. The rechargeable base and holder are great, but those features dont make up for the poor reception. A separate note is that the volume level between 0 and the first step up is higher than I would have liked.

title: Amazing at first
body: But now they die after 20 minutes of listening. I go to plug them back in and they say they're fully charged but just die immediately. Outside Amazon's return window which is irritating because they are defective an it's only been 2 months. My sister has a pair and doesn't have this issue.

title: Not worth your money!!! Don't buy!!!
body: If I could give negative stars I most definitely would. First got them I was thrilled. Two weeks later one of the buds stopped pairing. It took their customer service a week to respond to my emails since they don't have a number to call. By that time I had already gotten a refund. All the email stated was how to reset and charge them which is what Amazon told me to do in the beginning. Waste of time and money!!! Don't buy!!!!!

title: Good headphones, but they won't stay in my ear
body:
These headphones seem pretty good in terms of quality, however they will not stay in my ears for longer than a minute, even using the smallest sized earbuds they provide.

To people who might think I am not aware of the different sizes of earbuds, I am using the smallest size.  I must have small ear canals, because I need even smaller earbuds in order to keep these from simply popping out of my ear after a short time.

No matter how good the product is, it really defeats the purpose if they won't simply stay in my ears.  I really like the product, so it's a shame I can't use them.  I am now having to purchase a different set with an actual wrap-around ear band.

title: Nice product for the price
body:
I've been using these headphones for a few weeks now and have enjoyed them.  Sound quality is good -- not Bose-like, but not tinny either.  Charging case is a nice feature.  Great battery life.  Did some yard work in the rain wearing them with no trouble, but probably will not attempt to take them in a pool or shower.

I have not experienced any of the connection problems noted in other reviews.  I don't power them down when I put them in the case, and I turn off the Bluetooth connection on my phone.  Maybe that makes a difference?

At any rate, I've been pleased with this product.  Just hope they last longer than some of the other wireless headphones I've bought recently.

title: Great product at a great price!
body: After I charged the earbuds in its case for a short time, I very easily paired the earbuds to my phone. It is easy to get going with this product and it's an especially nice feature that four sides of ear cones are provided to help ensure that the earbuds don't fall out.

title: Better than expected
body:
After a few days I'm impressed with these buds. Sound quality is surprisingly good for earbuds (though not good by any objective measure of sound quality, let's set that straight), and noise isolation on calls is acceptable. In noisy environments your first syllable will get dropped when you speak.

The fit was good for me, but not for my wife, it's about the shape of the ear not the size, and the right one would fall out of her ear. For me, 40 minutes of vigorous walking did not dislodge them at all.

title: Solid Product
body: Product arrived in solid packaging. The earbuds easily paired with each other and with all my devices.  Sound quality is awesome.  When I’m using my earbuds my husband has to talk louder to get my attention or for me to understand him...and volume is at medium low.  I just wish it has a volume control and can be paired to 2 devices at the same time. All in all though, I am very happy and satisfied with my earbuds!!!

title: Best wireless earbuds so far!!
body: After trying multiple brands ad models of wireless bluetooth eabuds, I ca unarguably say these are the best. Pairing was super easy. Love i can charge wirlessly on a Qi pad. The sound is fabulous. I love that I am able to swim in these as well. Also beng ableto use only one was an unexpected awesome feature. I'll add info on battery life after more usage. So far I love them enough I purchased another pair and sent a different brand back.

title: Poor technology, badly ergonometric, falls continuously, but ok sound
body:
I bought these because I was trying to find an alternative to AirPods given their excessive price. I totally regret it!
As soon as I put these TOZO T10 on, I realized that they didn't fit my ear very well, despite trying the different sizes. This became particularly bad working out - they kept falling in certain positions and when lifting weight. I started to work out without any music as a result. Now, one of the headphones (the left) failed completely.
In addition, the pause buttons are too hard and honestly, the fact we can't control the volume or to play the next song it's quite bad and technologically rudimentary.
Lastly, connecting my phone to these was a struggle. Often times I had to turn off my bluetooth, forget the device and pair it fresh, or the right/left connection would be lost...
In summary:  I do not recommend this, not at all!!!

title: Good while they lasted
body: I really liked these ear buds but not my (R) ear bud does not want to charge and no longer working. I switched it to the left charging port but it looks like it is actually the ear bud that will not charge. Disappointed...

title: Constant sound loss
body: The built looks good the sound is good but I keep having trouble with the right ear piece it’s not charging correctly.  Every time I want to use only the right ear piece I keep getting a sound coming off of it like every 10 seconds, really annoying and makes it unusable. When trying to use the left ear piece only sound keeps cutting off and and it’s just unusable as well. When using both the sound is good, but almost every time there’s  head movement the sound cuts off. It gets really annoying.. like I said built is good and Sound is good. But the constant loosing of of sound makes this product unusable.

title: Great Headphones
body: I use these daily for commuting now. Between 4 and 8 hours per day. They connect really easily, great sound quality, they stay comfortably in my ear even when I'm doing yard work type stuff, comes w/ different sized earbud covers which helps a lot w/ the fit. Just across the board great headphones at a great price.

title: Great bass and design!!
body: There's wireless earbuds are great. Was looking for a cost effective alternative to Apple air pods and the TOZO T10s exceed my expectations. I've tried the airpods and compared to my new T10s, the sound quality is much better with the T10s. While I wish the battery lasted longer the charge case is a great addition and I only planned to use them at work and at the gym so it works out for me. Love the design and look of these earbuds as well. They fit in my ear great and come with different sized buds. They paired easily with my iPhone which is great as well.

title: Very good quality!
body: The quality is good, it mostly depends on the fitting and the sizing of the buds. I reccomend trying the different earbuds that comes with these. Overall the quality is great, even for music. Sadly there's no manual volume controls, but that's fine for me at least. Everything else about them is good, I'm sure they'll work great on a phone, although I use these primarily on my Laptop, anyways really great quality earphones!!!

title: Great Headphones
body: These are easy to pair to your device and they auto pair to each other.  (They even do a stereo check).  Just take them out of the storage box and they turn on and pair.  Watch the video to make sure you properly twist them in your ear.  I'm still trying to make it a habit.  And use the different soft bud sizes to find the right one for you.  It's a little different at first as they feel a bit big, but they have not fallen out while working out, riding a bike, mowing my lawn, etc.  The storage box automatically recharges them and has 4 lights to show how much charge is still left in the box.  So far I've used them all week without plugging in the box and I'm on my last light (1 of 4) of reserve power.  I have not used the headphones from 100% to 0% to truly test the number of hours you get on 1 charge.  You can pause music and answer a phone call with the button on the ear bud, but I don't think there is a microphone and you can't control the volume.  Luckily I have the watch that can change songs, change volume, etc.  So it's not a big deal for me.  Overall I enjoy the product and the price is great!

title: Best earbuds on amazon
body:
These are the first earbuds that I have bought that actually stay in your ear while moving around
Earbuds are small and comfortable
Sound quality is great
Noise cancellation is great aswell which is perfect for when I want drown out the sound of the air compressor we have running
I use them while I work at a mechanic shop (Graveyard shift) and if these break or get lost I will be ordering another pair

title: Awesome customer service!
body: Received a defective pair and customer service reached out and sent a replacement. These earbuds are amazing! Thanks again, will do business in the future again for sure!

title: Great sound great price great earbuds
body:
I was looking to replace a pair of bluetooth earbuds that were tethered together which I found to be awkward.  These are completely separate and more comfortable.  I use them mainly for Audible books and secondarily for music.  The sound quality is amazing for music.  Bass response is great for small earbuds.  They are really easy to pair with Bluetooth on my iPad and to each other.  In fact they pair to each other automatically all you need to do not is take them out of the charging case.  The charging case is very well built and charges the earbuds quickly.  The case can be charged with the included usb cable or wirelessly.  The case is small and easy to travel with.  It’s actually small enough to put it in your pocket.  The case has blue lights to show the charge level and the earbuds have a red light that shows it is charging when fully charged the lights go out.  The earbuds were easy to fit to my ears.  They  come with several sizes and recommended that you try all of them till you find the ones that works best for you.
I highly recommend these for the reasons I have outlined here.  You can’t go wrong I promise you.

title: A good set of earbuds
body: I bought these earbuds for running and doing yard work. The sounds is fantastic and they do a good job with noise cancellation while I’m mowing. They fit well and do not fall out even when running. I did have an issue with the left earbud because it would keep cutting in and out while running, which was quite annoying and threw off my pace. I emailed TOZO and they were very responsive. They are sending me a new pair and not wanting the first pair back. Overall I’m very happy with the earbuds, and hopefully the new pair will not have the same issue as the first.

title: very impressed!
body: i had been in the market for some buds for a while but could never stomach paying apple prices... what a surprise to find these awesome buds.. The quality of the package and construction  is top notch. The sound quality is very good for both podcasts and music. I don't know why you would pay more when you can get everything you would want from these..

title: First venture into TWS headphones, not disappointed.
body:
TLDR, fantastic value and performance for the price.

While I've only had these for a few weeks, I can see myself using them for as long as they last.
My biggest gripe with past wireless headphones, has always been the cord or band that connectes the two.
Starting with the Motorola S9 headphones ages ago, they worked ok but we're a bit bulky and the charging port eventually broke rendering them useless. Then the replacement S11HD's while much better to wear and listen to, we're also much more fragile and my first pair died from moisture from sweat while working out, and the second pair had them break the band right in the middle which rendered them also useless.
Finally I ran across the QY8's on Amazon a while back, and while they were on sale for $5 which is a absolute steel, they sounded much better and have our lasted all my previous pair currently. The main issue I do have is the rubber band that connects them together which while it is nowhere near fragile like the past headphones, it is a little bit grippy, and would continually loosen the buds out of my ear as I move around, as well as grip the back of my neck and pull them out as my neck gets sweaty.

In enters the T10's. My first venture into TWS headphones and while I question the validity of over 14,000 review, I figured for the price, these would be a perfectly reasonable first try. Well, for how good they really seem to be, they might be with me for a long, long while.
Initial initial impression is really good as the packaging is top notch, and all the parts feel high quality and well put together. The earbud itself is made of a sort of matte soft rubber that seems to be better at not sticking and collecting earwax like a smooth rubber, but still sticks and stays in your ear reliably especially being as they are two little buds that have to remain in your ear all by themselves.

Pairing is as easy as pulling both buds out of their case and waiting a few seconds, then making sure you find and connect to the TOZO-T10-R which is the Right earbud that acts as the primary device. Once connected you get high quality and virtually latency free audio with high quality sounds, and solid bass. Volume has a pretty good range and while they are not active noise canceling, they cancel out as much as expected with an in ear earbud which is still really good.

I just took them on a 4hr flight linked up to my Oculus Quest to watch Netflix on the flight, and the earbuds worked perfectly to completely remove you from the noise and overall presence of the flight and escape into vary own private theatre room. It was bliss.

The only downside I can address is the battery life was only just around 4hrs give or take. The storage case is a portable battery bank that should cover at least one full charge, and it does seem to recharge them rather quickly so this might have been a non issue if you give them 5-10 minutes to charge a little between movies or a visit to the bathroom, but I failed to give them a jolt and before the end of the flight I had one of the buds telling me that its battery was low. The curse of BT headphone I suppose but still in most cases I don't see this being a big issue.

The only other thing that I'm not sure is a negative as it seems to be a constant with most all BT headphones has been the little lite hiss that happens when there is low/no audio at a point, but the headphone is active to the device. They are completely silent when the audio is paused for more than a few seconds, but when you start any audio, the quiet part of say a song, you may hear a lite hiss that I believe is something that all BT headphones have when the connection is active. Once audio starts to play though, you won't notice and the high quality sound will fill your ears.

Overall I'm extremely happy I got the T10's as my first TWS headphones as they really exceeded my expectation. I highly reccomend them among the flood of reviews. They really are that good.

title: Descent headphone with short battery life and bad call quality
body: I have had these headphones for a few days. The build quality is really good with good music quality. I just wished it had a longer batter life and good call quality. I get a lot of complains when I use it for phone calls. I wish it had active noise cancellation for phone calls.

title: Good headphones garbage charging case.
body:
Not sure if it's just my product but the little charging case is complete garbage and is completely useless as a recharging system for the headphones.

I use these headphones every time I go to the gym. I keep the headphones and case in the center console of my car. when I first got them I made sure that the case was fully charged so that it would charge my headphones after I used them at the gym. They get about 1-1.5 hrs of use every other day, so I assumed the case would keep them charged for basically a month's worth of use before the case would need to be recharged. After my first day of using them I put them back in the case to recharge and the case was at full charge. Two days later I got them out and the headphones were fully charged but the case was completely drained. I have tried recharging the case multiple times but it seems like as long as the headphones are in the case the case will be constantly draining. This completely defeats the purpose of having a charging case. It should only drain to the amount that the headphones need to be charged and should not constantly be draining. For a while there I was recharging the case every 3 days and only using the headphones about 3 hours in total.

From my experience these are a good pair of headphones with a good case for storage but has a useless charging feature.

Five stars for the headphones the 1 star for the case

title: IT WON’T STOP BEEPING.
body:
If you only use one bud at a time, it won’t stop beeping to tell you to put the other in. It’s so aggravating I could curse. Whoever wants to use two earbuds all the time? Especially just for phone calls or driving? It’s a feature annoying enough to make me want to leave 1 Star. It distracts from anything good.

Update:
The beeping stops after a couple of minutes.

title: Better than Apples Bluetooth Ear-Buds
body: This is definitely one of my better purchases. All the recommendations are correct and it does what is advertised. It’s easy to pair with my iPhone and is plenty loud which was my problem with the apple Bluetooth ear buds.

title: Excellent Product
body: Very nice earbuds. Louder than you need and waterproof. What else can you say? I had a pair of Jabra Elite 65t and these are just as good and louder. For 1/3 the price. Even if they stopped working in 6-9 months you could buy another pair and not freak out if you lost them.

title: Great Deal
body: These earbuds are very well made, sound excellent, and battery life if pretty good considering the sound quality.  They are comfortable to wear once you get your right size ear piece which they come with 4 sets of different sizes, there not as heavy as I thought they might be which is a plus.  If you like listening a little loud like i do then good luck hearing anyone around you, i couldn't hear a thing around me when the music is playing which can be good or bad depending on your situation... The case is durable and has a magnetic locking lid which is very nice.  Has a strap to put on it if your into that.  The only problems i see with this is the cord that comes with to charge it is very short, but I suppose you really dont need a long one, and the rubber piece that seals the miro-usb port is a little bit cheap, i could see it eventually breaking off after repeated use... however i still think for the price this product is worth it, especially if you purchase on sale or have rewards points to burn... or both! Great job Tozo!

title: Great Sound Quality and Portability
body: The TOZO T10 earbuds are my first wireless earbuds. According to my sister that briefly tried them on, the sound quality was way better than her other pair from a different company. I'm glad that I was gifted these earbuds because the bass is high quality as well. I definitely want to keep using this product as it made my run a lot more enjoyable than my regular earbuds and my wired bluetooth ones.

title: Stays in place when excersising.
body: I have been using the headphones almost every day for about three weeks so far and they have been great. I use them when I work out. I typically run outdoors or on a treadmill, usually for a minimum of 25 min at a time. I did run 7 miles the other day and have not had any issues with them staying in place. They don’t move around when I jump rope or run. I have connected them to 3 different devices without any issues. Having several different ear pieces to provide a good fit was helpful. The sound from them is well balanced with a lean towards bass. Battery life thus far has been great and being able to charge them in the case is a handy feature. I have recharged them 3 times on 1 case charge. I dropped the case from about 3 feet up onto concrete and it was unscathed.

title: Super comfortable headphones.
body:
I bought these headphones for my wife. She has a busy job that she needs to be talking on the phone and decided on these as they look super convenient with the charging cable usb.

She loved them. We took our time to set it up for her and for her to choice the correct earbud for correct placement.

These sound better then my apple AirPods.

The sound is crisp, clear bass and when we tried talking on the phone there was no echo.

Great purchase, super friendly my daughter was also already asking for a pair.

title: Amazing company and cares for customers.
body: I've had my Tozo ear buds since early September and we have become a staple for my listening experience. They fit comfortably and conform well to the contours of my ear without falling out. Battery life is amazing with six to eight hour usage and charge extremely fast. 20 minutes of charge time equal about one hour of listening time. Charger case is sturdy with magnetic lid. On top of everything though, Tozo's customer service is impeccable. I had damaged my right earbud and after contacting customer support Tozo was completely willing to send me a new pair!

title: Poorly Designed
body:
I had to return this item.  The left channel simply would not consistently sync with the right earbud and is currently not working at all.  It's a shame because for the few days it worked, this was a really convenient and useful gizmo.

Also please note that the seller offered me a free charging pad if I wrote a positive review.  Take that into mind when reviewing seller feedback.

title: Great bass, comfortable, good for workouts, easy to use.
body: These Bluetooth earbuds have the best bass of any earbuds I've used yet. They have a simple and sleek design, that fits comfortably and is easy to clean. I have recommended these to 2 people already, and use them daily for many hours at the gym. Must buy if your in the market for this kind of product. Also, battery life is underrated, the portable charging case has 4 battery lifes.

title: Won't stay paired and must be close to phone
body: I would give these a 4 or 5 rating if they could stay paired and not have static if more than 3 feet away from source.  Sound quality good and volume max good.  Bulky ear buds..maybe fit larger ears better.

title: Finally found wireless workout ear buds
body: I enjoy working out, anything from Olympic lifting to running, cycling etc. I really was in need of some ear buds that would stay in during my work out and now I have finally found them. I have done several workouts with them so far and have had zero connection issue with my IPhone and I hardly even notice them. As a bonus the sound is pretty good. The bass is a little higher than it should be but for workout music that is what you want. I will update my review in 90 days to discuss durability.

title: The stereo sound is the best quality of these earbuds
body: The stereo sound is the best quality of these earbuds. The stereo sound boasts superb bass sound, with clear high & low volume. The earbuds reduce the background noise, you could enjoy your music, no matter what happens around.

title: Great sound, wireless charging, price.
body: Easy pairing/connection. Long battery life.  Great sound. Love the wireless charging feature.  Why spend cray money on apple pods.

title: Snug, comfortable fit. Excellent sound quality and noise cancellation.
body:
I bought these to use while working out. AirPods don't fit, and I don't like the feel of anything over my ears. The TOZO T10's snug fit provides consistently high quality sound and noise cancellation, because they're not moving around inside my ear. They paired easily to my iPhone and my Windows 10 PC. With Bluetooth 5.0, they can access a larger bandwidth than older headphones can for higher music and call quality. As an audiophile on a budget, I highly recommend these.

(Any trouble using the microphone inside Windows 10 is because of the PC's older Bluetooth receiver, and *any* Bluetooth headset will have the same issues on the same PC.)

title: Super value!  Great fidelity.  Unknown battery life.  Unknown waterproofing.
body:
Haven't fully discharged to test battery life—but seems to meet my needs on a daily basis.
Haven't put them in water.
The fidelity is spot-on and very good.  They fit my ears and provide a great alternative to AirPods.

title: The Price Is Right With These Great Feeling & Great Sounding earbuds!!!
body: I LOVE these earbuds!!  They feel great in my ears and don’t fall out or even shift when I make sudden movements.  They’re the best, especially at the price at which they're offered.  I have been using them for about 2 weeks or so.  The sound is much better than most of the previous bluetooth earbuds I've bought and definitely the loudest by far.  I have to say that I'm very happy.  Try them and you won't be disappointed.

title: These earbuds are amazing!
body: I'm so glad I bought these. The earbuds themselves hold a charge for at least four hours, and the case only needs to be charged every two or three days -- even if you're using them fairly regularly. They hold up in the rain and the pool, as long as you're not submerging yourself in water. The left headphone did stop charging after a few months, but after cleaning the charger, it works just just fine. I would highly reccomend this product, and I will definitely buy it again in the future.

title: Not consistent - short shelf life
body: These buds were great at first but over time began losing their connectivity going from one ear to the next then stopped holding their charge. At one point I had 70% charge and in fifteen minutes died in the middle of a run. Let them charge overnight - only to 50%. Unless they were at 100% they'd die within twenty minutes and spend several minutes beeping at you with the alert. Looks like the majority of these are fine but my experience was poor. up to you.

title: Easy listening
body: Like so many folks I have been searching for that perfect Bluetooth device that performs like advertised. This comes very close to being perfect and the waterproofing a spot on for someone like me that sweats just by getting out of bed. I highly recommend it!!!!

title: Not comfortable to wear
body: The battery life seemed good, I only had them for a week but I used them quite often and never had a problem. Sound quality was good when I could get them to properly stay in my ears. I could never be comfortable with them in. They always felt like they were about to fall out. The sound quality always sounded like headphones that were not fully in your ears correctly and needed to be readjusted. When I held them in with my hands, sound was awesome. Noise cancellation was not good since they were never fitted into my ear correctly. And yes I tried the different sized ear pieces extensively. In the end I was disappointed and returned them.

title: So far
body: Just received them, they are very sleek looking, paired easily with my note 9, I'm only giving 4 stars cause I just got them, I will update in a month or so!

title: Left side cuts in and out.
body: I will be returning them. The sound quality is nice. However the left side continually cuts in and out. It's so bad that I ultimately took them out and put in my crappy wired earphones. When it works, it sounds great, but I'm sad that less than a week old, they already have issues.

title: Easy set-up, comfortable, good value
body: After going through literally 9 pairs of Jaybird's over a 3 year period I decided to switch to something more affordable.  Happy with the ease of set-up with these, they fit well and are comfortable, and the sound quality is very good for the money.  I am hopeful these will have more longevity than my previous experience.

title: Convenience
body: I bought these so I could practice yoga in my bedroom as my son sleeps without interrupting him. So far it has really helped to enhance my practice. But I use them even more than I anticipated. I use them at work, for phone calls, in the living room when there are other noises. I really enjoy them! They have great sound quality and can get very loud. I never turn up the volume all the way. I also love how many times I can charge them in the wireless charger. Definitely recommend.

title: Great for the price, but they do leave something to be desired.
body:
These sound okay - they're definitely loud enough. I don't want to split hairs, 'cause these are fairly cheap at ~$50 - but... for me they're overly bass-heavy. Background though: I'm used to some (wired) earbuds that are audiophile quality reference headphones (MEE Audio Pinnacle P1's) - so if you're a bass-head & usually go for Beats by Dre or something like that - you'll probably have no issue with these earbuds.

Love the case & that it's wireless charging. They're nice and light & comfortable in the ear.

Another pain point for me on these though, is that they can only be 'actively' paired with one device at a time - meaning... They can't have two devices connected at once, and automatically switch between them based on which one is playing sound. I would've liked that option so I could have them paired to my phone & computer simultaneously...

But again - these are kind of a budget model - and for the price, they're more than what I wanted from them: a handy set of no-fuss/no-cords headphones that I can easily pop in for use when I want some headphones on when I'm using my phone: Playing games/listening to music while the wife & two toddlers are sleeping in the same room, etc...

These easily earned 4 stars, and are probably really a 5 star product when you factor in the price.

Would recommend these.

title: Amazing Earbuds
body: These earbuds are great. I wanted to pair of truly wireless earbuds because I travel some and needed a small Bluetooth option. I also wanted some that I could work out in for running and weight training and not get tangled up in wires or fall off/out if my ears. They work perfectly. They sound fantastic. I was honestly surprised at how good they sounded. They lean slightly to a heavier bass profile but for me I don't mind that. I highly recommend these.

title: Loudest earbuds i've owned!
body: Great wireless earbuds for the price! These are easily the loudest i've owned. Usually I have to raise the volume up to about 3 clicks less than the loudest setting on my phone to have it where I like it at, but with these I usually at the halfway level. These are also smaller than my previous ones so they fit comfortably. Satisfied so far, but I would like to see them improve on the charging ability of the case to about 4-5 full charges. Highly recommend!

title: They were awesome, until they weren't
body: I loved these ear buds when I first got them. I use my time in the shower to watch the shows I like during my me time. I use my cell phone and mount it on the wall and while I'm taking my time showering I watch some YouTube videos. Like I said they worked pretty well for a while. I did have some trouble keeping them in my ears  but I was able to deal with it. Not even a month into using them the left ear bud stopped holding a charge. I exchanged them for the exact same thing and once again they were awesome. Sadly, nearly a month later I had issues again. This time the left ear bud suddenly disconnected and went dead. Usually if the battery is low it will tell you so. That didnt happen, it just went deal. It will not charge or turn on. I'm so sad! Now my showers will be dull again.

title: Very good audio and comfortable to wear
body: I've been very impressed with this set of wireless earbuds. The audio has been exceptional with all the music and audiobooks I've used them with. I was a bit worried that the shape would be uncomfortable over time, but I've quickly forgotten they're even there most of the time. They paired with my Pixel 2 right away, and with one another without any problems. The magnetic snap-in charger box is very cool. The earbuds click into place and hold firmly, and start charging right away. The box itself has blue LED indicators to show how much charge is left in the internal battery, so it's easy to see when it's running low. One feature I didn't notice when I bought them was the wireless induction charger in the bottom of the case. If you have wireless chargers already, you can just set this case on them to recharge the internal battery rather than use the included USB cable. It's a very convenient feature to have! Overall, I've had a great experience with these, and wouldn't hesitate to recommend them to others.

title: Little, with outstanding promises!
body: These little things are absolutely fantastic! They fit snug in your ear, along with great sound quality! And I love the portable case that acts as a charger! So great, that I've already ordered another upgraded pair (t6)!

title: Solid product, Left ear bud cuts out...
body: I've read enough reviews to be able to give you a solid review of the product and the expectations for this product.  While the unit is very well build and a solid overall product, the resounding issue seems to be the hit/miss of the Left ear bud.  I did discover that the ear pieces can fallout without the proper size in your ear (I will chalk that up to the user since the company provides alternate sizes so you can find the best one for you).  The product in my case lasted 3 plus hours (which is better than expected).  The drawback comes back to the Left ear bud not connecting well (and to recap what others were saying, the phone would be within a foot or so from the ear buds).  If you happen to get a good pair that doesn't buffer, then your in luck.  If yours buffer (likely the culprit is the left ear piece), then decide it the price is worth keeping it vs returning it.

title: Quality Big Sound and Great Charging Case!
body:
Overall quality is good as any on market.  Battery case a big plus for travel / carry in backpack and even better with option to use onwireless charger station.  A little confusion initially with the sound notifications (i.e. It will search for its other earbud if you pop in master and beeps for few seconds- some research helped answer - would recommend adding more detailed instruction manuel.

Otherwise great product so far - big sound and great value vs. higher price point earbuds and no quality.

title: Better than Apple AirPods
body: I recently received my T10 Wireless Earbuds and I am extremely pleased! Originally, I was looking at buying the Apple AirPods, I have tried them before but since it is so pricey, I decided to look at other wireless earbuds and I am so happy that I found Tozo’s. I have been using the earbuds ever since I got it and I have used them in the shower, one of them even fell to the floor and it still worked! There’s a reason why these earbuds are so highly-rated! Tozo’s customer service is absolutely amazing too!

title: Make sure to try all earpieces!!
body:
I originally bought these to drown out noise on my bowling league.  They have not disappointed.  Manual instructs that you try all the earbud sizes, I agree, as you want a snug comfortable fit since there is no wire or wraparound holder.  Because they fit so snuggly in your ear and it samples out side noise, they block out a lot of excess noise.  The sound quality sounds clear and still has a deep bass profile even turned all the way up.  I also use them at work and only out one in.  They aren’t required to be used in tandem.

When using a Bluetooth headset for calls, the other person says is sound just like normal, only slightly quieter.  I’m buying another set for the SO soon.

title: Overall love them
body: I use these daily at work and the sound quality is great. I don't really use the buttons and mainly control everything from my phone. Both the case and the earbuds hold a great charge as well. Only draw back is due to the design, they start to work themselves out of my ear after awhile so I wouldn't recommend them for working out but if your intended purpose is like mine you'll be fine.

title: Good Value for the Money
body: I am surprised at how well the T10 wireless ear buds work. I got them based on a few articles that mentioned them as a good alternative to the expensive name brands that I can't afford right now. I listen to podcasts when I sew, and wanted the wireless so I wouldn't be tied to my phone, or have to deal with more cords. The noise cancelling function does a decent job of muting the sound of the sewing machine.  But I can still hear my husband so it's not perfect. I like that different sizes of rubber ear pieces were provided since one size fits all is usually a lie. The case is compact enough to fit easily in my purse or pocket. The battery life is just ok, but the charging case holds enough power to get me through quite a few podcasts. It doesn't take long to charge these little guys up. The little latch flap where you connect the charging cord is difficult to open at first, but it loosens after about 4-5 openings. The sound is clear. The range is really good. I'm able to get up and move around, or go into another room, and leave my phone on the desk. The customer service is good, too. They've emailed me a couple of times just to ask if I have questions or concerns about the product. Best Buy doesn't do that. Overall, considering my need and usage, the price point is excellent, and the quality is way above my expectations. I'm happy with this purchase.

title: Excellent ears buds...highly recommend.
body:
The product is excellent, great sound and looks.
I was a little skeptical, because other product I had, never stayed in my ears. But these ear buds would stayed in place, no matter what I’m doing.

title: They do their job, when they're charged
body: I was excited to get these for the price. They sound good when you have them in and they do an ok job of noise cancellation but you can still hear outside noises when you're volume is any lower then deafening. You can use them individually while one is charging in the dock but they tend to get a bit sensitive and will beep at you for awhile, it will finally stop and you can enjoy your music. They stay in your ear pretty well but I wouldn't be to vigorous with them or they will fall out. I have not tested the waterproof. Battery life is pretty poor. From full charge to dead in about a week with little use. Honestly I'm not sure if that's norm for wireless earbuds but it can be frustrating considering my wireless headset will stay charged for over a month. All in all you can't beat the price but make sure you're charging them plenty or you'll end up with dead ear buds.

title: Comfortable and easy to pair, zero bass
body: Comfort wise these are great and pairing was a snap.  But the sound quality....I get absolutely no bass with these things.  I understand they're earbuds, so not expecting reverberating kettle drums, but a little bass (somewhat key to solid listening experience) is to be expected.  Got nothing with these.

title: Simple yet quality product
body: This is our first time purchasing wireless headphones and decided to try earbuds.  The various earpiece sizes included helped my wife find the perfect fit, so that they wouldn't fall out in a variety of activities.  Sound quality is decent, even for bass in a small package.  With the snug fit and even with the volume only turned up slightly, it was difficult to hear any noise or be bothered by other background sounds.  Very happy with how is cancels out other sounds.  Thank you for making a simple yet quality product!

title: Great earbuds
body:
Great set of earbuds. Love the chargering box and how the earbuds are magnitize in place.

My only con: would be the distance between devices. Your device has to be pretty close, if not it will start to disconnect.

Overall, they dont hurt my ears nor do they fall out.

title: Great earbuds
body: Overall these earbuds are great. I was looking for some to use while doing yard work and relaxing outside. I also wanted some that were waterproof and these were rated the highest. This allowed me to go from mowing the grass right to the shower. The sound on these are fantastic. They have a deep bass are crisp clear. The only reason I didn’t give a five star is because they don’t have the capability of touching the earbud to advance to the next song. I recommend purchasing these earbuds.

title: I had to buy accessory ear buds
body:
I felt like I couldn't give less stars because the company has been incredible to work with! They have answered all of my questions very quickly. Plus, I think it's a personal thing as to these not working for me. I would return them, but I want' to use them to swim laps with, so I bought better 3 tiered ear buds made for swimming to use with these. These simply will not stay put in my ear, my right one especially. The other thing that I feel is missing (probably due to the IPX8 rating), is that you can't skip songs on the ear buds themselves. I've found others, but they only have a 7 rating, which means they can't be submerged. So it appears you can't have the best of both worlds.... YET...

-Stu Review

title: Left earbud is useless
body: Had same issues as everyone else especially the left speaker just going in/out to a point where it wasn’t worth listening to music etc. retuned it, purchased Jabra t65. Just started using it an hour ago; the sound, the fit, the ease of use is night and day different. I had a crappy battery life both for speakers—1 hr and the case  Both needed daily charge. I am not a heavy user.

title: One of the best purchases among my running gears
body: I recently started working out on daily basis and I was sick of the wired ear phones that would get in the way of my hand and arm movements. For the wireless earbuds, I initially was considering the airpods, however it's very costly and I tried them feeling not very comfortable with them in my ears. I searched online and found the positive feedback on this Tozo T10. Got it and put it on and immediately was fascinated by its sound quality. There were four sizes of rubber pieces to try and the smallest ones fit me. Don't forget to slightly turn them backwards so that they would fit snugly. Now I wear them every time I work out, morning runs, lunch time gym, and home core trainings. My husband is now jealous of me having them and he's asking for a pair!

title: Good Quality
body: I have small ears and these worked perfectly for them. They come with three sized ear bud tips. They also are great for blocking out noise. I wear these at the gym and they stay in place. I use these for PC and phone and they work great. Sound quality is crisp and all music types sound good. I just wished they came with a carrying pouch because if you put them in the case they turn on and drain the battery, otherwise they are fantastic!

title: Disappointment
body: After a few months my riggt earbud stopped working won't even try to power on I tried contacting seller see tgey would fix it ....guess just stuck with them....crappy they were pretty good

title: Impressed
body: Initially, I was skeptical about ordering these earbuds, but after trying them for about a week, I've been pleasantly surprised. The sound quality is great and the bass is impressive. The portable charging case is good quality and built better than I originally expected. The lid for the case is magnetic and the earbuds are magnetic as well, so you don't have to worry about them falling out of the case. I wish the battery life was a bit longer, but they charge pretty fast. Battery life is about 3 hours for music and 5 hours for phone calls. All in all, this is a pretty good deal and I highly recommend it to those who are looking for a pair of affordable bluetooth earbuds.

title: Good sound quality, Not for Swimming
body:
Overall a decent product, just don't go swimming in these. I did and after 20 minutes, one earbud broke. Customer Service offered to send me a replacement in exchange for a review.

PROS:
Good sound quality, good passive noise cancellation, good battery life on the earbuds.
Case has wireless charging capabilities.

CONS:
Bluetooth - have to manually connect on the bluetooth app in your phone settings each time before each use.
Poor battery life of the charging case - only charges earbuds a few times considering its bulky size.

title: Love, love, love
body: I was skeptical about the bud thing, but I quickly came to like this item.  At first, the bud kept coming off, but when I changed the bud coverings to an appropriate size, the slipping stopped.  Try not to lose track of them if you're just wearing one and you forget where you may have placed them.

title: Quality Earbuds
body:
The Tozo T10 is very well made and quite impressive for the price. The packaging was well executed, and it comes with very nice features such as IPX8 waterproofing, Wireless charging, high quality 8mm sound driver, and bluetooth v5.0.

Pairing them with my phone was too easy. Take them out of the charging case and they are ready for pairing. With bluetooth v5.0 they have a stronger connection at a longer distance. The highs have very good clarity clarity and the bass is very rich. The ability to use the T10 for a little over four hours and then a charging case good for four full recharges of the earbuds is very nice. I have tried two other brands, both quite good, but the T10 are significantly more comfortable, and the sound quality is better overall. If you have a hearing deficit you can use the right earbud to aid in phone conversations. These are very nice earbuds, the price is great, and I will be using them often in place of my wired earbuds.

title: Awesome Buds at an Awesome Price!
body:
After the umpteenth time of entangling myself in wires, I figured it was time to cut the cord and go wireless for my music listening.

I ended up purchasing TOZO after I saw the many positive reviews for it. My criteria came down to cost and quality for the price. After wearing them and listening to them for the past couple of days, I could say I'm very satisfied with the product.

The sound quality is exceptional. Clear, crisp sounds (depending on the music type) all coming from two tiny ear pieces. The noise cancellation is very admirable, considering again the small size of them. I haven't used them long enough yet to consider battery life, but they've been solid so far for my two-hour sessions at the gym.

The only quibble I can think of to mention is to make sure you select the right size ear cap for your ears. Believe me, this will save you a lot of moments where the earbuds fall out of your ears at the slightest tilt of the head. A proper ear cap size helps them stay snug and secure in your ears.

Overall, I'm very pleased with the product. Hope you enjoy it, too!

title: Earbuds are great
body: This is my second pair. I stupidly left the first pair in my car at a hotel and the valet took them. They work great and stay in my ear no matter what I am doing, working out, yard work, etc. For the money, they sound great.

title: Call quality lacking
body:
Impressive product until you make phone calls
I can hear the other person really well but the quality on their end is not good
This was from 3 different people in 3 different locations
Very disappointed in this as I do a lot of hands free business calls
 Otherwise this product has so much to offer but it is a no go for me

Back to Jabra or Jaybird
update - company did reach out with another pair. these seem to be better. good deal for the money and company is great at customer service

title: They sound great.
body:
For listening to music and people talking. But using it for phone they cannot seem to hear me. I always take it out and turn Bluetooth off.
No matter what ear piece size I use one always seems to fall out.

title: The best earbuds I've ever used
body: I've had these for about a month now and I can say without a doubt that these are my current favorite headphones to use. I like that I can basically use them anywhere I go, so at the gym, at work, in bed, and since they're waterproof even in the shower. The battery is 3 hours off one charge and the carry case can charge up to 3 times on one charge so a total of 12 hours on one case charge.

title: Excellent sound quality and battery life
body: For how much these cost, these headphones rival my Sony noise-cancelling Bluetooth headphones pretty well. Sound quality is fantastic, has a great battery life, and also quite comfy to wear for working out. Only downside I would say is that it’s microphone is not that great and doesn’t cancel out ambient noise very well, from what others have told me when I’m on the phone with them.

title: Greatly Effective and Handsomely Good-looking
body: These TOZO earbuds are my first experience ever with wireless earbuds, and I must say that, for the fantastically low price, these earbuds have far exceeded my expectations so that I can’t begin to imagine a similar product being any better. I’m not one to use earbuds quite frequently, but just walking by the case itself which serves as the home to the earbuds (which are quite sporty and slick, I might add,) I get an urge just to put them in and listen to some music while just walking around or listen to Friends on my iPad while cleaning! Couldn’t possibly be any sense of disappointed.

title: Good head phone
body: Update Tozo contacted me and provided me with new head phone which worked much better for the mic portion.  I would give this tozo a 10 if I can for customer service and 5 for the product . The original ear phone had a problem with the mic it look like it was defective but it was quickly replace.  With that being said and the sound quality being great these are worth every penny.

title: Great quality and great price
body: This is a really good earbuds. I'm surprised with the sound quality at this price. Its bluetooth connectivity is very fast and responsive as well. I tried the other earbud and returned as one of those 2 ears bud didnot sync. This Tozo earbud is totally a game changer. I'm very happy with the quality. Oh, did I mention the quality of call, very clear and no noise affected. Definitely a must buy if you are looking for an earbud!

title: Amazing sound in a little package
body: I've tried several bluetooth earbuds, and by far these have the best quality sound and bass response. They are lightweight and completely comfortable. The audio cues letting you know the pairing and L/R channel status is a nice touch. The charging case is also light and durable. Give these a chance, you will not regret it.

title: Good product, but not worth the price tag.
body:
I returned this product for a few these cons:

* Touch control - for something that is in your ear, you have to press the button way too hard for it respond. I used other in-ear headsets that a light press is all that is needed.
* connection reliability - I had the earphones less than 5 feet from my phone with no interference in-between and the connections will still pop in and out.
* Annoying blinking light - when in ear, the light blinks constantly which can be very annoying at night. Other competing earphones will only blink in ear if you are on a call which makes more sense than an constant blink.
* The earphones are the exact same form factor (not a plus) - because they are the same shape, it is possible to put them in the wrong ear. While this doesn't sound like a big deal for some, I feel I shouldn't have to closely examine the earphone for the L or R notation to know what ear to put it in. Plus, only the right earphone will automatically disconnect the earphones from your device, so its important to know which is which especially when you are in mono mode... and speaking of which...
* Mono mode - the earphone is constantly beeping looking for the other earphone. This is true for both the R and L ear piece, so Mono mode is a worthless "feature" in my opinion. It's incredibly annoying if you have to charge one side only but while you're listening with the other side, it is constantly beeping looking for the other side to connect to.
* Large case - While this case can charge the earphone several times and itself can be charged wirelessly, it is extremely large. other competing cases have half the footprint, but can almost have the same charging capacity.

UPDATED (7/23) I should have listed pros:

*Well made - despite the cons listed above, you can tell the product is made of high quality and will likely last long.
*Wireless Charging - The wireless charging worked flawlessly and was very responsive on the couple of different wireless pad it was tested on. Unfortunately, part of the convenience of wireless charges meant a larger case. For my purposes, while I loved the wireless charge, I would stick to cable charging if it meant a smaller case for portability. Granted, while still very portable and if you only owed this set, the case may seem small, but in comparison to other units I have used, the case was huge in comparison.
*Customer Service - The customers service is very responsive and even offered a replacement, but again for my purposes, the cons outweighed the pros, so the product was returned.

Overall, Tozo has a very good, well made product with great sound and (fairly unique) features but in this reviewers opinion, some there are glaring 'issues and build decisions' gives the set its current 3 star review. The 'issues' (I put issues in quotes cause it may not a deal breaker for some, but it is for me) can probably be an easy fix in a future version that would earn an easy 5 star review.

title: Great fit and sound quality.
body: Have had them for couple weeks,  easy to use I like the option to either wireless charging or plug in. Good battery life and great fit.

title: So far so good!
body: Impressive bass and battery lasts as described. So far I have just tested its waterproof  capabilities in the shower and they passed the test. Very good quality for the price. Sometimes it falls out one of my ears, but looks like is me😁.

title: Performs well above it's pricepoint
body:
This is my first set of wireless iems, so I wasn't sure what to expect. I feared poor sound, poor fit, cheap quality, constant dropped connections etc. Turns out they are virtually the opposite.
I had them paired up to my V30+ in no time, adjusted the EQ to my taste via Viper4Android, and began to use them. These really sound fantastic, as it turns out, nice balanced tone, bass is solid and non bloated (these are not "basshead" buds, which I am very happy about) Mids and treble are clean, non sibilant, and the soundstage it pretty darn good. I love the case/charger, very handy to use. I will use these mostly at night before falling asleep, but the convenience of lying in bed without wires running to the phone is really nice. Build quality is also nice, again these belie their modest price. So...I'm very happy with these & glad that I purchased them.

title: Great product
body: The charging case is compact but sturdy.  The Earbuds themselves fit snuggly and don't require constant re-adjusting.  I rode 21 miles on my bicycle and had no issues with them.  The bass is not a strong as I thought but the sound quality is very good.  I would definitely recommend this product.

title: Great sound quality.  Easy to use.
body: So I decided to finally try truly wireless headphones because my over the ear headphones sound great but I sweat too much with them on in the summer time.  I had a difficult time deciding which ones to buy because there were so many choices.  I'm glad I bought these.  They seem to be of good quality.  After finding the right size ear tip for me Ive decided they sound really good.  They have great full range sound with punchy bass.  I mainly listen to bands like Radiohead and Grouplove and in my opinion these are perfect for that type of music.  I plan on mainly using these for when I'm either at my home relaxing or walking around town and these seem like they will work great for that.  I'm very happy with this product.

title: Comfortable, great sound, and not overall expensive!
body: I have tried several other Bluetooth and these are just what I was looking for. I have tried the apple ones which fall out of my ear easily and very uncomfortable for me. These have several different changeable earpieces that are great for customization. Also the sound is great and I can walk 30+ft away from my phone while working out and not lose the connection!

title: They are working well for me...
body: I purchased these to listen to music or audio books on my walking commutes. They have never died on me, and my walk is 80 minutes - which is more than I can say for the last BT earbuds I had. I like the earbud receptacle/battery charger case. I not really impressed with the noise cancellation, but that's not a big deal for me (I've read that NC is primarily designed to cancel jet engine noise, and doesn't handle a wide variety of random frequencies well - what I experience walking home with traffic). These also stay in my ear better than the last set I had, which would fall out when I ran (it not fun trying to find the little buggers). They sound fine to me, but I'm not an audiophile and have some high frequency hearing, so I'm not a good judge of audio quality. I would purchase these again.

title: Don't waste your money
body:
These sounds great, but they wouldn't stay in my ears during a mild walk, let alone working out. I tried all 4 ear bud sizes and none of them held it in my ear, because they are just too heavy and bulky.
Very disappointed. Update the seller reached out to me and has offered  to replace with a newer version.

title: Base meeeeeggaaaaa .  sound is unbeliveble good & wireless charging top!
body:
Meeeggaaa base , unbeliveble , the sound is super super good very impressing!
Im do music by myself for almost 40 years and im very picky with the sound, because im recording lots of people in the studio. And hey wirelss and usb charging are a must in 2019, i love it......
i will buy a second one for my wife right now...

title: Some good qualities BUT lacking in some important areas. Read first!
body:
PROS: Decent wireless ear buds. Comfortable in ear. Good while walking or lifting and while day to day activities. Sound quality is impressive for the size. Would be a good purchase for use in those areas and mindful of 3 hr life plus.

CONS: While they are "waterproof" they are not swimming earbuds. BT cuts out immediately in water. Could NOT use them during swim. ALSO, this is my second set as the first ones cut out after first use. My second pair left ear still fits out occasionally. And the pairing can be tricky. Definitely better buds out there.

title: Fast SYnc
body:
Just got these in, so far they do well, I adjusted the earpieces to one size larger and they do very well. I could have probably used the ones that came on them in the box, but opted to change them.  They came fully charged and have performed well during listening and syncing so far.  I received them on Thursday and today is Tuesday and they have been great all weekend.  I have not used them in a wet environment yet so I cannot speak to that yet.
It was surprising that with my phones Bluetooth on upon taking these out of the storage box/charger they synced almost before I could put the right side in my ear.  They also synced to each other very quickly

title: Never going back to wired
body:
To start things off, I can say these earbuds are well worth the price, a good product to see what wireless earbuds are like without spending a fortune. I use them casually throughout the day and I can say I prefer wireless over your traditional earbuds now. Just taking out these compact earbuds and listening to music around the house without having to lug my phone and cord around is amazing. The battery life is pretty impressive, I have gone on Netflix binge sessions on my phone then put them back to charge without a worry, I've only gotten the low battery message a few times and hearing that surprised me as I thought the battery was gonna be an issue in these. As for the sound, it sounds great, just what you would expect from your music, the only issue I found with the sound is when listening to songs with many sounds happening at once in a complex way or organ noises make the audio sound broken. This isn't a big issue since a majority of songs are pretty normal so this is just a warning for people with specific tastes in complex music pieces.
Overall well worth the buy and changed my preference in earbuds to wireless.

title: Tony Lamb
body: When I pulled the box from the Amazon shipping box, I was pretty impressed with the packaging. The charging box is very nice and well constructed. I was able to pair up the earbuds without a problem. Also, pairing with my phone was easy as well. Putting the earbuds in my ears was a nice and comfortable process. But, what was most impressive is the sound, just amazing. So crisp and clear. I could hear every detail in the music. I have only had the TOZO T10 earbuds for a day and I have been bragging about them to friends and co-workers. I look forward to more and more awesome music. Keep up the great work.

title: 100% Worth your money!!!!
body: Love how snug they fit in my ear, perfect for running or working out. I work outside and use them to listen to music and I use them for the gym. I love them so much I think I’m gonna get a 2nd pair just for the gym. Also the fact that the case charges the headphones multiple times on a single charge is pretty awesome. Reasonably priced! 100% worth the money

title: Very Poor sound experience
body: I’m experiencing really poor sound experience when I make a call otherwise it’s Gud for hearing songs and watching videos. Not good for making a call and talking.

title: Second pair same exact great service product and reliability. Easiest set up ever! Ready to use !
body:
Love this set so much that I purchased a second pair. Again the second pair came ready to use charged and all! The sound quality good and For the price this set is awesome! Bought these for my my son after my wife using them for about a month the original purchase unit was replacements for her old beats audio.  Can honestly say she will not miss the old overpriced unit.

These guys have great customer service with a confident open line of communication.

title: A solid set of earbuds for a good price
body: I was initially skeptical purchasing truly wireless earbuds for under $50, but besides minor connectivity hiccups (i've asked around and it happens to nearly everyone) and a weird popping noise in the right earbud while putting it in which probably is backpressure of some kind of waterproofing, these are the best earbuds I have ever owned.  They charge quickly, have great sound, and identify when pairing occurs during each piece of the process which is excellent in case there is ever a day I need to troubleshoot.  While I have only had them for a few days, I will be interested to see if anything other issues come up. That said, if they keep being the great earbuds they are turning out to be, I will likely buy many more pairs as gifts!

title: Not for ears.
body: Everything works, terrible ear design. Noise cancelation works, but only if your ear is mishaped. There is no account for an actual ear for the deaign in this. Does not stay in place, you have to jam it in for it to stay, and then it hurts after 5 minutes of wearing.

title: Both earbuds keep cutting in and out continuously
body:
This product was good for a few weeks, but now both of the ear buds continuously cut in and out as if i am pressing pause and play repeatedly.

[update] I was able to get them to work by turning them off, and then turning them back on and reconnecting. However, the next day, the same problem happened and now it is not working with any solution I attempt. This really sucks because I actually liked the quality of these headphones, but the connection keeps cutting out. Originally, it was just the left earbud that kept cutting out, but now it's both at the same time, and it is a consistent problem. For the price, they are ok, but regardless of the price, if you are going to sell any kind of bluetooth device, you should make sure it works.

I have switched my review to 2 stars.

title: Exceeded expectations
body: The left earbud cuts out quite a bit even if my phone is just in my pocket, so I’ve just started using it as a right-only earbud, which is actually nice because I can keep my wits about me when walking around my city. Overall, I haven’t had the product long, but the call quality, sound quality, and longevity of battery (including the wireless charging capability) is well above expectations for $50 wireless earbuds.

title: Best wireless ear buds we've tried, so far
body: My husband has tried several wireless ear buds and these have been the best, by far. His voice sounds super clear when he's talking on the phone, they fit nicely, stay in place, and charging them couldn't be easier.

title: Great value and quality!
body: These are great, especially considering the cost.  The smaller set of ear adapters fits perfectly and the noise cancellation is great!  I love that they can wireless charge as well.  Great value and quality!

title: Battery life stinks
body: I will start with the good.  The case is small and is easily carried in even my smallest purse.  I usually have trouble with earbuds due to my ear canals being very small.  This comes with different size buds and the smallest one worked for me.  They are light weight and feel comfortable in my ears.  I don't run in my every day life so I am clueless if they would stay in for that but for walking and doing housework they remained secure.  Pairing with the phone or computer was super easy and quick.  All this was great but the battery life is terrible.  I use them generally for 1.5-2 hours and put them back in the case but the next day they have not recharged and are dead.  So, the case needs to be charged after each use.

title: Giving these a second chance
body: UPDATE: The company has mentioned sending me replacement ear buds.  Hopefully the new ones will be better.  Original: I can't stress how out of the box broken these were.  Maybe I got a bad pair of buds but these DO NOT stream clear audio.  Here's the problem, when connected I start up my music and the right bud will usually work but the left ear bud will constantly cut in and out and sometimes not play anything at all.  If I even move my phone slightly they will cut out.  I can even sit still and it will have connectivity issues.  I think through a 1 hour workout session I can get consistent clear audio for maybe five minutes but the other 55 minutes I am listening to snippets of audio.  I have tried different apps, a different phone, and literally not trying to move at all which defeats the purpose of these earbuds but they will constantly produce jittery audio.  I've tried turning them on and off in different sequences and ensured that they were fully charged.  It doesn't matter if the phone is in my pocket or on my arm or right next to the earbuds on the table, they still cut out.  I'd really like a replacement if this isn't normal behavior but I tried to give it the old college try with these.

title: Nice ear buds
body: These ear buds work as advertised. They pair easily with each other and to my iPhone 7 Plus. I can use the only the right ear bud OR only the left ear bud if I want which is nice for driving. I watched reviews on these buds on YouTube before buying and I agree with the positive reviews. The only annoying thing is when using only one ear bud it beeps for a minute or so while trying to find the other ear bud to pair with. I understand that is somewhat necessary for these to function as advertised so it’s not that big of a deal. The longevity of the ear buds are my only other question.

title: Good Performance and a Great Value
body: We have been using the Tozo T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Earbuds for about 1 month.  The sound quality is excellent and a great value at this price.  I use the earbuds for water aerobics and running and find their stated specifications to be correct (up to 30 feet and about 3 hours on a single charge).  I make one suggestion when using in the pool: the connection works better if your smartphone is positioned vertically (not flat) near the edge of the pool and not in direct sunlight. Their customer service was extremely helpful, and corrected a static/pairing issue I had initially.

title: Would buy again :)
body: Great headphones! I was actually very pleasantly surprised by the quality of sound. Might be better than my 100$ Sony pair.  Charging case is awesome. It supports wireless charging as well! Pairing is a breeze. They pair right up with each other and pairing with the phone is easy. The two colors are very stylish too.

title: Great sound quality and connection!
body:
I personally love these earbuds. I work in an office that does not allow cell phones and I had no Bluetooth headphones that could keep a good signal with my phone from the break room. This is the first pair I have ever used that work with both the distance AND the interference with the office walls.

The sound quality is fantastic and they're super comfortable. I love them, and will definitely be recommending them to friends!

title: AMAZING, EFFORTLESS EARBUDS. HIGHLY recommend!
body:
I am so excited to write this review. I was on a SEARCH for wireless earbuds that works seamlessly and effortlessly. I am a pre dental student so I am always on the go and studying. I have tried many different earbuds and my biggest issue was the pairing method. I  didn't want to spend so much on apple airpods either so wanted to look for an alternative.
