These TOZO earbuds were so SO SO easy to pair (whether I wanted to use them for my laptop, ipad or phone). I usually don't have much patience or time on waiting for earbuds to pair but these does it so effortlessly that I am so amazed. The sound quality is also amazing, the charging case is adorable and I'm so excited to say that I love the wireless charging option.

I would highly recommend these earbuds if you're looking for a QUALITY product without wanting to SPEND so much money! I've been using these for a week now and I get so excited to study cause I get to use these TOZO earbuds! Thanks Tozo!! <3 xoxo!

title: Superb value
body: This is truly a great set of earbuds. I used them for the first time today and they survived unscathed,  which is saying something.  I would have have paid double. I have purchased and gave away a set of 200 dollar Bose earbuds because they sucked, these far surpass them. Great value.

title: Fantastic Earbuds
body:
I had never considered buying wireless earbuds, as I was always listening to music in my car over Bluetooth. However, I recently got a new job that I'll be commuting to via public transportation so I wanted something to make my commute a little more seamless.

There are alot of options for wireless earbuds, and I dont regret going with these. For 50 bucks, the build quality of the case and of the earbuds themselves is solid and after messing with it for a few minutes out of the box, it pairs up to my phone within usually within 7 seconds, most of the time in less than 5. Can't go wrong. My brother in law has the samsung ones and I like these way better!

title: Sound quality and connection are solid
body:
Sound quality and connection are solid. Product itself is super high quality.  Really impressed with these given the price point. Hands down buy these!

Only con: once every other day it seems, they are a bit finicky to connect to the phone (Pixel 1). That might be due to the lack of Bluetooth 5 on my phone (product itself DOES support Bluetooth 5.

Call quality: a few people have complained that I sound distant. Honestly its 50/50... I think some people just need to turn there handset volume up as I tested this with a fried and could here him just fine when he was wearing these. Probably won't work in a super noisy environment (airport), but I love the freedom these grant to take a call while doing things around the house.

title: Tiny earphones pack a punch.
body:
A well thought out product.  And,  they sound great.

Addition:  I have read some of the other reviews and wanted to make some points known.  While I have received the offer of a free wireless charger, by the time I received that offer I had already written this review giving it 5 stars. I have had many different sets of earphones/headsets from cheap to expensive.  These actually qualify as being inexpensive and for the money, fairly awesome.  The sound expensive and can't be beat for this price.

No, they don't fall out of my head but that is because I took the time to pick tips that fit my ears.  In fact, I always take it an extra step and get foam ear tips.  They may be expensive but my ears like them and they don't fall out.

I would buy these again in a heartbeat.  The sound great, and are incredibly convenient.  As I said previously, a great sounding product at an great price.  I spend at lease 8 hours every day with my earphone in my ears and these are just perfect.

title: How is this possible for $50?
body:
If not for feedback of other persons, I would have thought this was gimmicky.  It is not and I rarely write feedback, but felt I should acknowledge this product.
These are great wireless earbuds.  Have to lower the volume because they have quite a sound.
The charging case, can also charge wireless by placing it on top of a wireless pad - can also charge via usb cable directly.
You can place the case on a pad and it charges on product that cost $50 bucks.
Wow!!

title: Huge! Beware! - Test the fit of the earbuds before you leave your home.
body: I am a principal and I’m always on the go, especially at school. I purchased these earbuds on October 1, 2019. I only had them for one day. I didn’t know these earbuds were so big. I arrived to school with the earbuds in to tackle the day. They were working well while I was talking to my husband on the way to work. I stepped out of the car and disaster struck. My right earbud fell out in the school parking lot and a car ran over it before I could retrieve it! $50 bucks gone down the drain if this insurance doesn’t cover it. I wish I knew these were so huge! I hope the insurance I purchased with the product can resolve this issue. Ill keep my fingers crossed. I emailed them today.

title: Great Wireless Earbuds.
body: This is a great wireless earbuds but the only thing is that if you stand far from your phone and someone walks by you, it cuts off the connection. Haha, but its overall pretty nice for such a good price. I didn't expect crazy high quality but I expected it to block out surrounding sounds and it did just that. Sits well on the ears and it comes with multiple ear piece sizes. I would definitely buy again.

title: Extremely satisfied
body:
I am very impressed with the Tozo T10. The packaging was incredible. It has amazing set of features with very fair pricing. The bluetooth has a stronger connection with longer distance connectivity. It offers very natural sound with powerful bass performance. I use it while working out and I don’t have to worry about my the sweat damaging my earbud since IPX8 waterproof Nano-coating protects the earbuds and charging case from sweat or water. Pairing to your device is very simple and easy. All you need to do is pick up 2 Headsets from charging box and they will connect each other automatically. And then enter mobile phone bluetooth setting choose "TOZO-T10-R" to pair the earbuds. All set!!!
#HappyCustomer :)

I am very satisfied with this product. The best part is they offered me a free wireless charger for my T10. Thank you TOZO :)

title: Excellent customer support!!!
body: This is a follow on review to note the excellent customer support upon purchasing the heads related to follow up how they worked from the company.  Very friendly, helpful and focused on customer satisfaction.  My initial reviewed talked about how easy they were to pair, fit my ears right of the box, sounds was really good, and love the box charging feature.  So far, so good on calls and walking with them in.

title: Awesome headphones
body: I did some research and compared different models of earbuds that come in charging cases.  I personally do not like ones with hooks, so these are perfect for what I was looking for.  I have sweat in them while working and they have been wet in a pool and stood up to that.  I really like the wireless charging option for the case that was one of the biggest sellers for me.  The case itself is great and fits in my pocket easily, the earbuds "click" in magnetically which is great, because they feel secure when in.  Overall I am very happy with this purchase, sound quality is great, and paring was very simple.  Able to use one or both earbuds easily.

title: They fit great and stay put!
body: I have only had these for a week but I am so far very happy with them. If you just follow the instructions how to put them in, they fit great and will stay put. They sound is good and the box is convenient and makes it easy to bring with you and not loose. They sound when you turn them off is a bit low so I have sometimes hard to hear if they got turned off or not, but that might have to do with my age :).  I use it when I do hit and put my phone on floor or desk while exercising, sometimes it does loose connection in a ear, but only temporary and for a short brief second. I am happy with them and hope these will last a long time. I sweat like crazy when exercising so my problem has always been that and that no earphones seem to survive that. We will see.. but so far I can recommend these!

title: Great Short term listening
body:
I like these buds but unfortunately the battery life is only about 3 hours..which is sad. I'm on the road a lot listening to podcasts, music, etc.
the Good: They come on and pair automatically when you pull them out of the case, Good sound, good fit.
The Bad: Pairing takes longer than i expected..about 90 secs to pair both automatically.  The battery life on these jewels suck...and this is a biggy for me...theyre now reduced to workout buds only.

title: IF you are using these for calls... look else where.
body:
UPDATE: emailed their customer support regarding my concern and didn't hear back; its been two weeks. The customer is supposed to matter.
I work in an office, so if I get a call on my cell--its nice to be able to switch from music to my headphones without having to take something out to pick up. I would give these such a high rating, BUT because I got these thinking it would make it even easier answering calls while working--and its actually making it harder and more frustrating-- I will be returning. I can use my wired headphones to call and know people can hear me. Very frustrating. If these are just for music for you, then you will love them. The fact that you can use just one is great, so if you are out and one dies, you switch to the other while charging. I like that the buds just connect as you pull them out of the case. JUST FIGURE OUT THE MIC!

title: Amazing Sound and Quality for a Bargain Price
body: When I was looking for a good pair of wireless earbuds I came across these on Amazon. I'm really glad I did too. These earbuds are very comfortable and sound really good. The level of clarity and rich bass that comes from these is pretty amazing. I thought that I'd need to spend over$100 to get something that sounded decent but I'm glad I took the chance in these. Add in wireless charging and this deal is outright insane.

title: Impressive
body: I wasn’t getting my hopes up about these ear buds. My 4 year was speaking to me and i can’t hear him at all. I think I’ll keep them in till he turns 18. Nice buds. Would buy again!

title: The Tozo T10 earbuds have loads of features found on more expensive earbuds
body: I am a very fussy person when it comes to listening to audio and tried 7 different brands and types but the Tozo 10 earbuds have great highs as well is very nice bass and cymbals sizzle. You will never get the high end out of the over the ear headphones like you will get with these earbuds.

title: Great sounding.
body:
It stays in your ear. Easy to recharge. As soon as you pop them out of the charger it reconnects to your phone. I really like that feature. The biggest problem is it picks up every noise in my truck and people can’t hear me that well. I mostly bought this for talking in my truck but I use it to listen to talk radio. The sound is very clear.

Built well. Solid materials. Magnetic earbuds so they snap into place in the charger. Batteries last 3 hours when I continuously talk or listen to podcast.

title: Very good for the price
body: I have relatively small ear-openings and these actually fit quite comfortably. They likely fit better in terms of seating more within the average person's ears, but so far I have run around with them and no problems!!! I'm not sure if they would fall out with swimming (they suggest in packaging that they can) but I don't swim so it's hard to comment. I am however really happy with the sound quality!!! I actually feel the noise cancelling is quite impressive for this price range, and the packaging is great and so slim. Love them :)

title: Excellent sound quality for the price point
body: This is my 3rd pair of truly wireless earbuds.  My 1st pair sounded great, but didn't have a charging case, so you had to plug them into a charging source whenever they needed charging.  So when I started seeing these new versions with a charging case, I was intrigued.  My first foray into this segment was disappointing.  The sound quality was simply awful.  No bass whatsoever.  With those returned, I stumbled upon these.  What a difference!  Solid bass (not over powering) and clean highs.  While these don't have a hook to hold them in your ears, they seem to stay put.  I replaced the silicone ear tips with memory foam ones and both the sound quality and retention seemed to improve.  If you want to rid yourself of cords and don't want to spend a fortune, these may be the earbuds for you.

title: Best Wireless Earbuds for the Money.
body: This could be my best bargain ever on Amazon. Purchased as one of the deals of the day after considering Apple wireless EarPods for over 5 times the price. Have now used for alomost 3 months and liking them more than ever. They link quickly to each other and my iPhone. The sound is amazing for the price...would be amazing for 3 times the price. Love the deep base...great when I am working out in a noisy gym or walking around my community. They fit perfectly in my ear....very comfortable. The charging case is great. Fortunately I had a wireless charging pad as a giveaway from a conference I attended. Charges quickly and case is good for 3 more charges. An all around great purchase.

title: not for calls
body:
I fully compared 3 Bluetooth headsets  this T 10 Headset,The OTium And 10 headset, and the LG 730 headset i use these for everything; driving, working out,  working in garage while making calls for all things listed.

TOZO T10
everything is as advertised except range
This headsetBuilt durable charging case is really niceThey feel comfortable in their ear. The sound quality seems pretty decentI can hear everything with good soundCall and listen to music and videos from both ears. For activities they stay in the ear they did not jostle around I do have rather large ears and was impressed by the fit.
However these are not for calls I sounded very distant comparatively to the other two Bluetooth headphones. Yes there is limited background noiseBecause everything sounded so distant. The range is rather questionable walking throughout a houseStraight line full battery you might reach before potential that they advertise. I wouldn't consider these noise cancelingHowever they do fit so snuggly in the ear comfortably they just block the ambient  noise.  One thing I did not like about these is Because it blocks the ambient noise I have to pull one out of ear Anytime someone is talking to me or want to hear what's going on around me.  The battery life is probably the worst I have experienced. As advertised you will get about only three hours of music n video. You can charge them in the case at least twice though Before plugging the case in.  when battery drops so does range and clarity.  Bottom line if I did not need to make phone calls and I just want to listenTo music  or videos for only 3 hours This is a solid choice.  I did not test water resistance  just sweet resistance was fine though
these are not practical for me

OtuIUM M 10
These headsets are extremely lightweight Can barely tell they hanging from your ear. HoweverIf you have to pull out the right earbud due to the placement of the volume And multi function button they we'll hang down and pull on the back of your neck.  Sound for music and videoIs not as Crisp the T10 However the clarity for the Person you are callingIs clearWith that being said that they can hear every ounce of background noise. From banging cupboards to shutting drawers, Fans were humming in the background. They will pick up all ambient noise but still be able to hear you.  they do fine for working out / running lil flops from the button piece but not bad.
the magnet catch is ok but not as awesome as they make it out to be
range was as advertised was able to go to the far side of my house from phone  before distortion 3 walls 30 ft or so.
so far this the one i will test further for durability

Lg 730
This headset was my favorite go too, it  is an older technology and a little bulky but has never let me down.  sound quality and distance is extremely comparableTo the M 10.  Due to its bulkRunning and working out makes this extremely floppyIn bouncing around on your neck. The battery life completely outperformed the other two. The quality of call for others Is right in line with the M10.  I haveFully driven this in rainWorking outThrowing it aroundIt is extremely durable And the battery will last 6-8 hours.  It does have a manual on off switch,  And the earbuds are held magnetically intoThe neck piece.  Comparably for the cost730 doesn't tube too bad of a job for old technology and cost if you can get it under 20 bucks.

I'm still searching for the perfect headsetFor multipurpose useAnd most importantlyQuality of callsFor the person on the other end of line. However out of these three.  the T10  will be returned and i will keep the other 2 for my needs

title: These are the BEST wireless headphones ever!!!
body: I have Sony noise canceling headphones 🎧 and these I think are better. I love the Phaiser headphones sold here on amazon for half the price. The Phaisers battery lasts longer for sure but these sound better and no annoying head wrap. I use the Phaiser strictly for heavy  fitness activity. I skateboard and gym lift akd aerobics exercise with these and they stay in perfect. I did swap the regular tips for foam since I buy foam tips in bulk and prefer to gross feeling silicone ones. The foam combo makes these super noise canceling even better than the Sony who supposedly lead the pack in noise cancellation. The bass is batter than the Phaisers and the highs are very clear and sound great. I have tried many other wireless headphones over the years that range in price from $19 to $300 and I can honestly say that these are the absolute overall best value and best sound quality and best in ear wireless headphones.

title: Good Alternative to More Expensive Wireless Earbuds
body: As the title states, these earbuds are a good alternative to more expensive earbuds.  I use these mainly for watching programs while I work out.  Past earbuds would not stay in my ear, but I had issues with Bluetooth dropping.  These earbuds stay very well in my ear while I'm working out and sweating.  They are pretty good at blocking out all noise, but really only can compare that when I had to pull one out when someone was talking to me.  The sound quality when used on a Samsung phone and Samsung tablet was very good.  Overall, very satisfied with the quality, in case charging, and the wireless charging option.

title: Great value and with the money
body: These earbuds sound great for $50. There is minimal bass response. Other than that they sound great. My wife yes them while riding on the back of my motorcycle. She loves them. Great battery life and supper convenient to be able to recharge them with the caring case. Super good value. If you want bass, you'll need to go with sy much more expensive setup.

title: Better than I expected for the price.
body: I don't use earbuds often, but while on vacation, I do a lot of walking and the earbuds that came with the iPhone kept falling out.  I finally decided to get a pair of wireless earbuds to see if they would stay in.  I didn't want to pay a ton of money either.  These earbuds have worked out great.  The smallest size ear attachment worked out best for me.  They feel snug and the sound is great.  Would recommend these.

title: Good little wireless earbuds
body:
Overall, this is a really good product. Once I figured out which size rubber adapter fit my ears, these have been awesome. You would have to be ok with things being in your ears like earplugs for these to be comfortable. Sound quality is really good with good bass and quality treble and mids. The only thing I would like is for the battery life to be a little better, but considering how small these are and how good the sound quality is even at high volumes, it is more than acceptable for me.

I mostly use them while running and they stay put in my ears and cause no discomfort. I would recommend these for the price.

title: Very good Purchase
body:
These earbuds are very important to me; I use them mainly at bed-time to listen to audio files that helps me to sleep better. I do not have to worry about cords which can be annoying. These wireless buds are much better.
Customer service is excellent. Thanks TozoStore for excellent service!

A. Parker

title: Believe the Hype
body:
After rolling through several reviews of the best budget earbuds out today and seeing the Tozo T10 prominently featured I decided to roll the dice and all I can say is... wow. For this price point, you will be hard-pressed to find a better out of the box bass delivery system. I have always used large tips for my earbuds but the added X-large tips take it up a notch. The sound is clean with punchy bass verging on thunderous depending on the fit/size of the ear tip. A snug fit is key to experiencing the full force of these little beauties. I am currently using memory foam tips that take the bass to that aforementioned "thunderous" level. Rage Against the Machine was finally able to rock on 2 small earbuds as heavy as they ever have on my home stereo. If bass is your thing, you just found paradise. And it's made out of memory foam.

Call quality seems to be good with the mic doing a decent job. I have had no complaints during calls. The lack of media controls is a bummer but pause, play, & redial suits the basic needs of the average person. Make no mistake, the sound is what drives people to the Tozo T10s. That's the reason I came and ultimately stayed. Any Bass-heads out there need to take a serious look at Tozo T10s when it's time to get new affordable buds. The bang for your buck on the T10s is fantastic.  Great Sound, Great Bass, Great price.

title: No extra tips? Otherwise GREAT
body:
These buds are NO JOKE!  I am blown away at the sound. The bass really is rich and clear.  The treble could increased a little more but that is minor compared to the sound these things pump out!
Battery life is sufficient especially with the case being a backup charger.

My only complaint is that for some reason I didnt get the extra ear tips and the cord for the case.... I am using the tips that came pre installed which are ok but I need a size down.  Tried to find how to email seller but no link... Oh well. Even with that small issue I still gave 5 stars for sound and price!!

Overall these buds WONT DISAPPOINT!!!

title: Great set of earbuds for under $100
body: Very happy with these ear buds. Charging case is great quality and they sound really good. My only criticism (which is a minor one) is that I would like them to get a little louder. The good thing, however, is that even at max volume the sound quality is never compromised. Sound remain crisp and just the right amount of bass. I would recommend trying the various bud sizes to figure out which sounds and feels the best. I was surprised at the difference in sound quality when I switched the size. I would definitely recommend these to anyone.

title: By Far My Favorite Wireless Earbuds On The Market
body:
Let me start off by stating I have tried just about all of the most popular wireless earbuds currently available and none compare to the quality of these. The most important characteristics of bluetooth earbuds that mattered to me most was: 1. range of sound, 2. durability, and 3. comfortability and feel for all day use. Oh and they needed to be able to connect individually and simultaneously whenever desired.  For the price range of $50, these were the only headphones that I found to meet all my expectations.

I use them mostly to listen to music every day while at work for it helps make me more productive during my blue collar work day. Between cutting wood and listening for my name over the loud speaker, I could get these earbuds to range from soft to outside noise cancelling quite easily.

As far as durability, they were the only earbuds that could withstand being dropped without breaking into a million pieces.  The construction and materials used are extremely tough and built to last for a long time.

And lastly the comfort of wearing these every day was far greater than expected. Literally everything about them I loved until I accidentally crushed one by stepping on it.  Thankfully, the customer service at TOZO reached back to me through email and clarified they were covered by warranty.  TOZO won me over as a lifetime customer and I will continue to keep purchasing from them and recommending them in the future.

title: Annoying issue
body: I enjoy the earbuds but the left earbud seems to constantly connect and disconnect, cutting out and sometimes taking a second or two to resume sound, it's rather annoying

title: Is waterproof!!
body: These are absolutely awesome! Battery is just a few hours but still great for the price. I accidentally tested the water proof part when on fell out of my ear and into a bucket of water.. Picked it up shock it off put it back iny ear and continued working and still does.. Over all highly recommend..

title: Good doesn't mean Best!!!
body:
Pros:
-great sound for music with excellent bass and a balanced equalizer.
-excellent for talking with good sound for person on other end
-syncing is good but could be better

Cons:
-battery life on the case is poor and had to be recharged every two days
-the buds are huge and bulky. There's a bit of heaviness that causes them to sag and not feel secure in my ear
-pressing the action button on the earbud requires such pressure that it pushes the bud into my ear and is uncomfortable!! I prefer a touch command like my previous pair

Am returning the product. The 14K reviews and stars impressed me to purchase but these just aren't for me

title: So far so good
body: I have only had the chance to use these earbuds for two days, but so far they have been absolutely wonderful. The sound quality is awesome and it was extremely easy to pair to my phone. I have not had the chance to test out how well the battery life is but I like how the case charges the buds between uses. The only unfortunate thing is that the earbuds cannot control volume and/or change the song. In the scheme of things this isn't a huge deal for me. All in all I am extremely happy with the earbuds and would definitely recommend them-especially for the price.

title: Great sound, great fit! Love that they’re waterproof!
body: These ear buds are great! With the different sizes of pads that come with them, I found the perfect fit. I wear them mostly at the gym (where the house radio station is pretty loud) and when working outside and mowing. They cancel outside noise really well and sound great and clear even when on my riding mower. I haven’t worn them in the rain yet, but I love that I could. Tozo’s customer service has been great. I am very happy with these ear buds.

title: First wireless earbuds
body: I was hesitant to switch to wireless earbuds due to battery life and wireless technology in general. I've had no connection issues and I've yet to run out of batteries in a day. Having the case handy to store them in and charge them at the same time is while not in use is awesome. Overall I am very happy to be rid of wires that get caught on things and pull the earbuds out. The bass is great and I won't be going back to wires after these!

title: Meh
body:
Pros:
Affordable
Decent Bluetooth distance
Decent speakers
Water resistant
Cons:
Sound is a little tinny,
lacks bass,
the speakers tend to slip out of my ear easier than normal,
battery quickly loses charge

title: Great product, no cables no cords no worries
body: As with all wireless earbuds you need to find the right position so they dont fall out.  But once you do, these are great!  Wireless charging inside the case, and the case its self charges wireless. Bought a bluetooth dongle for my pc and work all day with these in.  No cords! Only drawback is that there is no skip button for listening to music.

title: So Far So Good
body:
I've owned these for about a week.  Nice packaging.  The case is nice and seems to be well made.  Haven't tried the wireless charging yet.  The sound quality is great.

Note:  When I first started using them, I thought the sound was ok.  After playing around with the different sizes, I landed on the next size up.  Doing so totally changed the sound quality.  The bass hits hard and the sound quality sounds like its in your head.

On the first day I noticed that the Left side would cut in and out.  I was going to return them because it wasn't working.  I started using them at work for the past four days and it hasn't cut out once.  I don't know if it was fluke or maybe interference at my house.  I will try again at home and see if that is the problem.  I will update review if things start going downhill.  "So Far So Good"

title: Easy to use!  Great for the price.
body: I use these earbuds for work and they are great.  They are convenient and easy to use.  Also they are very comfortable. They connected easily to Bluetooth and lasted for my complete shift.  I definitely recommend these earbuds.

title: I'm hip, connected, and cordless.  I'm free and in touch if I want to be.
body: Been tied to my cell phone in travels and at properties I own.  Always in my pocket and can't dig it out in time.  These blue tooth buds have made my life less complicated and simplified.  Only had them for a few days and so only pairing with a few of too many devices.  Sound quality and voice transmission very good. Comfortable and do not obscure normal  conversation or sound.  Time will tell.  Using windows 10 and android devices

title: Earbuds are a great value
body:
I wanted some easy to use wireless earbuds for when I exercise - either in the gym or on a bike ride outdoors. I have worn them twice and I have to say I am pretty pleased.  They paired with my Motorola X4 phone right away.  I have had used them twice so far. First, I charged them on the previous night.  The next morning, I noticed that they seemed to be having some very short connectivity gaps when the microwave was on.  It was an odd coincidence, but it happened.  Then, I wore them to my gym and I was doing various exercises.  I am not sure why, but it seemed like at times the right earbud was momentarily losing contact with the left earbud as i tilted/crunched my way through the exercises.  It wasn't bad, but I was not expecting that.  My expectation was that these earbuds are only 6 to 8 inches apart between my ears so why would there be any problem? This morning, I wore them on a bike ride and I experienced no issues whatsoever.  On both occasions, I was also wearing my Fitbit Inspire HR tracker so there were at least two Bluetooth connections to my phone. I'm not sure if that matters.

I am going to continue using these for the next few days and will monitor the performance.  However, if these don't stop working and continue giving me a good experience, then I will feel it was well worth it.

Having the wireless earbuds is much better than having wired earbuds (so old fashioned, I now realize).  Thanks TOZO!

title: Great ear buds for a great price.
body: I live these ear buds by Tozo. I've been looking to transition to wireless earbuds for about a year but didn't want to give up sound quality. I have tried my friends ear buds from other companies and found them to lack sound quality or be expensive.  When I saw the reviews for the Tozo ear buds I thought I should give them a try. I live them so much that I ordered a separate pair just to keep at work.

title: Solid pair of wireless headphones
body: I bought this pair of headphones for my father, who wanted to join the wireless gang. The sound quality was pretty good with nice full bass. It did take some trial and error to find the best fitting position for the buds to stay in place. The battery life is pretty standard for these types of buds lasting about an 1 1/2 - 2 hours.  Overall pretty impressed with these ear buds and they are worth a shot!

title: Broken after two months
body:
EDIT: Just after a couple months of use, the left earbud has stopped working. Changing my review til this is addressed.

I got these because my old pair of earbuds were dying.

These are great for commuting in NYC and working out. They cancel out the noise of my morning commute and fit comfortably in my ear, thanks to the varied sizes of eartips they included with the buds. The sound quality is better than I expected, though a bit bass heavy. And I've yet to run out of battery - I pop them back in after my morning commute and they're fully charged for the gym later in the day.

Will update if anything changes, but these are great so far.

title: I highly recommend!!!!
body: I was wanting to purchase another set of earbuds and had just ordered my son the Skullcandy Indy buds but really didn’t want the arm on them just wanted some that stuck inside my ear i has looked at several different kinds and came across the Tozo watched several reviews on YouTube as well as reading the reviews on amazon and decided on the Tozo and so glad I did love the sleek look, the magnet snaps on case, not having to turn on or off, multi charges, and the wireless option for charging.

title: For People who Want Earbuds, but Can't Wear Earbuds
body:
I had a really hard time with Airpods staying put. I live in NYC and was terrified to lose them in the subway tracks. When this finally came to pass, I decided a cheaper option had to be the way to go.

Luckily, these stay put, have amazing sound quality, and are really affordable. I can ride the subway and ignore Showtime with ease.

title: Get these!
body: Dude this suckers a pretty good, there is a good amount of bass, sound canceling, great audio, phone calls work fine although the person on the other end says you sound a bit far away which is typical for a Bluetooth device. Quite durable I’ve dropped them separately and in the case like multiple times and still no cracks, scratches or dings, charges pretty fast, charge lasts, I wear these in the shower like everyday, so I don’t feel bad blasting my music anymore, it would be great if you could change songs by pressing the earpiece like you used to with Apple headphones. But overall worth the price!

title: Has a few down falls, but great product
body:
Great headphones. Simple set up and user friendly. The sound is great. They fit into ear easily. Not too bulky. Lightweight.

The only thing I do not like about these headphones is that you cannot change songs nor turn up/down the volume from the actual headphones. Plus my set did not come with extra ear pieces to customize the fit.

title: Sound great!
body: I saw these on sale and said what the heck. Got a pair for me and a pair for my girlfriend who has been hounding me to get apple pods. When she saw these and got jealous I whipped out the pair I got her and she snatched em. We were both amazed by how nice the presentation of the packaging is, the materials, and most importantly the sound. Heaps of low end. She jumped up and down to see if they would pop out. They didnt. Even if they did they come with different size plugs. I love that you can charge them from the carry case suppposedly up to 4 times. I listened to these all night and they went strong the whole time. The case is magnetized so that it snaps shut and so are the buds themselves. They pop right in and charge. Pairing was a breeze. The case door is opaque so you can see the chargu g status. I notice on the white set, it wasnt as clear to see the status as on the black...at least in a lit room. I saved myself about 150 bucks since she is happy enough with these. She pretty much ignored me the whole night listening to her music with these on. As far as that goes, it blocks out a good amount of sound. I flushed the toilet with these on and I had to open lid to see if it really flushed because I heard zero noise so do t drive with these on listening to music. I find myself listening to more music because of how enjoyable these are.

title: Immensely satisfied
body: This product did exactly what I wanted it to. I bought these with the hope that they would be able to do everything my wired earphones do, but without the wires. It very much satisfies these requirements. The connection didn't cut out as long as I stayed within roughly 8 meters, and I got the full quality of sound that wired earphones give. The battery time wasn't a problem at all, with me being able to keep them in my ears for up to 4 hours without any problems. The water resistance was also a big selling point for me, and I was able to take them into the shower without a problem. If they do end up breaking, the free 1-year warranty eases my mind. The case seems quite sturdy, and I have yet to have a problem with it. They were extremely easy to set up, and I would happily recommend these to a friend.

title: Great waterproof earbuds!
body: The TOZO T10 earbuds are excellent. They work well in the shower as well as the gym. Sound quality and noise cancellation are top notch. A full charge may not last 3.5 hours of constant music, but it lasts at least 2.5 hours.

title: Great Wireless Earbuds!
body: These are great wireless earbuds!  I was happy to see that they can survive a trip through the washing machine, which is how I lost my last pair (different brand).  The sound is good and they fit snugly and comfortably.  Also, there is a 1 year warranty in the package, which I hadn't noticed when I bought it.

title: Great for the gym and the price is right
body:
Overall a totally decent pair of headphones, great quality for the price

Range: Adequate, although they start to cut out if I leave my phone on one side of the gym and walk to the far side.
Sound: Just fine, although I'm not an audiophile and listening in a loud gym usually
Battery power: At least 1.5 hours gets me through my workout, then they recharge in the case
Durability: So far no issues, IPX8 is nice but I haven't taken them swimming
Comfort: Fit nicely in ear.  They stay in well at the gym, but would definitely fall out during high intensity activity with a lot of head movement

title: They're Chinese
body: very badly built case for the earphones, they also make very irritating sounds while connecting or disconnecting. Sound quality is nowhere close to the bigger more well known brands, ofcourse you pay for the cost of R&D with bigger brands but I'm also questioning the safety of these earphones, how good are they for your eardrums in the long run? If you can spend a little more I say do that and get a better brand but for the price these are ok. Sound is not great either, they sound like chap earbuds, bass is really ghetto and not clear, kind of like a bass of a car stereo when your standing outside the car. good battery life though and these are not touch so don't be fooled.

title: AMAZING HEADPHONES
body: I’ve never really been sold on totally wireless headphones because I tend to run and jump too much while working out. Well I went on a limp and bought the TOZO 10 Bluetooth headphones and I did the craziest workout I could think of to make these headphones fall out. No matter how hard I ran, how many time I shook my head, they never moved an inch. Probably the best headphones I’ve ever used, and the sound quality is amazing as well. Will be buying this product again!

title: Great for the price! Customer service awesome!
body:
Ok. I got this product on super sale $39. Good deal. My first unit worked great but had problems cutting out and one side failed. I sent a message but for price expected, nada. But was pleaseantly surprised within a few hours I got an email..... Wow!! They sent a new unit out and got it 2 days later. Told me to keep the old one. Awesome.
Second pair has worked great and consistent for nearly 6months now.
The charger gives you about 2-3 charges at best. Full charge is consistent at 4hrs of music at high volumes. Eartips are good but after about 4hrs in the ear, gets uncomfortable. That's expected.
If your gunna compare these to Samsung buds or Beats? Those have more features for sure, but for the price.
Cons- might be a little larger than others when in your ear.
Pairing sometimes is often clunky. If your running or doing back flips they might not stay in your ear.
Pros- customer service was great, battery life, good fit that blocks out outside noise well. Comfortable.

title: Good for running
body: I use these for running. They stay well in my ears. They are very light weight and do not hurt after wearing them for a while. I like the quality of the sound also. I need to plug in the base about once every two weeks. I am very happy with my purchase.

title: Amazing product, true waterproof
body: This is a awesome product! I love it. It was expensive and I was  originally skeptical. After buying this product I love it. I didn’t believe it was waterproof and I actually decided to throw it in the tub. It still works and the sound is great. These headphones last around three hours for me and I can get about three or four more charges from the case. This is one of my best investments. 10 out of 10 recommend .

title: Good way to try out Wirelss earbuds
body:
I was unsure about the jump to totally wireless earbuds. I was worried id lose them, they may fall out while using them, they would be a hassle to connect, among other concerns.

Im happy to say that these earbuds have quelled all doubts.
They come in a convenient carrying case that also charges them, so losing them is not a problem.
I have use them at the gym with no signs of them falling out.
And the earbuds immediately connect with eachother upon pulling them fron the case. And connecting to the phone is no more complicated than any other headset.

Very happy. Would recomend.

title: Great sound quality.
body:
The sound quality is great for this little bluetooth earphones. Loud for this little package.
Pairing is simple, pick up both earphones and the left one will pair with the master right.

The wireless capable charging box is a great idea. After use, put it in the box to charge these earphones. It's always charged up when you pick them up. Smart thinking.

The only thing they can do to make it better by make the charging box a little thinner.

title: Perfect Wireless Headphones
body: Great purchase!  Phenomenal Sound Quality, and easy to use.  It takes some getting use to on the connection side, but once you have that down, they are a great asset!

title: Bad noise cancellation, and poor anchoring connectivity
body: Earbuds do not  cancel noise, as well as there is an issue with how strong the connection between the two earbuds are when anchoring together, the slightest movement or angle can cause the left ear bud to tune in and out making their main use annoying at most points in time, especially if your doing any movement at all (or none in some instances I noticed).

title: Great Product And Great Customer Service
body: These ear buds are great! I really loved how well they worked for me and how convenient they are. The microphones work amazingly, I can take calls and be heard clearly, the sound was fantastic, and when I had a bit of trouble with the earbuds I was immediately helped by customer service it didn't take more than a few hours for them to reach out and help me. Overall great product I would buy it again, and I would suggest buying it.

title: Great Quality for their price
body: For the low cost of these headphones, I've been very impressed with their battery life, quality of sound (very good), and noise cancellation (very good). Charging is super easy and lasts quite a while. The water proof is great for when I'm walking or running in the rain. They are great for the gym, and won't fall out with any activities. The only thing I wish was a little better iss bluetooth connecting to your phone. Sometimes it takes a couple tries if you don't connect right away. Overall, I'd highly recommend these. A great deal for their price.

title: Great sound quality
body:
I got these a few weeks ago and really enjoy them, they are easy to set up and sound really good. The waterproofing is a nice touch as well. Battery life seems a little shorter than expected but its not a significant issue. I did however suddenly have an issue with the audio on the right earbud suddenly becoming quieter than the left so I contacted thier support and they were fantasic, they had me reset them and see if it helped, unfortunatley it didnt but with the one year warrenty they offered to send me a new pair without hesitation.
For the price these are definitely worth it.

title: Fantastic fit nice sound quality
body:
I was  optimistic considering the price but so far three days in the gym very happy with the outcome !
Sound quality is fantastic and fit is good!
I can do  vigorous CrossFit without them falling out !

title: Great buy. Full range of sound from highs to lows
body:
First let me say I am a Bose fan to the end.  But if would have got these first I would not have a set of Bose.  These sound great, contect easy and stay in my ears which usually is a problem for me with this type of earbud.  Full range of sound from highs to lows.
The only issue for me is if you just use one, for about a minute it beeps to let you know it is looking for the other to connect to.  One of the reviews I read said this but it is really not a big beal to me.

title: Great quality for small price
body: Received these quickly.  Nice packaging.  Earbuds were exactly want I wanted as I didn't want to pay too much.  Price quality and reviews what influenced me to buy.  Comes with a small compartment to store and charge.

title: Great Value
body: My Bose Soundsports are falling apart after less than a year. After reading all the positive reviews I decided to give these a try. LOVE THEM! I use my earbuds mainly at night in the bed and like to fall asleep listening to podcasts and such. Being able to listen to one at a time so I can hear the kids is great. Gives twice the battery life. When one dies I switch it out for the other. They last a lot longer than the 3.5 hours it states. I get 5-6 hours out of them. They stay in all night as well. The wireless charging case is awesome and the fact that the case is wireless charging capable is even more awesome. I gotta say... for 50 bucks these are a steal. The sound quality is great also!! Highly recommend!!

title: Great earbuds!
body: When I first bought these I was really skeptical despite the great reviews but these ear buds are some of the best I have ever used. The sound quality is amazing. From volume to bass to clarity these earbuds have it all. I highly reccomend them to anyone who wants great sound at an affordable  price

title: Great Sound Quality and A Great Price!
body: I have only had these headphones for about a week but so far I have absolutely loved them! I have never used wireless headphones before and decided to try them out since the headphone adapter for my iPhone kept on breaking. Because I did not want to spend the money on AirPods I decided to buy the TOZO T10 Bluetooth headphones. Best decision ever! These headphones are truly noise canceling and the quality of sounds is fantastic! I have only used them in the shower once or twice but when I have, I have not had any problems and can hardly hear the sound of the water running. I appreciate that they come with several different sizes of silicone to attach onto the earbuds so I can make sure the fit is perfect for my ears and comfortable.

title: Works well!
body: I wanted to wait until I used these multiple times before I wrote a review. I have used them to exercise, clean, run, sweat a lot and sweat a little. They work well with no issue. They stay in which was my biggest concern. They feel like they might fall out but they never have and when I take them out they are actually pretty deep in my ear. So far so good.

title: Great sound
body:
These headphones are a great buy for the money. The sound is very respectable, the battery lasts a long time, they are not too big, they use bluetooth 5.0, and the case has wireless charging.
My biggest issue is the size of the case is a little too big to comfortably carry in your pocket, but at this price I doubt anything comes close.
Overall these are a great purchase, especially if your not sure whether making the switch to truly wireless headphones is worth it.

title: Good for calls ok for music
body: Sound is great and wife says I sound good when I call her so mic is good. The rubber ear pieces have a light extra material from the molding process which hurt my ear so I used a bladed to cut it off. Distance isnt bad until something blocks me and my phone. Case and earbuds are great quality and they hold a great charge and the case charges fast. Nice feature with case charging the ear buds is the case holds them in place magnetically so they wont come out easily. Biggest downside is playing music, you cant skip, repeat, or control volume. Have not tested them in water yet. Would recommend them.

title: Recommend, with significant reservations
body:
I've had these for nearly a month and a half now, and while they started out great, they haven't lasted.

Pros:
The fit is great. They come with different sizes of inner ear pieces, so you can find the one that works best for you, but I was fine with the one that came already installed.
Never had a problem with them falling out of my ears. Occasionally get a little jostled, but never a problem while running.

Cons:
Sound quality was great when listening to music/podcasts (at first), but did go in and out a bit.
Poor headphones for phone calls; the person on the other end complained that they couldn't hear me 80% of the time that I tried to use them.
Claim to be waterproof (able to use in the shower) but that only worked for one week before the left earbud was affected, and then another three weeks before the right one was. Sound is now muted and difficult to understand in both earbuds.

There's a one year warranty, so I may activate that to replace these. But I'm not sure it's worth getting a second pair. They may be good headphones if you don't test the waterproof claim.

title: Stunned and Satisfied
body: I honestly was unsure if I would be able to keep up with wireless headphones but these have been a breeze. The battery life is amazing, I don't really have to charge them except for maybe once every two or three weeks but granted I do not use them often. When I do, however, they are great at cancelling out noises, even with wearing just one. And they are extremely discreet. Would definitely recommend.

title: Clear and comfortable, would buy again!
body: I've only been using this for a week, but love them so far. Great for the gym, for painting, and for anything active. Wish the battery life was a little longer (it's about 3 hours), but this is a minor complaint.

title: Great sound quality, IPX8 Waterproof
body:
This earbuds is what I've been looking for...

I already bought more than four different earbuds on Amazon, and definitely I can tell, this is the best one.

1 - The sound is amazing, great bass!!!
2 - It's real waterproof, I can shower with them watching my favorite shows, so my wife doesn't complain about the loud volume of the cellphone.
3 - They have magnetics, so, once you take them out from the case, they automatically turn on and connect with my cellphone
4 - Noise cancelation works well

I couldn't be more happy with this purchase.
If you are in doubt, buy this one, you won't regret.

title: problem with the left headphon
body: Headphone looks really good and it does feel very comfortable when you put in your ears. Sound is great. I like the quality of sound too. So here is the sad part, when you are running or moving, the sound keeps cutting off in the left side  headphone. If you do not move there seems to be no problem, but when you start moving the left side headphone cuts off in and out. Looks like the pairing between the left and right is not good. Sorry I am returning it.

title: Great sound!
body: Wow! These earbuds are amazing! Not only do they fit right in my ears but the sound is amazing.  I was going back and forth with getting the Samsung ones that cost $120, but for this price, I figured I'd give them a shot. Glad I did!  I really love the sound quality and the comfort of them!

title: These are great
body: I bought these because I needed some new wireless buds. These so far are excellent. They fit well and come with multiple replacement ear gummies that vary in size from small, medium, large, and extra large. The batteries haven't died on me yet but that's partially because I put them back in the charging case after use. They charge REALLY fast and so does the case. The pairing is nearly instant also. The sound is pretty supreme for bluetooth buds too. There's a tiny bit of background static but that seems to be customary with bluetooth earbuds. The bass is strong and I am able to easily tune out my surroundings. That being said you shouldn't substitute ear protection for these (such as if you're working with heavy machinery). Over all these are fantastic and I love using them any chance I get.

title: Sounds great,case and headphones are water-resistant.  Case can be charged wirelessly  . Great deal
body: Product  is great water-resistance is top notch I use them in the shower and I have a job doing leak testing . The headset sounds great . They are some of.  If not 'the best sounding earbuds I have ever heard connection is pretty solid listened to them for 6ish hours and the connection didn't drop . After about 6 to 6.5 hours the voice assistant in the headphones alerted me that the battery needed recharging which I just popped it back in the case which charges the earbuds wirelessly.  And the case can also be charged with a micro b cord or wirelessly too.overall you couldn't buy a better set of in ear headphones.  No not from Samsung, nor even apple

title: Earbuds Not Snug Fit
body: Sound quality is good, but the fit not so much. They need to be more ergonomical to fit more snuggly for maximum sound quality. I feel like they can fall off anytime, especially when I am on the stairmaster. I fear one of the earbuds will fall into one of the crevices between the steps. Too much trouble when it comes to pairing. The right earbud connects immediately but the left one I have to reconnect everytime. Both buds should immediately connect with my phone as soon as I take them out of the case.

title: Great sound quality and finally rid of wires
body:
I've had these for about 6 months now and I love these.
No more annoying wires dangling around my neck.  And no wires needed to charge this.  The case itself charges wirelessly, and the earbuds charge in the case.  This means I don't have to worry about finding a charger that fits.  No need for lightning connector, USB C, Micro USB, etc.  This charges on any wireless base there is.
The sound is great too.  I admit I was worried when buying these because of the lack of wires - but the sound is better than my last pair of wired earbuds.  Definitely better than the sound from Airpods - too much noise is lost with airpods because they don't fit to the ear like earbuds do.
These can get loud too, if you want that. - I never turn them up all of the way because it can get too loud for me - and I like loud music - so they get loud enough.
Sound quality is great for the types of music I listen to - that includes rap, some pop, classic rock, metal like Metallica and Megadeth, harder metal like Slayer and Lamb of God.  It all sounds great.  I have Bose speakers in my car and the music with these earbuds sounds better than when I listen to the speakers in my car.
Customer service is awesome too.  Fast responding and proactive customer service team.

title: Small but Big Sound!!!
body: I am loving my totally wireless earbuds. I took them out of the case and they instantly connected to my phone.  I put the smallest earbud covers on so they can still go in my ear with the tragus piercing.  It has great sound and everyone that I have talked to with them on say I sound fine. These a keeper and the price makes them even better. I won't be using my other headphones ever again. The case is also convenient and petite to fit in my purse. I love everything about them!!!

title: Terrible sound quality
body: Not sure why there isn't a two star overall rating for these. The sound quality is absolute garbage. The static is louder than my music. It's almost unbearable regardless how well they are designed. It's a shame because they last forever, are comfortable, light weight and connect easy. Will be returning asap.

title: Not working correctly after two pairs..
body: Unfortunately they Sound is great but they will keep cutting in and out. I have galaxys9+ and they only work right if I'm sitting down with my head tilted and holding still. If I walk around they cut out all the time and is very annoying. Thought it was a defect and they sent a second pair but same thing. I have a pair of skull candy and they don't cut out at all but have the neck strap that connects the two ear buds. Going to try a different brand. Hopefully they work for you if you choose to try them. They really do have great sound when they work...

title: Returned within three days
body: I was hopeful that buying this product would be a positive purchase, especially with 10,000+ reviews and the majority of them being positive ratings. The product arrived quickly as anticipated. Out of the box, they seemed to be a quality item. I read the directions and synced to my phone and they played right away with no initial issue. Then I started experiencing intermittent problems with the left earbud, where the left one would cut in and out. This is not just a once of twice thing. It happened 40+ times in an hour or so. I tried in house, outside, in the gym, and yes, my phone (XR) was about three feet from these earbuds while this was happening. Remembering that the directions said that if you experience connection issues or static, you should shut them down and re-pair to your phone again. I did this and tried again. Same problem. I then tried it again the next day and the same issue occurred. The cutting in/out seemed to happen more often when the volume was turned up towards the max and even seemed to align with the bass in the music. Not sure if I got a bad one or if that is what was to be expected, pursuant to the instructions in the box which talk about static and connections issues. Disappointing.. Just dropped them off to be returned.

title: Excellent quality!
body: Love these ear buds! They fit well, are waterproof, great for travel, charge easily, great sound quality, great for gym/pool, and easy to pair with your device. We bought both the black and white ones and both look stylish and work great!

title: Pair easily
body: They pair much easier than many earbuds I have used. Range is about 30-35 feet in gym setting. In water - they work ok on breaststroke but freestyle they kind of lose the earpiece that dips in water as you turn your head. Overall they work great and no issues so far.

title: Excellent earbuds!
body:
I'd give these "TOZO T10" earbuds 4.7 stars if I could.

(I didn't get paid for this review, and I didn't get the earbuds for free.)

The only major drawback I can see is the audio/video delay (lag) that I get on my laptop.

I originally bought these in an attempt to find bluetooth earbuds that didn't stick way out of my ear, had decent bass response, and most importantly, didn't have the infamous audio/video lag when watching on my laptop.

The good:
-Comfortable in my ear
-Sound is great (TONS OF BASS)
-Battery pack and ability to charge the earbuds is nice

The "needs improvement" section:
-The audio/video delay (lag) is still there!
-Stcks out of my ear a bit, but not too bad

Overall, the earbuds are really nice! I am searching for another pair though, due to the audio/video delay (lag).

I tested the audio/video lag by watching videos on YouTube and videos on my laptop. I have a Bluetooth 5.0 card in my laptop, so I don't think that's it, but I could be wrong.

I also tested the music/bass response with the following songs:
-Eye of the Tiger (Survivor)
-Danger Zone (Kenny Loggins)
-YMCA (Village People)

The bass is really amazing, so I'm keeping these as my "control" set. I compared these to the "Audio Shockerz" pair that I just bought, and the sound stage and the bass in the "TOZO" is quite a bit better, so I'm returning the "Audio Shockerz".

If the audio/video lag wasn't here, I'd say these earbuds would be nearly perfect. And waterproof to boot!

title: Great quality buds and charging case!
body: I really like these ear buds! I finally decided to splurge on a good set because I wanted to be able to watch my digital media in noisy places and I wanted more freedom to listen to media when I am working out ... and I sweat a lot! They sound great and don't appear to be affected at all by my sweat. I also like the various cushion sizes that come with them. The wireless charging case is awesome and well constructed.

title: Great for small ears and cord-free listening while working
body:
Typical earbuds do not fit/stay in my ears. I apparently have small ear canals. These come with a few different size plugs that go in your ears. The smallest size still doesn't fit correctly in my left ear but it fits well enough for my purposes.

While doing farm, landscaping and construction work or simply chores around the house, I can comfortably wear these without cords getting tangled in plants or tools.

title: Great product
body: When I first used this items I noticed some problems w the charging case and or buds.  I contact the customer support/ manufacturer and they quickly made things right by sending me a replacement.  I was unable to write a fair review of these buds because they were defective.  Now that I recieved the new buds the case charges really quickly and it also charges the buds quickly as well.  Sounds quality is amazing for such small buds. The bass quality is surprising as well.  I am very satisfied with my purchase.  I am glad I got an exchange instead of a refund.

title: Too bulky, not good for running
body: I was looking for something for working out and running. These keep falling out due to the weight and bulkiness of the product. I returned them. Travyna headsets are pretty good, no bass but loud enough and they don't fall out of your ears while running.

title: Easy to set up, charge on the go and sound great!
body:
I received these two days ago as promised.  I was surprised to find them already charged and ready to go.  They fact that the case not only is a charger but essentially a power storage device is amazing! I was very happy with the easy of set up and the quick start guide. First time out of the box my ear buds did not pair correctly. Following the guide, I quickly did a reset by holding each buds button for 15 seconds, put them in the charging station for a few seconds, removed them once again and they paired instantly!

The buds themselves fit comfortably and sound amazing. They are the perfect solution to my new phones lack of generic audio out jack.  As I travel frequently, I love that they recharge in the case without the need to find a outlet between planes!!  I’ll miss my big name, large over earphones, but paying 6X the money to move to their wireless version just didn’t make sense.

title: LOVE these earbuds!
body: The state of TN has recently enacted a ban on using your cell phone while driving.  I used to use a single airbud and was dissatisfied with it.  I ordered the TOZO ear buds and I LOVE THEM!  They fit in my ear perfectly and the sound quality is absolutely amazing!  I'm going to be making a 1000 mile move and I can't wait to use these!  I definitely give this product 5 stars! *****

title: Wire-free, trouble-free
body: So far so good! I've only had the headphones for a few days now, but the sound quality is great, they connect quickly to my phone, and they are comfortable for my ears. I love having wire-free earbuds. The one thing that's weird so far is that if i just listen to the headphones for an hour or less, if i put them back in the case to store, it uses up one of the charges. Not a big deal, though. Still need to test the phone mic!

title: Complete disappointment
body: The product is completely not answers the expectations. And here is why: Its pairing period is somewhat 10-15 seconds. And its every time you taking them from the charging box. So, if you have a phone call and you wish to take it with your charging Bluetooth earbuds - there is no chance. Second, you cannot charge master earbud (right one), while using left one. Once you put the right one to charge both are disconnecting from phone. Next, play time of 3.5 hours is the same as idle time (out of charging box). So even if earbuds are not in use, but also not charging - they discharged in 3.5 hours. Solution is to hold them in the charging box, but in this case you will need 10-15 sec to pair them again... Also faced some strange disconnection of left earbud if it being put away from the right one even for the 3 ft distance (placed right one in the pants pocket, while left was in my ear). Another issue is microphone. Seems that only one mic is working on the right earbud, but if it on - people on other side can barely hear you talking. Not sure if left mic is exist and if yes, it wasn't working for sure (tried to speak into it and it wasn't any better). So, forced to use left one to listen and right one to speak. Not really what i was expected. Forced to return the product.

title: Pros and cons
body: I’ve had these for a week now. Sometimes the pairing is difficult, when I’m working I can only wear one side. Sometimes the ear piece that is in would beep for a while making you think that it can only be worn with both pieces in your ears. On the plus side, they do not and will not fall out . Though, feels like My ears are popped with them in, same feeling as when an airplane takes off. The mic for when you speak during a phone call is much better quality than AirPods, says my wife. I tried  AirPods before this purchase but they continuously fall out of my ears. I’m a grown man by the way

title: Best I've gotten so far at a great price
body:
These are great! I got an adapter that so I can use them with my Nintendo switch and they are killer. Audio quality and battery life were what I was looking for, and these have both in spades. The case is slick as heck too, and the company included a warranty ND was highly responsive to me when I had a question via email
 Good product! Hopefully it stands the test of time.

title: Work great!
body: I really like how discreet and powerful they are, not to mention how adjustable! they charge plugged into my laptop conveniently. Ive had mine for a few months and I think the battery life could be improved. it only lasts an hour of consistent use and the strap it comes with loosens way to easily.  I removed the original strop and replaced it with a lanyard strap. One other downside is that you cant just have one in your ear and the other in the charger; if one goes in the charger they both disconnect from your phone. As for its waterproof ability, i cant speak on that bc I haven't dared to test it. I originally bought these wireless earbuds to use when I cleaned and closed a restaurant I worked at and I still use them daily. I recommend these for anybody looking for affordable bluetooth earbuds that will fit great!

title: Great quality - nice for the money
body: We'll see how long the battery lasts over time, but for the money these are great.  They fit in my ear well and are not too heavy.  The sound is great, could be a little louder....but overall really pleased with these - based on how much they cost.

title: A couple critical issues compromise an otherwise good product
body:
The Good: Audio quality is excellent.  Great bass and mid range.  The case is nice and the ability to continually charge the buds while they are being stored is great. Did not really use long enough to test the battery life.

The Bad:  Audio kept clipping in and out when I had my hone in my pocket, when I was walking, or whenever the phone was more than a couple feet away.  This is a huge issue as I use the earbuds while exercising all time time.  The limited BT signal range made these earbuds effectively useless.  I know it is not my phone because my previous BT earbuds did not have any issues with range, and a newer pair I purchased after trying these out also enjoyed excellent range and no signal loss issues.

Also could not get these buds to seal inside my ear well regardless of which size earbud I used.  Especially when working out and sweating, these would always work loose and never form a tight seal.  This always lead to a compromised audio quality.

Will be returning these earbuds.

title: I was in your shoes! Read review :)
body:
I’ve had these head phones for about 2 weeks now. I’ve been searching for a good pair of true wireless head phones that didn’t cost an arm and a leg. Since buying them I’ve used them for movies on my tablet, YouTube videos on my phone and music at the gym. I was skeptical about the gym but they hold up nicely! I don’t really ever write reviews but these head phones are worth a review!
The reason why I give them 4 stars is because I found that when I use them at work and I’m walking around (with my Bluetooth devise in my pocket) it would occasionally cut in and out for a few seconds. I’m not entirely sure why this is. I ended up getting the 4yr protection plan on them so I’m not to worried though!

Pro:
-Battery life is great for an 8 hour work shift (the charging box is portable and very convenient!)

-I was worried about video quality having a delay with voices matching the mouth. THERE IS NONE OF THAT :)

-music quality is rather nice. If you’re heavy into bass quality this might not be for you. But for the average person the quality is perfect.

-the price is a bit of a pinch but not to bad compared to other wireless headphones

Cons:
(2-19-19)

-while walking around at work with my BT device in pocket they seem to cut in and out for a few seconds. Not sure why this is.

-easy to loose/misplace if you’re not careful

title: Good, cheap alternative
body:
These earbuds are a great choice for those who don't want to spend a ton of money but still want quality wireless earbuds. They pair pretty easily and the sound is good (at least to my standards). They definitely cancel out noise. I don't know if I just have small ears but they are a little bulky. Strangely it helps when I don't wear any rubber thing on them. Their charge is good and they charge fast in their case.
Overall, would recommend!!

title: Great sound, great customer service,  issue with hearing while on phone.
body: The headphones themselves were great they had a great fit they also have a great sound the only issue I had was that during one of my call's the right ear Bud the master 1 decided no longer to play any sound during the call so the person on the other line could hear me but I could not hear them when I connected the left ear bud I was able to hear the calls find the media still plays with that is 1 issue that I have made phone calls.  The customer service is also very good they were very prop in helping resolve my issue and sending me a new pair

title: Unexpectedly Bada$$ Headphones - UPDATE - 5-Stars to 2-Stars unfortunately
body:
I was hoping these would be at least as decent as my JBL or Apple headphones - but, wow was I underestimating these. Never heard of this brand (TOZO), and I'm always skeptical of overly positive reviews, but I literally can't find one thing wrong with these. While you can't control anything physically on the ear pieces, they do have built in mics for bluetooth, handsfree talking, and you can control the volume and sound FX when connected to your phone or device. What's most impressive is the bass these little things produce. I feel like I have a subwoofer in my head. They fit super snug, and cancel ambient sound better than any headphones I've owned. I truly hope these hold up. A+++++++

UPDATE REVIEW 7/31/19:
While these do sound pretty great, they do manage to have a few irritating qualities. You can't control the volume on them, but that doesn't especially bother me because you control it on your connected device. What bothers me is there is no on/off button, so these things are on and auto-connected the moment they come out of their charging case.

The headphones have to connect to each other. You'll hear a voice say "second device connected" - at first I thought that meant I had connected to someone else's device, but no... connection 1 is the left headphone, connection 2 is the device. When the headphones aren't paired to a device, they have a little chirp that goes off about every 20 seconds, which is extremely annoying. What's worse, is now mine won't stop chirping at all, whether connected or not.

Now to the absolutely biggest design flaw in these - the microphone. I bought these for hands-free convenience. But if you are outside in the slightest bit of wind, or in a Starbucks or anywhere not in a closed, quiet space, no one can what you're saying. The microphones are on the outside facing part of the headphones, so they aren't even directed towards your mouth. This is a huge issue and I am returning these as this particular flaw completely defeats the reason I bought them in the first place.

title: Fantastic deal
body: These wireless earbuds are a great value for their price. I was surprised with how good they sounded considering the price. I have not personally tried out the waterproofing, but I am excited to use it next time it rains or next time I go swimming.

title: These are outstanding.
body: These ear buds are outstanding quality for very little money.  They pair automatically.  The battery life is about 4 hours.  No interruption.  Great sound.  Different size fittings for the buds.  These were my early Christmas present to myself and I’m very happy with them.  I use them every day.

title: Very nice for the price
body:
Here's my quick opinion: I'm a 45 year old guy, no audiophile and I wanted something cheap to use with my tablet so I could watch shows while in waiting rooms and sitting around.  These are perfect and I love them.

Here's more detail:
From the description page these Tozo T10 look a little cheap as well as the case. They are not at all. They seem very durable, the case is heavier than it looks and has 3 very strong little magnets that hold the lid shut. I thought the lid would be thin cheap plastic, but it's actually quite thick and seems sturdy. I take the whole case out of my work lunch box and toss it on the bed so I can charge it later and it stays shut. I even tried grabbing the case by the sides, and shook it, trying to get it to open and get the earbuds to fly out. They wont. Impressive.
Wireless charging works great.
The sound quality is great from these. Like I said, I watch movies on a kindle and using only 1 earbud, I have the  volume at about 75%. If I were to use both, I would be good at about 50%. I won't say these are extra loud, but should be plenty loud enough for most people.
So after having these for a couple of days and using them, I am very, very happy for what I got for the price. As long as they last a while, they'll be perfect. I would definitely buy again.

title: Pleasantly surprised
body: These earbuds were listed as Amazon‘s choice. They have been reviewed by over 10,000 people including myself now. I have used Apple AirPods for a couple of years now but I have started having issues. I didn’t want to spend buchu‘s of money  replacing my AirPods. I found these and thought to myself 50 bucks not bad I’ll give it a shot especially with Amazon’s return policy. Long story short I am pleasantly surprised with how well things sound the connectivity is easy no issue.  I would highly recommend these truly wireless earbuds for anyone needing to listen to music while working out or working in general. I have use them to make a phone call and they work well for that also. If I was being completely honest the only downside is you need to be in a place with not a whole lot of noise because they will pick it up. In other words when I use them at home I can talk on the phone fine, when I use them at work people have a hard time hearing me because of the background noise. Overall I am surprisingly satisfied for the price point and I plan on buying another pair for my wife.

title: Favorite in-ear headphones
body: I may buy more sets for when I wear these out. Comfortable. Work great. The mic is very good too. Solid range. Very nice sound. The case and headphones for well in my pocket. Love these and highly recommend them.

title: Better than expected!
body:
Easily paired and very convenient. I love the ability to use the right earbud while leaving the other in the case. Allows me to have a conversation while being able to listen to music or watch a video/show.
I have wireless Beat headphones and got tired of them being so bulky and depending on the workout I was doing they would slide off. I havent put these to the full test yet but so far these have exceeded my expectations.

title: So gooooood!!!!
body:
So greatly impressed by these headphones!!
Way better than I expected even; the sound quality is so on point. The bass blew me away; it has that really solid *thumpthump* without being crackly or overpowering at all!!
Have yet to experience battery life/quality; I’ll get back to you 😉
They fit perfectly in my ears without having to even change the buns, and I accidentally answered a call by pushing the call answer button on the right!

Overall, phenomenal first impressions and can not wait to test out all the other capabilities I.e. battery life, waterproofness, wireless charging.

Will def be recommending to everyone.

title: Do not buy!!!!
body: Very disappointed! Saw so many good reviews and was excited to try them. First the buttons on the earbuds are very hard to press. And second and most annoying is that it disconnected on its own every couple mins! Doesn’t matter what one doing or how close or far im from my phone it always disconnects! So having to reconnect constantly in between calls or music is very frustrating!!!!!  Honestly going to return them and get the AirPods !

title: EXCELLENT customer service
body: I initially bought one pair of Bluetooth headphones from Tozo, but I lost one of the buds. I contacted them and they offered me a nice discount on a second pair, even though dropping the headphone out of a car is obv not covered by the warranty. Very happy with the quality of the headphones, they’re awesome. Pretty happy with Tozo at this point, will continue to use their products

title: Great headphones and company but not sure how water resistant they actually are.
body: Recently bought these and was really happy with them but the left ear bud went out completely after being exposed to water. They shipped me a brand new pair and they were delivered in 2 days on the free included warranty. Great company and service but as far as how waterproof they are I can’t say.

title: Impressive sound and durable.
body: I got these for workouts, rock climbing, and dancing. They have great sound and work easily. They are also pretty durable as I have already dropped them from a decent height and they are working fine.

title: Excellent sound and good battery life.
