body: I decided to give these Bluetooth wireless earbuds a try after my old cheap pair broke. This is my first pair of earbuds that lack any wires, and I was very impressed by the sound quality. The bass  is excellent and they give you a lot of volume to work with. Prior to me purchasing these ear buds, my biggest concern was how they were going to fit on me. Not only are they comfortable, but they also don't slip out of my ears! The price is a steal, especially with the free 1 year warranty. I definitely would recommend.

title: I love these buds!
body:
I’ve been wanting some Bluetooth buds but the airpods don’t fit in my ears well. After looking at dozens of options on amazon, I settled on these and am very happy with my purchase.
They arrived well-packaged the next day. Both the charging case and buds themselves feel like good quality items. They paired quickly to my iPhone with zero problems. The sound is quite good, perhaps a touch bass-heavy, but most casual listeners like it that way. Would definitely purchase again. They stay firmly but comfortably in my ears.

title: These earbuds make constant popping sounds with music that has ANY treble
body: The monumental cons: I knew as soon as I put these on they were trash. As soon as I queued up some test music, the popping began. Go ahead, try it with any music that features trumpet such as Stan Getz or electric guitar such as Metallica's And Justice for All. These earbuds can't handle high treble sounds to save their life. Period. I'm avoiding all earbuds in this price range for now as they all seem to be of poor construction. The pros: Good punchy bass and noise cancellation.

title: Doesnt work well for mowing lawns.
body:
Thought they would work for mowing lawns. I have one that is 2.5 hrs long and one that is 4 hrs. The ear buds have done fine for awhile but after 3 months of use I cant make it through my one lawn that is 2.5 hrs long anymore.

Another problem is i cant have my phone in my back right pocket. They connect but cut out frequently.

When working with phone 3 feet away from face they are great.

Sound quality is mediocre at best

title: Excellent earbuds for the price
body: In fact, they are excellent when compared to all other earbuds.  This is from someone who really dislikes all earbuds, due to the mediocre bass quality, and most annoying of all, the two stereo channels separated by the width of your head.  The Tozo buds can't solve the latter problem, but they do have good midrange quality, and bass is as good as you will find in earbuds of this size.  Highly recommended.

title: Comparison: TOZO T10 vs BEBEN 5H
body:
I purchased both the BEBEN 5H wireless ear buds and the TOZO T10 wireless ear buds, for use with my Samsung Galaxy S7 Android phone. Prior to these purchases, I have been using Anker bluetooth (wired-to-each-other) ear buds; the Anker buds have served me well for a couple of years, but I was looking for truly wireless for a couple of reasons (I won't waste your time with those reasons--I suspect if you read them you wouldn't care).

I checked out reviews and ratings for several brands, and settles on these two:
-- BEBEN 5H Continuous 25H Cyclic Playtime IP68 Waterproof 5.0 Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds with Wireless Charging Case (here: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07PN2FK2W/ref=ppx_yo_dt_b_asin_title_o04_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1)
-- TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds with 【Wireless Charging Case】 IPX8 Waterproof TWS Stereo Headphones (here: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07J2Z5DBM/ref=ppx_yo_dt_b_asin_title_o06_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1)

I purchased the TOZO first, after reading many positive reviews, and seeing an average of 4.4 stars from more than (at the time) 9,000 ratings; the price was $49.99. Afterward, I noticed the BEBEN, getting an average rating of 4.8 stars from over 1,000 ratings; these were slightly less expensive, $45.99. I liked the controls advertised for the BEBEN better than those advertised for the TOZO.

Both sets claim IPX8 waterproof certification, which means they can be dropped in 3 feet of water and should be good to go. (Interestingly, IPX8 *does not* mean all of the lower IPX ratings are covered. For example, IPX6 means it can handle a spray of water at some amount of pressure; being rated for IPX8 does not mean it passes the IPX6 test.) Both are bluetooth. Both advertise good music sound quality, and good use for phone calls.

When I received them, I decided they must have some common manufacturing. While the shape of their cases is different, there are some notable elements in common: Both have four small LED lights in the case to indicate the case's battery level, both cases close magnetically, and they come with identical graphics and text materials to communicate they're good for swimming (surface, not underwater) and good for showers. The TOZO advertised that it came with 5 pairs of different sized silicone cups to fit different sizes of ears, and it did; the BEBEN advertised that it came with 3 pairs, but it came with 5. Both cases charge wirelessly, and both cases can recharge the ear buds multiple times before needing a case recharge.

I put both sets through the same test routine. I listened to similar music, and I made phone calls. With each set, I ran 4.5 miles on a treadmill, then showered while wearing the ear buds and listening to podcasts. When I was in the shower, the ear buds were connected to my phone which was about 25 feet away with 2 walls in between. Here are my findings:

SOUND QUALITY:
I found the sound quality to be very good in both. I'm probably not as demanding in this area as some, but I would guess I'm as demanding as most.

Score: tie

SOUND BLOCKING:
Neither set has active noise cancelling. They block noise through their physical design; the silicone cup which fits into the ear canal physically blocks a lot of environment noise. I think both do brands do a fine job of blocking environmental noise, so the music sounds good.

Score: tie

CONNECTION STABILITY:
One complaint I'd read a few times regarding the TOZO was dropped connections. When I tried the BEBEN, as I got around 25 feet from my phone, with 2 walls between me and my phone, on a couple of occasions both ear buds disconnected, then reconnected very quickly; each disconnect-reconnect lasted maybe half a second. It was a little annoying, but rare, and pretty understandable given the distance and walls. The TOZO did the same thing. However, the TOZO did the disconnect-reconnect routine many, MANY times, including when the phone was only 3 feet away and there were no obstructions between the phone and ear buds.

Score: BEBEN 5H wins

CONTROLS:
The BEBEN 5H's buttons offer more controls than the TOZO T10's. The TOZO's controls include:
- Answer phone
- Hang up phone
- Redial last number
- Play/pause
- Reject phone call

The BEBEN's controls do not offer 'redial last number', but otherwise have the same controls plus:
- volume up/volume down
- next/previous (song, podcast, etc.)

Score: BEBEN 5H wins

FIT:
The fit was very similar between the two. The TOZO are slightly larger (as seen in one of the attached photos). Both stayed in my ears while I ran 4.5 miles on a treadmill. Neither the shaking nor the sweat led to ear buds coming loose.

Score: tie

PHONE CALLS:
For me the sound was good. I was told by my daughter that on her end I sounded good. In the initial tests, I found no difference. Since the initial testing, I have used the BEBEN for phone calls on many occasions; on a couple of occasions I have been told by the person at the other end of the call that they could not hear me well. I don't have enough information, yet, to decide whether that was because of the environment I was in at the time, or if there's some flaw in the BEBEN mic.

Score: tie

WATERPROOF:
Both sets survived my shower with flying colors. They performed fine. It was nice to keep listening to music or podcasts while I was showering. In each test, I removed the ear buds while I was in the shower (so I could clean my ears), set the buds on the bath tub rim, then put them back in my ears about a minute later. No problems with regard to water.

Score: tie

OTHER:
These two things are small, but I notice them. First, the TOZO case lid is slightly translucent. Because of that, when the battery level LEDs are lit, they can be seen through the case lid, which is nice (this is shown in one of the pictures); the BEBEN lid is completely opaque, so the LEDs cannot be seen without opening the case.

Also, as seen in one of the pictures, the "L" and "R" on the BEBEN ear buds are small and low-contrast with the surrounding plastic. For a 54-year-old who needs reading glasses but who otherwise has good vision, I wish they would have made these markings easier to see.

Score: TOZO

SUMMARY:
The BEBEN 5H are very good. I'm glad to have them and will make great use of them. The have the added benefits of offering additional controls over the TOZO, which I am glad to have, and they are slightly cheaper.

The TOZO are pretty good, but that issue with disconnecting and reconnecting is very annoying. This is something they should fix. As can been seen in other reviews, I'm not the only person to find this problem. This set will be going back.

Oveall Winner: BEBEN 5H

title: I tried two other brands that both had major issues.
body: I tried two other brands before getting these. The first ones I actually tried four pairs and every one the right channel cut in and out and the left and right ear weren't in sync. The second brand I tried because I gave up o the other one wouldn't stay in your ear. I contacted both brands about the problems they each had and both told me that the problem was a known problem. That's how I ended up with these, they work perfect and sound great.

title: Great pair of Headphones
body: These headphones connect with ease to just about any device! It even connected to my Amazon Fyre. Unfortunately, there is no volume option there. I mainly use these headphones at work to drown out office noise as I work, and they work amazingly. I am very impressed with these headphones

title: Great wireless earbuds
body: Great sound and deep bass. The earbuds are very light, so they stay in your ear and won't fall out. The ability for the case to be wirelessly charged is awesome, and the fact that they start connecting when I remove the earbuds from the case is very convenient.

title: Save yourself $100
body: I wanted something a little lower profile than “pods”, so I figured I’d give these a try. I’m glad I did, the connection and sound quality are great, and the batteries last me a couple of weeks with moderate use.

title: Top quality earbuds
body: I have been looking at getting wireless earbuds for awhile now. I would have got the apple wireless earbuds but I didn’t want to pay that much. I did some research and found these. They are pretty amazing especially for the price point. The sound is great, it cancels the noise so your only hearing clear music. I was surprised at the quality of bass you hear in your music. It’s almost better to me than apple earbuds. The packaging was great. Everything was protected and safe from damage. Overall I’m very satisfied with this purchase. I would definitely recommend these.

title: great alternative to air pods and good for running
body: I wanted wireless earbuds that would last but air pods don’t fit in my ears right and are also too pricey. I took the chance on these and I like them a lot. I put one in during work and those around me can’t hear anything in terms of sound leakage. also bc they’re so small ppl don’t realize i’m listening to podcasts (lol). they fit in my ears well (there are different sizes of cushions to try) and the battery lasts long. the case is a bit large to carry around though so before a run i’ll pop them out and leave the case in the car. I lost my right earbud and the company was helpful in giving me options to replace it.

title: Sound, fit and work great!!
body: This product looks and sounds great! The charge case is very convienient and the ear buds have a good battery life. I use them while running and they haven’t fallen out yet, though after a while it feels like they wiggle loose a bit but I feel that’s expected in this design of earbud. It comes with several size selections for the ear inserts to be sure you have the right fit. The wireless charging is cool and the fact that they have a waterproof rating give we confidence wearing them in any weather or while sweating or at the beach or pool.

title: Super
body:
They fit great, and don't come out during intense gym workouts. They sound great, much better than my last wired pair! They look great, very unobtrusive. The charging is super convenient and fast. They're fairly rugged too, as I'm never worried about breaking them. The connectivity is perfect. I haven't tried with phone not on me, but there are zero stutters or drops during typical listening conditions.
The only features they left out - that you can get at 4 times the cost of these, are better controls. They turn on/off and answer/hang-up calls, that's it. Would've liked volume and music track (next/prev) control gestures or click sequences. But these are the entry buds you've been waiting for.

title: Definitely NOT WATERPROOF
body: I already have an excellent pair of earbuds, what I was looking for was a pair of EarPods that I could swim with. Based on the reviews, I thought I had found such a pair with the Tozo T10. Unfortunately, the moment my head went under the water, these  earbuds lost connectivity with my Apple Watch and ceased to work. Presently the left earbud doesn’t work at all. This is all from a brief moment of submersion. These earbuds sound very good, but you can find equally good sounding buds for less money. If someone knows of a pair of earbuds that can actually be used to swim with, I would love to know about those. I can say without hesitation, that these are not the earbuds I was looking for

title: Battery life
body: Love these headphones. They fit great in your ear An does not easily fall out. Also the bass is pretty good An battery life is good also since I have purchased these I haven’t charged them in two days An fully an i still have battery life if you are looking for some good ear buds for a good price I recommend these.

title: I love these headphones
body: These are my go to wireless headphones now, the sound quality is great for the price and the charging case is easy to throw in my bag. It charges up in the case about two and a half times before you need to plug it in, and the earbuds themselves last about 2-3 hours fully charged. It's not as long as I would like, but they're so small I really can't complain. They do fall out of your ears if you whip your head around (and I tried all the sizes of the rubber earpiece and found one that fits my ear) so it's ok if you're just lifting weights at the gym, but not great for dancing or any more full body workouts. I'm not a runner, but I would be afraid to run with these as I'd feel like they were constantly about to fall out. I have walked with them in and had no problem though, they just have to be occasionally adjusted.

title: Like the sound
body: I liked these headphones. I used them for days working around our property. I don't know how people like them for working out or swimming. Although they stay in your ear ok my experience you have adjust regularly while running. Eventually on a run one fell out quickly. I was not able to locate it. The downside of completely wireless.

title: Pleasantly Surprised
body: I didn't have high expectations for this product. The reviews were great but I've bought plenty of items with 4 1/2 stars that I felt were 3 at best. However, the TOZO T10 are remarkably good for the price. The sound is excellent but, best of all, the noise cancellation - due to a tight fit - was fantastic. My wife was 3 feet away from me when I first put them in and while I could see her lips move I didn't hear a word (a wonderful hidden feature).

title: Quality, function and fit
body:
This is just a preliminary review. I've had the product almost a week now and am very pleased with it so far. I've used it on and off the whole week and haven't needed to charge it so far. The sound quality, specifically the bass, is amazing. I have to turn the volume all the way down so I don't feel like I'm going to damage my hearing.

That being said, it fits very well when I go running, doesn't fall out and I can still hear my music perfectly well. I did have to switch out the buds with the smallest size to fit my ears.

I'll update again in a few weeks when I try it lap swimming. I bought this product specifically for that.

title: GREAT but not for long...Should last longer than 45 days!🤬
body: Worked great for about a month & a half then just past the return "window" they started failing, I use them for about 2-4 hours a night to not disturb my GF's sleep while I'm watching TV in bed,I was very happy with this product until now...I feel that they should either repair or replace them regardless of the 30 return policy....$50+ for 45 days of usage, REALLY??

title: Great Customer Service
body: These earbuds have great sound quality and they fit really well because of the different sizes. I use them on a daily basis and have even tried them out in the shower several times with no problem.  Recently, I had one occasion of moisture accumulating in the earbuds which made them sound a bit muffled.  I contacted customer service and they responded within 24 hours offering to send me another pair for free.  Great customer service!

title: Good quality, helpful customer service
body: I recently got a pair of these and they are amazing. The sound quality is awesome, they fit in your ears snugly, are comfortable, are waterproof, have good battery life, charge quickly. But for some reason with my pair the left earbud sometimes has trouble connecting to the right one. Sometimes it works fine and sometimes it cuts in and out. I emailed the help people for TOZO and they offered to send me another pair for free. Very nice and willing to do a lot to help you be satisfied with their product. Hopefully when I get this pair they will work flawlessly. I definitely recommend getting these. Even if they have this slight connectivity problem.

title: Great ear buds for a great price.
body:
I’ve had these for a few weeks now, and so far they deliver everything promised. I love the packaging, and that you can set the charging cradle on a wireless charger pad (if you have one). I listen to audiobooks mostly, and the lowest volume is perfect, so I get about 4 hrs out of one charge. I’m no audiophile, but music sounds great too. I work in a noisy environment and while these are not noise cancelling, they do a good job of muting that noise, allowing me to listen to my entertainment of choice at a low volume.

Setup was super easy on my iPhone 6 Plus. It finds them automatically now when I take the buds out of the charger (unless you’ve turned your Bluetooth on and off, then you have to pair them again). I have small ears and the smallest buds fit perfectly. I did try them in the shower, and they are indeed waterproof. Overall, I’m super happy with them!

title: Great Headphones Only Missing a Couple Features
body:
Bought these to avoid spending 3 times as much on Airpods and am very happy with my decision so far. The sound is great for the price and they fit very well. I've used these on runs and have no problem with the headphones falling out. The bluetooth connectivity is pretty good. Every once in a while it seems best to reset the headphones by putting them back in the charging case and then removing them again to repair. This solves the issues that occasionally occur if you don't put them back in the charger and just turn them off and try to repair. The battery life so far seems to really be 3+ hours and the case is good for a few more charges.

The only thing I missing is the ability to change volume and song via the button. The button allows for pausing only. This is only really a problems when on a run but is the thing preventing me from giving them 5 stars.

Overall I would definitely recommend these for the price.

title: The reviews are a lie
body: I never give reviews until I saw a verified purchase  show an email of the company bribing people. My right ear bud cuts out when I turn my head and the loudest volume the headphone go is close to a cat meowing on your shoulder. This is a great product if you listen to your music softly I can hear everything around me at all times which I guess is nice if I'm going for a run alone  but for it to be called noise canceling. It's a lie there are no controls  but they do fit in the ear nicely even if they are sticking out they dont move from my ear.

title: Love these, awesome sound, great fit, waterproof.
body: I bought the TOZO T10 wireless earbuds to workout as they were definitely the most reasonable. For the price, I didn't expect that much, but I was amazed by the sound quality. The fit is tight but comfortable. Very pleased with my purchase. Bought a second pair for the wife after trying mine out the first week.

title: Best Wireless Earbud Experience To Date!!
body: I was on the market for a new true set of wireless earbuds when I came across TOZO T10 earbuds. What first caught my eye was high ratings and the great price, seeing how it was affordable I thought what the heck there’s nothing to lose. Once arrived the packaging was simple yet had a nice quality. But the real topic of conversation is the amazing sound and bass to come from these earbuds!! I was shocked to hear such strong bass and clear mids from these small earbuds. I would recommend these earbuds 100x over you won’t regret getting these amazing earbuds

title: Great in the shower
body: The waterproof quality is especially nice. I can shower with them in just fine. It takes a little while to get used to inserting them so that they don’t fall out (the trick is to tug on your earlobe while you insert them and twist). My only real disappointment is how short the battery life is. I’m frequently having to put them back in the charger case more than I’d like, but at least the case holds a wireless charge so it’s not always tied to the wall.

title: Terrible connection never stayed connected music went in and out the whole time
body: I just got them yesterday. They went in and out of the connection my whole workout. I reset the Bluetooth 4 times with no luck in keeping them connected. If the connection cant hold from my watch to hear that cant be a good pair of bluetooth ear buds. Sorry i bought them

title: My first wireless earbuds - cannot be more happier
body:
Never use a wireless earbuds before and decide to give it a try.
I use it for workout and gym for several weeks now. It is very comfortable and never fall.
Before this, I use wired headphone and this is a day and night experience, I wish I found this earlier !!

I am not sure why people spend 3x but I am getting another one for my wife.

title: Work great right out of the box
body: Purchased this pair to a few days ago, so this is an early review for now. The earphone connected easily to the phone. They sound great. Wireless charging is awesome, just put the box on a wireless charger and they charge. So convenient. I am glad I took the chance on these after some research.

title: Pretty good
body:
I'm not an audiophile but the sound quality appears excellent.  Nice deep basses.  Pairing is easy.  Packaging was very good.  Problems: 1.  I use it to listen to my TV and there is a significant sound delay though it might be the stereo system or the dongle (Avantree Priva III) I'm using.  2.  Battery life is poor.  Doesn't get 3 hours of active listening.

For me, the poor battery life is the most disappointing part of this system and the only reason why, if I had to do over, I would look for another brand.

title: Absolutely Amazing Product for price
body:
I did not expect anything amazing from these earbuds. In fact, I was entirely prepared to receive them, use them for a day, and send them back due to poor quality.

The housings on each earpiece have a matte black finish that feels really nice. Each earbud feels light yet sturdy. There are 4 included ear piecesThe earbuds pair automatically when taken out of the housing. The sound on these is incredible! When situated properly in the ear, these things pump out Bass. The buds pair automatically when removed from the case, and I have yet to experience any static while listening. They also have an excellent range.

title: Falling in & out of Love
body: I Love the ability to move around without a long cord getting in the way. However, I am having the hardest time keeping the earbuds in my ears. I've changed the ear caps on the buds to ALL the sizes and they keep coming right out of my ears. I even tried taking the ear caps off to see it that will keep them in.

title: Great sound, what a great value
body: These earbuds are awesome.  I use them at the gym.  The quality is remarkable and the sound is perfect.  One of the best things is the earbuds light up (right and left) to make sure you put them in the right charging slot and of course the right ears.  Perfect size carrying case, so light and easy to carry around.  I highly recommend these earbuds.  You won't find a better pair for the money you pay.

title: Great bang for buck
body:
I was pleasantly surprised by the sound quality. Once you get your right fit of attachment, it sounds amazing and noise cancellation is decent too. Although, I experienced a little pain wearing it for a long time, but I'm guessing I need to find a better size. Plus it's waterproof! Haven't tested it though.
Definitely worth the money.

EDIT: After about a week of using it, I felt the mic is a bit weak. It captures the voice of people behind me better than my own.

title: Much better than expected.
body: I was very apprehensive when I bought it, expecting that it would be a lot of hype, but it works very well with my Samsung note 8, the sound quality was better than expected and the battery life is adequate. Wireless headphones have inherent problems with maintaining  reliable connections but this  unit performed well under  the circumstances. I wish they would incorporate the contacts so that you abe better able to screen your calls

title: Big sound for your bucks.
body: Great starter ear buds. I had been looking to get some but the ones at the local electronic stores are so spendy. My ears don’t fit air pods and I wanted something different. Read all the review and decided to try these and they are great! They fit my ears. They have different sizes though. They sound great! Good base and they feel like I am not wear anything at all! If you are looking to try eat buds and know what you are getting into, give these a try. You will not be disappointed.

title: Great Product compare to price
body: bought these ear buds to use at gym. These earbuds are great for me. They are pretty small with a decent connection range and great sound quality. It is really reasonable price. Also, it has a potable charger so I can recharge anytime without connecting to an outlet.  Overall a great purchase for me I’ve recommended them.

title: These are great headphones
body: I really like these headphones.  They have excellent sound quality and cancel out noise very effectively.  I had my doubts that they would be very good with no wires but they exceeded my expectations!  Love them!!

title: 3 Months Later- DEAD
body: These were great while they lasted! I even told another friend to get them. These were delivered at the end of June 2019 and today- Sept 23, 2019, the left earbud is dead- no sound, no red light, nothing. The right one works just fine. I'm really disappointed that these only lasted a few months. WASTE OF MONEY.  I have kept these at my office the whole time, never been wet or mistreated. Would not purchase these again.

title: Great Quality
body:
I love these, my job banned music in all departments, this has made it a struggle to stay awake because I work alone in my office doing mountains of paperwork and I get sleepy without something to keep me awake.
I have a pair in black also but these ones are strange and make 30 seconds of beeping after connecting to my phone. It’s very annoying. My blue pair doesn’t do this and I wish I could trade the black pair out! I
They are also great at my second job in retail, easily hidden and saves me from the company’s music variety and ads.

title: Great product, perfect for workouts!
body:
My favorite part about the T10 ear buds is that they are completely wireless. Honestly what a great product with no hassle of any wires.
The charge box and ear bud protector is amazing! It charges the ear buds on the go! The sound is great, perfect for workouts or simple general moments of relaxation. I highly recommend the wireleaa charger aswell by Tozo, only around 16$ and easy way to charge the ear bud charge box. Ps. It comes with a free 1 year warranty, almost no ear bud company does this! Great Job to Tozo!

title: Doesn’t fit in your ear
body: Sound was fine but too big for your ears and would never stay in unless you crammed then in your ears. Wish they would make more adaptable ear fittings

title: Great Product!
body: I love these! The only problems I have are that it's a pain to just get one speaker to work at a time, the microphone is super quiet, and it gets a little jumbled when im jogging with them in. Other than that I love these! The charging case is pretty awesome!

title: Long review  - pros and cons
body:
So I will be honest, there's things i love about these and a few things I dont like but not enough to return them. Prepare for a long review!!!

I LOVE how small and compact the case is. It is convenient since I am not really a purse kind of girl so when I am using one, it's just a tiny little case. Neat idea but also a con for me since i listen to music practically all day.. but each bud has an approx 3 hr battery life and then the case is also a battery pack for the ear buds. There are 4 blue lights that indicate how much charge is left on the case. They are magnetic so when you put them in the case the "click" back in so to speak so no worry of them falling out of the case for any reason. The lid is also so magnetic so even better of accidentally dropping and opening.

Case can also be attached to a wireless docking station to charge instead of actually plugged in which is a plus when im in a rush and can just grab and go and not risk ripping out my charger when im not careful.

The sound is pretty clear and solid. My brother owns a different pair of wireless/bluetooth buds. We played the same song and put one of each in each ear to compare sound and feel. And to be honest, both were practically the same. (His were ENACFIRE E18 if you're curious. Also more expensive by like 10 bucks)

The great bass it claims to have isnt bad but not quite meeting expectations. Could always change your music settings to get extra.

Love these are waterproof as i bought these for my vacation trip tp California and it rained hard core for 3 of my 5 days there! So was nice i didnt have to worry bout them while out and about in the rain.

Some cons - using it for calls, doesnt really work well. I used it twice and both times the caller barely could hear me. He said i sounded far away. Granted the mic is in the ear buds lol so im not really surprised. And Im not going to shout to talk on the phone. But not a big deal since i bought these for the purpose of just listening to music with the convenience of no wires and at least knowing im getting a call.

Dislike these didnt come with different size ear piece covers. For my ear its snug, for my sister its too big, for my brother its too small. So i had to spend extra money to buy different size ear pieces.

Also a slight con is you have to use both at the same time. The left one connects to the right and the right connects to the phone. So if the left one isn't out of the case the right bud beeps every 10 seconds.

title: Excellent connectivity and value
body: Over the years I have used bluetooth earbuds extensively. Have tried many top shelf brands (Bose, Sony, Jabra, Samsung) with mixed results. Received my TOZO T10 earbuds yesterday and have tested them out with my most critical clients and they have come thru with flying colors. They can hear me clearly with a minimum of background noise and I can hear them clearly as well. Easy to connect, operate independently if required, easy to custom fit and simple to use. Given the price and the one year extended warranty at no extra charge (upon registration with TOZO), best value I've seen and used for the last 10 years.

title: Highly reccomend this product!
body: The headphones came in the mail and after getting them to full charge I went through the process of the setup. Bluetooth worked perfectly for both earbuds. Its important to select the Tozo-R after your device picks up the signal. Sound quality is absolutley perfect with a deep sound (not tinny) and they are plenty loud enough to block out noise around you. They fit and are secure in my ear. Very comfortable. They seem built well enough to be durable however time will tell if they last.

title: Left ear bud stopped working after 5 months
body:
I purchased these 5 months ago and maybe have a total of 5 hours of use on them. Compared to regular wired Apple EarPods that are acceptable to me, the sound quality is just a notch lower than the Apple. Otherwise, these pair quickly and charging case is cool also.

That said - my left ear bud is completely dead and no longer turns on or pairs. I have never dropped it or anything or even used working out. Not happy with this.

title: great product
body: I have only had these for a few days but so far they are pretty good...haven't tried a phone call yet but I will update my review once I have

title: For $50, not worth the money for what I wanted to use this.
body: I wanted to float on my raft in the pool to exercise my lower body. I put my phone that plays books on tape in a water proof bag and keep it no more then 2 feet from my head. The ear phones cut in and out, which is annoying. So I charged them for four days and tried them again today and they still cut in and out. SO NOT WORTH THE MONEY because it does not play well. I don't know if they will work if they get a little wet, because I kept my ears out of the water. I just wanted to enjoy my books while floating and it is just annoying to listen to skip like I was listening to my old 33's on the home stereo.

title: Great Quality Waterproof Bluetooth Ear Buds
body: Very comfortable and easy to pair; I mainly use these with my tablet but occasionally I pair them with my desktop. So far, no problem pairing/unpairing. The charging case is excellent. Fast charging and has a translucent lid so you can see the charging LEDs inside the case. The sound quality is very good. If you like bass, these are the headphones for you.

title: All bad
body: Look nice and fit nice but no one could barely hear me. I even left myself a voicemail and I had to talk loud like one of those idiots you see in the store sharing their whole conversation with everyone within 30 feet. Had to send them back

title: A Lot of Bang for Your Buck
body: I would definitely give this product 5 stars. I came in with decent expectations and was surprised to find out how great these earbuds really are. The sound quality is on par with much more expensive products. They also fit into you ear very nicely and even include custom tips to ensure they fit perfectly. The earbuds pair right when you open the case making them quick and easy to use. They are also completely waterproof meaning you can swim with them which is an awesome bonus. The product comes with a 1 year warranty as well so I would definitely reccomend these.

title: Revised Review.  These are a great buy.
body:
This is more of an update to a negative review.

My first pair of Ear Buds would not stay connected to any of my Apple Devices.  It’s a pain to return items when life has me busy and traveling etc. - but I was forced to do so.

Now - the seller contacted me to discuss the problem.  They took control and quickly replaced the Ear Buds without any hassle or problems.  Their customer support is top quality for sure.

Now - the Ear Buds are up and running.  They carry good sound quality and pair easily with all of my devices.  They come with different sized tips for the best comfort.  I am not sure about battery life but so far it’s not too bad.

For the price - these things are great.

Their customer service takes all of the worry about a purchase.  Buy with confidence.

title: Not Waterproof
body:
I bought these specifically because they were advertised as “waterproof “. The first time I used them, the left earbud fell out and dropped to the bottom of a 4’ pool. I picked them up within 30 seconds and placed back into my ear. The next day no sound would come out of it. I attempted to swim freestyle with the right earbud the following day. This time anytime the earbuds were submerged, it would mute. Eventually, it muted altogether. Both sides don’t work now, so I returned them.

Update 8/9/19:
I have tried three sets of these ear buds. I thought the first was just defective so I exchanged it for a new set. The second set of earbuds wouldn’t pair, but I did try swimming with the working one anyway. It eventually went dead. These are truly not waterproof, only water resistant. I returned the second set.

Then surprisingly Customer Service contacted me because of my 1-star review and offered to send a free pair for an updated review. I again had trouble getting them to pair, but my husband figured it out. You have to press the earbud until the blue light comes on. I was trying to tap it on or didn’t hold it down long enough when I did hold it down. These ear buds do work well out of the water, but I wouldn’t use them for swimming again. I don’t know that ear buds exist that are truly waterproof. If you find any, please let me know.

title: Amazing Sound & Fit, Left channel cuts out.
body: Let me start off by saying the sound these bad boys produce is amazing, slightly deep base mixed with perfect treble. Right out of the box I was blown away by the sound & fit! I’ve tried 5 different pairs over the last week and these fit like a dream!!! The noise canceling is decent as well. I cut the lawn after playing with them for an hour after opening them and I could barely hear anything but the sweet sounds of Queen, Eminem, & Mitch Hedburg (don’t judge) As for the battery, I takes me a solid 3 1/2 to 4 hours and they lasted longer then that. The only reason I’m giving 2 stars is due to the fact that the left channel will randomly go out at least every other song for a second before coming back and if I hold my hand close to either ear it cuts the left earbud out every time, I’ve tried re-pairing, resetting, and everything the manual says to no avail. But for the price you really can’t go wrong and I’m hoping I maybe just have a defective left earbud? Time will tell. I do wish they had a ‘skip ⏩ and previous ⏪’ feature but it’s not a selling point for me. Finally the wireless charger case works fantastic. If I didn’t have a issue with the left bud cutting out these would be a easy 5 stars much better then my Bose, AirPods, and Rowkin. (UPDATE) Tozo customer service contacted me and is sending me a replacement pair, no charge. Told me to keep the old ones too. Awesome customer service! They responded in less then 24 hours and are fixing the issue. Outstanding, thank you Tozo!!!

title: Very Impressed!
body: I'm nothing but impressed with these earbuds!  The bass response was unreal.  I actually had to use my phone's EQ to LOWER the bass.  Noise cancellation is great, highs and mids are good too.  They paired very easily and stayed paired.  The order shipped quickly and the packaging contained everything advertised.  Would recommend.

title: Outstanding customer service!!!
body:
Update: The company reached out to me and is replacing the earbuds with an upgraded pair. That’s never happened to me before! I will review the new pair or update this to include what worked better. Super glad to see a company that takes pride in not only their product, but also takes customer satisfaction seriously!

Even the smallest plastic earpiece is large for my ears. The sound quality is good, but not great like my previous pair that has been discontinued.

title: Surprised at these beastly headphones
body: I was surprised the amount of clarity and bass these headphones have. I love the fact that when they are in your ears, you cant even really tell. They do a pretty darn good job at noise cancelling and battery seems to last as advertised. These exceeded my expectations.

title: Good sound quality, but uncomfortable for small ears
body: The sound was very good in these ear buds and I was happy with them in that sense, but forget these if you have smaller ear canals. They hurt after 20 minutes of wear and they stuck out really far! The charging case was convenient, but I had to return them because they made my ears insanely sore and did not look good sticking out (I tried rotating them and using different ear bud covers with no luck). Battery life was good for when I did use them.

title: Well made, solid value, fantastic sound!
body:
I’m honestly impressed! (So far)

Just got these yesterday.  I have bought and lost two sets of the Bose wireless sound sport buds, which are a really great product with a couple of issues, the first being price.  I got these for 25% of the cost and while I can’t comment yet on durability the sound quality is excellent.  I’d go so far as to say superb.  They don’t come out
Of my ears and they are comfortable.  Also very easy to pair and the charging case is well designed.  You can see the status LEDs through the black translucent case which is a nice touch.  Haven’t worn them to swim laps but I am just superstitious that it would be the end of them, has nothing to do with the product.

If like me you are a Bose fan but can’t spend another 200 bucks on wireless buds try these out, at the price you can’t lose.

title: Great service
body: Had an issue with my right earpiece being muffled and popping when I would move a bit. Contacted the company and they send me a new set in just a couple days. I recommend these if you are looking for good battery life and good service.

title: Great Sound Quality
body: Don’t even sound like earbuds.  Used to have my iPhone settings on “small” but these are able to reproduce sound like headphones.

title: Connectivity
body:
Out of the box, the pair connected with each other and with my device without any problem.  Unfortunately, the left earbud keeps on getting disconnected frequently.  Not only that, both the earbuds gets disconnected with the device while walking.  This aspect is really ANNOYING.  One cannot successfully use this while walking, jogging or travelling,
Noise cancellation is moderate and good considering earbuds.

title: These are not running headphones 🎧 and I’m so glad they exist!
body: These waterproof Bluetooth headphones are awesome!!!! I take them to the pool with me to drown out the sound of ill behaved children! Also good when you want to do a few tedious laps for a workout. These work very well and I did a submersion test in a glass of water to prove they’d hold up... no issues! The carrying case is amazing! You can charge the case and then it becomes the charger for your buds so you can charge them on the go! Case remains charged for a while before a recharge is needed. Perfect for someone who forgets to charge all their devices like me. And I love how you can charge them on the go! These are cheap considering function and quality! Gosh I love them! Yes they are a bit clunky and hard to squeeze into some ears but as long as you don’t do HIIT with them should be fine. And if you do HIIT I’d recommend just holding them in with a sweatband! They do water sports like they are intended to but might be clunky for running. I absolutely love these headphones and thank them for existing!!!!

title: So far, So good!
body: I have used the earbuds for a few days now and I am enjoying the experience. The sound quality is better than I expected and I have yet to have an issue with the battery life. The only issue that I have experienced is paring the Left and Right at times is sporadic. I have had to turn off and on each in order to get them to sync up. But after a little bit of effort I can get the ear buds to work fine. I have yet to give them a go at the gym, but looking forward to trying them out!

title: Great quality & sound fantastic at a great price!
body: Love these! Excellent quality product, very good sound quality, fantastic battery life & multiple size ear buds. I use these both for general listening & while working out & they have performed very well.

title: I'm loving my upgrade!
body:
I had gotten some real cheap wireless (though not true wireless) headphones on here before that lasted forever. They are still going strong but due to heavy use and possible damage, they were becoming a little spotty, so I needed to replace them. These headphones, I'm pleased to say, are keeping up, so far, with my old fave pair!

The cons I'll go after first and all are minor or personal preference. They do feel a bit weighty in my ears, even with different cushions. It can cause part of my outer ear to ache slightly but that is after lots of hours of use. The other thing is the pairing, since the Left has to connect to the Right and can sometimes mess up due to other things they are connected to (my phone and comp will sometimes push the Left earbud out of connection) so I just have change a setting every once in awhile.

The pros are that the case holds great charge and saves me in case I forget to plug them in. The buds themselves have a long life too, so charging everyday or every other day isn't always necessary. They have a great feel to them as well, the buds and case don't feel flimsy or cheap.

Definitely a great buy, glad I didn't try for a different, higher priced brand.

title: Sucks for phone calls, fine for music if it fits
body: I've only used these a couple times so far. I have the smallest ear pieces on and it still barely fits properly. I feel that if I actually run, instead if cleaning the house or taking a shower, that I will constantly have to adjust to make sure I don't lose one. My music sounds great but my friends say on phone calls, they can barely hear me or that I sound far away. It picks up all the background noises better than my voice. I'll give them a few more days before I complain or send them back. Probably wont make a difference.

title: Better than AirPods
body: My brother told me about these  HE said they were better than AirPods and he's right  They're comfortable and feel secure not like they're about fall out  Sound quality is really good and to be honest I sometimes forget they are in my ears Great Product and worth the price

title: Price and Quality of item.
body: Just got it and was easy to pair... It's friggin smarter than me, like literally it pairs itself. Dang!  Sounds good so far, I like my bass a bit deep with clarity. I'm a bit picky when it comes down to sound in my head/earphones so this one def impressed me. I always buy duplicate of things I love , so i Will buy another to have on the side.

title: A perfect choice for work out
body: I have 3 pairs of earbuds from different companies. I was not satisfied with any of them because even though sound quality is reasonably good, they use to fall down easily. I just wanted to give a try one last time and I went ahead buying T10 this time. To my surprise, these earbuds are excellent on every front. They sound good, They fit perfectly into my ears, they are easy to connect. battery life is good. All this is 45$ price which is 1/4th of what apple charges you for airpods which are mediocre to say the least. All in all, Just go for T10.

title: Decent quality for a good price
body: When opening the box, it seemed surprisingly better quality than I expected. Upon closer inspection however, you can see it is indeed cheap Chinese manufacturing. These are Bluetooth earphones under 50$ though, so that is to be expected. It comes with 3 sizes of ear buds, the smallest being the only one that fits me, and even so I’m constantly adjusting them to stay in my ears. It’s a minor nuisance but a nuisance nonetheless. Regarding sound quality, there’s way too much bass, it drowns out the mids and highs but not enough to completely ruin the experience. I use these solely for the gym, so it’s not a big deal to me, but I don’t use them any other time. Battery life is pretty good. I use these about 1.5-2hrs per day, 5-6 days a week on one charge. So roughly 9-12 hrs span for my usage. There’s no controls on the device themselves to adjust volume from what I can see, and the button is on the lateral portion of the earbud, so if you try to turn them off/on in your ear, you’re going to dig it deeper and cause some pain or discomfort. They are waterproof which is why I bought them, I sweat profusely and have ruined headphones before. So far they’ve held up just fine. Lastly, I clean my ears regularly, but since I have to shove them in so far just to maintain position, they accumulate ear wax and it grosses me out. All in all, you get what you pay for and they’re not that bad. However I would not recommend them for anything other than use for exercising.

title: Ear buds 100%
body: These are absolutely amazing!!! My son asked for AirPods.  I don’t have that kind of money to spend. I read all the reviews on these and went for it! My son is so happy with these I can’t thank you enough because once again I’m the best mom ever!!! I highly recommend this company and these ear buds!! The customer service is so kind. They check in on you to see if your happy with the product. Not to many company’s do that!

title: So Far I'm Impressed
body: So I just got these yesterday, but what I noticed immediately was the sound quality.  I literally only had my volume turned up by *1* and the sound was clear, and louder than expected.  For that, I love them more than my regular "plug in" headphones.  I have to use the smallest earbud pieces, but they fit nice in my ears and don't feel like their falling out of my ears.  My true test with that will be running, as I really got these for running, but with the way they feel I'm thinking that won't be an issue.  For now I can't speak to any battery life, but they were super easy to pair to my phone, and the case they go into for charging is quite sturdy.  I can toss it into my gym bag or purse without worry.  When you put the earbuds into the charging case, it's magnetic, so they plop right in and stay put.  For now, I'm definitely impressed with these!!

title: Quality product but beware
body:
I'll admit I rely on reviews pretty heavily when considering an Amazon purchase. So when I found myself on the market for a pair of wireless Bluetooth earbuds, I was immediately drawn to these. Lots of reviews and (at the time) four and a half stars. That grabs your attention. This device had everything I was looking for. What I wasn't aware of at the time is that this company offers a free wireless charging station to those that purchase their product and leave a five star review. I have to say that is an extremely dubious way of inflating your positive five-star reviews. So don't be like me and rely too heavily on these reviews.

Having said that, I like the product a lot. They're great. They're comfortable. The sound is awesome. I haven't had them long enough to test the battery life, but so far, great. I disagree strongly with their manipulation of Amazon's review system.

title: An Emerging Tech to have
body:
As a comparison with the Logitech Jaybird Vista with a IPX7, This is almost 1/4 the price of a consumer brand true wireless earbuds.

Sound quality is standard, but can use a EQ program on the connected device to make the experience little enjoyable.

The noise cancellation should be a "staple" (standard) to all true wireless which this have, but it does not have mic monitoring ( ambient sounds) that should be in all true wireless earbuds.

Battery life is enough for a normal use with the case as an additional battery life. It could do better with an upgrade of the charging plug from usb-b to USB type C and the chipset to have it charge the earbuds quicker. No need for rechargable lithium battery, NIMH is fine unless the weight of the battery matters.

The button click presets should be customizable and also should have a programable app on the connected devices. Only way is to put a better chipset in this product and have a detection alert if away from the connected device so if it gets lost or misplaced. Love all carrying cases with a holder for attachment which this has, also like the case to be less bulky if it could.

It is lightweight and should include those ear-guards for better grip and comfort, I separately bought eartips with a different material (cloud foam "memory foam") for in-ear grip/comfort and sound difference.

Most/all true wireless earbuds doesn't connect properly, having to putting it back in the case or pressing/holding a button to reset one of them. That should be something to look at and also I suggest a very low latency in sound connectivity if possible.

title: Great earphones, better with foam earbuds.
body: These earbuds are great quality and work well. I am usually not a fan of earbuds since they fall out most of the time when I am working out. I tried the different sizes and these earbuds also started to fall out, so I bought ear tips which were irritating. Finally I tried foam earbuds which work really well since they expand once they're in your ear. I don't use these earbuds often, but I do have to charge them about 1-2 times a week. Other than that these earbuds are great

title: Superior product at Great Price
body: The product is excellent. The sound quality is impressive and are really waterproof. I love that I can charge them wireless, so easy and no need to plug in the cable every time you need to charge them, I just put the case over the same charger I use for my iPhone and done. Love the magnetic lock that the buds have so you can open the case without caring that one of them will fall. When I bought the TOZO earbuds I also bought another very expensive brand that has no magnetic lock nor wireless charging, (big mistake) I ended up using the TOZO ones by default.

title: Nice product - Ear Buds too Big
body:
The noise canceling feature is great, sound quality is good. I plan on returning this product, as it has been sitting in the case after trying it for 24hrs.
 The ear buds are too big, even at its smallest diameter. This is made for someone who has a large ear canal. I switched out all buds but it falls out even with slight bending  or turning your head. Its ashame.

title: Perfect to walk my dog
body:
I use these headphones to take my dog out for a walk.  Not sure if it is the headphones, the audio book or the dog, but I get to walk way more than before!  It cancels the street noise, however I can be aware of my surroundings.  They are also very comfortable in my ears once I found the right fit.  Also, they charge easy and quick.
I wish they were a little less bulky, because they look like antennas coming out of my ears.  Other than that, I'm very pleased!
And.. if I leave this review, they will gift me a wireless charger :)

title: Wowzers
body:
Wow. Iam truly impressed. Normally I spend $50-100 on a pair of nice quality wired earbuds but I figured that since I hate carrying around a separate cord(and I keep losing it) for my iPhone I would try some Bluetooth earbuds...

Sound quality is very nice and rich. I would say that these are the perfect rap/hip-hop earbuds. The bass is deep and hits very well. While you can definitely enjoy some other genres. I feel the bass slightly overpowers some delicate guitar riffs and snare sessions; sometimes even a singer with a deep voice can seem too deep. But all in all I really could not ask for a better set of earbuds; especially at this price. Keep up the good work guys!

title: They stopped taking a charge.
body:
Great start with them but after about 3 weeks the right earbud stop taking a change. Then I was just using the left earbud then that one stop charging. Tried charging wireless and plug the case in the case showed charged but the buds would not charge...
They are cheap and useless.

title: Great product
body: Awesome sound quality, I wear while working in the yard and they block out 80% of noise. Also they work great in the shower.  I really like how comfortable these ear buds are and so light weight. The sound quality is really good also. Great product.

title: Great sound, excellent fit
body: Everything about this ear bud is outstanding. The sound has great midrange and bass, the 5.0 Bluetooth reachability is amazing, the ear fit is perfect and the case battery life and wireless charging technology is excellent!!! Being waterproof is a big bonus.. I use it on the jacuzzi with confidence while doing my hot water therapy. The technology of this product is soooo far more superior to that of JBL Free (which I returned by the way after using the TOZO T10).  This is now my headphone of choice while watching movie on my IPad in bed, instead of my Bose QC35 II.  Great for outdoor hikes as well. I just wish TOZO will send me another one of these as a New Year present ...lol

title: Truely phenomenal engineering work
body: Earbuds fits the ear pretty well compared to the other earbuds I have used before. Sound quality is phenomenal. Signal distortion is next to zero. I tried swimming with these but practically you can’t listen to music while swimming because the signal bounces off when your head is in the water. I recommend wearing a single earplug in the side where your head comes off the water for breathing. The other side will get disconnected since it rarely comes out of the water. Not to mention that I was using the front crawl swimming technique. In general as long as you keep your head above water, the earplugs will work fine. Battery life is pretty reliable and probably holds the record for being one of the best earbuds battery life I have ever dealt with. Also, the two sides get paired immediately and sometimes it struggles to detect the phone. A simple restart can easily solve the problem. By so far, the only concern is that it pauses automatically without any user inferences. It has not been a huge hazzle but hope it won’t get any worse.

title: Basic functinalities are missing.
body:
Let me start by saying that when you pay $50 for a product made in china, you expect some features and quality at least.
I have tried resetting the device twice and was still seeing the issues below.

Pros
- Good Sound Quality
- Wireless charging

Cons
- If you need to use one bud you can't charge the other one, as soon as other bud goes into charging case, connection is lost and there is no sound in the other one. I tried with both
left and  right. It does work if you are not charging the other one but I don't see think that is useful.
- You have to pair them every time you take them out of the case. It just forgets the paired devices.
- Since one of them is primary which makes the connection and other kind of connects to primary, there are small sound gaps on secondary one where the sound is completely lost.
- If the device you have paired the buds with is on the left side of your body, buds start cracking and the device is within 10m.

title: Excelent product. Satisfied
body:
I love it.
Excellent product, I had bought another brand that were a total loss, but these fascinating me, happier impossible. Thank you.

title: Left ear drops constantly!
body:
Great sound and volume but the headphones keep cutting out on the left side. It’s very annoying!
I don’t know if this is common or I’ve got a busted pair. If I cover the right side with my hand it kills the signal. I’ve noticed if I move my head in certain ways, like drinking a beverage, they cut out. They even cut out if I tilt my head sometimes.
I don’t see these working for someone who wants to work out!
This could be a 5 star rating if this can be fixed.

title: So Far, They are Great!
body: Got my earbuds 2 days ago and my biggest concern from the reviews was the fit.  The first time I put them in, I followed the directions and they fit snug.  Pandora sound quality is great and volume is good.  Have only made one phone call with them and they say it sounded good on their end.  Will update later, but so far I am very pleased!

title: Left and Right Cutting Out
body: Got them to use while working out. They arrived Saturday and I started using them on Monday. Thought they were a bit bulky for my small ears but using the smallest ear tips gave me a good comfortable fit. By Wednesday morning while using only the right earbud I noticed my music kept cutting out while sitting at my desk with my phone beside me. I then connected the left and both kept cutting out. Disconnected and reconnected them and the same thing kept happening. They are now cutting out for longer periods. It is so annoying! I would have been so mad had it happened while I was at the gym!

title: Terrific product
body: Gave this item as a gift and was well received. The person indicated they are Very happy with the sound quality and battery life...along with the fact it's an awesome piece of technology!

title: Easy to use and great sound
body: I ordered these ear buds and they came really quick.  They charge very easy and quickly.  After charging them, I synced them to each other. That was easy to do too. Then I set them up on my Fitbit. They work great and have amazing sound. I use them for working out. They are waterproof so no worries about them getting  sweaty.  I also use them for my tablet to listen to audiobooks. So glad I bought these!

title: Best Sound For Price Range
body:
Upgraded from Tozo T8’s that I lost.

The first set i received had connectivity issues. Amazon had another set delivered two days later and these are AMAZING.

The quality of the case and earphones are superb. Didn’t expect much better than the T8’s but these T10’s surpassed my expectations.

title: Amazing quality
body: These buds are better than all the high price junk on the market. I bought over priced Raycon buds. Worst buds I ever purchased.

title: Perfect Package!
body: I LOVE these ear buds!  I cut grass and weed eat and I can hear the music loud and clear!  I love the charging case too.  Very convenient and I never have to go looking for them.  They are the perfect package SOUND, STORE, CHARGE

title: Puts out great sound
body: I use this product at work as I sit and key in data for 8 hours. I also wear a headset at times that covers my left ear, so I am able to use the right Tozo Earbud & still take calls when needed. It comes with different size buds so you can change them out if you need them bigger or smaller. And the price does not kill the wallet either.

title: Great headphones.
body: These headphones are by far one of the best headphones I’ve ever had. They pair immediately upon removal from base with phone and/or with the other pair. I can have a normal conversation with the person on the phone without talking loudly. I wish they were an option to purchase a single one because I lost the left pair, my fault . 5 star though.

title: Cant listen when my phone is in my pocket or bag
body: I keep having these earbuds go in and out when my phone is in my pocket. This is extremely annoying as they are wireless thus meant to be enjoyed hands free. I keep having to hold my phone as I walk nearly up to my face to be able to keep the buds from trying to disconnect. I also have had problems with the buds only half connected if I take one out of my ear for a moment, leaving me with only one earbud for the rest of my gym workout until I can get back to my locket and put them back into their box to reconnect. I wish I could like these more but I charge them daily and I am still having trouble with them dropping connection throughout the day.

title: For the Price, Not a Bad Deal
body: Generally speaking, not a bad product for the price. I was not overly impressed with the sound quality. It is definitely clear and the tone is correct, but for music, it can become a little garbled and the bass quality is so-so. Battery only lasts about 4 hours, so for me, who wears them at work, I'll use one at a time and always have one charging. They sit well in the ear. I have not had them pop out yet. And I haven't had any issues with the connection. Easy to pair. Easy to operate. Overall, for the price, not a bad deal.

title: Almost perfect Bluetooth Earbuds
body:
Good product I recommend them. These bluetooth earbuds are almost perfect the only thing a didn’t like is that you cannot adjust the volume in the earbuds it self, you need to controlled the volume only from the unit is connected too.
So if you're not close to the unit you cannot lower your volume.
Waterproof and truly wireless. They’re easy to pair, not difficult to understand how to work them. I used them for everything Gym, running cleaning the house and even when I vacuum and I cannot hear the outside noise.
So far I am very happy with them looking forward to much more enjoyment!

title: Easy to Pair!
body:
These headphones just arrived today and while I have not been able to test the sound quality yet, they have thus far been great. They were not fully charged when they arrived but charged enough to pair to my iPhone and Macbook Air. Pairing was fast and easy to do.

I am experiencing some minor sound interference when these are paired to my laptop but I am in an office with many other Bluetooth gadgets - headphones, keyboards, speakers, etc.
I did have an interference issue on my iPhone X but a restart of my phone fixed it :)

Great price and great quality!

title: Very satisfying!!!!!
body: Now that I had a few months to use this amazing earbuds I have to say they deserve a 5 out 5 am really happy with the output of music and performance of this device. The first week I was not to happy my left bud didn't wanna connect or stay connect properly I was about to return them until later some how the problem when way and seen then I have to say I cant be more happy with this earbuds

title: Amazing product that you'll love to use every day!
body:
I love them. They work independently and together.... it's easy to sync them to your phone.

The sound is great nice loud and clear... the mic is t the best but people said they can hear me clearly.

Automatically connect to your phone as soon as you take then out of the box. Plus the box has plenty of charge.

Definitely worth the purchase. Also customer service is very friendly and helpful.

title: Summer days with my Tozo T10
body: Summer days are here. My Tozo T10 wireless earbuds are excellent for the pool! The sound quality is fantastic. The base is rich and the volume is loud. I spent weeks researching my choice, and it payed off. I’m very happy I chose the Tozo T10, the absolute best bang for the buck!!!

title: Battery life
body:
I bought this to use it while I'm in the Gym and thought I could use it for travel in the plane as well, but no, the battery life sucks.
Maybe can last for 3-3.5 hours max.
One thing I hated when used it on the plane while I travel, is no wire at all you can plug into if the battery life is low, it kept on telling you the battery life is low, need to be charge, and saying it over and over and over again.
But if you only use it while you are in the gym, this is perfect, that is why I'm giving it 4 stars.

title: Premuim build. Budget price
body: So far so good. It feels really premuim and has  lots of accessories included. At first mine felt like it was falling out but I changed the eartip and I am starting to get used to it. Easy to pair love the look will buy again also has a 1 year warranty.

title: Excellent earbuds for the price
body:
First thing I noticed was the look and feel of these earbuds give off a quality built product.

The earbuds automatically turn on when removed from the case. After inserting them into my ear and rotating them into place, they felt very secure. Both earbuds proceed to tell you that they connect to each other as a pair and once syncd via Bluetooth to your phone, will say Device Connected. When you put the earbuds back in the case they automatically disconnect from your device and turn off to be charged.

As far as sound, there is a great balance between bass and all around sound quality. If I had to rate the sound quality, I would say it’s between a skull candy bass earbuds and Dre Beats ear bud.

The case itself being a charger is awesome and it has plenty of indicator lights showing you that it’s charging and how much battery life is in the case before it needs to be recharged.

The Vendor was also very proactive in making sure everything was working properly and that there were no issues.

Overall I’m very impressed with these earbuds at such a great price. Definitely worth the money.

title: Short
body: I like the way the product sounds and performs but the headphones are constantly cutting out while wearing them. They appear to have a short. They have done this since day one. I would like to return them but am apparently outside of the return window. Would not suggest buying this product.

title: Good headphones for on the go.
body:
Pros: Nice case, easy to charge and connect. Having almost no wires except for the charging cable to the box makes it a very nice pair of portable headphones. My last pair of bluetooth headphones are connected physically by a wire, and this often get in the way or was uncomfortable. This pair is comfortable in the ear and very small.

Cons: Sound quality is average at best. My last pair I bought 2 years ago for only $20 and had much better sound quality. I'm a little disappointed that at this price these weren't at least a little better in this regard. Everything sounds a little muted coming through.

Overall I'm still pretty happy with it, and for moving about or the need to be discreet (at work), these are excellent.

title: Can Not Be Heard
body: I bought the Tozo T10. I have been using them for a week. When I answer a call, the caller says he/she can't hear me as I am "muffled". Using them outdoors is even worse. Also, when listening to music or a book the earphones lose the connection and must be reinitiated. Happens about every 15 minutes. I am very disappointed in these and can't imagine why their reviews are so positive.

title: Good sound, terrible latency
body: I wanted to like these, but I don't.  The sound is good, the bass is punchy.  For strictly music, they are a great set of bluetooth ear buds.  However, I watch a good amount of video on my laptop and the audio latency is very bad.  My previous set of bluetooth earbuds were the Taotronics TT-BH026, these use Bluetooth 4.2 and have significantly less latency with video content. I will likely be returning the Tozo earbuds.

title: First set had disappointing battery life
body:
Update: Customer service was very responsive to the battery issue I was experiencing. The replacement case does seem to hold a charge longer than the previous one. I would definitely recommend these earbuds.

These earbuds are fine if you get them on sale, but they're not worth full price. They connect well and the sound quality is quite good. They are not very ergonomic, sticking all the way out of your ears and only contacting by the tips. And the battery life of the case is very poor, closer to 300mAh than the 600mAh advertised. My set was replaced and I'll update my review if there is an improvement in battery life.

title: Great Product
body: I have the 8 and love it so  I just the 10. Only have a few days but just as good. Only thing I would change is case it's a bit bigger then the 8. But overall it's a Great product and the people who work there are soooooo nice.Good buy

title: Great sound
body: Great sound quality with music and calls. Battery life could be better but if charges wirelessly and the case will change them a few times before needing charging.

title: Much better than I was expecting...
body: Worked just fine with my phone (Samsung S10+) and my PC.  I can hear myself breathe sometimes, but I'm assuming that's just a normal thing (first earbuds I've ever used).  The sound is great and they are completely comfortable.  The only odd bit is that it will NOT wirelessly charge using the wireless charger I use for my phone.  It gives no indication that it can wirelessly charge at all, no matter where I put it on the charger.  It does charge just fine using the included USB cable though.  Weird.  The manual could be improved by explaining what the four blue charging lights in the case mean.

title: Left Earbud Issue
body: These are excellent! AirPods don’t fit me AT ALL and are not made with decent quality. However, the left earbud goes in and out on the Tozo T10. I thought it was because of me using my old iPhone 7, but when I got my iPhone 11, the problem persisted. I will update after the customer service experience .

title: Sound is amazing!
body: This is my first pair of wireless earbuds and I was  unsure if I would like them or not. I love them! They connect easily with my phone and laptop (after reading the instructions about connecting the main earbud first!) and they sound great. The sound that comes out of them is very clear with good beats. I would definitely recommend them to anyone looking to try out wireless earbuds without spending the big bucks for Beats or Apple. Well worth the price!

title: 3 days in right ear bud stopped charging
body: Loved the sound, but not the length of charging capability of one of the earbuds. Had them for maybe two days... got them on a Thursday and the right one stopped charging after maybe the third wearing. I contacted seller and was instructed to do several basic common sense things I had already attempted. Thus far disappointed.

title: Stopped charging after 6 months.
body: Broke after 6 months. They worked well before then, although the battery life was rather underwhelming. They had some issues staying in my ear. All this is overshadowed, though, by the fact that the case stopped charging after 6 months, and since the case is the only way to charge them this makes them entirely useless.

title: Sound better than AirPods!
body: These earbuds sound amazing!  Not only do they provide amazing sound quality, but they also come with multiple adapters to make them fit tight in any size ear!  I’m a long distance runner and I like the fact that they are completely water proof.  My previous earbuds were water resistant, but once I started to sweat, they failed to produce sound, which halted my running or work out.  I also love the fact that I never have to use a charging cable with these T10s because of the wireless charging feature!  I have not had a chance to test this, but will update my review once I do.  For anyone on the fence about purchasing these, you won’t find better sound, fit, and quality earbuds here on Amazon.

title: Pretty good!
body:
Pretty good. Definitely better than AirPods. I think this is a problem with bluetooth headsets in general - they sometimes have a hard time staying in.

But overall, for $50 they have pretty great sound quality. They’re also waterproof so I shower in these. The only time I’ve had to worry about battery is when I forget to put them back in the charging case throughout the day. If you’re not forgetful like me you’ll be fine. And even if you are I just throw them in the charging case and then wait 30 min before they’re fully charged again.

title: Best product and customer service
body: The stereo sound is awesome!!! Fits comfortably in my ears, most importantly they stand by their product by offering a warranty option. I wish I had known about Tozo before I purchased my first earbuds.....when the charging case stopped charging I reached out to the manufacturer many times have never received a call/text/email to this day compared to Tozo with excellent communication I am a happy customer

title: Sound quality, bass and noise cancellation
body: The bass, sound quality, and noise cancellation aspects are all super impressive especially for the price. My first pair of wireless ear buds were the jabra ones for like 160 at the time and I bought these at around 50 bucks and these are just amazing I can jump rope and move around with them on and they stay in like a dream. I had to change out the size to fit my ear better but they are amazing and easily worth a 5 star rating I'm super impressed by these.

title: A great product
body: My co worker had this, and I liked it because it was personal light and portable. I wasn't so sure about the sound, until I bought it, and the surround sound like system that it possesses blew me away. Only thing it lacked was a longer duration (mine lasts for about 2-3 hours watching a movie, but longer listening to music). This is perfect for traveling or watching a personal show or movie with out disturbance, the sound cancellation is superb. I would suggest this to anyone, you won't be disappointed.

title: These are my favorite out of 3 different brands I tried
body:
I've bought and tried 3 different allbeit similar styles all about the same price on here give or take 5-10$. These are my favorite.

 The case is slightly larger and made of a higher quality plastic that others and feels good in your hand, as in you aren't going to drop it handling it.

The voice that talks to you speaks comprehensive English which is nice. Pulling the earbuds out and putting in your ear tells you it is connected left to right and then tells you it's synced to your device. Other models I tried had broken or incomprehensive English akin to Chinese restaurant menus attempting to tell you what your earbuds are doing.

The case has a nice cover over the charging port, as well as the case being capable of charging your device about 4 times. The lid for the case also has 3 small magnets that keep the lid closed.

The earbuds, are comfortable, stay in my ears and comes with different size gromets for other size of ears. I have worn these at work, rock climbing (inverted), at the gym. Never once having them fall out.

Another feature I liked that is unlike other styles is the waterproof buttons (one on each ear) is a physical button, not a soft touch button (think Xbox one power button) the difference being with this style I don't unintentionally pause my music when my shoulder grazes my ear at the gym or stretching. It's a nice feature, taking a deliberate action to pause or make a phone call ensures you won't get the Bluetooth equivalent of a butt dial.

title: Excellent bluetooth earbuds!
body: Have had these earbuds for around a month now and they're fantastic. Great sound and bass, IPX8 water resistant and a great overall value! I'm not afraid of running in the rain with these on and I've tried giving the earbuds a rinse under water and it still worked! Wow! These things rival more expensive product on the market.

title: Good sound for the price
body: The earbuds connected to each other and to my phone as advertised. It took a few tries to find the best fitting pads, but after that the listening experience was excellent.
