My only complaint is that the bass levels are not as loud as the mid range and highs, but for the price the sound is very good.

title: GREAT PRICE GREAT QUALITY AND NICE SOUND!
body: I took a chance buying these because I was looking at much higher price wireless earbuds ,but when I received them they really surprised me with great packaging and presentation and when I tried them out I was very very pleased with the great sound and very good noise cancellation and great battery life.i give the tozo T10 a solid 10 if I could.oh did I forget IPX8 WATERPROOF! VERY NICE!.YOU CANT GO WRONG WITH THESE EARBUDS.

title: Poor sound quality, good construction
body: When first opening the box, I was impressed by the quality of both the earbuds and the charging case. I have also been impressed by the battery life, which has been much better than my previous pair of Bluetooth headphones. However, the sound quality is quite poor. It's extremely tinny sounding and has poor range as well. Better options can be found out there

title: Sound is terrific, but control is another story.
body:
I mainly use these earbuds for listening to music.  They are terrific.

I tried them to make phone call, but the person on the end was complaining poor quality.

Here are the breakdowns of pros/cons:

** PRO **
- Sound is terrific

** CON **
- Phone conversation is not so great.
- No rewind, skip, or volume control.
- If you have small ears, these earbuds do stick out.
- Slow bluetooth connectivity.  It took awhile for earbuds automatically connect to my Galaxy Note 9.
- Bluetooth connectivity is often choppy when the RIGHT earbud is not close AND/OR in the line of sight with your smart devices, such smartphone, smartwatch, etc.  Whenever my Galaxy Note 9 is on the left AND/OR behind me as well as my Fitbit Versa, the bluetooth connectivity is weak.  To resolve this, swap your earbuds where the RIGHT earbud is in your left ear.

title: good quality sound  and comfortable
body: I like the quality of the sound and comfortable fit of these earbuds. Easy charging case, though putting in charging wire could be easier. Thus far i truly enjoy this product.

title: No Volume Control
body:
Connected these to my fire stick, which is why I purchased it so I can watch tv while my husband is sleeping. The volume on the ToZo was extremely loud. I wasn’t able to adjust it not even with the tv or fire stick remote. The volume can only be controlled when connected to your phone or tablet. I bought this on Prime Day thinking I was getting a good deal and Paid $49.99 with $3 off but found out other purchase this for around $25/$30. Two stars because they work find when connected to a phone or table but that’s not what I purchased them for.

UPDATE REVIEW...
This is an update. TOZO Customer service is wonderful they reached out to me to rectify the issue. They issued another TOZO Bluetooth. The previous one works great with my devices just not with my smart tv. Haven’t tried the new one yet but Will keep you posted.  Thanks TOZO

title: "Combination of features I'm really happy with..."
body:
I really like the multiple size choices. I have very small ear canals and it was nice to find ear buds that won't fall out easily. I love that I can exercise (yoga, Palate) and not have anything flopping on my neck. I also like the way the ear buds look...small and not noticeable. So far, so good. Connection is not hard. I love the charging case. Sound is good, but I'm not really picky as long as the sound is clear and consistent. I've been very happy so far.
UPDATE : I bought a second pair for my husband and he uses the largest ear buds. It's nice that we can both have a pair that fit us well and work well. Again, so far, so good.

title: Great for the hearing impaired! (If you can get them to hold a charge)
body:
Addendum to my review below:  I am so sad that after a few days of use, I can’t seem to get these to hold a charge for any length of time!  The directions you get with this product are pretty worthless—definitely translated from Chinese—and  they don’t go out at the same time.  One goes out, then works for a while, then here goes the other one.  When they both work, the sound is truly amazing.  I’m SO disappointed! I thought I had finally found the answer to my need for increased volume, but they seem to always need to be on the charger.  I’m changing my rating from a 5 to a 1
I have a hearing loss and wear hearing aids. Other Bluetooth collars I’ve had were difficult for me to hear music/Audible books because maximum volume wasn’t enough if there was any outside noise at all. I am so happy that I can hear with my new Tozos!!

title: Surpassed expectations while being the best bang for your buck.
body: I was sceptical about most things, particularly the waterproof part of the earphones as I was unable to find any testing of any sort online and only saw negative reviews about it. However, I can testify that after using these in the shower as the manual said I could, I was surprised to see that it was still working after constant exposure to water. The audio quality is excellent with minimal complaint. There are few minor quality of life changes such as changing songs and the volume with the buttons that I would like to see but other than that it is a great product that I would recommend or buy for others.

title: Great headphones!
body: One of the reasons there are so many great reviews is that you can get a free wireless charger if you write a review, so here's mine. I like these - they are exactly what I expected given the reviews. The only negative - I wish the USB cord fit into the carrying case so I wouldn't lose it. Sound quality is great and I haven't had issues yet (I've only had them a few days).

title: Awesome wireless earbuds
body: All as stated, easy setup , good price, fast shipping , works great !!!! Will be using it while driving motorhome, airline flights and car rides.

title: Completely STOPPED functioning after 2 months.
body:
The earbuds were decent while they lasted. The left earbud would intermittently cut in and out, and got significantly worse as time went on (against my thought that it was originally just a software glitch, this problem sounds more hardware-related).

Also the earbuds randomly activated while in the charging case, so sometimes the earbuds would turn on and remain on and completely drain themselves and the case charge. At a certain point (inconveniently outside of the return window), the left earbud now completely fails to charge when placed in the charging case dock.

I do NOT recommend these earbuds.

title: Great product for less money
body: These are awesome.  I figured I’d try these before spending a lot of money on Apple ear buds . I’m glad I did. They sound great, fit comfortably in my ears, easy to connect, and charge fast and easy in the case. I would highly recommend these.

title: Suprisingly good noise cancelling
body:
Context: Wanted headphones to use at work and when going for walks/bike rides.

I changed the rubber ear socket to a slightly larger size and found it fitted perfect, recommend to test different sizes before you commit to one.

The noise cancelling is surprisingly good, I could barely hear the person talking next to me even with no music.

The base is strong, I think because of the great acoustic seal the ear buds make. So its not having to work too hard, allowing the base to have a lot of clarity. There is good acoustic clarity in the higher spectrum as well.

I still need to test more in different environments but so far I'm impressed overall especially at this price range.

Also the boot up time and auto sync between L and R is great.

title: Good sound and deal for the money
body: I like these, but they were hard to sync at first. Just takes a bit of patience, I would not wear them swimming, they say waterproof,  But that is not the problem. The problem is they fit loose in the ear they would fall out easily. I do light workouts on treadmills and do weights and they do fine but if you are doing somersaults flipping around for anything super extraneous out get something with more secure holdings

title: Not for exercise
body: If you plan to do anything besides sit in a chair typing these are NOT for you.  Have run these through their paces and they CONSTANTLY fall out of my ears.  I have tried all 4 sizes of included soft attachments and none of them stay in place during even light movement.  Its fine if you're doing weights but during running, jumping, even pushups they constantly slide out and i have had several ear aches from constantly jamming them back into place.  Sound is average, battery life is good, and durability is good (because they fall from my ears regularly and haven't broken yet form hitting the floor).  As soon as i submit this I will be ordering a different set that won't constantly be falling out and these will just be for sitting at the computer.

title: Great Sound, great fit!
body: Love the dynamic range of these headphones. The sound is superior. Love the fit: encourage new users to take time to fit the correct size of earbuds, which may need to be different for each ear. Also, pay attention to how they should be fitted each time. Tozo provides both written and video instructions for this.

title: Returning my master & dynamic for these, need I say more!
body: Great sound( frequencies, sound stage, sound balance). What I found is, depending on the phone it is paired with will affect the Suns quality. iPhone XS Max with google music ( highest streaming) bass was overwhelming, but with a music app that adjusts the EQ , you can these earbuds sound great. With Samsung Note 10, it Is great with no adjustments. Bought master&dynamics, more going to return the $300 earbuds for a $50 pair. If sound quality matters over features, try these.  The only problem I have with them is the fit, the tips are too bulky for my ear, can’t get a solid fit all the time, but when I do, oh boy, great sound.

title: Sounds amazing but has function issues
body: Simply walking around they loose connectivity in the left ear. When I contacted tozo they said it's because the human body has a magnetic field and disrupts the connection. Sorry. Also I've noticed they will be sitting in my truck and they will randomly connect to my phone inside the house and I've tried to turn them off manually this makes the battery case die fast so they never really hold a good charge.

title: Seems nice but they does not work good 👎
body: When This headphones arrived they looks like a very good product but once I start using them the lefty one is faking every second is imposible to listen the music like this I’ve contact the seller but no one answer me back I’m returning them back

title: I really loved them but now the charging case isn't working
body:
I really loved these ear phones. They fit in my ears perfectly (small ears).
They're kind of bulky but still not too bad (I think because I have small ears)
The ear phones themselves hold a long charge. I use them at the gym and at work.

After a few months the charging case went out. I only holds one charge before I have to recharge the case again (the case use to last me two or three days and now not even one day). Which doesn't give the ear phones enough time to get a full charge.

title: I've never experienced BASS like I have with these before!
body:
So I actually bought some airpods about a year ago and was disappointed by the sound quality, the lack of bass and lack of noise cancellation. I got the TOZO T10 based on the great reviews and have to say that it has been the best purchase I've made in terms of headphones. The bass is OUT OF THIS WORLD, I'm a bass player and can listen to every single note with clarity. The battery life is great, I never run out of it and also the charging case gives me around 4 full charges.
If anyone wants to purchase true wireless headphone I would definitely do these ones. My girlfriend tried them and she is getting hers as well.

title: Great product and costumer service
body:
Received my Toxo-T10 earlier this week and im not only impressed with the design but also the sound quality these little things provide

They are easily compatible to my old Beats by Dre which after 1 year of use they gave out. Safe to say I will never purchase Beats ever again.

These TOZO wireless earbuds work flawlessly in pairing with my mobile device. I love the black design and especially the portable charging case. My gym workouts have been pleasant once again especially with these new earbuds from TOZO

Thanks again for the great product at an affordable price.

PS. I still haven’t charged them since I got them last week and they’re still going hard.

title: They continually fall out
body: The sound on these are great and so is the noise cancellation, but I wear them in the gym and they fall out EVERY TIME I USE THEM. I have tried everything to keep them in, I have also tried every size that comes with the earbuds, but none of them seem to stay in my ears. I am going to have to bite the bullet and buy another pair that doesn't fall out which is really disappointing.

title: NOT FOR SMALL EARS!!!
body: I am sure these headphones work just fine, but they don't even fit in my ears.  I have very small ears.  Giving them to my boyfriend, as it isn't even worth the hassle of returning them, but sad that I can't use these.

title: Exactly what I wanted
body: I recently purchased the TOZO T10 earbuds.  I've used wireless headsets before, but they always felt "clunky" when I was working in the yard or hiking.  These arrived right on time.  They were almost fully charged when they arrived.  As expected, they came with extra ear buds so you can find your perfect fit, but mine fit just right straight out of the box.  I work from home, and I keep a wireless charging pad on my desk - I really like that I can charge the TOZO earbuds wirelessly - and they charge FAST!  Great sound quality using them with my phone or with my FitBit.  Very comfortable and stable.  I haven't really tried their water resistance yet (I will this summer) but I haven't had any problems with them wanting to slip out of my ears no matter what I'm doing.  Really couldn't be happier with the product.

title: Amazing earphones!!! Definitely worth the price!
body: I got tired of using wired earphones because they break on me really easily, so I was looking for wireless earphones that will last me a long time. I'm not going to lie; I was really apprehensive before buying these earphones because I've never spent more than $20 on earphones and I was afraid of making a wrong investment. After looking through several wireless earphones, I decided to settle on these Tozo ones due to the overall positive reviews. I LOVE THESE EARPHONES! I love how I can't hear any outside noise when I have these on, so the noise cancellation aspect of these earphones is excellent. I was afraid that these earphones won't be able to withstand high volumes, but to my satisfaction, whatever you're listening to can get very loud if you want to increase the volume. When it comes to earphones, I don't care for the bass quality much, thus I prefer a clean sound. However, I immediately noticed these earphones have a good amount of bass for those who appreciate it while the sound still sounds clear. One thing I don't like about wireless earphones is that they often need to be charged, but these earphones charge quite quickly and easily. They automatically fit into their respective spots inside the charging box, and the box is small and compact enough that you can take it anywhere. I'd say one whole charge would last about three hours, maybe, and it doesn't take long for the earphones to charge up. For those worried about the earphones hurting or not fitting their ears, there are different sized tips, so you can try on each one and find the right size. These earphones also stay in your ears even if you dance and jump around a lot like how I do. I really like these earphones!!! I'm planning to buy another pair for my mother as a surprise gift as she appreciates a good set of earphones. I recommend you try these earphones!!!

title: Excellent Wireless Earbuds!!
body: These earbuds are fabulous.  The sound quality is excellent no matter what volume you choose to use these earbuds for.  I've had some wireless earbuds before but they did not cancel out any of the outside noise but these do!  I use these earbuds at work when I walk (usually outside) and I can get a good week of not charging out of the earbuds.  They do not need to be charged every night - which is fabulous as I do not need one more thing to remember at night to do.

title: Sound great and comfortable (if they work)
body:
*Update: I received a replacement pair which seem to work as intended. The representative at Tozo told me to keep the earbuds I already had, which saved me the hassle of returning them and also left me with a spare set of earbuds and a charging case. The second charging case I received seems to be a little wonky, the left earbud wiggles around a bit too much and if it moves it may switch back and forth between charging and pairing modes. This is a little annoying but since I had a functional case already I just put the new earbuds in the first case and called it a day. I'm upgrading my overall review to 4 stars because the second pair is functional, continues have great sound, comfort and ease of pairing, and the customer service was very good.*

These earbuds and their charging case are well designed, comfortable, sound great with great volume for their size (tweak your eq to bring up the bass and make sure you get them deep into your ears to get the most out of low tones), and charge quickly. However, my first pair has problems with the sound in the left earbud sputtering and cutting out rather frequently. It's hard to tell if this is related to an unstable bluetooth connection or a physical defect, though it seems to happen most when I move around or adjust either earbud, leading me to believe they are somehow damaged. Customer service responded to me almost immediately, offering to replace them. I would like to give them a higher rating if my second set works properly because the sound, comfort and security in my ears are truly great for the price.

title: Excellent!
body: This is my second attempt at buying wireless earbuds.  The first Esanik True Wireless Earbuds even though at first glance look very similar were miles inferior. Regrettably they've been thrown away because they quit holding a charge after 3 months.  The sound on the TOZO earbuds is comparable to my Bose headphones which is no exaggeration.  I can't believe the clarity and quality of these from start to finish and especially the base which is super important.  You need to have a proper fit which makes a huge difference in sound quality however the different sizes needed are included.  I rarely take the time to review an item but music is part of my life so much I hope this can help someone understand these are an amazing deal and worth every penny.

title: Great product, great price.
body:
I’m shocked how great these sound for the price. They come with four sizes of ear buds to ensure a great fit and seal in the sound and reduce outside noises. It came without four days of ordering and everything was as advertised.
I haven’t ran with them in yet but I was jumping and running around the house and they never moved out of my ears.
Great value.

title: Absolutely Amazing!
body: For the price of these earbuds, they’re actually pretty much worth it! They sound amazing, you can feel the bass, they pair to your Bluetooth very quickly, and the charger for them is amazing. But one thing that stand out to me is when you take the earbuds out the charger and they instantly turn on and pair to each other. I would totes recommend this to a friend.

title: Great earbuds for the price
body: Really solid headphones.  They paired super quick.  The sound quality is better than I expected.  The bass is pretty good.  They feel really solid and well built. My only complaint so far after using them for an entire day is the the left ear bud seems to randomly go quiet for a second or two and then resume normal play. I may just need to follow the reset procedure instructions provide in the instruction.

title: Comfortable Airpod-like Earbuds for Android
body:
Despite the fact that I have several wired "wireless" bluetooth headphones for my devices, I have friends who use Airpods with their iPhones, and it looked rather convenient to have such a small device ready at the moment's notice while out and about. So I decided to shop around and see what I could find. This is my first foray into a device of this style, you know - completely wireless, but so far I am very pleased with them.

My first concern was size. Airpods have that little stick portion that hangs out of the ear, and there are several Android styles similar to that, but I have a few pairs of Skullcandy earbuds that use this model's offset ear canal design, and I find them far more comfortable than older, straight line earbud designs. The TOZO earbud is a good size, and the weight is very comfortable in the ear. It is not difficult, even with how small they are, to pick them out of the case, or to fit them into the ear when needed. The directions included make it easy to understand how to use them, but if you fit the right size cups, and then insert and twist like you are told, you will have a tough time shaking the buds loose. That said, I still bought the Amazon 3 Yr Warranty, it's $5, just in case something happens, better than shelling out another $40.

OF NOTE: I read several reviews of people who didn't seem to understand the interchangeable ear cups. The fact is that everybody has different size ear canals, so you have to take the time upfront to try out each size cup in your own ear to find the best fit, then use that pair of cups on your buds. If you, like my wife, don't like ANYTHING in your ears, then this is NOT the product for you, so don't buy it and then review it like it should be an over-ear headphone.

My second concern was sound quality. I am definitely a techie, and an audiophile, though not to the level of snobby hipster, if I say so myself. The TOZO buds play my Amazon music from my phone (LG G8) with good clarity and nice sound, but I had to play with my phone's equalizer to shift the tonal quality around, remove some of the highs because it was a bit tinny on the normal phone settings. Once I shifted it around, I found that the Hip Hop EQ gave the best sound, no matter what music style I was listening to (in case you are curious, I tried some rock with Hoobastank and Avenged Sevenfold, some country with Sam Hunt, and then R&B with Tank and Ne-yo, and it sounded excellent across that entire spectrum in Hip Hop EQ). If your device has EQ settings, I absolutely recommend you adjust those to find your musical sweet spot! The only thing that I took one star for in this area is that, even with volume for my buds turned up to 100% on my phone, the buds themselves did not thrash my eardrums, which is probably a good thing, saving my volume for my old age, but sometimes, you need to headbang to death metal and want it LOUD. Considering the size of the buds speaker driver, they are adequately loud, and with it fitted snugly in the ear canal, it does a great job of reducing external noise. Totally plan on using these for when I am riding my mower or working in my wood shop!

Next: Bluetooth connectivity. The pairing process is super easy, because the button design is simple. Unlike some of the other buds on Amazon, these are not "touch-style" but have a mechanical "click" button. Fantastic! Nothing worse than something tapping your bud in the middle of your favorite jam and then having to stop whatever you are doing to fix it. Some people noted that TOZO has R or L models, but the reality is that you can use either bud independently. The model choice just assigns the default earbud, because some people have an ear preference. If you want to use either one, then take the time to actually pair both in your bluetooth menu, and then you just have to pick the active one if it doesn't sync automatically. Handy when the primary bud is dying in the middle of a phone call! Besides all of that, they normally pair quickly without any actions needed on the device, and they will give you little beeps and messages in your ear to let you know that everything is working, so you don't have to pull your phone out and look to make sure. Nicely done, TOZO!

Bonus features: The case is sized nicely, fits in the pocket comfortably, but it is definitely larger than an Airpods case. Not a big deal for me, as a jeans or cargo shorts kind of guy, but I can imagine for a woman wearing yoga pants or skinny jeans, that might be an issue. Case is QI wireless charging capable, which is FREAKING AWESOME. Totally recommend wireless charging like other reviewers have said, incredibly convenient and saves your phone from the infamous "broken usb port" problem. Same thing here, and the "grab and go" functionality this provides for your buds cannot be understated! Holds enough charge to keep your buds going for about 30 hours, longer if you only use one bud at a time like I do at work. I have not tested the waterproof capability, but the buds seem well constructed and tightly sealed, so I believe their claims would probably be well founded. They do state in the instructions that they cannot be used submerged (but aren't they IPX8? wait for it...), not because of the waterproofing, but because you won't get signal underwater from the bluetooth device, which makes some sense.

So to sum up, TOZO has taken their earlier designs up to a new level with a solid construction, great style and fit, and good sounding speaker to deliver a comfortable earbud that gives an Airpod-like experience for those of us with Android or regular bluetooth devices. 5 Stars overall!

title: Sounds great
body: So far so good, my wife had a pair of BT wireless ear buds but the noise canceling wasn't that great. So far, these wireless ear buds have good noise canceling and sound good with deep bass.

title: these are waterproof but do not work while swimming.
body: The sound quality is great, bass is good , they don't fit very well for working out and i had to modify them to stay in but thats no big deal to me. I'm very upset though because i bought these with the thought that i could use them while swimming laps. As soon as my head goes under water the sound is gone. I dont know if i have faulty ones because they work perfectly fine everywhere else even in the shower. but as soon as i'm underwater , sound is gone. so they are okay and get 3 stars

title: Great Sound and Bass for the Price!
body: For the price, you really cant beat these. I was very surprised at the output and yes, a very good Bass which- as is so often the case when buying wireless ear buds, is hit or miss. Great little performer for music and exactly what I was looking for however,........call quality is poor......but hey, who talks on the phone anymore?

title: Disappointing
body: The sound is really, really good. And I like the charging case setup. But I get an intolerable amount of interference using these Bluetooth buds. Sitting still on the train or plane, perfect. Walking to the train is a different story.... I clearly get interference from overhead and underground high voltage, and god knows what else. If I move, I get left/right/both ear interference. If TOZO reads their reviews I’d gladly take a second set and test them - if I just got bad pair I’ll gladly retract or update the negative review.

title: Best Bang for your Buck!!! For about 2 months, then tTOZO will ignore your warranty claim
body:
The sound is good and they fit nicely. The case is nicely fit and lightweight.
After 2 months of use the right piece stop working, I had to reset over 20 times per tozo customer support instructions and it does not work. After 2 weeks of communication with tozo customer support,  they said they were sending a new one.
That was 3 weeks ago and they had sent nothing.
Very bad product and CD worst customer support I have ever had to deal with. Don't waste you money
Cheap product and it will brake sooner than later.
I'll never buy from tozo ever again and do not recomend to my worst enemy.

title: New guy says WoW!
body:
Usually ear muffs make my ears sweat and become uncomfortable, plus I do want to able to hear a bit of what is around me, ie, warnings and others telling me it’s my turn to play pool etc.
While vacationing mid-August in Dallas, TX, USA, I decided based on recommendations from family to try Tozo earbuds. Dallas in August is hot, hot, like extreme heat hot; however, I decided to order the TOZO T10 and they arrived promptly and fully charged. Easy straight forward instructions read, earbuds paired and Bluetooth activated all within 5 minutes. Cuban piano music accessed and the sound was fantastic.
Played 3 games of pool with granddaughters and not once did the buds become loose. The charging carry case really protects these little jewels. BTW those earbuds work independently which means I could let my granddaughters listen through one bud while while I listened through the other.

title: Best & Smartest Bluetooth Earbuds I've ever tried, and I have tried several!
body:
Pros: Great sound quality, quick charging, always ready to go! I'm very happy with these. The sound is suburb, good bass, and these actually stay in my ears, as opposed to so many i've tried! My left ear is weird and i cant get regular earbuds to stay in, but the Tozos have no issues. Very surprised. Great value!

Cons: a few bugs. sometimes the buds wont connect to eachother right away, and you have to "reset" them by placing both back into the case for a second then take them back out and they connect just fine.
I've used them to talk on phone calls and people usually complain that they can't hear me if i'm outside or in a crowd, but i have used other bluetooth headphones for calls with no issues, so i'd say thats their weakest point. Don't get them if you're strictly going to make calls outdoors around lots of people and noise.

Other than that you won't be disappointed!

title: DISAPPOINTING, Sub-par Bluetooth connection
body: Like most of you, I was sitting reading the overall great reviews of this product hoping not to fall into the airpod trap. Alas, I am unsure whether or not I received a lemon or if they were just truly that bad, but mine struggle to stay connected when my phone is in my pocket. It is not a phone issue as I connect to bluetooth stuff all day (car, radio, speakers, computer etc.) I used them for 3 days, now they sit on my desk unused... really wish they did better.

title: Poor sound and connectivity
body:
Pros:
Fit in my ear perfectly. Always had an issue with headphones fitting in my ears.

That's where the pros end though....

The sound quality on these is awful. I'm not sure if I just got a faulty pair, but the reviews always talk about how fantastic the sound quality is. For me, in most music I listen to, it sounds like all of the audio is clipping or something. Cymbals have a popping, or crackling kind of sound and it's regardless of volume. It's like that with most things, but cymbals have been the hardest to ignore since they are always there.... Its been like that since the first time I tried them so it's not like I could have broken them somehow?

Bluetooth connectivity is garbage too. Just like alot of the other reviews say, anything you are doing anything BUT sitting in one place, they will constantly disconnect. As a runner that's an absolute deal breaker for me.

Battery life is ok I guess, nothing to brag about though compared to other brands.

I would be very cautious about buying these, I have no idea how every review is so positive

title: Expected better.
body:
I’ve had these for a month. Here are honest pros and cons.

PROS:
They are durable, Ive dropped them a few times pretty hard and they suffered 0 damage.
The noise cancellation feature works as advertised.
They are pretty loud.
The CASE battery life lasts pretty long, enough for my 9 hour shifts at least.
They’re wireless, obviously, that’s always a plus.

CONS:
The right earbud charges slower and dies faster than the left one.
If you only have one earbud in, it’ll glitch out depending on if something is covering the opposite one. Kind of annoying.
The bass is almost non existent.
The overall battery life for the earbuds themselves only last about 2.5 hours, because if one earbud dies, the other won’t work, and the right earbud dies way faster than the left one. So I have to deal the the uneven charging and uneven battery life.

Overall, these earbuds are good and do the job, but they’re definitely not perfect and I don’t know if I’d ever buy them again.

title: Functional, Effective, Great price and gives you freedom from wires!!!
body: I purchased this recently and the quality and packaging of the product surprised me, it's so good that I have stopped using my Bose QuietComfort 20 Acoustic Noise Cancelling Headphones. These are great for workouts and answering calls anytime. They fit well in my ears and are not too big, they are just the right size, and you could change the silicone caps for your own convenience. The charger is very compact and well built, they do the work really well and at such an awesome price. They have a decent battery life and gets more with the charger pod. Will be buying more as gifts.

title: Connection drops frequently
body:
This is the second pair of random Chinese earbuds I have purchased on Amazon and they were both defective. The sound quality is OK, not good but not terrible either. The charging case is nice as it successfully extends the battery life pretty well.

BIG PROBLEM: whenever I move around with these, like walking or working out, the slave earbud drops connection to the master for a second quite frequently. This is incredibly disruptive and frustrating. As long as I sit still like at a desk they are fine, but as soon as they get moving there are constant drops in connection. Indications of a faulty product or terrible quality control at the manufacturer. You get what you pay for, and these are just another set of relatively cheap Chinese electronics that may or may not serve you well.

title: Love the wireless, waterproof headphones!
body:
These headphones are great. I felt so free and amazing at the gym where I usually feel a bit restricted even with wired bluetooth headphones.

The fit is great for me and they come with multiple ear sizes if the first fit isn't good for you.

I'm very critical of sound and these didn't let me down. Treble and bass is great IMO.

Add in the fact that they're water proof you really can't go wrong for the price.

title: Great Sound & Comfortable
body: This is the first time I have purchased wireless earbuds. I was always worried about the size and if they really would stay in my ear. I am very pleased with the TOZO Earbuds. The sound is great and they are not heavy in my ear. I was very pleased to find that they come with multiple size ear foam pieces to fit as snug or loose as you would like. I would definitely recommend.

title: Terrible for phone calls and even worse for music or audio books.
body: They sound great, when they are connected. The volume fades in and out and they disconnect a lot. I have used these with my previous phone and my new S9 Note, same issues. If I dare to get very far away from my phone, it's worse. People also have difficult hearing me when I use them for phone calls. I'm past the date to be able to return, so they will sit in a drawer.

title: Best buds on the market and a great price!
body: Love these buds. That fit perfectly and are very comfortable to wear for long periods of time. Pairing and charging is so easy. I have used many other listening products and none compare to these.

title: Quality Headphones
body: After 6 months of daily use I still love these headphones. The sound quality is great and the battery life is very impressive for being fully wireless, and customer support from TOZO has been very helpful and fast to reply, I will definitely continue to recommend these to my friends

title: Near perfect headphones!
body: Among the various headphones I've used, these provide the best fit for me personally along with its exceptional sound quality. These headphones work very well of you're involved in an activity that deals with hard work such as fitness. Sweating is a big issue between headphones and me so the implementation of water resistance is much appreciated. Astonishingly, even the battery life gave me a good 3-4 hours (about how long I work out) of listening experience. These headphones are the near perfect choice for training and would recommend to anyone wanting to invest in a pair of headphones for a good price.

title: Great except for one thing
body: These sound great. They are loud enough, which is not always the case for Bluetooth headphones. They pair with my phone quickly and easily. The charging case seems to be good quality. Great sound cancellation and price point. All good things. But there is one major flaw; at least with the set I received. The batteries don’t last! Seems like I only get an hour of use before I get low battery warnings, which are also far too frequent; chiming in about every 20 seconds. Then they die. This has happened to me after each full charge. If the batteries lasted as long as advertised these would be a five star product all day. However, I am probably going to return them. I might order a second set after in hopes this particular set is defective because I really do like them otherwise.

title: Cuts in and out while walking
body: Bought this item for my husband and he took it out for his walk and it kept cutting in and out every 30 seconds so time is being returned

title: Decent earbuds.
body:
Overall: sound is amazing. They are durable and seem to be very good quality. Charges well.
However, i cant just get the right bud to pair without it beeping every few seconds. I end up pulling out the left bud and leaving it on the table.
Also, it feels like its going to fall out, no matter how i place it. I shake my head amd it doesnt fall out, but it feels like its going to.
Again, overall i recommend getting these. Much better than the bluetooth headset with wires and all. I will never go back to using wires after using these ear buds.

title: Everything
body: I LOVED THE SOUND OF IT, I REALLY LOVED IT. THE NEG PART IT'S THAT IT DOESN'T LAST FOR NO MORE THAN 3 HRS TO 4 HRS. AFTER 4 HOURS YOU HAVE TO RECHARGED THEM AGAIN. BUT EVERYTHING ELSE IT SOUNDS BEAUTIFUL.

title: Hard to get a good fit in my ears.
body: Good sound. Good concept but they keep falling out of my ears while running. Really wanted to like these but I've tried the three different sizes and they will just not stay in my ears.

title: One of the better earbuds that I have purchased here on Amazon.
body: I've purchased many wireless earbuds/headphones from Amazon. I dislike wireless earbuds that have a wire connecting the them, so I tend to lean towards earbuds. These earbuds caught my eye because of it's IPX8 feature. As I have lose many due to rain or just stupidity, I decided to give these a try. I bought these and immediately tested them out in a shower (since they even advertise that). Expecting them to be like most earbuds that claim to be water-resistant, I braced for the worst. To my  surprise, they survived. This already has been a big plus. I haven't tested them underwater, but that will be the next step. The sound quality is is as good as you'll get without spending hundreds of dollars on other earbuds. The battery life is about standard to most earbuds on the market now. Speaking on that, another surprising feature is that the case can be charged wirelessly. In this day and age, wireless charging is becoming more prominent, and this feature just made this more convenient. More to come and will update in a few months.

title: Well worth it. Just buy them!
body:
Initial first impression... These earbuds are well worth the money. Sound quality is great. Pairing was a snap. Excellent bass. Battery life has been as advertised. Range is as good as the high-end units.

I really like being able to use left or right independently. Phone quality is good.

And the charging case Qi capable (wireless charging).

I will update if any issues arise.

Update Feb 9 '19
These ear buds are still great. My only complaint is the charging case. I wish it had more capacity. I have to recharge the case every night.

Sound quality is still great. Volume is still great. Still a great set of ear buds.

Still 5 stars

title: Great headphones at a great price!
body: This is my first pair of wireless headphones so I have nothing to compare these to for wireless, but as far as sound goes these things rock! They have plenty of volume and good bass. I love the recharging case because I don't have to connect them to power very often. I use them to workout at the gym and they stay put in my ears just fine. Overall I have been very happy with these headphones.

title: Ease of use
body: These are great earbuds!  I bought my husband a pair and he loves them. He is deaf in one ear and can use just the one without any problems.  He liked them soo much I bought myself a pair.  I have used them in the shower without issue.  They stay firmly in my ears without issue.  I will recommend them to others.

title: Best I can explain to you
body:
The sound quality is awesome hands down but kept disconnecting when phone was in pocket. Thought battery was low but found out it's a default in headsets.
For the price I say go for it but besides great sound quality if it stays connected, you will get frustrated

title: Wonderful experience!!
body:
I ordered Tozo Wireless Earbuds and have to mention that it has been such an amazing experience. The sound quality is nice, was able to hear the bass and beats clearly. As a student who spends a lot of time commuting or working out, these headsets have been a wonderful companion.

One of the headset did stop working after sometime but the company was swift in recognizing and acknowledging the issue and sending a replacement for the same. Hats off to the customer service.

title: So Far so Good!
body: I’ve only used once. My primary use is for the gym. I’m a runner and was looking for ear buds that were loud and waterproof. I listen to Amazon music and YouTube on my iPhone while working out. I didn’t have to stop mid run to wipe earbuds and sound was loud on both apps. I’ll have a better idea after a full week of runs.

title: Free wireless charging pad with BS 5 star review
body:
First and foremost be warned that the amazing reviews are thanks to a free offer for a wireless charging pad in exchange for a 5 star review. The main reason I purchased this brand was because of how many people raved about them. I was super annoyed when I found out the truth.
The truth: they're not bad. They sound great and feel comfortable and the case feels very sturdy and safe. They last about three hours and charge in about 1 hour. And at this decent of a price, who can complain?

title: Great quality at unbeatable price
body:
This is a quality set of earbuds at a great price! Fits nicely with custom-sized ear fittings, great sound and connectivity.
Easy setup, connects to multiple devices without issues. And waterproof to top it!

title: AWESOME, JUST AWESOME!
body: I can sit here and bore you with a bunch of verbiage, but I wont.  Let me be clear:  These earbuds are AMAZING.  Seriously.  They do EVERYTHING very well and they are just as described!  High quality stuff!  I wear them while cycling in (right now) 100+ degree humid heat in South Carolina and not only do they stay in place, but they are unaffected by sweat, etc.  Amazing sound, amazing clarity.  These things should easily cost $200.

title: What a waste !
body:
I purchased this product after reading through all the great reviews and great expectations. What I experienced with this product has been a mix bag.
It pairs easily when removed from the charging case with the first device and with the left channel. The sound quality for music and movies from my iPad are pretty decent.
I paired it with a total of 4 devices and have been using it for a about 6 months with a mixed experience.
If there is only 1 device in the vicinity, then it takes an abnormally long time to pair with it, and it is constantly scanning for the other devices making a ping sound when unable to pair  (WHY??), causing a huge nuisance. So now, I have reset them both multiple times and have it paired with just one device. And still it keeps seeking the other missing device(s?). What a very strange ghostly behavior. And yes, resetting it multiple times seems to have minimal effect on this behavior.  So, I have wasted $50. It's not worth considering these as a alternative to any of name brands!!

title: Outstanding customer service
body: Update :  I had an issue with the earbuds and contacted for customer support .  The customer service responded within 24 hours and offered a resolution to my problem .  The customer service is outstanding and These earbuds exceeded my expectations.  I highly recommend this product to anyone interested in wireless earbuds .

title: Amazing headphones!
body: I purchased these headphones in preparation for a 6.5 mile run/race. I was tired of my wire headphones getting in the way. But I was also concerned for water because I sweat alot and wanted to use them at the gym and for running. Well let's just say these headphones delivered. They stayed in place, had great sound quality and didn't get ruined by water/ sweat. I love these and am extremely satisfied.

title: Good Sound Quality, Reasonably Priced, Good Value,  Right Choice
body: Very good quality for the price.  The earbuds are small enough to be comfortable in the ear and come in a sturdy and protective charging case that will also recharge your earbuds.  They paired easily to me Pixel 3.  Good sound quality for music and movies and phone conversations.  Comfortable fit and they didn't fall out during normal wear once I placed the right earbud cushions on the earbuds.  The earbud must be placed in the ear channel for proper fit and to keep the device in place during normal wear.  I tested the noise level from external sources while listening to music and movies on the TOZO T10 Bluetooth earbuds.  They are not noise cancelling.  You can hear noise in the background but most prominent is the audio in your ear.  I had no trouble hearing the words of the music or people talking in movies.  I was able to hear the audio clearly without turning  the volume up to an uncomfortable level in my ear.  I had no trouble focusing on the music or movie because it was the most prominent thing I was hearing.  I bought these for listening to audio media on a plane.  I think that they will work just fine.  During phone call (and video call) conversations, I was able to hear the conversation in both ears clearly.  These earbuds have exceeded my performance expectation;  especially nice since the price of the earbuds was reasonable.

title: Good to be free
body: I am so happy I went with these. I shopped around for a while to find the best pair and I am so glad to say these were my first pick and so far I am satisfied with them. I've tested while hiking, exercising, showering and doing house chores and they have not fallen out.

title: A really good product
body: I really recommend this. It has a really good sound quality and I didn't see any other wireless earbud that you can charge with your wireless charger, yes you can put it on your cell phone wireless charger and it will charge.

title: Unbelievable quality that doesn’t break the bank!
body: Being a professional audio engineer, I’m always skeptical about finding a high quality product at a low price point. Generally speaking, you get what you pay for. In this instance, you get so much more! Beautiful sound quality! The range is incredible and clean, as well as perfect noise cancellation. If you pay anything above what these sell for you are wasting your money plain and simple. Incredible product!

title: That didn't go as planned.
body: For some reason the volume would go down on it's own and slowly go back to where it originally was. This would happen about three to four times in a row, then it would stop. A few minutes pass by and itll begin doing it again. Instead of staying in my ear there were times that they would fall from the slightest sudden movement. For example, if something fell on the floor and I would try to pick it up, the earbuds would fall as well. Sounds quality was a bit off. Yes, they were loud, but it would sound as if I am listening to music from down the hall. Slight echo, and there was no way of fixing that. So I just returned them.

title: Great earbuds.... Great customer service
body:
Best earbuds I’ve ever owned. Great sound quality. They are also very good on noise cancellation as I use them when mowing the lawn.

The customer service is also excellent... My right earbud stopped working after 8 months. After reaching out to customer service and determining that it could not be reset, they sent me a new pair of earbuds, and I didn’t have to return the original pair.

Thanks TOZO!

title: Simplicity
body: Easy to use, easy to pair and exceptional sound quality. The noise-canceling was better than I expected. These buds are loud enough for me but they aren't overly powerful. Fits good, although I have not tested their capabilities when doing physical activities, they are a snug fit. They do protrude out a bit more than I would like and are not comfortable if you try to lay your head to the side while wearing them. Otherwise, for the price and quality you get, I am overall satisfied.

title: Awesome Product, A must Buy
body: I love this product, before I purchase it I read most of the reviews and I was sold, but when I received the product and started using it during my gym workouts, I was amazed how the quality of sounds this ear buds produced. You guys made an awesome product and I will do business with you guys in the future and also will spread the word about these amazing ear buds to friends and family

title: No use if needed for phone call use!
body: I gave a 1 star because I purchased these so that I could be hands free while driving and to walk around without holding my phone. All I hear when I make a phone call or the person calls me is I cant hear you!!! The purpose of me getting this was for business calls and personal calls and it doesn't work. Waste of money!!

title: Superb wireless bluetooth earbuds for all activities including swimming
body: I purposely bought these wireless bluetooth earbuds to be able to listen to audio content while swimming. These are precisely what I wanted. Very comfortable to wear at any time. More comfortable than Apple AirPods. I like the different sizes of ear plugs that come with the unit. Provides excellent fit. Great sound cancellation, as I have worn them while using machinery, and did not need additional hearing protection. Great wound with fuller sound than other EarPods I have tried. Love the charging unit, that quickly recharges the pods. Easy to connect to my phone, to listen to any program or music on my phone,  while swimming, working, or relaxing. Excellent product for the price. Considering buying one for my wife.

title: Disappointed
body:
UPDATE: After 7 weeks and using them 2-3 times a week they no longer charge. They don't charge on the wireless pad or connected to a cord and I have tried 2 wireless pads and 5 different cords. Not sure if this is an isolated incident or not but I am waiting to hear back from Amazon and/or Tozo on how they are going to fix them.  Dead headphones arent very useful.

I needed something small and something that would sound good while I worked (painting and general house repairs) and while I am at my computer working. These seem to work well for both tasks. I just got them and haven't had a ton of time using them but the sound quality, which is the biggest thing for me, is amazing. The charging time and battery life are still being discovered but I used them for about two hours yesterday and never had an issue. Noise cancellation is pretty good, moisture wicking was sort of average. I didn't want to drop $150 on airpods or the Samsung model so for $50 these were worth every penny!

title: Amazing Product!!
body: I wanted a good set of Bluetooth earbuds that I can hear my music and also speak on the phone without having to take my phone out of my purse. I was intending to buy a more expensive earbuds but decided to try Tozo T10 instead. I am not disappointed! The music is loud and clear not a tinny sound. Phone calls come through I hear my caller clearly and they hear me. Battery life are also great.

title: Is bulky and great features enough to use in public?
body: I love the features. What it says on their description hits the red mark. However, what I didn’t realize until I wore them was that I can’t wear it in public. The wireless earphones are great but in my opinion I wouldn’t wear them out as it looks like I have something stuck in my ear. It’s not pretty. If you are looking for a great wireless headphones with promising potential this will be great for you. However, if you are trying to find one with great features and to wear in public this may not be for you.

title: Doesn't stay in ear during workout
body: I really wanted to love these.  Everything about them was great except they kept falling out of my ears during a workout.  Since I bought them specifically for working out, had to return them.

title: Great clarity with deep bass
body: I just received these and went for my first run with them this morning.  All I can say is, "WOW!"  Great clarity and deep bass.  I own a pair of Beats and Samsung and the TOZO T10s sound way superior.  If you are in the market for high quality sound at an affordable price; look know further because these are it.

title: Great Ear Buds and Great Customer Service!
body: These work fantastic, and I really enjoy the case as well! When I did get some issues TOZO sent me a replacement absolutely free. I highly recommend both the product and the company!

title: Great quality wireless earbuds
body: These wireless earbuds work great! It took some practice to figure out how to get them to stay in but once they’re in they sound great and do cancel background noise well. I like that I can use either one or both.

title: FOR THE MONEY....I WAS SHOCKED!
body: I AM A TOTAL SKEPTIC BUT THESE HEADPHONES ARE AMAZING. I STRAIGHT UP CANNOT BELIEVE THE QUALITY FOR THE PRICE. THE FACT THAT THE EAR BUDS ARE ACTUALLY "BUDS" CREATE WAY BETTER SOUNDS THAN AIRPODS (WHICH I OWN). I DON'T USE THE AIRPODS BECAUSE THEY DON'T STAY IN MY EARS. ANYONE LOOKING FOR A PAIR OF WIRELESS EARBUDS REALLY REALLY NEEDS TO GET THESE. THE PACKAGING IS AWESOME AND YOU CAN TELL WHOEVER MADE THESE REALLY TOOK THE TIME TO DO IT RIGHT. I COULDN'T BE HAPPIER AND I AM GOING TO GET MY WIFE A PAIR.

title: Best blue headphone!!!!!
body:
This is amazing headphone!! I bought my husband’s first and I tried out his headphones and the sound quality is amazing. He is really picky for the headphones because of base sounds and noise cancelling but he is totally satisfied!!
I ordered mine right next day and I love it so much!!! Best Bluetooth ever!!

title: Great Headphones at a great price
body: These are my first wireless headphones and the sound quality is excellent in these. I haven't tried to test battery life per charge yet but I sit at a desk and use them for very long periods and haven't had to charge them yet. The charging case is light but feels super sturdy too. I have to use the smallest earbud size but they have stayed in my ears super well so overall I love the purchase. Its worth noting that you can use one earbud but it has to be the right one as the left is slaved to it so if you wanted to throw just one earbud in it will have to be the right one to activate the auto connect of the Bluetooth.

title: I Am Very Impressed!
body: This is my first pair of wireless bluetooth earbuds as I've clung to my wired earbuds over the years. I just got fed up with tangled wires that broke eventually. I am very impressed with these headphones so far. They are good quality, water resistant, come with several earbud sizes to choose from, the case supports both wireless charging and wall charging, it comes with a carrying strap, the earbuds have buttons on them to control play/pause/power, there are colored lights on the earbuds/case so you can see the status at a glance, and it comes with a free 1 year warranty in the box. Sound quality is great; I was very impressed with the volume and strong bass considering the size of the earbuds. I would definitely recommend these to anyone looking for a good set of wireless bluetooth earbuds.

title: Very satisfied!
body: I have been wanting wireless headphones for SO SO long, I had a pair of the Sol Republic Tracks Air for almost 6 years and used them till they broke I loved them so much!!! So I was in the market for new ones and these DO NOT disappoint. The sound quality is really good, I have zero complaints. Noise cancellation is also awesome. I would definitely recommend to anyone, no matter what your budget is

title: I’m impressed!
body: I got these after ordering some dud earphones from another seller and seeing these recommended in those reviews. I am very happy with my purchase. The difference in quality is astounding! These feel well made, the battery is quality and the earphones have a magnet to affix them to the charger easily. The range is good and so is the sound quality. I am very happy with my purchase.

title: A Detrimental Glitch Ruined Them
body: I got these earbuds for my son's birthday and they stopped working within a month of getting them. A glitch occurred where they would attempt to connect to his phone even while they were in the charging case, meaning they would never actually charge while they were in their case. Once the power ran out for them, they would not charge again. I would not reccomend them, especially considering their price.

title: Left earbud kept losing connection!
body: I like how they're waterproof, and the sound is OK not very BASS-y as described, and the left earpiece kept losing connection, like they were wired and it had a bad cord! Paired with another phone, and the same thing. Why do I always have to get the lemons of the bunch?!?!!? Don't waste your money

title: Very satisfied
body: I purchased these so I could listen to podcasts while riding my bike.  They have great sound and do a good job of minimizing wind noise.  Once I found the correct-size ear buds, they fit fine, did not hurt, and didn't fall out during my bike ride.  They were easy to pair to my iPhone.  Battery life seems fine.

title: Worked OK for a week or two
body:
Updating my review after a few weeks: well, these suck. They were promising: for the price they had decent sound, good construction, etc.

But, after ~2 weeks, the right earbud got very muffled. It's not blocked by anything on the outside. Just got quiet. So basically I have a mono earpiece now.

I'll try to get a replacement from the manufacturer but what a pain.

title: Great experience; really enjoying these earbuds
body:
I've been cautious about purchasing bluetooth earbuds. I've been let down by other brands. However I decided to try out Tozo T10 after my Apple wired earbuds failed.

Tozo T10 has completely changed my mind about bluetooth earbuds. They are have been fantastic.

* Much lighter than I expected.
* I switched the earbud padding to the smaller size. It now fits comfortably in my ears, so I'm not worried about them falling out.
* The sound quality is better than my prior wired earbuds.
* The sound insulation is perfect. I like wear my Tozo earbuds to the gym and they completely knock out the loud speaker announcements and music.

I would definitely recommend these to anyone looking for a pair of earbuds (bluetooth or wired).

title: Battery life is garbage.
body: Had to stop my workout to write this review . Battery life went from 60% to dead in less than 15minutes. I don't think I've even had these 3 months. What a waste of money.

title: Finally, wireless earbuds that fit and sound amazing
body: I spent more than $150 on wireless earbuds that did not fit well and/or sounded “weird” so I set my hopes accordingly. The first thing I noticed was that half the manual was dedicated to a detailed description on how to fit the device in the ear. They get it I thought. I will forgive missing functionality and or high sound quality for a good fit. I followed the detailed instruction and - a miracle, the units fit perfectly into their place. And the sound and isolation where better than all other wireless earbuds I tried. The connection to the device is seamless and consistent. The earbuds and the charger/battery have a clean and beautiful design. You can tell that they are maid with high quality material. The units snap into their slots in the charger.  The LEDs are clear and noticeable. The earbuds fit in and stay there. I tested that at the Gym and in long walks. I sweat a lot but while other devices stopped working these buds were not affected. Yes, you can’t control the volume from the buds but this is a really small detail compared to the fact that finally I have earbuds that perfectly fit and sound great. I will happily recommend the product.

title: Exactly what I've been waiting for
body: These earbuds are an absolute G-d send. I'm a day sleeper and a lot of times I needs something to listen to to put me away. Speakers kept everyone else awake. Headphones kept me awake with constant repositioning of my device. And other earbuds have me pain or lost sound quality depending on how I would lie. But not these!  Brilliant fit, rich sound, and has helped me in my quest for sleep amongst the day dwellers. Thank you oh so much!

title: So far so good!
body: I initially bought these headphones as a more affordable option compared to the AirPods for iPhones. So far I’m pretty impressed all around. The sound quality is great, they fit very well, and I love that the charging case is compatible with wireless chargers. The company even offered me a free wireless charging pad for the headphones. I wish that you could skip songs by touching the earbuds, but understand that they are used for calling functions. Will update review if needed!

title: Easy ti set up, work with recent model of iPHONE and iPAD
body: Very good earbuds, easy to set up, pair, battery last more than 12 hours. Small, has 4 earbud sizes to fit your ear.

title: Connect problems
body: Sound cuts out every now and then. It’s not enough to make it unbearable but for the price I’d expect these to work flawlessly. If you can make them work the sound quality is amazing.

title: Quit working after 7 months
body: After only 7 months using 3-4 times a week for only 20-40 minutes each time. The left completely quit working. Loved these while the lasted though!

title: Simple, sleek, effective, and great for the price.
body: These headphones, for the price, are by far the best sounding / easiest to use. And the charging station is simple, effective, and sleek. They feel high-tech when you put them in, and with the right sized cushions (they come with four sizes, above and beyond the norm) they'll fit snug, stay bassy, and let you do even vigorous workouts without issue. I even could do handstands without them moving around. Really great for a pair. I will say that sometimes the left earbud's connection will duck out but it's only for a split second and doesn't happen often. Overall, these are far better for the price than most of the earbuds I've used.

title: Sounds Great but died
body: The description clearly says that they are waterproof. This is a falsehood. I had them in while taking a bath and of course, the right one fell from my ear while I was watching netflix on my phone. Yes, it plummeted to the bottom of the tub (A horrifying depth of about 18 inches) And by the time I got it dried off and reinserted into my ear? It was dead. I've tried everything to get it to work, but no. They are officially toast. Sucks really, because I loved those buds. I had them all of a month before this happened. Will not be purchasing another pair from this company.

title: Nice option; you should consider
body: So far very happy with headphones. I use for working out/running and they fit the bill. I wanted something that was quality without breaking the bank

title: Worth The Purchase!
body:
These earbuds are great!! I ordered them on Thursday and they told me they would arrive by Saturday. I get home from work on Friday and there they are! A very nice surprise to see them a day earlier than expected. The sound quality is really good, especially for the price. When I'm wearing them properly, the noise cancellation is wonderful! I can't hear anything else around me. My wife and I both tested them out to see how well they stay in your ear once you find the right size earpiece, since they come with 4 different sizes. These suckers aren't going anywhere! They are perfect for a good session at the gym. The charging case is a great addition! You can see the charging indication lights through the case when it's closed. The case is small and most definitely travel friendly. It doesn't get in the way of anything at all! The battery life of both the case and the earbuds are much better than I expected. Normally when I get a pair of wireless headphones/earbuds, the battery life is quite disappointing. Not with these! The case charges them fast and they last for exactly how long I need them for and even longer! It doesn't take very long for the case to charge up as well, which is a huge plus.
The only thing I was iffy about while purchasing these was that I was thinking they would be bulky while they're in your ears and they would stick out far. It's not that bad at all. Much better than I anticipated.
Overall I am very satisfied with these earbuds and would recommend these to anyone who is looking for a good pair of wireless earbuds.

title: I'm blown away by how great it is at this price.
body: With the $50 price tag I was not expecting high quality, but that's what I got.  I recommended it to all my friends.  Couldn't be happier.

title: Okay but not a good fitting earbud...Letscom are way better!
body: Lost one after a week. Even with the various sized bud covers, they just aren’t suited to fit the ear. I had to purchase a different brand  and they’re awesome! Letscom True Wireless...They fit perfectly and have many more options such as skipping a song, pause, answer call, adjust volume, and more! Also,  when these ear buds are put in the case they automatically shut off and when they are taken out of the case, they automatically turn on, bonus! Buy Letscom True Wireless Earbuds instead!

title: Excellent sound, horrible longevity.
body: Broke after one month of use. The battery pack appears to have fried both headphones. Was unable to get help on doing a factory replacement. When these headphones worked, they were amazing. Way better than I thought they would be. Still wish I didn’t toss 50 bucks in the trash though.

title: Great product!
body: So, like other reviews...I’ve tried different earbuds in the past and honestly these compete with the best. Actually, I think these are the best I’ve ever ordered. I love the fact you can use either ear bud independently and not drain the battery down. The design is sleek and modern and although I don’t have one yet, the wireless charger option seems pretty neat.

title: WTF
body: Everyone else on this page must have gotten entirely different earphones than me. first mine came in a different packaging than the one in the pictures it was white for some reason. The charging doesn’t work my earphones never charge completely the case is charged but the earphones always remain red which is complicated because they have just sat on my desk for a week and now they have no charge, WITHOUT ANYONE YSUNG THEM! And finally they don’t even connect fast at all they connect to each other first which is already slower than normal but then it takes a little less than a minute for them to connect. If anyone wants to tell me why this is happening, or better yet send me a new pair because these ones are useless please contact me.

title: Amazing sound quality.
body: Ok, I usually don’t write feedback on any product. However, when something shows good value and good quality, I do. On this case, these are the best wireless headphones I have ever owned. Great price, great quality, and amazing sound quality.

title: Could be better
body: Quality of the earphones are pretty good as far as sound goes. I don't like how difficult it is too connect the earphones to each other and to my device.  I'm repeatedly turning them on and off before it will connect to my phone. Also I would like the option to at least listen to one earphone by itself but the right one always has to be on for the left one to work. Would not purchase had I known I would have this issue.

title: A solid pair of beginner Bluetooth earbuds for the $
body: I decided to go cordless with my earbuds and saw the Tozo T10 as a highly rated and recommended product on Amazon. I did not want to spend the $150+ for the top tier earphones on the market so decided to settle on a pair of Tozo T10's. After using the product for a couple days, I can say that I do not regret the purchase. Going cordless has been a true game changer and these earbuds did not disappoint. The earbuds connect very easily with my laptop and phone and the sound quality is quite good. I have not tested its water resistant as I do not use these in the shower or go swimming often but I will trust the product's description and believe that it is in fact water resistant. The case that holds the earbuds is magnetic and the earbuds snap into place when putting them in the case. The charging port for the case is traditional USB type A but that isn't a big deal at all. Overall, the product is worth it for its price and I hope these last me a while.

title: Worth It!
body: Straight of the box, I was impressed. The buds came charged! They magnetically fit into the charging case - I really like that feature. The sound is good -- I am not a expert though. The buds for in my ears well -- lots of options for different sizes. All around very good product.

title: Impress with the quality/price
body: I work out a lot & my previous headset died, likely due to continual perspiration when working out. Reading the reviews, I decided to purchase TOZO & test out the product. Currently, I'm impressed.  Since its waterproof, I'm hoping this headset will last longer than my previous one. Nice base & a crisp sound quality to it. It sits well in my ears. Overall, it's worth the price! No regrets at this time! Any issues arise, I will update.

title: Good quality TWS earbuds that work as described
body:
I've had these for 5 months and I can say they are very well constructed and of good quality. The reason I gave these 4.5 stars is that I do wish they came with either ear hooks or ear wings as I am having to readjust them at the gym from time to time. As most earbuds of this type, they stay on due to a vacuum caused by the silicone ear tips.
This same vacuum is the sole cause for the noise cancellation, as most of the sound is blocked off from entering your ears. This means that you are not able to have a conversation with both buds in. The sound is decent, not comparable with Jabras or anything in the above $100 range, but if you are paying $50 for these then you should only expect decent sound. I use them mostly for podcasts and music streaming in the gym and they are fine.
Battery life is good, they last about 2.5 hours or so. The case does provide about 5 additional charges so the overall of 12-12.5 hours is accurate. The case does charge wirelessly and it charges up when plugged in a couple of hours. I have never had an issue with them pairing, from the time I take it out of the case and put them in my ear I always hear the "connected" voice prompt. I do have the occasional issue of the left bud temporarily loosing sound if my arm gets in front of it, when doing a movement like a front raise for example. The sound does come back once I lower my arm, so just a minor annoyance. I've watched Hulu, Netflix and YouTube videos with them and there is no latency.
I haven't tested the "waterproof" feature, mainly since Bluetooth does not conduct through water, I don't see the point. I do appreciate that I don't have to worry about the earbuds getting wet in the rain. Maybe I'll find out if they are really waterproof when I give these to one of the kids and the inevitably drop them in the pool.
Although they are very good, at this price they compare directly for the JLabs Air. My wife has those and the sleeve they come with do help keep them more secure. BTW, she previously had different pair of $50 TWS earbuds from Amazon but one of the buds stopped charging after about 2 months.
Overall I like these, but at this price they are right behind the JLabs mainly because of the readjusting I have to do at the gym. I guess the waterproofing and the wireless charging case makes up the difference. Maybe when I fish them out of the pool and they still work I'll up my score to 5 stars!

title: Great Product
body: I ordered these to replace a different set of ear buds.  These are an outstanding set of wireless earbuds for the money.  They give good sound and the noise canceling is excellent.  They were easy to use and work well with my phone.

title: Everything I wanted in wireless Bluetooth earbuds!!!
body: I researched Bluetooth earbuds for several weeks.  There are so many options and so many claims.  Reading the reviews and questions on this product, I decided to give them a try.  They had EVERYTHING that I wanted in wireless earbuds.  I wanted great sound, a charging case that could be charged with USB as well as being charged on a wireless charger, the option of using just one earbud (left or right) for phone calls, great usage time, quick charge time and good range.  Also, as with any purchase I make, I look for Seller feedback when there is a problem or defect.  These earbuds check everything on my list.  I have put them through the gambit and they met or exceeded my expectations.  They easily connect to my iPhone XR.  They effortlessly connect to each other for really good stereo sound.  They have a range of 30-35 feet in my home.  You can use the Left or Right earbud by itself.  They have a very good length of charge.  Although I don't listen to music all day long (so I can't comment on the length of time they will stay charged for a whole day of music), but I have listened to a couple of hours and used for phone calls all day long and didn't need to recharge them.  They are extremely comfortable.  I have gone to bed and discovered that I still had one in my ear.  The only problem I have had with them is that I have extremely small ear canals.  I had to purchase a set of XS ear tips (SpinFit CP100-SS 3.8mm here on Amazon).  This is no slight to these earbuds though, most people will be completely satisfied with the multiple sizes provided with the earbuds.  I would and have recommended this product to everyone.

title: Very light weight
body: My husband loves these headphones. I tried them on myself and they are super comfortable. Very light weight. The sounds is great and the noise canceling is perfect.

title: Good Quality and easy to maintain
body:
This was a gift for my grandson. He truly likes them and because of him having them my daughter bought herself a pair and loves them. I ordered a pair in white and am waiting for them to arrive.
They come with several sizes of ear caps so finding your fit should be easy.

title: Great value, why pay/buy for Beats??!!
body: These work great for all uses, although they do occasionally try to slip out while running, they have great sound and longevity for the price, and the storage bin doing double duty as a charging station for them also it a sweet touch/great idea.  I'd recommend these over the overpriced beats and similar products out there any day, don't let marketing steal your hard earned money! These do great for their purpose

title: Tozo Fan
body: The fit and sound are great. I like how they charge in case and you can tell when fully charged (red light goes out). It’s easy to tell when the case needs charging as the number of blue lights decrease. Great product with good customer support.

title: Dream come true!
body: This product will not disappoint! Quality of build, sound quality, flawless connectivity, comfort to wear, and easy charging, all make the TOZO T10 perfect for the active user. The 4 set of ear buds will make it easy for you to find the right fit. This help with blocking out noise and holding the device firmly in your your ear. Have not had one time where they felt like they were slipping out like some other wireless headsets I have had. Really helps with the comfort of wearing them also. Sound quality was very good. Found myself not needing to have the volume up as high as other wireless headphones. Thanks TOZO for knocking this out of the park!

title: Truly Wireless but terrible mid and bass, returning
body:
Originally I had a positive review but I could not get used to the lack of bass and compared to my Bose headphones these things sound awful. One should also note that the companies warranty heavily pushes positive reviews by incentives (IE they will send a free charging plate).  This is mentioned as many of the reviews appear to be suspect.

Initial thoughts (revised):

Good:
- form factor is excellent
- easy pairing
- charging box is quick and easy

Cons:
- sound quality ( main reason for returning), treble is way to high and drums sound terrible. There is virtually no bass and mid . The sound is very shallow when compared to my Bose headphones wired and wireless.
- better ear bud silicon
- slimmer charging case would fit better in certain areas, comes with a cord, but it seems to heavy to conveniently cary at the gym
- dual / multi connection at once : These can only be connected to one device at time and is probably better on battery life. However, my bose soundsport can be connected to my watch and phone at the same time without problems.
- nitpick: treble is a little high and bass could be slightly deep
- be nice if an optional string could be attached to the headphones to link them together. This would be nice for draping them around my neck upon leaving the gym. Otherwise putting this in a pocket makes them super easy to forget about and possibly lose or wash.
- started having connection issues where the units get out of sync (left / right) .

title: Comfort
body: These headsets have been great so far. They were easy to pair with my cell and my iwatch. I love that they are wireless and the charging case is great as a carry case too. The product comes with four ear piece sizes, the current ones I am using were slipping on my last run, but I started with the smallest option. I am confident a larger size will fit more snug. I haven’t tried the earbuds in the pool yet, but plan to soon and I will update the review once I do.

title: They were great! For a week....
body:
