*Well one star off, I have only had these earbuds since August 2nd, and now the left one cuts the music on and off, and cuts off my calls completely, and now the right bud disconnects. I am giving it one more shot before I give up on them.

I bought these by word of mouth. I was hesitant because many said they could not be used one at a time, which proved to not be true.

The sound quality is quite frankly, amazing. Even only having one in, it is crystal clear despite outside noise. With them both in, I hardly hear outside noises.

I used them all day, including during my hike and not once did I fear they were going to fall out. I am truly grateful they came with different size rubber buds, as one ear is slightly damaged inside, so the smaller rubber bud was a better fit.

Sweat was no longer a problem, my last pair of non wireless I was always having to remove and clean. These the sweat glides over it, and when I take them out, they are usually dry.

Setting up was a little annoying, but that was due to my excitement on using them.

As for using only one, both do have to be on, as the R is the master and the L is the slave. However, I just put one back in the case, still on, and let it charge there. So far, the beeping in the background has gone away after a minute or two. It would be nice if this was not necessary, but I am not going to complain beyond this.

Overall, even if it being just one day, I am damn happy I bought these.

title: A novel concept, a product that works exactly as advertised.
body:
The earbuds charged quickly and easily, popping right into and out of the charging box with a satisfying magnetic “snick.” The box was very small and easily fit into my hip pocket.
The fit of the product was quite remarkable-small enough to fit easily into the outer ear canal and light enough to stay there. The package comes with several different sizes of ear cushions to help customize the fit; the size that snaps onto the earbud is standard, the same size as many other in-ear brands, meaning you likely already have numerous spare pairs laying about.
The sound was great with clear highs and good bass response.
Overall great product and an even better customer service experience.

title: Very Convenient
body: Used this product to replace existing wireless ear buds that were connected with cord. This is much more comfortable. The only negative so far is there is not much bass in the sound.

title: Nice product but too many connection issues
body: I used these for running. They are lightweight and fit perfectly out of the box.  I never had an issue with them moving or falling except the one time I ran in the rain - then they slipped out slightly.  Good sound but a little bassy.  I ended up returning them because 20% of the time I would have issues with the connection between the two earbuds.  Sometimes it was sporadic enough I could deal with it but others it was so bad I took them out to finish my run.  If it was not for the connection issues I would rate 5 stars.

title: So awesome we bought his and hers!
body: Was skeptical at first but the reviews were good and the price was right so we gave these Bluetooth earbuds a chance.  We bought one pair to try and they were so awesome my husband was like “I want a pair too!” So we got a set each and we love them.  I take mine with me everywhere.  They’re great in the car when I need to make a call, or at the gym and theses little things can really bump up the music! Noise canceling feature on these is not exaggerated.  Definitely want to get a wireless charging pad for them if you can because it’s easier to charge, because you just lay the charging case on it and go (and it holds a charge for hours and days if not in constant use) and the wireless charger pad is cool for your phone too so it’s nice to have.  So if you’re on the fence and looking for some new Bluetooth earphones, these are it.  I promise you won’t be disappointed.

title: Perfect!
body:
Just got this today and was happy with the product so far, the packaging was great everything was in there that was supposed to be. The sound quality really surprised me I was not really expecting it to be as clear and crisp as it was, the bass was great, well balanced. Once I found the correct ear piece they fit perfectly. The sound canceling was great almost too good, I had to turn the volume almost all the way down to be able to hear someone that is talking in a normal voice.
Overall great product!

title: Good Quality
body: I like these headphones for their convenience mainly with exercising and everyday moving around. They don't fall out and the sound quality/noise cancellation is great. I especially like the charging case provided, they are very convenient to  take out of the case and they automatically  turn on and connect to your phone (once paired that is). The only thing I do not like about these headphones is that their is no feature to turn up or down the volume or switch songs. But overall great purchase.

title: They seem to be working for what I need them to do.
body:
After the 3rd pair I received I finally received 1 that works.
I purchased a set and the right bud did not work at all. The 2nd pair Amazon sent me had good sound quality but I would receive interference and it would on get every other word in the song.
Amazon took the earbuds back and returned my money.
After a day or so I was contacted by TOZO.
They had seen my review sent me a pair that works. Thank you for that.
Sound quality is on par with my apple buds.
I only just received them and I will be using them in gym.
So it seems like the one that they sent me works well.
I gave them a 3 star now because I had so many issues initially. But they do have nice sound and lasts at least an hour in the gym and YES they are sweat proof so far!!!!
Thanks

I hope this helps.

title: Great Sound but a few other annoyances
body: These headphones have great sound. They are slow to pair, the fit is a little loose and the alternate size esr pieces are awkward to install. The controls are meant for phone but not music. While I love the sound quality these other items somewhat lessen the experience for me. Five stars for sound three stars due to the slow Bluetooth, awkward fit adjustments and lack of music controls.

title: Quality earbuds at a reasonable  price.
body: Initial impression, glad I found these ear buds.  I was considering a much more expensive option, when I saw the great reviews for the Tozo T10.  The sound is so much better than my previous Bluetooth Earbuds and the connection was very easy.  The charging station is very convenient assuring they are always fully charged when I need them. Like many reviewers said, they fit well in your ears, I have no concern of them falling out.  Compared to JBL, these are quality earbuds at a reasonable price.

title: Just Okay!
body: If you're listening to podcasts or anything other than music these would be ok. For music, they are not good. Not much bass at all.A lot of mid and treble which almost hurts your ears. Very harsh sounding. Maybe a tiny step above Apple earpods. They are packaged nice and the addition of 3 different size rubber caps ensures that they will stay in your ear. Will probably return

title: Great sound quality for the price.
body: TOZO T10 is so far the best Bluetooth headphones set that I have owned and I’ve had a few. I was not expecting such great sound quality from a reasonable priced headphones. I’m made a good decision in buying two because my wife just loves it. I definitely recommend this product if you’re in a budget and want good quality Bluetooth headphones.

title: Great sounding waterproof headphones
body: Working in a greenhouse all day these things are holding up great. No worries when getting sprayed with water. The noise canceling is great and really helps block the sound of the fans running all day. They really sound great and fit good too.

title: Pretty solid for the money
body: These earbuds are pretty solid for the money. After charging them and linking them up they were fine and then after about an hr or so the left earbud started disconnecting for some reason even after following the instructions and rebooting them. Contacted the sale and the are in the process is sending out a left bud to correct the situation. Hopefully everything will work fine once I recieve and link them up. "Hopefully "

title: Definitely recommend!
body: I purchased these and have been using them for over a week off the battery life they had when I received them and today is my first day charging them! They are absolutely amazing and make working out much easier not being connected to a cord or dealing with spotty connection. I can easily walk all over the gym and never lose sound quality. I’ve found the right bud to not fit quite as snug as the left but that is my ear not the actual ear buds fault.

title: Keep the case with you when using the buds to recharge them and store them.
body: I love this product! I use them for convenience; they're better than my car Bluetooth setup. And I also use them in an infrared dry heat sauna. Every other earbud that I've tried has heated up, these do not, and I can wear them for an entire hour sweat session. I don't usually get jazzed about products, but this one I really like. For the price it did not disappoint. The only thing is just be careful as they're easy to lose. However, they thought about that with the recharging case so keep the buds with the case; don't just stick them in your pocket or you will forget about them.

title: Amazing earbuds, so easy!
body: I am so glad I finally stopped buying the cheap $5 earbuds like every week and purchased these. They have 4 different ear bud sizes to fit pretty much everyone, although I think it would still be too big for children on the smallest setting. The small fit me perfectly, they never fall out when I'm working out. Syncing them to my phone was amazing, it just happened right before I could read the instructions on how, all I did was turn them on and my phone found it right away. I do wish the sound had a little more bass, but other than that sound quality is great. I haven't tried using for anything like phone calls yet.

title: Exactly what I was looking for!!!
body: I wanted some ear buds that I could wear out at the pool and could wear while driving.  I only wear one when driving so I needed to be able to use one at a time.  I can do that with this product.  Just picking up the right bud, and connecting it to my phone, it has a beep that is trying to connect the left for about a minute or so then stops.  I'm very happy with these buds, the are doing exactly what I wanted.

title: Convenient in every way with really great audio
body:
This was the first product that I really wanted to go out of the way to review the moment I turned them on. However, I wanted to give them some time to make sure that I would still be satisfied with them a few weeks down the line and all I can say is that I have never been more happier with a purchase. I really enjoy these.

The moment I tried them, I was immediately impressed with the sound quality as it was multiple times better than the wired earphones that came with my Samsung Galaxy s9. With my previous earphones, I would still manage to have a hard time hearing the majority of audio even at maximum volume.
However, now using these, I rarely even find myself putting the volume above the standard warning you receive when placing the volume too high. Even with my volume halfway, I can hear the audio in the same way as if it were at full volume. On top of that, the quality of the bass was immediately noticable and made everything so much more better to listen to.

As well, many times before, I have found myself trying to find ways to where I could listen to music simultaneously while taking a shower or accomplishing other activities that tend to obstruct the clarity of music. With these, I don't have to worry about the possibility of my neighbors complaining about my music being too loud anymore. The fact that these are bluetooth and waterproof have really been useful to help cut out the middle man and take the music wherever I wish to listen to it. All without the cord in standard wired earphones getting caught up in things and getting tangled up by the time I pull them out of my pocket.

It comes with extra sillicone ear buds, a charging usb cable, and that fabric cord (I dont know what it's called) that is used for the wireless charging container to be hung with. The charging container itself is magnetic which makes the lid durable, and it makes its grip on the bluetooth earbuds firm enough not to fall out when placed inside to charger.

Some tips:
1. I'm not sure if it comes with a brick to charge but I use a standard phone charger with the usb cable it comes with
2. When taking them out to pair with phones, I sometimes have to take them out once, and instead place it back in to see the red lights, and take them out once more ready to be paired.
3. I use multiple devices to transition between, such as my phone and my laptop. So if I'm using my laptop on the bus along with these earbuds and need to put my laptop away when I am getting off, I shut off my laptops bluetooth first before putting it away, and then turn on my phone's bluetooth to connect it with the Tozo Earbuds.
And I do this process vice versa.

I really couldn't be more excited to recommend these enough times. Great product!

title: Great sound, great price.
body: I like these earbuds very much. Right away I was impressed with the look and feel of the case and the fit of the earpieces inside. The earpieces fit well after trying the various foam earpads. The sound is really what impressed me the most, especially for the price. It is a warm and natural sound and fully adjustable with the equalizer on my iphone. I highly recommend the TOZO T10 earbuds.

title: Great value wireless earbuds
body:
Having lost my second pair of wired earphone Jaybirds, I decided to give these a try.  I've had the Tozo T10 earbuds for 2 weeks.  My expectations were exceeded for price I paid.  I've used them running and cycling with good result.  Occasionally on my ride, the left and right will get out of sync for 10-30 seconds, giving a very slight echo affect but readjusted quickly.  Sound itself has been very good, I mainly listen to voice ( audio books and podcasts with a little music).  Ive done several calls with no complaints from callers.  T10s have been very comfortable, wearing them 1 -2 hours at a stretch with no issues staying in nor on battery life.  They charger case is great, enabling 3-4 full recharges.
Cons are very limited controls on earbud but mitigated by using phone to control  and no sound customization  (ie, no equilalizer to make tenor/base adjustments).

In summary I would buy them again (and probably will if I misplace these too).

title: who needs airpods?
body: these are honestly much more practical than airpods in many ways. not only are they very affordable but they perform just as well, if not better. the battery life is incredible and the overall quality of sound is beautiful. think im gonna be using these for a very long time.

title: Good sound
body: These earbuds have very good sound, fit in the ear really well. Although the music is muted when a phone call comes in on the phone, you cannot use the ear buds to speak on the phone.

title: Uncomfortable, gave me headaches and fell out of ears
body: First the good stuff. Sound quality was excellent. BUT, they were extremely uncomfortable and gave me a headache every time I used them, They hurt. Even the smallest size was too big. They continually fell out of my ears. I am returning, the headaches negated the quality of the sound.

title: So far so good
body: Sound great and all functions work properly. A bit of trouble getting connected correctly but once I did they worked flawlessly. Took 2 phone calls the next day and they worked great no problems with adequate volume. So far im very satisfied with their performance... will update this review in a couple months after more use.

title: I like that way they charge but they do not conserve power by going off automatically
body: I purchased these after my $20 mpow headphones stopped working (after at least 2 years of daily use).  I was excited to have a pair of ear buds and these reviews were good so I spent the $50 and got these.  I have headphones in all night after I fall to sleep to an approximate one hour of playing podcasts while sleeping. I will say the sound with these is very good but they apparently don't power off on their own and I was startled awake with a "Battery low" message in the morning.  That's not going to work for me. I need a longer battery or they need to program them to go off after a period of non use to conserve the battery.

title: You get what you pay for. Not for iPhones.
body:
Edit: these will not stay connected to each other.

These headphones felt more expensive than they are. The volume is great. It would be better if double click skipped to the next song. They work great if you stay inside and sit still on the couch, unmoving. The minute I step outside with these, they constantly drop connection with each other and cut in and out. These headphones seem to work perfectly with my Chromebook but kinda wonky with my iphone. They are good for $30-40 headphones if you sit still in your house.

title: Great sound and listening time with fair pricing!
body: Like the sound of these. First time use after charging all was as advertised. Easiest pairing of more expensive brands. Second use left ear bud didn’t charge for some reason unknown. Put back in charger and disconnected charger from wired charging. This time left ear did not automatically pair up. Turned both off the back on again and all went well. What’s missing volume control feature and next or last song control. This seems to be a barrier for independent wireless ear buds I have tried even for those manufacturers of over priced brands like xFyro.

title: Shower with the music you like to sing with in your ears without a care in the world..
body:
Pros:
Sound quality is Great even when the volume is turned all the way up.
They can get vary loud. I normally have trouble hearing with headphones though I have to keep the volume turned down on these.
Batteries last longer than I expected for there size.
IP rating is great, haven't had any problems with them in the shower or the mud.
Wired and wireless charging is great, and I use both of them.

Cons:
Noice cancellation works but the noisier it is the louder you have to talk.
No volume or voice calling controls (Does have one click Answer and Hang up).
The case only recharges them about two and a half times.
Left earbud disconnects sometimes, mostly when I put my hand over my ear when scratching my head or when I lay on my side in bed the pellow blocks the signal.

Other thoughts:
They fell out of my shirt pocket into a mud puddle and I didn't realize it until I was about to leave the job site. Washed them off with bottled water and kept using them without any problems. Mud puddle was next to my truck where I hooked my hoses up. Lucky that was the only place I bent over at or I might not have found them. They were still turned on when I found them too. If these were Samsung headphones they would have been tost.

Lisa Yang left a comment complaining about the company telling them they would send them a free wireless charger if they posted a five star review. I got the same email and it didn't say I had to post a five start only they a had to post a good review to get the free charging pad. Well so everyone knows I already had multiple Samsung charging pads for all my devices so I don't need one from them I am simply posting a review so people that read Lisa Yang's reviews don't think the company is paying for five star reviews.
I am a Samsung fanboy but I do not own any of Samsung's wireless earbuds because the battery dies way to fast (excepton the new models), they have no IP rating (the new ones are rated at IPX2, wow trash), and they cost $130 vs Tozo IPX8 for $50.

If for some reason they do send me a wireless charging pad for this review, I will just give it away unless its a Samsung.

I have been vary pleased with these headphones and plan on buying five or more for family and friends that don't have bluetooth headphones this coming Christmas.

title: Cheap
body: I've been using these for just a few minutes now and the left ear bud keeps cutting in and out when I move. Not a good sign fresh out of the box

title: Not too shabby earbuds
body: I was looking into the market for some wireless earbuds for everyday use from driving hands free, working out at the gym, and I've even showered with them while listening to music. The sound quality is pretty good and they are pretty durable. Love the fact I can charge these on the go with the small charging case. It's always a must for me before I go walk my dog so I can listen to music and get some steps in. They last about a good 2 1/2 hours with a full charge. I've even watched a whole movie on my phone without the battery dying. Why are you still reading this review, still debating on getting apple airpods. Do yourself a favor and don't break the bank with a pair of these bad boys!

title: Great Addition
body: Great sound! Find your proper ear cushion for comfort and great sound! Wireless charging worked flawlessly. Automatic on and pairing didn't on first attempt. Probably user error, if not review will be edited. Nice case, and packaging was nice. Excited!

title: Love them!
body: These earbuds come with a few different sizes to fit different ear sizes. The earbuds are great at drowning out noise. When I put them in and turn on anything from a podcast to music it tunes out all other noise. They are great for bass playing as well. I have not tried to water proof aspect of it so I cannot comment on that part.

title: Excellent Value, Great Features, Impossible to beat for the price
body:
Right out of the box these come with must-have accessories: a charging case, three sizes of ear buds, a lanyard to attach to the edge of the case, USB charger and info about the warranty.

I've had these for about a month and so far so good. The battery life is about 3 hours as advertised and I can usually get 2-3 full charges out of the case. The most useful feature by far is the fact that you can use one headphone at a time as it doubles the battery life. Whenever one bud is low I swap it out for the other one. Though they say R and L you can easily put them in either ear.

Pros
Can use one at a time
great accessories
incredible price
sleek look
bluetooth connection is fast and reliable
decent noise canceling
wireless charger capability
Asurion warranty available
great value
actually water resistant, I took them in the shower a few times

Cons
Sometimes audio quality dips but I'm not sure if its an internet connection issue
Wish the charging case could hold more juice but you'd have to pay a lot more for that

title: They made my teen boy happy.
body:
Before I bought these for my 17 yr. Old I bought him another brand which costed more but I had to take back because my son was disappointed with them.....seen these on Amazon and thought why not!
My son was happy and thought they were more expensive then the last pair but they were $100 less....saved money and my 17 yr. Old happy.....priceless!

title: Great for exercise & motorcycle riding
body: These earbuds are awesome! I use them everyday for working out and they even fit inside my motorcycle helmet! All other earbuds I've owned I always had to use full volume because they were so quiet, not with these. These I can't even go above 75% volume. They totally cancel any outside sound even when the volume is low, which is great protection for my ears from wind noise when riding on the freeway. I haven't had a chance to test the waterproofing but upon visual inspection they seem to be sealed very well. Would highly recommend.

title: Very good value for price
body: Although they don't look it, I seem to have very difficult ears to fit.  These work well and stay put, thanks to a variety of included tips.  The sound is also quite nice, although my chief use is with podcasting.  The only slight issues I've had with them is that once in a while, in their case and therefore theoretically off, they'll spring to life and connect to my phone, which then goes silent and creating a puzzle for me to solve; and they might occasionally hiccup the connection, reconnect themselves, and there will be a few seconds' phasing as they sync up again.  Not enough for me to be annoyed with.

title: Good value, good sound
body:
I'm a big fan of the Tozo T10 headphones.  I have bought 3 pairs so far for my family and I use them every day.  For the price, I don't think you can beat them--they are comfortable, simple to use, and high-quality.  If you push them down into your ears, the bass is excellent (if you just lightly put them in, you won't hear much bass at all, which is typical for ear buds).
The microphone performs well for phone calls, but in any place other than a silent room, I find it necessary to take the right earbud out of my ear and hold it in front of my mouth.  Otherwise the other person on the call can't hear me.  That's not great (because I have to use a hand to hold the earbud in front of my mouth), but I don't think there is much Tozo can do about that.
I have had difficulty with the wireless charging.  I told Tozo that one of my cases would not charge wirelessly (it still charges fine with a USB cable), and they sent me a new one immediately, which was great service.  However, the new case also does not charge wirelessly, which makes me think there is just something wrong with the design or the component or an internal connection (I have tried multiple charging pads, with the same result on all of them).  On the other hand, wireless charging is such a minor benefit (you have to plug the pad into a USB cord anyway, so might as well plug into the earbud case instead) that it doesn't change my opinion of the product.
I haven't tested how waterproof the earbuds are, but I do bike with them frequently, and they work absolutely great.  I put my iphone in the back pocket of my biking jersey (pro tip: put the iphone in a ziploc sandwich bag--now the iphone is truly protected from rain because there is no earbud wire to break the waterproof seal of the baggie) and the bluetooth works great with both earphones.

title: Just what I was looking for!
body: After an extensive search for wireless headphone to workout with I came across these earbuds. I was happy to find earbuds that weren't too big and clunky, I was even happier to find earbuds that had different size adapters for your ears, and I was thrilled to find a pair that were priced as fairly as these. I used the smallest size and they have yet to pop out of my ears while running - I get to the point where I forget I am wearing them. The charging case is tiny and super convenient.  Best earbuds I have tried in years!

title: Best combination of sound quality, ease of use, and price.
body:
I decided I had to quit using wired ear phones while I was trying  to use the many different types of excercise machines in my Cardio Pulmonary Physical Therapy  sessions. Those ear phone wires kept getting tangled with the moving parts of my excercise machine!
Now I am able to excercise without having to stop and pickup my cell phone.
I'm now looking to using my bluetooth ear phones and listening to more audio books, while improve my health.

title: Solid purchase with a couple down sides
body: I purchased based on reviews of the high quality sound being as good or superior to AirPods. That is a stretch. By no means are they poor just not on same level. The recharging case is nice but need to make sure they are in just right or won’t charge.  I bought them to wear while doing yard work. I do find that they pop out rather easily even after using a smaller rubber thingy. Pairing requires manually clicking in settings every time which is actually kind of annoying. Overall though, a decent purchase. One impressive point is that they survived a round trip through the laundry.

title: Great quality for the price.
body: Awesome product easy to setup. I am 65 year old female and the unpacking and setup took less than five minutes. The included instructions are very good. The sound is great. I highly recommend these.

title: Great Bluetooth Earbuds
body: These earbuds offer great value as they provide high quality sound and comfort for a very reasonable price. I use them daily and have not noticed any decline in charge length. The case is awesome if you need to charge away from a plug in power source. It holds about 2 charges worth before it needs to be plugged in again. Recently, i have been having trouble charging one of the earbuds but their customer service is great and I was able to get the issue resolved. Would recommend

title: They can take the sweat!!!!
body: I have bought countless headphones over the years and none of them til now have stood up to working outside in the hot Florida weather! These are the first headphones that can handle sweat or being worn the rain! They are easy to pair, fit well and stay put, and have a great sound quality! They go from handling the outdoor weather to awesome speakers for watching movies without disturbing my husband! The only downside to these is if you’re married, expect to be buying your spouse a pair when they see how nice they are!

title: Left ear bid cuts out non stop
body: Just received this, charged it all up and synced to my phone.  Need to listen to tunes while mowing, and have been using corded ear buds in the past.  Was excited to not have to get tangled up in cords anymore.  Sad to say I am not happy with this selection. I have re-synced these about 5 times now and the left ear bud cuts out continuously. Very annoying.  It’s too bad because the sound out of these is great.  I will be sending back.

title: ***updated review***good starting set.
body:
product arrive in new pack. hard to set up first time. Earbuds would not sync to eachother. sound was a little aboveach other. wish they lasted longer.

***updated ****
so after having the headsets for a while I'm pretty happy with them. only reason why I could not give them 5 stars is because the earpieces didnt last 2 hours on a full charge.  Tozo has great customer service so that's what bump them from 3 to 4 stars. I know mostly use the headphones before bed when I want to watch something on my kindle or hear my audio books.

title: Good quality Happy Customer
body: These wireless earbuds are a great find.  I was hesitant as I had never heard of the brand before.  But took the jump and ordered them.  They paired extremely well with the iPhone X that I have and are very easy to use.  The sound quality is exceptional for what you pay for with these.  The four sizes that are included will aid in any ear type, this was the feature I was most looking forward to since "airpods" do not fit my ear.  Overall I would definitely purchase again or for a friend or family member.

title: Best cost efficient earbuds!
body: I love the convenience of having a phone conversation and not having to hold the phone. Sound is great! When running the earbuds stay in my ear with no problems of falling out. I used the smallest ear insert. Staying connected is also great. If you want only 1 earbud in,  you can just pick up the one you want& it's a 1x manual connection. Every connection after that is automatic which I love!

title: Worth it!
body:
Love that the case is a charger itself. The buds are very comfortable. I was worried they were going to fall out since I typically use the smallest size of buds for any typical headphones. Using the smallest buds on these ones, were no problem. I go to the gym and they dont fall out or move. I appreciate it that the case comes with a lanyard and that you can see the charge status through the case cover. The sounds quality is good for the price and quite loud. The bass is deep and sometimes muffled the songs but Im sure it because of the sound settings I have on my phone, which can be tweaked.

I only gave it 4 stars because you cant control the volume on the buds themselves, nor skip to the next song. All of this has to be done on the phone. Hopefully they add these features to the next one. But for 50 bucks its not a big deal.  Also, the sound quality when using the buds for a call is not that great but I personally purchased these for the gym.

title: For the price, I recommend.
body:
I’ve had these for almost a week now and they have really impressed.  The bass is solid and deep, without being too much or crackled.  The mids are good, and the highs are sharp.

For the price, I recommend.

title: Do not buy
body: I would give this product zero stars if I could.  Unfortunately Amazon reviews are becoming less helpful these days and this a another example of the problem.  As other reviews (which are hard to find) have said, the sound quality is only fair.  They do not pair well.  Frequently loose connection with device and each other.  An annoying beeping sound has started in the device that will not stop.  They are big and bulky in the ear.  Spend your money else where

title: Enough bass and sound for my Techno!! Must buy.
body: Techno listeners!  This is rocks!  I'm not usually a big fan of bluetooth headphones but I love these things.  Ps I'm a DJ/Producer!

title: Frustrating connection issues
body:
I bought a pair of these earlier this year and gave a 1 star review. This was mainly because the left earbud would constantly disconnect. The manufacturer told me I just got a defective pair, and that they would send a new pair if I was willing to delete my review. This seemed fair enough, and they quickly sent out a new pair once the review was deleted.

Unfortunately, the new pair has the same issues as before, and I would recommend not buying these. The sound quality isn’t bad, but the non stop cutting out of the left earbud is a dealbreaker when it comes to wireless earbuds. I appreciate that they were willing to make this right, but 2 pairs of bad earbuds don’t help anyone. I highly recommend spending more on a better brand.

title: Great bass, delivers in its promises!
body: These are the first I’ve bought in a while that lived up to all their claims. Every now and then, at the office only, left one will drop out for a second. The bass is GREAT!

title: Washed these with my laundry. They still work.
body: I’d love they battery to last much much longer if possible but since they made it through the wash cycle and the dry cycle and turned on after with no issues. So these are pretty good. I doubt apple can survive being in the wash for 40 mins.

title: Left channel constantly cutting out
body: Earbuds looks and sound pretty good, but no matter how many times I follow the 'reset' procedure to try to fix the issue, the left channel constantly cuts out if I move my head much, or even partially cover the earbud.

title: Move on
body: Constantly disconnect even with phone not a foot away...zero volume

title: buy at own risk
body: I waited to review, I'm glad I did, sound quality when working was good but they keep cutting in and out which is fine if you like hearing every 3rd or fifth word so I can't recommend that anyone buy these, personally I find that the 25 dollar pair of Anker sound sport  I got from Walmart to be a better product

title: Great product!
body: These earbuds are great! Fits well in my ear and even if it didnt, they have multiple ear bud sizes. Also the whole thing fits well in my earlobe. Also working out with these fit really well and never moved around at all when working out. Sounds is good but could be a little clearer but still good for the price and for something wireless. Lastly it has a good range when working out so you can have it anywhere in a decent sized room. Great product!

title: Great value
body: Honestly don't know how they could have done better.  Sound is great, stay in during workout, battery life appears to be phenomenal.  Honestly don't know what the attraction could be to incent someone to pay $100 more for some other brand, and for someone who is much more likely to lose 'em than wear 'em out, I really like the price point. Charging case is super handy.  Connectivity is really solid, although I do see the right bud dropping when I move my phone around, but its very rare. Going to push the envelop this week and see how they do in the pool will update after a couple of long lap workouts.

title: Great Product!
body: I bought these to wear at the gym and when entering data at work. They work great! I can easily, and quickly, charge them at home or work. Once charged, they hold their charge for quite some time. They connect easily to my LG K30 Android phone. It was super easy to setup.  I would recommend this product if you are looking for wireless earbuds.

title: Surprised
body: Paired up no problem to samsung s8+, sound quality is very good for music even having surprising bass for earbuds this small, audio books (audible) are a little tinny but that could be the app or recording. I use these for stationary bike, weights, and walking with no problem , will try on bicycle when weather warms up.  I think for the price this is a great deal, equal or better than higher priced units.

title: Awesome product!
body: The ear buds are very good and really comfortable in my ear. I truly love the build quality or the ear buds and the sound is amazing. Would recommend this product for anyone looking for true wireless ear buds. They connect quickly to the Bluetooth of your phone.

title: Great Product / Sound Quality
body: I have to say this is more bang for its buck! I have had these for about a week now and I can say I am very impressed. The product quality alone feels not cheap at all. The charge case is sturdy and well built. The magnetic piece that charges your earbuds is a very nice feature that allows perfect charge connectivity. The sound is flawless and I really like the bass level they added. I can lastly say I will recommend this to my friends. Thank you for also providing a 1 year warranty. That shows you really stand behind your product and want the best for your customers.

title: Decent for the price. 5/5 for customer service.
body:
EDITED: 5/5 stars for excellent customer service

Sound quality is very acceptable. Not perfect, but good enough for casual music and phone calls. My Note 9's speakers sounds significantly better, and when I'm on a call people say my cell phone's microphone is noticeably superior to the T10 microphone.

They were a bit of a pain to setup, but part of that was a problem with my phone, not the product itself. They sometimes automatically connect out of the case, but only like 20% of the time, and it's a little annoying to pair them. Have been using them almost a week and have had no battery life problems, but I also don't need to use them for more than 3 hours at a time, and any time I'm not using them, I put them back in the case.

There is somewhat noticeable latency when watching video on my phone or computer, maybe 50-100 ms. Pretty standard for "true wireless" headphones.

Really like the size and form factor of both the buds and the case, these are my first pair of wireless earbuds and I really like the freedom of not having a cable to break or get tangled.

4/5

title: I wanted to love these
body: Having finally upgraded my ancient iPhone 5C to an XR, I decided to try and reduce the number of 3.5mm headphone jacks in my life as well.  These took a bit of fussing and resetting to connect in stereo, but then they worked fine. However, I either have weird ears or exceptionally tiny ear canals - the smallest earbud tips didn't fit and they won't stay in.  (And honestly, I'm not a huge fan of those squishy things stuffed in my ears anyway after over-ear cans for my listening needs.)  So I'm returning because they don't work for me.  That being said, sound was good, setup was easy, and if you're the sort of person who doesn't mind those little smooshy tips in your ears, these should work fine.

title: Always had issues.
body: This was my first wireless ear buds. I thought they would be great, because what company would sell ear buds at this day in age that wouldnt be decent for at least a year?! I buy everything on amazon and read the reviews just like you. Not sure if I got just a bad pair or not. I am always willing to give the company another chance. I have only had mine a few weeks and i have had nothing but issues.Sometimes they connect, sometimes they dont. Sometimes the left ear works,sometimes it doesnt. Now today, 6/24/19 the left wont work at all.Ive tried resetting the bluetooth, turn them on and off in different sequences, charging it etc. Nothing. So good luck.I am sure there are other buyers who had better luck.

title: Great sound quality, caveat emptor with the in call microphone quality
body:
Overall 3 stars because the microphone is horrible for attempting to make a phone call.  To the point that I just stopped trying.

The audio quality and fit in the ears is great, the ability to charge in the case and the fact the case charges on the wireless charging pads is nice.  Syncing the earphones takes a second or two if one drops out.

title: Great Product / Great Customer Service
body:
I truly love these earbuds. After years of buying ones that never stay in my ears, these ones do. Couldn't be happier with my purchase.

The customer service is amazing. I lost one of my earbuds while working, and I had a warranty on them but it didn't cover replacement earbuds however Katherine from TOZO customer service sent me a pair of brand new ones. Talk about a company who's customer service goes the extra mile for their customers. You guys are awesome and so are these earbuds

title: Sound quality and Reliable Wireless Earbuds " A very satisfied customer"
body:
I have always been very cautious when writing reviews. I don't like to jump right away to express satisfaction because once the honeymoon is over you might regret what was said. Having said that, I had these for over a month and I can honestly say that I love them. The sound quality while I'm working out and noise reduction is really awesome. The battery life to my surprise very dependable. Why spending 100 to 150 dollars when you can have these for a very affordable price. That's the reason why I rated them with a five. You wont regret getting them, you will be very pleased!
JDiaz

title: NOPE
body:
UPDATE: It has been less than a MONTH and they are already glitching. I hate the internet and all their god damn useless suggestions.

I don’t know what everyone is so hysterically excited about. These are pretty much what you’d expect for $50. The design is bulky, the pairing is spotty, and the sound fidelity for music is very hollow. They’re fine for what they are but there is literally nothing exceptional going on here.

title: Nice wireless earbuds
body: Just started using them for about a week.  First impression is you have to try the different size ear plugs to get the best fit for you.  The sound is very good.  No volume control.  I use them for running and gym.  They are a bit larger than I thought but fit in the ear well.  I run 3 to 4 miles and sweat and they stayed well in my ears.  Have to adjust to how they feel since there is no wire connection between the two ear pieces and you will have the feeling that they may fall out, so that is what you have to get used too.  Have had very minor sound cutting out.  I am mostly connecting them to a gar in and Tom Tom fitness watch.

title: Tozo10 Bluetooth ear buds are the perfect match for my lifestyle.
body: I have been looking 6 years now for a way to go wireless with my phone and MP3 player.  These little bluetooth beauties from Tozo are by far the best I have tried.  I love the versatile charging system.  I work 10 hour days and listen to music from the time I leave home.  The battery life is  pretty average at 2 1/2 to 3 hours of continuous use, so I have 3 pair and get through the day changing them out as  needed.  Pairing is super easy.  The sound quality beats any of the wired buds.  As expected, it took a few tries to get the best fit, but once I figured out which size to use,  I rarely have problems with them falling out.  I have learned that chewing gum or eating will get them to fall out though.  These wireless ear buds are a great buy and the customer service is excellent.

title: Forget air buds
body: I had voiced out my negative opinion with the previous buds i ordered and the company sent me a brand spanking new one, no questions asked. Seemed i had a faulty product so i was given one that worked better. Good value.

title: So Far So Good, Everything According to Specs
body:
So far I've quite enjoyed the bluetooth headphones -- I switched from Apple Airpods and I found the bass and sound quality to be better, as well as it to be easy to switch from one ear to the next unlike the airpods which only fit in one ear. I like to switch them from left to the right so minimize hearing damage.
Cons:
 - the case is larger than my airpods and doesn't fit very comfortably in my pocket
 - doesn't seem as though you can use only the left headphone, you have to take the right one out of the case to use the left by itself

title: Working well so far!
body: I’ve had the earbuds for a couple of weeks now, and so far I am really enjoying the sound with music. They don’t work the best for speaking into, but I didn’t really intend to use them for phone calls. I am surprised at how well they stay in my ears.

title: Excellent earbuds,Excellent customer service
body: I'm going to be honest,for just 50 dollars i didnt really expect much but these blew me away.They had excellent sound quality and felt good while laying down with them.They are also very water resistant as i found out when i accidentaly dropped them in a bath.The customer service is also great (i sent an email at around 9:20 P.M. and they responded the next morning).I am  very happy with the quality of these and highly recommend for the cheap price.The battery life is also great which ice sometimes found to be annoying because of the bulky case they come in which is ok since it is basically a power bank for them and can charge them around 3 times.

title: These are great pair of Buds
body: I was skeptical of getting these even with the great reviews and ended up getting the B&O 2.0 even though there was a mix of review about the B&O’s. The sound quality is good and the bass is heavy, if there was a way to adjust the bass, and I'm not a fan of press controls I would have returned the B&., For one the price they cannot be matched and secondly the PRICE!! Cannot be matched.

title: Great for music, bad for gaming.
body:
I waited until I go the feel for these earbuds before I rated. After about a week and a half, here is my opinions.
Sound quality is great, it’s crystal clear, bass is just insane, and overall I enjoy listening to music far more on these than any other device I have. The only issue(which has passed) was when I first connected them to my phone and the left earbud kept cutting out. I think the issue is the right one being the master connected device. The left earbud connects to the right instead of the phone and seems to have a shorter distance it can travel from the right. Since I noticed that, it has been fixed. The comfort is good, it doesn’t fall out of my ears and it doesn’t hurt having them in for hours on end.

Verdict: if your using it for music, YouTube, Netflix, etc... it’s great. However if you are a gamer, and plan to use these on your pc or console, you need to look somewhere else. The audio is a good 2 seconds of delay for some reason.

title: Don't run with them
body:
Well I can say I did a bit of research regarding earbuds.  I needed a set of earbuds that would fit an active lifestyle in hot out door environments and pool time. Majority of the use would be doing long runs and lots of sweat and sun.  I also didn't want to have to spend all my petty cash on one product. Well these seemed to be the earbuds for me. I have to say,  with only one day of use I was impressed with the easy connection and sound quality. I went on a short 2.5 mile run. By mile 1,  the earbuds took turns falling out of my ears. I was not happy having to stop and pick up an earbud and continue running.  My run became a constant check and finger poking to keep the earbuds in place.

it could be that I have shallow depth ear canals. If you have deep set ear holes and some what on the large size, this may the the buds for you.  I am sorry to say that I just cant use them for the one thing i needed them for. Listen to music while running. I  think my brother (non runner and couch potato) will love these. Happy Birthday bro. You just got some earbuds. I am back to the long boring process of looking for another pair of earbuds that will stay in my ears while running .

If they would stay in my ears, I would be very happy and recommend them to friends.

title: Great sound for the price
body: Great sound. Relatively easy to connect. Didn't give 5 stars for 2 reasons:  1) ear bud sizes are difficult to change & 2)when u connect to just the right bud it beeps for about a minute.  Maybe this is a warning that you can't get rid of or I'm doing something wrong.

title: Good quality
body: For the price, you cannot beat these pair of wireless earbuds. They connect to multiple devices. So I listen to them on my laptop and on my phone when I receive calls. The call clarity, according to my friends, is very clear. They charge very quickly and what's more convenient is that they are wireless charging capable. They come with multiple earbud sizes and the case that they are carried in is fairly small.

title: Great ear buds.. More than I expected!!
body: Recently my Bluetooth broke and I was in the market for new one. I was on Amazon and saw this product and it had great reviews. I wasn’t really looking for wireless ear buds, but I said “ what the heck?” I received them yesterday and they were very easy to pair and the sound is awesome!! I would definitely buy more and tell people about them.. So far I have had a great experience with them!!

title: Bring Duct Tape!!!
body: The sound is good for the average ear. For the audiophile it scores a 4 out of 10. No way to adjust the EQ properly. The waterproof feature is nice for someone who sweats like me. The 3 ear sizes are not enough...as they keep dropping out. Nothing that duct tape can’t cure!

title: Loses connection
body: Great sound, deep bass and does a good job blocking outside noise. Call quality is great also. But they feel bulky and stick out in my ear. I feel them kind of slipping out slowly after a while of having them on but not to the point I feel like they’ll ever fall out. The buttons are quite harder to press compared to others I’ve used. Battery life per charge is ok but I’ve seen and used longer ones. But these are not the dealbreakers or the reason I returned them: they constantly kept disconnecting and reconnecting, especially during phone calls and that was very frustrating. I’m disappointed in that regard. Otherwise, these would have been some great pair of earbuds to have.

title: I am loving my TOZO-T10 IPX8
body: Just received my wireless earbuds. I have used it on my cellphone and now I am also paired with my laptop. What an amazing product I highly recommend this is better than some $$$ expensive brand outthere will not mentioned their names but this is worth buying. Thank You! TOZO for creating such good quality earbuds.

title: TOZO T10 for Me
body:
I liked that it is wireless. However, I was not able to use it as a BlueTooth because during phone calls the other person who I was talking to could not hear me.
The manufacturer replaced the item for free without any hassle. It was a good customer experience.

title: A great product for the price and quality of the product.
body: I recently purchased these and so far they have been great. The sound quality is amazing and I love that they're so easy to use. Very pleased with purchase.

title: Honestly a good company to buy from
body: I go to the gym everyday and I like to be able to have loud music and focus on me. These headphones have not been bad at all. for $50 they are better then expected so i gave the product a 4/5. why the overall review in 5/5 is because after a few months the case and everything just died out on me. I got hold of the company and they were very good about willing to send a replacement set for free. that to me speaks volumes.

title: Excellent Value Headphones
body:
Plastic case is quality.  Decent gasket/cover for charging port.  Good size.
Headphones come with a good number of tips for a good fit.  These are not noice cancelling, but with a good fit, they block sound as headphones should.
Sound and bass levels are excellent.

I'm really pleased with these headphones.

UPDATE 2019/9/25: After spending more time with the headphones,  I have decided they deserve 5 Stars.  I have worn them in the pool, in the shower while shampooing my hair, and while working out.  They stay where I put them and I were waterproof as described.

title: OMG .. The Bass
body:
If you love deep, rich, booming bass, then these are for you.  This isn't muddled bass but strong, full sounding bass.  They are also very comfortable to wear ...I can keep them in for hours without fatigue.  Battery life is good (about 4 hrs), the volume is plenty loud at 50% ..and the charger case will charge wirelessly (or with included usb cable)  Three sets of tips included to insure a perfect fit.  These are comparable to my Bose Soundsports (really) at 1/4th the price.  Phone calls are clear.  I would of given 5 stars if you could advance tracks and control volume.
UPDATE:  I can't believe the fidelity of these earbuds.  Updating to 5 stars regardless of the advance track and volume control (or lack of)  These SURPASS my Bose SoundSport in every way ....comfort, bass, overall sound ...I can't describe the sound quality enough ....I must have 10 pair or more of wireless earbuds ...each almost hitting the mark ...these surpass the mark ...these will hit those sub bass notes ...and in a pleasing way ...they rival an expensive pair of over the ear headphones.

title: Update:  Solid Wireless Earbuds [Model T10] from Tozo
body:
Very nice wireless earbuds.  Sound quality is top notch.  Wish the buttons could be used to skip to next track.  Would recommend this product.
Update:  Had connectivity issues with my earbuds.  It was a pleasant experience interfacing with Tozo customer service.  They were quickly able to send out a replacement pair!  Would absolutely buy again and recommend!

title: Great set of gym ear buds!
body: I bought these as a replacement for another pair of ear buds.  These are waterproof and I get really sweaty when I work out, and these work great.  They do not slip out, and they are very comfortable after 2 hours in the gym.  I haven't had much of a chance to test the noise cancelling, since I am always listening to music.  But for the price these things are amazing!

title: Fit and battery life steal the show.
body: When I received the TOZO T10 wireless earbuds I was quite excited. Most earbuds do not fit my ears well and the wires are always getting tangled during the times I use ear buds (yardwork, lawn mowing, rote work of almost any kind.) I found that the smallest of the included soft inserts enabled the buds to fit perfectly and close out a lot of the outside noise. The sound quality was excellent although I had to be careful where I carried my phone or the Bluetooth signal could get blocked. Most impressive was the battery life. I found that I could work for most of the day outside and not need recharge. I highly recommend these ear buds.

title: Well fitting, new name earbuds
body:
For being a brand name I have never heard of these earbuds have really impressed. It comes with multiple sizes of interchangeable squishy ear peices, however the size that came pre installed works great for me. You could even use a different size for each ear if your canals are of differing sizes.

The charging case opens and closes using magnets, and the whole thing has a nice weight to it. It feels well made and durable for pocket carry. The earbuds click into their respective charging slots via magnetics as well.

Wireless charging works, as does the micro USB cord.

I primarily use these earbuds for playing TPP games on my cellphone like PUBG and watching videos. The headphones work great for this purpose and sound awesome.

I have noted some sound cutting in and out of the left earbud while laboring. I was shoveling snow from my driveway using them and noticed as I swung my arm it seemed to make the audio cut in and out of the left earpiece. The right remained constant. I attempted repositioning the source (my phone) closer to my head to account for winter layering. This did not help. I even re-established the Bluetooth connection multiple times with no avail.

For what I primarily use these earbuds for I remain happy with my product. Just been careful if you intend on primarily using them for work or exercise.

title: Great Sound - uncomfortable fit
body:
The sound quality exceeded my expectations. The bass was nice and clean with a good mixture of mids and highs. The case/charger felt solid with a magnetically closing lid.  The buds themselves were quick to charge and I had no issue connecting the ear buds to my computer via Bluetooth. Please note, the right connects to your device and the left bud connects to the right bud. You can use the right bud without the left, you can not use the left without the right.

I did find the ear buds to be a bit uncomfortable to wear for extended periods of time (15+ minutes), even after trying the various sizes of ear pads that came the unit. This is probably a personal preference as other may find them comfortable. This is the only reason I'll be returning the ear buds.

The only major flaw is the charging cable that came with the unit, the cable is  too short. You'll need to be less than a foot away from any charging port using this cable. There is no wall adapter, you'll need to use your computer to charge or a separate USB wall charger.

Side note: when you choose to use only the right bud, it will beep for the first 30-45 seconds as it searches for left ear bud. After x amount of time the beeping will stop. If you want to use the left ear bud after using the right ear bud for awhile you'll need to turn off the right ear bud and then back on so it can search for the left.

Overall a decent product for a great price.

title: Really wanted to like these.. sent back.
body: I own a pair of the Tozo T8's, had them for a few years and wanted to upgrade to something with more volume and better sound quality. I purchased the T10.  The build quality was impressive. The charging station, and earbuds in general were larger than the T8's, maybe something to do with the waterproof nature of them, maybe bigger drivers than the T8.  They did protrude from my ears much more than the T8, which I did not like. The sound quality was excellent. Very loud, good bass, good overall equalization, nice and balanced for such a small device.  The battery life was good.  I was VERY disappointed in the poor Bluetooth connection. The sound CONSTANTLY breaks up (doesn't disconnect entirely), to the point where I had to keep my phone always within 2 feet from where I was.  I couldn't even put my phone in my pocket or move my head from side to side.  Just constant , unnerving interruption..  killed my workouts!  I reset them as per the website instruction, I forgot device and re-connected, I shut bluetooth on and off numerous times. Nothing stopped the interruptions .  I have 3 other headsets and none of them do this. My T8s are better, my Jambuds (which hurt my ears) stay relatively breakup free within a decent range, my Vmoda Crossfades I can walk away 15 feet without an issue.. I literally had to hold the phone 1 foot in front of my face to get a decent constant connection with the T10.. even then it would sputter.  Sent them back, which stinks because I liked  the sound just fine.

title: Great for music, Unusable for Phone calls
body:
Good:
- Sound quality
- fit
- battery life
- case that stores battery and charges headphones

Bad
- microphone

These earbuds are great for running with music, even in the rain. However, if you're looking for a cheaper and less dumb-looking alternative to Airpods, these are not it. These are absolutely unusable for phone calls. The microphones are so weak that the other party can't hear you even if you're yelling. It's ridiculous.

title: Great for running!
body: I have been eyeing these headphones for a long time and finally got some for my birthday. I was skeptical of their ability to stay in during running, but I have been BLOWN AWAY by their performance! They have stayed perfectly in place for all of the runs I have used them on. They are very noise canceling, so I only use one for running. I love that I can use just one ear bud and not have to worry about the other bouncing around since there aren't wires! The sound quality is pretty good, and so far I haven't had any issues with battery life.

title: These are great for what I need them for
body:
got these for my hour long bus commute and couldn't be happier.  While they are good for sitting on the bus or walking to my office, they are a little bit on the chunky side, so I don't thing they'd be good for jogging or running .
Sound quality is super sharp, and they battery life is great. I use them for 45 mins  2x a day, and only need to re-charge 1x a week.

title: Don't stay in ear, stopped working after 5 months.
body:
I have had these headphones for less than 6 months and they already stopped working. The left headphone went out and the right beeps the entire time. When I tried to run with the headphones they always fell out; even after using the different earpieces.

I recommend spending the extra money to purchase the bose wireless headphones. They are much higher quality and stay in your ear without causing irritation. If there are any issues Bose will replace the headphones without question.

title: Great earbuds for a great price
body: I have never used bluetooth headphones or earbuds. So I thought I would give these a try after watching multiple reviews on YouTube. ToZo had high ratings on most review sites and I can "hear" why. The sound quality is excellent. Great bass. The charging case is compact and easy to use. I have not evaluated the noise cancelling ability, but gave it four stars anyway. It did take several attempts to get the buds to pair and then pair with my new phone. I believe this was due to my inexperience,  so you may need to attempt pairing multiple times. However, once accomplished, the buds pair quickly and the music sound is excellent. You will not regret purchasing these little gems. I am a happy customer and kudos to ToZo for their quality product at an excellent price point.

title: Not worth the price
body: I’m not sure how these headphones are getting the reviews they are getting. I’ve purchased three headsets, prices varying from $35 to $45 dollars, and in my opinion, they’re not worth it. The good in these headsets is that they sound pretty good. There’s a good range of lows, mids, and highs. They’re cordless. And they’re water resistant (I’ve showered in the pair I use). However, the bad news is that they are useless for phone calls. If you try to use these to talk on the phone, the person on the other end can’t hear you. This is a big negative for me because I like to be able to work at the computer while I’m talking on the phone. Also, the battery life is inconsistent. Some days I get a few hours of use, but most days I get an hour or two before they’re telling me the power is low. This is after they’ve been on their charger and plugged in all night. I’m getting the same review from the two other people I’ve purchased these for. In the end, I’ve had much better Bluetooth headsets, for more than half the price of this pair. When it’s time to get new ones, I’ll be looking elsewhere.

title: Great earbuds for the money
body: I had wanted truly wireless earbuds for some time, however did not want to pay $150 or more for a pair.  Then I saw these and figured for the price I could not go wrong.  I was absolutely right.  These are great little earbuds.  The sound quality is actually pretty good and the battery life is about 3 to 3.5 hours and I find the case very convenient. I have had them a few months now and I think they are great for the office or the gym.

title: Great Product!
body: So far so good. I have only had these for roughly a week and love the sound quality from these. I have yet to put them to the test with the waterproof feature. I was able to connect both sides to my phone easily. One of the things I liked is that these came with different sizes (the piece that goes in your ear) so you can find the right fit. These will more than likely be used at work where the wireless feature will come in handy. I, so far, recommend these for those who want true wireless headphones.

title: Very impressed
body:
I've owned couple of wireless headsets in the past and almost all of them have failed me. I was skeptical of buying this product, but needed one ASAP and the reviews seemed decent so I decided to give it a try.
I was very impressed by the sound quality and would recommend this to anyone.

title: Best of the $50 earbuds.
body:
I tried 7 different sets of “cheap” earbuds (around $50), and the TOZO T10 are the best of them by far.  I got the grey pair and they look amazing and not cheap at all.  The case while kind of big feels very solid.

I highly recommend these earbuds.

title: Good sounds value but not worth the side problems.
body:
It can in fact be used in the shower for example and sound quality is definitely worth the price.

But I have big problems.

Horrible connection. The headphones randomly and abruptly lose connections and lose sound while being connected and on full charge. This happens almost everyday. I’m holding my phone or am right in front of my computer screen  and the sound just goes away and stutters for unknown reasons.

Wish I could return and get my money back

title: Just not a good value
body:
I bought these trying to get a cheaper solution than the better engineered competitive products that are also 3x or 4x the price.

My key complaint is the fit.  They seemingly need to be pressed hard into the ear canal when worn.  This has caused irritation / pain when I have used them.  Further, they fall out intermittently.  I bought them to use while working out so this was a real pain.  I ended up bringing them to my work as kind of a backup pair of headphones but for the most part know I will never use them again.

The battery life and sound quality are average.  Nothing special about these except for the cost compared to similar products.  If you feel you will lose them often, this might be a better option.  Otherwise, you should probably do what I eventually did and just bite the bullet on a nicer pair

title: It was an amazing decision to buy these earbuds!!!
body: This earbuds are excellent. These are my first earbuds, and I can say that they work really well. First, the presentation of the package is very professional compare with other earbuds I have seen. Second, they fit really well in the ear. Last, but not least, they sound really clear. The only inconvenience is that you can only play/pause and answer/hang calls, there is not skipping songs or listening previous song. Overall it was a really good purchase.

title: 4 Stars
body: It would be a 5 star if it didn't fall off the ear so often or if the second connection didn't have that much trouble with pairing.

title: Try them you will like them!
body:
This is the first pair of earbuds I have purchased and happy with my decision.

Pairing with my LG G4 is always fast and easy.  The sound is exactly what I was looking for.  Charging is quick and easy with the provided USB charger as well as the wireless charging capabilities.  With the 3 different size ear pieces along with the ones that are on the ear buds already you have 4 different sizes so finding the right size for your ears should not be a problem.

I use these mostly for work so I am able to keep working while taking phone calls and listen to music occasionally.  I use these intermittently for an hour or two at a time and I went 3 days between my first and second charge.

I had no interest in running out like everybody else to buy the "name brand" buds at two or three times the price and I couldn't be more happy with my decision.  I would gladly recommend these earbuds to anyone.

title: Best earbuds I’ve purchased!
body: These are by far the best earbuds I’ve purchased (and I’ve gone through my share). I’ve had them almost 2 months. I use them daily at work to listen to podcasts, roughly 20 hours of use weekly. I only use one earbud at a time and at the end of the day put it back in the case. I only charge the case maybe once a week. The batteries have never ran dead on me so it could go longer between charges. For me that was enough to recommend these to others. But a few days ago I put one of the earbuds in my jeans and one thing lead to another, two full wash cycles later I found the earbud still in the washer. Immediate heart pounding as I knew I’d lost one of my favorite earbuds. BUT to my surprise it turned right on!! These deserve every one of its five stars. BUY THEM!

title: Comfortable and great sound!
body: These sound great and are very comfortable to wear. I did have some connection issues but it was on my end not the products problem.

title: Quality, Price nothing better
body:
Looking for quality earbuds without the high price. Was able to test other brands (purchased by friends) $150+
Tested ToZo no difference, choice was simple.

title: Impressive sound, battery life sucks
body: I really enjoyed the sound. Very bass heavy, kills the treble a bit but you can adjust it with the equalizer setting on your phone. They sound better than the soundpreats, skullcandys, and JBl. The battery life was disappointing. The buds started to die out after 1.5 hours. It does take a bit for them to pair to your phone also. It’s great sound but I don’t if I’ll keep them. It somewhats cancels out Noise. I could still hear the gym music through the headphones which could be good or bad

title: Great product.
body: Have had these wireless ear buds for a week now and so far so good!  Pairing was easy and doesn't drop (using iphone 7).  BT range is great as well, been able to leave my phone around 30' + away and still receive crisp, clean audio.  Volume is great too, as I have yet needed to take it above level one on my phone.  Bass sounds good as well,  drives it pretty good.  Walk a lot for work and have had zero issues with them falling out or jostling around in my ears.  As of now would recommend these  especially for the price.

title: Great product for phone calls but audio level is poor.
body: Sound quality is good but volume level is low compared to other brands, if you are using just for phone calls this product will work great but not for music lovers.

title: Overall great and easy to use but with sound inconsistencies
body:
These headphones are really great for overall usability and sound. I mainly use at the gym, but the pairing is really quick and automatically connects when you take the headphones out of the case. Charging case is amazing, and I've not yet had any issues withe battery life despite heavy daily use (>4 hours at high volume every day) as it charges every time it's in the case.

The only issue I've had so far is when the headphones switch between "music" and "phone" mode. E.g. if you make or receive a phone call while listening to music, the headphones seem to activate another function to engage the microphone function and settings that are optimized for calls. If you then go back to listen to music, the sound quality is HORRENDOUS. The included instruction manual did not mention this potential issue nor how to switch between these modes. However, I have found the best fix is to put the headphones back in the case and then take out again. Somehow this "resets" the sound, though I'm not sure if it's a long term fix or will work for everyone.

title: Fit well, great sound.
body: I've not had anyone complain about not being able to hear me and I've been able to hear others well. The ability to use each independently but also as a pair is great feature that I use all the time. I've listened to music while working all day in a single charge. They fell nice in my ear and do not pinch or hurt. I can place my phone in my back pocket without loosing connection.

title: Great quality but short battery life.
body: In the last two years I have bought 3 pairs of over the ear head phones as well as two sets of wireless ear buds and a pair of the sports buds that have hooks to go over your ears and have a wire connecting them to each other. For one reason or another each of them hasn't worked for me. These are really high quality, fit perfectly in my ear- even if I jump around, have really good sound quality and are light weight. The problem? A three hour battery life. UGH! I need something that will last 6-8 hours as I listen to a rain program while I sleep at night to drown our a snoring partner. I'm so frustrated that I can't find something like that without spending $200!! Crazy! I guess most people must buy these for working out, but some of us have other needs. My bluetooth for my phone lasts 6-8 and didn't cost me $200, so why can't someone come up with ear buds that last that long at a better price!?!

title: Great for jogging
body: My daughter wanted these for her birthday and when she got them, she loved them. She's a jogger she it was a no-brainer (only one in when jogging). It's against the law in Georgia to touch your phone while driving so it was a no-brainer for that too.  Great buy.

title: AWESOME
body: Bought this for my wife, she LOVES them can’t stop talking about them. I highly recommend these to any fitness junky likes us. She is very active in the gym and NO problem with them falling out of her ears GREAT sound a must buy and the company they love their customers.

title: still working after washing them
body:
So I don't really have a break down of pro's and con's for this, so I'll just lay out my thoughts.

First and foremost, I accidentally left these buds in a pair of pants, and ran them through the wash. After blowing out some water, and resetting the headphones, they are still working 2 weeks later. I also wear them to the gym, and sweat all over them, so the water proof part seems to be true.

sound quality is somewhat hollow, but I only really notice it on songs with a heavy baseline. This is to be expected with the size of the ear buds though.

Battery life is 3-4 hours of continuous use, and does not seem to change much when making phone calls. I wasn't sure what to expect exactly as this is my first pair of headphones like this .

Once in a while I experience an issue with the connectivity between left side  earbud (the client), and the right (the hub). This usually only happens when I take one bud out to readjust, and just has to do more with the distance between the two buds. anything more than about 18" and the signal on the left earbud starts to cut out.

title: Excellent design and performance
body:
These are really nice earbuds.

I wear different pads (Comply) on my earbuds and the pads I had on my old earbuds didn't fit into the charging case (which is similar to this one) and it was a hassle to always take the pads off and replace them during the charging process. The pads totally fit inside this case and this saves me a step.

The sound quality is better than I expected. The bass is good and the treble is a little high but I think that's more a function of what I'm listening to (podcasts and the like).

These fit in my ear nicely and aren't heavy at all. Set up/pairing was easy.

The charging case comes with a USB cord so I can just plug it in and forget about it.

All in all this is a great value.

title: Pops out
body: I have fairly regular sized ears. After a workout it loosens up & pops out. A bit annoying bc despite the diff size of ear buds it’s the moisture that causes it. Over all sound quality is pretty good & definitely it has some great noise cancellation.

title: Buy these earbuds.... now!! Amazing!
body: I would say these earbuds and the company rock!! They pair and connect like a dream and you can actually feel the base if you turn the volume up! Super comfortable to wear. My 16 year old son tried them out as well and ordered himself a pair pretty much immediately. As far as customer service... fantastic!! My 2 year old German Shepard got a hold of one of the buds and chewed it up. Now this is not covered in my warranty, but they are sending me a new pair for free!! I'm not sure I could recommend the product or service anymore.... don't hesitate,  buy these now!!!

title: Might not fit your ears
body: I purchased these because i really wanted airpods but didnt want to spend AirPod money. The good thing about these headphones is that they dont really fall out. The charging case is great and lasted me my 17 hours flight back home. And the ear piece was great for your ears popping on the plane. The bad is that they don’t really have the best sound quality. And i think this is mostly because of the second reason they didnt work for me, which was they’re to big. I really had to shove them into my ear to make it work. And of course they slid out. I ultimately had to return them and still get air pods. But i think they might work best for someone with bigger ears. For $50 they’re okay, but ive purchased other headphones off amazon for $20 with better sound quality and better fit so im not impressed.

title: microphone is subpar
body: Everything is fine (sound quality, charger, pairing, etc.) except the microphone. People said it sounds like I'm far away. When holding the right piece (where the microphone is) close to the mouth then it's perfect but what's the point. Listening to music, watch movie should be ok. Just don't use it to talk in the office. Hence 1/2 the stars for 1/2 the use.

title: Great product for the money
body:
These earbuds are great for the money.  Very good sound and comfortable fit.  I use them to run and they stay in and sound great.  Only complaint would be battery life -- I only get about 3 hours of listening before a recharge is required.  The good news is recharge is usually very quick.
Update:  I had an issue when the right bud stopped working.  I contacted customer service and they immediately apologized and sent out a new pair.  I had them in just 3 days from initial contact.  I really appreciate customer service like this!

title: Waterproof, but only can connect to one side at a time
body: The Bluetooth can only connect to either the left or right earbud, but not both. Therefore, I would not recommend it if you intend to use it primarily for music as the sound quality is not good with only one earbud.

title: Best earbuds for the price!
