body: Purchased these same earbuds for 3 different people and they all love them! Comes with charging case. Easy to pair with any smart phone. Multiple ear pieces to ensure comfortable fit in ear. Battery life is great, sound quality is even better.

title: Excellent Product, Worth the Cost, Great Sound.
body: Great fit and fairly comfortable.  I say fairly as the do get a touch uncomfortable after wearing them for a couple hours (this is in the outer ear only, not in the ear canal...  that never got uncomfortable).  Regardless, I would definitely buy these again.  The cost and the quality are well worth it and they sound awesome too.  Good bass, Clear sound and they can get LOUD, so no worries there.

title: Good for the price - Decent Battery Life
body:
I have been using these earbuds for a week now.  Pretty good battery life. I like how the buds snap in and out of the charging box. Comes with 4 different size of ear plugs to make sure you get the right fit. Build quality is good at this price.

Only reason to give 4 stars is when the battery life reduces below 50%, I have had people complain while on phone call that my voice sounds either distance or muffled (happened twice in last 1 week).

title: Best headphones I have owned!
body: I love the tozo earphones! This is the 2nd pair of tozo t-10s i have bought and I bought 3 pairs of tozo t-8s. (I drop stuff very easily and I'm a mechanic on buses so I constantly have to take them in and out and put them down so I lose them easily. I lost one because it rolled out of a bus as I was driving. Yes i am that bad lol) I will be sitting at my table with them in listening to music and my family tells me they are talking to me for like a minute before they realize I can't hear them, great noise cancelation! Great sound quality! I love that I can connect one at a time, again bus mechanic so I can't have both in at work at the same time so I can hear if they are calling me.

title: Not good for swimming laps
body: Can not be used for swimming. First of all a bathing cap pushes the large buds against the ear. Then the minute I turned my head to side right ear went out then left. So I had to get out of water to reset Bluetooth for right ear. Bud never recovered and earphones went back. Waste of money and time. Clearly the Bluetooth wouldn’t work from one end of pool to another. Don’t understand who wrote these stunning reviews but the were not good for swimming.

title: Great Sound
body: The sound quality is the best I've gotten out of any earbud I've ever used. Not an obscene amount of bass that I have heard in other type of buds. It can get plenty loud when you need to. The noise cancellation isn't the greatest but it is far from bad in my opinion. Loud noises can still get through, but for the most part I'm just into the things I'm listening to and it doesnt bother me. As far as wireless earbuds go it's not bad. I get about 2 - 3 hours before needing to charge, and the charge pretty quick.

title: Great product
body: I am giving a 5 star review, because the product was not bad, the easiness to deal with merchant as far as getting the product, time of shipment, refund questions, and process. I did return item due to the fact that other people (not all) complaint about nor being able to hear me. I do have to say that I drive a truck, so the noise is a lot. However, as far as me being able to hear, and the quality sound of music its outstanding, and I got no complaints.

title: Great, but they won't stay in
body: Paired with the Note 9 easily but they will NOT stay in no matter what I do.  They don't stay in when I'm at the gym and they won't stay in when I'm working at my desk.  Would send them back but I think I'm passed the return time.

title: Bot impressed. Buy cheap buy twice.
body:
Upate from my previous review. Originally gave a 5 star but after using for a few weeks I am not happy. The ear buds cut out if you phone is not in the line of sight. Sometimes it works when in your pocket...not well in your back pocket...sometimes not even when it's in your back pack.
Good luck swimming with them because they cut out when only 10 ft away when advertising 10meters.

title: Superb Sound
body:
I was very pleasantly surprised at how good the sound quality is.....exceeded my expectations!
Very comfortable to wear, easy to charge, and they travel well. I am quite happy with my purchase!

title: 4 stars because they easily come out when sweating.
body: Easily fall out when sweating even if you change up the bud sizes.  Other than that, great wireless earbuds that won't break the bank.  I resorted to an over the head wireless headset when working out.

title: Great headphones at a great price
body: These headphones are amazing for the price, I just bought my wife the Bose true wireless headphones and they don't even come with a case that you can charge over a pad and we paid 225, these things sound great and super easy to hear from and to connect to devices, you'll love these if your trying like me to keep a budget to a minimum

title: Great bday gift
body: I got these as a gift and pairing was tricky because the left tries to pair and cancels it out..but the right pairs and then you are connected. I can't seem to get the left to pair correctly and the right beeps in my ear no matter what.. They fall out of my ears when i walk or run..

title: I wasn’t expecting much for $50
body: I recently purchased these headphones as my wireless Bose headphones stopped working. I was happily surprised when I turned them on and they played loud, crisp music. The wireless charging case is super nice too because I was worried about losing an earbud, but now I don’t have to worry since they can be stored safely in there. And they don’t fall out during my workouts (which I am constantly jumping/moving around quickly).  So far, I love them!

title: Good customer response_but for use in bed
body: Since my initial feedback I had a quick and full response and refund. I appreciate the rapid response to my concern.  The sound is good and they worked though not as I’d hoped. Don’t listen to those podcasts in bed unless your partner wears an eye mask and won’t see the blue lights emitting.

title: Pleasantly surprised
body: I am thrilled that these are such good quality for the price.  I've been shopping for a few months and really didn't want to pay the average price of $125 for earbuds.  When I saw the good reviews at this great price, I thought I'd give them a shot.  They paired easily, are comfortable and the sound is fine for my usage.  I bought the tan colored ones which are quite nice looking, also.

title: Easy to use, loud
body:
I use these for running and also to cancel out snoring noises from people sleeping next to me. They stayed in my ear during a 20 minute run, and the bass is very satisfying for such small earbuds.
One thing I don't like is the constant flashing lights, they can be disturbing when trying to sleep and wake up my partner too.

title: Sound is amazing
body: I love these wireless earbuds. I've always wanted to go wireless, but wasn't sure how they would sound or fit, or how well they would keep the connection to my device. (I use them with both a Samsung Galaxy S9, and an iPod Touch.) But I finally decided to go for it, and it was the best decision I ever made in the headphones area. The only drawback, and my #1 concern, was battery life, something you don't even think about with a wired set. Good thing is, it charges very quickly. But I'll probably get a second pair to use while these charge. I use them for 12 hours a day, and I can't go back to wired headphones. These things have spoiled me.

title: You get what you pay for.
body: When they worked the sound was great, battery life was acceptable, and noise cancelation was adequate. However, to keep them connected a line of sight was needed. While at work if my phone was in my pocket and I leaned against anything the connection would drop. If I left my phone on my tool box and went under a vehicle the connection would drop. They fit well and never had an issue with them falling out but they would cause fatigue. I couldn't wear one long enough for the battery to die before the pain from fatigue would cause me to remove  them. Lastly, you can not use the left one without the right being on also. The right is the master and the left is a slave, can not charge the right and listen with just the left. Ultimately returned them and forked over the extra for the samsung buds. No complaints now.

title: Good purchase for the money
body: This was a great purchase for what I'm looking for in inexpensive earbuds. Very good sound quality. I've only tried one other pair ( apple styled soundpeats ) which were actually very good but lacked the bass quality I was looking for. I settled on the Tozo T10 because of the number of reviews. Not disappointed one bit. Keep in mind these are not audiophile quality, but they do the job very well. The other reason was because I could select which earbud to listen through which the soundpeats only allows listening thru the right earbud. All in all I would recommend this for gym or casual listening as they stay in my ears very well.

title: Great quality for the money
body: My husband and I each ordered a pair of these and we love them. Our only issue, we ordered blue for my husband and had to wait a few days for them to arrive, only to see we received black.

title: Great aearbuds and a Good Value
body: My first Bluetooth earbud purchase. I have used Bluetooth earphones but not earbuds. The earbuds are easy to insert and automatically turn on and pair when removed from carry case charging doc. Earbuds stay in my ears with no movement. I love the charging case! After I am through or get a low battery signal just place them in the case and they are recharged. Eventually you have to charge up the carry case which can be some wirelessly or by using a cable which comes with which can be hooked up to a computer or your phone charging power plug.

title: Great but maybe not if you have really small ears
body:
I really like this earbuds, used them today for the first time to go to the gym and they never fell, never got lose, didn’t even have to accommodate them. I had a hard time pairing initially but it’s my fault for not reading instructions.

They fit perfectly on my ear (didn’t even have to change the tips) but I had my husband try them on and looks like his outer ear is just smaller and looked all funky and he said he feels they would fall so maybe if you have small ears (where the outer portion of the earbud would sit) this is something you might want to keep in mind.

title: Very good music quality, can't skip songs.
body:
They're super nice! I'm a person who needs a lot of bass. These absolutely kill the low end. I played a bass clip on youtube and nearly died from the bass. I love it. The music quality is top notch.

I haven't tested out the waterproof on them.

The button on each is super nice for pausing songs, however this leads to....

My only complaint.
Pressing the button twice does NOT skip songs. Instead it redials the last number called. I WAS NOT AWARE OF THIS! It lead to a very awkward conversation with my professor.

In summary, worth the money, incredible bass, can't skip songs,

title: Great Ear Buds with quality sound!
body: Purchased these ear buds last month and couldn't be happier with them! I was surprised how well they sounded, and provided a punchy bass. Paired easily with my Note 8 and have provided great battery life. Love that the case holds a charge for recharging buds and that the case can be placed on wireless charger. Great product and definitely recommend.

title: 2019 generation seems to have Bluetooth Connectivity problems
body:
UPDATE
Company reached out to me a week after my review and sent me a brand new pair. Everything works perfectly! Good customer service.
--------
--------
My left earbud is constantly cut off every time I turn my head to the right.
I looked up the word "CONNECTIVITY" in Q&A section and it seems like MANY MANY people are having the same problem starting Jan 2019. TOZO NEEDS TO FIX THIS!!

title: Comfortable and convenient
body:
They have great sound quality and have a better battery life than I expected. They also seem to charge very quickly. The buds stay in my ears very well during running and are comfortable to wear.

My only complaints with the ear buds are that It seems as though people who call me have a tough time hearing me but usually hear me better if I use my hand to direct the sound towards the ear bud. Also, pushing the buttons on the buds can be difficult.

title: Welp, I was a skeptic, but I'm convinced...
body:
I was skeptical, just like many of you are I'm sure. But I thought hey, anything with THIS many reviews and such a good rating has be worth a shot.

I was immediately impressed with the quality. The box, the charger, the earbuds themselves, all very good quality. I use them while working out, and have zero issues with them falling out of my ears.

The only thing I would say is that the bass is not the greatest, but that's honestly to be expected at the price point. All in all, very pleased with the purchase.

title: A fantastic product!
body:
These are fantastic! From the delivery to initial pairing to usage. Sound quality is great and you can swim with them!!
I’ve paired them to my TV, my DENON amp, iPhone 8+, office pc. Very satisfied

title: Absolutely Amazing Earbuds!
body: This purchase was a impluse buy. I was unsure if they would fit my ears or if the lack of sound quality would be an issue. But after reading a few reviews I went with it. I took out the rubbed tips and installed Comply M-400 Foam tips. Which gives it more noise isolation. Will buy again as a gift for cousins and friends.

title: GREAT EAR BUDS AT A GREAT PRICE
body: After reading an article in which the Tozo T10 ear buds  were named one of the top ten ear buds for the iPhone  11 Pro, I ordered a pair, and I'm glad I did.  The sound quality is terrific, and they look good and are comfortable to wear.  They appear to be very well made and the packaging is quite impressive.  Plus they paired easily with each other, and with my phone.

title: Don't use at busy gyms!!!
body:
When I first looked at the reviews and how many of them I thought, this looks like a great cheaper alternative to Apple airpods especially since I have a Samsung device. When they came in the mail they were very sharp looking. The case looked good and came in a nice sealed plastic covering. I really liked the wireless charging feature since I have a charging pad for my S9. I charged them for the time suggested (around 4 hours) and proceeded to use them in the house. They were a little bulkier than I anticipated for being in your ear but they stayed in my ear pretty well. Don't try to compare them to Airpods as they aren't as sleek and the case isn't either.

Pairing was easy and worked well. You pair the R earbud to the phone and the L earbud pairs to the R earbud. Walking around the house with my phone in my pocket the sound in my L earbud fluctuated a bit but I didn't think anything of it. I then went to the gym during the week at a busy time. I had a pair of LG headphones ($100) that fell apart after about 1 year and I didn't want to wait for warranty.

When I got to the gym, the L earbud started to cut out constantly the entire time I was there. It was very frustrating. This happened to my LG headphones so I thought maybe its just my phone or my mobile data. To figure out if that was true or not, I switched to the gym wifi and still same issues. I held the phone close to the earbuds and it got a little better but still cut out constantly. Very much a distraction. I then thought maybe it was my phone even though its a Samsung Galaxy S9. I used my wife's Samsung S9 and also my dad's Samsung S10 and they all did the same thing. Cut in and out during every song and the R earbud would sometimes fluctuate or cut out because the L one was doing it.
I unpaired and repaired the earbuds several times while at the gym to no avail. I know this can't be a problem with other headphones because I don't see other people fooling around with their headphones the entire time at the gym, just me. I read more reviews on these and found the same issue with other people at a busy gym. I'm not switching gyms just to be able to use these earbuds so I proceeded to return them.

I purchased the Mpow 059 bluetooth headphones which are cheaper and according to them older bluetooth technology than these Tozo earbuds. I didn't want to switch to over the ear headphones but they work so much better than these Tozo earbuds. They had a lot of potential but so disappointing that they didn't work.

title: Does What You'd Expect
body:
Pros: multiple ear bud sizes, great sound quality, lightweight, awesome charging port
Cons: Short battery life, might find yourself pushing them back into your ears a couple times during a workout

I use mine at work and during the gym. They are a great size. They stay pretty hidden and never bother me- except they do slip out of my ears slowly while working out. I did not want to own earbuds with the ear hook, so I don't mind the slight slipping. Overall really happy with the purchase. They connect to each other and my phone within 3 seconds of being out of the charging case.

title: The sound is ok
body: Well, you get what you pay for. The sound is ok (my $12 wired Panasonics sound slightly better) and they're very light and comfortable, however I've only had them for 7 days and unfortunately these headphones have a bad habit of fading in and out when walking, on both ears.... not just the left side as other reviewers have indicated. Having said that, I discovered that they only do this when my phone (sound source) is in my back pocket (where I prefer it) and not if it's in my front pocket or if holding it while walking. Very inconvenient for me. Debating on returning them since the manufacturer has mentioned in other reviews that some may be defective.

title: Hide them from your teens! Better than AirPods!!!
body: I bought these earbuds for me & hid them from my teens when I realized how great they are-well my 17 year old found them this week, tried them out & he just bought his own pair because I’m not sharing 😂

title: These are a solid product that are fairly priced.
body: Hey these Bluetooth ear buds are very well built and seem to be worth the price I paid. They connect easily and have decent sound once they are properly inserted in your ear canal. It does take some doing to get it right however. I considered paying more but the reviews convinced me that these would be acceptable. I think they are.

title: Good sound, low battery life
body: Sound is good.  A bit difficult for me to keep in my ears during a workout. Less tha 3 hours battery life--won't work well if you do long bike rides.

title: They're ok, but...
body:
I gave 2 stars due to the price. Opened the box, charged (wirelessly, nice) and went on a 12 mile run. No problem staying in ears. Stayed connected to my Samsung galaxy watch with Spotify (nice). Listened until they died...3hrs total. (Decent, would like 5-6hrs).
The big problem came the next day, with a full charge. Started a run, and earbuds kept going in and out. I've had them about 3 months now and still same problem. They work not further then a meter out from the Samsung watch, or 2 meters from Samsung S9 phone.

Sound quality is ok with ok bass
Battery life is 3hrs on the $$.
Noise cancelling is pretty good. Maybe too good.
Overall big disappointment with sound going in and out.

title: Pretty good for the price
body: I love that these are waterproof; they have transformed my shower time! :) I like that they come with different sized adapters for the earbud part to make sure they fit. I have a couple of complaints, the first being that it seems to have a relatively short battery life (seems to range from 2-3 hours, less than some other bluetooth headphones I use). My second issue with them is that I like to use only one earbud at a time (like at work or when I need to keep one ear open, lol), but if you don't have both earbuds powered on at the same time, it will beep looking for its partner. It would be nice to keep one charged while I use the other one, but I guess that is more a personal preference than a design flaw.

title: Not great but also not awful - Very middle of the road
body: I don't understand how overwhelming positive the review of these ear buds is. These fall out of my ear after 15-20 minutes. The sound for phone calls is great and this is a productive tool to have for work. For music? No way - Garbage. I compared my traditional apple ear buds that came with my phone and other wireless head phones that I have and it is night and day. This product lacks the bass. Battery life is also not great. The price should be lower. After using these I should have just sprung for air pods and paid more. They look cool and the charging dock is nice.

title: Stopped working after a month. Poor fit, but solid sound.
body:
Worked well for a few weeks, but the left suddenly stopped pairing and now sounds like a slow motion version of the RH (master side) nothing about a fix in the manual and the reset does nothing for it.
Sound is impressive however, the fit is not great. Been through all the size pads they pop out a lot.  Just contacted tozo will post about response.

title: Well worth the money
body: I bought this pair of ear buds because I wanted a good set but wasn’t willing to spend hundreds of dollars. I’m glad I went with TOZO. At a good price, you will definitely receive a nice sounding pair or ear buds that will stay in your ear comfortably. I use them while working out, running, in the office and more. They are a good fit with sound to match. To add to the experience, the warranty service has been good and easy to work with. I highly recommend this product.

title: Highly recommend! Great price, great product
body:
Got these and have been really pleased with both the sound quality, fit and battery life.

They send you different size "ear buds" so you have no problem finding the fit you need. They're very comfy and stay in my ear without any problem. Used them for listening to music and a couple calls and the sound has been great.

Would definitely recommend. Great price and a quality product!

title: I already ordered more!
body:
These earbuds are great! My 16 year old son approves. I ordered myself a set as well.
They also have great customer service! You won’t be disappointed!

title: Connection to phone is horrible! DO NOT BUY!!!!!
body: Love the look of these headphones and on first use at home, sitting down, with the phone perfectly flat and still on the table a foot from me... not bad... now... if you put said phone in your pocket or try to talk to someone right next to you... connection drops. Yeah... that gets old really quick. I have a new Samsung S9 so I figured they would work fine, and they did if you're buying these to listen to music at home, alone, and you can breathe very shallow and not move. ANYTHING OTHER THAN THAT DO NOT BUY THESE... there are plenty of other options in this price range that will surely work better for a normal gym workout or work. Seriously reminded me of a skipping portable CD player back in the day... I WAS FOOLED BY THE B.S. "5 STAR" REVEIWS... DO YOUR RESEARCH AND DONT BUY THESE

title: Sound quality is amazing.
body: Needed a new pair of buds so I thought I would give these a try. I like them...a lot.  I love how the case charges them and they always connect to the source instantly. I don't know the range but I leave my phone by my gym bag and I can walk anywhere in the gym and the buds stay connected to the phone, playing music. They fit great and stay in place, whether running or lifting. You should buy these.

title: Bluetooth Earbuds that Fit Great and Don't Break the Bank!
body:
I use bluetooth earbuds to listen to podcasts when I'm virtually doing anything during the day. I needed a pair that would stay in comfortably, pair automatically, and charge without any issue.

I owned the SoundPeats brand that were good, but the charging station was not the best and it was incredibly difficult to pair the two together. These Tozo earbuds are far better in comparison and the cost is similar. They pair to your phone automatically when taken out of the charging station, have a magnetized charging station so there is no missing the charge adapter, and have multiple ear pieces to accommodate all people.
Don't hesitate, pick these up if you want a pair of affordable earbuds that won't frustrate you on the little things that break over time. Plus they come in multiple colors which is a nice option.

title: Good value ear buds for general purpose use.
body:
I purchased these as value earbuds.  I use the for phone calle and audio books mainly, and sometimes music, but I have over the ear headphones for when I really want to listen to music.  These fit me well, and sound good for the price.  There has been a delay or echo a couple of times, like there was interference between the left and the right earbud, so I can’t give them 5 stars, but it was brief and my expectations are not perfection at a value price, so I only knocked off one star.  There were many different sizes of ear canal pieces, and I tried them all on and settled on a good one for me.  I only do light walking and jogging, and have not tried swimming or showering with them on so cannot comment on their waterproof capabilities.

The company has had fast service, shipping, and communication.  I am happy with them and would purchase from them again.

Overall, so far, I am pleased.  I have only had them a few weeks, so we’ll see how long they last.

Side note - The company did offer a free gift for posting a review and strongly requested a 5 star review - so full disclosure there.  I am not posting 5 stars, so we’ll see what they do.

title: Charging problems
body: 0:000:00This video is not intended for all audiences. What date were you born?SubmitAdobe Flash Player is required to watch this video.Install Flash Player Don’t really like the fact that one earbud charges and the other doesn’t or randomly with stop charging.

title: Disappointed
body: I purchased these headphones and generally liked them. They stay charged for a long time, have good sound quality, and cancel out a good amount of noise. Unfortunately they don’t stay in very well. I wore them on a long flight and they both kept falling out. Now I am missing one because of this.

title: Great Sound!!
body: Sounds great!! Lots of deep bass!! Reallly cancels our all exterior noise, mainly  because they fit so snug in your ears. They have a little weight in them so you'll want them to fit (no ear hooks).

title: So far so good with these ear buds
body: I received these earbuds about two weeks ago and I am pretty heavy user especially for calls.  So far I am pretty happy with them.  They are my first pair of these and for the prices the have a lot to offer.  The sound quality for music and sound is good even while driving and I haven't had any complaints from people with background noise.  The battery life lasted an entire three hour drive today on the phone and listening to podcasts in one ear.  Definitely give them a try.  I might get a pair of white ones for the wife.

title: they don't hold a charge!
body:
Updated to one star.  These don't hold a charge!!! I missed the return window because I was out of town.  Now I'm stuck with them.  Would not recommend this product!

I've never used earbuds before.  just got these and they were really easy to pair to my phone and were a great price.  sound quality is great.  haven't tried using them to talk on phone yet but looking forward to using them soon.  Really comfortable.

title: Amazing sound and high quality.
body: I use these headphones daily at the gym.  I have smaller ears and the different size ear peices provided work perfectly.  I really love the sound quality and noise cancellation.  Absolutely would recommend these!

title: Best device for the money!
body: Amazing product.  Works like a charm and talk about noise canceling- these are definitely going to the pool with me to tune out screaming children. I’m going to buy another pair to carry on travel.

title: Loud & Fashionable
body: I bought b/c I listen to music/shows all day at work. These are awsome! Last 3+ hours. I wasnt interrupted not once durung my 8hr shift to charge. I did put on charger while on lunch to recharge but it wasnt a must. The BASS is great too. Im about to order another pair for hone lol

title: Impressive quality for the price
body:
What I didnt know when I bought these wireless headphones is that the case keeps the earphones charged when you store them!! Once you plug the storage container into a miniUSB to charge, it not only charges the storage container battery but also the earphones. Perfect for traveling on a plane for extended periods of time !!!

The sound quality is pretty good; the sound isolation is exceptional. A worthy purchase.

title: Nice bass
body: These are great. The sound is awesome. And like others have stated. The bass is amazing. I just returned them (because my daughter wanted the black ones) can't wait for them.

title: (Update!) Battery drain is the Achilles heel
body:
Update (11/3/19): Tozo customer service reached out to me and offered to replace the T10 earbuds with the newer T6. Their customer was very helpful and was great at communicating throughout the process from their initial contact. I have adjusted my review from 2 to 4 stars based on their customer service.  I will review the T6 once I have some time to break them in.  I stand by my initial 2 star review of the product itself, and hope the T6 is a higher quality product.

For $50 these have a good sound, fit in ear well and when they work properly they're a fantastic value.  However there are issues that make me regret this purchase.  First, the battery in the charging case drains within 2 weeks, EVEN IF, the case is fully charged.  I use these mostly when I mow my lawn.  When I finish mowing I put them in the fully charged case and put them back on the shelf for next week.  I have been charging them every other use, so I'm depending on the case to provide at MAXIMUM two full charges to the earbuds between charging the case.  It seemed to work at first, but after several months of use, the earbuds are dead when I go to use them.  So now after every use I'm required to put them in the case, then plug the case in until the case is fully charged.  This cannot be by design as it makes the case essentially useless other than as storage.  Second, the left earbud disconnects at random several times during my roughly 1 hour of use.  Third and finally, when I go to use them I take out the right earbud first, as instructed, then I'll take out the left earbud AFTER the right earbud connected to my bluetooth source.  This fails to connect both earbuds 25% of the time, and I have to set both earbuds back in the case and try to start all over again.  Ultimately this comes down to "You get what you pay for."  I regret this purchase and should have spent the extra money on a higher quality set of wireless earbuds. 2/5 stars.

title: Hurts the skin of your ears. Ugh
body:
The only.negative about these are the ear cushions themselves.  There is a molding nit line in the middle of the silicone. So it scrapes your ear putung then in and removing them......  Ive been using them for about a month now and my ears are so sore... even with the smallest pair supplied....
Worst design flaw by far.  I'll be purchasing different ear pieces  Other than that.. they work well for the price.....

title: They work for everyday use and the gym.
body: I have been impressed with the earbuds. I use them for the gym mostly and the single right unit for navigation when needed. The battery life is great for what I have done so far.  The sound quality is perfect with the ability to adjust just by changing the angle. I have been in to music "Vocals" and performance for  a long time so have a tuned ear for audio reproduction. These earbuds were a great choice as I spend a number of hours on Amazon researching before purchasing.

title: LOVE THEM!
body: I was looking for noise-canceling headphones to use when traveling but was hesitant to buy a pair of wireless earbuds because I thought that they would be expensive (on the order of over-the-ear headphones), uncomfortable, and difficult to connect to my various devices--an Android phone, a Chromebook, and a Windows 10 laptop. But when I saw the thousands of great reviews of this product, I decided to try it. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality and ease of set up. The phone was the easiest to set up, but I was able to connect the other devices fairly quickly. The sound and noise-canceling are great, and I found a comfortable set of tips among those included with the product. I've only used them once for exercise, but the waterproofing seems fine. It was 50 bucks well spent to get rid of annoying wires and bulky headphones!

title: Excellent purchase of quality sound; comfortable fit; and well built earbuds
body: My stars don't really qualify at this time as i've only used these ear buds for two days now. Wanted to initially comment on the timely shipping and physical quality of the product as I've enjoyed them so far. Sound quality is AWSOME! Connectivity, a breeze! The earbuds themselves feel light, comfortable and very well built as opposed to others I've had that feel hollow and cheap. No fear of them accidentally falling out of my ear during the most vigorous of tasks so far. Looking forward to more hours of use. I'll tell u how it goes.

title: Sound is great. but microphone mehh
body: I bought this product to serve as a listening device with ability to have wireless phone conversations.  I must say that the sound is great with great deal of noise cancellation.  However, it's tough to talk on the phone as you tend to hear yourself more with both earplugs in, but I tend to use one ear bud during calls to alleviate this. Callers have also complained that they can't hear me well.

title: They are great!
body: I really liking the Tozo T10 earbuds. The case and earbuds are lightweight and small making it convenient to just have in my pocket all the time. One feature I particularly like is that I can use one earbud and still use the pause/play button. I know that usually standard feature, but my last $50 bluetooth earbuds didnt do that, weird. Again I think it's a great product. I havent had it long but works wonderfully. The sound is by far the loudest I've heard so far from bluetooth earbuds.

title: Comfort and Great Price
body: There aren't words to tell you how impressed I am with the comfort of these earbuds I can honestly say that I usually forget they are even in my ears.  I have longer hair that covers my ears and with the size of these earbuds no one can even see them.  I work in an office and generally only use one earbud during the day so that I am still able to answer the phone and hear conversations clearly.  I like being able to enjoy music while at work while still showing respect to coworkers by not interrupting or distracting them.  I am so thankful for finding these earbuds.

title: Real Pleased
body: I bought two of these and so far so good. They paired to my iPhone as advertised. Today I used them for a two run and they stayed secured and no moving around. My daughter enjoys them and she uses them more throughout the day. We are real pleased with our purchase.

title: High Quality & Affordable
body: I bought this product after my older pair of wired ear buds broke. The left ear bud broke in half from me dropping it while running on a treadmill. Anyway, I decided to go with this product after doing a little bit of snooping around. Right out of the box, it was just as easy as they claimed to pair the headset with your phone. Took no more than 5-10sec. The sound quality was much more acoustic than my old wired pair. This is my first wireless pair ive bought and i couldnt be happier. The thing that i was really satisfied about also was how they fit in my ears. Ive had trouble in the past with finding comfortable earbuds and ones that stay snug in your ears (especially while exercising). Ive went for a run with them recently and they didnt budge one bit! The fact i didnt feel the need to adjust them at all during my run was huge. Definitely would recommended these to anyone looking for a decent pair of earbuds and affordable cost.

title: All the bangs for your bucks.
body:
These are hands down the best headphones I've ever owned. The sound is great, all my music is super crisp! It's even got me liking songs I normally wouldn't.

My only cons are the battery, I wish they lasted longer than 4 to 5 hours but that's okay, the fast charging battery and portability of the charger really makes up for it. And the fact that I can't just have the right (master) out of the charger without having the left out. The (master) just keeps beeping until I take the left one out of the charger. Maybe I'm not doing something right.

You're getting a lot of bang for your buck with these. Thank you reviews for helping me make a decision and thank you TOZO for making great headphones.

title: Great sound quality, a comfortable fit and quality customer service.
body:
I grew tired of having the wires of my previous ear buds catch on drawer knobs and god knows what else so I resolved on buying some wireless ones (i.e these). While I can't attest how waterproof these are (I'd rather not test it all), I can say with confidence that these quality ear buds that are easy to sync with any bluetooth capable device and the case that comes them makes it easy to both store and charge them. By the way, the batteries in these usually go for about 4-5 hours and take about half a hour to charge (give or take).
The only downside is that I recently one of the ear buds, one of the fears that kept from going wireless sooner. So I contacted customer support and after a brief email  exchange I had a replacement bud mailed to me in under a week.
In conclusion, I'd highly recommend these to anyone willing to spend the money on them.

title: Excited I purchased them.
body: I was honestly not expecting these headphones to sound this good. The quality is great. I  work out a lot and having headphone that stay in my ear the whole time is a God sent. And , they are water proof, even better. I like that they come with multiple bud sizes, so I can fine the right size for me. Con: changing the earbud inserts, this can become difficult at times, so choose the right bud for you.

title: Great sound quality.
body:
First off,

Understand, my wife owns apple air pods. I loved them but I can’t use them when moisture might be present. (I like to wear them while cutting grass or working out).

Aside from that I would still put these Tozos up against apple any day for sound quality.

They paired easily with my IPhone XR and the battery lasts for a while. The case doesn’t feel cheap or loose. The magnets are strong and durable. I’m sure these will last me a few years to come.

Over all, I’m a huge fan.

title: you get what you pay for?
body: the earbuds sound great!  actually, better sound quality than my broken beats x that these have replaced.  anyway, the battery is not fantastic.  i get at most 2.5 hours of listening time from them before they require a recharge.  i notice that the more expensive brands have a much better battery life.  for the price i paid, i really cannot complain.  i would like to see battery improvements, but then, i guess i'll have to pay $200.00 to get it.  for less than fifty dollars, these'll do just fine.

title: Great Sounding, Comfortable, and Quality!
body:
When I got this, I knew from the quality packaging I was going to like this item. It screams quality out of the box! I tried every ear bud to find the perfect fit and glad I did because the smallest size worked the best. The ear buds stayed in my ear no matter how much I deliberately moved to try and get them to fall out.
I opened the package at work and was the envy of all my coworkers as they commented how nice they were.
The sound was crisp, clear, perfectly bassy, and loud. Idk if they're noise canceling (not a selling point when I was shopping around) but when I was using them, I couldn't hear anything going on around me.
I love the charging case as it conveniently charges the ear buds and stores them when not in use.
I give this product a 5/5, can't go wrong with the 1 year warranty and great customer service!

title: Price Point, quality of the sound and the ease of use
body: This was a great buy.  Any negative review disregard.  I am pleased with the sound.  How quickly they pair.  The price point in comparison to others is awesome.  A must buy if you are in the market!!

title: Works as advertized.
body: It works super well. Blocks noise. Has great bass. fairly durable. Nice charging bay. Wish the battery life on the earpieces was better, but given their size and sound quality it's acceptable.

title: Affordable yet Amazing!
body:
I bought this product a few months ago and I absolutely loved them! The sound quality is great, and they’re super convenient to use in public.
After a few months one of the earbuds stopped charging. I emailed customer service and they were extremely helpful and will be sending me a new charging box including earbuds for free. I loved these so I’m relieved that they were more then happy to send me a new product without the hassle of me having to return the old one!

title: Not For Me
body: I got these to pair with our smart tv for late at night as to not bother neighbors (we live in a townhouse). They paired easy enough with the tv, but the sound would cut in and out constantly unless I was standing right in front of the tv. Even sitting on the couch directly across, they would cut out. Disappointed as I wanted them to work. Ended up returning them.

title: Overall Looking
body: I like how small the earbuds are and how you can barley notice them. I use them for work even tho I’m not allowed to use earbuds but people don’t notice I have them on. The case isn’t big either so that’s good. The sound quality is amazing, way better than I expected. I’m also glad you can use one if you wanted to at a time. Also the battery last a long time.

title: Best beat for your buck
body: Wow. Seriously amazing product at a fraction of the price vs the competitors. I stumbled on these while I was about to buy the skullcandy wireless buds and I am glad I did. I even compared these with my studio beats and these are very good. The battery life is also amazing. I love the fact that if I run out of power with one I can pull out the other one from the case and charge the other one. These also feel like they are made with good quality materials. All I have to say is give this a chance, if you don't like it get your money back.

title: Very disappointed
body: I paid $50 for this product and was very excited to have it.  It arrived and I was disappointed because the earbuds kept falling out of my ears.  I contacted the company and they sent a smaller earpiece.  Unfortunately, that did not correct the problem.  They are useless because they do not stay in your ear when you walk or move.  Moreover, they are big and bulky.  This is definitely a do not buy, even at the reduced price of $29.  The worst purchase I ever made.  I am now looking for a good set that is usable for the gym or even on a plane.

title: Another brand that doesn't work well.
body: I bought this product for my husband because I messed up with a cheaper brand that he likes better. Of course I read the reviews about the product...especially about the battery which is true. But, the quality of the sound and the breaking in and out wasn't mentioned. I might have a bad product or not...if I don't then others should agree. I heard other people voices when my huaband was talking to me. He had to charge the ear piece every two hours...when we talked he couldn't hear me..I forgot to mention that when I received a call I had to pick up my phone to use it instead of tap the right ear one time.

title: Does not work independently and has a long recharge.
body: So I want to preface this with a statement saying that this company, Tozo, attempts to bribe people to leave good reviews, so keep that in mind with all those 5 star reviews. Now for my actual review. It sounds good, Takes way too long to get a full charge when a full charge only lasts like 2.5 to 3 hours. You know those old RC cars where you charge them as much as you can use them? Yeah that's what these reminded me of.  Waterproof seems to work fine though. They are comfortable in my ears at least.  Won't work without both being connected to each other and if one is on the charger they both disconnect. One will not work independently unless the other is in your pocket, which is not independent functionality, so dont listen to those questions that are answered that say they work independently.  The low battery warning is about 10 seconds before they die, and interrupts whatever you are listening to with s voice telling you.  Should just be a low beeping in the background, maybe on a future product?  Also, true independent functionality, with the water proofing and a full charge in about 15 to 20 minutes, I'd pay a little over 100 bucks for if you guys had it.  I tested these and the link between the two can be spotty, seems to be rare but it happens. One loses signal from the other and you hear the beeps as it tries to reconnect and then they work again. With that, I have maintained a connection between the two from about 50 ft away, more and they disconnect.  I do really enjoy the design, and their charge pad, nice quality charge pad and gorgeous but I'll go write that over there too.  The case has a very strong and satisfying snap as it closes that is nerd asmr.

title: I wish I could give it more stars
body: As a music lover. I need bass!!! And these fulfill my needs. Battery life is great and the music quality is great. I'd definitely recommend these headphones. The smallest ear buds fit me perfectly. I'm still trying to figure out how to adjust them so my braids don't knock the ear piece out of my ear. But the noise cancelation on these are life!!!!! I don't have to turn my volume all the way up on flights. Comes with a year warranty also

title: Really surpising...
body: I was really surprised  by the sound of these headphones. The bass is much better than I thought and I think most people will be pleased. There may be a bit too much bass but that depends on how the ear buds are seated in your ear. I had some difficulty following the initial pairing instructions. They kept disconnecting  after about a minute so I needed to following the reset instructions and start new with the paring. Once I did this, they paired well.

title: Choose something else.
body: Decent sound, but crap battery life.  When they do successfully pair I always forget what combo I used. Almost like I did it on accident. Does not stay in my ears very well and I’m not even a runner.  Wish I would’ve chose another product .

title: Great price and quality!!!
body: I have had these a few weeks now and they are amazing!  You cannot beat the price and quality.  as soon as you pull them out of the case, they turn on and connect with each another and my phone almost instantly.  Just follow the included instructions on how to properly put them into your ear and they will stay in snug and firm.  I run with these and they have yet to pop out.  I am very pleased with this purchase.

title: Fantastic value
body: I bought these to replace a pair of Jaybirds that I accidentally put in the washing machine.  Going completely wireless is great, I love that there is no wire dangling between the earpieces under my chin or around the back of my head.  These earbuds paired easily with my phone on the first try.  If they seem to lack strong bass try a different size earpiece, I can hear a definite difference when I use the correct size.  The sound clarity is absolutely amazing.  The earbuds reduce ambient noise substantially at lower volumes even though they aren't marketed as such. Overall I am very pleased and would purchase them again.

title: Perfect for the Gym!
body:
I made the switch from the basic wired Samsung headphones to the future with these Tozo Bluetooth Wireless Earbuds. After getting tangled up with my old wired headphones on the treadmill, I am happy to say the Tozo headphones perfectly fit my needs! These new earbuds fit securely, don't fall out even while jogging, and best of all are waterproof (for sweaty workouts). While these might not be as noise canceling as a set of $300+ Bose, for the price they are worth every penny!

When I purchased these I had no expectations and knew nothing about competitors like Apple AirPods and had no knowledge of Bluetooth headphones. I am so glad I made the jump and gave these a try! If given the chance I would purchase them again in a heartbeat.

title: Does not work under water
body: Sure its waterproof. but what's the point if bluetooth doesn't work under water AT ALL... bluetooth doesn't transmit under as little as 2 inches of water, therefore making every swimming ad BS.

title: Shockingly Fantastic!
body:
1st.. pairing is infinitely simple. Just pick the buds out of the case, and they immediately turn on, pair with each other - if you're quick, you'll hear a clear voice indicating left, right pairing success - and when you pair to your device, it's just as simple. Be sure to look for 'Tozo T10 -R', because the Right bud is the master, and the left bud will slave from it. You'll never see the -L bud in your pairing lists.

Right now, I'm using them on my laptop for music.. my tablet + Roku app which allows me to listen to television privately thru the Tozo, and of course, my phone for calls + music.

The sound quality is.. well, I'm shocked at how good it is for a $50 pair of BT earbuds. Stereo separation is solid.. audio range is solid.. and these things actually have some bass punch! They won't replace your $200++ audiophile Sennheiser or favorite headsets, but the bang-for-buck is great!

Noise cancellation? I have to presume it works, because I've heard no interference or 'fuzziness' on calls or music. Just clarity of whatever source I'm listening to.

Waterproof/resistance? Can't speak to that, as I haven't had them near any such sources.

I have one.. and only one possible issue.. and to be fair, this may be the source devices causing it. On occasion, even when I'm right near the Bluetooth source (laptop or tablet in this case) I have had both earbuds slightly fade out for 1-2 seconds and then fade back in, with solid performance. This has seemed to happen randomly when I'm using laptop or tablet to listen to audio or TV. To be fair, this may be because the source device is processing other data. I haven't dug in to figure it out, yet. My tablet is a basic 1-gig Amazon Fire.. but my laptop is a high powered gaming rig and maxed out with ram.

This has not happened when I'm paired to my phone and using them on calls. They have been absolutely perfect on calls. No fades out or in.. just perfect clarity of audio.. and the microphones clearly work perfectly because I've never been told there was a problem hearing me, from the callers on the other end. They've said the call was very clear and easy to hear with little to no background interference.

Great bang-for-buck units!

title: Best activity wireless earbuds yet!
body: These true wireless earbuds are so awesome. For the price you pay, I don’t feel like there is anything else as great as these. They are light and comfortable. I usually rock a medium silicone canal bud, but with these I went to the next size bigger so they really cancel out more of the sound, they are just as comfortable. I run, ride mountain bikes, road bikes, and my motorcycle and these are just great. When the call comes in I hear them and they hear me just fine. I recommend everyone to give these at least a try. I’m buying more for my family.

title: Super impressed
body: Wow! Super impressed exceptional sound quality and volume level. Ordered today and received today via Prime. Great packaging and you even get a year extended warranty. Definitely recommend these ear buds to anyone that doesn't want to pay 100 plus.

title: Lost connection
body: The sound of this product is great. The buds are easily stored and I liked the feature of having the charging holder that easily fit into a bag for after the gym. My reasoning for sending these back was that even after trying different sizes of fittings for the buds, and following the turn and twist directions, the buds fell out of my ears on a consistent basis. I also found the disconnection from my phone to be annoying. It was almost every time that I turned my head that the buds would lose connection and then I would have to stop what I was doing to reconnect them. If it wasn’t for those two issues, I would have been satisfied with this product.

title: Very Satisfied
body: Overall a really awesome product to buy if you're looking for a simple set of Bluetooth earbuds. The sound is amazing, it does a pretty good job of canceling outside noise. The one drawback that it has is that the battery life does drain pretty quickly while in use. Once it hits 20% percent it'll beep and let you know to charge it, thought it does that every few seconds until you start charging. Definitely worth the money, though!

title: This product beeps, but is comfortable and has a long battery life.  Also good customer service.
body:
This product cannot be used for what I want it for.  I like to use Wireless earbuds one at a time and this product... Ugh.  When you only have one connected it keeps searching for the other one so will beep repeatedly for several minutes!  And since I like to use this for sleep, this just cannot stand. The beeps keep me awake. What a useless quirk that makes this product essentially unusable.

Update: The company sent me a different product of theirs that is much more what I like without the beeping.  I'm impressed by their quick response and customer service so gave them additional stars.

Also, with these original headphones, I should add that I've used them when I was awake and about and they were very decent on battery life and much more comfortable than many others I've used.  If only not for the dang beeps, I'd prefer this one.

title: A must-buy for anyone interested in getting wireless earbuds!
body: This product has been nothing short of amazing. I was a bit skeptical at first considering the price of these earbuds; however, I have been more than satisfied with this product.  The build quality is excellent and pairing it with my iPhone was easy.  The sound is also very solid and the earbuds stay snug in my ear when I am working out.  I would recommend this product if you're looking for an alternative to the wireless earbuds that are on the marketplace.

title: If these don’t satisfy you, nothing will!
body:
Did my wife just say something?....  It wouldn’t matter if she did because you’re  not going to hear it.
Can’t go to the concert?  Who cares, these bad-boys deliver it directly to your skull.
I’ve never heard better response from earbuds, let along wireless!  - Mind blown.

Spend the fitty

title: Comfortable earbuds.
body: I replaced my LG sports Bluetooth headset with these. I was kinda skeptical with having earbuds that weren’t attached to anything but, these are comfortable and stay in my ears. I must say that i was pleasantly surprised. I like the fact that when an incoming call came, it announced the number. Overall these are a great set of earbuds that are priced great.

title: Left earbud has intermittent connection in high density BT environments.
body:
Left earbud will not stay connected in envorments will a large number of Bluetooth devices such as an airport.  I have used them in low density environts such as a neighborhood or gym and they work; however the left earbud has intermittent connection in the airport.

Edit: Tozo customer service contacted me stating that they believe the issues I have encountered are due to faulty headphones.  They have offered to provide replacements to correct the issue.

title: good sound good price good charger connected flawlessly to a IPhone 10.
body: Just got them, and I was skeptical, even after seeing 10,000 plus people had reviewed them and they come in as a 4 1/2 star. Work great with my I phone 10, sound very good bass is even there! Connected as soon as i had one in my ear.  This is my fourth pair of Bluetooth ear pieces and so far a great sounding  decision. Calls aren't so great, I come in  a little faint but that's not what I bought them for!

title: Quality headphones?
body:
So far I have been very impressed with these head phones.  It’s so nice to finally do away with the wires!  I can walk all over my house without losing connection.  I also like how these automatically connect when removed from the case.  The sound quality is great as well!

Update: left side cuts out constantly. Also battery dies rapidly even when not in use.

title: too many syncing issues
body: i bought them, first set wouldn't connect to other set. so they sent me a new set. second set still does similar things, cuts out whenever it wants from the other earbud! so annoying i ended up buying another brand! sound is good, bass is amazing for a lil but, comfort is about avg, battery life is good.. they just won't sync to each other and im not into listening to music out of just the right ear! wish they worked well, but they just did not after 2 different sets! case is a bit bulky also compared to my new jabras! you get what u pay for

title: Great wireless headphones for price!
body: I just purchased these and am so far very pleased with them. The only reason I gave 4 stars is because they are a little large but otherwise they have excellent sound quality. They are not noise cancelling but the quality of sound you hear drowns out other noises. I'm please with this product and they are easy to pair with each other and blue tooth! I recommend for sure!! I just purchased a 2nd pair!!

title: Unit replaced - replacement item is significantly better.
body:
I understand the physics behind this. The right earbud connects to the device, and the left earbud connects to the right. But Bluetooth uses 2.4 GHz, which does not transmit through water. What is my head made of? Mostly water. So turning my head, or moving, or really much of anything, causes the left bud to drop out. Constantly. Plenty of other manufacturers have figured this out, but not this one.

Audio sounds fine, build quality seems good, and I really like that the case is water resistant. But none of it matters when the left audio channel constantly cuts out.

EDIT: The company has graciously offered a replacement. I will update to three stars at the moment, because reaching out to dissatisfied customers is a solid customer service move. If the new ones work, I will happily update.

I'm rooting for these guys. I would love to see the replacements work.

UPDATE - The replacement worked significantly better. It still cuts out very occasionally, but it is completely usable. I also commend TOZO for reaching out to me, based only on a poor review, to ensure that I was satisfied. I was prepared to write the product off, but they went above and beyond to ensure that I was happy.

I heartily endorse TOZO. I wish every company was this thorough to ensure that the customer is satisfied.

title: Not for swimming
body: I bought these to use in the pool and to pair them with my Apple Watch.  Even though they are waterproof the disconnect when they go under water. If I would have known this I would not have purchased them

title: Superior Product, Great Value
body:
I became skeptical when they fell out of my ear with the first caps however the next larger size, after a few tweaks and getting used to, fit perfectly and the sound quality is amazing! These are perfect for my workouts; lifting and/or cardio and the distance I can travel from source/phone is greater than advertised. I love this product and the more that I wear them, are proving to be and exceptional replacement for old Beat headphones that I really liked. It's liberating to have such great sound without the headgear.
These TOZO T10  Bluetooth are a great value too, costing a fraction of my previous workout headphones.
I highly recommend!

title: Value and solid product.
body:
Update 2: one side doesn’t charge anymore. Also one thing I noticed with these earbuds... even when you turn it off, it turns on to charge depleting the charge left in the case. Dropping majo stars.

UPDATE: I was thoroughly happy that this earbud made it thru the 2 hr half marathon. I made sure it was fully charged and never tested it for this long. I got nervous at mile 12 when one side start to fade in and out. Not sure if it was the sweat or what but I notice that more often now even after a short run... for that losing a star.

***
I’m an avid runner. And been thru a whole host of headphones and was Leary of wireless “buds”. But I bought these as dual role of listening to music low profile at work (and for running).

So far nonissue with sweat considerably snug and Decent noise cancelling (in that I don’t hear much else besides music) and pretty decent battery life... so far.

Only issue? I gotten used to pairing one or both with my phone but it does take awhile to turnoff properly. Also, if u carry these in ur bag ur pocket in the car, careful because phone calls will be directed to your headphones. Also range is what you would typically expect of wireless/Bluetooth earbuds : ie up to 10-15 feet away from source

title: Really good for their price!!!
body: The battery life is awesome n the sound is great it doesn’t really wrk for swimming but if ur just chilling in the pool 🏊‍♀️ it works great! I got them wet under water the sound does go off but since it’s under water the signal cuts off once ur back in the surface signal comes back. After that the sound wasn’t damaged or had any sort of problems this wireless headphones r great for the price!

title: Great headphones!
body: These earbuds are amazing! I cant believe the quality you get for the price. They are very easy to use. Once you have them linked to the bluetooth on your phone it's as simple as pulling them out of the case that charges them. When you pull them out of the case they automatically turn on and connect. They last about 4hrs on one charge and I get roughly 4 charges out of the case. I have even used these in the shower without any issues. The case is easy to charge at the end of the day I just throw it on my wireless charger, no pluging in necessary. I would highly recommend if you are in the market for affordable wireless ear buds that offer the quality of some higher end brands.

title: Serious upgrade from the TOZO T8 line.
body:
I've owned a couple of Tozo's line of wireless earbuds, with the latest being the TOZO T8. What an improvement this T10 model is. Here's the list of improvements I remember.

1) waterproof - pretty important if I'm hanging at the beach or lake
2) wireless charging - I hated plugging in the little case and forgetting it. Its so simple to just put the product on a wireless charger.
3) additional ear sizes (used to come with only 3 sizes; now comes with 4)
4) better battery
5) you can close the case without it turning off the earpieces in your ear

The one thing I need to test is whether or not I can put foam caps on the ear pieces and still have this fit in its case. With that, this will hopefully be the last one of these things that I buy.

title: Nice Features
body: These TOZO T10 Wireless earbuds are my first experience with wireless earbuds. The instructions are excellent and clear, but I did not (initially) read them closely enough. The first time I attempted to pair the buds the only TOZO product listed on my cell phone was T10L. I selected T10L and only the left earbud worked. I went back to the instructions and they clearly stated DON'T select T10L. Following the instructions (this time) I reset the buds. The second attempt to pair my cell phone offered the T10R selection. Selected T10R and both buds paired properly. They work well and stay in my ears. The noise cancelling feature could be a little better, but maybe I need to try a different sized cup.

title: Solid headphones. Recommended
body: Haven't had these long but so far they seem solid. Sound quality is good and loud.  They don't seem to cancel noise completley which is fine. They stay in my ear really well. I have been using them while riding my harley with straight pipes and i have expeienced no connectivity issues(other wireless headphones in the past would lose connection when riding. I assumed from vibrations). They even stay in place when i take my helmet off. The buttons on the headphones are not touch sensitive which for me is a plus. Pair the right ear. If you pair the left ear when you turn on the right one it will lose connection. So pairing the left one I assume is for single ear use... so just pair the right one so you can use both and if you only need one just leave the left one in the case... haha I feel like I made that longley overcomplicated. Anyway... this seems like a good bluetooth earbud set so far. If I have anything negative to say i will update this review

title: Surprisingly Great
body: For the price I wasn't expecting anything this nice. The bass could be better, but they have overall great sound quality, noise cancellation and battery life. They stay in just fine during workouts and are very comfortable.

title: Outstanding Customer Service
body: After we purchased these ear buds, one fell in a parking lot and was crushed. I contacted Tozo and they responded immediately and replaced the set for us. I am very impressed and would highly recommend these ear buds and this company.

title: Amazing quality and sound
body: I purchased as a lightning deal. I was skeptical because of past attempts to purchase completely wireless bluetooth head phones. Past purchases from other manufactures proved to be poor quality and sound. I was very surprised by these ear buds. Fit is perfect. Device is somewhat larger than I though but the fit very well. Sound is amazing. pairing is super easy with iPhone 8 and iPhone XS. I love the fact that it charges in the case and the case is compatible with wireless charging. The only thing I wish was better is when using a single earbud (Right side) and leaving left in the case there is a small beep that happens every 30 seconds or so, But when using Bothe left and right together they are amazing.

title: Good sound, long lasting charge, great value
body: Good sounding, love that the case keeps them charged and that they can be used independently or joined. This is great in situations where I need to hear the world around me, but equally great when I don’t! :-)

title: Sounds great and comfortable fit
body:
I’m really pleased with these earbuds. They are well made and sound great. I was even surprised by the charging box and how the earbuds snap into their dock with magnets. Although they came fitted with silicone earcaps that were too big for my ears, they also come with other sizes so I was able to easily change them out. They feel snug and comfortable now. I also like that they are waterproof - I’ve worn them in the shower and can’t wait to wear them this summer in the pool.
I debated on putting 4 or 5 stars (would give a 4.5 if I could), and the that’s only because the charging box doesn’t seem to hold a charge as long as I would expect. The earbuds themselves last for most of the day of continuous play, but when they’re in the box they’re constantly charging and that drains the battery on the box. But in the big scheme of things that’s not a major problem, especially if you carry a backup battery around like I do for my phone.

title: A+++++ love these so far!
body: I love these earbuds. They came with different size ear pieces which was a huge concern of mine. The smallest size fit my small ears perfectly. They were charged enough to use right out of the box to test them out. They linked to my samsung s8 right away and the sound quality is amazing. I will be purchasing a pair for my oldest and my husband. Oh and they arrived a day early.

title: It's only 3hours of music
body: Wow I've ordered and tried at least 5 pairs different brands even Bose, and let me tell you I'm very impressed with this earbuds, the sound is amazing specially the bass and the noise cancelation. The complaint I have is the comfort level, I think my ears are too small because they don't fit snug or I just don't know how to put them on. I'm using the smallest fitting and still no luck, I'll keep trying different angles maybe it's just me. But definitely recommend this.

title: Very satisfied with my purchase
body: I use them while doing light exercise and they are perfect for what I need them for. The fit is snug enough that I can sprint or use my punching bag without them falling out due to repeated light impact. Sound quality is good and the charging case feels very sturdy.

title: Can U hear me now
body:
I took a leap of faith & ordered these earbuds, I was super surprised!!! I was already using another brand, but my music sound in the gym or on my motorcycle was never loud enough to me...🙁
These TOZO earbuds are on point, they feel even more sturdy & the storage case is high quality material.

I highly recommend...👍😎👍

title: Great for the price!
body:
Pros:
  1. I love these! They have good sound and they fit my ears nicely.
  2. When I work I keep one in my ear and rotate them when one battery gets low.

Cons:
  1. The design of these makes it critical that you speak up clearly when on a call.
  2. They can get knocked out of your ear during rigorous activity.

title: TOZO for RTOZ the best combo option ever!
body: I was skeptical at first when I ordered it and happily surprised when I got it. Very nice package and presentation with excellent overall quality and great sound. Easy no hassle pairing. I also loved the quietness provided by the noise canceling during my first flight using it.

title: Great Headphones!
body: I use head phones on a daily basis so I needed something that provided comfort, long battery life, and good sound. These head phones do just that. Great sound quality, and I love the fact that if I forget to charge them for a night they still have charge provide charge within the carrying case. They also have a great mic to them, when testing them the person on the call said it was super clear. Great head phones at a decent price!

title: Top performer for waterproof earbuds, TOZO ranks very high in my book
body: Received the TOZO T10 as a gift for my birthday.  Right away I was excited to get them because I really enjoy spending time in the pool but not a fan of speakers.  One of the key features is the fit.  There are several sizes available and I selected a smaller piece that worked great.  Set up was easy too.  The Bluetooth connectivity was seamless and fast.  Once connected, the sound was perfect.  I use them for work as well with taking phone calls.  The sound quality for both me and the caller is very good.  I am sure you will enjoy.  Customer service responded quickly to an inquiry and was easy to work with.  Very helpful.

title: Mostly good with a few quirks
body:
I use these almost daily and for the most part they are good.  I listen primarily to audiobooks with occasional music and the quality is good enough for me.
My main complaint is the controls.  A tap of the button will toggle play/pause but there is no way to advance to the next track or adjust volume.  A click and hold of the button instead triggers a phone call to the last person I called which is not very useful for me.
Another small issue is sometimes when I return them to the charging case the right earbud doesn't seem to make contact and remains on and connected to my phone.  Re-seating it usually resolves the issue right away.  I've gotten in the habit of disabling Bluetooth on my phone when not needed but it would be better to not have to worry about this.

Overall I'm satisfied for the cost of these but wouldn't mind seeing a slight revision with better control options.

title: Amazing Value and Performance
body:
I've had these for about a month now -- so while I can't speak to longevity, I'm loving them so far. Compared to other wireless buds/phones I've owned they: 1.) pair much more easily and reliably -- just remove them from the case and they power up and find my iPhone; and 2.) have amazing sound quality.

I have small ears, so I had to use the smallest insert. I won't say they fit like a glove -- I think only a custom mold like pro musicians get would do that -- but they are reasonably comfortable and have only slipped out once, during a very vigorous workout. I've used them during normal workouts and bike rides with no slip-out issues.

I haven't tested how long they hold a charge, but I think they finally drained out on about my 4th use. The case charges them (and sucks them into place with cool, little magnets) and I only have to charge the case itself once every two weeks or so.

I don't know about you, but I just couldn't justify Apple's price for AirPods, nor of some of their competitors. My wife tried PowerBeats Pro's buds and hated them.

Again, we'll see if they're still kicking in a year (perhaps I'll update then), but for now, I'm very impressed and happy with these babies. The only thing keeping me from giving them 5 stars is the jury being out on their durability. (But I did accidentally drop the case on my hardwood floor and they were fine, so there's that.)

title: Wanted to like them
body: I really wanted to like this product, unfortunately they would not fit in my ears. Honestly they hurt as well. Yes I tried each size of bud they gave. Overall I liked the look, and everything else about them. I feel you don’t deserve one star based on the fact they simply wouldn’t fit. Good customer service gave me my refund.

title: These ear buds work great
body:
Received the T10 earbuds on time  Everything worked right out of the box.  Set up was really easy.  The buds sync with each other as you take them out of their case.  Then connecting via bluetooth to my iphone was flawless.  Even connected to my pc - no problem.
They fit nicely in my ears and come with various size foam inserts as well
Sound quality is really good.
So far, so good.  I would recommend these to others!

title: Great Look, Feel, and Quality
body: The Tozo T10's are the perfect balance between quality and cost. The battery life on both the ear pieces and the charging case are both enough to last me a whole day of use. The noise cancelation is what surprised me the most, it is one of the best features. What I was most concerned about was the look and feel due to how bulky the ear pieces look online. In-person however, they barely protrude out of my ear so they are great if you don't want them to be noticeable. The sound quality is probably the best that I've even comparing to my previous pair of wired headphones. Overall I would recommend this product.

title: Relief
body: I had a pair of very expensive Jabra's which had problems.  These Tozo's work very well.  It was a welcome relief after wrestling with the Jabra's for a couple of weeks.  You should know that you can't adjust the volume from the earpiece and you can't access your Google assistant or Alexa with them, but I can live without those things.  The tradeoff is saving over $100 and simple dependability.  OK, I've only had my Tozo's a couple of days, so I really don't know about long term dependability.  I'll be back if there's any problems.

title: Excellent ear buds...
body:
This are great. The bass is good and the battery life is excellent! I would recommend these to anyone looking for a wireless ear buds..
The only thing that makes me feel bad,  is I payed the top price for mine about 2 weeks ago and now there $20 less! Ugh!!!

title: Awesome ear buds if they fit well
body:
Have had them since August & they re slammig!  The sound is amazing, I can hear the tambourine in songs previously I'd only heard on my Nose system.The bass great but doesn't drown out other high & mid ranges which is important to  me for quality music playback.  They paid easily together automatically when taken from the case..Four top sizes included was 1 reason I kept them, I needed the extra small, still the buds are very noise cancelling, I have take them out of I see lips moving certainly won't hear them!
They arrived without flaws, packaged better than I could package a bift, btw they make a great gift considering price value & quality.. Wrist band of you're out. Silicone tips are an upgrade from rubber tips & more comfortable, imo
I chose the white & they look a bit more classy imo.
I have one question & one almost a deal breaker
Q: how to sanitize eartips & are there replacement tips of needed?
ADB: I most have small ears. They enclosed tips on insertion is genius
& much appreciated.  However they still stick out making my ears look like something growing out of them! Not a good look. Was going to ask If.mini buds available but death in family, vandalism of property, overstating guests got in the way.  I don't think everyone would have so h an awkward for & I've never been told my ears are too small for my face, Not even ENT's  That is my only complaint because they are awkward fitting in my ears if I bend my head downward 1 usually the right 1 is likely to fall out.
These have awesome sound, quality classy look compared to a friends set ...Great brand but as he said mine were better, if they only fit my ears a bit better & didn't stick out like Dumbo....oops not a good look.
Missed date to return of ask about the sanitation & tip replacements. Most of all a better fitting set of buds with same sound quality.
It's a love/hate thing Love the buds, hate the fit & fear of losing one if I'm moving around & isn't that the point of wireless buds, too be able to move & wear?  I should  contact the company about suggestions for a better fit same quality maybe they will read this review & contact me that would be nice.Oh I did email them about fit, They sent me an email with I copy of the already enclosed how to insert. Good info they included in my purchase. But nothing more. Fairness my month was extra busy as said.
Recommendation Great buds for what you get at a fair price, if they fit well you'll love them.  BTW they hold a charge good even when they fell out of my ear  I would never use them if I were really on the move due to ill fitting for me. For me I'll use them until I find a new  better fitting pair with the slamming sound noise cancelling these defiantly have. Like I said it's a love/hate thing
Any suggestions appreciated

title: Very nice set of ear buds
body: First, let me start off by saying this: "THESE ARE SOME VERY GOOD EAR BUDS". They have DEEP BASS, excellent range from the phone (IPhone 8+), and last longer then the 1.5 hours of constant use. I got these on a lightning sale for $10 less then the normal  price.

title: Most Legit Headphones! Amazing price, Amazing product!
body:
