I went through three pairs of blue tooth headphones from FYE. I had to return every single pair due to connection problems, volume problems, and mic problems when on the phone.

These however are the BEST product I have purchased. I have not had problems with skipping of music, mic problems on the phone, or sound quality! The battery life is amazing and you can connect both or only connect one.

Only issue is you can’t sleep with them because it hurts, but other than that these are the most legit pair of earbuds I have gotten for this price. These are AmAzInG!!!

title: I’m still in awe
body:
I’ve been researching wireless earbuds for the past few years. I tried another brand a couple years ago and they were a huge disappointment. I understand why these are Amazon’s Choice and why they are at almost 5 stars with over 4,000 reviews. These earbuds are super comfortable, with different rubber ear pieces to make sure you have the perfect fit, but the sound is phenomenal. I have wireless Beats by Dre, and those are wonderful, but I wanted something much smaller, with comparable sound quality. These are it. And a fraction of the price.
I couldn’t recommend these enough to anyone looking for easy-to-use, yet great-looking wireless ear buds. The charging box they come with is an added bonus too, and so easy to carry around!

title: Super price for superior quality
body: I’ve only had the earbuds for one day and they are amazing. Wore them the entire day in the office and no discomfort from wearing and then wore them at the gym. Great fit. Couple co-workers may even buy a pair soon. Received an email from TOZO the day after receiving the earbuds to ensure I was 100% satisfied. Will purchase from this company again when the need arises.

title: Bluetooth connectivity is not very good
body:
When I do sit ups the connection will sometimes break. It'll still be paired but the music cuts out and in.

If the connectivity was solid all throughout my activities I'd give it 5 stars because that's what you expect from Bluetooth headphones.

title: I never knew how much I needed these!
body: These fit great! I'm excited to have small bud's with great sound and limited appearance! My only negative is the micro usb cover on the back is SUPER hard to open.  I that it tho because it prevents stuff from getting in and messing with the connection.

title: Incredible Pair of Earbuds!
body: I've only had one set of earbuds (Shure) that were pretty good.  Since I needed a Bluetooth pair for my iPhone X, I read several reviews on many sets.  Considering the TOZO T10s, which are not just Bluetooth, but waterproof with wireless charging capabilities, I bought these.  THESE TOZO T10s ARE TERRIFIC IN EVERY WAY! Great sound quality with a superb charging case and a 1 year warranty.  Can't imagine more expensive buds actually being better than these.  Believe me, you wont be disappointed if you purchase these buds, period.

title: Wish the left worked
body: I was hoping these head phones would be great replacement for what I have but they are not left ear bud goes in and out and before anyone says any thing this happens with the phone a foot away from me on a table even in my hands but when it is not cutting In and out they sound amazing I just wished it the left worked and wouldn’t cut out at all

title: I am new to BT earbuds and from what I have experienced, these are excellent earbuds
body: I have never had any BT earbuds in the past. My son has a pair, but I did not want to spend the amount of money he spent. Especially, since I was not sure how much I would actually use them.  This price point was perfect for me and the reviews (even independent reviews) really indicated that they were worth the money.  So far, I have enjoyed the ability to utilize one earbud at a time while the other is left in the charging box. The box charges on my existing wireless charger I have had for my phone as well. I have made a couple phone calls through them and the quality was pretty good if I kept a steady volume to my voice. I will update my review as time goes by.

title: Very happy with these...
body: I still want to dish out the cash for some AirPods in the future but these have been a great introduction into wireless headphones. The battery lasts long enough to not be annoying and their waterproof capabilities makes it easy to work out without anxiety of damaging them. If I had any issue it’s that they’re a little bulky and the blue light that occasionally flashes can be distracting but I don’t think that makes them worth any less considering the reasonable price tag.

title: Hoping to figure out the sound quality..
body: So I just received my earbuds, followed the instructions for pairing, but I can't seem to get this great quality that everyone references. It's not my first pair of bluetooth headphones, so I know there is always a little bit of quality loss, but it's a pretty harsh quality drop. I tried to reset the buds as the directions say, for static, but with no improvement. Hopefully I'll be able to get them working better, but right now I'm not impressed unfortunately.

title: Awesome Product
body: Perfect size and fit. Charges fast and battery lasts forever. Great overall quality and craftsmanship. I am definitely glad I bought these and not the expensive Apple Pods. These are just as good and wayyyyyyy more affordable

title: These are eh...
body: I used these for about a month. I missed the return window so I just kept them. They lose connection regularly and are not easy to pair with each other, or to a device. Honestly I think I just forgot to return them because I have no idea why I would have kept them. The sound was decent as long as they were connected, but if you move your head the wrong way, the connection will be lost and during a workout because I would stop working out to try to fix this issue. This got to be so annoying that I just stopped using them altogether.  I never got to test the battery life because I never used them to battery exhaustion, just mine.

title: Broke quickly, no customer service
body: I LOVED these headphones. While they lasted. I’ve had them only a few weeks, was very pleased, until one day the left earbud slipped out of my ear and fell three feet to the ground. It disconnected immediately, and I’ve been unable to turn it on or charge it since. I tried to contact the company, and was sent a “delivery failure” in response to my email. Apparently the email the company has posted doesn’t actually exist. I would have given this product five stars, but with how easily it breaks and an inability to contact customer support, I’m dropping it to one. Very disappointed.

title: Really great sound, deep bass, good noise isolation - a great value!
body: I have Apple Airpods, and they're convenient (I have all Apple gear), but the sound is thin and noise comes through. Not so with these - make sure to try the different tips to the earbuds to find the best fit, and then *boom* when you put them in, you will almost hear nothing other than your sound source. And the bass is very good and deep. Pairing is more difficult than AirPods of course, but it works fine once you get the hang of it. The range is pretty good. Love that they're waterproof, so it's OK to have them in when swimming (above the water). It's great to hang out at the pool with these and listening to music or audiobooks my Apple Watch, not worrying about water damage ;-) A great value for the money!

title: Great Earbuds!
body: Most earbuds won't stay in my ear, forcing me to use headphones, however, no problem with the TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds.  They fit perfectly, and sound great! It is a real plus that the TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds are waterproof, as I wear them when I jog each morning and don't have to worry about the sweat damaging them.

title: High-quality earbuds. TOZO backs their products with outstanding customer service.
body:
I purchased the black TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds with Wireless Charging Case IPX8 Waterproof TWS Stereo Headphones in-Ear Built-in Mic Headset Premium Sound with Deep Bass for Sport.

Accurate order placement and delivered on time. Love the stylish design, sound quality, battery life and wireless charging of these earbuds. Discrete and great for workouts. TOZO customer service is outstanding and stands behind their awesome products. I would definitely recommend the TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 wireless earbuds.

title: Amazing Sound Quality, But....
body:
I want to start by reminding anyone reading this that wireless earbuds are still a baby technology, THEY WILL BE BUGGY. Even Apple's airpods are buggy. It's perfectly normal the first few years a new technology is released.

I have had these for a month now and am writing this review based on my daily use of the product.

This being said, I am a landscaper by trade and am moving around for 12+ hours a day. I needed something wireless as any wired earbuds get caught on my equipment annoyingly often. I bought these after learning they had a 10 hour play time, reading the good and bad reviews, and weighing my options. I got them first day and played them until they were dead (about an hour) and charged then overnight. To my dismay, they only charged halfway even though they were magnetically attached to their case all night. No chance they "slipped off" or weren't connected. I'm not sure if this is part of the glitches or if I have a defective charging case, but this seems to be a typical problem. I just make sure to wiggle the earbud so that it "wakes up" and continues charging. Unfortunately, they do not have a 10 hour play time. Once charged, they will play for about 3 hours before dieing. Luckily, none of my yards take longer than 3 hours to landscape and my drive time between properties can be an hour or more sometimes, so I just charge them in the truck.

Another hitch I have noticed, as other reviews have stated, the booth connectivity is weak between the right unit (main unit) and the left. This means that at least a handful of times throughout the day the left earbud blips in and out, interrupting the music. Now, if you are at a desk job or work with very little movement you may not notice this issue, but since I am constantly moving around, it happens with annoying frequency.

With all that being said, I love the sound these headphones have! The bass is amazing and they don't detract from the music quality. They also have a feature in both units that allow you to pause/play with a single push. They are also pretty good at phone calls. My husband and mom both say they don't notice anything. Unfortunately, there is no volume control on the unit, you have to use your connected device to control it.

In recap:

Pros: sound quality and bass, wireless, play/pause function, phone call quality good

Cons: glitchy connection, play time less than 3 hours, intermittent charging port, no sound control on unit

Would I recommend them ... No. This company still has quite a few bugs to sort out, especially the connectivity issue between earbuds. But they are good enough for me and work sufficiently for the price.

title: Right Ear - Completely Stopped working after one day of use.
body: This manufacturer has manufacturer quality control issues. The headphones weren't dropped  and just stopped working with intermittent sound in right ear. Probably a cold solder joint. Will not buy this brand or products from this manufacturer again. Threw away my box already, so I probably won't bother returning. $50 wasted....

title: Awesome!
body: Not only are these a fraction of apple ear buds, these are amazing! Love the charging ability, they stay charged for a nice long time, the sound quality is out of this world, plus, I like that I get audio notifications when they are connected. Good product!

title: They connect!!
body: This is my third pair of Bluetooth ear buds that I have bought in 3 months, from different companies. The first quit working, the second would never pair but these paired minutes after I opened the box. Sound quality is incredible!!!

title: Best wireless earbuds
body: Absolutely thrilled with this product, I never thought wireless earbuds would have the quality of sound, and the ease of use the these have. Pairing was a breeze, and so far not a single problem. I sweat a great deal when I work out so the iPX8 rating was very important to me. These are also very comfortable to wear what's after only a few uses I hardly noticed them.

title: Fits perfectly, sound quality ok, low default volume - charge only lasts 2.75 hours
body:
The GOOD - I am an avid mountain biker and runner, I am very impressed on how they stay in the ear, even after a couple of MTB crashes.  They do slip a bit in the ear, but a quick re-adjustment takes care of that - be sure to experiment with the different size buds.  Sound is better than expected.
The BAD - Not sure what Tozo advertises, but the charge only lasts 2.5~2.75 hours at 3/4 volume.  My phone is carried in my pocket so no drain on Bluetooth distance.
Also, compared to other Bluetooth headphones, the max volume does not reach what other headphones can get up to. I like to crank it for the gym but no go. I also had to lower the volume due to the short charge life - see above.

I would pass on these headphones if any of the issues are important to you.

title: Good ear buds at a good price
body:
I have only had these for a few days, but here are my initial thoughts:
- pairing was easy and they automatically paired when I got to the gym
- I wanted a set that would stay in my ear while running and not slip out after sweating. I had no issues with this after one hard work out.
- sound quality was good
- once or twice the earbuds sound would fade in and out when I am exercising since my phone is on the move, slightly annoying but nothing drastic
- I have not tried all of the expensive pairs, but as long as these continue to perform no need to spend on the those
I will update if anything changes

title: Look no further- these are the ones!
body: I am in love with these wireless earbuds! I have small ear canals so the various sized earbuds that come with these were great for me to find the perfect fit! I typically run 5 times a week from 2-7 miles. The earbuds stay in my ear the entire run! I never need to adjust them or push them in. The sound is incredible and you can make adjustments to sound, etc using the actual earbuds! Awesome purchase!

title: Excellent sound, easy to pair!
body:
bought this for my wife, had to pick one out of the many products available at $50. this one had more reviews, and I now know why (*secret*). joke aside, I picked it since advertised as waterproof and with optional wireless charging feature.

about the product: very good sound, clear and deep. The pairing was exceptionally easy, each earbud configuring separately, but also detecting each other. smart ;-). in 30 sec the pairing was done.

about the size of the earbud: tricky. my wife found the size she wanted (2nd from the smallest). for me.. unsure. still debating. would not do free style in the water with it, would freak out!!

Last: have not tested the duration of the battery yet.. they say 3hours music/5hours phone, will see in practice and update this review. same for the 4 recharges per cradle.

title: Sometimes ok, sometimes not
body: Constant issues with it disconnecting, and constant beeping in my ear while using for no apparent reason that will come and go at random. Battery sometimes will last all day, sometimes only a few hours. Completely unpredictable.

title: Easy pairing indeed
body: I always have a rough time with bluetooth - these things really do pair easily which is great. The fit I found to be great and don't think you'll have any issues at the gym. Sound quality was just fine, especially for the price! I love the wireless charging feature too. Would recommend this.

title: Great bang-for-your-buck earbuds! What are you waiting for!?
body: I'm really liking these earbuds so far! The bass is great and the range feels almost as good as some of my studio headphones. I recommend trying out all the earbuds sizes they provide. For $50 this felt like a solid deal compared to the other competing bluetooth headphones on Amazon. Battery life is meh but I use them for working out and at work so I can never need full charge off the charging station for more than a couple of hours. All in all, I high recommend trying with the warranty TOZO gives you.

title: Love these earbuds!
body: I was reluctant to try wireless earbuds but I finally gave in. I am not one bit disappointed with these either. I had a little trouble pairing both buds at the same time and that was resolved in short order. The sound is incredible and they are super comfortable.

title: Design Flaw
body:
Left bud doesn't work by itself. Right bud beeps for about 5 minutes if you try to use it by itself. The beeping sound is completely unnecessary and really annoying. I'm going to be charged $7 for return shipping.

Outside of this it feels like a well designed product, good sound and solid feel to the buds and the case.

title: Great product for a great price
body: I am extremely satisfied with my new TOZO earbuds. They were extremely easy to set up with my iPhone and I love the sound quality that I get using the headphones while listening to music, watching Netflix or listening to a podcast. The charger that comes with the earbuds is easy to carry around in a bag or pocket and gives a solid charge in a quick manner! I highly recommend these to anybody looking for a great product at an even better price

title: WOW!!!! Fantastic product!
body: Extremely good product! The fit is perfect. They are very comfortable and sound is fantastic considering the size. Very happy!

title: Great sound!
body: These are really great earbuds. I could slightly hear my daughter talking to me but canceled out most background noise. The sound is superb. It kept the charge as described. Most importantly they stay in my ears unlike another pair I recently purchased.

title: Too big for ears and annoying pairing issue
body:
So, I like these earbuds. Aside from having to go into settings and manually pair them for each use, they are pretty simple.
The reason I am scoring them so low is really because the silicone pads that come with them don’t fit my ears. That’s not necessarily  the company's fault, but they don’t sell smaller sizes. I’ll have to return them, which is disappointing. Without the pairing issue and the too big for my ears issue, I’d have given them five stars.

title: Good value for price
body: I've had my headphones for about a week now and they work pretty well. I'm still trying to figure out how to reduce the time it takes for just one ear to pair and I have received some complaints when I make phone calls with it, but it's great for listening to audio. I wish there was a way to increase or decrease the volume using the headphones, so that's something the developers could consider. All in all, I am a satisfied customer for the price I paid.

title: Good for the price, Very good for the price if stationary
body:
The set comes with plenty of size options for any ear, and even though they look bulky they are lite enough to not be noticed while wearing them. I will say they perform perfectly sitting at a desk or watching TV or playing video games. Every now and then they have connection issues when moving or putting the streaming device like my phone either hand to hand or in my pocket.

The manufacturer is very prompt with support and is sending me a free set to replace mine because of the connection issues.

title: Good first impression but didn’t do it’s core function.
body: Well first impression in the Air was good. Connected right away and the sound quality was good. After wearing them for a few minutes they started to cut in and out. When I went to the water that’s where it got worse. I dunked my head in the waters and immediately lost connection. The regained connection after a few seconds. I decided to test them by swimming a lap. Again they lost connection but this time didn’t connect again. I was unable to repair them. Even after recarging them and forgetting the device reconnecting.  My phone saw them but were unable to connect. Sorry for the review. I know it’s a tough product to make. Not upset or anything.

title: Awesome bass
body: They do feel a little big in the ear and the other thing that bothered me is that it announces everything like if I'm making a call or something. I'm not trying to be picky I actually do think the sound quality on this is great but I ctually like to defer to my other set of Bluetooth headphones because there magnetic and just lay around my neck when I'm not using them.

title: Truly good sound quality and noise canceling.
body: I’m a Bose fan and was very skeptical in buying anything else, but these caught my attention. I’m so glad I took the chance because these are amazing. I love the bass. I haven’t had any connection issues I have read in these reviews nor did I have any issues using my iPhone. Works perfectly.

title: Quality sound for music, terrible for phone calls
body: The Tozo T10 wireless earbuds are an excellent budget earbuds. They have terrific sound and bass quality. The also come in a nice slim charging case that is sleek and easily fits in a pocket. The charge time is pretty good, I have about 4-5 hours in earbud time. They are said to be waterproof, but I have not had a chance to test that yet. On my runs they stay firmly in my ears and sweat doesn't make them move around. The one negative I am upset about is the call quality. I read other reviews on this product that the call quality is pretty good both for caller and receiver. I may have a defective pair but the receiver says I sound alien like. My voice is distorted. I tried this 5 times with different phones and people- same result. Since they are also budget earbuds you do not have as much touch control with the earbuds themselves. 1 click- play/ pause. 2 click- redial last number. I haven't seen anywhere I can change this.

title: Great Wireless Earbuds
body: I bought these because my AirPods broke so I was looking for something inexpensive and these had some really good reviews so I purchased them and tried them out and I was surprisingly amazed by the quality of these earbuds. I really love the sound quality and the I can feel the bass that what I was looking for. The pairing process to my phone was very easy. You pair the right earbud and the left automatically pairs itself. They don’t slip out of my ear a whole lot. I really enjoy these earbuds. I would recommend these to any and everybody!

title: So far so good
body: These could seat better in my ears, but I’m sure they’ll fit everyone differently. Volume controls would be nice. When syncing with my TV via a USB Bluetooth dongle, I have no way of adjusting the volume. Otherwise, they could have a tad more bass. Keepers.

title: Great sound for an unknown brand namr
body: I am a bit of a sound nut, having grown up in a family where music is paramount and a father who designed speakers and sound processors. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of sound that this product provides. I poured over previous reviews, paying attention to what was said about the sound quality and bass output. I finally decided to make the purchase and have yet to regret it. The quality is good, the bass is ok, but after downloading an equalizer app for my phone (as suggested by the company and other reviewers) the quality became sharper and the bass has a nice kick to it. I've enjoyed using these at the gym. They fit great in my ears as well, since I have smaller ear canals and have trouble keeping most buds in. These stay in whether I am running, talking, lifting, or just moving around in general. They have yet to hurt after prolonged wear too. Ive also been impressed with the case, as it charges the buds quickly and works with my Samsung wireless charging pads. Very happy with this purchase.

title: Very nice earbud for the cost
body: I am an airpod user, but needed to find another option for wearing at the gym.  These TOZO T10's sound very nice, and work out well for gym use.  Their customer service is great!  I needed some smaller rubber ear protectors and emailed them.  They responded immediately and said they would be sent right out.  They have a nice wireless charger as well!  Nice job TOZO!

title: Great Earbuds!
body: I wanted to get some earbuds that rival Apple Earpods, and the Tozo Earbuds do just that! Great sound, bass, easy pairing, and they fit nicely in my ear. Charging didn't take very long. I would highly recommend them! Great value!

title: They're good when they do work
body: Meh...I use these ear buds at work.  I only use one, my headset is on my other ear.  When they do work properly the sound quality is great!! However, when they work crappy...while using one bud it constantly beeps until the other one has left the charging dock.  Syncing them is difficult at times and the actual ear buds are uncomfortably big even using the smallest size.  Overall they get 2 stars from me.

title: The technology's just not there.
body: I'm not sure if there's actually a quality pair of bluetooth earbuds out there, but the ones I have tried, including this brand, left much to be desired.  My two biggest issues were low volume and insufficient bass response. These might be okay for talking on the phone, but forget it when it comes to listening to music... that is if you really care about music.

title: Seem to  work well
body: I received an email telling me if I gave a review they would send a free charger.  In the email I was told I needed to give 5 stars a few different times.  The earbuds have the potential to be 5 stars, but not just yet.  So far they are working great.  The button on the left ear is hard to push to turn on and connect.  If I don't have Bluetooth on when I turn them on, they don't connect immediately.  I have an iPhone 6+.  So when I have to turn off the earplug and turn it back on to connect, I have to push the button so hard that it actually deafens my hearing.  I wish the button would be a little more sensitive.  I'm hoping the on/off switch relaxes a little over time.  If so, the product is worth 5 stars.

title: Happy customer
body: I bought these for my husband and he loves them! First- they arrived on time; that's always a plus. He likes how the buds come in different sizes to fit his ear. No one like ear buds falling out while he runs. He can even share an ear bud with me and we still get the great sound quality. Overall- excellent wire free ear buds for a fair price.

title: Love them!
body: These earbuds have great sound quality, volume, and battery life! Apple airpods don't fit in my ears, and are quite pricey, so these affordable, comfortable, earbuds were a great alternative! One in a while, the left earbud won't connect, but if I put both back in the case and take them back out, it works great!

title: Indoor only
body:
These sound great.  I use them at night when people are sleeping connected to the TV or cellphone.  Words great indoors.  My TV is pretty far away from the couch and these work great.  I bought a total of 3 of these because they work well with kids on their devices indoors so I don't have to hear them.  Also the kids use them on car rides in the back seat for watching videos.  They work great.

Now outdoors and PC/Laptops is where they have problems.  I connect these to PC/Laptops and they crash the sound drivers.  I have some AT m50x Bluetooth and I can connect just fine with them on my PC/Laptop, so I think its just the TOZO's.  Also when I go outside for walking the dogs and running/jogging they seem to cut in and out like I am on a old CD walkman without antishock.  Its weird, but the only solution I found is keep it near the left side of your body, either being in the left hand or back left pocket.  Seems to work fine then.  Looking at getting a forearm strap for my phone so I can keep it closer without holding my phone.

The in-call noise cancellation sucks, people can barley hear me in calls and usually hear everything else better than my voice.

I would say, great for indoor use around the house, or for the people in the rear seat for road trips.  Especially for the price.

title: Good Quality at a Fair Price
body: As someone who typically can not wear ear buds/Airpods from Apple, i was pleasantly surprised to find this product.  They offer a "customizable" fit with the various sized rubber ear pieces.  It was easy to find an option that fit well, without falling out of my ears or causing discomfort.  The sound is awesome for the price, and the snug fit really helps keep out outside noises.  They paired immediately to my iPhone, and i was able to use them right away after their initial charge.  Would highly recommend.

title: Amazing sound quality w/ fit kinks
body: the audio/sound is way better than I expected. Possibly better than or equal to my airpods. The only thing that is taking some adjusting is how they fit/lay in my ear when I use them. I'm still trying to work out the size/fit of the headphones

title: Not worth the money!
body:
There are some main issues:
1.  sometimes randomly, left and write earbods do not pair resulting in one paring with your phone, then you have to reset them both to get both working! sucks!
2. Sounds keep changing channels, transferring from left to write, dropping or increasing volume, bluetooth connection to the phone is also pretty weak which make the sound break up and change quality,
3. Overall, don't waste your money!

title: The Bass is great!
body:
Sound quality is very good, outstanding bass for earbuds.
Battery life has been very good for me, and the charging case charges them very quickly as well as it charging quickly as well.

Comes with 4 different size ear pieces, first few didn’t fit me well but found ones that do.

Noise cancellation is on point, to the extent of almost being annoying because how good it is (hard to socialize with both in)

title: Nice earbuds for running
body:
I bought these wireless earbuds mostly for running outside and exercising in gym. My previous lightweight wireless headphones didn't provide good sound quality. Any my other noise cancelling over-the-ear headphones while providing good sound weren't suitable for running because they were soaking in all the sweat.

I completely satisfied with the sound quality of my new TOZO earbuds. They don't provide complete isolation, which is good when you're running outside. As long as I found right size of cushions they sit comfortably tight in my ears. I didn't have any pairing issues. I didn't use them very long periods yet to check the battery life. But they definitely charge quickly and conveniently using their charging case.

title: Great Earbuds!
body: Recently ordered these and couldn't be happier. They are much higher quality than others of similar price. But most importantly they do not lose connection like the last set of earbuds I had. I can't recommend these enough!

title: Excelentes auriculares!
body: En base al precio no esperaba la calidad de sonido que encontré, bajos profundos, sonido cristalino. La vida útil de la batería es excelente, los he usado por más de dos horas sin probelma y luego vuelven a estar rápidamente cargados al guardarlos en su estuche. Los uso para entrenar y el agarre es suficientemente bueno, más allá de la comodidad de no depender de cables. Totalmente recomendables!

title: Ok, but overall not worth $50
body: This item is... ok. If you’re looking for something to work out in, not for you. The way that it’s designed makes the back too heavy and in the end it just falls out when ever you move up and down (I.e. running, yoga, swimming, not gonna work out). The sound is decent, it’s loud and over all pretty average, an ok amount of bass behind it as well, but the left bud is quieter than the right. The connection is pretty bad. Sometimes I’ll just be sitting and I’ll rest my hand on my head and the sound will cut out in the left ear bud. Also, it only sometimes automatically connects to your phone, and while the right headphone is supposed to be the “master” bud, the left one will attempt to lead as well and then neither of them work with the phone, just causing more steps. I think that there are better products for the price, it was my first wireless earbud purchase, and I think it’s ok for my first run, but not a great item.

title: Problems starts arising but sound quality is great. I’ll still give it another try.
body:
Base is great! Pretty clear. Similar to a Bose quality sound. Only problem is no matter how I charge it as soon as I take it out it keeps beeping like it’s low in battery when I’m on the phone every few seconds. After a few days it keeps connecting and disconnecting while on the phone. When it comes to important calls it gets really annoying because you won’t hear what the other person is saying. I haven’t read the manual to pin point the problem but in a few days if it gets even worst I’ll return it. Maybe it’s just a faulty one. I’ll still give it another try because the sound quality is pretty darn good!

(UPDATE) ok so this is quality review: had it for a few weeks now. After 2 days it started having problems. Kept beeping like it’s low in battery but I’ve left it charging for 2 days! A few days after it started cutting in and out. Disconnecting and connecting randomly. At the beginning or a few times in the conversation. Gets annoying and especially for important calls you won’t hear what they’re saying. I thought it’ll get better in time but it seems to be getting worst. So sad. Sound quality is great but sadly it’s not working properly so I’ll have to return it. I rate it a 1 Star after this experience. If you can’t use it sound quality doesn’t matter.

title: Goid product for the price.
body: I had purchased these buds because I was in a pinch. Being a maintenance man for properties I deal with plumbing and that includes water... well, my phone took a bath. This left my microphone inoperable. Instead of replacing my phone that works fine other than the microphone I rely on bluetooth. I had a nice LG JBL set but being over 6 years old they quit... So, I purchased these. Not as expensive and do the job. These new style buds are iffy for the fact they are just that buds. No cables, nothing to restrain them from getting lost. You rely on the product and your ears to hold them in. Sound quality is good for what they are. You may want to download a sound equalizer app if your looking to get better quality. For me, they work good without. Microphone wise, I have had no issues. Unless, if your like my sister and relies on her car audio for calls, good luck. She said I sounded really quiet during our conversation. Nothing that can really be done about that. Noise cancellation, still can hear the environment around you just muffled. It all depends on your preference really. I do like the waterproof aspect. Being that I do work outside quite frequently it's a nice feature. They also come with a one year warranty.

title: Small but POWERFUL
body: I’ve been looking for wireless earbuds for a while now and I took a gamble at these. Best decision I’ve made. Great sound quality and they really pack a punch. They come with 3-4 different ends so you can find the right size for you ear. I haven’t had an issue with falling out since I changed them out. Would recommend.

title: Fantastic product with superior customer svc.
body: ***uodate*** based on my original review, Tozo reached out and sent me a new set of earbuds. They work great! I can’t say enough about the customer service at Tozo and their determination to make me happy. Thanks, Tozo!

title: Excellent quality
body: I was unsure about going wireless until I got these. The sound quality is great and the fit is very comfortable. These are definitely worth the price!

title: They are actually pretty damn waterproof!
body: I left my Airpods in Houston after a business trip; which was a good thing because the sound quality was poor and they had zero noise cancelling capabilities. I bought the Tozo 10's on a whim to replace them, and could not be more satisfied for the price. They fit well and don't fall out. The bass and sound quality is satisfactory, and they look about as good as you could ask for. The most surprising thing I found is that they really are waterproof. I work out in the pool a lot, and I gave them the full test in the pool yesterday. Water was splashing on them and it didn't effect them at all. The ear buds keep almost all of the water out of your ear, so the sound never really gets distorted. I even wore them beneath the water, and they still held true. However, the sound cuts out when you go under water because the Bluetooth signal cannot traverse a liquid environment. Whenever I surfaced, the music would go right back to playing. The signal distance is satisfactory as well. For example, I wrapped my phone up in a towel and put it in the center of my 25 meter long lane, and I received minimal cut outs in sound. Would, and already have, recommend this to anyone trying to get decent/good quality wireless headphones.

title: The ability to charge wirelessly.
body: The sound quality is great for this product. The price is great for a product of this quality. Once I figure out how to keep the ear buds in my ears without it falling out, I’ll be a very happy camper. Outside of that, I love the product.

title: Stopped playing audio!
body: I used the product every day, multiple hours per day. They stopped playing audio through my phone after about a month and a half. At first I liked them due to the sound quality and noise cancellation. I work with metal so it's hard to find headphones that do both for an affordable price. These were great until they broke. Headphones should last longer than a month and a half in my opinion

title: They don't work well
body: They take wayyyyy too long to auto-connect to my phone. I mean it takes at least 3 minutes! Additionally, the left earbud often intermittently disconnects from the right so the sound in your ear is in and out which is frustrating. I noticed it when I had alerts coming in and ok, fine. But the sound is also interrupted for no discernible reason. Also, it often happens that the left earbud will play music at a different speed than the right earbud. it often plays the music at a faster speed. That is super disorienting.  They fit my ear well and the sound is good, but i can't use them! Don't waste your money. Another pair I bought had similar issues. Maybe the tech isn't good enough yet? Maybe these are too cheap? IDK

title: 100% Excellent product! I bought 2!
body: I am very pleased with the smooth and clear sound. They are very comfortable to wear running, walking, and even working at work cancel the noise around people talking. I purchased TWO because I use them a lot. I needed two reliable and comfortable blutooth ear buds. Again 5 stars for this product. Thank you for the great technology. I will probably buy another one to give to a friend.

title: Excellent audio w/superb bass.  Inductive charging feature is great.
body:
I received the Tozo T10  Bluetooth 5.0 wireless earbuds earlier today.  These are the best earbuds that I have owned.  I charged the carrying case with my wireless inductive charger and then paired the earbuds without any issues.  The audio quality is very crisp, the bass is very deep, and the volume can be set noticeably higher than my previous earbuds.

The carrying case is somewhat large for my jean pocket.  But, the carrying case comes with a neck strap so this works fine.

The phone call connectivity is good.  My previous earbuds which also supported Bluetooth 5.0 had some connectivity issues.  These earbuds do not have these issues.

Overall, the earbuds are an excellent value.  The IPX8 waterproof feature for both the earbuds and the case is a great bonus feature.  I might start to wear these while swimming.

title: Really well built wireless earbuds, but poor sound quality.
body: For the price, I don't think there's anyone that can beat it.  The battery life will probably give you 120 minutes before you have to charge it.  As for noise cancellation, it's no active noise cancellation, but the earbuds do block off 85% of the noise.  Sound quality is by far the worst...maybe because it's waterproof, the audio sounds muffled.  I would recommend these earbuds if you are looking for an affordable option.

title: After weeks of use, this is my expirience...
body: Im really really disappointed overall by the product overall... I was really looking forward to expirience these after looking at the reviews but was bummed to expirience lag/bluetooth issues, and a bad sound quality. I dont know if my pair was bad or if its the actual quality of the buds..; it sounded like it was under water, I tried fixing it by turning on EQ but sadly failed. The selling point on these for me would be BLUETOOTH, ive used WIRED earbuds under 20$ with AMAZING sound quality so pick your poison.

title: Returning these :(
body: I really wana leave a good review for these but I can’t. While the sound is great and they’re nice and loud (I don’t have to put my music past 50%), they’re a bit uncomfortable if you have smaller ears. While they don’t fall out because the seal on these are great! I had mine for only about 4 days before there was some kind of digital short in my left one. Like the audio would just randomly go out briefly. I thought maybe they were dying but even after a full charge (and restarting and repairing to my phone) the issue is still persisting. So these will unfortunately be returned.

title: Radio static/popping/clipping audio quality, otherwise solid.
body: Random loud vinyl like static/popping and clipping on any song with higher end. Hopefully I just revived a defective product but the sound quality is about equal to a 7$ pair of Walmart earbuds. Everything else is great, comfortable, good battery life, relatively inexpensive, but when you pay 50$ for earbuds you expect to get decent sound quality, the other features don't matter at all if the sound isn't up to par. That is the point of headphones after all.

title: Great sound quality at a great price
body: Of course I finally buy a newer iphone and the no audio jack problem forces me here. But you know what....I don't really mind so much now. These TOZO earbuds have fantastic sound, I use them for my phone and also my desktop computer all the time and the low-end is still surprising me. Haven't used the mic, but plan to soon. The other parts all work as expected - connection works easily with each device, the charger provides a fast, consistent experience, and the fit is enjoyable and no issues with earbud fall out. I recommend these!

title: Not for swimming
body: I had high hopes for these earbuds for swimming laps. They are advertised as waterproof and good for swimming. The problem is, you are not supposed to submerge them, which is hard when swimming laps. It is not until you open the instruction manual does this image show up, so I couldn't tell until I got them. Some reviews even said they were good for swimming, which kind of baffles me. Anyhow. Sound was fine and they seemed decent, just not for doing what I bought them for. Will be returning.

title: Exceeded expectations in sound quality, noise cancelling, and form fitting. Totally worth the buy!
body:
These head phones are excellent! I am extremely happy with my purchase and hope to have these for quite awhile. The only thing I’ve noticed, which is extremely specific, is that if you already have them connected to the phone, and go to place them in the case with the case being almost out of charge, then connect your phone to a different Bluetooth device (for me that is an fm transmitter), once the case battery dies the headphones will act as if they have been pulled out of the case and connect to the phone again, forcing me to reselect the other device. But seeing as that is so specific, it has no negative bearing on my view of this product. The sound quality is excellent for the price(not “true flat” but nice), I’m a music recording tech, so I know good sound quality.
The noise cancelling works perfectly. And even though I was worried that these would have problems staying in my ear, I was proven wrong and am not even the least bit concerned about them falling out unless I’m head banging to some death metal!

title: Sound quality is awesome! Nice deep bass!
body: These earbuds are terrific!! Nice sound quality with awesome bass! These are a must have! I did have a slight problem with the charging base keeping a charge. I contacted Tozo customer service and they rectified the issue very quickly. Thank  you Tozo! Excellent customer service. I would highly recommend these earbuds.

title: Best value and great sound
body:
I have had these for about 6 months and they have been great.

Pros:
Sound quality is impressive, good range and clarity
Battery is long lasting and the case having a battery for charging on the go is very convenient
Pairing was quick and easy
Cons:
None so far

title: Connection problems, Dont buy.....
body: I was excited to get the T10 earbuds. I was impressed with the sound of them. However the connection to my phone is very choppy most of the times. I will have my phone just a foot away and the sound cuts in and out as if I were walking to another room and leaving my phone behind. I have trouble shot the bluetooth and even changed from an Galaxy S8 plus to a Note 10 plus and it didnt help at all. So now I am disappointed that I wasted my money on them. I would not suggest buying these earbuds. If it wasnt having connection problems I would love these earbuds.

title: Dynamic Sound Earbuds, Comfortable Fit with Storage Case as Charger. Very Sleek.
body: These are the most versatile earbuds I've owned. Very practical that the case is a charger. I have lost two wired headphones and one wired Bluetooth headphones because the wire snagged and fell. These fit comfortably with the choice of 4 earbud sizes. The charge lasts for over an hour and half at minimum and it has great noise reduction. The sound quality is very good and can be loud without distortion when the volume is full. The Bluetooth range is fine for biking whether my phone is in my pocket or fitted on the handlebars. I have not tested that it is waterproof, but riding in the rain has not been an issue. They are comfortable and sleek. I am very satisfied with these earbuds that were at half the cost of my Klipsch wired headphones or my ISOtunes Bluetooth headphones. This was a lucky find and the Amazon representative I called also had them and shared her positive experience.

title: Great sound, easy pairing, and comfortable
body: Was skeptical on which ones/brands to order, decided to give these a try and turned out great! Easy pairing with my galaxy note 8, sounds great, nice bass and crisp sound. With the extra earbuds was able to get the best fit for my ears, very comfortable, and hasnt fallen out or any problems. I did drop one in the bath and still works fine so can say it is waterproof, only thing I cant say is I havnt tried making phone calls while using them so not sure how good they work for that. Would definitely recommend these for a cheap alternative with great sound, and waterproof..I just ordered the white set for my wife!

title: Excellent quality and noise cancelling earbuds
body:
The first thing you notice about these earbuds is the high quality construction. The instructions are straight forward and easy to follow. Had the earbuds paired with the iPhone very quickly. There were ample options for ear plug sizes to make them fit comfortably and securely, even with jumping around they didn't dislodge. The sound quality is great, but the best part is the noise cancellation which got rid of outside noises.

The holder/charger has nice magnetic contacts to take the earbuds which is great. The earbuds charged up to full capacity quickly and for their intended use (used while running), the battery life has been perfectly fine.

title: Just what I needed.
body: This is the first time I am using wireless Airbuds of any sort so I read alot of reviews on many different brands and I chose this. Firstly I chose this because I was satisfied with the reviews that I have read. Although i have never heard of the brand it did sound quite impressive to me. Also, being on a budget I wanted to get something valuable for my money. I only started using these about a week now and i must say, i was worried about if they would hurt my ear, to be honest I barely feel them, I even fell asleep with them once or twice because they feel so non-existent in my ear. They come with different sizes of the actual 'earplug' so you have to try which one is suitable for your ear.  The sound is wonderful, it's very detailed, you hear every instrument crystal clear through these babies. I have used earphones in the past and because of background noise the person you're speaking to automatically know that you're connected to a device, but with these,  the person on the other end does not hear that background interference AT ALL.  The noise cancellation is great, kinda scary, makes you feel like only you in the world matters. It's a great product. I cannot wait to use it at the gym.  I have not used it in water as yet to give a review of that but I was in a little rain and that has not affected the functions at all. I will greatly recommend this to anyone.

title: Great choice for the smaller earbud
body:
Nice product overall. I purchased these because I thought I had lost a pair made by Taotronics. I got this pair because of the amazon recommendation. They work well enough and make music listening while I work enjoyable.
Compared to the TaoTronics  these are actually not as good and a bit more expensive. Thats not to say they are bad just not as good. Sound quality lacks a bit and the carry case is a bit more intrusive when pocket carried. Still a good buy if you need smaller.

title: Great Cost effective Earbuds
body: Based on what I paid for, these Earbuds are great. They have a great sound quality. They pair easily without problems. Just follow the order from taking them out of the case, first left and then right. Also pair the cellphone only with "R" Earbud. I was facing some dropping on the left, but I just followed the instructions where it says that once the earbud is inside the ear, just rotate it. That I guess helped to mitigate the interference made by the head. Also the place where I was testing this guys was an office full of other Bluetooth devices. But now I don't face any issue at all. The only thing that I would improve from them is that if you leave them in the case, the battery will keep draining. Also, their tech support is good, they do respond to any email.

title: First wireless earbuds, loving them!
body: Recently got these earbuds and am really enjoying them so far. Very comfortable in my ears, excellent sound quality and the bass is solid! Much better than my last pair. The charging case is great, and very convenient. It's nice to have the buds clean, always fully charged and to have the ability to recharge without plugging them in to an outlet. I was also very impressed with the Bluetooth call quality. Friends I have called with the buds all commented that they could hear me perfectly and I could hear them perfectly as well!

title: Superb quality for the price
body: My review of products typically consist of a single word: bad, good, OK, satisfactory, great, etc.  For the TOZO T10 wireless earbuds a single word is not sufficient.  A group of friends and I travel on our motorcycles.  The Honda Goldwing has on board sound but when wearing a helmet I have to use a wired set up.  The wired sound is OK until getting or turning off the bike. When the bike is off so is the sound. The T10’s make it possible to Bluetooth through my iPhone, wear the earbuds with my helmet on or off and exit the bike with no interruption of music/sound.  The T10’s sound quality is crisp and clean unlike other earbuds I’ve tried.  The pairing is SUPER easy, they fit securely in my ears, the sound quality is exceptional, comes with a charging case and all for less than $50. I am exceptionally happy and pleased with this purchase!!!

title: Sound is good, call quality is good, warranty seems legit so far
body:
Good sound , also seems to have better call quality than some of the reviews say,  this may be because people aren’t rotating the earbuds towards the back.  They fit well in my ear and aren’t as loose as previous pairs.  Especially when rotated back to fit snugly in the ear.  Haven’t had them long enough to say with certainty that they stay paired or have any battery life issues.  The warranty seems more legit than the last earbuds I bought.

So far so good so I’m very happy with music sound quality and call quality.

title: Left earbud constantly cuts out
body: The sound quality is not bad for the price. But like most people who are using these, I am having an issue with the left ear bud cutting in and out. They seem to work fine when my phone is on the treadmill in the open. As soon as I put my phone in my pocket to go lift, the audio cuts in and out from the left side. Any minimal movement can trigger it. The technology in these does not seem great, which is unfortunate because the quality of the case and product seems very good.

title: I cant even feel them in my ears. Super lightweight.
body: I love these earbuds. The quality is really great. I use them at work alllllll day long and only need to charge them once. They last about 3-4 hours on one charge. The sound is really good and crisp. They are super lightweight and i can't even feel them in my ears sometimes. They stay in my ears snug too. I talk on the phone with them too and can hear clearly and the other person hears me good too. I'm very happy with these and they go everywhere with me even the gym.

title: Finally I've got the right ones BABY!!!
body: I am extremely impressed with these earbuds I have gone through at least four pair for different companies this year and they have just not been the greatest quality the charge doesn't last or they don't stay in my ears and these are doing an awesome job it's only been 24 hours but I desperately needed some good earbuds these are great quality great reasonable price I absolutely recommend anyone to get these

title: Excellent Customer Service
body:
Edit: So the company reached out to me and sent new pair which appear to work great. I suspect I may have initially gotten a defective product, but the new item sent works wonderfully. Would recommend!

So I brought this primarily for listening to Audible, and in that capacity it works well. However (and I'm not sure if this is a defect or an intentional design) when listening to music it becomes clear that the left earbud seems to have practically no bass at all.

This wasn't as apparent when listening to a person talk (phone calls or Audible) as the sound is clear, but it is noticeably lacking in bass on one side.

As such, while the product works well enough, I'm not likely to recommend it with this flaw.

title: Great sound and convenience of wireless charging at competitive pricing
body: So many other bluetooth earbuds at the similar price range as the Tozo but have been pleasantly surprised by the sound quality and the convenience of the wireless charging case.  The internal packaing could be better since the ear buds aren't individually wrapped or the charging contacts covered in tape like others, and the touch control panel could be finished better (can see fine scratches), which I initially thought was used, but a replacement unit all exhibited the same condition.  Get it when it's on sale and it's a good buy.

title: They provide rich sound but won’t stay in my ears.
body:
I find the sound quality good but for the life of me these earbuds will not stay in my ear. I have tried all the end covers (or whatever they are called) that came with the earbuds but none of them work for me. I now dampen the buds when inserting them in my ear to create some suction and that works but it is not ideal and has to be done each and every time I have to put them back in. I can’t help but think I am inviting an ear infection.

I wish the charge lasted longer than roughly 4 hours. The average length of a workday would have been ideal.

title: WELL worth the price...
body: I've only had these for a few days, but REALLY, REALLY impressed. Ease of pairing, ease of functionality, excellent batter life. If these continue to perform at this level over the next few months, will buy more for family members as gifts this year. Very happy with this purchase and value.

title: Work great , battery life is excellent
body: love these , I mostly use one to discreetly watch Net flix at work (SHHHH) , so if you use one you have to use the right one. sound is good not great but for the price I am very satisfied. you cant go to far from the source but its not terrible. I would recommend them to anyone unless you are looking for insane quality but you will pay double or triple.

title: It's OK
body: It's ... OKAY. If you turn your head a little bit, sometimes the left ear would stop working for a second. Really annoying when listening to music, so you'd have to reset the earbuds. Sound quality is actually pretty good for the price as well.

title: Holy s&@t!!!
body: First off I have to say I own a pair of Bose earbuds that I paid $300 for. That being said I WISH i would have found these first. Now I’m only gonna talk about the sound quality considering I’ve owned them for about 2 hours. First off when I first turned them on I was blown away, volume only half way up and was loud (good loud), so going loud enough is not a worry. Next I tried about 10 different kinds of songs and all sounded amazing! Crisp clear highs, bass was great and mids were on point. That being said, if I would have paid $100 I’d still be overly joyed! If you buy these you won’t be disappointed.... p.s ANYONE that are having battery issues got a defective pair (which happens with electronics, believe me I fix them for a living). They should return them for a different set, cause mine are absolutely amazing.

title: Connectivity and range issues, doesn't stay in ear.
body:
First and foremost, the sound quality on these is decent, having said that everything else is below par.
I had these for about a month before I decided to return them.
The issues started with connectivity, the range on these is very poor, and I mean if you walked away from your phone more than a few feet, the sound would start cutting out and breaking up.
Second and biggest issue for me is the fact that if you run with these on, they will NOT stay in your ear. I tried the smallest to larger eartips and they would always fall out.

Call quality is very poor, I had people on the other line not being able to hear me at all with these on.
Overall the price for what you get is not that bad, but in this case it might be worth it to pay a little more to  get  better quality.

title: Great Buds
body: First pair of wireless buds I've owned and I don't think there's much you can improve on. There's great sound quality, portability, and with the charging case, enough charge to listen to hours and hours of music. They come with small, medium, and large interchangeable rubber buds so you can wear them comfortably, a charger cord, and a lanyard, as for the battery life, 3 hours for the buds, and 4 full charges on the case. If that's not enough, they are also waterproof ( non submergable )

title: Got an used product...Defective!
body: Before I place my order, I searched on Amazon, and found out this product has decent review and "amazon choice". I have to say, the shipping service is great. I got the package and tried to enjoy the music. I tried to pair these earbuds with my music player, then I heard "second device connected". That means, these earbuds was connected with some devices before and the volume are super loud!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  Be careful!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  Don't buy this product if you want to protect your ears.  It's ridiculous that the default volume is so loud!!!  Also, the left and right earbuds lost connection occasionally. Have to return it and get my money back.

title: Great bargain!
body: Volume control is on the phone only.  Not a perfect fit but the sound is unexpected for its price.  I little clunky.  I tried sleeping (nap) with them on.  It’s fine until I turned over to my side.

title: Best value wireless buds
body:
Sound = perfect, no serious...rich flowing sound quality, super impressed
Battery life =  awesome, lasts a long time between charges
Size/ease of use = ideal, fit is great, all-day comfort too
customer service = awesome, gave me a full refund and covered return shipping

My first set had a crackling sound and would disconnect if right earbud was over 4ft away or didn't have direct line of sight to phone. So, I returned them. Tozo did some kind of magic fix, because the replacements are absolutely great. They paired easily and work every bit as good as the Samsung earbuds that came with my new Galaxy S10.

Tozo went out above and beyond to make sure I was happy with their product. They contacted me after the return asking me to test out the new version to see if the problem was fixed. That is amazing, right? I think this company has the mindset that many manufacturers today have forgotten. I'm very impressed with their customer service and their product and would not hesitate to recommend them.

title: Very Professional
body: I had issues with the first ear buds and got an immediate response from TOZO.  They were very accommodating and replaced the ear buds.  New TOZO T10 seem to be working fine.  I am very pleased.  They deserve a 5 Star.

title: Decent budget earbuds
body: The Tozo T10 earbuds have great battery life, I can use them all day on and off and still have 25 - 50% left on the wireless charger case. The wireless charging works great, but when it isn't perfectly aligned, I have noticed a strange high-pitched whine coming from it. Also the fit took some getting used to, but now that I have it down, they stay in pretty well. I don't find them to be super comfortable, but I'm still getting used to them. The sound quality is ok except the volume is realitively loud with no way to turn it down from the earbuds even with low volume from the phone. The microphone is okay, but it's a bit too quiet, and I couldn't get it to work with Windows 10. It works with Android though.  I'm pretty satisfied with these for the price.

title: The Positive Reviews are Real - These are Great
body:
Wow - color me impressed. I was not expecting sound quality this good, and bass this powerful, out of a generic pair of Bluetooth earbuds. I read the reviews though, and they seemed legit - trust me, they are. I was thinking this was going to be another piece of generic Chinese technology with some random brand name slapped on it - with a package insert promising free products or an Amazon credit in exchange for a good review (I've received products like that in the past). Thankfully, this is NOT one of those products. There is no incentive to leave a good review, so the good reviews are actually genuine.

The only thing that was slightly disappointing at first was the quality of the bass - but that was quickly remedied (as others recommended) by swapping out the silicone caps on the earbuds with another size from the included sets, to get a better seal in your ear. It went from tinny to almost too powerful - I had to jack the equalizer on my phone back down to the normal range so my fillings weren't rattling. Now, with the proper-sized silicone caps, it sounds great.

Finally, they feel extremely secure in my ears. I bought these for running, replacing a pair of wireless earbuds that had a rigid plastic wire that connected the left and right - when I would run, the piece that wrapped around the back of my head would flop and hit the back of my neck, resulting in a deafening thump with every step. My only concern was that these would pop out during activity, but they actually feel far more secure in my ears than my regular wired earbuds.

These are definitely going to be my full-time earbuds, not just for running - these awesome little things are going to accompany me on my daily commute as well. VERY happy with this purchase.

*****Follow-Up******
In the interest of full-disclosure, after I submitted this original review I went and registered by earbuds for the warranty, after which I was contacted by the manufacturer/seller who asked that I review their product and in return they would send out a token of their appreciation. I submitted the review above though before this happened, and I believe I was only hit up to do so because I registered and provided them with my email address.

title: Low expectations happily surpassed in every way
body:
I'm only one week into owning this product, so I can't give any insight into how the long the battery lasts or the long term durability of the product. Although, I can give my first impressions on the sound quality, noise cancellation, fit, and overall experience I've had with the product so far. I came from using Bose Soundsport wired headphones and I went through 2 pairs in about 4-5 years. I was initially worried about sound quality coming from a wired 100$ pair of headphones to a completely wireless 50$ pair. Right away I was kind of blown away by the sound quality on these headphones. My expectations weren't super high, but sound quality is really important to me and these definitely surpassed my expectations. It has a nice bass sound when sitting properly in your ear, and they are really loud and fairly clear.  Fit can make or break the experience. It felt great with the rubber tips that came on the product and the smaller set that it came with it. Both worked well with my ears and it's nice to have 4 options to get the size just right. I wasn't expecting any noise cancellation, but these have a great seal and I felt immersed in my music. I think noise cancellation can be affected by the fit and how it sits in your ear. Fit is king with this product. If none of the 4 sets of rubber tips fit properly it's hard to get the most out of this product.
My overall experience with the product has overwhelmingly been positive. Paired immediately with no fussing around, sound quality is great for the price, comfortable, immersive, and I love the travel charging case. I only have a few worries and concerns for the long term. But overall, I'm definitely happy with my purchase.

title: Great product
body: This is an amazing product. Best pair of Bluetooth headphones I have ever owned. They fit perfectly and are always comfortable.

title: Not for swimming!
body:
I wanted a pair of waterproof ear buds for swimming laps. Even the one page brochure appears to advertise it as a good way to swim and listen to music. This is not true. The minute they are even slightly submerged the signal is lost. If you swim with your head constantly above water then these can be used for “swimming.” Any competitive swimmer will be disappointed.

I wanted to leave only one star but I do admit they did a good job ensuring that they pair easily and the sound quality is fairly decent.

title: High quality and sound for a great price!
body: These earbuds are amazing. My boss recommended these and I have zero regrets. First off, they say 3 hours per charge. After 2 hours of use it still says I have 80% battery life left. Pairing is effortless and have great bluetooth range. Sound quality is amazing for the price and I am surprised at the bass it puts out. I highly recommend these to anyone looking for a great pair of bluetooth earbuds. You won't be dissapointed.

title: Can't ask for more
body: Bought a pair for myself and my daughter we both love them. The sound is really good and the bass in them is better than expected .

title: Buy them!
body:
I had bought a pair of Jabra earbuds from my local big-box electronic retailer, which basically stopped functioning after about 6 weeks. These earbuds cost about 1/3 of the price, and have worked flawlessly from day one.

They paired to my iPhone very easily, and have excellent sound. I use them while I'm doing my daily 6-mile walk, which takes about 1.5 hours. They block out most of the ambient sound, yet do allow me to hear things like cars that are approaching from behind with no problems.

Very pleased with them. Excellent quality and excellent value.

title: Initially Skeptical Pleasantly Surprised!
body: I was in the market for new BT headphones to wear while traveling and working in my shop.  I had typically used the around the neck style because most end up hurting my ears pretty quickly.  I wanted buds but doubtful I would like them.  I decided to give these a try and have been pleasantly surprised.  I've only had them a few days and had limited use but so far they are comfortable and feel secure.  I haven't had an problems with them falling out or my wanting to remove them from discomfort.  I went as far as to show them to my wife and suggest she get a pair....LOL

title: Excellent sound quality, Fast charging
body: While the case is too small to be charged with the Samsung galaxy S10 power share feature, the battery holds plenty of power for what I need, and the charging case means I can charge it on my breaks and have it almost full again in just a few minutes. Pairing is easy and straight forward, and the sound quality is SIGNIFICANTLY better than any other wireless earpieces I've used to date.

title: Sound Great, Work Great, Great Price!
body: Just got them a few days ago AMAZING! I tried a different type of wireless earbuds a while back and these are FAR superior. The sound quality is amazing! As for noise canceling you can't hear ANYTHING besides what your listening to! They also feel and look very high quality! These earbuds are definitely worth the buy!

title: Really Waterproof
body: Ttuely waterproof ! I Was on call today and wanted to be out in the pool with my family lots of splashing and I got dunked twice. Got 20 calls and everyone clear as the next.  I bought two more sets for my boys.

title: Early Impressions
body: My experience with the TOZO T10's so far has been a pretty good one, they are easy to set up, sound fairly good for bluetooth earbuds, and losing the wire makes it easy to sleep with them on and not have one of them get pulled out of my ear when I turn. They are extremely comfortable which makes me want to use them for any devices while lounging but there are some limitations as they don't have a built in volume up or down controls. Due to that, I wouldn't recommend using them with a Fire TV for example as that goes off the headphones audio levels and can't be adjusted. Other than that though no issues with anything. They charge really fast, feel durable, they came with different ear type pieces but the stock ones perfect for me, and have an IPX8 rating. (I haven't had the luxury to take them on an intense run yet but will update if anything goes wrong. though my cheaper IPX7 pair is lasting those so I'm not worried for these things.)

title: Great sound quality for low price
body: What i love about these bluetooth earbuds & why im glad i bought them : when you take them out of the charger they automatically pair to eachother, they are easy to pair to your device. The sound quality is great for bluetooth earbuds, better sound qaulity then airpods, the battery lofe on them is great to. These are great for the price they are sold at.

title: A wonderful inventory!
body: I use this device every day when exercising a GYM, it is light and fits perfectly into ears. I go to hot tub, use steam or dry sauna , and it still works and I enjoy music while relaxing. Music still runs while taking shower, unbelievable, non stop and high quality.  I tried many waterproof earbuds before,  finally I found out this masterpiece. Don't miss it.

title: Not the best purchase
body: I purchased these and maybe I expected more than what I got.  Most of the time they don't pair the way they should, and the rest of the time they don't connect well to my phone.  Pretty disappointed in the product because I was hoping to use them to work out.  However, if you move the phone to your pocket or something you can forget about using them.  Even if the phone is in sight of the earbuds sometimes they cut in and out.  Other than that, they come in a convenient case and charging is pretty easy.  The battery life on them is also questionable.  I used them for about 2 or 3 hours and they died.  Not sure if I got a defective pair or if they just suck, but I would recommend spending more money on a better product at this point!

title: It's not waterproof and the Bluetooth does not support even shorts distance like 4ft
body:
Not waterproof at all. Got a little bit wet with some sprinkles of water and does not work anymore.
If you are using to workout every time you turn down to do something or grab something in the floor it interrupts the sound like cutting off.
Bluetooth is not 5.0 at all. In the distance between my room and my kitchen which surely it's very less than 4ft in a small apartment, it does not work ad well it cut off the sound and interrupt what you are listening.
I can say if something is waterproof like my galaxy S10, the S8 and 9 as well which you could win until 5ft and it would work perfectly. This phone is like the iPhone, just try to sprinkle some water and you will see if works or not.
The sound it's good and clear. The microphone not too good, during callings people complain a lot. The battery lasts for a good period of time at least 4 hours and charges very fast.

title: Good but I have small ears!
body: These earbuds are great for the price, they work great. I am very picky on the bass that comes through a headphone and they are better than Apple. (I even change my car settings to have higher bass) They do the job, the only thing is that I have really small ears and they kinda look like marshmallows outside of my ear. I think they do take some getting used to for sure! I'm giving 5 stars because for the PRICE, LOOK, FEATURES, AND WARRANTY. These are the best you can get!

title: Great for exercise
body: The Tozo earbuds sound great and have worked well for me. I have used them jogging, walking, running, and sprints. No issues with them slipping or falling out. Once they are in, they stay put even sweating through workouts. They sound better than my child’s AirPods. Music sounds great and podcasts are clear. Would definitely order again.

title: Great earbuds, cheap price!
body: I really like these headphones!  I love that there are no cords when you wear them so you don’t have to worry about anything getting snagged. I listen to podcasts at work and usually only keep one in so I can hear everything else that is going on. If I have both in the noise cancellation is great and blocks out most noise around you. I have taken them in the shower and have had no issues. As soon as you take them out of the case they pair to my phone which makes them so easy to use!

title: Absolutely best ear buds for the price
body: The quality of these ear buds are absolutely insane. I had been looking for a good pair of ear buds to go to the gym with and for everyday use and these absolutely beat air pods in the price and quality. The sound that comes out of these is super rich and you can feel the bass in both. It’s very easy to use both ear buds or use one and let the other charge. I’m extremely pleased with these and bought them immediately after doing research on them and I was not disappointed at all.

title: Good fit
body: I'm glad I bit the bullet and tried these although they are not name brand. I chose these because I wear glasses and around the ear don't stay and over the ear headphones eventually hurt my head from pressing on my glasses. I got them for watching videos while treadmilling it and they have not fallen out yet. Sound quality is good, but my usage is to work and exercise in them, not sip brandy in a leather chair and try to decipher every note. The battery life is good, I haven't run out yet. I will update if they end up being trash.

title: There are better options at this price.
body:
TL;DR - Do not recommend buying unless the only thing you care about is waterproof, loud bass.

Bought two pairs of these. Returned one thinking it was faulty. All Pros and Cons below are based on both sets so you can pretty much expect the same.

Pros:

Bass. If you love it, you will like these. Very strong profile compared to other sets. Likely due to the 8mm driver, most others are 6mm or smaller.

Loud. Much louder than comparable sets. Rarely need to hit the volume limit. Consider if you need the extra volume headspace.

Waterproof. You can submerge these in shallow water with no ill effects. Swimming, showering, etc are no problem.

Connection. When dropping out of range, the left disconnects temporarily while the right usually stays connected. Reacquires very quickly.

Cons:

Sound. Noticeable distortion at mid-high frequencies on left earbud only. If you own these, don't listen to Thievery Co- Sweet Tides, you will never unhear it. Stereo sound oscillates back and forth from left to right earbud through center-stage while listening to music or on calls instead of staying at the same volume level.

Drops. Loses connection at random times. Complete drop outs only correctable by turning off and on again or putting back into case. If you take critical phone calls, you can't depend on these.

Call quality. Sub par compared to others. Voice transmitted sounds very distant. Voice transmitted cuts in and out constantly.

Case. Buds occasionally do not power up when removed from case or only the right powers up. Large size for the amount of recharges you get compared to others. Battery should be bigger for a case this size.

title: The Best Wireless Buds in Their Class
body: First, I have to admit that the seller gives a free wireless charging pad for your review, hence the large number of reviewers.  However, I am reasonably happy with my purchase.  The sound is close to the best I have seen in wireless earbuds, especially at this price point.  They are the clear leader as far a bass is concerned.  I bought these earbuds really for one reason only; to workout in a high-cardio environment where I sweat profusely.  I must say that these earbuds have so far lived up to the challenge.  I do recommend them if you want reasonably good sound, waterproof performance, and a decent price.

title: It's my second review for this purchase
body:
It's stopped to work for no reason at all after a week of happy using it.  I returned it and I was told that I'd be refunded which I need to confirm so, stay tuned for the segue.
No refund at all.

title: Excellent Product and Great Value
body: I purchased these earbuds after the sweat from my intense indoor cycling workouts fried two pairs of wireless "workout" headphones in less than three months.  The sound quality of the Tozo earbuds is excellent, the inclusion of several ear pads made individualized fitting easy, and pairing was a snap.

title: DO NOT BUY
body:
