The charging case's USB port is broken because it's made of low quality materials. It says it's compatible with wireless charging - THIS IS A BLATANT LIE. It does NOT work with wireless charging at all.

Additionally, the buds die at about 40% battery (and will scream at you about how low the battery is over and over until they do)

Absolutely unacceptable. Anything less than a full refund is not enough.

title: Fit, sound and this product have. Thank you 👍
body: Every now and then a person can come across something that make them question what they were doing before, this product made me do that, made me think why would I ever pay a Premium price when I can get a better Quality for no less than 3 times less money. The sound and noise cancellation alone should cost way more. I definitely will be getting this again and again also I will be recommending them to family and friends.

title: Good value for the price.
body:
Quality of sound is good.  Noise cancellation ... I still hear all external noise when I'm using the earphones, so I'm not sold on it.  The battery life is near what is stated.
The weird thing that has got me scratching my head is that since I added this to my iphone, my other apps are acting up.
Could be a really odd coincidence, but all of a sudden when I turn on the camera app, my phone timer kicks on (as if I'm in a call)  When I go to Shazam (earpieces not active), the phone timer goes on.  I have needed to turn off my bluetooth to get normal functionality back.

title: Hear better ... without wires
body:
Although Bluetooth technology has been around for a while, these ear-buds seem to use a better technology and better environmental protection or proofing of each of the earbuds.  Connection and pairing is simple; nothing new other than have the source and destination be aware of each other. Listening is even easier, as they disappear from being noticed as there are no wires to distract one from doing something without the worry of losing an earpiece.
The TOZO T10 Bluetooth ear buds both charge in a charging case that is included, and they can be recharged even when the charge base is not connected to power. I enjoy the freedom and the quality of sound they produce. They are great for some bass-ness of beat but have a tremendous range for the full audio spectrum.

title: Good quality
body: My wife really likes this ear buds , the battery life is not bad, and with the carrying case quickly charging them, that's good, she likes the fact that the case can be wireless charged she just places them in the pad and they are good

title: Rich sound but not deep bass
body: I bought them because the description said deep bass. They have crystal clear and rich sound but not deep bass as it described to me, I think it sounds more treble than bass. They took longer time to pair with my phone compare to my Geekee earbuds. I have not tested about how long they last after a full charged yet.

title: Great earbuds for a great price! Wireless charging case!!!
body:
I purchased this product to replace my wireless earphone from Plantronics. I used for a while, but it really didn't fit my ear perfectly. Since it didn't fit perfectly, the sound was not good and was able to ear all noises from outside. At last, my cat chewed on the earphone and I had to say bye to my Plantronics. I searched a lot for a replacement and I decided to go with earbuds because my cat can't chew on it.
This product provides better sound quality (it has enough bass if you are bass lover), good noise canceling (not like the high-end noise-canceling headphones, but it works great!), and the wireless charging case is a huge bonus.
The only downside about it is that it does not have control of your music. For instance, you cannot move to next/previous track and you cannot control your volume. It has to be controlled on your phone or connected device.
Also, it sounds like I talk from far away when I call with someone.
Except for these cons, everything works like or better than those wireless earbuds out in the market for more than $50.
I would highly recommend this product if you are looking for cheap wireless earbuds with good sound quality.

title: Great product, excellent customer service
body: I was pleasantly surprised to find that these were of high quality. They sound just as good as my daughter much more expensive earbuds. Excellent customer service too. They are constantly checking if I am satisfied with the product. Would highly recommend them for people who want a great set of earbuds without paying a premium price.

title: Great product and excellent customer service!
body: I originally posted a review saying these ear buds seem to fit well and the sound is pretty good, but they were cutting in and out. Their customer service contacted me directly and offered a full refund or replacement pair which is awesome. I opted for a new set because I do love the fit and the sound quality.

title: Great sound, but left earbud cuts off when moving your head
body: I love the size and fit of these earbuds. Sound quality is great and the bass has a richness to it. These fit snug in my ear and you cannot hear that much of the surrounding noise. One thing I have noticed is when I turn my head to the right or sometimes to the left, the sound drops for a moment mainly in my left earbud. When I straighten my head there is less of a chance of the sound being dropped. I can’t figure out what is causing the sound to drop when I turn my head.

title: Great product for the price!
body: Really enjoying this product. I’ve been using them for a few weeks, and they are my first Bluetooth headphones. Going from being tied to a cable to being free to move around is amazing! These headphones sound great for the price. The noise cancelling depends more on the ear bud and the fit to your ear so that is a bit subjective in my opinion. I see several complaints that they aren’t waterproof because they don’t work when you swim. The headphones are waterproof...Bluetooth; however, is not. So these are just fine in the shower/bath or just hanging around water. Just be careful not to drop them. I wish the charging cord was a bit longer but the base charges quickly so it isn’t usually a problem.

title: Amazing sound quality
body:
Tozo T10 earbuds are easy to pair, it’s adjust steady to your ear, in my opinion good choice price valued. After I tested pair with my computer and mobile phone, soon notice its quality built in immersive sound are intrinsic characteristics suited of this device. Almost compared one of one with high expensive brands except for the price.
 I was surprised to find that battery autonomy lasted over four hours playing music and the charging case provided extra full recharges. Haven’t test the water capabilities yet.
So far highly recommended.

title: Great Value
body: Great value in these. Sound quality is comparable to much more expensive options, and it does everything else extremely well. Case fits in pocket well too.

title: Excellent earbuds
body: I have purchased a couple different true wireless earbuds, and these are by far the best sound. Great quality, comfortable, and don’t slip out of ears. I wish the range was a little longer but for the price I would definitely buy again. I have recommended them to multiple friends.

title: Good set of Wire less Earbuds
body:
I've had these TOZO T10 earbuds for about 2 months now with no real issues. They have good battery life and I've even taken them out swimming for a bit - while not submerging them of course - with no issues.

The only CON I can say so far is that they sometimes don't connect well all the time. It seems like there can be interference's here and there but nothing that has been too bad for me.

title: very easy set up and use
body: I had another wireless bluetooth earpiece that died on me and I wanted to get another bc I absolutely hate cords and I needed an earpiece to use in bed at night so my man doesn't have to listen to my whatever I happen to be watching on my IPad.  I read other reviews on how to pair each earpiece separately (can't remember which reviewer but thank you!!!) and it works but to perfection.  I love that I can listen to one earpiece while the other one stays charged.  The only thing that would make it better is if the individual earpieces were smaller.  I mean maybe I just have a small hear but I feel like they stick out a bit when I have them in.  I only use them at night in bed so far so I guess it hardly matters if they stick out.  Overall, extremely satisfied with purchase and would recommend.

title: High quality earbuds for a very reasonable price.
body: I had been looking for some affordable earbuds that still had decent sound and bass, but other brands' reviews were mixed. These came up on a flash sale so I decided to bite. I'm sure glad I did. I use it exclusively for working out at the gym, and they do a great job. They tune out background noise, have ample bass, and stay put in the ear.  I was sold.  So much so that when I accidentally lost the pair on an airplane, I went and bought a second set.  So I've now bought two of these, and would recommend them to anyone shopping at this price point.

title: Awesome earbuds!
body: I honestly wanted the apple ones. But I wanted to give them a shot and I am glad that I did. Great sound and great battery. I barely charge the case and I use them everyday. I had an issue with the right side earbud and contacted the company and they walked me through step by step trying to fix it. Couple months later I had the same issue. I contacted them and they didn’t hesitate to replace it with a new one without having to return the old one. They truly care about your satisfaction.

title: TOZO T10 wireless earbuds
body: I was not sure if this design would work well staying in my ear, they work great and stay put when I am working out. The only issue I have had with these is the bass is not as good as I was hoping for compared to other earbuds I have used but the other tones a great.

title: REMARKABLY SATISFYING PERFORMANCE AND PRESENTATION
body:
I came across the TOZO T10 earbuds on an Amazon Flash Sale and decided to give them a listen. Long story short--these are keepers.

The sound will never compare to wired earbuds in the $100+ range, but they certainly sound good enough for casual listening. Add in the fact that these are wireless comfortable  BLUE TOOTH instruments, and you're looking at a remarkable value. The earbuds, battery-charger case and documentation all look first class and solidly built. The case is charged via USB and holds enough battery power to charge a re-charge the buds a couple of times. Give them a try--for the price, you won't be disappointed.

title: Excellent product and exemplary company follow up
body: Product works well. Easily paired and so very convenient to use. I love the ability to use the right earbud while leaving the other in the case. Allows me to have a conversation while being able to listen to music. I've owned so many earbuds but this is the best for using while my head was in a pillow which helped me recuperate while being sick. Even with all of these features, the best was the customer support and follow up from the company. It's been a long time since I've had a company that I actually felt cared about my experience. Will buy many products from them in the future.

title: Great product at a great price
body: These earbuds or everything I expected at a good price. Great performance in great value. Very satisfied with the product and the subsequent customer service.

title: Connectivity is a huge issue
body: The headphones sounded great, cut out noise, and the battery was great. Overrall really liked it. The problem. Connectivity was terrible. It's not a faulty product. Many others have the issue. If my phone was in my pocket, it would cut in and out. If I covered a earbud with my hand, that earbud would completely disconnect. If my phone was 4 feet away, it would disconnect. I really really wanted to enjoy the product, but when I worked out, it would cut it and out. Disappointed :(

title: Fantastic Earbuds at an amazing price!
body: I bought these to replace my lost Jabra 65t's and couldn't bear to drop another $150.  The T10's are Fantastic and in every respect as good or better than the Jabra's.  I was pleasantly surprised to find out they can charge wirelessly!

title: Well made , great sound, won't fall out!
body: I'm very impressed with these earbuds, I primarily got them becuase they're portable but I've been happily surprised by how well they isolate noise, using them at work really helped drown out my noisy co workers. I've been longboarding with them in, so far they're comfortable and haven't fell out which happened with my last pair. The bass is low, the voice clarity is great and wireless charging is a nice bonus feature :)

title: Great sound, fit and quality at a fraction of the price
body:
I finally broke down and decided to get a pair of wireless Bluetooth earbuds.  I was overwhelmed by the seemingly endless choices on Amazon, but settled on the TOZO T10s after seeing so many 5-star reviews and the price (I even got them delivered a day earlier than expected).
I walk a mile from the train station to my office and back every day and am very satisfied with this product.  The sound is full and clear with just enough bass to compliment the other instruments rather than drown them out.  The fit is excellent (I recommend taking the time to find the right tips before making any judgements) and the sound isolation is good enough that I can hear my music or podcasts clearly without being completely cut off from my surroundings.  The fact that they are waterproof is a nice feature, which is why I purchased a pair for my fiancee (she uses them for her workouts and is quite happy with them as well).
Pairing was a breeze, and the quality of the earbuds and charging case is top-notch.
To anyone who is considering paying a premium for Bose, Sennheiser or any other "top" manufacturer: stop looking and buy the TOZO T10s.  You won't regret it!

title: A College Student's Thoughts
body: After losing my pair of Apple Earbuds I needed an alternative, as a college student I'm always moving around and fretting from place to place so I wanted something wireless. I already had Beats so I considered airpods but the expense was a deal-breaker. I found these and was highly impressed. The sound is nearly as good as my beats, over-the-ear headphones, they fit very well in my ear, are comfortable, and connect flawlessly to my phone each time I use them.

title: A unit to enjoy
body:
I Purchased this unit after reading the reviews and was worried it will not be as mentioned. Once the unit came and I open the box, I liked the sturdy structure and the small shape of the earbuds. They were almost fully charged and it only took less than a minute to pair with my phone and the sound was amazing. The ability to have both earbuds on at the same time with the right one in control is great, and when I just place the buds in the box they are not longer connected. I also liked the box, small and wireless charging abilities, it makes it easy to charge and make sure you never have the box which is a charging battery never empty. For now I like the units and will say great accept the battery life is only about 3-4 hours in my use. Even that is not an issue, I like them a lot
I highly recommend them as unit with an amazing price.

title: Excellent quality for the price!
body: I was impressed with the quality of the product while un-boxing and setting up.  Then when paired with my Galaxy S-10+, I was impressed again with the sound quality and bass response from these headphones considering the price range.  I like the way they fit and the quality of the charging case and headphone build in general.  Would definitely recommend these for someone looking for workout or running headphones as they are ipx8 waterproof.

title: Outstanding product and service
body:
I was first impressed with the packaging of these earbuds. I know that doesn't add to the sound quality but it certainly gives a purchaser a great first impression. In addition, I had occasion to contact the company and their response was both very prompt and extremely satisfying. Wow! I didn't expect that.
The sound quality of these earbuds is excellent. At my age my hearing is not the best but the sound output has made me forget that limitation. Great product and great value.

title: What a Difference!
body: I had been using earbuds that had a wire between them while working around the house, the yard, and at the gym.  I broke them recently when working out in the yard when the wire got caught and pulled the earbud out of my left ear and broke.  Now with the wireless earbuds I don't have that problem.  The sound is great and such an improvement.  I found the "Important Notes & Trouble Shootings" tips that were sent by email after I registered were very helpful in setting up the earbuds and using them.  I am very happy with this product.

title: No longer skeptical
body:
I have to say, I was skeptical of these when deciding to buy them.  For the cost of some of the other ones out there, I really wasn't all that sure.  However, these turned out to be a great buy.  I've only had about 2 hours of listening with them, but I think their quality is great.  They fit comfortably in the ear and don't have that "getting ready to fall out" feel that others I have worn do.

The battery case is nice and sturdy and convienently stores the buds, which are just the right size.  Pairing was a breeze and I can walk around a pretty wide area before the signal gets lost.  My 15 year old Tech son was also impressed.

I'm glad I bought them.

title: Love and Hate
body:
My first bluetooth headset. The fit and finish is great and they're durable. The concept and pairing is simple and straight forward. Generally speaking they function as advertised at a good price.

Sound is good and what you would expect for the cost. You shouldn't expect studio quality at this price.

The battery life is so so. I had a home project where I was listening to a podcast while working. The lack of cords was great, but then the battery died and that kind of sucked. Generally for going to the gym and keeping them charged they work well. I do wish it came with a longer usb cord. I had to use an extension for safe storage and charging in my car.

Now the hate. Slight turning of the head causes audio to phase in and out. It's not like it's always noticeable but its odd and sometimes you're not sure if your left or right earbud is working. It's not constant and not a deal breaker but it's a fault of the product and the reason I gave 3 stars.

title: First Pair of True Wireless Earbuds
body: Great product.  These bluetooth headphones are a perfect mix of things that I want.  Waterproof and truly wireless.  Use one or both and while they are labeled right and left put them in whichever ear you want as they are the same shape.  Wireless charging is quiet convenient as I already wirelessly charge my phone and can now just use the same pad to charge the case which charges the headphones.  So far I am very much enjoying them and look forward to much more use!

title: 10/10 Would Recommend!!!
body:
I bought my brother some airpods for his birthday but didn’t want the same hefty price tag for my earbuds (I previously had the Powerbeats 3 by Dre but lost them), and ended up buying these after reading some stellar reviews.

First off, the earbuds don’t fall off your ears easily! Which is what worried me about the apple airpods - they don’t stay secure in my ears. But these feel comfy and fit snug.

Secondly, the noise cancellation + sound of the earbuds are state of the art! I cannot recommend these enough. I can hear the noise really well and all the highs and lows of the song.

Lastly, I always feel like non-“professional” grade bluetooth earbuds have difficulty in pairing from one device to another. These pair seamlessly from my phone to my laptop with no difficulty.

I also read that these are waterproof but have not tested them.

All in all, I would recommend these in a heartbeat. I would buy these again if my pair were to stop working! (Oh, they also have a 1 year warranty - will update if I ever do end up needing it within this year).

title: stylish with good sound quality
body:
These headphones are great! I wanted to splurge a little on bluetooth earphones but didn’t want to go the apple pods route. These ones are pretty good looking, have great sound quality, and the carrying case is nice. The only complaint I have is that I wish the earbuds didn’t slide around so much in my ear sometimes. Gotta get the placement just right.

I was super disappointed when one of my buds stopped working suddenly, but I just emailed customer service and they’re sending me a replacement free of charge! They answered super quick (I honestly didn't think they would answer at all) which was nice, because I can't survive long without working earbuds.

title: Solid earbuds at a fantastic price!
body: So I dropped my AirPods in some water for about 15 seconds and they started to fail over the course of a year. I was tired of spending that much money on something so small and fragile. Saw the Tozo reviews and figured I’d give them a shot. Let me say that I’m really glad I did. I would be impressed with them at twice the price but for around $50.00, they are a really great deal! Sure, they don’t access Siri like the AirPods, but I rarely used that feature anyway. Very happy with my purchase. Totally recommend.

title: Great purchase! Would recommend to a friend
body:
I got the blue Tozo T10. They have a very sleek design and can fit in my pocket or in any part of my backpack or purse. They fit great in my ears with the little buds that came with it, but I love having the option to switch what size the buds were in case they didn’t fit. When running, they stayed in my ears, and I ran around a small indoor track and was able to leave my phone in the locker on the track and solely control it through my smart watch. The Bluetooth was perfect for my whole run.

I really like how these headphones are sound proof. They can tune out the noises of a coffee shop with consistent music coming through the ears.

Great purchase and a great (free) warranty that comes with it.

title: Buyer beware!  These are garbage!
body: The first pair I received we're defective- the left earbud continually dropped out.  I contacted Tozo, and they agreed to send me a new pair, IF I GAVE THEM A 5 STAR AMAZON REVIEW.  So I did, in hopes the second pair would work.  Well, they second pair I received worked WORSE than the first.  Don't bother with these- as suspected, you get what you pay for - garbage!

title: By far and waway the best bang for your buck under $50
body: I lose my headphones a lot, and shop around a bit when I repurchase, because you never know what badass thing is around the corner for less money (or occasionally more).  With that said, these kick the sh!t out of any other headphones I've bought under $50, and I'm hoping to find the pair I recently mislaid because the Tagry earbuds I bought to replace them don't hold a candle to the Tozos.  Stop looking in the $20-$30 range and just drop the $40.  you'll be glad you did.

title: Great sound!!
body:
So I was looking for some headphones without wires and after reading reviews from the high end to the low end, I decided to go with these after a lot of good reviews.  I was looking for some strictly for the gym, something that could last at least 2 hours or more.  So far I love them.
Pro:
Wireless Charging
Great sound
Great fit, once you find the right tips, you will never have to adjust them while in your ear
Easy pairing

Cons:
No volume control, but I use my smart watch to adjust the volume
No control over skipping or repeating a song.

Even with the cons, I still love them and would buy a 2nd pair if they went cheaper, I cant say much about the battery life since I have never worn them down.

title: Amazing sound!
body: I bought these for my daughter, and I was lucky enough to catch them on sale. We have never bought any kind of ear buds like these before, so I didn't want to spend a ton and her not like the sound quality. These blew us all away! The sound is amazing, they cancel noise pretty darn well, she has even taken them in the shower a few times and they work exactly as they should. The one concern about them she has is the earbuds can't be far away from each other. She likes to use only one bud most of the time. So when she's video calling her friends she has to carry the other ear bud on her. She can't just leave it laying down on her desk and walk around the room. But, that's personal preference, and these earbuds are still a 5 star product!

title: Not recommend, Not at all
body:
Tozo wireless buds sound average.
The battery life is pretty ok and the fact that the case charges the buds is nice.

They become uncomfortable after extended wear and fall out alot. (I tried all 3 sizes)
Connecting the buds is annoying. It's not hard to do but the stupid things beep for several minutes after connecting to the device.
At 20% batt the buds annoy you until you charge them. " Beep* beep* low battery please charge"
Over and over until they die or you take them out.

title: Great sound earbuds! and Good service for me! I love TOZO.
body: I bought T10 TOZO ear Buds. It was good choice. Its sound is perfect and it is comfortable for me. Since it has 5.0 Blue tooth system, they are connected well although I leave from phone far. And they also provide 1 year guaranty. It is good for me. Thank you Tozo. I will suggest it to my friends.!

title: Better quality than Airpods
body: My only dislike:  the noise canceling,  wearing between calls acts like earplugs.  I have been told sound isn't great on receiving end of call.  Otherwise,  beautiful sound for tunes,  movies,  etc.,  really love them.  My son says quality is better than his Air pods

title: Fantastic Ear buds. Definately worth the purchase!
body: Such a great purchase. I am highly impressed with the quality of the product. They have really great sound quality compared to regular earbuds. I am a fan of noise cancelation head phones so these wireless earbuds have surprised me with the same quality of sounds and the best part is the 4 different size fittings that are included so you can get that perfect fit in your ear. No more earbuds falling out. Another plus is they are waterproof. They pair up easily with my phone every time i use them. I will definately be researching more products made by TOZO.

title: Save and buy a better one
body: Great product in regards to sound quality but I will be returning mine. The left we bud can't seem to pair with the right, and most times the left goes silent. Too many times that has happened to me so it has to go back.

title: Overall very good
body: These TOZO earbuds are pretty good, I've had my fair share of wireless earbuds all for around the same price as these.  For the pricepoint, TOZO provides a remarkably outstanding product.  The bass and sound quality is great.  The only personal issues I have had are that sometimes they tend to slip out of my ear but that may be to not using the proper fitting or sweat during exercise.  Also sometimes I do have trouble having the earbuds link to each other before the right one links to my phone exclusively.  Overall im very happy and satisfied with my purchase I just hope i dont lose them. again.

title: Good sound however has issues...
body:
Earbuds work well for the most part. As far as sound goes they are good. They function as expected and are crisp and clear. They do cancel any noise around you when fitted into your ear properly. However, the fit in your ear is not the best. If you have small ears they tend not to fit well and feel like they are going to fall out at any moment.

The wireless charging is a huge plus. If anything it outweighs any of the other issues this product has.

If you live in a major city (Chicago) do not expect these to work. Home life and outside the city they are perfect. Once you enter the earbuds have a hard time with buildings and other bluetooth devices. The earbuds cut out and a majority of the time you only get sound out of the right ear. As soon as you enter a building both ears come back and sound quality is improved.

I would not recommend using these to talk on the phone. Hard to hear the other person.

Over all they are earbuds and while not great they fit the bill and play music most of the time.

title: Not that loud
body:
I bought these headphones for working out but they don’t stay in my ear that great. I had to change the buds and it got better but not great. I have this issue with a lot of headphone however, Apple headphones fit my ear sooo.

The sound was ok. I like my headphones to be deafening! I want to not be able to hear anything outside of the music. Not the case with these. I put on Booty Work by TPain and It didn’t knock like I needed it to. I am going to keep em but had I gotten the chance to sample them, I would have passed. My search continues

title: Unreliable battery strength
body: I'm am audio book junkie and I got these headphones for my books. I'm so disappointed in the battery life of both the headphones and the charging case. I will be returning these headphones very soon.  Don't even try to use these for calls!

title: Excellent value!
body: There's a reason why more than 83% of the 7,000+ people who reviewed this gave it 4 or 5 stars. For ear buds, the bass is incredible. You may have to try all the different sizes they provide to get the right fit. If you don't, they may fall out or you may not hear the excellent range very well. Love that these and the case are IPX8. Also love that the case can wirelessly charge on a qi pad. Call quality is also excellent. I returned a $200 pair of headphones due to how well these work and sound. I guess the only downside is not being able to rewind or skip tracks. Definitely not a deal breaker for me.

title: Good sound quality
body:
I've searched bluetooth earbuds having good sound& long last battery, and I finally got this one after read many reviews & compared other brand's bludtooth earbuds.
f.y.i., I attached photo with tflash memory, it's small enough to carry on whenever, and easily faired well with my smartphone(galaxy9) as soon as I pulled out of case.
Especially, sound is really dynamic when I heared the drum performance,it's really outstanding than any other my headset,bluetooth earbuds,earphone..
One thing good point is that I can use the left side earbud while put right side earbud sitting in the case,
when it's run out of battery for left side earbud, I put it and keep listening to music only with right side earbud,
so its playing time can be doubled for me.
this is especially good for whom likes to enjoying music I can recommend.

title: Great Earbuds!
body: I was looking for some wireless earbuds for when I work out. I didn't want to spend a ton of dough, so I found these Tozo earbuds and so far they are really great. I use them when I run and there is little shifting or needing to adjust in my ear. I really am enjoying them right now, it was a great investment.

title: Great product support!
body: Edit: Contacted support and the offered to replace headphones, no hassle or issues.  Even though the headphones are definitely bass heavy, I am happy to see a company offer this kind of service.

title: Great headphones
body:
Very happy with these wireless earbuds, especially for the price!  It was easy to pair, great sound quality, and blocks out noise well.  The earbuds are comfortable and light weight.  I can use one earbud and leave the other in the charger.  It'll beep for 30 seconds initially, but it'll stop.

The charging case is convenient.  It'll last for four full charges and there are lights to indicate how many charges are left.

title: Updated: Great customer service
body:
July 28 2019 update
Customer service saw my original review and reached out to me saying I must have received a defective product and sent me a new set. Sound on this set is great so I am now giving this product 5 stars. Easy to set-up, pairs well and quickly with any device.

title: Good product for affordable price
body: I am completely satisfied with the product, it has things I did not imagine for the price they offer.  The sound quality is very good, I like the design and the presentation is amazing.  They are elegant, they do not fall when I am using them.  Good battery life, I used it for 4 hours and it recharges fast.

title: The good the bad and not so ugly
body: What I liked , sound quality is good , price is a bit high but not to bad at all. The pairing is very easy , and I like the look and over all quality. The one down side is the ear bud sizes while are plentiful , I need 1 more size smaller .

title: Suitable
body: I’ve only had my earbuds for a couple of days but I love being able to wear them while traveling. They block out loud noises very well and the sound is great for such small speakers.

title: great but... I received the wrong color.
body: These ear buds are great. The sound quality is very good, the battery life is decent and so is the range. It also comes with a neat charger case. But... I received the wrong color. I specifically wanted a white pair so they would be easier to see and therefore harder to lose. Quite disappointed with this but I'm not going to go through the hassle of returning them.

title: Quality sound quality product ! I even love the recharging case
body: I refuse to pay four times this to try the Apple earbuds because I was afraid they would fall out of my ear and I would lose them. These had such great reviews so I got them and I absolutely love them and they've never fallen out of my ear (when inserted correctly -  twist after putting in ear)  i've already told a half dozen people about these! Thanks for good sound in a quality product! I even love the recharging case!

title: Great Earbuds at a Great Price
body:
I ordered these earbuds on the recommendation of a co-worker.  I work in a construction environment and in my position I spend a lot of my day on the phone.  Trying to find a quiet place to talk on the phone with construction going on all around is a challenge, so I wanted to get a product that would allow me to use the phone without having to find a quiet spot.

When this product arrived, the buds were fully charged.  They paired instantly and do so whenever I remove them from the case.  Since the package arrived on a Sunday, I was not at work and could not put them to the test for the primary purpose I had gotten them.  Just to test them out, I started listening to some of my music and was blown away!  For the price point, these have some of the best sound quality I have experienced.  I am not one to listen to music on my phone, but I am starting to rethink that decision.  These earphones give a full, rich quality that I would expect from a much higher-priced unit.

My experience working with these units on the jobsite was just as satisfying.  High sound quality and good noise exclusion during phone conversations.  They make my work life better.

I give this product five stars all day long.  I have not had an issue with fit or comfort, the charging case is good for about 4 full recharges and the quality of the construction is top-notch.  Well done.

title: Bargain Quality Wireless Earbuds
body:
Looking for something to use running that wouldn't slip out when the others always seems to fall out or there were too many wires getting tangled. After buying a number of pairs these seemed to fit the bill. They're lightweight enough to stay put and it's a good balance of sound quality and noise cancelling as I don't want to block out 100% of the traffic around me when I'm out on a hilly road and need to keep my wits about me. The carrying case was a definite bonus as it charges them too. The hardest part is testing all the various earbud combinations to figure out which size works best to keep them put. Winner Winner me!

Update** After a week of using these I noticed the same quality issues other users faced where the sound cuts out intermittently. It's really quite annoying. I've done the troubleshooting but haven't been able to resolve the issue yet and may return these in the next week if the MFG isn't able to help.

title: Great wireless headphones without high price!
body: I bought these as a gift for my husband after his previous wireless headphones stopped working/charging.  These got good reviews but were also a very reasonable price.  He is SO happy with them!  The sound quality is excellent and the charging case is high quality.  They did not totally cancel out noise when I used them but not sure if that is just me.  I did a good amount of research and most wireless, bluetooth headphones are pretty pricey with variable ratings.  I'm now ordering a pair for myself.

title: Poor Connection
body:
I never gave a product a 1 star review. I always practice an attitude of gratitude. Nevertheless, it would be irresponsible and unethical of me not to warn you of the sad truth of this product which is: The connection of the left earpiece is very weak.

Before purchasing, I saw a review saying: "Ignore all the positive reviews" or something to that effect. Still, I was incredulous.

At the gym, the left earpiece's sound would continuously click and the sound would continuously turn on and off. It may have to do with the fact that there are a multitude of other wireless headphone users there. Still, the whole purpose of these earbuds was for me to use at the gym.

I followed the instructions and did a reset of the Bluetooth connection, the problem still persisted.

Sound quality, great.
Packaging, great.
Bluetooth connection, poor.

title: Great product.....for 3 months.
body:
Overall a great product.....while it lasted. Got this late March,early April 2019. It was such a good investment at the time. I was able to go 4-5 hours of run time. Put it in the charging case during luch(45 mins) . And had another 4-5 hours of play time. This was such a good pair of headphones. But just recently the right earbud doesnt want to pair. It's not even visible to any phone. I reset it numerous time and nothing.
I'm tempted to buy another pair as $50 isnt that expensive. I just cant see myself buy this every 3 months.

So everything was great except it doesnt last long.

title: Nice for the price
body: These ear buds are pretty good for the price. The left bud drops out every once in a while but comes back on in a second or two at the most, probably not worth the hassle to return & I can live with it for now. The batteries last about 3hrs which is good for what I need. Overall a good product.

title: I don't miss my Bosè QC-35
body:
I have to say that I have a pair of Bosè QC-35 as my primary headphones. But in summer they get steamy, and for travelling they are rather big, so I started to look for some more portable and smaller headphones. I didn't want to pay $150 for some Apple AirPods, so I did a research and found this TOZO.  And I love them. I've had them for a couple of weeks, and I'm still on the "you're-the-love-of-my-life" phase; so, I will try to be as objective as possible.

[Sound Quality]
Powerful basses and crisp higher notes. Once you fit your earbuds correctly, you will feel amazed by the bass sound. Choose the ear cushions that fit snuggle and comfortable, but don't let any gaps in your ears.

[Comfortability]
They come with 4 sizes of ear cushions, so for sure you will have a pair that fits you correctly. As I said above, choose the ones that fit comfortable and does not leave gaps in your ears for better sound quality.

[Noise Isolation]
Fantastic. I used them in the airplane, and you hardly notice you're flying. I use them at the office and people have to wave their hands to me, because I don't listen a thing outside my music (volume at 70%).

[Battery Life]
I've been using them for 10 days, 1 hour a day aproximately. This is the first time I recharge the base. So, I could say that total battery life, including base charge is around 10 hours.

[Waterproof]
I took a shower with them. Worked perfectly.

[Other Things]
Pairing is easy. Though somehow I turn them off, and store them in the case, and after a while they re-connect to my iPhone. What I did was "disconnect" the earbuds in the iPhone settings and it stopped completely. Now I have to manually connect them to the iPhone everytime I use them. No big deal.

[Overall]
You don't have to pay $150 for AirPods. Yes, they are more fancy, look nicer and they are connected to Siri, but I don't think the price difference is worth it. So far, I'm in love with this TOZO earbuds.

title: Super if you like things that don't work well
body: Used this morning for the first time.  They fit in well, but wow is the sound HORRIBLE.  They have frequent drops in sound level and they cut out frequently.  Next time I'll buck up and pay more for something better.

title: A nice alternative to Galaxy Buds
body: Originally, I lost my Galaxy Buds so I needed to replace them. After doing some research, I came across the TOZO earbuds, which have very similar, if not the same, features and quality at an affordable cost. The earbuds can be used independently which is nice for a phone conversation, and you can wear them both at the same time especially for music. The sound quality is very crisp, and the background noise is very minimal. I do like the charging feature with being able to wireless charge my earbuds with my phone. Overall, I do like this product and I highly recommend it!

title: Light weight, comfortable, & easy to pair.
body: Just bought my first pair of wireless earbuds.  So far extremely happy with the choice I made.  I have them paired with bluetooth on my new LG tv.  They were very very easy to pair, they are quite comfortable, & have very clear stereo sound.  I'm hearing sounds in a movie that I have never heard before.....I consider these to be an exceptional value.  It may be my first pair, bu t it won't be my last.

title: Battery life is awful
body: Works very well but the battery life is terrible so I’m only giving it 1 star. Literally not last 3.5 hours even after being charged up all night long. I brought these to be able to have something small right in my ear and it did work for that but my regular Bluetooth last 10 hours on a full battery so I still have to use them. Will be searching for a better pair in this style

title: If you get one that’s not faulty like mine...
body: These are pretty descent however the left bud on the ones I received disconnected often for no reason. I actually liked them but the playback with this problem is annoying. I tried to contact the shipper no reply. So I’m returning

title: SUPER SATISFIED
body:
I would say that this is the best wireless headset that I’ve bought.

1) The sound quality is pretty good.
2) Good at blocking outside noise.
3) Super easy to connect and use.
4) They stay very snug in the ears (several sizes can be selected).
5) The charging case is an awesome feature.

Overall, these earbuds are great! Good price, great sound, nice presentation and comfortable case.

title: Fit my tiny ears!
body: These have been great! I have a hard time finding ear buds that fit my child size ears but these do! The sound quality is awesome-I wear them while mowing the lawn and the tractor doesn’t get in the way of my podcast!  I wear them on average an hour a day-charged them 10 days ago and haven’t had to charge them yet!  Initially pairing was tricky but once done they pair so easily!

title: Blew me away!!!
body:
I bought these to replace my wired headphones that I use to talk on my phone daily, and it was quite more than I expected. The sound is SUPERB. Quality is SUPERB. Battery is SUPERB. Comfort is SUPERB. Mic is SUPERB. Waterproof is SUPERB. ONLY DOWNSIDE IS THE SOMEWHAT BULKINESS. I shower with these and they hold up just as advertised.

*** HIGHLY RECOMMEND ***

title: Great sound quality and wireless charging!
body: Loved these Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds; 1) Great sound quality with excellent bass 2) case has wireless charging which so easy, earbuds go back in case and sit case on wireless charger.  So simple!

title: Left ear bud drops signal constantly
body: These ear buds sound good if you can get them deep enough into your ears, which gets uncomfortable to me within an hour or so. My biggest complaint is that once you step outside the left ear bud drops signal constantly. I assume without walls to bounce off of the Bluetooth pairing is just not powerful enough to make it through my thick skull? Will be returning and trying another brand.

title: Cuts out, skips transmission, no good.
body: Defective as received.  Charged up, paired to phone, played music and sound came through for maybe half a minute then started cutting out like many other customers have complained about. Reset them and repaired to phone, but problem persisted. Lousy product performance.

title: Amazing customer service!
body: These headphones are a good quality for the price.  They are easy to operate and fit comfortably.  While I haven’t had them long enough to really give a full review of the product features, I just had to give 5stars for customer service alone.  I received the headphones on Monday and the right ear bud wasn’t playing any sound.  I emailed them about my problem.  They advised I reset them.  I had done this before, but I tried again, and it worked but only temporarily.  I again emailed back with the issues I was having, and the representative I was corresponding with was so helpful.  I received responses within 24 hours of each email and all from the same representative.  I questioned whether I wanted to keep them at first, but now I definitely will just because I know if there is a problem, they will take care of it.

title: Battery Life/Stand Time
body:
These headphones have a great battery life compared to any Bluetooth headphones I have purchased in the last 5 years. They not only hold a charge, but stay charged when not used for a few days.

The noise cancellation feature is also great. It is nice to have the option to use one ear bud when trying to stay alert in an office setting, or use both when needing to get in the zone.

Overall, great purchase and experience with Tozo!

title: Good build but keep falling from ears.
body: The case and the accesories have a good build and quality, they charge fast and sound great, but they keep falling from my ears and just wished they were smaller. They get unconfortable after pushing them inside the ear for about an hour or so.

title: THEY STAY IN YOUR EARS!!! :D
body: I ordered this product because I needed some nice wireless earbuds to workout in. I can't tell you how sick and tired I was of having to maneuver around my Apple earphones with the wires. The Tozo 10 bluetooth earbuds come with three different sizes of buds so you can get the right fit for your ears, and it also comes with a case that is the charger, and a cord to charge the case with. Once the case is fully charged, you can get a good few charges out of it, no problem. I worked out with them for the first time yesterday actually, and it went perfectly. It almost feels too easy, being so hands free and not having to worry about the wires getting in my way or tripping me up when I'm working out vigorously. To sum it up, this product is AMAZING and I would 10/10 recommend it to any and everyone. Not everyone can afford AirPods (I sure can't LOL), and Amazon has great prices, so if you're looking for some awesome wireless earbuds, go ahead and order these TODAY! :)

title: mixed feelings
body:
The sound is better than other headphones that I've tried but it never connects to my phone without me going to the "previously connected devices" option and the charging case seems to run dry on a single charge (it seems to keep draining regardless of how charged the headphones are).

So...this would be a 4+ on sound and a 1 on some of the ancillary things. Basically I cannot find perfect bluetooth headphones. Maybe they're still a few years out.

title: Cheaper than Boise
body: Ordered these to resolve issues with other ear buds falling out of my ears.  Was not sure what to order.  I saw the Boise buds, but didn't want to spend that much on something that may not work.  To my surprise the Tozo buds worked great without any hassle.  I don't really like anything in or on my ears, but these are the  best I have found so far.  Anticipate keeping these since they met all my criterion.

title: Great sound and excellent service!
body:
I bought these ear buds a few days ago. I love the sound quality and the noise cancellation is surprising effective. Plus, the headphones have a very deep bass which is hard to find in a true wireless set.

I did have an issue with the battery life. However, after contacting the companies customer service, they helped me fix the problem quickly and effectively. It was a great change of pace to have a company care about their service with their customers in addition to their product.

I will definitely recommend these earbuds to anyone who will listen.

title: Best Purchase I Have Ever Made!
body: The sound quality is awesome.  I use my earbuds while working on my various glass projects.  During the evening, I can open my windows and listen to my music without irritating the neighbors.  Yay!!

title: Great sound quality at an amazing price!
body: I received these about 5 or so days ago and so far I am pretty impressed. They are very well made quality wise and the sound quality honestly shocked me was way better than most other forms of earbuds I've had in the past. I really love the charging case that they come in. Fits in my pocket so I can care it around at work and charge basically whenever I need too. The only down side is the battery life. Now for the record the estimated amount of hours on full charge I believe is 3 to 4 hours which so far that is true. I rated the battery life 3 of 5 because I know of other wireless earbuds that last 7 or more hours each charge. I also haven't used them for phone calls mostly listening to music or watching youtube. But I will say that while I was out walking I tried to call upon my Google assistant with my phone in my pocket with the earbuds in and it couldn't pick up my voice.  But for what I wanted to do with them I can just wish they lasted more and a few hours between charge.

title: Connection problem...
body: The left ear connection keeps going in and out. I am not sure if thats only me

title: Very short range
body: Signal cuts in and out when I put my phone in back pocket also cuts out about 10-15 ft from phone.  I have a 20ft carpet runner and it cuts out before I get to the other end.  The sounds is good when signal makes it through. Water proofing seemed okay (only used once in water).

title: Near perfect
body: Only reason I gave them a four star is because I can not use one bud then pull out the other and they just work. Also can not press the button without holding the bud.

title: Great for Workouts
body: I bought a pair for both me and my boyfriend to use during our workouts and we love them so far.  The sound plays great and the price was even better.

title: Glad I got them!!
body:
I really enjoy these ear buds.  They were a lightning deal (that’s the main reason I got them).  I like that I can use one ear bud or both.  I normally use 1 for music and both if I’m making calls.  Sound is great on music and calls.  I really like that the charging base is wireless, and that it can hold about 4 charges.  I just wish the ear buds themselves held a longer charge.

But i really enjoy these, I’m glad I got them and would definitely recommend.

title: Great sound and true ear buds!
body: I received this product for a gift. I was not sure how they were going to work when seeing them but WOW!! I found the fit to be very comfortable and really appreciated the extra ear bud covers to be able to make sure I got a snug fit. No problems with them falling out! The pairing and ease of use did not require multiple steps and they connected with no problems and are easy to use. I am really liking that these are true earBUDS and don’t have an extra part hanging down out of your ear. But the BEST part was how well they sound....and I appreciated the extra bass in the mix. I am enjoying my listening very much.

title: Great bang for the buck earphones!
body: I originally bought this as a true wireless earbud system since the wires on my older set kept getting stuck on my neck during workouts. This took care of the problem and more - I was genuinely surprised by the sound these little units produce as I purchased this without any real expectations and mainly bought these for a "function over form" item. The best thing I like about these are how long the battery has the potential to last - just bring the case with you and you have 4 full charges of your earset (which last approx 4-6 hours each for me, not bad at all if you ask me) The earbuds also come with a variety of different sizes of earpieces so you can get your best fit in order for the earbud to stay in your ear. They are pretty comfy! I haven't gotten these wet yet, but another part of my purchasing this earset was due to their water resistance. It was the highest (that I found) whilst shopping other similar earset and although I have yet to test that aspect of it, I am fairly confident that it will deliver based on all other aspects being delivered, if not exceeded.

title: Decent for a month, then the sound started skipping
body: Worked fairly well when dry as long as both are in. With only the left one, the sound got glitchy, even if the right was on and close. I was okay with that since I only want to use one at a time or I’m deaf to the world. Until the right one started skipping too. Three days after return window closed. Also, although not my concern but others may be interested, they fell out of my ears when they got wet.

title: Great earbuds for the price
body:
The packaging was unbelievable, the build quality is top notch, and a good set of features for the price. Wireless charging, IPX8 waterproofing, high-quality 8mm sound driver, and Bluetooth v5.0 are just a few of the high end features the T10's have to offer. The Bluetooth v5.0 mean they have a stronger connection and long distance, but sometimes it gets disconnected due to the walls in the apartment.
The Qi wireless capability case is very handy. I can set the earbud case on any Qi charging pad, and I'm good to go. The price for the quality of the earbud on the market is great.

title: Quality product
body: Very slick product. Like the carrying case. Buds lock in magnetically. Looking forward to using the magnetic charging station. Quality product.

title: Didn't work as intended, maybe a bad pair.
body: I was excited to get this item as my work requires that I use both hands to type all day, first thing I notice it was the left headphone kept shuting off and didnt work as intended, the mic had low reception I guess due to being small, I return them and will be looking for a different one due to the quality, I guess I just got a bad pair.

title: Great sound quality
body: Great company with great customer service. They really care about making sure you’re satisfied with their products. The sound quality on these are unbeatable for the price. Bass is perfect.

title: These Tozo's are high quality.
body: I purchased these as a gift. The recipient was very happy with the sound quality and battery life. They said it was an excellent upgrade from their last pair of Tozo's. And they use these buds all day at work.

title: BELIEVE THE HYPE!
body:
I listen to both spoken word and classical music.  Often times small speakers
do not pick up the nuance of one or the other.  These do!  Just do what the
instructions say, you will have the listening experience you expect in either.
The comfort in the ear does take the fussing of the instructions but it' worth it.

title: Impressed by the sound quality
body:
I have a Pixel 2 phone that comes with no audio jack. I've been looking for a bluetooth earbud for a while. After reading the reviews and answered questions for this product, I decided to give it a try. The price is reasonable comparing with similar products.

It comes with a well designed box that contains a charging case with a pair of earbuds inside,  a user guide,  three earbud caps with different sizes and a lanyard. I was blown away by the sound quality. It has nice bass, and well defined mids and highs. Earbuds fit incredibly comfortably. The earbuds pair quickly and easily to each other and to my Pixel 2 with voice prompts letting you know when each is paired

All in all these are great little earbuds and are well worth the money.

title: This product broke after about 1/2 a year. There is no warranty to cover it past 1 month.
body: I bought this product March 18, 2019 and the return deadline was April 2019. The left ear bud stopped working in Oct. 2019. I can listen with the right earbud but the left earbud is broken. So now the product is worthless to me. Don't buy this product if you want to listen to music in stereo.

title: For $30-$50 bucks this is a good deal with built in wireless charging case compatibility
body:
Pros:
-the charging case is compatible with wireless charging pads in addition to the traditional micro USB charging method
-price point (especially if purchased during lighting deal)
-amazing sound for this price
-comfortable with the correct fitted earbud tips

Cons:
-charging case continues to discharge earbuds even when they are powered off inside the charging case, depleting the charging case in about 6 days without any use
-earbuds are a little large with regards to protrusion out of ears
-battery charging case could have a bigger battery for longer earbud charging times

The long version:
What makes these earbuds worth purchasing is they sound good overall. There's a little bit of emphasis on the bass but that is mentioned in the breakdown of the product, so I knew prior to purchasing these. The bass isn't so strong that it drowns out the mids or the highs. The wireless charging case compatibility with wireless charging pads truly makes these wireless.

I can't speak for those that have had a bad experience with these headphones, but I'm completely satisfied with these earbuds. What makes these earbuds and earbuds similar to these earbuds noise cancellation effective is fitting the proper earbud tips on the earbuds for your ears. That's not to take anything away from these earbuds because they are exactly everything I expected them to be. I didn't buy these for phone calls nor have I tested them for phone calls so I can't comment on that aspect.

Update 8/4/19
I noticed one major flaw with this earbuds that made me take away two stars because the charging case is a very important part of why I purchased these. It's important for the charging case to be able to hold a charge for a long period of time (at least 30 days) without having to charge the case when the earbuds are powered off inside the charging case. For some unknown reason the charging case will continue to discharge with the earbuds powered off inside the charging case. It seems as though the earbuds turn themselves back on when placed inside the charging case. I haven't actually tracked how long the case holds a charge with the earbuds powered off inside the case but I suspect the case will loose its charge in less than 7 days. This is not normal because I have other wireless earbuds that don't have this problem with the charging case discharging after the earbuds are placed inside the case sitting for many days, sometimes weeks before I use the earbuds again.

title: Great sound quality over battery
body: I absolutely love these headphones! They sound really good the last pair of headphones I had was Powerbeats 3 but my cat chewed the cord so I bought these for my birthday! I have to say these do a really good job of staying in my ears once I switched to the smallest ear pieces.  I can’t hear anything around me which I like so people do t talk to me lol. It also looks like you aren’t wearing any headphones. Down side is that you can’t skip or replay through the headphones you can only pause . You can use Siri to change your music if you don’t want to pick up your phone. The other downs side they don’t hold a charge for long about 2 1/2 hours. So always have your case charged. They do charge pretty fast though so that’s a plus. Other than the battery life and unable to skip or replay music the sound is really amazing I’m not mad about this purchase at all!

title: Poor battery life and sound
body: The sound quality is poor, the battery life barely lasts 1 hour. If you lose the charger, you’re done. I accidentally left my charger on a flight and was not able to charge the ear buds my entire 15 day cruise.

title: Poor battery life.
body: I can go days without using the earbuds. Very disappointing to want to use them and they are not charged. I would leave a full charge in them and still would be drained a couple of days later. Ended up going to a different product.

title: So excited to run with these!
body: I have been through five different three headsets in the past three years and am very excited to finally have truly wireless headsets.  They each connect on their own so you can use one independently.  The noise cancellation is fantastic. They are very comfortable.

title: Absolute junk. Positive reviews must be fake
body:
After seeing all of the positive reviews on these earbuds I thought I would give them a try, especially being they are affordable. My gut told me there is no way a $50-60 set of bluetooth earbuds would actually be any good but I tried anyway. Boy was my gut right!

Many hours of frustration and multiple sets of exchanges later I can say with absolute certainty that these are absolute junk and could even be a scam. You are greeted with nice packaging, your normal warranty card and quick guide (both of which are so poorly translated that it is laughable). The charging case is actually very nice and probably the best feature of the whole set. Once the headphones were charged I tried them out and immediately had audio cutouts constantly. The left earbud would constantly lose connection with the right and this causes the right side audio to fade in and out. I then did the hard reset per the instruction multiple times with the same result. The funny thing is, the issue was the worst when I turned my head right and slightly up. I also tested on multiple bluetooth phones and smart watches to no avail.

I requested an exchange and the new set promptly arrived. This set was a bit better at home but as soon as I went out or to the gym they were almost completely useless with audio cutouts so frequent you couldn't tell what song you were listening to. If you run with only the right earbud turned on it is a better experience but this is in no way acceptable. Repeated the process again but again, same result. On top of this, when I did have a good connection the sound quality was absolutely awful. Very compressed sounding with no low end response. Finally gave up and got a refund.

TL;DR - Left earbuds cuts out constantly and causes the right to cut as well. Bluetooth is very unstable and weak and the sound quality is sub-par at best. A bunch of wasted time and multiple sets later I returned the last set.

title: Love the T10s!  Fabulous in every way!
body: I LOVE THESE SO MUCH!!!  I never write reviews, but I am enjoying these earbuds so much right now that I had to share the news! I have SO many pairs of earbuds.  I am crazy about none of them...including the Apple AirPods & Jaybird Runs.  They are average and overpriced if you ask me!  The TOZO T10s blow them all away in price point (obviously) but also sound quality, comfort and look. I LOVE the wireless charging capability which is a huge reason why I purchased them.  No buyers remorse here!  Awesome product!

title: Great sound and customer service.
body:
I received these as a gift and loved them. They produce great sound and are very comfortable. One earbud ceased working and I contacted their customer service. They responded very quickly and resolved the issue by sending me a new set.  Great company to work with. I would highly recommend and buy again. Thanks for standing behind your product.

UPDATE:  I received my replacement 2 DAYS after contacting customer service with my problem. I could not imagine receiving such fast and satisfactory service. Again great product produced by a great company.  Again many thanks!

title: Easily charged and easily paired.
body: Easy and fast charging, battery life long enough. A good company for daily life entertainment and especially during sports or some outdoor activities. I especially like the way the product got paired with my phone, previously I owned two other Bluetooth earphones, both have annoying process to get paired and after several days of using, you even had to disconnect and re-pair. For this one, so far the pair process has been going well.

title: Works Well
body: Had an issue, quickly addressed by seller and replaced. Absolutely love these buds. Recommended them to all my friends and family. Love that I could use one bud while the other one charges, charge last awhile. Absolutely worth every penny.

title: Faulty Left Earbud
body: Only the right earbud worked. The second device connected every time... however, not a single sound. I was sure the left earbud connected, because the automated voice said “second device paired” and i was able to pause and resume my music using the left earbud (useless regarding sound though). I tried resetting it as mentioned, I followed the manual’s Bluetooth connection/pairing directions to the “t”... nothing.  I’m not one to instantly return a product if I find something complicated: I reset my phone, I “forgot the device”, I did everything.  I cannot rate battery life, sound quality, etc, due to it not working as it is supposed to (as 2 functioning earbuds).

title: Lightweight and Lasting!
body: I've been using these earbuds for the past couple weeks now to use when I'm doing my cardio workouts. I used to use my wired apple earpods, but was annoyed/distracted with the cable. I never owned a pair of bluetooth earbuds and I'm very happy with these! They pair fast and conveniently with my phone, comfortable in my ears (I used the smallest size), and have great sound quality while I focus on my workout! No more fiddling with the earbud staying in my ears or a cable bouncing around! I also love the case they come in along with showing how much battery life is left (lasts a long time). I have yet to test it's waterproof effectiveness, but haven't had the need to at the moment. Overall, a great product!

title: Great Customer Service - Replaced Defective Left Channel.
body:
Left channel went quiet after the first 20 minutes of use.  Customer Service promptly sent a replacement.
Audio quality is supurb.
Compared to Letsfit D39, it is a little bit heavier which i notice while running.  It has the exact same female voice saying left, right, pairing, and paired, so it may be running the same software.

title: Surprised for a budget set of wireless earbuds
body: Technology has come a long way. I'm actually pretty surprised with the sound quality of the earbuds for a set under $40. It also feels like it was quality made, too; does not feel cheap at all. I've ran with them and used it at my desk during work. I like the case design and how the case charges the earbuds when I place them back in. The only issue I have is the battery life. But I understand you can't really put a big battery in the individual earbuds. It's only going to get better when we continue advancing in battery technology. For someone who's looking for cheap but good quality wireless earbuds, I would recommend this.

title: Great wireless headphones!!
body:
I purchased these headphones because I was sick of wanting to listen to music while I worked out and also worked on small projects and having a cord hanging in my way.  The Tozo T10 headphones are amazing for the price.  Syncing them to my phone and my laptop was super quick and easy with zero problems.  They are super light weight and don't fall out of my ears no matter what activity I am doing.  The charging case is very sturdy and I love that it can be charged by plugging it in or I can also set it on my cellphones wireless charging pad and charge it on that.
In this price point these are some of the best quality wireless headphones you can buy.  Lots of features and great quality - I would highly recommend these headphones to anyone.

title: Very poor Bluetooth connection
body:
I have been using these for a few weeks now during my workouts. Everything seems to work fine, except the Bluetooth connection. My pair uses the right earbud as the master and the left one as the slave (meaning my phone connects to the right side and that connects to the left one). The connection to the right earbud is ok, not good, but ok. Works fine when my phone is near me but if I venture more than 10 or so feet away in the same room it starts to cutout (note that Bluetooth should work at 30ft+ in an open space). It will also cutout if my phone is in my right pocket and I look to the left. My bigger problem is the left one. That one cuts out constantly even when my phone is in my hands. It's very annoying and causes me a lot of frustration during my workout.

Reached out to the manufacturer for a replacement, will update if the new pair is any better.

title: I'm giving it a 3 and I'm being generous.
body:
I've owned many headsets, wireless and wired alike. If I could rank this headset out of 10 it's a 5 and here's why.

The sound quality: the sound quality is alright at best, certainly nothing to ride home about. You'll get HQ music from it if you have it but it (meaning the music itself) has to be that good.

It's "perks": despite what's here I'll tell you the truth about this headset, it's a poor headset for exercising so don't even bother buying it for running, lifting, or any activities in general beyond walking because they will slip out with use. Additionally, DO NOT BUY this for talking, it has been the worst headset I've ever used for talking, no one can hear me and it isn't a them problem because let's face it, over 20 people with different phones can't have the same problem. Finally it's connectivity kills me, does not automatically connect with my phone and the ear buds can't be more than 1 and a half feet away from one another if not they start glitching and messing up.

It's actual pros: it's got decent battery life and it does have some water resistance, didn't want to push my luck with that though so I don't know how far that goes.

So in all and all in short I probably would not buy this headset again. You can get it, it won't be the worst thing in the world but don't expect the best.

title: Outstanding Earbuds
body: I've used various earbuds over the years, but none compare to these! One issue I've had with others have been how they fit and feel in my ears. These have been ideal as they fit snuggly and comfortably. The sound is outstanding, which has been great while running. Highly recommend!

title: Fantastic product!
body: These earbuds are a great value. These earbuds not only sound great, but they cancel out so much around you. I used them at an indoor track that constantly pumps out loud music, and all I heard was what was on my earbuds. My wife and I both love them. Connecting was very easy, and they work greet with my phone and laptop. They are really comfortable and stayed in without issue for my first run, which was well over an hour. Very impressed!

title: Good product, great customer service
body: I bought these earphone so I could listen to music while swimming. The sound is good, however, once your head is underwater the connection gets lost; but I least I can hear some music on and off. I had these earbud for over a month now, and the left earbud is not working. However, I contacted customer service and they were very helpful solving the problem

title: Great Product
body: This is my first set of wireless headphones, and I love no longer being tethered to my devices!  My cord was always getting tangled up in things or getting in the way on the treadmill.  Why didn't I purchase some sooner??!!  These fit snugly in my ears and I haven't had a problem with them coming loose during use.  I fly frequently, and these do a decent job of blocking loud airplane noise.  I have three different devices I regularly pair with, and it isn't hard to switch between devices.  You just need to put the right headphone in the case for a moment to break the pairing and re-pair.  I haven't actually timed the battery life, but it probably lasts about 2-3 hours before they need to be placed back in the case to recharge.  The case can charge them several times before needing a recharge itself.  This product is a great value!

title: Great bass
body: Finally, a pair of decent earbuds that have decent sound.  The pair I bought before these sounded like I had two tin cans on my ears and absolutely no bass.  These are excellent.  Fits in the ear nicely and they don't fall out.  The bass sounds like what bass is supposed to sound like.  I'm very pleased.  Love the charging case and the fact that you can answer calls with the earbuds.  Thank you!

title: Amazing Headphones!
body: I was a little sceptic when deciding to buy this Tozo T10 wireless earbuds due to its competitive cost but once I received them and started the setup in my phone I was really surprised how good they work along the sound quality and features. Definitely is a better buy even better than expensiver or fancier brands such as Apple airpods. You need to try this!

title: Great Sound! Great Price!
body: I've had these earbuds for just over 2 weeks and I can say that the sound is just as good as by Beats over the ear headphones, and a lot more comfortable. The fit is great and the charge lasts at least three hours ( that's as long as I've worn them at a time) and they were still going strong then. This is the first pair of earbuds I've owned and I would definitely buy another Tozo product again judging from the build quality that went into these 'buds!

title: Customer Support
body:
Initially purchased in August 2019, sound quality was intermittent. Used with an Apple 4 watch on morning walks, I had to hold my arm still to hear sound in the left ear bud. After several weeks buds refused to charge. Contacted Customer Support, explained my problem in detail, and TOZO quickly provided replacement ear buds. So far, the replacement buds work as advertised--sound is good in both ears. No issues charging.
I am especially appreciative of TOZO's customer support to ensure that all customers are satisfied with their product.
I recommend the buds to other prospective buyers.

title: GREAT PRODUCT!
body: Bought two sets, one as a gift and one for my self.  Both of us really like this and the price was great.!!  easy to use and battery life pretty good.  Both colors are good, comfort is good, used them while weed eating and work great I recommend this purchase.

title: Great product. Perfect for people with small ears
body: Great product. I have very small ears so it’s hard to find something that fits comfortably in my ear. This product is so smooth and conformable that there is no pain at all while wearing them. They stay in place great and the sound quality is great.

title: I love these earphones!
body: This product is fantastic. I’ve been using them for about a month now and they are excellent. Very durable and the sound is great. They fit well in my ears and never fall out. I’ve done sprints and runs while using these and never had an issue with them falling out or losing sound, etc. I sweat hard Whem working out and never had any kind of malfunction due to excess sweat, water, etc. In my opinion this is a perfect product for a perfect price and beats those overly priced AirPods any day! I highly recommend these!

title: Best Earbuds for the price!
body: I started cardiac rehab and the music they often play is horrid. Millennial play list when Boomers are the clients just don’t mix. I tried using my Apple ear buds but I hate them. They make my ears hurt and the wire made it impossible to move on gym equipment.  I saw one of the patients with wireless earbuds and I immediately started researching. TOZO buds were ordered that day and cane the next. Very pleased with sound, size, and comfort!

title: Great headphones for the price
body: The headphones are great for sound quality and price.  The battery life is solid.  I did have a defect in the right headphone where it did not charge or turn on after it drained its battery.  Tozo customer service was great and said they will send a replacement headphone.  My wife will buy from them soon as well. Satisfied and recommend them to others.

title: Static in the left earbud.
body: After allowing for a full charge, I did my test. The earbuds connected with each other, and then found my iPhone quickly with no issue.  However, when I used the earbuds, the left earbud throws out distorted static above the music.  It’s connection with the right ear bud fails to provide quality sound.  I also tried an audio book and same thing.  The voice speaking has a fuzzy static to it.  There is no way these are acceptable or usable.  I would love to find out I have a defective unit or a wireless channel setting I could adjust, but I didn’t see anything that detailed in the manual.

title: Not worth it
body: Overall, I am disappointed with these earbuds.  It takes awhile to pair up, they shut off and on for no reason and have very limited range.  I cannot leave my phone and walk around too far without it cutting out or shutting off  then I have to pair them back up again.  The sound is good but I would not recommend these. If I could have gotten my money back , I would have.

title: Awesome earphones for an awesome price
body:
I bought the Tozo T10 for the IPX8 waterproof rating as no other wireless buds matched this rating for this price range. I was skeptical at first given the price but after using it for just a few days, I fell in love with them. The things that I like the most about these buds are:

Sound quality - for this price point, Tozo 10 does a flawless job. I use mine to listen to music, phone calls and watch TV shows. I can hear the dialogues perfectly when there is noise in the background. I don't have to rely on subtitles anymore.
Battery life - The T10s last over 3 hours of playtime on a single charge as advertised and you can charge them using the case multiple times. The wireless charging case is very handy as I can just leave the case on my wireless charger when I go to sleep. If I forget to charge the case at night, I can still charge them over USB in my car.
Perfect fit - They are a perfect fit for my ears. The earplugs come in 3 sizes but the ones it came with were just the perfect size for my ears. Most of my other earphones usually fall off from my ear or with a gentle tug on the wires but not the T10. I have used them during workouts, runs, and sometimes watch TV shows while lying on my bed and these buds won't fall off easily.
