Waterproof - This was the main reason I bought the T10s. I use it to listen to music while showering as I cannot take my phone in the water and my shower is too loud to use the speakers on my phone. I had no problems showering with these on.
Noise cancelling/isolation - Although I think there isn't an active noise cancellation feature on the T10s, the perfect fit in my ears ensure high level of noise isolation. I work in an office with open floor plan and when I have these earbuds, I can barely hear people talking even if they are besides me even when I am not playing any music.
Rugged finish - Lastly, I like the finish on my Tozo T10. I have dropped them a few times on hardwood floors while taking them out or putting them on the case but the rubbery finish on the earbuds with matte surface on the button means no scratches anywhere. The build quality is very high and they don't feel cheaply made unlike some other shiny plastic earbuds out there.

The high average rating from over 4000 people is very well deserved. I would gladly buy these again as a gift during the holiday season.

title: Bang for Your Buck!!!
body:
I did a bit of research to find an affordable pair of "true-wireless" earbuds that would work well and I was not disappointed. These earbuds are pretty awesome for their price!
I use them to listen to music every day at work and they totally cancel out the surrounding noise.
I even wore them to wash my hair and they are truly waterproof.
The only possible issue is that the connection between the earbuds and the phone becomes very spotty around the water.
Overall, very very happy with my purchase.

title: Amazing bass but will drop call in 5 minutes via Skype call but ok on cell.
body: I will change this to 5 stars when the vendor is able to figure out why a skype call will drop every 5 minutes.  But I can switch to music no problem and when it's connected to the cell phone the calls don't drop.

title: Great earbuds
body: These work very well and the battery will last about 3 hours on a charge.  They are a little large, but I find them comfortable enough. I’m not sure they would stay in place during activities although for my use they are fine.  The holder is also a charger and it seems like I can get 1 or maybe 2 charges before it needs to be plugged in again. They turn on when you remove them from the box and connect automatically to each other and your device. They can be used on multiple devices once you have them paired. Overall a decent product at a decent price.

title: More than decent quality and leaves your wallet happy!
body:
Had these for a solid month and a half now.. been using them daily and so far...

Pros:
1. Find the right size silicone bud allowing a snug (not vacuum-sealed) fit and noise cancellation is pretty solid. Bass is more than satisfactory.
2. Took a shower with them on and its working just fine. (don't submerge them in water though) they're water-resistant.. not waterproof.
3. Battery life is great and the four additional charges you can have on your docking case allows even more prolonged use. Quick 45 minute charge gave me 4-5 hrs of music playtime. (haven't tested out calltime)
4. Personal pet peeve of mine but the low battery announcement isn't rushed (good five minutes before device actually powers off from no more battery life)
5. Call quality is fantastic and people on the receiving end of the line never complained about not being able to hear me when I am talking.
6. Magnetic ends on the buds allow for more convenient access to the charging dock - no need to fit them inside like a puzzle piece.
7. Answer/Reject Calls function is neat and announces the phone number of who's calling.

Cons:
1. Even with the optimal silicone bud size for my ears, they do tend to fall out of your ear every now and then. Especially for me, it was when walking down stairs and rigorous sprinting.
2. No playback function or volume function.. have to adjust volume or next/prev track on connected bluetooth device.
3. Another small pet peeve of mine but if you do decide to use one bud at a time, there will be four to five intermittent  beeps until the opposing bud is paired as well. Not a huge dealbreaker though - it becomes more bearable as time passes lol.

TLDR
Sure you can go with Bose/Beats/Jabras etc but why spend that extra cash when there are gems like these that are more than capable and satisfactory. Maybe time will truly tell whether if these buds will last as long but for people looking to make a quick (less guilty) purchase - you won't regret these.

title: 100% worth the money.
body: Right out of the box, these headphones are fantastic. The sound is very clear and clean and sound delay is very minimal. Usage is super intuitive, the headphones turn on automatically when they're taken out of the charging case and automatically pair to each other and go into pairing mode for the mobile device (or whatever you're using) to connect. They fit perfectly in the ear and the buttons are easy to press with fairly easy to remember controls. All around a great pair of headphones and significantly better than any I've had in the past 3 years.

title: Might be bigger than you think, but they’re great!
body:
I work in landscaping and I consistently used the Apple EarBuds (wired) every day at work. But then I’d drop my phone and the plugs would bend, or the cable would snap, or my cat would simply chew threw it. My friend recommended I get AirPods like he had but I wasn’t about to spend $120 on what, in my opinion, were mediocre headphones that don’t even block out sound (I.E.: rubber nubs). I bought these, not expecting the sound quality to be nearly as good as they are and even with BassBooster on my iPhone there is no crackle. Outside sound is extremely muffled, which is great for when I’m operating machinery. I can hear without turning my volume all the way up too (even over the machinery)

My only issue with these (if you want to call it an issue) is that they were a bit larger than I expected. Not HUGE, but a bit bulky. Otherwise, great headphones.

title: Great customer service. They take care of you
body: A quality product and a good value. The sound quality is great. But I was going to rate the product one star because the charging case stopped charging less than two months after purchase. What changed my mind was the swift customer service response to address my concern. It’s good to know you are not ignored.

title: Great sounding Wireless Ear Buds
body: Does not sound like the earlier wireless headphones or ear buds. These sound solid with great base, mids and treble.  Could use a bit more treble; however, for the price and Wireless option, pretty amazing. I even compared next to an over ear set of Parrot headphones and JBL wired ear buds. I'd use the Tozo ear buds as a preference now and I'm not even thinking about the waterproof part...but I know it will come in handy as well.

title: Perfect for the gym
body:
This is my first pair of totally wireless earbuds for the gym. I couldn't recommend them any more highly. They've never fallen out of my ears during workouts. No more wires of any sort to get caught in a weight. And best of all the batteries have never once run out during my workouts. I can be in the gym upwards of 2.5 hours and the headphones still have plenty of battery left when I'm done.

I enjoy the charging case as well. It's great to be able to keep them charged on the go.

As for the sound, everything is clear. I'm a musician so this is big for me. The bass especially comes through without being too loud. Noise cancellation is the only thing lacking. I can often hear the gym's music blasting coming through what I'm listening to on the headphones. However it's easy to hear people ask if they can work in or how many sets I have left, so that's a big plus.

title: Great set of earbuds.
body: Great set of earbuds. At first, they didn't fit quite right but they provide a few options for the ear cups and I found one that fits really well. They stay in and they sound great. I have used a number of different buds and I really like the sound and feel of these. The bass is good....not gonna totally blow  you away...but there is plenty there...mids and trebble sound great. I enjoy listening to these.

title: Occasionally cuts out. But ok
body: I bought these to work out and jog with. Without the jangling of a corded earbud. They don't fall out easily so that's good. Sound quality is good. It does the job. My problem with these is that I can hold one in my clenched fist and they will disconnect. Sometimes when im walking with my phone in my pocket the connection cuts. But besides that they are ok.

title: Needs improvement
body:
I was really excited when i received this, the earbuds look pretty cool and the case as well but the left ear piece started to have connections issues in just a few days, I returned it and got a new pair.
CONS:
1- Once it reaches low battery which is around 20% or so it starts to beep too frequent to even be able to use it for the remaining time
2- once you pick it up one ear piece from the case it is supposed to connect to the other one but if you only want to use one lets say the right one, it will beep constantly trying to connect to the left one which is really annoying
3- if there is anything in between the earbuds and the device you are connected to it loses connection pretty easy for example: if you are listening to an audio book and tilt your head and support it with your hand in a resting position and your hand cover the ear piece it would actually cut the connection with device for a few seconds.

PROS
1- Good looking design
2- case looks well built
3- audio quality is decent
4- battery life is decent
5- the wireless charging is very convenience ( wireless charger sold separately)

title: Left Bud intermittent t
body: When I use the buds after a full night of charging the left bud cuts out intermittently. When I immediately return to chatter right bud led displays solid green while left bud flashes red. Since I have disposed of packing materials and it is a bother to return.

title: Great seller - Updated
body:
Wow, I gotta say, the seller is committed to happy customers!
I submitted the review below, and the seller reached out, asking what they could do to make me happy.  They offered to send me a different pair, so I took them up on it.  Again, to be clear, the sound in the original pair was impressive, especially for the price-point, but I was disappointed in the top volume.
Well, the new pair arrived this weekend, and rather than the same model, I was sent the Tozo T6 model.  Very similar sound, but one key difference... the T6 has an internal volume control in addition to being able to control volume from your phone (or other bluetooth device).  The net result is more volume control, and more volume.  (The carrying case/charger is a bit smaller, too).
-----
Original Review:
The build quality seems pretty good, and the sound quality is above-average.... except for the volume. My hearing is fine, and I'm comparing these against several other pairs of headphones (both wired and wireless). I do like to listen to music on the louder side now and then, and these come up short at those times. Comparing them against other wireless headphones, I would say the volume maxes out at around 2/3rds of what is typical. If you're only going to be listening to these in a quiet environment, or you never turn your volume up past half-way, then the quality of the sound and build makes these a good buy for the price.
But if you like it on the louder side, keep looking.
The seller did offer a free wireless charging pad in exchange for a high review, but I didn't need one.

title: Best Earbuds by far!
body: Amazing earbuds! The bass is absolutely flawless, the clarity of sound, basically everything. They paired incredibly easily with my phone, and I can literally walk around my entire house with my phone upstairs and still have perfect sound signal.

title: Great Sound and Easy to Pair
body: I switched to these for my workouts because my over-the-ear headphones were not great to wear in Arizona in the summer. The earbuds came with 4 sets of buds to ensure they will fit in anyone's ears. I wear them during my 4-mile walk and they never fell out. If you don't want to spend money on over-priced Apple buds, these are perfect for you. They came charged and all I had to do was pair the right earbud and both were paired.

title: Great for the price. Super bass!! d@@b
body: First off for the price you can’t go wrong. I’ve herd sound from buds that cost twice as much and the bass on these are ridiculous! The connectivity is quick and easy and they haven’t cut out or anything as of now (had them for almost I week). I use them while doing housework outside in south Florida heat and the sweat doesn’t make them wiggle out. I also longboard around the neighborhood and they stayed in. Make sure you fit the correct size gel ear piece or they will fall out. Though I have to say getting the gel piece on was a challenge, have big fingers. Call quality was great! I herd them fine, and they herd me like I was holding the phone. So all in all for less than $50 I have no complaints. They even give you an extended 1year warranty on them. Oh I forgot you can charge them wirelessly!!  Just drop it on the pad and viola!!

title: Excellent Product! Excellent Price!
body: These earbuds are amazing. Automatically pairs and comes on when you take them out of the charger. Sound quality is much better than most with low bass and nice high's.  Would recommend to all my friends and family. Simply amazing earbuds for the price. Very Satisfied!! Best earbuds I have ever owned. Would buy again and with Christmas coming they would make excellent gifts.

title: Decent
body:
These are a nice set for those with budget in mind. The sound quality is good for the price, although the bass they claim to have is very sloppy and takes away from the sound quality. The controls are terrible as they are click buttons rather than touch surfaces. You pretty much pop your ear drum if you try to press the bud button. The commands don't really make sense either (2 clicks makes your phone call back the last number you were in contact with). The comfort is pretty standard for an in-ear bud. Multiple spelling/grammar errors in the user manual makes you think you bought something fake.
Overall, my discontinued $60 Samsung Gear wireless headset from 4 years ago is still better today.
The numerous amazing reviews are pretty misleading. As someone with an ear for quality, I will be returning these and giving the Echo buds or Galaxy buds a shot at $130

title: Great headphones for the price!
body: I went out on a limb and purchased these headphones. I thought maybe they were a little too good to be true but I decided to give them a try because of all of the positive reviews. They look great and good as well. Battery life seems to be pretty good so far, especially with the extra life contained in the case. Pleasantly surprised and I’d definitely recommend these to a friend!

title: Great Quality
body: I purchased two of these units. They paired easily to the first device. The second device needed the first to be out of range or off. So they are each now paired and work well with either equally well. Charging is quick and done easily enough via cable or on a wireless charging pad. I have not been able to determine long term battery life but updated battery status is indicated in the devices Bluetooth indications. The sound quality has been great. It comes with 4 different sizes of "boots" to fit many sizes of ears. I put a larger one on the right side than the left whuch is perfect for me. I've niw done a few longer workouts abd the battery has been very good. The bass response has been great

title: Loving my TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds!
body: Just received my TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds.  I was blown away by the ease of set up, feel and sound quality.  The fact that I can use 1 at a time is brilliant.  I use these at work and need to keep one ear open while I listen to my music and field calls on the other.  My old bluetooth died and I have been shopping for a replacement.  These were the best for the value.  I am very happy with my purchase.

title: Great Quality at Affordable Price
body: I needed to get some wireless ear buds because the wired ones were getting in my way at work.  I did some research and the Tozo T10's had some good reviews and at a price between $40 and $50, I thought I would give them a try.  The battery life is good on these, they are definitely noise cancelling as I can't hear anything when I have both buds in and the sound is good quality.  Never having had true wireless, I didn't realize you had to have both buds close together or the connection gets crackly (I only keep one bud in at work because I need to hear if there is a co-worker behind me or someone asking me a question).  That took me a minute to realize but definitely not an issue.  I would highly recommend these ear buds as the quality of the build and sound are very good. Can't beat the price for the quality.

title: Earbuds hold a good charge and sound great.
body:
I mainly bought this so I can listen to podcasts and music while working. The earbuds work as intended. When you take them out of the case they turn on. You can use the left or right separately or they can link together. If you do intend to use them separately make sure you pair both of them and not just the right. They also turn off as soon as you put them back into the case. The case also holds a pretty good charge so I don’t worry about the earbuds dying.

The only downside is that the left earbuds keeps falling out of my ear. So I probably need to switch to a smaller rubber piece or it could be a problem with my ear.

title: Sounds great. Hate the case.
body: Looking for a pair of WHITE wireless earbuds. This seems to fit the bill, but while this pair sounds great, the case is just too big! No USB type C.

title: Great product for the price.
body:
This item arrived as described.  Was neatly packaged and arrived quickly. I had a few wireless earbuds and this one for the price and quality, it is on par or better than some of the earbuds I had that are same price or higher.

Sound quality is surprisingly good.  Has a nice deep bass so great for workout type of music.  If your music player have equalizer, you can tone down the bass if it becomes too much.  For me it is perfect with the punchy bass since I use it mainly for workout.

I thought the earbud would not stay.  If you follow the direction and twist it, it does stay securely.  I had to adjust a few times when it becomes loss, but that's not an issue for me.

It is super comfortable.  At times I forget I was wearing it.  Light weight and not as bulky where it'll stick out.

Overall I am satisfied with this purchase and will recommend to anyone wanting a decent pair of wireless earbuds for a reasonable price.

title: Solid product, great customer service
body: Had purchased these earbuds previously and although they sound good, the quality on the calls weren't so hot.  Customer service replace them and the new pair are much better.  Good call quality and good music.  For the price this is a great set of buds.

title: I'm all about the bass.
body: Had these for a few days now and so far they are fantastic for the price. Definitely the best sound i have ever had from earbuds. I have tried several Motorola and LG in the past and the have the best bass I've heard. Battery life is good so far and the fit with the provided adapters is spot on. Hope they hold up because right now i love them.

title: Great Quality & Sound
body: I wasn't looking to spend $200 on a pair of headphones. So I did some searching on Amazon and came across these TOZO Bluetooth wireless headphones and I am so glad I did! Pairs very easy, great noise cancelling, and fantastic sound quality. You do not have to worry about them falling out of your ear! I use them for working out, taking phone calls, and listening to music at work. Great product at great cost!

title: Finally, a good pair
body:
This is the 4th pair of earbuds I have tried.  So far, I am totally happy with thes.  The ease of setup is very important to me.  They paired with one another and then to my phone.  They are simple to use and the sound quality is very nice.

Thank you - I am enjoying these buds.

title: They fit in small ears
body: So far they’re great! They actually stay in my tiny ears. I’ve never been able to use apple earbuds because they’re too big and hard painful plastic. These stay in very well. They slip out a little bit with sweat, but I think that’s pretty unavoidable. I used them all day yesterday and the battery was still charged, and the sound quality was very good.

title: Smaller sizes please
body:
SO big and awkward looking. I bought these to work out with and just went back to my regular headphones. I'm honestly embarrassed to wear these out in public with how they stick out of my ears.

Everything else is great but if smaller sizes were available I would give 5 stars.

title: Left ear bud constantly cuts out
body: Decent sound and connectivity but the left ear bud constantly cuts out with random events:  phone in your pocket, turning your head too suddenly, etc.  Customer support for the product is lacking - they simply give you several steps to reset the ear buds and when these don't work they advise you to contact Amazon for more support.  Once you purchase the product the company begins sending you e-mails soliciting you to leave a good review in exchange for another charging case or wireless charger.

title: Even Better
body:
I upgraded from the T8. They sound better and last longer.
These also support wireless charging which is awesome. For some reason they sync up with my phone faster & better than the T8's also.

I haven't attempted to use these in the pool yet but the manual says you can use them in the pool (only not to submerge your head under water)

title: Great pair of fairly price bluetooth earbuds
body: Would definitely recommend. The sound quality is precise, especially given the price of the earbuds (with significant bass amplification for people who want that). They fit well in my ears, connect to my phone over bluetooth conveniently, and have a significant range. The charging case is also a cool feature and can fit in your pocket. Earbuds are great for working out. On top of that, customer service is very helpful as well.

title: Great set for the money amazing sound!
body: The fit is perfect and the light weight makes them stay put even when active. The sound quality is impressive. I have other high end brands and these are just as good as pairs I paid over $200 for. The case holds them really well with magnets and is sturdy as well. The case only charges them fully once and partial the second time but I can't complain. Distance is great I can be across the apartment and the Bluetooth stays connected.

title: Amazing Product
body: The earbuds were everything that I expected. The way they fit in your ear blocks out the sound around you. My main concern was going to be the quality of the sound and how loud the ear buds would get and, I was not disappointed. The sound quality was great. I use them in the gym and in the shower.

title: $100 wireless earbuds for $50
body:
I had been using Jaybirds for years and wanted to try a truly wireless pair of earbuds. The last Jaybirds I owned was the x2 so that's my comparison. I bought my Jaybirds when they were around $100.

The range is a bit further than the Jaybirds, and the sound quality is similar. I think bass is a bit lacking but I didn't really notice it after a few uses. It's very "plug and play" and does everything I expect. On the first few uses, the left side sometimes very briefly disconnects from the right. However, it still doesn't seem to be anything that interrupts my use.

I wish I could adjust the volume from the earbuds and 3 hours isn't as long as my other earbuds but otherwise, it's a great purchase for $50. It's been a week. If it lasts a year then it's fantastic. For now, I'm a very satisfied customer.

Also, the charging case is an awesome feature to upgrade to from the Jaybirds, which helps a bit for the short battery span.

title: The Best Affordable Wireless Earbuds
body: I've been using "wireless" earbuds for the last few years, and although they're more convenient than wired ones the fact that they still are connected to each other with a wire pretty much still makes them a bit "in the way." I loved the idea of the AirPods being truly wireless and having a secure storage case that charges the earbuds but I didn't like the design of the earbuds themselves or the shape Apple uses as I prefer in-ear ones. Paired with a high price tag and average sound quality I looked on here to see what true wireless earbuds were available and the Tozo T10s stood out the most. They have the in-ear style earbud, compact charging case, and are very affordable. There are many different wireless earbuds to choose from but I really like the small design of the earbuds themselves, not too long, and don't come with any wing tips that take a bit longer to line up in your ear. Also the charging case is the perfect size, not being too tall or wide, and unlike the majority of other charging cases it can be charged wirelessly and is IPX8 waterproof. The sound quality of the earbuds is very good for my needs of connecting them to my Apple TV and iPad to watch TV shows, YouTube, and music. They usually last between 3-4 hours of listening out of the case which is great and when you do put them back in the case they charge back up very quickly and you can get several recharges out of the carrying case itself before it needs recharged, which also is very fast to charge up. The best method to have the earbuds pair to each other quickly and then to your device is to remove the Right one first, and very quickly (half a second after) remove the Left. That way the right starts searching and as soon as the left one comes on it picks it up and then immediately pairs to whatever device you're using. The only two things I don't like is since the right bud pairs to the left it counts as a connected device and then you can only connect to one other device (for example an iPhone.) It seems even bluetooth 5.0 still can only connect to 2 devices at the same time but since the left earbud counts as a connected device that really only leaves you one. So if they're paired to my Apple TV (which never shuts off) then if I want to connect them to my iPad they'll auto connect to the Apple TV if they were last used on it so I have to manually disconnect them and then they'll pair to the iPad. The buds both have a clickable button but it only does Play/Pause or answers a call, and if you long press it redials the last number you called. I rarely make calls on my iPhone and even if I do I'm not going to use the earbuds with it, I only use them for music and video, so I would prefer that the button functioned as media controls. One button can control several playback features (for example, I press is play/pause, 2 presses is skip forward, and 3 presses is skip back, and since both earbuds have a button one long press on the right could be volume up and one long press on the left is volume down.) Although it's not a big deal, I think those features could make these earbuds truly perfect and hopefully they can release a newer model with those features as I'd gladly buy another pair.

title: Quality earbuds for the price point...
body:
I bought these because my old Samsung S7 is starting to get old and the headphone jack is start to wear out.

These have thumping base and loud sounds. Clarity is good. Loud though only head phones I have to turn down to 70% volume. It was made with alot of bass in mind.

I have made phone calls with it. This one was what I was worried about. But to my surprise... it was clear and my family said it was not echoy or I didnt sound muffled... The Trick to this is USED BOTH earbuds to sound crystal clear ...

Overall pretty good quality for its price point. I would purchase these again... Shoot I might even give these out for xmas presents.

title: Good alternative to high end bluetooth headphones.
body:
So far so good.  The sound quality is good.  Good bass.  Cancels outside noise pretty good too.  The design is good.  The case is nice. Wasn't sure how I was going to feel with a seemingly bulky earpiece in my ear. Once it's in, I barely notice it's in there. Plus they stay in during workouts.

When I wear corded headphones, the tend to make me ear tender. As of now I haven't had that issue with these headphones.

So far battery life has been good.  Good to have the case give you extra charges if your out as well.

Only thing I don't like is your not able to adjust volume with the earpieces.

Other than that,  I'm liking these so far.  Would recommend to anyone wanting to try bluetooth headphones but now wanting to dish out $100+.

title: Incredible Value!
body:
After continuous use the last 4 months I’ve been very impressed with this product. No it won’t win any Apple style points but it’s been dependable and easy to use across many devices.
PROS:  Easy set-up, pairing, comfortable fit, good sound quality, more than decent battery life
CONS: Charging case is a little bulky but not a big issue (mainly when you try and pocket it)  The mini USB charging port can be hard to plug into (but not a huge issue)

title: So glad I bought these!
body: I got these just yesterday, and I don’t know how I survived without wireless earbuds before now. These fit inside my ears perfectly, and the sound quality is great. They pair easily to my iPhone, and the music/podcast starts up almost immediately when I put them in my ears. They are small and inconspicuous, which I like. The wireless charging case is small, sleek, and very convenient to be able to keep around to charge the earbuds. My husband tried them on last night and now he’s going to buy a pair for himself! These are really great, especially for the cost!

title: Great Quality For The Price
body: I was told by multiple sales representatives at phone companies that the only way to go is to match my iphone with Apple Air Pods. However, i couldnt see myself paying $200 for a pair of small headphones. Tozo proved them wrong. I was a bit skeptical about the purchase. Once I received them I was satisfied with the instructions and %75 battery life out of the box. Upon testing them out for the first time in the office, the headphones worked great for business calls. Later that day i took them to the real test. THE GYM. The headphones worked great and had solid noise cancellation. one of the earbuds fell out but i replaced the earpiece with a larger one provided in the box. Havent had a problem since. I will be buying multiple sets for christmas this year. I feel like my family will enjoy them as well and it wont break the bank! I give this a five star shopping experience. Good job TOZO.

title: Good quality earbuds for a great price
body: These earbuds were a good buy. The sound quality is overall very good and the bass is exceptional for such a small footprint. You can use both earbuds or a single earbud at a time, which is super convenient in the office environment. One area that may be a concern is that the noise cancelling and even the environment noise blocking of these earbuds makes it extremely difficult to hear things around you. That is why in the office I use one earbud.  When i just want to fade away and chill that same characteristic is amazing!!

title: Wonderful Product- Great Customer Service
body: I purchased this product as an alternative to the more expensive Apple Air Pods.  I had tried several “generic” AirPods and had frequent sound quality issues, range issues, etc.  I also liked the fact that these earbuds are waterproof—though I have not had the opportunity to use them while swimming yet.  THe sound quality, charging case (which also charges wirelessly on any wireless charging mat) and earphone are excellent.  I did have a rare problem with the left earbud battery failure, but customer service was prompt and eager to solve the issue.  They come with a one year no-hassle warranty and they mean what they say.  I appreciate all the help and enjoy using these earbuds.  I recommend highly recommend the product.  I did mark down noise cancellation to 4 stars, but earbuds inherently do not have the same ability to noise cancel as over-the-ear headphones.  I have three young children, so noise cancellation can be a huge feature when I am trying to work from home.

title: Compact case perfect for everyday commuter headphones
body: These headphones are perfect for my daily casual usage on the train. They stay in well due to the multiple sized earbuds, and the microphone is actually clear for people to understand if you're on the phone. The best part is the condensed size of the case, much smaller the than other ones I saw online. Also, they look a lot better than airpods!

title: Portable, very good price, convenient and sound is terrific
body: Pairing them with my phone or my laptop was easy, very convenient to use and it works well. The sound quality is perfect with a deep sound  and they are plenty loud enough to block out noise around you, the bass is a good quality level. The unit comes with several sized ear cups, they include two sizes smaller and one size large, so after having these for a week and using them, I am very happy for what I got for the price. Overall a great purchase for me I’ve recommended them to a few of my friends. I would buy them again.

title: JUNK. Like other reviews the left speaker cuts off constantly
body: I was impressed for approximately 15 minutes. The sound was a fun sound, not great but not bad. It was easy to set up on my iPhone and my Tidal app worked flawlessly with it..until 15 minutes and the left speaker constantly  cutting out. If you turned your head..cut out..walked 5 feet from my iPhone..cut out..moved my body a couple of inches..cut out..did nothing..cut out. I knew these were to good to be true. If you read the honest reviews you’ll see this seems to be a common occurrence with these. They are solid looking but looks can be deceiving. They go back tomorrow. Junk, just junk. Don’t be fooled by the reviews like I was.

title: GOOD! YES!
body: LOVE these. Kinda expensive but good sales sometimes and worth it. Waterproof to the extent that I can shower and listen to podcasts at the same time without incident. Pretty good battery life compared to other wireless earbuds I’ve tried, doesn’t look too goofy in the ear. Love this shit. My shitty brain requires input and Knowledge at all times and I’ve always wished I could LEARN stuff or listen to audiobooks while I shower and now I CAN. I wish these headphones would pay for my water bill

title: They stand by their product!
body:
UPDATE - TOZO reached out and sent me a replacement pair that works as its supposed to. The company stands by their product, which I respect.

Original review below

They fit comfortably and they sound good—when they work. The left ear cuts in and out all the time with just regular use, such as biking, walking around the neighborhood, or at the gym. It's pretty frustrating. I've reset them multiple times, but still have trouble with the left one cutting in and out.

If I hold perfectly still, they tend to work. But I bought these to use at the gym and they don't really work for that.

title: Perfect fit!
body: I really like the sound quality that vines out of these ear buds.  But I bought them specifically for there size.  I have s lot of trouble finding ear buds that fit and stay in my ears because I have very small ears.  These for perfectly.

title: Great value great product
body:
There are so many things I liked about the earbuds. First is the fit. I have small ears and difficulty wearing headphones that are not over the ear or clip on to the ear.

I listened to two audible books without any pain. Usually if earbuds fit then they are extremely tight. Not these!

The sound quality is very good. Bass is nice too. On the lowest volume I could not hear much outside noise at all.

title: Good product
body: So far really liking there ear buds. I did have 1 fall out. Not sure if I ha e really small ears or not... didn’t think I do. But otherwise sound good and have held up well to sweat here in south while running.

title: Update.
body: When I originally bought these I returned them due to connectivity issues and thought nothing of it after I left my review. About a week later I received another pair from the vendor even though my money was refunded and I did not ask for a replacement. I’ve tested the new pair for about four weeks and have not had one issue with connectivity at all. As I suspected the original pair I received just happen to be a bad pair. I would highly recommend these buds. For the price point the sound quality is good, battery life is good and customer service is great. If you have an issue with your buds don’t do like me and just return them, reach out to the seller and they will do everything they can to resolve your issue.

title: Awesome Sound Quality But......
body: I was impressed with the quality of product and sound when I first got it.  However, the charging problem does bring frustration soon.  I thought I was not charging the unit correctly.  When I try to study the user manual, I found there's hardly any information.  The earbuds go out of  power in the afternoon even after I charged the whole night.  Later I saw other people's review, I realize it might be the connection problem.  I need to double check the connection while charging the unit to ensure the earbuds won't be out of commission at the mid-day.

title: Don't wait, you’ll be impressed and relieved
body: Small and so easy to pair with BT device. I absolutely love the self-pairing ability when adding or putting only 1 away.... you just gotta poke that bad boy in your ear with the right sized ear bud squishies

title: Product basically performs as advertised
body: Packaging is top notch.  Sound quality is clear but bass could be amped up some.  Battery life is as advertised, but keep in mind that I use only one bud for phone and do not use for music.  I do have one problem with these, and that after pairing with Galaxy S8 phone, the connection drops/connects approx., every few minutes.  This does not happen with any other BT devices used on this phone.  Have done recommended trouble shooting to no avail.  Currently waiting for response from TOZO customer service about problem.  Contacted them same time I wrote this review.  I would really hate to have to return these, as these are very nice earbuds.

title: Awesome for the price
body:
These ear buds are pretty good,
Sound quality okay, those you are talking to can hear you clearly . Was interested in purchasing other items at some point. Seller contacted me offering a free charger for earbuds still waiting to hear back. Will write review on that as well when I receive if I receive. Only had for 2 weeks but no complaints as of now. They sell other products as well

title: Crisp and Clear Sound
body: So far, I’ve really enjoyed these earbuds.  The sound is excellent and they stay put in my ears. The sound is crisp and clear and these have been perfect while working in an office so as not to disturb others while I listen to Zeppelin and Deep Purple :) My only issue is I wish the earbuds would last a bit longer on a full charge than they do.  Seems I have to recharge more often than other similar products I’ve had.  That or I listen to too much music.  Overall, a good product I would recommend.

title: Granny Loves her TOZO T10 earbuds!
body: I am a 72 year old grandmother and I dearly love my TOZO T10 earbuds.  I am Apple person from the very beginning, but when I saw my husband’s Apple wireless Airpods, I thought he looked like an alien!🤪. I have found my TOZO earbuds easy to pair to each other and to link to my iPhone and iPod.  The enclosed instructions were clear and understandable.  The wireless feature is important for me,  as I use these earbuds while I am knitting and there are no wires to to get tangled with the yarn.  I also like the wireless feature when I walk outside or am doing household chores.  I listen to my own music from Pandora, my subscription radio shows both live and in a podcast format as well as to the audio books that I listen to from the Audible App.  I do not plan on testing them them in the water, nor can I comment on noise cancellation.  I very much like the convenience of use, the portability and being able to others things while enjoying a fine listening experience at the same time.  It is of great use in my retirement years.  Nancy C.

title: Best Cheap Bluetooth Wireless Earbuds on Amazon
body:
Edit 9/27/2019: I used the earbuds for a little more than a week and one got this distorted sound and half the time wouldn't turn on. I got a replacement through amazon and used it for a little more than two weeks when the right earbud stopped charging in the charging case all together unless you held it down at the right angle. I contacted TOZO and they sent a replacement in just 2 days, however sadly on arrival the right earbud once again wouldn't charge and I was stuck with two sets of broken earbuds. I wanted to love these earbuds and i'm sure if I contacted the company they would give me another replacement as their customer service seems great. I decided however, to go with a different brand around the same price and have had no problems.

The TOZO T10 Bluetooth Wireless Earbuds are the best I've tried out of many other products at this price range. The IPX8 waterproofing, sound quality, connection, and charging case features all make these earbuds the best for me.

IPX8 Waterproofing: This was the most important feature to me, as I spend a lot of time around water and like to listen to music or podcasts while I am. Most of the wireless earbuds at this price are IPX5-7 and although this is alright, it's not good enough to not worry about water at all. With the TOZO T10's I have not worried about water once. I have used these in the shower, in the rain, and by the pool(not inside the pool) and have had no problem with a difference in sound quality while they are wet.

Sound Quality: When the product says deep bass, it means it. The bass on these earphones is very deep and sounds amazingly good with music, I believe it might be just a bit too much bass for voices on podcasts or videos but it's not enough to be a problem and I find the sound quality to be the best I've heard on a pair of wireless earphones. Surprisingly to me, even better than the Samsung Galaxy Buds I also own and they are $130 instead of $50.

Connection: The connection with these earbuds actually is within 10 seconds. Obviously it will never be as fast as plugging in a wire but the earbud first searches for the second earbud and then both connect to the device automatically after the first pairing all with sound promps to tell you when its connected. Losing connection never happens unless I go too far away from the device.

Quality of Earbuds/Charging case: The earphones last about 3-3.5 hours and the charging case gives them a couple extra charges as it should. The charging case charges very fast when it needs it. The quality of both of charging case and earbuds is fantastic, the magnets for the lid on the charging case are very strong and do their job. I have had no problems putting the earbuds into the case to charge.

Fit: The earbuds fit very well in my ears and even stay in my ears when wet in the shower or rain, I have not had a earbud fall out of my ear once even with good use. I did have to go a size up on the buds and this was easy as they provide 3 different sizes and one different color(black instead of black and red) for the buds.

Conclusion: These earbuds have 4.3 stars out of 7000 reviews for a reason, they are very good for their price and at least to me seem to have zero problems and only good features. If you want cheap wireless earbuds with great waterproofing and sound quality with no other bad features, the TOZO T10's have done everything right and you should get them, even if you feel worried about it from other brands wireless earbuds. I own the more expensive Samsung Galaxy Buds as well and the TOZO T10's win for sure.

title: TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds Review
body: The sound quality is excellent and the compactness of this Bluetooth is awesome.  There have been moments where I'm on a call, and the other person says that I sound muffled when I talk, but other than that, I love this item, and would recommend this item for purchase.

title: Amazing Sound Quality!
body: I’ve had these for a while now, and I’m honestly very happy with them! I’ve found that I have to take them out to have a conversation with people because the sound quality is just THAT good! And I even have the volume on the lowest setting! I just wished that these bad boys were a bit smaller because I have small ears as it is, and they do kind of stick out! But otherwise, I’m very very pleased with this purchase.

title: Started off great, but stopped holding a charge 2 months later.
body: Originally I was really happy with this product.  Unfortunately, the battery life is a total disappointment.  It will fully charge, but then when I go to use the product, the charge is gone.  It doesn't even last overnight when it isn't in use.

title: Great Quality for Great Price
body: Just received these TOZO T10 in the mail and WOW I was not expecting this for a $50 pair or earbuds. Right out of the box you can tell these are quality made! I love the wireless charging case with the very nice magnetic holders to keep the case nice and sealed. The pairing is very easy with very simple and easy to follow along instructions and the many options to what size ear piece is needed to best fit you is great. The sound quality now is something else! They have great sound and noise cancellation and the bass is amazing! I would recommend these to anyone if they are looking for an affordable pair of wireless bluetooth earbuds!

title: A soild 4.5 stars
body: So I when buying these I was just looking for something small enough to wear at work and works pretty well. I was really surprised to find out that these would be better then the over the ear headphones I ordered. I use these things all day every day. The bass amazed me like it punches good. Noise canceling is good but honestly I just play my music really loud. Battery life could be better but you get about 4-6 hours out of one charge and the charging is pretty quick.

title: Awesome earbuds!
body: Sound quality, noise cancelation, and ear fitting is great! The only thing about these earbuds is pairing can get confusing. JUST FOLLOW DIRECTIONS ! When you initially get them and pair them for the first time the device you are using will try and pair the buds separately, don't try and pair separate. Take both buds out and and let the right earbud pair with left earbud. This might take 30 secs. Once the the earbuds are paired  then you will only see the right earbud as a selection to pair with your device. Pair the right earbud to your device and even though your device shows only right is paired both earbuds will work.  If it fails the first time its okay. Delete the earbuds from your device and try it again. I had to attempt it twice and now they work perfect!

title: Good for working out
body: Great pair of Bluetooth earphones. They fit well in my ears and are secure yet comfortable. Great sound quality and ease of use with the automatic pairing when you take them out of the case. I sweat like crazy when I workout and have had no problems with wearing them while working out.

title: The Perfect Earbuds
body: These earbuds are amazing! I was one of those people so accustomed to wire headphones and was hesitant to switch to Bluetooth but I decided to make the jump and so happy I did! They are very comfortable, don’t fall out of your ears, and the sound quality is great. That is one of the most important things to me and these do not disappoint- they have awesome bass. I also love that they come in a compact, sleek container so they don’t get lost and are charged through there. The battery lasts a long time and the setup is very easy. Can’t say enough great things about these. I have been recommending them to everyone!!

title: Very bass heavy sound (good overall) but ergonomics are so so
body:
The sound from these, when fitted with the proper ear gels is very isolating and emphasizes the low end. This is preferred, imo, overall to headphones that are too flat in sound. When outdoors and commuting bass does not get lost and the outside world does not intrude uneccesarily. Top marks for sound quality!

Othewise, the ergonomics on these are questionable. The left and right earpieces are exactly the same shape. This means instead of "tucking in" next to your ears when they are inserted, they stick out. For me, this seems like a cost-cutting measure. This makes them more likely to fall out because they don't rest on your ear cartilage as much and, for what it's worth, look more nerdy.

This set also takes a while to auto pair with my phone after removal from the case. It goes into pairing mode automatically and takes about 15 seconds before it's ready to go. Seems too long to me. The Galaxy buds I tried take far less time. The charging case could also be a tad bit smaller.

title: BEST EARBUDS EVER!!!!
body: I am also one of those people that doesn’t like the apple AirPods and was looking at different products. And then I came across this and saw the reviews and decided to go for it. Not only does this product blow away the apple stuff, and it’s a much better price. The quality is excellent! Fits in my perfectly and totally drains out noise. The bass response is also incredible which I was not expecting for this price. I can literally tune out the world watching my favorite show or movie. And the sound is amazing! I am so happy with these wireless earbuds and the price awesome! If you’re looking for a replacement for the apple stuff this not only the best choice, but the only one!!!!

title: worked once
body: The first time i got it, it worked great... the second, third, forth and so on times i tried to get it to freaking pair to itself or my phone. It would no work. I tried to "reset" as they had it written. Nothing. Once in a blue moon i got only one of the headphones to work but then it stopped. Im so fed up playing with it for 15mins and for it to not work.

title: Sound and design great but battery life and size are not.
body:
Sounds great and love the design... but they don’t stay in my ears and the battery last barely 3 hours.
 I liked being able to have the charging case but it no longer charges even though it says it’s fully charged.

title: Disappointed
body: They don’t stay in my ears very well, they fall out easily. That makes me fear I might lose one. I’ve had them for 3weeks. They were great at first, but lately the sound is jumping from lt to rt ear, which is frustrating when trying to listen to something with them!

title: Impressed
body: I had a pair of apple air pods and lost one. I didn’t want to pay 150$ for another pair , so I found these on amazon. They arrived much quicker than predicted.  They connected to blue tooth quickly. Sound quality is clearer than my old air pods which had no noise cancellation.  Very comfortable, maybe slightly loose, but fit better than air pods

title: Great gift!
body: My husband is a headphone snob & so we go through ALOT of different devices & gadgets for him. These are a winner in his book! He wears them when he mows the lawn & the noise cancellation is awesome!!! 👌🏻👌🏻👌🏻

title: Very nice!
body: I love these ear buds. I had a hard time getting them paired with my phone but after a few tries I did the hard reset (held button on both buds until purple light flashed 3x). They paired with ease after that. I like that they come with different sizes because I switched to the smaller bud covers. Still getting use to putting them in for a snug fit so they don't fall out but sound quality is great. I even answered a call without difficulty and they didn't complain about not being able to hear me. The only thing I didn't like was the sound switched from ear to ear when the other person talked at times. I like that it comes with the charging/storage case. Love these and can't wait to take them on my trip. Highly recommend these.

title: Best Buds I've had in awhile
body: I love these earbuds. I've tried several ear buds over time and I've found that most are lacking in some major way. These are the exception. I've only used these buds a few times so far, but I find I love the super deep bass and the fit of the buds. Changing the rubber tips to a smaller size to fit my ears was easy. The sounds for this price range is exceptional and well worth the monies. Thinking very seriously about buying another pair for my wife. She tried them and loved them as well.

title: Best Headphones I've gotten to date
body:
At first I was a bit skeptical buying headphones like these, because just dropping one side of it and losing it was a fear of mine, and would certainly warrant a lot of "F's" in the chat.

After getting these though, the sound quality, how comfortable it fits in my ears, and the battery life on the headphones themselves, and then there's the price: I'm just gonna say that these are worth the purchase, and I have a feeling these will last me quite a while. I've also gathered (from reading other reviews) that the customer reviews are pretty solid in their own right, so that took care of my earlier concern.

So, if you're considering it, my advice is, as a famous guy once said, "JUST DO IT".

title: great sound
body: these are excellent for music, the reception for calls lacks some, hard for the caller to hear you.....needs a better mic.

title: WoW
body: I was skeptical at first having delt with some lemons in the past but as soon as I removed the buds from the dock they paired. Connected them to my iPhone with no hassle. Picked my favorite Volbeat song and bam! The difference was night and day to the ones I've been using for the past 3 years. The volume a tad lower than my older ones which concerns me a bit but won't know till Monday how they hold up at the factory where I work but so far I'm digging them. My old ones last 2 hrs at full volume so I'm hoping I get simular battery life as that's a deal breaker for me. I have two that I alternate between breaks but if this charging box holds true it will be a blessing as I only intend to use one bud per 2 hrs. Love the look, seem quality, sound good so fingers crossed they work out for my purpose.

title: Great headphones!
body: Great product. I like that they are Waterproof and that can be Used one or both and while they are labeled right and left put them in whichever ear you want as they are the same shape. Wireless charging is quiet convenient as I already wirelessly charge my phone and can now just use the same pad to charge the case which charges the headphones. So far I am very much enjoying them and look forward to much more use!Only issue I’ve had is that it  Sometimes disconnects but quickly reconnects.

title: Great sound, super comfortable and sweat proof!
body: I got these to replace MPow Flame earbuds.  Sound quality is great - I'm really pleased given the price point - deep, full sound with excellent bass for podcasts and rock/pop.  Battery life is around 4 hours...but even when I listen for long periods of time, I usually take short brakes,and by placing the buds back in the case they charge quickly without having to plug the case in, which is very convenient and helps extend battery life.  Workouts and sweat proofing - I sweat a lot.  I've historically used buds with ear hooks so that they stay in place during workouts, but the cord was always annoying as it tended to pull on one of the buds.  After several weeks, these have been great against resisting sweat.  The only thing that I would improve upon would be to include the large foam ear tips (see photo) with the earbuds.  For my ears, even with the largest of the rubber tips, the earbuds tended to fall out when my ears were sweaty, which is similar to my experience with other earbuds.  Once I swapped to the foam tips, I got a better seal that no longer falls out when at maximum sweat.  If you are looking for earbuds for running/workouts, these are the way to go!

title: You get what you pay for
body: The quality of sound on these buds is actually very impressive. After my beats wireless buds went bad I decided to get a cheaper set and these outperform the Beats earbuds on sound quality as well as volume. The major problem with these buds is the battery life. The description says you can get up to 7 hours of life on these things, but I have personally never gotten any more than 3 hours of life out of them. Also, the charger only charges them about two times on a full charge. Definitely disappointed, but I guess you get what you pay for.

title: Excellent sound quality!
body: I use headphones to work out and hike 3-4 times a week, and I have 40% hearing loss in both ears.  So I’m sensitive to sound quality as it greatly improves my experience when listening to music.  Often as I turn the sound up to listen easily, poor sound quality becomes very apparent. These earbuds fit comfortably and securely and provide great sound.  Especially for the price!  I was using BeatsX headphones before and these are much better (and MUCH less expensive).  I like the waterproof aspect as well.  I was hiking recently and got caught in the rain, and I didn’t have to worry.  Well I did worry, but they had no problems.  So, now I can relax.

title: Great Sound at a Great Price
body: I'm a work out junkie and I bought these headphones for the gym.  They feel great once I settled on the right ear piece and the sound is phenomenal the range is a bit short but for the most part I can leave my phone in my gym bag and still hear the my music.  Overall I would recommend these every bit as good as the competition but so much lower in price.

title: Not as reviews described... Really disappointed
body: Not impressed, I stream music all day at work. The battery barely lasted 3 hours. I prefer to wear only one ear bud because I'm at work and need to hear others as I'm needed. The right one called the master lost battery life and can't use the left without the right unless the right isn't in the charging case. The left is called the slave by the way which really didn't sit right with me at all. Also barely even able to leave my office and the earbuds disconnect. I'm extremely disappointed in this purchase and will be returning them. Not sure where all the good reviews came from '_cause that wasn't my experience. Gonna be even more disappointed if I will be charged return shipping from my refund

title: Great Value and Functionality
body: I just needed some wireless buds for the gym but didn't want to be break the bank. The TOZO T10 have been a surprise in all regards. Out of box pairing is  easy, the buds fit quite snugly (YMMV, though they offer multiple size tips) and provide decent noise cancellation. I'm no audiophile but the buds also have surprisingly powerful bass drivers and pretty good overall sound. I am looking forward to putting the buds through their paces, haven't really tested the waterproof abilities, but light sweating has been no issue. The charge case and quick charge abilities make them perfect for short stints like trips to the gym or hikes. Also comes with 1 year manufacturer's warranty.

title: Excellent Earbuds in both performance and value
body: I picked up a pair of these wireless earbuds as my 2nd dip into the crowded pool of wireless earbuds.  I previously used another brands wireless earphones, the kind with the cable between the two earbuds, and then bluetooth to the phone.  They worked great for almost 2 years, and only recently started to not hold a charge anymore.  I think i paid $20 for them on a Lightning deal, so i call that a win.  So when it came time to buy a replacement, i started doing some research online.  I landed on another brands earbuds, one could say maybe a more well known brand.  I bought them direct from the brands site.  When i received them all seemed great, good fit and finish, but when i started using them in the gym they kept dropping connection from the left and right earbud.  I followed all the instructions from there help forums and all that, no luck.  So after many resets, re pairs, and firmware updates i gave up and sent them back.  As soon as i did that i did some more digging and came across these TOZO earbuds.  First off, i had no idea who TOZO was, as there seems to be a million companies making similar earbuds, with all sorts of claims.  But, i was in need of some earbuds, and the price was good, and the reviews looked solid.  So i ordered them up, knowing if they did not work, i could just return them via Amazon.  Well, to my surprise, they work amazing.  They worked right out of the box, super easy pairing, build quality seems great for the price.  Sound quality is actually really good.  I can not really comment on battery life, but they have not needed to be charged in over a weeks of daily use, but that is also the case charging them.  These little guys are a great value, you are not paying for a name and marketing.  Give them a shot, i am pretty sure you will like them, and if you don't, return them and find one that does .

title: Easy to use and stay put In your ears
body: These are easily the most comfortable and easy to use earbuds I've ever owned. They twist to fit in your ear, so they stay put while running or jumping. The seller is responsive and easy to work with. Thanks to Tozo, I don't have to buy expensive phone brand wireless earbuds that don't stay put during my workout!

title: Well worth it
body: Sound quality is great, fits relatively well in my ear hoodies will eventually knock out the headphones. Haven't tested headphones in water but have worn in a rainstorm still work well. A bit wierd when only trying to use only one headphone must wait till search for is done to stop beeping. All in all for the month plus that i have been using the Tozo T10 worth every penny

title: Wireless charging is why I got these
body: These are great headphones.  What I've noticed is that while in their charge case, not being used, if the battery level of the case falls below a level that will charge the buds, they will connect to your paired BT device without being removed from the case.  You wouldn't notice this unless your were looking at your phone to see the headphone symbol appear in the status bar.  You might notice if you were listening to an audio source but if you didn't, the headphone batteries would drain to zero.  So you must be mindful of the case charge level as well as the bud charge to get the most out of these.  I will say that TOZO the company has been great when I've not been completely satisfied with one of their products and replaced it or refunded my purchase price at my option.  I love the wireless charge case, I don't like how these buds will connect without being removed from the case.

title: Great buy!!!
body:
Love the bass on these.  Bass is certainly important according to my teenage son who doesnt know I got these for a good deal....hes one of those teens who thinks name brand is always best..lol. yes true to some extent  but for these.  Wow. Extremely happy with sound quality and the way it looks too.

Try these out...we are definitely happy with purchase.

title: Not for me, at least.
body:
Doesn't fit well in my ear at all. I've tried all of the different rubber inserts, but none of them fit well. Not only that, its very uncomfortable, even hurts at times. Once I place them in, they just start sliding out immediately. To fix this, I have to really jam them into my ear, twisting them in. Just not happy with it.

Sound quality seems fine, but leaving it in my ears for more than a few minutes becomes really uncomfortable and taking them out is not relieving. It's very jarring taking them out. Also, the buttons on the side are incredibly difficult to press, a serious pain. Not a fan.

title: Happy with these earbuds.
body: Was pleasantly surprised to find these earbuds. They work well and thankfully had the right size ear adapters so they are snug but not uncomfortable for any length of time.

title: Left ear has no sound
body: I've had these ear buds 6 weeks and I loved them at first.  I'm now having issues with the left earbud where there is no sound at all.  It is not connecting via bluetooth to my iphone.  I am already having to contact the company about this technical issue.  I would not expect to have issues so soon.

title: Loving my Tozos !!
body: Ive had them not quite a full week yet. They take a little getting used to. I find that I want to readjust them in my ears often but I think that comes from me being afraid of them falling out... They never do, I'm just anxious. I think sound cancellation may depend on your ear hole size and shape. There have been instances where I thought the noise cancellation was awful but I think it was just douchebags being loud at the gym and not so much the earbuds themselves - maybe a little bit tho. So far I love them. They are quite useful in the gym - weight lifting, yoga, handstanding, running, dancing, all of that! They never fall out. They stay out of my way which is exactly what I wanted. I was using an LG Tone neck band before and it just got annoying. I think they're definitely worth the money and they come with a 1 year warranty! also the hands free call aspect is wonderrrrfulllll. over all I love this product.

title: Amazing!!
body:
Update 10/25/19: the one problem I have which I dont mind for the cost. Is that sometime it turns on while in the case and pairs up with my phone when I dont need it.

The best bluetooth for great price! I love it I has to YouTube the instructions on how to used them. Also if you plan to use one of them it is best to use the right one since it is the dominant one. I would highly recommend it to anyone even family and friends for the price I am definitely happy with these bluetooth buds.  You can answer calls on the as well.

title: Color Me Impressed
body: Ok I have been looking for weeks on Amazon for a good pair of affordable True Wireless Earbuds and originally had purchased the Sandoo Earbuds. When the Sandoo earbuds came in I was so excited, but that excited lasted about half a day because the ear buds would cut in and out if you even thought of touching them and they sounded terrible as well. The Sandoo earbuds were $10 less than the Tozo Earbuds, but they were recommended by Amazon so I decided why not buy them to have one more shot at finding a good pair of true wireless earbuds before I gave up. The Tozo earbuds showed up at my house and I couldn't wait to open them up to see if they actually worked as advertised and omg WOW WOW WOW!!! They most certainly do what they promised and sound amazing. From the packaging to the actual product itself I am literally amazed. I mean only Apple has a system like that where the packaging is just as nice as the product and Tozo you are knocking things out of the park. How do Apple Earpods cost so much when the Tozo earbuds sounds just brilliant. The bass is awesome, the mods are awesome and the highs are awesome and not to mention I use these while working out in my garden and then come inside and jump right into the shower with the ear buds still on never missing a beat. I will recommend your products to anyone I know looking for things that y'all sell. Thank you so much for making this skeptical man a happy man.

title: Great Earbuds
body: I bought the Tozo earbuds last November and wanted to use them a while before writing a review. They are great!! The charging case does a really good job and the buds seem to hold their charge for a long time -- I've used them continuously as long as 3+ hours and they were still working. Although the range from the iPhone or computer is limited, the sound is very clear.

title: Love my new TOZO earbuds
body: I love my new TOZO earbuds.  The sounds quality is a lot better than I expected.  I had some Bluetooth wireless headphones which were fine but the cord was distracting during my workouts.  These earbuds are great for the gym and working out and the battery life has been great.  Just put the ear buds in the case and they stay charged up.

title: I love these earbuds!
body: I am able to wear these buds in the pool. If I leave my phone on the side of the pool and swim to the other side the earbuds stay connected. This is great for swimming laps. My only complaint is that the rubber cushions are a little too big. I need smaller ones. They stay in my ears but, are a little loose. The sound quality is fantastic. A great deal!

title: Excellent value and high quality!!!
body:
Item is as described.  Once I found the correct earpiece that fit I was off and running.  I have not had these loosen up at all, much less fall out.  The sound is extremely good quality and has more bass than I expected.  I have swam with these, long bike rides on trails and used with the phone, all of which worked perfectly.
These are well worth the money and better than the high priced ear buds I’ve tried in the past.

title: Great product!!!
body: Product works well. Easily paired and so very convenient to use. I love the ability to use one earbud while leaving the other in the case. Allows me to have a conversation while being able to listen to music. Even with all of these features, the best was the customer support and follow up from the company. It's been a long time since I've had a company that I actually felt cared about my experience. Will buy many products from them in the future.

title: Great product with some flaws
body:
So these things are great and all, but there’s pros and cons to everything.

Pros: - it sounds great
- they connect easily to iPhones
- they charge fast
- they fit in my ears well

Cons: - sometimes the sound cuts out
- intense workouts can cause them to wiggle out

I had to return them to have them replaced to have the left ear bud stop cutting out, but it didn’t really stop. Might just have to deal with it. Other than that, it’s a great product and I love it.

title: Better product than I anticipated.
body:
I ordered two different styles of headphones to test Knowing I would be shipping the losing sets back to Amazon.  Not only did I keep these but I had to get an additional set for my wife.  You could spend 3 times the amount and not get half the features.  I hope that they hold up I have only owned them 3 weeks.

Volume up and down,  Thinner modules,  and get rid of the annoying beep when only using 1 earpiece would make these perfect.

title: Great battery life and sound
body:
Update: I’ve had these for a month or two and while my original review is the same, I have experienced the earbuds cutting out when using them when I’m walking. This is an issue that’s been mentioned by other reviewers, too, so it seems it’s pretty common.

These have been excellent so far. My previous (different brand) had been was a pain to connect and pair but I didn’t realize that wasn’t normal until I used these. These are super easy to use, have great sound and do well blocking most noise. They fit comfortably and hold a charge a really long time. So far, I’m loving them.

title: A nice upgrade from the T8
body: I had been using the TOZO T8 earbuds, but the right earbud died on me within 2 months. I asked about a warranty and they said they would give me a discount on the new T10 model, so I took them up on their offer, and so far so good. The T10 are a bit better designed, and the sound quality is a little better (not perfect, but still great value for the price), and the charging case has LED indicators for its battery. Hope these new ones don't die on me, and if not they're great!

title: Good quality, and not too expensive.
body: I just got these yesterday and I love them already. I've been using wired headphones all my life, but they always get in the way. So I thought I'd try some wireless ones. The sound is really good, and ear buds don't fall out! I was worried about that, but since they also give you different size gummies you can find ones that fit you. I also thought the ear bud would look to big on my ear, but it doesn't look too bad. It does say that the battery life is about 3 hours, but the charging case can charge your earbuds 4x.

title: Great Workout Earbuds
body: I've only had the Tozo Earbuds for a week, but so far, they work great! I bought them primarily for working out and because they are the most water resistant and sweatproof earbuds available. Quality is great, sound quality is good, and is is easy to find the perfect fit with the additional attachments.

title: Great customer service!!  A++
body: The customer service from the Tozo was fantastic. I received my earbuds and was disappointed when the right earbud would not power on. However, I contacted the customer service from the manufacturer and told them what was going on. They walked me through the steps to reset the earbuds and it still did not work.  At this point, the company promptly sent me a replacement pair of earbuds at no cost to me!!  I would highly recommend the company based on my interactions with them.

title: The best wireless earbuds I own so far
body:
I tested the earbuds more than a week. This is my best wireless earbud so far.

Compared with another wireless earbud I previous used, TaoTronics TT-BH026 https://amzn.com/gp/product/B074QKS8RK, TOZO T10 outperforms on the Bluetooth link speed, and the battery life.

TOZO T10 usually took less than 2 seconds to get connected to my devices. And last times I used it for 4 hours, the battery life still had 70%.

One pitfall I found is that the earbud will not turn off automatically when putting back to the charging case. I have to manually turned it off by holding the button for few seconds.

If the next model would have a USB Type-C charging port, that would be ready great.

title: No likely...I would get headaches every time I used them.
body: These were ok.  I had some issues initially connecting and the sound would go from mono to stereo a few times but the biggest issue was that every time I used these I would get a headache so it freaked me out.

title: Finally stay in my ear and no bruising
body: Awesome... I have purchased alot of earbuds and thrown alot away.  I'm part of the group that earbuds were NOT designed for. I get bruising in my ear from shoving them in as far as I can so they don't pop out. Then they still come out from me sweating. Not anymore... After I put on the right size caps for my little ears, I tried shaking my head but they stayed inplace. Ran 3 miles on thetreadmill this morning and all I heard was my music and no gym chatter.  The rating is well worth it. Plus a free extended warranty card come in the box.  We will definitely be buying more for other members of the family.

title: Absolute garbage
body: I'm really not sure how these earbuds managed to acquire a four star rating. The sound quality is mediocre at best. The soundstage is flat and sounds like you are under water. The bass it definitely lacking in these, as well. Trying to get them to connect to my LG V30 is a chore. I have to manually attempt to get them to connect each time I take them out of the case. This process usually takes about a minute or two before both earpods are actually connected. Usually only one connects and I have to press the power button on the second eaerbud and hope it connects. Starting today the right earbud is failing to stay connected so I'm only getting audio out of the last earbud. Needless to say these are pretty worthless. I paid $28 for these which was way too much. There are way better alternatives out there from major name brands in the $50 range! Please save your money and headache and go check out the alternatives. You've been warned!

title: This headphones are REALLY GOOD
body: This product is amazing. I have used airpods and samsung wireless headphones, and these match up to them, or even exceed them. For such a low price, I don't see why anyone wouldn't buy these. Not to mention, their customer support is phenomenal!

title: Great value and sound quality. Waterproofing is nice.
body: Didn't wanna shell out a ton of money for air pods so I went with these based on reviews and I'm impressed so far. Audio quality is just as good if not better than my wired and bluetooth headphones. Haven't had them drop out of my ear and they cancel outside noise quite well. They come in a neat, compact, magnetized case that also acts as a charger. I really love that I can shower in them! They didn't malfunction or anything after a 15 minute shower including shampoo.

title: Not good for swimming!
body: I bought these to wear while swimming. They work in pool but only if you're above the water.  As soon as your head is covered even slightly you lose connection.  And they don't fit well in ear even with the smallest fitting. When swimming my arm hits the earbud and it pops out. But I think the most frustrating thing is I have to re-pair it every time I use it. It doesn't automatically connect like all my other ones. The last thing is the battery doesn't last. I have to charge them every time before I use them. So, they're fine if you are lounging in the water, just don't go below it.

title: Fast connect and go!
body:
This is an excellent product. Sound Quality is great, It is very speedy turn on and connect up. I work construction so it is very nice to have it cancel out noise, and also played podcasting Without background noise leaking through.

Would certainly recommend this product. It is worth the money.

title: Sound Quality plus Bass are fantastic!
body: I just got these and the Bluetooth 5.0 is great because it pairs automatically. The sound is deep and I can get lost in my music on a plane with screaming kids (and some screaming adults too). I looked around and tried many including name brand ones, but even if I paid $300, the sound can't be beaten.  Even better if you buy some foam tips to lock in the music and lock out the noise!!

title: Awesome Product
body:
I have always been skeptical about using wireless earbuds but these earbuds totally changed my mind. In the past I have use earbuds where the sound quality was bad or would even lose signal despite the phone and earbud being close to one another. I have also had ear buds where the mic did not pick up my voice well. All of these concerns were resolved with the TOZO T10. I have had the ear buds for about one week since the writing of this review and I have nothing to say but praise so I will just mention points that are important to me.

First, the sound quality is very good. I use the earbuds for music and calls and the sound has always been clear. The earbuds also produce a surprising amount of bass which I would say is comparable to what you would get from wired ear buds/phones. I also like that you have the option of using one or both wireless ear buds and the sound quality does not suffer.

Second, the mic picks up my voice very well. In fact, people that I have called had said they even hear my background noise.
