Lastly, the batter life is surprisingly good. There was a day where i used the earbuds non-stop for about 4 hours straight for music before I got the warning that the battery was low. Afterwards, I put the buds in the charging case and they re-charged very quickly.

If I really had to complain though... it would be that the earbuds are really good at blocking out noise. In the box, there are additional ear pieces so you can select the size that best fits you and the one I selected fitted me very well to the point where I almost missed the train because I barely heard it pull up.

All in all, I think TOZO made a very good product and I will most likely recommend or even gift a set of these ear buds to a friend.

title: Great Value and sound!
body: I was absolutely amazed by the sound quality of these wireless Bluetooth earbuds. Blows away Apple in comfort and sounds. All for under $ 50 and they are waterproof and have long battery life. Highly recommended. Great value.

title: Love me some Tozo T10
body: I chose the grays, and I'm in love.  For me I love to listen to some music while I'm at work, riding my bike on the beach or just cleaning around the house, Mega love the sound quality. I'm mesmerized, with just the press of the right side of the Tozo T10 earbud I can answer calls (call quality is awesome), pause my music and resume and for me, this is priceless.  I love the easiness to pair with my phone and the wireless charge box aspect, it really sets it apart from other brands, The case the earbuds stay in is genius! Not only does it keep them safe but it charges them too! Simply charge up the case using the USB cable and then the case can charge your earbuds on the go, which is amazing for traveling! Overall, I'm so happy that I chose the Tozo's with the sound quality, the battery life, and general looks, you can't go wrong, You can thank me later!

title: Excellent sound/nice fit
body:
Sound quality and fit are excellent.

Nice compact design and charging case is not to wonky.  Longer charge life would be helpful as they lasted about 3.5 hours on the plane but that is what is stated in the product specifications.

I took a couple of phone calls on it and the voice was very clear on my end and people could hear me clearly on the receiving.  That was a plus as I wasn't planning on using them for phone calls but it would appear that I can with confidence.  I have not tested yet to see how they perform at places like airports where background noise is significant

title: Wireless charging doesn’t charge. Microphone picks up a lot of background noise.
body:
Wireless charging doesn’t actually work at all. The lights go on but nothing actually happens beyond that. I’ve been told that they pick up background noise when in phone calls.

If just using them as headphones they’re pretty good. For $50 the wireless charging was like a bonus to me so I wasn’t entirely butthurt about it not working, inconvenient mostly since I almost exclusively use wireless charging for my phone it would have been nice to be able to charge my headphones wirelessly too (you know... like they were advertised)

The left headphone doesn’t work without the right. So if you’re in a situation where you just want to use one of them it always has to be the right one.

title: Not great, not terrible
body:
ORIGINAL: I was excited for these earbuds since most of the reviews were 4-5 stars, however my pair had a very loud static sound when playing music (to their credit they were perfectly silent when no music was playing). This sound persisted after resetting the earbuds (suggested as a static fix in the manual). I've owned cheaper earbuds which had no static, so I'm reasonably sure it isn't a problem with my device. Hopefully this was just a defective set and can either be fixed or replaced.

EDIT: I returned my original pair for a replacement; While the static is less pronounced on the new pair, it is still more present than it was on cheaper pairs, so these aren't great for quiet music.
They have good bass reproduction, but suffer when producing high notes. If all you listen to is house music, these will work perfectly, but most other things might sound off.
The charging case works well, and pairing was hassle free.
I give them 3.6 stars. Not great, not terrible.

title: Great priced buds with great sound quality
body:
I haven't had these earbuds for long but they already seem like they're more than worth the money. I compared several wireless earbuds after getting annoyed with my old wireless pair while running. These were offered at a more competitive price than other wireless buds recommended for runners (most of those around 150) and also offered a high degree of waterproof which I liked because I sweat a lot.

The case they come in has this neat magnetic attachment when you go to put the buds in and doubles as a charger since you can hook up a usb cable to the back. Blue LED lights give you charge info and when you take them out of the case, you can easily pair them. There's an included instruction manual that makes that a breeze too.

The buds themselves seem sturdy and of good quality. I was a little concerned with fit because I've had trouble before but as with some other buds offered these days, these also include several different size attachments for fitting different ears. The standard pair actually fit quite well so I didn't even need to swap which is nice. The amount of noise these block from the outside when wearing them is pretty impressive too.

Now, the sound quality - the important stuff right? The first time I paired them and started listening to a game grumps podcast/Q&A... Wow - sounded crystal clear with no static or interference at all. I even went into another room and still no problems.

I can't say much about long term reliability and testing but my initial impression was very positive and I'd say I recommend these if you're looking for competitively priced wireless buds with waterproof qualities 👍

title: Meh...requires some physical improvement and connectivity
body: Just got the pair yesterday, tried them on doing great. It is well balance for its price. After the next day of use, right side ear piece started having issues. It’s out of sync with each other, and the right has volume issues compared to the left. Read the manual that piece should only connect to the device, and didn’t matter whether I connected to the LH or RH piece. Tried connecting both at the same time didn’t help either. Next, the charger cover is too difficult to remove. Also the charging port cover is held in pretty tight to keep water or dirt out which is nice. However, the tab used to help open the cover is too small, when trying to open the cover its strain the tab to the point of tearing it. Opening the cover is difficult, due to the small tab, tried my best to carefully not strain the tab of the cover.  Which, as predicted the tab did tear due to the strain. It would be nice if there was a better way to open cover. Finally, position of the buds is always a concern, when the position is wrong, the bud won’t play any. As a result I returned them.

title: Not Too Happy
body: I’m training for a marathon.  I can successfully say after running with this product, I was more happy with my 19 dollar Bluetooth headphones.  It’s fine for going out for every day use but it doesn’t have a long battery charge and if I was to run into another runner by accident, I run the risk of losing my headphones.  Sound quality is about the only thing it was really good for.

title: Excellent product at a great price
body: So far love this product. When using while riding my motorcycle completely cancels all noise out when I want to. Extremely comfortable and lightweight. Can not recommend this product enough. Save your money and buy these. In my opinion just as good if not better than the more expensive products out there.

title: An all around upgrade in comfort and sound quality
body: I will never understand for the life of me why someone would pay so much for other wireless earbuds when we live in a world where these exist at the price they do. I enjoyed my previous version of PeohZarr wireless earbuds so much, I decided to give these a try and give my daughter my pair (since her $200 pair of Apple earbuds recently died). Man, these are a step up in every way possible, and for only $10 more than what I had paid for my original pair. I never thought I would want or need a waterproof pair of headphones, but I am honestly excited to try them out in the shower. The sound is richer, and believe it or not, they are actually more snug as well (which I didn't think was possible). On top over all of that, I think they are far more attractive than the longer earbuds that drape down the side of your face. Kudos the people behind this product, as it checks off every box for me. I won't hesitate to make these stuffing stockers this coming Christmas for all my friends and loved ones.

title: If the value doesn't pull you in, their customer service is phenomenal
body:
I've owned a variety of wired and wireless headsets/earbuds and these are my new favorite.  For the price, you can't beat it for sound quality and functionality.  I mainly bought these for my workout and they fit comfortably snug.

Note: I initially had an issue with the left bud cutting in/out randomly.  I reached out to TOZO customer service and they were great.  I was taken cared of right away.  Thank you!

title: Listen to the Younguns...
body:
This is my first ear buds, I was concerned they would not be comfortable, plug my ears, most any excuse an old man could come up with. Since my grandchildren have earbuds, they convinced me to get a pair for a trip we were making to use with my phone and tablet when I wasn't driving.  Turns out they are comfortable, and have a great sound, and I've started using them with my desktop also!

Bottom line great sound, at a great price point.

title: Wonderful Sound & Comfortable
body: As a pair of 'True Wireless' ear buds these have exceeded my expectations.  They have wonderful sound and great comfort.  The various size of ear cups provided allow for a precise fit to my ear.  I've worn them doing yard work and with a trimmer /mower running the noise cancellation was great.  They never felt like they were going to fall out as I have had other earbuds do.

title: Let me explain...
body:
I decided to give it a week before posting this review -

So I'll start with the pros: great with noise cancellation, bass, and battery life.
Cons:
So far I've had issues with connecting the headphones via Bluetooth on my phone - it would come in and out, even though the phone is within a few inches away from the headphones. This happened when I was walking in the streets of San Francisco though, so maybe the towers nearby threw it off (giving benefit of the doubt).

I really dislike how this company sent me an email offering a free wireless charger if I gave a 5 star review - don't do that to your customers, it's dishonest and a cheap move.

Overall, I don't think they're worth 50 bucks - shop around for a better deal.

title: Left earbud is not working at all.
body: I just received the wireless earbuds in the mail today.  I was hoping they would be great.  Instead I a seriously disappointed.  The left earbud is not functioning.  The right one is fine and it paired easily with my iPhone and Apple Watch.  The left one does not even light up.  It is definitely malfunctioning.  I should have paid the money and bought a reliable Apple product.

title: they cut out
body: sound is not that great, turn your head left or right they cut out even with phone in shirt pocket ,they don't fit that great left one fell out while mowing could not find it ,got junk now.

title: Pretty friggin' good earbuds. Especially for the price!
body:
So far these have been a nice surprise.  The bass is full though the mids and highs are slightly muddy... but maybe im just getting old?  I've never been a fan of earbuds as they always seem to either make my ear holes sore and/ or one or both constantly pop out of my head....
Not so with these! So far these fit nice and snug (annoying without sound as they act like ear plugs the sound of breathing fills my head) and they keep all the noise you don't want out while the sound stays inside your head where it should be. Not too shabby at all!

title: Tozo earphones are amazing!!
body: You will love everything about this product, it comes with multiple earbud sizes for all types of ears, a charging dock that can charge up other devices and an amazing sound system. I usually don’t care for most material things but this product has impacted my life so substantially that I had to do a review. I can sync one earbud to one device and sync the other to another phone simultaneously and it allows me to get more things done in a quicker amount of time. For only $50, this is the best product you can buy by far from any others, thank you!!

title: Don't buy this product
body:
The first one of these had an intermittent problem of the left earbud momentarily losing Bluetooth connection.  This lasted a fraction of a second; on average, about 3-4 times per song.  It kind of killed the music experience.  Amazon sent me a replacement; but the left earbud on the replacement lost Bluetooth connection for several seconds at a time, which was totally unacceptable regardless of how many times it occurred per song.

Other than that, the case is really cool looking and is very functional.  It will recharge the earbuds about 3 times.  The user instructions are - as typical - not very good; but they at least give you the general idea of how to set it up and achieve Bluetooth pairing.  After that, it's just a matter of persistence in making it work.

HOWEVER, the fact that the left earbud loses Bluetooth connection in 2 out of 2 units suggests (to me at least) that there is a basic design flaw, which makes this product unacceptable.

title: Not that great in my opinion
body:
They sound great but I have constant issues with connecting both sides. Either one will connect and other will give me issues and is a headache to change connection to another device. Also doesnt fit very well in ear. I've tried each size gel but does not stay on during a workout. Battery life is also not the greatest.
I guess I should've known I'd run into issues paying 50, but honestly they're more annoying then anything to deal with so I want to return.

title: Heads phones good, customer service even better!
body:
So I have had these headphones for about three months. Due to a manufacturing defect, the right headphone has died.
With that said prior to that, the sound quality has been great and battery life excellent. I usually get through most of my work shift and then some with out any problem listening to music or audio books. For their size sound range is great and base comes through well considering their size. As for the noice cancelation, it’s not the best on the market, but in terms of their size they do an adequate job and block most noise. By the time your playing anything most noice is cut out. Load noises  do come through, like with the lawn mower, but it’s definitely better then just plain headphones.
 Now the reason I write this review has been customer service. They have been amazing and have been very supportive of their product. I have no complaints about their customer service so far. Will give an update on the review in three months time on the new headphones.

title: Comfortable, convenient, functional!
body: These earbuds are like a dream come true. I love the design -- they look really cool and subtle, compared to my last pair which made me look like I was wearing hearing aids. They are comfortable and the sound quality is great. I used them while working out and they didn't fall out of my ears. The charging case is super handy and you can charge the earbuds while also charging the charging case. I haven't encountered any issue with these at all, and I only wish I bought them sooner!

title: Absolutely the best I’ve had!
body:
I bought this here and was a bit worried it won’t work right coz i got it for a really good price. But when I got it, it was packaged so nicely. Took it off the box and voila! — ready to use! Followed the instructions on how to connect to phone and it was so easy! The sound is superb!

My husband borrowed it once and since then, I’ve been having difficulty prying it off him coz he loves it too!

I’m thinking of giving it as a gift if someone in my family lists “earphones” for their Christmas or birthday gift!

title: left channel drops constantly ugggh
body: would have been proper for the money, battery life is as expected, sound quality is expected, average consumer sound, not bad, not HiFi. mic quality as expected, not so good but the main purpose was audio for cheap which is fine but the left ear keeps dropping out and back in. it's Soo damn annoying. makes what would be decent budget wireless earbuds complete trash.

title: Great earbuds
body: Great earbuds, very comfortable. I wanted something lightweight and easy to charge, so I love that they come in their own charging carrying case and they charge fast. Pristine sound - I actually have to turn the volume down often. I've had them for a month and haven't been disappointed once.

title: AMAZING! Best bang for your buck - no doubt!
body:
I've been using these earbuds for a few days now and I absolutely love them! I spent hours researching true wireless earbuds. When I came across these, I liked that they were waterproof and noise canceling  - as I mainly use them for the gym. I've had some pretty sweaty workouts with them and they stay in. The sound is awesome too, and this is coming from a previous Beats user (when Beats were good). I've told family and friends to invest in these as well.
They come with a 1 year warranty - another plus! If you're like me and you're searching for the perfect TRULY WIRELESS earbuds - look no further!

title: Well built product with great sound that takes some effort to keep them from falling out.
body: Overall very satisfied. Took several days of trial and error in getting them to stay in my ears. Rotated through the different ear caps, found the one that stayed in ear while moving around or eating. Sound quality very good. Buds and case very sturdy. Only complaint is time before needing charge , about 3 hours. Also documentation is somewhat lacking.

title: Low sound volume.
body: Good fitment, pairs quickly, and decent sound quality. HOWEVER if you're using them in a loud/semi loud environment, you can hardly hear them at full volume. I've tried using them while cutting the grass and running a saw, and all you can make out is a slight mumble of what you're listening to. Thinking it was my phone, I plugged in my corded headphones with the volume at max and it nearly made my ears bleed it was so loud. I might keep these as a back up or just to workout in, but for what I need headphones for most of all, is going to require me to buy another set from someone else unfortunately.

title: Great for Programming
body:
Firstly, the sound quality on these things is surprisingly good for being earbuds. The noise cancellation will depend on whether you can find a good-sized rubber end. For me, the medium sized one works the best.

They're okay for working out. Being cordless is a huge plus, and the noise cancellation works really well. But they have a tendency to fall out if you don't press them in hard. I haven't had to use these in a wet environment yet, but their waterproofing is rated really well.

The batteries are also really weak, but the charging case that comes with it can do about 4 full charges. I use these a lot at work while I'm programming, and I've never had to charge them more than twice. The case can also be charged wirelessly which is cool.

My last gripe is about the lack of volume control. You can't use any buttons to turn up/down the volume. All volume control has to be done through the device that's connected through Bluetooth which, for me, is usually my phone, and I don't like having to take my phone out of my pocket to change the volume.

Overall, these are great wireless buds. They have high sound quality, and the wireless charging and cordlessness make them pretty hassle-free.

title: Great sound for a great price
body: I bought these for wearing at my computer. They have great sound and pretty good battery life. These actually sound better than my AirPods. I've worn them at the GYM, but not running. The work great synced with my PC for music and gaming. They also work well paired with my Samsung TV for watching TV or movies. These are some of the best wireless earbuds I've owned.

title: Good Head Phones - Not for small ears
body: I've had these for a few weeks and really have no complaints aside from they dont fit in my ears, with the smallest attachments on. The left headphone doesnt fit at all - the right headphone requires adjustments all the time. I purchased these after reading reviews from others with small ears and said these fit, but they still dont work for me. Otherwise, these are good headphones. They hold a charge well and have pretty good music quality for the price.

title: Glad I got these and not paying $140 for others
body:
Perfect for what I wanted. I didn't want to spend 140 on ear buds that didn't or didn't like. They are comfortable don't fall out and the battery on one charge seems to last about 2 1/2 hours. The case is small and convenient and charges the ear buds fast. It has a nice indicator on the box. It was easy to pair with phone and mp3 player.
Putting the ear buds back into the case is great.... They are easily marked R & L and the magnets make sure it stays in the box. I may get another pair!!

title: Great Customer Service
body: I read that these were waterproof earbuds but when my dog accidentally kicked them into the spa they immediately stopped working even though the depth was less than 1 meter and they were in there for less than two minutes. In reaching out to TOZO directly they offered to ship me a new right earbud for free without the hassle of returning the other. The response took less than 24 hours and as of right now I am very pleased with how this played out! Can't wait to use them again, although I am a little hesitant to leave them so close to the spa next time!

title: Love the design, but battery life is nowhere near what advertised
body: Design is good -- the buds feel sturdy as does the case; they more or less stay securely in my ears (a big problem with almost every other earbud I've tried.) But the battery life is a big problem: they advertise "over 3.5 hours’ playtime from a single charge"; I've never gotten anywhere near that. I rarely get over 2 hours of playback, which kinda sucks, since it means they barely last for a workout. The RIGHT earbud (at least in my pair) is always the one to die first; it seems to hold only about 75% of the charge as the left one. A UX gripe I have is that from the moment you get the first low-battery warning, you have about 30-seconds of playback remaining before the earbuds die. That's pretty lame; if you don't have the case with you, there's not much you can even do. The warning should signify 5-10 mins left (imo).

title: Not a great item, but maybe for the price.
body:
I figured I would give these a try since they were priced pretty cheap but after I used it a few times....figured out why. They connect to your bluetooth on their own, so when you're on your phone and all of a sudden the sound goes mute, probably because the ear buds connected to your phone by it self. Just does it on its own. Kinda weird. Batteries die pretty fast, within a day, even if they're just sitting in its case. I had previously owned Ray's and they were awesome but after i ruined them I thought I would try these cause they were half the price...now I know why. Only good thing about these are the sound. Clear and nice base to them, but Im sure after a few months of use they will go bad.
Can't say great value but super cheap for what they are. Only good thing about these ear buds would be the price.

title: I enjoy it
body:
I received it on time
It's nice I like that it charges when you put it in the case and the case can also charge wirelessly thats a nice touch
Music quality is not bad deep bass
Can always be better but for the price its more then perfect
Easy to use
I enjoy it

title: Somewhat frustrating
body: The sound just randomly drops out.  They don't disconnect.  They just lose sound.  Sound comes back in a few seconds, but it's very annoying.  This happens when connected to my phone or laptop.

title: Exceeded My Expectations
body:
First off with so many products to choose from I couldn't ignore the amount of positive reviews. Still sceptical, I went ahead and purchased these with the amazing price knowing now what I get out of these ear buds.
One of the first things I did after unboxing was figure out the perfect size for me and I'm glad i did. The Bluetooth is unbeatable! I absolutely hate being locked in one spot if I don't want to lug my phone around at the gym. (Might as well still have a cord) Walking to go get water across the gym was no problem with no disconnection. The capability of starting and stopping music with both the left and the right ear buds came in handy on multiple occasions. One thing I was surprised about was the sound quality and the noise cancellation capability. I've been through so many headphones and ear buds from high end brands to knock offs and always seemed to be disappointed with some aspect of them from sounds quality to Bluetooth connection. One last thing i will highlight on would be the battery life and charging box. I couldnt beleive how long these lasted and how quick they recharge in a pinch. Overall these ear buds from Tozo has checked every box for me and easily became my go to for everyday/ every occasion use.

title: Best Bang for Your Buck
body: I love these earbuds.. you definitely get a bang for your buck and the sound quality is pretty solid. I’ve added an image to show the sizing of the buds. I thought maybe they would fall out and lose them but so far they have been stood in my ears without slipping out. These are well made and I highly recommend them, especially for the price compared to other high end earbuds.

title: Great Buds....excellent sound!
body: Ordered these after looking at many other options and I could not be happier with the TOZO T10's! Great sound and easy to pair.  So nice, I am ordering a set for my wife.  Try'm you'll like 'em!

title: All in all, it's a great buy for the price! Impressed!
body: I've had this for a couple of days now and so far so good! Love the smooth sleek design. The magnetic charging case is well built and feels high quality. Used it at the gym and after about 3 hours the battery life was still at 80%. Real easy to pair, effort less. I'm a happy customer.

title: TOZO Wireless Bluetooth T10 : Good Quality in a affordable price
body:
I was impressed with the Tozo T10. The packaging was great, the build quality is top notch, and an amazing set of features with affordable price.
Pairing them with my phone was too easy. The product comes with the complete instruction manual which is user friendly for doing the set up. The sound is very clear till 15 Ft away. The case recharges very fast and even the ear buds recharge quickly.  Once charging of the ear buds, can support till 3-4 hrs of call.  All in all for the price I could not find a better earbud on the market.

title: Reasonably priced good quality
body:
This is a great set of headphones for exercise.  I sweat a lot.  Like torrents.  These headphones have not been ruined by all the sweating.  Sound quality is good.  They are comfortable.  They stay in my ears when I'm at the gym.  They work for phone calls.  The price is terrific, especially when compared with other "name brand" headphones.

I have only been using them for a few weeks, so I can't speak to long-term durability, but so far, I love them.

title: Great product, low price
body: I actually returned a previous pair of wireless ear buds from a different seller that exclaimed DEEP BASS and had none, so I was uncertain what I would get when giving it a 2nd try with a new brand/seller.  These don't have audiophile quality sound, but let me tell you, the bass was a great balance with the treble and mid-tones and I haven't had a problem with them falling out whatsoever.  I haven't noticed them to be moisture wicking, and the noise cancellation is limited, but I wanted these for when I go out and jog or when working out and they work perfectly for me.

title: Exceptional Quality & Value
body: Crisp. Full. Magnificent. Superior performance and quality. Really no comparison to the (3) other brands I have purchased here on Amazon recently - and subsequently returned. Rich full crystal clear stereo, deep bass, absolutely no ambient or white noise,  auto pairup, dynamic range w/  no clipping, exceptional design & engineering, long battery life, full featured and efficient charging system, state of the art product registration and customer support.

title: First Pair of Bluetooth Earbuds!
body: I'm happy this was the choice that I went with for my first pair of Bluetooth earbuds. The sound is clean and has nice bass. The pairing/set up was easy. The battery life seems very decent. The price point is very reasonable. The different earbud sizes is a fantastic touch. My only thing is that sometimes the left one disconnects from time to time while in use for an unknown reason. Highly recommend!

title: Great wireless earbuds for the money
body: This is my first pair of wireless earbuds and I love them. They fit comfortably and come with several other sizes for modification. The earbuds are easy to pair with my computer and my iPhone. The battery life seems impressive as I have worn them for hours at a time and have not had them die yet. The case is sturdy and allows for a direct line in charge or or charges on the optional wireless charging pad. I would buy these again.

title: Earbuds Deliver!
body: (Full disclosure - the vendor requested I submit a review in order to receive a wireless charging pad.) Given that incentive, I thought I would have to embellish this review - but just like most of the other purchasers of these buds, I am impressed on a number of fronts. First, the construction of the buds and case is pretty solid and durable. Second, the pairing of the buds to each other and to my phone (Galaxy S9) was pretty quick and consistent.  Also, the sound quality is pretty good..deep bass. I've used the buds on a commuter railroad and have not been disappointed. All in all, I am a satisfied customer.

title: Great sound, life, range, & build quality
body:
I've been using these earbuds since July, and they've been absolutely fantastic. The range is almost ridiculous, even when I forget my phone and go into other rooms without my phone. The battery life is great. I only use one earbud at a time while working (listening to audio books or podcasts all day) and one bud lasts from 8am until about 4-4:30pm.

I love the charging case - very rugged, and I only need to charge it every 2 or 3 days (probably because of the one earbud thing).

I only have one complaint that keeps it from being a 5 star review, which is, again, related to my using one earbud at a time. When you first power it up, it beeps continuously for like two or three minutes, looking for the other earbud to pair. There's no way to stop it, and it's really irritating because it interrupts what I'm listening to for that first couple of minutes. If they come out with a firmware update that turns that off, these things will be perfect.

title: Great Quality for a Reasonable Price
body: These earbuds are not bad. Personally, I use these earbuds for workout sessions so I have no problem to stay in a stationary place to workout. Overall, the earbuds are comfortable. The ability to change the earbuds size was a plus as it allows you to change the size according to your ear size for comfort. Pairing didn't take long at all. The charging case looks well made and seems durable. The sound quality is great, good amount of sounds comes out for almost any song really. When jogging or doing any cardio related exercises, these earbuds so far does the job in staying put in your ears. What makes the product shine more was being water and sweat resistant as I use these pair of earbuds for workouts, so to me this was great. At the end of the day, this product is great for a good price.

title: Good sound, noise cancellation, and comfort; sometimes repeated disconnect/reconnect during call
body: Sound quality and comfort are good for me. This is one of those things that is subjective: they will work well for some people and not well for others. One thing I do not like is they sometimes disconnect and reconnect multiple times during a call. This generally seems to be when in the business environment with signal quality challenges.

title: Could be a good product if they fixed the bluetooth.
body: At first I was impressed with the sound quality, fit and the case. However I ran into a HUGE problem. The bluetooth on these is horrible! If I walked beyond 5 feet of my phone, they would cut out. Additionally, even with my phone in my pocket, they would cut out every 30 seconds in one ear, sometimes both. It's too bad, because other than that, they seemed good. Looks like others have had the very same issue. I tried to disconnect an repair the bluetooth but same results. I ended up getting the Juckbo 5.0 Earbuds and couldn't be more pleased. More comfortable and bluetooth works across the house. Not as loud, but loud enough.

title: Okay earbuds for the price
body:
My experience from this product:
-decent base and volume output
-battery life for non-stop music play was about 3 hours
-left ear bud goes silent randomly
-after 1.5 months of daily use the volume from left earbud was really low and the charging case stopped working
-sometimes the earbuds won't charge if you just put it back into the case. I had to wiggle them around until the red light came on to indicate that they were charging.

I'm getting a replacement product due to my left defective earbud. TOZO was very responsive in honoring their warranty. Hopefully i'll have a better experience the second time around.

title: best earbuds ever made
body: I really liked the product. I have an iphone 8 but because of my outer ear canals I am unable to use default iphone head sets. These earbuds perfectly fit to my ear and no matter how hard I shake my head, it never fall off. The sound quality is also excellent. At the beginning, I had some difficulties over the built-in microphone then I realized that I should cover my mount with my head. Doing so my voice goes directly into the microphone. I used the product under the heavy rain one time and I can assure that it is 100% water-resistant. Again I really appreciate to TOZO company for creating a #1 quality product

title: Very comfortable and secure in your ears!
body: I really like that the ear buds fit so well, I was very pleased with how quick they paired also...so easy! I charged them when I took them out of the box but I think they were already partially charged as they were useable immediately....and love that the charger will charge them 4 times before needing to be connected to USB port.....highly recommend...and the price is very good for a water proof earbud with such a great fit.

title: Great Earbuds, Better Value
body: These earbuds far exceeded my expectations for the price. Primarily use them to listen to music to go to sleep without disturbing my wife (or being disturbed by her snoring! Sorry, honey...) Sound quality is good, noise cancellation is good; I can't hear her mild-to-moderate snoring next to me when they are on. Battery life is good, also. I have the headphones on for anywhere from 4-6hrs per night and only need to charge them twice a week. I highly recommend. I'd give 5-stars, but I don't know what to judge them against since it seems I got lucky on my first pick!

title: Bluetooth wireless earbuds
body: My husband uses these daily and after months of daily use no problems at all. Definitely a quality product for a good price. Easy to hear on video chat while he’s working out of town. Great earbuds for the price.

title: DONT BUY! Worked for 1 week only
body:
Very disappointed, they only worked for 1 week, now i can’t use them on my Garmin because it would never connect, sometimes bluetooth doesn’t find them or sometimes it does but it won’t connect (displays error every time) and when i try to use them with my Iphone mobile it would only pair one side, Right and Left won’t sync anymore (i read the manual and tried many times using their instructions but it won’t work).
I NEED A REFUND ASAP!

title: Excellent wireless ear buds, great sound comfort and battery life
body:
First off let me say, these airbuds are super comfortable, I can wear them all day without them hurting ears. I bought an expensive one from BB and had to return them a week later because they were so uncomfortable.  But I love TOZO T10.  In regards to the noise cancellation, my true test would be on plane and so far I haven’t taken them on a plane.  However, on the subway, they block out most outside noise.

For the sound, this is one of the main reason, I purchased this T10. The sounds, especially the bass is amazing, crystal clear withnot distortion even when the volume is high.  The Bluetooth pairing  is breeze, and I like that you listen to one side only if needed.
The battery life is excellent, I believe I gone a full 2 hours of listening to music and watching movies before, the battery indicator moved half way....and thats impressive.  Overall, I would highly recommend these wireless ear bud to anyone. Don’t be discouraged by the price, thinking they are cheap...they are well made and the sound, comfort, and battery life is great.

title: Great sound quality; super snug for my little ears!
body:
These are a great replacement for my old Bluetooth ear buds that die after 30 minutes!
So far, I’ve charged them once and been on 2 different 60 minute bike rides; battery is still going strong. They are lightweight, have good sound quality, easy to pair, and I love that they come with 4 different silicone inner ear sizes!
The charging case is solid, and great magnetic lid; I’m not worried about losing these.
Great purchase, very satisfied, definitely recommend!

title: Don’t waste your money.
body: In order for these to work you have to delete them from your Bluetooth every time you use them. They won’t work if you don’t Do that. Also the battery and one only lasts about an hour. Very difficult to use the ear buds that hold them in your ear that come on are very huge and it’s virtually impossible to change them with the smaller ones.

title: Better than I ever expected
body: I just received my new earbuds and they are better than I expected.  I have been searching for the right set of earbuds for 3 months when I can across this product on Amazon.  After reading the reviews I decided to give them a try.  Boy an I not disappointed. The sound quality is amazing and they fit in my ear perfectly.  I love the carrying case. I am very much impressed with this product.

title: Great earbuds!!!
body: Love these earbuds, the sound quality is exceptional.  I had issues at first but I was able to get great satisfaction and help with customer service.  They were very helpful and made sure I was a happy and satisfied customer.  I recommend these earbuds highly!

title: Buy These Headphones!!
body:
I'm always on the fence when it comes to buying earbuds because I'm never convinced they'll fit in my ears. Initially I bought these for traveling but I've recently been using them to work out and they're perfect! I'm pretty sure one of my ear holes is bigger than the other 🙃but since these come with 4 different bud sizes, I'm able to run, jump, lay sideways and still keep the earbuds in BOTH my ears. I'm truly happy with my purchase and definitely recommend these to anyone looking for wireless headphones.

They were also delivered extremely fast and the customer service reps have been phenomenal. After I registered for the warranty, one reached out to me directly to make sure I was satisfied with my purchase and even offered me a free wireless charger.

If you need wireless bluetooth earbuds, look no further - BUY THESE NOW!!

---------------------------------------------------------

UPDATE: My earbuds starting having weird issues (like taking several minutes to pair with bluetooth) and TOZO sent me a brand new pair immediately with no hassle. I definitely recommend these headphones. Not just because they're great quality, but because the company's customer service is A1!

title: Amazing Product/ Great Customer Service
body: Let me tell you, this company is great. I ordered these headphones, had them for half a day (and absolutely loved the sound) and then went to work and lost it, which was my fault. I was super bummed out, but I was really going to order them again cause I was actually really impressed. But I decided to email customer support and see if they could do anything for me and now they’re sending me a whole new pair. Beyond impressed. Quality product and an actual decent company. Would recommend to everyone if you enjoy real sound.

title: Great sound, great fit and great chargeable storage box
body:
I was skeptical about buying a ear bud, having bad experience with other products.  This one is a charm amazing sound quality, amazing fit and amazing comfort. I have been using it every day since I received, have been with it on Treadmill, jumping up, floor exercise and many more.. it hasn’t popped out and hasn’t been uncomfortable either.. so far quite happy with the purchase.

Haven’t tried much to conclude how good is battery life, but can day for sure it lasted like a charm for 2hrs every day for back to back days before I put it on charge

Not to forget the amazing wireless chargeable box it comes with..

All in all thumbs up for this product..

title: How well they fit/feel in my ears.
body: I was always a skeptic about wireless earbuds because I felt there was no way they could stay in any ear including my little ears until my daughter got a pair. I became more intrigued by them and how easy it was to wear them. I found myself this wonderful pair of TOZO T10 bluetooth earbuds here on Amazon (it was one of their daily deals). When they arrived I immediately thought they were to big, but once I read the directions on how so insert them and correctly choose the right size ear piece, I forget that I even have them in sometimes because they are so comfortable. I'm very happy that I chose to give them a try and would recommend them to anyone. And the price was amazing>

title: Final Update - These things rock.
body:
FINAL UPDATE (#2):  I am updating this review after getting to examine a 3rd pair of earbuds and finding that they were completely trouble free.  I have kept all previous reviews below for completeness sake.  Quick version:  I got a bad pair, but I was quickly sent a replacement, and have used a 3rd pair.  The 2nd and 3rd pair worked flawlessly (the first pair were clearly not the “normal” quality) so I feel compelled to update my review based on this.  I also discovered that if you have a wireless charger (like one you use with your phone), you can rest the charging case on that wireless charging pad and they charge!  That’s so convenient.  I am also finding them to be very comfortable and I enjoy the sound.  Great for the gym!

UPDATE 1:  TOZO contacted me by email and sent me a new pair of earbuds.  These earbuds indeed work fine and don't have any issues at all.  I think TOZO understands the importance of reviews and very much wants people to give them good reviews.  I would say they are even a bit aggressive about their customer service. They were always incredibly polite and professional, but they wanted to be sure I got the second pair to try.  I can appreciate their hard work in trying to make sure that I walked away with good things to say about the product.  I have now given this 4 stars because the final product works great, but the fact that I got one that seems to be way too susceptible to interference won't allow me to give it 5 stars in good conscience.
Bottom line:
- first product worked well except for drops - but they were so frequent in certain places it was maddening
- second product worked like a charm and does not seem to have any of the dropping issues
- they want to be sure you are happy so the customer service was lightning fast and with no questions asked
- If you are looking for a relatively inexpensive pair of Bluetooth wireless earbuds, give these a try.

ORIGINAL REVIEW:  They pair easily, have a nice charging case, and seem to have a good battery life.  Unfortunately, they drop signal 3-4xs per minute.  I did a bit of troubleshooting to make sure it was the earbuds and not the device.  I paired it with several devices and the earbuds always dropped signal.  I then paired all of the devices with several other bluetooth headphones and speakers I have (including an Echo).  All of the devices played flawlessly through all of the speakers without dropping signal.  However, these drop regularly.  Sometimes it will go for a minute or two without dropping, sometimes certain places seem to make it worse, but, overall, it happens several times per minute.  It makes an otherwise decent pair of earbuds unusable.  I will return these.

title: Great Earbuds!
body: The sound on these is excellent. They pair quickly with my iPod. I bought a second pair for my daughter who uses them to block out noise while studying. I had an issue with the charger after several months. I emailed the excellent customer service and received a brand pair in the mail within days, even though I only needed the charger. I highly recommend these!

title: I Bought 2 Sets!
body: I've been waiting to pick up AirPods for a while now but couldn't justify paying $140 for something that falls out of my ear. After some intense searching I came a crossed this set. After reading the reviews I went for it and was not disappointed! Not only are they much more comfortable then the pods but the sound is imo much better and clear. I've been using these a few weeks now on and off and have only changed them once. They come with different size earbuds so you dont have to worry about comfort or noise cancellation being an issue. I'm also really fond of the style and color. The case does change the earbuds as well and has a set of lights to indicate the charge which is super convenient. My husband "stole" my first set so I ordered another for myself.

title: Unfortunately!!!
body: Lets start off with the good, these headphones sound great, probably one of the best sounding headphones I've tried. Deep strong bass even at low volumes without distortion. Unfortunately, these headphones are the most annoying pair with stupid little annoying features built right in. The bluetooth connection sucks, it takes a while before it connects auto, than when it does, it talks to much, "right channel connected, left channel connected, connected" if you press play on your song before its done saying all that it'll fail the connection completely. You can only use the right headphone by itself if you want, but if you do, the right will constantly chirp/beep, every few seconds no matter what, even if you have a song on or you're on the phone. The programming on it sucks so bad, there's even times when they won't disconnect from my phone even after I put both headphones in their case/charger. These would've been awesome headphones but those mistakes are so annoying, I've had them for a few days and I have to return them because they'll raise your blood pressure, so my recommendation is to AVOID these headphones!!!

title: Best wireless headsets for the price!
body: I received my TOZO headphones a few days ago and have had nothing but great things to say about them! The sound quality is amazing and once you find the right earpiece they are a very secure fit. I used them at the gym for over an hour doing heavy lifting without having to worry about them falling out and I have also ran 3 miles on my treadmill without them coming loose either! I would and have recommended these headphones to everyone searching for wireless headsets!

title: A good buy
body:
I listen to audiobooks mostly while working and it seriously sounds like the narrator is inside my head. When I've listened to music, the sound is rich and full.

The battery life is "meh." But when I remove them, I return them to the portable charging case. So, no big deal. It was a good buy.

title: Right earbud quit after getting in water.
body: I am writing a review having only used these earbuds for a few weeks. Until the incident I will describe further, the earbuds worked great. Good sound, good connection with my device and a good fit once we used the right fitting provided. However, after using the earbuds in the shower, as we were inclined to believe this would be okay, I dropped one of them in the water for just a split second. Then, about a day later it stopped working. I tried to revive it using even a hairdryer (per the advice of a customer rep) but to no avail. So I’ve been working with other reps to get a replacement. After communicating with Amazon and Tozo for a few too many times, I think I’m going to get a replacement. So I’m waiting for that and then I can write another review to let you know how that went.

title: Very impressed - Quality product
body:
I am very impressed with the TOZO T10 earbuds. Especially given the price, these are a quality product with great sound and easy pairing. I have gone through about a half dozen wireless headphones the past few years and these earbuds sound great and are super comfortable when wearing. I run regularly and recently ran 6+ miles on a treadmill and did not have any issues with these falling out of my ears or cutting out due to wetness or issues with the bluetooth connection.
It took a few times using these earbuds to find the correct size for my ear but the additional ear plug sizes were helpful and I was able to find one that fits without falling out.
The wireless charging is super convenient too. Definitely recommend this product for an affordable, high-quality product.

title: Sound Quality ✔️Easy to Use ✔️Sleek ✔️Stylish ✔️Bang for Buck ✔️Fit ✔️
body: I've gone through several wireless ear buds in my day, and this one really works well. The sound quality is good (not for audiophiles, but for your average music listener). The design is sleek and can easily fit in my pocket; the case and the buds also look pretty good, though I would say it looks a wee bit bulky; I personally prefer the white. I haven't had any concerns of these buds falling out of my ear with the standard fit it came with (there are other fits supported as well) while biking and some gentle walking; very minimal re-adjustment is ever needed maybe every hour or so. The price point makes this particularly attractive. I've also had very little issue with the battery life, being able to listen for several hours without any threat of the buds dying. The nice thing is the charging case, so you can re-charge on the go up to 4 full charges! That's awesome. The fact that the charging case works with wireless charging is just extra icing on the cake here.

title: Great sound quality
body: This is my first pair of wireless earbuds.  I was a little nervous because I have very small ears and wasn’t sure they would fit.  However, they include multiple sizes of covers.  They still aren’t super tight in my ears, but I’ve figured out how to put them in properly and they fit pretty well & stay in while I work out.  I bought them to swim laps in, but haven’t tried that yet because it’s still too cold.  Overall, I’m quite pleased with them!

title: Great value! Great sound quality! Clean simple design.
body:
Used for running
sounds great, good bass in my opinion
easy connect
the battery lasts for over two hours straight use from full charge last I tested
nice and compact yet easy to handle
used in the shower, worked well
a great case that charges buds and can be charged wirelessly
nicely packaged
I wish it comes in more colors
would purchase again

title: Great Earbuds, Great Price
body: Just couldn't pull the trigger on dropping $150 on airpods, saw these and the other good reviews and went for it.  They arrived charged, easy pairing with my iPhone, sound quality is good but maybe a little on the bassy side--but that's what most people want, I'm just more sensitive as a classical musician.  None the less, great for workouts, listening to podcasts, and complying with my state's new handsfree law in the car.

title: Awesome sounds, well built, won’t stay in.
body:
Concise:

They sound awesome. Bass heavy profile, ideal for the gym or activity.

Materials are great. The case being able to use QI wireless is awesome.

They just won’t stay securely. It’s such a pain, I want to love these but not including ear fins or something to keep them in seems like a very obvious oversight. I will be returing these.

title: Awesome sound! Awesome price!
body: Perfect fit, easy pairing and great sound quality.  I use these at the gym and have zero issues with them staying in. The noise canceling is great, so good that I find myself having to take one out if I need to talk to someone.  Charging is flawless with the pack or on my wireless charge pad (Samsung).  I’m looking forward to trying the Tozo wireless charger since the earbuds work so well!

title: Bad microphone quality!
body: While the bluetooth pairing worked better than expected; the microphone quality on both iPhone and Android is seriously lacking to the point of unusuability. I tried multiple settings and configurations to address this but everytime folks complain about not being able to hear me so I have to just turn them off. It's unfortunate because I really wanted these to work. Also after having them out of use for awhile I wasnt sure if the battery was dead or not because they wouldnt turn on again until I put them in the case. Kind of weird, because I put them in for less than a second and they were on again. Not sure what's going on.

title: falls out of ear
body: I was looking for wireless earbuds for running.  I have the bose with the ear piece that wraps around the ear.  I wear glasses plus like to put a hat on in the summer.  It was too much at the ear and caused pain.  Plus, the Bose could not sit flush with my head and I lost sound quality.  These TOZOs were rated well on Amazon so I tried them.  They connect fine but are heavy.  I tried the different ear pieces.  If you sit still, you may be OK, but it you move, they fall out.  I could not keep the left one in my ear.  I returned these.  I hope the return goes smoothly.  But, I ordered the Klipsch that are buds and a wire running between them, but no ear piece to wrap around.  I just think the buds alone are not for me.

title: A definite buy!
body: These are amazing and worth the money. The packaging it's good. The charging case is well built and won't open in your pocket. Ear buds are comfortable, have amazing clarity, bass,treble. Easy to pair up. Best thing is it comes with an extended 1 year warranty, you can't beat that.

title: Excellent
body: These are my first wireless earbuds and I am surprised at how great they sound! Really great bass (a bit muddy, but better than expected), easy pairing, good battery life, very comfortable, do not fall out of my ears when walking or working out. In short, they do everything that wired earbuds do without the wires...excellent! Well done, Tozo...

title: Frequent disconnects, Otherwise great product
body: It worked great for first few weeks. The bluetooth connection with my android phone worked fine w/o any hiccups  and sound quality is on par with what you expect from a $30 or so product! I actively use them during my workout which lasts for 60-90 mins and they are super comfortable. However, the dropout / auto disconnect way frequently - almost 3-4 times in my 1 hour workout session. Not sure if it's a defect but i'm past my return window so sad that the product started degrading after 1 month or so.

title: Best wireless headphones!
body: Love these headphones!! The first day I wore them I couldn’t take them out the sound quality is so good and they fit in my ears perfectly (AirPods don’t fit my ears). They hold charge and have no pairing problems. After a couple of months I had a problem with the charging case and the company didn’t not hesitate to send me a new pair and were very easy to communicate with. Highly recommend over any headphones!!!

title: a solid pass
body: sound quality is very good and noise cancelation is fair but the battery life is poor. Did not take long to charge but two hours of use at a time does not work for me. you can get better battery life and sound for the price.

title: Excellent pair of wireless earbuds
body:
So far there is nothing to dislike about the Tozo T10 wireless earbuds, but only all to love.
I've had these for one week and the battery life is excellent; slightly exceeding the stated spec..
The charging case is a great feature for those on the go or travelling, and the remaining charge indicator LEDS are really helpful.
Leaving the best for last; the fit and sound quality:
Once you've installed the ear tip the best fits your ear, and you've placed the unit in your ear as instructed, they fit snug and are very much secure in your ear. This allowed me to go running and there was no movement or shifting once they're in place.
The quality of the sound, the lows, mids and high frequencies far exceeded my expectations. And, there was no sign of distortion at higher volume levels.

All in all, an excellent product at a reasonable price.

title: Believe the hype of these reviews....
body:
I'm honestly trying to think of bad things to say about these headphones but I can't. My friend has them and let me try his and i was sold. The sound quality is ridiculously good for how small they are and they connect with ANY device super quickly. Having multiple ear sizes is great cause my ears have an odd shape.

All these reviews are right when they say these bad boys STAY IN YOUR EARS. Shake your head, get sweaty, taking calls, or doing errands around the house. I would recommend these to anyone and everyone (and i have). Not many products deserve 5 stars but these headphones do.

title: Wonderful earbuds
body:
I love the fact you can charge it on a wireless charging pad. I love the face you can use the earbuds separately or together and the sound quality is wonderful. They pair with my phone quickly.
They were a struggle in the beginning to figure out how to settle in my ear in a way that they didn’t fall out when I chewed or moved around a lot.
The only complaint I have is that they disconnect frequently from my phone. I will be listening to something and it just randomly disconnects or gets really staticky for about 10 seconds and then fixes itself.

title: Very Nice Buds, But Did Not Fit
body: I must have very small ear canals. I had to return these because I was not able to get these to fit well even with the smallest bud covers (there are 4 sizes). Too bad, because these are very nice - good sound and build quality. My only complaint (other than sizing) is that the documentation is sparse. There should be a better explanation of what the status LEDs mean.

title: So far so good
body: I know it's a little early since I only used for a couple times, but so far so good. Wanting the free wireless charger so here we go. Bass is very good, volume can get loud and it stays in ears very comfortably. I am worried about the charge life since the battery case is at 1 light after 2 uses. I hope it does not suffer from same situation as the Gear Icon X did with their charger where it continually charges the earphones and drains the charge case.

title: Must buy for the price and bass
body: Awesome headphones for the price and waterproof capabilities. High bass sounds so expect to have more lows in your music though. If charging wireless it ONLY CHARGES THE CASE but when plugged in it charges both. Others have mentioned it’s better with the wireless charger but given it only does one I prefer to just plug it in. Another nice feature is being able to let one person have the other earbud if your watching a show, working out, playing pool, etc.  I actually use these over my wireless beats. I’ve talked 3 friends into these so far.

title: Product is very solid, great customer service
body:
Have no complaints with the product, sound quality is solid and battery life is good.

Customer service is extremely responsive and sent me a new pair immediately when I ran into an issue

title: Good product and Great customer service
body: I use the ear bud at work to listen to podcasts, and when I run. The range is great, I can walk into the office next door and they still stay connected! The sound quality is great, and I even have to turn down the volume at times! I like the feature where you can use only one earbud at a time if you choose. I have had other wireless earbuds and the batteries last longer with this pair. Also the customer service is Excellent, I had lost one earbud on the running trail, emailed them about buying just one and they sent me a new pair!

title: Don't waste your money!
body: The left earbud does not stay connected. It constantly cuts in and out while on the phone or listening to music. Phone calls are impossible with these. No one could hear me on the other end of the phone when I was using them. I was always skeptical when people told me a lot of Amazon reviews are fake and that the company may have paid people to put good reviews. I definitely believe that now with this product. No way this product deserves more than 1 or 2 stars.

title: Great earbuds!
body: Love these earbuds!  Sound quality is pretty good, like the base.  Noise cancelling seems good.  I tried it inside my car with the car's radio on, and I can't hear the radio.  Not sure about the performance in an airplane.  Only complaint is ear piece is too big for comfort even after I change to the smallest size.  But overall, I liked it.

title: Good earbuds with some issues
body:
**I added a star because the vendor is truly concerned about their customers, and I've gotten more comfortable with these earbuds, and have found that I enjoy them even more. Other than their weight/size maybe not being ideal for all ears, these are probably the best reasonably priced earbuds I've found.

These earbuds are well made and the charging box has plenty of oomph to keep things going throughout a long day. The ear buds have excellent battery life and good range, and certainly more than 30ft, in my experience. But I suppose that would vary depending on the environment. They are a bit on the heavy side but can lock reasonably well in the ear. Sound is also very powerful, but this is also an issue with my setup. The problem is that my iPhone7S can't reduce the volume to a point that I'm always happy with; some music is good but others I'd like to turn-down the volume and the lowest setting just isn't low enough for my taste -- If you like loud music these are definitely good though. Sound quality is good too, but maybe just a bit heavy on the bass. Again a personal preference. Sound cancelling is good, but because I can't find a volume that's always comfortable, I end-up not seating them as securely in my ears so I do lose some of that benefit, plus they're more likely to fall out then. Can't really blame the construction or function for this, because I'm not really using them properly. The more major issue, for music, is that I like to be able to do more than pause songs, I like to be able to skip songs and change volume from the ear buds, and that's not supported; you can only pause on them, so you have to keep your device available to perform those functions. Lastly, both earbuds pair with themselves very reliably, but I manually have to select them under Bluetooth devices to connect them to my iPhone7S. They always go into pairing mode but don't auto-connect like my other earbuds. Overall, they're high quality earbuds with a few operational issues, but they have the most powerful sound of any that I've used to date.

title: Great sound, lightweight, decent battery life.
body: I use these for gaming on my laptop. The sound quality, bass and spatialization is very good. They're easy to pair and reconnect whenever Im ready to go again. The charging case quit working but amazon support was very polite and helpful and the manufacturer is sending me a new one free of charge.

title: Exceeded expectations, good sound quality
body: I tried these out for the first time today and they exceeded my expectations. Sound quality was as expected for $49.99. I was able to walk further than the product listed and still maintain a connection. The small earbuds size worked perfectly for my little ear canals; definitely try the different sizes if they don’t seem to fit on the first try. And I love that the case charges the earbuds multiple times!

title: Fit is fantastic & comfy!
body:
Just put these on & I love them!! Sound quality is amazing and just made a phone call. Person on the other end of the call asked for the link.
I wear earplugs at work and I’m used to talking with them in. These feel (sound) the same way - but way more comfortable. It can sound funny at first but you get used to it.
Will recommend to anyone looking for a similar product.
(I gave the battery a 5 because the case acts as a charger without a power source, as long as it is charged. I really don’t know how long a charge lasts yet.)

title: Great Substitute for Apple AirPods
body: I was looking for a less expensive alternative for the AirPods. Spent a good deal of time researching and decided to give these a try. I believe I chose wisely. The sound quality is excellent. Better than I expected. A solid case with magnetic closure to store them in that also allows recharging even when not connected to a power supply. They easily pair with my iPhone and  computer via Bluetooth 5.0. Pods fit comfortably in the ear and come with different size tips to accommodate different ear sizes. The pods have a built-in microphone, so making/receiving phone calls are an added bonus! All in all, if you are looking for an economical alternative/replacement for Apple's AirPods, these Tozo T10's are it.

title: High performance for affordable price
body:
I ordered these because I wanted something wireless and waterproof for when I worked out and was doing chores around the house. I was so impressed by these. Great sound, sleek and compact charging case, and extremely easy to use.
Just take them out of the case and they automatically power on and pair, and you’re good to go. Way better than than apple air pods for far less money. I strongly suggest you purchase these.

title: Horray for the reset function.
body: I really enjoy these earbuds. I was worried they might be prone to falling out due to the lack of ear hooks, but I have not had a problem with them so far. I like how the button press is gentle and you don't end up jammin it into your ear just to press the button. What I am very glad about is the ability to reset the earbuds in the event of a pairing problem.  I had another different brand that you couldnt reset and they ended up bricking on me one day and I returned them so I could buy these instead.

title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER A MONTH!
body: I don't know where all this five stars reviews are from but that certainly was not my experience. I bought this phone at the beginning of September and as of now it has stopped working. The right headphones won't turn on and connect to any devices. When it was working the sound quality wasn't the best. Noise cancellation is a joke because I could hear everything still while using this headphone. Also, it keeps slipping out of my ears and I was just walking while using them, not running or doing high intensity workouts. For $50 and over 13,000 reviews with 4.5/5 stars I expected better than this.

title: Truth about all the 5 star ratings for this product.
body:
There are a lot of customers that have given this product a 5 star rating. Here is the reason why- after I bought these headphones I got an email from TOZO asking me to give them a 5 star rating and they would send me a free charging pad. I am sure most people who gave these headphones were motivated by the free gift and not by the quality of the product. I obviously declined.
The headphones are average at best, I had issues with frequent disconnects initially but has gotten better over time. The sound quality is a average.

title: Only comes with one size of ear buds
body: Just received these today. Nicely packaged. Very easy to pair right out of the box. Excellent sound. Will have to see how long the battery lasts. Only complaint is that although the manual references different sizes of the little rubber ear inserts, these were not included. So if the one that came with these is too big or small for you, you're out of luck.

title: These for the win.
body: These are pretty great I must say. Reviews say it all. I’ve owned a lot of headphones in the past and these are top. Easy to connect, charge, and keep with ya at all times. From the gym, to being at home cutting grass they are loud and clear and don’t have to worry about hearing anything outside of the music itself. Anyone I talk to I refer to these. Nothing beats the price as well!

title: Awesome earbuds
body: One of the best purchases I made on Amazon was these earbuds.  Had these for over a month now without a single problem.  Comfortable, great for working out, sound quality is excellent compared to other more expensive brands.  Took these on an international flight and worked better to block out unwanted cabin sound compared to the actual noise cancelling headphones that came with the flight.  Will likely buy another pair.

title: Very comfortable earbuds!
body: Great wireless earbuds! Very easy to use and they stay charged for a long time. Easy to connect to my iPhone too.

title: These are on a whole other level of awesomeness!!
body:
So the Tozo T10 5.0 wireless ear buds are my first set of true wireless earbuds but had many traditional headphones and earbuds with wires and those wireless earbuds that use a wire to link both sides. With that being said I'll never look back!
  First off the Tozo's were a great deal with awesome reviews for under $50.  I've payed $80 for wireless Skull Candy's and there is no comparison.
  Keep in mind I purchased these to use at work and I'm a welder. So one major problem I've always had was metal dust getting stuck in the earbuds due to the magnet and getting destroyed. I haven't had that problem at all so far with these. The other thing I loved with these were that u could use one at a time and take calls with perfect quality! I would definetly recommend these to anyone looking to buy a new set of headphones. They would never go back to the old style.

Pros
  Amazing battery life
  Make and receive calls with no issues
  Sound quality is awesome for the price
  Waterproof
  Stays put while in ear

Cons

None

title: Great sound, comfortable and connection doesn't drop
body: Great sound and fits well, not at all uncomfortable. The best part is the connection, so far its flawless. I've owned a different pair when this type first came out and it would drop connection all the time, very distracting. Not these, have not dropped once. So far (just got them) these are fantastic.

title: Awesome sound and awesome price
body: I bought these as my first pair of wireless headphones. I was not disappointed. The sound is very good even when I just have one in at work. My box was missing the extra earbud covers. I felt like I needed the smaller size because they seemed to fall out of my ears easily. I emailed this company and they responded immediately and made it right. I believe this is a great product at a great price! I am not one to spend $100 on stuff like this. Perfect for teens that tend to lose things easily.

title: I Love These Amazing Earbuds
body:
I was looking for a pair of earbuds I could use whilst working out. I won a number of "high end" headphones such as Shure, Sony, Bose, etc but wanted a fully wireless pair that sounded decent. I tried a number of wireless earbuds from BestBuy such as Sony, Sennheiser, Beats, etc, but wasn't impressed at all with their sound quality. I came across these on Amazon, but was skeptical as the price seemed quite low for what the manufacturer claimed they could do and how they sounded. I decided to give them a try as Amazon have an excellent returns policy.

I am very glad I got these. They sound amazing. Much better than the much more expensive ones I tried from Best Buy. I also thought the features, look, feel and quality of both the earbuds and the chargeable carrying case are excellent. They were extremely easy to pair with both my phone and my laptop. They fit snugly and securely in my ear, and are very easy to insert and take out. If I were talking about $150+ earbuds, I would still be very happy with these, but considering that they cost me less than $50, they are simply amazing.

title: These are a great value and easy to set up
body: This is my second set of wireless earbuds. This set stands out - the only reason I didn't give 5 stars in battery life is that the case seems to need to be recharged every time, not when it drops to 2 or 1 status lights. The earbuds are comfortable to wear for prolonged periods, and the set was easy to pair - first to my laptop, then to my Kindle Fire when my needs changed.

title: Very impressed!
body: These sound and look great for the price! Very impressed. I love that if I ruin or lose them its just $50 to replace em! These will be my new workout buds!!

title: Awesome sound!
body: These sound great! I love the wireless charging capability it has.  They shipped as expected and paired very easily.  Customer service has been great with a minor issue I had.  Great for the price and I would recommend these to anyone.

title: Awesome Product - Better than Airpods
body: These earbuds are amazing.  I could tell from the way they were packaged that this was going to be a quality product.  Once you find the right size earbud attachment they are very comfortable and they stay in your ear.  The sound quality is great and they even have good bass.  I put one of these in my ear and an airpod in my other ear and I could honestly not tell the difference.  I had my wife who has never tried either before do a blind test and she picked the TOZO brand stating that they were more comfortable and had better bass.  For a quarter of the price of a second generation airpod you get a similar product that is waterproof!  I would definitely recommend this product! Great customer service too!

title: I am very happy with this product. Well worth the money!
body: The product does what it says it is going to do.  This product also comes with excellent instructions how to use, maintain and get the most out of this product. And if that is not enough this product also provides a website with instructions and instructional video so you will have the best experience possible with this product. For the price it is worth a buy and then some.

title: Great product for the price BUT....(Update: waiting for the replacement)
body:
I bought this product about 2 weeks ago and I was using it pretty much all the time, at work, at home and even for working out. My first impression was WOW this is cool, everything was fine until suddenly the left earbud start going on and off, either on a call or playing some media, also noted that got worst if I started moving my head, don't know why but that was what I noted. Also the other day I was working on my yard, and I was in a squat position with my phone in my left pocket, and the media started cutting off, then when I stood up was fine, I did it repeatedly to reproduce the issue, and yes, it was an issue, every time, same behaviour.
When is working sound quality is great, noise reduction is great, I used at work to avoid distractions and look and feel is great also, I didn't try any of the really expensive ones, but this ones, except for the issues explained above, are good. I just hope is a problem with the pair I got and not with the product itself.

title: Great when it works...
body: Can have good sound quality with loud bass, but only when they work. IF they can connect to your device AND you are sitting VERY still, they produce great sound, but move just a little and the sound breaks up. Exercising at the gym? Nope. Walking with your phone in your pocket? Nope. Eating lunch at a restaurant? Nope. Sitting in a chair while typing on a keyboard? Sure, but don't change position. They also had about a 1 to 4 chance of actually connecting at any given time. Overall, I found this product to be far more frustrating than I could tolerate.

title: Amazing Audio quality and perfect service
body:
I'm very impressed with Tozo T10. First, the sound quality is balanced between the bass and treble. When playing a Bass Shaker test track which will literally shake the audio drivers in earbuds. On the sweeping tone test, It also can stay clear and pure. I need to say the cost & performance of T10 is very high. If you are the one one who wants to enjoy music. T10 should be on your list. By the way, the blue tooth connection is easy. With Bluetooth 5.0 I can answer the call even far away from my phone. It's also convenient to clean earbuds by washing them for IPX8.
The most important is that the service is perfect. I bought this for a business trip to the USA. When back to Taiwan the charging box is broken. It can't charge anymore. They're kind and enthusiastic to help me to fix it.
Thank you, Katherine. You are really doing a good job.

title: Bang for the buck
body: I have tried several ear-buds and have had mixed luck. They always fall off with the slightest movement - perhaps my ears are not meant for them. However, I have had some great luck with these ear-buds. They fit well, are comfortable and provide great sound quality. I have used them on conference call with some good results. I have had some issues as my voice wasn't too clear at the other end but then it was probably due to the fact that I was walking in Manhattan with the wind blowing. Other times sound has been clear both ways. I highly recommend these. I use them on planes a lot as I travel weekly for work and they reduce the outside noise greatly. Nice product at a reasonable price.

title: Good for the price.
body: I believe that earbuds are very much personal, so I'll write down my personal impression. The Tozo is very good, but they seem to fall off my ear, I've tried all sizes of ear piece included, even a few more, but they all didn't work. Sound is great, connection awesome, charging and case amazing for the price. One big downside is the microphone, I use them a lot, wile listening I receive call and need a earbuds to feature well on calls, but Tozo mic don't seem to capture my voice well, and the other side of the line didn't listen to me, and a lot of background noise, even thou I'm in a quiet place.
