Bottom line, Tozo is fantastic for listening and noise canceling, as long as you don't need to use it on calls, and don't mind then falling off a bit.

title: Love my new Earbuds!!!
body: I purchased these after seeing my Fiance's wearing them and with him producing music I knew that they had to be good so that's why I now own my own pair thank you for such a Great Product!!

title: Great overall, but not connecting to both simultaneously
body: Everything seems nice, but I’m having trouble getting both headphones to connect simultaneously while I’m on the phone. I don’t know if it’s a call feature as the includes materials are limited. If anyone has had this issue and resolved it, please help. Past this issue it seems pretty good, was shipped fully charged. It’s comfortable, and the material feels heavy duty. Will change to five stars if I can figure out how to connect both

title: They cut out frequently. Very annoying!
body: I think I'm sending these back. Ive had them for a couple weeks and use them daily. They cut out frequently and it annoys the hell out of me. My phone is on me, so it's not a range issue. Battery life is about 5 hours. So far disappointed, I expected better from all the positive reviews.

title: Super convenient and great sound
body: Love the wireless charging, it is super convenient just to leave the case sitting on the charger to keep the headphones always ready.  Sound is great.  Pairing and setup super easy.  I got these when I upgraded to a Pixel 3XL phone (without a headphone jack), I had bluetooth headphones before but they were always a hassle to charge, so I would switch back to wired headphones, with these that is not a problem.  Highly recommend.

title: These sounds great! Great budget buy.
body: These earbuds sound great for a simple train ride to work here and there, a google hangouts conference call, and for rollerblading. The extra sized earbuds make a good fit for most people. The charging box is also pretty neat too. You can charge the earbuds 4 times in the case before needing to recharge the case. These are a great budget buy that doesn't break the bank.

title: They fall out
body: They fall out of my ears a lot.  Simple walking, and working in the garage.  Never tied anything hard like running.

title: TOZO EARBUDS REVIEW
body: These bluetooth headphones/earbuds are great in performance, but the only downside to them is that they don't include colum top-down option along with the track controlling option. The buttons only turns on-off the earbuds, and pause play the tracks.

title: Best Earbuds I've ever had!
body: I had bought these about 2 weeks ago and they are awesome! the noise cancellation is great and the sound quality is even better!...I would recommend to anybody, definitely would buy again!...

title: Falls out of your ears
body: I liked to idea of these but they fall out of my ears.  It's not a good situation when I've walking to get my exercise in the pool.

title: Easiest pairing excellent fit
body: These are what  listening to music is supposed to sound like. The sound is  excellent and the  fit helps make them that way with  multiple ear size ear pieces to pick from. Looking forward to swimming with music  this summer.

title: great customer service!
body:
When I first purchased the tozo t10 I was thoroughly impressed with the sound quality and noise cancelation as well as battery life. I could make it throughout my day of mowing (I am a landscaper) on one charge. Now 3 months later I am lucky to get a couple hours on a charge.

I changed my rating from a 3 star to a 5 star due to the amazing customer service that tozo has. They offered to replace my headphones with a new pair.

title: Just What I was Looking For
body:
I have been wanting a pair of wireless earbuds that I could buy for a decent price and good quality. I wanted it to be at least below $100 dollars. Upon buying these I had low expectations being that the last earbuds I bought were not ideal-the sound quality was poor and they did not stay in my ears. However after buying these I was impressed.

1. Design:
The first impression of this product was how it looked when it came out of the box. I was surprised to find that these earbuds appeared and felt as though they were more expensive than just $50. The charging case had a heavy feel to it instead of a light, cheap design. The earbuds and case lid are magnetized so they stay in the case and the lid stays shut. These features are both really nice to have. The earphones themselves have touch control for playing music/adjusting volume.

2. Sound Quality
Unlike some music listeners, I am a real bass head, and these earbuds do just that. They have the perfect amount of base that doesn't drown out the treble.

3. Noise Cancellation
These earphones effectively block out outside noises, but not completely.

4. Battery Life and Wireless Charging
I think for the amount of time that I use these wireless earbuds the battery life is long lasting. With the case fully charged I am given 4 hours of playtime. It only takes about 20 minutes to charge the earbuds in the case. I also like that the case can be charged wirelessly. This makes it much easier to charge the case than connecting it to USB.

Overall I really like these earbuds and they surprised me when I first tried them out. In my opinion they may even exceed the sound quality (but not the functionality) of $150 dollar airpods. I definitely suggest these to people who may be looking for a similar design but for a much cheaper price.

title: Great sound quality
body: These earbuds have excellent sound quality and noise cancellation especially for the price. I've actually been getting quite a bit longer out of the battery than advertised so battery life is good as well. Unfortunately I started having connection issues with one of the earbuds but customer support responded very quickly and they are being replaced so I have no complaints at all with this product.

title: Best deal out there!
body: Stop looking for quality earbuds: You've found them! Out of the factory sealed box, they had 100% charge and were ready to go! They paired seamlessly and they sound great! Great bass and if you use the correct rubber pieces, great seal and noise cancelling. My favorite feature is the range. I sat my phone down on my porch and was able to cut my entire 3/4 acre yard and didnt lose signal! Most impressive. I sweated like crazy all over them and they just keep going. I've used them in the gym on benchpress day as well and they stayed put while I moved heavy weight and sweated profusely. All around, great bang for your buck. The charging case is very solid as well. These could cost way more than $50 so this is a great bargain.

title: Left earbud cuts out- DONT WASTE YOUR TIME with these!!
body:
I was really excited and hopeful for these earbuds, as they were my first wireless earbuds. However, I received them a few hours ago, charged them, and took them with me to the gym. At the gym now and wasn’t even able to work out with them for ONE MINUTE without the left earbud cutting out CONSTANTLY. Thankfully, I had my other pair of headphones with me and I’m using those as I’m sitting, writing this review.

These are junk. There’s obviously a glitch, since many others have had this same EXACT problem. The manufacturer should really fix it. Til then, these are going back. Don’t waste your time buying these!!

title: Great earbuds for best price!
body:
Great products with a reasonable price. I have searched around for a pair of bluetooth earbuds with good looking design, secured staying on my ears, has affordable price, and especially with bass support. I finally found Tozo T10 and I'm very happy with the product. All I want is in these earbuds! Now I can enjoy music, audio book, etc. without dealing with tangled wire as before.
I would recommend this product to anyone who is still thinking and don't know which one they should get. Give it a try. Also the company offers one year guarantee which is great.

title: Quality Earbuds for an Affordable Price
body: This product is nice for working on the computer or listening to music while reading. However, the reason I gave it 4 stars was because moving around while them in my ears causes them to fall out no matter which soft ear piece size I used. This has been an issue for me in the past with many other headphones. Other than that the sound quality is great, noice cancelation is good other then when they fall out, and the portal charging station is a nice bonus. Lastly the multifunction buttons are user friendly and allow for hands-free phone management.

title: For the price excellent purchase
body: I have to say I was a little selectable about buying this product coming from beets but I have to say that these ear buds are an excellent purchase for the price. There noise cancellation is excellent I work around oversized equipment and they are capable of reducing the noice just as good as if I wore my ear muffs. Battery life is ok, so if your looking for some bluetooth ear buds these Tozo are an excellent choice for the price.

title: Better comfort than overpriced airpods
body: I couldn't imagine spending absurd money on uncomfortable looking air pods. These fit and feel great. They sound great and come in a great charging case. I am pleased with this order.

title: Value
body: These headphones had a great battery life, sound quality, and waterproof capability. The charging case is also dope. I didn't want to shell out a ton of money for air pods, but the cheap Bluetooth headphones I had were quite awful. These are affordable but are much better quality than I ever expected. I use them to listen to music while studying and running and would highly recommend them. They come with different ear sized buds but even the smallest ones were a little big.

title: Great fit and Great sound quality - Highly recommend!
body: These are fantastic and at a reasonable price.  I've tried bluetooth earbuds before and they never stayed securely in my ears.  These were great!  I bought them specifically for a long trip by train.  I was able to watch movies and listen to music very comfortably with these earbuds.  I've always hated wearing earbuds but these totally changed my experience.  I will now use them for much more often for more activities since they stay in place so well.  The charging case is another bonus!  so easy to charge and store the ear buds.

title: Nice Earbuds
body: Great product for what it's worth. Decent sound. The only two features it doesn't have are volume control on earbuds and the left earbud doesn't stick well to the charger. You have to press it down for the light to come on.

title: So far they're pretty great
body: I've only had them for a couple of weeks but so far everything seems great. The sound quality was better than I expected for this price range. Pairing was easy and they don't cut out like other bluetooth earbuds. The caring case is convenient to throw in a pocket and have to backup charging. At first I was a little disappointed that the right earbud is the primary but since they are identical you can use it in either ear. I have tiny ears so I was worried about fit and comfort but with the different size converters, these should easily fit any size ears. The battery doesn't last as long as other brands but with the carrying case you can quickly recharge them on the go.

title: Amazing for the money
body: Was gonna get some new apple air pods, but didn't want to spend so much.  These were also water proof, which I've used in the shower over and over.  I love them, work great, decent distance from device, audio quality is a solid 8 out of 10, and connection pairing isn't quite as smooth as apple, but really works pretty well.  The only complaint I have is if you only want to use 1 it will beep for about 30 seconds signalling it is trying to find the other one, and if you don't ever connect them it will finally stop the beeping, I haven't found a way to get it to not do that.  but its a minor price to pay considering I usually use both ears, which connects super fast.

title: Sound Sleep
body: I have problems with insomnia including those nasty earworms (having a song stuck in your head.) I am able to fall back asleep with the right earbud in while listening to rain/thunder from an app. The sound quality is pretty amazing for these buds.

title: Great Product, Great Customer Service
body: I have had these for a few month after and decided to keep them after purchasing about 5 different ear bud options. I am very pleased with these for a few reasons- they are comfortable, sound quality is great and bluetooth works good. Unfortunately, i had a few issues with batter drainage and the ear buds not charing completely in the charging case even while kept in the case but i contacted the company and they are happy to send me a new replacement case. I appreaciate this kind of customer service that is backed behind a good product.

title: Updated: OK but needs quality control, Vendor will replace.
body:
Update: The vendor has offered to replace the defective unit. I will update again when the new unit arrives if it has no issues.

Sound quality in the right ear is good... The left is trash, sounds like someone is shaking a rattler to the music. Save your money.

title: Amazing sound quality. BOSE/BEATS quality
body: Great sound. Amazing base. And crisp crystal clear sound. It’s like having BOSE headphones without the price tag. The charging stations is handy. Elongates the life of the headphones and ultimately works great and automatically pairs. Haven’t gotten phone calls yet, but so far so good.

title: Highly recommended
body: I am extremely pleased with these earbuds. The fit well and have a good sound. I do have some trouble with the fit and occasionally one of them will pop out, but I have found that to be true of every earbud I’ve ever tried. I think it’s just something about my ears. But it happens less with these than with others I have used so I am pleased. I would recommend them.

title: Great sound, but too many negatives
body:
I previously had wireless bluetooth headphones that were connected to each other via a cable and this upgrade to the 2 individual earbuds was something I didn't know how much I'd appreciate. I was especially impressed when I put them on and heard the sound. Every song I listen to sounds new with the great bass and full sound. In addition, the microphone is actually useable, which is something that hasn't been the case with my previous Bluetooth headphones.

The negatives for this is that the connection between the two earbuds gets out of sync often, which results in either an echo or audio drop outs almost every time I'm walking around with them. In addition, when you take the headphones out of the case to start using them, it takes about 20-30 seconds of booting up, syncing with each other then finally my phone. With my previous pair of headphones I'd turn them on and could be listening within 3-5 seconds.

Because of these pretty big usability issues, I may be returning these.

title: It's a great small headset
body: I mainly got these headsets because I sometimes like to wear a hat on a hot day and bulky over the ears headsets don't fit if I have one on. I usually don't get in the ear headsets because they never managed to fit me. They just pop out of my ear. But these are suprisingly snug and light. Its great to were for a couple of hours for workout and commute to work. An added bonus is that the seller cares about your purchase and how happy you are about it. It's a breath of fresh air on Amazon to be honest and I greatly appreciate that.

title: Awesome, NO complaints. Would definitely recommend buying especially for the money
body: So far these ear buds are great. They showed up very quickly, they were fully charged out the box. Packaged in a convenient little box very nice. Comes with multiple different sized ear rubbers to ensure a comfortable fit. Also comes with a 1 year warranty easy to use just plug in your amazon order number and you have a one year warranty. You can not beat these low budget very high quality ear buds. Thank you so much to the TOZO team keep it up! Would definitely buy another pair

title: Real solid quality buds
body: The charging case is solid. Very comfortable. Includes different sized rubber tips. Included with a one year warranty. Customer service is excellent. Outstanding value. I hope they last a while. I pretty highly recommend

title: Great Earbuds!!!
body: I love these earbuds and the sound quality is second to none. The wireless charging case is a true bonus.

title: Terrible connectivity - hardly any noise cancellation
body:
These earbuds are garbage. The biggest issue is the connectivity consistently cuts out on the left earbud and often enough on the right as well. (phone pairs to right bud, then right pairs to left) If I have my phone in my pocket the sound cuts out, when I have it in my workout sleeve it cuts out, when I breathe it cuts out. I have my phone on my desk with these in as I type this and it's cutting out for no reason.

I didn't expect much noise cancellation given the price but I can hear someones conversation as clear as if I was just playing music next to me.  Avoid these at all costs. Just do yourself a favor and spend the extra cash on a decent pair.

I do find them comfortable and they stay in my ears while I run. So that's two positives.

title: Great for working out
body: I love these! I wear them to workout. They are lightweight, they stay put nicely and they have good sound quality. I like that they are wire-free. Running with a wire bouncing around in front of me or behind my head is annoying.

title: Great sound and a good price
body: Just got them yesterday and so far they are great. Paired easily with my phone and sound great. I like that I can use just the right one while riding my bike. They stay in your ears really well too

title: No problems what so ever
body: Excellent pair of Bluetooth headphones. Fit comfortably in your ear and do not fall out even with constant movement. Sound quality is amazing for the price and you can either wear one at a time or both and when the battery runs low just pop em back in the case and they instantly start charging. The battery life for 1 earbud runs 5 hours and just switch it to the other for another 5 hours or use both. It’s an excellent buy you won’t be disappointed.

title: Love these so much ,I got my wife a set !
body: These earbuds are amazingly easy to connect to any device ! they are crisp, clear, and comfortable. Hooked up to tablet ,phone, bluetooth speaker or any device, they perform. Wife loves running with them (no wires).Get em !!!!

title: Great True Wireless Earbuds for the Price...and FRUSTRATING!
body:
When I first got these earbuds, I was impressed. Setup was a breeze. Fit (once I found the right earpiece size, which was supplied in the packaging) is perfect. Sound controls were intuitive and easy to operate. Most importantly, though, I was really impressed with the sound quality. If you're looking for top of the line, best sound quality earbuds out there - these aren't for you. But if you're looking for good earbuds, with very good sound quality, and a fantastic price, well, now you know why I bought them.

So, why did I only give the earbuds two stars, you might be asking. They won't disconnect or turn off. Mine might be faulty, but they stay connected to my phone at all times - even when returned to their case for a recharge. Inside the case, they stay on until they've ran out the entire battery life of both the case and the earbuds. I expected once they were in the case and the case closed that the buds would turn off and disconnect from bluetooth, but so far, I've not been able to get them to do that. I have read and followed the instructions; and, like I said, perhaps mine are just faulty. But it's very frustrating.

I'll update this review if I figure out what's going on and determine it was user error, which could be the case. But, this ain't my first rodeo. :-|

title: Excellent value and great quality wireless earbuds
body: I’ve used these for two days and so far, I’m very happy. The sound quality is great for music and spoken word.  The battery life is right in line with competitors, about 4 hours. I love the ability to recharge the case on a wireless charging pad or via usb. Noose cancelling is reasonably good, though I haven’t tried on a plane yet. The Bluetooth range for me has been about 10 feet.  In summary, I think these represent the best value in truly wireless earbuds.

title: Left earbud keeps losing audio.
body: The sound quality is amazing. Some of my friends say its better then Air Pods from apple. With that being said, my left one keeps losing sound as if it disconnects. I have to tap on it to get the sound back, then it goes out again and i keep having to tap on it. I mean I dont know if i got a bad one or what but its just the left side, the right one is always connected. Ill fix my ratings once I can get help from the support team!

title: Great product!
body:
A commuter’s perspective

I commute to and from Seattle for work using the train system so I rely heavily on music to make my experience a positive one. I had previously owned Apple airpods and had been looking for a better product when I came across these. It’s great that multiple earbud sizes come with this product because my ears aren’t evenly sized. They feel secure and the sound is much more enveloping than the Apple airpods. These wireless headphones are totally superior to the airpods: better battery life, better custom fit, more wholesome sound. They even work great as earplugs. The train station is a really loud place so these headphones have also been great to muffle the noise for ear protection. Taking phone calls are also very easy and so far I haven’t had any issues with static or failing parts. Great quality for the price. Wish I found them sooner!

title: Not quite there
body: I go through a lot of bluetooth earbuds like this model and these have been the least comfortable. They constantly fall out of my ears even during weight training. You can forget about it on a run. Sound quality is great. seem to be water tight, but too early to tell how they will stand up. I have to get another brand for my runs. the search continues.

title: Good headphones, excellent customer service
body:
UPDATED REVIEW: Tozo contacted me and sent me a new pair of headphones as well as a wireless charger to apologize for the defective pair I received.  Both work perfectly and their customer service was fantastic. Definitely recommend!

Original Review:
I really wanted these to work.  Unfortunately, the music kept stopping and starting, and then about 3 hours of sitting in my purse (maybe on, but not being used) they wouldn't turn on.  Additionally, the microphone sounded like I was speaking through a tunnel.

title: Update
body: I received these recently and so far so good. They sound great I listen during workouts. They don't slip out. The range is pretty good you dont have to carry your phone in your pocket.  Overall a good experience thus far. Update: I really love these I didnt expect a $50 earbud to last this long. I like that you can use one at a time. The range is great, I walk around and no one thinks anything. My rating went from 4 to 5 nice product.

title: Love them
body: I just got these and OMG they fit perfectly!! They don’t fall out of my ears and are SO lightweight it’s easy to forget they are there.  The sound quality is good but it cuts out abit if I shifted too much I still had perfect sound in the other bud.. so it wasn’t bad just minor.  I think it’s possible to reset them if this is a bother.  I like them and will likely be getting another set just so I can have them on for more of the work day and not have to wait while they charge.

title: Truly wireless bluetooth earbuds, never thought I'd see the day.
body: I've always listened to music my entire life, from cassette players, to cd, and finally apple products starting with the ipod Nano, over the course of all these devices there has been  one consistent issue, Headphone/Earbud Longevity, whether it's from me simply moving about as I listen to music, or perhaps it's from when you put your Headphones/Earbuds away in your pocket, bag, etc, but I've rarely ever have had a pair of either last more than three months or so, then come along bluetooth earbuds and it seemed like my issue was finally resolved, and while yes they did in fact last longer than earbuds and headphones connected to the device they still had the issue of a wire or cable connecting them which again lead to longevity issues, but now with these new earbuds that issue is a thing of the past, I'm allowed to move as freely as I want and I even have a perfect charging station/carry case for my earbuds that completely negates any potential wear and tear damage, so if you're looking for a pair of TRULY wireless earbuds then I highly recommend these, they're EXACTLY what i've been waiting for for YEARS and I am extremely satisfied with my purchase overall.

title: IPX8 + Deep Bass!
body: I was recommended this product by my co-worker, and I was a bit skeptical at first. First, I was unsure of the brand itself, and then I was unsure of the quality. However, I took a leap of faith, and ordered the earbuds. After receiving them, I charged the case/earbuds for 1 hour, and used them while I went out for a run. Generally, anything in ear tends to get sweaty and falls out for me, so I use over the ear, DJ style, headphones while I workout. These little buds stayed up, did not get sweaty, and the BASSS! The bass was deep, rich, and of some of the best quality i've ever heard in headphones/ear buds. I used to listen to music using August EP650 headphones, and i absolutely love those, but a little bit of moisture, and those would turn off. I went through my run, in light rain, wearing these buds, and they still work; thus the IPX8 rating checks out for now. I still want to test them while I swim in a pool. Overall, great little product, price point is unbeatable, the sleek design is enticing, and the noise cancellation is of decent quality for a product that doesn't even mention noise cancellation. DEFINITELY BUY THESE!

title: Great product!
body: Bought these for my son for his birthday.  He really likes them alot.  better than the last pair i bought from a different brand that was around the same price.  very easy to set up.  Sounds great! I would recommend these.

title: Surprisingly pleased
body:
I have to say I was a little hesitant at first buying anything other than market recognized brands but this did work well for me.

Pros:

* Very good comfort as sometimes I forget they are in my ears
* Very good sound quality. Even at 74% volume, I feel it's pretty high.
* Wireless charging is a huge plus. No one liked micro USB ports/ wires.
* Battery life has been great so far

Cons :

* There is a bit of lag when watching videos, esp fast paced. You can see that the sound you hear is sometimes not in sync with the video.
* Disconnecting from one device and connecting to another is sometimes frustrating that you have to put them back in the case and retrieve them with a new connection.

However, I don't see them as cons per se, since I normally listen to music and not watch too many videos, nor re-connecting to new device taking 5 more seconds out of my life a huge deal.

I had an issue with the microphone at first but powered down and back up on the individual earbuds, since then people can hear me fine.

For the price, I think its a solid deal.

title: UPDATED: Bluetooth sucks.
body:
UPDATE: 9/10/19
SO BUMMED!! Love the features, the look and sound quality is great EXCEPT the left earbud, which only connects to the master right earbud, cuts out constantly! Sending them back and going to try a different Chinese no-name brand, or drop double the price for some decent quality.

ORIGINAL REVIEW:
I purchase a lot of things on Amazon, because if the product turns out to be a dud, Amazon is very good with returns. So, I took a chance on an obviously Chinese-based wireless earbuds manufacturer, since they had quite a few reviews and the features and design looked good. And the price was pretty good too, at around $50 USD.

These wireless earbuds have exceeded my expectations! Sound quality is strong, great low-end tones, very little distortion (and I only heard it at max volume listening to a bass-heavy song).

PROS:
-Good sound quality
-Charging dock uses wireless charging or USB
-Sturdy build, but comfortable
-Waterproof (good for sweat)

CONS:
-batter life was lacking. Mine died after about 2 hours of almost max volume use
-Lack functionality buttons. The single button on each earbud only paused/played, but didn't control volume or advance to next song (though, there might be more features to these buttons than I've figured out yet).

Overall - I would recommend! (NOT ANYMORE, SEE UPDATE)

title: Excellent sound.
body: Excellent sound, easy pairing, comfortable, and doesn’t fall out while working out.  Drawbacks - only 2.5 hour battery life, and you can’t use the charging case as a portable power pack for charging other items in a pinch.

title: Very good quality
body: These ear buds are amazing! They have different fittings for your ear so they will not fall out and I’ve worked out in them before. The volume can get decently loud and the battery life is pretty good. I also had to go through customer service about some warranty questions and they were very helpful and so easily reached out to. I got a reply very soon after I sent the email and the representative helping me was very kind and helpful.

title: Great purchase
body: Great battery life.  They clearly label which headphone is which side, which makes pairing easier, too.  Noise cancelling for days; I can't even hear my girlfriend screaming at me when she's 2 feet away.  They stay in through a workout.  Good sound quality, but a bit heavy on the bass.  I would definitely recommend.  I wish the charging case was less bulky is all.

title: I wear mine to run outside on the road - and have loved them
body: I purchased my earbuds in January, 2019 and run outside nearly every day.  I link the earbuds with my FitBit and they've been great.  I actually purchased this pair because my plan was to use them swimming which I haven't done, however, like to have the confidence that they will not be damaged by sweat or rain.  And because I'm running outside on the road I like that I can still hear some traffic noise - but not excessive.

title: Good sound...BUT
body:
I've had these for about a week and these definitely are not my 1st pair of wireless earbuds...

Pros:
1. Sound is good and unlike the wireless headphones that wrap around the neck, these have really good base

2. Not as sensitive to backround noise when talking on the phone.

Cons:
1. To change songs you HAVE TO take out your phone. These dont allow you to change songs any other way.

2. If you have 1 earbud in and decide to put the 2nd one in after say 10 minutes, it's a bitch to get both earbuds to play music.

3. People keep saying that I sound like I'm talking low when I'm on the phone.

4. At times it completely disconnects from my phone

5. The carrying case is pretty big, can be uncomfortable in pockets.

I'm returning these and ordering a different pair.

title: THE BEST EARBUDS
body:
My husband ordered these for me since my iPhone started giving me problem with being able to hear callers. He ordered them got them a few days later charged them picked the smaller size ear caps that come with it. Once we paired them with the iPhone it was wonderful I could hear who I was talking to with no issues clear connection no interference at all.  Just turn them in your ear the way the instruction manual says you will no issues.
The price is also the best price!!! I just could not justify spending $145.00 for apple ipods.  These are one of the best ear buds out on the market.

title: Heaven in my ears!!!
body: Buddy at work had these amdentiomes how well they blocked noise and that the bass was good too! Wow! 10 of us at work just moved into a communal open office. These ear buds block 85% of the loudest person and the bass is fantastic and and and they stay in my ears when doing any manner of CrossFit exercises. 4 hours battery life then a lunch break to charge, and then another 4 hours. These have been fantastic. And they handle phone calls really well with good audio too. We have a winner. Major big bang for buck.

title: Update to my original review to 5-stars
body: I had originally given these earbuds a 2-star rating for the left earpiece losing connection to the right, primary, earpiece whenever I moved my head. Customer service reached out via email the next day apologizing for the poor performance and only asked for original order number so they could send another pair free of charge. I replied and received the second set the following day. I've been using these for the past couple of days and I can say that I"m impressed with the performance now. When I'm watching training videos and only using one piece, I'm using the left one and I'm not having any dropped connections to the primary. When at work I like to tune people out by listening to music and the sound quality is right up there with the more expensive headphones I use for gaming. 5-stars for customer service and 5-stars for how the product performs.

title: TOTALLY WASTED MONEY
body: I wanted to wait a couple of weeks to review to give them a chance to work. They rarely worked at the same time. One ear would be on, the other not. Didn’t answer a call correctly. NOT a comfortable fit, tried out 3 sizes, and they still fell out on a WALK. and there was an odd static sound when no audio was being played. Gave them to my older son, he couldn’t find a correct fit for his ears and thought they were cumbersome. Too late to return, no one in the family wants them, so I am out $50+.

title: Very good quality for the price you pay
body: Everything works well, from easy bluetooth pairing to fine noise cancellation. These are good quality wireless headphones. The downside is that the sound will bounce around from left to right occasionally, which is a little bit bothersome.

title: Fantastic product and here’s why
body:
I have had these for over two weeks and have had an amazing experience with them. Probably the only downfall is that when I eat they fall out sometimes, otherwise they stay put for hours on end. I haven’t tried the mic with calls with them so I can’t comment on the quality there but according the the comments I’ve seen the mic is really bad. Like I said I have no idea though. The bass is AMAZING. The sound quality definitely caters towards music. So if that’s why you’re buying them for they’re great.
Now to address some of the bad reviews I’ve seen; I have not had a single problem with disconnections. I can be on the second floor of the house and they still have perfect connection.
Now if you have one bud in and want to put the second one in as well, you will have to put both back into their case and start the connection over again. Otherwise you’ll only have audio in on bud.
TLDR; they’re great and I haven’t had a single complaint or problem with them :)

title: The design is amazing
body: Since the time that I took them out from the box, I felt in love immediately. The design and the lights that come from the earbuds really surprised me. I put them on to try the sound, and it was perfect they cover your ears completely and the experience is so comfortable and enjoyable. I don’t regret at all for buying them.

title: Noise cancellation almost too good!
body: These wireless bluetooth headphones are amazing. I was blown away the first time I popped them in and turned on some music and was instantly amazed by the sound quality and bass. I wish the battery life lasted a little longer though but it is what it is. I work in a warehouse setting with machinery and forklifts driving around so these headphones work great as an alternative to ear plugs with their noise cancellation. But it almost works too well, when both headphones are in I legitimately can't hear anything going on around me. Which is fantastic in other situations, so a positive and a negative depending on the situation. All in all, these are great headphones with great sound quality.

title: I'd definitely recommend as a decently priced, waterproof, COMFORTABLE and nice sounding earbud.
body: The ear buds and the charging case they come in are great and customer service was the best experience I've ever had. They even emailed ME to make sure everything was up to par, which it was. The bass sounds awesome and the highs are crisp and possibly a little sharp but not enough to take away from the listener's experience. The waterproof rating is awesome so I can even listen to them in the shower if I wanted to. You won't find many with that high of a rating. Also, the charging case has the same waterproof rating of ipx8(just a little sidenote). They do have a nice Bluetooth range of 10 meters or about 36 feet and even at that distance it's still got a decent connection; any further and they will cut out too much. I found it interesting that when I was using the left earbud and had my phone with me, but the right earbud(the master earbud) was left in my room, the left would cut out until I was near the right one again even if I left my phone on the back porch. So the right earbud is the one that holds the connection, but you can still use each one individually, and the connection will be fine. I purchased the 3 year extended warranty without knowing the product comes with a 1 year extended warranty that is super easy to sign up for; just scan the QR code that comes in the package, which takes you to the website, enter in your amazon order number and that's basically it. They not only emailed me to make sure I was happy with their product, but they offered me a COMPLETELY FREE, no strings attached (no pun intended)wireless charger! That goes BEYOND customer service in my opinion. I'm glad I didn't order one beforehand(which I seriously contemplated). All in all they are a great sounding, comfortable set of waterproof earbuds with an excellent battery life, and the charging case doubles as a power bank to charge your phone. The 1 year extended warranty included is decent, and customer service is alone worth well more than the money you spend on this item, especially since they offered me the completely free wireless charger to make sure I'm happy. If you're interested in purchasing, just seal the deal. You WILL be happy.

title: Worth the buy
body: I am an avid runner and occasional gym goer so I've been in the market for a new pair of bluetooth headphones for a while. I was using the over-the-ear bluetooth Beats and they have been awesome but were a few years old. I came across these browsing one night and decided to purchase, they are way more affordable than the $250 Beats in-the-ear headphones. I've used them several times since I got them and have really enjoyed them. You could imagine my panic the other night when I realized I left them in my shorts pocket after the gym and had already washed AND dried my clothes! I just knew they would be ruined. I expected them to either not work at all or to sound like someone was singing underwater. To my surprise, they still worked perfectly! I've used them about 3 times since then and haven't had any issues so I'd say they are worth the buy!

title: Incredible sound
body: These earbuds are surprisingly great quality for such an affordable price. Unfortunately, mine stopped charging, but I was able to contact seller for free warranty replacement with no hassle.

title: Worth the cost of name brand, better quality, and cheaper
body:
These earbuds have already really impressed me, I had been trying to find a good pair of truly wireless earbuds and looked at JBL, Bose, and scull candy and all of the reviews were very sub par and if I was going to pay anywhere from $100-200 for earbuds I wanted them to be quality. I found these on Amazon because they were very highly rated and had over 8000 reviewers, me at others had 100 reviewers at best. I assumed with that many positive reviews they must be doing something right so I picked these up for $50 and it was a great decision.

The packaging was very high quality, well protected and packed, free 1 year extended warranty right at the front of the box. These were super intuitive and worked right out of the box, both the earbuds and the case had charges, the buds paired without problem with each other and almost as easily with my phone. I love that when I pull these out of the case they turn on and shut off when I put them back, they automatically pair with each other when I pull them both out. Another feature that makes these an absolute winner is that they can be paired separately. I wear these a lot when working and in an industrial environment you always have to be able to hear what is going on around you. It takes a minute for the individual bud to stop searching for it's pair but when it's done it works flawlessly, I can also pair the left separate so I can use one untill the battery runs out and then swap. I used just one for close to 8 hours only throwing it back in the case for 15 minutes at a time while I was on break. I was able to walk upto 50 feet away with no dropping or sound degradation, I did have some drops with it in my back pocket but for the most part there has been no issue.

They also fit very well, I use the smallest buds and they fit snug and secure and don't fall out while I'm moving around.

The sound is really good quality, I hate earbuds that give that flat and hallow sound and these aren't anywhere close to that, they may not be concert quality but it sounds good in every range, the bass is really good and you can definitely feel it. They put out solid volume so I can rock out when I want and they seal well and keep out most ambient sounds even at lower volume.

So far I have no real complaints and would highly recommend picking up these over spending significantly more on worse quality buds.

title: Worth it!
body: I received my earbuds yesterday and immediately put them to work. I paired with three devices, MacBook, iPhone and iPad Pro. The MacBook had a little “dead spot” when I would turn my head but my Mac is older. No issues with other two devices. I made several phone calls, listened to music and even took a shower:) while listening to music from iPhone. Sound is great, the medium size cups worked for my ear holes. Price for these earbuds was fine with me.

title: Great idea...but doesn't actually stay secure
body: I love the idea of these earbuds and really wanted them to work. I tried all of the rubber pieces. None allowed the earbuds to stay firmly in place no matter how I twisted to insert them.  The downside of completely wireless earbuds is if they do fall out the crash to the ground.

title: Do not work for swimming!!!
body: They’re great for running but in pool unless you’re using a kickboard the Bluetooth will constantly cut out

title: Inexpensive yet premium., recommend you look at these.
body: These are amazing earbuds for the price. Sound quality I would rate up there with most top brands such as Bose, JBL, etc. fit and finish are excellent and love how the case can be charged with a Qi charging pad. Not to mention it makes a cool evil robot face:-) overall surprised and satisfied with this purchase. These were better than my Motorola verve one earbuds. I would recommend you give these a try.

title: Best bang for your hard-earned bucks.
body: I have these paired to an iPhone 8+. You can use them individually if you pair each one to your phone. After the simple initial pairing process these will auto-pair to your phone but it will take up to a minute to do automatically. It isn’t a problem but is longer than most people are use to waiting. The sound quality is phenominal even out of the box for what you are paying for. I have had earbuds from klipsch that are on par that cost a lot more. The buds are comfortable and come with four sizes of gummies to fit your ear. They are capable of being really loud so beware. Once fitted properly, it’s rare I ever go above sixty percent volume. I like a fairly natural sound because I listen to many different type of music. I don’t need to use the Apple ear for anything I listen to with the T10s. They make everything I listen to sing. They have definitely made a fan of me. They are great in the shower as well. I like the fact that you can charge the case wirelessly on a Qi pad or with the included micro usb cable. It’s always nice to have options.If you choose to give these a try, I think you will be hard- pressed to find a pair that beats them at even twice or three times the cost.

title: Great Sound
body: I have enjoyed my set so far.  They were easy to pair to my phone.  Looks great and fits well.  Quick recharging time as well.  The only thing I have found so far is that you cannot pair them individually.  I only listen with my right bud because I have it in at work.  I can't use both at the office.  So when the right one dies, I cannot cycle to the left bud only.  Also, my package didn't come with the different size silicone ear canal things to swap out.  Thankfully, the size that came on them work okay.

title: Great for the Price Point
body: I was very satisfied with the battery life and sound quality of the earbuds. I did have some people tell me that it was heard to hear me on phone calls and that my voice would break or that background noise would easily overpower my voice. Other than that, i think everything about this product is great and as advertised. I would definitely recommend them at the current cost, great value!!

title: Great Earbuds Great Price
body: Great Earbuds with the great specs I was looking for. Small form factor, high IPX8 waterproofing, wireless charging, can use one at a time. Multiple ear piece sizes to ensure good fit. Quality seems nice. Easy to pair. Customer service seems responsive. Have had a few drop outs for a second or two from one ear piece or the other, but over all satisfied with the quality and price. I wish there were more controls on the earbuds for things like volume or skip tracks. As is the only thing you can control is answer/hangup call, redial last, reject call, and play/pause. I would rather see these call features replaced with music controls.

title: Great value earbuds
body:
This is a great pair of earbuds for the following reasons:
1. Easy setup - I plugged them into my ears and it recongnized and connected right when I touched on the bluetooth
2. Good sound quality - The sound is great. The bass is great. Satisfactory.
3. Comfortable fitting - No problem w the earbuds staying in my ears.
4. Great price - there are not a lot out there with this price and this value. I recommend this product!

title: Convenient to use, and great quality for the price
body:
UPDATE: I put these through the wash, and they STILL WORK.  Did not expect something at that price point to actually be fully waterproof.

I have used these earbuds far more than any other earphones I have owned.

1. These earbuds definitely block sound, which is great for indoor workouts, but I wouldn't say it's great for "sport" or outdoor runs.  You really can't hear anyone speaking to you or cars coming up behind you.
2. Super convenient to carry around due to the small charging/carrying case.
3. Great battery life.  I occasionally place the charging case on the wireless charger built into my Toyota Tacoma and I haven't had to worry about the battery since I purchased them - the earbuds are always fully charged!
4. No more messing with wires or holding a button for 3-5 seconds to turn them on.  Remove them from the case and pop them in your ears, and it takes about 2 seconds to turn both L and R on, and about 5-15 seconds to connect automatically (after you connect to the phone the first time) to your Bluetooth device.  When you are done, don't mess with turning them off - just plop them back into the case and let it close with a satisfying magnetic snap.
5. They are light enough that I can't get them to fall out, even if I shake my head really hard.  However, if you already have wet ears from showering or sweating, they do slip out a bit so the sound quality suffers.  That is an issue with any earbud that does not have extra ear support.
6. I accidentally field tested the waterproofing quality after dropping one in the shower.  It smacked onto the metal and got pretty submerged for a second (about as long as it takes to swear twice), but they still work great!

title: Great design, faulty execution
body:
These headphones are great in concept.  They are completely wireless, pairing to each other and the device.  They have a storage container that serves as storage and the charging station (and has a small internal battery so you can charge the headphones while away from home) which is handy and eliminates the need to charge them independently or with a cord.  They have a pretty good range and sound quality.

However, about a week after receiving my headphones the left one stopped working.  I'm not sure if the charging stopped or if there was some other issue.  It won't charge in either the right or left slot of the docking station so it's definitely the headphone itself that is defective.  I still use the right headphone when I'm working out or on my commute, but given the price I would definitely look for another product.

title: Best bang for your buck!
body: These headphones are pretty good! The high and mid range sound is nice and clear, the bass is very nice as well, not too much, not too little, nice and lightweight design! Perfect for any occasion! 10/10 recommend getting these headphones!

title: I really wanted these to work for me, but...
body: They fit great, the battery life was good and they sounded fine... But the signal would drop constantly. I'm pretty sure that most of the issue was caused by interference from other Bluetooth devices within about 10 feet. For example, I'd have terrible connectivity problems if I had my Fitbit Charge 2 on my wrist. It would get worse if I raised my hand above chest level and got it more than about 18 inches from the headphones. I'd get pretty good connections if I was alone in my house, but forget about walking around outside or in an office setting. I live in San Francisco, and the streets are crowded with tons of people - and I noticed that if anyone with iPhone Bluetooth ear buds got within about 10-feet of me, I'd lose first the left ear, then the right. It would clear up about 3 seconds later after I'd passed the 20-foot mark away from the other Bluetooth user. This left me feeling certain that the problem was with interference from other Bluetooth devices. For the way I intended to use these earphones, that just wouldn't cut it. I've returned them after two weeks of trying to make them work and I'll be replacing them with something else.

title: Do not hesitate to buy! They are worth it.
body: The fit and finish is great on these ear buds. They are sleek, non intrusive, and they sound great for their price! I’ve had many others, and am a bit picky on earbuds but these meet and exceed my requirements! The sound is rich. The battery life is long, the charger is handy, and the different size ear pieces make it customizable to fit anyone’s ears. I would totally buy these again.

title: Super nice headphones.
body: These headphones have superb bass sound. I knew it said they did, but when I turned them on the first time, I was blown away. I didn't expect them to have near what they did. I've tried at least five different earphones/earbuds and none (not even the Apple pair that came with an iPhone and was ruined after going through the washer) had near as good as bass. The only problem is my phone. It recently started pairing all Bluetooth devices as [name unknown]. Also, I'm not sure if it's my phone or the earbuds, the left earbud will cut out every five seconds sometimes. This only happens every once in a while and I found that pausing the music with the earbuds, waiting about three seconds, and then playing the music again will stop the cutting out. One theory I have is that my phone has version 3.0 Bluetooth and these earbuds have version 5.0. But overall, these earbuds are very durable, waterproof (unlike the Apple ones), and have superb bass. To use them is also very simple. Once they are paired with your phone, simply turn them both on, (or take them out of the charging case, they turn on automatically) let them connect with each other, and then the right earbud will connect with your phone. Then let bass rumble! You can also use just one of the earbuds if you want too, although you don't as good of sound. When I use these earbuds, I turn the volume on my phone clear down to 1 as the buds are quite loud and cancel sound very well. With the volume on 1 in a quiet room, I can't hear a person talking to me from three feet away AT ALL. This also saves your phone battery as it doesn't have to create as strong of a signal. I do wish they wouldn't cut out though. Also, the case won't take a charge from most charging cables, however, it works with some cables. Still, the seller is so nice, he's going to send me a free wireless charger. By the way, he offered to send me one before I told him my case wouldn't charge. That's what you call customer service! It came the other day. It's worth $20. And they sent it completely free. Works awesome, the only down thing is, my phone doesn't support wireless charging. :) Altogether, they get a five-star rating.

title: Great Product ...even in desert heat
body: These earbuds are amazing quality for an amazing price. They have great sound quality and are very comfortable. I've tried cheap bluetooth headphones with wires and hated how they got tangled and caught in everything.  I've tried expensive ones such as Beats by Dre and Bragi...these beat them at an incredible price. Live in the Southwest USA...VERY HOT...and with heat they work great...even when I am sweating buckets. Excellent value!

title: TOZO T10 The Best Bluetooth Earbuds I Have Ever Purchased
body: The sound quality is excellent with nice bass.  The battery life is longer that others I have used.  Totally recommend these TOZO T10 Earbuds.

title: Buy something else
body: if I step more than five feet from my phone, the signal gets choppy. I use to be able to go at least 15-20 feet before. So basically I need to keep it on my person at all times.  Not good at all

title: Great Design! Great Sound! Great Value!
body:
I had considered several different brands of Bluetooth wireless headphones, but after comparing prices and reading the reviews I decided to go with the TOZO T10.
The first thing I noticed upon opening the package was the elegant design of the product.  They paired to my iPhone easier than any previous device!  The sound was amazingly crisp...I have not experienced any static associated with signal interruptions.  The controls are intuitively positioned and easy to master.
So far, the TOZO T10 has exceeded all of my expectations...superior design, amazing sound, top quality and impeccable value!
Buy this product!

title: Great value!
body: These were simple to use, and they work great. The included ear tips helped me find the right fit so the earbuds are secure in my ears. I wish the volume could have a finer adjustment as I wore these with the sound on “one bar” on my phone and while not uncomfortable, I wish I could have turned the volume down more to allow me to hear my surroundings. Overall, great purchase for the price and performance!

title: Hurt my ears!!
body: I haven't truly used these for more than 5 minutes yet...but from what I have listened they are pretty loud...I have it 4 stars because they are not very comfortable in my ears.  I had to use another earbud cushion so it is more comfortable...

title: Well worth the money!!
body:
I was really impressed my this product. The charging case is sturdy and the top opens all the way. Comes with 3 sets of ear buds. I had a hard time finding the right set at first but once I figured out the proper way to wear them. They are awesome. Great sound for the price. I usually buy a pair of wired set every week so I am excited to get these. I put a clip on the charging box and wear it on my short loop so I have a constant way to charge for all day use
 I have found like others the battery last about 4 hours. I have not had any complaint from people being able to hear me on a call.

title: Happily Surprised
body: I'm always hesitant to buy electronics like this off Amazon.  It's been pretty hit and miss in the past.  Quite pleased with this product.  The sound quality is great.  I have no issue with these buds coming out of my ear during workouts.

title: They do not hold a charge
body: These do not hold a charge. I went for a run the other day and they were at a 60% charge, within 20 minutes they were dead! And that wasn't the first time. I thought it was just a fluke the first time, but unfortunately not. The sound quality is just ok.

title: 110% best wireless earbuds on the market
body: This is one of a kind wireless headphone product that I would definitely recommend to all of my colleagues and anyone who is looking for not only quality but amplified sound with excellent noise cancellation. By far this headphones has exceeded its ratings. I've had many pairs of headphones throughout my life but I was tired of the tangleness, messiness, constantly in the way of wires. Until I bought these. They not only have changed my perception of the future but has opened my eyes to a virtually better sound and better music. Impossible is possible with these headphones!! I fully support this brand and hope that they will make it to the market one day.

title: Good buy
body:
I love these so far! I had a hard time picking out a new pair of wireless ear buds. My last pair (totally different brand) was sub par. I've been waiting to have a reason to buy a replacement and finally they broke. Lol.
 I haven't had these for long, but so far, no complaints. The sound quality is good. So far, they are sweat proof. All in all, a good buy. They are already better than the last pair I had.

title: No Joke, these are THE BEST I EVER HEARD
body:
THIS IS AN ENTHUSIASTICALLY WRITTEN POSITIVE REVIEW!
Usually when Amazon or a seller asks me for a review about an item I purchased, I tend to accommodate them even if my opinion was less than stellar. I'll tell the truth about my likes and dislikes so that others could make a more informed decision about the item.
I've tried so so many earbuds over the years. They would either not fit well, fall out, sound brash with too much high end / no low end, get uncomfortable after a very short time, etc., I NEVER found earbuds that were satisfactory, let alone excellent. Once these earbuds are placed in the ear canal, I feel like I can use a trampoline and they'll still stay in. Not only that, the sound is AMAZINGLY GOOD. No kidding. I'm a lifelong musician and hate listening to music that is badly reproduced by crappy audio equipment. These buds provide a strong punchy bass, nice separation and the mids and highs are just about perfect. Seriously, you don't know me but take my word on this. This review has been a pleasure to write. It's honest and gratifying to think that someone might buy these buds because of this review.  I really think you'll be pleased with them. These earbuds are INEXPENSIVE AND FAR SUPERIOR  to anything I've tried in the past. I highly recommend buying them before they become TOO desirable and expensive :) PS: They are also the simplest earbuds to pair and connect to a source.

title: Large and in charge
body:
I’m not an audiophile by any means so for me, these sound great. They get pretty loud without the volume being turned all the way up.

Unfortunately, I was looking for earbuds that fit flush into my ear and doesn’t make me look like an early model cyberman. These are def not it. They are humongous! They look like they’re literally falling out of my ear and I have to readjust them often to make sure they stay in.  The charging case is very good quality but that is also extremely large.

Every now and then, the sound on the left ear bud would also cut out when I’m walking even with my phone in my hand.

These would honestly be such a good buy if only it weren’t so conspicuous.

title: Great sound, charging, pairing, fit.
body: Very happy with these so far, I work in an open office environment that is loud so these drown that out, sound great when playing music, and can take phone calls seamlessly. The pairing is easy every time, I don’t run but am pretty active at work and walk an industrial environment many times daily and haven’t had issues with them falling out. The charging case works great and charges wirelessly smoothly. No complaints.

title: Shocked at how disappointed I am
body: Shockingly disappointed in these. Had so many great reviews but after having worn them twice- I’ll probably never wear them again. Work okay in the ear when you’re dry and not really moving but even when I was putting on my makeup I had to readjust them a couple of times. Then I got home from work and decided to put them on in the shower bc they’re waterproof and I’m pretty sure the ear piece tried to suck my tympanic membrane out of my ear canal. Yes these are waterproof. No they do not stay in your ear when wet and if you try to push them back in while wet it creates a suction cup (that only lasts a second and then they fall out again) to your ear canal and it hurts horribly. So no I don’t recommend these to anyone and I should have just spent the money and gotten AirPods

title: Meh... Not great not bad...
body: I really like the quality however the beeping when you only pair 1 earbud is super annoying & it seems to be no way to turn it off after it beeps intermittently for a few mins. Other than that the bluetooth seems to disconnect after a while during phone calls

title: These Headphones Make Everything Easier!
body: I love these headphones. I just got them a few days ago to replace my current workout headphones which were just the Apple brand corded kind. I was looking for a good sound quality and a great ability to stay in as well, and found both in these. My husband has a pair of over $100 Jaybird headphones and they aren’t nearly as good of quality as these. We’re looking to get a pair for him too! Also, the customer service is awesome and they offer a year warranty for free!!

title: Great sound
body:
These have great sound, and a real quality feel to them.
They come with different sizes of pads to fit most ears.
Stay in great while I'm at the gym.
I would definitely recommend these to anyone looking for wireless earbuds.

title: It doesn't get better than this..buy'em.
body: I tried and returned at least 4 ear buds from other companies until I found these little powerful extremely comfortable almost invisible gems...holy crap...these earbuds are off the scale amazing...base is perfect..deep..and full..and RICH...the highs are perfect....the sound clean and flawless...50 bucks?...is this company nuts?...they could get hundreds EASY CHEASY PEASY they are that good..what a freakin steal...the charge case just blew me away...magnetic pull when you pop them into the case is powerful...the led lights on the ear buds to let you know they are charged is awesome..and the carry box has its own battery..so I can charge the carry case...then slip the ear buds in many times to keeps charging the ear buds anywhere I am...genius smart..the quality of everything is top shelf....the sound quality blows me away everything I use them...and waterproof too...WTF?......you buy any other earbuds and you should be spanked and run out of town naked....I highly highly recommend them for everyone anyone and then some...think I'm impressed. ..gee..how'd you ever guess...BUY'EM...see what I'm talkin about...you'll write a review just like this one....I kid you not...kirk out

title: The best earbuds on the market
body: These are I feel one of the best if not the best earbuds on the market. They are so clear and have a great bass sound. They. Connect easy and charge fast. Why would anyone buy the crazy expensive apple crap just for the name.

title: Tozo Customer Service is GREAT!!!  T10 ear buds are also great.
body:
Tozo Customer Service is very responsive. I emailed with an issue and received a response in less than 12 hours. Tozo went above and beyond my expectations.

The left earbud fell out of my ear while I was aggressively running on a treadmill.  Don't worry, they stay in but I was really pushing it for awhile.  The treadmill sucked up the earbud and the gym was unwilling to take 4 screws out of the cover to retreive my lost earbud. I emailed Tozo with my situation, wishing to purchase a replacement left earbud.  They informed me that they do not sell single units but would send me a FREE replacement earbud which arrived within a week. I did experiance a pairing issue with the new earbud. I sent another email to customer support on a weekend and received a response within 15 hours. Problem solved in 5 minutes.

The T10's are everything advertised and the price is great. I love the waterproof feature and the wireless charging case with a lanyard.  Bass is good and the sound is clear and adequate even in a noisy gym environment.

You can't go wrong purchasing the Tozo T10's and if there is a problem, Tozo Customer Service work to make you happy. A great product at a great price with customer service to back it up.

title: Great buy at this price. I love them.
body: Very good earbuds for this price point!!! The second I took them out of the charging case the synced with each other, my cellphone found the Bluetooth signal and I was using them!! I like that the volume control is on my cellphone because past earbuds with onboard volume control would fall out when I tried to adjust the volume. These are sturdy, well made earbuds and the charging case is not only closed magnetically, but it’s see through so you can see the blue charge level lights and the earbuds lights through the lid. I’ve gotten almost five full charges from the case before I had to recharge it. I’m very glad I purchased these earbuds.

title: Awesome earbuds
body: I really like these earbuds. They are easy to pair to my phone. They stay in my ears (especially after using the correct earbud size) and the batteries seem strong. The case is very durable and charges easily by just plugging the USB to a computer. It can also be charged wirelessly; you have to buy the wireless charger separately though. The sound is awesome; you can hear the bass! The microphone is powerful. You don't have to speak loud to be heard during phone conversations. It's a good earbud to buy.

title: Was good but then...
body: I really enjoyed these the first day I used them but then out of nowhere they got really quiet. Yes, both earbuds were connected and producing sound. I'm disappointed that this happened because they are overall great earbuds. I like the design and the sound quality. I hope that I can figure this issue out myself, or I'll contact Tozo and try to get a replacement. I still would recommend these because you get a one year warranty.

title: Great solid wireless pair for the price
body: I’ve had these for a month and I’ve now passed the honeymoon phase. Definitely recommend them BUT as someone who uses them exclusively at the gym they seem to be cutting out more from the left and right ear which is annoying. Less important is the range truly isn’t long. If there’s a wall between you and your phone you’ll hear a lot of breaking up but most people will have their phone just a few feet away. If price is important as it was for me I’d say go for them. Might upgrade in a few months however.

title: Finally found my earbuds!
body: They have only been in use for a short time, but they have become my "trusted partner" for my morning walk. I am now able to listen to podcasts without the distraction of street sounds. Those sounds are muffled so still able to maintain the stroll in safety. I have used a variety of ear buds and these have outperformed them all. And they provided a bonus of a 1 year extended warranty if registered within the specified time period. Thank you TOZO

title: My 1st pair of Earbuds
body: I was a little concern about ordering these earbuds but after speaking to one of my brothers, I decided to place my order. They were delivered when I was supposed to get them.  The package they came in was just simply beautiful. It came with easy set up instructions, both earbuds worked great and the sound was just amazing with listening to music. These are my 1st set of earbuds that I've purchased, so it's taking some time getting use to them. But overall they are great.

title: Pleasantly Surprised
body: I did not expect this level of quality for the money. I love these airbuds. The sound is very good, plenty of volume. I've literally been wearing them all day with no discomfort and they effortlessly connect to my iPhone. I compared these with my daughter's apple buds and to me, there was no contest. I've never heard of Tozo before, but I'm a fan now.

title: Great if you workout hard and don't want to pay a lot.
body: Fried my last set of earbuds working out, when they didn't live up to their waterproofing hype. Got these to replace them. The sound quality is excellent. They are sturdy and I haven't sweated them to death, and I work them hard almost every day. Turns out, the IPX8 waterproofing is what I needed. They come with different size earpieces to help them fit snugly in your ears. A fine set of workout earbuds for a good price.

title: Feedback
body: Very nice, built in microphone  could use a way to adjust/increase sensitivity. These are not noise cancelling but I knew that and I find the noise isolation is great

title: Amazing sound! Very comfortable and perfect fit.
body:
This was my first time buying totally wireless Bluetooth ear buds and I couldn't be happier.
Worked as advertised right out of the box and delivered amazing sound. Almost as good as my $300 BT headphones!
Added bonus: the fit is so good that it sounds like active noise cancelling. When I first tried them in my noisy office environment I had to go back and read the product page on Amazon again to see if I'd missed a part about noise cancelling.  I've only had them for one day so I can't comment on battery life yet but I'll return and update my review when I've used them for a few battery cycles.

title: Use in the shower without worry...
body: These work as expected. Have used them in the shower to listen to books,  which do not seem to do as well on external speakers...I like the convenience of them and that the water from the shower doesn't affect them!

title: Great deal for the price
body: These earbuds are not perfect, but given the cost, they are well worth it, especially compared to AirPods. I was considering getting AirPods but was turned away by the price, so I got these instead. The sound quality is good, nothing amazing, but honestly there's nothing to complain about, especially when you can wear these wireless. It's just a compromise you have to make, and it's a good compromise. The earbuds fit very nicely, don't fall out, and aren't very noticeable when wearing. If you're looking for earbuds to wear in the gym, running, or whatever, these are a great option.

title: Great!
body: I tried these out for the first time and they work great! The sound was way better than any of the cheap BT headsets I've had before and they fit well in my ears. They also stayed put while I was running and didn't make my ears sore.

title: Not for me, but could be perfect for someone else.
body:
I never even got through the set-up of these because they wouldn't stay in my ears. So I can't provide a proper review.
That being said, know what kind of ear buds typically work for you. If you tend to use a kind like these, you'll be fine (probably).
The left and right ears are labeled clearly. The case is nice (I love the sound it makes when it shuts)- seems like a good quality. I like that the micro-USB port has a cover. And the set-up I started was very easy to do.

title: Great fit and quality!
body: I was really excited to get my new earbuds! I recently got an iPhone for work and the earbuds were a pain. These ear buds work for both of my phones as well as my laptop making it much easier to get work done. The different cover sizes are much appreciated as my ears are on the smaller side. Setup was simple, just the press of a button. The sound is exactly what I was expecting. Looking forward to getting more use out of my new find!

title: Solid, but the range is not quite great for lots of movement
body:
These are pretty solid, if the bluetooth range to the device was better, these would be the best head phones I have ever purchased. The batterylife is pretty good, the only think that stinks is the headphones won't work if the case is out of battery when you pull them out.

The range worked okay the first day, then when I put my phone in my pocket to go for a run, the sound kept going in and out. I took my phone out of my pocket and it was fine again, and if my phone was in my pocket upside down it wasn't as bad. Seems to me it needs a direct line of connection with nothing blocking the connection (my arms while running or the bottom of my pocket when it was right side up).

I use them with my laptop and they work fine, but I do not run with them in anymore.

title: Great product.
body: Ok. Overall for the money this product is amazing. Sound quality is great. And the noise cancelling is leaps and bounds better than air pods. They stay seated in my ears even when I’m riding my motorcycle. Which was what I was worried about. They pair with each other very easily. And the manufacturers are really friendly.  The charging case works top notch. And I love the wireless charging. Im able to set the case down when I get home and at night and it’s ready to go in the morning. Overall great product. Highly recommended

title: Other brands have better features, but if it’s sound quality you’re after, get these
body:
I go through a LOT of headphones/earbuds as I’m always looking for the perfect pair.
These wireless earbuds get a 4-star rating because of the sound quality and waterproof rating.  For me, the sound is superb, rivaling my Bose Quiet Comfort headphones.  I will say though, they have a heavy base, that I love, but is not for everyone.

Pros:
The audio quality is excellent!
Battery life is in line with other wireless earbuds of its category
It has a substantial battery in the case (for charging multiple times without being plugged in)

Cons:
It has nearly zero control features (pause and redial) - not having AT LEAST track forward/track back and volume is a big miss
*On this point, my Apple watch acts as the remote for the music

Meh:
I’ve tried all of the different sizes of buds and the earbuds tend to come loose from my ears without a lot of movement - I have not given up on this, though
As is the common practice with these types of earbuds, the right ear connects to the sound source (ex. IPhone) and the left ear bud connects to the right ear bud.  It’s a minor gripe, but the left earbud will go silent (for just a fraction of a second) when I tilt my head.  I sent my first pair back because it was doing this at almost any head movement.  The vendor was very responsive and replaced them.  My 2nd pair still does it, but not nearly as badly as the first.
The bluetooth range on these is not great, and requires an unobstructed line of sight (does not pass through walls well).  Again, this is minor, and I suspect it’s due to the size of the parts.

title: Incredible ear buds for the dollar
body: All around amazing ear buds. I use them for everything but mainly mowing and they block noise very well. Battery life is excellent. Sound is clean and crisp. Great bang for the buck. LOVE them. My only recommendation would be is to some how integrate a volume function and skip song function on the earbud itself.

title: GREAT Purchase!!
body: This is a GREAT buy!! I got this as a gift for my brother. And when he sent me the link on them I took the chance and got two sets. Well, since then my hubby has enjoyed them along with myself. I had one ear bud and He had the other! I was downstairs in my office listening to his tunes on his phone while he was on the 2nd floor! Yep, shared listening Impressive performance! I will be purchasing another pair for him soon!

title: Best wireless earbuds under $50
body:
These sound amazing! Pretty deep bass, very good level of treble. The noise isolation is better than any other earbuds I have owned. The case is high quality .

I haven't tested how waterproof they are, and will update the review after. Also, I haven't been able to connect it to two devices simultaneously yet, will update that as well. They lasted me 4 hours on first use.

title: Buy them!
body: I brought these because my wired bluetooth speakers kicked the bucket. I was skeptical because I thought they would constantly fall out of my ear. I was proved wrong! I can wear them on the floor at work without any issues. I typically wear just one, so I can still listen out for my patients. The buds paired really easily with my phone and stay connected without any issues.

title: I'm impressed!
body: I was in the market for some new Bluetooth earbuds and bought a pair at my local Target. I bought then base on convenience and they were on sale ($99). After using them for a week I returned them because they were too bulky and heavy for my ears. Then I came across these earbuds and thought "why not". I was super excited when received my package. I pulled out the earbuds and easily connected them to my phone with the easy to read instructions. The earbuds fit perfectly in my ear and the sound was amazing for the price I paid.

title: Not bad for the price, but a couple of flaws
body:
Product works fairly well, and the sound is better than I expected, but....

First, the screening on the product is ridiculous.  You need a flashlight and your reading glasses to figure out which piece is labeled R and which is L.  If they just colored the tubes differently the issue would be solved.

Second, the reception range on them is sub-par.  With my phone in a pocket the sound frequently drops out.  I have to walk with the phone in my hand for a steady signal.

title: Best bang for your hard earned $$$!
body: After an unfortunate incident with our washing machine, I had to replace my beloved Bose ear buds. I was apprehensive at first, but decided to go with the TOZO T10 wireless waterproof Bluetooth earbuds. They are easy to pair with your device, sound quality is second to none with a range of crisp clear highs and mids and real clean deep bass you just don’t find in many other earbuds. In my experience, you get in the ballpark of 4-5 hours battery life. The case is also your wireless charging station with its own internal battery. It can be plugged in via a standard micro usb charging cable or just sit it your wireless charger. These earbuds are a homer in in my books and if anything were ever happen to them, I would not hesitate to purchase another set!

title: I love the buds!
