body: I really love these earbuds. They have really good sound quality and the case is really streamlined to use. BUT, there are some connection issues that happen from time to time and it’s annoying when it happens. I also figured out today that the battery life is right at 3 hours, which is a little less than I was thinking. However, with all of that, I would still easily recommend them based on the value alone. For the price you pay compared to others, the few issues I have experienced are no major issue. Plus, you get a one year warranty should you have major issues.

title: Great Value!
body: This has been the quickest and easiest set up for using bluetooth, Opened the well packaged product,took it out of the well made earbud holder box and immediately the left and right earbuds paired . I was very comfortable with the earbuds fitting my ear. There are 4 different sizes included. Mine fitted perfectly in my ear without having to try on the other three. The sound is very good for the price of the earbuds. This is a great value for what you get.Very pleased with my Tozo T10 bluetooth earbuds. You can't go wrong!!

title: Left war bud keeps cutting out....
body:
If I turn my head, the left ear bud cuts out, A LOT.

I tried putting my phone in left pocket, right pocket, back pocket, etc. unless I hold phone in the right spot, the left bud cuts out.  :-(

title: So far very good.  Amazed!
body: I’ve had these earbuds for a couple of weeks and so far so good.  I have small ear canals and the device fits comfortably.  I thought these would fall out easy, but they actually stay in when moving around. I was truly surprised about the case.  It is well made and has magnets to keep it closed.  Great product for the little cost.

title: AMAZING!
body:
I am a skeptic, and as such I did not know what to expect. I used to own AirPods and I travel for work and I hated how low they are on the plane. I also hate how there is no bass.

Upon opening these I wasn’t sure what to expect, but I read the reviews and trusted them. They got here in one day and the second I put them on to hear I was blown away. They are INCREDIBLE. The sound quality is unlike anything I have heard for their price point.

If you are debating, don’t. You can always return them but I promise you that you will not!

title: Great TWS Earbuds!
body: I love these earbuds.  They fit well in my ears and sound great.  The battery life could be longer, but they charge really fast in the case.  The case can charge wirelessly with any qi charger which is an added plus.

title: Great sound and flawless performance
body:
I use sound isolating headphones when I'm out doing yard work. I enjoy listening to music when working but also need good sound isolation to protect my hearing from loud yard equipment. These headphones meet both of those requirements. As for sound isolation, at a medium volume I had no problem hearing the music over the noise from the lawn equipment.
I listen to online music - Pandora, Tunein, etc- when I use these headphones. I'm pretty particular about headphones, when it comes to sound quality. I like a full range sound, not muffled and solid bass. These have great bass, without being overpowering and clear highs. It usually takes me about 60-90 minutes to finish the yard so no issues with battery life.
I did keep track of battery life the last time that I used them. They lasted right at 3.5 hours of continuous use. I rated these at 5 stars for battery life because that is what they were advertised to last.
Connecting to the phone was easy and wireless charging worked flawlessly. There are 4 blues lights on the case that let you know the charge level of the case. They are visible through the case lid when it's closed. I've used both a Samsung wireless phone charger and an Anker charger to wirelessly charge the case.
For the price, these are a awesome buy. Now, I look forward to doing yard work. Ok, not really but it gives me an excuse to use these headphones.

title: Outstanding! Very comfortable and great sound quality!
body: I love these earbuds so far! Very comfortable, actually stay in your ear I train with them in everyday and literally have not fallen out once. Also comfortable to wear at night. I had a pair that went over the ear and were bulky so they would hurt my ear if laying on my side. With these, you can lay on your side and you can’t even feel them in your ear. 100% worth the buy! Battery has lasted 5 hrs straight so far. The charging station is also a battery. So once it’s fully charged you can take with you and charge earphones without a cord.

title: Fine but don't fit my ear
body: I gave them four stars because the only thing against them is that I can't wear them. The sound is fine, I also wanted them for their color so they are less obvious in my ears.  I have small ear canals and even with the smallest buds on them they are too tight to be comfortable for me.  I'm sure they would be fine for anyone that doesn't have this problem. I have to return them.

title: Left side cuts out
body: Works good and sounds good most the time but seems like when I use it in the gym left earbud cuts out and only works half the time very frustrating!  Don’t know if it’s from all the metal equipment or if there’s multiple frequencies going on with other wireless air buds but I can’t use them at the gym !

title: Exceeded all expectations
body: Amazing. Fantastic sound, comfortable fit, charging case comes with them, and the right bud is clickable to pause/ play. This is my first set of wireless earbuds and good god...I’m super impressed. The quality for the price really shocked me. I expected them to be about as comfortable as Apple’s, but no. These put Apple’s to shame and they’re  the same price!

title: Work great, strong customer service and support
body: These work really well, though for people new to Bluetooth headphones like me, there is a bit of a learning curve (since charging headphones isn’t  something I was used to). That said, they work really well, and my kids are always trying to steal them, which is a very good sign about the product. Their customer service and support is excellent as well.  Somehow I was thinking they had a built-in microphone, which they do not, but that’s my mistake.

title: Great quality great price!
body: I was not sure what to expect when I ordered these, but I was willing to give an unknown brand name a shot since I’m not willing to drop a Costco trip worth of money on wireless headphones(AirPods) and I wasn’t disappointed, the packaging was great, the sound quality is surprisingly adequate and the setup was so easy. I like the look and ease of them and they provide you an additional one year no questions asked warranty when you register them. I used them in the rain and had no problems. I recommend them!

title: Absolutely Phenomenal must buy
body:
These head phones are great quality for the price. The packaging is quality, the sound is quality, the carving case for the ear buds.

Note: whenever I first tested them out i wasn’t satisfied with the sound. However, I did not have them pushed in my ears all the way.
After pushing them in I realized they sounded great.

title: Awesome quality at a great price 👍
body:
My wife and I both have a pair of the T10s I also have a set of the T6.
The T10s are comfortable once you figure out the right size ear plugs to use. It comes with 4 sets of rubber tips. The more snug the fit the better the sound.
The sound quality it great once you have the right fit. I pair them with my phone to listen to music. The sound is great and the bass is punchy.
The Bluetooth connection is solid.
The battery life of both the ear buds and the charging case are great.
TOZO's customer service is also very good.
Over I'm very satisfied with the quality of the T10s especially considering the price!

title: Excellent Sound Quality for Price
body:
I've used these wireless headphones for a while now and mostly during work. They provide great quality sound comparable to my previous $100+ headphones and have that deep bass that I was searching for. I love the base as you can charge it on your charging base and is waterproof. Overall, its great value for the price and I did not have any issues.

Recommendation: Solid buy for the price

Pros:
- Excellent sound quality
- Focus on deep bass
- Wireless charging for entire pod
- Waterproof
- Great battery life
- Comes with extra ear plugs for replacement
- 1 year warranty

Cons: None

title: Better than I Thought!
body: My brother got these for my birthday. I didn't expect much from them since they were so cheap. However, these earbuds blew me away with the sound quality for the price. I used it for my whole trip in Europe. The battery life is pretty amazing as i never ran out of juice in the day. When i got back home, I bought another one of these for my father's birthday. I really recommend if you're looking for amazing quality bluetooth earbuds that are not apple or samsung.

title: Absolutely Amazing!
body: So I am an Apple person right, however I could not afford to buy Apple  AirPods and was also not very impressed with the sound and design for the cost Apple had these wireless headphones. So, needless to say I began my search for other earbuds and found these. I trusted the other reviews and purchased them and not only did they arrive the SAME DAY I ordered them, but they are amazing!! I struggled at first putting them in and having them sit comfortably but then saw a note that said there were extra ear plug sizes. I found the right one for me and honestly have enjoyed the loud, noise cancelling sound of these headphones. They remind me of beats with the great quality sound they provide. AND it comes with a FREE 1 year warranty! I totally recommend!

title: Fits my small ear canal
body: I usually have a problem finding devices that fit in side my ear comfortably. Most are too large. I was worried the earbuds would not stay in but they do. I run and these stay in place with no problems. Good price for product. Also, I like that the product comes with a one year guarantee. I would purchase this again.

title: Amazing Headphones!
body: Love these! I have the rose gold ones but bought these for my husband and they’re amazing!! My husband loves them as well! So easy to use and stay in your ear perfectly even when you sweat! I will definitely buy another pair! The sound and bass is amazing, like nothing I’ve ever heard with headphones!

title: Great Sound & Quality; Subpar Microphone
body: The sound is excellent, everything overall; highs and lows are even to one another then also the build quality of these headphones and the box they come in all excellent and high quality for the price you are paying for them. The only complaint I have is the call quality & the responsiveness of the microphone. Besides that one issue, this is a steal for the price for anyone who needs outstanding quality, great sound and something that will stay in your ears well beautiful headphones.

title: Good sound quality and fit
body:
Great in ear headphones. They block out sound pretty well. Lots of bass. This means the highs are less than stellar, but when you buy for bass at this price, it is to be expected.

They stay in surprisingly well. The default size fit me. All in all, I recommend these headphones for working out or motorcycle riding.

title: These are Excellent Ear Buds!
body: I wanted to try them out for awhile before posting a review and I must say that these ear buds are outstanding. First of all the sound quality is really good. I have had some ear buds in the past where you could hear some whitenoise in the background, especially at higher volume, but these have a really crisp and clear sound. Secondly, is they stay in your ears. I have had problems in the past with ear buds falling out of my ears, especially when jogging, but these stay in really good. Also, since they are waterproof, you can just rinse them under the hydrant when you get through with your workout and that keeps them really clean. I would highly recommend this product.

title: Spend the extra money to get a better, more reliable product!
body: *********THE CUSTOMER SERVICE WAS SPECTACULAR AND THEY SENT US A SECOND PAIR AT NO COST IN ORDER TO MAKE US SATISFIED CUSTOMERS! MY WIFE IS USING THEM WITH HER iPHONE AND iPAD AND IS VERY HAPPY!!! THANK YOU FOR GOING ABOVE AND BEYOND IN ORDER TO MAKE AN UNHAPPY CUSTOMER A HAPPY CUSTOMER!!!!! KUDOS!!!!!!!!!!**********************Very disappointed in this product. The music breaks up and interrupts during play. The syncing between the two earbuds was problematic from the moment I unpackacked to use. The second day I couldn’t even get the earbuds to synchronize. I am sending them back for a refund.

title: Great earbuds
body: These are perfect, they actually fit my ears really well, which I can't say about other bluetooth earbuds and are easy to hook up to everything - each earbud pairs separately which means I can share one when my kid loses theirs!

title: Great sound and quality for the price!
body: I bought these after seeing great reviews on Amazon, and I have to say that I wasn't disappointed. Right out of the box, the setup was easy, and the sound is very good, for a set of buds in this price range. I love the charging case, too. Great quality all around. I'd definitely recommend. One note: the left ear bud might be a bit static until you do a full reset of both buds. Easy and fast. Not sure why this is needed, but it fixed the only issue I had. The instructions recommend doing it. They stay in my ears even when jogging, too. Very nice.

title: Great quality, sound amazing, waterproof, great battery life and the charging case is really nice.
body: After doing some research I decided to buy the Tozo T10's and I am more than satisfied with these headphones. Pairing is super simple, songs are crisp and clear, bass is so powerful and they block out all other noise very well. The quality is amazing and the case is very handy for storage and charging. On top of that they're rated IPX-8 waterproofing, which altogether amounts to a great purchase that I use at the gym, outside when running, and at home when watching anything on my phone. I highly recommend.

title: Good alternative to AirPods if you don’t mind the suction type earbuds
body: It’s a really good alternative to AirPods if you don’t mind the suction earbuds. They give you 4 sizes so you can try different ones and pick the ones that work best for your ears. The battery life is my only real complaint, though I haven’t had any problems with it personally yet it could be a problem for other people.

title: Worth it
body:
Really enjoying these! Battery life seems great, haven't had to charge them yet.  I can get a pretty good distance from my phone. I use these at work (in a library) and am able to make it about halfway across our building.
I changed the ear pieces to find ones that fit and they have never fallen out. I listen to these almost the entire work day (6-8 hours) and have no issues with them falling out or disconnecting. Sound quality is fantastic. I had no trouble connecting the first time, and they connect automatically to my note 8 when taken out of the case! Definitely worth the purchase!

title: Great Quality, Great Features & Great Price!
body:
I've been using them about a week now, and they are amazing. They fit like a glove with the soft gel like silicone earpieces. There are also four different size ear pieces to ensure a good fit.
Listening to music the sound quality is amazing. On calls the sound quality is amazing, unfortunately you do have to speak in a high normal voice when you're in the public situation, but that's to be expected when there is no boom mic.
They charge quickly in the magnetic docking station, so the earbuds don't fall out if the docking station is open. The docking station can be recharged by micro USB or wireless charger, which is great as it charges quickly as well. The docking station will recharge they are buds for well more than a day's worth of use.
I love them and would highly recommend them great quality and value.

title: Great set of earbuds
body: I am very happy with this purchase.  I took my time searching Amazon for the right pair, as for me the size and weight were very important, I did not want a set of ear buds which stick out of my ears.  T10 are very compact and light while delivering an outstanding sound, the fact they are water proof is an extra bonus for me.  The build quality is very good, each ear bud sits firmly in it's position in the charging case held by a magnet, and LED indicating lights let you know exactly when they are charged.  The fit is very good and the ear buds come with multiple sets of ear pieces which ensure a great fit.  Once I settled on my size ear pieces they held my ear buds in place and I have not had any issues of them falling out.  I am very happy with this purchase and would recommend them to anyone.

title: Wonderful Sound and Fantastic Design
body:
After returning a different pair of wireless earbuds, TOZO's were the next on my list of bluetooth buds to try. Once I recieved them and put them on, I knew they were on a different playing field. When it comes to a good fit, they shine. I use the smallest size of insert and after following the given instructions, they felt right at home, barely budging and inch with vigorous head weaving and bobbing. Thankfully, this fit is not the only going for these bad boys. The sound is fantastic. Paired with the more than decent sound cancelling, the bass packs a punch I didn't think was possible on bluetooth buds like these. The depth of sound going on here is not to be passed up. I'm no expert on sound specs and quality, but I do know what sounds good, especially for the price that these TOZO buds are at. The pairing, after getting conifgured on my phone, works quickly and efficiently. The range on the bluetooth is quite good. I have yet to run into any connection problems with these buds. The battery life is just right. While I haven't driven them dry from a full charge, they shoe great promise for someone who doesn't intend to wear them every moment of the day. The charger is a nice shape, featuring simple to understand LED charge-level lights. Having the ability to wirelessly charge makes battery life a non-problem.

Overall, I love these things. The ergonomic design might produce some soreness if worn for longer than a few hours, but which earphones won't do that? Give these ear phones a chance. I'm sure they won't dissappoint.

title: Great bass sound and they stay in your ear!
body: For the price, you can't beat these ear buds. I was surpised that they fit very well and literally could not come out on their own.  Great bass as advertised but keep in mind you should select the right size ear bud cushions first before adjusting your sound on your phone or whatever device you use them for. The second to smallest size cushions were on when I opened the package and after pairing them to my phone, the bass was barely there. I adjusted my EQ to full base and it helped a little. Then I tried on the best cushions which ended up being the laregest ones and best fit AND full deep base. I had to go back an adjust EQ bass down.

title: Great product! Must buy!
body:
This is a high-quality product for the price, and I recommend it for anyone who is looking for sound quality, comfort, and looks.

No issues pairing them to my iPhone, noise cancellation is great, and sound and connectivity with phone calls (sending and receiving) have been on point.

Very happy with it, I have already recommended it to many at work and they have purchased the item since they saw first-hand that it is quality.

title: Fit's better than you might expect
body: I received these on 4-6-2019  and I've had them about 5 days. Let me say first that for 50 dollar in ear headphones they sound great. A little heavy on the bass, but still better than I expected. The battery life so far has been about 4 hours for each one listening to a mix of podcasts music and phone calls and the charger seems to get about 2 1/2 charges before needing recharging itself. They come with several sets of tips, so you probably won't find that to be an issue as far as fit goes. If you have trouble getting them to stay in, remember to stick them in and twist toward the back of your ear until your ear acts as a brace. Mine haven't fallen out since I started doing that. All in all I'm a very satisfied purchaser at this point. I'll update this review if anything changes.

title: The best and most life changing wireless headphones.
body: If your looking for a miracle,look no more. These headphones changed my life for the better, I can die happy now. The craftsmanship is something from out of this world. The sound is as beautiful as a 1000 sirens calling you to your death. The customer service was the utmost prompt and professional people I have ever dealt with. If I die a happy man it is because of this product, they have help me achieve supreme spirituality. Burry me with my tozo t10 Bluetooth 5.0 wireless earbuds.

title: Great earbuds, nice price
body: These wireless earbuds are really good. The sound is good and very clear. They come with 4 different tips so you can get a great fit, I didn’t need to change them from the ones that came on the earbuds. They charge quickly and last about 3 hours of continuously listening to music. I recommend them for quality and price.

title: Nice earbuds with a caveat
body: These sound surprisingly good for being non-HD Bluetooth and having a traditional driver. The pairing is pretty easy and the charging case is pretty nice too. The issue I am having is that the left unit drops out periodically. I have tried re-setting their connection and removing/re-adding them to my phone. It almost seems like there is a vacuum sensor that mutes the device when an air pressure change occurs since it seems to happen with yawning/coughing and other actions that would change the pressure between the driver and eardrum. If this could be resolved, I'd give them 5 stars for their class of buds.

title: Good, but not the best.
body: My earbuds only came with the covers that were attached, which were extra large. I need the small, which is bad that I needed to buy some to use these. The sound quality is good, not a lot of bass as advertised, but fine for use. Also, if you intend to swim in these, don't buy these. If you go under water at all they do not work. These are more for sitting on the side of a pool and then getting slightly wet, but not for swimming.

title: Nice Sound, but they fall out
body:
Pros

Sound quality is good, much better than the airpods I used to have.
Relatively inexpensive
Cons
They fit well when dry, but continually fell out of my ears when running, working out, etc. upon sweating.

The size of the earbuds they came with were optimal (the others either too small or too big).  It may be that anatomy of my ears are not conducive to these types of headphones (the airpods were much worse).  I went to the airpods as my plantronic fit headphones battery was wearing out after 7 years.  Just found out that the plantronic fits are on sale at Costco, so I will go back to wearing this type of wireless headphone.

title: Not bad
body: Not a bad set of Bluetooth headphones. They don't hold a charge all day but will for a few hours. Easy to use and sync. They do cancel out noise quiet well. I can't hear people talking to me. The box holds a charge for a day or so. Haven't waited to see how long. Not a bad set. I haven't tried anything with water so I can't review for that. I was not given a deal to do a review either.

title: Issues with my earbuds
body:
I'm having issues with my left earbud no longer syncing up with my right. When I pick the left earbud up from the charging case and put it on it will say, "Power On" Before beeping twice and attempting to pair on its own without connecting automatically to the right earbud. I've attempted everything I could, turning them off, resetting them, putting them back in the charging case for extended periods of time.

I actually really enjoy this product and how easy it is to use, and I've purchased the wireless charging pad to go with it, I'm just having this one really obnoxious issue that's preventing me from using it further. Any helpful tips?

title: Wireless Sonic Freedom!
body: Took a chance on the Tozo T10 Waterproof Wireless Earbuds and must say I'm very impressed. Out of the box they quickly and very easily paired with my iPhone 8. Sound quality is rich and full, with great bass response. They fit comfortably and snugly in my ears, once I switched to the large ear caps. They're packaged with four sets of varying size ear caps, a mini USB charge cable and nice lanyard. The included charge box, like the ear buds themselves, seems very-well constructed, has a magnetically secured lid and charges via USB, or the separately available wireless charging pad. The overall charge box dimensions are 1.34"H x 1.74"W x 3.62"L (34mm x 45mm x 92mm) . So far I'm very satisfied with this product!

title: Great product
body:
Am impressed with the TOZO T10. The product quality is top notch, and lots of features for the price. Wireless charging, IPX8 waterproofing, high quality 8mm sound driver, and Bluetooth v5.0 are just a few of the high end features the T10's have to offer.

Pairing them with my MACPRO was too easy. All you have to do is take them out of the charging case and they are ready for pairing. The Bluetooth v5.0 has a stronger connection and longer distance. I can leave them in my backpack and up to 25 feet away an still connected. The sound clarity and the bass are of the richest quality level of the top end earbuds. The earbuds and the case are extremely water resistance from the description on the packaging, still yet to find out. I found out that I could use the product for about or over four hours and the charging case is good for four full recharges of the earbuds. The Qi wireless charging case is very handy.

title: AirPods? Who needs AirPods?
body: This is my second pair of TOZO ear buds. I had the T-8 before, and this is a definite step up. I only replaced the T8 because I lost one. TOZO earbuds work seamlessly with my iPhone. Syncing is never a problem. I like that you pick them up out of the charger and they automatically turn on and pair. These earbuds have a great sound with deeper base than anything I’ve heard except my noise-canceling OTE headphones. They are sturdy and well built but not bulky in my ear. I am often asked about them and my answer is always the same: a much cheaper option than AirPods but a high quality too.

title: Long distance waterproof earbuds
body: Cool earbuds, wireless, waterproof and the case charges them!  So you can go for a trip and have your case charged up and give u a few rounds of use.  Pretty comfortable, and they can go a long distance from your phone.... I can walk all around my house no problem.  Being waterproof you could keep your phone away from the water and still listen to your music... really neat!

title: Best? Probably not.  Worth the money YES
body:
I have only used these for a total of probably 10 hours in the first week of owning them.

TOZO sends and email promising a free wireless charger for leaving a review.  The email doesn't say it has to be 5-star, but 5-star is mentioned repeatedly throughout the email.  This is an honest review whether they want send me the charger or not.

Pros

-Sound is detailed for headphones in this price range.  I own MANY headphones mostly wired and far more expensive.
-Wireless has not given me problems
-Gets plenty loud

Cons

-THIS IS SUBJECTIVE but after an hour my ears hurt no matter which earpiece size I use.

Neutral

- These are BASS HEAVY.  Bass is still someone clean, but definitely boosted.

title: Best Bluetooth Heaphones EVER!
body: I usually do not write reviews on amazon,  but for this I felt compared to write one. I started my search for Bluetooth headphones because I brought some "home Bluetooth headphones" and I had such a hard time pairing them. Long story, short, I never got to pair them. So, while searching on Amazon,  I came across these headphones and I must say I am impressed. They worth a pretty penny but every cent is worth it. The sound quality is crystal clear. It has long battery life and it is easy pair to any device. I satisfied with this purchase. I recommend them to anyone looking for a good pair of Bluetooth headphones.

title: The fit and sound were better than expected
body:
I don't typically buy expensive headphones or anything so I'm not comparing the sound quality to that, but I will say that the sound quality of these are much better than other cheap headphones and earbuds I've used in the past. That was a pleasant surprise.

I was also concerned that they would be a bit bulky in my somewhat smallish ears, but the small tip worked and they really weren't that bulky looking.

The next thing I was concerned about was how well they would stay in my ear while running. After some trial running they didn't budge at all and felt quite comfortable in my ear.

The only negative that I have is that after using them the battery life was not as long as I was hoping for. They only lasted about 3 hours before needing to be recharged.

Overall though, better than expected.

title: Bad fit, bad design, bad battery life
body:
Background: I am by no means an audiophile or someone who has used expensive audio devices or has exceptionally high standards for quality. Despite that, these were bad enough for me to return, and I will explain why. In recent history I really just use whatever Powerbeats-style (connected by a wire, loop/hook that goes over top of ear) knockoff/budget pair I find, and most recently I was using the SENSO Bluetooth headphones. When those broke after much use, I found these and the style was a little different but I decided to give them a go. I will break down my experience in a few categories: fit, sound, bluetooth/design, battery life.

Fit:
-The worst thing I immediately noticed about these was the fit. I took the time rotating through the different size ear piece attachments but none of them fit in such a way that made them feel secure in my ear. I will admit they felt unsecure in my ears much more often than they actually fell out, but despite this the feeling of needing to readjust to be sure was always close by. This is especially frustrating for lifting weights or taking public transportation to work, the two main activities I do while wearing these. I constantly felt the need to twist or push further into my ear but when I did that, the audio would become distorted or I would push the button on the device, pausing the music. When I pushed it again to restart, of course the fit was messed up again.

Sound:
-Not impressive enough to outweigh the bad. The bass was not as hard hitting as my Senso’s. It was hard to tell how good the audio actually was since it would slightly change each time I adjusted them in my ears. Definitely not terrible, just not good enough for the increased price and other inconveniences.

Bluetooth/Design:
-I don’t know how AirPods or other non-wired devices work, but the left and right devices each connected separately to my phone (iPhone XS) and then connected to each other in a second step which you can hear narrated by the device. The issue is, I have to power on both devices and then put both in my ear quickly or it’s possible I won’t know if one connected, so then I have to actually go to my phone’s Bluetooth page to confirm. Additionally, there would be random times where one wouldn’t connect and I would have to power both off and then back on to get it to work. There was also at least one time where it just wouldn’t connect, despite restarting my phone and the devices and trying to let them charge for a little while. When that happened, it was the last straw and I decided to return. And finally the button on the side just doesn’t work well. Bottom line: managing the on/off and connection status of both separately was a pain. Also, the Powerbeats style is in and around the ear, so when I push a button on one of the sides, it doesn’t easily get pushed further into my ear. Not the case with these. If I push it, it sends it into my ear affecting how can hear the music, so I have to pull it out slightly, which then dislodges it, meaning I basically have to be prepared to readjust it every time I want to use the button. There’s also no volume control that I could tell, meaning I have to do that on my phone’s volume rockers. (Something I didn’t have to do with my previous pair)

Battery life:
-Just not good enough, plain and simple. I could make it through two days with my Senso’s, but not these. The charging case didn’t need to be charged nearly as often, so that was nice, and popping them in for a charge is satisfying since there’s a small magnetic pull that snaps them into place. All that is to say, these are the earbuds for you if you love charging super often. However, I shouldn’t have to explain how inconvenient weak battery life is for an audio device when I’m on the go for 12 hours on any given week day. I can get through the day on a full charge, but if it’s not full to start or I forget to charge the night before, it will almost certainly need a charge at an inconvenient time.

Conclusion:
-I stop short of giving this one star since I recognize my biggest gripe, the fit, is a little more subjective and it’s possible they fit most people’s ears better than mine. Subtract the bad fit, assume the connection issues were with my phone and not this device, don’t use them from your morning commute to your evening lift, and maybe you’ll like these. With that said, I’ve already purchased a new Powerbeats style knockoff from Anker and they are immensely better on sound/bass, battery life, and of course the fit. It’s possible that Powerbeats style is just the style for me, or maybe it’s just the right choice for an active lifestyle. But then again, isn’t that the point of going wireless, so you can do more? Take that for what it’s worth.

title: Great product needs a little work on stabilizing the connection between earbuds
body: The sound quality is phenomenal the highs and lows are very crisp. I would love to give this product 5 stars but the 1 complaint i have is that when i sit still both earbuds stay connected but when i walk about the left one seems to cut in and out but then the connection gets stable again. Other than that the product is great. Hopefully the company will address this issue if they haven't begun to already.

title: Great Sound!
body: I like the small earbuds. They fit my ears very well. I use these to mow my lawn and I am amazed at how low I can play my music and still hear well.  I like that the case is used to charge my earbuds and I can take them anywhere. I liked them so well my husband just bought a pair. I highly recommend them.

title: They are super easy to pair
body: I am enjoying these earbuds quite a bit.  They are easy to pair, sound is good and I love that I can charge the charging case by placing it on my charging pad.  About the only thing that I think could use any improvement is how long the battery life is for the buds.  They last about 4 1/2 to 5 hours of use.  What I do is use only one at a time.  I listen to iHeart Radio all day while I'm at work so I switch out the buds half way through my day.  It is working out just fine.

title: Best headphones I’ve ever had!
body: The reviews are all true. These headphones are amazing and for such a good price. The small bud covers fit perfectly in my ear. The first page of the guide book is easy to understand and easy to get started using the headphones. I got the white and they look beautiful. The charging box is so nice and I think guarantees I won’t lose one or both of the headphones!! The sound is also impressively clear and I seriously can’t hear anything else. Can’t wait to use these at the gym! Highly recommend.

title: Great item for great price! (Edited review)
body:
EDIT: It’s been a week and I’m already losing confidence in my purchase. The left earbud is constantly cutting out when my phone is literally inches away. The headphones also keep turning on when they’re in the case (which they are not supposed to do) and pairing to my phone, draining both batteries. They’re still good earbuds. Just not the best quality.

These are great for my first pair of wireless earbuds! Very great at cancelling out the sounds around me. Also I love that I can be listening to music and the people around me can’t hear it. That’s a quality I really desire in earbuds. The headphones pair together easily and make phone pairing very easy. I’m very satisfied with my purchase!

title: using them for work out - they rock
body: The last pair I bought - NOT THESE - broke right away because of my sweat!  These have not and they work great! They easily pair and I am surprisingly pleased!!!!!!!

title: Perfect for my purpose!
body: These earbuds are perfect for my purpose.  They charge quickly in their great little case on my wireless qi charger, stay in my ear, and turn my media on and off with a touch of a button.  In fairness, I must explain that I only wear the right earbud and use them only to listen to audiobooks.  I know they have capabilities far beyond my limited needs, but I can't tell you about how fabulous they are for listening to music or talking on the phone--not my gig.  But, I absolutely love that I can pause my books easily and listen while driving, gardening, walking, etc without wires or worrying about rain  and no one has to know that I'm ignoring them.  I wish when the power in the right earbud got low, that I could switch to the left earbud, but that doesn't seem to be an option.  Still great!

title: These are very good earbuds for the money
body: Good sound quality and battery life. The biggest knock is that connecting both earbuds is dependent on the right earbud being connected first. If that's not done they tend to not connect properly. Other than that I am very satisfied.

title: Very uncomfortable
body: I really wanted to like these earbuds but after wearing several times I can't stand them.  They are so big (doesn't matter what size cover--the actual earbuds are huge and even when I get them in  it's painful and today one of them fell out when I wasn't even moving.  The sound quality is good but if I can't wear them, not much use.  I sure wish I'd save all the packaging as I'd definitely return them.

title: Earbuds are Incredible Regardless of Price!
body:
So I had a pair of Bose Wireless Sport Earbuds that I dearly loved and cost me about $200.00.  Unfortunately (and this is I swear, a true story), my dog ate one of them... I nearly cried.  Now understand that I work out at a minimum of 3 times a week - usually 4, and I sweat like the Beast.  I cannot wear (nor stand) the Apple earbuds and was desperate to get another pair ASAP.  Yeah, well I was having a hard time swallowing (pardon the pun) another $200 expenditure on a replacement set of Bose buds... Enter the TOZO. I saw that these got a high rating here on Amazon and figured at a 1/4 of the price of the Bose, I'd give them a try.  Man!  Am I glad I did.
  Any of the other good reviews on here pretty much sum up how I feel about them.  They're about 1/2 the size of my Bose (see image), stay in place while running and doing cardio, pairing is a breeze and reliable,  and the battery time is excellent. The bass is solid and the highs are clear.
  One other thing these have over the Bose is the ability to drop them onto my wireless charger... Works great and is very rapid! Also, wanted to mention that the microphone is every bit as good as the one from Bose and I've asked friends how I sounded and they all said "great".  As for being waterproof... Well, I can't say I've jumped into the shower with them or anything even though the manual practically encourages you to do so, but I can say, that they hold up to some massive sweating with no issue!
  All in all, a great buy and I'd say they hold up to any of the competition regardless of the price!

title: I would have pay more.
body:
This is an amazing product, I recently purchased another brand for the gym and this to use at home, I haven't used the gym headphones more than 2 times, not because it is bad, is just because the TOZO t10 is so much better.
The quality and feel is amazing, the little charging box is super useful with its translucent cover you can see the battery level with a glance.
if you are not sure if this is the right product for you, just go for it. you won't regret it

title: Average wireless ear pods
body: When i read the reviews for this item i thought i stumbled across a gem in the rough. After wearing them around a bit at home and work id say theyre OK. I work in loud warehouse, a job that requires a lot of moving so anything wired has a chance of being caught and ripped out of my ear. After an evening with these guys, theyre not really what i thought theyd be like. The bass is subpar (i get bettwe base from the skul brand you find at walgreens), in order to block out most of the warehouse sound i have to turn my volume up passed the halfway mark by then the sounds arent even and very sharp (even a bass dominated song isnt really bassy more on the sharp side that gives you a headache). Im not a fan with how much they stick out of your ears, i get that currently on the market a lot of wireless earbuds will stick out but this pair REALLY sticks out. I tried increasing the size of earplug and that kind of helped but not by much. They will also connect and disconnect at random moments, even if my phone is a foot from the pods. For the money i spent, im not too satisfied.

title: Best wireless earbuds!
body: Amazing product. The built quality is fantastic , truly water proof tested it my self, they feel great they look great, battery is long lasting and the sound is outstanding! Very full clear sound with a great bass to it. Not too much not too little. 5 stars hands down. Pairing is super simple as well. Very pleased

title: Great sound, good fit, and great customer service.
body:
These are definitely the most quality completely wireless earbuds I've bought in this price range. Considering that they're advertised as "Deep bass for Sport" they perform as promised and even a little more. I did have some doubts because they were advertised that way, but they vanished when I pressed play. I was relieved and truthfully a little surprised. So full points there.

I bought them for the gym. They stay secure whenever I'm doing resistance training and any cardio that isn't running. However, if you do run and begin to sweat, that combined with the impact from running cause them to start dislodging from your ear. I expected as much so it wasn't a deal breaker for me but if that's a problem for you, now you know.

They come with a 1 year warranty which I registered on their website for. They have a contact for customer service and they were prompt to answer what couple questions I had.

I can't stand the wire hitting my neck when doing high impact training so these met my needs at an affordable price and I regret nothing.

title: Very Good for Travel
body: I purchased 2 of these units for my wife and myself, primarily for use on long distance air travel.  Sound quality is very close to my older headphones, which were very large and bulky compared to these earbuds.  I like that the earbuds can be recharged several times using the battery contained inside the docking case.  The charge on the earbuds alone was more than enough for our use, but having the extra capacity is appreciated.  Can't speak about the long term durability since I've only had them for about 1 month, but I am currently very satisfied.

title: Great for the price!
body: These headphones have made my life easier! The sound is great. The headphones do a decent job of drowning everything out. I mainly bought them because I needed the flexibility of listening to music or podcasts while getting things done at work & at home.

title: Enjoying the sound
body: Amazing product for the price. Only two downfalls would be need to have extra small ears piece to fit small ears canal. My one ear canal is smaller than the other due to me damaging it when I was a small kid jamming stuff in my ear. Fits perfectly in my other ear, but is loosely fit in small ear canal. Other might be people complaining that they can't hear me. Amazing bass quality and treble.

title: These are a good pair of earbuds.
body:
Received a bad pair.

Edit: TOZO has contacted me in regards to the earbuds I received. They offered to send me a replacement which is good on their part. Once I receive them I will update my review accordingly. I commend TOZO for standing by their product and sending a new pair out in case the ones that I had received were defective in any way. 4 star review Pending.

Edit: the new ones I received were better than the ones that I was originally sent. I would recommend them. I switch between these for working out and my AirPods for normal listening. They are a good pair of earbuds for the price, sound quality is good for the price and the waterproofing is a plus for working out. I would give them a try for people looking for a set of working out earbuds or a cheaper alternative to AirPods.

title: Poor bluetooth connection
body: The earbuds sound great. They pair with my phone fairly well - but not as seamless as I’d prefer. Haven’t taken a phone call with them so can’t speak to that. Sound great overall. My main concern and the reason for my 3 star rating is due to the bluetooth  connectivity. I bought these to use for working out. If I’m just lifting weights or running on a treadmill and my phone is sitting away from my body - the earbuds work great. However, when I took them jogging and had my phone in a pocket the bluetooth connection would continuously cut out. If I turned to look over my right should the connection would cut entirely and would not return until I returned to looking straight. This is terrible and makes them worthless as a jogging earbud.  Never had this problem with my MPOW D7 headphones. Likely returning these.

title: Best earbuds to have!
body: The best wireless earbuds ever. First I would like to say I am so glad they come with different size ear pieces. This really helps find the right fit for you. Second the case, the earbuds are placed in magnetically so they won’t fall out and can be charged via cable or wireless charging pad. I have mine plugged into my car cause it’s more convenient for me. Now for battery life. It’s pretty great! I use my earbuds for taking calls, listening to videos on Facebook, watching memes and movies so I can get a good couple hours of listening if I did it continuously nonstop. The battery doesn’t get used up when on standby so I’ll be at 25% battery before it’s time to charge again at the end of the day. The sound is crystal clear and when you have it in your ear it cancels out any noise to distract from your listening. I like that I have the option to use either one earbud or two so I will have my right earbud in all day and if I need to I can connect my left one in a snap. When it comes to connecting via Bluetooth it connects fast once connected it will beep like 5 times to finish connecting that’s only cause it’s waiting if you are trying to use the other ear bud as well or just the one but the beep will stop :)

title: No Music Control kills these
body:
Came from AirPods gen 1, loved them hands down best headphones for me besides max volume. Got power beats pro and they were aweful constantly disconnect if Siri was activated and the range was abysmal. Got AirPods gen 2 and same issue as the beats since it’s the same chip. Unfortunately Apple ruined AirPods till they fix the Siri and connectivity issue. So the hunt for new headphones led me here, another strike out see below.

Pros
Good sound
Quality feels good
Ok distance

Cons
not the most secure fit
No controls for music only calls (biggest issue)
Left ear does sporadically cut in out (nothing crippling but it’s slight annoyance)
Pairing isn’t as seamless

title: Impressive true wireless earbuds for a really great price!
body: Impressive for what you are paying for. Good sound. Connected very easily tho did not expect I was able to use either the left or right earbud separately. Which is a huge plus because I sometimes prefer the left over the right. The sound again is very good. Nice, loud, crisp sound. Definitely recommending these and may be purchasing some for my wife.

title: Best cheap Bluetooth Headphones for the price.
body: The earphone never fall out but it might take a while to get a snug perfect fit. You have to find the perfect angle to fully enjoy it. It connects very easy. Although it is waterproof, I wouldn't touch them with very wet fingers because it makes it uncomfortable. Other than that, can't complain.

title: Awesome sound and quality
body: These earphones really work well.  Sound quality is supreme and bass is felt.  Only wish I have with these are the ability to skip songs and control the volume which they don't.  Otherwise, I really enjoy using these for working out.

title: Amazing Wireless earbuds
body: First of all, I am glad that I decided to buy these wireless earbuds. I thought it would have been a total waste but I guess I was wrong. The quality on this wireless earbuds are amazing. The sounds quality draws me in to my music. Giving me the relaxing time I needed for some time on own. I like the smooths and finished black touch on it. It doesn't feel weird in your ears at all. In fact, I finds these earbuds very comfortable while wearing them. No matter how hard I tried, the earbuds sit comfortably in my ears. The customer support is probably one of the greatest thing about this product. I do feel like they care for their product and the customer. Compared to most wireless earbuds, this one is a must take.

title: Excellent Quality Earbuds for the Price!
body: I bought my first pair a couple of months ago to use while working out.  Once I managed to swap out the ear pieces with the smallest size (this is the ONLY annoying thing about these earbuds.  The ear pieces don't go on very easily) they stay in my ears during workouts where yes, even my ears sweat.  They are comfortable, the sound is great, and they block out all of the gym noises; even the really loud grunters!  I just bought a second pair for my 22 yr old son who is very particular about technology and he loves them.  The charging case is an awesome feature as well.  Highly recommend.

title: Left ear problems  cant use just one?
body:
UPDATE 3 like others have said left ear cuts out frequently
  UPDATE 2. So i still haven't figured out completely, because sometimes it does not beep at all when you try and use one, but i found that the beeping does stop after a minute or so.  UPDATE. so i haven't figured it out yet, but sometimes it does allow me to use just one without the constant beeping , so im not sure what im doing but there seems to be a way of using just one.  wish instructions were clear on this matter. ORIGINAL POST so the description does not say, but reviews said that you can use just one, and i would think this would be a pretty basic expectation, but if you just put one in, it continuously beeps trying to connect to the other, or am i just doing something wrong.  let me know and ill change the review

title: Better than Samsung Galaxy Buds
body: I bought this headphones and the galaxy buds at the same time and guess who went back to amazon? Almost the same audio quality for less money, also you had waterproof resistance and more recharging opportunities. And really good for workout. I ran a few miles and I don't suffer any interruption on the signal. Excellent product.

title: Comfortable and high quality sound
body: I bought wireless earbud to help when I do aerobics and want to workout to my own music, quality of sound and noise reduction is great. Would highly recommend to those people that have a hard time keeping them buds in ear as these are very comfortable and stay in place while you work out. Stay charged for a long time and had no problems with any cutting out of sound while wearing.

title: not IPX8
body: It worked ok for 30 min, but a little splashing and the left one died. Took it inside to see if it needed charging and pressing the button made water come out of a hole they made for the LED indicator.... Why would you design a hole for an LED indicator on a product that is supposed to be highly water resistant? It was NOT submerged, and it wasn't even wet for 30 minutes = NOT IPX8

title: Got my brand new TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds!! Excited to discover its mystery.
body:
My old wireless earphones broke, which leads me to look for a new pair of wireless earphones.
While I was researching and comparing different brand and products, I end up ordering TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds. Frankly, looking at so many positive review on amazon was the first triggering point, however, after much further reason and going through the list of amazing features offered by this wireless earbud, I'm sold!

So, finally I got my pair of TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds, yesterday and I really like the compact packaging of this product. The build quality sounds really solid and trendy.

1. Package comes with a pair of IPX8 waterproof TWS stereo Headphones (IPX8!!!!)
Earbuds are comfortable and high quality as advertived by the company.

2. Value for money, with good build quality and compare to other brands affordable price.

3. Battery life, I still need to completely check it but till so far earbuds are holding its juice from past 2+ hrs.

4. Wireless charging case as an added bonus, which can easily extend earbuds life 3 times (8-9 hours). Moreover, its trendy, good build quality and makes easy to carry TOZO T10 earbuds when not in use.

I'll try to update my post after a month.

title: AWESOME product especially for the price
body: I ordered these extremely hesitant as I have a problem with ear buds causing pain in my ears. Unfortunately due to my work having huge headphones on just creates to many issues so i ordered these anyway. BEST purchase I could have made as these headphones are extremely comfortable and sound amazing. Even better i didnt realize when i bought them that they were waterproof but a couple friends of mine also bought them after i let them try em and my 1 friend brought it to my attention that they are waterproof so he uses them in the shower(of course i had to try it) and they worked awesome even in the shower. Couldn't be happier with this purchase. For those who might want to know they case will recharge them they last approx. 3.5 hours per charge. and the case recharges them a few times.

title: Neat !!
body: Just got this in the mail today, tried it and the sound quality is very impressive considering the price for this baby. Super excited- it came with a 1 year free warranty that you sign up to- already did it (: so far so good. If anything changes I'll give an update!!!

title: Terrible BT range
body:
Edit: The Bluetooth in these headphones is terrible. I had my phone in my pocket while mowing the lawn and the sound cut out every two seconds! So unless you plan on sitting motionless I would not recommend these. Was 4 stars, now changed to two stars.

The sound quality is decent, but I wish there was a way to change tracks via the headphones. The charging case is convenient and charges headphones quickly. I haven't done any hardcore activities with these yet, but they are comfortable and seem to stay put...

title: Highly recommend
body: I love that these ear buds stay in so well.  I have tried several other kinds of ear buds only to have them constantly falling out during my runs.  These stayed in the whole time, the sound quality was remarkable, and I couldn't ask for a better pair of ear buds, especially for such a reasonable price.

title: Pay close attention to the pairing instructions,So you don’t ya e a pairing issue like I did.
body:
I really like the quality of these headphones for the price, as an iPhone user the new air pods are $130+
And that’s just too much for me to spend on headphone. So I decided to try these based on reviews. I have not been disappointed. The Mobil charging pod makes it easy to take in the car and use when you want to, and keep charged when you don’t. Not long after I got them, my wife asked about them, so I bought her the white ones.

title: Best Sounding and Convenient Earbuds
body:
The earbuds have a nice design along with its perks for being resistant(if not proofed) against water damage. The little battery container is a nice small design to carry in your pocket, and if you wished to hang it on a string for a more convenient carry, it provides a little loop on the side to feed string through.

The earbuds themselves have a small design. Which can make me a little more conscience about losing them. But they fit in the ear very well and they provide for more silicon sizes in case the already rubbery interior of the earbud didn't quite fit. They stay in my ear surprisingly well for every day to day activities, however, when it comes to working up a hard sweat either working in the summer heat or just working out in general, I find that the earbuds start giving way to fall out. Now I do recognize that Tozo has other earbud products with an ear wrap around to keep earbuds in securely, but this product was advertised for "Sports" in the title. I would say these earbuds may not be the right fit for sports, but as I said before, Tozo does offer other earbuds better fit for Sports activities.

The pairing is very simple and quick and I have had no trouble with it. As soon as the earbuds are taken out of its battery container, they immediately begin pairing the earbuds together and ready to be pair with whatever device you are ready to connect them to.

Overall, I am quite satisfied with these for regular use for Almost any activity.

title: NO MORE WIRES!
body: The talk quality is a lot better than LG’s retractable earbuds HBS series, but it has its own flaws.  It might work better with just one channel, but I’m not complaining.  The Bass is unbelievable.  I experienced a problem where I had to re-pair my buds after a phone call, but that may have been because I had my old broken LG headset still on and paired—not complaining, about this product anyways.  For $50 they’re a great value and I’m sure they last longer than my old over-priced LG headsets that always had a problem with one channel dying because of a short in the electrical wire developed after some time of retracting and pulling the earbuds from the headset.

title: Perfect Little Buds
body: If you want Bluetooth headphones it's hard to beat these for the price. The only negative I can think of is the range. If you walk with your gf (holding hands distance) they signal gets very choppy. Zero other issues. These are larger in the ear tube diameter so you may be sore from constant wear. Very nice case, thick plastic, strong magnet holders, convenient storage/charging. DESERVES YOUR MONEY!

title: Sound quality is as good as my over the ear Sony headphones
body: Sound quality is fantastic. Strong base, crystal clear across the whole range. Just got a second set to give as a birthday gift. Be aware that if the phone is in your pocket, your body could interfere and cause dropoffs.

title: Excellent value for the money!
body: These earbuds provide good sound quality and they are quality constructed.  The battery and carrying case provide many hours of good listening.  The price is very competitive and, all things considered, the earbuds are an excellent value for the money

title: Battery Life
body: Battery life not at all what was promoted! "3.5 hours with a single charge and an extra 9 hours in the battery case". I go to the gym 5 days a week for an hour each time and if I don't drop it in the battery case after 2 days of use I will get an audio message that the battery will run out...and it does within 5 minutes! I wish I could find a set of ear buds that actually do what they're advertised to do!!

title: AMAZING
body: I love these headphones. The only concern I have is losing them. Perfect for working out. Once they are in, they stay in. Love love love them. I am not able to give a opinion on battery life, however they charge quick.

title: AMAZING!!!
body:
When I bought these I had my doubts they would be anything other than average. BOY was i surprised when i put them in and they were like BAMMMM.  The quality is great considering the price and size. I had an little issue getting them linked, but that was me not the product. In no time at all i was completely drowning my family out with pulsating beats..
I would def buy again....

title: We are very happy with our choice
body: I bought two of these, one for my self and one for my husband. My husband charged and set up his set right away. He got a phone call from his boss while wearing them and my husband said the clarity of their voices was excellent, his boss said he could hear my husband very well. We both wore them to the gym and for me the sound was amazing! My husband has not had anything to wear to the gym like this and he was thrilled! He got to listen to his favorite music and workout. When I used these to listen to my music I found the pairing to my phone easy. Pairing to my ipod was a bit more complicated probably because I made it more complicated. They played my music beautifully and the sound was very good. The battery life is something we're waiting to see about since we just got these on Monday and just really used them yesterday at the gym. So far this has been a great purchase. I hope that sometime you can make a longer play time, longer than 3.5 hours with all of the great things there are with these earbuds. We are very happy with our choice!

title: Great earphones for the price!
body: The TOZO earbuds are truly amazing. The sound quality is incredible and I'm totally blown away by the bass coming from this earphones. I'm one of a few people that the AirPods keep falling off from my ears but this thing sits comfortably in my ears. I love everything about the headphones especially the price tag. The pairing process is seamless. A set of wireless headphones and a wireless charging case for $50 is a steal. I'm satisfied with this purchase!

title: Great sound, wish the button was a touch, didn’t fit me
body:
I have small ears so it is hard for me to find earbuds that stay in. I tried another pair first, and they didn’t fit well, and the sound was quiet. Then I tried these. They stay in my ears 95% of the time, however they stick out very far and don’t fit in the outside of my ear like they are supposed to do they are easy to knock out. They also come out easily when I sweat a lot. The sound is great, but the fit doesn’t work for me. I would have returned but I missed the return window.

I wish these had touch control, because you can’t tap to pause. The button is difficult to press so you have to hold the earbud while you push the button. It’s a little annoying.

title: Great sound, Great customer support!  Be careful around water though....
body:
These earbuds are advertised as being waterproof.  Sadly, this I did not find this to be true.  I had used them for 2 months, liked the sound quality and they were comfortable but was disappointed when the first time it got wet one of the ear buds stopped working.  I purchased these particular headphones because I knew they would be getting wet and didn't expect them to give out so soon.  Very disappointed!

Edit.  I contacted Tozo and explained what happened and they offered to replace he headphones for free, no questions asked.  I appreciate a company that will stand behind their warranty.  I was always happy with the sound, fit and functionality of the earbuds but initially gave it a poor rating because they weren't "waterproof" as advertised.  I'll be more careful with the new set and try and keep them out of the water. I've changed my rating to 5 stars because of the great customer support I received.

title: Excellent quality earbuds and customer service!
body: Best earbuds I've ever tried and amazing customer service! The right earbud stopped working and I contacted customer service. Within 45 minutes I received a customer service email from two different representatives offering to assist me in making sure I had a 5 star experience. A new set of earbuds were shipped immediately. Not every product is produced without errors, but this company cares about making sure to correct any issues immediately. Thank you very much!

title: No longer tethered!!!
body: I have an android phone and no matter what wired headphones I got they would eventually make the phone go haywire and stop working. It was time for wireless headphones. My fear was always the battery dying before my workout was over leaving me with no music. This is not the case with these headphones. I was able to finish my workout, walk almost a mile from where I work and even showered with them on (don't judge me) and there was still battery life.... the sound quality is outstanding, they fit super comfortable (especially since they send additional ear plugs to fit your ear) and throughout my workout did not once fall out... Love the charging case too!!! Overall great product especially for the price.

title: Great
body: These dear buds are really great.  The sound quality is much better than I expected and they are comfortable to wear even for a long time.  I recommend buying these and you will not be disappointed.

title: Amazing Earbuds!
body:
These earbuds are amazing, I'm wowed by the sound quality.
I've heard sounds from songs I've listened to with other headphones that I did not hear before but now with these headphones, I can hear everything clear as day.
The bass is full and vibrant, sounds like angels in my ears.
The noise cancelling is A++, I put them in and tune the world out and for $50?
You cannot beat that price point as compared to Apple Airpods which cost double that price.
As well as it being waterproof!
I've showered with these and they got wet yet still worked the same like nothing ever happened.
The case has a strong magnetic closure to ensure that it will not open and disrupt your earbuds.
The earbuds are magnetic as well, those suckers aren't coming out.

What are you waiting for?
Get yourself a pair!

title: Good sound (including base) / Horrible fit for me (maybe I have weird ear canals)
body:
I bought these to use while I'm running.  The actual ear pieces pair wonderfully to each other and to my phone and I was really excited.  The sound quality for music is excellent and phone calls (mic) is relatively decent.  The biggest problem I had with these is that they constantly fell out of my ears.  To be clear,  if I was moving at all (running/walking/ect) they had no chance of staying in place.  i had to search on the ground too many times for them to even be worth anything to me.  And I did try the different ear piece fittings under "active conditions" and it made no difference for me

I actually got so fed up I was going to throw them away  and chalk it up to a failed experiment but daughter hijacked them with the last new "earpiece" fittings and she likes them well enough.

TLDL:  They were rubbish for me but as a 40 something male maybe i have a strange ear canals that makes these unusable.  ymmv

title: Im impressed!
body: These earbuds are really nice. They fit very well in my ear and have great call and sound quality. I showed them to a buddy of mine skis a real stickler for sound quality in music. He told me that the earbuds were not going to sound great because of the transmission over bluetooth and yadda yadda yadda..... I told him to put them in and listen. Well, he was impressed! These earbuds actually have base too! Im very happy with my purchase!

title: Excellent sound quality, workmanship and support
body: These are quality headphones.  They fit snugly in my ears and they stayed in. The key is to find the right size earcaps (they provide 4 sizes).  The sound quality is very good. I use Spotify which provides a way to set the equalizer to your preferences.  I am sure apple music and other apps provide similar capabilities.  The noise reduction is reasonably good and actually lowered outside noise as I walked through my neighborhood. Support is excellent!  I wanted to reset the earpods and wasn’t sure how to do this. I sent an email to their website.  I received a personalized response and was very satisfied with their support.

title: Awesome product
body: I must say that I was a little hesitant when I first baught these ear buds as I had never heard of the brand before. However, these ear buds far exceeded my expectations. The sound is clear and the bass is awesome. When I wear them I hear no outside noise! They are water proof. The awesome part, is when I am done, I put them back in the portable case and they recharge automatically. When I take them out, they connect right away with no issue. I am happy with my purchase as well as the price I paid. Great product. If you are looking for a great set of ear buds at a reasonable price, get these. You wont be disappointed.

title: Great for single side use
body: Working in an office environment, I really like the ability to have one kept on the charger and use the other one until I need to swap as they both pair individually. The sound is good and the variety of tips to fit your ear is nice. It's great to be able to simply remove them from the charging case and have them automatically connect to my phone after the initial pairing.

title: Great product with 5 star sound quality and battery life.
body: Great earbuds. Just arrived yesterday and I had been using them since. Sound quality is awesome given the price paid for it. Using them was easy. Just turn both earbuds on and they’ll automatically pair with each other. Next find them on your device and connect. Done! Battery life is great. I had to switch to bigger size earplugs but once I did that, they stay in no matter how much I jump or run. Would definitely recommend them.

title: Great ear buds at a great price
body: I bought these for my son for Christmas and I like them so much, I’ll get a pair for myself. They paired with no problem and the sound quality is very good. There are 4 LEDs on the case to indicate charge level of the battery pack. The instructions claim you can charge the ear buds 4x using the battery pack before having to charge it again but we typically don’t run them dead before charging.

title: Great sound, difficult fit
body: I really like these and would like to like them more.  The sound is good and even for me with rather sensitive ears that don't like most in-ear buds these are comfortable.  The fall out pretty easily, though so, for me personally, I can't imagine using them during activity.  Good for working at my desk or under a motorcycle helmet.

title: Good product but no so good customer service
body: The earbuds are good for the price I paid.  Very good battery life.  I haven't used any other Bluetooth waterproof / sweat proof earbuds , this one seems pretty good but all the fancy features start to fall apart after a few weeks of use. 1. It is not suitable for answering phone calls as the other side cannot hear me even if I raised my voice.  2. I also enjoyed the wireless charging as the charging port at the back of the case if very narrow and unless you use the charging cord that comes with the earbuds, other charging cords (same type) will not fit.  3. Not so good customer service.  Two months later, the wireless charging no longer worked.  I tried to contact customer service by email, and have not heard back from them at all.

title: Great headphones to use while active!
body: My fiance got me these so I could listen to music while I do yard work...I've had bluetooth headphones in the past but the wire connecting them would always get caught on my hat or neck as I was working outside. Love that these are totally separate earbuds. The sound quality is great and the charging case is really convenient. They came with a lot of different plastic earbud options so I'm still trying a couple of those but overall they're working out well!

title: So easy to connect and use.
body: I found this product so easy to connect and use.  I had a set of wireless buds before, but they could not take the sweat of running. These Tozo T10 ear buds can. When running they do not work loose at all. I find them very easy to control and work well for phone conversations.  I also really like how the case keeps the buds charged. I would like to have them have a little more bass, though.

title: Great Earbuds, price and quality
body: Very impressed; originally purchased a pair for my wife as her inexpensive BT ear buds failed. I did not want to spend the money on Apple's options, and Skullcandy options were out of my price range as well. She was so impressed with her new ear buds that I bought a pair. I'm blown away,  as they are more comfortable than my XTFree Skullcandy headset and sound just as good. Bass response is great, maybe a touch too "bassy". Phone calls with earbuds work well. Overall very happy, I rarely leave reviews. Great option if you are looking for inexpensive earbuds.

title: They are great... when the sound is working properly
body:
I was really excited about these earbuds. They came quickly, the charging case is awesome. The different sized earbud pieces ensure a good fit.  My problem is that I'll be listening and everything is fine. Then all of a sudden I hear a lot of static and the music goes in and out of the left and right channel or the music skips. It's maddening. When they ate working correctly they are great and a good price point.
But because of the sound issue I am thinking of returning them.

title: Never thought they would sound this great...
body:
Just got these and I am amazed how good they sound.....bass is fantastic and clear, they get pretty loud but I'm one of those people that like to crank it all the way up which is why my wife says I'm going deaf...but for the normal person they are loud enough.
Call quality seems good but haven't been able to test it while at work yet (Truck driver) so I'll will update soon....  just based on listening to music I would recommend them 100% other than that only time will tell on the durability...

title: Microphone Issue
body:
I just bought the new TOZO T10 earbuds. The sound quality is great. I love it.
However, when I tried to make a phone call, the person on the other end couldn't hear what I said. The sound always got interrupt. Sometimes they heard it loud and clear, and sometime barely heard a word. If i hold the right one close to my mouth when talking, the person can hear well. On the other hand, the left one didn't do the same.

I don't know if they will let me return the earbuds or exchange for a different pair.

title: Randomly turn on when not using them & don’t fit to well
body: My headphones randomly turn themselves on while in the charging case so pretty much need to charge them every night where I plan to use them the next day. The sound quality is great but they don’t stay in the ear very well when moving around like bicycling or exercising at the gym and tend to fall out often.

title: Great product for a GREAT price!!
body:
I have been super impressed with these little guys. First, I use these all day with one headphone in while at work. I have the volume at the lowest setting (on my phone) and one headphone literally lasts 5 hours of constant use. No exaggeration. Again, this is at the lowest volume setting, so I am sure that plays a big part. I listened to one headphone for 5 hours straight, then would throw it in the charging case and listen to the other headphone for the rest of the day. While doing this for a whole week, the charging case never ran out of juice. So basically for me, I charge the case & headphones on Sunday, then listen to them (one headphone at a time) Monday through Friday and put them in the case over night. And the case lasts all week without a charge.

Even at the lowest setting, these sound amazing. I have had them up to mid to 3/4 volume, and they BUMP! Great bass while maintaining great sound quality. If you put them in correctly, they block out all exterior sounds.
I have not fully tested the call experience yet, but the one call I had I was able to hear the other person perfectly, and after a second or two the other person was able to hear me ok as well.
I have been recommending these to everyone who will listen. My wife wasn’t even thinking about new headphones until she tried these, now she wants a pair!
Can not recommend these enough!!!

title: Stopped Charging - **Updated**
body:
The sound was great, and battery life was *ok*, but after a couple months of use the right ear piece stopped charging.

**Update** Company sent me a free replacement. Very fast shipping, great customer support. I'm assuming the last pair was just defective.

Sound quality is great. They have good volume and deep base. Louder than my Anker Sound Beats, and fuller base.

title: Great true wireless capability!
body: Great for use at work especially because I can keep a bud in one ear and still use my headset for my phone. I've used the bluetooth headphones that are connected together with cords and since I usually only have one bud in, the cord and other bud would always get in the way or catch on stuff. The full wireless capability is the way to go! These buds work great for most casual use, but I have yet to try them while doing more strenuous activities.

title: Pairing and Syncing with Phone is an ease!
body: I just recently bought a Note 10+ and new that I needed a good pair of wireless headphones. I have a pair of Beats but they get bulky and cumbersome and wanted a good, quality wireless earbuds. These do no disappoint, they come with multiple rubber tips for all ear sizes. As soon as you take out of the case and place in ears they pair effortlessly and connect to the phone within seconds. The initial setup was a breeze, battery life has been surprising good, been using them off and on since Sunday (8/25) and still haven't had a need to recharge as of Friday (8/30). The charging indicator in the case is simple and easy to read, earbud construction is very solid. Anyone who buys this product will not be disappointed.

title: Great pair of headphones for the price with great audio quality
body:
Great pair of headphones for modern (non headphone jack having) smartphones below are my list of pros and cons.

Pros:
Great audio quality
Easy to pair
Nice charging case
Decent battery life

Cons:
They may fall out if you ears generate more "grease" than average
When using just one it tries to pair to the other for nearly 2-3 mins and makes a beeping noise which it turns the music down for.
It appears they have their own built in EQ (which is a bit too bassy for me) and default volume, so if you change the EQ on your phone you may have to connect the headphones go into your EQ settings on your phone change the EQ then change it back (if you have it set for a perfered EQ setting.

Summary:
Great pair of headphones for the price with great audio quality (once the Eq is right for your needs) but With some minor inconveniences

title: Ok product, Decent battery, Decent Noice cancellation for the price
body:
