I was having intermittent connection drops when connected to my MacBook.
Switching between devices is not a pleasant experience and definitely not seamless.
While they are not too heavy, they don't feel light on your ear as well and long term wearing might cause some inconvenience.

title: Great for all outdoor activities
body: I workout every day and other earbuds would not work during sweating conditions - these Tozo's work perfectly.  Also, I swim regularly and while they do not work under water, the sound returns immediately once your head has cleared the water line. Absolutely the best ear buds that I haver ever used.

title: Depends on what you use them for
body:
I use these mainly when I’m sitting at me desk at work and listen to podcasts and for that they are great. I get about 6 hours of continuous play at low volume before they shut down. After about 15 minutes in the case they charge back up to about 80%.

Absolutely horrible for working out or any type of physical activity. THEY WILL FALL OUT. NONSTOP.

If you plan on using these for commuting, around the house or at work then I really do recommend them they cancel outside noise really well and have good bass. For weight lifting or running these get 0 stars.

title: Good customer service, product needs improvement to make it last more than 6 months.
body:
Update, 17/7/19
After one day, a very polite CSR, Shirley, from Tozo responded with an offer to send me a brand new headset.

I therefore have changed my rating to a five stars for customer service.

The headset was working great until yesterday when all of a sudden they stopped recharging.  I tried many things but to no avail.

There is no customer service / tech support number, just an email address and their website is void of any troubleshooting data.  I sent an email and am now at their mercy for a reply and maybe a satisfactory resolution.

This is a further example of low quality junk products sold by Amazon.

I’m going back to Bose, best products and great customer service!

title: Great price-quality balance
body: I commute every day on my bike and these earbuds are perfect for what I need. While I—of course—did not expect sound quality like Bose offers, I was positively surprised; perhaps a bit heavy on the base but overall much better than I would have expected. A great feature is that I can only use one earbud (right) while leaving the other in the charging case. You need to get both out of the case at the same time, have it paired, and then return the left earbud. It will beep a couple of times but after that, it works like a charm. Would I buy again? Yes; in fact, I did. I was unlucky to lose one—my own fault—so I purchased them again.

title: Good but bud broke
body: It’s amazing! I’ve had it for 2 months by now and every things good. But I was listening to them in the shower (as they say their waterproof) and my left bud disconnected. This had happened to me before so I think I just missed a battery low warning. I got out the shower and plugged them in they didn’t even register. But just to make sure I put the righ bud in and it works I tried holding them for a few seconds.Nothing. Other than this unfortunate incident I do suggest them because they do still have amazing sound quality, they are water proof and have a good battery life.

title: Good battery life, easy to pair
body: Used these for the first time on a quick weekend trip. Paired easily with my iPhone. I used them for a 2 hour flight each way and still had battery life despite not charging in between. Noise cancellation worked well as I didn’t hear surrounding noise over my phone audio while on the plane. Overall very happy with the quality!

title: Comparable to earbuds double the price
body: I was really impressed with these earbuds. They support connecting to two devices at once which I think is a petty unique feature for true wireless earbuds. They fit well and sound great with good bass. They connect easily without any issues. Unfortunately my dog chewed one of the earbuds. It still works but I doubt that it is water proof anymore. I tried several others and had to spend more than double to get ones better.

title: Perfect size, great looking, and awesome sound!
body: Had these for a few days now and I love them. I brought them to work and hung out in the noisy break room, and I wasn’t able to hear a word outside of my music. The fit is great, and I was able to find the perfect size because they supplied 4 different bud sizes. Weight is minimal and you barely remember they’re in. Easy to understand pairing instructions. The case is great and holds 4 charges; plus the fit of the ear buds into the case is perfect with a magnetized attachment. All that for a super cheap price makes me a happy camper. Exactly what I’d hoped for when I purchased these!

title: Wayy better alternative than the apple airpods
body:
I love this cheaper alternative to the apple airpods. the sound quality is sooo much better and the noise cancellation is impeccable. a lot of times people around me would be talking to me and i couldn't hear a thing! I loved this product so much that i got my sister her own pair.

the only thing i hope they might be able to change in their next model is to be able to turn the charging case on and off so the earbuds are not being charged everytime i put it back in the case. because sometimes i only use the earbuds for 10 minutes or shorter.  another thing i hope they might be able to modify is to be able to use the earplugs individually. a lot of times i want to go out with one of the earplugs so i can at least hear people around me (because the noise cancellation is soo good with both on) but I am not able to use one of them alone because of the beeping that happens if you put one if them back in the case. the only way i can use one of them is when i put the other earbud in my pocket but i am always afraid of losing that earbud.

But overall I am VERY satisfied with this product and I will continue to recommend it to people around me. apple airpods are so overrated haha

title: Amazing Earbuds and an Amazing Price
body: These have been the perfect wireless earbuds for me. The sound quality is shockingly good, especially considering the price. The volume capability is also impressive. They're super comfortable with multiple size options, very easy to use with the automatic pairing, and noise cancellation is perfect. can't hear a thing other than the headphones even with the volume less than halfway. I've had no static or any problems at all.

title: OMG!
body: I never thought this headphones will be that good! I previously bought another brand here in Amazon for the same prize range,but that was trash compared to this one. The sound quality amazed me the most, sounds like my Bose headphones from before. I highly recommend this one! And i do not really write reviews for products, but this one really deserves 5 star, even 10! I will highly recommend this to friends and family. ♥️

title: Came as Advertised
body: I had a different pair of Bluetooth headphones I loved that I accidentally ran over with my car (sad, sad day). So I was unexpectedly in the market for new ones as the company I had purchased from didn't make the headphones I ruined any longer. After significant research and reading reviews I decided to go with the TOZO T10 5.0 Wireless Earbuds based on over 5,000 reviews that were mostly positive. Turns out I made the right decision, and here's why: 1. These cancel out ambient noise better than any pair of non-custom headphones I've ever owned (I do own a pair of Alcair in-ear monitors custom fit and they are the only things that seal better than the TOZO). This means when I am mowing the yard, edging, or on a run near a busy street I can hear the podcast to which I am listening without an issue. 2. The low end in these headphones is substantial giving power and depth to music you stream. 3. They fit very nicely in my ears and, no matter how much I sweat on a run or doing yardwork, they remain in my ears once I have put them in place (the instructions on this are very helpful and really do lock these universal earbuds into your ears as if they were made for you - though to be fair I have larger ears so headphones do fit a bit easier). 4. The charging case and battery life are nice. I went two weeks after the initial charge upon receiving them in the mail before I had to charge them again.

title: Great Gift! Great Earbuds!
body: I purchased this eaebuds for my father, he love it very much! Easy to paired, aweson sound, long battery life, light weight, comfortable to wear. He will recommend to his friends.

title: Holy battery batman!
body: I have had these for maybe a week, and am THOROUGHLY impressed, I have showered with these, dropped them onto concrete and accidentally stepped on them, this is legitimately the most impressive pair of earbuds ive had, and the best part? THE BATTERY LIFE,  like holy damn im an irresponsable person so I forget to charge things, and with daily use of about 1-2 hours per day THEY STILL HAVENT DIED 14 HOURS OF SERVICE WITH 1 CHARGE. I was working in a study room and someone called my name, I didnt hear them, they started YELLING at me and I didnt hear them these earbuds are AMAZING. If I had to make one complaint it would have to be the wind, when cycling you can hear the wind on your ears which is kinda meh, but you cant do anything about it, thats just physics. So its a 5 stars from me

title: Good bargain
body: These are perfect for the office. We are not allowed to wear ear covering, noise canceling headphones so I thought these would be a good alternative. They are perfect! The sound is very good for the price point. Their description says 3.5 hrs playing time and I get just a little over that. Bluetooth distance is excellent. I can roam all over our office.  They were also very easy to pair.

title: Headphones beat $200 Bose earsports
body: I was settling for a new cheap earphones that would get me through the gym. What I got in this product blew me away. These headphones are comparable to the $200 Bose earsports  and even exceed them in connectivity. The sound quality is amazing and the bass packs a punch. Great buy and would buy again.

title: Impressive sound quality
body: I had always used a "wrap around head" headphone to workout.  My recent one broke after a few months so I bought this one to try out the "earbuds".  The sound quality is definitely a notch above the cheap fitness headphones.  It was easy to pair & the extra earbuds sizes helped with choosing the best buds for my ears.  Even though the descriptions said it would be fine to take that along with you to the shower, I opted out of that.  It was fine though throughout my workout, waterproof against sweat.  A good bang for your buck.

title: Fake reviews - not a good product
body:
Bought these earbuds 2 weeks ago as my first experience with Bluetooth earbuds.
Design is nice and it comes with a bunch of different tips so they can really fit into your ear, a plus for that.
BUT, once I started listening to videos on my tablet, I noticed that the sound had a micro-second difference with the actual video. Thought it wasn't that bad.
BUT, I tried with my app Duolingo and  not only it lagged but everytime they were saying something, I would miss the first or second word because of the bad connection.
With just that, I was happy I didn't spend more money into that kinda product.
BUT after just 2 weeks, the earbuds wouldn't connect anymore with my phone. Don't know why, but it would take 5 attempt to finally connect.

On top of all that, reviews on this product are potentially fake. Once you register your product online for the warranty, you get an email asking you to rate 5 stars and in exchange, they send you a wireless charger.  So beware that from that 10 000 plus reviews, a lot of them were bought from the company itself.
I returned them and bought another brand for cheaper....better sound, better connection.

title: doesn't work underwater
body: I bought this to listen to music while I swam for my workouts, but it stops playing as soon as it hits water.  take my head out of water starts playing again.  I would return but its past the return date.

title: ITS A MIRACLE!!
body:
I'm one of the very, very few people who cannot use the apple air pods. No matter how hard I try, they fall out of my ear in less than a minute. I thought I would try a different brand, and when I put these in my ear, they fell out within seconds. I was about to give up, pack up the box, and send it back, but I decided to check out the instruction manual in case i was doing something wrong. I’m so happy I did. Turns out there were 4 sizes of plastic ear caps included with the earbuds. On my third try, the second smallest ones, I felt how i imagine Cinderella felt when she tried on the glass slipper. They were perfect and no matter how much I jumped up and down or shook my head, they stayed in place!
The quality of sound is impeccable, nice highs and lows, with a decent amount of bass. Once I found the right match, the fit was extremely comfortable.
I love these headphones, they have already changed my life for the better!

title: Great Product Excellent Customer Service
body: This product is great! The sound quality and bass truly astounded me for the price. I originally had a little difficulty getting the right earbud to stay in my ear (a typical problem for me), but with adjusting the earpiece and doing a little twisting, it works great. I encountered a problem within one week of purchasing where the right earbud stopped working, but I emailed the company and they immediately responded and let me know that they would send me a brand new pair (without even having to send the old ones back)! Even if the product didn't sound as fantastic as it does, I'd back it simply because the company so assuredly stands behind their product! They also are excellent with noise cancellation as they ended up stopping working during the middle of my workout, but I kept them in because of how good they canceled out my surroundings and helped me focus on my lift!

title: Affordable alternative ear buds that are great!
body:
I have my buds connected to my Samsung Galaxy smart watch. They pair easily. The sounds is fantastic and gets plenty loud. My only gripe is I just wear my watch on right hand to stay fully connected when I walk. I have long arms and on the left they disconnect. Otherwise these are great ear buds and the price is right.

Highly recommend you give these a try. You won't be disappointed.

title: poor microphone
body: I bought these to replace lost Airpods that are important to me for conference calls. They sound good but I am told the sound on the other end (hearer)  is distant and muffled. Further, 3 hours into a conference call they quit and the call dropped off my phone. So, that's not good enough if you need them continuously for few hours. So don't buy if you plan to use for conference calls.

title: A great pair of wireless pods!
body: So my son wanted the new Samsung pods but for what they cost I was afraid he'd lose one.  So I saw these Tozo's and they were reasonably priced and had solid reviews.  After a couple of months they are holding up well. The sound and fit are great. Make sure you use the right cover for your ear! The mic picks up phone conversations pretty easy, though I've only used it indoors to make calls. They were pretty easy to pair to our phones and the charger case is nice, maybe a little bulky but with the extra juice for your phone it's worth the bulge in your pocket. Overall they're a solid pair with great sound and features. Do yourself a favor and get two pair!

title: A good bang for your buck.
body: Let me just say that I'm very surprised, didn't think that they would be any good. First the sound quality is amazing, deep bass and clear voice. Battery life is pretty awesome. I got a good 4.5 hours on a single charge. And like 3 charges out of the case. The fit is pretty good. I'm a mechanic and work in awkward positions and the buds didn't fall out. But will say that once you sweat they will get loose. They pair really quick to the phone and each other. Overall for the price they are really good. Would recommend these to a friend.

title: Disappointed with these
body:
Even though this product had good reviews, I'm not happy with them.  When working properly, which is only about 50% of the time, the sound quality is very good.  The problem is that they cut out, switch back and forth between left and right, and go into an echo mode randomly.  They've completely dropped out in the middle of calls several times so I can't count on using them at all for important virtual meetings.  And battery life I haven't found to be anywhere near what is claimed.

My opinion is that you should buy something else.  These aren't worth the money.

title: Great quality earbuds at a great price
body: These headphones are extremely good, particularly for their price. They come with a handy charging case, several different ear pad sizes, and a charging cord for the case. The default earpads fit my ears perfectly. I took them for a test drive on my most recent trip to the grocery store. I was able to listen to my audiobook without having to constantly adjust the earbud and it made a banal task into something fun. I'd highly recommend these headphones for anybody who wants decent sound at a great price and wants to be able to charge them wirelessly. Battery on the headphones is excellent lasting me for over 4 hours. The case can charge that your buds up three or four times so these are good for long trips or long shifts at work. These are easily one of the easiest recommends I've ever made.

title: Wireless Freedom
body: I've only had these for the last 24 hours but I can already say that I am extremely pleased with the quality and fit of these wireless earbuds!  I wore them for a solid 6 hours while finishing up my work day and going home to cook dinner/meal prep and I didn't feel like they hurt my ears at all for that extended period of time using them.  I've primarily been using them paired with my cell phone for listening to music but I also tried them out on a lengthy phone call and was told that my voice sounded crisp and clear (which was an issue I experienced with some wired headphones).  All in all, I'm excited to continue putting these to the test in different scenarios (gym, mountain biking, trail running, etc.).

title: Stopped working after 2 months and can't return
body: I loved these at first, other than the short battery life (only get about 2 hours out of them before needing charged).  But now, suddenly after only 2 months they won't work.  They still "talk to me" when turned on but I can't connect to them.  Very sad for $50 down the drain!  Of course I am outside of my return window. 😣  Back to corded headphones for me.

title: Great product and great customer service!!!
body: Love these earbuds — great sound and they fit in my ears well.  After a few months I lost the charging cord, so I messaged the Tozo store asking if they sold it separately and was told they will ship one for free.  Amazing customer service! and I am very happy I can use the earbuds again!

title: Not a good fit
body: These weren’t a good fit for my daughter when she would run they kept falling out and she did try every one of the different earbud sizers. They had to go back.

title: So far so good...but some problems
body:
I purchased these to replaced my old bluetooth earbuds (which would only hold a charge for 40 min) to use exclusively at the gym.  Upon arrival I was a little skeptical of these earbuds.  The initial pairing with my iPhone 8 was simple enough but when removing them from the case for daily use they weren't automatically pairing with my phone.  I contacted customer support and they gave me instructions to reset the earbuds and that still didn't seem to help.  I came to find out that it just takes about 15-20 seconds to find and connect to my phone.  It's not a huge deal but I expected it to pair more quickly.  Custom support was quick to respond and friendly but you should know what to expect.  Their initial response will most likely be a cut and paste from the instruction manual or promotional bullet points that may or may not answer your specific question.

Another issue I've found is if you remove the left earbud first, it won't pair with the right.  Even if you remove them at the same time, there's a chance the left will start looking for your phone making it unable to pair with the right.  So, lesson learned. Always remove the right earbud first.

Lastly, I've only had these about a week but I have a hard time believing the charging case will give me a full 4 charges.  I fully charged the case and earbuds on Monday, went to the gym, used the earbuds for about an hour (not the full battery life) and placed them in the case to charge.  The case was already down to 3 of 4 lights. Went to the gym on Wednesday, wore them for an hour, placed them back in the case.  Now the case was down to 2 lights.  Same deal on Friday, case was down to 1 light.  So while for my personal use, they will probably give me 4 charges for each hour of use, I'm not sure if I fully depleted the earbud batteries each time, if the case would give me the 4 FULL charges.

Also, I should mention that customer support emailed me separately asking me if I would like a "truly free" "no strings attached" wireless charger.  I said, of course! To which they replied and asked if I would write a "kind honest" review.  They didn't say I HAD to but I felt like it anyway.  So we'll see if my 4 star review will still grant me the free charger.  With all the negatives above I hope this comes off as an honest review.

To end on a positive, the sound quality is good (I listen to rock/metal so I don't need all the bass hip hop and dubstep fans cry about) and the multiple earbuds sizes allowed me to find the perfect fit.  Overall I'm very pleased with them.

title: Good sound, poor battery and connectivity. PLEASE READ!
body:
I will start this review with the positives.

-I have been using these ear buds for just over a month now. The sound is actually pretty damn good. I was surprised by this. The low end gives a nice bass sound but not too much that kills the high end. It's a perfect balance! So the sound was definitely good. And after changing the ear bud tips, I was able to find a comfortable one that fits in my ears and will stay most of the time.

But there are many negatives for me..

-Connectivity is a pain. I learned quickly that I needed to remove the right ear bud from the dock first so that it would scan for Bluetooth connection. If you pull the left one first you can't connect to your device. Also I frequently would have issues with them not pairing with my phone. I would have to turn them off and back on to get them to connect. It's annoying......

-The microphone is terrible. When talking on the phone most times people can't hear me unless I talk very loud! Not happy about that.

-And lastly, the battery! The ear buds show on my phone that they have 30% battery life but the buds will still tell me to charge them. And does so every 10 seconds until I turn them off. They are supposed to last 3.5 hours but honestly it's probably just over 2.5 hours. And the charging case doesn't seem to hold much of a charge. After consistent use of only a month it's only good for 1 full charge and partial of another..

Look it's not bad for the price. However I do wish I had just invested the money into a pair of Bose.

title: Loss of sound in left earbud
body: Major issues with these earbuds. Limited distance of about 7'.  The right earbud works fine (thats the one that connect to your phone) The left earbud doesnt stay connected, volume will drop and come back on as if it doesnt have a strong connection (it connects to the right earbud)

title: Great Sound at an affordable price
body: I bought these for my husband because he works outside with loud equipment. These headphones have quality sound and work great even with all of the sweating he does! They do not fall out of his ears and he says they are really comfortable.

title: New earbuds are cool
body: I’ve only had them for two days. I do like the sound quality very much. I had to change the size that came in the ear pods but now the fit is much better. I’ll update soon.

title: Exceeded expectations
body: I casually mentioned to a friend I was looking for wireless earbuds and he recommended TOZO.  The price was lower than the others I had in mind but took the risk on a “cheap” pair.  These sound amazing!  The bass is warm and the clarity is fantastic.  I am hearing things in my favorite songs that I’ve never noticed before!  Pairing with my phone and my Fitbit was a breeze.  Looking forward to enjoying these for a long time.

title: Nice earbuds for this price
body: I would say, I have tried more than 10 true wireless earbuds but this one is one of best under I would say $99 range. I only paid $45 with the promo code and got IPX 8 waterproof earbuds. The only one thing I am not satisfied is the sound quality. Well maybe to me I don’t like too much bass but they have powerful and strong bass if you like. Other than that I have nothing to complain with these earbuds! $45 for them, what else you wanna expect? Of course sounds quality is not as good as jabra or bose or Sony but they are $200 range. I love mine

title: Great sound for the price!
body:
Great sound with base and mid range asside from the occasional fade out between the ear buds. One flaw is that you can only control stop or play. There is no advance or backup/repeate  feature with the earbuds.

I have used many earbuds in the past and these fit comfortably in my ears where others have failed with a tight fit. They are better sounding than the more expensive or fancier brands listed for sale on amazon. Infact these almost have the sound quality of a good pair of over ear headphones.

The earbud battery could use a little longer play time as other similar earbuds can play 4-5 hours without recharging.

One major issue is that the earbuds do not connect automatically to my cellphone. I have to connect them manually. Well worth the price though.

title: The best noise cancelling earbuds you need to own!
body: TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds are the best headphones I have ever owned. The sound quality is by far the best Ive experienced. The sound can be very loud if thats your liking or at a medium level with little outside noise interference. Outside of running and gym workouts, I use these as I cut the grass. I barely hear the lawnmower. I am also an audiobook/podcast fan and am easily distracted. I am submerged into my book or podcast with these earbuds. Exercise is no longer frustrating as these earbuds fit snuggly into my ears without constant adjustment. To me the best part of these is the pairing ease. The first time I took one of the buds out the BlueTooth connection was visible on my phone. No holding any buttons and waiting for different blinking lights! Ive owned these earbuds for a few weeks now and have only charged twice. Ive never had issues with power. I am now a loyal customer to this brand! If you are reading this, click above to buy these right now!

title: Great Bluetooth earbuds
body: Work exactly as described, long playtime, stays in ears well, comfortable, easy to pair. I love that you can just use the right earbud. I use them most often for walking the dog while wearing my 8month old baby on my back. I need to be able to hear cars coming, etc. these provide great sound while only wearing one earbud.

title: Sound quality is much better than my old earbuds
body: These earbuds have deeper bass and sharper  tones than any of my former bluetooth earbuds.  I actually had to turn down the volume from where it was set on my old set.  The fit is snug without any problems at the gym.  At first it was a little setback when I realized the buttons on the earbuds do not let you skip songs or change the volume , but then I learned I can just ask Google to do that for me since I have a Pixel.  Overall I am very happy with these.

title: Great sound and Outstanding Service!
body: I ordered the Tozo T10 earbuds a month ago after reading and comparing other earbuds reviews with the same price range. I am very satisfied with the T10. The sound quality is really great and is comparable to many much more expensive earbuds. I used them to work out in the gym and the noise cancellation is terrific. Unfortunately, I dropped one earbud on the gym floor and could not find it. I wrote to Tozo and explained this to them and they promised to send me a new pair! Wow, that's great service!

title: They sound great but lose connection frequently
body:
I picked these up to replace my wired earbuds for use when working out, biking, yardwork etc.
The sound quality was great,  actually much better then my previous beats earbuds.  While in use I notice that at first the left channel would randomly drop out and reconnect.  The problem would come and go, sometimes every few minutes which made this highly annoying.
Then I took my first long use trip via a plane flight from NJ to CA,  on a full charge I got just north of 2.5 hours before they alerted me to a recharge.  Recharging took about 30 min, and it was good to go again.  But during this time both left and right channels would drop randomly.  These lasted until the battery died and then I switched to my corded solution and stayed that way for the remaining 3 hours of the flight.

Overall I am on the fence with these..  battery time is OK..  but random channel dropping just got worse as time progressed.  I have these paired with a Galaxy S7,  at first I thought maybe it was the phone,  but I paired it with a bluetooth speaker and no disconnects .  And this is with the speaker being further away from the phone then the earbuds.

title: Good value for the price point
body: The sound is really pretty good for the money.  I'm told folks can hear me very clearly when on a phone call - another good point.  I bought them for use on my sailboat - a forever damp environment and they're great for that.  The BT range is good - at least 47'.  They're a bit heavy so not great for running unless you get the fit "just right."

title: Excellent earbuds!
body: Needed am inexpensive pair of wireless ear buds for gym and swimming. Got these babies in and love them. Their sound is unbelievable! It took me a bit to work with them in my ears as i have extremely small ear openings. Look forward to many workouts with these!

title: Good for listening to music but horrible for speaking to callers!
body: These are of great quality for listening to music. I would recommend this for music listening only. None of my callers are able to hear me when I speak. They ask me to repeat myself every other word. Since I purchased these for wireless talking, I am not happy with my purchase.

title: Awesome earbuds!
body: Everything about about these feels like quality. Even the packaging is durable and attractive. The instructions are clear. I thought having to pair two devices would be a hastle but you just follow the instructions and once paired they connect with your phone automatically when you take them out of the charging dock. I was also a bit worried that they wouldn’t stay I my ears while running but they provide 4 steps of different sized earbuds so finding a size that fits and stays put is easy. Love these earbuds and use them every day. Would definitely purchase again!

title: Where have these been my whole life?
body: Finally! I’ve purchased 5 sets of wireless earbuds have always had issues with them coming out of my ears,  or pairing or the battery life only lasting a short time. These are perfect! They came with different size ear cushions and fit like a dream. The sound quality is amazing and they pair themselves. These are my new favorite thing, add the great price and wireless charging and just wow!

title: Better than Expected
body: I am very pleased with my purchase! The earbuds were ready to use right out of the box. The packaging was very professional looking. The instructions were easy to follow. The only thing that I didn't like was the terminology used in the instructions. It referred to the right earbuds as MASTER and the left earbuds as SLAVE. It made me really uncomfortable at first and I considered sending them back. I decided to keep them because I think that it was not meant to be offensive, even though it is. Instead, I will just address it in my review. I gave this review 5 stars because the product is 5 star quality, so far. The customer service has been 5 star quality as well. I recommend these earbuds BUT I also recommend the company considering removing the power designations in the future.

title: Think you can't wear earbuds?
body:
I could never find comfortable earbuds so always wore the sports type that is wired and hooks over your ears.  Well recently my iPhone died and I found that the newer iPhones only accept wireless headphones.  After spending several days reading review after review I decided to give this pair a try. I was impressed that it came with different sized earpieces. I thought this would give me a better chance of finding a secure and comfortable set of earbuds. I was right!

From the moment I inserted them they were comfortable!  I listen to Audible books as I go about my day.  No matter what activity I am doing the earbuds stay right where they belong.  I couldn't be happier!  You absolutely should give the TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds a try.  You won't be sorry.

title: Not for running
body: This is good headphones if you're going to be using them in the gym and you're not doing a whole bunch of movement like doing weights; basically anything except running. They also do not really sit well in my ears. I wish there was a smaller model.

title: If looking for Bluetooth earbuds these are a MUST BUY
body: Only had these for a few days so far but I really love these buds.  Time will tell how they hold up but they are an all around 5 star unit.  Wish I would’ve bought them sooner.  The bass is incredible for such a small unit that was really surprising to me.  When I was shuffling around music just testing and a post Malone song came on and the bass slammed I was like wow that’s incredible how low the bass drops and still sounds good in them.  I have beats solo wired headphones and these sound comparable. The range is ok probably like 20 feet. The call quality seemed good. My wife said she heard me good when I was talking to her on them.  They fit in my ear nice and snug with the large rubber.  The charging station is nice and I like the fact I can take it with my and basically have a whole day of use with the charging station fully charged.  I haven’t killed the battery on them yet as I’ve only used a couple hours at a time and then put them back on the charger.  The company emailed me also offering a free wireless charging pad and I agreed so time will tell if it actually gets sent to me but seems like a nice gesture.  All around great.  I wanted a decent set of Bluetooth earbuds for work or working out or making calls and these blew away my expectations.  Very satisfied.  Purchase with confidence.

title: Comfortable enough for 8 hours straight.
body: Normally I can't wear earbuds. They hurt my ears or fall out, but these haven't been an issue at all so far. I've had them for about two weeks now and I love them. The sound quality is comparable to a pair of expensive headphones that my husband wears. I wore them for an entire 8-hour shift, and not once did I have a problem with them. I love them and highly recommend. I am also considering buying my husband a pair for Christmas this year.

title: Great earbuds for a good price.
body: I had bought a pair Jlab JBud Air Executive from Best Buy for $70. Got them home and one of the buds would not power on. Took them back and decided to try these for $50. Glad I did. These are great earbuds for the price. I have to say a couple things though. First the instructions indicate to try all the ear pieces to ensure you get the right ones for you. I started with the ones that came on out of the box. They seemed to fit and be secure in my ear. While using them the sound seemed to be louder in one ear. I could press the less loud one to make it sound the same but it would not stay when I let up on it. I tried the smaller ear pieces and they fit into my ear canal more completely and everything was even and sounded louder. Second, tweak your EQ. They sound was not very good until I adjusted the equalizer settings and it made a world of difference. I would definitely recommend these once I made these changes.

title: I like them
body: I use these at work where most of the time I’m sitting at a desk (just want to be rid of the cords, stop flinging my phone across the room when I forgot I’m attached to it) and they work great! I usually use just one of the earbuds and that works fine, I take them both out of the case to connect and then I put one back in, it disconnects but then the other keeps working. The sound cuts in and out when you walk with your sewing hone in your pocket which is annoying so I imagine these aren’t great for jogging/bouncy sports. Haven’t tested water proofing, can’t imagine needing it, I dont think these would stay in my ears while swimming anyway.

title: Final Update: Five Stars.  The Ear buds are great and the seller is better than great
body:
Final Update:  The replacement ear buds arrived today and they are perfect.  I testing the microphone immediately and it worked just great.  Kudos to the seller for reaching out to me.  The ear buds sound great and function perfectly.  Love the wireless charging via the Qi pad.
Updated: The seller reached out to me and is sending me a new pair of earbuds.  I'm updating to 4 stars for good service.  I'll update when I can test the new ones.  I will test the microphone.
Original post:
I had to change my rating from 5 to 3 stars because I’ve now had a chance to try some phone conversations.  The mic is near worthless.  I am a commuter and I do make calls for work while in transit and I need good call quality.  It’s a shame because I loved everything else about them.  If you’re not using them for phone calls they’re 5 stars.

title: IPX8 Waterproof, Wireless Charging and Great Sound at this price?
body: I live in Florida, yeah it’s very hot and humid here but I love being outdoors working in the yard or having fun on the golf course. These have already proven themselves in the yard and while taking a shower, golfing soon to come! Sound quality is great especially for the price compared to MUCH more expensive alternatives.

title: These blew me away!
body: For $50 this has gotta be hands down the best pair of wireless headphones for the money. I also have a pair of Bose SoundSport (Bluetooth not true wireless) and yeah they do sound better but with a price tag nearly 2.5x higher, I honestly don't think they sound 2.5 times better. You can feel the sub bass with these and they're plenty loud to cancel out noise at least while music is playing, and the included charging case is a plus over the Bose for battery life. I use them at the gym while distance running and I haven't had an issue with sweat or them falling out.

title: Very Impressed!
body: This is a very well built and great sounding set of ear buds. Not many ear buds stay in my ears but these do. The sound is great with a good mix of bass and treble to create the best experience. I enjoy the charger which has a battery. I am able to put the ear buds in the charger after working out and the next time I use them they are fully charged.

title: I highly recommend these earbuds
body:
These earbuds are absolutely fantastic for the price! The audio quality is great and has some surprisingly good bass. The batteries in the earbuds work for hours before they need to be charged, and the charging/holding case can charge the earbuds multiple times before the case itself needs to be charged. They fit snugly into my ear and don't feel like they're going to fall out when I move my head around. The Bluetooth range is also fantastic! I have no trouble staying connected to my phone if I leave it in a different room on the other side of my apartment. The build quality is solid to the point that they're also quite waterproof.

All around I would very genuinely say that these are the best wireless earbuds in this price range. I have recommended these to so many people.

title: Great wireless earbuds
body: These Bluetooth earbuds are perfect! The Apple earbuds would always fall out when using them during exercise and would constantly have to put them back in. With these, they lock into my ears and feel so comfortable. Sounds is great. These are high quality at an affordable price. I’ve only been using them for about 2 weeks now and I have no complaints.

title: Totally worth it.
body: My pair was just stolen so I'm reordering. Excellent product for the price. I have wierd ears and usually have trouble with earbuds falling out. These stayed in perfectly. Great sound quality and bass. Only two complaints I have are to be expected at the price point: only the right bud can be used independently and there is no volume or track control from the buds.

title: great fit, chic design, high quality sound
body:
I ordered this for my son as a graduation gift. He was planning to buy some other brand for himself so he was really surprised. He loved them, he says the fit is so important for him because he is mostly using the earbuds outside when doing sports, running, cycling.... He thanked me and said the quality of the sound is really great too. He is so
glad he didnot buy the other brand, we are all happy with this Tozo. Our expectations of an earbud are more than met. great package, great sound, great fit.

title: Very Great Earbuds
body: It has plenty of battery life on the go. The bass is super amazing, and it's super good since its water/sweat resistant. I would highly recommend these for any athlete or any person to just wear. If you're looking for good quality wireless earbuds for a decent price, this is what you need to get. It also comes with different sizes to switch out. The right earbud is the dominant Bluetooth, and it connects two devices at once: the left earbud and your phone, so when it says, "second device connected," you know why.

title: Better devices on market
body: These have ok sound battery life truly sucks in them on good for listening to music for about 3hrs at a to me. Don’t like that they can’t be connected to two devices all the time have to and turn Bluetooth off on either device all the time to switch between

title: Wanted to like them..
body: I really wanted to like them...but the left side gets quiet right after putting them in the ear and makes a tin canning sound. They sound good when both are working correctly but  so far that hasn't been the case. The left will sound distorted for about 10-15 minutes before going to normal again with slight distortion remaining the whole work out...rightside sound great

title: Not functional
body: Loses signal when submerged even an inch below water, approximately 5 feet from bluetooth source. Defeats purpose of being water proof.

title: Incredible sound, very comfortable
body: These are the first bluetooth earbuds I have owned. The price fit my budget and I was looking for something to wear at the gym. When I tried them out last weekend, I was very blown away by the excellent sound quality, the ease at setting them up on my phone, and also how comfy they are to wear. I have small ears so getting the different size earbuds was appreciated. When I wear these are the gym they stay put- even when i run on the treadmill. I wear these earbuds around the house when i do chores and its an improvement. The range is good too. I wore these when I went downstairs to do laundry ( my phone was upstairs) and the connection was still there. What a great buy!

title: These slipped out often.
body: These didn't stay in my ears at all. I tried every bud size combination that came with it, too. Maybe someone with different ears will have a better experience; but I know there are cheaper, better alternatives. Sound quality is decent, I don't remember noise cancellation being particularly good but I didn't care for it. Battery life was enough for me but is probably lower than what most people would like.

title: Great buy!!!
body: I absolutely love my earbuds! They are very comfortable and actually forgot they were even in my ears. I needed something to be able to run with and they are perfect!!! Highly recommend!!!

title: Great customer Service - Occasional sound issues
body:
The sound sometimes sounds echo-y, like there is a millisecond delay between one earbud and the other.  It usually rights itself within a minute.

The click to pause is less convenient than being able to tap.  You have to grab the earbud to do it or push into your ear, which is uncomfortable, to pause.

But generally, good.  The fit is good.  No problems keeping in my ears.  Pair with my iphone easily.

title: Not good audio quality
body:
Pretty disappointed with these earbuds, I really wanted to love them. Unfortunately, the audio quality is pretty bad to be honest. The left earbud seemed to be softer for some reason which I couldn't understand, people couldn't hear me very well, and almost every time I wore them - the audio connection would sputter in and out (and this is when I'm holding it in my hand, not many feet away). Also, I had to JAM it into my ear every time I wanted to tap the button, not easy to use AND if you tap twice, instead of switching the song, it redials your last number?? What stupid functionality.

Case is awesome, noise cancellation is great, but not impressed and not worth it when there are so many other competitors.

title: Best bluetooth earbuds so far.
body: wow! by far the best bluetooth earbuds I've used so far. fast and easy connection,  great sound quality, and they are very well made and don't feel cheap. a volume button feature would be a nice addition but other than that, i'm 100% satisfied with this purchase.

title: Misleading information. Only can use right earbud alone.
body:
I really wanted to like these headphones after seeing all the reviews. I am not sure what the expectations where for the other reviewers but these headphones did not even come close to my expectations. Below are my issues with the headphones
1) Made for only one size of ear. It did not come with any extra ear pieces for different size ears.
2) This was the biggest issue with me, you are only able to use the right earbud alone. The left one (or slave one as stated in the instruction manual that came with it) cannot be used by itself. No where does it state this by the way in the manual or in the item description that I could find. This means that when the right one runs out of battery life, you have no headphones. This is very misleading not including this information in the description or the manual.
3) I am not sure as to what the 4 blue lights are supposed to indicate in the charging case but it showed 4 blue lights when I put the drained earbuds in the case and 1 blue lights when I removed them 2 hours later. I see where people are saying they can get 4 charges out of the case but not sure how that works exactly.
4) Left earbud sounds louder then right one when they are both in. I have never noticed this difference with any of the other earbuds that i have purchased in the past.

I hate having to write this review but now I have to go through the trouble of returning these and purchasing another pair. If the sellers of these earbuds happen to read this, it would be very helpful if you would please put that the left one is useless without the right one. Thanks.

title: Really great sound quality!
body: I brought these when my previous Bluetooth headset stopped working. I was nervous at first because I hear horror stories about people losing one of the ear buds. However, the ear pieces come in 4 sizes, so one of the sets will be customized to your ear. I also like the charging case as well. It is a very convenient way to charge the ear buds. Also, the sound quality is really good and the ear buds do really well with cancelling noise.

title: Can't be the quality and the price tag it comes with.
body: For this price, the sound quality is amazing. The size is nice and small and fits comfortably in the ear. I hear complaints about battery life but the Apple Pods are promising 5 hours and these head phones are promising 4 hours. Not a problem.

title: Out of the box impression and 3 week update
body:
Just finished trying them out after taking them out of the box. I was hesitant buying these because some people said sound quality was awful, but I disagree! It sounds like you'd expect regular headphones to sound.  I haven't done a workout with them yet, but they seem to stay pretty well in my ears. Not heavy enough to bother me. Easy to use after pairing them with my phone for the first time, just put them in your ears and make sure your bluetooth is on. Haven't experienced any issues with the left earbud.

3 week update: I'll be returning these. They fall out even when I'm sitting. I cant find any accessories to make them fit any better and I cannot be fiddling with my earbuds every 5 seconds during my workouts anymore. I have tried working out with all the different sizes of buds and they fall out and loosen immediately regardless of what size I use. This also eliminates the noise-canceling aspect too, I can hear the people next to me breathe. Btw: the earbuds fell out as I wrote this update sitting on the floor. Good pairing and sound quality though.

title: Feel and sound great!
body: Awesome Earbuds! I just got these to use by the pool. They look so cool, they paired easily, and the sound quality is so good! I haven't gotten them wet yet but so far I'm happy with how they look, how they fit and feel and how the sound. Great purchase for sure!

title: Excellent Ear Buds
body: I have really enjoyed the convenience and ease of use.  I am new to blue tooth ear buds and I am quite happy  with these.  The battery life lasts for several hours, I put them back in the charger when done and have yet to run low during my usual routines, listening to music while doing chores, talking on the phone, etc.  I used the smallest ear size adapters and they stay in just fine but you do need to follow the instructions and twist the bud backwards into place.  I would highly recommend them to anyone.  I have not tested them in water, hope I never have to!!! Other reviews say they are fine to get wet so I would believe it, having seen other features match with what other reviewers are saying.

title: Better than the competition for a quarter of the price
body: I have had these headphones for about two weeks now and as of now they are the best wireless headphones I have ever purchased/used. Being a college student noise cancellation is extremely important when it comes to studying. The company does not advertise this but with how they sit in your ear, they make things much quieter even when there is nothing playing through them. I am also an avid runner and I know I have had previous issues with other wireless headphone competitors on being comfortable and staying in your ear comfortably when going for twenty mile runs but these stay secure the entire time even after sweating. Another bonus is how loud these get compared to others. When you get twenty miles deep into a run and you need as many distractions as possible at this point and the sound quality and volume the music plays at is extremely impressive.

title: Left earbud had constant static in it, for the price that's ridiculous...
body: No volume control, mic is poor quality/positioned poorly, and my left earbud was defective, playing constant static just loud enough to not ignore. Very un-balnced sound, wayyyyy too much bass.

title: Great Quality
body:
Comfort:
As someone who prefers over ear headphone, I'm not accustom to having things in my ear. However, these sit so comfortably in my ears that I forget they are there after a while.

Sound:
Sound quality is great! Really did not expect this level of fidelity from such small devices.

May update this review further as I get more use out of them.

title: Great quality but do not sit and stay well.
body: The sound quality and noise canceling is excellent. However, I cannot get the product to stay in my ear while I am running. I have used the smallest end bud and still doesn’t work. I wanted this to work so badly because I hate paying the price for Apple AirPods. For someone who does not have high energy work out these might be just fine. :-)

title: Big sound in small package at great price
body: I love the TOZO T10. The sound is great (surprising bass for such a small package), and at a very affordable price. Setup was very easy and the charging time is short.  I find the TOZO T10 comfortable to wear. Noise cancellation is very good. In making and receiving phone calls the sound is good on both ends for indoor conversations. I haven't tested outside in windy conditions yet. I've already recommended these to several family members and friends.

title: Questionable first impression later redeemed
body:
The copy of the Tozo earbuds I received initially worked fairly well  upon receipt with the big caveat of pairing and connectivity issues. Namely, after the original pairing between phone and earbuds, the buds would only connect to the phone if manually selected in bluetooth settings in iOS 12 despite the fact that they are supposed to automatically reconnect to the previously paired device (as almost all BT headphones do). I went through numerous troubleshooting steps including re-pairing with the phone, as well as pairing with other phones and devices. In all cases, the earbuds would pair but not automatically connect for subsequent uses. I contacted Tozo support and they walked me through more troubleshooting, with no change. As a result, Tozo sent me another unit while giving me the option to return the originals (but at my own expense for shipping, which is why I chose not to). Here's where it gets strange. After receiving the new unit, I followed the same pairing steps and got the exact same results until the last time when I forgot to remove the first unit from the BT devices list before pairing the second unit. In other words, both Tozo sets were paired to the same device at the same time. When I realized the mistake, I deleted the first unit leaving only the new unit, and continued testing. From this point on the connection behavior changed; instead of NEVER connecting automatically, now the earbuds would connect automatically after about 15-20 seconds. This is a rather long time considering A) every other BT listening device I own connects in 1-5 seconds (all of them!), and B) the Tozo earbuds turn off after about 30 seconds if no device is connected. Stranger still, after the dual pairing the original unit started to behave in this same way. I was baffled enough by these events to begin to question both my intelligence and my sanity - but then I remember how many times I paired and re-paired with at least 3 separate devices and carefully  and patiently observed the results. Take it with a grain of salt if you must, but SOMETHING happened that caused the earbuds to start behaving differently.

Having said all of this for the sake of completeness, I can actually comment on the typical device characteristics.

Pros:
High degree of waterproofing: I've tested them in the shower, and they can get slippery and pop out but they function fine (this also applies to the case which is also waterproof).

Fit: There are several sizes of tips and if you find the right one, these fit very snugly and do not come out or feel like they are coming out.

Sound: Certainly not audiophile quality, but perfectly acceptable for wireless buds under $50. Compared with my poor fitting Airpods I would say these sound better (and fit way better) for over $100 less.

Wireless charging:  Nifty little feature that is surprisingly useful

Build quality: Both the case and bud look, feel and perform like they are well made with quality materials.

Customer service: The Tozo people are very understanding, helpful and accommodating.

Cons:
Connectivity: Despite the fact that the earbuds are now connecting automatically after pairing, it still takes at least 15 seconds, which is not god, especially since every once in a while they refuse to connect and I find myself waiting and waiting until realizing that I have to intervene. Also, the connection between the right and left buds appears to be relatively weak. I noticed this when trying to use them while lying down. As soon as my arm/elbow covers up my ear, the connection begins to skip in and out. This stops when I lift my head. Cupping my hand over one ear has the same effect. I have not experienced any issues, though, during walking, running, etc.

Unfortunately, due to the connectivity issues (both the problems in the beginning which wasted a lot of my time and the ongoing peculiarities) I cannot give these 5 stars, but for the majority of use cases at $50 or less, it would be hard to find a unit that has all of the Tozo's features and still works relatively well in all respects.

title: I ordered for work but great as well for play
body: I use my earbud/earbuds for work to talk to clients .... I'm also OCD and wanted to eliminate wires dangling on my desk... my OCD mind can't think in what it perceives as a mess and the wireless charger I've been using since my Note 9 and now Note 10 has one wire anchored to the charging disk and that my mind can deal with.... so my quest to replace my current for a Q1 compliant bud began.  I was drawn to the T10's because they met my criteria but also the high waterproof rating... same as the Galaxy Note... since my business is all with medical often my calls are emergencies and I actually take calls in the shower and out running in the rain. It also said that I can rinse them off under the faucet and that's what I do with my Note as well so added convenience.  But the real surprise came with my music folder...Tozo basically advertised to attract music and entertainment lovers ...so.... I played a variety from Beethoven to Toby Keith, from Pavoratti to Simon and Garfunkel, from Helen Reddy in the 70s to Kellie Pickler in the 21st century...… and my goodness, everything sounded incredible... it was 3D quality.... the singer in the front of me, drummer behind me, musicians on my left and right.... I am in the center of the band!!!  So now instead of swapping back and forth from my Bluetooth buds to my Bluetooth speaker between calls I'm listening through the T10s and let them doing the swapping for me when a call comes through.... that's another added convenience and something else off my desk (the speaker).  Lastly, my price point shopping was between $100 and $200 and these were fifty bucks... but they also came with a no questions asked money back guarantee so with the features they posted I said "what the heck".... another thing my OCD mind can't deal with is the clutter of empty boxes laying around... I won't be needing the empty from these buds so I tossed the box.... the only place these buds are going is on the night stand by my bed so they're handy for my ears when middle of the night calls come through from medical facilities!!

title: I am impressed.
body: I wanted something I could work out with and I didn’t want to spend that kind of money on AirPods for that purpose so I tried these. They stay in my ears with no issue. They sound great which impressed me. I did have one small issue that seemed to resolve itself. When you first get these, the left earbud may cut out for half a second. This happened a few times, but that went away the more I used them. You can’t beat these.

title: Great wireless earbuds for the price, work as described.
body: I bought these earbuds earlier this month and couldn't be happier with them. They work in the shower and connect to my phone rather fast. They fit in my ears perfectly, and the case has a nice design. The only issue I had with them is that when I connect one earbud and then want to connect the other at a later time I would have to disconnect and reconnect, but this issue is rather minor. Overall, I would recommend this product for anyone looking to purchase wireless earbuds at this particular price range.

title: I’m Happy
body: So far so good. I just use the for watching TV at night and they are doing the job as intended.

title: Blah blah blah
body: Even with my phone in close proximity (in my pocket) the Bluetooth would go in and out of connection creates a weird sound especially during workouts. It is/was inconsistent when I utilize it for phone calls. Plenty of times the persons I call say they can’t hear me.

title: Awesome headphones and totally worth it
body: These are excellent headphones. I usually have a problem of the earbuds being a bit loose in my ears but these came with easily adjustable ear sizes. They aren’t too huge in your ears either. Without music playing they cancel a ton of noise as it is. Once my music was one or two notches high, I couldn’t hear someone right in front of me. Everything about these headphones are great. My only complaint would be that the battery life is somewhat shorter than I expected. It last about three or four hours but the case and charging them when not in use honestly erases most of my problems.

title: Crisp, clear sound!
body: Sound is great! I haven’t worn them in the water, but I love that I can if necessary. I needed to read the directions carefully as one bud pairs to the other first, then pairs to your phone or iPad. So far so good!

title: Going to buy several pairs!
body:
These are fantastic. I was a little concerned about what the quality would be like for the price, but they are great. Super easy to set up and pair, and work fantastic.  I am so glad I tried these before shelling out four times as much for AirPods!

I am going to buy several more pairs to keep in different places (office, gym bag), and for gifts!

title: Great bass and volume, not for every ear shape, pairing can take some time
body:
Have been using them for around a week now. Definitely made a right choice buying these.

The bass and the overall sound quality are great - no complaints there. I love the wireless charging case which goes great with wirelessly charging phone if you have one.

Pairing with the phone could be on a slow side at times and ocassionally needs to be initiated from the phone (or maybe I set up something wrong).

Finally, my biggest concern is that these don't fit nicely everyone's ears, mine included. They don't fall out, they sit firmly, but they're sticking out like small antennas. They still work perfectly, it's just that I do look a little silly when I look myself in the mirror. Luckily, it's definitely not a dealbreaker for me.

title: Best Sound Quality Earbuds
body: I’ve never written a review on any product, but I felt compelled in this case. I’ve used countless headphones and earbuds, from studio grade to casual, and from plug-in to Bluetooth. However, none that I’ve used before are anywhere close to the overall quality of the T10 wireless earbuds. From its stellar sound quality and its waterproof capabilities to the ease of use and innovative design, the TOZO T10 wireless earbuds are truly top of the line (and for an economical value I might add). I was truly impressed with this product and have already recommended to my family and friends that they try this product. Trust me, you won’t be disappointed!

title: Perfectly filled my need at great price
body: Great little eat buds, came on time no issues with performance other than I wish the volume could be a little higher understand though about the whole hearing loss prevention. No complaints from individuals whom I called while using them

title: Affordable price and excellent quality
body:
I  bought this device in last month. IPX8 waterproofing, high quality 8mm sound driver, and Bluetooth v5.0 are just a few of the high end features the T10's have to offer. Pairing them with my phone was too easy. I thought I would try a different brand, and when I put these in my ear, they fell out within seconds.

Thank you very much to TOZO and I strongly recommend this product will give 100 % customer satisfaction.

title: Best Music Experience
body: So glad I am living in this age where you can hear music in this extraordinary way. My old iPod died and I was so sad. But now I can never go-back-streaming music and listening with these amazing blue tooth earbuds is the way to go! Quality case, everything is flawless in design and the battery lasts a long time before having to recharge it. An incredible value for the quality of the item and the sound.

title: Fantastic product for half the price.
body: I've had these ear buds for about 2 weeks and so far they have been absolutely outstanding. They are half the price of my other wireless Jbuds and sound twice as good. The sound quality is super clear and crisp. Really love the bass. I travel a lot and watch movies while flying and it's like being in a theater with these ear buds in.

title: Enjoying my Tozos!
body:
Purchased these on 9/20/2019, and so far my Tozos have been great. The packaging is clean and organized, and has a card that includes the warranty registration (which was easy to do as well). It was easy to switch out the ear caps to the correct size that fits my ears. Here are the pros and cons from my experience so far....
Pros
Comfortable. Long lasting battery with quick charging. Simple bluetooth pairing, with no issues.
Cons
You can tap the earbuds to control a phone call (redial, ignore, disconnect), but you cannot tap to control music. It would be nice if tapping could pause, skip to the next song.

title: Constant Connection Disruption
body: I keep trying to use these thinking that they will get better and they just don’t.  I bought these to use at the gym and while biking.  There is a constant connection interruption between each of the earbuds and my iPhone.  Just bending over to tie my shoes causes the sound to cut in and out.  The overall quality of the earbuds and the charging case is fantastic.  Looks very well made, but the electronics is severely lacking.  I’ve had to use my old wired earbuds because these are so frustrating.  Going to look into a return if it’s not too late.

title: Not bad in-ear wireless, but....
body: You only get about three hours of listening time before you have to charge these again. Probably not a big deal for some but I use music to improve my daily focus in the office. All in all, these are nice to use on the weekends when gardening outdoors. I don’t end up snagging a wire and pulling out of my ears when wiping off sweat. And the water resistance is a nice quality as I tend to have neighbors who stop to talk while I garden, meaning dirt gets transferred to the surface and I have to rinse off constantly.

title: The most important thing to know is the fact that sometimes the headphones will  phase  in and out.
body:
Are use this product for music in particular and working out, and i used it for phone calls as well.
The quality for the phone was OK, sometimes it would be a little interference but not bad it’s really really a great product for those of you who want to listen to the music with heavy bass this absolutely has heavy bass enough heavy bass that it kind of shocked me. But also there’s a good balance in between as far as the music you’re listening to, as well I went from Bluetooth headphones JBL and they were not as good as the Bluetooth headphones I have now.

title: Excellent range, good sound quality
body:
Normally I use electronic devices longer before reviewing them. However, this set has so far proven better than the 4-5 other bluetooth headphones I've owned, so I'm happy to review them now!

-Great range, better than any other BT earbud set I've owned (all at this price point)

-Good sound quality

-Very easy to use/connect

I'd highly recommend these earbuds at the ~ $50 price point.

title: The product quality is great!
body: I was surprised by how well designed the product is. The earbuds themselves can withstand swimming (granted, not underwater swimming or diving), sweat, showering, and washing your face. This doesn't mean you should submerge the earbuds in water though. The earbuds also come with 4 different sizes (S, M, L, XL) so that you can pick the most comfortable size for your ears. Getting used to having to kind of turn them in my ear to make them fit snug has been somewhat of a struggle, but other than that, I have no serious complaints for this product.

title: Good sound, comfortable, but drop outs are insane
body: I like the way these sound and the way they feel, love that they connect quickly. BUT, the amount of drop outs is pretty insane. I understand that there are interferences everywhere, but this is the first pair of bluetooth headphones that have So So So many drop outs. it's very annoying and makes it difficult to listen to them. Not sure if Im going to keep them. GOing to see what my phone battery needs to be at before this drop out madness begins. So far, the ear buds are charged 100% so maybe it's my phones bluetooth signal. But like I said, I've had many bluetooth ear buds before and these drop out more than is usually acceptable.

title: Pay more for a trusted brand and save money
body:
I'd rather pay twice as much for a good pair and save money than throw away $50. I have no time to return these.
The main reason for one star is left ear plugs does not charge, I put them on charge for a full night and the left one says low battery please charge.
They lose connection easily when outside or more than 10 feet away from the phone.
The sound quality is an absolute joke, it's not even bad, it's just flat out joke. Maybe I'm just used to decent headphones from trusted brands.
It's better to pay more and save money.

title: Great Sound! Great Noise Cancellation! Not for Daith Piercings!
body: I like that they really cancel out the noise!They have awesome sound!!  What I didn’t anticipate and completely forgot about was my Daith piercing! It’s in my right ear and this is the ear bud that is the main controller. No matter how I try to fit it comfortably. It just doesn’t. So if you have a daith piercing I would really consider this when purchasing any type of ear buds that fit tightly in the ear!

title: Great sound and excellent customer service
body:
The Tozo earbuds are a great wireless headset. The bass is deep and the sound is crisp. On phone calls I can hear great and my callers tell me the sound is good on their side. I like the portability and the wireless charging. I just drop the case on a puck on my desk and grab it when I leave my office.

Customer service is excellent as well. I had a question and they responded quickly to address my concerns and resolve to my satisfaction. I recommend the product and the seller.

title: Charging on the Go!
body:
I am really enjoying the my Tozo Wireless Earbuds.
They sound great and provide good noise cancellation.
The fit my ears pretty well.  No readjusting the earbuds to fit comfortably or for stability.
But the most important part about the earbuds is the ability to charge from the case itself.
I did not  realize the case that the earbuds are stored in has the ability to charge the earbuds up to 4 times without connecting it to a charger.  While in the case the earbuds and the storage case charge at the same time.  Pretty sweet.

title: Great headphones
body: These headphones work great.  I really like how they are charged in the case.  They have a nice sound quality and set up is super easy.

title: Great product for the price
body: I was not about to pay $100-150+ for the airpods and have been looking for wireless headphones for a while. I got so tired of untangling the headphones all the time! I had to use the smallest sized pods for my ears and I almost wished there was one size smaller. However, they do fit. Sometimes I really have to push them in there to stay (and I had to read the directions/watch the video on correct orientation/insertion). But, they haven't fallen out while biking or walking. I'll try running at some point. Excellent sound quality! I also love how they magnetically stay in their charging station. So far, great product for the price.

title: Good sound quality and well made, slight issue resolved by customer service
body:
I've had these for about two weeks with almost daily use. The build quality is really good and the sound quality is great. I was concerned about the battery life but with the case constantly keeping them fully charged when now in use it hasn't been an issue.

The one issue I have is the left ear bud cuts out to 10% volume every few minutes for a second or two. I told there customer service and they are replacing the headset for free. I also didn't see any other reviews mention it so it must not be a common issue.

title: Initial impressions are really good!
body: So far, so good. Fit is good, quality (sound, packaging and materials) is good as well. I like the charging case and the fact that it charges easily on my Anker wireless charging pads. Can’t speak for battery life just yet...  Overall, happy so far.

title: Very Satisfied.
body: I’ve had these earbuds for several months and so far I am very pleased! They paired perfectly right out of the box with my iPhone Xs Max. . They fit my ears great and the sound is very good. The packaging and product quality are impressive. Five minutes after I put them in I received a phone call. No problem, sound was good and my caller could hear me just fine. These are the perfect interim earbuds until the apple airpod 2 comes out later this year. And when they do these will make great backups or a gift.

title: Noise cancelation works extremely well
body: Just got these the other day. I have been able to use them a few times. They work well and charge fast. The noise cancelation works really well even with windows down in the car or at the gym with other music playing. Have not been able to use them while out on my motorcycle yet but will update afterwords to see how the noise cancelation works to that extent. Over all very satisfied with them and was happy they came with a 1 year warranty.

title: Top Quality Earbuds
body: Initially I had a difficult time settling on which earbuds to purchase, but bought these after considerable research.  I must say these buds are absolutely fantastic and worth the money.  They have great sound, fit nicely in my ears and are easy to operate. Be mindful to carefully read through the instructions, although simple its easy to skip a step.  I'm enjoying these buds so much I plan on buying several pair for its.  And I appreciate they actually came "new" in the original packaging and sealed (not the recycled/returned items Amazon tends to send out).  Great buds, love them!!!

title: Under priced! Totally worth it!
body: All I can say is that I wasn’t expecting to get such great pair Bluetooth earphones for the price! (They are my first so I was skeptical). Off the bat I was impressed by the packaging so it got me excited to see the products as a whole. I haven’t had any problems with them the Bluetooth range is amazing and I love the waterproof of both the earphones and the case. The case is portable and can recharge the earphones 4 times before having to charge the case again. The case is also wireless charging compatible which makes everything more easy. The sound quality blew me away I was not expecting so much clarity and so much bass! The noise canceling is very effective I can’t hear anything and thats when my volume is at about 10% overall if you are considering getting these you should and if you are not well now you should! Couldn’t be happier amazing quality for the price I am  thoroughly impressed!

title: Finally some earbuds I love
body:
I have been looking for some true wireless earbuds for work, relaxing and working out and I finally found them.  The sound quality is rich and crisp.  The design also means that I can block out the ambient noise in my  open office work space without having to blast the music.

The packaging and design of the earbuds scream quality and attention to detail!

Pairing the earbuds was simple.  The instructions were spot on.  Open the case, take them out, find them in Bluetooth settings and they are paired!

My favorite part is the charging case that they come in.  I can charge them from my wireless charger or from the included USB cable.  I expect to use these for a long time coming!

title: Amazing how simple and easy these are to get started with - Great Sound and battry life
body: I couldn't believe how simple these are to get up and running. They connected right away with my Samsung phone and the sound is great. The batteries have lasted through my first two hours of working out with no issues. The charging case is so slick with the buds clicking into place magnetically. If you are looking for a hassle free set of ear buds then theses are the ones you want.

title: Great earbuds and customer service
body:
The earbuds come with many different sizes to comfortably fit into one’s ears. The sound quality is great and has more bass than others I’ve tried. They definitely cancel out exterior sounds so just be careful of one’s surroundings.
Unfortunately recently, the right earbud stopped charging, but awesomely, the TOZO customer support team we’re quick to respond with suggestions to see what may be the problem, and ultimately they quickly decided to send a whole new set with no further questions. So a whole new set is now the way. Definitely satisfied with this purchase and service.

title: Great for the price but with some creature comfort problems
body: I was very surprised by the sound quality upon connecting these headphones for the first time. Pairing was easy and simple(actually paired to my echo first strangely enough).  The only problem I have with them is the touch controls. They have one button per earbud that takes some force to press. this means that you can only play or pause your music without using your device, double pressing is reserved for redialing a phone number while one press can play and pause music as well as answer a phone call and hang up. otherwise they are solid great battery life sturdy feeling contstuction. they even had a full charge of both the case and earbuds right out of the box

title: Excellent Value, Great Sound!
body: I primarily purchased these wireless earbuds to wear to bed when listening to ASMR. Previously, I used traditional wired earbuds which got in the way/tangled when wearing in bed. The sound quality is great for ASMR and music alike. I'll also be using these for listening to music when mowing the lawn. My musical tastes vary from Hip Hop to Extreme Metal and other genres in between. The bass response is excellent and the overall sound dynamic is rich. I've never used more expensive earbuds, but these are worth every penny.

title: Buy these.
body:
If you're looking at a couple different Bluetooth headphones and are on the fence... Consider this your deciding review.
