They could easily charge twice as much for these. They definitely do everything they claim, I use them almost daily, I've tested them in the shower, wireless charging.

I love these headphones, I'll probably gift them to friends and family.

title: Great buy
body: I love this earbuds. It is louder than my other wireless earbuds so that's awesome. Noise cancellation is too good (When I'm wearing it at work and my boss is behind me, talking..she swears I ignore her when I cannot hear ish). Cons - the fitting in my ear canal is not good. When exercising, it falls out...I think it would fill some ears perfectly, just not mine.

title: Very good customer service
body: I contacted the Customer Service to explore how could I get only the replacement of the Right earbud. I have bought the earbuds some days before but I lost one of them. While I didn't have any expectations about their response, I was delighted to hear that they could sent me a new one. I highly recommend this product because the quality and the after sales client driven attention.

title: The Sound of Value for your money
body: Overall this was a good purchase.  I found out the hard way that when you use these buds, don't let them touch each other or place them in a pouch or carrier that will cause them to touch.  Keep them in the bulky cradle provided so that they are separated.  The bulky (my only negative) cradle is a pain to carry in your hiking shorts (as I do), but the cradle provides additional battery power should you be on a long hike/run as well as keeping the buds apart.  When touching they tend to disable each other.  I found the customer service department of this company to be very generous & helpful when I encountered a few problems due to my ignorance as stated above.

title: Best wireless headphones I have purchased yet
body: Overall I am extremely satisfied with these headphones. My only complaint is I wish the battery would last longer but 8 hours is still really good, and the headphone case is a wireless charger so really it's not a big deal. That is why I am giving them 5 stars in all areas. I love these so much, I show everyone I know. Truly noise canceling to me anyways.

title: Don't charge or pair anymore
body: they worked the first couple times I used them.  Now they only charge for a few seconds and then stop, I have to reseat them in the case to begin charging for another few seconds, etc.  Getting both the left and the right to pair at the same time is hard. a lot of the time they are not detected.  If I successfully pair the right side, it just beeps in my ear over and over (I suppose because I can't manage to get them to charge).

title: Super easy to use
body: I've been using these headphones for around three weeks now, and they're great. Pairing is unbelievably easy, just take them out of the charging case and they automatically start pairing. Occasionally the connection is a bit spotty when there's a lot of other Bluetooth devices nearby, but I think that's par for the course considering the price. Battery life is as advertised (over 3 hours) and charging is fast as well (though I haven't measured it exactly). I've also worn these in the shower a few times and they still work, so they are water resistant, but since they are not safe to swim in I will say they are probably not 100% waterproof. Overall these are definitely worth the price.

title: Falls Out Quicker than you can say TOZO
body: It falls out very easily if you have medium sized ears. I have tried all of the different sized ear things that came with the headphones and they didn't solve the problem. I bought these to work out in and they didn't do a great job for that, one jump and they would fall out because of the way the weight is distributed in the product. Because the outside and the body of the buds are so heavy, they fall out of your ears super quickly. Not worth the time and the money to buy and then return it because it serves no purpose.

title: Amazing
body: Finally I can walk around or move with out knocking ear buds out of my ears when I hit the cord. These mean freedom!! Very high quality. Magnetically snap into the charging box. Wireless charging. Waterproof (wear in the shower!) and they paired with blue tooth automatically. Get these!!!

title: A few days in... they work well for me
body:
After many annoyances with cheap wired earbuds, I bought these and I'm happy with them so far. The sound quality is good for music and podcasts, better if you can access equalizer settings. The smallest caps fit me well, they stay in my ears securely, and do a decent job of blocking out noise.

Similar to some other reviewers with Samsung Galaxy S8, I have experienced occasional sound drops (not disconnection) while walking around, especially in a crowded area. Playtime isn't the longest, however, the charging case is convenient.

title: DO NOT BUY POC
body: they are top heavy and fall right out your ear i almost lost one dont buy

title: Great price, really great earbuds
body: I purchased these based on the reviews that I read, and I wanted a great quality pair of wireless earbuds. I didn’t want to spend too much money while so, but what I got passed my expectations! The earbuds stay in place and don’t hurt my ears. The price was very reasonable and I am very satisfied with the sound. For waterproofing, I even dropped them in the rain and they still worked like a charm. They are very easy to use once you get past the pairing part! I love the little case as well. I haven’t used them for an extended period of time so I can’t comment on the battery life but so far, so good. I do recommend this product. The company is super nice and follows up with your order in case something may have happened. Definitely a buy.

title: Fantastic earbuds for $50
body:
I bought these, GoNovate Airo, 1More true wireless and the $250 powerbeats pro. These $50 headphones totally beat (pun intended) out the powerbeat pro by a long shot.

These have good volume, sound, and good bass. The 1More earbuds might be slightly better (at $99), but I need to do a comparison again.

Highly recommend these TOZO T10 earbuds, for $50 you cant go wrong.

title: Great sound, some functions MAY be lacking...too new to tell
body: Barely used for a few days, but sound is great!  One caller commented that background noise was still audible, thus my 2 star rating there.  I gave 3 for battery life, as 3 hours is all it touts for streaming, though 5 hours for talking.  I haven't talked that long yet, so can't verify!  Ease of use seems great so far.  My biggest concern is connectivity to laptop for Skype/Webex.  So far it worked only 50% of time.  Jury's still out!

title: TERRIBLE
body: These headphones were a real disappointment.  They CONSTANTLY cut out, so much that they are useless.  I use them while cutting grass with my phone between my legs, and the left ear bud will cut out every couple of seconds.  They have great sound, and great noise cancelling when they DO work, BUT THEY DON'T.  VERY DISSAPOINTED.  Now I have to buy a whole new set of earbuds and HOPE that they actually work.

title: Believe the hype!
body:
One of the best tech buys of all time! Believe the 15k reviews. Delivers great sound and bass. Battery life is about 3-4 hours per charge with a case that can juice them up sufficiently in just 10-15 minutes.

My only negatives are that the case is a tad bulky for pockets and I’ve had a few issues w/ connectivity and the charging mechanism becoming a bit finicky. However, most of these issues were solved quickly by their customer service or Amazon.

Overall, I’m buying these as holiday gifts. They are so easy to use and have proven to be resilient and long lasting.

title: Don’t waste money on lesser earbuds, even from big names.
body:
These gems beat any other earbud I’ve tried, including apple and others.
The set up took less than a minute, charging lasts a very long time and the fit into my ears without falling out.

Set up is two steps and done
Charging is fast and easy and I’ve used them on calls lasting three hours
Fit is nice, the buds are balanced well and they don’t fall out even when you are chewing.

title: Awesome earbuds
body: I’ve always wanted to get wireless earbuds but could never find any that I liked until I tried TOZO T10 earbuds.  If you are looking for earbuds to find, the ship stops here. You won’t be disappointed. They stay in your ears while you run, lift weights, shower or just doing everyday chores. I love it that they are waterproof hence the shower comment. Thanks TOZO for a great product.

title: great sound
body: I have a pair of LG earbuds and have tried the air buds by apple, however these are the most comfortable and best sounding by far.  Would recommend them to anyone looking for a great pair of earbuds at a price far better than others on the market.  As  FREE added  features these are water proof to a few feet, wireless charging enabled, they also have a  one year manufactures warranty  and fast shipping.

title: Good when they work
body:
So I've used these earbuds on 4 different devices and experienced different results on each. However one thing stays consistent, disconnections. Devices used, Note 8, PC(with USB bluetooth adapter), NVIDIA Shield, and iPad Pro. Randomly the left earbud will stop receiving sound for a second then come back. All devices. A couple of the devices the sound was coming through more like morse code. No large distance between me and the device so that shouldn't be the issue. Anyway, for the price, like I said, when they work they're good headphones, but quite annoying to constantly stop hearing audio out of the left ear then it come back.

Edit: Customer support has contacted me regarding my issues and offered to send me a new pair since these seem to be defective. I'll update again once I test them out.

title: Split decision
body: Better than what I had, but the search continues.  I have tiny ears and these are larger than expected, so they are not useful to me on the go or during exercise since they fall out..  On th flip side, my son has tiny ears, but he absolutely loves these (I guess every millimeter counts). Once set up they are super convenient.  Immediate auto connect when you take them out of the charging station and the station can be wireless so I don't have to plug into something everyday.

title: Solid competition to AirPods
body: These are a solid solution to the triple priced apple AirPods. The noise cancelling is good, the sound quality is good. I was pleasantly surprised!

title: WINNER.....A Must Read Review Will Definitely Save You Some Time
body:
I purchased these three earbuds and compared them. TOZO (ranked #5 in “Earbuds), 4.4 stars from 8300 reviews, took 1st place with ease. The sound..AMAZING. Deep rich base and clear highs. All pair very easily with my iPhone X and functions are all fine. Sound is where O
TOZO steals the show. The other two couldn’t compare, not even close and most surprising...look at the comaparison.

All three were tested with same phone, same song,, same volume and same room with equal ambient noise, which was none. Same thing with a phone call. Same person etc..

PASONOMI: rank #481 in Earbuds, 4.2 stars, 6500 reviews. Which I have no idea how those stats are possible, sound is absolutely horrible. No need to write anything else about these, horrible should be could enough.

MEBUYZ: rank #1880 in Earbuds. 4.4 stars, 1400 reviews. No charging indicator (if that matters to you), you have to turn them on each time you want to use them. The other two connect as soon as you remove them from their case. The sound of these are fantastic, almost as good as TOZO. It fails miserably when it comes to features, in short, they suck.

title: These are fantastic! Love them!
body: I have never used wireless earbuds before so this is my first pair. They are very easy to use. Within 2 or 3 minutes of opening up the package, I was up and running. They arrived already charged and I was able to pair them with my tablet quickly. The directions and user manual have all of the info you need. The sound quality is excellent. I highly recommend them!

title: First bluetooth headphones that I can actually use on a regular basis!
body: I have owned many bluetooth headphones over the years, and have always been very disappointed in their sound quality, and in particular the microphone. The TOZO T10 is great with both! Fantastic bass response (I am a musician, and bassists in particular) and the mic is clear and clean. I am very pleased!

title: I recommend buying at least two pairs! 😊
body: I was so impressed with the quality of this product that I two more pair.  One for my girlfriend, and another for myself.  The sound is very impressive!  The price is great.  I figured with two that should get me through entire day.

title: Really well built and perfect for the price!
body: Received these earbuds less than a week ago but i can tell they are well made and sturdy. Of course the sound does not compare to high end earphones like my Sennheiser HD555 or Bose QC 35 II but it does the job very well and it’s the best in that price range. I am happily surprised about the sturdiness and built quality for both the earphones and the charger.

title: Good quality sound in headset, poor quality Mic
body: Great sound quality as headset. But I have had very poor quality on any calls I makes. Everyone I talk to using the headset say the mic is barely audible. Would not recommend this headset if you are planning to use it for calls also.

title: Excellent wireless earbuds for those that wanna great sound at a great price.
body: If you're in the market for great wireless earbuds that connect quickly, aren't going to break the bank and have great sound, look no further. It took me trying all the ear caps until I found the best fit, but once I did, these fit snug and the sound quality is superb. I'm not an audio junkie, but the sound seems well balanced and crisp. For the price I definitely recommend them. Very satisfied!

title: Tozo made it right
body:
At first when I put them on they worked fine. After 2 minutes it decides to cut in and out. No matter what I did, the music would come on and off. They are useless. Cant used them.

I am updating this review. Tozo has contacted me to make it right. I have to say that it was nice to see that they do care for their customer. That is great. Thank you Tozo.

title: Waterproof or Not?
body:
I needed waterproof buds, as the primary time these are used is during physical exertion.
First time in use, the buds were working well...except, the left bud, apparently worked too far loose, and plopped into a bucket of water.  I retrieved it immediately and turned the system "off"...waited for it to dry, and, tried again.  It worked, but after some time (less than a day's typical use) the left earbud began to intermittently lose connectivity (bluetooth).  Put up with this for a few days, then contacted TOZO Customer Service.  They responded asking that I do a manual reset.  After the 'reset', they worked well for a number of hours...but, by the following day, were back into 'intermittent-signal-loss' mode.  I tried 'reset'ting again, then again and then, once more...to no avail.  Contacted Customer Service again - was informed that TOZO was interested in my 5-Star satisfaction...but wanted me to write a review 'first'...
So - looking forward to seeing their response to this review.
Have purchased another set of earbuds that I am not as impressed with, and would like the TOZOs to work well enough to upgrade this to a 5-Star Review.
Will let you know.

title: I love them!
body:
I was very pleasantly surprised how good the Tozo T10 ear buds are. I am an audio engineer and recording artist and appreciate how good the bass comes through these ear buds. The handy charging case is well made and the whole setup to link the earbuds and link to my play back device is pretty straight forward and simple to do

I love em' W Kruger Spring Grove IL

title: I can recommend these headphones!
body:
Includingthis product, I have 3 Bluetooth headphones and I love how this is more convenient because it comes with a case to charge the device and I have not noticed heavy disruption.
Pros: its light, waterproof, portable charger to extend battery, has noise cancellation, and the case is extremely convenient.
Con: they're small so if not careful you could lose a pair, nitpicking but no volume control which my other Bluetooth headphones have, there are times the left or right piece may pause but that is better than losing the entire sound and it doesn't happen often which is good.

title: Survived my washer and dryer. But can’t be used to swim in a pool.
body:
Lost one of the earbuds and accidentally washed in the washing machine which is pretty bad but then I also ran it through the dryer for an hour and this was after having not charged the earbuds for three weeks.  And after all that I found it and put it in my ear and it powered right up and connected to my iPhone and played beautiful quality audio.

The problem of course is I can’t swim in a pool with it but I can wear it to listen to audiobooks in the shower but no immersion without it turning off on you which I assume the manufacturer designed to do that so as to discourage people submerging it which makes me sad because I bought it to swim in was why I wanted them in the first place.

Other than that I am impressed.

title: Wife loved them!
body:
I bought these for my wife as an anniversary present. We recently started going back to the gym for the first time in years and she was tired of borrowing my corded earbuds that I currently use. These didn't fit that well at first until we used the smaller little earbuds that they came with then they fit perfectly. She loves that they now fit perfectly and won't fall out of her ears no matter what exercise she is doing or how much she shakes her head.

I tried them on also and the sound quality was amazing on these and is much better then my current corded earbuds I have been using. I'm going to buy a pair of these once my corded earbuds quit working. All in all we couldn't be happier with out purchase. Being able to throw them back in the charger and give them a quick recharge is awesome and very convenient. If you are looking for the perfect wireless earbuds for your next gym workout I would definitely give these a try. You will be happy you did.

title: Great product for the price!
body: So, I liked the idea of having a wireless headphone, but could never get the apple airpods to fit my ears.  I decided to find something similar and saw the positive reviews for these headphones.  After switching to the smallest sized earbud cover, they fit perfectly.  The sound is great and there is a nice bass as well.  They are easy to pair, and easy to operate.  I would definitely order these again!

title: These work well...however
body: The battery life is great, the sound is great...however they are very heavy and do not fit and stay in my ears.  I have tried all of the ear pads and none fit my ears well.

title: Great Product, great price
body: I bought these to replace a different style. These are far better than the expensive name brand style.  Although I;m still learning the fuctions, the sound is very clear when on the phone, the music comes in kinda loud for me where I've had to turn down the volume. We'll see if that changes over time.

title: Great bang for the buck!
body: These are legit! As a lifetime Beats connoisseur, I decided to step outside my box & give these a try. The sound is incredible, clear highs & deep bass. The multitude of ear pieces makes finding the perfect fit a breeze. Noise cancellation works as described. Love them! Customer service has also been exceptional!

title: Don't Waste your Money
body:
After seeing 8500 reviews with most of them positive, I figured I would give them a shot. What a waste of time, these 8500 reviews are mostly fake. There is no way that many people are having a good experience with these earbuds.
From the moment I put them in after pairing, the left one started cutting out. It constantly just cuts out and that causes the right one to pause. No matter where I hold my phone, it still does it. With Bluetooth 5.0 it should never happen, but it does and it makes these unusable and are being returned.
If an item looks too good to be true.......it is, and these fit that bill.

title: They're OK
body: Fit, weight, sound, use, is all adequate.  The bluetooth connection is very spotty, though.  Turn your head - music cuts out.  Phone in pocket - music cuts out.  I haven't had a phone call with them yet, either.  Pairing is a little strange and finicky.

title: Great Earpieces for the Price
body: The battery life is good. I use them with my Samsung Note 8 and I use one earpiece at a time. The left or right side lasts me an entire day (based on my usage). The case charges the earpieces and the case can go days without the need to recharge it. Sound quality is good, nice bass, and decent noise cancellation.

title: Great Sound!
body: I love these earbuds. The sound Quality is perfect with lots of bass and treble. Thought I would try out them out in the shower since they are waterproof and they did very well and are still working properly. The only downside I would say, is they sorta have trouble staying in my ear walking or doing cardio. I tried all the sizes they included but it just doesn’t want to sit right (idk maybe ears shaped weird lol). They sorta look like wine corks sticking out of ear too. All in all, very well made product.

title: Surprised by these little beasts.
body: These little bad boys have killer bass!! I was truly shocked! Sound pretty good. Mostly low and high “sweep” sound frequencies but it’s still impressive.

title: definitely worth the price!!!
body:
It is definitely worth the price compare to other so called hi-tech products.
Not really comfortable for running or elliptical workouts.. you would have to keep adjusting as it keeps coming off..
other than that it's perfect with sound quality.
you can either use only left earbud or right earbud or both since both have on/off which is good!!..

title: Great Sound!
body: These produce much better sound than I was hoping. I like a deep, rich bass and crisp highs. I'm not a huge fan of mids for most of the music I listen to - when I use an equalizer looks like a "V" for most things. These really deliver that for me and I'm really pleased. I was hoping the battery life would be better. I sculpt stone and my last set of "connected wireless" BT headphones would run all day (6-8hrs). These last about 3hrs. I'm not a huge fan of how they fit in your ears, but my ears are wonky. They come with 4 prs of different sized nubs and the standard size fits in my left ear well and feels stable. I've tried all of the other sized nubs for my rt and none of them feel super stable unless I really jam into my ear canal (not so fun). It's still pretty stable and as long as I'm not dancing around too much righty stays in - it just doesn't FEEL stable and that's a little distracting. I wish they made attachments that would wedge against the cymba of the ear - I think that would warrant 5 stars regardless of the batt life.

title: Quality ear buds with great sound and high end feel
body: This my 3rd pair of wireless earbuds and these are by far my favorite. The sound is amazing for the price, the pairing is the easiest of all my ear buds and paired flawlessly on the first try to phone and HP laptop. The build quality is solid and feels high end. Even the case feels high end.

title: Cuts in and out
body:
The left earbud cuts in and out repeatedly (every few minutes). The earbuds lose contact with the device. This problem exists on an iPad Pro 11 inch (latest model) and on my laptop. I should have listened to the other reviews. I plan on returning these to Amazon. Very disappointed because they do sound reasonably well.

P.S. Tozo support contacted me wanting me to do a product reset (on a brand new item?) and to watch a series of videos for instructions on how to use these earbuds. Odd for something that is purported to be automatic pairing. BTW, I did the reset as instructed and it failed.

title: Best pair of earbuds I’ve ever owned. They flat out work great!
body: The TOZO T10 just flat out rocks in the earbud category. They pair automatically when removed from the charging cradle with no button pushes needed. Ready to go when you are. Sound quality is as good as the high end noise canceling over the ear headphones I own, but so much more convenient. The rare earth magnets in the lid keep the earbuds secure in the case no matter how much they roll around in a backpack. Being water resistant is just icing on the cake. They can be worn while out mowing the lawn, fishing on the lake or just relaxing at the beach.

title: Amazing Discovery | Awesome device
body: Today I realize that I can have two devices connected to theT0Z0 headphones. One is connected to my laptop and the other to my cell phone. I also notice that I can hand one of my buds to another person and we can have a three-way conversation. Excellent device. It doesn't fit my ear as well....keep falling out but I had to write this review. I give u a 4.5 stars..get it to stay in my ear and u get 5 stars.

title: Wonderful earbuds and experience!
body: I adore these headphones! They are incredible alternatives to other wireless earphones. I have only had them for about a week, but I use them daily for hours on end. They are easy to keep charged with the case included and simple to pair. I definitely reccommend these if you are in search of bluetooth earbuds on a budget. The company is incredibly kind and supportive as well.

title: Left earbud frequently disconnects from Right Bud.
body: The sound quality is good but has far too much bass.  Fell out of my ears frequently.  Tried all the sizes of bud cushions but no help.  I returned these for another pair and they had the same problems so I am returning the replacements too.

title: Great earbuds
body: Great earbuds. Super easy to use. Just take it out from the case and it’s automatically paired. Sound quality is great. Super comfortable if you have the right size so make sure to try all (comes with package) . Highly recommend

title: Very Happy!
body:
I labored over the decision of which wireless ear buds to buy for days.  None of the available choices in my price range have all the features I want, and they all have mixed, sometimes highly dubious reviews.

I finally decided on the TOZO T10's, and I'm very happy with them.

Construction of the buds and their case appears to be good and robust.

The waterproofing makes them great for showers.  I haven't used them for swimming, but I would recommend using a larger sized bud than may be comfortable for everyday wear as the addition of water to the mix may cause the earbud to slip out more readily.  This isn't a problem, unless you have really big ear holes since it came with 4 sizes of silicone tips and can use standard replacement tips in whatever size you need.

They do not have all of the control functionality I would like, the button basically answers/rejects calls and pauses/plays media.  It doesn't skip, adjust volume or really much of anything else beyond that.

Call quality is not great, but cupping your hand from the earbud to your mouth definitely makes enough improvement to the mic's pickup to make them functional for calls.

Syncing via Bluetooth is super easy.  The earbuds can both be used singly or paired, and either earbud will work in either ear (when paired together, the R earbud is always the Right Channel  and the L is always the Left).  Signal quality is pretty solid up to 30 feet, I can leave the case and my phone just about anywhere in the house and be anywhere else in the house without losing connection.

The charging case works as advertised.  I haven't had a day yet where I ran out of power, though I have occasionally had to drop to using one earbud so that one can be charging while I'm listening to the other.

Noise cancelation is moderate, as it is more a byproduct of having something stuck in your ear than any sort of purposeful engineering.

They do have the mildly annoying trait of beeping every second for the first 10 seconds or so after they link up, but it does stop just about the time you're trying to figure out WTF.

They may not do everything I want as well as I want,  but they do everything I required and most of what I wanted.  There are undoubtedly better wireless earbuds out there; but, for the price, I don't think these can be beaten.

title: Great Product! Better than Expected!
body: Great product!  I didn't expect this type of quality from bluetooth earbuds.  It works better than my wired head phones.  The sound is outstanding with its bass.  I use these for work and for working out.  When working out these never fall out when i'm running on the treadmill or just lifting weights.  It says last about a few hours per charge, but I used it for work a few times and I got 6 hrs of usage with the headphones still showing 25% left.  These are way louder and crisper than my other earbuds I have.  I can tell the difference between these bluetooth earbuds and my other ones.  The sound is clearer and louder.  The case having wireless charging is also a big plus!  The only thing  I will say that could be improved on atm is the case that holds the earbuds, its just all plain black.  I would've loved like a TOZO logo or something to show off :P.  Will definitely buy again and recommend to others.

title: Good quality earbuds
body: First off, pairing was simple, I removed the earbuds from the case and they paired with my phone automatically. Connect within seconds every time I've used them after that. Sound quality is impressive and the range is good. Good value for the money.

title: Great earbuds that stay in your ear!
body: These earbuds are great simply for the fact that they connect easily and stay in your ear when moving around or exercising. I use these at work in the construction industry so I like that they don't snag on anything, but also because the battery will actually last for the whole day. The case is sleek and the earbuds charge quickly. The sound quality is excellent, even at high volumes! Would definitely recommend! Great value:)

title: 1/4 the cost of airpods 2
body: Build quality is excellent.  Magnetic closing case closes with precision.  Sound quality is good.  Pairing is seamless and straight through. I would buy again.

title: Yes they are water proof and still sound excellent.
body: Love these for running, swimming, yard work and you can even shower with them.

title: That why does this product work the way it is described on website.
body:
I was very excited about these earbuds, but had that worst experience.  The right one loses connection whenever it wants to and goes silent. Pairing process is so bad that I don't connect automatically and you have to do it manually every single time. These behave very poorly outdoors and you cannot listen to  any thing at all.
Overall this product is really not what it has been described and total waste of money.
On top of that the customer service thinks that giving you a new free earbuds will solve the problem, made feel thati am looking for a freebie. Not nice I  their part at all

title: Great sound and noise canceling really works!
body:
Overall, I am very satisfied with my purchase. First I bought a more expensive product that arrived broken and I was super upset, but then I saw these and the ratings were so good and the price stood out to me, as well, that I thought I'd give them a try.

They were so easy to set up and the noise cancelation is amazing. I have to watch out that I don't miss important alarms or something while I have these in! The sound quality is so good, too. I was worried that these were not as cute as the more expensive ones I had returned, but the ergonomic design makes up for it because they are so comfortable and definitely don't fall out!

I would recommend these to anyone. Part of me is glad the other earbuds didn't work out for me because I got to get these great ones instead!

title: sound nice, mic isn't so nice
body: they sound great, but don't expect to be able to have conversations with people on the phone.. they can't hear you unless you have your head in a box. but for headphones only good buy, has deep bass for little speakers

title: It's pretty great
body:
I'm one of the very, very few people who cannot use the apple air pods. No matter how hard I try, they fall out of my ear in less than a minute. I thought I would try a different brand, and when I put these in my ear, they fell out within seconds. I was about to give up, pack up the box, and send it back, but I decided to check out the instruction manual in case i was doing something wrong. I’m so happy I did. Turns out there were 4 sizes of plastic ear caps included with the earbuds. On my third try, the second smallest ones, I felt how i imagine Cinderella felt when she tried on the glass slipper. They were perfect and no matter how much I jumped up and down or shook my head, they stayed in place!
The quality of sound is impeccable, nice highs and lows, with a decent amount of bass. Once I found the right match, the fit was extremely comfortable.
I love these headphones, they have already changed my life for the better!

title: Super Impressive
body: I bought these a few weeks ago and wanted to test them before reviewing. I can safely say these are the best wireless earbuds I've ever used. They don't fall out on the treadmill or while lifting and they are great in all situations. It's crazy how well these little things cancel the outside noise. The charging case makes it super convenient so that I can go days without worrying about them dying. Overall I'm super impressed with the quality of the earbuds, I even bought a second pair for my wife.

title: Not the product as described (Specially Swimming)
body:
One of the important feature as advertised was it can be used while swimming. However the movement your head is down the sound is off. The manual states that it can work unto one meter but it does not !!!!!
This was very disappointing. I had also suggested my colleagues for this feature and even they purchased on my word. But eventually all of us are disappointed.

title: Great buy for price point
body:
I'd like to preface this brief review by stating I was given a new pair of headphones to test by TOZO.

These are good headphones for several reasons: they're pretty darn loud, the case carries a really long charge before having to plug back in, you can tell when the charge is done without opening the case, and for those that have fully transitioned to wireless charging, all you have to do is place the case on top of a charging mat.

The customer service was excellent. They reached out to me attempting to rectify any issues once they saw my return.

For the price point, well worth the investment

title: Super Comfortable!
body:
I've been looking for headphones that were comfy and didnt irratate my neck or whatever. These a great, I forget I have them in some times. They stay in my ears pretty good too, I have to push them in from time to time, but not an issue for me. The sound quality is pretty good as well, especially for the price.

UPDATE - I loved my last ones so much, that as soon as I broke the new ones, I bought some more, without even realizing that I had a warranty on the other ones.

title: Amazing quality compared to more expensive wireless earbuds
body:
I've had these for a few months now.
I love these wireless earbuds! Comparing TOZO 10 to the apple airpods and BOSE wireless earbuds. These are WAAAAY better. They cancel outside noise and insulate whatever you're listening to. The sound quality is very high. The battery life is the perfect amount for me. Extremely satisfied with this purchase. Plus customer service is amazing as well.
If I were to get any cons. The distance between the source and the earbuds is kinda short. And I wish I got them in white!

title: Bluetooth range isn't great
body: For the price of these earbuds they are worthwhile but if you're going to buy these you should know the Bluetooth connecting range it's not very far if you walk 5 feet away from your phone you will start getting lag between the music it will start going in and out but the water resistance is awesome my only wish is that they had better Bluetooth range and they lasted just a little bit longer but the sound quality is unbelievable for ear buds I'd say it's worth the price

title: Great pair of earbuds!
body: I received my package quickly and everything was secure. Upon opening it, everything looked new and the earbuds looks well made. These were my first pair of true wireless earbuds ever so I didn't know what to expect but pairing to my pixel was easy. The case is sturdy and I appreciate the ease of seeing the lights to know when charging is completed. The lid is magnetic so generally seems like it won't accidently open. I was super impressed with the sound quality. I am no audiophile but the bass was great and there was good depth to music. Will update to see how battery life holds! Overall, great pair of earbuds!

title: Love them!
body: My office cubicle is next to a conference room where many loud meetings take place, but my work requires me to focus and concentrate! I tried a white noise machine, but it didn’t cut it. Add these babies and I can’t hear people standing next to my desk! Oh blessed quiet to work-with music, pop casts, need, etc playing quietly in my ears! Pretty good sound quality too, I was impressed! Now I need to try them for working out! I walk everyday, so I put these in the charger case while I walk and during lunch to keep them going all day!

title: It’s okay
body: I wanted to give this a better rating but honestly don’t want to be the reason someone decides to purchase. The great thing about this product is that it gives you different sizes of ear buds. The battery does not last long, and it’s hard to connect the Bluetooth at times. Sometimes when your blood is playing louder than the other and there’s not a way to fix that after a couple of time The battery does not last long, and it’s hard to connect the Bluetooth at times. Sometimes when earbud is playing louder than the other and there’s not a way to fix that after many attempts

title: Comfy, stay put, rockin' headphones. Beats out AirPods for me!
body: Really great, very comfortable set of headphones that stay in place, even with seemingly lots of jostling. Almost comfortable enough to sleep in. They aren't much for noise cancellation- but they aren't meant to be. They way they are put in and fit is quite clever. I immediately appreciated how cushy they were. My husband is completely unable to wear AirPods, they simply won't stay in his ears. These do. The battery life is what it is. But the case is an amazing charger and only takes 20-30 min to go from flat dead to a full charge and you're rolling again. If you just simply drop them in the case every now and then throughout the day, they last quite easily. I bought these over AirPods for myself and I'm glad that I did, 10/10 would buy again. And now having used both... I think I can fairly say this is the better purchase.

title: Great Sounds with Limited Features
body: For the asked price, this product provides great sound quality and accessibility. However, the buttons are unconventional in a way that the buttons allow you to pick up the call, cancel the call, dial the most recent number, and pause/play music. What it can't (it really should have these functions) do is skip the song, go to the previous song, and volume control. Overall, great earbuds with amazing sound quality.

title: Not without their issues
body:
The sound quality is nice. A little surprising considering the other issues. Sometimes they pair quickly, sometimes it's just faster to manually pair them. Annoying. Sometimes when I pull them out of the case, one earbud dosen't come on. I have to put it back in a couple times before it'll fire up. I find it hard to believe these are bluetooth 5.0, the range isn't very good so its probably wise to keep the device you're running these off of nearby.

Overall, these were $50. Are they worth it? Yeah, the sound quality was better than expected and the case having the ability to wireless charge is nice.

title: Great sound, nice fit, reliable signal, good quality
body: Ear buds and charger case nicely designed and good quality. Buds come with three different sizes of ear piece, so you can find the ideal fit. Although not ergonomically shaped like some others, they fit very well in the ear and are very secure. I wear them walking the dog and doing yard work and landscaping and they have not fallen out or even come loose. Haven't used them swimming. GREAT SOUND, not at all 'tinny' and with impressive base. Reliable signal from phone to buds. Very easy to set up and after that, they connect automatically. They cancel out external noise very well. Linking up mini-USB for charging case is a little fiddly as there is a waterproof cover for the charging port, which is recessed into the charger case. Heartily recommend and am going to buy again for my teenage kids.

title: Bad Bluetooth connection, bad sound quality
body: The sound quality of these ear buds were sub par. It sounded a bit buzzy and barely any base. The Bluetooth connection also wasn’t too great. It would cut off from time to time. Would not recommend, especially at this price.

title: Solid Purchase
body:
This product is a solid purchase at this price point, it has great sound quality and stays in rather well.

The only reason I can't give it 5 stars is because the charging tab was almost impossible to open.

title: Amazing fit and sound quality!
body: I was skeptical about these at first and a coworker told me he had these and loved them. I decided to pull the trigger and pick up a pair. When they finally arrived and I had the opportunity to try them out I was shocked at how well the sounded and fit. Now I’m a bit of an audiophile and have several pairs of Audiotechnica cans and trying to compare there buds to those is like comparing apples to oranges. However with that being said, the sound quality on these are very clear and natural. I have gone in long runs with these and they didn’t budge once for me. I would definitely recommend these to anyone else looking for something in this category.

title: Sound cuts out, won't auto connect
body: Got these instead of Samsung, mistake.  As others have said, while mowing and phone in pocket, they constantly cut out. When they were working they were great, I could hear everything while mowing. They work great with the phone on a table walking around the house.  I also have to manually connect them every time I pull them out. Using a note 9.

title: Way Better Quality Than Expected!
body:
I am really surprised about the quality of these earbuds for the price. Qualtiy packaging, manual booklet, something you'd expect from a name brand product. A much better unboxing experience than I expected.

The case has a nice heft to it and feels strong, like you could drop it or even throw it at the ground and it'll hold together nicely. I love the magnetic clasp, which also feels strong and I have no worries of it coming open on its own. One thing I really wasn't expecting was the earbuds magnetically snapping into the case, so cool!

The buds themselves are nice and light, very comfortable. The paired instantly when I pulled them out of the case (they come partially charged). Connected to my laptop and my phone no problem. I found that when connected to my laptop that if you right click the volume button on the taskbar and turn on Windows Sonic Spacial Sound they sound way better than without.

Anyway, I'm very happy, and the year warranty was a nice surprise too!

title: Ok product so far
body:
These are the first wireless earbuds I have ever bought. I use them for talking on the phone and listening to music. They were great for a while and then the left earbud would go quiet I have to tap on it to get it to work correctly. Contacted seller they are sending a replacement pair. We will see how that goes and update when I can check out the new set. Delivery was fast and so far the communication with seller has been very helpfull

Update the new ear buds work great. I would purchase again

title: Great earbuds for music
body: These earbuds are perfect for working out, while jamming to your favorite tunes. They fit perfectly in your ears, especially with the different sized earbuds to choose from. I really enjoy the fact that the case serves as a charger as well. The only semi-negative experience is the talk quality. I didn't buy these for talking so it's not a big deal to me. You can talk using them, but you'll be told that they cannot hear you fairly often. Other than that, I would definitely purchase again.

title: Functional/Great Customer Service
body: Got these when I lost my much more expensive Bose wireless.  They are fine and well worth the $$$.  They do not have the sound quality of the Bose (lots of high end) and biggest pain is they do not synch quickly.  I have to force it every time.  That being said, they work just fine.  I upgraded this review to 4 stars as they sent me a new set upon reading my comments.  Great communication.  Nice folks.

title: Excellent product, exceeded my expectations!
body: I read reviews on numerous products as I wanted  these as a gift to my husband. Although some reviews for this kind/brand were negative, overall it seemed to be the best. I’m so glad so went with this lair because did not disappoint! My husband LOVES them! They sound great, feel great, and have a long battery life. Due to a weird situation, he lost one. We ordered a 2nd pair of these. He didn’t want to look up any others because he was so pleased with these. The 2nd pair is also fabulous!

title: Best overall listening device I’ve had yet.
body: Tozo T10 love the way they fit my ears,  this is the first his sit I’ve had a busy annoying my ears. Overall I really like them I wish they had some kind of volume control on the earbud. And sometimes I only use one I would like to be able to use either right or left not just right because they definitely cancel the outside sound very well.  The voice recognition is a little slow sometimes it doesn’t understand what I’m saying,  I like to do dictation and I have a strange  accent.

title: Best earbuds ever
body: Love these! They're the best earbuds I've ever had. I bought the three-year warranty because I've had such poor luck with other earbuds that don't last longer than weeks or a few months. I might not need it, but it was worth $5.99 to me. Highly recommend!

title: They are great
body:
The headphones are nice and loud, and you can wear one of them at a time.  They probably only last about two-and-a-half
 hours at full volume.

title: Fantastic Sound, Great Price!
body: Bought these because a few people at work had earbuds like them and I liked the idea of the rechargeable case.  When I received them the sound is great and the bluetooth worked flawlessly.  I needed to change the size of the earbud cover and the size I needed only had 1 in the package, a quick email to customer support and they shipped one right out to me no questions asked.  I highly recommend these for the price!

title: Awesome sound, excellent bass, great fit in ears, horrible bluetooth connection
body:
After trying a few off brand earbuds, these were by FAR the best audio quality. I would LOVE to keep them, but the bluetooth connection is just unreliable. The left earbud consistently has problems connecting right out of the charging case and it drops during music playback. Seems to work best when your phone isn't moving, but once you start moving around it goes in and out very badly. Probably going to have to return, and I'm bummed about it... Giving it a couple more days.

Edit: Didn't get better, leaving 2 stars because if you're stationary its ok. But can't give more than that. Unfortunately having to return these.

title: Amazing Earbuds for the Price - 10/10 Would Recommend
body: If you are debating about whether or not to buy these or Airpods, buy these TOZO earbuds! First, they literally sound exactly the same to me, despite the immense price difference. Second, they fit better in your ears. Third, it seems pretty likely that you could lose one (as it is with airpods) - wouldn't you rather pay less and then if you lose them replace them for less as well?? I would definitely recommend this product!!

title: Poor product
body: This is a product that doesn't match the facts. The quality is completely different from the online rating. The quality is not good. The opening of the box makes me very disappointed. It feels very bad. The packaging looks the same. When I try to use it, I can't pick it up.  I took the Bluetooth headset and it was very uncomfortable to put on my ear. The sound quality was poor. I decided to return it, but I was eventually deducted the $8 fee. I hope everyone can consider buying this product again!

title: Been looking for affordable wireless earbuds that have decent bass and I finally found them.
body: Everything I have tried in the past has lacked in some way. These stay in, have decent battery, great sound and are easy to use. Added bonus is definitely the case. I’ve been using for a couple weeks now and didn’t realize how much I enjoyed that the case charges it 4 times before I ever have to put it on the charger. I didn’t buy it for that feature but I am definitely appreciating it.

title: Left Earbud Cuts Out
body: The sound quality is good. They are comfortable. And great buy for the money. However, the left earbud keeps cutting out whenever I move my head. This is very annoying. After researching the problem, I found that this happens to the majority of wireless earbuds, regardless of price. Still, I will be returning these and just get a pair of Apple AirPods. Didn't want to have to do that, but the cut out on the left side is very annoying.

title: Love these earbuds...
body: I have had several pairs of wireless earbuds and headphones and they have had issues and quit working pretty quickly. Usually after a little sweat gets into them. But these are water proof, so no worries there. Also battery life has been an issue but these lasted three times as long as other earbuds. But the most impressive was the sound quality, rich bass and sharp treble, the audio range was awesome. I have recommended these to friends and family. I also love the storage case/charger, very nice.

title: Best bang for the buck!! No question.
body:
These earbuds are fantastic!! They sound great!! I’d definitely recommend these earbuds for the cost as compared to higher priced earbuds. I really like that this pair is waterproof!! And if you do get them soaked, you can let them dry out for two hours and they’re ready to go. Not sure how many Bluetooth earbuds are waterproof, especially at this price point!! Solid design. Sound quality is great, for both parties, on phone calls as well. No complaints here.
Thank you for a quality product.

title: Great product value!!!
body: I would use this item to be able to listen music through high quality. This product provides great features and it's a fair price value as well. This product has great features and it helps to zone out any noise that might cause any disturbance. What I liked about it, is it's unique shape and how they look. I really like them a lot.

title: TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds are amazing
body: TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds are amazing. I do not think you can find anything better for the price of the TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds. Very good sound quality. Easy to pair, the case is very nice well thought and very easy to carry. I say TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds are the best choice if you are looking to buy Earbuds. TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds are just outstanding.

title: Great quality for the price.
body: Great product. They provide different size fitting for your ear and I have to say  you have to try all the sizes they provide to get the right fit for you. The sound is great for earbuds. Ran with them in the rain and it worked well. charging is very easy with little chance for mistakes

title: Great for mono horrible for stereo
body:
In mono when I only use the right it works pretty well. The problem occurs when I want to use stereo. Every single time I try going stereo, the signal will just cut out of the left on and off. It’s horrible. On top of that, even when it’s not strobing, the signal sort of pans back and forth between the two earbuds in the oddest way.

The frequency response isn’t the worst. If you like your headphones bass heavy, this is good. The battery life is incredible and the build quality actually isn’t bad as far as material goes.

If it wasn’t for the fact that I can only use it with one ear I’d give it a 5.

title: Went in skeptical... came out feeling like a genius!
body:
So, I originally had my mind set on the Klipsch or Sennheiser wireless earbuds, but after reading a lot of reviews I was worried about spending hundreds of dollars on something that I may not like (I am used to my wireless over-the-ear Sennheiser headphones).

I came across these TOZO T10 Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds and was extremely intrigued by the price, reviews and look.  I figured that I'd rather 'test-drive' the earbud format in a less expensive item so I ordered them.

They arrived in 2 days and I eagerly opened the high-end packaging and paired them with my iPhone.  I placed them in my ear and was shocked that my fears were unfounded - they fit very well and even with a lot of rigorous head-shaking I couldn't get them to budge!  I queued up a variety of musical genres and let it rip.... wow!  These earbuds sound better than any of my wired earbuds (more expensive models) and are easily on par with my over-ear models.  Their sound has a nice, full, warm, bass with clear highs.  More than loud enough - I didn't even come close to full volume with any of the songs I played.  Bottom-line?  I love these earbuds and plan to get a second pair to keep solely at work.

Additionally, the warranty setup was quick and easy and there was even a welcome email with an invitation to reach out with any questions or issues (of which I have had none).

Feel like a genius as well by purchasing a pair of these great earbuds.

title: They work.
body: I actually would give the product 4.5. I tried 5 pairs and these are the ones that work in the conditions I need them to. I do a lot of trail running so I am out in the sticks so to speak. I do want to mention that the right one works consistently but not so much the left bud. At home they are above average and have range pretty much throughout the house when away from the device. Battery life seem good but I haven't timed it.  Charger is decent weight and I've charged buds up to four times per charge, And the case lid is secure. Good communication with the company.

title: Perfect fit, good sound, and great noise cancellation
body: These earbuds are easy to pair, have multiple sizes of pads to ensure a good fit, have a great system in place to charge wirelessly, and actually work for me. I have tried numerous wireless earbuds that for some reason have issues connecting to my phone if there is any part of me that between the receiver and the phone, but these ones seem to be able to overcome this issue for me.

title: NO MORE WIRED HEADPHONES!!! Yes please
body:
These things will not disappoint!
First of all they come in a professional package with a really nice charging case/ box *
I was getting sick of dealing with wired headphones at work and i look forward to no more of that non sense.my first pair of ear buds and im extremely glad i went with this brand! There are cheaper sets available  but i recommend going with these Tozo T10s.. the sound quality is great! Thanks Tozo!

title: A product in need of further development
body: These buds fit ok, sound good, but the left channel keeps cutting out for brief but annoying instances intermittently. The battery only lasts about 3 hours on a full charge; I'd expect six out of a good product. I'm afraid I'm going to be tossing these and buying another pair.

title: Not for TV but great otherwise
body: Wanted to watch TV but T10  does not have any way to control volume. I'm older and normally wear hearing aids and Tozo T10 output is very loud. If your TV has optical audio output only, and many newer TVs this is the only audio output, you cannot control volume using the TV, thus no way to control volume. Works great with cell phone, but not for TV. Did not use long enough to rate moisture wicking.

title: Awesome Sound Quality and Excellent Price
body: These earbuds caught me by surprise. I was looking for an IPX 8 earbuds for working out and decided to purchase these. The price was too nice to pass up compared to several other brands. Charging and operation is very simple. I like the charging case and solid feel of the earbuds. The sound is amazing though. I have a pair of Powerbeats and they sound terrible compared to these earbuds. I have yet to work out with them but they fit fairly snugly so I don't anticipate problems.

title: can't believe all the positive reviews
body: These headphones are terrific.....if you aren't moving at all and your phone has line of sight to the earbuds. The connectivity on these are terrible with motion. I am very disappointed and will be replacing these with airpods. Another example of you get what you pay for.

title: heavy to the ear drum and very large ..
body: its ok,but it does not come with extra ear buds for the different ear sizes like in the add, contacted co and you have to reply with all this info like i am trying to waste my time to get free ear caps. NO GOOD .also its kind off heavy to the ear and not sure its a good choice if you are using them for running . i will say it goes dead after about 6hrs of use and they are bulky so if you have small ears or drum its gonna stick out or fall out

title: Excellent quality and great sound
body:
UPDATE:  After over 1 month of use I am VERY pleased with this purchase.  I can wear them with NO irritation to my ears, the sound is still very good, and I am not having any connection issues.  I have learned to always take the right ear piece out of the charging case first and then the left - otherwise they don’t connect smoothly to my devices.  The ear buds stay in my ears whether I’m walking around, exercising, or laying down.  I love how easy and fast they are to charge.

Initial impressions:
The charging case feels nice and sturdy.  It has a strong magnetic closure that securely holds the lid closed.  The ear pieces lock into their slots magnetically as well.  Very well made.

The ear pieces feel comfortable and easily fit in my ears.  It comes with several pairs of ear tips so it is easy to find a good fit.

Out of the box, the ear pieces had a partial charge but not enough to successfully use them - could not get them to pair with each other or my phone.  I recommend before first use, completely charge both the case and the ear pieces.  After charging, the ear pieces worked exactly as described.  They paired with each other within 10 seconds of removing them from the charging case .  Then they easily paired with my iPhone 6s - the Right ear piece shows up in the bluetooth list.  After pairing the first time, they now automatically pair with my phone every time I take them out of the charging case.  I can also use them with my iPad easily.

If you see both a Right and Left ear piece in your bluetooth list turn off you bluetooth and let the earpieces pair together first - you will see a slow blinking blue light on each ear piece when they are paired to each other then turn your bluetooth back on.  You should see only the Right ear piece in the bluetooth list.  Select it and you will be set to go.

My first day using them has been very successful.  I popped my ear pieces in, selected some music, put my phone in my pocket and went for a nice walk.  They never lost connection with my phone.  They seem to have adequate noise cancellation for what they are and I am satisfied.  I like the sound quality - the music sounded rich with good bass.  I don’t like my bass to be thumping loud and these ear pieces seem to have a good balance to them for any type of music.

Overall, Day 1 with this product has been very satisfying.  I am enjoying them very much.  I will continue to update this review.

title: Great Sound
body:
Sound with Base!!!!
The Biggest Draw back CAN'T skip tracks with these ear buds!

Some Engineer thought is was more important to be able to last redial than skip a track. Most times using my phone as a way to call someone its in my hand and I can redial or call who I want. When listening to music its in a pocket or a holder and it would be nice to skip a track with out touching the phone!!!!

title: Quality set of wireless earphones
body: I have found the quality to live up to the cost. The sound quality is as expected from the price point with nice a bass and a respectable mid to high sound range. They definitely fit in my ear better than other wireless headphones that I have tried especially due to both the light weight and the adjustable earpiece sizes that are provided. It is also a plus that the charging case is supposed by wireless charging and the headphones are IPX8 instead of 7 or below. Overall, I would recommend these earphones to friends and family.

title: Good Purchase
body:
I’ve had these Bluetooth earbuds for 2 months now. I love how easy it transfers music from the phone to the car speakers and back. The charging time is great as well. Charging it for about 30-40 mins can last up to 3 hours of listening time. I use it a lot even in the shower. It works great.

Cons:

The bass was great at first but now it’s not at its best. The left bud sometimes acts up and just doesn’t work so I have to put it back in the charger then get it again. It’s not so bad but it can be an inconvenience when you’re in the shower.

title: Good sound but not the most durable
body: I'll start off with the good. The sound quality and base for the price of these is great. The costumer service from this company is also amazing, however the product has some major problems. It took 3 tries for the company to send me a pair that worked. I'm happy with them now that I have it, but the quality of product can't be that good if they came in broke. Altogether it was a good purchase for the price, but only if you get a working pair.

title: Grat for the money
body: I would say they are excellent for the money. Have a very good bass response detailed highs good mids What's not to like!

title: Not impressed!
body: They only work for about twenty min. And they don’t stay in the ear!!! No matter what size I used. They kept falling out!!! I’m not impressed. I won’t be ordering them again!

title: The best investment EVER!!
body:
These earbuds are so awesome! I wear them in the shower and they have not gotten any water damage. I also listen to them in quite loud places and they do a VERY good job of blocking out the ambient noises. With the right earpieces they also do a good job of staying in you ear! The customer service is also top-notch! They allow you to activate a warranty when you receive it in the mail and are very helpful when you have any issues. Also you could get some free offers ;) .
One other thing that this earbud set has over other, similar earbuds is that the voice it uses to let you know when the battery is low and when it powers on/off isn’t too loud and obnoxious. This is an underrated feature but it means a lot to me because when I’m jamming out to my favorite song I’d hate to have some loud robotic voice screaming in broken English: “Battery Low! PlEaSe ChaRGe NOw!!”  🙄 Bit again this one is great!

title: Best quality earbuds ever!
body: This was a gift for my son’s bday and his response was “ these are the best earbuds EVER!”  And I agree! Great quality product with amazing sound ata fantastic price!! Will definitely purchase again for a gift.

title: Just what I wanted!
body: I got daith piercings in both ears for migraines 3 years ago and I haven't been able to find an earbud that doesn't hurt, or that I don't jerk out of my ear while running. These are exactly what I was looking for! I wear only 1 earbud for running because the noise cancellation works so well, but the sound is so good! I'm super happy with my purchase and the fact that they're so easy to charge! I've only used them a full day so far, so if anything changes (which from the other posts I'm doubting this) I'll update my review. Right now I'm so impressed with them, I've told my husband and son to grab a pair. Love the option of white as well, I prefer it over the black.

title: Fall out constantly, odd fit
body:
After I lost one of my AirPods and couldn't justify the cost of new ones, I decided to get these based on the positive reviews. These do their job.... but not without some major issues. The main problem is the size and shape of the earphones. They are too big to comfortably fit in my ears, and so they constantly fall out and/or cause pain. I typically use headphones when traveling or when listening to a sleep podcast at night, and in either situation it's inconvenient to constantly readjust the earbuds as they pop out or put pressure on my ears. Even pressing down on them to turn them on will usually make them fall out. Based on that factor alone, I don't get a lot of use out of these. The battery life is also not the best. I wish that like the AirPods, they would conserve the battery by turning "off" when they're not in my ears or in the case.

For the cost I wasn't expecting a lot, and they do their job. Had I known they would be impractical to wear on the run, I would have rather spent more money on headphones I could get more use out of, though.

title: Earbud pairing.
body: I use the earbuds in conjunction with my Garmin Vivioactive music watch.  initially, I had distortion and interruptpted music when running.  Then I realized that the right earbud paired with my watch on legs wrist.  I put the left earbud in the right ear and right earbud in the left ear and all is well.  I could have moved the watch to my right hand to also negate the problem.

title: I was happy - good quality and good sound.
body: I was surprised about the quality for the price. The case and the buds are high quality, the top of the case is magnetic which is very nice for long term, they connect immediately upon removal of the box, the case holds a charge well and they sound good. I would recommend these for the price.

title: Great sound!
body: The best quality earbuds I ever owned!  The sound is amazing. I only wish there was a way to control the volume and charge the song from the actually ear piece. But that’s something I can live with, because they fit in my ear better then any other earbuds I’ve ever owned.

title: OKay
body: Battery life and noise cancellation is good, sound quality sucks.  They cut on and off at times, can't use both at the same time.

title: Buy them!!
body: This is my second pair and I really love them. Great fit and good sound. I also love the wireless charging capability.  I highly recommend! They sound great and the distance is very nice and really helpful!

title: Uncomfortable Button Controls
body: They do as advertised and have a very neutral astetic with great sound however their are other IPX8 earbuds of similar design, in the same price range but offer touch controls over the button control on this set.  Button control means you have to physically press the device into your ear which is quite uncomfortable.

title: really impressive wireless headphones
body: first off, the product was shipped quickly and well packaged.  I opened them up and immediately paired them with my iPhone.  The process was straightforward, simple, and worked immediately.  Off to the gym and wow, the sound quality was amazing!  Deep, rich sound that I did not have to crank up to hear.  My older headphones needed too much volume to get a decent bass response.  Not so with these.  They sound great even at lower (safer) volumes.  I would definitely recommend these to anyone looking for a quality headphone at a fair price.

title: Sound quality is great
body: Technology has come a long way from what it used to be, and wireless headphones/earbuds are one of them. These earbuds in particular are definitely worth checking out. There are so many new wireless earbud technology coming out, and this is one you might want to get. It has some pretty good highs, mids, and even lows. If you want to test out a bass intensive song, these should not disappoint. For complete experience, I cannot really complain about the sound quality. They come packaged neatly with a charging dock that you can use multiple times before recharging the dock itself, so you won't lose your world of music or other uses for the earbuds. I haven't had problems with them yet, but I'll keep on the lookout.

title: Bought these for my son
body: My son is a sport enthusiast, goes tot he gym all the time, plays sports in school, etc.  He loves these earbuds.  He said they are WAY better than air pods and are a LOT cheaper too.  That is a win-win in my book.

title: Perfect fit and easy operations
body: So far so great.  The pairing process with my iPhone 11 was simple out of the box and I have successfully used only one earbud (the left one remains in the case for safekeeping).  The out of the box tip was perfect for my ears, but it is nice to have options.  I have a Choetech proximity charger for my iPhone and I was able to successfully use it to charge my earbuds as well.  Sound-wise I primarily listen to non-music (podcasts and books) and it worked well for both of those.  I like the ability to pause the playback from the earbud rather than having to fumble with my phone.  I have not yet used the earbud for a call, but for what I needed these are excellent.  If anything changes I will update.

title: Quality for the money!
body:
I typed a long review on my phone and all of a sudden it's gone. I'm not re typing all of that 😐

Cliff notes:

I like these headphones. They are my first wireless ear buds ever. Charging case and idea is great and after 3 days so far I am very much enjoying them.

I'll follow up in a few months to see.

Great customer service. I was sent an email for a free wireless charger. That's great service!

title: Best decision ever!
body: These earbuds are amazing! They come very nicely packaged, the instructions for pairing were very simple, and they are comfortable to wear. I'm extremely impressed and can't wait to see how they are for my first run. The little charging carrier came precharged and so were the earbuds! I was able to use right away!

title: Great sound, no volume controls
body:
I usually use my headphones while jogging and had been using a bluetooth pair that were wired to eachother for quite some time.  They sounded great but the jogging action would cause the cable to rub off my clothes which would be conducted straight to my ears.  So I decided to jump on the bandwagon and get this pair of wirefree headphones.
Pros:  The sound is excellent.  The trebles are clear, the bass is rich without being overpowering or murky.  I have had very few problems with signal drops (if I put one earpiece in my rear pocket when talking to someone then the signal may drop out).  Also these seem to stay put in my ears with no problems whatsoever.
Cons:  No volume control.  This is a very big con though.  It's ok if you're listening to music via a PC or a phone and then you can use the volume control on the device.  However I primarily watch TV when I'm on a treadmill and use the Amazon fire stick.  Since the default connection volume setting for the headphones is "blow your eardrums out" this presents a huge problem.  The Fire Stick doesn't have volume controls (although the newer versions do).  As a result I cannot use these headphones for the primary reason I got these headphones to begin with.
I've only made one phone call with these earpieces and while I could hear the caller without issue, they claimed they had a very hard time hearing me (however this call was done via skype so it may not be the earphones issue).
All in all, I'm giving these headphones 3/5 starts.  The audio quality is amazing, but the lack of volume controls is a big issue for me.

title: Can’t get it stay in my ears no matter what I do.
body:
I tried all of the different ear plug sizes, but they never sit firmly in my ears.  Can’t get it stay in my ears if I move at all.

Sound quality is below average with very little base.

I’ve used mostly bud ear phones all my life and these are by far the worst.

title: Amazing Sound and Great Fit!
body: So surprised at the fabulous quality of sound with these headphones.  Love the fact that they came with different sized buds for a great tight fit.  Absolutely no problems with their performance in the pool when I’m doing laps and aerobics!

title: Quality headphones at a spectacular price!
body:
Great affordable headphones. Pair easily and sound spectacular.  Probably the best Bluetooth headphones I’ve had.
I’ve used them at work and it’s so nice to have the charging case to put them in. One thing I would like better though is a slightly slimmer case that doesn’t feel so bulky in my pocket.
I have also used them for running and they are perfect. No more cable bouncing around while I run and these bad boys stay put for 3+ miles with a guy who sweats a lot.
I have not tested the waterproof side of them but if they can handle my sweat from running then surely they could stand up to a little dip in water.
They charge with my non Tozo wireless charging pad, I’m going to have to buy another so I can continue to charge my phone wireless at night.
Oh an the battery last at least 3 hours on one charge in the case, all together I can get 3 and a half charged out of a fully charged case.
Overall I’d say give them a shot. If you don’t like them you can always return them.

title: earpiece beeps every 10 seconds for 2 full minutes after successful connection
body:
PROS:
1. 1 year warranty (needs to be activated, instructions are included in package)
2. comfort: good
3. charger: functional for the 30 days i had it. its nice that it comes with a 1 year warranty. make sure you register your warranty to "activate" it.
4. showerproof: functional for 30 days I used it. i put a small strip of packaging tape over the mic hole though. just to be safe.
5. bluetooth range and connectivity: max range is 30 feet for me. which is better than most v4.X bluetooth. no drop outs in media or phone calls.
6. video audio lag: none

CONS:
1. sound: treble is a too high. an EQ setting: "treble reducer" can remedy this somewhat. bass is ok, not good or bad. high treble is annoying.
2. THE BEEPING.
if you use just one earpiece and connect it to your smartphone, it will continue to beep every 10 seconds for 2 full minutes. this is to notify the user that the earpiece is searching for the other earpiece. which is dumbest design idea ive ever seen.
just tell the user in the manual/online that the earpiece will search for the other earpiece for 2 minutes after successful connection. also you can just change the pace the LEDs flash to indicate this searching process instead. i only use one earpiece at a time. the battery for each earpiece only lasts 3 hours. so you can imagine how annoying this gets on a daily basis.

conclusion: i am returning this product for the extremely annoying beeping "feature". knocking off 2 stars for this, and 1 star for the high treble audio.

title: Great Product and Customer Support
body: Initially not satisfied but their support was amazing. Quickly sent me another pair that sounds and works great. The different size ear pieces ensure you can select a pair that fit snugly in your ears. Can easily control calls and music with a tap on the ear piece. Bass was especially great

title: Great Sound. Great Fit. More bang for my bucks.
body: I was looking to purchase a good pair of wireless ear buds primarily for daily use at work. These work very well for that purpose. I am “FREE” to move around the office without the aggravation of cords. The noise cancelling is nice because I work in a cubicle, and I can focus without all the external noise. The sound quality is great!!! I almost bought a more expensive set, but I’m glad I didn’t. These have exceeded my expectations .

title: Quality earbuds - well thought out design!
body:
I was super excited to get these, as I hate how it’s impossible to charge my IPhoneX while using the wired headphones.

I’ll admit I had a bumpy start with them - mainly because I was bull-headed and thought I could just figure them out as I do with most electronics I purchase. Learn from me: do check out and follow the included instructions!

I clearly didn’t properly “pair” them properly or reset when I ran into issues with glitchy connections (or the left earbud losing the signal). When I did this, however? Amazing results.

This earbuds are pretty remarkable given the price - great sound and I absolutely adore the carrying case / charger. It’s so simple - you wonder why this concept wasn’t born sooner.

Overall, love this purchase and hard to imagine going back to the white, tangled cords of death!

title: Light weight, great fit, stay in ears
body: I bought these earbuds for running after using earbuds that connected behind my head.  Initially I had liked those, since they gave me more freedom when working out than the headphones that plugged into my phone.  After awhile, I got frustrated with them since the cord around the back of my neck would snag on my clothes when working out.  It also made it difficult to wear just one earbud.  So I decided to take a chance on these wireless earbuds and I couldn't be happier!  They fit just snug enough in my ears that they stay put without any irritation.  The sound quality is great.  It is so nice to be able to listen to one earbud without having to worry about any cords.  And for added convenience, the charging case makes it easy to charge them anywhere!

title: great product
body: I was looking for headphones to workout in. This have worked amazingly. They stayed in my ears without moving throughout my workouts. I have even started using them at work too. I can wear them without them becoming uncomfortable for a couple hours. They block out almost all outside noise which is great at the gym. The sound they provide is very high quality. I would highly recommend them.

title: Great earbuds just dont take them to 1 North
body:
There awesome for the price.. love them.
I used them for a week they are pretty awesome they do go in an out grom time time....I then went to One North restaurant in the north shore and one of the parking attendant stole them. Ill get a new pair but now i have two case's 😆

title: Finally! Exceeding expectations with Bluetooth earbuds
body:
I’ve now worn these through at least 10 charge cycles and they’re fantastic.

PROS
-sound quality is excellent with great bass that’s not overdone either
-charge time is short. Earbuds charge up quickly on the go (just in the case) AND when needed the case re-charges quickly
