-easy to understand/ intuitive LED lights in the case and on the earbuds
-great Bluetooth range if I need to leave my phone on the counter charging
-zero issues with Bluetooth going single channel
-comfortable to wear for hours!

CONS
-none, these little babies are as advertised and are exceeding my expectations

title: Amazing Earbuds!!
body: I absolutely LOVE my new ear buds!! They are extremely comfortable and the noise cancellation is outstanding!!! I work in a loud warehouse & when I have them in, I can’t hear anything but my music & the sound quality is fantastic!! The case is compact and easy to travel with. They also charge very quickly. I have purchased 2 different brands in the past, but none of them can compare to my TOZO’s. I am very pleased in every aspect from the price, quality and ease of setting them up. Customer support is extremely helpful. You won’t be sorry if you choose TOZO!!

title: No Bluetooth range
body: I purchased these, and then sent them back.  The range of the Bluetooth is about 2 feet line of sight.  If you put your phone in your pocket the signal keeps dropping.  They also fell out of my ears easily.  A few times I had to turn them on and off because the left ear would not sync with the right ear.  Maybe I just got a bum set but this is what I got.

title: Excellent wireless earbuds
body: I have tried many wireless earbuds, but these earbuds so far has the greatest volume capacity, sound quality, and rechargeable charging case. The only downside to this product is the button functionality where it is optimal for calls rather than music. So if you want to increase the volume, skip a song, play a song back, or stop/resume a song from playing, you will have to do it from your device instead of being able to do it with the earbuds.

title: Great ear buds, case and support!
body: This is the 2nd pair that we have purchased for our family.  They shipped right away.  Had an email from the seller making sure that the product was to our liking.  Has a 1 year warranty.  The ear buds charge in the case that is fast and convenient!  Love these ear buds and would highly recommend.

title: Good Quality
body: SO FAR, this product is exactly what it says it is.  However I'v bought these kind of devices in the past, after few months of use you start realizing their "buggs".  As of yet don't see anything wrong with them even call quality (and i'm pretty much deaf in my left ear) is amazing, best I have ever experienced.  Music quality is like no other, bass is so amazing I was impressed!! So over all AGAIN SO FAR, this product is really, really good!!  I will continue this review in about 3 months if I find any crap with these.

title: Really Good
body:
I was skeptical and compared reviews from this Tozo T10 to the Samsung Earbuds and the reviews were pretty similar.  So I thought I would try the $50 risk instead of the $130 risk.  I can say that I'm very happy with these earbuds.  I have a Samsung Note 8 and I haven't had any problems with disconnects/quality.  I've only had them for a few days, so I will update if things change.

Pros:
- Sound is great for small earbuds and the bass is great and punchy.
- Connection is really good for me, so far I haven't had the connection issues others have reported.  Both earbuds stay connected while the phone is in my pocket or sitting 30 ft away.
- Wireless charging ability is awesome and the earbud case is great and feels solid
- My fit was perfect, I had my kids/wife try them on and they were loose, so I can see some people having issues with smaller ears.  I would consider mine medium sized and they are perfect.  Since they fit well, I also can't hear anything when I'm wearing them, which makes them perfect for cutting grass, etc...

Cons
- The side buttons only have the following features (Play/Pause, Accept/End Call, Reject Call, redial last number).  This is a con for me because I wish it had volume and or next track.  I will be using these for music not phone calls.  It would be even better if they could make one earbud control music and the other control phone calls

Overall I am very happy with these.  If they fix the volume/music thing on the Tozo T11 they will be perfect.

title: Amazing Piece of Technology
body:
With these wireless earbuds, I am now able to enjoy my music in the shower, truly an amazing experience. I personally enjoy the cancelling of outside noise and the deep bass these earbuds provide. I have these on during weight lifting and do not have to worry about wires getting tangled up due to it being connected to my phone. I can now set my phone on the side, do my lifts, and not worry about having anything in my pockets getting in the way of my lifting, especially dead lifting where the bar is gliding up your legs and constant hitting your phone that's in your pocket.
5/5 would recommend.

title: Replacement pair is perfect.  Feature-laden.
body: I had a pair of these in black but lost them.  When researching options, I came back to this brand because others don't offer IPX8, wireless charging, and the attractive compact size.  Sound quality is the same as before: balanced and perfectly acceptable.  Wireless interference wasn't a problem like my very first set before a quick and easy exchange with Amazon.  Happy with this product.

title: They fit perfectly. There's a trick tho
body: These are the best Bluetooth headphones I've ever purchased. The battery life is amazing. The case is amazing, it's constantly charged. The fit is amazing. Now regarding the actual fit there was a trick that I did to make them fit perfectly. If anyone is use to work earplugs you know that the recommended way to apply them us to pull (the top of) your ear back and I sent the plugs in. Now, same applies to these headphones. Pull your ear back and insert each headphone in while twisting it clockwise. Once you let go of your ear the plastic piece will form to your war canal and create a perfect fit. Once I did this trick the fit was amazing, the sound was incredible the bass is 10x better. Totally recommend!!

title: Great for the price!
body:
These headphones work great for running, the don't fall out and I am going on day 3 with no charge. I listen to audio books a lot, and even gave these a test while showering. So far no fail on the waterproofing. You can keep volume at a relatively low level due to how well these cut off noise.
My only complaint is that the left earbud loses connection to the right. It happens if I set my phone on the counter and walk around my kitchen, the right earbud keeps playing perfectly clear but the left one starts to drop out at about 3 ft.
Still, the price is good and they sound decent

title: Updated Review- WOW
body: So I was truly disappointed originally with my first experience, the left bud just completely stopped working after the very first time I used it. I wanted to return them, but i didn’t quite have the time to go to UPS to resend it. The seller actually reached out to me and offered to replace my broken set! I’ve been using them for a few weeks now and they continue to impress! The sound quality is awesome, a little tricky to get them to stay in your ear but remember to adjust the ear pieces that it comes with and follow the instructions! Worth every penny :) My experience with customer service was truly what lead me to update my review. Just know they’ll take care of you if you need them! Outstanding!

title: Good sound but not perfect overall
body:
Pros: easy to connect to Bluetooth, good sound to me, great noise cancelling, comfortable with extra ear pieces in a different size, carrying case that also charges them

Cons: no mic in order to answer a phone call, battery life is just over 2 hours.

I bought these to listen to audiobooks or music while cooking. I’ll probably be shopping around for a different set though because the biggest complaint I have for my personal use is that the sound cancellation is almost too good. I can’t hear much of anything if the music is at a moderate volume. This would be great in some situations but I’d like a bit more room awareness and phone call connectivity with my everyday earbuds.

title: Maybe look somewhere else...
body: I've been using the Tozo T-10's for about a month now, so I feel like I've used it enough to write a fair review. The sound quality of the ear buds is ok. Nothing terrible or great to say about it, but that's what I was expecting given the low cost compared to some of the name brand wireless earbuds. The bass is pretty weak and some rock music can sound staticky. The biggest issue with the sound is actually how frequently it'll cut in and out. My phone is in my pocket the vast majority of the time, so distance should not be an issue. I never had this issue with another brand of wireless headphones I got on Amazon, so I know it has nothing to do with my phone or the app I'm using. The biggest disappointment though has been the battery life. The battery life of the earbuds themselves is close to what's advertised, given that I probably listen at a volume higher than they tested; however, the battery life of the carrying case is terrible. I charged both earbuds and the case to full and used the earbuds until they were drained. When I put them into the case to charge, it only had 1 charge left...after not having used it once after a full charge. For those of you who are still on the fence, I think it's worth saving up for a bit and buying yourself a more reputable brand of wireless earbuds.

title: Works as advertised
body: I really wanted a pair of wireless earbuds but didn't want to break the bank getting them. I came across these and all the positive reviews and decided to give them a try. I was surely not disappointed. The sound quality was great and had excellent bass and thanks to additional buds provided I was able to find the right size to fit in my ears. They are water and sweat proof though not submersible according to the instructions and I tested them out by wearing them in the shower. No problem so far and at this point I would definitely buy them again.

title: Really wanted to like these!
body: I really wanted to like these. I had issues pairing these, keeping the connection, and issues with the buds reconnecting after pairing. I would pull them out of the case and they would simply beep at me, it would take upwards of a minute to pair to the phone and I had to go into my bluetooth settings to reconnect a known device. No reason for this. The sound was decent, bass was decent but it seems that the vacuum seal when they twisted into my ears caused instant headaches from the pressure. Didn't even know this was a thing as my other in ear headphones do not cause this problem. But some research on Google confirmed I'm not the only one to have this problem. Earbuds also do not work independently of each other. There are questions and answers on here that are mixed about this but I can confirm they do not work this way.

title: Superior to the competitor's earbuds in every way!!
body:
I purchased the Tozo T10 earbuds for my wife after purchasing a competitor's bluetooth earbuds that she was not satisfied with. The competitor's earbuds were hard to pair, had poor noise cancellation,  have clunky function buttons on the earbuds, have hard to understand and incomplete written instructions and the earbuds made her ears sore.

When the Tozo T10's arrived, we were impressed with the premium packaging right out of the box. The T10's are very easy to pair, the written instructions are clear and thorough, the sound quality is outstatnding as is the noise cancellation, the earbuds have integrated touchpad function buttons, and they are very comfortable in her ears - all superior to the highly rated competitor's earbuds. In addition, the T10's have a sturdy, water proof case/charger that includes a free lanyard to fasten it to a backpack, purse straps, etc. The earbuds and case include excellent battery charge indicator lights. The T10 case can be charged with the included USB cable or wirelessly if you have a wirelss charging pad or stand - an excellent feature! I actually charged the case using the Wireless Powershare feature on my Samsung Galaxy S10 phone. Also included are 4 sets of silcon ear adapters in different sizes for a comfortable, custom fit. The earbud touchpad function buttons make it easy to powere on/off, pause/play media, and answer/reject or hang up from a phone call. The instructions included Tozo's website URL and a scannable code to access their website for support, instructions and warranty registration.

The Tozo T10's are SUPERIOR to the competitor's product in evey way - we recommend them highly!!

title: Tozo T10 Headphones are GREAT!!
body: After my go to headphones died on me I was in the market for a new pair of wireless headphones. I browsed Amazon and came across the Tozo T10 Wireless earbuds. I checked online reviews, watched videos and finally pulled the trigger and purchased them. These headphones have exceeded all expectations for me. The sound is very rich and the bass is very deep and sounds wonderful. When I have these headphones in at the gym I can't hear any weights slamming or people screaming and shouting. This by far one of the best pair of headphones I've purchased.

title: Works well
body: Only been using this for about 2 weeks, There isn't a lot of bass tho only adequate when using it with my ipod, bass turned up all the way, other wise sounds pretty good for the price, also comes with different size ear cushions, good range, I would say about 50 feet or so, I mainly got these for airplane travel, but works well in the house, haven't tried to use with phone yet..

title: Sound quality is average
body:
I have used alot of these wireless earbuds, so I have listened to a wide range of quality.

In my personal opinion, the sound quality is just average. It's not super clear and sounds kinda "muddy". I listened to rock and hip-hop with them. Sounded flat.

They fit really nice in the ear and didn't fall out or anything. Very comfortable to wear.

title: Comfortable wear, great sound, easy to pair and excellent call clarity
body:
I wanted this type device - 2 separate units versus a connected pair - for a while now but waited until the technology was more stable.  Take these out of the charging base and they connect to each other and then your device really, really quickly.  The sound is crisp and clear.  You use your device to control the volume and song advance as there aren't controls for those on the units...but that's actually a better approach in my opinion as finding tiny buttons while exercising usually is an error filled event.
The call clarity is very good and I have not had any drop outs or complaints of muffled speech.  I like these a great deal and think they are an excellent product.

title: These earbuds should be 6 stars
body: I am a senior citizen who has ALWAYS had trouble connecting any kind of headset via bluetooth to any kind of device.  I am so happy to have found the TOZO T10 ear buds.  The directions for pairing were so simple that I was suspicious I would have trouble.  Far from it.  All I had to do was:  take the earbuds out of the black box.  The right bud started flashing red/blue and then connected to the left bud all by themselves in my hands!  I went to my bluetooth menu on my phone and there was "TOZO-T10-R".  One tap and I was connected.  You follow the directions for inserting the earbuds and they are very, very secure.  It comes with 4 sizes of buds.  I changed out the originals for the smallest size.  I reinserted the buds, found a song to play on my iTunes, and OMG!!  Everything worked!!!  And the sound quality is fabulous.  My old ears usually miss half the words on a song, but I could clearly hear every word!  How wonderful!..And a quick tap on the right earbud puts it in pause.  Another tap and I'm back to the song or book or whatever.  These earbuds do exactly what I've needed all these years.  Thank you TOZO.

title: Great Product
body: So far these have met and exceeded expectations. I was able to set my phone on its charger in the kitchen and use the headphones in the shower; no issues with reception or getting them wet. I was also surprised how well they worked while running. I had to push them back in every so often but that happened even with my last pair of wired, over-the-ear sports earbuds. Would recommend.

title: Received replacement ear buds, real deal now
body: Decided to try my hand at wireless ear buds for working out in the gym and for road cycling. Overall extremely satisfied with the quality of the sound and level if noise cancelling. Happy regular listening and no issues in gym. I had one successful bike ride out of 4 rides so far where audio didn't cut out while cycling... I'm not sure the issue here but would love a fix if possible because I have enjoyed the comfort, functionality and sound quality over the the past week of owning these. Updating my initial review. Customer support reached out to me and sent me a new pair of earbuds, of their own accord and no charge to me.  Turns out there was indeed a glitch in the first pair of earbuds. I've gone on 3 rides since receiving new earbuds and all 3 rides have proven that these ear buds are the real deal. The noise canceling and sound quality on the rides are epic! I got exactly what I was looking for and hope that the next model will have more features along the lines of changing tracks. Satisfied and impressed by customer service initiative.

title: Awesome
body: I always sort by customer reviews.  It is better to see what real customers are saying about the product.  The earbuds are outstanding.  nd the after service if needed is there to support you (I have not needed as they just work great).  This is what customer service means.  Paired right up to a single device (iPhone) and a second MacBook Air.

title: Great product, great price!
body: Love these headphones! They deliver great sound, comparable if not better than apple earbuds. I got them specifically for the purpose of not having to carry around my phone at the gym. I Bluetooth connect to my Apple Watch, and keep moving. The only reason I removed a star was because sometimes, the sound goes in and out on one earbud...it never lasts long enough to really annoy me but it’s there. Also, sometimes connecting to the Bluetooth on ur device may require more than one try. But otherwise, solid product for the price! Would definitely buy again.

title: Bluetooth connectivity issues between earbuds...
body:
**Update 5/10/19**

The exact same issue is happening with the replacement earbud set. Right ear stays connected to the phone and has no issues what so ever. The Left earbud drops signal every 1-2 seconds. No amount of resetting fixes the issue. Very disappointed.🙁

RMA requested. They’re going back.

****************************************************

**Update 5/8/19**

I’ve just received the replacement set of the Tozo T10 IPX8 earbuds. They were new, in a sealed box. Pairing with my phone and the two buds went without a hitch. Initially upon first use of the replacement set the left earbud did disconnect from the right earbud a couple of times so I performed the factory reset and there have been no issues. I will put them through the paces over the next 24-48 hours and update again. Still have not heard from Tozo. 🤨 Thank You again Amazon Customer Service! You’re the BEST!!

****************************************************
I liked the look of these earbuds. The reviews sold me so I pulled the trigger on this purchase.

I like the fit and sound. Really like the dedicated charging case that can be wirelessly recharged.

Pairing with my iPhone 7 was easy and the pairing process between the buds was just as easy. They didn’t or haven’t fallen out of my ears. Used them for about a half a day and the Left bud started to lose connectivity with the right ear bud.

After trying the reset recommended in the owners manual I still had the same issue so I contacted Tozo’s customer service via two separate e-mails. Waited 24 hours and heard nothing from them. So I escalated my issue to Amazon’s customer service team who came to the rescue. They’re sending me a replacement set and will edit my review after I receive and use the replacement buds.

title: Sweat Resistant Earbuds
body:
Purchased based on IP rating due to having many issues with sweat destroying earbuds. Would need to purchase a replacement ever few months. So far these are surviving approximately 6-months out, and the case is good for a few charging cycles.
Wonderful customer service. Encountered an issue with intermittent sound in my left ear piece, and they're sending me a replacement.

title: Sleek durable quality 5 STARS!!
body: Awesome sleek stylish durable product! Sounds great listening to music, etc. Can use 1 or both buds. On the phone has nice quality sound without the back noise. It pairs most easily and so comfortable. Says waterproof and tried it. Cool beans! It does live up to its standard. I was torn about AirPods and price, these earbuds are nice quality & good price!  I highly recommend.

title: Customer Service
body: I ordered these based on the reviews and upon delivery, the right ear bud would not work, I was leaving for a trip across country and wanted these before the trip so I was a bit disappointed. However, I reached out to customer service to explain my situation, and they were more than happy to send a replacement free of charge and even expedited the shipping to ensure I would receive them before leaving the country! On top of it all, they work GREAT! HUGE fan of both the product and the customer service!

title: The sound is amazing!!
body: These in ear units are the best. I never wanted to spend $$$ on the big name brand so I figured for the price it ok...: but when I turned these things on and went to the gym I was in ah of the sound these puppies put out. Now I don’t leave home with out them .. there great for walks, runs, gym, plane, anywhere!!

title: Great wireless headphones for the price
body: These were really easy to sync to my iPhone. The battery lasts all day if I’m listening to music or talking on the phone. The sound is clear and the bass is decent. Phone conversations are clear. The noise cancellation is great when music is playing, but I can hear surrounding noise when music isn’t playing. The carrying case is compact enough to fit in my purse, but a little too bulky for jean pockets. It comes with different size pieces for the ear holes, which was perfect for me because I have tiny ears and the set it came with didn’t fit. Really good product for the money! I had older iPod earbuds and these sound and function just as well.

title: Not Worth $50
body:
Not worth $50. If you're just looking for a cheap pair of wireless earbuds to wear around the house, then they might be worth picking up if you can get them for $30. They don't fit well with smaller ears and tend to fall out with mild activity. Even if they do fit well, the left earbud cuts in and out frequently when jogging. Sound quality is about what you'd expect for the price. Everything sounds a little muddled and there's very little noise cancellation.

Overall I'm not happy that I spent $50 on these, and I'm even less happy that they're now on sale for $30 a few days later. Not sure how they have anything above a 3 star rating honestly.

title: Wonderful well engineered product
body: I was pleasantly surprised with these earbuds. Fantastic sound. Stay in your ears even with vigorous head shaking. Spoken connection and on/off status is very complete. And case battery charger is wonderful. LED displays on inside and outside to indicate charging level. Wireless charging for the case make life a breeze. No more fiddling with charging cables. Very satisfied with this well engineered product.

title: Extremely impressed overall and great price to match
body:
Taking into consideration the very affordable price my expectations were far exceeded. Overall I was very impressed with the sound quality, comfortable fit and feel, battery life of the compact earbuds was very suitable to my desires and the waterproofing....works great!! I’ll return to my personal experience addressing my pleasure with the waterproofing of the earbuds.

The only negative aspect I have to mention about the earbuds was already addressed by the seller. That problem being would be the connectivity of the earbuds, the first set I received I had issues with the left earbud cutting in and out of connection. The seller immediately sent me a replacement at my request.
The second set, no such issue thus far after nearly a week, the one year extended warranty is also very reassuring that if they do present any issues it will be taken care of.

Waterproofing, works very well on the first day of trying my replacement pair I didn’t have the earbuds properly secured and lost it in a solution I believed would indefinitely render the earbuds useless. Removed and powered off and dried off, two hours later, back to jamming out to my tunes and finishing the installation of the diesel pump I was working on. Several days later they are still playing like new. I love them!

title: Truly a great purchase
body: Truly a great purchase.  So I was going to purchase the Apple air pods.  I couldn’t bring myself to spend all that money. I really appreciate Amazons reviews and therefore chose to go that route and fell upon these earbuds. Simply put I am extremely thankful and happy with them. I don’t need to necessarily have studio sound quality but I am very much not lacking in overall performance, sound, and quality. I am happy to have this economic alternative which works well. Simply put… I full heartedly recommendation these!!!

title: Good sound, short battery life and Not good for phone calls
body: When they connect correctly they work great for listening to music, movies and videos although they are NOT good for phone calls. Also the battery life is said to be 3 hours and I barely make it to 3 hours so I'm returning them. I bought them with the intent of using them while working, working out and to talk on the phone and need to keep my hands free. So although they do work and sound great I'm not a fan of the battery life and that they don't well with calls.

title: Excellent all around wireless headphones
body: Best $50 I have spent in a while. I do a lot of outdoor activity in the Colorado mountains and these headphones have not budged from running to downhill mountain biking. Love that I can just wear one of them and listen for other bikers or joggers with the other ear. Connection and sound quality is excellent. Charging Case works great, wireless charging is a bonus. Worked great on a recent flight as well. Absolutely no complaints.

title: A nice product, with a few caveats
body:
I bought this product after becoming intrigued at the prospect of completely wireless earbuds, with a case that was capable of charging. I spend a lot of time on my phone, between listening to audio and making and answering phone calls while working from home. The addition of the waterproof factor was also something that was really interesting to me, since I do run and get caught in the rain sometimes.

While I'm still impressed with the audio quality and waterproof factor, I did run into a few annoyances once trying these out, which make be dealbreakers for other buyers. While you can start and stop audio or calls using the buttons on the units, you cannot control volume at all, unless you do so on your phone. I also found that call quality was TERRIBLE, and those I was talking to on the phone often couldn't understand me. The earbuds were also often slow to connect to Bluetooth - I even had to place them back in the case and remove them again to "restart" the pairing process a time or two. Battery life was shorter than some of my other bluetooth earbud units, but still long enough for a good run and a few hours of around-the-house listening.

I will say that I contacted the seller upon experiencing my issues, and they immediately apologized for the inconvenience, acknowledged the issues, and offered me a partial refund (I believe I bought this product when it was priced on the higher end of its average). I was very impressed with their prompt response and interest in maintaining good customer service. My understanding is that they intend to work on these issues and improve them in future models.

Despite the issues experienced, I do think the product is worth the purchase, as long as user expectations are realistic. If you don't talk on the phone with them, have use for the waterproof factor (it IS really cool being able to listen worry-free in the bathtub), and are prepared to adjust volume on your phone, they're a really nice little "spare" buy. I just wouldn't pay my original purchase price of $50 for them.

title: Good sound, bad battery life and connection consistency
body: Good sound, strong bass. Worked well for 45 min to 1 hr workouts. The battery life started degrading about a month after using the product and now the right ear bud runs is intermittent when turning on and needs charging immediately. Also, they sometimes connect to the device when in the charging station which has caused some problems with phone calls and listening to music.

title: Great fitting wireless earbuds with fantastic sound.
body: My husband and I both purchased a pair to try for working out. Out of the box they paired very nicely without any issue.  (Bonus.....They don't conflict with each other when both sets are on) The fit is snug inside the ear WITHOUT adding extra pressure and making them uncomfortable to wear. The noise cancellation was quite an added surprise. It blocks more than enough so that listening to your music or whatever is enjoyable.  They do have GREAT sound quality. nThe bass was perfect. Sweating in them is not an issue. Overall we are very pleased with our purchase and would recommend these ear buds. to others.

title: Well worth the money!
body: I’m a 73 year old walker. I love these T10s. Pairing them with iPhone X was a breeze, and they hook up to it before I even get them in my ears. They have a great sound and stay in place until I elect to remove them. The case they come in is jewel of thoughtful engineering. Easily charges the earbuds multiple times even when it’s unplugged. Magnets in the case hold both the buds firmly in their sockets for charging and the lid down to protect them. The lid is smoke grey, but translucent so you can see the charge level of both the case and the ear buds. I’ve charged the case both via a wireless charger and via the USB C connector. Both ways are fast and flawless. All and all, a great buy with an eager to know your satisfaction level service department.

title: Won't stay in my ears...
body:
The sound quality is good, but there are two problems.
-  Connecting to your device is difficult, as each bud has to connect to each other, things often get confused when trying to connect to the device.
-  The earbuds do not stay in my ears while running.  It seems like they would work if you were on a gym machine with no vertical movement (elliptical, rower, recumbent bike, etc.), but whenever I go for a run, they come loose about every 30 seconds.

title: Terrific value and sound quality
body: I have been impressed with the comfort on the T10 Earbuds and the sound quality. I find the sound to be full and rich and well balanced between bass and treble. Service has been exceptional and I have received an unexpected free wireless charging station from TOZO for buying the earbuds! Great valve for the price and highly recommend.

title: Awesome
body: Bought these for work. I work in a huge boat building factory 10 hours a day. Can hear it perfectly. I use one til It dies which is about 5 hours into the day, and then use the other one. I don't like how I can't skip songs on the headphones. Gotta pull out my phone Everytime but other than that, they're great. I charge the box on Sunday and it keeps the headphones charged until Thursday. Awesome

title: Liking It So Far
body: I had these wireless earbuds for about a week and I have been enjoying them. I like the sound quality and was easy to pair to my devices. The negatives are when using it on call at times the other person cannot hear me but on most calls they hear me clearly. It is however better than other wireless earbuds I had where the other party could not hear me at all. Another thing I noticed is when I use it with my tablet at times there is a slight delay with the audio when streaming shows. I love using them in the shower to listen to music and I don't have to worry about disturbing my family.  So far I like them and I look forward to seeing how they are over time.

title: One week and they stopped working
body: So at first i loved them and after about a week of using them i put them on the charger and they wouldnt charge and the headphones and charging case were extremely hot. There useless now after mutliple times of trying to charge and turn on because they wont charge or turn on. I missed the return window because of being out of town and a busy person.. sucks for me, money down the drain and no headphones.

title: Good value, stays in place.
body: I was very impressed with these headphones. There are multiple size attachments to ensure you get the best fit, and they stay in place very well, even while at the gym (treadmill tested). The sound quality is incredible and they cancel out other noise.  The only issue I've had so far is with pairing when I take them out of the case. It's infrequent and easily fixed, so it's hardly worth mentioning. Good purchase.

title: These are amazing!
body: I have bought my fair share of earbuds. Wired and wireless. These are extraordinary. Very comfortable in my ears, the sound is loud and crisp. I'll definitely but from this store again. Big thumbs up.

title: Great Sound
body: Better than I expected. I had a bit of a problem getting comfortable with the fit, but after a few tries I managed to find the right fit. Great sound.

title: Favorite ear buds to date.
body:
I run with these daily. I love them! Good sound and a pretty good battery life too.

Update: I bought these five months ago, and I still love them. My husband and I both run with them. I just came back to buy a third pair for our son.

title: So far, so good. Very impressed!
body: I've only had these headphones for a short while but am very impressed. I was skeptical about true wireless headphones since I have never owned a pair and the reviews on several of other brands' were bad. I was worried about connection issues, poor sound quality, not connecting to my phone, range, etc. However, with these, I have had no issues at all. The sound quality is AMAZING. They have a really good bass and clarity for such small headphones and being in-ear. I also have had no connection issues and they have really good range. So as I understand it, the right connects to the device and the left connects to the right so that they will always play the same if the right has connection to the device, which is really smart in my opinion. I was also skeptical of them falling out or being uncomfortable but I have worn them several times to run/workout and they stay in place and are really comfortable. I would definitely recommend these for anyone who wants a nice pair of true wireless headphones for much less that name brand competitors!

title: They fell short on the most important part!
body:
Using these for the gym or just general purpose. They fit well they sound good and yes they are def water proof I am very happy with these features.

What I am not happy about is the sound is choppy when my iPhone is in my left pocket and my watch is on my left hand. My body is interfering or other near by freqs are over powering it I am not sure witch but it’s very annoying trying to listen To choppy music or audio books. Plus the left one cuts out with the right one.

I have other Bluetooth headphones and they cut out or get choppy now and again but nothing like these. I will keep using them and once I get to my new geographic location if something changes for the better I will update.

title: Great sound for great value!
body:
I use these regularly for listening to music and videos will at work, through the house. The sound is great, and they fit well - as long as you change the earpieces for your ear size. They also hold a charge for about 3 hours, and recharge very quickly (within 30 minutes). The other thing I really like is the case is the charger - and you can charge it wireless. I have a wireless charger for my Samsung phone and set this on the charger to ensure I have fully charged base every time.
I was skeptical, but very pleased with the purchase. I have had other wireless earphones that I was not so impressed with. This purchase was well worth the money!

title: The bass is amazing!
body: I love the bass on this earbuds! The moment I put it own, it just made me very happy for the rhythms!!! The sound quality is definitely my favorite compared to the other two pairs of earbuds I bought! But only downside is the fitting in my ears. I have small ears, these earbuds they sticking out and it doesn’t look pretty when I’m wearing them and I afraid it will drop out when I work out! I haven’t try it for work out yet but I hope it is going to be ok because it’s staying in my ears when I was just sitting down in the bus, hope it stays when I work out! And battery lift is a little short it still drains out even I was not using it! But it can last 2-3 days no problem! It also depends how much you use them! If you use them a lot it will only last 2 days! Again I love this earbuds because the sound quality is amazing!

title: Adequate but not great
body: I’ve been waiting for a new company to finish crowdfunding some sweet wireless earbuds, but I got too impatient. I picked these because price and product seemed very similar to multiple products getting great reviews. They aren’t very expensive so I was mainly worried I’d get what I paid for. I’m cautious spending too much on pirated tech since it’s usually inferior. These earbuds are very adequate but are far from being great. They pair first to each other, then they pair to my device. A pleasant voice tells me what’s happening, but to hear it you have to get them in your ears fast. The startup happens when you remove the buds from the charging/storage case. The pairing occurs when I’m putting them in my ears and getting the fit as comfortable as I can. I have a small head with similar ear canals. I’m using the small flanges that fit the ear well, but doesn’t provide a lot of surface to counter balance the weight of the bud. With the battery and tech, they have some weight to them. I went on a 1 1/2 mile walk on a dirt road wearing these. I adjusted each side about three times to shift the weight, find comfort, and once to stop it from rubbing the same spot. They may get more comfortable once I figure out their sweet spot. They do a great job blocking external noises because of the fit. I didn’t hear whistling wind from my brisk walk. The sound is adequate but not high quality. The range just flat out sucks with these. I had a pair of shorts with a cell phone pocket by the right knee pit. I’m not tall so it’s not too far from my ears. I would get no noise from one ear, the other, or both just walking. When I moved the phone to my front hip pocket I was able to get a good connection. I had to do nothing more than move the phone from one spot to the other, the earbuds did all the rest to get me listening again. If I did not have to tether the phone so close to the buds I would like them better. I’m hoping technology improves quickly so that our bodies don’t interfere with the signals, but until it’s affordable and effective, I’ll use these.

title: Great for the Price
body:
I dare you to find a comfortable, light wireless earbud for the price.
Was leery at first but I've tried literally most on the market. The expensive ones may have better sound, I mean may have, but lack in other ways. These little guys are light and comfortable, I just wish they were a little bit louder. I work in an industrial atmosphere, some areas louder then others. And it goes without saying, I looked for something different because the expensive one couldn't give the volume levels or comfort either. These ones are close, just wish they were a little bit louder. Guess you have to give up something for comfort.

title: Tozo T10 - Don't hesitate to buy
body: These pair of bluetooth earbuds are great. Pairing is simple and straight forward.  Clarity of sound is amazing. The reviews don't lie. My experience so far has been great. They stay in place through rigorous activities without calling off from the ear, which is a big deal for me as I typically don't have good experience with the ear buds staying in place. Highly recommend and wouldn't hesitate to buy another pair in the future from them!

title: Good product for the price
body:
So far I have liked these earbuds, they are comfortable in the ear, I haven't had any issues with them falling out, and the sound quality is good. They cancel outside noise very well. Paired to my phone well and easily.

Update: was having issues with them not working and the company replaced them for me for free. we'll see if the replacements are any bertter
